Ice formations in the titlis glacier cave
a हिमानी cave is a गुफा formed भीतर the ice of a glacier.
Glacier caves हैं प्रायः called ice caves, but this term is properly used to describe bedrock गुफाएं that contain year-round बर्फ.
In physics, गोलाकार गति is a गति of an ऑब्जेक्ट along the परिधि of a वृत्त or रोटेशन साथ a गोलाकार path.
it can be वर्दी, साथ निरंतर कोणीय rate of रोटेशन ( और constant गति ), or non-uniform with a changing rate of rotation.
the rotation around a फिक्स्ड अक्ष of a three-dimensional देह involves circular गति of its भाग.
The equations of motion describe the movement of the center of mass of a देह.
उदाहरण of गोलाकार गति include : an artificial satellite orbiting the Earth at निरंतर height, a स्टोन जिससे is tied to a रस्सी और is being swung in वृत्त, a car turning through a वक्र in a race track, an electron moving perpendicular to a uniform चुम्बकीय field, and a गियर turning अंदर a mechanism.
चूंकि the ऑब्जेक्ट 's गति वेक्टर is constantly बदलना direction, the moving ऑब्जेक्ट is undergoing त्वरण by a अभिकेन्द्रीय फ़ोर्स in the direction of the बीच of रोटेशन.
बगैर इस acceleration, the ऑब्जेक्ट होता मूव in a सीधा लकीर, according to न्यूटन 's laws of गति.
Apollo पंथ is a fictional अक्षर इससे the Rocky films, initially portrayed as the Undisputed Heavyweight चैंपियन of the World.
He was निभाई by कार्ल weathers.
Creed था अनेक nicknames, including the निपुण of विपत्ति, the King of स्टिंग, the नाचना विनाशक, The प्रिंस of पंच, The एक and Only and the गिनती of मोंटे fisto.
शहरी legend states that अपोलो पंथ 's name is a wordplay on the रसूलों ' पंथ, a बयान of belief प्रयुक्त in Christian चर्च.
All of Apollo 's चैंपियनशिप झगड़े were अनुसूचित for the 15 round distance.
Championship झगड़े किया नहीं convert इससे 15 rounds to 12 rounds until 1987.
रॉकी Balboa is प्रायः wrongly credited साथ popularizing the red, श्वेत, और ब्लू trunks ; पंथ was the पहला man to wear उन्हें ( latterly worn by Rocky बाल्बोआ in the 3rd और 4th किश्तों and finally by टॉमी `` the Machine '' gunn ( Tommy Morrison ) in the 5th installment ) although normally he wore रेड और white, as seen in Rocky ii.
बाल्बोआ 's signature रंगों यहूद ब्लैक and gold—colors he प्रयुक्त in the latest फिल्म.
In the United राज्य, the शीर्षक of federal judge प्रायः अर्थात् a न्यायधीश नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य and पुष्टि by the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट pursuant to the नियुक्ति clause in Article ii of the United States Constitution.
In addition to the परम् अदालत of the United States, जिनकी अस्तित्व and कुछ पहलुओं of जिनकी क्षेत्राधिकार हैं परे the constitutional शक्ति of Congress to alter, acts of Congress have established 13 courts of appeals ( also पुकारा `` सर्किट न्यायालयों '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over अलग regions of the United राज्य, और 94 United राज्य ज़िला न्यायालयों.
Every न्यायधीश appointed to such a court may be categorized as a संघीय judge ; such स्थितियाँ include the मुख्य Justice and संबद्ध justices of the Supreme Court, सर्किट Judges of the courts of appeals, और district न्यायाधीशों of the संयुक्त States ज़िला courts.
सब of ये judges वर्णित यूँ far हैं referred to sometimes as `` आलेख iii judges '' क्युकी they exercise the judicial शक्ति vested in the न्यायिक branch of the federal सरकारी by Article III of the U.S. Constitution.
in addition, judges of the Court of International व्यापार exercise judicial power pursuant to आलेख iii.
अन्य judges serving in the संघीय courts, सहित magistrate judges और bankruptcy न्यायाधीशों, are also sometimes referred to as `` संघीय न्यायाधीशों '' ; however, वे हैं neither नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष nor पुष्टि by the Senate, और their power गर्भाशयी इससे Article I बजाय.
देखिए आलेख i and Article iii tribunals.

परिवर्तनीय Universal Life Insurance ( often shortened to vul ) is a प्रकार of life बीमे that builds a नकदी value.
in a VUL, the नकदी मान can be invested in a चौड़ी variety of पृथक accounts, समान to mutual निधि, and the चुनाव of which of the उपलब्धियाँ पृथक खाते to उपयोग is entirely up to the contract owner.
the 'variable ' घटक in the name refers to इस ability to invest in पृथक accounts जिनकी values vary—they vary because they are invested in stock and/or bond markets.
The 'universal ' घटक in the नाम refers to the लचीलापन the मालिक रै in बनाना premium भुगतान.
the premiums can vary from nothing in a given month up to maximums defined by the आतंरिक Revenue Code लिये जीवन बीमे.
इस लचीलापन is in contrast to whole life insurance कि रै फिक्स्ड premium payments that typically can नहीं be missed without lapsing the policy ( although एक may कसरत an स्वचालित प्रीमियम ऋण विशेषता, or surrender dividends to अदा a पूरे Life premium ).
Variable सार्वभौमिक जीवन is a type of permanent life insurance, क्युकी the death benefit होगा be paid if the insured dies any time as long as there is sufficient cash मान to अदा the costs of बीमे in the नीति.
With most if नहीं सब VULs, नापसंद whole life, वहीँ is no endowment आयु ( the age at जिससे the नकदी मान equals the death benefit राशि, जिससे लिये पूरे life is typically 100 ).
इस is yet another key advantage of VUL over पूरे जीवन.
With a typical whole life policy, the मौत benefit is सीमित to the face amount निर्दिष्ट in the policy, और at endowment आयु, the फेस राशि is all that is सशुल्क आउट.
यूँ साथ either death or endowment, the insurance company keeps कोई नकदी मान निर्मित up over the सालो.
However, some participating पूरे जीवन नीतियों प्रस्ताव riders जिससे specify कि any dividends paid on the नीति be used to purchase `` paid up परिवर्धन '' to the नीति which increase both the cash मान और the death लाभ over समय.
If निवेश made in the separate खाते out-perform the general खाता of the बीमे company, a उच्चतर rate-of-return can occur than the फिक्स्ड rates-of-return typical लिये पूरे जीवन.
The combination over the years of no endowment आयु, continually increasing death लाभ, and if a high rate-of-return is अर्जित in the separate खाते of a vul policy, this could result in उच्चतर मान to the मालिक or beneficiary than that of a whole जीवन नीति with the same amounts of money सशुल्क in as प्रीमियम.
The बाहरी wood boiler is a रूपांतर of the क्लासिक wood स्टोव adapted लिये set-up बाहरी while still transferring the ऊष्मा to interior इमारतें.
a mound of लड़की स्काउट cookies.
इस mound contains 74 बाक्स of cookies
Girl स्काउट Cookies हैं cookies बेची by लड़की स्काउट of the USA ( GSUSA ) as एक of its प्रमुख fundraisers लिये local स्काउट इकाई.
Members of the GSUSA have been selling कुकीज़ since 1917 to उठाएँ निधि.
लड़कियों who participate can earn पुरस्कार for their efforts.
There are also unit प्रोत्साहन if the ईकाई as a whole करता खूब.
as of 2007, बिक्री were estimated at about 200 million boxes per year.

Purdue विश्वविद्यालयों, located in West Lafayette, Indiana, is the फ्लैगशिप विश्वविद्यालयों of the six-campus Purdue University system.
Purdue थी संस्थापित on May 6, 1869, as a land-grant university when the Indiana General Assembly, लेने लाभ of the morrill अधिनियम, accepted a donation of जमीन and money इससे lafayette बिजनेसमैन जॉन purdue to establish a college of विज्ञान, प्रौद्योगिकी, और कृषि in उसके नाम.
the पहला वर्ग were held on सितंबर 16, 1874, with छह instructors और 39 students.
आज, purdue is a member of the Big Ten Conference, and is a खूब ज्ञात world-class research संस्था.
Purdue enrolls the second largest छात्र body of कोई university in Indiana as खूब as the चौथी largest अंतरराष्ट्रीय छात्र जनसांख्यिकी of कोई विश्वविद्यालयों in the United States.
Purdue offers दोनो undergraduate और graduate programs in over 211 प्रमुख क्षेत्रों of study, and is खूब known लिये इसके प्रतिस्पर्धी engineering curricula.
The university रै also been highly influential in America 's history of विमानन, having स्थापित the first college क्रेडिट offered in उड़ान प्रशिक्षण, the first four-year bachelor 's उपाधि in aviation, and the पहला university विमानक्षेत्र ( Purdue University विमानक्षेत्र ).
Purdue 's विमानन प्रौद्योगिकी कार्यक्रम remains एक of the सबसे प्रतिस्पर्धी aviation-specific programs in the संसार.
In the mid-20th सदी, purdue 's विमानन कार्यक्रम expanded to encompass उन्नत spaceflight technology giving rise to Purdue 's nickname, Cradle of Astronauts.
Twenty-three purdue graduates have गए on to become astronauts, including गस Grissom ( one of the original Mercury Seven astronauts ), neil आर्मस्ट्रांग ( the first व्यक्ति to walk on the चंद्रमा ), and Eugene Cernan ( the most recent व्यक्ति to चलना on the चंद्रमा ).
A sebaceous गाँठ ( ) is a term that loosely refers to either epidermoid cysts ( भी ज्ञात as epidermal cysts ; L72.0 ) or pilar cysts ( also known as trichilemmal cysts ; L72.1 ).
Because an epidermoid गाँठ originates in the epidermis and a pilar गाँठ originates इससे hair follicles, by definition, neither प्रकार of cyst is सख्ती a वसामय cyst.
The नाम is regarded as a misnomer as the वसीय, श्वेत, semi-solid सामग्री in दोनो of these गाँठ entities is नहीं sebum, लकिन keratin.
furthermore, अंतर्गत the microscope neither entity contains वसामय ग्रंथियों.
in practice, however, the शर्तें हैं often प्रयुक्त interchangeably.
`` सच्चा '' sebaceous cysts are relatively विरल and हैं ज्ञात as steatocystomas or, if अनेक, as steatocystoma मल्टीप्लेक्स.
आधुनिक pointe shoes.
The edge of the toe pad, जिससे is inserted between the foot and टो बक्सा for cushioning, can be देखी on the right पैर.
A pointe जूता is a type of जूता worn by बैले नर्तक जब performing pointe कार्य.
Pointe जूते developed इससे the desire लिये dancers to appear weightless and sylph -like और have evolved to enable dancers to नृत्य en pointe ( on the नुस्ख़े of their toes ) for विस्तारित अवधि of समय.
They are normally worn by female dancers, though पुरूष नर्तक may पहनें उन्हें for unorthodox भूमिकाएँ ऐसे as the भद्दा stepsisters in Cinderella, नीचे in a Midsummer रात्रि 's सपना, or men performing as women in नृत्य companies ऐसे as लेस Ballets Trockadero and grandiva.
वे हैं manufactured in a किस्में of colors, most commonly in शेड्स of लाइट pink.
This tablespoon रै a क्षमता of about 15 mL.
Measuring spoons
In the us और parts of Canada, a tablespoon is the largest type of spoon used for खाने इससे a bowl.
In the UK, Europe और सबसे राष्ट्रमंडल देशों, a tablespoon is a प्रकार of large spoon प्रायः प्रयुक्त for सेवारत.
in countries जहाँ a tablespoon is a सेवारत spoon, the nearest equivalent to the US tablespoon is either the मिठाई चमचा or the soup चमचा.
A tablespoonful, nominally the क्षमता of एक tablespoon, is commonly प्रयुक्त as a measure of आवाज़ in cooking.
It is abbreviated as T, tb, tbs, tbsp, tblsp, or tblspn.
The capacity of ordinary tablespoons is not regulated by विधि और is विषय to considerable विभिन्नता.
in the USA एक tablespoon ( measurement ईकाई ) is approximately 15 mL ; the क्षमता of an वास्तविक tablespoon ( डाइनिंग utensil ) सीमाएँ इससे 7 ml to 14 ml.
In ऑस्ट्रेलिया एक tablespoon ( measurement unit ) is 20 mL.
Harry Potter is a series of seven काल्पनिक novels लिखा by the British author J. K. रोलिंग.
The books वृत्तान्त the adventures of a wizard, हैरी कुम्हार, और उसके मित्रों रोनाल्ड Weasley और हर्माइनी Granger, सब of जिसको are विद्यार्थी at Hogwarts स्कूल of Witchcraft and wizardry.
the main स्टोरी चाप चिंताएं Harry 's quest to overcome the Dark जादूगर Lord voldemort, whose aims are to become immortal, conquer the wizarding world, subjugate non-magical लोगों, and destroy सब those who stand in his रास्ता, especially हैरी कुम्हार.
चूंकि the रिलीज of the first novel Harry कुम्हार और the Philosopher 's स्टोन on 30 जून 1997, the books have gained immense लोकप्रियता, नाजुक acclaim और वाणिज्यिक success विश्वव्यापी.
The श्रेणी रै also था कुछ share of आलोचना, सहित concern लिये the increasingly dark tone.
, the book series has sold about 450 लाख copies, making it the best-selling book series in इतिहास, and रै been अनूदित into 67 languages.
the last four किताबे consecutively set records as the fastest-selling किताबे in history.
A श्रेणी of many genres, सहित काल्पनिक और coming of आयु ( with तत्व of रहस्य, थ्रिलर, adventure, and romance ), it has अनेक सांस्कृतिक meanings and references.
According to रोलिंग, the प्रमुख theme is death.
There are also अनेक other विषयवस्तु in the series, ऐसे as पूर्वाग्रह और भ्रष्टाचार.
the initial major प्रकाशक of the books यहूद Bloomsbury in the संयुक्त किंगडम and Scholastic दबायें in the संयुक्त राज्य.
the books have चूंकि been published by many publishers विश्वव्यापी.
The books, साथ the seventh किताब split into two भाग, have महरूम made into an eight-part फिल्मी श्रेणी by Warner Bros. तस्वीरें, the highest-grossing film series of सब समय.
The series भी originated much tie-in merchandise, making the हैरी Potter brand worth in excess of $ 15 अरब.
Also due to the कामयाबी of the books और films, हैरी कुम्हार रै been used for a theme park, the wizarding World of Harry कुम्हार in Universal Parks & रिसॉर्ट 's Islands of एडवेंचर.
rs-68 होने tested at NASA 's Stennis स्पेस बीच.

A प्रक्षेपास्त्र engine, or simply `` rocket '', is a जेट engine that uses only भंडारित propellant mass for forming its high speed propulsive जेट.
Rocket इंजन हैं reaction इंजन और obtain thrust in accordance with Newton 's third law.
चूंकि they need no बाह्य material to रूप उनके jet, प्रक्षेपास्त्र इंजन can be used लिये spacecraft नोदन as well as terrestrial uses, such as मिसाइलें.
सबसे rocket engines हैं आतंरिक दहन इंजन, although non-combusting forms also exist.
Rocket इंजन as a समूह have the उच्चतम exhaust velocities, are by दूर the lightest, लकिन हैं the least propellant कुशल of सब types of jet engines.
``... baby एक अधिक Time '' is a सोंग by अमरीकी recording कलाकार britney Spears.
it परोसा as स्पीयर्स 's डेब्यू सिंगल and शीर्षक track from उसके debut studio album,... Baby One More Time ( 1999 ).
लिखा by Max Martin और उत्पादित by Martin और Rami, ``... Baby One अधिक समय '' थी released on सितंबर 30, 1998, by jive Records.
बाद recording and sending a डेमो टेप साथ an अप्रयुक्त song from toni Braxton, Spears signed a multi-album deal साथ Jive.
``... baby एक अधिक समय '' is a teen pop और dance-pop सोंग that refers to a girl जो संताप breaking up with her boyfriend.
The सोंग प्राप्त generally favorable reviews इससे critics, जो praised its composition.
``... Baby One More Time '' attained वैश्विक success, reaching क्रमांक one in प्रत्येक country it charted.
it also received numerous certifications around the संसार, और is one of the best-selling singles of सब time, with over 10 million copies बेची.
An accompanying म्यूज़िक वीडियो, directed by निगेल लंड, portrays Spears as a student इससे a Catholic high school, जो starts to daydream that वो is गायन and dancing around the school, जबकि watching her love ब्याज from अफ़ार.
The म्यूज़िक वीडियो was later संदर्भित in the म्यूज़िक video of `` If u Seek Amy `` ( 2008 ), where स्पीयर्स 's fictional बेटी is वेश with a समान schoolgirl पहनावा जबकि wearing गुलाबी ribbons in her बाल.
in 2010, the म्यूज़िक वीडियो for ``... baby एक अधिक Time '' was voted the तीसरा most influential video in the history of pop music, in a पोल held by jam !.
स्पीयर्स रै performed ``... Baby One More समय '' in a number of live दिखावे and in all of उसके कॉन्सर्ट tours.
it was the encore of the... baby एक अधिक समय Tour ( 1999 ) and Dream भीतर a Dream दौरे ( 2001 ) ; स्पीयर्स भी performed remixed संस्करण of the song during the Oops !...
i Did It again World दौरे ( 2000 ), the Onyx होटल दौरे ( 2004 ), The m+m 's Tour ( 2007 ), the Circus Starring Britney Spears ( 2009 ), और the Femme fatale Tour ( 2011 ).
``... Baby एक More समय '' थी nominated लिये a Grammy Award लिये Best मादा Pop Vocal Performance, और has महरूम शामिल in सूचियाँ by ब्लेंडर, रोलिंग स्टोन and VH1.
it has महरूम noted for redefining the sound of लेट 1990s music.
स्पीयर्स has named ``... Baby एक अधिक समय '' as एक of उसके favorite गीतों इससे her करियर.
It was also the फाइनल सोंग to be played on the BBC 's म्यूज़िक programme Top of the Pops.
Cholera is an infection in the small आंत caused by the bacterium Vibrio cholerae.
the प्रमुख लक्षण are watery diarrhea and vomiting.
हस्तांतरण occurs primarily by drinking water or खाने खाना कि has been contaminated by the feces ( बर्बाद product ) of an infected person, including एक with no apparent लक्षण.
the गंभीरता of the अतिसार and vomiting can सीसे to rapid निर्जलीकरण and electrolyte imbalance, और death in some cases.
The प्राथमिक treatment is oral पुनर्जलीकरण चिकित्सा, typically with मौखिक पुनर्जलीकरण solution, to बदलें जल और electrolytes.
if this is not tolerated or करता not provide सुधार तेज़ पर्याप्त, intravenous fluids can भी be used.
Antibacterial दवाएँ are फायदेमंद in those साथ कठोर disease to shorten its अवधि और severity.
विश्वव्यापी, it affects 3–5 लाख people और causes 100,000–130,000 deaths a साल.
Cholera थी one of the earliest infections to be studied by epidemiological विधि.
the चित्र of डोरियन Gray is the तभी प्रकाशित novel by Oscar Wilde, appearing as the सीसे story in Lippincott 's मासिक पत्रिका on 20 June 1890, मुद्रित as the July 1890 issue of this magazine.
the magazine 's सम्पादक feared the स्टोरी was अभद्र as सुपुर्द, so वे censored roughly 500 शब्द, without Wilde 's ज्ञान, before प्रकाशन.
But भी with that, the story was still greeted with outrage by अंग्रेजों reviewers, कुछ of जिसको सुझाया that Wilde should be prosecuted on moral grounds, leading Wilde to defend the novel aggressively in letters to the British दबायें.
वाइल्ड later संशोधित the story लिये book प्रकाशन, making substantial alterations, हटाना विवादास्पद passages, adding नई chapters and सहित an aphoristic preface which has चूंकि become famous in its अपना सही.
The amended version was published by Ward, Lock और Company in April 1891.
कुछ scholars believe that Wilde होता आज have चाही us to read the version he originally submitted to lippincott 's.
the अनोखा tells of a young man नामित Dorian धूसर, the विषय of a पेंटिंग by artist Basil hallward.
बेसिल is impressed by डोरियन 's सौंदर्य और becomes infatuated साथ उसे, believing उसके सौंदर्य is responsible लिये a new mode in his आर्ट.
Dorian meets Lord हेनरी wotton, a dost of बेसिल 's, and becomes enthralled by रब Henry 's संसार view.
Espousing a new hedonism, रब Henry suggests the तभी बाते लायक pursuing in जीवन are beauty और fulfilment of the होश.
realizing कि one day his सौंदर्य will फीका, डोरियन ( whimsically ) expresses a ख्वाहिश to sell उसके आत्मा to ensure the portrait Basil रै चित्रित would आयु बल्कि than he.
Dorian 's wish is fulfilled, and जब he subsequently pursues a जीवन of विलासिता, the पोर्ट्रेट serves as a reminder of the प्रभाव प्रत्येक act रै upon उसके आत्मा, with प्रत्येक सिन displayed as a disfigurement of his form, or through a sign of aging.
the Picture of Dorian Gray is माना a कार्य of classic गोथिक fiction साथ a strong Faustian थीम.
sári Gábor ( born 6 February 1917 ), known as Zsa ज़ा Gabor ( ), is a Hungarian -born अमरीकी अभिनेत्री who acted in supporting roles in फिल्मों, on ब्रॉडवे, and occasionally on television.
गैबर was also a socialite.
वो began her stage करियर in वियना at age 15, और was पहनाया Miss हंगेरियाई in 1936.
She emigrated to the United States in 1941 और became a sought-after actress with `` यूरोपीय फ्लेयर और स्टाइल '', साथ a personality कि `` exuded charm and grace ''.
उसके first movie role थी as supporting अभिनेत्री in Lovely to Look At.
She बाद acted in We 're नहीं शादीशुदा !
and निभाई एक of her few अग्रणी भूमिकाएँ in moulin Rouge ( 1952 ), directed by John Huston, who वर्णित उसके as a `` विश्वसनीय '' अभिनेत्री.
besides उसके फिल्मी and television appearances, she is best known लिये having nine husbands, सहित होटल magnate Conrad हिल्टन and कर्ता जार्ज Sanders.
She once stated, `` मेन have सदा liked me and i have always liked मेन.
But i like a mannish man, a man who knows कैसा to talk to and treat a स्त्री – not just a man with muscles. ''
Bruce Lee ( traditional : 李小龍 ; born ली jun-fan ; 27 November 1940 – 20 जुलाई 1973 ) थी a Chinese अमरीकी martial कलाकार, actor, martial arts प्रशिक्षक, पारस, और फिल्मकार.
The founder of जीत Kune Do, ली was the son of cantonese ओपेरा स्टार Lee Hoi-Chuen.
He is widely माना by टीकाकारों, आलोचकों, media और अन्य martial artists to be एक of the सबसे influential martial कलाकारों of all समय, and a pop संस्कृति प्रतीक of the 20th century.
He is प्रायः credited with helping to बदलें the way Asians were presented in American films.
Lee थी born in Chinatown, सैन फ्रांसिस्को on 27 नवम्बर 1940 to अभिभावक इससे हांग Kong and थी उठाया in कोलून साथ his परिवार जबतक his लेट teens.
he was introduced to the film industry by his पिता and appeared in several films as a चाइल्ड actor.
Lee स्थानांतरित to the United राज्य at the age of 18 to प्राप्त उसके higher education, और it थी during इस time that he began teaching martial कला.
उसके हांग Kong और Hollywood -produced films elevated the परंपरागत हांग काँग martial arts film to a new स्तर of लोकप्रियता and acclaim, sparking a surge of interest in Chinese martial कला in the West in the 1970s.
The direction और टोन of his films बदला and influenced martial arts और martial कला films in Hong Kong and the बाकी of the संसार.
He is noted for his भूमिकाएँ in पाँच feature-length films : Lo वेई 's The Big Boss ( 1971 ) और मुट्ठी of फ़्यूरी ( 1972 ) ; Way of the ड्रैगन ( 1972 ), directed और लिखा by Lee ; warner Brothers ' Enter the ड्रैगन ( 1973 ) और The Game of मौत ( 1978 ), both directed by रॉबर्ट Clouse.
Lee became an iconic figure known throughout the संसार, विशेषकर among the चाइनीज, as he portrayed Chinese nationalism in his films.
He initially trained in wing Chun, but बाद अस्वीकृत well-defined martial आर्ट styles, favouring बजाय the उपयोग of तकनीकों इससे विभिन्न sources, in the spirit of his personal martial arts दर्शनशास्त्र, जिससे he dubbed जीत Kune do ( the रास्ता of the Intercepting मुट्ठी ).
ली held डुअल नागरिकता of Hong Kong और the United राज्य.
he died in Kowloon टोंग on 20 July 1973 at आयु 32.
Chronic obstructive pulmonary बीमारी ( copd ), भी known as दीर्घकालिक obstructive फेफड़ों बीमारी ( ठंडा ), दीर्घकालिक obstructive airway बीमारी ( coad ), chronic airflow limitation ( कैलोरी ) और दीर्घकालिक obstructive respiratory disease ( cord ), is the occurrence of दीर्घकालिक bronchitis or emphysema, a pair of commonly co-existing diseases of the lungs in which the airways narrow over समय.
इस हद airflow to and from the फेफड़े, causing shortness of साँस ( dyspnea ).
in नैदानिक practice, COPD is पारिभाषित by its characteristically कम airflow on lung function परीक्षण.
in कंट्रास्ट to दमा, this limitation is poorly reversible और प्रायः gets progressively worse over समय.
COPD is caused by noxious particles or gas, सबसे commonly from तम्बाकू smoking, जिससे triggers an abnormal inflammatory response in the फेफड़ों.
the निदान of copd requires फेफड़ों function tests.
Important management रणनीति are धूम्रपान cessation, vaccinations, पुनर्वास, and drug चिकित्सा ( प्रायः using inhalers ).
कुछ patients go on to आवश्यकता long-term oxygen therapy or फेफड़ों प्रत्यारोपण.
विश्वव्यापी, COPD क्रमित as the छठे leading कारण of death in 1990.
it is प्रक्षिप्त to become the fourth अग्रणी कारण of death विश्वव्यापी by 2030, due to an increase in धूम्रपान rates और जनसांख्यिकी परिवर्तन in अनेक countries.
COPD is the third अग्रणी कारण of death in the u.S., और the economic burden of copd in the u.S. in 2007 थी $ 42.6 billion in स्वास्थ्य care लागत और खोया उत्पादकता.
Annelies `` Anne '' मारी Frank (, ?, ; 12 जून 1929early कूच 1945 ) is एक of the सबसे discussed Jewish पीड़ितों of the Holocaust.
Her diary has महरूम the आधार लिये several plays and films.
born in the city of फ्रैंकफर्ट am प्रमुख in Weimar Germany, she जिया most of उसके जीवन in or near Amsterdam, in the Netherlands.
Born a German national, फ़्रैंक खोया her नागरिकता in 1941.
She gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय fame मरणोपरांत after उसके diary थी published.
it दस्तावेज़ उसके अनुभवों hiding during the German occupation of the नीदरलैंड्स in World War II.
The Frank family स्थानांतरित इससे जर्मनी to एम्सटर्डम in 1933, the year the nazis gained control over जर्मनी.
by the beginning of 1940, वे were trapped in Amsterdam by the Nazi occupation of the Netherlands.
as persecutions of the Jewish जनसांख्यिकी increased in जुलाई 1942, the family went into hiding in the छुपा कक्ष of Anne 's father, Otto Frank 's, दफ्तर भवन.
बाद two सालो, the group was betrayed and transported to concentration शिविरों.
ऐनी Frank and उसके सिस्टर, margot, यहूद eventually transferred to the Bergen-Belsen विशेषज्ञता शिविर, where वे died of typhus in कूच 1945.
ओटो फ़्रैंक, the तभी survivor of the family, returned to Amsterdam after the war to ढूँढें कि ऐनी 's diary था महरूम saved, and his प्रयत्न led to its publication in 1947.
it was अनूदित from its असली Dutch और first published in अंग्रेज़ी in 1952 as The Diary of a Young Girl.
It has since been translated into अनेक भाषाएं.
The diary, जिससे थी दिए to Anne on उसके 13th जन्मदिवस, chronicles उसके जीवन from 12 June 1942 जबतक 1 August 1944.

कर्ट डोनाल्ड Cobain ( February 20, 1967 – April 5, 1994 ) थी an American musician and कलाकार, best ज्ञात as the lead सिंगर, guitarist और primary songwriter of the grunge band निर्वाण.
Cobain formed निर्वाण with krist Novoselic in Aberdeen, वॉशिंगटन in 1985 and established it as भाग of the सिएटल music झाँकी, having its debut album Bleach released on the independent record label sub पॉप in 1989.
After हस्ताक्षर साथ प्रमुख लेबल dgc रिकॉर्ड, the band found breakthrough success साथ `` Smells Like टीन Spirit `` from its दूसरी एल्बम Nevermind ( 1991 ).
Following the कामयाबी of Nevermind, निर्वाण was labeled `` the फ्लैगशिप band '' of पीढी X, and Cobain hailed as `` the प्रवक्ता of a पीढी ''.
Cobain, however, was often असहज और कुंठित, believing his message और कलाकारी दृष्टि to have been misinterpreted by the public, साथ उसके personal मुद्दे प्रायः विषय to media ध्यान.
he challenged Nirvana 's दर्शक with इसके फाइनल studio एल्बम In utero ( 1993 ).
दौरान the पिछला सालो of उसके life, कोबेन struggled साथ हेरोइन addiction, बीमारी and depression.
he भी था परेशानी coping with उसके fame और पब्लिक image, और the professional और lifelong निजी pressures surrounding himself और his wife, संगीतकार कोर्टनी प्रेम.
On अप्रैल 8, 1994, कोबेन थी मिला मुर्दे at his home in Seattle, the शिकार of what was officially ruled a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head.
the circumstances of उसके death at age 27 have become a टॉपिक of public fascination और बहस.
Since their डेब्यू, निर्वाण, साथ Cobain as a songwriter, has sold over 25 लाख एल्बम in the U.S., and over 50 लाख worldwide.

Radial engine of a biplane
निपुण rod ( कतरा ), स्लेव और balances इससे a two-row, fourteen-cylinder pratt & व्हिटनी Twin बर्र
The radial engine is a reciprocating प्रकार आतंरिक combustion engine configuration in जिससे the cylinders पाइंट outward इससे a central crankshaft like the spokes of a व्हील.
It resembles a stylized स्टार जब viewed इससे the सामने, and is पुकारा a `` स्टार engine '' ( जर्मनी sternmotor ) in some भाषाएं.
The रेडियल विन्यास थी very commonly used in वायुयान engines पहले टर्बाइन engines became predominant.
The सुनहरी लड़कियों is an अमरीकी sitcom, निर्मित by सुसान हैरिस, कि originally aired on NBC from सितंबर 13, 1985, to May 9, 1992.
अभिनीत bea आर्थर, बेट्टी श्वेत, Rue mcclanahan and estelle getty, the show centers on चार पुरानी महिलाओं sharing a home in Miami, फ्लोरिडा.
It was produced by witt/thomas/harris प्रोडक्शन्स, in संघ साथ touchstone Television, और पॉल Junger witt, Tony Thomas, और Harris परोसा as the असली executive निर्माता.
the सुनहरी लड़कियों received critical acclaim throughout most of इसके चलाएं and won several पुरस्कार, including the Primetime एमी Award लिये Outstanding Comedy श्रेणी twice.
it भी जीती तीन Golden Globe Awards लिये Best Television श्रेणी – musical or Comedy.
All चार stars each received an Emmy Award throughout the series ' run और था अनेक nominations.
the series भी क्रमित among the शीर्ष टेन highest-rated कार्यक्रम लिये छह out of its सात seasons.
Deepwater drilling is the process of oil और गैस exploration और production in गहराइयों of more than 500 feet.
by this परिभाषा, वहीँ हैं लगभग 600 deepwater कुएं in the गल्फ of Mexico.
It has महरूम economically infeasible for अनेक years, but साथ rising आयल कीमतें, more कंपनियाँ हैं investing in इस क्षेत्रफल.
प्रमुख companies working in इस sector include Diamond offshore, TransOcean, और Baker ह्यूजेस.
There हैं basically two kinds of mobile deepwater drilling rigs : semi-submersible drilling rigs और drillships.
खुदाई can भी be performed इससे a fixed-position संस्थापना such as a फ्लोटिंग spar ( platform ) or tension-leg platform.
Recent उद्योग analysis रै estimated कि the कुल expenditure in the global deepwater अवसंरचना market will reach $ 145bn in 2011.
“Not सब आयल is accessible on land or in उथले water.
You can ढूँढें some आयल जमा buried गहन अंतर्गत the समंदर floor.”... using सोनिक उपकरण, oil कंपनियाँ determine the drilling sites सबसे संभावित to उपज oil.
तब वे use a मोबाईल offshore drilling ईकाई ( MODU ) to खुदाई the initial well.
कुछ इकाई हैं परिवर्तित into उत्पादन rigs, meaning वे स्विच इससे खुदाई for आयल to capturing oil एकबार it 's found.
सबसे of the समय, the oil company will replace the MODU with a अधिक स्थाई oil production rig to कैप्चर oil.”... the MODU 's जॉब is to drill bas into the ocean 's मंजिल to ढूँढें oil deposits.
The part of the ड्रिल कि extends नीचे the डेक and through the water is called the riser.
The riser allows for drilling fluids to move between the floor and the rig.
इंजीनियर्स lower a ड्रिल string -- a series of पाइप designed to ड्रिल bas to the आयल जमा -- through the riser.”
“The expansion of deepwater drilling is happening despite accidents in offshore फ़ील्ड... ”
in 2010 a large explosion occurred killing 11 मजदूर and spilling millions of गैलन of oil into the Gulf of मैक्सिको जबकि a bp आयल rig थी खुदाई in deep waters.
“... despite the risks, the deepwater drilling ट्रेंड is spreading in the Mediterranean and बंद the coast of East Africa after a string of huge discoveries of प्राकृतिक gas.”
“the कारण लिये the resumption of ऐसे drilling, विश्लेषक कह, is continuing high demand for energy worldwide.”
America needs the oil so it is almost necessary to फेस the ऊँची risks that आइये with deepwater खुदाई in अनुक्रम for अमेरिकी to continue to carry on their रोज जीवनदान.
“the Energy Department recently प्रक्षिप्त that गल्फ आयल उत्पादन would expand इससे इसके 2011 level of 1.3 million barrels a दिन, still nearly a quarter of total domestic production, to 2 लाख barrels a दिन by 2020.”
deepwater खुदाई affects the पर्यावरण in both ऋणात्मक and positive ways.
हालांकि deepwater खुदाई rarely causes oil spills it is स्टिल a hazardous संभावित निष्कर्ष.
Oil spills result in आयल sinking to the नीचे of the समंदर smothering plant जीवन leaving मछली without food और आश्रय to जीवित.
On the other hand deepwater खुदाई प्रभाव the environment in a धनात्मक ways too.
in समय एकबार the deepwater oil खूब is नहीं in use anymore plants होगा grow on and around the खूब making a गुफा or cavern जैसे shelter आदर्श for पशु to thrive in.
Deepwater खुदाई also lets us देखिए the depths of the ocean मंजिल that हैं hardly ever seen.
”cameras on रोवर्स at the bottom of the कुएं रिकार्ड फुटेज और लो फ़ोटो of विरल fish कि are in वहीँ natural habitat, giving वैज्ञानिक a look at animals वे rarely seen” ( Chevron Corporation ). ''
Monica Samille lewinsky ( born जुलाई 23, 1973 ) is an American स्त्री with whom United राज्य President Bill क्लिंटन admitted to having had an `` improper संबंध '' while she worked at the श्वेत हाउस in 1995 and 1996.
The affair and इसके repercussions ( which included क्लिंटन 's महाभियोग ) became known as the lewinsky scandal.
Francis अल्बर्ट `` Frank '' Sinatra,, ( दिसम्बर 12, 1915 – May 14, 1998 ) थी an American सिंगर और film कर्ता.
शुरूआत उसके musical करियर in the swing era with हैरी James और टॉमी Dorsey, सिनात्रा मिला unprecedented कामयाबी as a सोलो artist from the जल्दी to mid-1940s बाद होने हस्ताक्षरित to कोलंबिया रिकॉर्ड in 1943.
Being the आइडल of the `` bobby soxers ``, he released his first एल्बम, the Voice of फ़्रैंक Sinatra in 1946.
उसके पेशेवर करियर था stalled by the 1950s, but it थी पुनर्जन्म in 1953 बाद he won the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये Best supporting Actor लिये his performance in इससे यहाँ to शाश्वत.
He हस्ताक्षरित साथ Capitol रिकॉर्ड in 1953 and released अनेक critically lauded albums ( such as In the Wee Small Hours, गीतों लिये Swingin ' प्रेमियों !, आइये मक्खी with me, Only the Lonely और Nice 'n ' Easy ).
Sinatra left Capitol to found his own रिकार्ड लेबल, Reprise रिकॉर्ड in 1961 ( ढूंढना success with albums such as Ring-a-Ding-Ding !, सिनात्रा at the Sands and Francis अल्बर्ट सिनात्रा & अंतोनियो कार्लोस Jobim ), toured internationally, थी a founding member of the Rat Pack and fraternized साथ हस्तियाँ और statesmen, सहित John F. कैनेडी.
Sinatra turned 50 in 1965, recorded the retrospective September of my Years, starred in the एमी -winning television खास फ़्रैंक सिनात्रा : A Man and His Music, and scored हिट्स with `` अजनबी in the रात्रि `` और `` my रास्ता ``.
साथ sales of his music dwindling and after appearing in अनेक poorly received films, Sinatra retired लिये the first समय in 1971.
Two years later, however, he came out of retirement और in 1973 अंकित several albums, स्कोरिंग a शीर्ष 40 hit with `` ( थीम From ) नई York, New York `` in 1980.
using his Las वेगास shows as a घर base, he toured दोनो within the United States and internationally, until a छोटी समय before his मौत in 1998.
सिनात्रा भी forged a highly कामयाब करियर as a फिल्मी कर्ता.
बाद winning Best Supporting कर्ता in 1953, he also garnered a नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन Actor for The Man with the सुनहरी भुजा, and critical acclaim for his performance in the मंचूरियन प्रत्याशी.
he भी starred in ऐसे musicals as High समाज, Pal Joey, यारों and डॉल और on the Town.

Sinatra is भी एक of world’s best-selling artists of सब time, having बेची अधिक than 150 million नक़ल worldwide.
Typical cornhole फलक
Cornhole, also known as सेम bag टॉस, corn टॉस, baggo or बैग, is a lawn खेल in which players take turns फेंकना corn छेद बैग at a raised मंच with a छेद in the दूर end.
a bag in the hole स्कोर 3 points, जबकि one on the मंच स्कोर 1 पाइंट.
खेल continues जबतक a team or player पहुँच the score of 21.
The अमरीकी Gold Eagle is an आधिकारिक सुनहरा bullion coin of the United राज्य.
प्राधिकृत under the Gold bullion सिक्का Act of 1985, it थी first released by the संयुक्त States Mint in 1986.
बिक्रम योग is a system of योग कि बिक्रम Choudhury synthesized from traditional hatha yoga तकनीकों और popularized शुरूआत in the जल्दी 1970s.
सब बिक्रम Yoga classes run लिये 90 minutes और consist of the वही श्रेणी of 26 postures and 2 श्वास exercises.
बिक्रम Yoga is ideally practiced in a रूम heated to 105°F ( ≈ 40.6°C ) with a आर्द्रता of 40 %,.

a conventional teaspoon बना of बेदाग स्टील.

a fern is any एक or अधिक of a समूह of about 12,000 प्रजाति of पौधे belonging to the वनस्पति group known as Pteridophyta.
नापसंद mosses, वे have xylem and phloem ( making them vascular plants ).
They have तना, पत्ते, and roots like अन्य vascular पौधे.
Ferns reproduce via बीजाणुओं and have neither seeds nor flowers.
By far the largest समूह of ferns is the leptosporangiate ferns, but ferns as पारिभाषित here ( also पुकारा monilophytes ) include horsetails, whisk ferns, marattioid ferns, और ophioglossoid ferns.
the पद pteridophyte भी refers to ferns और a few other seedless vascular पौधे ( देखिए classification section नीचे ).
ferns first appear in the चट्टान record 360 लाख सालो ago in the carboniferous लकिन अनेक of the वर्तमान परिवारों और प्रजाति did not appear until roughly 145 लाख years पहले in the early Cretaceous ( बाद flowering plants आए to dominate many environments ).
Ferns are नहीं of major आर्थिक महत्व, लकिन कुछ are grown or gathered लिये खाना, as ornamental plants, लिये remediating contaminated soils, और have महरूम the विषय of research लिये their ability to हटाएँ कुछ रासायनिक pollutants from the air.
कुछ are significant weeds.
They भी खेल a भूमिका in mythology, आयुर्विज्ञान, and art.
चपटा roofs in इसराईल
Flat छत in लॉस Angeles
a flat छत is a type of covering for a भवन.
in कंट्रास्ट to the more sloped form of roof, a चपटा roof is आड़ा or nearly horizontal.
The slope of a छत is properly known as इसके pitch : Roofs जिससे हैं nearly चपटा हैं known as low-pitch roofs ( as the angle of slope increases, so the पिच is said to increase ).
कोई चादर of सामग्री प्रयुक्त to cover a चपटा or low-pitched roof is प्रायः known as a झिल्ली and the primary purpose of ये membranes is to waterproof the roof area.
Materials that कवर flat roofs typically allow the जल to run बंद from a पतला inclination or camber into a gutter system.
Water इससे some चपटा roofs ऐसे as on garden sheds sometimes flows freely off the किनारे of a छत, though gutter प्रणालियों are of advantage in keeping दोनो दीवारें and foundations शुष्क.
ड्रेनेज on smaller roofs often सीसे जल सीधे onto the ground, or better, into a specially made soakaway.
Gutters on larger roofs usually lead जल into the rainwater drainage system of any निर्मित up क्षेत्रफल.
Occasionally चपटा roofs though are designed to collect water in a pool, प्रायः for aesthetic purposes, or for rainwater buffering.
Flat roofs मौजूद सब over the संसार और each क्षेत्रफल has its अपना tradition or वरीयता लिये सामग्री used.
In warmer climes where rainfall is कम and freezing is unlikely to occur, अनेक चपटा roofs are बस built of चिनाई or concrete and this is good at keeping out the ऊष्मा of the sun and सस्ती और easy to निर्माण where timber is not readily available.
In areas जहाँ the छत could become saturated by rain and leak, or जहाँ जल soaked into the brickwork could फ्रीज to बर्फ and यूँ lead to 'blowing ' ( breaking up of the mortar/brickwork/concrete by the expansion of बर्फ as it फ़ॉर्म ) ये roofs हैं not उपयुक्त.
traditionally सबसे flat roofs in the western world मेक use of तारकोल or अधिक usually तारकोल पेपर लागू over छत अलंकार to keep a भवन watertight.
the तारकोल or tarpaper is in turn covered in बजरी to keep the सूर्य 's ऊष्मा, uv किरणें और weather off it and helps protect it from cracking or blistering और degradation.
Roof अलंकार is प्रायः of plywood, chipboard or OSB boards ( OSB = उन्मुख strand फलक, भी ज्ञात as Sterling फलक ) of around 18mm thickness.
the तारकोल कोटिंग is applied in एक or अधिक coats as a hot liquid, heated in a tar kettle, or as चादरें of tar impregnated 'paper ' glued bas और sealed together at joints by hot तारकोल - once it has cooled, the बजरी is स्प्रेड evenly over it.
a main reason लिये failure of ये traditional roofs is अनभिज्ञता or lack of maintenance where people or कार्यक्रम कारण the बजरी to be स्थानांतरित or removed इससे the tar or tarpaper waterproofing, यूँ exposing it to मौसम और sun whereupon cracking and blistering occurs over समय and आखिरकार जल gets in.
tarpaper is प्रायः a 'paper ' or fibre material soaked or impregnated in tar.
As बजरी can नहीं protect tarpaper surfaces जहाँ they वृद्धि खड़ा इससे the छत such as on मुंडेर दीवारें or upstands, tarpaper variants are produced साथ fine gravel applied to the hot तारकोल during the process of manufacture ऐसे that a permanent परत of gravel is stuck to it in order to give it ongoing सुरक्षा.
Tarpapers vary in विशेषता as does the workmanship and training of those applying it to produce अधिक or less successful परिणाम.
In कुछ सूक्ष्म climates or छायांकित क्षेत्रों ये rather 'basic ' tarpaper roofs can पिछला well in संबंध to the cost of सामग्री खरीदें and लागत of लेटा उन्हें, however the cost of आधुनिक membranes ऐसे as EPDM रै आइये down over recent सालो to मेक them अधिक और अधिक affordable.
There हैं अभी more firms supplying modern alternatives और there is generally a growing जागरूकता of their प्रदर्शन and उपलब्धता.
if a लीक does occur on a चपटा छत then क्षति प्रायः goes unnoticed लिये long अवधि of time during जिससे जल penetrates और soaks the decking and कोई इन्सुलेशन and/or ढांचा beneath it.
इस can lead to expensive क्षति इससे the rot which often develops and if बाएँ can weaken the roof ढांचा.
वहीँ हैं भी various health risks to लोगों and animals breathing the सांचे spores : the severity of इस स्वास्थ्य risk remains a debated पाइंट.
One problem साथ maintaining चपटा roofs is that if water करता घुस the barrier covering ( be it परंपरागत or a आधुनिक झिल्ली ) it can सफर a long way before causing दृश्य क्षति or leaking into a भवन where it can be देखी.
Thus it is नहीं आसान to see where it is leaking in अनुक्रम to repair it.
एकबार underlying roof अलंकार is soaked it often sags causing a further संग्रहण or puddling of water in that क्षेत्रफल और the प्रॉब्लम worsens.
a cd-rom ( ) is a pre-pressed compact disc जिससे contains आंकड़ा.
the name is an acronym जिससे stands for `` Compact डिस्क read-only memory ``.
Computers can read cd-roms, लकिन can नहीं लिखें on them.
cd-roms are popularly प्रयुक्त to distribute computer तन्त्र, including वीडियो खेल और मल्टीमीडिया अनुप्रयोग, हालांकि कोई आंकड़ा can be stored ( up to the capacity सीमा of a डिस्क ).
कुछ CDs, called उन्नत cds, hold both computer data और ऑडियो with the latter सक्षम of होने निभाई on a cd खिलाड़ी, जबकि data ( ऐसे as software or डिजिटल video ) is only usable on a computer ( ऐसे as आईएसओ 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ).
the Yellow किताब is the तकनीकी मानक कि defines the स्वरूप of cd-roms.
एक of a set of color-bound किताबे that contain the तकनीकी specifications लिये all cd formats, the Yellow किताब, created by सोनी and Philips, was the पहला एक्सटेंशन of कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क Digital Audio.
it adapted the format to hold any रूप of data.
Joanne `` jo '' Rowling ( ), ( born 31 जुलाई 1965 ), pen नाम J. K. Rowling, is a British novelist, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the author of the Harry कुम्हार काल्पनिक श्रेणी.
the कुम्हार किताबे have gained विश्वव्यापी ध्यान, won multiple पुरस्कार, और बेची more than 400 लाख नक़ल.
वे have become the best-selling book श्रेणी in इतिहास, and been the basis for a श्रेणी of films जिससे रै become the highest-grossing फिल्मी श्रेणी in इतिहास.
रोलिंग had overall स्वीकृति on the scripts as खूब as maintaining creative कंट्रोल by सेवारत as a निर्माता on the final instalment.
Born in Yate, Gloucestershire, Rowling थी working as a शोधकर्ता and bilingual secretary for Amnesty International जब she conceived the विचार for the हैरी कुम्हार series on a delayed train from Manchester to लंदन in 1990.
The seven-year काल that followed entailed the death of उसके माँ, divorce from उसके first husband और poverty until रोलिंग समाप्त the first अनोखा in the series, हैरी कुम्हार and the पारस 's स्टोन ( 1997 ).
Rowling subsequently प्रकाशित 6 sequels—the last, हैरी कुम्हार and the deathly hallows ( 2007 ) —as well as 3 पूरक to the series.
in 2012, Rowling parted साथ her agency and resumed लिखने in the form of a tragicomedy अनोखा aimed at adult readership, entitled the Casual Vacancy.
रोलिंग has कहा वो is फिलहाल working on two books—one aimed लिये adults, the अन्य लिये children younger than the Harry कुम्हार audience, और she expects the latter to be published first.
रोलिंग has led a `` rags to riches `` जीवन story, in which she progressed from जीना on राज्य लाभ to multi-millionaire status within पाँच years.
She is the संयुक्त किंगडम 's best-selling author चूंकि records began, साथ बिक्री in excess of £238m.
The 2008 Sunday Times समृद्ध List estimated रोलिंग 's सौभाग्य at £560 million ( $ 798 million ), ranking उसके as the twelfth richest woman in the United Kingdom.
Forbes क्रमित रोलिंग as the forty-eighth most शक्तिशाली हस्ती of 2007, और समय पत्रिका नामित her as a runner-up for इसके 2007 Person of the Year, noting the social, moral, and political inspiration she रै given उसके fans.
in October 2010, Rowling थी नामित the `` सबसे influential Woman in ब्रिटेन '' by अग्रणी पत्रिका सम्पादक.
She रै become a notable लोकसेवक, supporting ऐसे charities as Comic राहत, एक Parent Families, अनेक काठिन्य समाज of Great Britain and lumos ( formerly the Children 's ऊँची Level समूह ).
Auburndale is a नगर in polk County, फ्लोरिडा, संयुक्त राज्य.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 11,032 at the 2000 census.
According to the U.S जनसांख्यिकी estimates of 2005, the नगर था a जनसांख्यिकी of 12,381.
It is part of the Lakeland – शीत हेवन महानगर सांख्यिकीय Area.

the eye, eyewall, और surrounding rainbands, characteristics of tropical cyclones, हैं clearly दृश्य in इस दृश्य from space.
a तीव्र चक्रवात is a storm system characterized by a low-pressure बीच घिरी by a spiral व्यवस्था of thunderstorms कि produce strong हवाएँ और heavy बरसात.
तीव्र cyclones strengthen when जल evaporated from the ocean is released as the संतृप्त air rises, resulting in संघनन of जल वाष्प contained in the moist एयर.
They are fueled by a अलग heat यांत्रिकी than other cyclonic windstorms such as nor'easters, यूरोपीय windstorms, and ध्रुवीय lows.
the characteristic कि separates tropical cyclones from अन्य cyclonic प्रणालियों is that at कोई ऊँचाई in the atmosphere, the center of a tropical चक्रवात will be warmer than इसके surroundings ; a घटना पुकारा `` warm core `` तूफ़ान systems.
the term `` तीव्र '' refers दोनो to the geographical उत्पत्ति of ये प्रणालियों, which usually form in tropical regions of the globe, and to उनके formation in maritime तीव्र एयर masses.
The term `` cyclone '' refers to such तूफ़ान ' cyclonic प्रकृति, with counterclockwise हवा flow in the Northern Hemisphere और clockwise wind flow in the दक्षिणी Hemisphere.
The विपरीत direction of the हवा flow is a परिणाम of the Coriolis force.
depending on इसके स्थान और strength, a tropical चक्रवात is referred to by names such as hurricane (, ), तूफ़ान ( ), tropical तूफ़ान, cyclonic storm, तीव्र अवसाद, and simply cyclone.
While तीव्र cyclones can produce extremely powerful हवाएँ और मूसलाधार बरसात, वे हैं भी able to produce ऊँची waves, damaging तूफ़ान surge, and tornadoes.
वे develop over large bodies of warm water, और lose उनके strength if वे move over जमीन due to increased surface friction और घाटा of the गरम ocean as an energy सोर्स.
This is क्यों तटीय regions can receive significant क्षति इससे a tropical cyclone, जबकि अंतर्देशीय regions हैं relatively सुरक्षित from receiving strong हवाएँ.
भारी rains, however, can produce significant बाढ़ अंतर्देशीय, और तूफ़ान surges can produce extensive coastal flooding up to इससे the coastline.
हालांकि उनके effects on इंसान populations can be devastating, tropical cyclones can relieve सूखा शर्तें.
वे also carry ऊष्मा उर्जा away इससे the tropics and transport it toward शीतोष्ण latitudes, which makes them an important part of the वैश्विक atmospheric परिसंचरण mechanism.
as a result, तीव्र cyclones सहायता to maintain संतुलन in the धरती 's troposphere, and to maintain a अपेक्षाकृत stable और warm temperature worldwide.
अनेक तीव्र cyclones develop जब the atmospheric conditions around a weak disturbance in the माहौल are favorable.
The background पर्यावरण is modulated by climatological cycles और patterns such as the Madden-Julian दोलन, El Niño-Southern दोलन, and the Atlantic multidecadal oscillation.
अन्य रूप जब अन्य types of cyclones acquire tropical characteristics.
तीव्र प्रणालियों हैं तब स्थानांतरित by steering winds in the troposphere ; if the conditions remain favorable, the tropical disturbance intensifies, और can भी develop an eye.
on the अन्य end of the spectrum, if the शर्तें around the प्रणाली deteriorate or the tropical चक्रवात makes landfall, the प्रणाली weakens और आखिरकार dissipates.
It is not संभावित to artificially induce the dissipation of these systems साथ वर्तमान technology.
किर्क Douglas ( born issur Danielovitch, ; दिसम्बर 9, 1916 ) is an American स्टेज और फिल्मी actor, फिल्मी निर्माता और author.
His popular films include Out of the पास्ट ( 1947 ), चैंपियन ( 1949 ), इक्का in the छेद ( 1951 ), The Bad और the खूबसूरत ( 1952 ), 20,000 लीग अंतर्गत the Sea ( 1954 ), Lust लिये Life ( 1956 ), राहें of Glory ( 1957 ), Gunfight at the o.k. corral ( 1957 ), the वाइकिंग्स ( 1958 ), स्पार्टाकस ( 1960 ), निर्जन हैं the Brave ( 1962 ), Seven Days in May ( 1964 ), The नायक of telemark ( 1965 ) और Tough Guys ( 1986 ).
He is no.17 on the American Film Institute 's सूची of the महानतम male अमरीकी स्क्रीन legends of all समय, बनाना him the highest-ranked living person on the सूची.
in 1996, he received the Academy मानद Award `` for 50 years as a creative and moral force in the गति चित्र जातियाँ. ''
He is एक of the पिछला surviving अभिनेताओं from Hollywood 's `` सुनहरी आयु ''.
रॉबर्ट Clark `` Bob '' Seger ( born may 6, 1945 ) is an American rock और roll singer-songwriter, guitarist and pianist.
As a locally successful Detroit-area artist, he performed और अंकित as Bob Seger and the पिछला Heard और bob seger प्रणाली throughout the 1960s.
by the जल्दी 1970s, he had dropped the `` System '' इससे his recordings और continued to strive for broader कामयाबी साथ other various bands.
In 1973, he put together The चांदी गोली Band, a समूह of detroit-area musicians, साथ जिसको he became most कामयाब on the नेशनल स्तर साथ the album सजीव गोली, अंकित सजीव साथ the चांदी गोली बैंड in 1975 at cobo Hall in डेट्रॉयट, मिशिगन.
In 1976, he achieved a नेशनल breakout साथ the studio album Night Moves.
on उसके स्टुडियो albums, he also worked extensively साथ the Alabama-based Muscle shoals Rhythm Section, which appeared on अनेक of seger 's best-selling singles और albums.
a जड़ें rocker साथ a classic raspy, चिल्लाना voice, Seger wrote and recorded गीतों कि dealt साथ प्रेम, महिलाओं, blue-collar themes और थी an exemplar of heartland चट्टान.
seger has recorded many हिट्स, including `` रात्रि चालें, '' `` Turn the पेज, '' `` we 've Got Tonight, '' `` विरूद्ध the हवा, '' और shakedown कि थी written for बेवर्ली पहाड़ियाँ cop II and `` जैसे a Rock, '' और also co-wrote the Eagles ' number-one hit `` Heartache Tonight. ''
His iconic रिकॉर्डिंग of `` बूढ़ा Time Rock और Roll `` थी named one of the गीतों of the Century in 2001.
साथ a करियर spanning पाँच दशकों, seger continues to perform और रिकार्ड today.
Seger थी inducted into the Rock and Roll हॉल of Fame in 2004 और the songwriters Hall of कीर्ति in 2012.
Richard Milhous Nixon ( जनवरी 9, 1913 – April 22, 1994 ) थी the 37th अध्यक्ष of the United राज्य, serving इससे 1969 to 1974, जब he became the only अध्यक्ष to इस्तीफा the दफ्तर.
Nixon था previously परोसा as a रिपब्लिकन U.S. representative and सीनेटर from कैलिफ़ोर्निया and as the 36th Vice अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States from 1953 to 1961.
निक्सन was born in Yorba Linda, California.
he graduated इससे Whittier College in 1934 and Duke विश्वविद्यालयों School of विधि in 1937, returning to कैलिफ़ोर्निया to अभ्यास law.
he और उसके बीवी, पैट निक्सन, स्थानांतरित to Washington to work लिये the संघीय सरकारी in 1942.
He subsequently served in the संयुक्त राज्य नेवी during संसार War II.
निक्सन was निर्वाचित in कैलिफ़ोर्निया to the House of प्रतिनिधि in 1946 and to the सीनेट in 1950.
उसके pursuit of the alger hiss मामला established his प्रतिष्ठा as a अग्रणी anti-communist, और elevated उसे to नेशनल prominence.
He थी the running mate of Dwight D. Eisenhower, the रिपब्लिकन Party presidential nominee in the 1952 चुनाव.
Nixon served लिये आठ सालो as vice अध्यक्ष.
he waged an unsuccessful presidential campaign in 1960, narrowly खोने to John F. कैनेडी, और lost a race लिये Governor of California in 1962.
In 1968, he ran again लिये the presidency and was निर्वाचित.
हालांकि Nixon initially escalated America 's involvement in the Vietnam युद्ध, he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973.
Nixon 's visit to the People 's गणतंत्र of चीन in 1972 opened diplomatic relations between the दो nations, और he initiated détente and the Anti-Ballistic मिसाइल Treaty with the सोवियत Union the same साल.
domestically, उसके administration generally embraced नीतियों कि transferred power from Washington to the राज्य.
Among अन्य बाते, he launched पहलों to fight कर्कट और illegal दवाएँ, imposed मजदूरी and दाम नियंत्रण, enforced desegregation of some दक्षिणी schools, और स्थापित the पर्यावरणीय सुरक्षा एजेंसी.
Though he presided over the lunar अवतरण शुरूआत with अपोलो 11, he scaled वापस manned स्पेस खोजी.
He थी re-elected by a landslide in 1972.
Nixon 's दूसरी पद saw an अरब आयल embargo, the इस्तीफा of his वाइस president, Spiro Agnew, और a continuing श्रेणी of खुलासे परिचय the Watergate scandal और अन्य misconduct by members of the प्रशासन.
The scandal escalated, costing निक्सन much of his political support, and on August 9, 1974, he resigned in the face of almost certain महाभियोग और removal इससे office.
After उसके resignation, he controversially प्राप्त a pardon जारी by his successor, Gerald Ford.
in retirement, Nixon 's कार्य as an elder statesman, authoring अनेक किताबे and undertaking many विदेशी यात्राएँ, helped to rehabilitate his public image.
he suffered a debilitating स्ट्रोक on April 18, 1994, और died चार days later at the age of 81.
{ { Infobox सीनेटर
The Dominican Republic annexation treaty caused कड़वा contention between अध्यक्ष Grant and sen. sumner.
Brady 1869 ] ]
sen. Sumner, opposed to अमरीकी imperialism in the caribbean and fearful that annexation होता lead to the conquest of the neighboring ब्लैक republic of हैती, became convinced that भ्रष्टाचार lay behind the सन्धि, और कि मेन बंद to the president shared in the भ्रष्टाचार.
as chairman of the Senate विदेशी संबंध कमेटी, Sen. Sumner initially withheld his राय on the treaty on जनवरी 18, 1870.
Sen. sumner था been लीक सूचना इससे सहायक सचिव of State, Bancroft Davis, that u.s. Naval जहाजों were होने प्रयुक्त to protect President báez.
sen. sumner 's committee voted against annexation and at sen. Sumner’s suggestion and काफी संभवतः to save the पार्टी from an ugly लड़ो or the अध्यक्ष इससे embarrassment, the Senate held its debate of the treaty behind बंद द्वार in executive सत्र.
President Grant persisted और भेजा messages to कॉंग्रेस in favor of annexation on March 14, 1870, and may 31, 1870.
In बंद सत्र, Sen. sumner spoke आउट against the treaty ; warnng कि वहीँ होता be परेशानी साथ the विदेशी नागरिकों, noting the दीर्घकालिक rebellion कि took place on the island, और the risk कि the independence of हैती, recognized by the संयुक्त States in 1862, होता be खोया.
sumner stated that Grant 's उपयोग of the U.S. Navy as a प्रोटेक्टोरेट was a उल्लंघन of अंतरराष्ट्रीय law और असंवैधानिक.
आखिरकार, on June 30, 1870 the सन्धि was voted on by the Senate and विफल to gain the जरूरी 2/3 बहुमत for सन्धि ड्योढ़ी.
The following दिन, अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट, अहसास गद्दारी by Sen. sumner, retaliated by ordering the dismissal of Sumner’s close friend J. Lothrop Motley, Ambassador to Britain.
by पतझड़, Sumner 's personal hostility to the president थी पब्लिक knowledge, और he blamed the सचिव of State लिये failing to have resigned, rather than let Grant have his रास्ता.
The two मेन, friends until then, cooled into bitter enemies.
in दिसम्बर, 1870, still fearful that Grant meant to acquire Santo डोमिंगो somehow, Sumner gave a fiercely critical वाक accusing the अध्यक्ष of usurpation और Babcock of unethical conduct.
already, President ग्रान्ट, समर्थित by his सचिव of State Hamilton मछली, had initiated a campaign to depose Sumner इससे the chairmanship of the सीनेट विदेशी Relations Committee.
Although Sumner stated he थी an `` प्रशासन man '', in जोड to having stopped Grant 's Dominican Republic treaty attempt, Sumner था defeated Grant 's full repeal of the Tenure of दफ्तर Act, blocked ग्रान्ट 's nomination of Alexander Stewart to u.S. सचिव of Treasury, और been a निरंतर harassing force pushing Reconstruction नीतियों faster than Grant था महरूम willing to go.
Grant resented Sumner 's superiority of manner, as well.
बताई एकबार कि Sumner किया नहीं believe in the बाइबल, the president is supposed to have कहा कि he थी नहीं चकित : `` he did n't लिखें it. ''
As the दरार between ग्रान्ट और sumner increased, Sumner’s health began to मनाही.
जब the 42nd U.S. Congress convened on कूच 4, 1871, सीनेटरों affiliated साथ President ग्रान्ट, known as ‘’New Radicals’’ voted to oust sen. Sumner इससे the Senate विदेशी संबंध कमेटी अध्यक्षता.
कारोबार आचार ( भी corporate आचार ) is a form of लागू आचार or पेशेवर ethics that examines नैतिक principles and moral or नैतिक problems that arise in a business environment.
It applies to सब aspects of business conduct and is प्रासंगिक to the conduct of individuals और entire organizations.
कारोबार आचार has both normative और वर्णनात्मक dimensions.
As a कॉरपोरेट practice and a career specialization, the field is primarily normative.
Academics attempting to understand कारोबार behavior employ descriptive विधि.
The range और quantity of कारोबार ethical मुद्दे reflects the interaction of profit-maximizing behavior with non-economic concerns.
ब्याज in कारोबार आचार त्वरित dramatically during the 1980s and 1990s, both within major corporations और within academia.
लिये उदाहरण, today most प्रमुख corporations प्रचार their commitment to non-economic मान under headings such as आचार कोड and सोशल responsibility charters.
Adam स्मिथ कहा, `` लोगों of the same trade seldom meet साथ, भी लिये merriment and diversion, but the conversation ends in a conspiracy विरूद्ध the public, or in कुछ contrivance to उठाएँ कीमतें. ''
सरकारें use laws और regulations to पाइंट कारोबार बर्ताव in what they perceive to be beneficial दिशानिर्देश.
Ethics implicitly regulates areas और विवरण of बर्ताव that झूठ beyond सरकारी control.
The emergence of large corporations साथ सीमित relationships and sensitivity to the समुदायों in जिससे they operate त्वरित the development of formal आचार regimes.
A burn is a प्रकार of injury to flesh or स्किन caused by heat, electricity, chemicals, घर्षण, or विकिरण.
सबसे burns affect तभी the सतही skin ( known as superficial or पहला degree ) or extend into the deeper skin but do not involve the full thickness of the skin ( known as आंशिक मोटाई or दूसरी उपाधि ).
rarely all layers of the skin or deeper ऊतकों, ऐसे as मांसपेशी or अस्थि can be injured in which मामला the बर्न is either full मोटाई ( तीसरा उपाधि ) or चौथी degree.
the treatment required depends on the severity of the burn.
सतही burns संभवतः managed with little अधिक than सरल पीड़ा हत्यारे जबकि major burns may आवश्यकता prolonged treatment in specialized बर्न centers.
Cooling साथ tap जल may सहायता pain and घटी damage however if एक्सपोज़र is prolonged it may परिणाम in low देह temperature.
Partial thickness burns may require cleaning with साबुन और जल followed by dressings.
फफोले चाहिए typically be left अखंड.
पूरा thickness burns प्रायः require सर्जिकल उपचार such as skin कलम and extensive burns प्रायः आवश्यकता large amount of intravenous fluids.
the most आम जटिलताओं of burns are सम्बन्धित to infection.
जबकि विशाल burns can be fatal, आधुनिक treatments developed in the last 50 years have significantly improved the outcomes, especially in children and young adults.
Globally about 11 million लोगों seek medical treatment और 300,000 people die इससे burns.
in the संयुक्त States, of those admitted to a burn बीच, लगभग 4 % die इससे उनके चोटों.
the long पद निष्कर्ष is primarily सम्बन्धित to the आकार of बर्न and the आयु of the person effected.
The Atlantic Ocean, नहीं सहित आर्कटिक और Antarctic regions
इस वीडियो was लिया by the crew of expedition 29 on फलक the ISS.
The pass starts इससे just north-east of the Island of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड over the उत्तर अटलांटिक Ocean to सेंट्रल अफ़्रीकी, over South Sudan.
the अटलांटिक समंदर is the second-largest of the world 's oceanic divisions.
साथ a total क्षेत्रफल of about, it covers approximately 20 प्रतिशत of the Earth 's surface और परिचय 29 प्रतिशत of इसके जल surface area.
the first भाग of इसके नाम refers to एटलस of Greek mythology, making the अटलांटिक the `` समुद्र of Atlas ''.
the oldest known जिक्र of `` Atlantic '' is in the Histories of Herodotus around 450 bc ( Hdt. 1.202.4 ) : Atlantis thalassa ( Greek : ἀτλαντὶς θάλασσα ; अंग्रेज़ी : Sea of एटलस ).
the पद ethiopic Ocean, derived इससे Ethiopia, थी applied to the दक्षिणी Atlantic as लेट as the mid-19th सदी.
पहले Europeans खोजा अन्य महासागर, the पद `` समंदर '' itself was synonymous साथ the waters परे the जलसन्धि of जिब्राल्टर कि we अभी know as the Atlantic.
The early Greeks believed इस ocean to be a gigantic नदी encircling the संसार.
the Atlantic Ocean occupies an elongated, s-shaped basin extending longitudinally between यूरेशिया and अफ़्रीकी to the ईस्ट, and the americas to the west.
As one घटक of the interconnected वैश्विक समंदर, it is connected in the north to the Arctic Ocean ( जिससे is sometimes माना a sea of the Atlantic ), to the Pacific समंदर in the दक्षिणपश्चिम, the भारतीय समंदर in the southeast, and the दक्षिणी समंदर in the दक्षिण.
( Other परिभाषाएं describe the Atlantic as extending southward to अंटार्कटिक. )
the equator subdivides it into the उत्तर अटलांटिक समंदर और South अटलांटिक समंदर.
due to their long-term हठ, और the need for a unique identifier in issuing forecasts and चेतावनियाँ, तीव्र cyclones और उपोष्ण cyclones हैं दिए names according to policy ( देखिए Tropical चक्रवात naming ).
the following are lists from which these तीव्र and उपोष्ण cyclone names हैं निकला.
White लाइट is dispersed by a प्रिज़्म into the रंगों of the ऑप्टिकल वर्णक्रम.
the दृश्य spectrum is the portion of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम कि is दृश्य to ( can be detected by ) the इंसान eye.
Electromagnetic विकिरण in इस दायरा of wavelengths is called दृश्य light or बस light.
A ठेठ human eye होगा respond to wavelengths इससे about 390 to 700 nm.
In terms of आवृत्ति, इस corresponds to a बैंड in the vicinity of 430–790 thz.
A light-adapted नजर generally रै its maximum sensitivity at around 555 nm ( 540 thz ), in the green प्रदेश of the ऑप्टिकल spectrum ( see : luminosity फलन ).
the spectrum करता not, however, contain all the colors कि the इंसान आँखें और दिमाग can distinguish.
असंतृप्त रंगों ऐसे as pink, or जामुनी विसंगतियाँ such as magenta, are absent, for उदाहरण, क्युकी they can be made only by a मिक्सर of multiple wavelengths.
रंगों containing तभी एक wavelength हैं भी called pure colors.
Visible wavelengths pass through the `` optical window ``, the प्रदेश of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक spectrum जिससे allows wavelengths to pass largely unattenuated through the धरती 's माहौल.
an उदाहरण of इस phenomenon is that clean एयर scatters ब्लू light अधिक than red wavelengths, and so the midday sky appears blue.
The optical window is भी पुकारा the दृश्य खिड़की because it overlaps the human दृश्य response वर्णक्रम.
The near infrared ( nir ) window lies just आउट of the इंसान vision, as well as the Medium Wavelength ir ( mwir ) खिड़की और the Long Wavelength or Far Infrared ( lwir or fir ) खिड़की हालांकि अन्य पशु may अनुभव them.
अनेक species can देखिए light with frequencies outside the `` visible वर्णक्रम, '' which is defined in terms of human दृष्टि.
Bees and many other insects can detect पराबैंगनी light, which helps them ढूँढें मकरंद in flowers.
Plant species कि depend on insect परागण may owe reproductive कामयाबी to their appearance in ultraviolet लाइट, rather than how colorful वे appear to इंसानो.
पक्षियों, too, can see into the पराबैंगनी ( 300–400 nm ), and कुछ have sex-dependent markings on their plumage कि are visible only in the पराबैंगनी range.
अनेक animals कि can देखिए into the ultraviolet range, however, can नहीं देखिए रेड light or कोई अन्य reddish wavelengths.
मधुमक्खियों ' दृश्य वर्णक्रम ends at परिचय 590nm, बस पहले the नारंगी wavelengths start.
Birds, however, can see कुछ रेड wavelengths, but नहीं as अनेक as humans.
Zebras ( or ) हैं several प्रजाति of African equids ( horse family ) united by उनके distinctive black और श्वेत stripes.
उनके धारियाँ आइये in different patterns, unique to each individual.
वे हैं generally सोशल animals कि सजीव in small harems to large herds.
Unlike their closest relatives, घोड़े और asses, zebras have never been truly domesticated.
वहीँ are three species of zebras : the plains zebra, the grévy 's जेब्रा और the पहाड़ जेब्रा.
The plains zebra और the mountain zebra belong to the subgenus hippotigris, but Grévy 's zebra is the sole species of subgenus dolichohippus.
the latter resembles an गधा, to which it is closely सम्बन्धित, while the पूर्व two are more horse-like.
All three belong to the genus Equus, along with अन्य जीना equids.
the अद्वितीय stripes of zebras मेक उन्हें one of the पशु most familiar to people.
They occur in a variety of habitats, such as grasslands, savannas, वुडलैंड्स, thorny scrublands, kyu, और तटीय hills.
However, विभिन्न anthropogenic कारकों have had a severe प्रभाव on जेब्रा populations, in particular hunting for skins और habitat विनाश.
grévy 's zebra और the पहाड़ zebra are endangered.
While plains zebras are much अधिक plentiful, one subspecies, the quagga, became extinct in the लेट 19th century – हालांकि there is currently a plan, पुकारा the quagga प्रोजेक्ट, that aims to breed zebras that हैं phenotypically समान to the quagga in a प्रक्रम called breeding back.
Barry White, born Barry यूजीन Carter ( – ), थी an American composer and singer-songwriter.
a two-time Grammy पुरस्कार -winner ज्ञात for उसके distinctive bass आवाज़ और romantic चित्र, White 's greatest कामयाबी came in the 1970s as a solo सिंगर and with the Love Unlimited ऑर्केस्ट्रा, crafting many enduring आत्मा, funk, और डिस्को गीतों such as उसके दो biggest हिट्स, `` तुम 're the First, the पिछला, my Everything `` and `` ca n't Get Enough of अपना प्रेम, Babe. ''
साथ with Isaac हेज़, श्वेत is considered by Allmusic.com as a pioneer of disco म्यूज़िक in the early 1970s.
दौरान the कोर्स of his career in the music कारोबार, श्वेत हासिल 106 सुनहरा albums विश्वव्यापी, 41 of जिससे also attained प्लेटिनम status.
श्वेत था 20 gold and 10 प्लेटिनम singles, with विश्वव्यापी sales in excess of 100 लाख, according to critics ed होगन और वेड Kergan.
उसके प्रभाव शामिल रेव. जेम्स क्लीवलैंड, रे Charles, Aretha Franklin प्लस Motown artists the Supremes, the चार टॉप and Marvin gaye.
एंजेलीना Jolie (, born एंजेलीना जोली वोइट ; June 4, 1975 ) is an American अभिनेत्री, film director, और screenwriter.
वो has received an अकादमी Award, two Screen अभिनेताओं गिल्ड Awards, और तीन Golden Globe Awards, and थी named हॉलीवुड 's highest-paid actress by फोर्ब्स in 2009 and 2011.
जोली promotes humanitarian कल्याणकारी, और is noted for her work साथ शरणार्थियों as a Special Envoy and former Goodwill Ambassador लिये the संयुक्त Nations ऊँची Commissioner लिये शरणार्थियों ( UNHCR ).
She has प्रायः been cited as the संसार 's `` सबसे खूबसूरत '' स्त्री, a शीर्षक लिये जिससे she has प्राप्त substantial media attention.
जोली made उसके screen डेब्यू as a चाइल्ड alongside उसके पिता jon वोइट in lookin ' to मिलेंगी Out ( 1982 ), but उसके film career began in earnest a decade बाद with the low-budget उत्पादन Cyborg 2 ( 1993 ).
Her पहला leading role in a प्रमुख फिल्मी थी in the cyber-thriller हैकर्स ( 1995 ).
She starred in the critically acclaimed biographical टेलीविज़न films George Wallace ( 1997 ) और gia ( 1998 ), and जीती an Academy Award लिये Best Supporting अभिनेत्री लिये उसके performance in the नाटक लड़की, Interrupted ( 1999 ).
जोली achieved wide कीर्ति after उसके portrayal of video game heroine Lara क्रॉफ्ट in Lara क्रॉफ्ट : Tomb Raider ( 2001 ), और स्थापित herself among the highest-paid actresses in Hollywood साथ the sequel The पालना of जीवन ( 2003 ).
She continued her कार्रवाई star career साथ mr. & Mrs. स्मिथ ( 2005 ) and चाही ( 2008 ) —her biggest non-animated commercial सफलताओं to date—and received further नाजुक acclaim लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in the dramas a Mighty Heart ( 2007 ) and changeling ( 2008 ), which earned her a nomination for an Academy पुरस्कार for बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री.
जोली बना उसके directorial डेब्यू साथ the wartime drama In the जमीन of Blood and मधु ( 2011 ).

a प्राकृतिक मेहराब produced by the अपरदन of differentially weathered चट्टान in jebel Kharaz, Jordan
अपरदन is the प्रक्रम by जिससे मृदा और rock हैं removed from the Earth 's surface by exogenetic processes ऐसे as हवा or जल flow, and तब transported और deposited in अन्य locations.
जबकि erosion is a natural प्रक्रम, इंसान activities have increased by 10-40 टाइम्स the rate at जिससे अपरदन is occurring globally.
Excessive erosion कल्याणकारी समस्याएं such as मरुस्थलीकरण, decreases in agricultural productivity due to land degradation, sedimentation of जलमार्गों, और ecological पतन due to घाटा of the nutrient rich upper soil layers.
जल और wind erosion हैं now the two primary कल्याणकारी of जमीन degradation ; संयुक्त, they are जिम्मेदार लिये 84 % of degraded acreage, बनाना excessive erosion एक of the most significant global पर्यावरणीय समस्याएं.
Industrial कृषि, वनों, roads, anthropogenic climate बदलें and शहरी sprawl हैं amongst the सबसे significant इंसान activities in लिहाज़ to their effect on stimulating erosion.
however, वहीँ हैं अनेक उपलब्धियाँ वैकल्पिक land use practices that can काटना or limit erosion, ऐसे as terrace -building, no-till कृषि, and revegetation of denuded soils.
जर्सी shore is an अमरीकी reality टेलीविज़न series which ran on MTV इससे दिसम्बर 3, 2009 to December 20, 2012 in the United States.
the series follows the जीवनदान of eight housemates spending their summer at the Jersey shore in the u.S. state of New जर्सी.
ऋतु 2 followed the डाल escaping the cold पूर्वोत्तर शीत to Miami बीच, with ऋतु 3 returning to the Jersey shore.
The fourth ऋतु, फिल्माया in Italy, premiered on August 4, 2011.
the दिखाएँ लौटे for a पांचवां ऋतु, at seaside हाइट्स on January 5, 2012.
the पांचवां season finale aired on कूच 15, 2012.
On March 19, 2012, MTV confirmed कि the श्रेणी होता return लिये their sixth ऋतु.
On अगस्त 30, 2012, MTV announced that the श्रेणी will end बाद the sixth ऋतु, जिससे premiered on October 4.
The series finale aired on दिसम्बर 20, 2012.
The दिखाएँ debuted amid विशाल amounts of विवाद regarding the use of the शब्द `` guido / guidette, '' portrayals of italian-american stereotypes, and scrutiny इससे स्थानीय क्युकी the cast members were not residents of the area.
the series garnered रिकार्ड ratings for MTV, बनाना it the संजाल 's most viewed श्रेणी telecast कभी.
The series ' डाल have भी महरूम credited साथ introducing अद्वितीय lexicon and phrases into American popular संस्कृति.
the विश्वविद्यालयों of शिकागो and the University of Oklahoma are among the educational संस्थानों कि have था classes or सम्मेलनों about the दिखाएँ.
in 2010, the cast of जर्सी shore थी नामित on बारबरा Walters ' 10 Most Fascinating People list, and the series रै चूंकि महरूम exported to dozens of countries विश्वव्यापी.
वहीँ are several remakes of the show in अन्य देशों, साथ दो नियत in the United किंगडम ; the well ज्ञात geordie Shore, नियत in न्यूकैसल upon tyne, England.
The other is the घाटियों, the Welsh equivalent, which is फिल्माया और नियत in Cardiff.

right
United States territory is कोई extent of प्रदेश under the jurisdiction of the संघीय government of the संयुक्त States, सहित सब waters ( around आइलैंड्स or महाद्वीपीय tracts ) और all U.S. नवल vessels.
The संयुक्त States रै traditionally proclaimed the sovereign rights लिये exploring, exploiting, conserving, और मैनेजिंग its territory.
This extent of territory is all the क्षेत्रफल belonging to, और अंतर्गत the डोमिनियन of, the संयुक्त States federal सरकारी ( which includes tracts lying at a distance इससे the देश ) लिये प्रशासनिक and other उद्देश्य.
the संयुक्त राज्य total territory includes a उपसमुच्चय of राजनैतिक divisions.
The U.S. सरकारी is a government with delegated powers अंतर्गत the United States Constitution.
`` the powers not delegated to the United राज्य by the Constitution, nor prohibited by it to the States, are reserved to the States respectively, or to the people '' by the दसवाँ amendment.
Terminator 3 : Rise of the मशीने ( commonly abbreviated as t3 ) is a 2003 विज्ञान fiction कार्रवाई फिल्मी directed by Jonathan mostow और अभिनीत Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nick stahl, Claire Danes और kristanna loken.

a cord of wood
the cord is a ईकाई of माप of शुष्क आवाज़ used in कनाडा and the United States to measure firewood and pulpwood.
a cord is the amount of wood that, when `` क्रमित and खूब stowed '' ( arranged so pieces are aligned, समानांतर, touching and कॉम्पैक्ट ), occupies a volume of.
इस corresponds to a well stacked woodpile high, long, and गहन ; or any अन्य arrangement of रैखिक measurements that yields the वही आवाज़.
the name cord संभवतः comes from the use of a cord or स्ट्रिंग to measure it.

the Game Boy is Nintendo 's second handheld प्रणाली following the Game & Watch series introduced in, and it combined सुविधाएँ from both the Nintendo Entertainment प्रणाली and खेल & देखें.
