the संसार व्यापार Center is a complex of buildings अंतर्गत निर्माण in निम्नतर Manhattan, New York City, United States, replacing an earlier जटिल of सात इमारतें साथ the same name on the same साईट.
the असली World व्यापार Center प्रदर्शित landmark जुड़वा towers, जिससे opened on April 4, 1973 और यहूद नष्ट in the September 11 attacks of 2001, along with 7 संसार Trade Center.
the other buildings in the complex were क्षतिग्रस्त in the हमले, and उनके ruins were आखिरकार demolished.
The साईट is being rebuilt with पाँच new skyscrapers और a मेमोरियल to those killed in the attacks.
, only one skyscraper रै been completed ; the other four हैं expected to be completed पहले 2020.
One World Trade बीच will be the सीसे building for the नई जटिल, reaching अधिक than 100 कहानियां at its completion.
It became the tallest building in New यॉर्क नगर on April 30, 2012, and is अपेक्षित to be finished by 2013.
A sixth मीनार is प्रतीक्षारत पुष्टि.
At the time of उनके पूर्णता, the original 1 World Trade Center ( the उत्तर Tower ) और 2 संसार Trade बीच ( the South Tower ), known collectively as the `` Twin मीनारें '', यहूद the tallest buildings in the world.
The other buildings included 3 wtc ( the मैरियट World Trade बीच ), 4 WTC, 5 WTC, 6 wtc, and 7 WTC.
All of ये buildings यहूद निर्मित between 1975 और 1985.
the लागत for the construction थी $ 400 million ( $ in डॉलर ).
The जटिल थी स्तिथ in the heart of नई York नगर 's शहर वित्तीय district और contained 13.4 million square feet ( 1.24 million m2 ) of दफ्तर space.
The संसार व्यापार बीच अनुभवी a fire on, 1975, a bombing on, 1993 and a robbery on, 1998.
in 1998, the Port प्राधिकार decided to privatize the संसार Trade Center, पट्टे the buildings to a निजी कम्पनी to manage, and awarded the lease to Silverstein Properties in.
on the morning of सितंबर 11, 2001, al-qaeda -संबद्धd hijackers flew two Boeing 767 jets into the complex, one into प्रत्येक tower, in a समन्वित terrorist attack.
बाद burning लिये 56 minutes, the दक्षिण मीनार ( 2 ) collapsed, followed a half-hour later by the North मीनार ( 1 ), with the हमले on the World Trade बीच resulting in 2,753 मौतों.
गिरना debris from the मीनारें, संयुक्त with फ़ायर that the मलबा initiated in several surrounding buildings, led to the partial or पूरा पतन of सब the other इमारतें in the complex और caused अनर्थकारी क्षति to टेन अन्य large structures in the surrounding क्षेत्रफल.
the प्रक्रम of cleanup and recovery at the World व्यापार बीच साईट took eight months.
Over the following सालो, plans for a rebuilt संसार व्यापार Center took form.
the पहला नई building at the साईट थी 7 World व्यापार बीच, जिससे opened in.
The Lower Manhattan विकास निगम ( lmdc ), established in to oversee the rebuilding प्रक्रम, व्यवस्थित competitions to select a साईट plan और मेमोरियल डिज़ाइन.
मेमोरी मूलाधार, designed by डेनियल libeskind, थी selected as the निपुण योजना, लकिन this गई through substantial changes in design.
the नई संसार Trade Center complex will include One World Trade बीच, तीन अन्य high-rise office towers, and the National September 11 मेमोरियल & संग्रहालय.
सैन जिबरील Mountains
San Bernardino Mountains, साथ mt. San gorgonio in the foreground और बिग भालू Lake in the background.
The Transverse Ranges हैं a group of mountain सीमाएँ of southern California, in the Pacific Coast Ranges physiographic प्रदेश in उत्तर America.
The अनुप्रस्थ सीमाएँ begin at the southern end of the California coast सीमाएँ और झूठ between Santa Barbara and सैन Diego counties.
They derive the name Transverse सीमाएँ due to their east-west अभिविन्यास, बनाना them अनुप्रस्थ to the सामान्य north-south orientation of सबसे of California 's coastal kyu.
आवधिक तालिका with electron शेल
An electron shell may be विचार of as an orbit followed by electrons around an अणु 's nucleus.
the closest shell to the nucleus is पुकारा the `` 1 shell '' ( भी called `` K शेल '' ), followed by the `` 2 shell '' ( or `` l shell '' ), then the `` 3 शेल '' ( or `` m शेल '' ), और so on दूर और दूर इससे the केंद्रक.
The shell अक्षर K, L, M,..., used in the x-ray संकेतन, हैं alphabetical.
Each shell can contain only a फिक्स्ड क्रमांक of electrons : the 1st शेल can थाम up to two electrons, the 2nd शेल can थाम up to eight electrons, the 3rd शेल can hold up to 18, और 4th शेल can hold up to 32 और so on.
Since electrons हैं electrically attracted to the केंद्रक, an atom 's electrons होगा generally occupy outer शेल तभी if the more inner शेल have already been completely भर by other electrons.
However, इस is नहीं a strict requirement : Atoms may have दो or भी तीन incomplete outer shells.
( See madelung rule for more विवरण. )
For an explanation of why electrons मौजूद in ये शेल see electron configuration.
the electrons in the outermost occupied shell ( or शेल ) determine the chemical properties of the अणु ; it is called the valence शेल.
प्रत्येक शेल consists of एक or अधिक subshells, and each subshell consists of एक or अधिक atomic orbitals.
Vickie lynn Marshall ( née Hogan ; नवम्बर 28, 1967 – February 8, 2007 ), known by उसके moniker anna निकोल Smith, थी an अमरीकी मॉडल, अभिनेत्री, and television व्यक्तित्व.
स्मिथ first gained लोकप्रियता in Playboy, becoming the 1993 संगिनी of the Year.
वो modeled लिये कपडे companies, including Guess जीन्स and लेन Bryant.
स्मिथ dropped out of high school and was शादीशुदा in 1985.
Her अत्यधिक publicized second विवाह to आयल business mogul, J. हावर्ड मार्शल, 62 years उसके वरिष्ठ, resulted in speculation कि वो married the octogenarian for his धन, which she अस्वीकृत.
Following Marshall 's मौत, Smith began a lengthy legal बैटल over a share of his एस्टेट.
Her मामला, मार्शल v. मार्शल, reached the U.S. Supreme अदालत on a सवाल of संघीय jurisdiction, और again on a सवाल of bankruptcy अदालत authority ( अभी called Stern v. Marshall ).
Smith died on फ़रवरी 8, 2007 in a Hollywood, Florida होटल रूम as a result of an overdose of prescription drugs.
भीतर the फाइनल six months of her life, स्मिथ was the focus of a नवीनीकृत दबायें कवरेज surrounding the मौत of her बेटे, Daniel, और the paternity and custody बैटल over her newborn daughter, Dannielynn.
the is एक denomination of जापानी yen.
the वर्तमान डिज़ाइन थी पहला minted in 1959 using जापानी वर्ण known as the `` नई स्क्रिप्ट ``, and यहूद भी minted from 1949-1958 using `` old-script '' Japanese characters.
Five-yen सिक्के date to 1870 ( जब, due to the much उच्चतर value of the येन, वे were minted in gold ).
the सामने of the सिक्का depicts a राइस plant growing आउट of the water, with `` पाँच येन '' written in kanji ; the वापस is stamped with `` Japan '' और the साल of समस्या, भी in कांजी, separated by sprouts of a tree.
The तीन graphic तत्व of the सिक्का represent कृषि and fisheries, the key elements of the जापानी first-sector अर्थव्यवस्था.
Around a छेद, वहीँ is a गियर that represents उद्योग.
It is the तभी Japanese सिक्का in circulation to lack अरबी numerals on either फेस.
TLC is an अमरीकी लड़की group जिनकी repertoire spanned R & B, हिप hop, soul, दुर्गंध, and नई jack swing.
originally consisting of singer tionne `` T-Boz '' Watkins, rapper लिसा `` Left नजर '' lopes and सिंगर rozonda `` Chilli '' थामस, the group found unprecedented success in the 1990s while also enduring a श्रेणी of spats with the law, each other, और the group 's रिकार्ड label.
Initially, tlc हासिल वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी following the release of their debut album ooooooohhh...
On the tlc टिप, which sold 6 million नक़ल worldwide.
However, it थी उनके second album, crazysexycool, कि catapulted the group to superstar औकात.
crazysexycool गई on to be certified डायमंड by the riaa — a first for a मादा group, और eventually बेची 23 million नक़ल विश्वव्यापी.
पाँच सालो बाद, the group released उनके third एल्बम fanmail, जिससे became the समूह 's first एल्बम to डेब्यू at number one and sold अधिक than 11 लाख copies worldwide.
The subsequent दौरे following fanmails रिलीज became the highest grossing दौरे of सब time by a मादा बैंड.
in 2002, लिसा `` बाएँ Eye '' lopes died in a car दुर्घटना in Honduras.
Seven महीने बाद, T-Boz and chilli released the समूह 's fourth album 3D, which sold 2 लाख copies विश्वव्यापी, it featured unreleased vocals इससे Left Eye.
बिलबोर्ड पत्रिका क्रमित TLC as एक of the greatest musical trios.
between 1992 and 2003, the बैंड accumulated टेन top ten singles, चार number एक singles, four multi-platinum albums, और चार Grammy पुरस्कार.
At the end of 1999, tlc was ranked as the seventh most कामयाब act of the 1990s by बिलबोर्ड.
in 2008, the समूह थी inducted into the सब Time hot 100 Artist हॉल of कीर्ति by the same पत्रिका, at 56th प्लेस.
कि साल it was also सूचीबद्ध as the # 25 r & B/hip-hop artist of the preceding 25 सालो.
TLC रै sold अधिक than 65 million records विश्वव्यापी and वे are ranked as the second बेहतरीन selling female समूह of all time, and the बेहतरीन selling मादा R & b group of all समय.
in 2012, TLC ranked 12th on vh1 's 100 महानतम महिलाओं in म्यूज़िक, होने ranked the number one all लड़की समूह on कि सूची.
Tarzan is a 1999 American animated adventure फिल्मी produced by Walt डिज़्नी Feature Animation और वितरित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी Pictures.
The 37th फिल्मी in the वॉल्ट डिज़्नी Animated क्लासिक, it is based on the स्टोरी Tarzan of the Apes by एडगर Rice बरोज, and is the only major motion picture संस्करण of the story टार्ज़न प्रॉपर्टी to be animated.
निर्देशित by क्रिस buck और Kevin Lima with a screenplay by Tab Murphy, Bob tzudiker, और Noni श्वेत, टार्ज़न features the voices of Tony Goldwyn, Minnie ड्राइवर, Glenn बंद, and रोजी O'Donnell साथ Brian Blessed, तलवार Henriksen, Wayne नाईट, and Nigel Hawthorne.
it was the पिछला bona fide hit before the Disney slump of the early 2000s grossing $ 171,091,819 domestically और $ 448,191,819 worldwide, outgrossing its पूर्ववर्तियों hercules ( 1997 ) and mulan ( 1998 ).
at the time of इसके release, its उत्पादन बजट of $ 130 million made it the सबसे expensive एनिमेटेड फिल्मी कभी बना, जबतक topped by Disney 's own $ 140 million खजाना Planet in 2002.
It थी भी the पहला डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड विशेषता to open at # 1 चूंकि pocahontas.
This was the पिछला major box दफ्तर कामयाबी of the डिज़्नी पुनर्जागरण.
आयल Platform p-51 बंद the ब्राज़ीलियाई coast is a semi-submersible मंच.
आयल platform Mittelplate in the North sea
an oil platform, ( offshore मंच or colloquially आयल रिग ) is a विशाल structure with सुविधाएं to ड्रिल कुएं, to निकालें और process oil और natural gas, और to temporarily स्टोर product जबतक it can be brought to shore for शोधन और marketing.
in many cases, the मंच contains facilities to house the workforce as well.
depending on the हालातों, the platform may be fixed to the समंदर floor, may consist of an artificial island, or may फ्लैश.
रिमोट subsea wells may भी be कनेक्ट to a मंच by flow लाइनों और by umbilical connections.
ये subsea समाधान may consist of एक or अधिक subsea wells, or of एक or अधिक manifold केंद्रों लिये multiple कुएं.
वध is the हत्या of animals, usually that of घरेलू livestock लिये food.
the animals most commonly slaughtered for food हैं cattle, water buffalo ( for बीफ और veal ), शीप, बकरियों ( लिये मेमने और mutton ), सूअर ( for pork ), घोड़े ( for घोड़ा मांस ), and fowl, largely chickens, turkeys, और ducks और increasingly fish from the aquaculture industry ( मछली खेती ).
the श्वेत House, the president 's आधिकारिक निवास और center of the administration
अंतर्गत the संयुक्त States Constitution, the अध्यक्ष of the United राज्य is the head of राज्य and सिर of सरकारी of the United States.
As chief of the कार्यपालिका branch and head of the federal सरकारी as a पूरे, the प्रेसिडेंसी is the उच्चतम राजनैतिक दफ्तर in the संयुक्त States by influence and recognition.
The president is भी the commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त राज्य Armed शक्तियां.
The अध्यक्ष is indirectly निर्वाचित to a four-year term by an चुनावी College ( or by the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि चाहिए the चुनावी कॉलेज fail to पुरस्कार an निरपेक्ष बहुमत of votes to कोई person ).
Since the अनुसमर्थन of the Twenty-second amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान in 1951, no व्यक्ति may be निर्वाचित President अधिक than twice, and no one who has served अधिक than two years of a पद to जिससे someone else थी निर्वाचित may be elected अधिक than एकबार.
Upon the मौत, resignation, or removal इससे office of an लाज़िम अध्यक्ष, the वाइस President assumes the दफ्तर.
The President जरूर be at least 35 सालो of age और a `` प्राकृतिक born '' citizen of the United राज्य.
This सूची शामिल तभी those persons जो यहूद sworn into दफ्तर as president following the ratification of the United राज्य संविधान, जिससे took effect on March 4, 1789.
For अमरीकी नेताओ पहले this ratification, see President of the महाद्वीपीय Congress.
the सूची करता not शामिल कोई एक्टिंग राष्ट्रपतियों under the Twenty-fifth amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान.
वहीँ have been 43 people sworn into office, और 44 presidencies, as ग्रोवर Cleveland परोसा दो non-consecutive terms and is counted chronologically as both the 22nd and 24th अध्यक्ष.
Of the individuals निर्वाचित as अध्यक्ष, चार died in office of प्राकृतिक causes ( William Henry हैरिसन, Zachary टेलर, Warren G. हार्डिंग, and फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट ), चार यहूद assassinated ( अब्राहम Lincoln, जेम्स A. Garfield, विलियम mckinley, and John F. Kennedy ) and एक resigned ( रिचर्ड निक्सन ).
जार्ज वॉशिंगटन, the पहला अध्यक्ष, थी inaugurated in 1789 after a सर्वसम्मत vote of the Electoral कॉलेज.
William Henry Harrison खर्च the shortest समय in दफ्तर साथ 32 दिनों in 1841, and Franklin D. रूज़वेल्ट spent the longest with over twelve सालो, लकिन died shortly into उसके fourth term in 1945.
he is the तभी president to serve अधिक than two terms, and a संवैधानिक amendment, affecting राष्ट्रपतियों after हैरी ट्रूमैन, थी passed to limit the क्रमांक of times an individual can be निर्वाचित president.
एंड्रयू Jackson, the seventh president, थी the first to be निर्वाचित by मेन of सब classes in 1828 बाद most कानून barring non-land-owners इससे voting were repealed.
वारेन हार्डिंग was the पहला निर्वाचित after महिलाओं gained मतदान rights in 1920.
इतिहास records four presidents – जॉन Q Adams, रदरफोर्ड B. हेज़, बेंजामिन हैरिसन और जार्ज W. बुश – जो खोया the लोकप्रिय vote but assumed office.
जॉन F. Kennedy रै महरूम the only अध्यक्ष of Roman कैथोलिक आस्था, और the current president, Barack ओबामा, is the पहला president of African descent.

a suppressor, sound suppressor, or ध्वनि मॉडरेटर, is a device attached to or part of the barrel of a firearm which reduces the amount of रव, और प्रायः the राशि of muzzle flash, generated by firing the हथियार.
A suppressor can be used both साथ a firearm और साथ संपीडित air gun.
हालांकि it is sometimes referred to as a silencer, this पद is a misnomer popularized by cinematic fiction : the ध्वनि of a प्रक्षेप्य, especially एक चलती तेज़ than the speed of sound, through the air can नहीं be eliminated.
using a suppressor in long distance shooting ( i.e. वृहद than 300 meters ) can lessen, or retard, the रपट at the पल of impact, and create the impression of खामोशी निकट the निशाना.
The noise सुना निकट the muzzle as a projectile पत्ते the बैरल, though subdued, is not silent at all.
A suppressor is usually a metal बेलन साथ internal mechanisms to reduce the sound of फायरिंग by slowing the escaping propellant gas और sometimes by reducing the velocity of the bullet.
जल्दी suppressors were created around the शुरूआत of the 20th century by अनेक inventors.
American आविष्कारक Hiram पर्सी कहावत ( not to be confused साथ Hiram स्टीवंस कहावत, hiram पर्सी 's father, and the inventor of the कहावत Machine Gun ), is credited साथ inventing and selling the पहला commercially successful models circa 1902 ( patented 30 March 1909 ).
कहावत दिया उसके यंत्र the trademarked name Maxim Silencer.
the मफलर लिये internal combustion engines was developed in parallel with the firearm suppressor by कहावत in the जल्दी 20th century, using many of the same techniques to provide quieter-running इंजन ( in many European देशों ऑटोमोबाइल mufflers are स्टिल पुकारा silencers ).
the शब्द silencer in reference to gun suppressor remains in फैली use, although it रै चूंकि गिरे out of favor साथ कुछ, विशेषकर among the firearms उद्योग, being replaced साथ the अधिक literally accurate term sound suppressor or बस suppressor, because a `` sound suppressor '' does नहीं `` खामोशी '' कोई weapon, rather it eliminates muzzle फ्लैश और reduces the सोनिक pressure of a firearm discharging.
Common उपयोग और U.S. विधान language एहसान the historically earlier पद, silencer.
in U.S. विधि, the terms `` firearm muffler '' और `` firearm silencer '' हैं synonymous.
suppressors were regularly used by एजेंटों of the संयुक्त राज्य Office of रणनीतिक सेवाएं, who favored the newly designed ऊँची मानक HDM.22 long राइफल pistol during संसार युद्ध II.
OSS Director William जोसेफ `` Wild Bill '' डोनोवन demonstrated the pistol लिये अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. Roosevelt at the श्वेत हाउस.
according to OSS research मुख्य Stanley Lovell, Donovan ( an बूढ़ा और trusted friend of the President ) थी waved into the ओवल Office, where रूज़वेल्ट थी dictating a letter.
While Roosevelt finished उसके संदेश, Donovan turned his वापस and fired टेन गोलियाँ into a sandbag he had brought with उसे, announced what he had किया और handed the smoking गन to the astonished president.

beatrice `` bea '' आर्थर ( May 13, 1922 – अप्रैल 25, 2009 ) थी an अमरीकी actress, comedienne, और singer whose करियर spanned seven दशकों.
Arthur achieved fame as the character maude Findlay on the 1970s sitcoms सब in the परिवार and Maude, and as Dorothy Zbornak on the 1980s sitcom The सुनहरी लड़कियों, जीतना एमी पुरस्कार for दोनो भूमिकाएँ.
a stage actress दोनो पहले and बाद her television success, she won the टोनी Award लिये बेहतरीन प्रदर्शित अभिनेत्री in a Musical for her प्रदर्शन as वीरा Charles in the original cast of Mame ( 1966 ).
is a 2011 जापानी 3d computer-animated फिल्मी आधारित on the Tekken video game series, उत्पादित by Digital frontier और वितरित by asmik Ace entertainment in association with Bandai Entertainment.
the film premiered in North America by Bandai Entertainment on जुलाई 26, 2011, और in Australia on July 27, 2011 in a खास विशेष one-off स्क्रीनिंग.
it थी released on सितंबर 3, 2011 in जापानी.
The फिल्मी थी released on blu-ray डिस्क on नवम्बर 22, 2011 for यूएसए, and December 1, 2011 लिये Japan.
इस फिल्मी थी also released on dvd on नवम्बर 22, 2011 ( 2D संस्करण तभी ).

in the United राज्य, a homeowner association is a निगम formed by a real estate डेवलपर for the purpose of marketing, managing, और selling of homes और lots in a residential subdivision.
It अनुदान the डेवलपर privileged voting अधिकारों in governing the संघ, जबकि allowing the डेवलपर to निकास वित्तीय and legal जिम्मेदारी of the organization, typically by transferring ownership of the association to the homeowners बाद selling बंद a predetermined number of लोट.
सदस्यता in the homeowners संघ by a आवासीय buyer is typically a condition of खरीदें ; a खरीदार is n't दिए an विकल्प to reject it.
सबसे homeowner associations हैं incorporated, और are subject to state statutes that govern non-profit corporations and homeowner associations.
राज्य oversight of homeowner associations is minimal, and मुख्यतः takes the form of कानून which are असंगत इससे state to राज्य.
कुछ राज्य, ऐसे as Florida and कैलिफ़ोर्निया, have a विशाल body of homeowner संघ law, और कुछ states, such as मैसाचुसेट्स, have वस्तुतः no homeowner association law.
The fastest growing form of आवास in the संयुक्त राज्य आज is common-interest developments ( cids ), a श्रेणी कि includes planned-unit developments of single-family homes, condominiums, and cooperative apartments.
चूंकि 1964, homeowner associations have become increasingly आम in the USA.
The जातियाँ एसोसिएशन संस्थान trade संघ estimated कि HOAs governed 24.8 लाख American घरों और 62 लाख residents in 2010.

वहीँ हैं अनेक breeds of Guinea सुअर जिससे have been विकसित since इसके domestication ca. 5000 bc.
breeds vary widely in रूप और purpose, ranging from show breeds साथ long, flowing hair to those in उपयोग as मॉडल organisms by science.
From ca. 1200 ad to the Spanish conquest of the इन्का Empire in 1532, selective breeding by indigenous South American peoples resulted in अनेक किस्में of घरेलू गिनी pigs, जिससे रूप the basis for कुछ of the modern घरेलू breeds.
जल्दी andean breeds were primarily kept as agricultural भण्डार for food, and प्रयत्न at improving the Guinea सुअर as a food source continue to the modern era.
साथ the export of Guinea सूअर to Europe in the 15th century, the लक्ष्य in प्रजनन shifted to फ़ोकस on the विकास of appealing pets.
To इस end, विभिन्न प्रतिस्पर्धी breeding संगठन यहूद founded by fanciers.
The अमरीकी Cavy Breeders Association, an adjunct to the अमरीकी Rabbit प्रजनक Association, is the governing body in the United States और कनाडा.
The अंग्रेजों cavy Council governs cavy क्लब in the United किंगडम.
समान संगठन exist in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ( ऑस्ट्रेलियाई नेशनल Cavy परिषद ) और New जीलैंड ( New Zealand Cavy क्लबों ).
प्रत्येक club publishes its अपना Standard of Perfection और determines which breeds are योग्य लिये प्रर्दशित.
New breeds continue to emerge in the 21st century.
हालांकि वहीँ are many breeds of Guinea सुअर, only a few breeds are commonly मिला on the show तालिका as पालतु.
सबसे Guinea सूअर found as pets were either found undesirable by प्रजनक or यहूद bred to be pleasant pets regardless of how well वे meet the नस्ल standard of पूर्णता.
the छोटी hair, Abyssinian, peruvian and Sheltie ( उर्फ Silkie ) breeds are those most frequently seen as pets, and the पूर्व three are the कोर breeds in the history of the प्रतिस्पर्धी showing of गिनी pigs.
In addition to their मानक रूप, nearly सब breeds आइये in a साटन variant.
satins, due to their hollow बाल shafts, possess coats of a special gloss और चमक.
however, there is growing प्रमाण कि the जीनों जिम्मेदार लिये the साटन कोट भी can cause severe अस्थि समस्याएं, including Osteodystrophy और Paget 's disease.
Showing साटन विसंगतियाँ is निषिद्ध by some cavy प्रजनक ' associations क्युकी of एनिमल welfare reasons.
All cavy breeds have कुछ shared सामान्य standards : the head प्रोफ़ाइल should be rounded, साथ विशाल आँखें और विशाल, smooth ears.
the देह should be strong and of कॉम्पैक्ट build.
कोट colour चाहिए in all विसंगतियाँ be clearly पारिभाषित और thorough from root to tip.
ये मानकों हैं best met by long स्थापित, commonly bred breeds, as उनके प्रजनक have था enough समय and पशु to effectively नस्ल for these qualities.
The coat colour ideal of good definition और thoroughness is rarely met by अन्य than the चिकना coated breeds, which have had खूब स्थापित, पृथक प्रजनन lines for different colours.
राज्य स्कूलों ( also known as पब्लिक schools or government schools ) generally refer to प्राथमिक or secondary स्कूलों mandated for or offered to सब children without charge paid for, in पूरे or in part, by कराधान.
The term may भी refer to institutions of post-secondary शिक्षा वित्तपोषित, in whole or in part, and overseen by government.
the ribosome assembles polymeric protein molecules जिनकी sequence is नियंत्रित by the अनुक्रम of messenger rna molecules.
This is required by all living cells और संबद्ध viruses.
The राइबोसोम ( इससे ribonucleic acid और the Greek सोम, meaning `` body '' ) is a large and complex molecular machine, मिला within सब जीना कोशिकाएं, that serves as the प्राथमिक site of biological प्रोटीन synthesis ( translation ).
ribosomes link अमीनो acids together in the order निर्दिष्ट by मेसेंजर RNA ( mRNA ) molecules.
ribosomes consist of two प्रमुख subunits—the small ribosomal subunit reads the mrna, while the large subunit joins अमीनो acids to रूप a polypeptide कड़ी.
प्रत्येक subunit is composed of एक or more ribosomal rna ( rRNA ) अणुओं और a variety of प्रोटीन.
The अनुक्रम of DNA एन्कोडिंग लिये a प्रोटीन may be copied many times into मेसेंजर rna ( mRNA ) chains of a समान अनुक्रम.
ribosomes can bind to an mrna chain and उपयोग it as a template लिये determining the correct sequence of amino acids in a particular protein.
अमीनो acids are selected, एकत्रित और carried to the ribosome by ट्रांसफ़र RNA ( tRNA molecules ), which डालें एक part of the ribosome और bind to the मेसेंजर RNA कड़ी.
the attached अमीनो acids हैं तब linked साथ by another part of the ribosome.
एकबार the प्रोटीन is उत्पादित, it can then 'fold ' to produce a विशिष्ट कार्यात्मक three-dimensional structure.
A राइबोसोम is made इससे complexes of RNAs and प्रोटीन and is इसलिए a ribonucleoprotein.
प्रत्येक राइबोसोम is divided into two subunits : the smaller subunit binds to the mrna pattern, जबकि the larger subunit बांधता to the tRNA and the amino acids.
जब a ribosome finishes पढना an mrna अणु, ये दो subunits split अलावा.
ribosomes are ribozymes, क्युकी the catalytic peptidyl transferase कार्यकलाप कि कड़ी amino acids साथ is performed by the ribosomal RNA.
ribosomes इससे bacteria, archaea और eukaryotes ( the तीन domains of life on Earth ) differ in उनके आकार, sequence, structure, और the ratio of protein to rna.
The मतभेद in structure allow कुछ antibiotics to kill जीवाणु by inhibiting उनके ribosomes, जबकि leaving human ribosomes unaffected.
In जीवाणु और आर्किया, अधिक than एक राइबोसोम may मूव साथ a सिंगल mrna कड़ी at एक समय, each `` पढना '' इसके sequence और producing a सम्बन्धित प्रोटीन अणु.
the ribosomes in the mitochondria of eukaryotic cells functionally resemble many सुविधाएँ of those in जीवाणु, reflecting the likely विकासवादी उत्पत्ति of mitochondria.
Albert क्लॉड, Christian de Duve, and जार्ज Emil Palade were jointly awarded the नोबेल Prize in Physiology or आयुर्विज्ञान, in 1974, for the discovery of the ribosomes.
the नोबेल पुरस्कार in Chemistry 2009 थी awarded to venkatraman रामकृष्णन, थामस A. steitz and एडीए E. yonath लिये determining the विस्तृत structure और यांत्रिकी of the राइबोसोम.
The सरलीकृत internal structure of a chloroplast
Overview of the Calvin साईकिल और कार्बन fixation
the light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ of photosynthesis are chemical प्रतिक्रियाएँ कि convert कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड और other यौगिकों into ग्लूकोज.
ये reactions occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled area of a हरितलवक outside of the thylakoid membranes.
These reactions लो the light-dependent reactions और perform further chemical प्रक्रियाओं on उन्हें.
वहीँ हैं three phases to the light-independent reactions, collectively called the Calvin cycle : कार्बन fixation, reduction प्रतिक्रियाएँ, and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( rubp ) regeneration.
despite its नाम, इस process occurs तभी when लाइट is उपलब्धियाँ.
पौधे do नहीं carry out the calvin cycle by रात्रि.
They, बजाय, release sucrose into the फ्लोएम इससे उनके मंड reserves.
This प्रक्रम happens जब light is उपलब्धियाँ independent of the kind of photosynthesis ( C3 कार्बन fixation, c4 कार्बन fixation, and crassulacean Acid Metabolism ) ; CAM plants store malic एसिड in their vacuoles every night और रिलीज it by day in order to मेक इस प्रक्रम कार्य.
In गणित, a square क्रमांक or पूर्ण square is an integer that is the वर्गाकार of an पूर्णांक ; in अन्य words, it is the उत्पाद of some integer साथ itself.
लिये example, 9 is a square क्रमांक, चूंकि it can be लिखा as.
The usual संकेतन for the सूत्र लिये the वर्गाकार of a क्रमांक is not the product, but the equivalent घातांक, प्रायः सुनाया as `` वर्गाकार ''.
the name वर्गाकार क्रमांक comes from the नाम of the shape ; देखिए नीचे.
Square numbers are non-negative.
another रास्ता of saying कि a ( non-negative ) number is a square number, is that इसके square roots are again integers.
लिये example, = ±3, so 9 is a square क्रमांक.
a positive पूर्णांक that रै no पूर्ण वर्गाकार divisors मगर 1 is पुकारा square-free.
लिये a non-negative पूर्णांक, the th square number is, with होने the zeroth वर्गाकार.
the अवधारणा of square can be विस्तारित to some other क्रमांक systems.
if rational संख्याएँ are included, तब a square is the ratio of दो वर्गाकार integers, and, conversely, the ratio of two square integers is a वर्गाकार ( e.g., 4/9 = ( 2/3 ) 2 ).
starting साथ 1, there हैं वर्गाकार numbers up to और सहित, जहाँ the अभिव्यक्ति represents the मंजिल of the क्रमांक.
The Era of Good जज्बात marked a काल in the राजनैतिक history of the United States कि reflected a भाव of नेशनल purpose और a desire for unity among अमेरिकी in the aftermath of the Napoleonic Wars.
The era देखी the collapse of the federalist Party and an end to the bitter partisan विवादों between it और the dominant democratic-republican पार्टी दौरान the पहला Party प्रणाली.
अध्यक्ष James मुनरो endeavored to downplay दलगत संबद्ध in बनाना his nominations, with the ultimate goal of national unity and eliminating पार्टियों altogether इससे national राजनीती.
the काल is so closely संबद्ध साथ मुनरो 's प्रेसिडेंसी ( 1817–1825 ) और उसके administrative लक्ष्य that his नाम और the era हैं वस्तुतः synonymous.
The Era of Good Feelings चिह्नित a परिवर्तन in American राजनीती साथ the समाप्त of the Federalist Party as अमेरिका began to develop after the War of 1812.
While America was experiencing growth and prosperity बाद the युद्ध with Britain, इस era भी marks the पहला instance of आर्थिक troubles in the growing संयुक्त States.
Mirroring the अमरीकी प्रणाली प्रस्तावित by हेनरी मिट्टी, protective tariffs और the chartering of the Second बैंको of the United राज्य जटिल the tension between the उत्तर and South साथ the coming of the पहला वित्तीय crisis.
जबकि the term “Era of शुभ feelings” is प्रायः viewed साथ irony क्युकी of the political turmoil, आर्थिक factors caused animosity between the North और South.
the designation of the period by historians as एक of “good feelings” is प्रायः conveyed साथ विडंबना or skepticism, as the इतिहास of the era was एक in जिससे the राजनैतिक atmosphere was strained और divisive, विशेषकर among गिरोहों भीतर the मुनरो प्रशासन और the रिपब्लिकन Party.
the phrase “era of Good feelings” थी coined by Benjamin रसेल, in the बोस्टन Federalist newspaper, Columbian Centinel, on July 12, 1817, following मुनरो 's विज़िट to Boston, मैसाचुसेट्स as part of उसके good होगा दौरे of America.
Mariel मार्गरेट `` Mia '' hamm ( born कूच 17, 1972 ) is a रिटायर्ड अमरीकी professional सॉकर player.
hamm played many years as a आगे for the संयुक्त राज्य women 's national सॉकर team और was a founding सदस्य of the Washington स्वतंत्रता.
hamm scored 158 अंतरराष्ट्रीय लक्ष्य, अधिक than कोई other खिलाड़ी, male or मादा, in the history of soccer and is the third सबसे capped female player in सॉकर इतिहास behind kristine Lilly and क्रिस्टी rampone, appearing in 275 international मिलान.
hamm was नामित the women 's फीफा संसार खिलाड़ी of the Year the first two टाइम्स that पुरस्कार was दिए ( in 2001 and 2002 ), and is listed as one of फीफा 's 125 best जीना players ( as chosen by Pelé ).
वो was inducted into the नेशनल Soccer Hall of Fame as well as the Alabama खेल हॉल of कीर्ति and Texas खेल हॉल of Fame.
वो is the लेखक of go लिये the Goal : A चैंपियन 's मार्गदर्शिका to Winning in सॉकर और जीवन और appeared in the HBO वृत्तचित्र Dare to Dream : The स्टोरी of the u.S. महिलाओं 's Soccer Team.
वॉशिंगटन पोस्ट columnist माइकल wilbon पुकारा hamm, `` शायद the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण athlete of the last 15 years. ''
Hamm takes a corner लात.
the नई York रेड Bulls is an अमरीकी पेशेवर soccer team based in Harrison, नई जर्सी, representing the New यॉर्क metropolitan क्षेत्रफल.
the टोली competes in the पूर्वी Conference of Major League सॉकर ( mls ).
It is एक of the टेन चार्टर क्लब of mls, having competed in the लीग since इसके inception.
The टोली was a founding सदस्य of MLS ( 1996 ), but रै गए through several name changes.
The टोली was originally known as the New York/New जर्सी metrostars through 1997.
इससे the 1998 season through the 2005 season, the team was ज्ञात as the metrostars.
on March 9, 2006, the team was बेची to रेड सांड gmbh, leading to the टोली 's वर्तमान नाम.
वे हैं the तभी original MLS मताधिकार नहीं to have जीती कोई significant trophy ( including नियमित season, playoffs, और knockout प्रतियोगिता ) चूंकि inception.
the team 's बेहतरीन परिणाम in the mls थी the MLS कप फाइनल in 2008.
in the US खोलें कप, the MetroStars पहुँचे three semifinals ( 1997, 1998, 2000 ), पहले reaching उनके first फाइनल in 2003, खोने 1–0 to the Chicago Fire.
On अगस्त 26, 2000, the metros ' क्लिंट mathis set an mls रिकार्ड by scoring five goals in a खेल विरूद्ध the डलास बर्न.
Some well-known players that have निभाई for the team शामिल giovanni savarese, टिम हावर्ड, Tony meola, tab Ramos, alexi Lalas, क्लिंट Mathis, jozy altidore, Michael Bradley, क्लाउडियो reyna, एडी Pope, Roberto donadoni, Lothar matthäus, Adolfo वालेंसिया, Youri Djorkaeff, amado ग्वेरा, Juan Pablo ángel, Thierry हेनरी, Juninho pernambucano, जन गुन्नार Solli, राफेल मार्ख़ेस, and Tim Cahill.
the टोली has also had well-known कोच, including Carlos queiroz, कार्लोस Alberto Parreira, Bora Milutinović, bob ब्राडली, Mo johnston, Bruce एरिना and hans Backe.
Confucianism, taoism, और Buddhism हैं एक, a painting in the litang स्टाइल portraying तीन मेन हँस by a river स्ट्रीम, 12th सदी, सोंग राजवंश.
Estimating the number of बौद्धों in the world, or in many देशों, is मुश्किल due to definitional issues as खूब as व्यावहारिक problems of enumeration.
To begin साथ, the religious मान्यताओं, practices, और पहचान of East Asians ( जो comprise the majority of the world 's Buddhists by any माप ) प्रायः blend buddhism साथ other traditions including confucianism, the Chinese folk religion, Daoism, shinto, और Korean shamanism.
Most followers of Buddhism do नहीं belong to संरचित congregations, or observe a definite ritual of adherence such as taking शरण, making it मुश्किल to accurately estimate the number of practitioners.
An अतिरिक्त challenge is the hostility of अनेक नेशनल governments ( often Communist ones such as China or उत्तर Korea ) to धर्म generally or to Buddhism specifically.
सरकारी नीतियों in these देशों may प्रोत्साहित the under-reporting or non-reporting of religious adherence, resulting in आधिकारिक totals कि may drastically underestimate the number of religious practitioners in ये countries.
अनुमान of the worldwide बौद्ध population दायरा from 350 लाख to over एक अरब, लकिन क्लस्टर nearer to the first फिगर.
adherents.com ( as of 2012 ) suggests a figure of 397 million.
by major branches, the संख्याएँ are as follows:
( 1 ) Mahayana buddhism, including ईस्ट एशियाई buddhism, with no fewer than 185 million adherents, और संभवतः several टाइम्स कि अनेक ( again, depending on definitional मुद्दे ).
इस is the predominant form of buddhism practiced in China, दक्षिण Korea, Japan, Taiwan, सिंगापुर, और Vietnam.
( 2 ) थेरवाद buddhism, with no कम than 125 million adherents.
इस is the predominant रूप of buddhism practiced in Cambodia, Thailand, लाओस, श्री Lanka, and बर्मा.
( 3 ) वज्रयान buddhism, with approximately 20 million adherents.
इस form predominates in the greater तिब्बती and मंगोलियाई regions, as well as in the Himalayas.
besides the independent countries of मंगोल और भूटान, और various territories भीतर कया is अभी western China, वज्रयान is परंपरागत to निश्चित regions of Russia ( e.g. कालमिकिया, बुर्यातिया ), इण्डिया ( e.g. लद्दाख, सिक्किम ), and नेपाल ( e.g. khumbu ).
Vajrayana, भी known as Tibetan buddhism, is often conflated with तांत्रिक buddhism, लकिन this is imprecise, as Shingon और other forms of East एशियाई buddhism भी practice तन्त्र.
At तनिक 7 countries ( Sri लंका, थाईलैंड, Cambodia, लाओस, Burma, Bhutan, और मंगोल ) have unambiguous Buddhist majorities.
depending on कैसा one calculates चाइनीज और अन्य East Asian adherents, इस फिगर might विस्तार to शामिल several more देशों.
in addition, Buddhism is the state religion of Cambodia and भूटान, and receives prominent जिक्र in the constitutions of Thailand and Sri Lanka.
in northern India और नेपाल, the land जहाँ Buddhism थी born, the धर्म severely declined during the पहला millennium.
whether this मनाही थी due to the Islamic conquest of उत्तरी India, or to अन्य कारकों, remains विवादास्पद.
See the article मनाही of buddhism in India.
James Butler Hickok ( may 27, 1837 – August 2, 1876 ), बेहतर ज्ञात as जंगली Bill Hickok, थी a folk hero of the American बूढ़ा वेस्ट.
उसके कौशल as a gunfighter और स्काउट, साथ साथ his प्रतिष्ठा as a lawman, provided the आधार लिये उसके fame, although कुछ of his reported exploits are fictionalized.
born and उठाया on a फार्म in rural Illinois, hickok went वेस्ट at age 18 as a fugitive from इंसाफ, first working as a stagecoach ड्राइवर, before he became a lawman in the frontier territories of Kansas और Nebraska.
he लड़ा for the Union Army दौरान the American Civil War, और gained publicity after the war as a स्काउट, marksman, कर्ता, and professional जुआरी.
between उसके law-enforcement duties और gambling, which easily overlapped, hickok थी involved in अनेक notable shootouts.
He थी शॉट और मारे जबकि playing poker in the nuttal & मन 's सैलून in Deadwood, डकोटा territory ( अभी South डकोटा ).
कलाकार 's conception of the जिज्ञासा rover vaporizing rock on Mars.
The रोवर landed on Mars in August 2012.
A मंगल rover is an स्वचालित मोटर गाडी जिससे propels itself across the सतह of the ग्रह मंगल बाद landing.
Rovers have अनेक advantages over stationary landers : वे examine more territory, they can be निर्देशित to interesting features, वे can place themselves in सनी स्थितियाँ to weather शीत months and they can अग्रिम the knowledge of कैसा to perform बहुत remote रोबोटिक vehicle control.
वहीँ have महरूम four कामयाब robotically संचालित Mars रोवर्स.
the Jet Propulsion प्रयोगशाला managed the Mars pathfinder मिशन और इसके अभी inactive sojourner rover.
It फिलहाल manages the Mars Exploration Rover mission 's active Opportunity रोवर और inactive Spirit, and, as part of the मंगल Science प्रयोगशाला मिशन, the जिज्ञासा रोवर.
A वित्तीय audit, or अधिक accurately, an audit of financial कथन, is the सत्यापन of the वित्तीय statements of a विधिक एंटिटी, साथ a view to एक्स्प्रेस an audit opinion.
the audit राय is intended to provide उचित assurance, लकिन नहीं निरपेक्ष परख, कि the financial कथन हैं प्रस्तुत fairly, in सब सामग्री respects, and/or give a true और fair दृश्य in accordance with the financial reporting framework.
the purpose of an audit is provide and objective independent examination of the वित्तीय कथन, जिससे increases the value and credibility of the financial statements उत्पादित by प्रबन्धन, thus increase उपयोक्ता विश्वास in the वित्तीय statement, reduce investor रिस्क and consequently reduce the cost of capital of the preparer of the वित्तीय कथन.
वित्तीय audits हैं typically performed by firms of practicing accountants जो are विशेषज्ञ in financial reporting.
The वित्तीय ऑडिट is one of अनेक परख कृत्यों provided by हिसाब firms.
अनेक संगठन separately employ or hire internal auditors, जो do not attest to financial रिपोर्ट्स लकिन फ़ोकस मुख्यतः on the आतंरिक नियंत्रण of the संगठन.
बाह्य auditors may चुनें to प्लेस सीमित reliance on the कार्य of internal auditors.
auditing promotes transparency and accuracy in the वित्तीय disclosures बना by an organization, इसलिए would संभावित to reduce of such corporations to conceal unscrupulous dealings.
internationally, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Standards on auditing ( isa ) जारी by the International auditing और Assurance Standards फलक ( IAASB ) is माना as the benchmark लिये audit process.
Almost सब jurisdictions require auditors to follow the isa or a local variation of the isa.
डालर सिक्के have been minted in the संयुक्त States in सुनहरा, silver, और base मेटल versions.
The term चांदी डालर is often प्रयुक्त लिये any विशाल श्वेत मेटल coin जारी by the United राज्य with a face value of एक dollar, although purists insist that a डालर is not चांदी जबतक it contains कुछ of that मेटल.
चांदी dollars, the first डालर coin समस्या, यहूद minted शुरूआत in 1794.
Gold डॉलर और gold-colored dollars have also been उत्पादित by the United States.
the sacagawea और Presidential डॉलर हैं often referred to as `` golden डॉलर ''.
In आधुनिक times, डालर coins have नहीं महरूम very popular in the संयुक्त States.
Despite प्रयत्न by the government to promote उनके use, सबसे अमेरिकी currently use the one dollar bill rather than dollar सिक्के.
in सीधा और स्तर उड़ान लिफ्ट ( L ) बराबरी वज़न ( w ).
in a banked फेरे of 60°, लिफ्ट equals double the वज़न ( l=2w ).
The pilot experiences 2g and a doubled weight.
The steeper the बैंको, the वृहद the g-forces.
This top-fuel dragster can accelerate from zero to in 0.86 सेकेंड.
This is a horizontal acceleration of 5.3 g. संयुक्त साथ the vertical g-force in the stationary मामला the Pythagorean प्रमेय yields a g फ़ोर्स of 5.4 g.
g-force ( with g from gravitational ) is a term लिये accelerations लगा as weight और measurable by accelerometers.
it is not a फ़ोर्स, प्रति se, but a फ़ोर्स per ईकाई द्रव्यमान.
चूंकि ऐसे a force is perceived as a वज़न, कोई g-force can be described as a `` weight प्रति ईकाई द्रव्यमान '' ( see the synonym विशिष्ट weight ).
The g-force acceleration acts as a गुणक of weight-like शक्तियां लिये प्रत्येक unit of an object 's द्रव्यमान, और ( save for certain electromagnetic force प्रभाव ) is the cause of an object 's acceleration in relation to free-fall.
इस त्वरण अनुभवी by an ऑब्जेक्ट is due to the वेक्टर योग of non-gravitational शक्तियां acting on an ऑब्जेक्ट फ़्री to move.
the accelerations कि हैं not उत्पादित by gravity are termed proper accelerations, और it is तभी these that हैं measured in g-force इकाई.
वे कारण तनावों और strains on objects.
Because of ये strains, विशाल g-forces may be destructive.
Gravitation एक्टिंग alone does not produce a g-force, भी though g-forces हैं expressed in multiples of the त्वरण of a मानक gravity.
Thus, the मानक गुरुत्वाकर्षक त्वरण at the धरती 's surface produces g-force तभी indirectly, as a परिणाम of resistance to it by mechanical शक्तियां.
The 1 g-force on an ऑब्जेक्ट sitting on the धरती 's सतह is caused by mechanical force exerted in the upward direction by the ground, keeping the ऑब्जेक्ट from going into free-fall.
the upward force from the मैदान ensures that an object at बाकी on the Earth 's surface is accelerating सापेक्ष to the free-fall कंडीशन, which is the पाथ कि the ऑब्जेक्ट would follow when गिरना freely toward the धरती 's बीच.
Objects अनुमत to free-fall in an inertial trajectory under the influence of gravitation-only, feel no g-force.
This is demonstrated by the `` zero-g '' conditions inside a freely falling लिफ्ट गिरना toward the धरती 's center ( in वैक्यूम ), or ( to शुभ approximation ) शर्तें अंदर a spacecraft in धरती orbit.
ये are उदाहरण of निर्देशांक त्वरण ( a change in गति ) without a sensation of weight.
the अनुभव of no g-force ( zero-g ), however it is produced, is synonymous with weightlessness.
in the absence of gravitational fields, or in directions at सही angles to them, उचित and coordinate accelerations हैं the वही, और any coordinate त्वरण जरूर be produced by a corresponding g-force त्वरण.
An example here is a प्रक्षेपास्त्र in फ़्री स्पेस, in जिससे सरल changes in velocity हैं उत्पादित by the engines, और produce g-forces on the rocket and passengers.
An augur holding a lituus, the curved wand प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a प्रतीक of augury on Roman coins
the augur थी a priest and आधिकारिक in the classical संसार, विशेषकर प्राचीन रोम और Etruria.
उसके main भूमिका थी to interpret the will of the gods by studying the flight of birds : whether they हैं flying in समूह or अलोन, what noises they make as they fly, direction of flight and what दयालु of birds वे हैं.
This was ज्ञात as `` taking the auspices. ''
The ceremony and function of the augur was सेंट्रल to any प्रमुख undertaking in Roman society—public or private—including matters of युद्ध, कॉमर्स, and religion.
The रोमन इतिहासकार Livy तनावों the importance of the augurs : `` Who does not जान कि this city was संस्थापित तभी after लेने the auspices, that सबकुछ in war और in सलाम, at घर और विदेश, was किया only after taking the auspices ? ''
Farmington पहाड़ियाँ is an affluent community in southeastern Michigan.
it is the दूसरी largest city in Oakland County in the U.S. state of मिशिगन.
इसके population थी 79,740 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
it is part of the upscale northwestern उपनगरों of महानगर डेट्रॉयट और is also पूर्वोत्तर of downtown ऐन arbor.
Farmington Hills consistently ranks as एक of the safest शहरों in the संयुक्त राज्य, as खूब as in the state of Michigan.
in 2010, the क्षेत्रफल क्रमित as the 30th safest city in America.
हालांकि the two शहरों have पृथक सेवाएं और पता, farmington and farmington Hills are प्रायः thought of as the वही community.
सुविधाएँ of the जातियाँ include a recently renovated downtown, boutiques, a vintage cinema, numerous रेस्तरां, exotic car dealerships, art गैलरी, and पब्लिक पार्क सहित विरासत पार्क.
वहीँ are several historical साइट including the Longacre House and the Governor warner mansion.
दोनो शहरों are परोसा by Farmington पब्लिक Schools.
Farmington पहाड़ियाँ serves as a major business बीच for the greater डेट्रॉयट क्षेत्रफल.
present-day impression of a Late Bronze Age seal
Town मुहर ( मेट्रिक्स ) of náchod इससे 1570
a seal is a device लिये बनाना an impression in मोम, मिट्टी, पेपर, or कुछ अन्य medium, सहित an embossment on paper, and is भी the छाप thus बना.
The original purpose was to authenticate a document, a wrapper लिये one such as a modern envelope, or the कवर of a संग्राहक or पैकेज holding valuables or अन्य वस्तुएँ.
the sealing process is essentially that of a mould, with the final चित्र represented on the यंत्र for बनाना the छाप by a mirror-image design, incised in sunken- ( or counter- ) relief or intaglio.
The seal-making device is also referred to as the मुहर मेट्रिक्स or die ; the imprint it creates as the मुहर impression ( or, अधिक rarely, the sealing ).
if the impression is made purely as a relief resulting from the वृहद pressure on the paper where the high parts of the matrix टच, the seal is known as a शुष्क seal ; in सब other मामले a द्रव or liquified मीडियम ( ऐसे as ink or wax ) is used, usually in another रंग than the paper.
For विधिक उद्देश्य, the definition of a मुहर may be extended to include रबर stamps, or writing निर्दिष्ट words ( `` seal '' or `` L.S. `` ).
in the संयुक्त राज्य, the word `` मुहर '' is sometimes आबंटित to a facsimile of the seal design ( in मोनोक्रोम or रंग ), which may be प्रयुक्त in a किस्में of contexts सहित architectural settings, on ध्वज, or on आधिकारिक letterheads.
यूँ, लिये example, the ग्रेट मुहर of the संयुक्त States, among other उपयोग, appears on the reverse of the one-dollar bill ; and several of the seals of the u.S. राज्य appear on उनके respective state flags.
In Europe, हालांकि coats of arms and heraldic badges may खूब विशेषता in such contexts as खूब as on seals, the मुहर डिज़ाइन in its entirety rarely appears as an emblem.
the study of seals is known as sigillography or sphragistics.
groundhog दिन ( Pennsylvania German : Grundsaudaag, murmeltiertag ) is a day मनाये on February 2.
according to लोकगीत, if it is cloudy when a groundhog emerges from its burrow on this day, then spring will आइये early ; if it is सनी, the groundhog will supposedly see इसके shadow and रिट्रीट वापस into इसके burrow, and the शीत weather will continue लिये छह more weeks.
Modern customs of the holiday involve जश्न जहाँ जल्दी morning festivals हैं held to देखें the groundhog emerging from its burrow.
in southeastern Pennsylvania, groundhog Lodges ( grundsow lodges ) celebrate the holiday with fersommlinge, social events in जिससे food is परोसा, भाषणों हैं made, और एक or अधिक g'spiel ( plays or skits ) are performed for entertainment.
The Pennsylvania German dialect is the तभी language spoken at the इवेंट, और those who speak अंग्रेज़ी pay a दंड, usually in the form of a nickel, dime, or क्वार्टर प्रति word spoken, साथ the money put into a कटोरी in the center of the table.
the largest Groundhog Day celebration is held in Punxsutawney, Pennsylvania.
groundhog Day, already a widely पहचाना और popular tradition, received widespread ध्यान as a result of the 1993 फिल्मी Groundhog Day, जिससे was set in punxsutawney, PA ( though filmed primarily in Woodstock, il ) and portrayed Punxsutawney Phil.
ऊँची रेज़ोल्यूशन चित्र of Tampa खाड़ी region
the tampa Bay क्षेत्रफल रै a आर्द्र उपोष्ण climate ( koppen cfa ), with warm और आर्द्र summers with बारंबार thunderstorms और drier सर्दियों with freezing temperatures occurring प्रत्येक 2–3 years.
the area अनुभवों a significant summer गीला season, as nearly two-thirds of the annual वर्षण falls in the महीने of June through September.
The क्षेत्रफल is सूचीबद्ध by the United States Department of कृषि ( USDA ) as being in hardiness मण्डल 10, which is परिचय the उत्तरी सीमा of जहाँ coconut palms and royal palms can be grown.
highs usually range between 65 and 95 °f ( 18 and 35 °c ) year गोलाकार.
हालांकि known for hot ग्रीष्म, Tampa 's official ऊँची रै never पहुँचे 100 °f ( 38 °C ) – the city 's all-time रिकार्ड तापमान is 99 °f ( 37 °c ).
St. Petersburg 's all-time रिकार्ड ऊँची is exactly 100 °f ( 38 °c ).
Pinellas काउंटी lies on a peninsula between Tampa Bay और the गल्फ of Mexico, और much of the city of Tampa lies on a smaller peninsula jutting आउट into Tampa खाड़ी.
This निकटता to large लाशें of water both moderates temperatures and introduces विशाल amounts of humidity into the माहौल.
in सामान्य, the लोकल communities farthest from the coast have larger तापमान सीमाएँ, both during a single दिन and throughout the seasons of the साल.
A diagram of the electromagnetic वर्णक्रम, प्रर्दशित various गुण across the range of frequencies and wavelengths
the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम is the range of सब possible बारंबारता of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक radiation.
The `` इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक spectrum '' of an ऑब्जेक्ट has a अलग meaning, and is instead the characteristic distribution of electromagnetic विकिरण emitted or अवशोषित by that particular object.
The electromagnetic वर्णक्रम extends from नीचे the कम बारंबारता प्रयुक्त लिये modern रेडियो संचार to gamma radiation at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end, thereby covering wavelengths इससे हज़ारों of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom.
the सीमा लिये long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself, जबकि it is विचार that the short wavelength सीमा is in the vicinity of the Planck लंबाई, हालांकि in principle the वर्णक्रम is infinite और निरन्तर.
सबसे parts of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम हैं प्रयुक्त in science for spectroscopic and अन्य probing interactions, as ways to पढ़ाई और characterize पदार्थ.
In addition, radiation इससे various parts of the वर्णक्रम रै found अनेक अन्य uses for संचार and manufacturing ( देखिए electromagnetic radiation लिये more अनुप्रयोग ).
लेजेंड
फ्रैंकलिन Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30, 1882 – अप्रैल 12, 1945 ), भी known by उसके आद्याक्षर, fdr, was the 32nd अध्यक्ष of the United राज्य ( 1933–1945 ) and a central फिगर in संसार events दौरान the mid-20th century, leading the United States during a समय of worldwide आर्थिक depression और कुल war.
a dominant leader of the लोकतांत्रिक Party and the only American president elected to more than two शर्तें, he built a नई सौदे गठबन्धन that realigned American politics after 1932, as उसके domestic नीतियों defined American liberalism for the middle तीसरा of the 20th सदी.
With the bouncy popular song `` प्रसन्न Days हैं यहाँ Again `` as his campaign theme, FDR defeated लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन हर्बर्ट हूवर in November 1932, at the गहराई of the ग्रेट अवसाद.
Energized by his निजी victory over polio, FDR 's unfailing आशावाद और activism contributed to a नवीकरण of the नेशनल spirit.
he worked closely with अंग्रेजों Prime मंत्री विंस्टन चर्चिल and Soviet सामान्य सचिव Joseph स्टालिन in अग्रणी the allies against Germany और जापानी in World War ii, and restoring समृद्धि to the nation 's economy.
in उसके पहला सौ days in office, जिससे began कूच 4, 1933, Roosevelt पथप्रदर्शन प्रमुख legislation और issued a profusion of कार्यपालिका आदेश कि instituted the नई सौदे —a variety of programs designed to उपज relief ( सरकारी jobs लिये the बेरोजगार ), रिकवरी ( आर्थिक growth ), और reform ( through विनियमन of Wall Street, banks and परिवहन ).
the अर्थव्यवस्था improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937, but then relapsed into a deep recession.
The bipartisan रूढ़िवादी Coalition कि formed in 1937 prevented उसके पैकिंग the Supreme अदालत or गुजर any considerable विधान ; it abolished many of the relief कार्यक्रम जब बेरोजगारी diminished during संसार युद्ध II.
Most of the regulations on कारोबार were ended about 1975–85, मगर लिये the विनियमन of Wall Street by the प्रतिभूति और Exchange Commission, which स्टिल exists.
Along साथ several छोटी कार्यक्रम, प्रमुख surviving कार्यक्रम शामिल the Federal Deposit बीमे Corporation, which was निर्मित in 1933, and सोशल सुरक्षा, which कॉंग्रेस passed in 1935.
as संसार युद्ध II loomed बाद 1938, साथ the Japanese invasion of चीन and the आक्रामकता of नाजी जर्मनी, FDR gave दमदार diplomatic and वित्तीय support to चीन और ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, while बाकी officially neutral.
His goal थी to make अमेरिका the `` आर्सेनल of लोकतंत्र `` which would सप्लाई munitions to the allies.
in March 1941, Roosevelt, with Congressional स्वीकृति, provided Lend-Lease aid to the countries लड़ against नाजी जर्मनी with ब्रिटेन.
With very strong नेशनल support, he बना युद्ध on Japan और जर्मनी after the Japanese आक्रमण on Pearl Harbor on December 7, 1941, कॉलिंग it a `` date जिससे होगा live in infamy ``.
He supervised the mobilization of the u.S. economy to support the Allied युद्ध effort.
As an active सैन्य नेता, Roosevelt implemented an overall war strategy on दो fronts कि ended in the defeat of the अक्ष शक्तियां and the development of the world 's पहला atom bomb.
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the internment of 100,000 Japanese अमरीकी civilians.
बेरोजगारी dropped to 2 %, राहत programs largely ended, और the औद्योगिक economy grew rapidly to नई हाइट्स as लाखो of people moved to new कार्य in युद्ध centers, and 16 लाख मेन और 300,000 women यहूद drafted or volunteered for military service.
Roosevelt वर्चस्व the American राजनैतिक झाँकी not only दौरान the बारह years of his प्रेसिडेंसी, लकिन also for decades afterward.
He orchestrated the realignment of मतदाता that created the पांचवां Party प्रणाली.
FDR 's New सौदे गठबन्धन united labor unions, big city मशीने, श्वेत ethnics, African Americans और ग्रामीण श्वेत southerners.
he भी बहकावे the बाद सृष्टि of the United राष्ट्र और bretton Woods.
रूज़वेल्ट is consistently rated by scholars as one of the शीर्ष तीन U.S. राष्ट्रपतियों, साथ with Abraham Lincoln and जार्ज Washington.
A liberal डेमोक्रेट, Roosevelt पारिभाषित उसके ideological स्थिति as `` a little बाएँ of center. ''
A Joint Committee is a पद in राजनीती that is प्रयुक्त to refer to a committee made up of members of both कक्षों of a bicameral legislature.
In other contexts, it refers to a कमेटी with members from अधिक than one organization.
the विनियमन of prostitution in the United राज्य is not among the enumerated शक्तियां of the federal सरकारी ; अंतर्गत the दसवाँ amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य Constitution, it is therefore exclusively the डोमेन of the states to परमिट, prohibit, or otherwise regulate commercial sex, मगर insofar as कॉंग्रेस may regulate it as भाग of अंतरराज्यीय कॉमर्स साथ कानून like the मन Act.
in most राज्य, prostitution is considered a misdemeanor in the category of public order अपराधों, a crime that disrupts the order of a community.
it थी at one time considered to be a vagrancy crime.
Currently, नेवाडा is the तभी state to allow brothel वेश्यावृति, the terms of जिससे are stipulated in the Nevada संशोधित Statutes.
तभी 8 counties currently contain active brothels.
सब forms of prostitution are illegal in क्लार्क काउंटी ( जिससे contains the Las vegas–paradise metropolitan क्षेत्रफल ), Washoe County ( which contains रेनो ), कार्सन City, डगलस काउंटी, and lincoln काउंटी.
the अन्य counties theoretically allow brothel वेश्यावृति, लकिन कुछ of these काउंटी फिलहाल have no क्रियाशील brothels.
Street prostitution, `` pandering, '' and living off of the proceeds of a prostitute remain illegal अंतर्गत नेवाडा विधि, as elsewhere in the country.
as with other countries, prostitution in the United States can be विभाजित into तीन व्यापक श्रेणी : गली prostitution, वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति, और अनुरक्षण prostitution.
The national flag of the संयुक्त States of America, प्रायः simply referred to as the American ध्वज, consists of तेरह equal आड़ा stripes of red ( शीर्ष और नीचे ) प्रत्यावर्ती साथ white, साथ a ब्लू आयताकार in the कैण्टन ( referred to specifically as the `` union '' ) bearing fifty छोटी, श्वेत, five-pointed stars arranged in नौ ऑफसेट आड़ा पंक्ति of छह stars ( top और नीचे ) प्रत्यावर्ती साथ पंक्ति of five सितारों.
the 50 सितारों on the ध्वज represent the 50 states of the United States of अमेरिका and the 13 stripes represent the thirteen अंग्रेजों colonies कि declared independence from the Kingdom of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन and became the first states in the Union.
nicknames for the ध्वज include the `` Stars और धारियाँ '', `` बूढ़ा Glory ``, और `` the Star-Spangled Banner. ''
India is a federal union of राज्य comprising twenty-eight राज्य और सात संघ territories.
the राज्य and territories हैं further subdivided into districts and so on.
congressional districts for the 113th संयुक्त States कॉंग्रेस
2010 जनसांख्यिकी change:
बदलें in apportionment of congressional जिले, starting in 2013, as a result of the 2010 census.
2000 जनसांख्यिकी change:
Change in apportionment of congressional जिले, from 2003 to 2013, as a result of the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
इस is a complete list of congressional जिले लिये प्रतिनिधित्व in the United States हाउस of Representatives.
the quantity ( apportionment ) and boundaries ( redistricting ) of जिले are संकल्पित after each census, हालांकि in some मामले राज्य have changed the boundaries more than once प्रति जनसांख्यिकी.
इस सूची includes the 435 current और over 200 obsolete districts.
For example, चूंकि the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी, नेब्रास्का has था three districts, but it प्रयुक्त to have as अनेक as six.
In the पहला दशक of the twenty-first सदी, टेक्सास had 32 जिले, but रै since added चार due to reapportionment as a result of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
Other states have खोया districts चूंकि the क्रमांक of congressional सीटे has महरूम set at 435 by statute.
भी included here हैं non-voting delegations : छह वर्तमान and four obsolete.
The सीमाएँ of जिले often शिफ़्ट साथ प्रत्येक redistricting.
over समय, the प्रदेश और जनसांख्यिकी represented in a district can बदलें substantially.
Furthermore, districts sometimes retain the same सीमाएँ जबकि changing their district numbers.
Mariah कैरी ( born March 27, 1970 ) is an अमरीकी singer, songwriter, record निर्माता, अभिनेत्री, और लोकसेवक.
Under the मार्गदर्शन of कोलंबिया Records कार्यपालिका Tommy mottola, Carey released her self-titled डेब्यू studio एल्बम mariah Carey in 1990 ; it गई multi-platinum and spawned चार लगातार number one singles on the u.s. बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 चार्ट.
following उसके marriage to mottola in 1993 and success with hit records भाव ( 1991 ), Music Box ( 1993 ), और Merry क्रिसमस ( 1994 ), कैरी was established as कोलंबिया 's highest-selling act.
daydream ( 1995 ) बना म्यूज़िक history जब its second सिंगल `` One Sweet Day ``, a duet साथ बॉयज ii Men, spent a रिकार्ड सोलह weeks on top of the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100, and remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. चार्ट history.
दौरान the रिकॉर्डिंग of the album, Carey began to deviate इससे उसके r & B and pop beginnings and धीरे traversed into हिप hop.
This musical change became evident with the release of Butterfly ( 1997 ), at जिससे time Carey had separated इससे Mottola.
कैरी left Columbia in 2000, and हस्ताक्षरित a record-breaking $ 100 million रिकॉर्डिंग contract with वर्जिन रिकॉर्ड.
Before the रिलीज of her first feature film Glitter ( 2001 ), वो suffered a physical and emotional विश्लेषण and थी hospitalized for कठोर थकावट.
following the फिल्मी 's poor reception, she थी bought आउट of उसके रिकॉर्डिंग contract लिये $ 50 million, which led to a decline in her करियर.
She signed a multi-million डालर अनुबंध deal साथ द्वीप रिकॉर्ड in 2002, and after an unsuccessful period, returned to the शीर्ष of music charts with the Emancipation of मिमी ( 2005 ).
Its दूसरी single `` We belong साथ `` became her सबसे successful सिंगल of the 2000s, and थी later नामित `` सोंग of the दशक '' by बिलबोर्ड.
Carey once again ventured into फिल्मी साथ a well-received अभिनीत भूमिका in ( 2009 ) ; वो थी awarded the `` Breakthrough Performance पुरस्कार '' at the Palm Springs International Film Festival, और Black रील and NAACP Image पुरस्कार nominations.
In a करियर spanning over two दशकों, कैरी रै sold अधिक than 200 million records worldwide, बनाना उसके एक of the best-selling music कलाकारों of all time.
in 1998, वो was सम्मानित as the world 's best-selling recording artist of the 1990s at the World म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार.
कैरी थी भी named the best-selling female कलाकार of the millennium in 2000.
According to the Recording Industry Association of अमेरिका, वो is the तीसरा best-selling female कलाकार in the United राज्य, with 63.5 million certified एल्बम.
With the release of `` टच My Body `` ( 2008 ), कैरी gained her eighteenth number one single in the संयुक्त States, अधिक than any अन्य सोलो artist.
In 2012, Carey थी ranked दूसरी on vh1 's list of the `` 100 महानतम Women in म्यूज़िक ''.
aside from her commercial accomplishments, कैरी रै जीती five Grammy Awards, 17 संसार Music Awards, 11 अमरीकी म्यूज़िक Awards, और 31 बिलबोर्ड Music Awards.
Referred to as the `` songbird परम् '' by the Guinness World रिकॉर्ड, she is famed for her five-octave गायन range, power, melismatic स्टाइल and हस्ताक्षर उपयोग of the whistle register.
Stratocumulus stratiformis cumulogenitus
in meteorology, a cloud is a visible mass of द्रव droplets or frozen crystals made of जल or various chemicals निलंबित in the माहौल ऊपर the surface of a planetary देह.
ये suspended अणु are also known as aerosols.
Clouds in धरती 's atmosphere हैं studied in the बादल physics शाखा of meteorology.
Two प्रक्रियाओं, possibly acting together, can lead to एयर बनने saturated ; कूलिंग the air or adding water vapor to the air.
in सामान्य, precipitation will fall to the सतह ; an एक्सेप्शन is virga, जिससे evaporates before reaching the सतह.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय cloud वर्गीकरण system is आधारित on the फैक्ट clouds in their सबसे मौलिक forms can show free-convective upward विकास जैसे cumulus, appear in non-convective layered sheets such as स्ट्रेट्स, or लो the form of thin तंतुमय wisps, as in the case of पक्षाभ.
prefixes हैं used in कनेक्शन with clouds to एक्स्प्रेस variations or complexities in ये मौलिक forms or to specify middle or ऊँची altitude ranges.
These include strato- for low clouds साथ सीमित convection that form ज़्यादातर in uneven परतों, cumulo- लिये complex highly-convective storm clouds, nimbo- for thick layered बादल of कुछ जटिलता कि can उपज moderate to heavy precipitation, alto- for मध्य बादल, and cirro- लिये high clouds ; the latter दो of which may be of सरल or मध्यम complex structure.
Whether or not a बादल is low, मध्य, or ऊँची level depends on कैसा दूर ऊपर the ground its base forms.
Cloud प्रकार with significant vertical extent can रूप in the low or middle altitude ranges depending on the नमी content of the air.
Clouds in the troposphere have Latin names due to the लोकप्रिय adaptation of ल्यूक हावर्ड 's बादल categorization system, which began to स्प्रेड in popularity during December 1802.
synoptic surface weather observations use कोड numbers to रिकार्ड and report the प्रकार of tropospheric cloud दृश्य at प्रत्येक scheduled observation time based on the height और शारीरिक appearance of the बादल.
जबकि a majority of बादल रूप in Earth 's क्षोभमण्डल, वहीँ हैं अवसरों when बादल in the stratosphere और mesosphere can be observed.
ये तीन प्रमुख layers of the माहौल where clouds may be देखी हैं collectively known as the homosphere.
Above this lies the thermosphere and exosphere, जिससे साथ make up the heterosphere कि marks the transition to outer स्पेस.
Clouds have महरूम observed on अन्य ग्रह और moons भीतर the सौर प्रणाली, but, due to उनके अलग तापमान विशेषताएँ, वे हैं रचित of other substances ऐसे as methane, अमोनिया, and sulfuric एसिड.
Galveston County is a काउंटी located in the u.S. state of टेक्सास within the Houston–Sugar Land–Baytown महानगर area.
As of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, the population थी 291,309.
Its काउंटी seat is Galveston.
लीग नगर is the largest city in Galveston काउंटी in terms of population ; url_http between 2000 and 2005 it surpassed galveston as the काउंटी 's largest नगर.
galveston County was संस्थापित in 1838.

the Big Ten सम्मेलन, formerly Western Conference and बिग नौ सम्मेलन, is the oldest Division i college athletic सम्मेलन in the संयुक्त राज्य.
इसके twelve member संस्थानों ( जिससे are primarily flagship research विश्वविद्यालयों in their संबंधित राज्य, well-regarded academically, and with relatively विशाल student enrollment ) हैं स्तिथ primarily in the Midwest, stretching इससे नेब्रास्का in the वेस्ट to Penn राज्य in the east.
The सम्मेलन competes in the ncaa 's प्रभाग I ; its फ़ुटबॉल टीमों compete in the फ़ुटबॉल Bowl subdivision ( FBS ), formerly ज्ञात as Division I-A, the highest स्तर of ncaa competition in that खेल.
Member schools of the बिग Ten ( or, in दो मामले, their parent विश्वविद्यालयों systems ) भी are members of the कमेटी on Institutional सहयोग, a leading educational और शोध consortium.
despite the conference 's नाम, the Big टेन actually consists of 12 schools, following the जोड of the Pennsylvania राज्य University in 1993 and the विश्वविद्यालयों of nebraska–lincoln in 2011.
In 2014, the conference will expand to 14 members साथ the additions of the University of मेरीलैंड, College Park and Rutgers, the राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों of नई जर्सी.
It is नहीं to be उलझन with the बिग 12 Conference, जिससे has तभी टेन स्कूलों and represents a अलग प्रदेश of the देश.
सिंगल Malt Scotch is single malt whisky made in स्कॉटलैंड using a घट still distillation प्रक्रम at a सिंगल डिस्टिलरी, साथ malted जौ as the only अनाज ingredient.
as with any Scotch whisky, a सिंगल malt स्कॉच जरूर be आसुत in Scotland और matured in ओक casks in Scotland लिये at least तीन सालो ( सबसे सिंगल malts are matured longer ).
`` Malt '' indicates that the व्हिस्की is distilled from a `` malted '' grain.
Several types of दाने can be malted ( लिये example, जौ, rye and गेहूं are all grains जिससे can be malted ) ; however, in the case of single malt Scotch, जौ is सदा the only अनाज प्रयुक्त.
`` Single '' indicates कि all the malts in the bottle आइये from a सिंगल distillery.
Bottlings containing malt व्हिस्की इससे multiple distilleries हैं called `` blended malt ``.
जबतक the स्कॉच व्हिस्की Regulations 2009 ( SWR 2009 ), the शब्द `` blended '' only appeared ( in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of Scotch whisky ) on bottles of whisky that contained a मिश्रण of दोनो जौ और non-barley अनाज whisky, लकिन this is no longer the मामला.
Under the terminology established by the SWR 2009, a `` blended malt स्कॉच व्हिस्की '' is a mixture of single malt स्कॉच whiskies, not a mixture of malted जौ whisky and non-barley whisky ; those हैं पुकारा `` blended Scotch व्हिस्की '', without the शब्द `` malt ''.
the पद `` blended malt '' replaced `` vatted malt '' प्रयुक्त अंतर्गत the prior labelling conventions.
The age बयान on a बोतल of single malt स्कॉच is the क्रमांक of years the whisky खर्च maturing in cask.
as very few whiskies हैं bottled from a सिंगल cask the आयु बयान reflects the age of the youngest malt in the mix.
A texture may be arranged so as to, `` closely approach the single-object status of fused-ensemble timbres, लिये उदाहरण, the खूबसूरत 'northern lights ' कॉर्ड..., in a very दिलचस्प distribution of pitches, produces a fused ध्वनि समर्थित by a suspended cymbal फेंकें `` ( एरिक्सन ( 1975 ), p.166 & 168 ).
In कंट्रास्ट to अधिक परंपरागत musical textures, sound mass composition `` minimizes the importance of individual pitches in वरीयता लिये बनावट, timbre, and डायनामिक्स as primary shapers of भाव and प्रभाव. ''
विकसित from the modernist tone clusters और स्प्रेड to orchestral लिखने by the लेट 1950s and 1960s, sound-mass `` obscures the boundary between sound और रव `` ( Edwards 2001, pp. 326–27 ).
Techniques जिससे may create or be used साथ ध्वनि mass शामिल extended techniques ऐसे as मूक पीतल or strings, flutter tonguing, wide vibrato, extreme ranges, और glissandos.
composers और works शामिल बारबरा kolb, pauline oliveros ' ध्वनि Patterns लिये कोरस ( 1961 ), Norma beecroft 's From सपनो of पीतल लिये कोरस ( 1963–1964 ), और Nancy वैन de Vate.
Beecroft `` टुकड़ा individual pitches in एहसान of a collective timbre through the उपयोग of गायन और इंस्ट्रूमेंटल क्लस्टर, choral speech, narrator, और a धो of ध्वनि from an electronic टेप. ''
( ibid )
A very जल्दी example is the opening of Jean-Féry Rebel 's ballet लेस elémens ( 1737–38 ), जहाँ अराजकता is represented by a gradually cumulating orchestral क्लस्टर of all seven notes of the D नाबालिग स्केल ( Henck 2004, pp. 52–54 ).
a बाद उदाहरण is the third गति of रुथ Crawford Seeger 's स्ट्रिंग quartet 1931 ( Nonesuch H-71280 ) जबकि अधिक recently phill Niblock 's multiple drone based म्यूज़िक serves as an example.
the use of `` मदारी approaching timbres '' begins साथ debussy और Edgard varèse प्रायः carefully scored individual इंस्ट्रूमेंटल parts so that वे would fuse into एक ensemble timbre or sound mass ( एरिक्सन 1975, pp. 18 and 21 ).
Other examples शामिल यूरोपीय `` textural '' compositions of the fifties and sixties ऐसे as Krzysztof Penderecki 's Threnody to the पीड़ितों of Hiroshima ( 1959 ) और györgy Ligeti 's works featuring micropolyphony in works जैसे Atmosphères ( 1961 ) और his Requiem ( 1963-65 ).
अन्य composers with works using this तकनीक include Henryk Górecki, karel Husa, witold lutosławski, Kazimierz Serocki, and स्टीवन stucky.
Sound mass तकनीकों भी appear in the music of George Crumb ( Anon. n.d. ).

A student is a learner, or किसी who attends an educational institution.
In some nations, the English term ( or its cognate in another language ) is reserved लिये those जो attend university, जबकि a schoolchild under the आयु of अठारह is पुकारा a pupil in अंग्रेज़ी ( or an समतुल्य in अन्य भाषाएं ), हालांकि in the United States a person enrolled in ग्रेड k–12 is प्रायः called a student.
In इसके widest उपयोग, student is used लिये anyone जो is सीखना.
ऑस्ट्रेलिया is a continent comprising mainland Australia, Tasmania, New गिनी, seram, संभवतः Timor, and neighbouring islands.
the continent is sometimes known in तकनीकी contexts by the names sahul, Australinea or meganesia, to फर्क it from the Australian मेनलैंड.
it is the smallest of the सात परंपरागत महाद्वीपों in the अंग्रेज़ी धारणा.
नई Zealand is नहीं part of the continent of ऑस्ट्रेलिया, but of the separate, submerged महाद्वीप of zealandia.
zealandia और Australia are both part of the wider regions ज्ञात as Australasia and Oceania.
The महाद्वीप of Australia lies on a महाद्वीपीय shelf overlain by उथले seas which divide it into अनेक landmasses — the Arafura Sea and Torres जलसन्धि between मेनलैंड ऑस्ट्रेलिया और New Guinea, and बास जलसन्धि between मेनलैंड Australia और तस्मानिया.
जब समुद्र levels यहूद lower दौरान the pleistocene बर्फ आयु, including the last glacial अधिकतम परिचय 18,000 BC, वे यहूद connected by dry जमीन.
During the past टेन हजार years, उठती sea स्तर overflowed the lowlands and separated the continent into आज 's low-lying arid to semi-arid mainland and the two mountainous आइलैंड्स of New Guinea और Tasmania.
Geologically, a महाद्वीप extends to the edge of its continental शेल्फ, so the now-separate आइलैंड्स are माना part of the continent.
Due to the स्प्रेड of पशु, fungi और plants आरपार the single Pleistocene landmass the पृथक lands have a related biota.
Central पार्क is nearly twice as big as the संसार 's second-smallest देश, मोनाको.
Historically its reservoirs were महत्वपूर्ण components of the नगर 's water supply.
Environmental मुद्दे in नई York नगर are प्रभावित by the city 's size, density, abundant public परिवहन infrastructure, और स्थान at the mouth of the हडसन River.
New York 's जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व रै पर्यावरणीय pros and cons.
it facilitates the उच्चतम द्रव्यमान पारगमन उपयोग in the संयुक्त राज्य, but भी concentrates प्रदूषण.
Gasoline खपत in the city is at the rate the नेशनल औसत थी in the 1920s, और greenhouse gas emissions हैं a भिन्न of the national average, at 7.1 metric tons प्रति person प्रति year, below सैन Francisco, at 11.2 metric tons, and the नेशनल average, at 24.5 मीट्रिक tons.
नई York City accounts लिये तभी 1 % of United राज्य ग्रीनहाउस gas emissions जबकि आवास 2.7 % of its जनसांख्यिकी.
in September 2012, New यॉर्क was नामित the # 1 `` America 's Dirtiest City, '' by a Travel+Leisure readership survey कि रेटेड the environmental quality of 35 prominent शहरों in the संयुक्त राज्य.
अटलांटा (, stressed, locally ) is the capital of और the most populous city in the U.S. राज्य of Georgia, साथ an अनुमानित 2011 population of 432,427.
अटलांटा is the सांस्कृतिक और आर्थिक बीच of the Atlanta metropolitan area, घर to 5,457,831 people and the ninth largest महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the संयुक्त राज्य.
अटलांटा is the काउंटी सीट of fulton County, और a छोटी portion of the नगर extends eastward into DeKalb काउंटी.
अटलांटा was स्थापित in 1837 at the चौराहे of two रेलरोड लाइनों, and the city rose इससे the ashes of the सिविल युद्ध to become a national center of commerce.
in the दशकों following the सिविल Rights Movement, दौरान जिससे the नगर अर्जित a प्रतिष्ठा as `` too busy to नफ़रत '' for the प्रगतिशील views of इसके citizens और leaders, अटलांटा attained अंतरराष्ट्रीय prominence.
अटलांटा is the primary परिवहन hub of the Southeastern United States, via highway, railroad, and एयर, साथ hartsfield–jackson अटलांटा International Airport होने the world 's व्यस्ततम विमानक्षेत्र चूंकि 1998.
Atlanta is considered an `` अल्फा ( - ) संसार city, '' and, साथ a gross domestic product of us $ 270 billion, Atlanta’s economy बाँधने 15th among world cities और sixth in the स्वदेश.
हालांकि Atlanta’s economy is considered diverse, dominant sectors include लोजिस्टिक्स, professional और business services, मीडिया परिचालन, government administration, और उच्चतर शिक्षा.
Topographically, Atlanta is चिह्नित by rolling hills and dense tree coverage.
Revitalization of Atlanta 's पड़ोस, initially spurred by the 1996 Olympics, रै intensified in the 21st century, altering the नगर 's जनसांख्यिकी, politics, और culture.
A 1947 propaganda कॉमिक किताब published by the Catechetical गिल्ड Educational समाज raising the specter of a कम्युनिस्ट कब्ज़ा
McCarthyism is the practice of making accusations of disloyalty, subversion, or देशद्रोह बगैर उचित regard लिये evidence.
it भी means `` the practice of बनाना unfair allegations or using unfair investigative तकनीकों, विशेषकर in अनुक्रम to restrict dissent or राजनैतिक आलोचना. ''
the term has its origins in the period in the United राज्य known as the Second रेड scare, स्थायी roughly from 1950 to 1956 और characterized by heightened fears of communist influence on अमरीकी institutions और espionage by सोवियत agents.
originally coined to criticize the anti-communist pursuits of रिपब्लिकन U.S. सीनेटर Joseph McCarthy of विस्कॉन्सिन, `` McCarthyism '' जल्द took on a broader meaning, describing the excesses of similar efforts.
The पद is भी now प्रयुक्त more generally to describe reckless, unsubstantiated accusations, as well as demagogic हमले on the अक्षर or राष्ट्रभक्ति of राजनैतिक adversaries.
दौरान the मैकार्थी era, हज़ारों of Americans were अभियुक्त of being साम्यवादियों or कम्युनिस्ट sympathizers और became the subject of आक्रामक investigations और questioning पहले government or private-industry panels, committees और agencies.
the प्राथमिक targets of such suspicions यहूद सरकारी employees, those in the entertainment industry, शिक्षक and union कार्यकर्ताओं.
Suspicions were प्रायः given credence despite inconclusive or questionable प्रमाण, and the स्तर of threat posed by a person 's रियल or supposed वामपंथी associations or beliefs थी प्रायः greatly अतिरंजित.
Many लोगों suffered घाटा of employment and/or विनाश of their करियर ; कुछ भी suffered imprisonment.
सबसे of ये punishments came about through विचारण verdicts बाद विकल, कानून कि होता be घोषित unconstitutional, dismissals for कारण बाद declared illegal or actionable, or extra-legal प्रक्रियाओं that would आइये into general disrepute.
the सबसे famous examples of mccarthyism include the भाषणों, investigations, and hearings of सीनेटर मैकार्थी himself ; the हॉलीवुड blacklist, associated साथ hearings conducted by the हाउस un-american क्रियाएँ कमेटी ( huac ) ; and the various anti-communist activities of the संघीय Bureau of Investigation ( एफबीआई ) under Director J. Edgar हूवर.
mccarthyism was a फैली सोशल और सांस्कृतिक phenomenon that affected all levels of समाज और थी the सोर्स of a great सौदे of बहस and conflict in the संयुक्त States.
Napoleon is a fictional अक्षर और the प्रमुख antagonist in George ऑरवेल 's Animal फार्म.
While he is at पहला a common farm pig, he gets rid of स्नोबॉल, another pig which साझा the शक्ति.
he then takes advantage of the animals ' uprising against their मास्टर्स to eventually become the tyrannical `` अध्यक्ष of एनिमल Farm, '' जिससे he turns into a dictatorship.
