एलिज़ाबेथ ii ( Elizabeth एलेक्जेंड्रा मरियम ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the संवैधानिक monarch of 16 sovereign states, ज्ञात as the Commonwealth realms, and their territories और dependencies, और head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations.
She is Supreme Governor of the Church of England and, in कुछ of her realms, carries the title of defender of the Faith as part of उसके full शीर्षक.
On her accession on 6 फ़रवरी 1952, एलिज़ाबेथ became Head of the राष्ट्रमंडल and महारानी regnant of सात स्वतंत्र राष्ट्रमंडल देशों : the संयुक्त किंगडम, कनाडा, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, New जीलैंड, दक्षिण Africa, Pakistan and Ceylon.
इससे 1956 to 1992, the क्रमांक of उसके realms varied as territories gained स्वतंत्रता और कुछ realms became republics.
at present, in addition to the first चार aforementioned देशों, Elizabeth is Queen of जमैका, Barbados, the बहामा, हरा, Papua New Guinea, the Solomon आइलैंड्स, Tuvalu, संत Lucia, संत विंसेंट and the grenadines, Belize, अण्टीगुआ और Barbuda और Saint किट्स और नेविस.
उसके शासनकाल of years is currently the second longest for a British monarch ; तभी Queen Victoria has reigned longer at over 63 years.
Elizabeth थी born in London and educated privately at घर.
उसके पिता acceded to the throne as जार्ज VI in 1936 on the abdication of उसके bhai Edward VIII, इससे which समय she थी the वारिस presumptive.
She began to undertake public duties during the Second संसार War, in जिससे वो परोसा in the auxiliary territorial सेवा.
in 1947, she शादीशुदा प्रिंस फिलिप, ड्यूक of एडिनबर्ग, with जिसको she रै four children : चार्ल्स, ऐनी, एंड्रयू, and Edward.
Her राजतिलक service took प्लेस in 1953 and थी the first to be televised.
the महारानी 's अनेक historic visits and meetings include a state visit to the गणतंत्र of आयरलैंड और reciprocal visits to and from the Pope.
The Queen has seen major constitutional परिवर्तन in her realms, ऐसे as devolution in the संयुक्त किंगडम and the patriation of the कनाडाई constitution.
Times of निजी significance have शामिल the births and विवाह of उसके children, the births of her grandchildren, the प्रतिष्ठापन of the Prince of Wales, और the जश्न of milestones such as उसके चांदी, सुनहरी, और डायमंड Jubilees in 1977, 2002, और 2012, respectively.
प्रमुख events in the महारानी 's reign have शामिल the Troubles in Northern आयरलैंड, the Falklands War, युद्धों with Iraq और the War in अफगानिस्तान.
वहीँ have been टाइम्स of personal sorrow for उसके जिससे include the death of उसके father at 56, the assassination of Prince Philip 's uncle, Lord माउंटबेटन, the breakdown of उसके children 's marriages in 1992 ( a year deemed उसके annus horribilis ), the मौत in 1997 of उसके former daughter-in-law, Diana, राजकुमारी of वेल्स, and the मौतों of her माँ and सिस्टर in 2002.
The महारानी has occasionally faced severe दबायें criticism of the royal family और republican sentiments, but support लिये the साम्राज्य and उसके निजी popularity remain ऊँची.
christianity is the largest धर्म listed by Australians in the national census.
in the 2011 जनसांख्यिकी, 61.1 % of australians were listed as Christian.
ऑस्ट्रेलिया has no आधिकारिक state धर्म और the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई Constitution protects स्वतंत्रता of religion.
the उपस्थिति of Christianity in ऑस्ट्रेलिया began साथ the आगमन of the पहला बेड़े of British convicts in 1788.
the religion grew to खाता for 96.1 % of the national जनसांख्यिकी at the समय of the संघ of Australia in 1901.
the Anglican Church of Australia ( formerly known as the Church of इंग्लैण्ड in Australia ) remained the largest denomination जबतक 1986, जब it थी surpassed by the Roman कैथोलिक Church in Australia.
Post-war multiculturalism और a मनाही in धार्मिक observance among some sections of the जनसांख्यिकी have diversified the जनसांख्यिकी of धर्म in Australia.
of the roughly 61 % identifying as Christian in 2011, the largest denominations यहूद either रोमन कैथोलिक ( 25 % ) or anglican ( 17 % ), with the तीसरा largest denomination होने the 5 % affiliated with the Uniting गिरिजाघर in ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
Post-war immigration has grown the numbers belonging to churches जैसे the यूनानी परंपरागत Archdiocese of ऑस्ट्रेलिया and there are large और growing Pentecostal groups, such as Sydney 's hillsong गिरिजाघर.
The त्यौहार of ईस्टर and Christmas are पब्लिक छुट्टियाँ in ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
Around a क्वार्टर of students attend गिरिजाघर schools और ईसाई organisations हैं अग्रणी non-government providers of स्वास्थ्य and welfare services through organisations like कैथोलिक स्वास्थ्य Australia, anglicare, unitingcare Australia, the मोक्ष Army and St Vincent de Paul Society.
historically significant Australian ईसाइयों have included रेव dr जॉन dunmore Lang, संत Mary MacKillop, Catherine हेलेन spence, पादरी David Unaipon, the रेवरेंड John Flynn और पादरी Sir Doug Nicholls.
High profile समकालीन ऑस्ट्रेलियाई ईसाइयों include : टिम Costello बैपटिस्ट मंत्री और current CEO of संसार दृष्टि ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Frank ब्रेनन, Jesuit इंसान rights वकील, कार्डिनल George pell, कैथोलिक archbishop of Sydney, Phillip Aspinall the current anglican Primate and Archbishop of Brisbane, केविन Rudd, पूर्व Labor प्रधान मंत्री, और Tony एबॉट, नेता लिये the Federal विपक्ष उदार पार्टी.
चार्टर बनाना कॉलेजिएट School, जिससे became Yale कॉलेज, अक्तूबर 9, 1701
yale University is a निजी Ivy League शोध university located in New हेवन, कनेक्टिकट.
संस्थापित in 1701 in the उपनिवेश of कनेक्टिकट, the विश्वविद्यालयों is the third-oldest institution of higher education in the United States.
Originally चार्टर्ड as the `` Collegiate School '', the संस्था traces its जड़ें to 17th-century clergymen जो sought to स्थापित a college to train clergy and political leaders लिये the उपनिवेश.
In 1718, the College was renamed `` Yale College '' to सम्मान a तोहफा इससे Elihu Yale, a राज्यपाल of the अंग्रेजों ईस्ट इण्डिया Company.
in 1861, the Graduate School of Arts और sciences became the first U.S. संस्था to पुरस्कार the PhD. yale became a founding सदस्य of the Association of अमरीकी Universities in 1900.
yale College थी transformed, शुरूआत in the 1930s, through the establishment of आवासीय colleges : 12 now मौजूद और दो अधिक are नियोजित.
yale employs over 1,100 faculty to सिखा और सलाह about 5,300 undergraduate and 6,100 graduate और professional विद्यार्थी.
लगभग सब tenured professors teach undergraduate पाठ्यक्रम, more than 2,000 of जिससे are offered annually.
the विश्वविद्यालयों 's assets include an endowment valued at $ 19.4 अरब, the second-largest of any academic संस्था in the world.
Yale 's प्रणाली of अधिक than two dozen पुस्तकालयों holds 12.5 million volumes.
49 नोबेल Laureates have been संबद्ध with the विश्वविद्यालयों as students, संकाय, और staff.
Yale रै उत्पादित अनेक notable alumni, सहित five u.S. Presidents, 19 u.S. Supreme अदालत justices, and अनेक foreign heads of state.
At the graduate स्तर, yale Law School, yale School of आर्ट, and yale School of Drama are consistently ranked the शीर्ष कार्यक्रम in their field.
yale विधि School is the सबसे चयनात्मक विधि school in the United States.
yale students compete intercollegiately as the Yale bulldogs in the ncaa प्रभाग I Ivy लीग.
The oldest intercollegiate एथलेटिक event in the United States is the Yale-Harvard regatta.
Artemisia tridentata ( `` बिग sagebrush '' or `` sagebrush '' ) is an aromatic shrub इससे the family Asteraceae, which grows in arid और semi-arid शर्तें, throughout a दायरा of ठंडा मरुस्थल, steppe, and पहाड़ habitats in the Intermountain West of North अमेरिका.
the देशी name `` sagebrush '' is also used for several related सदस्यों of the genus artemisia, such as कैलिफ़ोर्निया sagebrush ( artemisia californica ).
बिग sagebrush and other artemisia प्रजाति are the dominant plants आरपार विशाल portions of the Great जलाशय, covering some 422,000 square miles in 11 पश्चिमी U.S. & Canadian राज्य.
it is the राज्य flower of नेवाडा.
sagebrush provides food और आवास for a variety of species, ऐसे as ऋषि grouse, pronghorn antelope, धूसर vireo, सानो खरगोश, और mule deer.
Big sagebrush was प्रयुक्त as an herbal medicine by देशी अमेरिकी throughout the intermountain West of North america—especially लिये preventing संक्रमण in wounds, stopping आतंरिक bleeding, और treating headaches और जुकाम.
chemically, the क्रियाशील औषधीय constituents शामिल camphor, terpenoids, और tannins.
Several प्रमुख threats exist to ऋषि brush ecosystems, सहित human settlements, परिवर्तन to agricultural land, पशुधन चरने, invasive संयंत्र प्रजाति, wildfires, और जलवायु change.
Yahoo ! मेल is a फ़्री ईमेल सेवा offered by the अमरीकी search इंजन company याहू !
It थी शुभारम्भ in 1997, and, according to comscore, याहू ! Mail is the third-largest web-based ईमेल service with 281 million उपयोक्ता as of दिसम्बर 2012.
Currently, याहू ! offers तीन संस्करण of याहू ! मेल.
The traditional `` याहू ! मेल क्लासिक '' continues the उपलब्धता of the original इंटरफ़ेस introduced in 1997.
A version introduced in 2005 included a नई अजाक्स इंटरफ़ेस, drag-and-drop features, improved search functionality, keyboard shortcuts, address auto-complete, टैब्स, और other updated features.
In अक्तूबर 2010, Yahoo ! released a बीटा version of Yahoo ! Mail, which शामिल improvements to the डिज़ाइन, performance, search कार्यक्षमता, और फेसबुक संयोजन.
In may 2011, बीटा testing for the new version रोका, and it became the default इंटरफ़ेस for Yahoo ! मेल.
in early 2008, याहू ! began offering unlimited mail भंडार to its users in response to heated प्रतियोगिता in the फ़्री web-mail market segment.
On जून 27, 2009, Yahoo ! Messenger थी integrated with Yahoo ! Mail.
टकोमा (, ) is a mid-sized शहरी बंदरगाहों नगर और the county seat of Pierce County, Washington, संयुक्त राज्य.
the नगर is on वॉशिंगटन 's puget Sound, southwest of Seattle, पूर्वोत्तर of the राज्य पूंजी, ओलंपिया, और उत्तरपश्चिम of Mount Rainier नेशनल Park.
The population was 198,397, according to the 2010 census.
टकोमा is the second-largest city in the puget ध्वनि area and the third largest in the राज्य.
टकोमा also serves as the center of business activity लिये the South ध्वनि region, which रै a जनसांख्यिकी of around 1 million लोगों.
टकोमा अपनाया इसके नाम after the nearby Mount rainier, originally called माउंट Tahoma.
it is ज्ञात as the `` City of नियति '' क्युकी the area was chosen to be the पश्चिमी टर्मिनस of the Northern प्रशांत Railroad in the late 19th सदी.
the निर्णय of the railroad थी influenced by टकोमा 's neighboring deep-water हार्बर, Commencement खाड़ी.
by connecting the bay साथ the रेलरोड टकोमा 's motto became `` जब rails meet sails. ''
आज शुरुआत Bay serves the बंदरगाहों of टकोमा, a center of अंतरराष्ट्रीय trade on the Pacific coast and वॉशिंगटन राज्य 's largest बंदरगाहों.
Like most central cities, Tacoma suffered a prolonged decline in the mid-20th सदी as a result of suburbanization और divestment.
चूंकि the 1990s, developments in the downtown core शामिल the University of Washington टकोमा ; टकोमा Link, the पहला आधुनिक इलेक्ट्रिक लाइट रेल सेवा in the state ; the state 's highest घनत्व of art और history संग्रहालय ; and a restored urban waterfront, the Thea foss Waterway.
With a long history of blue-collar मजदूर politics — from the रेलरोड मजदूर of the 19th century, to the longshoremen of the 20th century, to the मजदूर Ready मजदूर of today — टकोमा रै long been known for its अशिष्ट, किरकिरी चित्र.
a सोंग about टकोमा, `` Thrice सब American '', by अमरीकी singer-songwriter and पूर्व निवासी Neko Case, describes it as `` a dusty old गहना in the दक्षिण Puget ध्वनि / where the कारखानों निकले / और the timber 's सब काटें down ''.
tacoma-pierce County has महरूम named one of the most livable areas in the देश.
Tacoma was भी recently सूचीबद्ध as the 19th most walkable city in the देश.
in कंट्रास्ट, the city is also क्रमित as the सबसे stressed-out नगर in the देश in a 2004 सर्वेक्षण.
in 2006, महिलाओं 's पत्रिका स्वः named टकोमा the `` सबसे Sexually Healthy City '' in the United States.
in 2012, the एडवोकेट दिया Tacoma the शीर्षक of `` Gayest नगर in America '', in part क्युकी of the large diversity of पब्लिक offices held, and वॉशिंगटन राज्य गुजर a bill in 2012 allowing lgbt युगल to निकाह.
टकोमा is famous for the 1940 collapse of the Tacoma Narrows सेतु.
chula विस्टा ( ; ) is the second largest city in the सैन Diego महानगर क्षेत्रफल, the सातवाँ largest नगर in Southern कैलिफ़ोर्निया, the fourteenth largest city in the State of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, और the 77th-largest city in the संयुक्त राज्य.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 243,916 as of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
स्तिथ just from downtown सैन डिएगो और from the Mexican border in the दक्षिण खाड़ी प्रदेश of the metropolitan area, the city is at the center of एक of the richest economic और culturally विविध zones in the संयुक्त States.
chula विस्टा is so नामित because of its scenic स्थान between the San डिएगो Bay and तटीय mountain foothills.
Founded in the जल्दी 19th सदी, fast जनसांख्यिकी growth रै recently महरूम observed in the नगर.
as the दूसरी largest city in San Diego County, chula Vista रै जल्दी become a गंतव्य popular to many पर्यटकों.
स्तिथ in the नगर is एक of अमेरिका 's few year-round संयुक्त राज्य ओलम्पिक प्रशिक्षण centers और लोकप्रिय पर्यटक destinations include Cricket बेतार Amphitheater, the chula विस्टा marina, और the chula विस्टा Nature Center.
metes और bounds is a प्रणाली or विधि of describing land, real property ( in contrast to निजी प्रॉपर्टी ) or real estate.
the system रै महरूम प्रयुक्त in England for अनेक centuries, and is स्टिल used वहीँ in the definition of general सीमाएँ.
By कस्टम, it was लागू in the original Thirteen colonies कि became the United States, and in many other जमीन jurisdictions based on अंग्रेज़ी common विधि.
typically the प्रणाली uses physical सुविधाएँ of the local geography, साथ साथ दिशानिर्देश and दूरियाँ, to define and describe the सीमाएँ of a पार्सल of जमीन.
The सीमाएँ हैं described in a running गद्य स्टाइल, working around the पार्सल in sequence, इससे a पाइंट of शुरूआत, returning back to the same पाइंट ; compare with the oral अनुष्ठान of beating the bounds.
It may शामिल references to other adjoining parcels ( और उनके स्वामी ), और it, in फेरे, could also be referred to in बाद surveys.
At the time the description is compiled, it may have been चिह्नित on the ground with permanent स्मारक लगाई where there यहूद no उपयुक्त natural स्मारक.
the term `` metes '' refers to a boundary पारिभाषित by the मापन of प्रत्येक straight run, specified by a distance between the टर्मिनल अंक, and an अभिविन्यास or दिशा.
a direction may be a सरल compass bearing, or a precise अभिविन्यास determined by सटीक survey विधि.
The term `` bounds '' refers to a अधिक सामान्य boundary वर्णन, ऐसे as along a certain watercourse, a stone wall, an adjoining पब्लिक सड़क रास्ता, or an existing building.
the प्रणाली is often used to define larger टुकड़े of property ( e.g. farms ), और political subdivisions ( e.g. कस्बा boundaries ) जहाँ precise परिभाषा is नहीं required or would be far too महंगी, or previously designated सीमाएँ can be incorporated into the वर्णन.
Sir Isaac न्यूटन ( 25 December 164220 March 1727 ) was an अंग्रेज़ी physicist and mathematician who is widely regarded as एक of the most influential scientists of सब time और as a key फिगर in the वैज्ञानिक revolution.
उसके book philosophiæ naturalis Principia mathematica ( `` गणितीय Principles of Natural Philosophy '' ), पहला published in 1687, रखी the foundations for सबसे of classical यांत्रिकी.
Newton भी बना seminal contributions to optics and shares credit साथ Gottfried Leibniz लिये the invention of the infinitesimal कलन.
Newton 's Principia formulated the laws of motion and universal gravitation कि वर्चस्व वैज्ञानिकों ' view of the शारीरिक ब्रह्मांड लिये the अगला तीन सदियां.
It भी demonstrated that the गति of वस्तुएँ on the Earth और कि of celestial bodies could be वर्णित by the same principles.
by deriving कॅप्लर 's laws of ग्रहीय गति from his गणितीय वर्णन of gravity, Newton removed the पिछला doubts परिचय the validity of the heliocentric model of the cosmos.
न्यूटन built the first व्यावहारिक reflecting दूरदर्शी और developed a सिद्धान्त of colour आधारित on the अवलोकन that a prism decomposes श्वेत light into the अनेक रंग of the दृश्य spectrum.
he also formulated an empirical law of cooling and पढ़ाई the गति of ध्वनि.
In जोड to his कार्य on the calculus, as a mathematician न्यूटन contributed to the study of power श्रेणी, generalised the binomial theorem to non-integer exponents, और developed न्यूटन 's विधि for approximating the जड़ें of a function.
न्यूटन थी a fellow of Trinity College and the दूसरी Lucasian प्राध्यापक of Mathematics at the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैम्ब्रिज.
He was a devout but unorthodox Christian और, unusually for a member of the कैम्ब्रिज faculty, he refused to लो holy आदेश in the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड, शायद because he privately rejected the doctrine of trinitarianism.
In addition to उसके work on the mathematical sciences, Newton भी समर्पित much of उसके time to the study of alchemy and biblical chronology, but सबसे of उसके कार्य in those क्षेत्रों remained unpublished जबतक long बाद उसके मौत.
In उसके बाद जीवन, न्यूटन became president of the royal Society.
he also served the British सरकारी as Warden और Master of the royal Mint.
Prof. Walter lewin explains न्यूटन 's law of gravitation in एमआईटी कोर्स 8.01
Satellites और projectiles सब obey न्यूटन 's law of gravitation
न्यूटन 's law of universal gravitation राज्य that प्रत्येक point mass in the universe attracts every अन्य point mass साथ a फ़ोर्स कि is directly proportional to the उत्पाद of their masses and inversely proportional to the square of the अलहदा between them.
( separately it was shown कि विशाल spherically सममित masses attract और are आकर्षित as if सब their द्रव्यमान were concentrated at उनके centers. )
This is a general शारीरिक law derived इससे अनुभवजन्य observations by कया न्यूटन पुकारा प्रेरण.
it is a भाग of शास्त्रीय mechanics and was प्रतिपादित in Newton 's work philosophiæ Naturalis प्रिन्सिपिया mathematica ( `` the Principia '' ), first published on 5 जुलाई 1687.
( जब न्यूटन 's किताब थी presented in 1686 to the royal समाज, Robert hooke made a claim that Newton था obtained the विलोम वर्गाकार विधि इससे him – देखिए इतिहास खण्ड below. )
in modern भाषा, the विधि states the following:
Assuming si इकाई, F is measured in newtons ( N ), m1 और m2 in गामा ( kg ), r in मीटर ( m ), and the constant g is लगभग equal to.
The value of the निरंतर g was पहला accurately संकल्पित इससे the परिणाम of the कैवेंडिश experiment conducted by the British scientist हेनरी Cavendish in 1798, although कैवेंडिश किया not खुद गणना a numerical मान for G.
इस experiment was भी the पहला परीक्षण of Newton 's सिद्धान्त of gravitation between masses in the laboratory.
it took place 111 years बाद the प्रकाशन of Newton 's Principia और 71 years after Newton 's मौत, so none of Newton 's calculations could उपयोग the मान of g ; बजाय he could only गणना a force सापेक्ष to another force.
Newton 's विधि of gravitation resembles कूलम्ब 's law of विद्युत forces, which is used to गणना the परिमाण of विद्युत force between दो चार्ज लाशें.
दोनो are inverse-square laws, in which फ़ोर्स is inversely आंशिक to the वर्गाकार of the अलहदा between the लाशें.
कूलम्ब 's Law रै the उत्पाद of two charges in प्लेस of the उत्पाद of the masses, और the electrostatic constant in प्लेस of the gravitational constant.
Newton 's विधि has चूंकि been superseded by Einstein 's theory of general आपेक्षिकता, but it continues to be used as an excellent सन्निकटन of the प्रभाव of gravity.
आपेक्षिकता is required तभी when there is a need लिये extreme precision, or when dealing with gravitation लिये extremely massive और घना वस्तुएँ.
White and red ध्वज, representing इराकी और American deaths, sit in the grass चतुष्कोण of The घाटी Library on the Corvallis, Oregon, कैम्पस of Oregon राज्य University.
as भाग of the traveling Iraq Body Count exhibit इससे 2008 to 2009 ( not सम्बन्धित to इराकी देह गिनती project ), the ध्वज उद्देश्य to `` raise जागरूकता of the इंसान लागत of the इराकी युद्ध. ''
( May 2008 )
हताहत of the conflict in Iraq since 2003 ( beginning with the 2003 invasion of Iraq, और continuing with the ensuing occupation of Iraq, as well as the क्रियाएँ of the विभिन्न हथियारबंद समूह ऑपरेटिंग in the देश ) have come in अनेक फ़ॉर्म, और the सटीकता of the information available on different types of इराकी युद्ध casualties varies greatly.
the table नीचे summarizes various estimates of the इराकी casualty figures.
लिये सैनिकों in the u.s.-led बहुराष्ट्रीय coalition, the मौत toll is carefully tracked and updated daily, and the names and छायाचित्र of those मारे in action as खूब as in accidents have महरूम published widely.
A total of 4,486 u.S. सैनिको were killed in Iraq between 2003 और 2012.
regarding the Iraqis, however, information on both military और civilian casualties is both कम precise and कम सतत.
estimates of casualty levels are उपलब्धियाँ इससे पत्रकारों on the झाँकी, from officials of शामिल organizations, and from groups कि summarize information on incidents reported in the news मीडिया.
The word `` casualties `` in its सबसे general sense includes the injured as खूब as the मुर्दे.
Accounts of the number of coalition wounded vary widely, partly because it is not obvious कया should be गिने : should तभी those चोटों गंभीर पर्याप्त to put a सिपाही आउट of commission be included ?
do बीमारियों or injuries caused by दुर्घटनाओं गिनती, or चाहिए the focus be restricted to wounds caused by शत्रु सगाई ?
Sources using अलग definitions may arrive at बहुत अलग numbers, और sometimes the precise definition is नहीं clearly specified.
Asalto al coche ( Robbery of the coach ), by Francisco de गोया
a highwayman was a thief और brigand who preyed on travellers.
इस type of outlaw usually travelled और robbed by horse, as compared to a footpad जो travelled and robbed on पैर.
आरोहित robbers यहूद widely considered to be socially superior to footpads.
Such लुटेरों operated in Great Britain and Ireland इससे the Elizabethan era until the जल्दी 19th century.
The शब्द highwayman is पहला ज्ञात to be used in the year 1617 ; other euphemisms included `` knights of the सड़क '' and `` gentlemen of the road. ''
दो terms लागू to 19th-century North अमरीकी highwaymen were सड़क एजेंटों in some instances for पहाड़ डाकुओं while in other cases the term is rlallaala for mountain-based ruffians.
in the same time काल in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, they यहूद known as bushrangers.
earvin `` जादू '' जॉनसन, Jr. ( born August 14, 1959 ) is a रिटायर्ड अमरीकी professional बास्केट player who निभाई point गार्ड for the लॉस Angeles लेकर्स of the National Basketball संघ ( एनबीए ).
After जीतना championships in high स्कूल और college, Johnson थी चयनित पहला overall in the 1979 NBA ड्राफ्ट by the Lakers.
He won a चैंपियनशिप and an एनबीए फाइनल Most मूल्यवान Player Award in his rookie ऋतु, और जीती four more championships साथ the Lakers दौरान the 1980s.
जॉनसन retired abruptly in 1991 after announcing कि he had contracted hiv, लकिन लौटे to play in the 1992 all-star खेल, winning the all-star MVP Award.
After विरोध इससे his fellow players, he रिटायर्ड again for चार सालो, but returned in 1996, at आयु 36, to play 32 खेल लिये the लेकर्स before retiring for the third और फाइनल time.
Johnson 's करियर उपलब्धियाँ include तीन एनबीए mvp पुरस्कार, nine NBA Finals appearances, twelve all-star खेल, and टेन all-nba First और Second Team nominations.
He led the league in regular-season assists चार times, and is the NBA 's all-time नेता in औसत assists प्रति खेल, at 11.2.
जॉनसन थी a member of the `` सपना Team ``, the u.S. बास्केट team कि जीती the ओलम्पिक gold medal in 1992.
After leaving the NBA in 1992, Johnson formed the Magic Johnson All-Stars, a barnstorming टोली कि travelled around the संसार playing exhibition games.
जॉनसन थी honored as one of the 50 महानतम Players in NBA इतिहास in 1996, और enshrined in the Basketball Hall of Fame in 2002.
He was रेटेड the greatest NBA point गार्ड of सब time by ESPN in 2007.
His friendship and फंसने with Boston Celtics star लैरी बर्ड, whom he faced in the 1979 ncaa finals and three एनबीए championship श्रेणी, were खूब documented.
चूंकि उसके retirement, Johnson रै been an एडवोकेट लिये HIV/ AIDS रोकथाम and safe sex, as खूब as an entrepreneur, philanthropist, broadcaster and motivational speaker.
जॉनसन was a part-owner of the Lakers for several years, और थी part of a समूह कि purchased the Los Angeles Dodgers in 2012.
allium cells in different phases of the कोशिका cycle
The कोशिकाएं of eukaryotes ( बाएँ ) और prokaryotes ( right )
the cell is the basic structural, functional and biological ईकाई of all known living जीवों.
It is the smallest unit of जीवन that is classified as a living बात ( मगर वायरस, जिससे consists only इससे dna/rna covered by प्रोटीन और lipids ), और is प्रायः called the भवन block of life.
it consists of a protoplasm enclosed within a membrane, जिससे contains अनेक biomolecules such as proteins और nucleic acids.
Organisms can be वर्गीकृत as एककोशिकीय ( consisting of a single कोशिका ; including most जीवाणु ) or multicellular ( including पौधे and animals ).
While the क्रमांक of कोशिकाएं in plants and animals varies इससे प्रजाति to species, Humans contain about 100 खरब ( 1014 ) कोशिकाएं.
Most संयंत्र और एनिमल cells are between 1 and 100 micrometres और इसलिए are visible only under the सूक्ष्मदर्शी.
The कोशिका was खोजा by Robert hooke in 1665.
the cell theory, first विकसित in 1839 by Matthias Jakob schleiden और theodor Schwann, राज्य कि all organisms are composed of एक or अधिक cells, कि सब कोशिकाएं come इससे preexisting कोशिकाएं, that vital कृत्यों of an सजीव occur भीतर cells, और that सब कोशिकाएं contain the खानदानी information necessary for regulating कोशिका कृत्यों और लिये transmitting information to the अगला generation of कोशिकाएं.
कोशिकाएं emerged on planet Earth at तनिक 4.0–4.3 अरब years पहले.
The शब्द cell comes from the Latin गर्भगृह, अर्थ `` छोटी room ''.
The descriptive term for the smallest living biological ढांचा थी coined by Robert Hooke in a किताब he प्रकाशित in 1665 when he compared the कॉर्क कोशिकाएं he saw through his microscope to the छोटी rooms monks lived in.
grecian Formula is a men 's बाल coloring उत्पाद in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Canada और Europe previously banned the उत्पाद because of इसके use of lead एसीटेट.
a motor scooter 's सामने with an impractical क्रमांक और variety of headlamps, added for सजावटी purposes
A headlamp is a बल्ब संलग्न to the सामने of a vehicle to लाइट the road ahead.
Headlamp performance रै steadily improved throughout the automobile age, spurred by the ग्रेट disparity between daytime और nighttime traffic fatalities : the U.S. National Highway Traffic सुरक्षा प्रशासन राज्य कि nearly half of all traffic-related fatalities occur in the dark, despite तभी 25 % of ट्रैफ़िक यात्राएं दौरान अंधेरा.
जबकि it is आम for the term headlight to be used interchangeably in informal चर्चा, headlamp is the term for the यंत्र itself, while headlight properly refers to the बीम of light उत्पादित और distributed by the यंत्र.
अन्य वाहनों, ऐसे as trains और वायुयान, are required to have headlamps.
Bicycle headlamps are often प्रयुक्त on bicycles, and हैं required in कुछ jurisdictions.
They can be powered by a बैटरी or a small विद्युत सृजनकर्ता on the wheel.
additionally automotive night vision प्रणालियों कार्य to supplement headlamps.
महिलाओं 's अधिकारों हैं the अधिकारों and entitlements claimed लिये women और लड़कियों of अनेक समाजों worldwide.
In some स्थान ये अधिकारों are institutionalized or supported by law, local custom, और आचरण, whereas in अन्य they may be उपेक्षित or suppressed.
They differ इससे broader धारणाएं of human अधिकारों through दावा of an inherent ऐतिहासिक और traditional bias against the exercise of अधिकारों by महिलाओं और girls in पक्ष of मेन and boys.
Issues commonly associated with धारणाएं of महिलाओं 's अधिकारों शामिल, though हैं नहीं सीमित to, the सही : to bodily अखंडता और autonomy ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to hold पब्लिक office ; to कार्य ; to fair मजदूरी or equal अदा ; to अपना प्रॉपर्टी ; to education ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to डालें into legal contracts ; and to have वैवाहिक, parental और धार्मिक rights.
Caryn ऐलेन Johnson, बेहतरीन known as Whoopi गोल्डबर्ग (, ( born November 13, 1955 ) is an American comedienne, अभिनेत्री, singer-songwriter, political activist, लेखक and talk दिखाएँ मेजबान.
गोल्डबर्ग बना her film debut in the रंग Purple ( 1985 ), playing celie, a mistreated ब्लैक woman in the Deep दक्षिण.
She received a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Actress and won उसके पहला Golden ग्लोब Award for her role in the फिल्मी.
In 1990, वो played oda mae भूरा, a wacky मानसिक helping a slain man ( पैट्रिक swayze ) save उसके lover ( demi मूर ) in the ब्लॉकबस्टर Ghost.
This प्रदर्शन won उसके a दूसरी सुनहरी ग्लोब और an Academy Award लिये Best Supporting Actress ; this बना गोल्डबर्ग तभी the second black स्त्री in the इतिहास of the अकादमी Awards to win an acting oscar—the first being Hattie mcdaniel जो जीती लिये गए With the Wind in 1939.
notable बाद films शामिल सिस्टर Act और सिस्टर अधिनियम 2, The खिलाड़ी, बना in America, कैसा स्टेला Got Her Groove Back, लड़की, Interrupted and चूहा Race.
वो is भी acclaimed for उसके roles as the बारटेंडर guinan in स्टार Trek : The Next पीढी, as टेरी Doolittle in Jumpin ' Jack फ्लैश, and as Carmen tibideaux in Glee, as well as the आवाज़ of shenzi the hyena in the शेर किंग.
Goldberg has been मनोनीत for 13 Emmy Awards for her कार्य in television.
She थी co-producer of the लोकप्रिय game दिखाएँ Hollywood Squares from 1998 to 2004.
वो has been the मॉडरेटर of the daytime talk दिखाएँ the View चूंकि 2007.
Goldberg रै a ग्रैमी, दो Daytime Emmys, two Golden ग्लोब्स, a टोनी ( लिये production, नहीं acting ), और an ऑस्कर.
In addition, गोल्डबर्ग has a अंग्रेजों अकादमी Film Award, four लोगों 's चुनाव पुरस्कार, and रै been सम्मानित साथ a स्टार on the हॉलीवुड Walk of कीर्ति.
वो is one of the few मनोरंजनकर्ता who have जीती an Emmy, ग्रैमी, ऑस्कर, और टोनी Award.
The नेशनल हॉकी League ( एनएचएल ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit संघ '' which operates a प्रमुख पेशेवर बर्फ hockey league of 30 franchised सदस्य क्लब, of जिससे seven हैं currently स्तिथ in Canada and 23 in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Headquartered in नई York नगर, the NHL is widely considered to be the premier पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी league in the संसार, and एक of the major professional sports लीग in the संयुक्त States और कनाडा.
the Stanley Cup, the oldest professional खेल ट्रॉफी in North America, is awarded annually to the लीग playoff champion at the समाप्त of each ऋतु.
The लीग was व्यवस्थित on नवम्बर 26, 1917, in मॉन्ट्रियल, Quebec, Canada, after the बर्खास्तगी of operations of इसके predecessor organization, the नेशनल हॉकी Association ( नह ), जिससे था महरूम founded in 1909.
It प्रारंभ with चार teams and, through a series of expansions, contractions, और relocations, the league is अभी रचित of 30 क्रियाशील franchises.
The nation to जिससे the नाम of the लीग originally referred was Canada, हालांकि the लीग has अभी महरूम binational चूंकि 1924 जब it expanded into the संयुक्त States.
बाद a श्रमिक dispute that led to the रद्दीकरण of the संपूर्ण 2004–05 season, the league resumed खेल अंतर्गत a new collective bargaining agreement that included a सैलरी cap.
in 2009, the NHL enjoyed रिकार्ड highs in शर्तें of sponsorships, उपस्थिति, और टेलीविज़न ऑडियंस.
The NHL draws अनेक highly skilled खिलाड़ी इससे all over the world and currently रै खिलाड़ी from about 20 different countries.
Although canadians have historically गठित the majority of the players in the एनएचएल, over the past चार plus दशकों the percentages of US and यूरोपीय खिलाड़ी have increased both because of the NHL 's जारी विस्तार from six to तीस क्लब चूंकि 1967, and the increased availability of highly skilled यूरोपीय खिलाड़ी.
Maggots feeding on carrion.
A maggot is the लार्वा of a fly ( अनुक्रम Diptera ) ; it is लागू in particular to the लार्वे of Brachyceran उड़ता, ऐसे as houseflies, cheese उड़ता, और blowflies, rather than larvae of the Nematocera, such as mosquitoes और क्रेन flies.
`` Maggot '' is नहीं a technical term and should not be लिया as ऐसे ; in many मानक textbooks of कीटविज्ञान it करता नहीं appear in the index at सब.
in अनेक non-technical texts the term is used लिये कीट larvae in सामान्य.
Other स्त्रोत have coined their अपना परिभाषाएं ; लिये उदाहरण : ``...
The term applies to a ग्रब जब सब trace of limbs रै disappeared... '' और ``... लागू to the footless लार्वे of dipters. ''
Maggot-like मक्खी larvae are of चौड़ी importance in ecology and आयुर्विज्ञान ; among अन्य भूमिकाएँ, विभिन्न प्रजाति are prominent in रीसाइक्लिंग carrion और garbage, attacking फसलों and foodstuffs, spreading microbial infections, और causing myiasis.
Herod (, Hordos, यूनानी :, hērōdēs ), भी known as हेरोदेस the Great ( 73/74 bce – 4 bce in जेरिको ), was a Roman क्लाएंट king of Judea.
उसके epithet of `` the ग्रेट '' is widely disputed as he is described as `` a madman who murdered his own family और a ग्रेट अनेक rabbis ``.
he is also known लिये उसके colossal building projects in जेरूसलम और elsewhere, सहित उसके expansion of the Second Temple in जेरूसलम ( sometimes referred to as Herod 's Temple ) and the निर्माण of the port at caesarea Maritima.
Important विवरण of उसके biography हैं gleaned from the works of the 1st सदी CE roman–jewish historian josephus flavius.
The Romans बना Herod 's son, हेरोदेस Archelaus, ethnarch of Judea, samaria, and Idumea ( biblical edom ) इससे 4 BCE to 6 ce, referred to as the tetrarchy of judea.
Archelaus थी judged incompetent by the रोमन emperor augustus जो then संयुक्त Samaria, judea उचित and Idumea into Iudaea प्रांत अंतर्गत rule of a prefect जबतक आयु 41.
हेरोदेस 's अन्य बेटे हेरोदेस antipas थी tetrarch of galilee from 4 bce–39 CE.
abo blood समूह antigens present on red रक्त कोशिकाएं and igm antibodies उपस्थित in the सीरम
The ABO blood समूह प्रणाली is the सबसे important रक्त type प्रणाली ( or blood group system ) in इंसान रक्त transfusion.
the संबद्ध anti-A और anti-b antibodies are प्रायः igm antibodies, which हैं usually produced in the पहला सालो of life by sensitization to environmental substances such as खाना, bacteria, और वाइरस.
ABO रक्त प्रकार are also present in some other animals, लिये example apes ऐसे as chimpanzees, bonobos, and gorillas.
साल 1907 ( MCMVII ) was a आम साल starting on मंगलवार ( link will प्रदर्शक the पूरा calendar ) of the gregorian calendar and a common साल starting on Monday of the 13-day-slower Julian पंचांग.
northville is an affluent नगर स्तिथ in और विभाजित by ओकलैंड and Wayne counties in the U.S. state of Michigan.
the क्षेत्रफल is a उपनगरीय of Metropolitan डेट्रॉयट.
the population was 5,970 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
Most of the city is in ओकलैंड काउंटी, and is घिरी by the नगर of novi.
The Wayne County portion is घिरी by northville Township.
northville is served by Northville पब्लिक Schools.
The नगर is स्तिथ northeast of ऐन arbor और northwest of डेट्रॉयट.
Elaine stritch ( born February 2, 1925 ) is an अमरीकी actress और vocalist.
She रै appeared in numerous stage plays and musicals, विशेषता films, and अनेक टेलीविज़न programs.
She is ज्ञात लिये उसके प्रदर्शन of `` The Ladies जो लंच '' in स्टीफन sondheim 's 1970 musical Company, उसके 2001 one-woman show, Elaine stritch at Liberty, और recently लिये her role as जोकर donaghy 's mother Colleen on एनबीसी 's 30 चट्टान.
She has been मनोनीत लिये the Tony Award five times in various categories.
Stritch is also a three-time एमी Award winner.
misfits is a अंग्रेजों विज्ञान fiction comedy-drama टेलीविज़न show परिचय a समूह of यंग offenders sentenced to कार्य in a community सेवा programme, where वे obtain अलौकिक शक्तियां after a अजीब विद्युत storm.
The श्रेणी खोली in 2009 and is currently जारी.
Antonia थामस, Iwan rheon, Lauren socha, नाथन Stewart-Jarrett, and Robert Sheehan are introduced as अलीशा डैनियल्स, Simon Bellamy, Kelly बेली, कर्टिस डोनोवन, and Nathan यंग respectively.
Sheehan left after the second series, replaced in the तीसरा by जोसेफ gilgun as रूडी Wade.
After the चौथी श्रेणी was announced Rheon, थामस and Socha had left their भूमिकाएँ and होता be replaced by नई वर्ण कार्ला crome, Nathan McMullen and मैट Stokoe, as जेस, Finn और Alex respectively.
मिडवे through the चौथी series, Stewart-Jarrett left जबकि Natasha O'Keeffe joined the cast as ऐबी स्मिथ.

ब्रेट lorenzo favre ( born अक्तूबर 10, 1969 ) is a पूर्व अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक जो spent the बहुमत of उसके करियर with the Green खाड़ी पैकर्स of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( NFL ).
He was a 20-year दिग्गज of the NFL, having played क्वार्टरबैक लिये the Atlanta Falcons ( 1991 ), Green खाड़ी पैकर्स ( 1992 – 2007 ), नई York jets ( 2008 ) and Minnesota Vikings ( 2009 – 2010 ).
favre is the तभी क्वार्टरबैक in एनएफएल history to throw for over 70,000 yards, over 500 touchdowns, over 300 interceptions, over 6,000 completions, and over 10,000 pass कोशिशें.
Favre प्रारंभ at the quarterback स्थिति लिये the विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिणी Mississippi लिये चार सालो before being selected in the दूसरी गोलाकार of the 1991 एनएफएल ड्राफ्ट by Atlanta ( 33rd overall ).
He थी traded to ग्रीन Bay on फ़रवरी 10, 1992, for the 19th चुनें in the 1992 NFL ड्राफ्ट.
Favre became the Packers ' starting क्वार्टरबैक in the fourth game of the 1992 ऋतु, stepping in लिये injured quarterback Don Majkowski, and started प्रत्येक खेल through the 2007 season.
He was traded to the New यॉर्क Jets and started at क्वार्टरबैक for the 2008 ऋतु पहले signing with the वाइकिंग्स on अगस्त 18, 2009 as their starting quarterback.
He made an NFL record 297 consecutive starts ( 321 सहित playoffs ).
he is the तभी खिलाड़ी to जीत the AP Most मूल्यवान Player तीन consecutive टाइम्स ( 1995–97 ).
he रै led teams to eight प्रभाग championships ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2007, 2009 ), पाँच NFC चैंपियनशिप खेल ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2007, 2009 ), and दो सुपर कटोरी appearances ( सुपर Bowl XXXI, Super Bowl XXXII ), winning one ( Super कटोरी XXXI ).
He holds अनेक एनएफएल records, including सबसे करियर touchdown passes, most career गुजर गज, सबसे career pass completions, सबसे करियर pass कोशिशें, सबसे करियर interceptions thrown, सबसे consecutive starts by a player, सबसे consecutive starts by a quarterback, most career victories as a starting क्वार्टरबैक, most बर्खास्त, and most fumbles.
He is also referred to by his nickname `` the gunslinger ''.

the संसार Wide Web ( abbreviated as www or w3, commonly ज्ञात as the वेब ), is a system of interlinked हाइपरटेक्स्ट documents पहुँचा via the अंतरजाल.
With a web browser, one can दृश्य web pages कि may contain टेक्स्ट, बिंब, वीडियो, and अन्य multimedia, और navigate between उन्हें via hyperlinks.
using अवधारणाओं from his पहले hypertext systems जैसे ENQUIRE, British engineer, computer scientist and at कि time कर्मचारी of the CERN, Sir Tim berners-lee, now Director of the संसार चौड़ी वेब Consortium ( w3c ), लिखा a प्रस्ताव in कूच 1989 लिये what होता eventually become the संसार Wide वेब.
At cern, a यूरोपीय शोध organisation near जेनेवा straddling the किनारा between France और Switzerland, berners-lee and belgian कंप्यूटर scientist Robert cailliau प्रस्तावित in 1990 to use hypertext `` to कड़ी and access information of various kinds as a web of नोड in जिससे the user can browse at होगा '', and वे सरेआम introduced the प्रोजेक्ट in दिसम्बर of the वही साल.
Wayne lyman मोर्स ( अक्तूबर 20, 1900july 22, 1974 ) थी a राजनेता and attorney इससे ऑरेगॉन, United States, known for उसके proclivity लिये opposing his parties ' leadership, and specifically for his opposition to the Vietnam War on संवैधानिक grounds.
Born in मैडिसन, विस्कॉन्सिन, and शिक्षित at the विश्वविद्यालयों of Wisconsin-Madison and the विश्वविद्यालयों of Minnesota विधि स्कूल, मोर्स moved to ऑरेगॉन in 1930 और began teaching at the University of ऑरेगॉन School of विधि.
During संसार युद्ध ii he थी elected to the United States Senate as a रिपब्लिकन ; he became an स्वतंत्र बाद Dwight D. Eisenhower 's चुनाव to the presidency in 1952.
While an स्वतंत्र, he set a record लिये performing the दूसरी longest one-person filibuster in the इतिहास of the Senate.
मोर्स joined the Democratic Party in 1955, and was reelected twice जबकि a member of that पार्टी.
Morse made a ब्रैड run for the लोकतांत्रिक Party 's presidential नामांकन in 1960.
a few years later, Morse was एक of तभी two सीनेटरों जो opposed the Gulf of Tonkin रेज़ोल्यूशन, which authorized the president to take military कार्रवाई in Vietnam बगैर a घोषणा of युद्ध.
He जारी to speak आउट विरूद्ध the युद्ध in the ensuing सालो, and lost his 1968 bid लिये reelection to Bob packwood, who criticized उसके दमदार विपक्ष to the युद्ध.
मोर्स made two अधिक bids for reelection to the सीनेट before उसके मौत in 1974.
in संसदीय कार्यविधि, a motion to तालिका रै दो अलग and contradictory meanings:
In the United राज्य, to तालिका प्रायः अर्थात् the to lay [ the topic ] on the table or to मूव लिये postponement of consideration ; a proposal to बर्खास्तगी consideration of a स्थगित गति.
Much कम प्रायः, it अर्थात् a गति to `` put on the तालिका '' : a प्रस्ताव to शुरू consideration ( or reconsideration ), a usage consistent साथ the rest of the english-speaking world.
in the बाकी of the english-speaking संसार such as the United किंगडम, to तालिका अर्थात् to move to प्लेस [ the topic ] upon the तालिका ( or to move to place on the table ) : a proposal to शुरू consideration ( or reconsideration ) of a प्रस्ताव.
दोनो the अमरीकी and the British dialects have the भाव of `` to table '' as to lay [ the टॉपिक ] on the table or to कारण [ the टॉपिक ] to झूठ on the table.
the difference is the idea of कया the तालिका is लिये, कि of a shelf off to the पक्ष, or an active work bench.
The British meaning has the भाव of the तालिका as होने an active work bench, साथ the topic being the center of ध्यान, माना और discussed by सब जबतक it can be resolved, at which पाइंट it is लिया off the 'table '.
The American भाव is कि the तालिका is जैसे that of a शेल्फ, अभिलेख, or long-term storage यंत्र, where the topic रै been disposed of by sending it to the 'table ' and leaving it वहीँ.
खिलौना Story 3 is a 2010 American 3d computer animated comedy-drama prison film, और the तीसरा किश्त in the खिलौना स्टोरी श्रेणी.
It थी produced by Pixar एनिमेशन Studios और वितरित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी Pictures.
Directed by ली unkrich, the film थी released विश्वव्यापी from जून through October in डिज़्नी Digital 3-D, RealD, और imax 3D.
खिलौना Story 3 थी भी the first film to be released theatrically साथ Dolby Surround 7.1 sound.
The पटकथा was लिखा by माइकल Arndt, while unkrich लिखा the story along साथ जॉन lasseter और Andrew Stanton, respectively निदेशक और co-writer of the दो first films.
the प्लाट focuses on the toys वुडी, बज़ lightyear, and उनके मित्रों dealing with an अनिश्चित भविष्य as their owner, एंडी, prepares to छोड़ लिये कॉलेज.
अभिनेताओं Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan cusack, डॉन rickles, estelle हैरिस, John Ratzenberger, Wallace Shawn, Jeff pidgeon, Jodi बेंसन, R. Lee ermey, जॉन मॉरिस, और लॉरी Metcalf reprised उनके voice-over भूमिकाएँ from the previous films.
जिम varney, who निभाई Slinky श्वान in the पहला दो films, and जो ranft, जो portrayed lenny and Wheezy, दोनो died before production began on खिलौना स्टोरी 3.
The role of slinky Dog थी taken over by ब्लेक Clark ( a dost of Varney ), जबकि ranft 's वर्ण and various अन्य were written आउट of the story.
नई characters include performances by ned beatty, Timothy डाल्टन, क्रिस्टन schaal, Bonnie हंट, Whoopi Goldberg, जेफ़ garlin, रिचर्ड Kind, and माइकल Keaton.
the विशेषता broke Shrek the तिहाई record as the biggest opening day उत्तर अमरीकी सकल लिये an एनिमेटेड फिल्मी unadjusted for inflation, और a big opening साथ an unadjusted सकल of $ 110,307,189.
It is also the highest-grossing खोलने weekend लिये a पिक्चर्स film, as well as the highest-grossing opening वीकेंड लिये a film to have खोली in the माह of June.
इस is the highest-grossing film of 2010, both in the United राज्य and Canada, और worldwide.
in early अगस्त, it became Pixar 's highest-grossing film at the North American बक्सा office ( surpassing Finding nemo ), and the highest-grossing एनिमेटेड फिल्मी of all समय worldwide ( surpassing Shrek 2 ) ; बाद that month, खिलौना Story 3 became the first कभी animated film in इतिहास to मेक over $ 1 billion worldwide.
It is फिलहाल the 10th-highest-grossing फिल्मी of all time.
Toy स्टोरी 3 थी nominated लिये पाँच अकादमी पुरस्कार, including Best Picture, Best Adapted पटकथा, and बेहतरीन ध्वनि Editing.
it थी the third animated फिल्मी ( बाद सौंदर्य and the जानवर और up ) to be nominated for Academy पुरस्कार for Best चित्र.
it won the पुरस्कार for Best Animated Feature और बेहतरीन असली सोंग.
John levell starks ( born अगस्त 10, 1965 ) is an अमरीकी retired पेशेवर बास्केट shooting guard.
starks was सूचीबद्ध at 6'5 '' और 190 pounds during उसके NBA playing career.
हालांकि he was not drafted in the 1988 NBA ड्राफ्ट after attending चार colleges in his native Oklahoma, including Oklahoma State University, he gained कीर्ति जबकि playing लिये the New यॉर्क knicks of the National बास्केट Association in the 1990s.
सुरक्षित Digital or ( sd ) is a non-volatile मेमोरी कार्ड format for उपयोग in पोर्टेबल डिवाइस, ऐसे as mobile फोन, digital कैमरे, GPS नेविगेशन डिवाइस, and टैब्लेट कंप्यूटर.
The Secure Digital standard is maintained by the sd कार्ड संघ ( SDA ).
SD technologies have been implemented in more than 400 brands across dozens of product categories और more than 8,000 models.
the Secure डिजिटल format includes four card परिवारों उपलब्धियाँ in तीन अलग रूप कारकों.
the four families हैं the असली Standard-Capacity ( sdsc ), the High-Capacity ( SDHC ), the eXtended-Capacity ( SDXC ), and the SDIO, which combines input/output functions with आंकड़ा भंडार.
The three form कारकों हैं the असली size, the `` mini '' size, and the `` सूक्ष्म '' आकार ( see illustration ).
There हैं many combinations of form factors और यंत्र परिवारों.
Electrically passive adapters allow the उपयोग of a छोटी card in a मेजबान device built to थाम a larger कार्ड.
मेजबान devices that comply साथ newer versions of the specification provide पिछड़ा compatibility और accept older SD cards, but this article explains अनेक factors कि can prevent the उपयोग of a newer SD card:
A नए card may प्रस्ताव greater क्षमता than the host यंत्र can handle.
a newer card may use a संचिका system the host यंत्र can नहीं navigate.
Use of an sdio card requires the host यंत्र be designed लिये the input/output कृत्यों the card provides.
The organization of the card was changed starting साथ the SDHC family.
कुछ विक्रेता produced SDSC cards above 1 gb before the SDA had standardized a विधि of doing so.
The sda uses अनेक trademarked लोगो to enforce compliance साथ its specifications और assure users of संगतता.
ह्यूज John mungo ग्रान्ट ( born 9 September 1960 ) is a अंग्रेजों actor और फिल्मी निर्माता.
he रै received a Golden ग्लोब, a bafta, and an मानद César.
His films have अर्जित more than US $ 2.4 अरब from 25 नाट्य releases worldwide.
Grant achieved international स्टारडम after appearing in Richard कर्टिस 's कामयाब चार Weddings और a Funeral ( 1994 ).
He प्रयुक्त इस भेदन role as a बारंबार cinematic persona दौरान the 1990s, delivering comic प्रदर्शन in मुख्यधारा films like मिकी ब्लू आँखें ( 1999 ) and नॉटिंग Hill ( 1999 ).
By the turn of the 21st सदी, he had established खुद as a leading man skilled साथ a satirical comic talent.
Grant has expanded उसके oeuvre साथ critically acclaimed turns as a cad in ब्रिजेट जोन्स 's Diary ( 2001 ), About A लड़के ( 2002 ), Love Actually ( 2003 ), and American Dreamz ( 2006 ).
he later निभाई against प्रकार साथ multiple cameo भूमिकाएँ in the एपिक नाटक फिल्मी बादल Atlas ( 2012 ).
Within the film उद्योग, Grant is cited as an anti-film स्टार who approaches his भूमिकाएँ जैसे a character actor, and कोशिशें to मेक his acting appear spontaneous.
hallmarks of his कॉमिक कौशल include a nonchalant touch of विडंबना / sarcasm and पढ़ाई physical mannerisms as खूब as his precisely-timed संवाद delivery and फेशियल expressions.
The entertainment मीडिया 's कवरेज of Grant 's जीवन बंद the बिग screen रै प्रायः overshadowed his कार्य as a thespian.
He has महरूम गायन परिचय उसके अनादर लिये the व्यवसायिक of एक्टिंग, and in his तिरस्कार towards the संस्कृति of हस्ती and hostility towards the मीडिया.
in a करियर spanning 30 years, ग्रान्ट रै repeatedly claimed that एक्टिंग is not a सच्चा कॉलिंग but बस a job he fell into.
the हान Dynasty ( ; ) ( 206 bc – 220 ad ) was an imperial dynasty of China, preceded by the Qin राजवंश ( 221–207 BC ) और succeeded by the तीन kingdoms ( 220–280 ad ).
It was founded by the rebel नेता Liu बंग, known मरणोपरांत as सम्राट Gaozu of Han.
It थी briefly interrupted by the Xin Dynasty ( 9–23 ad ) of the पूर्व regent वांग mang.
इस interregnum separates the Han into two periods : the Western हान ( 206 bc – 9 ad ) और पूर्वी हान ( 25–220 AD ).
spanning over four centuries, the काल of the हान Dynasty is considered a सुनहरी age in Chinese history.
to इस day, China 's majority ethnic group refers to itself as the `` Han लोगों '' and the चाइनीज स्क्रिप्ट is referred to as `` हान वर्ण ``.
The Han Empire थी विभाजित into areas सीधे नियंत्रित by the सेंट्रल government, ज्ञात as commanderies, और a क्रमांक of semi-autonomous kingdoms.
ये kingdoms gradually lost सब vestiges of उनके independence, particularly following the विद्रोह of the सात States.
the xiongnu, a nomadic कनफेडरेशन जिससे dominated the पूर्वी यूरेशियाई स्तान, पराजित the हान army in बैटल in 200 bc.
Following the defeat, a राजनैतिक marriage गठबंधन थी negotiated in जिससे the हान became the de facto inferior partner.
When, despite the सन्धि, the Xiongnu continued to रेड Han सीमायें, सम्राट Wu of Han ( r. 141–87 bc ) शुभारम्भ अनेक military अभियान विरूद्ध उन्हें.
The परम Han विजय in ये युद्धों आखिरकार forced the Xiongnu to accept vassal औकात as हान tributaries.
These अभियान विस्तारित हान sovereignty into the tarim जलाशय of Central Asia and helped establish the विशाल व्यापार संजाल known as the Silk Road, जिससे पहुँचे as far as the Mediterranean world.
हान शक्तियां प्रबंधित to divide the Xiongnu into दो competing nations, the दक्षिणी और उत्तरी Xiongnu, and मजबूर the Northern Xiongnu across the Ili नदी.
despite these victories, the territories north of हान 's सीमायें were जल्दी overrun by the nomadic xianbei कनफेडरेशन.
After 92 ad, the राजमहल हिजड़े increasingly involved themselves in अदालत politics, engaging in हिंसक power struggles between the various consort clans of the empresses और सम्राज्ञी dowagers, causing the हान 's परम downfall.
Imperial authority was also seriously challenged by विशाल Daoist religious समाजों which instigated the पीला पगड़ी Rebellion और the पाँच Pecks of राइस विद्रोह.
following the death of सम्राट ling ( r. 168–189 ad ), the राजमहल हिजड़े suffered होलसेल नरसंहार by military officers, allowing members of the aristocracy and military governors to become warlords और divide the साम्राज्य.
When Cao pi, King of Wei, usurped the throne from Emperor Xian, the हान Dynasty ceased to exist.
the Han राजवंश थी an age of आर्थिक समृद्धि and saw a significant विकास of the धन अर्थव्यवस्था पहला स्थापित during the झोऊ राजवंश ( c. 1050–256 BC ).
The coinage issued by the सेंट्रल सरकारी mint in 119 bc remained the मानक coinage of China until the तंग Dynasty ( 618–907 AD ).
to pay लिये इसके military campaigns और the उपनिवेश of newly conquered frontier territories, the government राष्ट्रीयकृत the private salt and आयरन industries in 117 BC.
ये government monopolies यहूद repealed during the पूर्वी Han काल, और the खोया आय was recouped through heavily taxing private entrepreneurs.
the emperor थी at the pinnacle of Han समाज.
He presided over the हान government लकिन shared power with दोनो the धामों और नियुक्त ministers who came largely from the scholarly gentry क्लास.
From the reign of Emperor Wu onward, the चाइनीज court officially sponsored Confucianism in education और court राजनीती, synthesized साथ the cosmology of बाद विद्वानों such as डांग zhongshu.
इस नीति endured जबतक the fall of the चिंग Dynasty in 1911 ad.
विज्ञान और प्रौद्योगिकी during the Han काल saw significant advances, सहित papermaking, the nautical steering rudder, the उपयोग of negative संख्याएँ in गणित, the raised-relief map, the हाइड्रोलिक -powered armillary गोला लिये astronomy, और a seismometer employing an inverted pendulum.
Tourette syndrome ( also पुकारा tourette 's सिंड्रोम, Tourette 's विकार, गाइल्स de la Tourette सिंड्रोम, gts or, more commonly, simply tourette 's or ts ) is an inherited neuropsychiatric विकार साथ onset in बाल्यकाल, characterized by multiple physical ( motor ) tics and at least एक गायन ( phonic ) tic.
ये tics characteristically wax और wane, can be suppressed temporarily, और are preceded by a premonitory urge.
Tourette 's is पारिभाषित as भाग of a वर्णक्रम of tic disorders, जिससे includes transient और chronic tics.
Tourette 's थी एकबार माना a rare और विचित्र सिंड्रोम, सबसे प्रायः associated साथ the मुँह of obscene शब्द or socially अनुचित and अपमानजनक remarks ( coprolalia ), लकिन this symptom is उपस्थित in तभी a small अल्पसंख्यक of people with tourette 's.
tourette 's is no longer माना a rare condition, but it is not सदा correctly identified because सबसे cases are mild और the severity of tics decreases लिये most children as they pass through adolescence.
Between 0.4 % और 3.8 % of children आयु 5 to 18 may have Tourette 's ; the prevalence of क्षणिक और दीर्घकालिक tics in school-age children is higher, साथ the अधिक आम tics of eye blinking, coughing, throat clearing, sniffing, और facial movements.
चरम tourette 's in adulthood is a rarity, and Tourette 's करता not adversely affect intelligence or जीवन प्रत्याशा.
Genetic और पर्यावरणीय कारकों खेल a भूमिका in the etiology of Tourette 's, लकिन the सटीक कल्याणकारी are अनजान.
in सबसे cases, दवा is unnecessary.
There is no प्रभावी treatment for प्रत्येक case of tics, but निश्चित medications और therapies can सहायता जब their use is warranted.
शिक्षा is an important भाग of कोई उपचार योजना, और स्पष्टीकरण and reassurance अलोन हैं often sufficient उपचार.
comorbid शर्तें ( co-occurring diagnoses अन्य than Tourette 's ) such as attention-deficit अतिसक्रियता disorder ( adhd ) और obsessive–compulsive disorder ( OCD ) are present in many मरीजों seen in tertiary specialty क्लिनिक.
These other conditions often कारण more कार्यात्मक impairment to the individual than the tics that हैं the hallmark of tourette 's, hence it is महत्वपूर्ण to correctly identify comorbid conditions and दावत them.
the eponym थी bestowed by Jean-Martin charcot ( 1825–1893 ) on निमित्त of his निवासी, जॉर्जेस अल्बर्ट édouard Brutus गाइल्स de la Tourette ( 1859–1904 ), a फ्रेंच physician और neurologist, who प्रकाशित an account of nine मरीजों with Tourette 's in 1885.
Sunbeam badge.
सनबीम थी a marque पंजीकृत by John marston Co. ltd of wolverhampton, England, in 1888.
the company first बना bicycles, then motorcycles and गाड़ियाँ इससे the late 19th century until about 1936, और लागू the marque to all three फ़ॉर्म of transportation.
the कम्पनी भी manufactured aero इंजन in the पहला World War and 647 वायुयान during the दूसरी World युद्ध.
A Sunbeam was the first British car to win a ग्रैंड Prix race, और नियत a number of land गति records.
the company went into receivership in 1935 और was खरीदा by the Rootes समूह, जिससे continued to use the Sunbeam marque.
फॉक्स न्यूज चैनल ( fnc ), also ज्ञात as Fox न्यूज, is a केबल न्यूज चैनल owned by the Fox Entertainment Group, a subsidiary of News Corporation.
as of April 2009, the channel was उपलब्धियाँ to 102 million households in the संयुक्त राज्य and to viewers internationally, प्रसारण primarily इससे its New York studios.
The चैनल was created by Australian-American मीडिया mogul Rupert Murdoch, जो hired पूर्व NBC कार्यपालिका Roger ailes as its founding सीईओ.
it launched on October 7, 1996 to 17 million cable subscribers.
it grew during the late 1990s and 2000s to become the dominant केबल न्यूज network in the संयुक्त States.
आलोचकों have stated that Fox न्यूज चैनल promotes रूढ़िवादी political स्थितियाँ और पक्षपातपूर्ण reporting.
Commentators, न्यूज anchors, और reporters at Fox News Channel have responded that न्यूज reporting और राजनैतिक commentary operate independently of each other, and have denied any bias in न्यूज रिपोर्टिंग.
the mandibular first molar or six-year molar is the दाँत located distally ( away इससे the midline of the face ) from both the mandibular दूसरी premolars of the mouth but mesial ( toward the midline of the फेस ) इससे दोनो mandibular दूसरी molars.
It is located on the mandibular ( निम्नतर ) मेहराब of the मुँह, और generally opposes the maxillary ( upper ) first molars और the maxillary 2nd premolar in सामान्य क्लास i occlusion.
the फलन of this molar is similar to कि of all molars in लिहाज़ to grinding होने the principal action during mastication, commonly ज्ञात as chewing.
वहीँ are प्रायः पाँच well-developed cusps on mandibular पहला molars : two on the buccal ( side nearest the गाल ), दो lingual ( पक्ष निकटतम the tongue ), and one distal.
वहीँ हैं ग्रेट मतभेद between the deciduous ( baby ) mandibular molars and those of the permanent mandibular molars, भी though their फलन are समान.
the permanent mandibular molars are not माना to have कोई दांत कि precede it.
Despite being named molars, the deciduous molars हैं followed by स्थाई premolars.
In the सार्वभौमिक system of संकेतन, the पतझड़ी mandibular first molars हैं designated by a letter written in uppercase.
The सही deciduous mandibular first molar is ज्ञात as `` s '', and the बाएँ one is ज्ञात as `` L ''.
The international notation has a अलग system of संकेतन.
यूँ, the right deciduous mandibular पहला molar is ज्ञात as `` 84 '', and the बाएँ one is ज्ञात as `` 74 ''.
in the सार्वभौमिक system of संकेतन, the स्थाई mandibular first molars are designated by a number.
The सही स्थाई mandibular पहला molar is known as `` 30 '', और the बाएँ one is ज्ञात as `` 19 ''.
The Palmer संकेतन उपयोग a number in conjunction with a symbol designating in जिससे quadrant the दाँत is found.
लिये इस दाँत, the left and right first molars would have the वही number, `` 6 '', लकिन the right एक would have the symbol, `` ┐ '', over it, while the बाएँ one would have, `` ┌ ''.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय संकेतन रै a different क्रमांकन system than the पिछला two, and the सही permanent mandibular पहला molar is ज्ञात as `` 46 '', और the left एक is ज्ञात as `` 36 ''.
mandibular primary first molars प्रायः have four pulp horns.
the first molar is usually the first permanent tooth to erupt and रै adult undertones.
anatomy : The mandibular पहला molar has पाँच पुलिन : the mesiobuccal ( MB, toward midline and गाल ), mesiolingual ( ml, toward midline और tongue ), distolingual ( dl, दूर इससे midline and towards जीभ ), distobuccal ( DB, away इससे midline और toward cheek ), और distal ( d, away इससे midline ), listed in order of अवरोहण size.
सूचीबद्ध in अनुक्रम of अवरोहण ऊँचाई they are : ml, dl, DF, mf, and D. An eighth cusp was found in a primary second lower molar in an Argentinean चाइल्ड.
viewed from the top of the दाँत ( occlusal view ), the mandibular first molar is pentagonal ( पाँच तरफा ) in shape और tapers toward the lingual, साथ the sides being the buccal surface, the mesial surface, the lingual surface, distal surface, और the distobuccal सतह.
the occlusal सतह has चार डोले.
The सेंट्रल नाली is not straight but runs bas the center of the tooth mesially to distally और contains चार गड्ढों ( mesial, central, central, and distal ).
the distobuccal नाली runs इससे the distal pit in the सेंट्रल नाली distobuccally separating the distal and distobuccal पुलिन.
the lingual नाली runs from the अधिक distal of the सेंट्रल गड्ढों in the सेंट्रल नाली toward the lingual सतह between the mesiolingual and distolingual पुलिन.
the buccal नाली runs from the more mesial of the सेंट्रल pits in the सेंट्रल नाली toward the buccal surface between the mesiobuccal और distobuccal cusps समाप्ति in the buccal गड्ढे.
the portion of the central नाली between the सेंट्रल pits is termed the Lewis offset and is mandatory to खाता for the locations of the buccal और lingual grooves ( buccal नाली होने अधिक mesial than the lingual groove जबकि वे हैं समानांतर ).
From the buccal ( buccal दृश्य ), दो roots are present.
The distal root is generally straighter, although दोनो प्रायः have a slight distal curvature.
The हाइट्स of contour on the mesial और distal contact the सटा दांत और हैं स्तिथ at the जंक्शन of the occlusal and मध्य तिहाई of the crown.
The फ्लोरिडा Legislature is the two घरों कि अधिनियम as the state legislature of the U.S. state of Florida.
The फ्लोरिडा Constitution राज्य that `` The विधान शक्ति of the state shall be vested in a legislature of the राज्य of Florida, '' composed of a Senate and हाउस of Representatives.
The विधानमंडल is seated at the Florida राज्य Capitol in Tallahassee.
Stained glass depiction of डेनियल interceding साथ Arioch, the किंग 's guard.
Arioch था महरूम charged साथ killing सब the हिकमत मेन बाद वे यहूद not समर्थ to interpret Nebuchadnezzar 's dream.
डेनियल 2 is the second अध्याय of the किताब of Daniel in the यहूदी Bible.
the chapter 's source टेक्स्ट is predominantly लिखा in aramaic.
according to the टेक्स्ट, nebuchadnezzar is the king of बाबुल जो is troubled by his dreams.
He demands an interpretation लिये his dreams or will have his रहस्यवादी interpreters executed.
डेनियल seeks दैवी अक्ल to interpret the king 's dreams and गुणगान God साथ a छोटी psalm.
God देता Daniel a vision in the रात्रि to reveal the किंग 's सपना.
Able to satisfy the किंग, Daniel is प्रचारित over the पूरे प्रांत of बाबुल.
One comcast बीच, the headquarters of comcast in Philadelphia, PA.
The बूढ़ा Comcast logo इससे 1969 to 1999, when it थी replaced with the crescent logo.
the comcast निगम is an अमरीकी provider of entertainment, सूचना और communications उत्पाद और सेवाएं.
It is the largest cable operator, एक of the biggest द्रव्यमान media, home Internet सेवा provider, और third largest घर telephone सेवा provider in the United States, providing केबल television, broadband Internet, टेलीफोन service और in some क्षेत्रों home सुरक्षा ( सहित burglar alarms, surveillance कैमरे, fire alarm प्रणालियों and घर स्वचालन ) to दोनो residential and वाणिज्यिक ग्राहक in 40 states और the District of कोलंबिया.
the कम्पनी is headquartered in फिलाडेल्फिया, Pennsylvania.
In 2011, comcast acquired a 51 % बहुमत stake in मीडिया संगुटिका nbcuniversal इससे ge in January 2011, और began the प्रक्रम of खरीदना the remaining 49 % on फ़रवरी 12, 2013, at a cost of $ 16.7 अरब.
It समाप्त the purchase on कूच 19, 2013.
comcast also has significant पकड़कर in several cable संजाल ( सहित e !
entertainment Television, Style संजाल, G4, the Golf चैनल and एनबीसी खेल Network ), वितरण ( theplatform ), और सम्बन्धित व्यवसायों.
Comcast has महरूम the विषय of criticism लिये activities सहित its stance on जाल neutrality, as well as ग़रीब results on customer satisfaction surveys.
porcupines हैं rodents with a coat of sharp कांटे, or quills, कि बचाव और camouflage उन्हें from परभक्षी.
वे हैं indigenous to the Americas, southern Asia, and Africa.
porcupines हैं the तीसरा largest of the rodents, behind the capybara and the बीवर.
सबसे porcupines are परिचय long, साथ an long टेल.
weighing, they are rounded, विशाल and slow.
porcupines come in विभिन्न शेड्स of भूरा, gray, and the असामान्य श्वेत.
porcupines ' spiny सुरक्षा resembles कि of the unrelated erinaceomorph hedgehogs और monotreme echidnas.
The common porcupine is a herbivore.
It eats leaves, herbs, टहनियों और ग्रीन पौधे like skunk cabbage और clover और in the winter it may eat bark.
The North अमरीकी साही often climbs पेड़ to ढूँढें food.
The अफ़्रीकी porcupine is not a climber और forages on the मैदान.
It is ज़्यादातर nocturnal, लकिन होगा sometimes forage for food in the दिन.
porcupines have become a pest in Kenya और हैं खाया as a कोमलता.
the नाम porcupine आता इससे Middle French porc espin ( spined pig ).
A क्षेत्रीय अमरीकी name लिये the एनिमल is quill pig.
First पेज of us patent 129,843 लिये सुधार in Lubricators for steam-engines
Elijah J. McCoy ( may 2, 1844 – अक्तूबर 10, 1929 ) was a ब्लैक canadian-american आविष्कारक और engineer, जो थी notable लिये उसके 57 u.S. patents, सबसे to do साथ lubrication of भाप engines.
Born free in Canada, he लौटे as a five-year-old चाइल्ड with उसके परिवार to the United States in 1847, where he lived लिये the rest of उसके जीवन and became a US नागरिक.
होंडा fcx स्पष्टता, a हाइड्रोजन fuel cell demonstration गाडी introduced in 2008
a hydrogen गाडी is a गाडी that उपयोग हाइड्रोजन as its onboard fuel लिये motive शक्ति.
हाइड्रोजन vehicles शामिल हाइड्रोजन fueled space rockets, as well as automobiles and अन्य परिवहन वाहनों.
the power plants of such वाहनों convert the chemical energy of हाइड्रोजन to mechanical उर्जा either by burning हाइड्रोजन in an आतंरिक combustion engine, or by reacting हाइड्रोजन with ऑक्सीजन in a ईंधन cell to चलाएं electric मोटर्स.
Widespread use of hydrogen लिये fueling transportation is a कुंजी तत्व of a proposed हाइड्रोजन economy.
हाइड्रोजन fuel करता नहीं occur naturally on धरती and यूँ is not an energy source ; बल्कि it is an energy वाहक.
it is most frequently made इससे मिथेन or other चट्टान fuels, लकिन it can be उत्पादित using स्त्रोत ( ऐसे as हवा, सौर, or नाभिकीय ) कि are intermittent, too diffuse or too cumbersome to सीधे propel वाहनों.
Integrated wind-to-hydrogen पौधे, using electrolysis of water, हैं exploring technologies to deliver costs कम enough, and quantities ग्रेट पर्याप्त, to compete with परंपरागत energy स्त्रोत.
अनेक कंपनियाँ are working to develop technologies कि might efficiently exploit the संभावित of hydrogen उर्जा लिये मोबाईल uses.
the आकर्षण of using hydrogen as an energy currency is that, if हाइड्रोजन is prepared बगैर using fossil fuel inputs, गाडी propulsion would not contribute to carbon डाइऑक्साइड emissions.
The कमियां of hydrogen use are ऊँची पूंजी cost, कम energy सामग्री प्रति unit volume, high tankage weights, बहुत ऊँची storage vessel pressures, the भंडार, परिवहन और filling of gaseous or liquid हाइड्रोजन in वाहनों, the विशाल investment in अवसंरचना कि would be required to fuel vehicles, and the inefficiency of production प्रक्रियाओं.
Sacramento is the पूंजी city of the U.S. state of कैलिफ़ोर्निया and the सीट of government of sacramento County.
It is स्तिथ at the confluence of the sacramento River and the American River in the northern portion of कैलिफ़ोर्निया 's expansive Central घाटी.
With an अनुमानित 2011 जनसांख्यिकी of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest नगर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया and the 35th largest city in the United States.
Sacramento is the कोर cultural and economic बीच of the Sacramento महानगर area which includes seven counties साथ an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123.
इसके महानगर क्षेत्रफल is the चौथी largest in कैलिफ़ोर्निया after the Greater लॉस Angeles Area, San फ्रांसिस्को Bay क्षेत्रफल, और the San डिएगो metropolitan क्षेत्रफल, as well as the 25th largest in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Sacramento was cited by समय पत्रिका as America 's सबसे ethnically और racially integrated नगर in 2002.
sacramento became a नगर through the efforts of the स्विस immigrant John sutter, sr., his बेटे जॉन sutter, jr., and James W. मार्शल.
Sacramento grew जल्दी धन्यवाद to the सुरक्षा of Sutter 's Fort, जिससे was established by Sutter in 1839.
During the California सुनहरा फटाफट, Sacramento was a प्रमुख distribution पाइंट, a commercial and agricultural बीच, and a टर्मिनस for वैगन रेल, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the टट्टू Express, और the पहला Transcontinental रेलरोड.
कैलिफ़ोर्निया राज्य University, sacramento, more commonly ज्ञात as sacramento State or सैक राज्य, is the largest local university.
it is one of the twenty-three campuses of the California राज्य University system.
drexel University Sacramento is स्तिथ in शहर, sacramento.
University of the Pacific 's mcgeorge School of Law is स्तिथ in the Oak पार्क पड़ोस.
in addition, the विश्वविद्यालयों of California, डेविस is स्तिथ in आसपास Davis, west of the पूंजी.
the UC डेविस Medical बीच, a world-renowned शोध hospital, is located in the city of sacramento.
The ठहराना स्टोर is a कड़ी of खुदरा स्टोर्स owned और संचालित by ठहराना inc., dealing in कंप्यूटर और consumer electronics.
The स्टोर्स sell Macintosh निजी computers, तन्त्र, ipods, iPads, iPhones, third-party accessories, और अन्य उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स such as Apple TV.
Some ऊँची profile स्टोर्स विशेषता a थिएटर लिये प्रस्तुतियों and workshops और a Studio for प्रशिक्षण with Apple उत्पाद ; all स्टोर्स प्रस्ताव a प्रतिभाशाली Bar लिये तकनीकी support और repairs, as खूब as फ़्री वर्कशॉप available to the पब्लिक.
Under the नेतृत्व of रॉन जॉनसन, the former वरिष्ठ Vice President of Retail परिचालन, the ठहराना स्टोर्स have, according to an आलेख in the नई York टाइम्स, been responsible लिये `` [ turning ] the उबाऊ computer sales मंजिल into a sleek playroom भर with गैजेट ''.
, ठहराना has 405 स्टोर्स विश्वव्यापी, साथ वैश्विक बिक्री of अरब in merchandise in 2011, और वे सीसे the संयुक्त राज्य खुदरा market in terms of बिक्री प्रति ईकाई area.
स्टीवन Paul `` Steve '' कार्य ( ; फ़रवरी 24, 1955 – October 5, 2011 ) was an American entrepreneur and आविष्कारक, best ज्ञात as the co-founder, अध्यक्ष, और CEO of ठहराना Inc.
through ठहराना, he थी widely recognized as a charismatic pioneer of the निजी computer revolution और लिये उसके influential करियर in the कंप्यूटर and consumer electronics fields, transforming `` एक उद्योग after another, इससे computers and smartphones to म्यूज़िक and फिल्मों... ''
कार्य भी co-founded और परोसा as chief कार्यपालिका of Pixar Animation Studios ; he became a member of the फलक of directors of the वॉल्ट Disney कम्पनी in 2006, when Disney acquired Pixar.
Jobs थी among the first to देखिए the commercial संभावित of Xerox parc 's चूहा -ड्राइवn आलेखीय user interface, which led to the सृष्टि of the Apple Lisa and, one साल later, the मैकिंटोश.
he also निभाई a role in introducing the laserwriter, one of the first widely available laser मुद्रक, to the मार्केट.
बाद a power struggle with the फलक of directors in 1985, Jobs बाएँ Apple and संस्थापित अगला, a कंप्यूटर platform development कम्पनी specializing in the higher-education and कारोबार बाज़ार.
in 1986, he acquired the कंप्यूटर graphics division of Lucasfilm, which थी spun बंद as पिक्चर्स.
he थी credited in Toy स्टोरी ( 1995 ) as an executive निर्माता.
he served as सीईओ and बहुमत shareholder until डिज़्नी 's purchase of पिक्चर्स in 2006.
In 1996, बाद Apple था failed to deliver इसके ऑपरेटिंग system, copland, Gil amelio turned to NeXT Computer, और the nextstep मंच became the न्यास for the Mac OS X.
Jobs लौटे to ठहराना as an advisor, और took कंट्रोल of the company as an अंतरिम CEO.
Jobs brought ठहराना इससे near दिवालियापन to profitability by 1998.
As the नई CEO of the company, कार्य oversaw the development of the imac, iTunes, ipod, iphone, और ipad, and on the सेवाएं side, the company 's Apple खुदरा स्टोर्स, iTunes स्टोर and the app Store.
the कामयाबी of ये उत्पाद और services provided several years of stable financial returns, और propelled ठहराना to become the संसार 's सबसे मूल्यवान publicly traded कम्पनी in 2011.
the reinvigoration of the कम्पनी is regarded by many टीकाकारों as one of the महानतम turnarounds in कारोबार history.
in 2003, कार्य was diagnosed साथ a अग्न्याशय neuroendocrine ट्यूमर.
Though it was initially treated, he reported a हार्मोन असंतुलन, underwent a liver transplant in 2009, and appeared progressively thinner as his स्वास्थ्य अस्वीकृत.
On medical leave for most of 2011, Jobs resigned in अगस्त कि year, और was elected अध्यक्ष of the Board.
He died of respiratory गिरफ़्तार related to उसके metastatic tumor on अक्तूबर 5, 2011.
Jobs received a number of honors और पब्लिक recognition लिये उसके influence in the technology and म्यूज़िक industries.
he has been referred to as `` legendary '', a `` futurist '' or बस `` दूरदर्शी '', and रै been described as the `` Father of the Digital Revolution '', a `` master of नवीनता '', और a `` डिज़ाइन perfectionist ''.

Roman numerals, the न्यूमेरिक प्रणाली in प्राचीन रोम, uses combinations of letters इससे the लैटिन alphabet to signify मान.
the numbers 1 to 10 can be expressed in रोमन numerals as follows:
and.
the Roman numeral प्रणाली is a cousin of Etruscan numerals.
Use of Roman numerals continued बाद the decline of the रोमन साम्राज्य.
From the 14th century on, Roman numerals began to be replaced in सबसे contexts by अधिक convenient Hindu-Arabic numerals ; however इस प्रक्रम थी क्रमिक, and the उपयोग of Roman numerals in some minor applications continues to this दिन.
प्रभावी Nuclear Charge Diagram
the प्रभावी नाभिकीय चार्ज ( प्रायः symbolize as or Z* ) is the net positive charge experienced by an इलेक्ट्रॉन in a multi-electron अणु.
the पद `` effective '' is प्रयुक्त क्युकी the shielding प्रभाव of negatively charged electrons prevents higher orbital electrons from experiencing the full नाभिकीय चार्ज by the repelling प्रभाव of inner-layer electrons.
The effective nuclear charge experienced by the outer शेल इलेक्ट्रॉन is also called the core charge.
it is possible to determine the शक्ति of the nuclear चार्ज by looking at the oxidation क्रमांक of the atom.
