the ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर नेशनल System of Interstate and Defense Highways ( commonly ज्ञात as the Interstate Highway System, Interstate Freeway प्रणाली, Interstate System, or simply the अंतरराज्यीय ) is a संजाल of freeways कि फ़ॉर्म a part of the नेशनल Highway प्रणाली of the संयुक्त States.
the प्रणाली is नामित for President ड्वाइट D. Eisenhower, who championed इसके formation.
Construction थी प्राधिकृत by the Federal Aid Highway Act of 1956, और the असली portion थी completed 35 सालो बाद.
the संजाल has since महरूम विस्तारित, और, it था a कुल लंबाई of, बनाना it the world 's second longest after China 's., about one-quarter of सब गाडी मील driven in the country use the अंतरराज्यीय प्रणाली.
The cost of construction रै महरूम अनुमानित at $ 425 billion ( in 2006 dollars ), बनाना it the `` largest public works program since the पिरामिडों ``.
the system has contributed in shaping the संयुक्त States into a संसार आर्थिक महाशक्ति and a अत्यधिक industrialized स्वदेश.
.eu is the country कोड top-level domain ( cctld ) लिये the European संघ ( EU ).
शुभारम्भ on 7 दिसम्बर 2005, the domain is available for संगठनों in और निवासियों of eu सदस्य states.
the TLD is administered by EURid, a consortium originally consisting of the नेशनल ccTLD registry operators of Belgium, Sweden, and Italy, joined बाद by the नेशनल रजिस्ट्री ऑपरेटर of the Czech Republic.
Trademark स्वामी यहूद समर्थ to submit registrations through a sunrise काल, in an प्रयत्न to prevent cybersquatting.
Full पंजीकरण started on 7 April 2006.
Meister means master in German ( as in निपुण craftsman, or as an honorific शीर्षक such as meister Eckhart ).
the शब्द is akin to maestro.
In खेल, Meister is प्रयुक्त for the वर्तमान नेशनल, यूरोपीय or संसार चैंपियन ( Deutscher meister, *europameister, weltmeister ).
Many आधुनिक day जर्मनी पुलिस forces use the title Meister.
दौरान the दूसरी World युद्ध, Meister was the highest enlisted rank of the ordnungspolizei.
meister रै been उधार into अंग्रेज़ी slang, where it is प्रयुक्त in compound nouns.
A person referred to as “meister” is एक जो रै extensive theoretical knowledge और practical skills in his profession, business, or some अन्य दयालु of work or कार्यकलाप.
For example, a “puzzle-meister” would be someone highly skilled at solving पहेलियाँ.
These neologisms sometimes have a sarcastic intent ( for उदाहरण, “stubble-meister” लिये किसी साथ a short, neat दाढ़ी or “crier-meister” for किसी who प्रायः cries ).
mighty Morphin Power रेंजरों is an American live-action children 's टेलीविज़न series परिचय teenagers साथ super-powers, आधारित on the 16th installment of the जापानी Super sentai franchise, kyōryū Sentai zyuranger.
Both the show और इसके related merchandise देखी unbridled overnight कामयाबी, बनने a स्टेपल of 1990s पॉप संस्कृति in mere महीने.
अंतर्गत the original नाम, `` mighty Morphin शक्ति रेंजरों '' the श्रेणी ran इससे 1993 to 1995 और spawned the feature फिल्मी mighty morphin शक्ति रेंजरों : the फिल्म.
The दूसरी and तीसरा seasons of the दिखाएँ खींचा on footage and तत्व from the Super Sentai श्रेणी gosei Sentai dairanger और निंजा sentai Kakuranger respectively, हालांकि the zyuranger costumes were स्टिल प्रयुक्त for the पाँच main Rangers और several regular खलनायक.
तभी the mecha और the kiba रेंजर वेशभूषा ( worn by the श्वेत रेंजर ) were retained इससे dairanger for the दूसरी ऋतु, जबकि तभी the mecha इससे kakuranger were featured in the third season.
However the kakuranger वेशभूषा यहूद later used for the शीर्षक characters of the mini-series, Mighty Morphin Alien Rangers.
the series was उत्पादित by MMPR प्रोडक्शन्स, distributed by saban Entertainment, और aired on फॉक्स बच्चे.
the दिखाएँ 's merchandise थी produced और वितरित by बंदाई entertainment.
In 1996, the series was rebranded as the Power रेंजरों franchise ; renaming the series प्रत्येक year बाद, and using वेशभूषा, props, and footage इससे subsequent Super Sentai श्रेणी, as well as बदलना the डाल and storyline.
जबकि an overarching storyline would continue जबतक Power Rangers खोया Galaxy, subsequent श्रेणी after mmpr are नहीं sequels or spin-offs in the traditional भाव.
In 2010, a re-version of mighty Morphin Power Rangers, with a नई लोगो, comic book-referenced ग्राफिक्स, and extra alternative special प्रभाव, was broadcast on ABC बच्चे, and बंदाई उत्पादित ब्रांड new toys to coincide with the श्रेणी.
Edgar allan पो ( born एडगर पो ; जनवरी 19, 1809 – अक्तूबर 7, 1849 ) was an American author, कवि, editor और literary critic, माना part of the अमरीकी रोमांटिक Movement.
Best ज्ञात for his किस्से of रहस्य and the macabre, Poe थी एक of the earliest American practitioners of the छोटी स्टोरी और is generally माना the आविष्कारक of the detective fiction genre.
He is further credited with contributing to the उभरते genre of विज्ञान fiction.
he थी the पहला well-known अमरीकी लेखक to कोशिश to earn a जीना through writing alone, resulting in a financially difficult जीवन and career.
he थी born as Edgar Poe in Boston, मैसाचुसेट्स ; he थी orphaned यंग जब उसके mother died shortly after his पिता abandoned the family.
पो थी taken in by जॉन और frances Allan, of Richmond, वर्जिनिया, but they never formally adopted उसे.
he attended the विश्वविद्यालयों of Virginia लिये one semester लकिन बाएँ due to कमी of money.
बाद enlisting in the Army और बाद failing as an officer 's cadet at West पाइंट, Poe parted तरीके साथ the Allans.
His प्रकाशन करियर began विनम्रतापूर्वक, with an anonymous संग्रहण of कविताएं, Tamerlane और अन्य कविताएं ( 1827 ), credited only to `` a Bostonian ''.
पो switched his focus to prose and खर्च the next several years working for literary जर्नल्स और periodicals, becoming known लिये his अपना style of साहित्यिक आलोचना.
उसके work forced him to move among अनेक शहरों, सहित बाल्टीमोर, फिलाडेल्फिया, and New York City.
In बाल्टीमोर in 1835, he married Virginia clemm, उसके 13-year-old cousin.
in January 1845 Poe प्रकाशित उसके poem, `` The रेवेन ``, to तत्काल कामयाबी.
His wife died of तपेदिक दो years after its प्रकाशन.
he began planning to produce his own journal, The penn ( बाद renamed The Stylus ), though he died before it could be produced.
on अक्तूबर 7, 1849, at age 40, Poe died in बाल्टीमोर ; the cause of उसके मौत is unknown और रै been variously attributed to alcohol, brain जमघट, हैजा, दवाएँ, heart disease, rabies, suicide, tuberculosis, और other एजेंटों.
पो and his works बहकावे literature in the United States और around the world, as well as in specialized fields, such as cosmology and cryptography.
Poe and उसके work appear throughout popular संस्कृति in साहित्य, म्यूज़िक, films, और television.
A क्रमांक of उसके homes are समर्पित संग्रहालय today.
the रहस्य लेखक of अमेरिका present an सालाना award known as the एडगर पुरस्कार लिये distinguished work in the रहस्य genre.
Lions हैं obligate carnivores ; वे आवश्यकता up to सात kilograms ( 15 lbs ) of meat प्रति दिन.
a major घटक of their आहार is the flesh of विशाल स्तनधारियों, like this अफ़्रीकी भैंस.
A carnivore ( ) अर्थ 'meat भक्षक ' ( Latin, caro meaning 'meat ' or 'flesh ' और vorare अर्थ 'to devour ' ) is an सजीव कि derives इसके energy और nutrient आवश्यकताएँ from a आहार consisting मुख्यतः or exclusively of animal tissue, whether through predation or scavenging.
Animals कि depend solely on एनिमल flesh लिये their nutrient आवश्यकताएँ are considered carnivores जबकि those that भी consume non-animal food are considered carnivores.
Omnivores भी consume both animal और non-animal food, and अलावा from the अधिक general परिभाषा, वहीँ is no clearly पारिभाषित अनुपात of संयंत्र to animal सामग्री कि would फर्क a facultative carnivore from an omnivore.
A carnivore कि sits at the top of the foodchain is an apex predator.
Plants कि capture और डाइजेस्ट कीट हैं पुकारा carnivorous plants.
similarly, fungi कि capture microscopic पशु हैं प्रायः called मांसाहारी fungi.
The FIFA World Cup, प्रायः simply the संसार Cup, is an international association फ़ुटबॉल प्रतियोगिता लडे by the वरिष्ठ मेन 's national टीमों of the सदस्यों of Fédération Internationale de Football संघ ( फीफा ), the खेल 's global governing body.
the चैंपियनशिप has महरूम awarded प्रत्येक चार years चूंकि the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1930, मगर in 1942 और 1946 जब it थी not आयोजित because of the Second संसार युद्ध.
The वर्तमान champions हैं स्पेन, who won the 2010 tournament.
the वर्तमान format of the टूर्नामेंट involves 32 teams competing लिये the title at venues within the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a काल of about a माह ; this phase is प्रायः पुकारा the World कप Finals.
A योग्यता phase, जिससे फिलहाल takes place over the preceding three सालो, is प्रयुक्त to determine which टीमों qualify for the tournament साथ with the मेजबान nation ( s ).
The 19 World Cup tournaments have been जीती by आठ different national teams.
Brazil have won five times, और they are the only टोली to have played in प्रत्येक टूर्नामेंट.
the अन्य संसार कप winners are इटली, साथ चार titles ; Germany, साथ three शीर्षक ; अर्जेंटीना and inaugural विजेता उरुग्वे, with two शीर्षक प्रत्येक ; and इंग्लैण्ड, France, and स्पेन, with एक शीर्षक each.
The संसार Cup is the संसार 's most widely viewed sporting event ; an estimated 715.1 लाख लोगों watched the फाइनल match of the 2006 FIFA World कप आयोजित in जर्मनी.
The अगला three संसार Cups will be hosted by Brazil in 2014, Russia in 2018, and क़तर in 2022.
Heroes is an अमरीकी विज्ञान fiction टेलीविज़न नाटक श्रेणी created by Tim क्रिंग that appeared on एनबीसी for four सीज़न from सितंबर 25, 2006 through February 8, 2010.
the series tells the stories of ordinary लोगों who discover superhuman abilities, and कैसा ये abilities take प्रभाव in the वर्ण ' lives.
the series emulates the aesthetic स्टाइल and storytelling of अमरीकी कॉमिक किताबे, using multi-episode story arcs कि निर्माण upon a larger, more encompassing arc.
the श्रेणी थी उत्पादित by Tailwind प्रोडक्शन्स in संघ with सार्वभौमिक मीडिया Studios.
it थी filmed primarily in Los Angeles, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
चार पूरा seasons aired, समाप्ति on February 8, 2010.
The critically acclaimed पहला season था a run of 23 एपीसोड and garnered an औसत of 14.3 लाख viewers in the United राज्य, receiving the उच्चतम rating लिये an एनबीसी drama प्रीमियर in पाँच सालो.
The second season of Heroes attracted an average of 13.1 लाख viewers in the u.S., and चिह्नित एनबीसी 's sole series among the top 20 क्रमित programs in total viewership लिये the 2007–2008 season.
Heroes रै earned a क्रमांक of पुरस्कार and nominations, सहित Primetime Emmy Awards, सुनहरी Globes, लोगों 's Choice पुरस्कार and अंग्रेजों Academy Television पुरस्कार.
An online एक्सटेंशन of the series, Heroes 360 अनुभव, later rebranded as Heroes evolutions, थी निर्मित to explore the Heroes ब्रह्मांड and provides insight into the दिखाएँ 's mythology.
अन्य official Heroes मीडिया शामिल मैगज़ीन, कार्रवाई figures, tie-in and इंटरैक्टिव websites, a मोबाईल game, a novel, clothing and अन्य merchandise.
in the fall of 2008, NBC डिजिटल Entertainment released a श्रेणी of online content for the summer, including more original वेब सामग्री, बेतार आईटीवी interactivity, ग्राफिक novels उपलब्धियाँ लिये mobile देखने और webisodes.
NBC announced Heroes रद्दीकरण on may 14, 2010.
afterward, the संजाल considered making a television खास इवेंट to conclude the series ; however, on September 9, 2010, NBC घोषित the decision to रोकें कोई further विकास of the नायक मताधिकार.
Tim क्रिंग then सुझाया कि the broad आधार of नायक storylines अनुमत लिये the franchise to वापसी for प्रशंसक, लकिन he did not बताएँ when or in what मीडिया स्वरूप.
On April 17, 2013, TV Line reported कि एमएसएन was in talks to revive the श्रेणी साथ a नई cast.
जॉन Pierpont `` J. P. ''
मॉर्गन ( अप्रैल 17, 1837 – कूच 31, 1913 ) थी an अमरीकी फाइनेंसर, banker, philanthropist and आर्ट कलेक्टर who वर्चस्व कॉरपोरेट finance and industrial consolidation during his time.
in 1892 Morgan arranged the merger of Edison General Electric और Thomson-Houston Electric Company to रूप सामान्य Electric.
After financing the सृष्टि of the संघीय स्टील कम्पनी, he merged in 1901 with the Carnegie Steel कम्पनी and several other steel और आयरन व्यवसायों, सहित Consolidated Steel और तार Company owned by विलियम Edenborn, to रूप the संयुक्त राज्य स्टील Corporation.
मॉर्गन died in Rome, Italy, in उसके नींद in 1913 at the आयु of 75, leaving his सौभाग्य and कारोबार to his बेटे, John Pierpont `` जोकर '' मॉर्गन, Jr., और bequeathing his mansion and विशाल किताब collections to The मॉर्गन पुस्तकालयों & संग्रहालय in नई यॉर्क.
At the height of Morgan 's करियर दौरान the early 1900s, he and उसके partners था financial निवेश in many large corporations and were accused by आलोचकों of controlling the nation 's ऊँची वित्त.
He निर्देशित the banking गठबन्धन कि रोका the दहशत of 1907.
He थी the अग्रणी फाइनेंसर of the Progressive Era, and उसके समर्पण to efficiency and modernization helped transform American कारोबार.
इस is a list of episodes of the टेलीविज़न series.
The episodes यहूद निर्देशित by Shigeru Ueda और उत्पादित by the yggdrasil Executive Committee जिससे शामिल xebec and Genco.
The प्लाट of the एपीसोड is set in टोकियो और घूमती around रिन asōgi, an immortal private investigator, as she explores the रहस्य of आधुनिक और near-future संसार और the अलौकिक कार्यक्रम that surround the fictional society of immortals जैसे herself.
There are विशाल समय गैप in the आतंरिक chronology between the first पाँच एपीसोड, ranging from एक to thirty सालो.
The छह episodes यहूद broadcast मासिक on AT-X channel in जापानी, between फ़रवरी 3 and जुलाई 6, 2008.
प्रत्येक episode is 45 minutes long.
Two टुकड़े of theme म्यूज़िक are used लिये the episodes : the खोलने theme `` Alsatia '' और the समाप्ति थीम `` कारण Disarray ''.
दोनो were composed and performed by the Japanese मेटल band Galneryus.
the series थी produced to commemorate the दसवाँ anniversary of the AT-X network it originally aired on.
Aerial फ़ोटो of fletc, where us डिजिटल forensics मानकों were विकसित in the 1980s and '90s
Digital forensics ( sometimes ज्ञात as डिजिटल forensic विज्ञान ) is a शाखा of forensic विज्ञान encompassing the recovery और investigation of material found in डिजिटल devices, प्रायः in संबंध to कंप्यूटर crime.
the पद डिजिटल forensics was originally used as a synonym लिये कंप्यूटर forensics लकिन रै विस्तारित to कवर छानबीन of सब devices सक्षम of storing digital आंकड़ा.
With roots in the निजी computing क्रान्ति of the late 1970s और जल्दी '80s, the discipline विकसित in a haphazard manner during the 1990s, and it was नहीं जबतक the early 21st century कि नेशनल नीतियों emerged.
Digital forensics investigations have a variety of अनुप्रयोग.
the सबसे आम is to support or refute a hypothesis before criminal or सिविल ( as part of the electronic डिस्कवरी process ) न्यायालयों.
forensics may also feature in the निजी सेक्टर ; such as during internal कॉरपोरेट investigations or intrusion investigation ( a विशेषज्ञ probe into the nature और extent of an unauthorized network intrusion ).
the technical पहलू of an investigation is विभाजित into several sub-branches, relating to the type of डिजिटल डिवाइस involved ; कंप्यूटर forensics, संजाल forensics, forensic data analysis and mobile device forensics.
the typical forensic प्रक्रम encompasses the seizure, forensic इमेजिंग ( अधिग्रहण ) and विश्लेषण of digital media और the production of a रपट into collected प्रमाण.
As खूब as identifying direct evidence of a अपराधों, डिजिटल forensics can be प्रयुक्त to attribute evidence to specific suspects, confirm alibis or कथन, determine intent, पहचानो स्त्रोत ( लिये example, in copyright मामले ), or authenticate documents.
Investigations are much broader in पैमाना than अन्य areas of forensic analysis ( जहाँ the usual उद्देश्य is to provide answers to a श्रेणी of simpler questions ) often involving complex time-lines or hypotheses.
A comparison of the chromaticities enclosed by कुछ color स्पेसेस.
a रंग मॉडल is an अमूर्त गणितीय model describing the way colors can be represented as tuples of numbers, typically as तीन or चार values or रंग components ( e.g. आरजीबी and CMYK are color models ).
however, a रंग model with no संबद्ध mapping फलन to an absolute रंग स्पेस is a more or less arbitrary color प्रणाली with no connection to कोई globally understood system of रंग interpretation.
adding a निश्चित मानचित्रण function between the color model और a निश्चित reference color स्पेस results in a definite `` पदचिह्न '' within the reference रंग स्पेस.
इस `` पदचिह्न '' is known as a gamut, and, in combination with the रंग मॉडल, defines a new रंग स्पेस.
For उदाहरण, Adobe आरजीबी and srgb हैं two different absolute रंग स्पेसेस, दोनो based on the आरजीबी model.
in the सबसे जेनेरिक sense of the definition ऊपर, रंग स्पेसेस can be defined बगैर the use of a रंग model.
These spaces, such as Pantone, हैं in प्रभाव a दिए set of names or संख्याएँ which हैं पारिभाषित by the अस्तित्व of a सम्बन्धित set of physical रंग swatches.
इस article focuses on the गणितीय मॉडल अवधारणा.
मजदूर दिन is an अमरीकी federal अवकाश observed on the पहला Monday in सितंबर, that celebrates the economic and social contributions of workers.
Life बीमे is a contract between an insured ( बीमे नीति होल्डर ) and an insurer, जहाँ the insurer वादे to अदा a designated beneficiary a sum of money ( the `` लाभ '' ) upon the मौत of the insured person.
depending on the अनुबंध, अन्य events such as terminal illness or नाजुक illness may भी ट्रिगर payment.
the नीति होल्डर typically pays a प्रीमियम, either regularly or as a lump योग.
अन्य खर्च ( ऐसे as अंत्येष्टि खर्च ) हैं also sometimes included in the लाभ.
Life नीतियों हैं legal contracts and the शर्तें of the अनुबंध describe the limitations of the insured events.
Specific exclusions हैं प्रायः written into the contract to सीमा the liability of the insurer ; common उदाहरण हैं claims relating to आत्महत्या, fraud, war, riot and सिविल commotion.
Life-based अनुबंध tend to पतन into दो प्रमुख categories:
Protection policies – designed to provide a benefit in the event of specified event, typically a lump योग payment.
A आम form of इस design is पद बीमे.
निवेश नीतियों – where the प्रमुख उद्देश्य is to सुकर the growth of पूंजी by नियमित or सिंगल premiums.
आम forms ( in the US ) are whole जीवन, universal जीवन and variable जीवन नीतियों.

mitzi gaynor Donahue ( born May 2, 1962 in Yorba लिंडा, Orange काउंटी, California ) is an American अभिनेत्री, भी credited and more popularly ज्ञात as Mitzi Kapture.
Kapture began her career in films, most of जिससे were not huge commercial successes.
She गई on to make a few television guest appearances ( MacGyver, 1st & टेन, और as a प्रतियोगी on the $ 100,000 Pyramid ) before she gained international एक्सपोज़र साथ her पहला प्रमुख television role as Sergeant रीता Lee Lance in the टेलीविज़न series रेशा stalkings.
kapture 's role as रीता, the other half of the two `` Sams '' लिये लगभग 5 years, cemented उसके लोकप्रियता.
युग्म साथ Rob Estes जो निभाई सार्जेंट क्रिस lorenzo, Kapture gained वैश्विक recognition साथ साथ उसके costar चूंकि the show थी ब्रॉडकास्ट in अनेक देशों.
सार्जेंट तलवार eventually became लेफ्टिनेंट तलवार by the समय Kapture बाएँ the श्रेणी in 1995 to have her first child Madison.
During her समय साथ the series, Kapture briefly sat in the निदेशक 's कुर्सी, लिये दो episodes.
She थी interviewed लिये the Silk stalkings Season 1 dvd which was वितरित by Anchor Bay entertainment and released in September 2004.
After a छोटी अंतराल from the screen following उसके निकास from रेशा stalkings, Kapture लौटे in 1997 to the छोटी स्क्रीन और यूएसए Network.
She played lead roles in दो यूएसए Pictures Originals telemovies, पूर्ण Crime ( आधारित on a सच्चा स्टोरी, भी called Hide and तलाश : the जोआन जेन्सेन Story ), which भी starred चमेली Guy और उसके अंगरक्षक.
वो later starred in a few अन्य स्वतंत्र film projects और theatre productions और था several television अतिथि दिखावे.
Kapture भी had a पुनरावर्ती भूमिका on Baywatch as Alexis ryker.
She निभाई Anita होजेस on the यंग और the बेचैन इससे 2002 through 2004, where she थी credited as mitzi Kapture donahue, और starred in the made-for-tv movie Night of आतंक जिससे premiered कूच 26, 2006 on Lifetime संजाल.
उसके latest is a supporting role in परमेश्वर 's Ears, released in 2007.
Kapture is the आधिकारिक हस्ती spokesperson for the Xeroderma Pigmentosum समाज.
The एक्सबॉक्स 360 is the दूसरी वीडियो game कंसोल विकसित by और produced लिये Microsoft and the successor to the Xbox.
The Xbox 360 competes साथ सोनी 's प्लेस्टेशन 3 and निन्टेंडो 's वी as part of the seventh पीढी of वीडियो खेल consoles.
As of सितंबर 30, 2012, 70 लाख Xbox 360 consoles have महरूम sold विश्वव्यापी.
the Xbox 360 was officially unveiled on एमटीवी on may 12, 2005, with विस्तृत लॉन्च and game सूचना divulged बाद that month at the इलेक्ट्रॉनिक entertainment एक्सपो ( E3 ).
the कंसोल sold आउट completely upon रिलीज in all regions except in जापानी.
अनेक major features of the Xbox 360 are its एकीकृत Xbox Live सेवा that allows खिलाड़ी to compete online ; download आर्केड खेल, खेल demos, trailers, tv shows, म्यूज़िक और फिल्मों ; और इसके खिड़कियाँ मीडिया बीच मल्टीमीडिया सामर्थ्य.
the एक्सबॉक्स Live also offers access to विभिन्न ( प्रायः region-specific ) third-party media streaming अनुप्रयोग.
at उनके e3 presentation on June 14, 2010, microsoft घोषित a redesigned Xbox 360 कि would ship on the वही दिन.
The redesigned console is slimmer than the पिछला एक्सबॉक्स 360 मॉडल and सुविधाएँ एकीकृत 802.11 b/g/n Wi-Fi, toslink s/pdif optical audio आउटपुट, पाँच usb 2.0 ports ( compared to the three इससे पुरानी संस्करण ) and a खास AUX port.
पुरानी models of the Xbox 360 have चूंकि been discontinued.
the पहला नई कंसोल to be released features a 250 gb hard ड्राइव, जबकि a बाद, कम महंगी SKU सुविधाएँ 4 GB आतंरिक भंडार.

A backpack ( also पुकारा रूकसाक, knapsack, packsack, पैक ) is, in its simplest form, a cloth sack carried on एक 's वापस और secured with दो straps that go over the कन्धों, लकिन there can be अपवाद.
Lightweight प्रकार of backpacks are sometimes worn on only one कंधे डोरी.
Backpacks are प्रायः preferred to हैंडबैग for carrying heavy loads or carrying कोई sort of उपकरण, because of the सीमित capacity to carry heavy weights for long अवधि of समय in the hands.
Large backpacks, used to carry loads over 10 kg ( 22 lbs ), usually offload the largest part ( up to परिचय 90 % ) of उनके वज़न onto padded hip बेल्ट, leaving the shoulder straps मुख्यतः लिये stabilising the लोड.
इस improves the संभावित to carry भारी loads, as the hips are stronger than the shoulders, और भी increases agility और संतुलन, since the load यात्राएँ nearer the wearer 's own center of द्रव्यमान.
In ancient टाइम्स, the backpack थी used as a अर्थात् to carry the शिकारी 's larger खेल and अन्य types of prey and as a रास्ता of easier हस्तांतरण for अन्य सामग्री.
In the cases of larger hunts, the hunters होता dismember उनके शिकार and distribute the टुकड़े of the एनिमल around, प्रत्येक एक packing the meat into many wrappings और तब into bags which वे placed on to their backs.
the थैला itself was made up of अलग animal छुपा and स्किन ( depending on what sorts of पशु were in the क्षेत्रफल ) and sewn together by the आंतों of कहा पशु, which were woven साथ tightly to मेक a sturdy thread-like material.
मैक्सिको ( ; ; ), officially the संयुक्त मैक्सिकन States ( ), is a federal संवैधानिक गणतंत्र in North America.
It is bordered on the north by the संयुक्त States ; on the दक्षिण and west by the Pacific समंदर ; on the southeast by ग्वाटेमाला, Belize, and the Caribbean समुद्र ; और on the east by the गल्फ of मैक्सिको.
covering almost दो million square kilometres ( over 760,000 sq mi ), मैक्सिको is the fifth largest देश in the Americas by कुल क्षेत्रफल and the 13th largest independent nation in the world.
With an estimated जनसांख्यिकी of over 113 million, it is the संसार 's eleventh सबसे populous देश and the most populous Spanish-speaking country.
Mexico is a federation comprising thirty-one राज्य और a संघीय ज़िला, the capital नगर.
in pre-Columbian मैक्सिको अनेक cultures matured into advanced सभ्यताओं such as the Olmec, the toltec, the teotihuacan, the zapotec, the माया और the Aztec पहले पहला contact with europeans.
In 1521, स्पेन conquered और colonized the territory from its base in méxico-tenochtitlan, which was administered as the Viceroyalty of नई Spain.
इस territory would eventually become मैक्सिको following मान्यता of the उपनिवेश 's स्वतंत्रता in 1821.
The post-independence काल थी characterized by आर्थिक अस्थिरता, the Mexican-American युद्ध और territorial cession to the United राज्य, a सिविल युद्ध, दो empires और a घरेलू तानाशाही.
The latter led to the Mexican Revolution in 1910, जिससे culminated with the promulgation of the 1917 Constitution और the emergence of the country 's वर्तमान political system.
चुनावों held in जुलाई 2000 चिह्नित the पहला समय that an opposition पार्टी जीती the प्रेसिडेंसी from the संस्थागत क्रांतिकारी Party.
Since 2006 the country रै been in the midst of a ड्रग war which has caused 60,000 मौतों.
मैक्सिको has one of the संसार 's largest economies, और is considered दोनो a क्षेत्रीय power and मध्य power.
in जोड, मैक्सिको was the पहला Latin American member of the संगठन लिये आर्थिक Co-operation और Development oecd ( चूंकि 1994 ), और considered an upper-middle income country by the संसार Bank.
Mexico is माना a newly industrialized country and an emerging power.
it रै the fourteenth largest नाममात्र जीडीपी and the eleventh largest जीडीपी by खरीदना power पैरिटी.
The economy is strongly linked to those of its North American फ़्री Trade Agreement ( nafta ) साझेदार, विशेषकर the संयुक्त राज्य of America.
Mexico बाँधने छठे in the संसार और first in the Americas by क्रमांक of UNESCO World विरासत Sites with 31, and in 2007 थी the tenth सबसे visited country in the world साथ 21.4 million अंतरराष्ट्रीय arrivals per year.
Babe Ruth holds the एमएलबी career slugging प्रतिशत रिकार्ड (.690 ).
In baseball आंकडे, slugging percentage ( abbreviated slg ) is a लोकप्रिय measure of the शक्ति of a hitter.
it is calculated as कुल bases विभाजित by at bats :
where ab is the क्रमांक of at-bats for a दिए player, and 1B, 2b, 3b, और hr are the क्रमांक of singles, युगल, तिगुना, and घर रनों, क्रमशः.
Walks are specifically excluded from this calculation.
For example, in 1920, बेब रुथ निभाई उसके पहला season लिये the नई यॉर्क यांकीज़.
In 458 at bats, रुथ had 172 हिट्स, comprising 73 singles, 36 doubles, 9 triples, और 54 घर runs, which brings the total आधार गिनती to ( 73 × 1 ) + ( 36 × 2 ) + ( 9 × 3 ) + ( 54 × 4 ) = 388.
His total क्रमांक of bases ( 388 ) विभाजित by उसके कुल at-bats ( 458 ) is.847, उसके slugging प्रतिशत लिये the ऋतु.
The next साल he slugged.846, और these records went unbroken until 2001, जब बैरी bonds हासिल 411 bases in 476 at-bats, bringing his slugging percentage to.863, बेमेल since.
is a role-playing वीडियो game विकसित और प्रकाशित by वर्गाकार ( अभी वर्गाकार Enix ) for the सुपर Nintendo entertainment प्रणाली in 1995.
Chrono ट्रिगर 's विकास टोली शामिल three designers that वर्गाकार उतावले the `` Dream Team '' : Hironobu Sakaguchi, the निर्माता of Square 's Final काल्पनिक series ; Yuji Horii, a freelance designer and creator of एनिक्स 's popular Dragon क्वेस्ट series ; and अकिरा toriyama, a freelance manga artist famed लिये his कार्य साथ ड्रैगन Quest और Dragon Ball.
Kazuhiko Aoki produced the game, masato Kato wrote सबसे of the plot, जबकि composer yasunori Mitsuda scored most of the game before falling बीमार and deferring बाकी ट्रैक्स to Final Fantasy composer nobuo Uematsu.
The game 's story फ़ॉलो a समूह of adventurers who travel through समय to prevent a वैश्विक catastrophe.
Square re-released a ported version by tose in Japan for सोनी 's PlayStation in 1999, later repackaged साथ a फाइनल Fantasy iv port as फाइनल Fantasy क्रॉनिकल्स in 2001 for the North American मार्केट.
A थोड़ा enhanced Chrono Trigger थी released for the Nintendo DS on नवम्बर 25, 2008, in उत्तर अमेरिका and जापानी, and went on sale in Australia on February 3, 2009 and in यूरोपीय on February 6, 2009.
The game was never released in PAL territories before the निन्टेंडो DS संस्करण.
chrono Trigger was a critical और वाणिज्यिक success upon रिलीज and is considered today to be एक of the महानतम वीडियो games of all समय.
निन्टेंडो शक्ति magazine वर्णित पहलुओं of chrono ट्रिगर as revolutionary, सहित its multiple endings, plot-related sidequests focusing on character विकास, अद्वितीय बैटल प्रणाली, and detailed ग्राफिक्स.
Chrono Trigger थी the तीसरा best-selling game of 1995, and the game 's SNES और PlayStation iterations have shipped 2.65 million नक़ल as of March 2003.
The version लिये the निन्टेंडो DS बेची 790,000 नक़ल as of कूच 2009.
Chrono ट्रिगर was भी ported to mobile phones, आभासी कंसोल, the प्लेस्टेशन संजाल ( तभी in the यूएसए ), iOS devices, and Android devices.
बकरी चीज
बकरी cheese, or chèvre ( इससे the French शब्द for बकरी ), is चीज बना आउट of the milk of goats.
अतिताप is elevated body temperature due to विफल thermoregulation that occurs when a body produces or absorbs अधिक heat than it dissipates.
Extreme तापमान elevation तब becomes a चिकित्सा आपात requiring immediate उपचार to prevent विकलांगता or death.
The most common कल्याणकारी include ऊष्मा स्ट्रोक and adverse reactions to दवाएँ.
the पूर्व is an अधि temperature elevation caused by एक्सपोज़र to excessive ऊष्मा, or combination of heat and humidity, कि overwhelms the heat-regulating mechanisms.
The latter is a अपेक्षाकृत rare side effect of many दवाएँ, particularly those that affect the central nervous system.
Malignant अतिताप is a विरल complication of कुछ प्रकार of general एनेस्थीसिया.
Hyperthermia can भी be deliberately induced using drugs or चिकित्सा डिवाइस और may be used in the treatment of कुछ kinds of कर्कट and other शर्तें, most commonly in conjunction with radiotherapy.
Hyperthermia differs इससे ज्वर in कि the body 's temperature set point remains unchanged.
the opposite is hypothermia, जिससे occurs जब the तापमान बूंदें below that required to maintain सामान्य चयापचय.
बेलीज़, is a देश located on the northeastern coast of Central अमेरिका.
it is the तभी देश in the क्षेत्रफल where English is the आधिकारिक language, although Kriol and Spanish are अधिक commonly बोला.
Belize is bordered on the उत्तर by मैक्सिको, to the दक्षिण और west by Guatemala और to the ईस्ट by the Caribbean समुद्र.
Its mainland is about long और चौड़ी.
With of land and a जनसांख्यिकी of only 312,698 inhabitants ( 2010 जनसांख्यिकी ), बेलीज़ possesses the lowest जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व in सेंट्रल America.
the देश 's जनसांख्यिकी growth रेट of 3.15 % ( 2012 est. ) is the दूसरी उच्चतम in the प्रदेश और एक of the highest in the western hemisphere.
बेलीज़ 's प्रचुरता of terrestrial और marine प्रजाति, और its diversity of ecosystems दे it a key place भीतर the globally significant Mesoamerican Biological corridor.
Belize has a diverse society, comprising many संस्कृतियों and languages.
It is the only nation in the प्रदेश with a British colonial विरासत, लकिन as a भाग of the Western caribbean मण्डल, it भी साझा a आम विरासत with the fellow Anglophone Caribbean देशों.
In general, बेलीज़ is माना to be a Central अमरीकी और Caribbean nation साथ दमदार ties to both the Caribbean और लैटिन America.
Belize is a member of the Caribbean Community ( caricom ), the Community of Latin American और caribbean राज्य ( celac ), और Central American Integration System ( सिका ).
बेलीज़ is known for its September जश्न, और is the जन्मस्थान of चबाने गम और punta चट्टान.
the `` Betsy Ross '' flag
A `` Betsy रॉस '' flag उड़ती outside San Francisco नगर Hall
The बेट्सी रॉस flag is an जल्दी डिज़ाइन of the ध्वज of the United States, popularly attributed to बेट्सी Ross, using the आम motifs of प्रत्यावर्ती red-and-white striped फ़ील्ड with five-pointed stars in a ब्लू canton.
the ध्वज थी designed during the अमरीकी क्रान्ति और सुविधाएँ 13 सितारों to represent the original 13 colonies.
The distinctive विशेषता of the रॉस flag is the arrangement of the सितारों in a वृत्त.
Although the Betsy Ross स्टोरी is accepted by सबसे अमेरिकी, some ध्वज इतिहासकारों and revisionists do नहीं accept the Betsy Ross डिज़ाइन as the first अमरीकी flag.
according to the परंपरागत खाता, the original flag थी बना in June 1776, when a छोटी committee—including जार्ज Washington, Robert Morris और relative George रॉस —visited Betsy and discussed the need for a new American flag.
Betsy स्वीकृत the जॉब to manufacture the flag, altering the committee 's डिज़ाइन by replacing the six-pointed सितारों साथ five-pointed stars.
While the बेट्सी रॉस legend is questionable, the flag design is ज्ञात to have been in use by 1777 ; अल्फ्रेड B. Street described it at the आत्मसमर्पण of सामान्य burgoyne और समझा the circle of सितारों to represent equality among the अमरीकी states.
It is one of the oldest संस्करण of u.S. flags known to exist ; जबकि it is not the oldest surviving ध्वज centuries in cloth रूप, इसके likeness appears on पुरानी physical relics, namely, the contemporary battlefield paintings by जॉन trumbull and चार्ल्स Willson peale.
They depict the गोलाकार स्टार व्यवस्था होने flown इससे जलयान masts and अनेक other स्थान, and यूँ provide the first ज्ञात ऐतिहासिक documentation of the ध्वज 's रूप.
the मुहर of the U.S. विभाग of Veterans Affairs uses the Betsy रॉस ध्वज to represent सेवा to all दिग्गजों इससे the American क्रान्ति to the उपस्थित day.
The Betsy Ross design of 13-star us ध्वज has been featured in many लोकप्रिय artworks ( sometimes inaccurately, as in Washington Crossing the डेलावेयर ) और films, ऐसे as the 1960 version of pollyanna.
the ध्वज continues to be एक of the सबसे popular प्रतीकों of the American Revolution.
a purr is a ध्वनि बना by सब प्रजाति of felids और is a part of बिल्ली संचार.
It varies between बिल्लियों ( लिये example by loudness and टोन ), और from species to प्रजाति, लकिन can be characterized as a tonal buzzing.
the पद `` purring '' रै महरूम used liberally in साहित्य, and it has been claimed that viverrids ( civet, mongoose, genet ), bears, badgers, hyaenas ( et cetera ) purr.
Other animals कि have been said to purr are खरगोश, squirrels, गिनी pigs, tapirs, ring-tailed lemurs, हाथियों, raccoons और gorillas while eating.
However, using a सख्त definition of purring कि निरन्तर sound उत्पादन जरूर alternate between pulmonic egressive और ingressive airstream ( and प्रायः go on for मिनट्स ), पीटर्स ( 2002 ), in an विस्तृत पुनर्विलोकन of the वैज्ञानिक literature, reached the conclusion कि until तब only ‘purring cats’ ( फ़ेलिडाए ) and two प्रजाति of genets, Genetta tigrina, और most likely also genetta genetta, had महरूम प्रलेखित to purr.
the platypus ( Ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic स्तनधारी endemic to eastern Australia, including तस्मानिया.
साथ साथ the चार species of echidna, it is one of the पाँच extant species of monotremes, the only स्तनधारियों कि lay अंडे instead of giving जनम.
It is the एकमात्र living representative of its परिवार ( Ornithorhynchidae ) और genus ( Ornithorhynchus ), हालांकि a number of related species have been मिला in the चट्टान record.
the unusual रूप of इस egg-laying, बतख -billed, beaver -tailed, otter -footed स्तनधारी मनोरथ European naturalists when वे first encountered it, with some considering it an elaborate धोखाधड़ी.
it is एक of the few विषैला स्तनधारियों, the पुरूष platypus having a spur on the hind पैर that delivers a venom सक्षम of causing कठोर pain to इंसानो.
the unique features of the platypus make it an important विषय in the पढ़ाई of विकासवादी biology और a recognisable and iconic symbol of Australia ; it रै appeared as a शुभंकर at नेशनल events and is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent सिक्का.
The platypus is the एनिमल emblem of the state of New South Wales.
Until the जल्दी 20th सदी, it थी hunted for इसके फर, but it is अभी protected throughout इसके दायरा.
हालांकि captive प्रजनन programmes have had तभी सीमित कामयाबी and the platypus is vulnerable to the effects of प्रदूषण, it is not अंतर्गत कोई immediate threat.
St. Elizabeth is a गाँव in Miller काउंटी, मिसौरी, United States.
the population was 336 at the 2010 census.
Wilton is a census-designated प्लेस ( cdp ) in Sacramento काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, संयुक्त राज्य.
it is भाग of the Sacramento – Arden-Arcade – roseville Metropolitan Statistical Area.
the population was 5,363 at the 2010 census, up from 4,551 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
in human-computer बातचीत, cut and paste and नक़ल और paste are related कमांड कि offer a user-interface बातचीत तकनीक for transferring text, data, files or objects इससे a सोर्स to a destination.
सबसे ubiquitously, users आवश्यकता the ability to काटें and paste भाग of मैदान text.
The cut command removes the selected data इससे its original position, जबकि the copy command creates a नकल ; in दोनो मामले the selected data is लगाई in a clipboard.
The आंकड़ा in the clipboard is later inserted in the स्थिति जहाँ the paste कमांड is जारी.
the command names हैं an इंटरफ़ेस रूपक based on the physical procedure used in पाण्डुलिपि संपादन to बनाएँ a पेज layout.
इस बातचीत तकनीक रै बंद associations साथ सम्बन्धित techniques in graphical उपयोक्ता interfaces कि उपयोग इंगित devices such as a computer mouse ( by खीचें और बूँद, लिये उदाहरण ).
Economic अनुक्रम मात्रा is the order मात्रा कि minimizes total inventory holding लागत और ordering costs.
It is one of the oldest शास्त्रीय उत्पादन scheduling models.
the फ्रेमवर्क प्रयुक्त to determine इस order मात्रा is also known as barabas eoq Model or Barabas सूत्र.
The मॉडल थी विकसित by Ford W. हैरिस in 1913, but R. H. Wilson, a सलाहकार जो applied it extensively, is दिए क्रेडिट for his in-depth विश्लेषण.
स्टीफन `` Stevie '' Ray vaughan ( अक्तूबर 3, 1954 – August 27, 1990 ) was an अमरीकी guitarist, singer-songwriter, and record producer.
Often referred to by उसके initials SRV, Vaughan is बेहतरीन known as a founding सदस्य और leader of दोगुना ट्रबल.
साथ with वादक क्रिस Layton and bassist Tommy शैनन, they ignited the blues पुनरुद्धार of the 1980s.
साथ a career spanning सात सालो, Vaughan and दोगुना ट्रबल consistently sold आउट कॉन्सर्ट जबकि their albums अक्सर went gold.
he was born and raised in Dallas, Texas, और for a छोटी काल of समय lived in ग्राहम, टेक्सास.
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan, Vaughan started playing the गिटार at आयु सात and formed several bands कि occasionally performed in local nightclubs.
At आयु 17, he dropped out of ऊँची school और moved to ऑस्टिन to further pursue his musical करियर, joining groups such as Krackerjack, the nightcrawlers, and the Cobras.
in 1977, he formed Triple Threat revue, a band that eventually विकसित into Double ट्रबल और regularly performed around Austin.
in 1982, Vaughan और दोगुना Trouble performed at the Montreux जैज़ पर्व in Switzerland, catching the ध्यान of musicians दाउद बोवी और जैक्सन browne.
बोवी asked Vaughan to play on उसके आगामी studio album Let 's Dance, जबकि Browne offered the बैंड फ़्री use of his personal स्टुडियो in Los एंजिल्स to रिकार्ड an एल्बम.
In March 1983, vaughan and Double Trouble were हस्ताक्षरित to Epic रिकॉर्ड by veteran record producer जॉन Hammond sr. and released उनके debut एल्बम, Texas बाढ़ in जून of that साल.
बाद कामयाब touring, the group released the एल्बम, could n't स्टैंड the मौसम ( 1984 ) and Soul to Soul ( 1985 ), the latter of which featured नई keyboardist रीज़ wynans.
हालांकि उसके करियर had progressed सफलतापूर्वक, vaughan checked into a पुनर्वास हॉस्पिटल in Atlanta, Georgia to give up a cocaine and दारू habit and returned to touring साथ the बैंड.
In June 1989, in कदम थी released और अर्जित them a Grammy Award for बेहतरीन Contemporary ब्लूज़ Performance.
On अगस्त 27, 1990, vaughan was killed in a हेलीकाप्टर क्रैश following a performance in ईस्ट ट्रॉय, विस्कॉन्सिन.
vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet तीव्र style थी निकला इससे a variety of musical genres.
he was influenced by blues musicians सहित Albert King, फ्रेडी King, Otis Rush, और muddy waters, और चट्टान guitarists ऐसे as Jimi Hendrix और lonnie mack.
उसके guitar playing reflected the क्लासिक ब्लूज़ and pentatonic तराजू.
He has प्राप्त wide नाजुक recognition for उसके गिटार playing, ranking at # 6 on Rolling पत्थरों सूची of `` 100 महानतम guitarists '' in 2011.
He was posthumously inducted into the Blues Hall of Fame in 2000 and a memorial प्रतिमा was erected in Austin 's Auditorium Shores पार्क.
Stevie Ray vaughan is widely माना to be one of the महानतम संगीतकारों to आइये from the state of Texas.
The लास Vegas स्ट्रिप World of coca-cola संग्रहालय in 2003
coca-cola is a कार्बोनेटेड soft drink sold in stores, रेस्तरां, और वेंडिंग मशीने in प्रत्येक देश मगर क्यूबा और North Korea.
it is उत्पादित by the Coca-Cola कम्पनी of अटलांटा, जॉर्जिया, और is often referred to बस as कोक ( a पंजीकृत trademark of The coca-cola Company in the United States since March 27, 1944 ).
originally intended as a patent medicine when it थी invented in the late 19th century by जॉन pemberton, coca-cola थी bought out by बिजनेसमैन Asa Griggs candler, whose marketing tactics led Coke to इसके dominance of the world soft-drink मार्केट throughout the 20th century.
the company produces concentrate, which is then बेची to licensed coca-cola bottlers throughout the world.
The bottlers, जो hold territorially विशेष अनुबंध साथ the कम्पनी, उपज समाप्त product in डिब्बे and बोतलों from the concentrate in संयोजन with filtered water and sweeteners.
The bottlers then sell, वितरित और merchandise coca-cola to retail स्टोर्स and वेंडिंग मशीने.
ऐसे bottlers शामिल coca-cola Enterprises, जिससे is the largest single Coca-Cola bottler in उत्तर America and western Europe.
The coca-cola कम्पनी भी sells concentrate for soda fountains to major रेस्तरां and food service वितरकों.
The Coca-Cola कम्पनी has, on occasion, introduced other कोला drinks under the कोक ब्रांड नाम.
the most common of these is आहार कोक, with अन्य सहित caffeine-free coca-cola, आहार Coke caffeine-free, coca-cola Cherry, Coca-Cola Zero, coca-cola Vanilla, and special versions with lemon, lime or कॉफी.
आधारित on Interbrand 's best वैश्विक ब्रांड 2011, coca-cola थी the world 's सबसे मूल्यवान brand.
बैरी लुई Larkin ( born April 28, 1964 ) is a retired Major League बेसबॉल player.
Larkin played shortstop for the सिनसिनाटी Reds from 1986 to 2004 और थी one of the pivotal खिलाड़ी on the 1990 Reds ' World श्रेणी चैंपियनशिप team.
larkin was elected to the नेशनल Baseball हॉल of Fame in January 2012 और थी inducted on July 22.
Larkin is माना one of the top players of his era, जीतना नौ चांदी slugger awards और तीन सुनहरा दस्ताने awards.
He was चयनित to the Major लीग all-star Game twelve times, और थी निर्वाचित the 1995 National लीग सबसे Valuable Player.
Brasília ( ) is the संघीय पूंजी of ब्राज़ील and the seat of government of the Federal ज़िला.
Administratively, the city is स्तिथ in the संघीय District which is in the Central-West Region.
Physically, it is located in the ब्राज़ीलियाई Highlands.
it has a population of परिचय 2,562,963 ( 3,716,996 in the महानगर area ) as of the 2008 IBGE estimate, बनाना it the चौथी largest city in ब्राज़ील.
However, as a महानगर area, it बाँधने lower at छठे in जनसांख्यिकी.
Brasília is the largest नगर in the संसार कि did not मौजूद at the शुरूआत of the 20th century.
brasília रै the पांचवां largest GDP among Latin अमरीकी शहरों and the तीसरा in Brazil.
at around r $ 62,000 ब्राज़ीलियाई reais ( equal to approximately $ 30,900 US डॉलर or €23,000 euros ), the city 's per capita आय is the highest among ब्राज़ील 's largest cities.
as the नेशनल capital, brasília is the seat of सब तीन शाखाओं of the संघीय government of ब्राज़ील.
the नगर also hosts the headquarters of many ब्राज़ीलियाई कंपनियाँ.
Planning policies ऐसे as the location of residential इमारतें around expansive शहरी areas, as well as भवन the नगर around large avenues and dividing it into sectors, have sparked a बहस and प्रतिबिंब on जीवन in बिग शहरों in the 20th century.
The नगर 's design divides it into numbered ब्लॉक as well as sectors लिये specified क्रियाएँ, ऐसे as the होटल Sector, the Banking सेक्टर or the Embassy Sector.
Brasília hosts 124 foreign embassies.
the city was planned और विकसित in 1956 साथ lúcio कोस्टा as the principal शहरी planner, Oscar niemeyer as the प्रिंसिपल architect और Roberto burle मार्क्स as the लैंडस्केप designer.
brasilia is in the युनेस्को 's संसार hertitage List due to its architecture.
on अप्रैल 22, 1960, it formally became ब्राज़ील 's नेशनल capital.
Viewed इससे above, the main portion of the नगर resembles an वायुयान or a butterfly.
the नगर is commonly referred to as पूंजी संघीय, or बस BSB.
Residents of brasília हैं ज्ञात as brasilienses or candangos ( the latter referring to those not born in the नगर लकिन who migrated वहीँ after it was established ).
in local उपयोग, the word `` brasília '' usually refers only to the पहला प्रशासनिक प्रदेश ( ra I ) भीतर the संघीय ज़िला ( Distrito संघीय ), जहाँ the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण सरकारी इमारतें हैं स्तिथ.
brasília has a unique औकात in ब्राज़ील, as it is an प्रशासनिक प्रभाग rather than a legal municipality like nearly सब शहरों in ब्राज़ील.
nationally, the पद is almost always प्रयुक्त synonymously with the Federal ज़िला, which constitutes an indivisible federative ईकाई, analogous to a state.
Several `` उपग्रह cities '' exist जिससे हैं also part of the Federal ज़िला.
Brasília अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र is the main विमानक्षेत्र in Brasília, connecting the पूंजी to सब प्रमुख ब्राज़ीलियाई शहरों and many international destinations.
It is the तीसरा सबसे महत्वपूर्ण airport in ब्राज़ील, in शर्तें of passengers and वायुयान आंदोलनों.
personifications of Germany, फ़्रांस, Russia, austria-hungary, and the संयुक्त किंगडम attempting to रखना the lid on the simmering cauldron of imperialist and राष्ट्रवादी tensions in the Balkans to prevent a general European war.
They were successful in 1912 और 1913 लकिन किया not succeed in in 1914.
The causes of संसार युद्ध i, which began in central Europe in late जुलाई 1914 और समाप्त in 1918, included अनेक factors, such as the विरोध and hostility of the चार decades leading up to the युद्ध.
Militarism, alliances, imperialism, and राष्ट्रवाद निभाई प्रमुख roles in the conflict as well.
the immediate origins of the युद्ध, however, lay in the निर्णय taken by कूटनीतिज्ञों और सेनापतियों during the Crisis of 1914, casus belli for जिससे थी the assassination of archduke फ्रांज Ferdinand ( the Archduke of ऑस्ट्रिया हंगेरियाई ) and his wife Sophie by gavrilo princip, an irredentist serb.
The संकट आए बाद a long and मुश्किल series of diplomatic clashes between the ग्रेट शक्तियां ( इटली, France, Germany, the British Empire, the austria-hungarian साम्राज्य and रूस ) over यूरोपीय and colonial मुद्दे in the decade before 1914 कि had left tensions ऊँची.
In फेरे ये राजनयिक clashes can be traced to changes in the संतुलन of power in Europe since 1867.
The more immediate cause लिये the युद्ध was तनाव over territory in the balkans.
Austria-Hungary competed with Serbia और रूस लिये territory and influence in the region और they pulled the rest of the ग्रेट शक्तियां into the conflict through their विभिन्न alliances और treaties.
हालांकि the chain of कार्यक्रम unleashed by the हत्या triggered the war, the war 's origins go deeper, involving national राजनीती, cultures, अर्थशास्त्र, और a complex web of alliances and counterbalances that था developed between the विभिन्न European शक्तियां चूंकि 1870.
कुछ of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण long term or structural causes हैं : the विकास of राष्ट्रवाद across Europe, unresolved territorial विवादों, an intricate system of alliances, the perceived breakdown of the संतुलन of शक्ति in Europe, convoluted और fragmented governance, the बाहें races of the previous दशकों, पिछला सैन्य planning, imperial और colonial rivalry for wealth, power और prestige, और economic and military rivalry in उद्योग और trade – e.g., the Pig युद्ध between Austria and Serbia.
अन्य causes कि आए into खेल दौरान the diplomatic संकट कि preceded the युद्ध शामिल misperceptions of intent ( e.g., the German belief कि the संयुक्त Kingdom होता remain न्यूट्रल ) और देरी और misunderstandings in diplomatic संचार.
the various categories of स्पष्टीकरण for World War i correspond to अलग historians ' overall विधि.
Most historians और popular टीकाकारों शामिल causes इससे अधिक than एक श्रेणी of स्पष्टीकरण to provide a rounded account of the causes of the war.
the deepest भेद among ये accounts is between stories that see it as the inevitable और predictable निष्कर्ष of निश्चित कारकों, and those कि describe it as an मनमानी और unfortunate mistake.
in attributing कल्याणकारी for the war, historians और academics था to सौदे साथ an unprecedented flood of memoirs and आधिकारिक documents, released as each country involved tried to avoid दोष for starting the war.
Early releases of सूचना by सरकारें, विशेषकर those released लिये use by the `` Commission on the Responsibility of the Authors of the युद्ध '' were दिखाया to be अधूरी and पक्षपातपूर्ण.
In जोड some दस्तावेज़, especially diplomatic cables between रूस and फ़्रांस, यहूद found to have been doctored.
भी in later decades however, जब much more सूचना had been released, historians इससे the same संस्कृति have महरूम दिखाया to come to differing conclusions on the causes of the war.
जॉनसन 's new chart of नेशनल emblems, प्रकाशित c. 1868.
the विशाल flags दिखाया in the corners are the 37-star ध्वज of the United States ( flown 1867-1877 ), the royal Standard of the संयुक्त Kingdom, the Russian Imperial Standard, और the French tricolore with inset Imperial त्रिभुज.
Various other flags flown by जहाजों हैं दिखाया.
the Flag of क्यूबा is labelled `` क्यूबन ( so called ) ``.
The Chinese dragon on the ध्वज of चीन थी drawn mistakenly as a पश्चिमी ड्रैगन.
a नेशनल ध्वज is a flag कि symbolizes a country.
The ध्वज is flown by the सरकारी, लकिन usually can also be flown by नागरिकों of the देश.
Both पब्लिक and निजी इमारतें ऐसे as schools और courthouses may मक्खी the नेशनल ध्वज.
In some देशों, the national ध्वज are only flown इससे non-military इमारतें on निश्चित flag days.
वहीँ are three पृथक प्रकार of नेशनल ध्वज लिये use on land, और तीन for उपयोग at समुद्र, हालांकि many countries उपयोग identical डिजाइन for several ( और sometimes all ) of these प्रकार of ध्वज.
the American सिविल War ( ACW ), also ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the Civil युद्ध ( see नामकरण ), थी a सिविल युद्ध fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य that घोषित उनके secession and formed the Confederate राज्य of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had इसके उत्पत्ति in the issue of slavery, especially the extension of गुलामी into the पश्चिमी territories.
Foreign शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene.
बाद चार सालो of bloody कॉम्बैट that बाएँ over 600,000 सैनिको dead and destroyed much of the दक्षिण 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, गुलामी was abolished, and the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल एकता and guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed स्लेव began.
in the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by अब्राहम lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त States ' territories.
Lincoln won, but पहले his उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन and the आवक republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address घोषित उसके प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate सिविल युद्ध.
आठ बाकी slave राज्य continued to अस्वीकृत calls लिये secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous federal दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the confederacy.
a Peace Conference विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह, and both पहलू prepared लिये युद्ध.
the confederates assumed that यूरोपीय countries were so निर्भर on `` King कपास `` that they होता intervene ; none did and none पहचाना the नई Confederate States of America.
hostilities began on अप्रैल 12, 1861, जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट Sumter, a कुंजी fort held by Union सैनिकों in South Carolina.
lincoln called for प्रत्येक state to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; consequently, चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the confederacy, bringing उनके total to eleven.
the Union जल्द controlled the किनारा states and स्थापित a naval blockade that crippled the दक्षिणी अर्थव्यवस्था.
the पूर्वी Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
the autumn 1862 confederate campaign into Maryland ( a संघ state ) ended with Confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
lincoln जारी the Emancipation Proclamation, जिससे बना ending slavery a war लक्ष्य.
to the west, by summer 1862 the संघ नष्ट the Confederate नदी नेवी, तब much of their western armies, और the Union at Vicksburg split the confederacy in दो at the मिसिसिपी नदी.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the बैटल of gettysburg.
पश्चिमी successes led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864.
In the पश्चिमी Theater, विलियम T. Sherman drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर Atlanta और marched to the sea, destroying confederate infrastructure साथ the way.
The संघ marshaled the resources और जनशक्ति to आक्रमण the confederacy from सब directions, and could afford to लड़ो battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards रिचमंड, the Confederate capital.
the defending confederate army विफल, अग्रणी to Lee 's surrender to ग्रान्ट at Appomattox Court हाउस on April 9, 1865.
The American Civil युद्ध थी one of the earliest true औद्योगिक wars.
Railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, और mass-produced weapons यहूद employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian कारखानों, mines, shipyards, बैंको, परिवहन और food आपूर्तियाँ all foreshadowed World War i.
it remains the deadliest युद्ध in American history, resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined क्रमांक of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the मौत टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 years old, and 30 percent of सब दक्षिणी white males aged 18–40.
norrie बीमारी is a जेनेटिक disorder कि primarily affects the eye and लगभग सदा लीड to blindness.
In addition to the congenital ocular लक्षण, some patients suffer from a progressive hearing घाटा starting mostly in their 2nd decade of जीवन, जबकि another portion may be mentally challenged.
मरीजों साथ norrie बीमारी may develop cataracts, leukocoria ( a कंडीशन where the pupils appear white when light is shone on उन्हें ), साथ with other developmental issues in the eye, such as shrinking of the globe and the बर्बाद away of the iris.
Around 30–50 % of them will also have developmental डेलाy/ mental retardation, psychotic-like features, incoordination of movements or behavioral abnormalities.
Most मरीजों हैं born with normal hearing ; however, the onset of hearing घाटा is very आम in early किशोरावस्था.
परिचय 15 % of the मरीजों are अनुमानित to develop सब the features of the बीमारी.
the बीमारी affects लगभग तभी पुरूष infants at जनम or soon बाद birth, क्युकी the बीमारी is inherited X-linked recessive.
तभी in very rare मामले, females have been diagnosed साथ norrie disease as well.
The exact incidence क्रमांक is unknown ; only a few hundred cases have महरूम reported so far.
It is a बहुत विरल विकार कि is not संबद्ध with any विशिष्ट जातीय or जातिगत groups.
a अनुबंध is an अनुबंध having a lawful object डाला into voluntarily by दो or more पार्टियों, प्रत्येक of whom intends to बनाएँ एक or more legal दायित्वों between them.
The elements of a contract हैं `` offer '' and `` acceptance '' by `` competent व्यक्तियों '' having legal क्षमता जो exchange `` consideration '' to create `` mutuality of दायित्व. ''
Proof of कुछ or सब of ये तत्व may be किया in लिखने, though अनुबंध may be made entirely orally or by conduct.
the उपाय for breach of अनुबंध can be `` क्षतिपूर्ति '' in the रूप of compensation of धन or specific performance enforced through an आदेश.
Both of ये remedies award the पार्टी at loss the `` लाभ of the सौदेबाजी '' or expectation क्षतिपूर्ति, which हैं वृहद than mere reliance damages, as in promissory estoppel.
The parties may be natural व्यक्तियों or juristic persons.
a अनुबंध is a legally enforceable promise or undertaking that something will or होगा नहीं occur.
the word वादा can be used as a legal पर्याय for अनुबंध, although परवाह is required as a promise may not have the पूरा खड़ा of a अनुबंध, as जब it is an अनुबंध without विचार.
Contract विधि varies greatly from एक jurisdiction to another, सहित मतभेद in आम law compared to civil विधि, the प्रभाव of प्राप्त law, particularly from England in आम law देशों, और of विधि codified in regional विधान.
Regarding ऑस्ट्रेलियाई Contract विधि for उदाहरण, there are 40 relevant अधिनियमों जिससे प्रभाव on the निर्वचन of अनुबंध at the राष्ट्रमंडल ( Federal / national ) level, and an अतिरिक्त 26 अधिनियमों at the level of the राज्य of nsw.
in addition वहीँ हैं 6 international यंत्र or प्रथाओं जिससे are applicable for international dealings, such as the United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International बिक्री of goods.
ASP.NET is a server-side Web अनुप्रयोग framework designed लिये वेब विकास to उपज डायनेमिक Web pages.
it was developed by microsoft to allow programmers to निर्माण डायनेमिक web साइट, वेब applications and वेब सेवाएं.
It was पहला released in January 2002 with version 1.0 of the.neT Framework, and is the successor to microsoft 's क्रियाशील Server पृष्ठों ( asp ) technology.
ASP.NET is निर्मित on the आम Language runtime ( clr ), allowing प्रोग्रामर्स to लिखें asp.net code using any समर्थित.neT भाषा.
The asp.net साबुन extension फ्रेमवर्क allows asp.net components to प्रक्रम SOAP संदेश.
lysergic एसिड diethylamide, abbreviated LSD or LSD-25, भी known as lysergide ( इन ) और colloquially as एसिड, is a semisynthetic psychedelic drug of the ergoline परिवार, well ज्ञात लिये इसके मनोवैज्ञानिक प्रभाव जिससे can include altered सोच processes, बंद and खोलें eye visuals, synesthesia, an altered sense of time and spiritual experiences, as well as for इसके key role in 1960s counterculture.
it is used mainly as an entheogen, recreational drug, और as an एजेंट in साइकेडेलिक चिकित्सा.
LSD is non-addictive, is नहीं ज्ञात to कारण दिमाग क्षति, और रै अत्यधिक कम toxicity relative to dose.
However, adverse psychiatric प्रतिक्रियाएँ such as चिंता, paranoia, and delusions हैं possible.
एलएसडी थी पहला synthesized by अल्बर्ट hofmann in 1938 इससे ergotamine, a रासायनिक निकला by Arthur stoll इससे ergot, a grain कवक कि typically grows on rye.
the short form `` एलएसडी '' आता इससे इसके early कोड name lsd-25, which is an संक्षिप्त लिये the जर्मनी `` Lysergsäure-diethylamid '' followed by a sequential number.
एलएसडी is संवेदनशील to oxygen, पराबैंगनी light, और chlorine, विशेषकर in समाधान, हालांकि its potency may last for years if it is stored away from light and नमी at low तापमान.
In pure form it is a colorless, odorless, tasteless ठोस.
LSD is typically वितरित orally, प्रायः on a substrate such as absorbent blotter paper, a शुगर cube, or जिलेटिन.
In its liquid form, it can भी be administered by intramuscular or intravenous injection.
LSD is बहुत potent, with 20–30 μg ( micrograms ) being the दहलीज dose.
New प्रयोग with एलएसडी प्रारंभ in 2009 लिये the first time in 40 years.
Introduced by sandoz laboratories, साथ trade-name Delysid, as a drug साथ विभिन्न psychiatric uses in 1947, एलएसडी जल्दी became a therapeutic agent that appeared to show ग्रेट वादा.
In the 1950s, officials at the U.S. Central प्रज्ञा एजेंसी ( CIA ) विचार the ड्रग might be applicable to mind कंट्रोल और रासायनिक warfare ; the एजेंसी 's MKULTRA शोध program propagated the drug among young servicemen और विद्यार्थी.
the subsequent recreational उपयोग of the drug by युवावस्था culture in the पश्चिमी world दौरान the 1960s led to a राजनैतिक firestorm कि resulted in इसके prohibition.
फिलहाल, a क्रमांक of organizations—including the Beckley न्यास, मानचित्र, Heffter Research Institute और the Albert hofmann Foundation—exist to fund, encourage and निर्देशांक शोध into the medicinal and आध्यात्मिक uses of LSD और related psychedelics.
the United States नेवी 's Sea, एयर, जमीन टीमों, commonly known as the नेवी SEALs, हैं the u.S. Navy 's प्रिंसिपल खास परिचालन फ़ोर्स and a part of the Naval खास Warfare कमांड और संयुक्त States खास Operations कमांड.
`` मुहर '' is सदा capitalized in reference to सदस्यों of the Naval Special warfare community.
the acronym is निकला इससे their क्षमता to operate at sea, in the air, और on land.
SEALs हैं पुरूष सदस्यों of the United राज्य नेवी.
an exchange कार्यक्रम साथ the Coast गार्ड, which graduated three Coast Guardsmen as seals, थी निलंबित in 2011.
the CIA 's अत्यधिक गुपचुप खास Activities Division ( SAD ) and more specifically इसके elite Special Operations समूह ( sog ) recruits operators from the मुहर टीमों.
संयुक्त Navy seals और CIA परिचालन go back to the famed macv-sog दौरान the Vietnam War.
इस सहयोग still exists आज और is seen in the wars in Iraq और अफगानिस्तान, और in the finding and killing of Osama bin लादेन in Pakistan.
World जनसांख्यिकी estimates from 1800 to 2100, आधारित on UN 2010 projections ( रेड, orange, green ) and us जनसांख्यिकी Bureau ऐतिहासिक estimates ( black ).
वास्तविक recorded जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़े are in blue.
According to the उच्चतम अनुमान, the संसार जनसांख्यिकी may rise to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according to the न्यूनतम अनुमान, it may मनाही to 6 billion.
the संसार जनसांख्यिकी is the कुल क्रमांक of जीना humans on धरती.
As of आज, it is estimated to number billion by the United States Census Bureau ( uscb ).
The USCB estimates कि the world population exceeded 7 billion on कूच 12, 2012.
according to a separate अनुमान by the United राष्ट्र Population निधि, it reached इस पड़ाव on अक्तूबर 31, 2011.
The संसार जनसांख्यिकी रै अनुभवी continuous growth चूंकि the समाप्त of the ग्रेट Famine and the Black मौत in 1350, जब it stood at around 370 लाख.
the उच्चतम दरों of विकास – वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी increases ऊपर 1.8 % per साल – यहूद देखी briefly during the 1950s, and लिये a longer काल दौरान the 1960s and 1970s.
the विकास रेट peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, and had declined to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total सालाना births यहूद उच्चतम in the late 1980s at परिचय 138 million, and हैं now expected to remain essentially constant at उनके 2011 level of 134 million, while मौतों क्रमांक 56 लाख प्रति साल, and हैं अपेक्षित to बढ़ाएँ to 80 लाख प्रति year by 2040.
वर्तमान projections दिखाएँ a continued बढ़ाएँ in population in the निकट भविष्य ( but a steady मनाही in the population विकास रेट ), with the global population expected to reach between 7.5 और 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates भविष्यवाणी further growth, stagnation, or भी overall मनाही in the global जनसांख्यिकी by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world population विकास, citing the growing pressures on the पर्यावरण, वैश्विक खाना supplies, and उर्जा संसाधन.
Memphis is a city in the southwestern कोने of the U.S. state of Tennessee, and the county seat of शेल्बी County.
The city is located on the 4th Chickasaw Bluff, दक्षिण of the confluence of the भेड़िया और Mississippi नदियाँ.
Memphis था a जनसांख्यिकी of 672,277 in 2011 making it the largest नगर in the राज्य of टेनेसी, the largest city on the Mississippi River, the third largest in the Southeastern संयुक्त राज्य, and the 20th largest in the United States.
The वृहद मेम्फिस महानगर क्षेत्रफल, including adjacent काउंटी in मिसिसिपी and Arkansas, had a 2010 जनसांख्यिकी of 1,316,100.
इस makes Memphis the दूसरी largest metropolitan क्षेत्रफल in टेनेसी, surpassed तभी by महानगर Nashville, जिससे रै overtaken मेम्फिस in recent years.
मेम्फिस is the youngest of Tennessee 's major cities.
a निवासी of मेम्फिस is referred to as a memphian, and the Memphis प्रदेश is ज्ञात, particularly to media outlets, as `` मेम्फिस & The Mid-South ``.

the Grafenrheinfeld नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in जर्मनी.
Chancellor एंजेला Merkel 's coalition घोषित on May 30, 2011, that Germany’s 17 nuclear शक्ति स्टेशन होगा be shut down by 2022, in a policy reversal following जापानी 's फुकुशिमा Daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति.
फिलहाल, 68 रिएक्टरों are अंतर्गत निर्माण in 15 countries.
Nuclear power स्टेशन operate in तीस countries.
In 2010, पहले the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster, it थी reported कि an औसत of about 10 नाभिकीय reactors were expected to become operational per year, हालांकि according to the संसार Nuclear Association, of the 17 civilian reactors नियोजित to become operational between 2007 and 2009, only पाँच दरअसल came on stream.
as of June 2011, जर्मनी और Switzerland are phasing-out नाभिकीय शक्ति.
as of जून 2011, countries such as Australia, Austria, Denmark, Greece, Ireland, इटली, Latvia, liechtenstein, Luxembourg, मलेशिया, Malta, New Zealand, Norway and Portugal remain opposed to नाभिकीय power.
Skeletal मांसपेशियां homo sapiens
इस is a table of मांसपेशियां of the human anatomy.
वहीँ हैं approximately 642 skeletal मांसपेशियां within the ठेठ इंसान, और almost प्रत्येक मांसपेशी constitutes one भाग of a pair of एकसमान bilateral मांसपेशियां, found on दोनो पहलू, resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles, as प्रस्तुत in इस आलेख.
Nevertheless, the सटीक क्रमांक is मुश्किल to define क्युकी अलग स्त्रोत group muscles differently, e.g. regarding what is defined as different parts of a single मांसपेशी or as अनेक muscles.
Examples दायरा from 640 to 850.
The मांसपेशियां of the human body can be categorized into a क्रमांक of groups जिससे include मांसपेशियां relating to the सिर और neck, muscles of the धड़ or ट्रंक, मांसपेशियां of the upper limbs, और muscles of the निम्नतर limbs.
The action refers to the कार्रवाई of प्रत्येक muscle इससे the standard anatomical स्थिति.
In अन्य स्थितियाँ, other actions may be performed.

the Seminole Wars, also known as the Florida युद्धों, were three conflicts in फ्लोरिडा between the seminole — the collective name दिए to the amalgamation of various groups of देशी Americans और Black people who settled in फ्लोरिडा in the जल्दी 18th century — and the United States फौज.
the पहला seminole War was इससे 1814 to 1819 ( although sources differ ), the दूसरी Seminole War from 1835 to 1842, and the Third Seminole War from 1855 to 1858.
the first विरोध with the Seminoles arose आउट of तनाव relating to General एंड्रयू Jackson 's attack और destruction of Negro फोर्ट in फ्लोरिडा in 1816.
Jackson also attacked the स्पेनी at pensacola.
ultimately, the Spanish क्राउन ceded the उपनिवेश to संयुक्त States नियम.

the 30-story hotel, स्वामित्व and संचालित by MGM रिसॉर्ट International, रै a casino with over 2,000 slot मशीने और 87 table games.
In the 2008 to 2009 renovation, it रै a new, अत्यधिक modernized, और contemporary design and contains a कुल of 4,400 rooms, including 442 suites, lining the आंतरिक walls of a पिरामिड style मीनार और within जुड़वा 22-story ziggurat towers कि यहूद निर्मित as later additions.

As of 2010, the Luxor has a 4 कुंजी rating from the ग्रीन कुंजी eco-rating कार्यक्रम, जिससे evaluates `` sustainable '' होटल operations.
A pilot प्रयोग, भी पुकारा a पायलट study, is a small स्केल प्रारंभिक study conducted in order to evaluate feasibility, समय, cost, प्रतिकूल कार्यक्रम, and प्रभाव size ( statistical variability ) in an attempt to predict an उचित नमूना आकार और improve upon the study design prior to performance of a full-scale research project.
पायलट studies, therefore, may नहीं be appropriate for case अध्ययन.
The लॉस एंजिल्स Fire Department ( LAFD ) is the एजेंसी that provides आग सुरक्षा और emergency medical services for the नगर of Los Angeles.

the acre is a ईकाई of area used in the इम्पीरियल और U.S. प्रथागत systems.
An एकड़ is about 40 % of a hectare – slightly smaller than an American football field.
The acre is no longer commonly used, हालांकि a few notable अपवाद include the United राज्य, Australia, बर्मा और the संयुक्त Kingdom ( as of 2010, the acre is no longer officially used in the संयुक्त Kingdom, though is स्टिल used in real estate descriptions ).
It is still प्रयुक्त, to कुछ extent, in कनाडा.
The international symbol of the acre is ac, और is defined as 1/640 of a square mile.
the सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त acre today is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़.
In the United राज्य both the अंतरराष्ट्रीय acre and the slightly different us सर्वेक्षण एकड़ हैं in उपयोग.
The most आम use of the acre is to measure tracts of land.
One अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ is पारिभाषित as 4046.8564224 वर्गाकार metres.
During the Middle Ages, an acre was the amount of land कि could be plowed in one day with a yoke of oxen.

Language processing refers to the way इंसान beings उपयोग words to communicate विचार और feelings, और कैसा ऐसे संचार are processed और समझा.
यूँ it is कैसा the brain creates और understands language.
सबसे recent theories consider that इस प्रक्रम is carried out entirely by और inside the दिमाग.
इस is माना एक of the most characteristic abilities of the human प्रजाति - शायद the सबसे characteristic.
However very little is ज्ञात about it और वहीँ is विशाल पैमाना लिये research on it.
सबसे of the ज्ञान acquired to तिथि on the subject has come इससे patients जो have suffered some type of significant सिर चोट, whether external ( wounds, बुलेट ) or internal ( स्ट्रोक्स, tumors, degenerative रोगों ).
Studies have shown कि most of the भाषा processing functions हैं carried out in the cerebral cortex.
The अनिवार्य फलन of the cortical भाषा areas is symbolic प्रतिनिधित्व.
भी हालांकि language exists in different forms, all of उन्हें हैं आधारित on symbolic प्रतिनिधित्व.

The असली version has a top speed of.
it थी named car of the Decade ( 2000–2009 ) by the बीबीसी television programme शीर्ष Gear.

on 6 अप्रैल 2013, Bugatti नियत the रिकार्ड for the तीव्रतम roadster in the संसार with the veyron Grand खेल vitesse, reaching on average a top गति of.
The Veyron 's chief designer थी hartmut Warkuss, और the exterior was designed by jozef kabaň of Volkswagen, with much of the अभियान्त्रिकी work being conducted under the मार्गदर्शन of अभियान्त्रिकी मुख्य वुल्फगांग Schreiber.

dvd is an ऑप्टिकल disc भंडार स्वरूप, invented and विकसित by फिलिप्स, Sony, Toshiba, and Panasonic in 1995.
dvds offer उच्चतर भंडार capacity than कॉम्पैक्ट discs जबकि having the वही dimensions.
pre-recorded dvds are mass-produced using सांचा machines कि physically स्टैम्प आंकड़ा onto the dvd.
ऐसे discs are known as DVD- ROM, क्युकी आंकड़ा can only be read and not लिखा nor erased.
Blank recordable DVD discs ( dvd-r and DVD+R ) can be recorded एकबार using a dvd recorder और then फलन as a DVD-ROM. Rewritable DVDs ( DVD-RW, dvd+rw, and dvd-ram ) can be recorded और erased अनेक टाइम्स.
dvds are used in DVD-Video consumer डिजिटल वीडियो स्वरूप and in dvd-audio consumer digital ऑडियो स्वरूप, as खूब as लिये authoring avchd discs.
DVDs containing other types of information may be referred to as dvd data discs.
