Peter जीन hernandez ( born अक्तूबर 8, 1985 ), known by उसके स्टेज नाम ब्रूनो Mars, is an American singer-songwriter and रिकार्ड निर्माता.
Raised in होनोलूलू, Hawaii, by a परिवार of संगीतकारों, मंगल began making music at a यंग age and performed in विभिन्न musical venues in his hometown throughout his childhood.
He graduated from ऊँची school and तब स्थानांतरित to लॉस एंजिल्स, California, to pursue a musical करियर.
Mars produced गीतों for other artists, joining उत्पादन टोली the Smeezingtons.
मंगल had an unsuccessful कार्यावधि with Motown रिकॉर्ड, लकिन then हस्ताक्षरित साथ अटलांटिक in 2009.
he became recognized as a सोलो कलाकार after lending his vocals और co-writing the hooks लिये the songs `` nothin ' on You `` by B.o.B, और `` Billionaire `` by travie मैककॉय.
he भी co-wrote the हिट्स `` सही गोलाकार `` by flo rida featuring ke $ ha, और `` Wavin ' Flag `` by K'naan.
in October 2010, he released his debut एल्बम, Doo-Wops & Hooligans.
anchored by the worldwide number-one singles `` Just the रास्ता You Are `` और `` Grenade ``, the album peaked at number तीन on the Billboard 200.
मंगल was मनोनीत for सात grammys at the 53rd Grammy Awards, winning बेहतरीन Male पॉप Vocal प्रदर्शन लिये `` Just the Way तुम हैं ''.
His second studio album, अपरंपरागत ज्यूकबॉक्स, थी released on December 11, 2012.
Mars ' music is noted लिये displaying a wide किस्में of शैलियाँ और influences, और contains तत्व of अनेक musical genres.
he has worked साथ an assortment of artists इससे विभिन्न genres.
as a चाइल्ड, he थी highly बहकावे by artists such as Little Richard, Elvis Presley and माइकल Jackson और would प्रायः impersonate ये artists from a young age.
मंगल also incorporates रेगी - and motown -inspired sounds into उसके कार्य.
विश्वव्यापी, Mars became the best-selling digital artist in 2011.
He था three singles in the top ten, including first प्लेस साथ `` Just the रास्ता You हैं '', which sold 12.5 लाख नक़ल.
मंगल won Best International पुरूष सोलो Artist at the 2012 BRIT पुरस्कार.
ब्रूनो मंगल has sold 6 million एल्बम and 40 million singles worldwide as a singer.
althought as a song-writer, producer and सिंगर उसके कुल सिंगल डाउनलोड sales surpass 100 million विश्वव्यापी.
Bust of ज़ीउस, otricoli ( sala Rotonda, museo pio-clementino, वेटिकन ).
यूनानी mythology is the देह of myths और शिक्षाओं that belong to the ancient Greeks, concerning their gods और नायक, the प्रकृति of the world, और the origins and significance of their अपना cult and ritual practices.
it थी a भाग of the धर्म in ancient यूनानियों and is भाग of धर्म in आधुनिक Greece और around the संसार, ज्ञात as Hellenismos.
आधुनिक scholars refer to and study the myths in an attempt to throw light on the religious और political संस्थानों of Ancient यूनानियों and इसके सभ्यता, and to gain understanding of the प्रकृति of myth-making itself.
यूनानी mythology is explicitly समाविष्ट in a large संग्रहण of narratives, and implicitly in यूनानी representational कला, ऐसे as vase-paintings and votive gifts.
Greek myth कोशिशें to बताइये the origins of the संसार, और विवरण the lives और adventures of a चौड़ी किस्में of gods, goddesses, नायक, heroines, और mythological जीव.
These खाते initially were disseminated in an oral-poetic परंपरा ; आज the यूनानी myths are known primarily from यूनानी साहित्य.
The oldest known Greek साहित्यिक sources, होमर 's epic कविताएं इलियड और ओडिसी, focus on events surrounding the trojan War.
दो कविताएं by Homer 's near समकालीन hesiod, the theogony और the Works and दिनों, contain खाते of the genesis of the संसार, the succession of दैवी शासकों, the succession of human ages, the उत्पत्ति of human woes, and the उत्पत्ति of sacrificial practices.
Myths हैं also preserved in the Homeric hymns, in fragments of एपिक कविताएं of the Epic Cycle, in lyric poems, in the works of the tragedians of the पांचवां सदी BC, in writings of विद्वानों और poets of the Hellenistic आयु, और in ग्रन्थ from the समय of the रोमन Empire by लेखक such as Plutarch and pausanias.
Archaeological निष्कर्षों provide a प्रिंसिपल सोर्स of विवरण परिचय Greek mythology, साथ gods और heroes प्रदर्शित prominently in the सजावट of many artifacts.
Geometric designs on pottery of the आठवीं century BC depict दृश्यों इससे the Trojan cycle as खूब as the adventures of Heracles.
in the succeeding archaic, Classical, and hellenistic periods, homeric और विभिन्न other पौराणिक scenes appear, supplementing the existing literary प्रमाण.
यूनानी mythology रै था an extensive influence on the संस्कृति, कला, और literature of Western civilization and remains part of पश्चिमी विरासत और language.
Poets और कलाकारों from ancient टाइम्स to the उपस्थित have निकला प्रेरणा इससे यूनानी mythology and have खोजा समकालीन significance और relevance in the विषयवस्तु.
Mouth & MacNeal in 1971
Mouth & macneal was a पॉप duo from the नीदरलैंड्स.
They are बेहतरीन known लिये their लाख selling recording of `` How Do तुम do ``.
The Boise State Broncos football कार्यक्रम represents Boise State विश्वविद्यालयों in college फ़ुटबॉल and compete in the Football Bowl subdivision ( fbs ) of प्रभाग I as a member of the पहाड़ वेस्ट सम्मेलन.
वे हैं currently led by head coach Chris Petersen and play उनके home खेल at Bronco स्टेडियम.
the फ़्रैंक ( sign : Fr. or sfr. ; German : franken, फ्रेंच और romansh : फ़्रैंक, Italian : franco ; कोड : chf ) is the currency और विधिक tender of Switzerland और Liechtenstein ; it is भी विधिक टेंडर in the इतालवी exclave Campione d'italia.
हालांकि not formally legal tender in the जर्मनी exclave Büsingen ( the sole legal currency is the यूरोपियन ), it is in wide daily उपयोग वहीँ.
the स्विस National Bank मुद्दे banknotes and the संघीय mint Swissmint मुद्दे coins.
The Swiss फ़्रैंक is the तभी version of the फ़्रैंक still जारी in Europe.
The छोटी denomination, a hundredth of a फ़्रैंक, is a rappen ( rp. ) in German, centime ( c. ) in फ्रेंच, centesimo ( ct. ) in Italian, and rap ( rp. ) in Romansh.
the ISO कोड of the currency used by banks और financial institutions is chf, although `` fr. '' is प्रयुक्त by सबसे businesses और विज्ञापनदाता ; some उपयोग SFr. ; the Latinate `` CH '' स्टैंड for confoederatio helvetica.
Given the different languages प्रयुक्त in Switzerland, Latin is used for language-neutral inscriptions on the coins.
Sir Charles स्पेंसर `` चार्ली '' चैपलिन, ( 16 अप्रैल 188925 दिसम्बर 1977 ) थी a British comic actor and filmmaker who रोज़ to fame in the silent era.
चैपलिन became a विश्वव्यापी प्रतीक through उसके screen persona `` the ट्रैम्प `` and is considered एक of the most important figures of the फिल्मी उद्योग.
His career spanned अधिक than 75 years, from a चाइल्ड in the Victorian era to close to his death at the age of 88, and encompassed दोनो adulation और विवाद.
उठाया in London, Chaplin 's बाल्यकाल थी पारिभाषित by poverty और hardship.
He थी भेजा to a workhouse twice before the age of nine ; his पिता was absent, और his mother was वचनबद्ध to a दिमागी asylum.
चैपलिन began performing from a young age, touring music halls and later working as a स्टेज actor और हास्य.
at 19 he was हस्ताक्षरित to the prestigious फ्रेड Karno company, which took उसे to America.
चैपलिन थी scouted by the film उद्योग, और बना his first दिखावे in 1914 with Keystone studios.
he soon विकसित the Tramp persona और formed a large fan base.
चैपलिन directed उसके films इससे an early stage, and जारी to hone his शिल्प as he moved to the essanay, Mutual, और First नेशनल corporations.
by 1918, he थी एक of the most famous men in the संसार.
in 1919, चैपलिन co-founded the वितरण कम्पनी संयुक्त कलाकारों, giving him पूरा कंट्रोल over उसके films.
उसके पहला feature-length picture थी The Kid ( 1921 ), followed by a स्त्री of Paris ( 1923 ), The सुनहरा फटाफट ( 1925 ), और the सर्कस ( 1928 ).
He refused to मूव to sound films in the 1930s, instead producing नगर Lights ( 1931 ) and आधुनिक टाइम्स ( 1936 ) without dialogue.
Chaplin became increasingly political and his अगला film, The Great Dictator ( 1940 ), satirised एडोल्फ Hitler.
the 1940s was a decade चिह्नित साथ controversy लिये Chaplin, और उसके popularity अस्वीकृत rapidly.
he was अभियुक्त of communist sympathies, while उसके भागीदारी in a paternity suit and marriages to much younger महिलाओं यहूद considered scandalous.
An एफबीआई छानबीन थी खोली on Chaplin, and he was आखिरकार forced to leave the United राज्य और settle in Switzerland.
He abandoned the Tramp for his बाद films, which include Monsieur Verdoux ( 1947 ), limelight ( 1952 ), A किंग in New York ( 1957 ), और a Countess From हांग काँग ( 1967 ).
चैपलिन लिखा, directed, produced, संपादित, scored, and starred in सबसे of his films.
he was a perfectionist, और उसके वित्तीय independence meant he often खर्च years on the development और production of a चित्र.
His films हैं characterised by slapstick संयुक्त साथ pathos, और often feature the ट्रैम्प struggling against adversity.
Many contain सोशल and political विषयवस्तु, as खूब as autobiographical elements.
In 1972, as भाग of a नवीनीकृत सराहना लिये उसके work, चैपलिन प्राप्त an मानद अकादमी पुरस्कार for `` the incalculable प्रभाव he रै था in बनाना गति तस्वीरें the art रूप of this century ''.
He continues to be held in high regard, साथ the Gold Rush, नगर लाइट्स, Modern टाइम्स, and The ग्रेट Dictator often ranked among the greatest films of सब time.
नियोजित Parenthood संघ of अमेरिका ( PPFA ), commonly shortened to Planned parenthood, is the U.S. संबद्ध of the International Planned Parenthood Federation ( IPPF ) and one of इसके larger members.
PPFA is a non-profit संगठन providing reproductive health और मातृ और child स्वास्थ्य services.
the नियोजित parenthood कार्रवाई निधि, inc. ( ppaf ) is a सम्बन्धित organization which lobbies for pro-choice legislation, comprehensive sex education, and अभिगम to सस्ती स्वास्थ्य care in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Planned parenthood is the largest U.S. प्रदाता of reproductive health सेवाएं, सहित कर्कट स्क्रीनिंग, HIV स्क्रीनिंग and counseling, निरोधक, and abortion.
Contraception खाते for 35 % of ppfa 's कुल services और abortions खाता for 3 % ; PPFA conducts roughly 300,000 abortions each साल, among 3 million लोगों served.
the organization has its roots in ब्रुकलीन, New यॉर्क, where Margaret Sanger खोली the देश 's first birth-control clinic.
Sanger founded the American Birth Control League in 1921, जिससे in 1942 became भाग of the नियोजित parenthood संघ of America.
चूंकि then, नियोजित parenthood रै grown to have over 820 क्लिनिक स्थितियाँ in the U.S., साथ a कुल बजट of US $ 1 अरब.
PPFA provides an सरणी of सेवाएं to over तीन लाख people in the संयुक्त States, and supports services for over एक million clients बाहर the संयुक्त States.
Mens rea is लैटिन लिये `` guilty दिमाग ''.
In criminal विधि, it is viewed as एक of the जरुरी तत्व of some अपराधों.
the मानक common law test of criminal देयता is usually expressed in the Latin phrase, actus गैर facit reum nisi पुरुषों बैठना rea, जिससे अर्थात् `` the अधिनियम is नहीं culpable जबतक the mind is guilty ''.
Thus, in jurisdictions साथ due process, there जरूर be an actus reus, or `` अपराधी अधिनियम, '' accompanied by कुछ level of mens rea to constitute the अपराधों with जिससे the प्रतिवादी is चार्ज ( देखिए the तकनीकी आवश्यकता of concurrence ).
as a general नियम, criminal देयता does नहीं attach to a व्यक्ति who acted with the absence of mental दोष.
the एक्सेप्शन is strict liability crimes.
In सिविल विधि, it is प्रायः नहीं जरुरी to prove a subjective दिमागी element to establish liability for breach of अनुबंध or tort, लिये उदाहरण.
however, if a tort is intentionally committed or a अनुबंध is intentionally breached, ऐसे intent may increase the scope of liability as well as the measure of damages देय to the अभियोक्ता.
इसलिए, पुरुषों rea refers to the mental तत्व of the अपराध कि accompanies the actus reus.
in some jurisdictions, the terms पुरुषों rea and actus reus have been replaced by वैकल्पिक terminology.
in Australia, लिये example, the elements of the संघीय offences are अभी designated as `` fault elements '' or `` mental elements '' ( पुरुषों rea ) and `` शारीरिक तत्व '' or `` external elements '' ( actus reus ).
This terminology थी adopted to बदलें the obscurity of the Latin terms साथ सरल and सटीक phrasing.
Ulysses S. Grant ( born Hiram ulysses Grant ; अप्रैल 27, 1822 – July 23, 1885 ) was the 18th President of the संयुक्त States ( 1869–1877 ) following उसके अत्यधिक successful भूमिका as a युद्ध सामान्य in the second हाफ of the सिविल War.
Under Grant, the Union फौज पराजित the confederate सैन्य ; having effectively ended the war and secession with the surrender of रॉबर्ट E. ली 's army at Appomattox.
as अध्यक्ष he led the Radical republicans in their effort to eliminate all vestiges of confederate nationalism and गुलामी.
परेशान over uncontrolled हिंसा in the दक्षिण and having desired to protect African अमरीकी citizenship, President ग्रान्ट effectively नष्ट the ku klux Klan in 1871.
ग्रान्ट थी the पहला अध्यक्ष to स्थापित Civil सेवा reform having created a two-year federally वित्तपोषित Civil Service आयोग in 1871.
in terms of foreign policy, ग्रान्ट नाज़िल an `` अनपेक्षित capacity for विवेचना और consultation '' that प्रचारित the national ब्याज.
His reputation was marred by उसके repeated रक्षा of corrupt appointees, और by America 's first industrial आयु economic अवसाद ( पुकारा the `` Panic of 1873 `` ) that वर्चस्व his second पद.
हालांकि उसके Republican Party विभाजित in 1872 with reformers denouncing him, ग्रान्ट थी easily reelected.
by 1875 the रूढ़िवादी white Southern विपक्ष regained control of every राज्य in the दक्षिण और as he left the White House in कूच 1877 his नीतियों were होने undone.
a करियर soldier, he graduated from the संयुक्त States Military अकादमी at वेस्ट पाइंट and served in the Mexican–American युद्ध.
जब the Civil War began in 1861, ग्रान्ट trained संघ स्वयंसेवी regiments in Illinois.
in 1862, as a सामान्य he fought a श्रेणी of battles और थी promoted to प्रमुख general after forcing the आत्मसमर्पण of a विशाल confederate फौज and gaining कंट्रोल of केंटकी और सबसे of Tennessee.
He then led Union शक्तियां to victory after आरंभिक setbacks in the Battle of Shiloh, कमाई a reputation as an aggressive कमांडर.
in जुलाई 1863, बाद a long, जटिल campaign, ग्रान्ट defeated पाँच uncoordinated Confederate सेना ( capturing one of उन्हें ) और seized vicksburg.
This प्रसिद्ध विजय दिया the Union full कंट्रोल of the मिसिसिपी नदी, split बंद the पश्चिमी confederacy, and opened the रास्ता for अधिक Union triumphs.
बाद another win at the बैटल of चट्टानूगा in late 1863, अध्यक्ष अब्राहम lincoln बना उसे लेफ्टिनेंट सामान्य और कमांडर of सब of the संघ Armies.
as commanding सामान्य of the फौज, ग्रान्ट confronted रॉबर्ट E. Lee in a series of बहुत खूनी battles in 1864 ज्ञात as the overland अभियान that ended with the bottling up of Lee at पीटर्सबर्ग, बाहर the confederate पूंजी of Richmond.
During the siege, Grant coordinated a series of devastating अभियान launched by William tecumseh Sherman, Philip Sheridan, और George थामस.
आखिरकार breaking through Lee 's trenches, the Union फौज captured Richmond in अप्रैल 1865.
Lee surrendered his depleted forces to ग्रान्ट at Appomattox as the Confederacy collapsed.
Although pro-Confederate historians attacked ग्रान्ट as a निष्ठुर butcher जो जीती by brute force, most historians have hailed उसके military प्रतिभाशाली.
Grant 's दो लगातार शर्तें as President stabilized the nation after the American Civil युद्ध और during the turbulent पुनर्निर्माण काल that followed.
as president, he enforced Reconstruction by enforcing civil rights laws और fighting Ku klux क्लान violence.
Grant won ड्योढ़ी of the पंद्रहवीं Amendment ; giving constitutional सुरक्षा लिये African-American voting rights.
he used the army to निर्माण the Republican Party in the दक्षिण, based on black मतदाता, उत्तरी newcomers ( `` carpetbaggers `` ) and native श्वेत supporters ( `` scalawags. '' )
as a result, अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी were represented in the u.S. Congress for the पहला time in American history in 1870.
reformers praised ग्रान्ट 's Indian सलाम नीति by having broken the deadlock on भारतीय appropriations in कॉंग्रेस, the creation of the Board of भारतीय commissioners to मेक reform सुझाव, and his enlistment of Quaker protestants who नियंत्रित मिड western Indian agencies, कि effectively curbed congressional patronage.
Grant remained संकल्पित in keeping Indians from होने exterminated इससे white settler अतिक्रमण or by the U.S. सैन्य.
Grant 's प्रतिष्ठा as अध्यक्ष by 1875 थी at an all-time ऊँची लिये उसके previous वीटो of the Inflation विधेयक, the ड्योढ़ी of the Resumption of specie Act, और Secretary Bristow 's successful raids कि shut down the whiskey Ring.
Grant 's foreign policy, led by Secretary of State Hamilton Fish, implemented International मध्यस्थता, settled the अलबामा दावा with Britain and avoided युद्ध with स्पेन over the virginius affair.
A ज्यूकबॉक्स is a partially automated music-playing यंत्र, प्रायः a coin-operated यंत्र, कि will खेल a patron 's selection इससे self-contained media.
the क्लासिक ज्यूकबॉक्स has buttons साथ अक्षर and संख्याएँ on them that, when डाला in संयोजन, are प्रयुक्त to खेल a specific selection.
A ड्रग test is a तकनीकी विश्लेषण of a biological specimen – for example urine, hair, रक्त, स्वेद, or oral fluid / लार – to determine the presence or अनुपस्थिति of specified parent दवाएँ or उनके metabolites.
Major उपयोग of drug testing are to detect the उपस्थिति of प्रदर्शन enhancing steroids in खेल or लिये दवाएँ prohibited by कानून, ऐसे as cannabis, कोका and हेरोइन.
A `` 10-panel मूत्र स्क्रीन '' consists of the following:
Amphetamines ( including methamphetamine )
barbiturates
benzodiazepines
Cannabinoids ( thc )
Cocaine
Methadone
methaqualone
Opiates ( codeine, Morphine, Heroin, oxycodone, Hydrocodone, इत्यादि. )
Phencyclidine ( pcp )
propoxyphene
Saturn V rocket, used लिये the अमरीकी मानवयुक्त चंद्र landing मिशन
Space exploration is the डिस्कवरी और खोजी of outer space by means of स्पेस प्रौद्योगिकी.
शारीरिक exploration of space is conducted both by इंसान spaceflights and by robotic spacecraft.
जबकि the observation of objects in space, ज्ञात as खगोलशास्त्र, predates विश्वसनीय अंकित history, it थी the development of विशाल and अपेक्षाकृत कुशल rockets दौरान the early 20th century that अनुमत physical space exploration to become a reality.
आम rationales for exploring स्पेस include advancing scientific शोध, uniting अलग राष्ट्र, ensuring the future अस्तित्व of मानवता and developing military and strategic advantages against other countries.
विभिन्न आलोचनाओं of स्पेस खोजी हैं sometimes बना.
Space खोजी has प्रायः महरूम प्रयुक्त as a proxy competition for geopolitical rivalries ऐसे as the Cold War.
the जल्दी era of स्पेस खोजी was driven by a `` स्पेस रेस `` between the Soviet Union और the United States, the launch of the पहला man-made object to orbit the Earth, the ussr 's sputnik 1, on 4 अक्तूबर 1957, and the पहला चंद्रमा लैंडिंग by the American अपोलो 11 craft on 20 July 1969 are often taken as the सीमाएँ लिये इस आरंभिक काल.
The सोवियत space कार्यक्रम achieved अनेक of the first milestones, सहित the first जीना being in कक्षा in 1957, the पहला human spaceflight ( Yuri Gagarin aboard Vostok 1 ) in 1961, the first spacewalk ( by Aleksei Leonov ) on 18 March 1965, the first automatic landing on another celestial body in 1966, and the लॉन्च of the first space station ( salyut 1 ) in 1971.
बाद the पहला 20 years of exploration, फ़ोकस shifted from one-off फ़्लाइट to बेदर्दी hardware, such as the स्पेस Shuttle कार्यक्रम, and इससे competition to सहयोग as साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Space Station ( iss ).
साथ the substantial पूर्णता of the ISS following STS-133 in कूच 2011, योजनाएँ for स्पेस exploration by the यूएसए remain in फ्लक्स.
नक्षत्र, a बुश प्रशासन कार्यक्रम for a return to the चंद्रमा by 2020 थी judged inadequately वित्तपोषित और unrealistic by an expert पुनर्विलोकन panel reporting in 2009.
the Obama प्रशासन proposed a revision of Constellation in 2010 to फ़ोकस on the विकास of the capability for crewed मिशन beyond कम धरती orbit ( LEO ), envisioning extending the आपरेशन of the ISS beyond 2020, transferring the विकास of लॉन्च vehicles for human crews इससे नासा to the निजी sector, and developing technology to enable missions to beyond leo, such as Earth/Moon l1, the Moon, earth/sun L2, near-earth asteroids, and phobos or मंगल orbit.
As of कूच 2011, the US Senate और House of Representatives are still working towards a compromise NASA funding विधेयक, जिससे will संभवतः terminate नक्षत्र and निधि विकास of a भारी lift लॉन्च vehicle ( hllv ).
in the 2000s, the People 's गणतंत्र of चीन initiated a कामयाब manned spaceflight program, जबकि the European संघ, Japan, और इण्डिया have also planned भविष्य मानवयुक्त space मिशन.
China, रूस, Japan, and इण्डिया have advocated मानवयुक्त मिशन to the Moon during the 21st सदी, जबकि the European Union has advocated मानवयुक्त missions to both the Moon और मंगल during the 21st century.
इससे the 1990s onwards, निजी रूचि began promoting space पर्यटन और then private space खोजी of the Moon ( देखिए Google चंद्र X पुरस्कार ).
जॉन calvin कूलिज, jr. ( जुलाई 4, 1872january 5, 1933 ) थी the 30th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States ( 1923–1929 ).
A रिपब्लिकन lawyer इससे वर्मांट, कूलिज worked his way up the सीढ़ियाँ of Massachusetts राज्य politics, eventually बनने राज्यपाल of कि state.
His conduct during the बोस्टन पुलिस स्ट्राइक of 1919 thrust उसे into the नेशनल स्पॉटलाइट and दिया him a reputation as a man of decisive कार्रवाई.
Soon after, he was elected as the 29th Vice अध्यक्ष in 1920 और succeeded to the प्रेसिडेंसी upon the sudden मौत of वारेन G. Harding in 1923.
निर्वाचित in उसके अपना right in 1924, he gained a प्रतिष्ठा as a small-government conservative, और भी as a man जो said बहुत छोटी.
Coolidge restored public विश्वास in the White House बाद the घोटालों of his पूर्ववर्ती 's प्रशासन, और left office साथ considerable लोकप्रियता.
As a कूलिज biographer put it, `` He embodied the spirit और hopes of the middle क्लास, could interpret their longings and express उनके opinions.
That he did represent the genius of the औसत is the most convincing प्रमाण of his strength. ''
कुछ later criticized कूलिज as part of a सामान्य criticism of laissez-faire सरकारी.
His reputation underwent a पुनर्जागरण during the Ronald reagan प्रशासन, but the परम मूल्यांकन of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी is still divided between those जो approve of उसके कटौती of the आकार of सरकारी programs and those who believe the federal government चाहिए be more शामिल in regulating and controlling the अर्थव्यवस्था.
Espresso is a concentrated पेय brewed by forcing a छोटी amount of nearly boiling water अंतर्गत pressure through finely मैदान कॉफी beans.
एस्प्रेसो प्रायः रै a thicker संगति than coffee brewed by अन्य विधि, a उच्चतर concentration of निलंबित और dissolved solids, और crema ( अर्थ cream, but होने a reference to the झाग साथ a creamy बनावट that फ़ॉर्म as a result of the pressure ).
as a result of the pressurized brewing प्रक्रम the flavors और chemicals in a typical कप of espresso हैं बहुत concentrated.
एस्प्रेसो is the आधार for other drinks, such as a latte, कापुचीनो, macchiato, मोचा, or americano.
एस्प्रेसो रै more caffeine प्रति ईकाई volume than सबसे beverages, but the usual serving आकार is smaller—a ठेठ 60 ml ( 2 US द्रव ounce ) of espresso has 80 to 150 mg of कैफीन, छोटी less than the 95 to 200 mg of a मानक 240 ml ( 8 US द्रव औंस ) cup of drip-brewed coffee.
ब्रायन Keith केली ( born अक्तूबर 25, 1961 ) is an American football कोच and पूर्व player.
he is currently the सिर फ़ुटबॉल कोच for the notre Dame लड़ Irish, a स्थिति he has held since December 2009.
केली was previously head कोच at Grand घाटी State विश्वविद्यालयों ( 1991–2003 ), सेंट्रल मिशिगन विश्वविद्यालयों ( 2004–2006 ), और विश्वविद्यालयों of Cincinnati ( 2006–2009 ).
a अनुबंध is an agreement having a lawful ऑब्जेक्ट डाला into voluntarily by दो or more parties, प्रत्येक of whom intends to बनाएँ one or more legal दायित्वों between उन्हें.
The elements of a contract are `` offer '' और `` acceptance '' by `` competent व्यक्तियों '' having विधिक capacity who एक्सचेंज `` consideration '' to बनाएँ `` mutuality of दायित्व. ''
प्रमाण of some or सब of these तत्व may be done in लिखने, though अनुबंध may be made entirely orally or by conduct.
The remedy लिये उल्लंघन of अनुबंध can be `` damages '' in the form of मुआवजे of धन or विशिष्ट प्रदर्शन enforced through an आदेश.
दोनो of these remedies पुरस्कार the party at घाटा the `` लाभ of the bargain '' or expectation क्षतिपूर्ति, जिससे are वृहद than mere रिलायंस क्षतिपूर्ति, as in promissory estoppel.
The parties may be प्राकृतिक व्यक्तियों or juristic व्यक्तियों.
a contract is a legally enforceable वादा or undertaking कि कुछ will or will नहीं occur.
the शब्द promise can be used as a विधिक पर्याय for contract, हालांकि परवाह is जरूरी as a promise may नहीं have the full standing of a अनुबंध, as when it is an agreement without consideration.
अनुबंध law varies greatly from एक क्षेत्राधिकार to another, सहित differences in आम law compared to सिविल विधि, the प्रभाव of प्राप्त law, विशेषकर इससे इंग्लैण्ड in आम विधि देशों, and of विधि संहिताबद्ध in क्षेत्रीय विधान.
Regarding ऑस्ट्रेलियाई अनुबंध Law for उदाहरण, there are 40 relevant acts which प्रभाव on the interpretation of contract at the राष्ट्रमंडल ( Federal / नेशनल ) स्तर, और an additional 26 अधिनियमों at the स्तर of the राज्य of NSW.
In addition there are 6 international यंत्र or conventions जिससे हैं applicable लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय dealings, such as the संयुक्त राष्ट्र Convention on Contracts for the International बिक्री of goods.
sidney Patrick Crosby, ons ( born अगस्त 7, 1987 ) is a Canadian professional बर्फ हॉकी खिलाड़ी जो is कप्तान of the पिट्सबर्ग Penguins of the National हॉकी लीग ( NHL ).
Crosby थी drafted पहला overall by the penguins आउट of the क्यूबेक प्रमुख Junior हॉकी लीग ( QMJHL ).
During उसके two-year प्रमुख जूनियर करियर with the rimouski océanic, he अर्जित back-to-back CHL Player of the Year awards and led his club to the 2005 मेमोरियल कप फाइनल.
Nicknamed `` the अगला एक ``, he थी एक of the सबसे highly regarded ड्राफ्ट चयन in हॉकी इतिहास, leading अनेक to refer to the 2005 ड्राफ्ट Lottery as the `` sidney crosby Sweepstakes ''.
in उसके first NHL season, Crosby समाप्त sixth in लीग scoring with 102 points ( 39 लक्ष्य, 63 assists ) और was a runner-up for the Calder Memorial ट्रॉफी ( won by सिकंदर Ovechkin ).
By his second ऋतु, he led the NHL with 120 अंक ( 36 goals, 84 assists ) to कैप्चर the आर्ट Ross Trophy, बनने the youngest player and the only किशोरावस्था to जीत a स्कोरिंग शीर्षक in any major उत्तर American खेल लीग.
कि वही ऋतु, Crosby also won the Hart मेमोरियल ट्रॉफी as the Professional Hockey लेखक Association 's choice लिये सबसे valuable player और the लेस्टर B. पियर्सन पुरस्कार as the NHL Players संघ 's choice लिये सबसे बकाया player, becoming the सातवाँ खिलाड़ी in NHL history to earn all तीन awards in एक year.
Crosby प्रारंभ the 2007–08 ऋतु साथ the team 's कप्तानी और subsequently led them to the 2008 Stanley Cup फाइनल, जहाँ they यहूद defeated by the डेट्रॉयट Red Wings in six games.
The penguins returned to the Finals against डेट्रॉयट the following साल and won in seven खेल ; Crosby became the youngest कप्तान in NHL history to win the Stanley कप.
in the 2009–10 ऋतु, Crosby scored a career-high 51 goals, tying उसे with Steven stamkos for the प्रक्षेपास्त्र रिचर्ड ट्रॉफी as the league-leader ; with 58 assists, he totaled 109 अंक, second in the NHL.
दौरान the off-season, crosby प्राप्त the चिह्नित Messier नेतृत्व Award.
in 2010–11, crosby sustained a concussion as a result of हिट्स to the head in back-to-back games.
the injury left him sidelined लिये टेन and a half months.
however, after playing eight games in the 2011–12 season, crosby 's concussion-like लक्षण returned in दिसम्बर 2011, and he did not return until mid-march 2012.
Internationally, Crosby रै represented कनाडा in numerous tournaments for the country 's जूनियर और men 's teams.
बाद competing in the 2003 u-18 जूनियर संसार कप, he represented कनाडा in back-to-back IIHF World U20 championships, winning silver in 2004 और gold in 2005.
at the 2006 iihf संसार चैंपियनशिप, he led the tournament in स्कोरिंग, जबकि भी कमाई Top आगे और all-star Team honours.
चार years later, crosby was named to Team Canada for the 2010 शीत Olympics in वैंकूवर.
playing the संयुक्त राज्य in the gold medal खेल, he scored the game-winning लक्ष्य in overtime.
a United States cent, also known as a penny.
`` My two cents '' ( 2¢ ) and its longer version `` put my two cents in '' is an संयुक्त राज्य ( US ) idiomatic expression, taken इससे the असली English idiom अभिव्यक्ति : to put in `` my two कौड़ी लायक '' or `` my tuppence worth. ''
it is used to preface the अंतरिम stating of one’s राय.
By विरोधात्मक the राय to follow – suggesting its value is तभी two सेंट, a बहुत छोटी amount – the user of the phrase उम्मीदें to lessen the प्रभाव of a possibly statement, showing politeness और humility.
However, it is also sometimes प्रयुक्त साथ विडंबना जब expressing a strongly लगा राय.
the phrase is also प्रयुक्त out of आदत to preface uncontentious opinions.

The चाइनीज सिविल युद्ध was a civil war in China fought between forces loyal to the government of the गणतंत्र of China led by the Kuomintang ( kmt ) और शक्तियां of the Communist Party of चीन ( CPC ).
The युद्ध began in अप्रैल 1927, amidst the उत्तरी expedition, and essentially ended जब प्रमुख active battles ceased in 1950.
the conflict eventually resulted in two de facto states, the Republic of चीन ( ROC ) in Taiwan and the लोगों 's Republic of चीन ( PRC ) in mainland China, both claiming to be the legitimate सरकारी of China.
the युद्ध represented an वैचारिक विभाजित ( Left vs. Right ) between the Communist CPC, and the kmt 's brand of Nationalism.
the civil युद्ध continued intermittently until late 1937, when the दो पार्टियों formed a Second संयुक्त सामने to काउंटर a Japanese invasion.
चीन 's full-scale civil युद्ध resumed in 1946, a year बाद the end of hostilities with Japan.
After four more years, 1950 देखी the cessation of major military hostilities—with the newly संस्थापित People 's Republic of China controlling mainland चीन ( सहित Hainan ), और the Republic of चीन 's jurisdiction होने प्रतिबंधित to ताईवान, penghu, quemoy, matsu और अनेक outlying islands.
the Kuomintang शिकस्त is attributed to several factors : Corruption - च्यांग लिखा in his डायरी on June 1948 that the kmt था failed, not because of external enemies लकिन क्युकी of दुर्गन्ध इससे within.
दमदार initial support इससे the u.S. diminished, और तब, stopped.
( partly क्युकी of kmt corruption और anti-democratic शासन, और partly because of the अनिश्चित U.S. विदेशी policy towards साम्यवादी between 1945 और 1950 ) ; Communist जमीन सुधार policy promised poor peasants farmland इससे their जमींदार.
इस ensured pla popular support.
बाद the आत्मसमर्पण of Japan at the end of World War ii, Soviet शक्तियां turned over उनके captured Japanese हथियार to the cpc and अनुमत the cpc to take control of territory in Manchuria.
To this day, no armistice or सलाम treaty has ever महरूम हस्ताक्षरित, और it is debated as to the whether the Civil युद्ध has legally ended.
Cross-Strait संबंध have महरूम hindered by military threats और राजनैतिक और आर्थिक दबाव, particularly over Taiwan 's political औकात, with both governments officially adhering to a `` one-china नीति. ''
the पीआरसी स्टिल actively दावा ताईवान as भाग of its territory और continues to threaten the आरओसी साथ a military आक्रमण if the आरओसी officially declares independence by बदलना इसके name to and gaining अंतरराष्ट्रीय recognition as the Republic of Taiwan.
The ROC mutually दावा mainland चीन, and they both continue the लड़ो over diplomatic मान्यता.
आज, the war as such occurs on the political and आर्थिक fronts in the रूप of cross-Strait relations ; however, the two पृथक de facto राज्य have close आर्थिक ties.
The One सौ बारहवीं United States कॉंग्रेस थी the बैठक of the legislative branch of the संयुक्त States संघीय government, इससे January 3, 2011 until January 3, 2013.
It convened in वॉशिंगटन, D.C. on जनवरी 3, 2011, और ended on जनवरी 3, 2013, 17 days पहले the समाप्त of the presidential term to जिससे बराक ओबामा थी निर्वाचित in 2008.
Senators निर्वाचित to regular शर्तें in 2006 समाप्त those शर्तें in this Congress.
इस Congress शामिल the last House of Representatives elected इससे congressional districts कि were apportioned आधारित on the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
in the 2010 midterm elections, the रिपब्लिकन Party won the majority in the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि.
जबकि the डेमोक्रेट kept उनके सीनेट बहुमत, it थी reduced इससे the previous कॉंग्रेस.
This was the first कॉंग्रेस in which the House और Senate यहूद controlled by अलग parties चूंकि the 107th कॉंग्रेस ( 2001–2003 ), and the पहला कॉंग्रेस to begin that way since the 99th कॉंग्रेस ( 1985–1987 ).
In इस Congress, the House of Representatives था the largest number of Republican सदस्यों, 242, चूंकि the 80th कॉंग्रेस ( 1947–1949 ).
It was also the first कॉंग्रेस since 1947 in which no member of the Kennedy family परोसा, as well as the सबसे politically polarized कॉंग्रेस since पुनर्निर्माण, साथ रिकार्ड low स्वीकृति ratings.
Wealth in the United राज्य is commonly measured in terms of net worth, जिससे is the sum of all एसेट, सहित घर equity, ऋण all देनदारी.
the कुल net worth of US households and nonprofit संगठन 1945–2009, unadjusted for inflation or population बदलें.
लिये example, a household in possession of an $ 800,000 house, $ 5,000 in mutual funds, $ 30,000 in cars, $ 20,000 worth of भण्डार in उनके own कम्पनी, और a $ 45,000 ira होता have एसेट totaling $ 900,000.
assuming that this household would have a $ 250,000 बंधक, $ 40,000 in car लोन, और $ 10,000 in credit card debt, इसके debts would कुल $ 300,000.
Subtracting the debts from the लायक of इस household 's एसेट ( 900,000 - $ 300,000 = $ 600,000 ), इस household would have a जाल लायक of $ 600,000.
जाल लायक can vary with fluctuations in value of the underlying एसेट.
the wealth —more specifically, the मध्य जाल worth—of households in the संयुक्त राज्य is varied with संबंध to race, शिक्षा, geographic स्थान और gender.
As one होता expect, households साथ वृहद income feature the उच्चतम net worths, though high income can नहीं be लिया as an सदा accurate indicator of net worth.
Overall the क्रमांक of wealthier households is on the rise, with baby boomers hitting the highs of their करियर.
in जोड, माल is unevenly वितरित, with the wealthiest 25 % of us households owning 87 % of the माल in the संयुक्त राज्य, जिससे was $ 54.2 खरब in 2009.
सहित human पूंजी ऐसे as skills, the संयुक्त Nations अनुमानित the total wealth of the संयुक्त राज्य in 2008 to be $ 118 trillion.
इस आलेख deals साथ चयनात्मक पृष्ठीय rhizotomy ( SDR ) बल्कि than the rhizotomy procedures लिये pain राहत ; लिये those प्रक्रियाओं, जिससे have begun to लो the name `` rhizotomy '' in certain उदाहरण, see facet rhizotomy और similar.
a rhizotomy ( ) is a पद chiefly referring to a neurosurgical कार्यविधि that selectively destroys समस्यापूर्ण तंत्रिका जड़ें in the स्पाइनल cord, सबसे प्रायः to relieve the symptoms of neuromuscular conditions such as spastic diplegia और other forms of spastic दिमागी palsy.
The selective dorsal rhizotomy ( SDR ) for spastic दिमागी palsy has महरूम the main उपयोग of rhizotomy for neurosurgeons specialising in spastic CP since the 1980s ; in this सर्जरी, the spasticity-causing nerves are isolated and तब targeted और नष्ट.
The sensory nerve roots, where spasticity is स्तिथ, are first अलग इससे the मोटर ones, और the तंत्रिका fibres to be cut are then identified via electromyographic stimulation.
The ones producing spasticity हैं then selectively lesioned with tiny विद्युत pulses.
In spasticity, rhizotomy precisely targets and नष्ट the क्षतिग्रस्त nerves that don’t receive gamma amino butyric acid, जिससे is the कोर problem for लोगों साथ spastic cerebral palsy.
ये over-firing, non-GABA-absorbing nerves generate असामान्य electrical कार्यकलाप during the EMG परीक्षण phase in sdr and हैं thus माना to be the सोर्स of the patient 's hypertonia ; वे are eliminated साथ the विद्युत pulses एकबार identified, while the remaining nerves और nerve रूट carrying the correct messages remain fully बरकरार और untouched.
This means कि the spasticity is permanently dissolved, and that this is किया without affecting बेचैन प्रणाली sensitivity or फलन in अन्य क्षेत्रों, because the तभी nerves नष्ट हैं the over-firing ones responsible for the muscle tightness.
the terms rhizotomy और neurotomy are also increasingly बनने interchangeable in the उपचार of chronic back pain from अपक्षयी disc disease.
This is a procedure पुकारा a facet rhizotomy and is नहीं a सर्जिकल कार्यविधि लकिन is बजाय किया on an outpatient basis using a simple जांच to लागू radiofrequency लहरें to the impinged pain-causing nerve रूट lying between the facet संयुक्त और the vertebral body.
ऐसे रेडियो frequency तंत्रिका lesioning परिणाम in five to आठ or अधिक months of पीड़ा राहत before the nerve regenerates और another round of the कार्यविधि needs to be performed.
a facet rhizotomy is just one of many different forms of radiofrequency ablation, and its use of the `` rhizotomy '' name should not be confused with the sdr procedure.
Migrant मजदूर in California, 1935
The पद migrant worker रै अलग official meanings and connotations in different भाग of the संसार.
the United राष्ट्र ' definition is व्यापक, including any people working outside of their घर देश.
the पद can also be प्रयुक्त to describe someone who migrates within a देश, possibly उनके अपना, in order to pursue work such as मौसमी work.
फोटोग्राफ of लील वेन साथ teardrop टैटू नीचे उसके आँखें.
The teardrop टैटू or tear tattoo is a सांकेतिक टैटू that is placed underneath the eye.
it रै no फिक्स्ड अर्थ but almost all meanings ( देखिए नीचे ) have some कनेक्शन to prison.
U.S. Route 75 is a north–south U.S. राजमार्ग.
the highway 's उत्तरी terminus is in kittson County, मिनेसोटा, at the Canadian border, where it once जारी as मनिटोबा राजमार्ग 75 on the अन्य पक्ष of the now-closed border crossing.
Its दक्षिणी terminus is at अंतरराज्यीय 30 and अंतरराज्यीय 45 in डलास, Texas, where it is known as उत्तर सेंट्रल Expressway.
u.S. 75 was a border-to-border route, from Canada to the गल्फ of Mexico at Galveston, टेक्सास.
however, the संपूर्ण खण्ड south of डलास, Texas has महरूम decommissioned in favor of Interstate 45, a cutoff section of town-to-town सतह सड़क having become राज्य Highway 75.
निम्नतर Ninth वार्ड is a neighborhood of the नगर of New Orleans.
as the name implies, it is भाग of the नवीं वार्ड of नई Orleans.
The निम्नतर Ninth वार्ड is प्रायः विचार of as the संपूर्ण area भीतर नई ऑरलियन्स downriver of the औद्योगिक कनाल ; however, the City नियोजन Commission divides इस क्षेत्रफल into the Lower Ninth वार्ड ( 2 ) और Holy Cross ( 3 ) neighborhoods.
the term `` निम्नतर '' refers to its location दूर towards the मुँह of the Mississippi नदी, `` down '' or `` नीचे '' the बाकी of the city in लोकल भौगोलिक शब्दावली.
But the 9th वार्ड, like सब Wards in New Orleans, is a voting ज़िला.
the 9th Ward थी added as a मतदान district in 1852.
the `` निम्नतर '' 9th Ward is रचित of वार्ड 9 जिले 1, 2, 4, और 7 जिससे मेक up the Holy क्रॉस क्षेत्रफल और वार्ड 9 Districts 3, 5, 6, और 8.
उच्चतर मतदान ज़िला संख्याएँ in the 9th Ward ( 8-27 ) हैं on the upriver side of the औद्योगिक कनाल.
the क्षेत्रफल आए to नेशनल attention for its devastation in the aftermath of Hurricane कैटरीना in 2005.
Hubble दृश्य of Copernicus crater ( inset ), जिससे is परिचय 58 miles ( 93 km ) wide
Red और orange tinted Moon, as देखी from Earth during a lunar eclipse, जहाँ the धरती आता between the चंद्रमा और Sun
The Moon is the तभी प्राकृतिक उपग्रह of the Earth, and the fifth largest satellite in the सौर System.
It is the largest प्राकृतिक उपग्रह of a planet in the Solar System सापेक्ष to the आकार of its primary, having 27 % the diameter और 60 % the density of धरती, resulting in इसके द्रव्यमान.
The चंद्रमा is the दूसरी densest उपग्रह बाद io, a उपग्रह of Jupiter.
the Moon is in synchronous rotation साथ धरती, always showing the same face साथ इसके निकट पक्ष चिह्नित by अंधेरा volcanic मरिया कि भरण between the bright प्राचीन crustal highlands और the prominent impact craters.
it is the brightest ऑब्जेक्ट in the sky after the सूर्य, although इसके सतह is actually बहुत dark, with a reflectance समान to कि of coal.
इसके prominence in the आसमान और इसके regular cycle of phases have, चूंकि ancient times, बना the चंद्रमा an महत्वपूर्ण सांस्कृतिक influence on language, पंचांग, आर्ट और mythology.
the Moon 's gravitational influence produces the समंदर tides and the मिनट lengthening of the day.
The चंद्रमा 's current orbital अलहदा, about thirty times the व्यास of the Earth, causes it to appear almost the same आकार in the sky as the सूर्य, allowing it to cover the सूर्य nearly precisely in total सौर eclipses.
This मिलान of apparent विज़ुअल आकार is a संयोग.
the चंद्रमा 's रैखिक distance इससे the Earth is फिलहाल increasing at a rate of 3.82±0.07cm प्रति year, but this रेट is not निरंतर.
The Moon is thought to have formed nearly 4.5 अरब सालो पहले, नहीं long बाद the Earth.
हालांकि there have been several hypotheses लिये इसके उत्पत्ति in the past, the वर्तमान सबसे widely स्वीकृत explanation is कि the Moon formed इससे the debris बाएँ over after a giant impact between Earth और a Mars -आकारd body.
The Moon is the तभी celestial देह other than Earth on जिससे इंसानो have नियत पैर.
the सोवियत Union 's Luna कार्यक्रम was the first to पहुँचें the Moon with unmanned spacecraft in 1959 ; the संयुक्त States ' नासा Apollo कार्यक्रम achieved the only manned missions to date, शुरूआत साथ the first मानवयुक्त चंद्र orbiting mission by अपोलो 8 in 1968, and छह मानवयुक्त चंद्र अवतरण between 1969 और 1972, साथ the पहला होने अपोलो 11.
These missions लौटे over 380 kg of चंद्र रॉक्स, which have महरूम used to develop a geological understanding of the चंद्रमा 's origins, the formation of its internal ढांचा, and इसके subsequent history.
बाद the अपोलो 17 mission in 1972, the चंद्रमा रै been visited only by unmanned spacecraft, notably by the फाइनल सोवियत lunokhod rover.
चूंकि 2004, जापानी, चीन, India, the United States, और the European स्पेस Agency have प्रत्येक sent lunar orbiters.
ये spacecraft have contributed to confirming the डिस्कवरी of चंद्र water बर्फ in permanently shadowed craters at the poles और बंधी into the चंद्र regolith.
भविष्य मानवयुक्त मिशन to the चंद्रमा have महरूम planned, सहित government as well as privately funded प्रयत्न.
the चंद्रमा remains, under the Outer Space सन्धि, free to सब nations to explore for शांतिपूर्ण purposes.
रोनाल्ड विल्सन Reagan ( ; February 6, 1911 – जून 5, 2004 ) was the 40th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States ( 1981–1989 ).
Prior to that, he was the 33rd Governor of कैलिफ़ोर्निया ( 1967–1975 ), and a रेडियो, film and टेलीविज़न actor.
born in Tampico, Illinois, और raised in डिक्सन, reagan थी educated at Eureka कॉलेज, कमाई a Bachelor of Arts degree in अर्थशास्त्र and समाजशास्त्र.
बाद graduating, reagan moved पहला to Iowa to कार्य as a रेडियो broadcaster और तब, in 1937, to लॉस एंजिल्स where he began a करियर as an actor, first in films and बाद television.
Some of his most notable films शामिल Knute rockne, सब American ( 1940 ), Kings Row ( 1942 ), और bedtime लिये bonzo ( 1951 ).
Reagan परोसा as अध्यक्ष of the स्क्रीन Actors Guild और बाद as a प्रवक्ता for General इलेक्ट्रिक ( ge ) ; उसके प्रारंभ in politics occurred during उसके कार्य for GE.
Originally a सदस्य of the Democratic पार्टी, उसके positions began shifting rightward in the 1950s, और he switched to the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी in 1962.
After delivering a rousing वाक in support of Barry goldwater 's अध्यक्षीय candidacy in 1964, he was persuaded to तलाश the कैलिफ़ोर्निया governorship, winning दो years later and again in 1970.
he was पराजित in his run लिये the Republican presidential nomination in 1968 and in 1976, लकिन जीती both the नामांकन और general election in 1980, defeating लाज़िम jimmy कार्टर.
as president, reagan implemented sweeping new राजनैतिक and आर्थिक पहलों.
उसके supply-side आर्थिक policies, उतावले `` Reaganomics ``, advocated reducing tax rates to spur economic growth, controlling the money सप्लाई to reduce inflation, deregulation of the अर्थव्यवस्था, and reducing government spending.
In his first पद he survived an assassination attempt, took a hard line विरूद्ध मजदूर unions, announced a new War on Drugs, and ordered an invasion of Grenada.
He थी re-elected in a landslide in 1984, proclaiming कि it थी `` Morning in America ``.
उसके दूसरी term थी primarily चिह्नित by विदेशी matters, ऐसे as the ending of the ठंडा War, the 1986 bombing of लीबिया, और the रहस्योद्घाटन of the Iran-Contra affair.
सरेआम describing the सोवियत संघ as an `` दुष्ट साम्राज्य ``, he समर्थित anti-communist आंदोलनों विश्वव्यापी और spent उसके first पद forgoing the रणनीति of détente by ordering a विशाल military buildup in an arms race साथ the ussr.
Reagan negotiated साथ Soviet General सचिव मिखाइल Gorbachev, culminating in the INF Treaty और the घटी of both देशों ' nuclear arsenals.
reagan बाएँ दफ्तर in 1989.
in 1994, the former अध्यक्ष disclosed कि he had महरूम diagnosed with Alzheimer 's बीमारी earlier in the year ; he died टेन सालो बाद at the age of 93.
A conservative icon, he बाँधने highly in पब्लिक opinion पोल of u.S. Presidents and is credited लिये generating an ideological पुनर्जागरण on the American political right.
Complete नियत of scrolls, constituting the संपूर्ण Tanakh.
The Tanakh (, or ; भी tenakh, tenak, tanach ) is a name used in Judaism लिये the canon of the यहूदी Bible.
The tanakh is also known as the masoretic Text or the Miqra.
The name is an एक्रोनिम formed इससे the आरंभिक Hebrew अक्षर of the Masoretic Text 's three traditional subdivisions : the तोरा ( `` शिक्षण '', भी known as the पाँच किताबे of Moses ), Nevi'im ( `` नबियों '' ) और Ketuvim ( `` कृतियाँ '' ) —hence TaNaKh.
The name `` Miqra '' ( מקרא ), meaning `` कि which is read '', is an alternative Hebrew term for the tanakh.
the books of the tanakh were relayed साथ an accompanying मौखिक परंपरा passed on by each पीढी, called the Oral Torah.
The Kawasaki Ninja ZX-6R is a Kawasaki 600 cc क्लास sport मोटरसाइकिल.
It was introduced in 1995, और has महरूम constantly अद्यतनीकृत throughout the years in जवाब to new products from Honda, suzuki, and Yamaha.
the zx श्रेणी is what was known as the Ninja लकीर of कावासाकी मोटरसाइकिल in the 1980s और still carries the name today.
Assassination attempts and भूखंड on राष्ट्रपतियों of the संयुक्त राज्य have महरूम numerous : अधिक than 20 कोशिशें to kill बैठे और पूर्व राष्ट्रपतियों, as खूब as the presidents-elect, are ज्ञात.
Four बैठे राष्ट्रपतियों have been killed : Abraham lincoln ( the 16th अध्यक्ष ), James A. Garfield ( the 20th President ), William McKinley ( the 25th अध्यक्ष ) और John F. कैनेडी ( the 35th President ).
दो राष्ट्रपतियों यहूद injured in attempted assassinations : पूर्व अध्यक्ष थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट ( the 26th President ), और President Ronald Reagan ( the 40th President ).
हालांकि the historian j.w. Clarke has सुझाया कि सबसे अमरीकी assassinations were नीतियां प्रेरित actions, carried आउट by rational मेन, not all ऐसे हमले have महरूम undertaken for political कारण.
Some हमलावर था questionable दिमागी स्थिरता, and a few were judged legally उन्मादी.
चूंकि the Vice अध्यक्ष of the United राज्य रै for more than a century been elected इससे the वही political पार्टी as the अध्यक्ष, the assassination of the अध्यक्ष is unlikely to result in major नीति परिवर्तन.
This may बताइये क्यों political समूह typically do not make ऐसे हमले.
जहाँ the Red Fern Grows is a अनोखा written by विल्सन Rawls in 1961 परिचय a boy who खरीदता और trains दो redbone coonhound hunting dogs.
ओक्लाहोमा ( ) ( pawnee : Uukuhuúwa, Cayuga : Gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a राज्य स्तिथ in West दक्षिण Central United राज्य.
Oklahoma is the 20th सबसे extensive और the 28th most populous of the 50 संयुक्त राज्य.
the राज्य 's name is निकला इससे the choctaw words okla और humma, अर्थ `` red people '', and it is known informally by its उपनाम, the sooner State.
Formed by the combination of Oklahoma territory और भारतीय Territory on नवम्बर 16, 1907, Oklahoma was the 46th state to डालें the संघ.
Its निवासियों are ज्ञात as oklahomans or, informally `` okies '', and इसके capital और largest city is ओक्लाहोमा नगर.
A major producer of natural gas, आयल, and कृषि, Oklahoma relies on an आर्थिक आधार of विमानन, उर्जा, दूरसंचार, and biotechnology.
it has एक of the fastest growing economies in the nation, रैंकिंग among the top राज्य in per capita income विकास और gross domestic उत्पाद growth.
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as ओक्लाहोमा 's प्राथमिक economic anchors, साथ nearly दो thirds of Oklahomans living भीतर their महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रों.
With छोटी पहाड़ सीमाएँ, prairie, mesas, and eastern वनों, सबसे of ओक्लाहोमा lies in the Great Plains और the U.S. आंतरिक हाइलैंड्स —a region especially prone to severe मौसम.
in addition to having a व्यापकता of अंग्रेज़ी, जर्मनी, Scottish, आयरिश and देशी American ancestry, अधिक than 25 Native American भाषाएं हैं spoken in Oklahoma, दूसरी तभी to California.
Oklahoma is located on a संगम of three प्रमुख अमरीकी सांस्कृतिक regions और historically served as a route लिये चौपायों drives, a destination लिये southern settlers, और a government-sanctioned territory for देशी Americans.
Redwall, by ब्रायन ज़ाक, is a श्रेणी of children 's काल्पनिक novels.
it is the शीर्षक of the पहला book of the श्रेणी, प्रकाशित in 1986, as well as the name of the ऐबी प्रदर्शित in the किताब और the name of an एनिमेटेड TV series based on तीन of the novels ( Redwall, mattimeo, and Martin the योद्धा ), which पहला aired in 1999.
The books हैं primarily aimed at पुरानी children, लकिन have fans of all आयु.
There have been twenty-two novels and दो चित्र books published.
the twenty-second, और final, novel, The Rogue क्रू, was posthumously released on may 3, 2011.
Natural Gas is usually measured by आवाज़ in the संयुक्त राज्य और is stated in cubic फीट.
A cubic foot of gas is the amount of गैस needed to भरण a volume of one घन पैर under set conditions of pressure और temperature.To माप larger amounts of natural gas, a `` therm '' is प्रयुक्त to denote 100 घन feet, और `` mcf '' is used to denote 1,000 घन फीट.
To provide वृहद accuracy in comparing fuels, energy content is measured in terms of `` अंग्रेजों थर्मल इकाई ( BTU 's ). ''
A btu is the amount of ऊष्मा जरूरी to उठाएँ एक पाउंड of जल ( approximately a pint ), एक उपाधि Fahrenheit at or close to its पाइंट of अधिकतम density.
एक अंग्रेजों therm ( प्रतीक thm ) is a non- SI ईकाई of heat energy बराबर to 100,000 British thermal units ( btu ).
it is approximately the उर्जा equivalent of burning 100 cubic फीट ( often referred to as 1 CCF ) of natural gas.
चूंकि ( Natural Gas ) मीटर माप volume और नहीं energy content, a therm फ़ैक्टर is प्रयुक्त by ( Natural ) गैस companies to convert the आवाज़ of गैस used to its ऊष्मा समतुल्य, and thus गणना the actual उर्जा उपयोग.
The therm फ़ैक्टर is प्रायः in the units therms/ccf.
It होगा vary with the मिक्सर of hydrocarbons in the प्राकृतिक gas.
प्राकृतिक gas साथ a higher than औसत concentration of इथेन, प्रोपेन or ब्यूटेन will have a उच्चतर therm factor.
Impurities, such as कार्बन dioxide or नाइट्रोजन, निम्नतर the therm factor.
the आवाज़ of the gas is calculated as if measured at मानक temperature and pressure ( STP ).
The ऊष्मा सामग्री of natural गैस is solely निर्भर on the composition of the गैस, और is स्वतंत्र of तापमान और pressure.
One therm is बराबर to परिचय 105.5 megajoules, 25,200 kilocalories or 29.3 kilowatt-hours.
One therm can also be provided by about of natural गैस.
The therm sometimes has been confused साथ the thermie ( देखिए below ).
The names of both इकाई come इससे the यूनानी शब्द लिये heat.
a thermie ( th ) is a metric unit of heat energy, भाग of the meter-tonne-second system sometimes used by यूरोपीय इंजीनियर्स.
the thermie is equal to the amount of उर्जा जरूरी to raise the तापमान of 1 tonne of जल by 1 °C.
The thermie is equivalent to 1,000 kilocalories, 4.1868 megajoules or 3968.3 btu.
the American सिविल War ( acw ), also ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the States or बस the सिविल War ( see नामकरण ), थी a सिविल युद्ध fought इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी slave states that declared उनके secession और formed the Confederate States of अमेरिका ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` दक्षिण '' ).
The युद्ध had its उत्पत्ति in the issue of गुलामी, विशेषकर the extension of गुलामी into the पश्चिमी territories.
Foreign शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene.
बाद four सालो of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना, the Confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the मुश्किल Reconstruction प्रक्रम of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed स्लेव began.
In the 1860 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into United राज्य ' territories.
lincoln जीती, लकिन before उसके inauguration on March 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave राज्य formed the Confederacy.
outgoing लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्ष जेम्स Buchanan और the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
lincoln 's inaugural पता घोषित उसके administration होता not initiate civil युद्ध.
आठ remaining slave states जारी to अस्वीकृत calls लिये secession.
confederate forces जब्त numerous federal दुर्गों within territory claimed by the confederacy.
a सलाम Conference विफल to find a compromise, and both sides prepared for युद्ध.
The Confederates assumed that यूरोपीय देशों were so dependent on `` किंग Cotton `` कि they would intervene ; none किया and none पहचाना the नई confederate राज्य of America.
hostilities began on अप्रैल 12, 1861, जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट Sumter, a key fort held by Union troops in South कैरोलिना.
Lincoln पुकारा for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently, चार अधिक स्लेव states joined the Confederacy, bringing उनके कुल to eleven.
The संघ जल्द controlled the किनारा states and established a नवल blockade that अबोध the southern अर्थव्यवस्था.
the Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
the autumn 1862 Confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a Union state ) ended with confederate रिट्रीट at the Battle of antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the emancipation उदघोषणा, which made समाप्ति slavery a war लक्ष्य.
To the वेस्ट, by summer 1862 the Union नष्ट the confederate river नेवी, तब much of उनके western armies, और the Union at vicksburg विभाजित the Confederacy in दो at the मिसिसिपी River.
in 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
पश्चिमी successes led to Ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of all संघ armies in 1864.
in the पश्चिमी थिएटर, William T. Sherman drove east to कैप्चर Atlanta और marched to the sea, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the संसाधन और manpower to attack the confederacy from all दिशानिर्देश, and could afford to fight battles of अपघर्षण through the Overland अभियान towards Richmond, the Confederate पूंजी.
The defending confederate फौज विफल, अग्रणी to Lee 's surrender to Grant at appomattox अदालत House on April 9, 1865.
the American सिविल युद्ध थी एक of the earliest true industrial wars.
Railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
the mobilization of civilian factories, खानों, shipyards, बैंको, परिवहन and खाना आपूर्तियाँ all foreshadowed संसार युद्ध i.
it remains the deadliest war in अमरीकी इतिहास, resulting in the deaths of an अनुमानित 750,000 soldiers और an undetermined क्रमांक of civilian casualties.
Historian जॉन huddleston estimates the मौत टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of all Northern males 20–45 years old, और 30 percent of सब दक्षिणी white males aged 18–40.
विलियम ब्रूस Jenner ( born अक्तूबर 28, 1949 ) is a पूर्व U.S. track and field खिलाड़ी, motivational स्पीकर, socialite, television personality और businessman.
he won the सुनहरा medal for decathlon in the मॉन्ट्रियल 1976 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक.
Following उसके Olympic जीत और the सम्बन्धित recognition, he शादीशुदा Kris Kardashian, and his पेशेवर career evolved into being a टेलीविज़न celebrity.
By 1981, he था starred in अनेक made-for-tv फिल्मों and was Erik Estrada 's replacement on the शीर्ष rated tv श्रेणी CHiPs.
he has छह children : बर्ट, केसी, ब्रैंडन, ब्रोडी, Kendall और काइली.
चूंकि उसके 1991 marriage to क्रिस जेनर, he is the stepfather to कोर्टनी, किम, khloe and Rob कार्दशियन.
चूंकि 2007, he रै appeared with his blended परिवार on keeping up with the kardashians.
Escherichia कोलाई ( ; commonly abbreviated E. coli ) is a gram-negative, rod-shaped bacterium कि is commonly मिला in the lower intestine of warm-blooded जीवों ( endotherms ).
Most E. coli strains are harmless, लकिन कुछ serotypes can cause गंभीर खाना विषाक्तता in humans, और are occasionally जिम्मेदार लिये उत्पाद recalls due to खाना contamination.
The हानिरहित strains हैं part of the normal फ्लोरा of the gut, और can लाभ their होस्ट by producing vitamin k2, और by preventing the establishment of pathogenic जीवाणु भीतर the intestine.
E. कोलाई और related bacteria constitute परिचय 0.1 % of gut फ्लोरा, and fecal–oral हस्तांतरण is the प्रमुख रूट through which pathogenic strains of the bacterium कारण बीमारी.
कोशिकाएं हैं able to जीवित outside the body लिये a सीमित amount of time, जिससे makes उन्हें ideal indicator organisms to परीक्षण पर्यावरणीय samples for fecal contamination.
There is, however, a growing देह of शोध that रै examined environmentally persistent E. coli जिससे can survive लिये extended अवधि outside of the मेजबान.
The bacterium can भी be grown easily and inexpensively in a laboratory सेटिंग, और रै महरूम intensively investigated for over 60 सालो.
E. कोलाई is the most widely पढ़ाई prokaryotic model organism, और an important प्रजाति in the फ़ील्ड of biotechnology and सूक्ष्मजैविकी, where it has परोसा as the मेजबान सजीव लिये the बहुमत of work साथ recombinant डीएनए.
Area कोड 217 is the उत्तर अमरीकी telephone area कोड for much of पश्चिमी और central Illinois.
the 217 area शामिल Illinois ' पूंजी, springfield, plus champaign, Urbana, Decatur, Danville, Quincy, और rantoul.
217 was one of the असली क्षेत्रफल कोड, which यहूद निर्मित in 1947.
the only significant change in 217 's boundaries was in 1957, जब its उत्तरी portion थी संयुक्त with भाग of area कोड 815 to रूप area कोड 309.

Ozone depletion describes two distinct लकिन सम्बन्धित phenomena observed चूंकि the लेट 1970s : a steady मनाही of परिचय 4 % per दशक in the total आवाज़ of ओज़ोन in धरती 's stratosphere ( the ओज़ोन परत ), और a much larger springtime decrease in stratospheric ozone over Earth 's ध्रुवीय regions.
the latter phenomenon is referred to as the ozone छेद.
in जोड to these well-known stratospheric phenomena, वहीँ हैं also springtime polar tropospheric ओज़ोन depletion events.
the details of polar ओज़ोन hole formation differ from कि of mid-latitude thinning, लकिन the सबसे important प्रक्रम in दोनो is catalytic destruction of ozone by atomic हैलोजन्स.
the प्रमुख source of these हैलोजन अणु in the stratosphere is photodissociation of man-made halocarbon refrigerants ( CFCs, freons, halons ).
These यौगिकों हैं transported into the stratosphere बाद being उत्सर्जित at the surface.
Both types of ozone depletion were observed to बढ़ाएँ as emissions of halo-carbons increased.
CFCs और अन्य contributory substances हैं referred to as ozone-depleting substances ( ODS ).
Since the ओज़ोन layer prevents most harmful uvb wavelengths ( 280–315 nm ) of पराबैंगनी light ( uv light ) इससे गुजर through the Earth 's atmosphere, observed और प्रक्षिप्त decreases in ozone have उत्पन्न विश्वव्यापी concern अग्रणी to अपनाना of the मॉन्ट्रियल Protocol that bans the production of cfcs, halons, and अन्य ozone-depleting रसायन such as carbon tetrachloride और trichloroethane.
it is suspected that a किस्में of biological consequences ऐसे as increases in skin कर्कट, cataracts, क्षति to पौधे, और reduction of plankton populations in the ocean 's photic मण्डल may परिणाम from the increased UV exposure due to ओज़ोन depletion.
The Preamble to the संयुक्त States संविधान is a ब्रैड introductory statement of the संविधान 's आधारभूत उद्देश्य and guiding सिद्धान्त.
It राज्य in सामान्य शर्तें, और न्यायालयों have referred to it as विश्वसनीय evidence of, the founding Fathers ' इरादों regarding the संविधान 's meaning and what वे hoped the संविधान होता achieve as it pertains to सब of the लोगों of the United States.
as the phrase, `` we the people '' suggests कि the नई सरकारी originates इससे the people of the संयुक्त States and it sets into motion a सवाल as it pertains to कि विशाल जनसांख्यिकी concerning the individual अधिकारों और equality among all लोगों ; इस can be देखी सबसे broadly in the divide between republicanism and social democracy.

the shot put ( pronounced ) is a track और फ़ील्ड इवेंट involving `` फेंकना '' / '' putting '' ( फेंकना in a pushing गति ) a heavy spherical object —the shot—as दूर as possible.
The shot put प्रतियोगिता लिये मेन has महरूम a part of the modern ओलंपिक since उनके पुनरुद्धार in 1896, महिलाओं 's competition began in 1948.
Map of the United Nations ( UN ) सदस्य states, साथ उनके territories ( सहित dependent territories ) पहचाना by the un in ब्लू
वहीँ हैं संयुक्त राष्ट्र ( UN ) member states, and प्रत्येक of उन्हें is a member of the United Nations General Assembly.
The criteria लिये admission of new members हैं नियत out in the United Nations चार्टर, अध्याय II, आलेख 4:
A अनुशंसा for admission इससे the Security परिषद requires affirmative votes इससे at तनिक नौ of the परिषद 's fifteen सदस्यों, साथ none of the five स्थाई सदस्यों मतदान against.
The सुरक्षा Council 's अनुशंसा must then be subsequently approved in the General सभा by a two-thirds बहुमत vote.
in principle, only sovereign states can become UN members, और फिलहाल all un members हैं sovereign states ( although a few सदस्यों were नहीं sovereign when they joined the UN ).
Because a राज्य can only be admitted to the UN by the approval of the Security परिषद and the General Assembly, a क्रमांक of states that may be माना sovereign राज्य according to the Montevideo सम्मेलन criteria are not सदस्यों क्युकी the UN does नहीं consider them to possess sovereignty, मुख्यतः due to the कमी of अंतरराष्ट्रीय मान्यता or opposition from निश्चित सदस्यों.
In जोड to the member states, the un also invites non-member राज्य ( फिलहाल two : the पावन See और फिलिस्तीन ), intergovernmental संगठन, और other international organizations and entities whose statehood or sovereignty are not precisely पारिभाषित, to become observers at the सामान्य Assembly, allowing them to participate and speak, लकिन not vote, in सामान्य Assembly meetings.
the Eiffel मीनार (, ) is an आयरन जाली मीनार located on the Champ de मंगल in पेरिस, named बाद the इंजीनियर Gustave Eiffel, जिनकी कम्पनी designed और built the tower.
erected in 1889 as the entrance arch to the 1889 संसार 's मेला, it has become दोनो a global सांस्कृतिक icon of France and one of the सबसे recognizable structures in the संसार.
The tower is the tallest structure in पेरिस और the most-visited paid स्मारक in the world ; 7.1 million people ascended it in 2011.
the तीसरा level वेधशाला 's upper platform is at the उच्चतम accessible to पब्लिक in the यूरोपीय संघ और the highest in यूरोपीय as long as the मंच of the ostankino मीनार, at, remains closed as a परिणाम of the आग of August 2000.
the मीनार received इसके 250 millionth आगंतुक in 2010.
The tower स्टैंड tall, परिचय the same ऊँचाई as an 81-storey भवन.
दौरान इसके निर्माण, the Eiffel Tower surpassed the Washington Monument to assume the title of the tallest man-made structure in the संसार, a title it आयोजित for 41 सालो, जबतक the Chrysler भवन in New यॉर्क City थी built in 1930.
क्युकी of the जोड, in 1957, of the एंटीना atop the Eiffel मीनार, it is अभी taller than the क्रिसलर भवन.
नहीं सहित broadcast एन्टेना, it is the second-tallest structure in France, after the millau Viaduct.
the tower has three स्तर लिये visitors.
टिकटें can be खरीदा to ascend, by stairs or lift ( लिफ्ट ), to the पहला and दूसरी स्तर.
the चलना इससे मैदान स्तर to the first स्तर is over 300 कदम, as is the walk इससे the first to the second level.
The तीसरा और उच्चतम level is accessible only by lift—stairs do exist लकिन are usually बंद to the पब्लिक.
The पहला और second levels have restaurants.
The मीनार रै become the सबसे prominent symbol of both पेरिस and फ़्रांस, प्रायः in the establishing shot of films नियत in the नगर.
Kenneth वेन `` केन '' Jennings III ( born may 23, 1974 ) is an American खेल दिखाएँ contestant and लेखक.
Jennings is विख्यात लिये holding the record for the longest जीतना streak on the U.S. syndicated खेल दिखाएँ jeopardy !
and as होने the all-time leading धन winner on American खेल shows.
in 2004, जेनिंग्स जीती 74 Jeopardy !
खेल before he थी defeated by challenger Nancy Zerg on उसके 75th रूप.
His कुल आय on Jeopardy !
are $ 3,172,700, consisting of $ 2,520,700 over उसके 74 विन्स, a $ 2,000 second-place prize in उसके 75th रूप, a $ 500,000 second-place prize in the jeopardy !
परम Tournament of Champions, as well as half of a $ 300,000 पुरस्कार in the IBM Challenge.
दौरान his first चलाएं of Jeopardy !
