the कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल League or cfl ( ' [ lcf ] in French ) is a पेशेवर खेल लीग स्तिथ in Canada.
The cfl is the highest level of competition in कनाडाई football, a form of gridiron फ़ुटबॉल closely सम्बन्धित to अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल.
Its eight current टीमों, which are स्तिथ in आठ separate शहरों, are विभाजित into दो विभाजन of four teams प्रत्येक — the ईस्ट प्रभाग और the वेस्ट प्रभाग.
The league 's 19-week regular ऋतु runs from late जून to early नवम्बर ; each टोली plays 18 खेल with one bye week.
following the नियमित season, the three teams साथ the बेहतरीन रिकॉर्ड in उनके division ( except if the fourth प्लेस टोली in एक प्रभाग रै a better रिकार्ड than the third प्लेस team in the अन्य प्रभाग, जब the टोली साथ the better रिकार्ड makes the playoffs and `` crosses over '' to the other प्रभाग 's playoff ) compete in the लीग 's three-week divisional playoffs, जिससे culminate in the late-november Grey कप चैंपियनशिप, the देश 's largest सालाना sports और television event.
the cfl was officially founded on जनवरी 19, 1958, making it the second oldest gridiron फ़ुटबॉल league in उत्तर अमेरिका still in आपरेशन, although सब its teams long predate the आधुनिक formation of the लीग.
it is the highest level of खेल in Canadian फ़ुटबॉल, the सबसे लोकप्रिय football league in Canada, and the second-most popular प्रमुख खेल league in Canada, after the National हॉकी लीग.
हालांकि बर्फ hockey is कनाडा 's सबसे लोकप्रिय खेल, the cfl has increased the popularity of Canadian football in क्यूबेक and Western कनाडा.
Canadian football is भी played at amateur levels ( i.e. युवावस्था, ऊँची school, cjfl, QJFL, CIS और वरिष्ठ leagues such as the Alberta Football लीग ).
The 2010s होगा be a significant decade for the cfl in terms of growth, as teams have संवर, विस्तारित स्टेडियम, or योजना to निर्माण entirely नई stadiums.
The मॉन्ट्रियल Alouettes accomplished this first, adding 5,000 सीटे to Percival Molson Memorial Stadium in time लिये the 2010 CFL season.
The Edmonton एस्किमोस and Calgary Stampeders also संवर उनके respective stadiums और facilities लिये the 2010 season.
in 2011, the BC शेर निभाई under a नई, retractable छत in bc Place after spending one और a half सीज़न at साम्राज्य फ़ील्ड.
तब the विन्निपेग ब्लू Bombers होगा play in an entirely new स्टेडियम at the विश्वविद्यालयों of Manitoba, अनुसूचित to खोलें in समय लिये the 2013 ऋतु.
The हैमिल्टन Tiger-Cats, saskatchewan roughriders and the नई ओटावा franchise are also looking at new or extensively-renovated स्टेडियम in the following years.
There are also उम्मीदें of expanding the लीग to अटलांटिक कनाडा ( ideally basing a team in either the more आबादी Halifax, or the अधिक centralized Moncton ), as 2010 and 2011 had regular ऋतु games hosted in Moncton.
According to sports इतिहासकार डगलस Brei, the कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल League holds the भेद of being the तभी professional खेल लीग in उत्तर America, प्रमुख or नाबालिग league, in which प्रत्येक existing मताधिकार रै जीती at least एक league शीर्षक while in उनके current स्थान.
प्रत्येक antibody binds to a विशिष्ट antigen ; an बातचीत समान to a lock and कुंजी.
an antibody ( ab ), also known as an immunoglobulin ( ig ), is a large y-shaped protein उत्पादित by b-cells that is प्रयुक्त by the immune प्रणाली to identify and neutralize foreign objects ऐसे as जीवाणु and viruses.
the एंटीबॉडी recognizes a unique part of the विदेशी निशाना, पुकारा an antigen.
Each टिप of the `` Y '' of an antibody contains a paratope ( a structure analogous to a ताला ) that is specific for एक particular epitope ( similarly analogous to a कुंजी ) on an प्रतिजन, allowing ये दो structures to bind together साथ परिशुद्धता.
using this binding यांत्रिकी, an antibody can tag a microbe or an संक्रमित कोशिका लिये आक्रमण by अन्य भाग of the immune system, or can neutralize its निशाना directly ( for उदाहरण, by ब्लॉकिंग a भाग of a microbe कि is अनिवार्य लिये its आक्रमण और survival ).
the production of antibodies is the main फलन of the humoral प्रतिरक्षा system.
antibodies are secreted by a type of श्वेत रक्त cell पुकारा a प्लाज्मा cell.
antibodies can occur in दो शारीरिक फ़ॉर्म, a घुलनशील रूप that is secreted इससे the कोशिका, और a membrane -bound रूप that is attached to the सतह of a B cell and is referred to as the b cell receptor ( BCR ).
the bcr is तभी found on the सतह of B कोशिकाएं और facilitates the activation of these कोशिकाएं and उनके subsequent differentiation into either antibody factories पुकारा plasma cells, or memory B cells that होगा जीवित in the body and remember कि same प्रतिजन so the B cells can respond तेज़ upon future exposure.
in सबसे मामले, interaction of the b cell with a t हेल्पर cell is जरुरी to उपज full सक्रियण of the b कोशिका and, इसलिए, एंटीबॉडी generation following antigen बाइंडिंग.
Soluble antibodies are released into the blood and tissue fluids, as खूब as many secretions to continue to सर्वेक्षण लिये invading microorganisms.
Antibodies हैं glycoproteins belonging to the immunoglobulin superfamily ; the शर्तें antibody and immunoglobulin हैं often used interchangeably.
Antibodies are typically made of basic structural units—each साथ दो large heavy chains and two छोटी light chains.
There हैं अनेक different types of एंटीबॉडी heavy जंजीरों, and अनेक different kinds of antibodies, which are grouped into different isotypes आधारित on जिससे heavy कड़ी they possess.
पाँच different एंटीबॉडी isotypes हैं known in mammals, जिससे perform अलग roles, और सहायता direct the उचित प्रतिरक्षा जवाब लिये प्रत्येक different type of विदेशी ऑब्जेक्ट they एनकाउंटर.
Though the सामान्य structure of all antibodies is very similar, a छोटी प्रदेश at the टिप of the protein is अत्यधिक variable, allowing millions of antibodies with थोड़ा अलग tip structures, or प्रतिजन binding sites, to exist.
This region is known as the hypervariable region.
Each of these variants can bind to a अलग antigen.
This विशाल विविधता of antibodies allows the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली to recognize an बराबर wide variety of antigens.
The विशाल and विविध जनसांख्यिकी of antibodies is उत्पन्न by यादृच्छिक combinations of a नियत of जीन खण्ड that encode different प्रतिजन बाइंडिंग sites ( or paratopes ), followed by यादृच्छिक mutations in इस क्षेत्रफल of the antibody जीन, जिससे बनाएँ further diversity.
एंटीबॉडी genes also re-organize in a process पुकारा class switching that परिवर्तन the आधार of the heavy कड़ी to another, creating a अलग isotype of the antibody कि retains the प्रतिजन specific परिवर्तनीय प्रदेश.
इस allows a सिंगल एंटीबॉडी to be प्रयुक्त by अनेक अलग parts of the प्रतिरक्षा system.
the symbol used by the Zodiac Killer to sign his correspondence
The zodiac कातिल थी a सीरियल killer जो operated in उत्तरी California in the late 1960s और early 1970s.
The killer 's identity remains unknown.
The Zodiac murdered victims in benicia, vallejo, Lake Berryessa, और सैन फ्रांसिस्को between दिसम्बर 1968 और अक्तूबर 1969.
चार मेन और three महिलाओं between the ages of 16 and 29 यहूद targeted.
The killer originated the नाम `` Zodiac '' in a series of taunting letters भेजा to the लोकल Bay क्षेत्रफल press.
ये letters included four cryptograms ( or ciphers ).
Of the चार cryptograms भेजा, तभी one रै महरूम definitively हल.
संदिग्धों have been नामित by विधि प्रवर्तन और amateur investigators, but no conclusive evidence रै surfaced.
In अप्रैल 2004, the San Francisco पुलिस विभाग marked the case `` inactive '', yet re-opened the case at कुछ पाइंट prior to March 2007.
The case also remains open in the city of vallejo, as खूब as in नापा काउंटी and Solano County.
the California विभाग of इंसाफ has maintained an open case file on the Zodiac murders चूंकि 1969.
जेनिंग्स is a small नगर in and the parish seat of जेफरसन डेविस Parish, Louisiana, United राज्य, near झील Charles.
the population थी 10,383 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, a small मनाही इससे the 2000 tabulation.
the city is 68 प्रतिशत white.
Jennings is the principal नगर of the जेनिंग्स micropolitan सांख्यिकीय Area, which includes all of जेफरसन Davis Parish.
it is भी part of the larger Lake Charles-Jennings संयुक्त Statistical Area.
nanotechnology ( sometimes shortened to `` nanotech '' ) is the manipulation of पदार्थ on an परमाणु and आणविक स्केल.
The earliest, widespread description of nanotechnology referred to the particular technological goal of precisely manipulating अणु और अणुओं for fabrication of macroscale products, also अभी referred to as molecular nanotechnology.
a अधिक generalized description of nanotechnology थी subsequently स्थापित by the National Nanotechnology पहल, which defines nanotechnology as the manipulation of पदार्थ साथ at तनिक one dimension sized from 1 to 100 nanometers.
इस परिभाषा reflects the fact that quantum mechanical प्रभाव are महत्वपूर्ण at इस quantum-realm scale, and so the परिभाषा shifted इससे a particular technological goal to a शोध category inclusive of all प्रकार of research and technologies that deal with the special गुण of पदार्थ कि occur below the given आकार threshold.
it is therefore common to देखिए the बहुवचन form `` nanotechnologies '' as well as `` nanoscale technologies '' to refer to the broad दायरा of शोध और अनुप्रयोग जिनकी common trait is आकार.
क्युकी of the variety of संभावित applications ( सहित industrial and सैन्य ), governments have invested billions of dollars in nanotechnology शोध.
through its नेशनल nanotechnology Initiative, the USA रै invested 3.7 billion डॉलर.
the European Union has invested 1.2 billion और जापानी 750 million dollars.
Nanotechnology as defined by size is naturally very broad, including फ़ील्ड of science as diverse as surface विज्ञान, सशुल्क रसायन, molecular biology, सेमीकंडक्टर भौतिकी, microfabrication, इत्यादि.
the associated शोध and अनुप्रयोग हैं equally विविध, ranging इससे एक्सटेंशन of conventional यंत्र भौतिकी to completely नई approaches based upon molecular self-assembly, इससे developing नई सामग्री with dimensions on the nanoscale to direct कंट्रोल of पदार्थ on the atomic scale.
वैज्ञानिकों currently debate the future implications of nanotechnology.
Nanotechnology may be able to create many नई materials and devices with a vast दायरा of अनुप्रयोग, ऐसे as in medicine, इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स, biomaterials and उर्जा production.
On the अन्य hand, nanotechnology उठाता many of the same issues as any नई प्रौद्योगिकी, सहित चिंताएं about the toxicity and environmental impact of nanomaterials, and their potential effects on वैश्विक economics, as well as अटकलें परिचय विभिन्न doomsday scenarios.
ये concerns have led to a debate among advocacy groups और सरकारें on whether खास विनियमन of nanotechnology is warranted.
मैप of the पूर्वी Bloc
the term पूर्वी Bloc or Communist bloc refers to the पूर्व communist राज्य of सेंट्रल and पूर्वी Europe, generally the Soviet संघ and the देशों of the वॉरसॉ Pact.
the शर्तें कम्युनिस्ट Bloc and Soviet Bloc were also प्रयुक्त to denote groupings of राज्य aligned साथ the Soviet Union, हालांकि these शर्तें might include राज्य outside सेंट्रल and Eastern Europe.
The नई जर्सी gubernatorial चुनाव of 2009 took place on November 3, 2009.
Democratic Governor jon Corzine थी running for a second पद और was होने challenged by रिपब्लिकन क्रिस क्रिस्टी, स्वतंत्र क्रिस्टोफर daggett and नौ others, in addition to अनेक write-in उम्मीदवार.
क्रिस्टी जीती the चुनाव, साथ about 48.5 प्रतिशत of the vote, to 44.9 percent for Corzine और 5.8 percent for Daggett.
Christie won the largest हाशिया लिये a पहला पद रिपब्लिकन since 1969.
क्रिस्टी assumed office on January 19, 2010.
This थी the पहला election to भरण the newly निर्मित दफ्तर of Lieutenant राज्यपाल.
the candidates for राज्यपाल and lieutenant राज्यपाल were joined together as a सिंगल choice, so कि मतदाता did नहीं have the अवसर to split the ticket.
Kim Guadagno, Christie 's running mate, became नई Jersey 's पहला lieutenant राज्यपाल following her inauguration.
स्वास्थ्य care in the संयुक्त राज्य is provided by अनेक distinct संगठन.
Health परवाह सुविधाएं हैं largely owned और operated by private sector व्यवसायों.
Health insurance लिये public sector कर्मचारी is primarily provided by the government.
60-65 % of healthcare provision और बिता आता from कार्यक्रम ऐसे as Medicare, medicaid, TRICARE, the children 's स्वास्थ्य बीमे कार्यक्रम, और the Veterans Health प्रशासन.
सबसे of the population under 65 is insured by their or a परिवार सदस्य 's नियोक्ता, some ख़रीदे स्वास्थ्य insurance on उनके own, और the शेष हैं uninsured.
Of 17 high-income countries studied by the नेशनल Institutes of स्वास्थ्य in 2013, the United States was at or निकट the नीचे in शिशु mortality, heart और lung disease, sexually transmitted infections, adolescent pregnancies, injuries, homicides, और दरों of disability.
साथ, such issues प्लेस the u.S. at the bottom of the सूची लिये जीवन expectancy.
on औसत, a U.S. male can be expected to सजीव लगभग चार कम years than those in the top-ranked देश.
according to the संसार Health Organization ( WHO ), the संयुक्त States spent more on स्वास्थ्य परवाह per capita ( $ 7,146 ), और अधिक on health परवाह as percentage of its जीडीपी ( 15.2 % ), than कोई अन्य nation in 2008.
The राष्ट्रमंडल निधि ranked the United राज्य last in the विशेषता of health care among similar countries, और टीप u.S. परवाह costs the most.
The u.S. Census Bureau reported कि 49.9 million residents, 16.3 % of the population, were uninsured in 2010 ( up from 49.0 million निवासियों, 16.1 % of the जनसांख्यिकी, in 2009 ).
A 2004 संस्थान of Medicine ( iom ) रपट कहा : `` the संयुक्त States is among the few industrialized nations in the संसार that does नहीं guarantee access to स्वास्थ्य परवाह for इसके population. ''
A 2004 oecd report said : `` With the exception of मैक्सिको, Turkey, and the संयुक्त States, all OECD देशों था हासिल सार्वभौमिक or near-universal ( at तनिक 98.4 % insured ) coverage of their populations by 1990. ''
A 2010 report observed कि कमी of स्वास्थ्य insurance causes roughly 48,000 unnecessary deaths every year in the United राज्य.
In 2007, 62.1 % of filers for bankruptcies claimed high चिकित्सा expenses.
A 2013 पढ़ाई मिला that परिचय 25 % of सब वरिष्ठ नागरिकों घोषित bankruptcy due to चिकित्सा expenses, और 43 % are मजबूर to mortgage or sell their प्राथमिक residence.
On कूच 23, 2010, the रोगी सुरक्षा और Affordable परवाह अधिनियम ( PPACA ) became law, providing for major परिवर्तन in health बीमे.
In physiology, body जल is the जल सामग्री of the इंसान देह.
a significant fraction of the human देह is जल.
Arthur guyton 's Textbook of चिकित्सा physiology states that `` the total राशि of water in a man of average weight ( 70 गामा ) is approximately 40 लीटर, averaging 57 प्रतिशत of उसके total body वज़न.
in a newborn infant, this may be as ऊँची as 75 प्रतिशत of the body weight, but it progressively decreases इससे जनम to old age, most of the decrease occurring during the पहला 10 years of life.
भी, obesity decreases the percentage of जल in the देह, sometimes to as low as 45 प्रतिशत ''.
ये figures are statistical averages, so are illustrative, and जैसे सब biostatistics, होगा vary with things जैसे type of जनसांख्यिकी, age and क्रमांक of people sampled, and methodology.
so there is not, and can नहीं be, a figure कि is exactly the वही for all लोगों, लिये इस or any other physiological माप.
लिये उदाहरण, Jackson 's ( 1985 ) Anatomy & physiology for Nurses gives a फिगर of 60 % लिये the proportion of body-weight attributable to जल, which approximates guyton 's 57 %.
In diseased states जहाँ देह water is affected, the कम्पार्टमेंट or compartments that have changed can give clues to the प्रकृति of the problem.
देह जल is regulated by हार्मोन, सहित anti-diuretic hormone ( अध ), aldosterone और अलिंदी natriuretic peptide.
प्रति Netter 's Atlas of Human physiology, body water is broken down into the following कम्पार्टमेंटs:
intracellular द्रव ( 2/3 of देह जल ).
प्रति guyton, in a देह containing 40 litres of fluid, परिचय 25 लीटर is intracellular, which amounts to 62.5 % ( 5/8 ), बंद enough to the 2/3 rule of अंगूठा.
Jackson 's ग्रन्थ राज्य 70 % of देह fluid is intracellular.
Extracellular fluid ( 1/3 of देह water ).
प्रति Guyton 's उदाहरण, लिये a 40 litre देह, परिचय 15 लीटर is extracellular, जिससे amounts to 37.5 % again, this is बंद to the 1/3 rule of thumb cited यहाँ.
प्लाज्मा ( 1/5 of extracellular fluid ).
Per guyton 's illustration, of the 15 लीटर of extracellular fluid, प्लाज्मा volume averages 3 लीटर.
This amounts to 20 %, the same as per netter 's एटलस.
Interstitial द्रव ( 4/5 of extracellular fluid )
Transcellular द्रव ( a.k.a. `` third space, '' सामान्यतः ignored in calculations )
contained अंदर अंगों, such as the जठरांत्र, cerebrospinal, peritoneal, and ocular fluids.
self-esteem is a term प्रयुक्त in मनोविज्ञान to reflect a person 's overall emotional मूल्यांकन of his or her own worth.
it is a निर्णय of oneself as खूब as an attitude toward the self.
self-esteem encompasses beliefs ( for example, `` I am competent, '' `` i am worthy '' ) और भाव such as triumph, despair, pride and shame.
स्मिथ and Mackie define it by saying `` The self-concept is कया we think परिचय the self ; self-esteem, is the धनात्मक or negative evaluations of the स्वः, as in how we महसूस about it. ''
Self-esteem is also known as the evaluative dimension of the self that includes feelings of worthiness, prides and discouragement.
One 's self-esteem is भी closely associated with self-consciousness.
self-esteem is a disposition कि a person रै which represents their judgements of उनके अपना worthiness.
in the mid-1960s, Morris rosenberg और social-learning पैरोकार पारिभाषित self-esteem as a निजी लायक or worthiness.
nathaniel branden in 1969 defined self-esteem as `` the अनुभव of होने competent to cope साथ the मौलिक चुनौतियां of जीवन and होने worthy of happiness. ''
according to branden, self-esteem is the sum of self-confidence ( a अहसास of personal capacity ) and self-respect ( a feeling of personal worth ).
it exists as a consequence of the अव्यक्त judgement that प्रत्येक व्यक्ति has of उनके ability to फेस जीवन 's challenges, to समझे और solve problems, and उनके right to achieve सुख, and be दिए आदर.
As a सोशल मनोवैज्ञानिक construct, self-esteem is attractive क्युकी शोधकर्ताओं have conceptualized it as an influential predictor of relevant outcomes, such as academic achievement ( दलदल 1990 ) or exercise बर्ताव ( Hagger et al. 1998 ).
In जोड, self-esteem रै भी been treated as an important निष्कर्ष due to इसके बंद संबंध साथ मनोवैज्ञानिक well-being ( दलदल 1989 ).
Self-esteem can लागू specifically to a particular dimension ( लिये उदाहरण, `` I believe I am a शुभ लेखक and i महसूस प्रसन्न परिचय कि '' ) or a वैश्विक extent ( लिये उदाहरण, `` I believe I am a ख़राब person, और feel bad about खुद in general '' ).
psychologists प्रायः regard self-esteem as an enduring व्यक्तित्व characteristic ( `` trait '' self-esteem ), हालांकि normal, short-term variations ( `` राज्य '' self-esteem ) भी exist.
समानार्थी or near-synonyms of self-esteem शामिल : self-worth, self-regard, self-respect, और self-integrity.
A Masonic Lodge, often termed a Private Lodge or Constituent Lodge, is the basic organisational ईकाई of Freemasonry.
Every new आवास जरूर be warranted or chartered by a Grand आवास, लकिन is विषय to its दिशा only in enforcing the published Constitution of the क्षेत्राधिकार.
By एक्सेप्शन the तीन surviving lodges कि formed the world 's पहला ज्ञात Grand आवास in London ( today पुकारा the संयुक्त ग्रैंड Lodge of इंग्लैण्ड ) have the unique विशेषाधिकार to operate as time immemorial i.e. without such warrant ; तभी one अन्य lodge operates बगैर a वारंट - this is the ग्रैंड Stewards ' Lodge in लंदन, although it is नहीं also entitled to the `` time immemorial '' title.
A freemason is generally हकदार to visit कोई आवास, in any क्षेत्राधिकार ( i.e. अंतर्गत any ग्रैंड आवास ) in सौहार्द with उसके own.
In कुछ jurisdictions इस विशेषाधिकार is restricted to निपुण masons ( कि is, Freemasons जो have attained the Order 's तीसरा degree ).
He is first usually required to जाँच, और certify, the नियमितता of the संबंध of the आवास - और be समर्थ to satisfy that Lodge of his नियमितता of membership.
Freemasons एकत्रित साथ as a आवास to कार्य the three basic Degrees of Entered Apprentice, Fellowcraft and निपुण Mason.
pilkington समूह सीमित is a बहुराष्ट्रीय glass manufacturing company headquartered in st हेलेन्स, United Kingdom and a wholly owned subsidiary of the japan-based NSG Group.
prior to इसके acquisition by एनएसजी in 2006 it थी an independent company listed on the London भण्डार एक्सचेंज and for a समय थी a constituent of the FTSE 100 अनुक्रमणिका.
A quotation is the repetition of एक expression as भाग of another एक, विशेषकर जब the quoted अभिव्यक्ति is well-known or explicitly attributed by citation to its असली source, and it is indicated by ( punctuated साथ ) quotation marks.
A quotation can भी refer to the दोहराया use of units of any other form of expression, विशेषकर parts of कलाकारी works : तत्व of a पेंटिंग, दृश्यों from a फिल्म or sections from a musical composition.
साल 1877 ( mdccclxxvii ) was a common year starting on Monday ( कड़ी होगा display the पूरा calendar ) of the Gregorian पंचांग and a आम year starting on Saturday of the 12-day धीमा Julian calendar.
ब्लैक pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering vine in the family piperaceae, cultivated लिये its fruit, जिससे is usually सूखी और प्रयुक्त as a spice और seasoning.
The फल, ज्ञात as a peppercorn जब सूखी, is लगभग in व्यास, अंधेरा red when fully mature, और, जैसे all drupes, contains a सिंगल बीज.
peppercorns, और the मैदान pepper निकला इससे them, may be described बस as pepper, or अधिक precisely as black pepper ( पकाया और dried unripe fruit ), green pepper ( dried unripe फल ) और श्वेत pepper ( dried पके seeds ).
Black pepper is देशी to south इण्डिया, and is extensively cultivated वहीँ और elsewhere in tropical regions.
फिलहाल Vietnam is the world 's largest producer और निर्यातक of pepper, producing 34 % of the world 's पाइपर nigrum क्रॉप as of 2008.
सूखी मैदान pepper has been प्रयुक्त since antiquity लिये both its flavour और as a आयुर्विज्ञान.
ब्लैक pepper is the world 's most traded spice.
it is one of the सबसे common spices added to European cuisine and its वंशजों.
the spiciness of ब्लैक pepper is due to the chemical piperine, नहीं to be confused with the capsaicin that देता मांसल peppers theirs.
It is in the modern world, प्रायः युग्म साथ salt.
आग hydrant in charlottesville, वर्जिनिया, USA
A आग hydrant ( also ज्ञात colloquially as a आग plug in the संयुक्त States or as a johnny pump in नई यॉर्क नगर ), is an क्रियाशील fire सुरक्षा माप, और a सोर्स of water provided in सबसे शहरी, suburban और ग्रामीण areas साथ नगरपालिका जल service to enable अग्निशमन to tap into the नगरपालिका जल supply to assist in extinguishing a fire.
इमारतें near a hydrant may qualify लिये an बीमे छूट since अग्निशमन should be समर्थ to more rapidly बुझा a fire on the insured प्रॉपर्टी.
The अवधारणा of आग plugs dates to at तनिक the 17th century.
This थी a time when firefighters responding to a call would खुदाई down to the लकड़ी जल मेन्स और hastily bore a छेद to सुरक्षित water to fight फ़ायर.
the water would fill the hole बनाना a temporary खूब, और be transported from the खूब to the fire by bucket brigades or, बाद, by hand-pumped आग इंजन.
The holes were तब plugged with stoppers, normally redwood, which over समय came to be ज्ञात as fire plugs.
the location of the plug होता प्रायः be recorded or चिह्नित so कि it could be reused in future फ़ायर.
इस is the source of the colloquial पद आग प्लग still प्रयुक्त लिये आग hydrants today.
After the Great आग of लंदन in 1666, the city संस्थापित water mains साथ छेद drilled at intervals, equipped with risers, allowing an access point to the wooden fire plugs इससे गली level.
the आविष्कार of a post- or pillar-type fire hydrant is generally credited to Frederick Graff Sr., Chief इंजीनियर of the फिलाडेल्फिया जल works around the year 1801.
it था a संयोजन hose/faucet outlet और was of `` गीला barrel '' design with the valve in the top.
it is said कि Graff held the first पेटेंट for a fire hydrant, लकिन इस can not be सत्यापित because the patent office in वॉशिंगटन d.C. caught on fire in 1836 destroying many पेटेंट records इससे कि period in the process.
the अध्यक्ष of the Republic of South अफ़्रीकी is the सिर of राज्य और head of सरकारी under South अफ़्रीकी 's Constitution.
From 1961 to 1994, the head of state was called the State अध्यक्ष.
the President is निर्वाचित by members of the National Assembly, the lower house of Parliament, and is प्रायः the leader of the largest party, which has महरूम the अफ़्रीकी National Congress since the पहला non-racial elections यहूद held on 27 अप्रैल 1994.
the role थी originally संस्थापित to be पृथक इससे the अभी defunct role of प्रधान minister, but the two भूमिकाएँ were merged in the 1983 संविधान जिससे निर्दिष्ट a four-year पद of office.
The 1993 and later constitutions limits the अध्यक्ष 's समय in दफ्तर to two five-year शर्तें.
The पहला President to be निर्वाचित under the नई संविधान was नेल्सन मंडेला, और the लाज़िम president is याक़ूब zuma.
Under the अंतरिम संविधान ( मान्य from 1994 to 1996 ), वहीँ थी a Government of नेशनल Unity, in which an mp from the largest विपक्ष पार्टी was हकदार to a position as Deputy अध्यक्ष.
साथ with thabo mbeki, the last राज्य अध्यक्ष, F.W. De klerk also served as डिप्टी President, in उसके capacity as the नेता of the National Party which थी the second-largest party in the new Parliament.
लकिन de klerk बाद resigned और गई into opposition with उसके party.
a voluntary coalition सरकारी continues to मौजूद under the नई संविधान ( अपनाया in 1996 ), although वहीँ have been no नियुक्ति of विपक्ष राजनेता to the post of डिप्टी president.
खास education or special needs education is the education of विद्यार्थी with खास needs in a way that पता the विद्यार्थी ' व्यक्तिगत मतभेद and needs.
Ideally, इस process involves the individually planned and systematically monitored arrangement of teaching प्रक्रियाओं, adapted उपकरण and सामग्री, accessible settings, and अन्य interventions designed to help learners with special needs achieve a उच्चतर level of personal self-sufficiency and कामयाबी in स्कूल और जातियाँ than होता be उपलब्धियाँ if the छात्र were तभी given अभिगम to a ठेठ classroom शिक्षा.
Common special needs include चुनौतियां साथ सीखना, communication चुनौतियां, emotional और behavioral विकार, शारीरिक disabilities, and developmental विकार.
विद्यार्थी साथ ये kinds of खास needs हैं likely to लाभ इससे additional educational सेवाएं ऐसे as अलग approaches to teaching, उपयोग of technology, a specifically adapted शिक्षण क्षेत्रफल, or resource रूम.
Intellectual giftedness is a difference in learning and can also benefit इससे specialized शिक्षण techniques or different शैक्षणिक कार्यक्रम, but the पद `` खास education '' is generally used to specifically indicate instruction of विद्यार्थी जिनकी खास needs reduce उनके ability to सीख independently or in an ordinary कक्षा, और gifted शिक्षा is handled separately.
In most developed देशों, educators are modifying teaching विधि and environments so that the maximum number of students हैं served in general education environments.
Special education in विकसित countries is प्रायः regarded कम as a `` प्लेस '' और more as `` a दायरा of सेवाएं, उपलब्धियाँ in प्रत्येक स्कूल. ''
संयोजन can reduce सोशल stigmas और improve अकादमिक उपलब्धि लिये many विद्यार्थी.
the विपरीत of खास education is general शिक्षा.
सामान्य शिक्षा is the standard curriculum प्रस्तुत with standard शिक्षण विधि and बगैर अतिरिक्त supports.
George Soros ( or ; ; ; born August 12, 1930, as schwartz györgy ) is a hungarian-american business महारथी, investor, और लोकसेवक.
He is the अध्यक्ष of Soros Fund Management.
Soros supports progressive-liberal causes.
He is ज्ञात as `` The man जो Broke the बैंको of England `` because of उसके in निवेश profits during the 1992 Black बुधवार uk करेंसी संकट.
between 1979 और 2011, Soros दिया away over $ 8 billion to इंसान अधिकारों, public health, और शिक्षा causes.
he played a significant role in the peaceful transition from communism to capitalism in हंगेरियाई ( 1984–89 ) और provided one of Europe 's largest उच्चतर education endowments to सेंट्रल यूरोपीय University in बुडापेस्ट.
सोरोस is also the अध्यक्ष of the खोलें Society Institute.
an actor portraying सिकंदर Graham Bell speaking into an early मॉडल टेलीफोन.
the आविष्कार of the telephone is the culmination of work किया by अनेक individuals, the history of which involves a संग्रहण of दावा and counterclaims.
The development of the आधुनिक electrical telephone involved an सरणी of lawsuits संस्थापित upon the पेटेंट claims of अनेक individuals and numerous companies.
इस article covers the जल्दी सालो from 1844 to 1898, इससे धारणा of the idea of an electric voice-transmission यंत्र, to failed attempts to उपयोग `` make-and-break '' वर्तमान, to कामयाब experiments with electromagnetic telephones by सिकंदर Graham Bell and Thomas Watson, और आखिरकार to commercially कामयाब telephones in the late 19th सदी.
a Master of ठीक कला ( MFA, m.f.a. ) is a ग्रैजुएट degree typically requiring 2–3 सालो of postgraduate study परे the स्नातक 's degree ( bfa ), although the पद of study होगा vary by देश or by विश्वविद्यालयों.
the MFA is a रचनात्मक degree प्रायः awarded as a टर्मिनल उपाधि in visual arts, रचनात्मक लिखने, filmmaking, नृत्य, or थिएटर and other performing कला.
Coursework is primarily of an applied or performing प्रकृति with the program often culminating in a major कार्य or प्रदर्शन.
Master of ठीक कला programs have generally जरूरी a स्नातक 's degree prior to admission, लकिन अनेक do नहीं require कि the undergraduate major be the same as the MFA फ़ील्ड of study.
the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण admissions requirement has often महरूम a नमूना पोर्टफोलियो or a performance ऑडिशन.
The निपुण of Fine कला differs from the Master of कला in कि the mfa, जबकि an अकादमिक कार्यक्रम, centers around अभ्यास in the particular फ़ील्ड, whereas कार्यक्रम अग्रणी to the ma प्रायः center on the scholarly, अकादमिक, or critical पढ़ाई of the फ़ील्ड.
additionally, in the United राज्य, an mfa is पहचाना as a terminal degree for practitioners of विज़ुअल आर्ट, Design, नृत्य, Theatre, film/video, नई Media, and Creative Writing - अर्थ कि it is माना to be the उच्चतम उपाधि in इसके फ़ील्ड, और is used as a minimum योग्यता to be able to apply to become a Full-Time प्राध्यापक teaching at the University स्तर in ये disciplines.
वहीँ are अपवाद to इस standard in the कला, notably in the case of म्यूज़िक performance, जहाँ the MFA is नहीं देखी as a terminal degree in the context of the more standardized DMA उपाधि.
It is also नाजुक to नोट कि in the interest of extending the कनेक्शन between creative production और जारी अकादमिक शोध, कुछ universities have स्थापित practice-based ph.d programs in फ़ील्ड ऐसे as रचनात्मक writing, visual कला, new मीडिया, डिज़ाइन और theater.
जबकि इस has had an effect in रचनात्मक Writing, and to a lesser extent in design and नई मीडिया, the influx of graduates इससे practice-based phd programs has not appreciably बदला the मानक for the mfa as the terminal उपाधि in most Arts disciplines yet.
इस is an जारी contentious topic, और is the बारंबार subject of academic panels, especially at the सालाना कॉलेज Art संघ conference.
the CAA 2008 दिशानिर्देश regarding the mfa strongly re-affirms that the phd is not जरूरी as a terminal degree in the विज़ुअल कला.
the atomic bombings of the शहरों of हिरोशिमा and नागासाकी in Japan यहूद conducted by the United राज्य दौरान the फाइनल चरण of संसार युद्ध II in 1945.
the two events are the only use of नाभिकीय हथियार in war to date.
following a firebombing campaign कि destroyed many जापानी शहरों, the allies prepared for a costly आक्रमण of जापानी.
the युद्ध in यूरोपीय ended when नाजी Germany हस्ताक्षरित इसके instrument of surrender on 8 May, but the प्रशांत युद्ध जारी.
साथ साथ the United Kingdom और the Republic of चीन, the संयुक्त राज्य पुकारा लिये a आत्मसमर्पण of Japan in the पॉट्सडैम Declaration on 26 July 1945, threatening जापानी with `` संकेत and utter विनाश ''.
the जापानी government उपेक्षित इस ultimatum, और the United States तैनात two नाभिकीय हथियार विकसित by the मैनहटन प्रोजेक्ट.
अमरीकी airmen dropped Little Boy on the नगर of हिरोशिमा on 6 August 1945, followed by मोटे Man over Nagasaki on 9 अगस्त.
भीतर the first दो to four months of the bombings, the अधि प्रभाव killed 90,000–166,000 people in हिरोशिमा and 60,000–80,000 in Nagasaki, with roughly half of the मौतों in प्रत्येक नगर occurring on the पहला दिन.
the हिरोशिमा prefecture health department अनुमानित कि, of the लोगों जो died on the day of the विस्फोट, 60 % died from फ्लैश or flame burns, 30 % इससे falling मलबा and 10 % इससे other कल्याणकारी.
दौरान the following months, large संख्याएँ died from the प्रभाव of burns, radiation बीमारी, and other चोटों, compounded by बीमारी.
In a US अनुमान of the कुल immediate और छोटी पद cause of मौत, 15–20 % died इससे radiation बीमारी, 20–30 % from burns, और 50–60 % इससे other चोटों, compounded by illness.
In दोनो शहरों, सबसे of the मुर्दे were नागरिकों, although Hiroshima had a sizeable गैरीसन.
on 15 August, छह days बाद the bombing of Nagasaki, जापानी घोषित इसके surrender to the Allies, हस्ताक्षर the Instrument of आत्मसमर्पण on 2 सितंबर, officially ending संसार युद्ध II.
the bombings led, in भाग, to post-war Japan 's adopting तीन Non-Nuclear सिद्धान्त, forbidding the स्वदेश from nuclear armament.
The भूमिका of the bombings in Japan 's surrender and उनके नैतिक औचित्य हैं still debated.
Mohandas करमचंद गांधी ( ; 2 October 1869 – 30 जनवरी 1948 ), commonly ज्ञात as Mahatma गांधी, was the preeminent नेता of Indian nationalism in British-ruled इण्डिया.
employing non-violent सिविल disobedience, Gandhi led India to स्वतंत्रता और प्रेरित आंदोलनों for non-violence, civil rights और स्वतंत्रता across the world.
the बेटे of a senior government official, Gandhi थी born और उठाया in a Hindu Bania community in तटीय Gujarat, and प्रशिक्षित in law in London.
गांधी became famous by लड़ लिये the सिविल अधिकारों of Muslim और हिन्दू इंडियंस in दक्षिण Africa, using new techniques of non-violent civil disobedience that he विकसित.
Returning to India in 1915, he नियत about organising peasants to विरोध excessive land-taxes.
a lifelong opponent of `` सांप्रदायिकता `` ( i.e. basing राजनीती on धर्म ) he पहुँचे आउट widely to सब धार्मिक समूह.
He became a नेता of मुसलमान protesting the declining औकात of the Caliphate.
assuming leadership of the भारतीय National कॉंग्रेस in 1921, गांधी led देशभर campaigns लिये easing गरीबी, expanding महिलाओं 's rights, भवन धार्मिक and ethnic amity, ending अस्पृश्यता, increasing economic self-reliance, और above all लिये achieving स्वराज —the independence of India इससे अंग्रेजों हुकूमत.
Gandhi led Indians in protesting the national salt tax with the dandi Salt March in 1930, और later in demanding the अंग्रेजों to immediately Quit इण्डिया in 1942, during संसार War ii.
He थी imprisoned for that और for numerous अन्य political offenses over the years.
Gandhi sought to practice non-violence and truth in all परिस्थितियों, and advocated कि others do the वही.
he देखी the गांवों as the core of the true इण्डिया and promoted self-sufficiency ; he किया नहीं support the industrialization programs of his शिष्य Jawaharlal Nehru.
he lived modestly in a self-sufficient residential community and wore the परंपरागत Indian dhoti and shawl, woven with धागे he had हाथ spun on a charkha.
उसके मुख्य राजनैतिक दुश्मन in Britain was विंस्टन Churchill, जो ridiculed उसे as a `` half-naked फकीर. ''
he थी a समर्पित vegetarian, and undertook long fasts as means of both self-purification and political mobilization.
In उसके पिछला साल, अप्रसन्न at the partition of India, Gandhi worked to रोकें the carnage between Muslims, हिन्दुओं and सिखों that raged in the किनारा area between India और पाकिस्तानी.
He थी assassinated on 30 January 1948 by Nathuram गोडसे जो thought गांधी was too sympathetic to India 's मुसलमान.
30 जनवरी is observed as Martyrs ' Day in India.
the honorific Mahatma ( `` ग्रेट Soul '' ) थी लागू to him by 1914.
In India he was also called bapu ( `` पिता '' ).
he is ज्ञात in India as the Father of the स्वदेश ; his birthday, 2 October, is commemorated वहीँ as Gandhi jayanti, a नेशनल holiday, and world-wide as the अंतरराष्ट्रीय दिन of Non-Violence.
गांधी 's दर्शनशास्त्र was not सैद्धांतिक लकिन एक of pragmatism, that is, practicing his सिद्धान्त in the पल.
पूछा to give a संदेश to the people, he would respond, `` my life is my संदेश. ''
Joan Crawford ( March 23, ca. 1904 – May 10, 1977 ), born Lucille fay LeSueur, was an American अभिनेत्री in फिल्मी, television and थिएटर.
Starting as a dancer in traveling theatrical companies before debuting on ब्रॉडवे, क्रॉफर्ड was हस्ताक्षरित to a गति चित्र अनुबंध by metro-goldwyn-mayer in 1925.
initially कुंठित by the size और quality of her parts, Crawford began a campaign of self-publicity and became nationally known as a flapper by the end of the 1920s.
in the 1930s, Crawford 's fame rivaled, and later outlasted, MGM सहयोगियों Norma शियर्र और greta Garbo.
क्रॉफर्ड प्रायः played मेहनती young women जो ढूँढें romance और वित्तीय कामयाबी.
ये `` rags-to-riches '' stories were well प्राप्त by अवसाद -era audiences और were popular साथ women.
क्रॉफर्ड became one of हॉलीवुड 's सबसे prominent फिल्म stars and one of the highest सशुल्क महिलाओं in the संयुक्त States, लकिन her films began losing धन and by the समाप्त of the 1930s she थी labeled `` box दफ्तर ज़हर ''.
बाद an absence of nearly दो years इससे the screen, Crawford मंचन a वापसी by अभिनीत in Mildred पियर्स ( 1945 ), for which वो won the Academy पुरस्कार लिये Best अभिनेत्री.
In 1955, she became involved with the Pepsi-Cola Company through her विवाह to कम्पनी Chairman Alfred Steele.
बाद his death in 1959, Crawford was elected to fill उसके vacancy on the board of निर्देशकों but थी forcibly retired in 1973.
वो जारी एक्टिंग in फिल्मी और टेलीविज़न regularly through the 1960s, when her performances became fewer ; बाद the release of the अंग्रेजों horror फिल्मी trog in 1970, क्रॉफर्ड रिटायर्ड इससे the स्क्रीन.
following a पब्लिक रूप in 1974, after which unflattering छायाचित्र were published, Crawford withdrew from public life और became increasingly reclusive जबतक उसके मौत in 1977.
क्रॉफर्ड शादीशुदा four टाइम्स.
उसके पहला three विवाह ended in divorce ; the last ended साथ the death of husband Alfred Steele.
She adopted पाँच children, one of जिसको was reclaimed by उसके जनम माँ.
क्रॉफर्ड 's संबंध साथ her दो पुरानी children, Christina and Christopher, यहूद acrimonious.
Crawford disinherited the two and, after Crawford 's मौत, क्रिस्टीना wrote a `` tell-all '' memoir, mommie dearest, in which she alleged a lifelong pattern of शारीरिक और emotional गाली perpetrated by Crawford.
वो was voted the tenth greatest मादा star in the इतिहास of American cinema by the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान.

tonneau cover ( or ) describes a hard or soft कवर प्रयुक्त to protect unoccupied passenger सीटे in a convertible or roadster, or the कार्गो bed in a पिकअप truck.
Hard tonneau कवर खोलें by a hinging or फोल्डिंग mechanism while soft कवर open by rolling up.
the tonneau कवर is प्रयुक्त to conceal कार्गो.
When the cover is खींचा out, it keeps वस्तुएं out of the सूर्य और provides अतिरिक्त security by keeping personal items आउट of sight, as well as shielding the driver इससे view.
ट्विटर is an online social networking सेवा और microblogging service that enables its उपयोक्ता to भेजें and read text-based संदेश of up to 140 वर्ण, ज्ञात as `` tweets ''.
ट्विटर was created in कूच 2006 by जोकर dorsey and by July, the सोशल नेटवर्किंग साईट थी launched.
The सेवा rapidly gained worldwide popularity, with over 500 लाख registered उपयोक्ता as of 2012, generating over 340 million tweets रोज़ and handling over 1.6 billion search प्रश्नों per day.
Since इसके launch, ट्विटर रै become one of the टेन सबसे visited websites on the अंतरजाल, and रै been वर्णित as `` the SMS of the अंतरजाल. ''
अपंजीकृत उपयोक्ता can पढ़ा tweets, जबकि registered users can पोस्ट tweets through the website interface, SMS, or a दायरा of apps for mobile डिवाइस.
ट्विटर inc. is आधारित in सैन Francisco, साथ अतिरिक्त servers and offices in नई York नगर, Boston, and सैन Antonio.
the hangover is a 2009 American कॉमेडी फिल्मी, co-produced और directed by टॉड Phillips and लिखा by Jon Lucas and Scott Moore.
It is the पहला film of the hangover मताधिकार.the film stars Bradley कूपर, Ed Helms, zach Galifianakis, हीथर ग्राहम, जस्टिन bartha, और Jeffrey Tambor.
the Hangover tells the स्टोरी of फिल wenneck, stu दाम and एलन गार्नर, who सफर to लास Vegas लिये a bachelor पार्टी to celebrate their dost Doug billings ' impending marriage.
However, फिल, stu और एलन have no मेमोरी of the पिछला रात्रि 's कार्यक्रम and जरूर ढूँढें डग before the wedding can लो प्लेस.
लुकास and Moore wrote the स्क्रिप्ट बाद कार्यपालिका निर्माता Chris Bender 's dost disappeared और था a large विधेयक बाद being भेजा to a strip club.
बाद लुकास और Moore sold it to the स्टुडियो लिये $ 2 लाख, फिलिप्स और जेरेमी Garelick rewrote the script to शामिल a बाघ as खूब as a subplot involving a baby और a पुलिस cruiser, and भी सहित boxer Mike टायसन.
Filming took place in नेवाडा for 15 दिनों, and during फिल्मांकन, the तीन प्रमुख अभिनेताओं ( कूपर, helms और Galifianakis ) formed a दोस्ती.
The Hangover was released on June 5, 2009, बनने a नाजुक और commercial success.
it became the tenth-highest-grossing film of 2009, साथ a worldwide सकल of over US $ 467 लाख.
Critics praised the film 's comedic दृष्टिकोण but criticized it लिये इसके vulgarity.
the फिल्मी जीती the सुनहरी Globe पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन गति चित्र – Musical or कॉमेडी, and received multiple other accolades.
It is the tenth-highest-grossing film of 2009 in the world, as खूब as the दूसरी highest-grossing R-rated comedy कभी in the United राज्य, surpassing a record previously आयोजित by Beverly Hills Cop for लगभग 25 years and later being surpassed by टेड in 2012.
आउट of all r-rated films, it is the तीसरा highest-grossing ever in the u.S., behind तभी The Passion of the Christ और the मेट्रिक्स Reloaded.
a sequel, the Hangover Part II, थी released in 2011, and a third और final फिल्मी, The Hangover भाग iii, is नियत for रिलीज in 2013.
Events involving meiosis, प्रर्दशित chromosomal crossover
Meiosis ( ) is a खास type of कोशिका प्रभाग necessary for यौन जनन in eukaryotes.
the cells उत्पादित by meiosis are गैमीट or spores.
In अनेक organisms, including सब animals and land plants ( but not कुछ other groups ऐसे as fungi ), गैमीट are पुकारा शुक्राणु और egg cells.
whilst the प्रक्रम of meiosis bears a number of similarities साथ the 'life-cycle ' cell प्रभाग process of समसूत्रण, it differs in दो important आदरs:
the chromosomes in meiosis undergo a recombination जिससे shuffles the genes producing a अलग जेनेटिक संयोजन in प्रत्येक gamete, compared with the co-existence of each of the दो पृथक pairs of प्रत्येक chromosome ( one प्राप्त इससे प्रत्येक जनक ) in प्रत्येक cell जिससे परिणाम from mitosis.
the outcome of meiosis is potentially four ( genetically अद्वितीय ) अगुणित cells, compared with the दो ( genetically identical ) diploid कोशिकाएं उत्पादित from mitosis.
meiosis begins साथ एक diploid कोशिका containing दो copies of each chromosome —one इससे the सजीव 's माँ and one इससे इसके father.
The कोशिका divides twice, potentially producing up to चार haploid cells containing one नक़ल of each chromosome.
( `` potentially '' क्युकी in some मामले, ऐसे as the गठन of oocytes in स्तनधारियों, तभी one of the possible four अगुणित कोशिकाएं survives. )
In पशु the haploid cell resulting इससे meiosis is a पुरूष or मादा gamete.
Each of the resulting chromosomes in the gamete कोशिकाएं is a अद्वितीय मिश्रण of मातृ and पैतृक DNA, resulting in offspring that हैं genetically पृथक इससे either parent.
इस देता rise to जेनेटिक diversity in sexually reproducing populations.
This जेनेटिक diversity can provide the variation of शारीरिक और behavioural गुण ( phenotypes ) upon जिससे प्राकृतिक selection can act, but, as वर्णित नीचे in Section 6, Origin और फलन of meiosis, the genetic diversity may be largely a by-product of the समजात recombination कि is primarily employed लिये its डीएनए repair फलन during meiosis.
it is भी noteworthy that during meiosis, विशिष्ट जीनों हैं more अत्यधिक transcribed, और these हैं पुकारा the meiome, the term प्रयुक्त in कार्यात्मक genomics लिये the meiotic transcriptome.
meiosis is a key विशेषता for all sexually reproducing eukaryotes in which समजात chromosome pairing, अन्तर्ग्रथन और recombination occur.
In addition to strong meiotic stage-specific अभिव्यक्ति of mRNA ( the meiome ), however, वहीँ हैं also pervasive translational controls ( e.g. चयनात्मक उपयोग of preformed mRNA ), regulating the परम meiotic stage-specific protein अभिव्यक्ति of genes दौरान meiosis.
यूँ, both the meiome and translational controls determine the व्यापक restructuring of meiotic cells needed to carry आउट meiosis.
Prior to the meiosis process the कोशिका 's chromosomes are duplicated by a गोलाकार of DNA replication, बनाना from the मातृ और paternal versions of प्रत्येक chromosome ( homologs ) दो exact नक़ल, सिस्टर chromatids, attached at the centromere प्रदेश.
In the beginning of meiosis the मातृ और पैतृक homologs जोड़ी to प्रत्येक अन्य.
Then they typically exchange भाग by समजात recombination leading to crossovers of DNA between the मातृ and paternal संस्करण of the chromosome.
spindle fibers bind to the centromeres of प्रत्येक pair of homologs and arrange the pairs at the spindle equator.
तब the fibers pull the recombined homologs to opposite डंडे of the कोशिका.
as the chromosomes move दूर from the बीच the cell divides into दो daughter cells, प्रत्येक containing a अगुणित number of गुणसूत्रों रचित of दो chromatids.
बाद the recombined maternal और पैतृक homologs have separated into the two बेटी कोशिकाएं, a second round of कोशिका division occurs.
वहीँ meiosis ends as the दो सिस्टर chromatids बनाना up प्रत्येक homolog हैं separated और मूव into एक of the चार resulting gamete कोशिकाएं.
Upon fertilization, for उदाहरण when a sperm enters an अंडा cell, two gamete cells produced by meiosis fuse.
The gamete from the mother और the gamete इससे the पिता प्रत्येक contribute एक हाफ of the set of chromosomes that मेक up the नई offspring 's genome.
Meiosis उपयोग many of the same mechanisms as mitosis, a type of कोशिका प्रभाग used by eukaryotes like पौधे and animals to विभाजित one cell into दो identical daughter cells.
In सब पौधे और in अनेक protists meiosis परिणाम in the गठन of बीजाणुओं : अगुणित cells that can divide vegetatively बगैर undergoing fertilization.
मुक्केबाज़ी ( pugilism, prize लड़, the मीठी science or in यूनानी pygmachia ) is a martial art and कॉम्बैट खेल in जिससे two people engage in a contest of शक्ति, speed, reflexes, endurance और होगा by throwing घूंसे with gloved हैंड्स.
amateur मुक्केबाज़ी is an Olympic and राष्ट्रमंडल sport और is a आम fixture in most of the major अंतरराष्ट्रीय games - it भी रै its अपना World championships.
मुक्केबाज़ी is supervised by a रेफरी over a श्रेणी of one- to three-minute intervals called rounds.
the परिणाम is decided when an प्रतिद्वन्दी is deemed incapable to continue by a रेफरी, is disqualified लिये तोड़कर a नियम, resigns by फेंकना in a तौलिया, or is pronounced the winner or हारा based on the न्यायाधीशों ' scorecards at the समाप्त of the contest.
The birth hour of boxing as a sport may be इसके acceptance by the प्राचीन Greeks as an ओलम्पिक खेल as early as 688 BC.
मुक्केबाज़ी विकसित from 16th- और 18th-century prizefights, largely in ग्रेट Britain, to the forerunner of आधुनिक boxing in the mid-19th सदी, again initially in Great ब्रिटेन and बाद in the United राज्य.
In 2004, ईएसपीएन ranked मुक्केबाज़ी as the most difficult sport in the संसार.
अनुबंध or concord happens when a word परिवर्तन रूप depending on the other शब्द to which it relates.
It is an उदाहरण of inflection, and प्रायः involves बनाना the value of some grammatical श्रेणी ( ऐसे as लिंग or व्यक्ति ) `` agree '' between different words or parts of the sentence.
लिये उदाहरण, in Standard अंग्रेज़ी, one may कह I am or he is, but नहीं `` i is '' or `` he am ''.
इस is because the व्याकरण of the भाषा requires कि the क्रिया and its subject सहमत in person.
The pronouns i and he are first और तीसरा व्यक्ति क्रमशः, as are the क्रिया फ़ॉर्म am और is.
The क्रिया रूप must be चयनित so कि it रै the same व्यक्ति as the subject.
The agreement based on overt व्याकरणिक categories as above is औपचारिक अनुबंध, in contrast to notional agreement, जिससे is based on meaning.
For उदाहरण, the phrase The United States is treated as एकवचन लिये purposes of agreement, even though it is formally बहुवचन.
इस is a list of places below औसत sea स्तर that are on जमीन.
स्थान in tunnels, mines, तहखानों, खोदा छेद ( also with open आसमान ), under जल, अंतर्गत बर्फ, or existing temporarily as a परिणाम of ebbing of sea tide इत्यादि. हैं not शामिल.

डिब्बी Macomber ( born अक्तूबर 22, 1948 in Yakima, वॉशिंगटन ) is a best-selling अमरीकी लेखक of over 150 रोमांस novels and contemporary women 's fiction.
over 140 million copies of उसके books हैं in छपाई throughout the संसार, और चार have become made-for-TV-movies.
Macomber was the inaugural विजेता of the fan-voted Quill Award लिये romance in 2005 and has महरूम awarded both a रोमांस लेखक of अमेरिका रीता and a lifetime achievement award by the Romance Writers of America.
Catonsville is a census-designated place ( cdp ) in Baltimore County, Maryland, संयुक्त राज्य.
The population was 41,567 at the 2010 census.
the community lies to the west of बाल्टीमोर along the नगर 's किनारा.
catonsville is the home of the विश्वविद्यालयों of मेरीलैंड, Baltimore County ( umbc ), a public शोध university साथ over 12,000 विद्यार्थी.
A वकील, according to ब्लैक 's Law शब्दकोष, is `` a व्यक्ति सीखे in the law ; as an attorney, counsel or solicitor ; a person जो is practicing विधि. ''
विधि is the system of नियम of conduct established by the sovereign government of a समाज to सही wrongs, maintain the stability of political and सोशल प्राधिकार, और deliver इंसाफ.
working as a lawyer involves the व्यावहारिक application of अमूर्त विधिक theories और knowledge to solve विशिष्ट individualized समस्याएं, or to advance the interests of those who retain ( i.e., hire ) वकील to perform legal सेवाएं.
the भूमिका of the lawyer varies significantly across विधिक jurisdictions, and so it can be treated यहाँ in तभी the most सामान्य शर्तें.
वेक्टर Marketing is the domestic sales भुजा of Cutco निगम, an olean, नई York आधारित cutlery निर्माता.
The Family and चिकित्सा छोड़ Act of 1993 ( FMLA ) is a संयुक्त राज्य federal law requiring covered employers to provide कर्मचारी job-protected और unpaid छोड़ लिये योग्य चिकित्सा and परिवार reasons.
योग्य medical और परिवार reasons include : निजी or परिवार illness, family military leave, गर्भावस्था, adoption, or the foster care placement of a child.
the FMLA is administered by the Wage and घंटा Division of the संयुक्त States विभाग of Labor.
The विधेयक थी a प्रमुख part of अध्यक्ष विधेयक Clinton 's कार्यसूची in उसके पहला पद.
President क्लिंटन signed the bill into law on February 5, 1993 ( ; 29 u.s.c. सेक. 2601 ; 29 cfr 825 ) और it took प्रभाव on August 5, 1993, six months बाद.
The fmla थी intended `` to संतुलन the demands of the कार्यस्थल with the needs of परिवारों. ''
The Act allows योग्य employees to take up to 12 कार्य weeks of unpaid leave during any 12-month काल to attend to the गंभीर health condition of the कर्मचारी, parent, जीवनसाथी or चाइल्ड, or for pregnancy or परवाह of a नवजात child, or for adoption or फोस्टर care of a child.
in order to be योग्य लिये FMLA छोड़, an employee must have महरूम at the कारोबार at तनिक 12 months, and worked at तनिक 1,250 hours over the past 12 महीने, और कार्य at a location where the कम्पनी employs 50 or अधिक कर्मचारी within 75 मील.
The fmla कवर both public- और private-sector कर्मचारी, लकिन certain categories of employees are excluded, including निर्वाचित officials और उनके personal स्टाफ सदस्यों.
The Vietnam युद्ध ( ) थी a ठंडा युद्ध -era सैन्य conflict that occurred in Vietnam, लाओस, और कंबोडिया from 1 नवम्बर 1955 to the fall of साइगॉन on 30 April 1975.
This युद्ध followed the पहला इंडोचायना War and थी लड़ा between उत्तर वियतनाम, supported by इसके communist allies, and the government of दक्षिण वियतनाम, समर्थित by the संयुक्त राज्य and अन्य anti-communist देशों.
the viet Cong ( also ज्ञात as the National मुक्ति Front, or nlf ), a lightly armed South वियतनामी communist आम front निर्देशित by the उत्तर, largely fought a छापामार युद्ध against anti-communist शक्तियां in the region.
The Vietnam People 's Army ( North Vietnamese Army ) सगाई in a more conventional war, at times committing विशाल इकाई into battle.
u.S. and South Vietnamese शक्तियां relied on air बड़प्पन और overwhelming firepower to conduct ढूंढें and destroy परिचालन, involving मैदान forces, तोपखाने, and airstrikes.
the u.S. government viewed भागीदारी in the war as a way to prevent a कम्युनिस्ट कब्ज़ा of South Vietnam as भाग of उनके wider strategy of containment.
the North वियतनामी government and Viet cong यहूद fighting to reunify वियतनाम under कम्युनिस्ट rule.
वे viewed the conflict as a colonial युद्ध, लड़ा initially against फ़्रांस, backed by the U.S., and बाद विरूद्ध दक्षिण वियतनाम, जिससे it regarded as a U.S. puppet state.
अमरीकी सैन्य advisors arrived in कया was तब French इंडोचायना शुरूआत in 1950.
u.S. involvement escalated in the early 1960s, साथ troop levels tripling in 1961 and tripling again in 1962.
U.S. combat units यहूद deployed शुरूआत in 1965.
परिचालन spanned अंतरराष्ट्रीय सीमायें, with लाओस and कंबोडिया heavily bombed.
American involvement in the war peaked in 1968, at the समय of the tet Offensive.
After इस, U.S. मैदान शक्तियां were धीरे withdrawn as part of a नीति ज्ञात as Vietnamization.
Despite the पेरिस सलाम accords, signed by all पार्टियों in January 1973, लड़ continued.
U.S. सैन्य involvement ended on 15 August 1973 as a परिणाम of the case–church amendment passed by the U.S. Congress.
the कैप्चर of Saigon by the Vietnam लोगों 's फौज in अप्रैल 1975 चिह्नित the समाप्त of the war, and उत्तर and South वियतनाम were reunified the following साल.
the युद्ध exacted a huge इंसान cost in terms of fatalities ( see वियतनाम War casualties ).
Estimates of the number of वियतनामी सैनिको and नागरिकों killed vary इससे 800,000 to 3.1 million.
Some 200,000–300,000 cambodians, 20,000–200,000 laotians, and 58,220 U.S. service members भी died in the conflict.
क्लीवलैंड Volcano in the Aleutian Islands of अलास्का photographed इससे the International स्पेस स्टेशन, may 2006.
राख plumes पहुँचे a ऊँचाई of 19 km during the climactic eruption at Mount pinatubo, Philippines in 1991.
a volcano is an opening, or rupture, in a planet 's सतह or क्रस्ट, जिससे allows hot मैग्मा, volcanic राख and गैसों to एस्केप इससे the मैग्मा कक्ष below the सतह.
Volcanoes हैं generally मिला where tectonic plates हैं diverging or converging.
A mid-oceanic लकीरें, लिये example the Mid-Atlantic Ridge, has examples of ज्वालामुखी caused by divergent tectonic प्लेटों pulling अलावा ; the Pacific रिंग of आग has examples of ज्वालामुखी caused by अभिसारी tectonic plates coming साथ.
By कंट्रास्ट, ज्वालामुखी हैं usually नहीं निर्मित जहाँ दो tectonic प्लेटों स्लाइड past एक another.
ज्वालामुखी can also रूप जहाँ वहीँ is stretching and thinning of the धरती 's crust in the interiors of प्लेटों, e.g., in the East अफ़्रीकी दरार, the Wells gray-clearwater volcanic field और the Rio Grande दरार in North अमेरिका.
इस प्रकार of volcanism falls अंतर्गत the umbrella of `` थाली hypothesis '' volcanism.
volcanism दूर from plate boundaries has also been समझाया as mantle plumes.
These so-called `` हॉटस्पॉट ``, लिये उदाहरण Hawaii, are postulated to उठता from upwelling diapirs साथ मैग्मा इससे the core–mantle boundary, 3,000 km deep in the Earth.
erupting volcanoes can pose many जोखिमों, नहीं तभी in the तात्कालिक vicinity of the फटना.
volcanic ash can be a threat to वायुयान, in particular those with जेट इंजन where राख अणु can be melted by the high operating तापमान.
विशाल eruptions can affect temperature as ash और droplets of sulfuric एसिड obscure the sun और cool the धरती 's lower माहौल or क्षोभमण्डल ; however, वे भी absorb ऊष्मा radiated up इससे the धरती, thereby वार्मिंग the stratosphere.
Historically, so-called volcanic सर्दियों have caused catastrophic अकाल.
A गहन pothole on नई York नगर 's दूसरी एवेन्यू
A pothole ( sometimes called a kettle and ज्ञात in भाग of the पश्चिमी संयुक्त States as a chuckhole ) is a type of disruption in the सतह of a roadway where a portion of the सड़क सामग्री has broken away, leaving a छेद.
renal कोशिका कार्सिनोमा ( RCC, भी ज्ञात as hypernephroma ) is a kidney कर्कट कि originates in the lining of the proximal convoluted tubule, the very small tubes in the kidney that हस्तांतरण GF ( glomerular filtrate ) इससे the glomerulus to the descending limb of the nephron.
RCC is the सबसे common type of kidney cancer in adults, responsible लिये approximately 80 % of cases.
it is भी known to be the सबसे lethal of all the genitourinary tumors.
आरंभिक उपचार is सबसे commonly a कट्टरपंथी or आंशिक nephrectomy और remains the mainstay of curative उपचार.
Where the ट्यूमर is confined to the renal parenchyma, the 5-year अस्तित्व रेट is 60-70 %, but इस is lowered considerably जहाँ metastases have spread.
It is relatively resistant to विकिरण therapy and chemotherapy, हालांकि some मामले respond to immunotherapy.
targeted कर्कट therapies such as sunitinib, temsirolimus, bevacizumab, interferon-alpha, and sorafenib have improved the outlook लिये RCC.
estée lauder Companies, Inc. is a निर्माता and marketer of prestige skincare, मेकअप, fragrance और hair परवाह products.
The कम्पनी has इसके headquarters in Midtown Manhattan, New यॉर्क नगर.
The peritoneum ( ) is the serous झिल्ली कि फ़ॉर्म the lining of the abdominal cavity or the coelom —it covers most of the intra-abdominal ( or coelomic ) organs—in amniotes and कुछ invertebrates ( annelids, for instance ).
It is रचित of a परत of mesothelium supported by a thin परत of संयोजी ऊतक.
The peritoneum दोनो supports the abdominal अंगों and serves as a conduit for their blood and lymph vessels and nerves.
The abdominal cavity ( the स्पेस bounded by the vertebrae, abdominal मांसपेशियां, diaphragm और pelvic floor ) should नहीं be उलझन with the intraperitoneal space ( स्तिथ भीतर the abdominal गुहा, लकिन wrapped in peritoneum ).
The structures भीतर the intraperitoneal स्पेस हैं पुकारा `` intraperitoneal '' ( e.g. the stomach ), the structures in the abdominal cavity कि are located पीछे the intraperitoneal स्पेस हैं called `` retroperitoneal `` ( e.g. the kidneys ), और those structures नीचे the intraperitoneal स्पेस are पुकारा `` subperitoneal '' or `` infraperitoneal '' ( e.g. the ब्लैडर ).
Modern 2.5 '' SSD प्रयुक्त in उपभोक्ता लैपटॉप and डेस्कटॉप computers.
ddr SDRAM based SSD.

pci-e, DRAM, and NAND आधारित ssd.
It उपयोग an external शक्ति supply to मेक the DRAM non-volatile.
a solid-state ड्राइव ( SSD ) ( also ज्ञात as a solid-state disk or इलेक्ट्रॉनिक डिस्क, though it contains no वास्तविक `` disk '' of any kind ) is a data storage device using एकीकृत सर्किट assemblies as मेमोरी to store आंकड़ा persistently.
ssd technology उपयोग इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अंतरफलक compatible with परंपरागत ब्लाक input/output ( I/O ) hard डिस्क drives.
ssds have no चलती mechanical components, जिससे फर्क them from परंपरागत electromechanical चुम्बकीय डिस्क ऐसे as मुश्किल disk drives ( hdds ) or फ्लॉपी डिस्क, which contain घूम disks and movable read/write heads.
compared साथ electromechanical disks, SSDs हैं typically less susceptible to शारीरिक shock, much quieter, have निम्नतर अभिगम समय, और कम latency.
However, while the price of ssds has जारी to decline in 2012, SSDs हैं स्टिल परिचय 7 to 8 टाइम्स अधिक expensive per ईकाई of भंडार than hdds.
अनेक ssds उपयोग I/O अंतरफलक विकसित लिये मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव, यूँ permitting सरल replacement in common अनुप्रयोग.
, most SSDs उपयोग nand-based फ्लैश मेमोरी, जिससे retains आंकड़ा बगैर शक्ति.
For अनुप्रयोग requiring तेज़ अभिगम, but not necessarily data persistence बाद power घाटा, SSDs may be constructed इससे random-access मेमोरी ( RAM ).
Such डिवाइस may employ separate power sources, ऐसे as बैटरी, to maintain data after शक्ति घाटा.
Hybrid drives or solid राज्य hybrid ड्राइव ( sshd ) combine the सुविधाएँ of SSDs और hdds in the same unit, containing a large मुश्किल disk ड्राइव and an SSD संचय to improve प्रदर्शन of frequently पहुँचा data.
These devices may offer near-ssd performance for many अनुप्रयोग.
