Caviar, according to the Food and Agriculture Organization, is a product made from salt-cured fish-eggs of the Acipenseridae family.
The roe can be `` भैस '' ( non-pasteurized ) or pasteurized, साथ pasteurization reducing its culinary and economic मान.
Traditionally the term caviar refers तभी to roe इससे जंगली sturgeon in the कैस्पियन and ब्लैक Seas ( बेलुगा, ossetra and Sevruga caviars ).
depending on the country, caviar may भी be प्रयुक्त to describe the roe of अन्य मछली such as salmon, steelhead, ट्राउट, lumpfish, whitefish, और other species of sturgeon.
Caviar is considered a लक्ज़री कोमलता और is खाया as a गार्निश or a spread.
In 2012, caviar sold for $ 2,500 per पाउंड, or $ 3,000 to $ 5,500 प्रति kilo.
The SEC Network is a television अनुप्रयोग network featuring सजीव broadcasts of कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल and basketball events इससे the Southeastern सम्मेलन.
It is owned and operated by ईएसपीएन प्लस and is shown in more than 50 प्रतिशत of households in the संयुक्त States, ज़्यादातर southeastern United राज्य बाज़ार.
the सेक Network typically airs in the noon eastern slot कि was former home to the Raycom खेल सेक खेल of the week.
खेल are दिखाया locally on broadcast stations, regional खेल संजाल, as well as on ईएसपीएन GamePlan, ESPN Full अदालत, और espn3.com.
the SEC Network is also available in Canada via Atlanta 's WPCH-TV.
The SEC संजाल uses the वही on-screen ग्राफिक्स currently used by ईएसपीएन on एबीसी, a संस्करण of ईएसपीएन 's ग्राफिक्स पैकेज.
सेक Network 's फ़ुटबॉल programming still उपयोग a title safe क्षेत्रफल because सबसे of इसके affiliates do नहीं letterbox their मानक Definition फ़ीड्स, while ईएसपीएन 's television networks have अनुमत their ग्राफिक्स to abandon the title सुरक्षित, but letterbox for sd viewers.
starting with the सेक 2012 बास्केट ऋतु, सेक संजाल 's graphics have been converted to a 16:9 widescreen-only format.
This is भी होने प्रयुक्त for the 2013 Basketball season, लकिन had still adapted the पूर्व 4:3-safe graphics format लिये the 2012 सेक फ़ुटबॉल season.
the 1990s, pronounced और भी known as `` the nineteen-nineties '' or abbreviated as `` the nineties '' or `` the '90s '', थी a दशक that began on January 1, 1990, and ended on दिसम्बर 31, 1999.
It थी the 10th and last decade of the 20th century and the 100th and last decade of the 2nd मिलेनियम.
The दशक is best ज्ञात लिये the समाप्त of the Cold War at the beginning of the decade and the विस्तार and व्यावसायीकरण of the Internet during the second half of the दशक.
In much of the West the 1990s is remembered as a period of unprecedented सलाम and समृद्धि, हालांकि अनेक भाग of the so-called Third World faced various समस्याएं including genocide, एड्स and नई or continuing जातीय tensions और civil wars.
culturally speaking the decade थी characterized by the rise of बहुसंस्कृतिवाद and वैकल्पिक media.
आंदोलनों such as grunge, the rave scene और हिप hop spread around the संसार to young people दौरान the दशक, aided by then-new प्रौद्योगिकी such as केबल टेलीविज़न और the अंतरजाल.
A combination of factors, including the mass mobilization of पूंजी बाज़ार through neoliberalism, the beginning of the widespread अप्रसार of नई मीडिया ऐसे as the Internet, और the विच्छेद of the सोवियत संघ led to a realignment और reconsolidation of economic और political power across the संसार, और within देशों.
Income असमानता among देशों in the संसार रोज़ sharply between the 1980s and the mid-1990s, पहले levelling off and तब falling बाद 2000.
New ethnic conflicts उभरा in Africa, the Balkans and the Caucasus, the पूर्व दो which led to the Rwandan नरसंहार and बोस्नियाई नरसंहार, respectively.
The संयुक्त States began its वर्तमान सैन्य occupation of the Middle ईस्ट दौरान the summer of 1990 साथ Desert शील्ड बाद it काटें off a large portion of the world 's petroleum सप्लाई.
Signs of any रेज़ोल्यूशन of tensions between इसराईल और the Arab world remained elusive, though the Irish परेशानियों came to a standstill in 1998 साथ the शुभ Friday Agreement बाद 30 सालो of हिंसा.
the gray भेड़िया or धूसर wolf ( canis lupus ) is a प्रजाति of canid देशी to the wilderness and रिमोट areas of उत्तर America, यूरेशिया, and North Africa.
It is the largest member of इसके family, साथ males averaging, and महिलाओं.
it is समान in general appearance और proportions to a German shepherd, or sled श्वान, but रै a larger सिर, narrower chest, longer legs, straighter टेल and bigger पंजे.
Its winter फर is long और bushy, and predominantly a mottled धूसर in रंग, हालांकि nearly pure white, रेड, or भूरा to black also occur.
भीतर the genus canis, the gray wolf represents a अधिक specialised and प्रगतिशील form than इसके smaller cousins ( the कायोटी and सुनहरी jackal ), as demonstrated by इसके morphological adaptations to शिकार विशाल शिकार, its अधिक gregarious प्रकृति and इसके highly advanced expressive बर्ताव.
It is a social animal, travelling in nuclear families consisting of a mated जोड़ी, accompanied by the जोड़ी 's वयस्क औलाद.
The gray भेड़िया is typically an apex परभक्षी throughout इसके दायरा, साथ only इंसानो और tigers पोज़ a गंभीर threat to it.
it feeds primarily on विशाल ungulates, though it also eats छोटी animals, पशुधन, carrion, and garbage.
the धूसर wolf is one of the संसार 's सबसे खूब शोधकार्य पशु, साथ संभवतः more books written परिचय it than कोई other वन्यजीव species.
It has a long history of संघ with humans, having been despised और hunted in सबसे agricultural समुदायों due to its हमले on पशुधन, while conversely होने respected by कुछ Native अमरीकी जनजातियों.
It is the sole ancestor of the dog, which was पहला domesticated in the मध्य East.
हालांकि the fear of भेड़ियों is प्रचलित in many human societies, the majority of recorded attacks on people have महरूम attributed to animals suffering from rabies.
Non-rabid wolves have attacked और killed people, मुख्यतः children, but this is unusual, as wolves are relatively few, live away from people, and have महरूम taught to fear इंसानो by hunters and shepherds.
शिकार and trapping रै घटाया the प्रजाति ' range to, though इसके स्टिल अपेक्षाकृत widespread दायरा and stable जनसांख्यिकी means कि the species is not threatened at a वैश्विक level, और is therefore वर्गीकृत by the IUCN as Least चिंता.
the Roman Empire ( ) थी the post- Republican period of the प्राचीन रोमन सभ्यता, characterised by an autocratic form of सरकारी and विशाल territorial holdings around the भूमध्यसागरीय in यूरोपीय, अफ़्रीकी, and एशिया.
the 500-year-old Roman गणतंत्र, जिससे preceded it, था been destabilized through a series of सिविल wars.
अनेक कार्यक्रम चिह्नित the परिवर्तन from Republic to साम्राज्य, सहित जूलियस Caesar 's नियुक्ति as perpetual तानाशाह ( 44 bc ) ; the Battle of actium ( 31 BC ) ; और the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the Roman Senate ( 27 bc ).
The पहला दो सदियां of the Empire यहूद a काल of unprecedented stability and समृद्धि ज्ञात as the pax romana ( `` Roman Peace '' ).
It पहुँचे its महानतम expanse दौरान the शासनकाल of त्राजान ( 98–117 AD ).
in the 3rd सदी, the Empire underwent a संकट कि threatened its existence, but was reunified and stabilized under the emperors Aurelian and Diocletian.
ईसाइयों रोज़ to power in the 4th सदी, during जिससे समय a प्रणाली of dual नियम was developed in the Latin वेस्ट और यूनानी East.
After the पतन of central government in the West in the 5th century, the पूर्वी हाफ जारी as what would later be ज्ञात as the बीज़ान्टिन Empire.
Because of the साम्राज्य 's विशाल extent और long endurance, the institutions और संस्कृति of Rome had a profound and lasting influence on the विकास of भाषा, धर्म, वास्तुकला, philosophy, विधि, और forms of सरकारी in the territory it governed, particularly यूरोपीय, और by means of European expansionism throughout the modern world.
शिक्षा in the संयुक्त States is mainly provided by the पब्लिक sector, साथ control और funding coming इससे three levels : local, राज्य, और federal, in that order.
चाइल्ड education is अनिवार्य, and there are also a large क्रमांक and चौड़ी किस्में of higher शिक्षा institutions throughout the देश कि एक can choose to attend, both सरेआम and privately administered.
Public education is universally उपलब्धियाँ.
स्कूल curricula, funding, शिक्षण, employment, और अन्य नीतियों are set through locally elected school फलक with क्षेत्राधिकार over स्कूल districts साथ many directives from राज्य legislatures.
School districts हैं usually पृथक इससे अन्य लोकल jurisdictions, साथ स्वतंत्र officials and budgets.
शैक्षणिक मानकों और standardized testing decisions are प्रायः made by state सरकारें.
the आयु for compulsory शिक्षा vary by state.
it begins इससे ages five to आठ और ends from ages चौदह to eighteen.
Compulsory शिक्षा आवश्यकताएँ can generally be satisfied by educating children in पब्लिक schools, state-certified निजी schools, or an स्वीकृत home school कार्यक्रम.
in सबसे public और private schools, शिक्षा is विभाजित into three levels : elementary स्कूल, मध्य school ( sometimes पुकारा जूनियर high स्कूल ), and ऊँची school ( sometimes referred to as द्वितीयक शिक्षा ).
In almost सब schools at these levels, children are divided by age groups into ग्रेड, ranging from किंडरगार्टन ( followed by first grade ) लिये the youngest children in elementary स्कूल, up to twelfth grade, the final साल of high school.
The exact आयु range of students in these grade स्तर varies slightly from area to क्षेत्रफल.
Post-secondary शिक्षा, better ज्ञात as `` college `` in the संयुक्त राज्य, is generally governed separately इससे the elementary and high स्कूल प्रणाली, और is described in a पृथक section below.
सरकारी supported, free पब्लिक schools for all प्रारंभ होने स्थापित बाद the revolution, and expanded in the 19th century, as the results of प्रयत्न of मेन जैसे Horace मन and Booker T. Washington.
By 1870, all states had free elementary schools, albeit only in urban centers.
As the 20th सदी drew nearer, states started गुजर laws to मेक schooling अनिवार्य, and by 1910, 72 प्रतिशत of children attended स्कूल.
निजी schools continued to spread दौरान this time, as well as कॉलेजों and—in the rural centers— land grant colleges.
the साल of 1910 also saw the first सच्चा ऊँची schools.
During the rest of the 20th century, educational efforts centered on reducing the inequality of the schooling प्रणाली.
the लैंडमार्क परम् अदालत case भूरा v. Board of Education बना the desegregation of elementary and high schools a national प्रधानता, while the pell Grant कार्यक्रम helped ग़रीब अल्पसंख्यकों gain access to कॉलेज.
खास education थी बना into federal विधि in 1975.
The Elementary और Secondary Education अधिनियम of 1965 बना standardized परीक्षण a requirement, और in 1983, a आयोग was स्थापित to evaluate their results और propose a कोर्स of कार्रवाई.
The resulting no Child Left पीछे अधिनियम of 2001 थी controversial and its लक्ष्य proved to be unrealistic.
a commission established in 2006 evaluated उच्चतर शिक्षा, but इसके सुझाव have yet to be fully implemented.
पॉल ब्रैग ( February 6, 1895 – दिसम्बर 7, 1976 ), nutritionist, was a पायोनियर in america’s तंदुरुस्ती गति.
Health spending per capita, in $ US ppp-adjusted, with the US और कनाडा compared amongst other पहला संसार nations.
Comparison of the health परवाह systems in Canada और the United States are प्रायः made by सरकारी, पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य and public policy विश्लेषकों.
the two देशों था समान health care systems before कनाडा reformed इसके प्रणाली in the 1960s और 1970s.
the United राज्य spends much अधिक money on health care than Canada, on दोनो a per-capita basis and as a percentage of जीडीपी.
In 2006, per-capita बिता for health care in Canada was US $ 3,678 ; in the U.S., US $ 6,714.
the u.S. खर्च 15.3 % of जीडीपी on स्वास्थ्य care in that साल ; Canada खर्च 10.0 %.
in 2006, 70 % of स्वास्थ्य परवाह बिता in कनाडा थी financed by government, बनाम 46 % in the संयुक्त States.
Total सरकारी बिता per capita in the u.S. on health परवाह थी 23 % higher than कनाडाई government बिता, और U.S. government expenditure on health care थी just under 83 % of total कनाडाई बिता ( public और private ) हालांकि ये आंकडे do n't लो into खाता जनसांख्यिकी differences.
अध्ययन have आइये to अलग conclusions about the परिणाम of इस disparity in spending.
A 2007 पुनर्विलोकन of सब studies comparing health outcomes in Canada और the us in a कनाडाई peer-reviewed medical जर्नल मिला कि `` स्वास्थ्य outcomes may be श्रेष्ठ in patients cared for in Canada versus the United States, but differences are not consistent. ''
Life expectancy is longer in कनाडा, and इसके infant मृत्यु रेट is lower than कि of the u.S., लकिन there is debate परिचय the underlying causes of these मतभेद.
एक commonly cited तुलना, the 2000 संसार स्वास्थ्य Organization 's ratings of `` overall स्वास्थ्य सेवा performance '', which used a `` composite measure of उपलब्धि in the स्तर of स्वास्थ्य, the distribution of health, the स्तर of responsiveness and fairness of financial योगदान '', ranked कनाडा 30th और the US 37th among 191 सदस्य nations.
This पढ़ाई रेटेड the US `` responsiveness '', or विशेषता of service लिये individuals receiving उपचार, as 1st, compared साथ 7th लिये Canada.
While the average life प्रत्याशा लिये canadians थी 80.34 सालो compared with 78.6 सालो लिये residents of the US, simply comparing the जीवन expectancy of दो groups with अलग जातिगत makeup और different मोटापा दरों is संभावित नहीं an effective रास्ता of determining which healthcare system is श्रेष्ठ.
the जो 's पढ़ाई methods were criticized by कुछ analyses.
Although वहीँ is a माप of सर्वसम्मति कि life-expectancy और शिशु mortality चिह्नित the सबसे विश्वसनीय ways to compare nation-wide स्वास्थ्य care, assuming the जनसांख्यिकी makeup is समान, a हाल report by the Congressional शोध Service carefully summarizes कुछ हाल आंकड़ा और notes the `` difficult research issues '' facing international comparisons.
the sound source रै now टूटा through the sound गति अवरोध, और is traveling at 1.4 times the गति of ध्वनि, ( mach 1.4 ).
Since the सोर्स is moving faster ( साथ a गति ) than the sound लहरें it creates, it actually लीड the advancing wavefront.
the ध्वनि सोर्स will pass by a stationary निरीक्षक ( with a गति ) पहले the observer दरअसल hears the sound it creates.
as a परिणाम, an निरीक्षक in front of the source होगा detect
और an निरीक्षक पीछे the सोर्स.
a sonic boom produced by an वायुयान चलती at M=2.92, गणना इससे the cone कोण of 20 degrees.
An observer hears the boom when the शॉक वेव, on the किनारे of the cone, crosses उसके or उसके स्थान.
mach cone angle
A सोनिक बूम is the sound संबद्ध साथ the शॉक waves निर्मित by an ऑब्जेक्ट traveling through the एयर तेज़ than the speed of sound.
Sonic booms generate enormous amounts of ध्वनि उर्जा, sounding much like an विस्फोट.
the crack of a सुपरसोनिक bullet गुजर overhead is an उदाहरण of a sonic boom in miniature.
The tonight दिखाएँ साथ Jay Leno is an American late-night बात show hosted by jay Leno that initially aired इससे may 25, 1992 to may 29, 2009, और resumed production on कूच 1, 2010.
the चौथी incarnation of the Tonight Show franchise made इसके डेब्यू on May 25, 1992, three दिनों following Johnny कार्सन 's रिटायरमेंट as मेजबान of the program.
The program originates इससे NBC Studios in burbank, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, और is broadcast सोमवार through शुक्रवार at 11:35 PM in the पूर्वी and Pacific समय zones ( 10:35 pm Central / Mountain time ).
Unlike कार्सन or उसके predecessor Jack paar, लीनो only एकबार utilized a guest मेजबान, preferring to host the श्रेणी by खुद.
On अप्रैल 26, 1999, the दिखाएँ began broadcasting in 1080i HDTV, becoming the first अमरीकी nightly talk दिखाएँ to be शॉट in high definition.
the show is शॉट in 16:9 पहलू ratio.
The श्रेणी, which followed the same मौलिक स्वरूप as कि of his predecessors ( an खोलने monologue followed by comedy routines, interviews और performances ), ran until May 29, 2009, बाद which Leno थी succeeded by Conan O'Brien.
एनबीसी signed लीनो to a नई deal लिये a nightly बात show in the 10:00 pm et timeslot.
the प्राइमटाइम श्रेणी, titled The jay Leno दिखाएँ, debuted on September 14, 2009, following a समान format to the Leno अवतार of tonight.
neither o'brien 's version of the कार्यक्रम, which premiered June 1, 2009, nor the Jay लीनो दिखाएँ उत्पन्न the ratings कि NBC had अपेक्षित.
the network decided to मूव a सघन 30-minute संस्करण of लीनो 's show to O'Brien 's time slot, और O'Brien 's tonight दिखाएँ a half-hour later.
इस निर्णय met साथ विपक्ष from o'brien, whose कार्यावधि on The tonight दिखाएँ ended जनवरी 22, 2010, बाद जिससे he began his अपना talk दिखाएँ on TBS.
the tonight Show साथ Jay लीनो then began इसके दूसरी and current incarnation, the छठे of the मताधिकार, on March 1, 2010.
rfid chip next to a grain of rice.
This चिप contains a radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड कुंडली that modulates an external magnetic फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र a coded identification number when queried by a रीडर device.
इस छोटी प्रकार is incorporated in consumer products, and implanted in pets, for पहचान purposes.
Radio-frequency identification ( rfid ) is the बेतार non-contact उपयोग of radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक fields to transfer data, for the purposes of automatically identifying और ट्रैकिंग टैग attached to वस्तुएँ.
the टैग contain electronically stored information.
कुछ टैग हैं संचालित and पढ़ा at short सीमाएँ ( a few मीटर ) via magnetic fields ( electromagnetic induction ).
Others use a लोकल power source such as a battery, or else have no battery लकिन collect energy from the interrogating em field, and then act as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or uhf रेडियो लहरें ( i.e., electromagnetic विकिरण at ऊँची बारंबारता ).
Battery powered टैग may operate at hundreds of meters.
नापसंद a बार code, the टैग करता नहीं necessarily need to be भीतर लकीर of sight of the reader, और may be अंतःस्थापित in the tracked ऑब्जेक्ट.
rfid tags are प्रयुक्त in many उद्योग.
An rfid tag attached to an automobile during production can be used to track its progress through the सभा लकीर.
Pharmaceuticals can be tracked through warehouses.
Livestock और पालतु may have tags injected, allowing positive पहचान of the एनिमल.
चूंकि RFID tags can be attached to clothing, possessions, or even implanted भीतर people, the possibility of पढना personally-linked information बगैर सहमति रै उठाया privacy चिंताएं.
id, अहंकार और super-ego are the three parts of the psychic apparatus पारिभाषित in Sigmund फ्रायड 's structural model of the psyche ; वे are the three theoretical constructs in शर्तें of जिनकी कार्यकलाप और बातचीत दिमागी life is वर्णित.
According to इस model of the psyche, the id is the set of uncoordinated instinctual रुझान ; the super-ego plays the नाजुक और moralizing role ; और the अहंकार is the organized, realistic भाग that mediates between the इच्छाओं of the id and the super-ego.
the super-ego can रोकें you from doing certain बाते that अपना id may want you to do.
Even हालांकि the model is structural and makes reference to an apparatus, the id, ego और super-ego हैं functions of the mind rather than भाग of the दिमाग और do नहीं correspond one-to-one with वास्तविक somatic structures of the kind dealt with by neuroscience.
the अवधारणाओं themselves arose at a लेट stage in the विकास of Freud 's thought : the `` structural मॉडल '' ( which succeeded his `` आर्थिक model '' और `` topographical मॉडल '' ) was पहला discussed in his 1920 essay `` Beyond the Pleasure Principle `` और थी formalized और elaborated upon three सालो बाद in उसके `` the अहंकार और the id ``.
फ्रायड 's प्रस्ताव was influenced by the ambiguity of the term `` बेहोश `` and its many conflicting उपयोग.
एयर Force rotc emblem
the एयर फ़ोर्स आरक्षित अधिकारी प्रशिक्षण Corps ( afrotc ) is एक of the three primary commissioning sources for अधिकारियों in the संयुक्त राज्य एयर Force, the अन्य two being the United राज्य Air Force Academy ( USAFA ) and Air Force अधिकारी Training स्कूल ( OTS ).
a अधीनस्थ command of the Air विश्वविद्यालयों भीतर the Air शिक्षा and प्रशिक्षण Command ( aetc ), afrotc is aligned under the Jeanne M. Holm बीच लिये अधिकारी accessions और नागरिक Development at Maxwell AFB, Alabama.
The Holm बीच, formerly known as the Air फ़ोर्स Officer Accession और Training Schools ( afoats ), retains सीधा responsibility for both AFROTC और ots.
afrotc is the largest और oldest सोर्स of commissioned अधिकारियों लिये the U.S. Air Force.
afrotc 's stated mission is to उपज quality नेताओ लिये the u.S. Air फ़ोर्स.
afrotc units हैं located on 144 college और university campuses with 984 additional संस्थानों of higher सीखना participating in cross-town agreements कि allow उनके विद्यार्थी to attend afrotc classes at a nearby `` host '' college or university.
According to AFOATS hq, in 2006, afrotc commissioned 2,083 यूएसएएफ Second lieutenants, with AFROTC नामांकन ranging इससे 23,605 in 1985 to 10,231 in 1993, और around 13,000 नामांकित आज.
afrotc इकाई at colleges और विश्वविद्यालयों are called `` detachments, '' और are typically headed by an active ड्यूटी USAF officer in the rank of कर्नल or lieutenant कर्नल जो functions as both the detachment Commander for यूएसएएफ उद्देश्य and साथ the nominal शीर्षक of प्राध्यापक of aerospace अध्ययन ( pas ) भीतर the institution 's अकादमिक जातियाँ.
सबसे कॉलेजों and universities will designate the AFROTC detachment as the Department of Aerospace अध्ययन.
the PAS is assisted by three to चार सहायक Professors of Aerospace अध्ययन ( apas ), all क्रियाशील ड्यूटी यूएसएएफ officers in the ranks of प्रमुख or captain.
तीन यूएसएएफ non-commissioned अधिकारियों and एक senior non-commissioned अधिकारी will typically provide सैन्य administrative support and are often augmented by एक to दो civilian स्टाफ support कर्मचारी of the अकादमिक institution.
Within afrotc detachments, the students ( referred to as `` cadets '' ) are organized into wings, समूह, squadrons, and फ़्लाइट, mirroring the यूएसएएफ कार्यात्मक wing ढांचा.
the afrotc detachment 's cadet wing or cadet group is separated into two divisions : the General सैन्य कोर्स ( GMC ) consisting of the first two सालो of प्रशिक्षण, and the पेशेवर अधिकारी कोर्स ( POC ) consisting of the last two सालो of training.
The AFROTC कार्यक्रम is भी divided into two प्रशिक्षण functions : the Academic कक्षा Program ( aerospace अध्ययन classes ) और Cadet Activities ( i.e., नेतृत्व प्रयोगशाला, Physical प्रशिक्षण, और अन्य प्रशिक्षण ).
पेपर density ( भी known as basis वज़न और grammage ) is a पद used in the pulp और पेपर industry and भी लिये fabric उद्योग to denote a माप of द्रव्यमान of the product per ईकाई of क्षेत्रफल लिये a type of fabric, पेपर or paperboard.
the term `` density '' is not प्रयुक्त in its परंपरागत भाव of द्रव्यमान प्रति ईकाई volume.
`` Paper घनत्व '', rather, is a माप of the क्षेत्रफल density.
पेपर products that let छोटी or no light pass through ( e.g. पोस्टर board ) हैं माना dense or heavy.
पेपर उत्पाद that allow कुछ लाइट to pass through ( e.g. ऊतक पेपर ) हैं considered lightweight.
In the pulp और paper industry, it is common to set a वाणिज्यिक paper यंत्र to produce पेपर to a target paper घनत्व.
पेपर घनत्व can भी be used to फर्क paper from paperboard as the latter प्रायः has a grammage greater than 134 g/m2.
Two तरीके of expressing पेपर घनत्व हैं commonly उपयोगd:
Expressed in grams per square मीटर ( g/m2 ), पेपर घनत्व is भी known as grammage.
This is the माप used in सबसे parts of the संसार.
Expressed in terms of the mass ( expressed as weight ) per number of चादरें, it is ज्ञात as आधार weight.
the सम्मेलन used in the United राज्य और a few other countries using us पेपर sizes is pounds of a ream of 500 ( or in कुछ मामले 1000 ) sheets of a given ( raw, स्टिल uncut ) आधार आकार.
Japanese paper is expressed as the weight in kg of 1000 चादरें.
Candace Nicole Parker ( born April 19, 1986 ) is an American बास्केट player for the wnba 's लॉस एंजिल्स स्पार्क्स and UMMC Ekaterinburg of Russia.
वो is the younger सिस्टर of एनबीए खिलाड़ी एंथोनी पार्कर.
She attended the University of टेनेसी और थी drafted by the स्पार्क्स in 2008.
She may be best ज्ञात for being the first स्त्री to dunk in an NCAA tournament खेल and the first स्त्री to dunk twice in a कॉलेज game—she set both माइलस्टोन as a redshirt freshman on कूच 19, 2006.
She also became तभी the second खिलाड़ी to dunk in a WNBA game on June 22, 2008.
a बहुमुखी खिलाड़ी, वो is मुख्यतः a forward, but was listed on Tennessee 's रोस्टर as a आगे, बीच, और guard.
She थी a starter on the महिला vols basketball team, विजेता of the 2007 and 2008 ncaa championships.
पार्कर won the 2009 Nickelodeon Kids ' चुनाव पुरस्कार as the पसंदीदा female athlete in the sports category.
और she was a अतिथि star on फिगर It आउट.
A खाना guide पिरामिड is a पिरामिड shaped मार्गदर्शिका of healthy foods divided into sections to show the recommended intake लिये प्रत्येक खाना समूह.
The first food पिरामिड was published in Sweden in 1974.
The सबसे widely known food पिरामिड थी introduced by the संयुक्त राज्य Department of Agriculture in the year 1992, was updated in 2005, and तब replaced in 2011.
over 25 other देशों and संगठनों have भी प्रकाशित food पिरामिडों.
Hans ईसाई Andersen ( ; often referred to in scandinavia as H. C. Andersen ; अप्रैल 2, 1805August 4, 1875 ) थी a डैनिश author और poet.
हालांकि a prolific writer of plays, travelogues, novels, and poems, Andersen is best remembered for उसके परी किस्से, a literary genre he so mastered कि he खुद has become as mythical as the किस्से he wrote.
andersen 's लोकप्रियता is नहीं limited to children ; his stories—called, or `` fantastic किस्से '' —express themes कि transcend आयु और राष्ट्रीयता.
दौरान his आजीवन he was acclaimed for having प्रसन्न children worldwide और was feted by रॉयल्टी.
andersen 's परी किस्से, जिससे have been translated into more than 125 भाषाएं, have become culturally embedded in the West 's सामूहिक consciousness, readily accessible to children, but पेश lessons of पुण्य और resilience in the face of adversity लिये mature पाठक as well.
वे have प्रेरित गति तस्वीरें, plays, नाटिकाओं, और animated films.

नजर contact occurs जब `` दो लोगों look at each other 's आँखें at the वही time. ''
In human beings, eye सम्पर्क is a रूप of अशाब्दिक संचार और is thought to have a विशाल influence on सोशल बर्ताव.
Coined in the जल्दी to mid-1960s, the term has come in the West to प्रायः define the अधिनियम as a सार्थक and महत्वपूर्ण sign of विश्वास और सोशल संचार.
the कस्टम और significance of eye contact vary widely between cultures, साथ धार्मिक और social मतभेद प्रायः altering इसके meaning greatly.
The पढ़ाई of eye contact is sometimes ज्ञात as oculesics.
bed bugs हैं parasitic कीट of the cimicid परिवार कि फीड exclusively on रक्त.
The term most commonly refers to members of the genus cimex of which cimex lectularius, the आम bed bug, is the बेहतरीन ज्ञात as it prefers to feed on human blood हालांकि other Cimex प्रजाति हैं specialized to other पशु, e.g., चमगादड़ bugs, C. pipistrelli ( Europe ), C. pilosellus ( पश्चिमी us ), और C. adjunctus ( संपूर्ण पूर्वी US ).
The नाम of the `` bed कीड़ा '' is derived इससे the preferred habitat of Cimex lectularius : warm घरों and विशेषकर आसपास or अंदर of beds और bedding or अन्य नींद areas.
Bed bugs are mainly active at रात्रि, लकिन हैं not exclusively nocturnal.
वे प्रायः feed on उनके hosts without होने noticed.
A क्रमांक of प्रतिकूल स्वास्थ्य effects may result इससे bed bug bites, including skin rashes, मनोवैज्ञानिक प्रभाव, और allergic symptoms.
Diagnosis involves both ढूंढना bed बग and the occurrence of संगत लक्षण.
bed बग have been ज्ञात as इंसान parasites लिये thousands of years.
at a point in the जल्दी 1940s, वे were ज़्यादातर eradicated in the developed संसार, लकिन have increased in व्यापकता चूंकि 1995.
Because infestation of इंसान habitats has महरूम on the बढ़ाएँ, bed कीड़ा bites and सम्बन्धित conditions have महरूम on the वृद्धि as खूब.
The Book of यशायाह ( ) is the पहला of the latter नबियों in the Hebrew Bible, preceding ezekiel, Jeremiah और the Book of the बारह.
( The अनुक्रम of the subsequent books differs somewhat in the ईसाई Old वसीयत ).
The पहला 39 अध्याय prophesy doom for a गुनाहगार यहूदा और लिये सब the nations of the world कि oppose परमेश्वर, while the last 27 prophesy the restoration of the स्वदेश of Israel और a new सृष्टि in परमेश्वर 's गौरवशाली भविष्य किंगडम ; this section शामिल the गीतों of the Suffering Servant, चार पृथक passages referring to the स्वदेश of Israel, interpreted by Christians as prefiguring the coming of यीशु Christ.
Tradition ascribes authorship of the book to Isaiah बेटे of amoz, लकिन now विद्वानों widely सहमत that the किताब is the कार्य of three different लेखक - few विद्वानों deny इस दृश्य, और those that do, do so लिये theological reasons.
The first, termed proto-isaiah ( chapters 1–39 ), contains the words of the 8th-century bce नबी with 7th-century bce expansions ; the दूसरी, deutero-isaiah ( chapters 40–55 ), is the कार्य of a 6th-century bce लेखक writing near the end of the babylonian captivity ; and the तीसरा, the poetic Trito-Isaiah ( chapters 56–66 ), थी composed in Jerusalem shortly बाद the वापसी from exile, संभवतः by अनेक authors.
ऑरेगॉन State University ( osu ) is a coeducational, public शोध university located in Corvallis, ऑरेगॉन, United States.
The university offers undergraduate, ग्रैजुएट और डॉक्टरेट डिग्री और a multitude of research opportunities.
वहीँ are अधिक than 200 अकादमिक degree कार्यक्रम offered through the university.
OSU 's कार्यक्रम in microbiology, नाभिकीय अभियान्त्रिकी, ecology, forestry, पब्लिक health, biochemistry, zoology, oceanography, खाना विज्ञान and फार्मेसी are recognized nationally as शीर्ष tier programs.
the osu 's उदार arts programs have भी grown significantly and the department is considered a `` cornerstone '' of the institution.
अधिक than 200,000 people have attended osu since its founding.
The Carnegie न्यास classifies ऑरेगॉन राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों as part of इसके top tier of शोध institutions.
As of 2008, osu is एक of तभी seventy-three land-grant विश्वविद्यालयों.
the school is also recognized as a sea-grant, space-grant and sun-grant institution, बनाना it one of तभी दो US संस्थानों to retain all चार designations and the only public विश्वविद्यालयों to do so ( कॉर्नेल is the तभी अन्य साथ समान designations ).
As one of the दो flagship विश्वविद्यालयों of the Oregon University प्रणाली, osu receives अधिक funding लिये शोध, annually, than सब other public higher education संस्थानों in Oregon combined.
मादा ejaculation is the expulsion of fluid by human females from the paraurethral नलिकाएं through और around the female urethra during or before an orgasm.
It is also ज्ञात colloquially as gushing or squirting, although these हैं माना to be अलग phenomena in कुछ शोध publications.
the exact source और nature of the fluid continue to be a topic of debate among medical पेशेवर, जिससे is भी सम्बन्धित to संदेह over the अस्तित्व of the G-Spot.
The Kanab ambersnail, scientific नाम oxyloma haydeni kanabensis or Oxyloma kanabense, is a critically endangered subspecies or प्रजाति of छोटी, air-breathing जमीन घोंघा, a स्थलीय pulmonate gastropod mollusc in the परिवार Succineidae, the amber घोंघे.
The आम नाम of the एम्बर घोंघे is आधारित on the shell, जिससे is पारदर्शी and when खाली usually resembles amber in color.
इस प्रजाति is endemic to the संयुक्त States, specifically the राज्य of एरिज़ोना and यूटा, where it was पहला एकत्रित in the early 20th century.
It रै महरूम listed as endangered on the United राज्य मछली और वन्यजीव Service सूची of endangered प्रजाति since 8 August 1991.
This घोंघा lives in वेटलैंड्स, springs, और seeps, और only two of इसके natural habitats हैं ज्ञात to exist : तीन झीलों, a meadow निकट Kanab, Utah, and vasey 's स्वर्ग, a वसन्त साथ the Colorado River within ग्रैंड canyon National पार्क.
In its प्राकृतिक आवास it is rather polyphagous, feeding mainly on bacteria, plants और fungi, and reproduces during the गर्मियाँ.
अभी माना a Critically Endangered प्रजाति on the आईयूसीएन रेड सूची of threatened Species due to a श्रेणी of कारकों ( सहित influence ), the Kanab ambersnail रै महरूम reintroduced to three स्रोतों above the historic high water level साथ the Colorado River.
The स्पेनी भाषा is the दूसरी most प्रयुक्त भाषा in the United States.
There are more स्पेनी speakers in the संयुक्त राज्य than there are speakers of Chinese, French, जर्मनी, इतालवी, Hawaiian, and the देशी American languages combined.
According to the 2010 अमरीकी Community Survey conducted by the U.S. जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो, Spanish is the प्राथमिक भाषा बोला at home by almost 37 लाख लोगों aged पाँच or पुरानी, a figure more than दोगुना that of 1990.
वहीँ are 45 लाख Hispanophones जो बोलो Spanish as a पहला or दूसरी language, as well as छह million स्पेनी भाषा विद्यार्थी, composing the largest नेशनल Spanish-speaking जातियाँ बाहर of Mexico and making Spanish the Romance language और the Indo-European भाषा साथ largest क्रमांक of native अध्यक्षों in the world.
Roughly half of all U.S. स्पेनी speakers also बोलो अंग्रेज़ी `` बहुत well, '' आधारित on the self-assessment Census question उत्तरदाताओं.
the भाषा came to the country चूंकि the 16th and 17th centuries साथ the arrival of Spanish colonists in areas that would later become the राज्य of Florida, टेक्सास, Colorado, नई मैक्सिको, एरिज़ोना, नेवाडा, यूटा, और California and of the स्पेनी explorers - जो explored क्षेत्रों of 42 states-.
Also वेस्ट of louisiana Territory was स्पेनी between 1763 - 1800 ( साल of the फ्रेंच रिकवरी of territory ), after the French and Indian War.
बाद of the incorporation of ये राज्य to the U.S. in first half of 19th सदी, the Spanish भाषा थी later reinforced by the अधिग्रहण of Puerto Rico in 1898 और by बाद लहरें of the Hispanic करणों, basically from Hispanic America, to the United राज्य शुरूआत in the second हाफ of 19th सदी जबतक आज.

The टोकियो mew mew manga and anime श्रेणी features a डाल of characters designed by Mia Ikumi.
The series takes प्लेस in Tokyo, जापानी, where five adolescent girls, पुकारा Mew mews, are infused साथ the डीएनए of endangered प्रजाति to combat aliens attempting to लो over the धरती.
the manga series is followed by a short sequel श्रेणी, टोकियो mew Mew a la विधि, which introduces a नई mew Mew and a new threat.
the Mew Mews are led by the main अक्षर, ichigo Momomiya, whose first task is to gather the other four mew mews : मिंट Aizawa, Lettuce Midorikawa, Pudding Fong, and zakuro fujiwara.
as the श्रेणी progresses, ichigo goes इससे having a crush on masaya Aoyama to बनने उसके गर्लफ्रेंड while trying to छुपा her secret double life इससे him.
the श्रेणी antagonists शामिल three aliens, kish, Pie, और तीखा, और उनके नेता, गहन ब्लू.
Originally इससे धरती, the aliens यहूद मजबूर to छोड़ long ago due to deadly पर्यावरणीय परिवर्तन.
They have लौटे to kill the humans, who they महसूस हैं destroying their planet, and reclaim the ग्रह.
in a la विधि, मध्य school student Berry Shirayuki is introduced as the sixth mew mew and, in the अनुपस्थिति of ichigo, the temporary leader of the Mew Mews.
a la Mode also introduces नई नियत of antagonists, the Saint Rose crusaders, a समूह of human teenagers साथ विभिन्न psychic abilities साथ a desire to बनाएँ उनके अपना utopia.
led by ड्यूक, they मेक अनेक attempts to मार Berry, आखिरकार turning the local populace against the mew Mews.
ikumi 's आरंभिक vision for टोकियो Mew Mew थी a स्टोरी पुकारा टोकियो Black Cat Girl कि प्रदर्शित a cat-girl battling एलियन आक्रमणकारियों.
After the story was transitioned to a अधिक upbeat स्टोरी of पाँच female superheroes, the अक्षर designs were redone to have a lighter, more रंगीन महसूस.
The प्रमुख series characters were praised लिये being a पूर्ण fit for the overall story, as well as लिये their cute दिखावे.
The वर्ण introduced in a la विधि were also praised लिये उनके visual appearances, but criticized as होने repeats of the original series.
the अक्षर ड्यूक was भी criticized लिये having a डिज़ाइन reminiscent of the white सर्वोच्चता समूह, the Ku klux Klan.
मध्य triassic सीमांत marine sequence of siltstones ( नीचे ) and limestones ( ऊपर ), वर्जिन गठन, southwestern Utah, यूएसए
Sedimentary rocks are types of rock that हैं formed by the deposition of material at the Earth 's surface और within bodies of जल.
Sedimentation is the सामूहिक नाम लिये प्रक्रियाओं that कारण खनिज and/or organic अणु ( detritus ) to settle and accumulate or खनिज to precipitate इससे a समाधान.
Particles that form a sedimentary चट्टान by accumulating हैं called sediment.
Before being deposited, sediment थी formed by weathering and अपरदन in a source क्षेत्रफल, और then transported to the प्लेस of deposition by जल, wind, ice, द्रव्यमान गति or glaciers जिससे are पुकारा agents of denudation.
The sedimentary चट्टान कवर of the continents of the धरती 's क्रस्ट is extensive, लकिन the कुल contribution of sedimentary rocks is estimated to be only 8 % of the कुल volume of the crust.
sedimentary rocks हैं only a पतला veneer over a क्रस्ट consisting mainly of igneous and metamorphic rocks.
Sedimentary rocks हैं deposited in परतों as strata, forming a ढांचा called bedding.
the study of sedimentary रॉक्स और rock strata provides सूचना परिचय the subsurface कि is useful for civil engineering, लिये उदाहरण in the निर्माण of roads, houses, tunnels, नहरों or अन्य constructions.
sedimentary रॉक्स हैं भी important स्त्रोत of natural संसाधन जैसे कोयले, fossil fuels, drinking water or ores.
The study of the sequence of sedimentary चट्टान strata is the main सोर्स लिये scientific knowledge about the धरती 's इतिहास, including palaeogeography, paleoclimatology and the history of life.
The वैज्ञानिक अनुशासन कि अध्ययन the गुण और origin of sedimentary रॉक्स is पुकारा sedimentology.
Sedimentology is both भाग of geology and physical geography और overlaps partly with अन्य disciplines in the Earth sciences, ऐसे as pedology, geomorphology, geochemistry or संरचनात्मक geology.

इंसानो are born साथ over 270 हड्डियों, some of जिससे fuse together into a longitudinal अक्ष, the axial skeleton, to जिससे the appendicular कंकाल is संलग्न.
संत पैट्रिक ( ; ; आधुनिक ; ; c. 387 – 17 कूच c. 460 or c. 492 ) थी a Romano-British Christian मिशनरी और bishop in आयरलैंड.
ज्ञात as the `` apostle of Ireland '', he is the प्राथमिक patron संत of the द्वीप along साथ संतो brigid and Columba.
दो authentic अक्षर इससे him survive, from जिससे come the तभी generally स्वीकृत details of his life.
जब he was about 16, he थी captured from his home और taken as a स्लेव to Ireland, where he lived for six सालो before escaping and returning to उसके परिवार.
बाद बनने a मौलवी, he returned to northern और western Ireland as an ordained बिशप, but छोटी is known about the स्थान where he worked.
By the सातवाँ सदी, he था already come to be revered as the patron संत of आयरलैंड.
सबसे उपलब्धियाँ details of उसके जीवन हैं इससे subsequent hagiographies, and these are now नहीं स्वीकृत बगैर विस्तृत criticism.
the Annals of ulster राज्य कि he arrived in Ireland in 432, ministered in Ulster around 443, और died in 457 or 461.
The text, however, distinguishes between `` बूढ़ा Patrick '' ( thought to औसत Palladius ) और `` पैट्रिक, archapostle of the स्कॉट्स, '' who died in 492.
The actual तिथियाँ of Patrick 's जीवन can not be फिक्स्ड साथ certainty लकिन, on a widespread निर्वचन, he थी क्रियाशील as a मिशनरी in Ireland दौरान the second हाफ of the 5th century.
he is generally credited with होने the पहला bishop of armagh, primate of सब Ireland.
Saint Patrick 's दिन is observed on कूच 17, the तिथि of उसके death.
it is celebrated दोनो inside and बाहर आयरलैंड, as both a religious and, especially outside आयरलैंड, धर्मनिरपेक्ष अवकाश.
in the dioceses of आयरलैंड, it is both a solemnity and a holy day of दायित्व ; outside आयरलैंड, it can be a celebration of Ireland itself.
Line segments in the सुनहरी ratio
a golden आयताकार साथ longer पक्ष a and shorter side b, जब placed adjacent to a square with पहलू of लंबाई a, होगा produce a समान golden आयताकार with longer side a + b और shorter side a.
इस illustrates the संबंध.
in गणित और the arts, two quantities are in the golden अनुपात if the अनुपात of the sum of the quantities to the larger मात्रा is बराबर to the अनुपात of the larger quantity to the छोटी एक.
The figure on the सही illustrates the geometric relationship.
Expressed algebraically:
जहाँ the यूनानी अक्षर फाई ( ) represents the golden ratio.
इसके value is:
the सुनहरी अनुपात is also पुकारा the golden खण्ड ( Latin : sectio ओरिया ) or golden औसत.
अन्य names शामिल चरम और mean अनुपात, medial खण्ड, divine proportion, divine section ( लैटिन : sectio divina ), सुनहरी proportion, सुनहरी काटें, and golden क्रमांक.
अनेक 20th century artists और architects have proportioned their works to approximate the golden ratio—especially in the form of the सुनहरी आयताकार, in जिससे the ratio of the longer side to the shorter is the सुनहरी ratio—believing this proportion to be aesthetically pleasing ( see Applications and observations below ).
mathematicians चूंकि Euclid have पढ़ाई the गुण of the golden ratio, including its रूप in the dimensions of a regular प्रस्तुतीकरण और in a सुनहरी आयताकार, जिससे can be काटें into a square और a smaller rectangle with the same पहलू ratio.
the golden अनुपात has भी महरूम प्रयुक्त to analyze the proportions of प्राकृतिक objects as खूब as man-made प्रणालियों ऐसे as वित्तीय बाज़ार, in कुछ मामले आधारित on dubious fits to आंकड़ा.
उत्तर Myrtle बीच is a तटीय रिज़ॉर्ट नगर in Horry काउंटी, दक्षिण कैरोलिना, संयुक्त राज्य.
It was निर्मित in 1968 from four मौजूदा municipalities उत्तर of myrtle Beach, and serves as one of the प्राथमिक tourist कस्बों along the ग्रैंड Strand.
the population was 13,752 at the 2010 census.
World युद्ध i ( WWI ) was a global युद्ध केंद्रित in यूरोपीय that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 नवम्बर 1918.
it थी predominantly called the World War or the ग्रेट War from इसके occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of World War II in 1939, and the पहला संसार War or World War i thereafter.
It involved all the संसार 's ग्रेट शक्तियां, जिससे यहूद assembled in दो opposing alliances : the allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल Entente of the United किंगडम, फ़्रांस and Russia ) और the सेंट्रल Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, austria-hungary और इटली ; but, as austria–hungary had taken the offensive विरूद्ध the agreement, Italy किया नहीं डालें into the युद्ध ).
ये alliances were both reorganised and विस्तारित as more nations डाला the war : इटली, जापानी और the United राज्य joined the Allies, और the उस्मानी साम्राज्य and बुल्गारिया the सेंट्रल Powers.
ultimately, अधिक than 70 लाख सैन्य personnel, including 60 million Europeans, were mobilised in one of the largest wars in इतिहास.
अधिक than 9 million combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements कि led to enormous increases in the lethality of हथियार without सम्बन्धित सुधार in सुरक्षा or गतिशीलता.
It was the fifth- deadliest विरोध in संसार history, subsequently paving the रास्ता for विभिन्न राजनैतिक changes, ऐसे as revolutions in अनेक of the राष्ट्र शामिल.
One of the long-term कल्याणकारी of the war was the resurgence of साम्राज्यवाद in the foreign नीतियों of the great powers of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of Austria, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a diplomatic crisis जब Austria-Hungary subsequently वितरित an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the previous decades यहूद invoked.
Within weeks, the प्रमुख powers यहूद at युद्ध and, via उनके colonies, the conflict soon स्प्रेड around the world.
on 28 July, the Austro-Hungarians fired the पहला गोलियाँ of the war as तैयारी लिये the invasion of सर्बिया.
जबकि the Russians mobilised, the germans invaded neutral बेल्जियम और Luxembourg on the way to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's घोषणा of war against जर्मनी.
After the जर्मनी कूच on पेरिस थी brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the marne —the Western सामने settled into a स्थिर बैटल of attrition with a trench line कि changed छोटी until 1917.
on the Eastern Front, the रूसी army थी successful against the austro-hungarians, लकिन was stopped in its आक्रमण of East prussia by the germans.
In November the Ottoman साम्राज्य joined the युद्ध, opening up fronts in the Caucasus, मेसोपोटामिया और the Sinai.
इटली and Bulgaria went to युद्ध in 1915 and रोमानिया in 1916.
in Russia, the tsar 's सरकारी collapsed in March 1917 और a subsequent revolution in November brought the russians to terms साथ the सेंट्रल शक्तियां.
बाद a 1918 जर्मनी अप्रिय along the western सामने, the allies drove वापस the germans in a series of successful offensives and American शक्तियां began entering the trenches.
Germany, which था इसके अपना trouble with revolutionaries, सहमत to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
the war ended in victory for the Allies.
कार्यक्रम on the घर fronts were as उग्र as on the बैटल fronts, as the participants tried to mobilize उनके manpower और आर्थिक संसाधन to लड़ो a कुल युद्ध.
By the समाप्त of the युद्ध, four प्रमुख इम्पीरियल powers—the जर्मनी, Russian, austro-hungarian और उस्मानी empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the पूर्व two खोया a ग्रेट amount of territory, while the latter दो were dismantled entirely.
the map of सेंट्रल यूरोपीय was redrawn into अनेक छोटी राज्य.
the लीग of Nations थी formed in the आशा of preventing another ऐसे conflict.
The यूरोपीय nationalism शाखित by the युद्ध and the ब्रेकअप of empires, the परखना of Germany 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of versailles हैं agreed to be factors contributing to संसार युद्ध II.
Camden is a नगर in camden County, New जर्सी, संयुक्त States.
It is the काउंटी सीट, स्तिथ आरपार the डेलावेयर River इससे Philadelphia.
As of the 2010 United States जनसांख्यिकी the नगर था a total जनसांख्यिकी of 77,344, representing a मनाही of 2,560 ( 3.2 % ) from the 79,904 निवासियों enumerated दौरान the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी, जिससे had in turn declined by 7,588 ( 8.7 % ) इससे the 87,492 counted in the 1990 जनसांख्यिकी.
Camden क्रमित as the 12th-most populous municipality in the state in 2010 बाद having been ranked 10th in 2000.
Camden was originally incorporated as a नगर on February 13, 1828, इससे portions of the now-defunct Newton Township, जबकि the क्षेत्रफल was स्टिल भाग of Gloucester काउंटी.
On कूच 13, 1844, camden became part of the newly formed Camden County.
Although एकबार a thriving center लिये manufacturing and उद्योग, Camden is शायद बेहतरीन known for its struggles साथ urban dysfunction.
तीन camden mayors have been jailed for भ्रष्टाचार, the सबसे हाल होने Milton Milan in 2000.
चूंकि 2005 the स्कूल system and police विभाग have been संचालित by the राज्य of नई जर्सी ; the कब्ज़ा expired in 2012.
in 2008, Camden था the उच्चतम अपराधों रेट in the U.S. साथ 2,333 violent crimes per 100,000 लोगों जबकि the national average थी 455 per 100,000.
Camden public स्कूलों खर्च $ 23,770 per छात्र ( $ 19,118 on a budgetary per-pupil basis ) in the 2009–10 school साल and two-thirds of the students ग्रैजुएट.
दो आउट of every पाँच निवासियों हैं नीचे the नेशनल गरीबी लकीर.
amitriptyline ( Tryptomer, Elavil, tryptizol, laroxyl, saroten, Sarotex, Lentizol, endep ) is a tricyclic antidepressant ( TCA ).
it is the सबसे widely used TCA और रै at least equal efficacy विरूद्ध depression as the नए क्लास of ssris according to a पढ़ाई इससे जल्दी 2001.
as well as reducing depressive symptoms, these प्रकार of tricyclics also ease migraines, tension headaches, anxiety attacks और कुछ schizophrenic लक्षण.
It is भी ज्ञात to reduce आक्रामकता and हिंसक बर्ताव.
A कंप्यूटर is a general purpose device that can be programmed to carry आउट a परिमित नियत of arithmetic or लॉजिकल परिचालन.
चूंकि a sequence of परिचालन can be readily बदला, the computer can solve अधिक than one दयालु of problem.
Conventionally, a कंप्यूटर consists of at तनिक एक processing element, typically a सेंट्रल प्रसंस्करण unit ( cpu ) और कुछ form of मेमोरी.
the processing तत्व carries आउट arithmetic and लॉजिक परिचालन, and a sequencing and control ईकाई that can change the order of operations आधारित on भंडारित सूचना.
परिधीय devices allow सूचना to be retrieved इससे an external सोर्स, and the result of operations saved और retrieved.
the पहला electronic डिजिटल कंप्यूटर were developed between 1940 और 1945 in the United Kingdom और United राज्य.
originally they यहूद the size of a large रूम, consuming as much power as अनेक सौ modern निजी कंप्यूटर ( pcs ).
in इस era mechanical एनालॉग computers were used for सैन्य अनुप्रयोग.
आधुनिक कंप्यूटर आधारित on integrated circuits are millions to billions of times more सक्षम than the जल्दी machines, और occupy a भिन्न of the स्पेस.
Simple कंप्यूटर हैं small enough to fit into mobile devices, और mobile कंप्यूटर can be संचालित by small batteries.
Personal computers in their विभिन्न forms are प्रतीक of the Information Age और हैं what सबसे people think of as “computers.”
however, the अंतःस्थापित computers found in many डिवाइस इससे mp3 players to सेनानी वायुयान and इससे toys to industrial robots हैं the सबसे numerous.
`` Barefoot और गर्भवती '' is a phrase most commonly संबद्ध with the विवादास्पद idea that women चाहिए not work outside the घर और चाहिए have many children दौरान उनके reproductive सालो.
It has several other meanings as well.
It is a फिगर of speech.
The phrase `` barefoot और pregnant '' थी probably पहला प्रयुक्त sometime before 1950.
an article from 1949 राज्य, `` By जल्दी 1949, twa was—in the शब्द of its new president, Ralph S. Damon—both 'barefoot और pregnant. ' ''
Its usage may तिथि as जल्दी as the 1910s.
an article प्रकाशित in 1958 states the phrase was first प्रयुक्त by a `` Dr. hertzler '' 40 years पहले.
`` कुछ forty सालो ago, dr. Hertzler advanced a hypothesis जिससे young महिलाओं of आज seem bent on proving correct. '
The only way to keep a स्त्री प्रसन्न, ' he कहा, 'is to keep her barefoot और pregnant. ' ''
oakhurst is a census-designated place और unincorporated जातियाँ within समंदर Township, in मॉनमाउथ County, New Jersey, संयुक्त States.
As of the 2010 संयुक्त राज्य Census, the cdp 's population थी 3,995.
University of Phoenix Stadium, opened अगस्त 1, 2006, is a multipurpose फ़ुटबॉल stadium स्तिथ in ग्लेनडेल, एरिज़ोना.
It is the घर of the Arizona कार्डिनल्स of the National फ़ुटबॉल League ( एनएफएल ) and the annual Fiesta कटोरी.
The स्टेडियम is स्तिथ next door to the jobing.com एरिना और it features the first fully retractable natural grass playing surface निर्मित in the संयुक्त राज्य on top of an AirField Systems drainage प्रणाली.
An opening on एक side of the stadium allows the playing फ़ील्ड to मूव to the exterior of the building, allowing the संपूर्ण natural turf playing surface to be exposed to daylight.
The stadium रै hosted सुपर कटोरी XLII, and the 2011 BCS National Championship Game, a game that it hosts प्रत्येक चार सालो, which set the स्थान 's entertainment attendance record of 78,603 on जनवरी 11, 2011.
It will again मेजबान सुपर Bowl XLIX in 2015.
The University of Phoenix acquired the naming अधिकारों in September 2006, shortly after the stadium था opened under the name Cardinals स्टेडियम.
The `` University of Phoenix `` नाम is applied as a corporate sponsor, and not as the home stadium of the University ( which has no intercollegiate athletics कार्यक्रम ).
The stadium रै भी hosted the डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई event WrestleMania xxvi साथ 72,219 प्रशंसक in उपस्थिति.
The इवेंट थी आयोजित in the stadium on March 28th 2010.
जोशुआ Lawrence Chamberlain ( सितंबर 8, 1828 – February 24, 1914 ), born as लॉरेंस Joshua Chamberlain, थी an अमरीकी कॉलेज प्राध्यापक from the State of maine, जो volunteered during the अमरीकी Civil युद्ध to जुड़ें the संघ फौज.
हालांकि having no पहले शिक्षा in सैन्य रणनीति, he became a अत्यधिक आदरणीय and decorated संघ अधिकारी, reaching the rank of ब्रिगेडियर general ( and brevet प्रमुख सामान्य ).
लिये उसके gallantry at Gettysburg, he was awarded the पदक of Honor.
He was दिए the honor of commanding the संघ troops at the आत्मसमर्पण रस्म लिये the infantry of Robert E. ली 's Army at appomattox, Virginia.
After the war, he डाला politics as a रिपब्लिकन and served चार one-year शर्तें of office as the 32nd Governor of Maine.
he served on the faculty, and as अध्यक्ष, of उसके अल्मा mater, bowdoin कॉलेज.
An inning, or पारी, is a fixed-length खण्ड of a खेल in any of a variety of sports – most notably क्रिकेट और बेसबॉल during जिससे एक team attempts to score while the other टोली कोशिशें to prevent the पहला इससे scoring.
in क्रिकेट, the पद innings is both singular और plural और is सदा spelled and pronounced साथ the टर्मिनल `` s ''.
In बेसबॉल और सॉफ्टबॉल, the एकवचन रूप is inning और तभी the plural takes an `` s ''.
in many other sports, the लंबाई of the game is dictated by a क्लॉक and teams स्वैप अप्रिय और defensive भूमिकाएँ dynamically by लेने कब्ज़ा of a ball or similar मद.
in baseball and cricket, however, one टोली, said to be `` batting '', कोशिशें to score `` runs '' —see चलाएं ( बेसबॉल ) और run ( cricket ) —while the other team, said to be `` क्षेत्ररक्षण '', attempts to prevent the scoring of रनों and मिलेंगी सदस्यों of the batting team आउट.
the teams switch स्थान after the क्षेत्ररक्षण team has succeeded in getting a फिक्स्ड number of खिलाड़ी आउट, बनाना a क्लॉक unnecessary.
In cricket, the पद पारी is also used to refer to the खेल of one particular खिलाड़ी ( Smith had a poor innings, scoring only 12 ).
By एक्सटेंशन, this पद can be used in अंग्रेजों English for almost कोई activity which takes a काल of time ( the Liberal सरकारी had a शुभ पारी, लकिन finally lost दफ्तर in 1972, or तुम 've had a fair innings, now it 's my फेरे, meaning `` you have spoken for long enough, now let me speak '' ).
It is also used in reference to someone जो रै died at a reasonably बूढ़ा आयु or lived a समृद्ध और rewarding जीवन ( Ah, खूब.
जॉन was 89.
At least he had a good innings ).
The baseball-derived समानांतर to this in अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी is the term at चमगादड़.
according to the ऑक्सफोर्ड अंग्रेज़ी Dictionary, the term innings has been used in reference to cricket since at least 1735.
As cricket थी a mature, highly व्यवस्थित sport in the 1600s in इंग्लैण्ड, the term 's उत्पत्ति could well precede this first अंकित usage.
the word inning अर्थ 'a महफ़िल in ' is पहला अंकित in 1522, और could be related.
Adenosine deaminase कमियां, भी called ADA कमियां or ADA-SCID, is an autosomal recessive metabolic विकार that causes immunodeficiency.
It occurs in कम than one in 100,000 सजीव births worldwide.
it खाते लिये परिचय 15 % of सब मामले of severe combined immunodeficiency ( scid ).
It is very विरल, you have a 3 % मौका of getting this जीन.
ADA कमियां may be present in शैशव, बाल्यकाल, adolescense, or adulthood.
Age of onset और गंभीरता is related to कुछ 29 known genotypes associated with the विकार.

गरीबी is the राज्य of एक who lacks a निश्चित राशि of सामग्री possessions or money.
निरपेक्ष गरीबी or destitution refers to the deprivation of basic इंसान needs, जिससे commonly शामिल खाना, जल, sanitation, कपडे, आश्रय, health care और शिक्षा.
Relative poverty is पारिभाषित contextually as economic inequality in the location or society in which people live.
For much of history, गरीबी was माना largely unavoidable as traditional मोड्स of production यहूद insufficient to give an entire जनसांख्यिकी a आरामदायक मानक of living.
After the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति, mass उत्पादन in factories बना माल increasingly अधिक inexpensive और accessible.
Of अधिक महत्व is the modernization of कृषि, such as fertilizers, in order to provide enough उपज to फीड the population.
the supply of मौलिक needs can be restricted by constraints on सरकारी सेवाएं ऐसे as corruption, tax avoidance, कर्ज़ and ऋण conditionalities and by the brain नाली of स्वास्थ्य परवाह और शैक्षणिक पेशेवर.
रणनीति of increasing आय to make मौलिक needs more affordable typically शामिल welfare, आर्थिक freedoms, और providing वित्तीय services.
गरीबी reduction is a major लक्ष्य and issue for many अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन ऐसे as the संयुक्त राष्ट्र and the संसार बैंको.
the संसार Bank estimated 1.29 अरब लोगों were जीना in absolute poverty in 2008.
Of these, about 400 लाख people in absolute गरीबी lived in India and 173 लाख लोगों in China.
In USA 1 in 5 children जीवनदान in गरीबी.
In शर्तें of प्रतिशत of क्षेत्रीय populations, sub-saharan Africa at 47 % था the उच्चतम incidence rate of absolute गरीबी in 2008.
between 1990 और 2010, about 663 million लोगों स्थानांतरित above the निरपेक्ष poverty स्तर.
स्टिल, extreme poverty is a global चुनौती ; it is observed in सब parts of the संसार, सहित the developed economies.
Mushroom poisoning ( also known as mycetism ) refers to नुकसानदेह effects from ingestion of toxic substances उपस्थित in a मशरूम.
ये symptoms can vary from slight जठरांत्र तकलीफ to death.
The toxins present हैं secondary metabolites उत्पादित in specific biochemical pathways in the fungal cells.
मशरूम poisoning is प्रायः the परिणाम of ingestion of जंगली mushrooms बाद misidentification of a toxic mushroom as an खाद्य species.
the most common कारण for this misidentification is बंद resemblance in शर्तें of रंग and general morphology of the toxic मशरूम प्रजाति साथ खाद्य प्रजाति.
भी बहुत experienced wild मशरूम gatherers हैं upon rare अवसर poisoned by खाने विषाक्त species, despite होने well जागरूक of the risks, through carelessness.
to prevent मशरूम poisoning, mushroom gatherers need to be बहुत familiar साथ the mushrooms they intend to collect as खूब as with कोई similar-looking toxic प्रजाति.
In addition, edibility of mushrooms may निर्भर on विधि of तैयारी लिये cooking.
Collectors also need to be खूब जागरूक that edibility or toxicity of कुछ प्रजाति varies साथ geographic स्थान.
इंसान height is the अलहदा इससे the bottom of the feet to the top of the सिर in a human देह, खड़ा वीर्यपात.
When populations share जेनेटिक पृष्ठभूमि और पर्यावरणीय factors, औसत height is frequently characteristic भीतर the समूह.
Exceptional height variation ( around 20 % deviation from औसत ) भीतर ऐसे a जनसांख्यिकी is sometimes due to gigantism or dwarfism, which हैं चिकित्सा conditions caused by विशिष्ट जीनों or अंतःस्रावी abnormalities.
in regions of extreme गरीबी or prolonged warfare, पर्यावरणीय factors जैसे chronic कुपोषण दौरान बाल्यकाल or किशोरावस्था may account लिये delayed विकास and/or ( in कठोर cases ) चिह्नित reductions in adult stature भी बगैर the उपस्थिति of कोई of ये चिकित्सा शर्तें.
Apollo 11 थी the spaceflight कि landed the पहला humans, अमेरिकी Neil आर्मस्ट्रांग और Buzz Aldrin, on the चंद्रमा on जुलाई 20, 1969, at 20:18 UTC.
आर्मस्ट्रांग became the पहला to कदम onto the lunar surface 6 hours बाद on जुलाई 21 at 02:56 utc.
आर्मस्ट्रांग spent about दो और a half hours outside the spacecraft, Aldrin थोड़ा less ; और together वे एकत्रित of चंद्र सामग्री for वापसी to धरती.
A तीसरा सदस्य of the mission, Michael Collins, piloted the कमांड spacecraft अलोन in चंद्र orbit जबतक Armstrong और एल्ड्रिन returned to it बस अंतर्गत a दिन later for the ट्रिप back to धरती.
शुभारम्भ by a Saturn V rocket from Kennedy स्पेस बीच in merritt Island, फ्लोरिडा on जुलाई 16, Apollo 11 थी the पांचवां manned mission of NASA 's अपोलो program.
The अपोलो spacecraft था तीन भाग : a कमांड मोड्यूल साथ a केबिन लिये the तीन astronauts which थी the only part which landed back on Earth ; a सेवा Module which समर्थित the कमांड मोड्यूल with नोदन, विद्युत शक्ति, oxygen and जल ; और a चंद्र मोड्यूल लिये landing on the चंद्रमा.
After being sent to the चंद्रमा by the Saturn V 's अपर स्टेज, the astronauts separated the spacecraft from it और travelled लिये तीन दिनों जबतक वे entered into चंद्र orbit.
आर्मस्ट्रांग और Aldrin तब स्थानांतरित into the चंद्र Module and उतरा in the Sea of Tranquility.
वे ठहरे a total of परिचय 21 and a half घंटों on the चंद्र surface.
बाद lifting बंद in the अपर भाग of the चंद्र Module and rejoining Collins in the कमांड मोड्यूल, वे returned to Earth and landed in the प्रशांत समंदर on जुलाई 24.
ब्रॉडकास्ट on सजीव TV to a world-wide audience, आर्मस्ट्रांग stepped onto the चंद्र surface और described the इवेंट as `` एक छोटी कदम for [ a ] man, एक giant छलांग for mankind. ''
Apollo 11 effectively ended the स्पेस रेस और fulfilled a national goal प्रस्तावित in 1961 by the लेट U.S. अध्यक्ष जॉन F. कैनेडी in a speech before the संयुक्त States Congress, `` before this दशक is आउट, of लैंडिंग a man on the Moon and returning him safely to the धरती. ''
the FIFA World कप, often simply the संसार Cup, is an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ फ़ुटबॉल competition contested by the वरिष्ठ men 's नेशनल टीमों of the सदस्यों of Fédération Internationale de फ़ुटबॉल Association ( फीफा ), the खेल 's वैश्विक शासी देह.
The championship has been awarded every चार सालो चूंकि the inaugural tournament in 1930, मगर in 1942 and 1946 जब it थी not आयोजित क्युकी of the दूसरी World युद्ध.
the current champions are स्पेन, who won the 2010 टूर्नामेंट.
the current स्वरूप of the tournament involves 32 teams स्पर्धा for the title at venues भीतर the host स्वदेश ( s ) over a काल of about a माह ; this phase is often पुकारा the संसार कप Finals.
A योग्यता phase, which फिलहाल takes प्लेस over the preceding three years, is used to determine जिससे टीमों qualify for the tournament together with the host स्वदेश ( s ).
the 19 World Cup tournaments have महरूम won by eight अलग नेशनल teams.
ब्राज़ील have जीती five times, and they हैं the तभी team to have निभाई in प्रत्येक टूर्नामेंट.
the अन्य संसार Cup winners हैं Italy, साथ four शीर्षक ; जर्मनी, with तीन शीर्षक ; अर्जेंटीना और inaugural winners Uruguay, साथ two titles प्रत्येक ; and इंग्लैण्ड, फ़्रांस, and स्पेन, with one title प्रत्येक.
the संसार कप is the संसार 's सबसे widely viewed sporting इवेंट ; an estimated 715.1 लाख people देखी the final मैच of the 2006 FIFA World कप आयोजित in Germany.
the अगला तीन संसार Cups होगा be hosted by ब्राज़ील in 2014, Russia in 2018, and क़तर in 2022.
Genocide is a पद coined in 1944 by राफेल lemkin to describe the deliberate और व्यवस्थित destruction, in whole or in भाग, of an ethnic, जातिगत, religious, or national group.
it is पारिभाषित in आलेख 2 of the सम्मेलन on the रोकथाम and दंड of the Crime of नरसंहार ( CPPCG ) of 1948 as `` any of the following अधिनियमों committed with intent to destroy, in पूरे or in भाग, a नेशनल, ethnical, racial or religious group, as ऐसे : killing members of the समूह ; causing serious bodily or दिमागी harm to members of the group ; deliberately inflicting on the groups शर्तें of life, calculated to लाओ परिचय its physical विनाश in whole or in भाग ; imposing उपायों intended to prevent births within the समूह ; [ and ] forcibly transferring children of the समूह to another समूह. ''
Skulls of victims of the rwandan नरसंहार
The प्रस्तावना to the cppcg not तभी राज्य कि `` नरसंहार is a crime अंतर्गत international विधि, contrary to the spirit और aims of the United राष्ट्र and condemned by the civilized संसार '', लकिन also कि `` at all periods of इतिहास genocide रै inflicted ग्रेट losses on मानवता ''.
determining what ऐतिहासिक events constitute a नरसंहार and which हैं merely दण्ड or inhuman बर्ताव is नहीं a clear-cut पदार्थ.
In nearly every case where accusations of नरसंहार have परिचालित, partisans of विभिन्न पहलू have fiercely विवादित the निर्वचन और details of the इवेंट, प्रायः to the point of promoting wildly अलग versions of the तथ्य.
An accusation of नरसंहार is certainly नहीं लिया हलके और will लगभग always be controversial.
the following list of genocides and alleged genocides चाहिए be understood in इस कॉन्टेक्स्ट और can नहीं be regarded as the final शब्द on ये subjects.
A समय belt is a non-slipping mechanical ड्राइव बेल्ट और the term may refer to either:
toothed बेल्ट, a लचीली बेल्ट साथ दांत moulded onto इसके भीतरी सतह
समय belt ( camshaft ), a toothed बेल्ट used to drive the camshaft ( s ) within an internal दहन engine
The संस्कृति of the संयुक्त States is primarily a Western संस्कृति, लकिन is also बहकावे by Native American, अफ़्रीकी, एशियाई, Polynesian, and Latin American cultures.
अमरीकी संस्कृति प्रारंभ इसके गठन over 10,000 years ago with the migration of paleo-indians इससे Asia into the region कि is आज the continental संयुक्त राज्य.
It has इसके अपना अद्वितीय सोशल और cultural विशेषताएँ such as dialect, म्यूज़िक, कला, social habits, भोजन, और folklore.
the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका is an ethnically and racially diverse देश as a परिणाम of large-scale immigration from अनेक अलग countries throughout its इतिहास.
Its मुख्य early यूरोपीय प्रभाव came इससे English, स्कॉटिश, Welsh and आयरिश settlers of औपनिवेशिक America दौरान अंग्रेजों rule.
British संस्कृति, due to औपनिवेशिक ties with Britain कि spread the English language, legal system और अन्य cultural inheritances, था a formative influence.
अन्य important प्रभाव came इससे अन्य भाग of पश्चिमी Europe, विशेषकर जर्मनी, फ़्रांस, और Italy.
असली elements भी खेल a दमदार role, such as the आविष्कार of Jeffersonian democracy.
Thomas जेफरसन 's टीप on the राज्य of Virginia was शायद the first influential domestic सांस्कृतिक critique by an American और a reactionary टुकड़ा to the prevailing यूरोपीय consensus कि अमेरिका 's domestic मौलिकता थी degenerate.
प्रचलित विचार और आदर्शों कि विकसित domestically, such as national holidays, uniquely अमरीकी खेल, military परंपरा, और नवप्रवर्तनों in the कला और entertainment दे a strong भाव of national pride among the जनसांख्यिकी as a पूरे.
American संस्कृति शामिल both रूढ़िवादी and उदार तत्व, scientific and धार्मिक competitiveness, राजनैतिक structures, रिस्क लेने and free expression, materialist and moral elements.
despite certain सतत ideological सिद्धान्त ( e.g. व्यक्तिगत, समतावाद, and आस्था in freedom और लोकतंत्र ), अमरीकी संस्कृति has a किस्में of expressions due to इसके भौगोलिक scale और demographic विविधता.
the लचीलापन of U.S. culture and its highly सांकेतिक nature lead कुछ शोधकर्ताओं to categorize American culture as a mythic identity ; अन्य see it as अमरीकी exceptionalism.
It also शामिल तत्व that विकसित from स्वदेशी Americans, और other जातीय cultures—most prominently the संस्कृति of अफ़्रीकी Americans, संस्कृतियों इससे Latin अमेरिका, और Asian अमरीकी संस्कृतियों.
अनेक अमरीकी सांस्कृतिक तत्व, especially इससे popular संस्कृति, have स्प्रेड आरपार the globe through आधुनिक द्रव्यमान media.
the संयुक्त States has प्रायः महरूम विचार of as a melting घट, but beginning in the late 1990s and early 2000s, it रुझान towards cultural विविधता, बहुलवाद और the चित्र of a सलाद कटोरी बजाय.
due to the extent of American संस्कृति, there हैं अनेक integrated but unique social subcultures भीतर the संयुक्त States.
the सांस्कृतिक affiliations an individual in the संयुक्त States may have commonly depend on social क्लास, political orientation and a multitude of जनसांख्यिकी विशेषताएँ such as religious पृष्ठभूमि, occupation और जातीय group membership.
samoan ( Gagana fa'a Sāmoa or Gagana Sāmoa — IPA : ) is the भाषा of the samoan आइलैंड्स, comprising the स्वतंत्र country of समोआ and the United States territory of American समोआ.
it is an official language—alongside English —in दोनो jurisdictions.
Samoan, a Polynesian language, is the पहला भाषा लिये most of the Samoa Islands ' population of about 246,000.
साथ अनेक Samoan लोगों living in other countries, the कुल number of speakers worldwide is estimated at 370,000.
the language is notable for the phonological मतभेद between औपचारिक और अनौपचारिक speech as well as a ceremonial रूप used in Samoan oratory.
A ग्लूकोज सहिष्णुता test is a चिकित्सा परीक्षण in which glucose is given और blood samples लिया afterward to determine how जल्दी it is cleared इससे the रक्त.
the test is usually used to test लिये मधुमेह, इंसुलिन प्रतिरोध, और sometimes reactive hypoglycemia और acromegaly, or rarer disorders of शर्करा metabolism.
In the most commonly performed version of the test, an oral glucose सहिष्णुता परीक्षण ( ogtt ), a standard खुराक of ग्लूकोज is ingested by मुँह और blood स्तर हैं checked two घंटों later.
Many variations of the GTT have been devised over the years for various उद्देश्य, with different मानक doses of ग्लूकोज, अलग रूट of administration, different intervals and durations of sampling, और विभिन्न substances measured in जोड to रक्त ग्लूकोज.
`` कया परिचय Me '' is a song written by Garry तुषार and Frances swan, पहला अंकित by Australian rock band चलती तस्वीरें from their एल्बम दिनों of innocence.
It थी the band 's first number-one सिंगल in ऑस्ट्रेलिया बिता six consecutive सप्ताह on the top ; there, it was the second-highest selling सिंगल of 1982.
the कामयाबी of the सोंग led उन्हें to America जहाँ it became a hit, reaching # 29 on the U.S. बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट.
the सोंग stayed in the u.S. charts for such a long समय that it managed to make billboards top 100 Pop Singles of 1983, at # 88, a rare feat लिये a single साथ ऐसे a low शिखर स्थिति.
the song made an असामान्य वापसी in 1989, peaking at # 46.

Eggs are रखी by महिलाओं of many different species, सहित पक्षियों, reptiles, amphibians, और fish, and have महरूम खाया by mankind लिये हज़ारों of years.
Bird और reptile eggs consist of a सुरक्षात्मक eggshell, albumen ( egg श्वेत ), and vitellus ( अंडा yolk ), contained within विभिन्न thin झिल्लियों.
लोकप्रिय चुनाव लिये egg खपत are chicken, duck, बटेर, roe, and caviar, but the egg most प्रायः consumed by humans is the मुर्गा egg, by a wide margin.
Egg yolks और whole अंडे store significant amounts of प्रोटीन और choline, और हैं widely प्रयुक्त in cookery.
due to their प्रोटीन सामग्री, the संयुक्त States विभाग of Agriculture ( यूएसडीए ) categorizes अंडे as meats within the खाना मार्गदर्शिका पिरामिड.
despite the nutritional value of अंडे, there are some संभावित health issues arising इससे egg quality, storage, and व्यक्तिगत allergies.
मुर्गियों और अन्य egg-laying creatures are widely रखा throughout the संसार, और द्रव्यमान production of chicken eggs is a global industry.
in 2009, an अनुमानित 62.1 million मीट्रिक टन of eggs यहूद produced विश्वव्यापी from a कुल laying झुण्ड of approximately 6.4 billion मुर्गियां.
There हैं मुद्दे of क्षेत्रीय variation in demand and अपेक्षा, as well as current debates concerning विधि of mass उत्पादन, with the यूरोपीय संघ 's ban on battery farming of मुर्गियों.
प्रमुख लीग सॉकर ( mls ) is a पेशेवर soccer लीग representing the sport 's highest स्तर in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा.
Sanctioned by the United States सॉकर Federation ( u.S. सॉकर ), the league is composed of 19 टीमों — 16 in the U.S. और 3 in Canada.
सीज़न presently run इससे कूच to December, with प्रत्येक टोली playing 34 खेल in the regular ऋतु.
Ten teams compete in the postseason mls कप Playoffs culminating in the championship game, the MLS Cup.
प्रमुख League Soccer थी संस्थापित in 1993 as भाग of the संयुक्त राज्य ' बोली to मेजबान the 1994 FIFA संसार Cup.
the पहला ऋतु took place in 1996 beginning साथ ten टीमों.
Instead of ऑपरेटिंग as an association of independently स्वामित्व teams, MLS is a single entity where प्रत्येक team is स्वामित्व and नियंत्रित by the लीग 's investors.
the league 's closed membership makes it one of the संसार 's few सॉकर लीग not using promotion और relegation.
The वैधता of कैनबिस varies from country to देश.
कब्ज़ा of कैनबिस is illegal in most देशों and has महरूम since the beginning of फैली cannabis निषेध in the late 1930s.
however, अनेक countries have decriminalized the कब्ज़ा of छोटी quantities of cannabis, particularly in उत्तर America, South America and यूरोपीय.
Furthermore, possession is legal or effectively विधिक in the Netherlands, उत्तर कोरियाई और होता be in the u.S. राज्य of कोलोराडो और वॉशिंगटन if it were नहीं लिये federal विधि, जिससे governs persons in सब राज्य.
The medicinal use of कैनबिस is legal in a number of countries, including कनाडा, the Czech Republic and Israel.
While संघीय विधि in the संयुक्त States bans all बिक्री और possession of कैनबिस, enforcement varies widely at the राज्य स्तर और कुछ राज्य have स्थापित medicinal मारिजुआना कार्यक्रम in that contradict संघीय law ; two states ( Colorado और Washington ) have repealed उनके laws prohibiting the recreational use of cannabis and replaced them साथ a regulatory शासन, भी contrary to संघीय statute.
Some countries have कानून कि हैं not as vigorously prosecuted as others लकिन, अलावा from the देशों that प्रस्ताव access to चिकित्सा मारिजुआना, most countries have विभिन्न दंड ranging from lenient to बहुत कठोर.
Some infractions are लिया अधिक seriously in some देशों than others in लिहाज़ to the cultivation, use, कब्ज़ा or ट्रांसफ़र of cannabis for recreational use.
A few jurisdictions have lessened दंड लिये possession of छोटी quantities of कैनबिस, making it दंडनीय by confiscation और a ठीक, बल्कि than imprisonment.
कुछ jurisdictions/ drug न्यायालयों use अनिवार्य उपचार कार्यक्रम for young or frequent users, with स्वतंत्रता इससे narcotic दवाएँ as the लक्ष्य और a few jurisdictions permit cannabis use लिये औषधीय purposes.
There हैं भी changes in a अधिक प्रतिबंधक दिशा as in कनाडा.
Drug परीक्षण to detect cannabis are increasingly common in many देशों and have resulted in jail वाक्य और लोगों खोने their कार्य.
however, simple possession can carry long jail sentences in some countries, विशेषकर in भाग of East एशिया and southeast एशिया where the बिक्री of cannabis may सीसे to a वाक्य of जीवन in prison or भी execution.
In cardiovascular physiology, ejection fraction ( ef ) represents the volumetric भिन्न of blood उत्तेजित out of the ventricle ( दिल ) साथ each दिल ताल or हृदय cycle.
it can be लागू to either the सही ventricle जिससे ejects via the pulmonary valve into the pulmonary परिसंचरण or the बाएँ ventricle which ejects via the aortic valve into the systemic circulation.
Imaging of the physiology of the mammalian heart is the art that allows सार्थक mathematical अभिव्यक्ति defining ef.
noninvasive cardiac imaging रै become a worldwide utility enabling पढ़ाई of हृदय performance reproducibly और inexpensively.
Simplified, Ejection fraction is a गणितीय product अनुमत by हृदय इमेजिंग.
As a mathematical पद, ejection Fraction is an extension of the कार्य of एडाल्फ फिक in हृदय output.
Dedicated technology ऐसे as Echocardiography, Computed Tomography, Magnetic अनुनाद इमेजिंग and MUGA scanning have definitively अनुमत clinically relevant गणित regarding Ischemia, जन्मजात Heart Disease and दिल Failure.
State Route 14 ( SR 14 ) is a north–south state राजमार्ग in the u.S. राज्य of California, largely in the Mojave Desert.
the दक्षिणी portion of the highway is हस्ताक्षरित as the antelope Valley Freeway.
the रूट connects Interstate 5, or Golden State Freeway, near Santa Clarita और with u.S. रूट 395 near Inyokern.
Legislatively, the रूट extends south of i-5 to राज्य Route 1 in the प्रशांत Palisades area of लॉस Angeles, however the portion south of the जंक्शन साथ I-5 रै not been constructed.
The southern part of the constructed रूट is a busy commuter freeway serving and connecting the समुदायों of Santa Clarita, Palmdale और Lancaster with the rest of the वृहद लॉस Angeles area.
The उत्तरी portion, इससे विंसेंट ( दक्षिण of Palmdale ) to रूट 395, is legislatively नामित the aerospace राजमार्ग, as the highway serves एडवर्ड्स एयर फ़ोर्स Base, एकबार एक of the primary लैंडिंग strips for NASA 's स्पेस शटल.
This section is rural, following the line between the hot Mojave desert and the forming Sierra Nevada पहाड़ दायरा.
Most of Route 14 is loosely paralleled by a main लकीर of the Southern प्रशांत Railroad, प्रयुक्त लिये the Antelope Valley लकीर of the Metrolink commuter रेल system as well as a कनेक्शन between लॉस Angeles और the California Central घाटी via tehachapi pass.
linked साथ us 395, इस सड़क connects लॉस Angeles with such स्थान as Mammoth पहाड़, Mono झील, Yosemite National पार्क और Reno, नेवाडा.
Route 14 थी भाग of u.S. Route 6 prior to truncation in 1964, जब u.S. 6 was a coast-to-coast रूट इससे long बीच to provincetown, Massachusetts.
The non-freeway segment of sr 14 इससे Silver महारानी Road north of Rosamond to Mojave is known as Sierra Highway, as is the old routing between अंतरराज्यीय 5 और चांदी महारानी Road where sr 14 has been moved to a नए freeway alignment.
portions of रूट 14 remain signed with names संबद्ध with US 6, including मिडलैंड Trail, थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट Highway और ग्रैंड Army of the गणतंत्र Highway.
इस route is part of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया फ्रीवे and एक्सप्रेसवे प्रणाली.
दृष्टिहीनता is the कंडीशन of lacking विज़ुअल perception due to physiological or neurological कारकों.
विभिन्न तराजू have been विकसित to describe the extent of vision घाटा और define दृष्टिहीनता.
कुल blindness is the complete कमी of रूप और विज़ुअल light बोध और is clinically recorded as NLP, an abbreviation लिये `` no लाइट बोध. ''
दृष्टिहीनता is अक्सर प्रयुक्त to describe severe विज़ुअल पुतलियों साथ दृष्टि.
those described as having only लाइट बोध have no more sight than the ability to tell लाइट from अंधेरा and the general direction of a light source.
To determine which people may need special सहायता क्युकी of their विज़ुअल disabilities, विभिन्न सरकारी jurisdictions have प्रतिपादित more complex definitions referred to as legal दृष्टिहीनता.
in उत्तर America और most of Europe, legal दृष्टिहीनता is defined as विज़ुअल acuity ( vision ) of 20/200 ( 6/60 ) or less in the better नजर साथ best correction possible.
इस means that a legally अँधा व्यक्तिगत होता have to स्टैंड इससे an ऑब्जेक्ट to देखिए it—with corrective lenses —with the same उपाधि of clarity as a सामान्यतः sighted person could इससे.
in अनेक areas, लोगों with औसत तीक्ष्णता who nonetheless have a visual फ़ील्ड of कम than 20 डिग्री ( the norm होने 180 degrees ) are also classified as होने legally blind.
लगभग ten प्रतिशत of those deemed legally blind, by कोई measure, have no vision.
The बाकी have some vision, from light perception alone to relatively good acuity.
कम दृष्टि is sometimes प्रयुक्त to describe विज़ुअल acuities from 20/70 to 20/200.
by the 10th संशोधन of the जो अंतरराष्ट्रीय सांख्यिकीय वर्गीकरण of Diseases, चोटों और Causes of मौत, low vision is पारिभाषित as visual acuity of कम than 20/60 ( 6/18 ), but equal to or better than 20/200 ( 6/60 ), or corresponding visual field loss to कम than 20 डिग्री, in the better eye with best संभावित सुधार.
Blindness is पारिभाषित as visual तीक्ष्णता of less than 20/400 ( 6/120 ), or सम्बन्धित visual फ़ील्ड loss to less than 10 degrees, in the बेहतर eye साथ best possible सुधार.
अँधा people with undamaged eyes may still register लाइट non-visually for the purpose of circadian entrainment to the 24-hour light/dark cycle.
Light signals लिये इस purpose travel through the retinohypothalamic tract and हैं not affected by optic nerve क्षति beyond where the retinohypothalamic ट्रैक्ट exits.
Earl सीमन्स ( born December 18, 1970 ), better ज्ञात by his stage names DMX और अंधेरा man X, is an American rapper और कर्ता.
