He has acted in films such as पेट, Romeo जरूर die, निकास Wounds, पालना 2 The संगीन, and Last घंटा.
In 2006, he स्ट्रक्चर in the वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी, जिससे थी primarily aired on the BET cable टेलीविज़न संजाल.
in 2003, DMX प्रकाशित a book of उसके memoirs हकदार, E.A.R.L. : The Autobiography of DMX.
dmx released a mixtape the तौल in as a prelude/promotion towards उसके album Undisputed ( 2012 ).
DMX रै sold over 30 लाख records विश्वव्यापी, बनाना उसे एक of the best-selling hip-hop artists of सब time.
पेशेवर प्रमाणन, व्यापार certification, or पेशेवर नामांकन, प्रायः called बस certification or qualification, is a नामांकन अर्जित by a व्यक्ति to assure योग्यता to perform a job or task.
नहीं all certifications कि उपयोग post-nominal letters are an स्वीकृति of educational उपलब्धि, or an एजेंसी appointed to safeguard the public interest.
बग बनी is a मजेदार animal cartoon अक्षर, best remembered for उसके अभिनीत भूमिकाएँ in the looney धुनें and Merrie melodies series of नाट्य छोटी films उत्पादित by warner भाईs. दौरान the सुनहरी age of American animation.
His लोकप्रियता during this era led to his बनने a कॉरपोरेट mascot of warner Bros. entertainment.
बग is an anthropomorphic gray hare or खरगोश जो is प्रसिद्ध लिये his flippant, व्यक्तित्व, a सुनाया नई York accent, his portrayal as a trickster, and his catch phrase `` eh...
कया 's up, doc ? ''
( usually said while चबाने a carrot ).
बग रै appeared in more films than कोई other कार्टून अक्षर and is the ninth सबसे portrayed film व्यक्तित्व in the world.
According to his 1990 `` जीवनी '' बग बनी : 50 Years and Only एक Grey Hare, बग थी born on July 27, 1940 in ब्रुकलीन, New York in a वारेन under ebbets Field, home of the ब्रुकलीन Dodgers.
in reality, he was brought to life by the animators and staff of Leon Schlesinger Productions ( बाद warner Bros. Cartoons ) : including टेक्स Avery, जो directed Bugs ' जल्दी definitive short a Wild Hare ( 1940 ) ; Robert McKimson, who created Bugs ' निर्णायक character डिज़ाइन ; और Mel Blanc, who originated the voice of Bugs.
The श्लेष्मक membranes ( or mucosae or mucosas ; singular mucosa ) are linings of ज़्यादातर endodermal उत्पत्ति, covered in epithelium, जिससे हैं involved in absorption और स्राव.
They लकीर cavities कि हैं exposed to the external पर्यावरण and आतंरिक organs.
वे are at several स्थान contiguous with स्किन : at the nostrils, the lips of the mouth, the eyelids, the कानों, the genital area, और the गुदा.
The स्टिकी, मोटा द्रव secreted by the mucous झिल्लियों और glands is termed mucus.
the term mucous membrane refers to जहाँ वे are found in the देह और not प्रत्येक mucous membrane secretes mucus.
the glans clitoridis, glans penis ( सिर of the penis ), साथ साथ the inside of the foreskin और the clitoral हुड, are श्लेष्मक membranes.
The urethra is भी a mucous membrane.
The secreted mucus traps the pathogens in the body, preventing any further क्रियाएँ of diseases.

Cake is a रूप of ब्रैड or bread-like खाना.
in its modern forms, it is typically a मीठी baked मिठाई.
In its oldest forms, cakes यहूद normally fried breads or cheesecakes, and सामान्यतः had a disk आकार.
determining whether a दिए food should be वर्गीकृत as bread, केक, or पेस्ट्री can be मुश्किल.
आधुनिक cake, especially layer cakes, सामान्यतः contain a combination of आटा, शुगर, eggs, और butter or oil, with कुछ varieties also requiring liquid ( typically milk or water ) and leavening एजेंटों ( ऐसे as yeast or baking चूर्ण ).
Flavorful ingredients like फल purées, nuts, सूखी or candied fruit, or extracts are प्रायः added, and numerous substitutions for the प्राथमिक ingredients हैं possible.
cakes are प्रायः भर with फल preserves or मिठाई sauces ( like pastry cream ), iced साथ buttercream or अन्य icings, and सजा साथ marzipan, piped सीमायें or candied fruit.
Cake is often the dessert of चुनाव for meals at ceremonial अवसरों, विशेषकर विवाह, वर्षगांठ, and जन्मदिन.
There are अनगिनत cake व्यंजनों ; some are bread-like, कुछ rich and विस्तृत, और many हैं सदियां बूढ़ा.
केक making is no longer a जटिल कार्यविधि ; जबकि at one समय considerable labor went into केक बनाना ( particularly the whisking of egg foams ), बेकिंग equipment और directions have महरूम सरलीकृत so कि even the most amateur cook may बेक a cake.
tamara faye LaValley bakker Messner ( March 7, 1942 – जुलाई 20, 2007 ) थी an अमरीकी ईसाई singer, evangelist, उद्योगों, लेखक, बात दिखाएँ मेजबान, and टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व.
She थी married from 1961 to 1992 to televangelist, और later convicted felon, जिम Bakker.
She co-hosted with उसे on The PTL Club ( 1976–1987 ).
वो was a participant in the 2004 ऋतु of the वास्तविकता दिखाएँ The surreal जीवन.
cambria is a village in कोलंबिया County, Wisconsin, United राज्य.
The population थी 767 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
It is part of the मैडिसन Metropolitan सांख्यिकीय Area.
पब्लिक policy is the principled मार्गदर्शिका to action लिया by the प्रशासनिक executive शाखाओं of the state साथ लिहाज़ to a class of मुद्दे in a manner सतत साथ विधि and संस्थागत कस्टम.
In सामान्य, the न्यास is the pertinent नेशनल and substantial constitutional law और implementing विधान ऐसे as the US Federal कोड.
Further substrates include both न्यायिक interpretations and regulations which हैं generally प्राधिकृत by legislation.
अन्य विद्वानों define it as a system of `` courses of action, नियामक उपायों, laws, and funding priorities concerning a given टॉपिक promulgated by a सरकारी एंटिटी or इसके प्रतिनिधि. ''
पब्लिक नीति is commonly embodied `` in constitutions, legislative अधिनियमों, और न्यायिक निर्णय. ''
in the United States, इस अवधारणा refers not तभी to the परिणाम of policies, but more broadly to the decision-making और analysis of governmental निर्णय.
as an academic discipline, public नीति is पढ़ाई by professors and विद्यार्थी at public नीति schools of प्रमुख विश्वविद्यालयों throughout the देश.
The U.S. professional association of पब्लिक नीति practitioners, शोधकर्ताओं, scholars, और students is the Association लिये पब्लिक नीति Analysis और Management.
Digestion is the mechanical और chemical विश्लेषण of खाना into smaller components that are more easily absorbed into a रक्त stream, for instance.
पाचन is a रूप of catabolism : a विश्लेषण of विशाल food अणुओं to छोटी ones.
जब खाना enters the mouth, digestion of the खाना starts by the कार्रवाई of mastication, a form of mechanical पाचन, and the wetting सम्पर्क of saliva.
लार, a द्रव secreted by the salivary glands, contains salivary amylase, an enzyme which starts the पाचन of starch in the food.
After undergoing mastication और starch पाचन, the food will be in the रूप of a small, round slurry mass called a bolus.
it will then सफर down the esophagus और into the stomach by the action of peristalsis.
gastric juice in the पेट starts प्रोटीन पाचन.
gastric रस mainly contains hydrochloric एसिड और pepsin.
as these two रसायन may damage the stomach वॉल, mucus is secreted by the stomach, providing a slimy परत कि acts as a शील्ड विरूद्ध the damaging effects of the रसायन.
at the वही समय प्रोटीन digestion is occurring, mechanical mixing occurs by peristalsis, जिससे हैं लहरें of muscular contractions कि मूव साथ the पेट वॉल.
इस allows the द्रव्यमान of खाना to further मिक्सर साथ the digestive एंजाइमों.
After कुछ time ( typically an hour or दो in इंसानो, 4–6 hours in कुत्तो, somewhat shorter अवधि in house बिल्लियों ), the resulting मोटा liquid is called chyme.
जब the pyloric sphincter वाल्व opens, chyme enters the duodenum where it mixes साथ digestive enzymes from the अग्न्याशय, और तब गुजरता through the छोटी आंत, in which पाचन continues.
When the chyme is fully पचता, it is absorbed into the रक्त.
95 % of अवशोषण of nutrients occurs in the small आंत.
Water और खनिज हैं reabsorbed वापस into the blood in the कोलन ( large आंत ) where the ph is slightly अम्लीय about 5.6 ~ 6.9.
Some विटामिन, ऐसे as biotin and vitamin K ( K2MK7 ) उत्पादित by जीवाणु in the colon हैं भी अवशोषित into the blood in the colon.
बर्बाद material is eliminated from the मलाशय during शौच.
Henry VIII ( 28 जून 1491 – 28 जनवरी 1547 ) थी किंग of England इससे 21 April 1509 until his death.
He was रब, और बाद किंग, of Ireland, as खूब as continuing the नाममात्र claim by the अंग्रेज़ी monarchs to the Kingdom of फ़्रांस.
हेनरी थी the दूसरी monarch of the ट्यूडर राजवंश, succeeding his father, हेनरी सात.
Besides उसके six marriages, Henry VIII is known लिये his भूमिका in the separation of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड from the Roman Catholic Church.
हेनरी 's struggles with Rome led to the विरह of the गिरिजाघर of England from papal प्राधिकार, the Dissolution of the Monasteries, and उसके अपना establishment as the परम् सिर of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड.
yet he remained a आस्तिक in कोर कैथोलिक theological शिक्षाओं, even after उसके excommunication from the Roman कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर.
Henry oversaw the विधिक union of इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स with the कानून in वेल्स Acts 1535 और 1542.
in 1513, the नई king allied with the पावन Roman सम्राट, Maximillian i, और invaded France in 1513 with a large, well-equipped army, but हासिल छोटी at a considerable financial लागत.
Maximillian, लिये उसके part, used the अंग्रेज़ी invasion to his own ends, and इस prejudiced इंग्लैण्ड 's ability to शिकस्त the French.
This foray होता prove the प्रारंभ of an obsession for Henry, who invaded again in 1544.
इस समय, हेनरी 's शक्तियां captured the important city of boulogne, but again the पावन Roman सम्राट, चार्ल्स v, supported हेनरी only as long as he needed to and England, strained by the enormous cost of the युद्ध, ransomed the city वापस लिये सलाम.
उसके contemporaries माना Henry in his prime to be an आकर्षक, शिक्षित और accomplished किंग, and he has been वर्णित as `` एक of the most charismatic rulers to sit on the अंग्रेज़ी सिंहासन ''.
Besides ruling साथ absolute शक्ति, he भी engaged himself as an author and composer.
उसके desire to provide England साथ a male heir – जिससे stemmed partly from personal vanity and partly क्युकी he believed a daughter होता be unable to consolidate the ट्यूडर राजवंश and the fragile peace कि existed following the Wars of the गुलाब – led to the दो things for जिससे हेनरी is most remembered : his छह marriages and the English reformation.
हेनरी became morbidly मोटे and उसके स्वास्थ्य suffered, contributing to his मौत in 1547.
he is frequently characterised in his बाद life as a lustful, egotistical, harsh, and insecure किंग.
bongos ( स्पेनी : bongó ) हैं an afro-cuban percussion instrument.
the drums are of अलग size : the larger drum is called in स्पेनी the hembra ( मादा ) and the smaller the मर्दाना ( पुरूष ).
वे हैं membranophones, or यंत्र that create sound by a vibration of a stretched झिल्ली.
अलग धार्मिक groups include different किताबे in उनके Biblical canons, in varying orders, and sometimes divide or combine किताबे, or चरितार्थ अतिरिक्त material into canonical books.
Christian bibles range इससे the sixty-six books of the प्रोटोस्टेंट canon to the eighty-one books of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo गिरिजाघर canon.
The Hebrew बाइबल, or Tanakh, contains twenty-four books divided into three भाग ; the पाँच books of the तोरा ( `` teaching '' or `` law '' ), the Nevi'im ( `` नबियों '' ), और the Ketuvim ( `` writings '' ).
The पहला part of ईसाई Bibles is the बूढ़ा वसीयत, जिससे contains, at minimum, the twenty-four किताबे of the Hebrew बाइबल divided into thirty-nine books and ordered differently इससे the यहूदी बाइबल.
The Catholic गिरिजाघर and पूर्वी Christian चर्च भी hold certain deuterocanonical किताबे और passages to be part of the Old वसीयत canon.
The दूसरी भाग is the New Testament, containing twenty-seven books ; the four canonical gospels, Acts of the रसूलों, twenty-one Epistles or अक्षर और the Book of Revelation.
the Eastern Orthodox, Oriental Orthodox and Eastern कैथोलिक churches may have minor differences in उनके lists of accepted books.
The सूची given यहाँ लिये these चर्च is the most inclusive : if at तनिक one पूर्वी church accepts the किताब it is included यहाँ.
the national flag of the United States of America, प्रायः simply referred to as the American ध्वज, consists of तेरह बराबर आड़ा धारियाँ of red ( शीर्ष and नीचे ) alternating साथ श्वेत, with a ब्लू आयताकार in the canton ( referred to specifically as the `` union '' ) bearing fifty छोटी, white, five-pointed stars arranged in nine offset horizontal rows of छह सितारों ( शीर्ष and नीचे ) प्रत्यावर्ती with rows of पाँच stars.
the 50 सितारों on the flag represent the 50 राज्य of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका और the 13 धारियाँ represent the तेरह British colonies that घोषित independence from the Kingdom of Great ब्रिटेन और became the पहला राज्य in the Union.
Nicknames for the flag शामिल the `` सितारों और Stripes '', `` Old महिमा ``, और `` the star-spangled ध्वज. ''
dred Scott v. sandford,, भी ज्ञात as the dred स्कॉट निर्णय, थी a लैंडमार्क decision by the u.S. परम् Court.
It बना दो main rulings.
The पहला सत्ताधारी थी कि african-americans यहूद not citizens, and therefore had no खड़ा to मुकदमा in संघीय court.
The second ruling थी कि the federal सरकारी had no power to regulate गुलामी in कोई territory acquired subsequent to the सृष्टि of the United States.
दिए the पहला सत्ताधारी, सबसे विद्वानों and many contemporary राजनैतिक figures ( सहित the नेतृत्व of the then-new रिपब्लिकन Party ) माना that the दूसरी सत्ताधारी थी नहीं binding यही, लकिन mere कहावत.
the rationale of the परम् अदालत regarding the jurisdictional सत्ताधारी implied that लोगों of African descent ( both स्लेव और free ) यहूद not सुरक्षित by the Constitution and were not u.S. नागरिकों.
Since passage of the 14th Amendment to the U.S. Constitution, both rulings are superseded and no longer valid precedent.
nonetheless, the मामला retains historical significance as it is widely regarded as the worst निर्णय कभी made by the Supreme Court.
the राय of the अदालत, लिखा by Chief Justice Roger B. taney, stirred बहस.
the decision थी 7–2, और every इंसाफ besides taney wrote a separate concurrence or dissent.
लिये the first समय चूंकि Marbury v. Madison, the अदालत held an Act of कॉंग्रेस to be असंवैधानिक.
Dred Scott, an african-american slave, had पूछा a संयुक्त States Circuit अदालत to award him his स्वतंत्रता क्युकी he और his master had resided in a state ( इलिनोइस ) और a territory ( विस्कॉन्सिन Territory ) where गुलामी had been बैन.
मुख्य इंसाफ रोजर Taney, writing for the court, आयोजित that स्कॉट, as a person of अफ़्रीकी ancestry, थी नहीं a नागरिक of the संयुक्त राज्य and therefore had no right to मुकदमा in संघीय अदालत.
This holding थी contrary to the practice of numerous राज्य at the time, विशेषकर Free states, where फ़्री blacks किया in fact enjoy the rights of citizens, ऐसे as the right to vote और थाम public दफ्तर.
in कया is sometimes माना mere obiter कहावत, the अदालत went on to hold that कॉंग्रेस था no प्राधिकार to prohibit slavery in federal territories क्युकी slaves हैं personal property and the पांचवां amendment to the संविधान protects property owners against पिछडे of उनके property बगैर due प्रक्रम of विधि.
in reaching this निर्णय, taney had hoped to settle the growing controversy surrounding गुलामी in the संयुक्त States, but it had the विपरीत प्रभाव.
The निर्णय थी fiercely debated आरपार the country, as शायद बेहतरीन सरंचनाओं by the lincoln–douglas debates of 1858.
Abraham Lincoln, the second-ever रिपब्लिकन nominee लिये President, थी able to जीत the अध्यक्षीय election in 1860 ; the stopping of the further expansion of गुलामी was a कुंजी रिपब्लिकन party plank.
the decision निभाई an important role in the समय of state secession और the सिविल युद्ध, although it is extreme to कह the निर्णय `` caused '' the war.
the decision is acknowledged for the influential role it played in altering the national political landscape : it is credited with launching अब्राहम Lincoln’s national राजनैतिक career and ultimately allowing लिये his चुनाव.
Although the Supreme Court has never explicitly overruled the Dred Scott case, the Court stated in the Slaughter-House Cases that at least one भाग of it had already been overruled by the fourteenth amendment in 1868, जिससे begins by stating, `` All व्यक्तियों born or देशीयकृत in the United राज्य, और subject to the क्षेत्राधिकार thereof, are नागरिकों of the संयुक्त States और of the राज्य wherein they reside. ''
To which the Court noted:
The पहला अवलोकन we have to make on इस clause is, that it puts at rest दोनो the सवाल which we stated to have महरूम the विषय of differences of opinion.
it declares that persons may be नागरिकों of the संयुक्त राज्य बगैर लिहाज़ to उनके citizenship of a particular राज्य, और it overturns the Dred Scott निर्णय by making all persons born within the United States and विषय to its jurisdiction नागरिकों of the United राज्य.
वहीँ are dozens of पड़ोस in Columbus, Ohio.
Some are मुश्किल to define, as वे encompass विशाल क्षेत्रों developed at different times—often साथ sub-neighborhoods within them.
सीमायें can also बदलें based on popular समझना of the area, as well as the whims of the residents.
This आलेख उपयोग data इससे the Datasourcecolumbus वेब साईट, Spotcrime.com, hellocolumbus.com, as खूब as the various कोलंबस क्षेत्रफल आयोग to define the various areas.
Excerpts और border सूचना are drawn directly from the main articles.
a biologist is a वैज्ञानिक जो studies जीना organisms and their संबंध to उनके environment.
Biologists involved in मौलिक research attempt to discover underlying mechanisms that govern कैसा organisms कार्य.
biologists शामिल in applied research attempt to develop or improve चिकित्सा, औद्योगिक or agricultural processes.

आधार jumping, भी sometimes written as b.a.s.e. jumping, is an कार्यकलाप जहाँ भागीदार jump from फिक्स्ड objects और use a पैराशूट to ब्रेक their fall.
`` आधार '' is an एक्रोनिम that stands लिये four श्रेणी of फिक्स्ड वस्तुएँ इससे जिससे one can जम्प : इमारतें, antennas, spans ( पुलों ), and earth ( cliffs ).
the British Shorthair is a domesticated cat जिनकी सुविधाएँ मेक it a popular breed in बिल्ली shows.
it has महरूम the सबसे लोकप्रिय नस्ल of बिल्ली पंजीकृत by the uk 's Governing Council of the Cat Fancy ( gccf ) since 2001, जब it overtook the पारसी breed.
the यूएसए Basketball Men 's Senior नेशनल Team, commonly known as the संयुक्त States men 's नेशनल basketball टोली, represents the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका in अंतरराष्ट्रीय मेन 's बास्केट.
the USA is the सबसे successful टोली in international competition, जीतना medals in all सत्रह ओलम्पिक tournaments it रै डाला, coming दूर साथ fourteen golds.
Two of इसके gold medal-winning दस्तों were inducted to the Naismith Memorial बास्केट हॉल of कीर्ति as टीमों in अगस्त 2010—the 1960 टोली, which प्रदर्शित छह हॉल of famers ( 4 players, 2 कोच ), और the 1992 `` Dream टोली '', featuring 14 Hall of famers ( 11 खिलाड़ी, 3 कोच ).
The संयुक्त राज्य is currently क्रमित first in the FIBA संसार rankings.
Traditionally रचित of amateur players, a 1989 नियम बदलें by FIBA allowed यूएसए बास्केट to फ़ील्ड टीमों with professional players.
the first ऐसे team, known as the `` Dream टोली '', जीती the gold पदक at the 1992 Summer ओलंपिक in Barcelona, स्पेन, playing in the फाइनल विरूद्ध Croatia.
With the परिचय of पेशेवर, the team थी समर्थ to spark a दूसरी चलाएं of dominance after capturing तभी a bronze medal in 1988.
a team of पेशेवर players competed at the 1994 FIBA संसार Championship, finishing पहला.
In 1996, 2000, 2008, और 2012 the यूएसए again captured सुनहरा medals.
facing increased प्रतियोगिता, the यूएसए विफल to win a medal at the 2002 fiba संसार चैंपियनशिप, finishing sixth.
The 2004 गर्मियाँ ओलम्पिक team खोया three games on इसके रास्ता to a कांस्य medal, a record that represented more नुकसान in a single साल than the country 's ओलम्पिक teams had suffered in सब पिछला Olympiads combined.
Determined to put an समाप्त to these असफलताओं, USA Basketball initiated a long-term प्रोजेक्ट aimed at creating better, more cohesive टीमों.
The USA जीती its पहला seven games at the 2006 fiba World Championship in Japan पहले losing विरूद्ध Greece in the semi-finals, समाप्ति the competition साथ the कांस्य medal.
the यूएसए जीती सुनहरा two सालो बाद, though, at the 2008 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक साथ a dominant प्रदर्शन.
This कामयाबी थी followed up at the 2010 fiba संसार चैंपियनशिप, where despite fielding a रोस्टर featuring no खिलाड़ी from the 2008 Olympic team, the यूएसए किया नहीं lose a single खेल en route to defeating मेजबान Turkey for the सुनहरा medal.
The यूएसए जारी इस streak of dominance by going undefeated and capturing gold एकबार more at the 2012 Summer Olympics.
The स्टीलर्स Super कटोरी xl ring
जो Theismann 's सुपर कटोरी Ring ( सही )
The सुपर Bowl ring is an पुरस्कार in the National Football लीग दिए to the विजेता of the लीग 's annual संसार चैंपियनशिप खेल, the सुपर कटोरी.
चूंकि तभी one विंस Lombardi Trophy is awarded to the टोली ( स्वामित्व ) itself, the सुपर कटोरी रिंग offers a collectible memento लिये the actual खिलाड़ी and टोली सदस्यों to keep for themselves to symbolize the victory.

the Witch 's Finger in the carlsbad caverns
a stalagmite ( or ; इससे the यूनानी σταλαγμίτης - stalagmitês, from σταλαγμίας - stalagmias, `` छोड़ने, trickling '' ) is a प्रकार of speleothem that उदय इससे the मंजिल of a चूना गुफा due to the dripping of mineralized solutions और the deposition of calcium carbonate.
इस stalagmite formation occurs तभी under निश्चित ph शर्तें भीतर the भूमिगत cavern.
the सम्बन्धित formation on the छत of a cave is known as a stalactite.
if these formations grow together, the परिणाम is ज्ञात as a column.
The Hall of Giants in the Carlsbad caverns
stalagmites चाहिए normally नहीं be छुआ, since the rock buildup is formed by minerals precipitating out of the जल solution onto the old सतह ; स्किन oils can alter the surface जहाँ the खनिज water होगा cling, thus affecting the growth of the गठन.
oils and dirt from इंसान contact can also दाग the गठन और बदलें इसके color permanently.
समान structures can भी form in lava tubes, associated साथ some प्रकार of lavacicles, although the यांत्रिकी of formation is बहुत अलग.
stalactites और stalagmites can भी रूप on concrete ceilings and floors, हालांकि वे form much अधिक rapidly वहीँ than in the natural गुफा पर्यावरण.
The largest stalagmite in the संसार is ऊँची और is located in the गुफा of Cueva मार्टिन Infierno, क्यूबा.
in the ज़ाग्रोस Mountains of south इरान, लगभग from the ancient city of Bishapur, in the shapur गुफा on the fourth of five terraces स्टैंड the 3rd century CE statue of shapur i, second ruler of the Sassanid Empire.
The statue, carved इससे एक stalagmite, is nearly ऊँची.
How i मिले Your Mother is an American sitcom that premiered on CBS on September 19, 2005.
the show was निर्मित by क्रेग Thomas और कार्टर Bays.
कैसा i मिले अपना माँ is framed by the year 2030, जब Ted mosby ( voiced by bob saget ) gathers उसके बेटी ( lyndsy fonseca ) और बेटे ( दाउद Henrie ) to tell them the स्टोरी of कैसा he met their mother.
we फ्लैशबैक to जहाँ it begins in 2005 साथ टेड Mosby ( Josh radnor ) as a single, 27-year-old architect living साथ his दो बेहतरीन मित्रों from Wesleyan University, Marshall Eriksen ( Jason Segel ), a विधि छात्र, और लिली Aldrin ( alyson हनिंगन ), a kindergarten teacher, जो have महरूम डेटिंग for लगभग nine years जब मार्शल proposes.
उनके सगाई कल्याणकारी Ted to think परिचय finding his अपना soul mate, much to the disgust of his dost Barney stinson ( neil Patrick हैरिस ), a womanizer with an unnamed कॉरपोरेट job.
और यूँ, Ted begins his ढूंढें लिये his पूर्ण mate, and meets रोबिन scherbatsky ( Cobie Smulders ), जिसको he भी befriends.
The 100th एपीसोड of कैसा I मिले अपना माँ aired on जनवरी 11, 2010.
On दिसम्बर 21, 2012, the series was नवीनीकृत for a नवीं season.
on January 30, 2013, it was announced that Season 9 will be इसके final season.
gringo (,, ) is a slang Spanish and पुर्तगाली word प्रयुक्त in ibero-america, to denote विदेशियों, प्रायः from the संयुक्त राज्य.
the पद can be applied to किसी जो is दरअसल a foreigner, or it can denote a दमदार association or सम्मिलन into foreign ( particularly us ) समाज and संस्कृति.
in स्पेनी it does नहीं have a negative connotation.
रोजर axtell, a travel etiquette विशेषज्ञ, notes that `` [ t ] he शब्द gringo is नहीं necessarily a ख़राब word.
it is slang लकिन is अपमानजनक तभी in इसके use and कॉन्टेक्स्ट. ''
The word थी used in स्पेन long पहले it crossed the अटलांटिक to denote विदेशी, non-native speakers of Spanish.
The great white शार्क, carcharodon carcharias, also known as the great श्वेत, श्वेत pointer, श्वेत शार्क, or white मौत, is a species of विशाल lamniform shark जिससे can be मिला in the तटीय surface waters of all the major महासागर.
the ग्रेट white शार्क is mainly known for its आकार, साथ the largest individuals ज्ञात to have approached or exceeded in लंबाई, और in weight.
इस शार्क पहुँच इसके maturity around 15 years of आयु और can have a life स्पैन of over 30 सालो.
The great श्वेत शार्क is arguably the world 's largest ज्ञात extant macropredatory मछली, और is एक of the प्राथमिक परभक्षी of समुद्री स्तनधारियों.
it is भी ज्ञात to prey upon a किस्में of other marine पशु, सहित मछली और seabirds.
it is the only ज्ञात surviving प्रजाति of इसके genus Carcharodon, and is क्रमित first in having the most हमले on humans.
The आईयूसीएन सूची the ग्रेट white शार्क as a vulnerable species, while it is शामिल in Appendix II of cites.
The bestselling novel Jaws by पीटर Benchley and the subsequent ब्लॉकबस्टर फिल्मी by स्टीवन स्पिलबर्ग चित्रित the ग्रेट white शार्क as a `` ferocious man भक्षक ``.
In वास्तविकता, humans हैं नहीं the preferred prey of the great white shark.
the United राज्य हथियारबंद Forces हैं the military forces of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका.
वे consist of the फौज, Navy, Marine Corps, एयर फ़ोर्स, और Coast गार्ड.
The u.S. रै a strong tradition of civilian control of the सैन्य.
The अध्यक्ष is the सैन्य 's overall head, and helps form सैन्य policy with the U.S. विभाग of Defense ( dod ), a federal कार्यपालिका department, एक्टिंग as the प्रिंसिपल अंग by which सैन्य policy is carried out.
the DoD is headed by the Secretary of Defense, जो is a civilian और कैबिनेट सदस्य.
the रक्षा Secretary is दूसरी in the सैन्य 's कड़ी of कमांड, बस नीचे the अध्यक्ष, और serves as the प्रिंसिपल assistant to the अध्यक्ष in all DoD-related matters.
To coordinate military action with कूटनीति, the अध्यक्ष रै an advisory National सुरक्षा Council headed by a National सुरक्षा सलाहकार.
दोनो the President and Secretary of रक्षा हैं advised by a seven-member संयुक्त chiefs of Staff, which शामिल the head of प्रत्येक of the Defense Department 's सेवा शाखाओं as well as the मुख्य of the नेशनल Guard Bureau.
Leadership is provided by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त chiefs of स्टाफ और the वाइस Chairman of the Joint chiefs of स्टाफ.
the Commandant of the Coast Guard is not a member of the संयुक्त Chiefs of Staff.
सब of the शाखाओं कार्य together during परिचालन and संयुक्त missions, अंतर्गत the Unified combatant Commands, under the authority of the सचिव of रक्षा with the एक्सेप्शन of the coast Guard.
the Coast गार्ड जलप्रपात अंतर्गत the administration of the विभाग of मातृभूमि सुरक्षा और receives इसके operational orders from the Secretary of Homeland सुरक्षा.
The coast गार्ड may be transferred to the विभाग of the नेवी by the अध्यक्ष or Congress दौरान a समय of युद्ध.
All पाँच हथियारबंद services are among the सात uniformed services of the United States ; the अन्य are the u.S. Public स्वास्थ्य Service Commissioned Corps and the National Oceanic और Atmospheric प्रशासन Commissioned corps.
From the time of its inception, the सैन्य निभाई a निर्णायक भूमिका in the इतिहास of the United राज्य.
A भाव of national unity and identity was forged as a परिणाम of victory in the पहला Barbary युद्ध and the दूसरी Barbary युद्ध.
भी so, the संस्थापकों were संदिग्ध of a स्थाई military force और नहीं until the outbreak of World युद्ध ii किया a विशाल खड़ा army become officially स्थापित.
The National सुरक्षा अधिनियम of 1947, अपनाया following World युद्ध ii और दौरान the Cold युद्ध 's onset, निर्मित the modern U.S. सैन्य framework ; the अधिनियम merged previously Cabinet-level विभाग of युद्ध and the विभाग of the Navy into the नेशनल Military Establishment ( renamed the विभाग of Defense in 1949 ), headed by the सचिव of रक्षा ; and निर्मित the Department of the Air फ़ोर्स and National सुरक्षा Council.
the U.S. सैन्य is एक of the largest militaries in terms of क्रमांक of कर्मियों.
It draws इसके जनशक्ति from a विशाल pool of सशुल्क स्वयंसेवक ; although conscription रै been प्रयुक्त in the past in various टाइम्स of both war and peace, it रै not been प्रयुक्त since 1972.
as of 2013, the u.S. spends परिचय $ 554.2 billion annually to निधि इसके सैन्य शक्तियां, और appropriates लगभग $ 88.5 अरब to fund Overseas आकस्मिकता परिचालन.
Put साथ, the u.S. constitutes roughly 43 percent of the world 's सैन्य expenditures.
the u.S. हथियारबंद Forces as a पूरे possess विशाल quantities of advanced और शक्तिशाली उपकरण, साथ with फैली placement of forces around the संसार, giving them significant सामर्थ्य in दोनो defense and power प्रक्षेप.
स्वतंत्रता of speech is the राजनैतिक right to communicate एक 's opinions and विचार using one 's देह and property to anyone who is willing to receive उन्हें.
The पद स्वतंत्रता of अभिव्यक्ति is sometimes used synonymously, लकिन includes कोई act of seeking, receiving और imparting सूचना or ideas, regardless of the मीडियम used.
In practice, the right to freedom of वाक is नहीं absolute in any देश और the सही is commonly subject to limitations, as साथ libel, slander, obscenity, राजद्रोह ( including, लिये उदाहरण inciting जातीय hatred ), copyright उल्लंघन, revelation of सूचना that is classified or वरना.
the right to स्वतंत्रता of expression is पहचाना as a human right under आलेख 19 of the Universal घोषणा of Human अधिकारों और recognized in अंतरराष्ट्रीय इंसान rights विधि in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Covenant on सिविल और Political अधिकारों ( iccpr ).
Article 19 of the iccpr राज्य that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without हस्तक्षेप '' and `` everyone shall have the right to freedom of अभिव्यक्ति ; इस right shall include स्वतंत्रता to seek, receive और impart सूचना and ideas of सब kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in लिखने or in print, in the form of art, or through any अन्य मीडिया of his choice ''.
Article 19 goes on to कह कि the exercise of ये अधिकारों carries `` खास duties and जिम्मेदारियों `` और may `` therefore be विषय to निश्चित restrictions '' when necessary `` [ f ] or आदर of the अधिकारों or reputation of अन्य '' or `` [ f ] or the protection of national security or of पब्लिक order ( order पब्लिक ), or of पब्लिक health or morals ''.
Freedom of वाक may be legally curtailed in कुछ धार्मिक legal systems और in secular jurisdictions where it is found to कारण धार्मिक ठोकर, such as the British Racial और Religious द्वेष Act 2006.
the Big बंग Theory लोगो.
The Big Bang सिद्धान्त is an American कॉमेडी television श्रेणी निर्मित and कार्यपालिका produced by Chuck Lorre and विधेयक prady.
Like the name of the series itself, with the exception of the first episode— '' Pilot '' —episode शीर्षक of the बिग बंग सिद्धान्त सदा start with `` the '' और resemble the name of a scientific principle, सिद्धान्त or experiment, whimsically referencing a प्लाट point or quirk.
, 133 एपीसोड have aired.
The Big Bang Theory रै been renewed लिये a सातवाँ ऋतु.
Dwight David `` Ike '' Eisenhower ( pronounced, ; अक्तूबर 14, 1890 – कूच 28, 1969 ) was the 34th President of the संयुक्त राज्य इससे 1953 until 1961.
he had previously been a five-star सामान्य in the United States Army दौरान संसार युद्ध II और परोसा as परम् Commander of the Allied Forces in यूरोपीय ; he था responsibility for planning और supervising the invasion of उत्तर अफ़्रीकी in Operation Torch in 1942–43 और the successful आक्रमण of France and Germany in 1944–45 इससे the Western सामने.
in 1951, he became the first परम् commander of नाटो.
Eisenhower थी of Pennsylvania डच ancestry और was reared in a large family in Kansas by अभिभावक with a मजबूत कार्य ethic and religious पृष्ठभूमि.
As एक of छह बेटे, he was conditioned by a प्रतिस्पर्धी माहौल which instilled self-reliance.
he attended and ग्रैजुएट from West Point और later married and had दो sons.
बाद World War ii, आइज़नहावर परोसा as फौज मुख्य of स्टाफ under अध्यक्ष हैरी S. ट्रूमैन, तब assumed the post of अध्यक्ष at Columbia विश्वविद्यालयों.
Eisenhower entered the 1952 presidential रेस as a Republican to counter the non-interventionism of सीनेटर Robert A. Taft and to crusade against `` साम्यवादी, Korea and corruption ''.
he won by a landslide, defeating डेमोक्रेट Adlai stevenson और समाप्ति two दशकों of the नई Deal गठबन्धन.
in the first साल of his presidency, आइज़नहावर अपदस्थ the नेता of Iran in the 1953 ईरानी तख्तापलट d'état और used नाभिकीय threats to conclude the कोरियाई War साथ China.
His New dekh नीति of nuclear deterrence gave प्रधानता to inexpensive nuclear हथियार जबकि reducing the funding लिये conventional सैन्य forces ; the goal was to रखना pressure on the सोवियत Union and reduce federal deficits.
In 1954, Eisenhower first articulated the domino theory in his वर्णन of the threat प्रस्तुत by the स्प्रेड of communism.
the Congress agreed to उसके request in 1955 for the Formosa Resolution, जिससे सक्रिय him to prevent चाइनीज कम्युनिस्ट आक्रामकता विरूद्ध चाइनीज राष्ट्रवादियों and established the U.S. नीति of defending ताईवान.
When the soviets शुभारम्भ sputnik in 1957, he had to खेल catch-up in the space रेस.
आइज़नहावर मजबूर इसराईल, the uk, and France to end their आक्रमण of मिश्र during the स्वेज Crisis of 1956.
In 1958, he भेजा 15,000 us सैनिकों to Lebanon to prevent the pro-Western सरकारी इससे falling to a nasser -inspired क्रान्ति.
निकट the समाप्त of his पद, उसके efforts to नियत up a summit meeting with the Soviets collapsed because of the U-2 घटना.
On the domestic front, he covertly opposed Joseph मैकार्थी और contributed to the समाप्त of McCarthyism by खुलकर invoking the आधुनिक expanded संस्करण of कार्यपालिका विशेषाधिकार.
he otherwise left most political कार्यकलाप to his वाइस अध्यक्ष, रिचर्ड निक्सन.
he थी a moderate conservative who continued नई सौदे agencies and expanded सोशल Security.
Among his enduring innovations, he launched the अंतरराज्यीय Highway प्रणाली ; the Defense Advanced Research Projects एजेंसी ( darpa ), जिससे led to the internet, among many invaluable outputs ; the नेशनल aeronautics and Space Administration ( नासा ), ड्राइविंग शांतिपूर्ण discovery in space ; the establishment of strong science शिक्षा via the नेशनल Defense शिक्षा अधिनियम ; and प्रोत्साहित शांतिपूर्ण use of नाभिकीय power via amendments to the परमाणु उर्जा अधिनियम.
In social policy, he sent संघीय सैनिकों to Little चट्टान, अरकंसास, लिये the first time चूंकि Reconstruction to enforce federal अदालत orders to desegregate पब्लिक स्कूलों.
he also हस्ताक्षरित सिविल अधिकारों विधान in 1957 and 1960 to protect the right to vote.
he implemented desegregation of the हथियारबंद शक्तियां in दो years और बना five नियुक्ति to the Supreme अदालत.
he was the first term-limited president in accordance साथ the 22nd Amendment.
आइज़नहावर 's two शर्तें यहूद शांतिपूर्ण ones for the most part और saw considerable economic समृद्धि मगर लिये a sharp recession in 1958–59.
Eisenhower is often क्रमित अत्यधिक among the U.S. Presidents.
Air Force One is the official air traffic कंट्रोल कॉल sign of a United States Air फ़ोर्स वायुयान carrying the President of the संयुक्त States.
In common parlance the term refers to those Air Force वायुयान specifically designed, निर्मित, और प्रयुक्त for the purpose of transporting the president.
the Presidential aircraft is a prominent प्रतीक of the अमरीकी presidency and its शक्ति.
the विचार of designating विशिष्ट सैन्य वायुयान to transport the President arose in 1943, जब officials of the संयुक्त राज्य Army एयर शक्तियां – the predecessor to the u.S. Air Force – became चिंतित with relying on वाणिज्यिक एयरलाइंस to transport the President.
a c-87 मुक्तिवादी Express थी reconfigured for use as a अध्यक्षीय हस्तांतरण ; however, it थी rejected by the रहस्य सेवा amid concerns over the वायुयान 's सुरक्षा रिकार्ड.
A C-54 skymaster थी then परिवर्तित लिये presidential उपयोग ; इस aircraft, उतावले the पवित्र गाय, transported President फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट to the Yalta Conference in फ़रवरी 1945, और was subsequently प्रयुक्त लिये another दो सालो by अध्यक्ष हैरी S. Truman.
the `` एयर Force One '' कॉल चिह्न was निर्मित after a 1953 घटना during which a उड़ान carrying President ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर entered the same airspace as a वाणिज्यिक एयरलाइन flight using the same call चिह्न.
Several aircraft have been प्रयुक्त as एयर फ़ोर्स One since the सृष्टि of the presidential fleet, including two बोइंग 707s introduced in the 1960s और 1970s, क्रमशः ; since 1990, the presidential fleet has consisted of two बोइंग VC-25As – specifically configured, highly customized बोइंग 747-200B श्रेणी वायुयान.
The Air Force is looking into replacing the two VC-25 वायुयान साथ three replacement वायुयान beginning in 2017.
A विवाह anniversary is the वर्षगांठ of the date a wedding took place.
Traditional names exist लिये most of उन्हें : for instance, 50 सालो of marriage is called a `` golden विवाह anniversary '' or बस a `` golden anniversary ''.
a स्कैनर with Duplexing स्वचालित दस्तावेज़ Feeder.
in multifunction or all-in-one मुद्रक, fax मशीने, photocopiers और scanners, an स्वचालित दस्तावेज़ फीडर or ADF is a विशेषता जिससे takes several पृष्ठों और feeds the पेपर एक पेज at a time into a scanner or कॉपियर, allowing the user to scan, and thereby copy, छपाई, or फैक्स, multiple-page documents without having to manually बदलें each पेज.
सबसे copiers allow स्कैनिंग on the flatbed or platen ( the `` glass '' ) or through a document फीडर.
The vast बहुमत of फैक्स मशीने have an adf, allowing the unattended sending of multi-page faxes.
due to the ubiquity of adf in फैक्स मशीने, some फैक्स यंत्र स्वामी उपयोग the फैक्स यंत्र as a स्कैनर, faxing multi-page दस्तावेज़ to themselves.
Document feeders are वर्णित by speed, in pages per minute or ppm, and क्षमता, usually in a range इससे 10 sheets to 200.
वहीँ are दो kinds of document feeders सक्षम of two-sided ( duplex ) scanning : a reversing स्वचालित document feeder or radf scans एक पक्ष of a पेज, तब flips it and scans the अन्य पक्ष.
A duplexing स्वचालित document फीडर or DADF scans दोनो पहलू in one pass.
the लाभ of the dadf is तेज़ गति for two-sided मूल.
radfs और DADFs are रेटेड in बिंब per मिनट ( IPM ), the क्रमांक of पहलू वे can scan each minute.
Fair Park is a recreational और educational complex स्तिथ in Dallas, Texas ( USA ).
the complex is registered as a Dallas लैंडमार्क, National ऐतिहासिक Landmark और is घर to नौ museums, छह प्रदर्शन सुविधाएं, a लैगून, और the largest Ferris व्हील in उत्तर America.
अनेक of the buildings on the जटिल यहूद constructed लिये the Texas centennial Exposition in 1936 जिससे drew over six लाख विज़िटर.
Most of the buildings built for the exposition स्टिल जीवित और it is recognized as a significant example of आर्ट Deco वास्तुकला.
Fair Park रै महरूम designated a Great प्लेस in अमेरिका by the American नियोजन Association.
the American Planning संघ ( apa ) “is an स्वतंत्र, not-for-profit शैक्षणिक organization कि provides leadership in the विकास of vital communities.”
The ग्रेट Places in अमरीकी कार्यक्रम helps to celebrate क्षेत्रों with “exemplary अक्षर, quality, and planning.”
Being designated as a Great प्लेस in America, Fair पार्क थी एक of तभी ten शहरों chosen in 2011.
San जोस ( ; स्पेनी : St. Joseph ) is the third-largest city in California, the tenth-largest in the u.S., और the county seat of Santa Clara County which is located at the southern समाप्त of सैन Francisco Bay.
San Jose is the largest city within सिलिकॉन घाटी, which is a प्रमुख component of the greater San Francisco Bay क्षेत्रफल, a region of 8.4 million लोगों and the पांचवां largest metropolitan area ( CSA ) in the संयुक्त States.
It is the largest नगर in उत्तरी California.
San Jose was संस्थापित on November 29, 1777, as el pueblo de San José de Guadalupe, the पहला civilian कस्बा in the Spanish colony of Nueva कैलिफ़ोर्निया, जिससे बाद became alta कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
The city परोसा as a farming जातियाँ to support Spanish सैन्य installations at San फ्रांसिस्को और Monterey.
जब California gained statehood in 1850, San Jose परोसा as its पहला पूंजी.
बाद more than 150 years as a छोटी खेती नगर, San Jose और the surrounding Santa Clara Valley became the last ( और largest ) संलग्न area of अविकसित जमीन surrounding the सैन फ्रांसिस्को Bay.
San जोस experienced increased demand for आवास from सैनिको और veterans returning from संसार युद्ध ii.
San जोस then जारी its aggressive expansion during the 1950s and 1960s by annexing more land area.
the rapid विकास of the high-technology and electronics industries further accelerated the परिवर्तन from an agricultural center, to an urbanized metropolitan area.
by the 1990s, सैन जोस 's स्थान भीतर the booming लोकल प्रौद्योगिकी industry earned the city इसके उपनाम, पूंजी of सिलिकॉन घाटी.
San जोस now maintains global नगर औकात और is the largest नगर in the San फ्रांसिस्को Bay क्षेत्रफल in terms of population, जमीन area, और industrial development.
the u.S. जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो reported the population of the city to be 945,942 as of the 2010 Census.
As of अप्रैल 2013, the estimated जनसांख्यिकी of San जोस was 984,000.
सैन जोस, along साथ the Santa क्लारा घाटी, अनुभवी परिचय half a century of spectacular suburban sprawl, with characteristics of intense शहरी समान to the Los एंजिल्स area of Southern कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
the city रै लिया definite कदम to avoid बनने `` L.A. उत्तर ''.
however, the sprawl in San Jose is बदतर than in Los एंजिल्स by उपायों such as population घनत्व and पब्लिक पारगमन safety, investment, और ridership.
यूरोपीय चित्रित by Antwerp cartographer Abraham ortelius in 1595
the history of यूरोपीय covers the people inhabiting the यूरोपीय continent since it थी first आबादी in प्रागैतिहासिक times to उपस्थित, with the first होमो sapiens arriving between 45,000 और 25,000 bc.
the earliest settlers to Prehistoric Europe आए दौरान the paleolithic era.
the आगमन of कृषि around 7000 bc ushered in the neolithic age.
पाषाणकालीन यूरोपीय lasted लिये 4000 सालो, overlapping साथ metal-using संस्कृतियों that gradually spread throughout the महाद्वीप.
Technological अग्रिम दौरान the प्रागैतिहासिक age tended to arrive from the मध्य East, spreading धीरे to the northwest.
Some of the best-known सभ्यताओं of प्रागैतिहासिक यूरोपीय were Minoan and माइसीनियाई, जिससे flourished दौरान the कांस्य Age until वे collapsed in a short period of time around 1200 BC.
The period known as classical प्राचीनता began साथ the rise of the city-states of Ancient Greece.
यूनानी influence पहुँचे its zenith अंतर्गत the expansive साम्राज्य of Alexander the ग्रेट, spreading throughout एशिया.
उत्तरी और western Europe यहूद वर्चस्व by the la Tène culture, a precursor to the celts.
Rome, a छोटी city-state traditionally founded in 753 bc, would grow to become the Roman गणतंत्र in 509 bc और होता succeed यूनानी culture as the प्रबल भूमध्यसागरीय civilization.
The कार्यक्रम of the rule of जूलियस Caesar led to reorganization of the गणतंत्र into the रोमन साम्राज्य.
the empire was later divided by the सम्राट diocletian into the पश्चिमी और Eastern empires.
दौरान the later सालो of the Roman Empire, the Germanic peoples of northern यूरोपीय grew in शक्ति और दोहराया हमले led to the Fall of the Western रोमन Empire in AD 476, a तिथि जिससे traditionally marks the समाप्त of the classical काल and the प्रारंभ of the Middle आयु.
During the मध्य Ages, the पूर्वी Roman साम्राज्य survived, हालांकि आधुनिक historians refer to this राज्य as the बीज़ान्टिन Empire.
in पश्चिमी यूरोपीय, Germanic peoples moved into स्थितियाँ of शक्ति in the remnants of the former Western Roman साम्राज्य and established kingdoms and empires of उनके own.
Of सब of the Germanic peoples, the franks होता rise to a position of आधिपत्य over पश्चिमी Europe, the frankish साम्राज्य reaching इसके शिखर under Charlemagne around AD 800.
Francia was divided into several भाग ; वेस्ट francia होता evolve into the किंगडम of फ़्रांस, while ईस्ट francia would evolve into the Holy रोमन साम्राज्य, a precursor to modern जर्मनी.
the British isles were the साईट of अनेक large-scale migrations.
Native Celtic peoples था been अधिकारहीन during the काल of रोमन Britain, और when the romans abandoned the British isles दौरान the 400s, लहरें of Germanic Anglo-Saxons migrated to दक्षिणी Britain and established a series of क्षुद्र kingdoms in कया would eventually develop into the किंगडम of England by ad 927.
दौरान this period, the किंगडम of Poland और Kingdom of हंगेरियाई ( 1000–1945 ) were व्यवस्थित as खूब.
the viking आयु, a काल of migrations of Scandinavian peoples, dominated the काल इससे the late 700s to the मध्य 1000s.
मुख्य among the viking राज्य was the Empire of Cnut the Great, a Danish नेता who होता become king of England, Denmark, and Norway.
the Normans, a Viking लोगों जो settled in Northern France और संस्थापित the Duchy of Normandy, होता have a significant impact on many parts of यूरोपीय, इससे the नॉर्मन conquest of England to Southern इटली और Sicily.
Another scandinavian लोगों, the rus ' people, होता go on to found kievan rus ', an early राज्य which थी a precursor लिये the modern देश of रूस.
As the Viking Age खींचा to a बंद, the काल known as the क्रूसेड, a series of religiously-motivated military रिझाने originally intended to bring the levant वापस into ईसाई rule, began.
Several Crusader states यहूद founded in the eastern भूमध्यसागरीय.
ये यहूद all short-lived.
the crusaders होता have a profound प्रभाव on अनेक parts of यूरोपीय.
Their Sack of कुस्तुंतुनिया in 1204 brought an abrupt end to the बीज़ान्टिन साम्राज्य.
विलुप्त श्वान breeds is a संकलन of dog breeds that have become extinct.
वी बोलो is a microphone accessory लिये निन्टेंडो 's Wii video game console.
Connected to the कंसोल via usb, the device can be लगाई निकट the वीडियो display, allowing आवाज़ गपशप to be conducted with the संपूर्ण room.
The device सुविधाएँ an led to indicate जब the microphone is active.

It was released separately and bundled साथ Animal Crossing : City लोक on November 16, 2008, in North America, and थी released on December 5, 2008, in Europe.
the Wii Speak accessory is succeeded by the embedded microphone on the Wii U 's gamepad controller.
निसान Intelligent Key®
A smart कुंजी is an electronic access और authorization प्रणाली which is available as an option or standard in several गाड़ियाँ.

univisión ( ) is a spanish-language टेलीविज़न network in the संयुक्त राज्य.
the संजाल is primarily समर्पित for Latin अमरीकी families जो reside in the United States.
It has the largest audience of spanish-language टेलीविज़न दर्शक in the world according to nielsen ratings.
Randy Falco, ( सीईओ as of जून 29, 2011 ) coo, रै been in चार्ज of the company since the प्रस्थान of Univision Communications अध्यक्ष and सीईओ Joe uva in अप्रैल 2010.
in हाल सालो the network has reached parity with the U.S. 's five major English-language television networks, and is प्रायः a strong पांचवां, outranking the cw, with कुछ fourth-place weekly placings, and as of 2012, भी पहला place rankings लिये व्यक्तिगत programs over all five English networks due to the network 's consistent अनुसूची of new telenovelas सब 52 weeks of the year.
Univisión is headquartered in New York, और रै इसके major studios, production facilities, and operations in doral, फ्लोरिडा, a suburb of मियामी.
In 2009, another television studio थी घोषित, univision studios, to be built in Doral.
Univision is उपलब्धियाँ on cable और उपग्रह in most of the country, with लोकल stations in over 50 बाज़ार साथ large Hispanic and Latino populations and a national केबल network feed वितरित in बाज़ार without either the availability or the demand लिये a locally-based station.
सबसे of ये stations air full लोकल news और अन्य लोकल programming in जोड to network shows, और in major markets ऐसे as Los Angeles, नई यॉर्क, and मियामी the लोकल newscasts carried by the network 's owned-and-operated station ( O & o ) stations are बराबर competitive with उनके english-language counterparts ratings-wise.
Univisión थी acquired on March 29, 2007 by a consortium led by haim saban 's Saban पूंजी समूह ( जो had previously owned the entity saban Entertainment ), tpg पूंजी, l.P., Providence Equity Partners, मैडिसन Dearborn साझेदार, and Thomas H. ली Partners लिये $ 13.7 अरब or $ 36.25 प्रति share plus $ 1.4 अरब in acquired debt.
The buyout left the कम्पनी with a कर्ज़ level of twelve times इसके annual नकदी flow, जिससे थी twice the norm in buyouts किया over the previous दो years.
Artist 's धारणा of a protoplanetary डिस्क
The formation and of the Solar प्रणाली is estimated to have begun 4.6 अरब years पहले with the गुरुत्वाकर्षक collapse of a छोटी part of a giant molecular बादल.
सबसे of the collapsing द्रव्यमान एकत्रित in the केन्द्र, forming the Sun, while the rest flattened into a आदिग्रह डिस्क आउट of which the planets, moons, asteroids, and अन्य small सौर प्रणाली लाशें formed.
इस widely स्वीकृत मॉडल, known as the nebular hypothesis, थी first developed in the 18th century by emanuel Swedenborg, Immanuel kant, and pierre-simon Laplace.
इसके subsequent development रै interwoven a किस्में of वैज्ञानिक disciplines including खगोलशास्त्र, physics, geology, और ग्रहीय विज्ञान.
चूंकि the dawn of the space आयु in the 1950s और the डिस्कवरी of extrasolar planets in the 1990s, the model रै been both challenged and refined to account लिये new observations.
The सौर प्रणाली has evolved considerably since इसके आरंभिक गठन.
Many moons have formed इससे circling discs of गैस and dust around उनके parent planets, जबकि अन्य moons are विचार to have formed independently और बाद महरूम captured by their planets.
Still others, as the धरती 's चंद्रमा, may be the परिणाम of giant टक्करों.
टक्करों between bodies have occurred continually up to the उपस्थित दिन and have been central to the एवोल्यूशन of the सौर System.
the स्थितियाँ of the ग्रह often shifted, and planets have switched places.
इस planetary migration is अभी thought to have been responsible लिये much of the Solar प्रणाली 's जल्दी evolution.
In roughly 5 billion years, the सूर्य होगा cool and विस्तार outward many times its वर्तमान व्यास ( becoming a रेड giant ), before ढलाई बंद इसके outer layers as a planetary nebula और leaving behind a stellar remnant known as a श्वेत बौना.
in the दूर दूर future, the गम्भीरता of गुजर stars will gradually reduce the Sun 's retinue of ग्रह.
कुछ planets will be नष्ट, अन्य ejected into अंतरतारकीय स्पेस.
Ultimately, over the कोर्स of tens of अरबों of years, it is likely that the सूर्य will be left with none of the असली लाशें in orbit around it.
the विचारण ( काफ्का 's असली German title :, later as, and ) is a अनोखा लिखा by Franz काफ्का in 1914 and 1915 लकिन not प्रकाशित जबतक 1925.
एक of Kafka 's best-known works, it tells the स्टोरी of a man गिरफ्तार और prosecuted by a remote, अभिगम्य प्राधिकार, with the nature of उसके अपराधों नाज़िल to neither him nor the reader.
जैसे Kafka 's अन्य novels, The Trial was never समाप्त, although it does शामिल a अध्याय which brings the story to an end.
क्युकी of इस there are निश्चित inconsistencies जिससे मौजूद भीतर the novel, ऐसे as असमानताओं in timing in addition to other discontinuities in narration.
बाद काफ्का 's मौत in 1924 his friend और साहित्यिक executor Max brod edited the टेक्स्ट for publication by Verlag die schmiede.
The original manuscript is held at the Museum of Modern साहित्य, marbach am neckar, Germany.
In 1999, the book थी listed in Le mondes 100 Books of the Century and as no. 2 of the बेहतरीन जर्मनी novels of the बीसवीं सदी.
लिसा Anne Loeb ( born March 11, 1968 ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter और actress.
वो शुभारम्भ her करियर in 1994 साथ the song, `` रहो ( I Missed तुम ) ``, which was शामिल in the फिल्मी वास्तविकता bites.
She थी the first artist to have a number one सिंगल in the संयुक्त States while नहीं signed to a recording contract.
Her पाँच स्टुडियो cds include her प्रमुख लेबल debut, the gold-selling tails और its follow-up, the Grammy-nominated, gold-selling पटाखा.
लोएब रै also worked in फिल्मी, television, voice-over कार्य and children’s recordings.
Loeb रै appeared in two टेलीविज़न series, dweezil & लिसा, a weekly culinary एडवेंचर for the Food Network and Number 1 Single, a वास्तविकता दिखाएँ on the e !
संजाल in 2006 focused on her quest for love, कामयाबी, career, और परिवार.
उसके children 's म्यूज़िक शामिल the एल्बम Catch the चंद्रमा ( 2003 ), और शिविर Lisa ( 2008 ).

In 2010 वो founded the लिसा Loeb चश्मा Collection, जिससे is based on उसके अपना डिजाइन.
the कोट of arms of the राज्य of New जर्सी शामिलs:
A shield with three plows emblazoned, प्रतिनिधि of New जर्सी 's agricultural tradition.
A forward-facing knight 's helmet.
a घोड़ा 's head as the crest of the हेल्मेट.
the female figures स्वतंत्रता and Ceres, प्रतिनिधि of the state 's motto ( देखिए अगला item ).
Liberty is holding a staff supporting a `` स्वतंत्रता cap `` ; Ceres is पकड़कर an overflowing cornucopia.
The streamer at the पैर of the emblem contains the State motto of New Jersey, `` Liberty और Prosperity '', और the साल of statehood, 1776.
it थी originally designed by पियरे Eugene du Simitiere in 1777 and थी परिवर्धित थोड़ा in 1928.
the मुहर is the सेंट्रल मोटिफ in the flag of नई जर्सी और the Great Seal of the State of नई Jersey.
The कोट of बाहें contains a घोड़ा 's सिर.
a helmet showing कि नई जर्सी governs itself accordingly और three plows on a शील्ड referring to the राज्य 's agriculture tradition, giving it the उपनाम `` Garden State ''.
The दो Goddesses represent the State motto, `` स्वतंत्रता and Prosperity ''.
Liberty is on the left.
She is पकड़कर a स्टाफ साथ a स्वतंत्रता कैप on it, और the word स्वतंत्रता underneath her.
The देवी on the सही is Ceres, goddess of agriculture.
वो is पकड़कर a cornucopia साथ समृद्धि written below her.
according to the मिनट्स of the New जर्सी सामान्य Assembly for कूच 11, 1896, the date in जिससे the सभा officially approved the flag as the state emblem, the buff रंग is due indirectly to George वॉशिंगटन, who था ordered on October 2, 1779, that the वर्दी coats of the New जर्सी महाद्वीपीय लकीर be dark ( Jersey ) blue, साथ buff facings.
Buff-colored facings had until तब been सुरक्षित only लिये उसके अपना uniform और those of other महाद्वीपीय generals और their aides.
तब, on फ़रवरी 28, 1780, the महाद्वीपीय War अधिकारियों in Philadelphia निर्देशित कि the uniform कोट facings of all regiments यहूद to be the same as the पृष्ठभूमि color of the regiments ' state ध्वज.

`` we Can कार्य It आउट '' is a सोंग by the बीटल्स, लिखा by Paul mccartney और John Lennon.
It थी released as a `` दोगुना a-sided `` सिंगल with `` Day tripper ``, the first समय both पहलू of a सिंगल were so designated in an initial रिलीज.
दोनो songs were अंकित दौरान the Rubber आत्मा सत्र.

This सोंग, `` A Day in the जीवन ``, `` baby, तुम 're a समृद्ध man `` और `` I 've मिला a Feeling ``, are among the notable अपवाद.
As a medical निदान, pedophilia or paedophilia is a psychiatric विकार in व्यक्तियों 16 सालो of age or older typically characterized by a प्राथमिक or विशेष sexual ब्याज toward prepubescent children ( generally age 11 years or younger, though विशिष्ट निदान मापदण्ड लिये the विकार extends the cut-off पाइंट for prepubescence to age 13 ).
an adolescent who is 16 सालो of age or older जरूर be at least पाँच सालो older than the prepubescent चाइल्ड पहले the attraction can be diagnosed as pedophilia.
The term रै a दायरा of परिभाषाएं, as found in psychiatry, psychology, the vernacular, और law enforcement.
The International Classification of रोगों ( ICD ) defines pedophilia as a `` disorder of वयस्क व्यक्तित्व और आचरण '' in which there is a sexual preference for children of prepubertal or जल्दी pubertal आयु.
According to the Diagnostic और Statistical Manual of दिमागी Disorders ( DSM ), it is a paraphilia in which वयस्कों or adolescents 16 सालो of आयु or पुरानी have intense and तूल sexual urges towards and कल्पनाओं परिचय prepubescent children कि वे have either acted on or which cause them distress or interpersonal परेशानी.
In popular usage, pedophilia means कोई यौन ब्याज in children or the अधिनियम of child यौन abuse, प्रायः termed `` pedophilic बर्ताव ''.
लिये example, The अमरीकी Heritage stedman 's चिकित्सा शब्दकोष राज्य, `` Pedophilia is the अधिनियम or fantasy on the part of an adult of engaging in sexual activity with a चाइल्ड or children. ''
इस आम use application भी extends to the sexual ब्याज in and यौन सम्पर्क साथ pubescent or post-pubescent नाबालिग.
Researchers recommend that ये imprecise uses be avoided क्युकी although लोगों who commit चाइल्ड यौन abuse commonly प्रदर्शनी the विकार, कुछ offenders do नहीं meet the clinical निदान standards for pedophilia और these मानकों pertain to prepubescents.
additionally, नहीं सब pedophiles actually कमिट such abuse.
Pedophilia was first formally recognized and नामित in the लेट 19th सदी.
a significant राशि of शोध in the area रै लिया प्लेस since the 1980s.
हालांकि ज़्यादातर documented in मेन, there हैं भी महिलाओं who प्रदर्शनी the विकार, और researchers assume उपलब्धियाँ estimates underrepresent the true number of female pedophiles.
no cure लिये pedophilia has been developed, लकिन there are therapies that can reduce the incidence of a व्यक्ति committing चाइल्ड यौन गाली.
in the संयुक्त States, following कान्सास v. Hendricks, sex अपराधियों who are diagnosed साथ निश्चित mental विकार, particularly pedophilia, can be विषय to indefinite सिविल प्रतिबद्धता, under various राज्य कानून ( generically called SVP कानून ) और the संघीय आदम Walsh चाइल्ड सुरक्षा and Safety Act of 2006.
at उपस्थित, the सटीक कल्याणकारी of pedophilia have not महरूम conclusively स्थापित.
Research suggests कि pedophilia may be correlated साथ अनेक अलग neurological abnormalities, and प्रायः co-exists साथ अन्य personality disorders और मनोवैज्ञानिक pathologies.
in the contexts of forensic psychology और law enforcement, a variety of typologies have महरूम सुझाया to categorize pedophiles according to बर्ताव and motivations.
Julio César chávez ( born जूलियो César Chávez gonzález on जुलाई 12, 1962 ) is a retired मैक्सिकन professional boxer.
chávez is माना by अनेक लोगों लिये their खेल statistics the महानतम सेनानी कभी to आइये out of Mexico.
He is a six-time संसार चैंपियन in three weight divisions, and लिये अनेक सालो he was considered one of the बेहतरीन pound-for-pound boxer in the संसार.
In a करियर that spanned over 25 years, Chávez won five संसार शीर्षक in three वज़न divisions : WBC सुपर Featherweight in 1984, WBA Lightweight in 1987, wbc Lightweight in 1988, wbc Light Welterweight in 1989, IBF लाइट Welterweight in 1990, और WBC Light Welterweight in 1994.
he holds records for most successful consecutive defenses of संसार शीर्षक ( 27 ), सबसे title fights ( 37 ), most title-fight victories ( 31 ) और he is बाद जो Louis with ( 23 ) लिये most शीर्षक defenses won by नॉकआउट ( 21 ).
Chávez भी has the longest अपराजित streak in boxing इतिहास, 13 सालो.
His record was 89-0-1 going into his first घाटा to Frankie Randall and had an 87 लड़ो जीत streak until his `` चित्रण '' साथ whitaker.
Julio César Chávez was known लिये उसके बकाया punching शक्ति, विनाशकारी देह attack, remarkably दमदार chin and the अथक stalking of his प्रतिद्वंद्वियों.
He बाँधने # 24 on ईएसपीएन 's 50 महानतम Boxers of All समय.
On December 7, 2010, he थी inducted in the prestigious अंतरराष्ट्रीय मुक्केबाज़ी हॉल of कीर्ति for the क्लास of 2011.
he is the father of prospect Omar Chávez और former wbc middleweight चैंपियन जूलियो césar Chávez, jr.

the Holocaust ( from the यूनानी ' : hólos, `` whole '' and kaustós, `` burnt '' ) भी ज्ञात as the Shoah ( यहूदी :, hashoah, `` catastrophe '' ; यहूदी :, churben or Hurban, from the यहूदी लिये `` विनाश '' ), थी the mass murder or genocide of लगभग छह million यहूदियों during World War ii, a programme of व्यवस्थित state-sponsored murder by Nazi जर्मनी, led by Adolf Hitler और the नाजी Party, throughout German-occupied territory.
of the नौ million Jews जो had resided in Europe before the holocaust, लगभग two-thirds यहूद killed.
Over एक लाख यहूदी children were मारे in the Holocaust, as were approximately दो million यहूदी महिलाओं and तीन लाख यहूदी men.
A network of over 40,000 facilities in Germany and German-occupied territory were used to concentrate, थाम, and मार यहूदियों और other victims.
Some विद्वानों argue that the द्रव्यमान murder of the Romani and लोगों with disabilities should be शामिल in the definition, और some उपयोग the common संज्ञा `` holocaust '' to describe अन्य नाजी द्रव्यमान murders, सहित those of Soviet prisoners of युद्ध, Polish और Soviet civilians, और homosexuals.
हाल estimates आधारित on figures प्राप्त since the पतन of the Soviet Union indicates कुछ टेन to ग्यारह million नागरिकों और बंदियों of war were intentionally murdered by the नाजी regime.
the persecution और genocide यहूद carried out in चरण.
विभिन्न laws to हटाएँ the यहूदियों इससे सिविल society, सबसे prominently the Nuremberg कानून, यहूद enacted in जर्मनी years before the outbreak of संसार युद्ध II.
Concentration camps were established in which inmates were subjected to slave labor until वे died of exhaustion or बीमारी.
Where Germany conquered new territory in पूर्वी यूरोपीय, specialized इकाई called Einsatzgruppen murdered Jews और political opponents in द्रव्यमान shootings.
the occupiers required यहूदियों and romani to be confined in overcrowded ghettos पहले होने transported by भाड़ा train to extermination शिविरों where, if वे survived the यात्रा, most यहूद systematically killed in गैस कक्षों.
प्रत्येक arm of जर्मनी 's अफसरशाही was शामिल in the लोजिस्टिक्स कि led to the genocides, turning the Third reich into कया एक Holocaust विद्वान has called `` a genocidal राज्य ''.
4-H in the संयुक्त States is a youth organization administered by the नेशनल Institute of खाना और कृषि of the United राज्य विभाग of कृषि ( यूएसडीए ), साथ the मिशन of `` engaging youth to reach their fullest potential जबकि advancing the फ़ील्ड of युवावस्था विकास. ''
the नाम represents चार personal development क्षेत्रों of फ़ोकस for the संगठन : सिर, दिल, हैंड्स, and स्वास्थ्य.
the संगठन has over 6.5 million members in the संयुक्त राज्य, from आयु पाँच to twenty-one, in लगभग 90,000 क्लब.
the goal of 4-h is to develop citizenship, leadership, जिम्मेदारी and जीवन कौशल of youth through experiential सीखना कार्यक्रम and a positive youth विकास approach.
हालांकि typically विचार of as an agriculturally केन्द्रित organization as a result of its इतिहास, 4-H today focuses on citizenship, healthy living, science, अभियान्त्रिकी, and प्रौद्योगिकी कार्यक्रम.
आज, 4-h and सम्बन्धित कार्यक्रम मौजूद in over अस्सी countries around the world ; the संगठन और administration varies from country to country.
प्रत्येक of these programs operates independently, but cooperatively through अंतरराष्ट्रीय exchanges, वैश्विक शिक्षा programs, and संचार.
The 4-h motto is `` to मेक the best better '', जबकि its स्लोगन is `` Learn by doing '' ( sometimes लिखा as `` सीख to do by doing '' ).
The national flag of चिली, consists of two गैरबराबरी आड़ा bands of श्वेत और red and a ब्लू square the same height as the white band in the कैण्टन, जिससे bears a श्वेत five-pointed स्टार in the बीच.
It was adopted on 18 October 1817.
the Chilean ध्वज is भी ज्ञात in स्पेनी as La estrella solitaria ( The Lone Star ).
The star represents a guide to progress और honor ; blue symbolizes the आसमान और the प्रशांत Ocean, श्वेत is for the snow-covered Andes, and रेड stands लिये the blood spilled to achieve स्वतंत्रता.
according to the एपिक कविता la araucana, the रंगों were निकला from those from the ध्वज flown by the Mapuche दौरान the Arauco War.
`` Flag दिन '' is held each year on the नवीं of July to commemorate the 77 soldiers who died in the 1882 Battle of la Concepción.
Generation Y, also ज्ञात as the Millennial Generation, is the demographic दल following Generation X.
वहीँ are no precise तिथियाँ लिये when पीढी Y starts and ends.
टीकाकारों उपयोग शुरूआत birth dates इससे the latter 1970s, or from the early 1980s to the early 2000s.

Virginia ( ), officially the Commonwealth of Virginia, is a U.S. राज्य located in the दक्षिण Atlantic region of the United States.
Virginia is nicknamed the `` बूढ़ा डोमिनियन '' और the `` माँ of Presidents '' बाद the आठ U.S. राष्ट्रपतियों born there.
The भूगोल and जलवायु of the राष्ट्रमंडल हैं तराशा by the ब्लू Ridge Mountains and the Chesapeake खाड़ी, जिससे provide आवास लिये much of its फ्लोरा and fauna.
the पूंजी of the Commonwealth is Richmond ; और वर्जिनिया बीच is the सबसे populous city.
फेयरफैक्स काउंटी is the most populous राजनैतिक subdivision.
The wealthiest is Loudoun County.
The राष्ट्रमंडल 's population is over eight million.
the area 's history begins साथ अनेक indigenous समूह, including the Powhatan.
In 1607 the लंदन कम्पनी established the उपनिवेश of Virginia as the first स्थाई नई संसार अंग्रेज़ी उपनिवेश.
स्लेव labor and the land acquired from displaced Native American जनजातियों each played a significant भूमिका in the colony 's जल्दी politics and वृक्षारोपण economy.
वर्जिनिया थी एक of the 13 colonies in the American Revolution और joined the confederacy in the American Civil युद्ध, during जिससे Richmond was बना the confederate पूंजी and Virginia 's northwestern counties seceded to रूप the state of West वर्जिनिया.
हालांकि the राष्ट्रमंडल थी under रूढ़िवादी single-party नियम for nearly a century following Reconstruction, दोनो प्रमुख national parties are competitive in आधुनिक Virginia.
The वर्जिनिया सामान्य Assembly is the oldest legislature in the पश्चिमी Hemisphere.
The राज्य सरकारी रै महरूम repeatedly क्रमित सबसे effective by the Pew Center on the राज्य.
it is अद्वितीय in कैसा it treats cities and काउंटी equally, manages local सड़कें, और prohibits इसके governors from serving consecutive शर्तें.
वर्जिनिया 's economy has अनेक sectors : कृषि in the Shenandoah Valley ; संघीय agencies in उत्तरी Virginia, including the headquarters of the विभाग of Defense and CIA ; and military सुविधाएं in हैम्पटन सड़कें, the site of the region 's प्रमुख seaport.
Virginia 's पब्लिक schools और many कॉलेजों and universities have contributed to growing मीडिया and technology सेक्टर.
As a result, computer चिप्स have become the state 's leading export.
खिड़कियाँ Movie मेकर ( formerly known as खिड़कियाँ सजीव फिल्म मेकर, codenamed sundance ) is a freeware video editing software by Microsoft.
It is a part of Windows Essentials software suite and offers the ability to बनाएँ and edit videos as well as to प्रकाशित उन्हें on SkyDrive, फेसबुक, youtube, and Flickr.
`` ब्रेंडा 's Got A Baby '' is the solo डेब्यू सिंगल by तुपाक shakur, and दसवाँ track इससे उसके डेब्यू एल्बम, 2Pacalypse Now.
the song, which features r & B singer Dave Hollister, is परिचय a twelve year-old girl named Brenda who जीवनदान in a ghetto, रै a baby, और is incapable of supporting it.
the सोंग explores the issue of teen गर्भावस्था and its effect on the young mothers and उनके परिवारों.
Like many of shakur 's गीतों, `` Brenda 's मिला a baby '' draws from the दुर्दशा of the impoverished.
using ब्रेंडा to represent यंग माताओं in general, Shakur criticises the कम स्तर of support from the baby 's पिता, the सरकारी, and समाज in सामान्य.
shakur लिखा the सोंग when he read a समाचारपत्र आलेख परिचय a twelve-year-old girl जो मिला गर्भवती from her cousin और, क्युकी वो did नहीं want उसके अभिभावक to जान about the baby, threw it in a कचरा can.
The official लोगो of पोकीमॉन लिये its international रिलीज ; `` पोकीमॉन '' is छोटी लिये the original Japanese शीर्षक of `` Pocket राक्षस ''.
is a मीडिया मताधिकार प्रकाशित और स्वामित्व by जापानी वीडियो game कम्पनी Nintendo and निर्मित by सातोशी Tajiri in 1996.
Originally released as a जोड़ी of interlinkable Game लड़के role-playing video खेल developed by Game Freak, पोकीमॉन has since become the second-most कामयाब और lucrative वीडियो game-based media franchise in the संसार, पीछे only निन्टेंडो 's अपना Mario मताधिकार.
पोकीमॉन properties have since been merchandised into दुश्मनी, manga, trading cards, toys, books, और अन्य media.
the franchise celebrated in 2006, और, cumulative बिक्री of the video खेल ( सहित home console संस्करण, ऐसे as the `` Pikachu '' Nintendo 64 ) have पहुँचे अधिक than 200 million copies.
In नवम्बर 2005, 4kids Entertainment, which had managed the non-game सम्बन्धित लाइसेंसिंग of पोकीमॉन, घोषित कि it था agreed नहीं to नवीनीकृत the Pokémon representation अनुबंध.
Pokémon यूएसए inc. ( अभी The पोकीमॉन Company International ), a subsidiary of Japan 's पोकीमॉन Co., अभी oversees all Pokémon licensing बाहर of Asia.
The name Pokémon is the romanized संकुचन of the जापानी brand.
The पद Pokémon, in addition to referring to the Pokémon मताधिकार itself, भी collectively refers to the 649 fictional प्रजाति कि have बना appearances in Pokémon media as of the रिलीज of the पांचवां generation शीर्षक Pokémon ब्लैक 2 and श्वेत 2 ; with the upcoming releases of पोकीमॉन X और Y, 6 नई Pokémon have महरूम प्रदर्शित in प्रचार for the games.
`` Pokémon '' is identical in दोनो the singular and plural, as is each व्यक्तिगत प्रजाति नाम ; it is grammatically सही to कह `` एक Pokémon '' और `` अनेक Pokémon '', as well as `` एक pikachu `` और `` अनेक pikachu ''.

दादा ( ) or Dadaism थी an art गति of the European avant-garde in the early 20th century.
Many अर्जी Dada began in Zurich, Switzerland in 1916, spreading to बर्लिन shortly thereafter लकिन the ऊँचाई of नई यॉर्क दादा was the year before in 1915.
to quote डोना budd 's The Language of Art ज्ञान, Dada was born out of negative reaction to the horrors of World War i.
This international गति थी begun by a समूह of कलाकार and कवियों associated साथ the कैबरे वोल्टेयर in Zurich.
Dada अस्वीकृत reason and लॉजिक, prizing बकवास, irrationality और अंतर्ज्ञान.
the origin of the name दादा is unclear ; some believe that it is a nonsensical word.
Others maintain कि it originates इससे the Romanian artists Tristan tzara और Marcel Janco 's frequent उपयोग of the शब्द da, da, अर्थ यस, यस in the Romanian language.
another सिद्धान्त says that the नाम `` Dada '' आए during a बैठक of the समूह when a paper चाकू stuck into a french-german शब्दकोष happened to पाइंट to 'डैडa ', a French शब्द लिये 'hobbyhorse '.
the movement primarily involved visual कला, literature, poetry, art manifestoes, आर्ट सिद्धान्त, theatre, और ग्राफिक design, and concentrated इसके anti-war politics through a rejection of the प्रचलित मानकों in art through anti-art cultural works.
in addition to being anti-war, दादा थी also anti- bourgeois and था political affinities साथ the कट्टरपंथी left.
दादा activities शामिल पब्लिक महफिलों, demonstrations, और प्रकाशन of art/literary जर्नल्स ; passionate कवरेज of आर्ट, राजनीती, and संस्कृति were विषय often discussed in a variety of मीडिया.
Key figures in the movement शामिल ह्यूगो बॉल, एमी hennings, Hans arp, Raoul hausmann, हन्ना Höch, Johannes baader, Tristan tzara, Francis Picabia, रिचर्ड huelsenbeck, Georg Grosz, जॉन heartfield, Marcel Duchamp, Beatrice लकडी, Kurt Schwitters, and Hans Richter, among others.
the movement influenced later शैलियाँ like the avant-garde और शहर म्यूज़िक आंदोलनों, और groups सहित surrealism, देवानंद réalisme, pop आर्ट and fluxus.
दादा is the groundwork to abstract आर्ट और ध्वनि poetry, a starting पाइंट लिये प्रदर्शन आर्ट, a prelude to postmodernism, an influence on पॉप art, a जश्न of antiart to be later embraced for anarcho-political uses in the 1960s और the movement कि lay the न्यास लिये surrealism.
First trophic level.
the पौधे in इस image, and the शैवाल and phytoplankton in the झील, are प्राथमिक producers.
They लो nutrients from the soil or the जल, और manufacture उनके own खाना by photosynthesis, using energy इससे the सूर्य.
the trophic स्तर of an सजीव is the स्थिति it occupies in a food chain.
The शब्द trophic derives इससे the यूनानी τροφή ( trophē ) referring to खाना or feeding.
a food कड़ी represents a उत्तराधिकार of organisms कि eat another सजीव और are, in turn, eaten themselves.
The क्रमांक of कदम an सजीव is from the प्रारंभ of the कड़ी is a measure of इसके trophic स्तर.
Food जंजीरों start at trophic स्तर 1 साथ primary निर्माता such as plants, मूव to herbivores at स्तर 2, परभक्षी at level 3 और typically finish with carnivores or apex predators at level 4 or 5.
The पाथ साथ the कड़ी can form either a one-way flow, or a खाना `` वेब. ''
Ecological communities with higher biodiversity form more complex trophic राहें.
चार of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण domesticated silk moths.

A silk-producing raspy क्रिकेट.
Silk is a natural प्रोटीन fibre, some फ़ॉर्म of जिससे can be woven into वस्त्र.
The protein fibre of रेशा is रचित mainly of fibroin और उत्पादित by निश्चित insect larvae to form cocoons.
the best-known type of silk is प्राप्त from the cocoons of the लार्वे of the शहतूत silkworm bombyx mori reared in captivity ( sericulture ).
The shimmering appearance of silk is due to the triangular prism -like ढांचा of the silk fibre, जिससे allows silk cloth to refract incoming light at अलग angles, thus producing different colors.
silks are उत्पादित by अनेक other कीट, लकिन generally तभी the silk of moth caterpillars has महरूम used लिये textile manufacturing.
There रै been some research into other silks, which differ at the आणविक स्तर.
अनेक silks are मुख्यतः produced by the लार्वे of insects undergoing पूरा metamorphosis, लकिन कुछ वयस्क कीट ऐसे as webspinners उपज silk, and some insects ऐसे as raspy crickets उपज रेशा throughout उनके जीवनदान.
Silk production भी occurs in Hymenoptera ( bees, wasps, and चींटियों ), silverfish, mayflies, thrips, leafhoppers, beetles, lacewings, fleas, flies and midges.
अन्य types of सन्धिपाद produce रेशा, most notably विभिन्न arachnids ऐसे as मकड़ियों ( देखिए मकड़ी रेशा ).
Late Show साथ David Letterman is an अमरीकी late-night talk दिखाएँ hosted by David लेटरमैन on CBS.
The दिखाएँ debuted on अगस्त 30, 1993, and is उत्पादित by लेटरमैन 's production कम्पनी, विश्वव्यापी पैंट Incorporated.
the show 's म्यूज़िक निदेशक और band-leader of the हाउस band, the CBS Orchestra, is Paul shaffer.
The head लेखक is Matt रॉबर्ट्स and the उद्घोषक is एलन Kalter.
Of the प्रमुख u.S. late-night कार्यक्रम, Late दिखाएँ ranks second in संचयी average दर्शक over time and third in क्रमांक of episodes over समय.
The दिखाएँ लीड अन्य लेट night shows in ad revenue साथ $ 271 million in 2009.
In सबसे u.S. markets the दिखाएँ airs at 11:35 p.m. eastern/pacific समय, but is अंकित Monday through बुधवार at 4:30 p.m., और Thursdays at 3:30 p.m और 6:00 p.m.
The दूसरी गुरुवार एपीसोड प्रायः airs on Friday of that सप्ताह.
In 2002, लेट दिखाएँ with David Letterman was क्रमित No. 7 on tv Guide 's 50 महानतम tv shows of सब Time.
सीबीएस रै a अनुबंध साथ विश्वव्यापी Pants to continue the दिखाएँ through 2014 ; by then, Letterman होगा surpass जॉनी Carson as the longest tenured late-night talk show host.
the Real Housewives of Orange काउंटी is an American reality documentary टेलीविज़न program on ब्रावो, set in नारंगी काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
it was the first The रियल housewives program in the series.
The श्रेणी is a voyeuristic look into the धनवान lives of ये housewives, as they shop, मिलेंगी plastic सर्जरी, gossip, fight और सजीव lavishly.
the financial crisis, the शुरूआत of which coincided लगभग exactly साथ the first season 's ब्रॉडकास्ट, रै since trimmed the housewives ' lifestyles साथ job नुकसान, evictions, बंधक defaults, foreclosures, और marital stress—all recorded in progressive सीज़न of the दिखाएँ.
cyberstalking is the उपयोग of the Internet or other इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अर्थात् to stalk or harass an व्यक्तिगत, a समूह of individuals, or an संगठन.
It may शामिल the making of गलत आरोपों or statements of fact ( as in defamation ), निगरानी, making threats, पहचान चोरी, damage to data or equipment, the solicitation of minors for sex, or gathering information कि may be used to harass.
the definition of `` उत्पीड़न '' must मिलें the मानदंड that a reasonable person, in कब्ज़ा of the same information, होता लिहाज़ it as sufficient to कारण another उचित person तकलीफ.
Cyberstalking is different from स्थानिक or ऑफ़लाइन stalking in कि it occurs through the use of electronic communications technology such as the internet.
however, it sometimes leads to it, or is accompanied by it.
Both are criminal offenses.
cyberstalking shares महत्वपूर्ण विशेषताएँ साथ offline stalking.
Many stalkers – online or off – हैं motivated by a ख्वाहिश to कंट्रोल उनके पीड़ितों.
A cyberstalker may be an ऑनलाइन stranger or a व्यक्ति whom the निशाना knows.
A cyberstalker may be anonymous and may solicit involvement of अन्य लोगों online जो do not even know the target.
cyberstalking is a criminal offense that आता into खेल under राज्य anti-stalking laws, बदनामी laws, और उत्पीड़न laws.
a cyberstalking conviction can परिणाम in a restraining अनुक्रम, probation, or even criminal penalties against the assailant, सहित कारावास.
a business अक्षर is usually used when लिखने from एक कम्पनी to another, or लिये पत्राचार between such संगठन और उनके ग्राहक, clients और other बाह्य पार्टियों.
The overall style of letter will depend on the relationship between the parties चिंतित.
वहीँ are अनेक reasons to लिखें a कारोबार अक्षर.
it could be to request direct information or action इससे another पार्टी, to अनुक्रम आपूर्तियाँ from a प्रदायक, to identify a mistake that was committed, to जवाब directly to a request, to apologize for a ग़लत or simply to convey goodwill.
भी आज, the business अक्षर is स्टिल बहुत उपयोगी क्युकी it produces a स्थाई रिकार्ड, is confidential, formal and delivers persuasive, well-considered messages.
tilapia ( ) is the आम name for nearly a hundred species of cichlid fish from the tilapiine cichlid जनजाति.
tilapia हैं mainly freshwater fish, inhabiting उथले स्ट्रीम, तालाबों, rivers and lakes, and कम commonly found living in brackish जल.
historically, they have महरूम of major महत्व in artisan फ़िशिंग in Africa और the Levant, and are of increasing महत्व in aquaculture.
tilapia can become समस्यापूर्ण invasive प्रजाति in new warm-water habitats, whether deliberately or accidentally introduced, लकिन generally not in शीतोष्ण climates due to उनके अक्षमता to जीवित in कूलर waters नीचे about.
टर्नर & Hooch is a 1989 कॉमेडी drama अपराधों film अभिनीत tom हैंक्स और Beasley the Dog as the eponymous वर्ण, Turner और hooch respectively.

it थी directed by Roger spottiswoode ; the फिल्मी थी originally slated to be निर्देशित by हेनरी winkler, but he थी terminated due to `` creative मतभेद ''.
It थी co-written by माइकल Blodgett इससे परे the घाटी of the डॉल fame.
Although k-9 ( with James belushi ) थी released prior to इस film ( exactly three months earlier ), टर्नर & hooch became more popular और seemingly overshadowed इसके greater success, even हालांकि k-9 had a बहुत similar प्लाट.
