एडोल्फ हिटलर ( ; 20 अप्रैल 1889 – 30 April 1945 ) was an Austrian -born जर्मनी politician and the नेता of the Nazi पार्टी ( ( NSDAP ) ; नेशनल समाजवादी जर्मनी Workers Party ).
He was chancellor of जर्मनी इससे 1933 to 1945 और तानाशाह of नाजी Germany ( as Führer und reichskanzler ) इससे 1934 to 1945.
हिटलर was at the centre of नाजी Germany, संसार युद्ध ii in यूरोपीय, and the Holocaust.
Hitler थी a सजा veteran of World युद्ध i.
he joined the German मजदूर ' Party ( precursor of the NSDAP ) in 1919, और became नेता of the nsdap in 1921.
in 1923, he attempted a coup d'état in म्यूनिख, ज्ञात as the Beer Hall Putsch.
the विफल coup resulted in Hitler 's imprisonment, दौरान जिससे समय he wrote his संस्मरण, mein Kampf ( my संघर्ष ).
After his release in 1924, हिटलर gained लोकप्रिय support by attacking the Treaty of versailles and promoting pan-germanism, antisemitism, and anti-communism साथ charismatic oratory and नाजी propaganda.
बाद उसके appointment as चांसलर in 1933, he transformed the Weimar गणतंत्र into the Third reich, a single-party dictatorship based on the totalitarian and autocratic ideology of नात्सीवाद.
हिटलर 's aim was to स्थापित a नई Order of absolute नाजी German hegemony in continental Europe.
To इस end, his विदेशी और domestic नीतियों had the उद्देश्य of seizing lebensraum ( `` living space '' ) लिये the Germanic लोगों.
he निर्देशित the rearmament of Germany and the आक्रमण of कैंडल by the wehrmacht in September 1939, resulting in the outbreak of World युद्ध II in Europe.
Under Hitler 's rule, in 1941 जर्मनी forces and their European allies occupied most of Europe and उत्तर Africa.
In 1943, जर्मनी था महरूम forced onto the defensive and suffered a श्रेणी of escalating defeats.
In the फाइनल days of the युद्ध, दौरान the बैटल of Berlin in 1945, Hitler married his long-time partner, एवा braun.
On 30 April 1945, less than two days बाद, the दो वचनबद्ध suicide to avoid capture by the रेड Army, और their corpses यहूद burned.
हिटलर 's aggressive foreign policy is माना the प्रमुख cause of the outbreak of World War II in यूरोपीय.
His antisemitic नीतियों and racially motivated विचारधारा resulted in the मौतों of at तनिक 5.5 million यहूदियों, and लाखो of अन्य people deemed racially अवर.

A डोमेन name is an पहचान string कि defines a realm of प्रशासनिक स्वायत्तता, प्राधिकार, or control on the Internet.
Domain names are formed by the rules और प्रक्रियाओं of the Domain Name System ( डीएनएस ).
Technically, any नाम पंजीकृत in the DNS is a domain नाम.
Domain names हैं प्रयुक्त in various networking contexts and application-specific नामकरण और addressing उद्देश्य.
In general, a डोमेन name represents an Internet प्रोटोकॉल ( ip ) संसाधन, ऐसे as a निजी computer used to access the अंतरजाल, a सर्वर computer hosting a वेब site, or the वेब साईट itself or any other service communicated via the अंतरजाल.
डोमेन names हैं organized in subordinate levels ( subdomains ) of the DNS रूट डोमेन, which is nameless.
the first-level set of डोमेन names हैं the top-level domains ( tlds ), सहित the जेनेरिक top-level domains ( gtlds ), ऐसे as the prominent डोमेन com, सूचना, net and org, and the देश कोड top-level डोमेन ( ccTLDs ).
Below ये top-level डोमेन in the डीएनएस पदानुक्रम हैं the second-level and third-level डोमेन names that हैं typically open लिये रिज़र्वेशन by end-users जो wish to कनेक्ट local क्षेत्रफल networks to the अंतरजाल, बनाएँ other publicly accessible अंतरजाल resources or run वेब साइट.
The registration of these डोमेन names is प्रायः administered by domain name registrars who बेचें their services to the पब्लिक.
A fully योग्य domain name ( FQDN ) is a domain नाम कि is completely specified in the पदानुक्रम of the डीएनएस, having no omitted parts.
डोमेन names are usually written in lowercase, हालांकि labels in the डोमेन नाम प्रणाली हैं case-insensitive.
नाइट्रेट is a polyatomic आयन with the आणविक formula no3− और a आणविक mass of 62.0049 g/mol. nitrates भी describe the सशुल्क functional समूह RONO2.
These nitrate esters हैं a specialized क्लास of विस्फोटक.

कृषि is a major industry in the संयुक्त States और the देश is a net exporter of food.
as of the last census of कृषि in 2007, there were 2.2 million खेतो, covering an क्षेत्रफल of, an average of प्रति फार्म.
हालांकि agricultural activity occurs in most states, it is particularly concentrated in the विशाल expanse of चपटा, arable land ज्ञात as the ग्रेट Plains, which encompasses the central प्रदेश of the nation.
the mpemba effect, नामित after Tanzanian छात्र Erasto Mpemba, is the assertion कि warmer water can freeze faster than colder जल.
हालांकि वहीँ is anecdotal support लिये the effect, there is no agreement on exactly कया the effect is and अंतर्गत what हालातों it occurs.
There have महरूम रिपोर्ट्स of समान phenomena since ancient times, although with insufficient विवरण लिये the दावा to be replicated.
the घटना seems contrary to ऊष्मागतिकी, लकिन a क्रमांक of संभावित explanations for the effect have महरूम प्रस्तावित.
further investigations होगा need to decide on a precise परिभाषा of `` freezing '' and control a विशाल क्रमांक of starting पैरामीटर्स in order to confirm or explain the effect.
the siamese (, ) is one of the पहला distinctly पहचाना breeds of Oriental बिल्ली.
the नस्ल originated in थाईलैंड ( formerly ज्ञात as सियाम ), जहाँ वे are एक of अनेक देशी breeds and are पुकारा wichian mat ( วิเชียรมาศ, a नाम अर्थ `` चंद्रमा डायमंड '' ).
in the 20th सदी the Siamese cat became one of the सबसे popular breeds in यूरोपीय और उत्तर अमेरिका.

in economics, the money सप्लाई or money stock, is the कुल amount of मौद्रिक assets उपलब्धियाँ in an अर्थव्यवस्था at a specific time.
वहीँ हैं अनेक ways to define `` धन, '' लकिन मानक measures प्रायः शामिल करेंसी in परिसंचरण और माँग जमा ( जमाकर्ताओं ' easily accessed assets on the books of financial संस्थानों ).
धन supply data are अंकित and प्रकाशित, प्रायः by the government or the central bank of the country.
पब्लिक और private सेक्टर विश्लेषकों have long monitored changes in money सप्लाई क्युकी of its effects on the price level, inflation, the एक्सचेंज रेट और the कारोबार cycle.
That संबंध between धन और prices is historically associated साथ the मात्रा सिद्धान्त of money.
वहीँ is दमदार अनुभवजन्य evidence of a direct संबंध between money-supply विकास and long-term दाम inflation, at least for रैपिड increases in the amount of धन in the economy.
कि is, a country such as ज़िम्बाब्वे which देखी rapid increases in इसके धन सप्लाई also saw रैपिड increases in prices ( hyperinflation ).
इस is one reason for the रिलायंस on monetary policy as a means of controlling महंगाई.
the nature of इस causal कड़ी is the विषय of contention.
Some शास्त economists argue that the धन सप्लाई is endogenous ( determined by the workings of the अर्थव्यवस्था, not by the सेंट्रल bank ) and कि the स्त्रोत of महंगाई जरूर be मिला in the distributional ढांचा of the अर्थव्यवस्था.
in जोड, those economists seeing the सेंट्रल बैंको 's कंट्रोल over the money supply as feeble कह कि वहीँ are दो कमजोर links between the विकास of the धन सप्लाई and the inflation रेट.
पहला, in the aftermath of a मंदी, when अनेक resources हैं underutilized, an बढ़ाएँ in the धन सप्लाई can कारण a sustained बढ़ाएँ in real उत्पादन बजाय of inflation.
Second, if the velocity of धन, i.e., the अनुपात between nominal GDP and धन supply, परिवर्तन, an बढ़ाएँ in the money सप्लाई could have either no प्रभाव, an अतिरंजित प्रभाव, or an unpredictable प्रभाव on the विकास of nominal GDP.

imax ( an abbreviation लिये चित्र अधिकतम ) is a गति picture फिल्मी format and a set of सिनेमा projection standards created by the कनाडाई company imax निगम.
IMAX has the capacity to रिकार्ड and प्रदर्शक बिंब of दूर greater size and रेज़ोल्यूशन than conventional फिल्मी प्रणालियों.
चूंकि 2002, कुछ feature films have been परिवर्तित ( or upgraded ) into imax स्वरूप for प्रदर्शक in imax थिएटर and कुछ have भी महरूम partially शॉट in imax.
IMAX is the सबसे widely used प्रणाली लिये special-venue फिल्मी प्रस्तुतियों.
, वहीँ are 697 imax थिएटर in 52 देशों.

It भी भागा on Nickelodeon and the Faith और Values Channel/Odyssey ( now the Hallmark Channel ) as खूब as many pbs stations throughout the संयुक्त States.

Many sequences लिये it यहूद shot at the Queen गली West and Yonge गली store बाद घंटों.
Constitutionalism, in its सबसे सामान्य अर्थ, is `` a complex of ideas, attitudes, और पैटर्न of behavior elaborating the principle कि the authority of government derives from और is सीमित by a देह of आधारभूत विधि ''.
A राजनैतिक organization is constitutional to the extent कि it `` contain [ s ] institutionalized mechanisms of शक्ति कंट्रोल for the सुरक्षा of the interests और liberties of the citizenry, including those that may be in the अल्पसंख्यक ``.
as वर्णित by political वैज्ञानिक और संवैधानिक विद्वान दाउद Fellman :
An ice-cream headache, also known as दिमाग freeze, cold-stimulus headache, or इसके दिए वैज्ञानिक नाम sphenopalatine ganglioneuralgia ( अर्थ `` nerve pain of the sphenopalatine गंडिका `` ), is a form of ब्रैड cranial pain or headache commonly संबद्ध with consumption ( particularly जल्दी consumption ) of cold beverages or भोजन ऐसे as बर्फ मलाई और बर्फ चबूतरे.
it is caused by having something ठंडा टच the roof of the मुँह ( तालु ), और is believed to परिणाम इससे a तंत्रिका जवाब causing रैपिड constriction और swelling of blood बरतन or a `` referring `` of pain इससे the roof of the मुँह to the head.
The रेट of intake for ठंडा भोजन रै been studied as a contributing फ़ैक्टर.
There are लोगों जो can नहीं अनुभव `` brain freeze '' or similar symptoms.
the term ice-cream सिरदर्द has been in use चूंकि at least 31 January 1937, contained in a journal entry by रेबेका timbres published in the 1939 किताब we किया n't ask यूटोपिया : a Quaker परिवार in Soviet रूस.
The first प्रकाशित use of the पद दिमाग फ्रीज, as it pertains to cold-induced headaches, थी on 27 May 1991.
`` auld Lang syne '' ( : note `` s '' rather than `` z '' ) is a स्कॉट्स poem लिखा by Robert Burns in 1788 और नियत to the धुन of a परंपरागत folk सोंग ( roud # 6294 ).
it is खूब ज्ञात in अनेक देशों, especially in the English-speaking संसार ; its traditional उपयोग होने to celebrate the start of the नई Year at the stroke of मध्यरात्रि.
by एक्सटेंशन, it is also सुंग at funerals, graduations और as a विदाई or समाप्ति to other अवसरों.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय Boy स्काउट युवावस्था movement, in many countries, uses it as a close to jamborees और other कृत्यों.
The सोंग 's Scots title may be अनूदित into English वस्तुतः as `` बूढ़ा long चूंकि '', or अधिक idiomatically, `` long long पहले '', `` days gone by '' or `` बूढ़ा times ''.
Consequently `` लिये auld लैंग syne '', as it appears in the first line of the chorus, might be loosely अनूदित as `` for ( the खातिर of ) बूढ़ा टाइम्स ''.
the phrase `` Auld लैंग syne '' is भी प्रयुक्त in similar कविताएं by रॉबर्ट ayton ( 1570–1638 ), allan Ramsay ( 1686–1757 ), और जेम्स वाटसन ( 1711 ) as well as older लोक songs predating burns.
मैथ्यू Fitt uses the phrase `` In the दिनों of auld lang syne '' as the equivalent of `` Once upon a time...
`` in उसके retelling of fairy किस्से in the स्कॉट्स भाषा.
Ben schulz, player of Leeroy Jenkins at BlizzCon 2007
leeroy Jenkins, sometimes misspelled लेरॉय जेनकींस और often elongated with numerous additional अक्षर, is an Internet मीम नामित लिये a player अक्षर created by Ben Schulz in blizzard entertainment 's MMORPG, संसार of Warcraft.
the अक्षर became popular due to a वीडियो of the खेल कि परिचालित around the अंतरजाल.
The घटना रै since स्प्रेड beyond the सीमाएँ of the gaming community into other online और मुख्यधारा media.
ऑस्कर Grant थी fatally shot by बार्ट police officer Johannes Mehserle in Oakland, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, संयुक्त States, in the जल्दी morning hours of नई साल 's Day 2009.
responding to reports of a fight on a crowded Bay Area Rapid पारगमन train returning इससे सैन फ्रांसिस्को, BART Police अधिकारियों detained Oscar ग्रान्ट और अनेक अन्य यात्री on the platform at the fruitvale BART Station.
Officer योहानेस mehserle and another अधिकारी यहूद restraining Grant, who थी prostrate और allegedly resisting arrest.
अधिकारी Mehserle stood and, according to गवाह, said : `` Get back, I 'm gon na tase उसे. ''
Then mehserle खींचा उसके गन and शॉट ग्रान्ट एकबार in the वापस ; Mehserle appeared दंग, put his हैंड्स to उसके head and exclaimed, `` Oh, my परमेश्वर ! ''
During उसके court testimony, Mehserle कहा कि ग्रान्ट तब exclaimed, `` तुम shot me ! ''
Grant turned आउट to be निहत्थे ; he was सुनाया मुर्दे the अगला morning at Highland Hospital in ओकलैंड.
the events यहूद captured on multiple digital वीडियो and cell फोन कैमरे.
the फुटेज was disseminated to media आउटलेट और to various websites, where it was देखी millions of times.
the following days देखी दोनो peaceful और violent protests.
the शूटिंग has been variously labeled an involuntary manslaughter and a सारांश निष्पादन.
on January 13, alameda County prosecutors charged Mehserle with हत्या लिये the शूटिंग.
he resigned his position और pleaded नहीं guilty.
the विचारण began on जून 10, 2010.
Michael rains, Mehserle 's criminal रक्षा attorney, argued कि Mehserle mistakenly shot ग्रान्ट with his पिस्टल, intending to उपयोग his Taser जब he saw ग्रान्ट reaching लिये his waistband.
Pretrial filings argue कि his क्लाएंट did नहीं कमिट first-degree murder और पूछा a लॉस Angeles न्यायधीश to instruct the jury to सीमा its deliberations to either second-degree murder or acquittal.
Oakland civil rights attorney जॉन burris filed a $ 25 लाख wrongful मौत अर्जी विरूद्ध बार्ट on behalf of Grant 's परिवार.
on July 8, 2010, the जूरी returned its verdict : mehserle थी मिला guilty of involuntary manslaughter और नहीं guilty of second-degree murder and voluntary manslaughter.
Initial protests विरूद्ध the सत्ताधारी were शांतिपूर्वक organized ; looting, arson, destruction of property, और छोटी दंगे broke out बाद dark.
nearly 80 people यहूद आखिरकार गिरफ्तार.
On शुक्रवार, जुलाई 9, 2010, the u.S. Justice विभाग opened a civil अधिकारों case विरूद्ध mehserle ; the federal government can prosecute him independently for the वही act अंतर्गत the separate अधिपति एक्सेप्शन to double jeopardy.
the Department of Justice होगा be working साथ the U.S. attorney 's office in San फ्रांसिस्को और the FBI.
on नवम्बर 5, 2010, Mehserle थी sentenced to दो years, ऋण समय परोसा.
he परोसा उसके समय in the लॉस एंजिल्स काउंटी Jail, occupying a private cell away from अन्य बंदियों.
He थी released on June 13, 2011 and is अभी on पैरोल.
Major representatives of the Harlem पुनर्जागरण.
the हार्लेम Renaissance थी a cultural movement कि spanned the 1920s.
at the समय, it थी ज्ञात as the `` नई नीग्रो Movement '', named after the 1925 anthology by alain locke.
Though it थी केन्द्रित in the Harlem पड़ोस of New यॉर्क City, many french-speaking black लेखक from अफ़्रीकी and caribbean colonies who जिया in पेरिस were भी influenced by the Harlem पुनर्जागरण.
the हार्लेम Renaissance is unofficially recognized to have spanned इससे about 1919 जबतक the जल्दी or mid-1930s.
Many of इसके ideas जिया on much longer.
The zenith of this `` flowering of Negro साहित्य '', as James weldon जॉनसन पसन्दीदा to call the Harlem पुनर्जागरण, was placed between 1924 ( the year that अवसर : a जर्नल of Negro जीवन hosted a party लिये ब्लैक लेखक जहाँ many white publishers यहूद in उपस्थिति ) और 1929 ( the साल of the भण्डार मार्केट crash और the beginning of the Great अवसाद ).

The इतिहास of Africa begins with the prehistory of अफ़्रीकी और the emergence of होमो sapiens in ईस्ट अफ़्रीकी, continuing into the present as a patchwork of diverse and politically विकासशील स्वदेश states.
Some जल्दी प्रमाण of agriculture in Africa dates इससे 16,000 bce, और metallurgy from परिचय 4000 bce.
the अंकित history of early civilization arose in Egypt, और later in Nubia, the Maghreb और the Horn of Africa.
During the Middle आयु, islam spread through the regions.
Crossing the मग़रिब and the Sahel, a major center of Muslim संस्कृति was Timbuktu.
कुछ notable pre-colonial राज्य और समाजों in Africa शामिल the nok संस्कृति, माली साम्राज्य, ashanti साम्राज्य, Kingdom of Mapungubwe, किंगडम of ज्या, Kingdom of Saloum, किंगडम of baol, Kingdom of ज़िम्बाब्वे, Kingdom of Kongo, Ancient कार्थेज, numidia, mauretania, the अकसूमी साम्राज्य, the ajuuraan राज्य और the Adal Sultanate.
इससे the लेट 15th सदी, europeans and Arabs took slaves इससे West, सेंट्रल and Southeast Africa overseas in the African slave व्यापार.
यूरोपीय colonization of अफ़्रीकी developed rapidly in the हाथापाई लिये अफ़्रीकी of the लेट 19th और जल्दी 20th सदियां.
Following struggles for स्वतंत्रता in many भाग of the महाद्वीप, as खूब as a weakened यूरोपीय बाद the दूसरी World War ; decolonization took place.
अफ़्रीकी 's history has been challenging लिये researchers in the field of African अध्ययन क्युकी of the किल्लत of लिखा sources in विशाल भाग of sub-saharan अफ़्रीकी.
scholarly techniques ऐसे as the रिकॉर्डिंग of मौखिक history, ऐतिहासिक linguistics, archaeology और genetics have been निर्णायक.
curry फोली थी the first player in प्रमुख League बेसबॉल history to hit लिये the cycle.
in baseball, hitting for the साईकिल is the accomplishment of one batter hitting a single, a दोगुना, a triple, and a home चलाएं in the same game.
Collecting the hits in that अनुक्रम is known as a `` natural साईकिल ''.
चक्र are uncommon in प्रमुख League Baseball ( MLB ), and have occurred 294 times चूंकि the first by curry फोली in 1882.
The cycle is roughly as आम as a no-hitter ( 279 आवृत्ति in एमएलबी इतिहास ) ; it रै महरूम पुकारा `` एक of the rarest '' and `` most difficult feats '' in baseball.
आधारित on 2009 अप्रिय स्तर, the संभाव्यता of an average MLB खिलाड़ी hitting for a साईकिल विरूद्ध an औसत टोली in a game is approximately 0.00590 % ; इस corresponds to about 2.5 cycles in a 162-game ऋतु साथ 30 टीमों.
In other बेसबॉल leagues, the cycle is हासिल less frequently.
through September 4, 2008, 62 खिलाड़ी in निप्पन Professional बेसबॉल ( npb ), the top-level baseball organization in जापानी, have hit लिये the साईकिल, the सबसे recent being michihiro ogasawara.
दो players have hit लिये the साईकिल on the same दिन once in NPB इतिहास ; this रै occurred twice in MLB इतिहास.
One npb खिलाड़ी has भी hit for the cycle in an npb all-star खेल.
No खिलाड़ी रै कभी hit for the साईकिल in the MLB all-star खेल or the postseason.
The main स्लेव रूट in medieval अफ़्रीकी.
इस article discusses प्रणालियों, history, और प्रभाव of slavery within Africa.
See अरब slave व्यापार, Atlantic स्लेव trade, Maafa, और गुलामी in contemporary अफ़्रीकी लिये other चर्चाएँ.
`` स्लेव हस्तांतरण in अफ़्रीकी ''.
europeans usually did not डालें the आंतरिक regions.
Slavery in अफ़्रीकी रै existed throughout the महाद्वीप for अनेक centuries, और continues in the वर्तमान day.
Systems of servitude और slavery were आम in अनेक parts of the महाद्वीप, as they were in much of the प्राचीन world.
In सबसे अफ़्रीकी societies where slavery थी प्रचलित, the enslaved लोगों were largely treated as indentured बन्दों and not treated as chattel स्लेव.
When the अरब स्लेव trade and Atlantic slave trade began, many of the local slave systems changed and began supplying captives for स्लेव बाज़ार बाहर of Africa.
गुलामी in ऐतिहासिक Africa was practiced in अनेक different forms और कुछ of these do नहीं clearly fit the परिभाषाएं of slavery elsewhere in the संसार.
Debt slavery, enslavement of युद्ध captives, सैन्य गुलामी, और criminal slavery were all practiced in various भाग of Africa.
Although there had महरूम कुछ trans-saharan trade from the आंतरिक of sub-saharan Africa to अन्य regions, गुलामी थी a छोटी part of the economic जीवन of अनेक societies in Africa जबतक the introduction of transcontinental slave trades ( अरब और अटलांटिक ).
स्लेव practices यहूद again रूपांतरित with यूरोपीय colonization of Africa और the formal abolition of गुलामी in the early 1900s.
खिड़कियाँ कार्य मैनेजर is a task मैनेजर or प्रणाली मॉनिटर अनुप्रयोग शामिल साथ the Microsoft खिड़कियाँ NT family of ऑपरेटिंग systems कि provides सीमित information परिचय computer प्रदर्शन and running अनुप्रयोग, प्रक्रियाओं and CPU उपयोग, commit charge and memory information, संजाल activity and statistics, logged-in उपयोक्ता, and प्रणाली सेवाएं ( and as प्रायः is the मामला साथ software tools provided by Microsoft for Windows, 3rd पार्टी तन्त्र is उपलब्धियाँ which fills the आवश्यकताएँ more thoroughly, e.g, `` Process एक्सप्लोरर '', `` विस्तारित कार्य मैनेजर '', `` Anvir कार्य Manager '', `` Process Hacker '', and `` System Explorer '' ).
the कार्य Manager can भी be used to नियत process priorities, प्रोसेसर affinity, forcibly terminate प्रक्रियाओं, और shut down, restart, hibernate or log बंद इससे Windows.
खिड़कियाँ कार्य Manager थी introduced साथ खिड़कियाँ NT 4.0.
पिछला versions of Windows NT शामिल the Task सूची application, जिससे had far कम सुविधाएँ.
the task list थी capable of लिस्टिंग फिलहाल कार्यशील प्रक्रियाओं और killing them, or बनाना a नई प्रक्रम.
In खिड़कियाँ XP only, a shutdown मेनू is भी present कि allows access to Standby, Hibernate, Turn off, restart, Log बंद and Switch उपयोक्ता.
Earlier versions of Microsoft खिड़कियाँ ( Microsoft खिड़कियाँ 3.x, खिड़कियाँ 95, खिड़कियाँ 98 ) had a कार्यक्रम ज्ञात as tasks to प्रदर्शक the programs currently कार्यशील.
This संचिका was चलाया by running the taskman.exe संचिका इससे the C : \Windows directory.
the Troop is an american-canadian live-action, single कैमरा comedy -adventure टेलीविज़न श्रेणी परिचय a तिकड़ी of teenagers who लड़ो and capture monsters और अन्य अलौकिक phenomena that invade the fictional कस्बा of lakewood.
Created और कार्यपालिका उत्पादित by अधिकतम Burnett, ग्रेग कूलिज and Chris Morgan, the श्रेणी premiered on निकलोडियन on सितंबर 18, 2009.
the दूसरी season premiered on June 25, 2011 and निकलोडियन cancelled the श्रेणी मिडवे through it 's second ऋतु.
The बाकी एपीसोड of ऋतु 2 यहूद aired on Nicktoons मगर the पिछला 3..
Sparsely populated in संबंध to इसके क्षेत्रफल, the Democratic Republic of the कांगो ( drc ) is home to a vast संभावित of प्राकृतिक संसाधन और mineral माल, its untapped जमा of कच्चा minerals हैं estimated to be लायक in excess of us $ 24 trillion, yet the अर्थव्यवस्था of the drc रै अस्वीकृत drastically चूंकि the mid-1980s.
at the time of इसके independence in 1960, drc was the second most industrialized देश in Africa बाद South अफ़्रीकी ; it boasted a thriving खनन सेक्टर और इसके agriculture sector थी अपेक्षाकृत उत्पादक.
If the viewer stares at this image for 20–60 seconds और stares at a श्वेत object, a negative afterimage will appear ( in इस case, it होगा be क्यान on magenta ).
इस can also be हासिल by the दर्शक closing his/her आँखें और tilting उनके head up.
an afterimage or ghost चित्र or चित्र burn-in is an optical illusion कि refers to an चित्र continuing to appear in एक 's दृष्टि after the एक्सपोज़र to the असली चित्र has ceased.
एक of the most common afterimages is the bright glow that seems to float पहले one 's आँखें बाद looking into a लाइट source for a few सेकेंड.
closing the eye can सहायता achieve a better भाव of the रंग in इसके own aspect.
afterimages come in दो forms, ऋणात्मक ( inverted ) and धनात्मक ( retaining असली रंग ).
the process पीछे धनात्मक afterimages is unknown, हालांकि विचार to be सम्बन्धित to neural अनुकूलन.
on the अन्य hand, negative afterimages are a retinal घटना and हैं खूब समझा.
Lost is an American serial नाटक टेलीविज़न श्रेणी कि premiered on सितंबर 22, 2004 on the American Broadcasting कम्पनी ( ABC ).
the series was निर्मित by J. J. Abrams और डैमन lindelof, based upon an असली pilot स्क्रिप्ट titled Nowhere लिखा by Jeffrey lieber.
छह सीज़न of the show aired, in जोड to numerous काटें shows to पूर्वावलोकन previous episodes.
एबीसी घोषित कि खोया होता समाप्त after six सीज़न, having उत्पादित a total of 121 episodes.
The श्रेणी फ़ॉलो the पास्ट, उपस्थित, और future experience ( s ) of the survivors of a plane crash on a यात्री jet, Oceanic उड़ान 815, flying इससे सिडनी to Los एंजिल्स after it क्रैश on a tropical द्वीप in the South प्रशांत.
The श्रेणी also includes कहानियां of the lives of people already living on the island — वे include the `` अन्य ``, who initially antagonize the survivors, as खूब as a group of people जो arrive on the freighter kahana.
प्रत्येक episode typically सुविधाएँ कार्रवाई on the द्वीप as well as a द्वितीयक कथानक from another पाइंट in a character 's life.
Season 6 features a detailing of the lives of the survivors in a अलग reality, as if the उड़ान had never क्रैश.
in the following सूची, the पद `` प्रदर्शित character ( s ) '' refers to the अक्षर or characters जो are featured in the द्वितीयक storyline of प्रत्येक episode.
`` No.
in श्रेणी '' refers to the एपीसोड 's number in the overall series, whereas `` No.
in season '' refers to the episode 's क्रमांक in प्रत्येक particular season.
`` U.S. viewers ( लाख ) '' refers to the number of Americans in लाखो who देखी the एपीसोड सजीव.
a कुल of 121 एपीसोड of Lost यहूद उत्पादित, the पिछला of which aired on May 23, 2010.
सब सीज़न are available on DVD in regions 1–4 and on blu-ray in Regions a and B.
Flat feet ( भी called pes planus or गिरे arches ) is a औपचारिक सन्दर्भ to a medical condition in जिससे the मेहराब of the पैर collapses, साथ the संपूर्ण एकमात्र of the foot coming into complete or near-complete सम्पर्क with the मैदान.
In some individuals ( an estimated 20–30 % of the general जनसांख्यिकी ) the मेहराब simply never develops in एक foot ( unilaterally ) or दोनो feet ( bilaterally ).
Three अध्ययन ( देखिए citations नीचे in सैन्य section ) of सैन्य रंगरूटों have shown no evidence of बाद increased चोट, or foot problems, due to flat feet, in a जनसांख्यिकी of people जो reach सैन्य service आयु without prior foot problems.
However, ये अध्ययन can not be प्रयुक्त to judge possible भविष्य क्षति from this कंडीशन when diagnosed at younger आयु.
वे भी can not be applied to व्यक्तियों जिनकी flat फीट हैं संबद्ध साथ पैर symptoms, or निश्चित लक्षण in other parts of the देह ( ऐसे as the लेग or back ) possibly referable to the पैर.
Generation X, commonly abbreviated to gen x, is the पीढी born after the Western post-world युद्ध ii baby बूम.
demographers, historians and टीकाकारों उपयोग beginning जनम dates इससे the जल्दी 1960s to the जल्दी 1980s.
the term थी popularized by डगलस Coupland 's 1991 novel पीढी x : किस्से लिये an Accelerated Culture.
Before that, it had been used for विभिन्न subcultures or countercultures बाद the 1950s.
दबाव ulcers, भी known as decubitus ulcers or bedsores, हैं localized injuries to the skin and/or underlying tissue प्रायः over a बोनी prominence, as a परिणाम of दबाव, or दबाव in संयोजन साथ shear and/or घर्षण.
Most commonly this will be the sacrum, coccyx, heels or the कूल्हों, but अन्य sites such as the elbows, knees, ankles or the वापस of the cranium can be प्रभावित.
The कारण of pressure ulcers is pressure लागू to soft tissue so that blood प्रवाह to the soft ऊतक is completely or partially obstructed.
shear is भी a cause ; shear खींचता on रक्त vessels that फीड the स्किन.
दबाव छाले सबसे commonly develop in व्यक्तियों who are not चलती परिचय or हैं confined to wheelchairs.
It is widely believed कि other कारकों can influence the tolerance of स्किन for pressure and shear thereby increasing the risk of pressure अल्सर विकास.
These factors हैं protein-calorie कुपोषण, microclimate ( स्किन wetness caused by sweating or incontinence ), रोगों कि reduce रक्त प्रवाह to the skin, ऐसे as arteriosclerosis or diseases कि reduce the अहसास in the skin, such as paralysis or neuropathy.
the healing of दबाव ulcers may be slowed by the आयु of the person, चिकित्सा शर्तें ( such as arteriosclerosis, मधुमेह or संक्रमण ), smoking or medications such as antiinflammatory दवाएँ.
हालांकि often prevented और treatable if मिला early, दबाव ulcers can be बहुत difficult to prevent in critically बीमार मरीजों, frail elders, व्हीलचेयर उपयोक्ता ( especially जहाँ स्पाइनल चोट is involved ) and terminally बीमार patients.
प्राथमिक रोकथाम is to redistribute दबाव by turning the रोगी regularly.
The लाभ of turning to avoid further sores is खूब प्रलेखित since at तनिक the 19th century.
in जोड to turning और re-positioning the patient in bed or व्हीलचेयर, खाने a balanced diet with पर्याप्त प्रोटीन and keeping the स्किन फ़्री from exposure to urine and स्टूल is very महत्वपूर्ण.
the prevalence of pressure छाले in hospital जमावट is ऊँची, लकिन सुधार are होने बना.
According to the 2010 ipup ( International दबाव अल्सर व्यापकता Survey ) conducted in कनाडा, वहीँ was a significant decrease in the overall facility-acquired व्यापकता of pressure छाले इससे 2009-2010.
छाले यहूद most commonly पहचाना at the sacral/coccyx ulcer location ; however, heel छाले were the most common facility-acquired स्थान in the survey.

Green Bay is a नगर in और the काउंटी सीट of भूरा County in the u.S. राज्य of Wisconsin, स्तिथ at the head of Green खाड़ी, a sub-basin of झील Michigan, at the mouth of the Fox नदी.
It रै an elevation of ऊपर समुद्र स्तर और is स्तिथ उत्तर of मिल्वौकी.
the जनसांख्यिकी थी 104,057 at the 2010 census.
it is the third-largest नगर in the state of Wisconsin, बाद मिल्वौकी and Madison.
It is भी the third-largest city on the वेस्ट shore of झील Michigan, after Chicago और मिल्वौकी.
ग्रीन खाड़ी is घर to the Green Bay Packers of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल League, making it by far the smallest metropolitan area in the यूएसए to मेजबान a major professional sports मताधिकार.
ग्रीन खाड़ी is the principal नगर of the ग्रीन खाड़ी Metropolitan Statistical Area, जिससे covers भूरा, kewaunee, and Oconto काउंटी और था a संयुक्त population of 282,599 at the 2000 census.
Green खाड़ी is an औद्योगिक नगर साथ several meatpacking and पेपर पौधे, और a बंदरगाहों on Green खाड़ी, an भुजा of झील मिशिगन कि locals कॉल the खाड़ी of Green खाड़ी, to avoid conflating it साथ the eponymous नगर.

Luteinizing hormone ( lh, also known as lutropin और sometimes lutrophin ) is a hormone produced by gonadotroph कोशिकाएं in the anterior pituitary ग्रंथि.
In महिलाओं, an अधि वृद्धि of LH ( `` LH surge '' ) triggers ovulation and development of the कॉर्पस luteum.
in males, जहाँ lh had also been पुकारा interstitial cell-stimulating hormone ( ICSH ), it stimulates leydig कोशिका उत्पादन of testosterone.
It अधिनियमों synergistically with FSH.
सेलिना quintanilla-pérez ( April 16, 1971 – March 31, 1995 ), known simply as सेलिना, was an अमरीकी singer-songwriter.
वो थी named the `` शीर्ष लैटिन कलाकार of the '90s '' and `` बेहतरीन selling लैटिन artist of the decade '' by बिलबोर्ड for उसके fourteen top-ten singles in the Top लैटिन Songs chart, सहित सात number-one hits.
Selena had the most successful singles of 1994 and 1995, `` amor prohibido `` and `` no me queda Más ``.
She was पुकारा `` The महारानी of tejano music `` और the Mexican समतुल्य of Madonna.
Selena released उसके first album, सेलिना y लॉस dinos, at the आयु of twelve.
She जीती मादा Vocalist of the Year at the 1987 Tejano Music पुरस्कार and landed a recording contract साथ EMI a few years बाद.
उसके कीर्ति grew throughout the early 1990s, विशेषकर in spanish-speaking countries, and वो had begun recording in English as खूब.
Selena was murdered at the age of 23 on कूच 31, 1995 by Yolanda saldívar, the former president of उसके fan club.
On April 12, 1995, two सप्ताह बाद उसके मौत, George W. Bush, राज्यपाल of टेक्सास at the समय, declared her birthday `` Selena Day '' in टेक्सास.
Warner Bros. produced सेलिना, a film based on her life starring जेनिफर लोपेज़, in 1997.
Selena 's life थी also the basis of the musical Selena Forever starring Veronica Vazquez as सेलिना.
In June 2006 Selena was commemorated साथ a life-sized bronze statue ( Mirador de la flor in कॉर्पस Christi, Texas ) and a Selena संग्रहालय opened वहीँ.
She रै बेची over 60 million एल्बम worldwide, बनाना her एक of the best-selling artists of all समय.
वो is also the तभी female artist to have पाँच एल्बम in U.S. बिलबोर्ड 200 at the same time.
German stahlhelm इससे संसार युद्ध ii
तमगा of the Bolivian फौज Colorados regiment, प्रर्दशित a Stahlhelm और two crossed bayonets
stahlhelm ( plural, stahlhelme ) is German for `` स्टील हेल्मेट ''.
the Imperial जर्मनी फौज began to बदलें the traditional boiled-leather Pickelhaube ( spiked combat helmet ) साथ the Stahlhelm दौरान World युद्ध I in 1916.
The term stahlhelm refers both to a generic स्टील helmet, और अधिक specifically to the distinctive ( and iconic ) German डिज़ाइन.
The Stahlhelm, with इसके distinctive `` coal scuttle `` आकार, थी an तुरन्त recognizable प्रतीक लिये सैन्य imagery और became a common तत्व of military प्रचार on both पहलू, just जैसे the pickelhaube पहले it.
Its name थी also प्रयुक्त by the Stahlhelm, a अर्धसैनिक nationalist संगठन established at the समाप्त of 1918.
Glow-in-the-dark may refer to:
Bioluminescence, the उत्पादन और उत्सर्जन of light by a जीना सजीव
chemiluminescence, is the emission of लाइट ( संदीप्ति ) without उत्सर्जन of ऊष्मा
स्फुरदीप्ति, a विशिष्ट type of photoluminescence सम्बन्धित to प्रतिदीप्ति
Radioluminescence, उत्पादन of luminescence in a सामग्री by the बमबारी of आयनकारी विकिरण

Frankfurt विमानक्षेत्र serves as a hub नगर for लुफ़्थान्सा and receives फ़्लाइट इससे Star गठबंधन वाहक.
Airline hubs हैं airports क्रमित as large, medium, छोटी, और non-hubs as one of the FAA airport categories which हैं re-evaluated प्रत्येक साल आधारित on number of वाणिज्यिक passengers.
The अधिक common but informal उपयोग for the phrase airline हब is an विमानक्षेत्र कि an airline उपयोग as a transfer point to मिलेंगी यात्री to their intended destination.
It is भाग of a hub and spoke model, where travelers moving between airports नहीं परोसा by direct flights change planes en रूट to उनके गंतव्यों.
इस is as opposed to the Point to पाइंट model.
Many hubs of the airlines हैं भी situated at airports in the cities of the संबंधित head offices.
Some airlines may उपयोग only a single हब, while other एयरलाइंस use अनेक hubs.
hubs हैं used लिये दोनो passenger फ़्लाइट as खूब as कार्गो फ़्लाइट.
अनेक airlines भी उपयोग focus शहरों, which function much the same as hubs.
एयरलाइंस may also उपयोग secondary hubs, a non-technical term for विशाल फ़ोकस cities.
a हब in the मध्य of a रूट is more प्रभावी than at either समाप्त as connecting ट्रैफ़िक अधिक easily भरता the प्लेन - यात्री prefer a one-stop ( two-leg ) रूट over a two-stop ( three-leg ) रूट.

Site of the Menelaion, the shrine to हेलेन and menelaus constructed anciently in the Bronze आयु नगर that stood on the hill of therapne on the left बैंको of the Eurotas River overlooking the future site of डोरियन स्पार्टा.

Sparta ( Doric यूनानी : ; अटारी यूनानी : ), or Lacedaemon, थी a prominent city-state in प्राचीन Greece, situated on the banks of the eurotas River in Laconia, in south-eastern पेलोपोनीज़.
it emerged as a राजनैतिक एंटिटी around the 10th सदी BC, जब the आक्रमणकारी Dorians subjugated the लोकल, non-Dorian population.
Around 650 BC, it rose to become the dominant military land-power in ancient Greece.
Given its सैन्य pre-eminence, Sparta was recognized as the overall नेता of the संयुक्त Greek forces during the Greco-Persian युद्धों.
between 431 और 404 bc, Sparta थी the principal enemy of Athens दौरान the peloponnesian युद्ध, इससे जिससे it emerged victorious, though at great cost.
स्पार्टा 's शिकस्त by thebes in the बैटल of Leuctra in 371 BC ended Sparta 's prominent role in Greece.
however, it कायम इसके political independence until the Roman conquest of यूनानियों in 146 bc.
it then underwent a long period of मनाही, especially in the मध्य Ages, जब अनेक Spartans moved to live in Mystras.
Modern स्पार्टा is the capital of the यूनानी regional ईकाई of Laconia and a बीच for the processing of goods such as citrus and olives.
Sparta was unique in प्राचीन Greece लिये इसके सोशल system and constitution, जिससे completely केन्द्रित on military प्रशिक्षण and excellence.
Its inhabitants यहूद classified as Spartiates ( Spartan नागरिकों, जो enjoyed पूरा rights ), Mothakes ( non-spartan free मेन raised as spartans ), Perioikoi ( freedmen ), and helots ( state-owned serfs, enslaved non-Spartan local जनसांख्यिकी ).
Spartiates underwent the कठोर agoge प्रशिक्षण and शिक्षा regimen, and Spartan phalanges यहूद widely considered to be among the best in battle.
spartan women enjoyed considerably more अधिकारों and equality to men than elsewhere in the शास्त्रीय world.
स्पार्टा was the subject of fascination in इसके own day, as खूब as in the West following the पुनरुद्धार of शास्त्रीय learning.
इस love or admiration of Sparta is known as Laconism or laconophilia.
काल्पनिक football is an इंटरैक्टिव प्रतियोगिता in which उपयोक्ता compete विरूद्ध each अन्य as सामान्य प्रबंधक of virtual टीमों.
The खिलाड़ी कि an individual is समर्थ to manage are professional American football खिलाड़ी in the National फ़ुटबॉल League.
the अलग actions people are समर्थ to make हैं drafting, trading, adding or छोड़ने players, and बदलना rosters.
Due to the growth of the अंतरजाल, काल्पनिक football रै vastly increased in लोकप्रियता, particularly because Fantasy फ़ुटबॉल providers such as ESPN, याहू, CBS, and the NFL itself are समर्थ to रखना track of आंकडे entirely online, eliminating the need to check बक्सा स्कोर और newspapers regularly to रखना track of players.
Most लीग have a single सप्ताह championship in Week 16 of the एनएफएल ऋतु.
संसार population estimates from 1800 to 2100, based on UN 2010 projections ( red, orange, green ) and us जनसांख्यिकी Bureau historical estimates ( ब्लैक ).
वास्तविक अंकित population figures are in blue.
According to the highest estimate, the world जनसांख्यिकी may rise to 16 billion by 2100 ; according to the न्यूनतम अनुमान, it may मनाही to 6 अरब.
The world population is the कुल क्रमांक of जीना humans on Earth.
As of today, it is अनुमानित to number billion by the संयुक्त States जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ( uscb ).
The USCB estimates that the संसार जनसांख्यिकी exceeded 7 अरब on कूच 12, 2012.
According to a पृथक अनुमान by the United Nations Population निधि, it पहुँचे this पड़ाव on October 31, 2011.
The संसार जनसांख्यिकी has अनुभवी continuous growth चूंकि the समाप्त of the ग्रेट Famine and the Black मौत in 1350, जब it stood at around 370 लाख.
the उच्चतम दरों of growth – वैश्विक population increases ऊपर 1.8 % per साल – were seen briefly during the 1950s, और लिये a longer काल during the 1960s and 1970s.
The विकास rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, and था अस्वीकृत to 1.1 % by 2011.
कुल सालाना births यहूद highest in the लेट 1980s at परिचय 138 million, और हैं now अपेक्षित to remain essentially निरंतर at उनके 2011 स्तर of 134 million, while deaths क्रमांक 56 million per साल, और हैं अपेक्षित to बढ़ाएँ to 80 लाख per year by 2040.
Current projections show a जारी बढ़ाएँ in population in the निकट future ( लकिन a स्थिर decline in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट ), साथ the वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates भविष्यवाणी further growth, stagnation, or भी overall मनाही in the global population by 2150.
Some विश्लेषकों have questioned the स्थिरता of further संसार population विकास, citing the growing pressures on the पर्यावरण, वैश्विक खाना आपूर्तियाँ, और energy resources.
skeletal muscles होमो sapiens
इस is a तालिका of muscles of the इंसान anatomy.
वहीँ are approximately 642 skeletal मांसपेशियां within the ठेठ इंसान, and almost प्रत्येक muscle constitutes one part of a जोड़ी of एकसमान bilateral मांसपेशियां, मिला on दोनो sides, resulting in approximately 320 pairs of मांसपेशियां, as प्रस्तुत in this आलेख.
Nevertheless, the exact क्रमांक is मुश्किल to define क्युकी अलग स्त्रोत group muscles differently, e.g. regarding कया is defined as different भाग of a single मांसपेशी or as अनेक muscles.
उदाहरण दायरा इससे 640 to 850.
The muscles of the human body can be categorized into a क्रमांक of समूह which include muscles relating to the head और गर्दन, muscles of the धड़ or trunk, muscles of the upper limbs, और muscles of the निम्नतर limbs.
The कार्रवाई refers to the कार्रवाई of प्रत्येक मांसपेशी from the मानक anatomical position.
in अन्य positions, other क्रियाएँ may be performed.
a सुनहरा बार is a quantity of refined धात्विक gold of कोई आकार that is बना by a बार निर्माता बैठक standard शर्तें of manufacture, labeling, और रिकार्ड keeping.
larger सुनहरा bars that are produced by pouring the molten metal into molds हैं called पिंडों.
छोटी bars may be manufactured by minting or stamping from appropriately rolled सुनहरा sheets.
the standard gold बार आयोजित as gold reserves by central बैंको और traded among bullion dealers is the 400-troy-ounce ( 12.4 kg or 438.9 ounces ) Good Delivery gold बार.
the kilobar, जिससे is to कह 1000 grams in द्रव्यमान, is the bar कि is अधिक manageable and is प्रयुक्त extensively लिये व्यापार and निवेश.
the प्रीमियम on these बार जब traded is बहुत low over the स्पॉट value of the सुनहरा making it आदर्श for छोटी हस्तांतरण between banks और व्यापारियों.
सबसे kilobars are चपटा, although some निवेशकों, विशेषकर in यूरोपीय, prefer the ईंटों shape.
Elisha Archibald `` आर्ची '' Manning III ( born may 19, 1949 ) is a पूर्व American फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक in the National Football लीग, playing लिये the नई Orleans Saints from 1971 to 1982, then for the ह्यूस्टन ऑइलर्स और Minnesota वाइकिंग्स.
he is the father of current डेनवर Broncos quarterback Peyton मैनिंग, वर्तमान New York दिग्गज starting quarterback एली Manning, और पूर्व Ole मिस receiver कूपर मैनिंग.
Advocacy is a political process by an व्यक्तिगत or समूह जिससे aims to influence public-policy और resource आवंटन निर्णय within राजनैतिक, आर्थिक, and सोशल प्रणालियों और संस्थानों.
Advocacy can include अनेक क्रियाएँ that a व्यक्ति or organization undertakes including मीडिया campaigns, public बोलना, commissioning और प्रकाशन शोध or पोल or the filing of an amicus brief.
lobbying ( often by लॉबी groups ) is a रूप of वकालत where a सीधा दृष्टिकोण is made to विधायक on an issue which plays a significant भूमिका in modern राजनीती.
Research is शुरूआत to explore how advocacy groups in the U.S. और Canada हैं using social media to facilitate नागरिक सगाई और collective action.
the ध्वज of Mexico ( Spanish : bandera de méxico ) is a vertical tricolor of ग्रीन, श्वेत, और रेड with the national coat of बाहें चार्ज in the बीच of the श्वेत stripe.
While the meaning of the colors रै changed over समय, ये तीन रंगों यहूद adopted by Mexico following independence इससे स्पेन दौरान the देश 's War of Independence, and subsequent पहला मैक्सिकन साम्राज्य.
the वर्तमान flag थी अपनाया in 1968, but the overall डिज़ाइन रै been प्रयुक्त since 1821, when the First National Flag थी निर्मित.
the वर्तमान law of national symbols, विधि on the नेशनल बाहें, Flag, and गान, that governs the उपयोग of the नेशनल flag has महरूम in place since 1984.
रेड, white, and green are the रंगों of the नेशनल मुक्ति फौज in मैक्सिको.
The सेंट्रल emblem is the Aztec pictogram लिये tenochtitlan ( now मैक्सिको City ), the बीच of उनके empire.
it recalls the legend कि inspired the aztecs to settle on what थी originally a lake-island.
the form of the coat of बाहें थी most recently revised in 1968.
a ribbon in the नेशनल colors is at the नीचे of the coat of बाहें.
Throughout इतिहास, the flag has changed four टाइम्स, as the design of the कोट of बाहें and the length-width ratios of the ध्वज have महरूम modified.
However, the कोट of arms has had the same features throughout : an त्रिभुज, holding a serpent in its talon, is perched on शीर्ष of a prickly नाशपाती कैक्टस ; the कैक्टस is situated on a चट्टान कि rises above a lake.
the कोट of बाहें is निकला इससे an Aztec legend that उनके gods told उन्हें to build a नगर where वे स्पॉट an त्रिभुज on a nopal खाने a serpent, which is now मैक्सिको नगर.
the current national ध्वज, the चौथी नेशनल ध्वज, is भी प्रयुक्त as the Mexican नवल ensign by जहाजों registered in Mexico.
A destination marketing संगठन or सम्मेलन और visitor ब्यूरो promotes a कस्बा, नगर, प्रदेश, or country in order to increase the क्रमांक of visitors.
It promotes the विकास और marketing of a गंतव्य, focusing on सम्मेलन बिक्री, tourism marketing, और सेवाएं.
Such organizations प्रचार आर्थिक विकास of a destination by increasing visits from पर्यटकों and कारोबार travelers, which generates overnight lodging for a destination, विज़िट to restaurants, and shopping revenues.
सम्मेलन और visitor bureaus हैं the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण पर्यटन विपणन संगठन in their respective tourist गंतव्यों, as they हैं directly जिम्मेदार लिये marketing the गंतव्य brand through travel और tourism `` product जागरूकता '' to विज़िटर.
DMOs उपज billions of डॉलर in direct और अप्रत्यक्ष revenue and कर लिये their destinations ' economies with उनके विपणन and बिक्री expertise.
Destination विपणन संगठन हैं प्रायः called सफर, सम्मेलन, visitors, or पर्यटन bureaux, स्वागत centers, information centers and more.
Regardless of the नाम, ये organizations प्रस्ताव many services to the traveling पब्लिक.
The elk or wapiti ( Cervus canadensis ) is एक of the largest प्रजाति of deer in the world, और one of the largest land mammals in उत्तर America और पूर्वी एशिया.
it थी long believed to be a subspecies of the यूरोपीय रेड हिरण ( Cervus elaphus ), लकिन प्रमाण from a 2004 पढ़ाई of the mitochondrial DNA indicates कि the दो हैं पृथक प्रजाति.
This एनिमल should नहीं be उलझन with the larger मूस ( Alces alces ), to जिससे the name `` elk '' applies in यूरेशिया.
अलावा from the moose, the तभी other member of the हिरण family to rival the elk in size is the दक्षिण Asian sambar ( rusa unicolor ).
Elk range in वन और forest-edge आवास, feeding on grasses, plants, leaves, और छाल.
हालांकि native to North America और पूर्वी Asia, they have adapted खूब to countries जहाँ they have महरूम introduced, including Argentina, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, और New जीलैंड.
उनके ग्रेट adaptability may threaten endemic प्रजाति and ecosystems into which they have been introduced.
Male नीलगाय have large antlers which are शेड each साल.
Males also engage in ritualized समागम behaviors दौरान the rut, सहित posturing, antler wrestling ( sparring ), and bugling, a लाउड series of vocalizations जिससे establishes dominance over other males और attracts females.
नीलगाय are susceptible to a number of infectious diseases, कुछ of जिससे can be transmitted to livestock.
Efforts to eliminate संक्रामक रोगों from elk populations, largely through टीकाकरण, have had मिश्रित कामयाबी.
कुछ संस्कृतियों revere the elk as a spiritual force.
in parts of एशिया, antlers and उनके मखमल हैं used in परंपरागत medicines.
Elk हैं hunted as a game प्रजाति ; the मांस is leaner और higher in protein than beef or मुर्गा.
the George वॉशिंगटन विश्वविद्यालयों ( GW, GWU, or जार्ज Washington ) is a व्यापक private, coeducational शोध university located in Washington, D.C..
it awards प्रमाणपत्र, स्नातक डिग्री, मास्टर्स degrees, और PhDs आरपार अनेक dozen disciplines.
The विश्वविद्यालयों थी चार्टर्ड by an Act of Congress on February 9, 1821 as The Columbian कॉलेज in the District of कोलंबिया.
The lion ( Panthera leo ) is one of the four बिग cats in the genus Panthera और a member of the परिवार Felidae.
साथ कुछ males exceeding in weight, it is the second-largest living बिल्ली after the tiger.
Wild शेर currently exist in sub-saharan अफ़्रीकी और in Asia ( where an endangered remnant जनसांख्यिकी resides in गिर वन National पार्क in इण्डिया ) जबकि other types of lions have disappeared इससे उत्तर अफ़्रीकी and दक्षिणपश्चिम एशिया in historic times.
जबतक the late pleistocene, परिचय 10,000 सालो ago, the शेर was the most widespread large जमीन mammal बाद humans.
They were found in सबसे of अफ़्रीकी, आरपार Eurasia from पश्चिमी Europe to इण्डिया, और in the americas from the yukon to Peru.
the शेर is a vulnerable species, having seen a प्रमुख population मनाही of 30–50 % over the past दो decades in इसके African दायरा.
Lion populations हैं untenable बाहर designated reserves and नेशनल parks.
हालांकि the कारण of the मनाही is नहीं fully understood, आवास घाटा and conflicts साथ humans are currently the महानतम causes of चिंता.
भीतर अफ़्रीकी, the West African शेर जनसांख्यिकी is particularly endangered.
शेर live for 10–14 years in the जंगली, while in captivity वे can सजीव longer than 20 years.
In the wild, males seldom सजीव longer than 10 सालो, as injuries sustained इससे continual fighting साथ प्रतिद्वंद्वी males greatly reduce उनके आयु.
वे typically inhabit सवाना और grassland, हालांकि they may take to बुश और वन.
शेर हैं unusually social compared to अन्य cats.
a अभिमान of lions consists of related females और offspring and a छोटी क्रमांक of adult males.
Groups of female lions typically हंट together, preying mostly on विशाल ungulates.
शेर are apex और keystone predators, although they scavenge as अवसर allows.
जबकि शेर do not typically hunt इंसानो, कुछ have महरूम known to do so.
Sleeping मुख्यतः during the दिन, शेर हैं primarily nocturnal, हालांकि bordering on crepuscular in प्रकृति.
अत्यधिक distinctive, the male शेर is easily recognised by its mane, and इसके face is one of the सबसे widely recognised animal प्रतीकों in इंसान संस्कृति.
depictions have existed from the अपर Paleolithic period, साथ carvings and paintings from the Lascaux और Chauvet Caves, through virtually all प्राचीन and medieval संस्कृतियों where वे once occurred.
it has महरूम extensively depicted in sculptures, in paintings, on national flags, and in समकालीन films and साहित्य.
शेर have महरूम kept in menageries चूंकि the समय of the Roman Empire, और have been a key प्रजाति sought लिये प्रदर्शनी in zoos over the संसार चूंकि the लेट 18th century.
Zoos are cooperating विश्वव्यापी in breeding कार्यक्रम for the endangered एशियाटिक subspecies.
In the history of video games, the सातवाँ पीढी of consoles is the previous generation, and शामिल consoles released since लेट by निन्टेंडो, Microsoft, और सोनी.
For घर consoles, the seventh generation began on 22 नवम्बर 2005 with the release of Xbox 360 और जारी with the release of PlayStation 3 on 11 November 2006, और वी on 19 नवम्बर 2006.
प्रत्येक new console introduced a new प्रकार of भेदन in प्रौद्योगिकी.
The एक्सबॉक्स 360 offered खेल rendered natively at hd रिज़ॉल्यूशन, the प्लेस्टेशन 3 offered, in addition to FHD gaming, HD movie playback via a built-in 3d Blu-ray डिस्क खिलाड़ी, और the वी focused on integrating परिरक्षक साथ movement सेंसर as खूब as joysticks.
joining निन्टेंडो in the गति मार्केट, Sony released the PlayStation Move in सितंबर 2010.
the प्लेस्टेशन Move features गति sensing गेमिंग, similar to that of the Wii.
Microsoft भी joined सोनी and निन्टेंडो, with इसके kinect.
Unlike the other two प्रणालियों ( प्लेस्टेशन 3 and वी ), kinect does नहीं use कोई controllers of कोई sort and makes the उपयोक्ता the `` नियंत्रक. ''
Having बेची 8 million units in इसके first 60 days on the मार्केट, Kinect has claimed the Guinness संसार रिकार्ड of होने the `` तीव्रतम selling consumer electronics यंत्र ''.
While the Xbox 360 offers तार परिरक्षक as a स्टैंडअलोन उत्पाद, all प्लेस्टेशन 3 controllers can be प्रयुक्त in तार और wireless configurations.
starting साथ हैंडहेल्ड consoles, the seventh पीढी began on 21 November 2004 साथ the उत्तर अमरीकी introduction of the निन्टेंडो DS as a `` तीसरा pillar '', alongside निन्टेंडो 's existing Game Boy अग्रिम and GameCube consoles.
The Nintendo DS ( NDS ) features a touch स्क्रीन और built-in माइक्रोफोन, and supports बेतार आईईईई 802.11 ( Wi-Fi ) मानकों.
Additionally, the संशोधित version of the nds, the DSi, features two built in कैमरे, the ability to डाउनलोड खेल इससे the DSi स्टोर, और a वेब ब्राउजर.
the PlayStation Portable, or psp, released बाद the वही साल on 12 December 2004, followed a different पैटर्न.
It became the पहला हैंडहेल्ड video खेल console to उपयोग an ऑप्टिकल disc स्वरूप, सार्वभौमिक Media डिस्क ( UMD ), as इसके primary भंडार मीडिया.
Sony भी दिया the PSP मजबूत multi-media काबिलियत, connectivity साथ the PlayStation 3 and other psps, and Internet connectivity.
the निन्टेंडो DS likewise रै कनेक्टिविटी to the internet through the Nintendo wi-fi Connection and Nintendo ds Browser, as well as बेतार कनेक्टिविटी to अन्य DS systems और वी consoles.
Despite ऊँची बिक्री numbers for both consoles, PlayStation Portable बिक्री have consistently lagged behind those of the निन्टेंडो DS ; nevertheless, the प्लेस्टेशन पोर्टेबल has the distinction of being the best-selling non-nintendo handheld gaming प्रणाली.
sgt. pepper 's निर्जन Hearts Club बैंड ( प्रायः shortened to sgt. pepper ) is the eighth studio एल्बम by अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान बैंड the बीटल्स.
released in जून 1967, the एल्बम शामिल songs ऐसे as `` साथ a Little सहायता इससे My Friends ``, `` Lucy in the Sky with ईंट ``, and `` A Day in the Life ``.
continuing the कलाकारी maturation seen on the band 's एल्बम रिवाल्वर ( 1966 ), sgt. Pepper further रजि from the conventional pop चट्टान मुहावरा of the time और incorporated balladry, साइकेडेलिक, म्यूज़िक हॉल, और symphonic प्रभाव.
During the sgt. pepper sessions, the group improved upon the quality of their music 's उत्पादन जबकि exploring experimental recording तकनीकों.
निर्माता George मार्टिन 's innovative दृष्टिकोण शामिल the उपयोग of an orchestra.
widely acclaimed और imitated, the एल्बम cover, designed by English पॉप कलाकारों Peter Blake और Jann haworth, थी inspired by a स्केच by Paul mccartney that चित्रित the बैंड पोज़ in सामने of a collage of some of उनके favourite celebrities.
sgt. pepper was a विश्वव्यापी नाजुक और commercial कामयाबी, spending 27 weeks at the शीर्ष of the UK Album Chart और 15 weeks at number एक on the US बिलबोर्ड 200.
a seminal work in the emerging psychedelic rock style, the album was critically acclaimed upon release और won four Grammy पुरस्कार in 1968.
With an estimated 32 लाख नक़ल बेची, it is एक of the world 's बेहतरीन selling एल्बम.
sgt. pepper is माना by many to be the सबसे influential and famous rock एल्बम ever, and रै महरूम named the greatest एल्बम of सब समय by दोनो All Time Top 1000 Albums and Rolling Stone.
The temporal lobe is a प्रदेश of the cerebral cortex कि is स्तिथ beneath the lateral फिशर on दोनो cerebral बांटती of the mammalian दिमाग.
the temporal निर्मोक are शामिल in the retention of विज़ुअल यादें, processing sensory input, comprehending भाषा, storing new यादें, जज्बात, and deriving meaning.
the human lungs are the organs of श्वसन in इंसानो.
Humans have दो lungs, a सही फेफड़ों and a बाएँ फेफड़ों.
the right lung consists of three निर्मोक जबकि the बाएँ फेफड़ों is थोड़ा छोटी consisting of तभी दो lobes ( the left फेफड़ों रै a `` cardiac notch '' allowing स्पेस लिये the heart within the chest ).
साथ, the lungs contain लगभग of airways and 300 to 500 लाख alveoli, having a कुल surface क्षेत्रफल of परिचय ( ) in adults — roughly the same क्षेत्रफल as एक side of a टेनिस court.
Furthermore, if all of the capillaries that घेर the alveoli यहूद unwound और रखी समाप्त to समाप्त, वे होता extend for about.
Each फेफड़ों weighs, therefore making the संपूर्ण अंग परिचय.
इंसान lungs
The श्वासनली divides into two bronchi ( एक for each side ) at the स्तर of t4.
This junction is भी known as the carina.
the conducting मण्डल contains the श्वासनली, the bronchi, the bronchioles, and the टर्मिनल bronchioles the respiratory zone contains the respiratory bronchioles, the alveolar नलिकाएं, and the alveoli.
the conducting zone and the respiratory stuffers ( but not the alveoli ) are made up of एयरवेज़.
the conducting zone has no gas एक्सचेंज with the रक्त, और is reinforced with उपास्थि in order to hold खोलें the एयरवेज़.
the conducting मण्डल warms the एयर to और humidifies the एयर.
It also cleanses the air by removing अणु via cilia स्तिथ on the walls of all the passageways.
The फेफड़े हैं surrounded by the rib cage.
The respiratory मण्डल is the site of gas एक्सचेंज with रक्त.
the sympathetic बेचैन प्रणाली via noradrenaline एक्टिंग on the बीटा receptors कल्याणकारी bronchodilation.
the parasympathetic nervous system via acetylcholine, जिससे acts on the m-3 muscarinic receptors, maintains the resting tone of the bronchiolar smooth मांसपेशी.
This action is सम्बन्धित, although considered distinct इससे bronchoconstriction.
अनेक अन्य non-autonomic बेचैन and biochemical stimuli, including carbon डाइऑक्साइड and ऑक्सीजन, are भी involved in the विनियमन process.
The pleural गुहा is the potential स्पेस between the parietal pleura, अस्तर the inner वॉल of the thoracic पिंजरा, and the visceral pleura lining the lungs.
The lung parenchyma is सख्ती प्रयुक्त to refer solely to alveolar tissue साथ respiratory bronchioles, alveolar नलिकाएं और terminal bronchioles.
However, it प्रायः includes any form of फेफड़ों ऊतक, भी सहित bronchioles, bronchi, रक्त vessels और फेफड़ों interstitium.
The margarita is a मैक्सिकन cocktail consisting of टकीला मिश्रित साथ Cointreau or similar नारंगी -flavoured liqueur और लाइम or नीबू रस, often परोसा with नमक on the glass rim.
it is the सबसे आम tequila-based cocktail in the United States.
The drink is served shaken साथ ice ( on the रॉक्स ), blended with ice ( frozen margarita ), or बगैर ice ( सीधा up ).
दो बोतलों of red बरगंडी wine इससे gevrey-chambertin, côtes de Nuits
बरगंडी is a dark red रंग संबद्ध साथ the Burgundy wine of the वही name, जिससे in फेरे is named after the बरगंडी प्रदेश of France.
The रंग burgundy is similar to other shades of अंधेरा red ऐसे as maroon.
जब referring to the color, `` burgundy '' is usually नहीं capitalized.
The पहला अंकित use of `` burgundy '' as a रंग नाम in English was in 1881.

Missing in action ( MIA ) is a casualty श्रेणी assigned under the Status of Missing to हथियारबंद services personnel who हैं reported लापता during active सेवा.
वे may have been killed, wounded, become a कैदी of war, or deserted.
if मृतक, neither उनके remains nor संगीन can be positively identified.
Becoming मिया has been an occupational risk for सेवा कर्मियों लिये as long as there has been warfare.
