it is the county सीट of शेल्बी County.
it is नामित लिये its स्थान निकट the center of Shelby काउंटी, not लिये इसके स्थान in टेक्सास as it is located near the Louisiana border.
Intense red-eye प्रभाव in ब्लू आँखें with dilated pupil
the red-eye प्रभाव in photography is the common रूप of red pupils in color photographs of eyes.
it occurs जब using a photographic फ्लैश बहुत close to the कैमरा लेंस ( as with most कॉम्पैक्ट कैमरे ), in ambient कम light.
The effect appears in the आँखें of इंसानो and पशु that have tapetum lucidum.
Theatrical followspot ऑपरेटर, positioned nearly coincidentally साथ a very bright लाइट और somewhat दूर from the अभिनेताओं, occasionally witness red-eye in actors on stage.
the प्रभाव is नहीं दृश्य to the rest of the audience क्युकी it is reliant on the बहुत small कोण between the followspot operator और the लाइट.
the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, सांता बारबरा ( commonly referred to as UC Santa Barbara or ucsb ) is a public शोध university and एक of the ten general campuses of the University of कैलिफ़ोर्निया प्रणाली.
the प्रमुख campus is स्तिथ on a site in Goleta, California, संयुक्त राज्य, इससे सांता बारबरा और northwest of लॉस एंजिल्स.
Tracing its जड़ें back to 1891 as an independent शिक्षक ' college, ucsb joined the विश्वविद्यालयों of California system in 1944 and is the third-oldest general-education कैम्पस in the system.
ucsb is one of अमेरिका 's पब्लिक आइवी universities, जिससे recognizes शीर्ष public शोध universities in the संयुक्त राज्य.
The विश्वविद्यालयों is a व्यापक doctoral university and is व्यवस्थित into पाँच colleges और schools offering 87 undergraduate degrees और 55 graduate degrees.
The campus is the 6th-largest in the UC system by enrollment साथ 18,977 undergraduate and 2,950 graduate students.
in 2012, ucsb was ranked 41st among `` नेशनल Universities '' and 10th among public universities by U.S. न्यूज & World रपट.
The विश्वविद्यालयों थी also ranked 35th विश्वव्यापी by the टाइम्स Higher Education संसार University rankings और 34th विश्वव्यापी ( 6th worldwide for engineering ) by the अकादमिक रैंकिंग of संसार विश्वविद्यालयों in 2012. < संदर्भ name= '' shanghairanking.com/fieldeng2012 '' >
UC Santa बारबरा is a `` बहुत ऊँची कार्यकलाप '' research university और खर्च $ 191.2 लाख on research expenditures in the 2007 फिस्कल year, 97th-largest in the United States.
UCSB घरों twelve नेशनल शोध centers, सहित the renowned kavli Institute लिये सैद्धांतिक Physics.
UCSB faculty includes five नोबेल Prize laureates, एक Fields Medalist, 29 members of the National Academy of sciences, 27 members of the National अकादमी of अभियान्त्रिकी, और 31 members of the अमरीकी Academy of Arts and sciences.
UCSB थी the No. 3 host on the ARPAnet और थी elected to the संघ of American विश्वविद्यालयों in 1995.
The uc Santa बारबरा Gauchos compete in the NCAA प्रभाग i Big वेस्ट सम्मेलन.
the Gauchos have won NCAA national championships in men 's सॉकर और मेन 's जल polo.
Saint Joseph with the Infant यीशु by guido reni
संत Joseph 's Day, March 19, the feast of st. Joseph is in Western Christianity the principal feast day of Saint जोसेफ, Spouse of the धन्य Virgin Mary.
he is भी the step-father of Jesus of नासरत /Jesus मसीह.
it रै the रैंक of a solemnity in the Roman कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर ; catholics जो follow the missal of 1962 celebrate it as a पहला class feast.
Previous to 1962 it थी celebrated as a feast of the रैंक of double of the पहला क्लास.
it is a feast or commemoration in the प्रांतों of the Anglican नियाज़, और a feast or पर्व in the लूथरन Church.
Saint जोसेफ 's दिन is the patronal feast दिन लिये Poland as खूब as लिये Canada, persons named जोसेफ, josephine, etc., लिये धार्मिक संस्थान, schools and parishes bearing his name, and for carpenters.
it is भी Father 's दिन in some कैथोलिक देशों, mainly स्पेन, Portugal, और Italy.
March 19 थी dedicated to संत जोसेफ in अनेक Western पंचांग by the tenth century, and इस कस्टम was स्थापित in रोम by 1479.
पोप St. Pius v extended इसके use to the entire Roman रीति by his अपोस्टोलिक संविधान quo Primum ( July 14, 1570 ).
Since 1969, Episcopal Conferences may, if they काश, ट्रांसफ़र it to a तिथि बाहर Lent.
between 1870 और 1955, a feast थी celebrated in सम्मान of st. जोसेफ as जीवनसाथी of the Blessed Virgin Mary and Patron of the सार्वभौमिक Church, the latter title having महरूम दिए to him by Pope पायस ix.
Originally मनाये on the तीसरा Sunday after Easter with an octave, बाद divino Afflatu of St. Pius x ( see Reform of the रोमन Breviary by पोप पायस X ), it थी moved to the preceding बुधवार.
the feast थी भी retitled the Solemnity of Saint Joseph.
This जश्न और its accompanying अष्टक थी abolished दौरान the modernisation और सरलीकरण of rubrics under Pope Pius बारहवीं in 1955.
it is still कायम by Catholics जो follow the missal of 1962 or earlier missals.
as the परंपरागत holiday of the Apostles ss. Philip और जेम्स, May 1, had धुंधली इससे the मेमोरी of most Catholics by the mid-twentieth century, that of जोसेफ the Worker थी created in order to coincide with the celebration of international श्रमिक Day ( may Day ) in अनेक देशों.
The feast of Ss. Philip and James, जिससे था been मनाये on that तिथि since the sixth सदी, थी स्थानांतरित इससे its परंपरागत place.
In the नई पंचांग published in 1969, the feast, which at एक समय occupied the उच्चतम possible rank in the Church पंचांग, थी घटाया to an वैकल्पिक मेमोरियल, the lowest rank लिये a संत 's दिन.
the पूर्वी परंपरागत Church celebrates संत जोसेफ on the संडे after Christmas.
mariah Carey ( born March 27, 1970 ) is an अमरीकी सिंगर, songwriter, record producer, actress, और लोकसेवक.
अंतर्गत the guidance of कोलंबिया Records कार्यपालिका Tommy mottola, Carey released उसके self-titled debut studio album mariah Carey in 1990 ; it went multi-platinum और spawned चार लगातार number एक singles on the u.s. बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट.
following her विवाह to Mottola in 1993 and कामयाबी साथ hit records भाव ( 1991 ), Music Box ( 1993 ), और मैरी Christmas ( 1994 ), Carey was established as कोलंबिया 's highest-selling अधिनियम.
daydream ( 1995 ) made music history जब इसके दूसरी single `` एक मीठी Day ``, a duet साथ बॉयज ii मेन, spent a रिकार्ड sixteen weeks on शीर्ष of the Billboard hot 100, and remains the longest-running number-one सोंग in u.S. chart history.
दौरान the रिकॉर्डिंग of the album, कैरी began to deviate इससे her r & b और पॉप beginnings and slowly traversed into hip hop.
This musical change became evident साथ the release of तितली ( 1997 ), at which time कैरी था separated from Mottola.
कैरी बाएँ कोलंबिया in 2000, और हस्ताक्षरित a record-breaking $ 100 million recording अनुबंध साथ Virgin रिकॉर्ड.
पहले the release of her first विशेषता film glitter ( 2001 ), वो suffered a physical और emotional breakdown and was hospitalized लिये severe exhaustion.
Following the film 's ग़रीब रिसेप्शन, वो थी खरीदा out of her रिकॉर्डिंग contract लिये $ 50 लाख, जिससे led to a मनाही in उसके करियर.
वो हस्ताक्षरित a multi-million डालर contract deal साथ द्वीप रिकॉर्ड in 2002, और after an unsuccessful period, returned to the शीर्ष of music चार्ट साथ The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ).
इसके दूसरी single `` We Belong Together `` became उसके most successful सिंगल of the 2000s, और थी बाद नामित `` सोंग of the दशक '' by बिलबोर्ड.
कैरी एकबार again ventured into फिल्मी साथ a well-received अभिनीत role in ( 2009 ) ; she थी awarded the `` भेदन प्रदर्शन पुरस्कार '' at the Palm स्रोतों अंतरराष्ट्रीय Film Festival, और ब्लैक Reel and NAACP चित्र पुरस्कार nominations.
In a करियर spanning over दो दशकों, कैरी has sold more than 200 लाख रिकॉर्ड worldwide, making उसके one of the best-selling म्यूज़िक artists of all समय.
in 1998, वो थी honored as the world 's best-selling recording artist of the 1990s at the World Music पुरस्कार.
कैरी थी भी नामित the best-selling मादा कलाकार of the मिलेनियम in 2000.
According to the Recording उद्योग संघ of अमेरिका, वो is the third best-selling मादा artist in the संयुक्त राज्य, with 63.5 लाख certified albums.
With the release of `` Touch My Body `` ( 2008 ), Carey gained उसके eighteenth क्रमांक one single in the United राज्य, अधिक than any अन्य सोलो artist.
In 2012, Carey was ranked दूसरी on vh1 's list of the `` 100 Greatest महिलाओं in म्यूज़िक ''.
aside from her वाणिज्यिक accomplishments, कैरी रै जीती five ग्रैमी Awards, 17 संसार म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार, 11 American म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार, and 31 Billboard म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार.
Referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the गिनीज World Records, she is famed लिये उसके five-octave vocal दायरा, शक्ति, melismatic स्टाइल and हस्ताक्षर use of the सीटी पंजीकरण.
A bumblebee is any member of the मधुमक्खी genus Bombus, in the family apidae.
There are over 250 ज्ञात species, existing primarily in the Northern गोलार्ध हालांकि वे also occur in South अमेरिका.
वे have महरूम introduced to नई जीलैंड और the Australian राज्य of तस्मानिया.
Bumblebees are सोशल insects that are characterised by ब्लैक और yellow देह hairs, प्रायः in bands.
however, कुछ प्रजाति have नारंगी or रेड on their bodies, or may be entirely ब्लैक.
Another obvious ( but नहीं अद्वितीय ) characteristic is the soft प्रकृति of the बाल ( long, branched setae ), called pile, that covers उनके entire देह, making उन्हें appear और महसूस फजी.
They are बेहतरीन distinguished from similarly large, fuzzy मधुमक्खियों by the रूप of the female hind लेग, जिससे is modified to form a corbicula : a shiny concave सतह कि is bare, लकिन घिरी by a fringe of hairs प्रयुक्त to हस्तांतरण pollen ( in similar bees, the hind लेग is completely बालदार, और pollen दाने हैं wedged into the बालों लिये transport ).
Like their रिश्तेदारों the मधु bees, bumblebees फीड on मकरंद and gather pollen to फीड their young.
a man खुलकर carrying a handgun in a Burger किंग in Eagle, कोलोराडो.
in the संयुक्त राज्य, open carry is shorthand terminology for `` openly carrying a firearm in public '', as distinguished from concealed carry, जहाँ firearms can नहीं be देखी by the कैज़ुअल निरीक्षक.
the अभ्यास of खोलें carry, जहाँ gun स्वामी खुलकर carry firearms जबकि they go परिचय उनके daily business, has seen an बढ़ाएँ in the u.S. in हाल years.
इस रै been चिह्नित by a क्रमांक of organized कार्यक्रम intended to increase the दृश्यता of open carry and public जागरूकता about the अभ्यास.
proponents of खोलें carry point to इतिहास and statistics, noting कि criminals usually छिपाते their weapons.
Encouraged by groups like OpenCarry.org, georgiacarry.org और कुछ भागीदार of the फ़्री State Project, open carry रै देखी a पुनरुद्धार in हाल सालो, लकिन it is नहीं yet clear if this represents just a short-term trend.
the गन अधिकारों community has महरूम mixed in इसके जवाब.
एलन Gottlieb of the दूसरी Amendment Foundation and the nra have been cautious in expressing support, जबकि special-interest groups such as the aforementioned OpenCarry.org and GeorgiaCarry.org, and certain नेशनल groups ऐसे as the Gun Owners of अमेरिका ( GOA ) have महरूम more outspoken in एहसान of the practice.
Open carry is strongly opposed by गन कंट्रोल groups ऐसे as the ब्रैडी अभियान and the Coalition to Stop गन हिंसा.
the cattenom नाभिकीय Power संयंत्र in France.
फ़्रांस produces around तीन quarters of इसके electricity by नाभिकीय शक्ति.
The Grafenrheinfeld नाभिकीय Power Plant in जर्मनी.
चांसलर एंजेला मार्केल 's coalition announced on May 30, 2011, that germany’s 17 nuclear शक्ति stations will be shut down by 2022, in a policy reversal following जापानी 's Fukushima daiichi nuclear विपत्ति.
फिलहाल, 68 reactors हैं अंतर्गत निर्माण in 15 countries.
Nuclear power stations operate in thirty countries.
in 2010, पहले the फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति, it थी reported कि an average of about 10 nuclear reactors यहूद expected to become operational प्रति year, although according to the World नाभिकीय संघ, of the 17 civilian रिएक्टरों planned to become operational between 2007 और 2009, तभी पाँच दरअसल आए on स्ट्रीम.
As of June 2011, Germany and स्विट्ज़रलैंड हैं phasing-out nuclear power.
as of जून 2011, देशों such as ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Austria, डेनमार्क, यूनानियों, आयरलैंड, इटली, Latvia, liechtenstein, ध्वज, मलेशिया, माल्टा, नई Zealand, Norway और पुर्तगाल remain opposed to नाभिकीय शक्ति.
रंग motion चित्र film refers दोनो to unexposed color फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक फिल्मी in a स्वरूप उपयुक्त लिये उपयोग in a motion picture कैमरा, और to समाप्त गति picture फिल्मी, तैयार लिये use in a projector, which bears बिंब in रंग.
the पहला रंग cinematography थी by अर्थात् of योगात्मक रंग systems ऐसे as the एक patented in England by Edward रेमंड Turner in 1899 और tested in 1902.
a सरलीकृत योगात्मक system थी developed by जार्ज अल्बर्ट Smith और सफलतापूर्वक commercialized in 1909 as Kinemacolor.
These जल्दी प्रणालियों प्रयुक्त black-and-white film to फोटोग्राफ और project दो or more component images through different color फ़िल्टर.
स्टिल from footage अंकित by Edward टर्नर in 1902
साथ the present-day technology, there हैं two पृथक प्रक्रियाओं : Eastman Color ऋणात्मक 2 chemistry ( camera negative stocks, duplicating interpositive and internegative stocks ) और Eastman रंग धनात्मक 2 chemistry ( positive prints लिये सीधा प्रक्षेप ), usually abbreviated as ECN-2 और ecp-2.
फुजी 's उत्पाद are संगत with ECN-2 and ECP-2.
ashanti Shequoiya डगलस ( born October 13, 1980 ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter, रिकार्ड निर्माता, और actress.
ashanti is सबसे प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके eponymous डेब्यू एल्बम, which प्रदर्शित the hit song `` Foolish ``, और बेची over 503,000 copies in its first week of release throughout the u.S. in April 2002.
the एल्बम set a Soundscan record as the biggest opening सप्ताह sales for a new मादा कलाकार, outselling debuts by एलिसिया कुंजियाँ और Lauryn हिल.
in the same week, वो became the first female यजमान to simultaneously hold the top two places on the Billboard hot 100 singles चार्ट with `` foolish '', and `` What 's Luv ? ``
( with Fat Joe ).
Ashanti broke records again by having three top ten गीतों, `` Foolish, '' `` कया 's luv ? '' and `` Always on Time ``, on the Billboard Hot 100 charts in the same week, होने the पहला woman to accomplish इस feat and होने second तभी to the बीटल्स.
in 2003, the self-titled डेब्यू album जीती ashanti उसके पहला ग्रैमी Award लिये Best समकालीन R & b एल्बम.
as of अप्रैल 1st 2013, ashanti has बेची over 27.7 लाख records worldwide.
ashanti ended the दशक ( 2000–09 ) as the third top new R & B कलाकार behind Alicia Keys and बेयोंस.
She also ended the decade at number 38 on the Top कलाकार of the Decade सूची.
She is फिलहाल on the list of The बीस Best selling म्यूज़िक singles Since 1990 लिये उसके single Foolish for selling 7.2 लाख copies to-date.
ashanti रै an estimated जाल worth of $ 40 लाख डॉलर [ USD ].
ashanti wrote and संग background on Jennifer Lopez 's `` Ai n't It Funny ( हत्या रिमिक्स ) ``, which पहुँचे क्रमांक one on बिलबोर्ड Hot 100, जिससे was also in the शीर्ष 10 chart at the same time as `` Foolish '', `` Always on समय '' ( साथ Ja नियम ), और `` कया 's Luv '' ( with Fat जो ).
Later that साल, she was acclaimed as the `` Princess of Hip-Hop & r & B '' by उसके लेबल and capped off उसके कामयाब डेब्यू by winning eight Billboard पुरस्कार and two American Music पुरस्कार.
भीतर seven years of Ashanti 's career, वो रै scored 16 शीर्ष 40 hits on the hot 100.
ashanti रै endorsed numerous उत्पाद including Gap, Herbal essences और mudd जीन्स.
Ashanti cites व्हिटनी ह्यूस्टन, Janet Jackson, Prince, Madonna, Tupac Shakur, मरियम J. Blige, एला Fitzgerald, नशीले Robinson, Donna Summer, और ब्लू Magic as her musical प्रभाव.
praised as a gifted songwriter by उसके peers and critics alike, ashanti has written/co-written the बल्क of सब उसके म्यूज़िक.
वो is currently working on उसके own publishing company हकदार Written Entertainment.
वो released her fourth स्टुडियो एल्बम entitled the घोषणा on जून 3, 2008 and is फिलहाल in the studio working on her fifth.
She also performed the charity धुन `` Just स्टैंड Up `` alongside 15 other female गायकों लिये the `` स्टैंड up to Cancer '' live television special जिससे helped उठाएँ $ 100 million डॉलर for cancer research.
the संयुक्त States फौज एयर Forces ( usaaf or aaf ) थी the सैन्य aviation arm of the United राज्य of America दौरान और तत्काल बाद World युद्ध II, और the सीधा पूर्ववर्ती of the United States Air Force.
The aaf was a घटक of the संयुक्त States फौज, which in 1942 was divided functionally by executive अनुक्रम into three autonomous forces : the Army Ground शक्तियां, the सेवाएं of सप्लाई ( which in 1943 became the फौज सेवा Forces ), and the aaf.
प्रत्येक of ये forces था a commanding general who reported directly to the मुख्य of स्टाफ of the संयुक्त राज्य फौज.
The aaf administered all parts of military aviation formerly वितरित among the Army Air Corps, सामान्य मुख्यालय Air Force, और ground शक्तियां corps area कमांडरों, और यूँ became the पहला air organization of the u.S. Army to कंट्रोल its अपना संस्थापना and support personnel.
In practice, the AAF थी वस्तुतः autonomous अंदर the फौज.
the शिखर आकार of the aaf थी over 2.4 लाख men and महिलाओं in सेवा और nearly 80,000 aircraft in 1944, and 783 domestic bases in दिसम्बर 1943.
by VE दिन it था 1.25 लाख मेन stationed विदेशी और operated from अधिक than 1,600 airfields worldwide.
The Air Corps became the फौज Air Forces in जून 1941 to provide the air arm a वृहद autonomy in which to expand more efficiently, and to provide a structure for the additional command echelons जरूरी by a vastly increased फ़ोर्स.
हालांकि अन्य राष्ट्र already था पृथक air शक्तियां स्वतंत्र of the army or नेवी ( such as the अंग्रेजों royal Air Force और the German luftwaffe ), the AAF remained a भाग of the United राज्य Army जबतक the संयुक्त States Air फ़ोर्स came into being in सितंबर 1947.
However, in its विस्तार and conduct of the युद्ध, the aaf became अधिक than बस an भुजा of the वृहद organization.
By the end of World युद्ध ii the AAF था become वस्तुतः an independent सेवा.
By विनियमन और executive अनुक्रम, the aaf was a अधीनस्थ agency of the War Department tasked तभी with organizing, प्रशिक्षण, और equipping combat इकाई, limited in जिम्मेदारी to the महाद्वीपीय संयुक्त States, as were the Army मैदान शक्तियां और the Army सेवा शक्तियां.
In reality, Headquarters AAF controlled the conduct of सब aspects of the air युद्ध in every भाग of the संसार, determining एयर नीति and issuing orders without transmitting them through the मुख्य of स्टाफ.
This `` कंट्रास्ट between theory और fact is... fundamental to an understanding of the AAF. ''
The स्वतंत्रता of सूचना अधिनियम ( foia ) is a संघीय स्वतंत्रता of सूचना विधि कि allows लिये the full or partial प्रकटीकरण of previously unreleased सूचना and documents नियंत्रित by the United States सरकारी.
the अधिनियम defines एजेंसी रिकॉर्ड विषय to प्रकटीकरण, outlines अनिवार्य प्रकटीकरण procedures और grants नौ exemptions to the statute.
It थी originally signed into law by अध्यक्ष Lyndon B. जॉनसन, despite his misgivings, on July 4, 1966 as और went into effect the following year.
The Federal Government 's Freedom of सूचना अधिनियम चाहिए नहीं be confused with the different and varying स्वतंत्रता of सूचना अधिनियमों passed by the व्यक्तिगत states.
अनेक of those राज्य अधिनियमों may be समान लकिन not एकसमान to the federal अधिनियम.
The European संघ ( EU ) is an आर्थिक और political संघ of 27 सदस्य राज्य that are located primarily in Europe.
The eu operates through a system of supranational स्वतंत्र institutions and intergovernmental negotiated निर्णय by the सदस्य राज्य.
Institutions of the EU include the यूरोपीय आयोग, the Council of the यूरोपीय Union, the European परिषद, the Court of इंसाफ of the यूरोपीय Union, the European सेंट्रल Bank, the Court of auditors, and the यूरोपीय Parliament.
The यूरोपीय Parliament is निर्वाचित every पाँच years by eu citizens.
the EU 's de facto पूंजी is ब्रसेल्स.
The EU traces इसके origins from the European Coal और Steel Community ( ECSC ) and the European Economic जातियाँ ( eec ), formed by the Inner Six countries in 1951 and 1958 respectively.
in the intervening सालो the जातियाँ और इसके successors have grown in size by the accession of new सदस्य राज्य और in शक्ति by the जोड of नीति areas to इसके remit.
The Maastricht सन्धि स्थापित the European संघ अंतर्गत इसके current name in 1993.
the नवीनतम प्रमुख amendment to the संवैधानिक आधार of the EU, the सन्धि of Lisbon, came into फ़ोर्स in 2009.
the eu has developed a single market through a standardised system of laws that लागू in all सदस्य राज्य.
Within the शेंगेन Area ( which includes 22 eu और 4 non-eu states ) passport नियंत्रण have महरूम abolished.
eu नीतियों उद्देश्य to ensure the फ़्री movement of लोगों, goods, सेवाएं, and पूंजी, enact legislation in इंसाफ and home affairs, और maintain आम policies on व्यापार, agriculture, fisheries और regional विकास.
A मौद्रिक संघ, the eurozone, थी स्थापित in 1999 and is composed of 17 सदस्य states.
Through the Common Foreign और सुरक्षा नीति the eu रै developed a role in बाह्य संबंध and defence.
स्थाई diplomatic missions have महरूम established around the संसार.
the eu is represented at the संयुक्त राष्ट्र, the WTO, the g8 और the g-20.
साथ a संयुक्त जनसांख्यिकी of over 500 million निवासियों, or 7.3 % of the world population, the eu, in 2012, generated a नाममात्र सकल domestic product ( जीडीपी ) of 16.584 खरब us डॉलर, representing approximately 20 % of the वैश्विक जीडीपी when measured in शर्तें of purchasing शक्ति parity, और represents the largest nominal जीडीपी and GDP ppp in the world.
the eu थी the recipient of the 2012 Nobel सलाम Prize.
the Wales national रग्बी league टोली represent Wales in अंतरराष्ट्रीय rugby लीग football matches.
Currently the टोली is seventh in the RLIF World rankings.
the टोली were चलाएं अंतर्गत the auspices of the रग्बी फ़ुटबॉल League, but an स्वतंत्र body, वेल्स रग्बी League, अभी runs the team from कार्डिफ.
A कुल of तीन Welsh खिलाड़ी have been entered into the Rugby League Hall of Fame.
समान to many other Welsh national sporting teams, वेल्स strip रै been primarily रेड लिये many years, including now.
However in their पिछला World कप अभियान in 2000 they किया wear a कमीज़ featuring the Welsh ध्वज, adding a touch of green और white.
the team is known as `` the ड्रेगन '' और so the teams लोगो on the कमीज़ is a red dragon.
The team तिथि वापस to 1907, making them the third oldest नेशनल side after इंग्लैण्ड और New Zealand.
And it was a touring नई जीलैंड पक्ष that वेल्स first played विरूद्ध in 1908, winning 9-8 at Aberdare.
Since then Wales have regularly निभाई इंग्लैण्ड, since 1935 फ़्रांस, as खूब as सत्कार the touring ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई Zealand teams, although वे rarely toured themselves, not playing a match in the Southern गोलार्ध जबतक 1975.
लिये twenty-six years Wales competed against उनके दो biggest rivals, इंग्लैण्ड और फ़्रांस, in the European राष्ट्र कप, जीतना the trophy चार times.
Wales have also competed in the World Cup on three अवसरों, the पहला time होने in 1975.
In 1995 और 2000 they था उनके most successful tournaments to date, surprisingly बनाना the Semi-Finals on both occasions before होने beaten by इंग्लैण्ड and ऑस्ट्रेलिया respectively.
Wales विफल to qualify for the 2008 संसार कप, being the दूसरी उच्चतम ranked side नहीं to do so, having lost to स्कॉटलैंड on अंक अंतर over two मिलान.
in 2008 Australian जॉन डिक्सन became the new head कोच और नियुक्त Lee briers as कप्तान, having played लिये वेल्स चूंकि 1998.
In recent सीज़न Wales have taken विशाल strides अंतर्गत former player Iestyn हैरिस जो has coached Wales to वापस to back European Cup successes, जिससे culminated in a Four राष्ट्र रूप in 2011.
Cardiomyopathy ( literally `` heart मांसपेशी disease '' ) is the measurable deterioration of the function of the myocardium ( the दिल muscle ) लिये any reason, usually अग्रणी to दिल failure ; common symptoms are dyspnea ( breathlessness ) और परिधीय एडिमा ( सूजन of the टाँगे ).
People with cardiomyopathy are often at रिस्क of खतरनाक forms of irregular दिल ताल और अचानक cardiac मौत.
the सबसे common form of cardiomyopathy is dilated cardiomyopathy.
बकवास in इसके शाब्दिक अर्थ refers to the अधिनियम of sexual intercourse.
it is an अंग्रेज़ी शब्द कि is often used as a profanity, either to denote disdain or as an intensifier.
The origin of the word is अस्पष्ट.
It is प्रायः considered to be पहला attested to around 1475, but it may be considerably older.
In modern उपयोग, बकवास and its derivatives ( ऐसे as fucker और fucking ) can be used in the position of a संज्ञा, a verb, an adjective or an क्रियाविशेषण.
वहीँ हैं many आम phrases which मेक use of the word, as well as a क्रमांक of compounds incorporating it, ऐसे as motherfucker.

This number, साथ साथ the औसत age of वाहनों, रै increased steadily since 1960, indicating a growing क्रमांक of वाहनों per capita.
The Chinese car market, however, is poised to जल्द exceed the United राज्य ; by the समाप्त of 2012, there were over 240 million cars on the सड़क in China.

नैदानिक प्रयोगशाला in a Hospital सेटिंग showing अनेक automated analysers.
A medical प्रयोगशाला or clinical प्रयोगशाला is a laboratory जहाँ tests are done on नैदानिक specimens in अनुक्रम to get सूचना about the health of a रोगी as pertaining to the निदान, treatment, and रोकथाम of बीमारी.
in poker, players construct हैंड्स of five cards according to predetermined rules, which vary according to which variant of पोकर is होने निभाई.
ये hands हैं compared using a hand रैंकिंग प्रणाली कि is standard across सब variants of पोकर, the खिलाड़ी with the highest-ranking hand जीतना that particular deal in most विसंगतियाँ of poker.
in some विसंगतियाँ, the lowest-ranking हाथ can जीत or tie.
These हाथ rankings हैं also प्रयुक्त in some other कार्ड खेल, and in पोकर dice.
the ranking of a particular हाथ is increased by including अनेक cards of the same कार्ड rank, by सब five ताश होने from the वही सूट, or by all five ताश होने of consecutive रैंक.
the सापेक्ष ranking of the various हाथ categories is आधारित on the probability of being randomly dealt ऐसे a हाथ from a well- shuffled डेक.
ब्रूस Randall hornsby ( born November 23, 1954 ) is an अमरीकी virtuoso ; a singer, pianist, synthesizer, accordion, और dulcimer player, and songwriter.
ज्ञात लिये the spontaneity और रचनात्मकता of his live performances, hornsby draws अक्सर इससे शास्त्रीय, jazz, bluegrass, folk, Motown, gospel, चट्टान, blues, और jam बैंड musical traditions with his songwriting और the seamless improvisations contained भीतर.
hornsby 's recordings have महरूम recognised on a क्रमांक of occasions with उद्योग पुरस्कार, including the Best New Artist Grammy in 1987 साथ ब्रूस Hornsby और the Range, the Best Bluegrass Recording ग्रैमी in 1990, और the Best Pop इंस्ट्रूमेंटल Grammy in 1993.
Hornsby has भी हासिल मान्यता लिये उसके सोलो एल्बम और प्रदर्शन, उसके touring band Bruce Hornsby and the Noisemakers, his bluegrass प्रोजेक्ट with Ricky skaggs और उसके दिखावे as a session- और guest-musician.
He भी collaborated with Grateful Dead और was a member of the बैंड from सितंबर 1990 to कूच 1992, playing at over एक hundred shows during कि काल.
Sugarcane plantation in ग्रामीण Cuba
कृषि in Cuba has played an important भाग in the economy for अनेक hundred सालो.
कृषि contributes less than 10 प्रतिशत to the gross domestic उत्पाद ( GDP ), but it employs roughly 20 प्रतिशत of the working population.
About 30 प्रतिशत of the देश 's जमीन is प्रयुक्त for क्रॉप cultivation.
the inefficient agricultural उद्योग in क्यूबा has led to the need to आयात large amounts of भोजन.
क्यूबा now imports परिचय 80 % of the खाना it rations to the पब्लिक.
the rationing कार्यक्रम accounts लिये about a तीसरा of the food उर्जा the औसत क्यूबन consumes.
Overall, however, क्यूबा is निर्भर on imports लिये only 16 % of its खाना.

आचमन Millions ( initially called the Big खेल Mega Millions as the successor of the बिग खेल ) is an American multi-jurisdictional $ 1 lottery game.
The first ( The Big Game ) आचमन Millions आरेखण थी in 2002 ( see नीचे ).
the minimum Mega Millions advertised jackpot is $ 12,000,000, paid in 26 equal yearly installments ( unless the cash option is chosen ) ; प्रायः, the जैकपॉट increases when वहीँ is no top-prize winner.
however, despite no जैकपॉट विजेता लिये the $ 12,000,000 दिसम्बर 18, 2012 आरेखण, the जैकपॉट remained at $ 12,000,000 for the drawing to be held on दिसम्बर 21.
( देखिए नीचे लिये information on how the game 's जैकपॉट is वित्तपोषित. )
reflecting आम practice among American lotteries, the jackpot is advertised as a नाममात्र value of सालाना installments.
A नकदी मान option ( the usual चुनाव ), when chosen by a जैकपॉट विजेता ( see नीचे ), pays the approximate उपस्थित मान of the installments.
आचमन Millions फिलहाल uses a 5/56 ( श्वेत गेंदें ) प्लस 1/46 ( the Mega Ball ) दोगुना matrix to select इसके winning संख्याएँ.
Each खेल costs $ 1.
In 43 of the 44 Mega Millions jurisdictions ( कैलिफ़ोर्निया is the एक्सेप्शन ), there is an विकल्प, पुकारा Megaplier ( such games हैं $ 2 प्रत्येक ) where non-jackpot पुरस्कार हैं multiplied by 2, 3, or 4.
The Megaplier थी बना available to सब आचमन Millions jurisdictions in जनवरी 2011 ; it began as a टेक्सास -only विकल्प.
Mega Millions is drawn at 10:59 p.m. Eastern time Tuesdays और शुक्रवार, सहित holidays.
आचमन लाखो is administered by a consortium of इसके 12 असली lotteries और the drawings are held at wsb-tv in अटलांटा, जॉर्जिया.
supervised by the Georgia लॉटरी.
The largest jackpot in आचमन लाखो, as खूब as in अमरीकी lottery history, थी $ 656,000,000 annuitized ( साथ a नकदी option of $ 474,000,000 ) for the March 30, 2012 drawing in which वहीँ were तीन jackpot-winning टिकटें ; one each in इलिनोइस, Kansas, and मेरीलैंड.
सब three tickets had महरूम claimed as of अप्रैल 18, with each नियत of winners choosing the cash option.
is a Japanese manga series निर्मित by writer tsugumi Ohba and manga कलाकार Takeshi Obata.
the प्रमुख character is लाइट Yagami, a high school student जो discovers a अलौकिक notebook, the `` मौत Note '', dropped on Earth by a shinigami ( a परमेश्वर of death ) नामित Ryuk.
the Death Note अनुदान इसके उपयोक्ता the क्षमता to मार anyone जिनकी name और face वे जान, by लिखने the नाम in the notebook जबकि picturing their फेस.
the series centers around लाइट 's attempt to create and नियम a world `` cleansed of evil '' as `` God '' using the कोपी, and the प्रयत्न of a जासूस ज्ञात as L to stop उसे.
मौत नोट थी पहला serialized in 108 अध्याय by shueisha in the जापानी manga पत्रिका Weekly shōnen Jump इससे दिसम्बर 2003 to may 2006.
The series थी also प्रकाशित in tankōbon format in जापानी starting in May 2004 और ending in October 2006 with a कुल of तेरह आयतन.
the anime series aired in Japan इससे अक्तूबर 3, 2006, to जून 26, 2007.
रचित of 37 episodes, the anime was developed by madhouse and directed by tetsuro Araki.
A light novel based on the series, लिखा by nisio Isin, was released in जापानी.
additionally, विभिन्न वीडियो games have been published by Konami लिये निन्टेंडो ds.
the series थी adapted into live-action films released in जापानी on June 17, 2006, नवम्बर 3, 2006, and फ़रवरी 2, 2008.
Viz मीडिया licensed the मौत नोट manga in North अमेरिका और has प्रकाशित सब the बारह volumes from the series, a 13th volume which serves as a `` रीडर 's मार्गदर्शिका '', as well as the light novels.
the episodes इससे the दुश्मनी पहला appeared in उत्तर America as downloadable by ign.
viz बाद licensed the anime श्रेणी and it aired on bionix in Canada और on Cartoon संजाल in the United States.

however, none of the वीडियो खेल have यूँ far महरूम प्रकाशित in North अमेरिका or यूरोपीय.
मौत नोट is one of Weekly Shōnen Jumps best-selling manga श्रेणी of सब समय, with बिक्री over 26.5 million copies.
Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a संकुचन of `` सब Hallows ' Evening `` ), also ज्ञात as All hallows ' Eve, is a yearly जश्न observed in a क्रमांक of देशों on अक्तूबर 31, the संध्या of the पश्चिमी Christian feast of सब hallows ( or All संतो ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas.
According to many scholars, All Hallows ' Eve is a christianised feast originally बहकावे by western यूरोपीय कटाई festivals, and festivals of the dead साथ संभावित pagan जड़ें, विशेषकर the Celtic Samhain.
अन्य scholars maintain कि it originated independently of samhain and रै solely ईसाई जड़ें.
Typical त्यौहार हैलोवीन क्रियाएँ include trick-or-treating ( भी known as `` guising `` ), उपस्थित costume parties, नक्काशी pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, apple bobbing, visiting haunted attractions, playing pranks, telling scary stories, और watching हॉरर films.
New यॉर्क City taxicabs during midtown rush घंटा in मैनहटन
the taxicabs of New यॉर्क नगर, साथ उनके distinctive yellow paint, are a widely पहचाना icon of the city.
Taxicabs हैं संचालित by private companies and licensed by the New यॉर्क City टैक्सी और Limousine Commission ( TLC ).

`` medallion टैक्सी, '' the familiar yellow cabs, हैं the तभी वाहनों in the city permitted to चुनें up passengers in response to a गली hail.
schematic क्रॉस section of part of पत्ता, जाइलम shown as रेड circles at figure 8.
Xylem is एक of the two types of transport tissue in vascular पौधे ( phloem is the other ).
the शब्द जाइलम is derived from the Greek शब्द ξύλον ( xylon ), अर्थ `` लकडी '' ; the best-known जाइलम tissue is wood, though it is मिला throughout the संयंत्र.
Its basic फलन is to transport water, लकिन it also transports कुछ nutrients through the संयंत्र.
u.S. women suffragists demonstrating for the right to vote, February 1913.
Women 's suffrage भी known as woman suffrage is the सही of women to vote and to चलाएं लिये दफ्तर.
Limited मतदान rights were gained by women in स्वीडन, फिनलैंड and कुछ western u.S. राज्य in the लेट 19th century.
अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन were formed to coordinate efforts, विशेषकर the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Council of Women ( 1888 ) and the International स्त्री Suffrage गठबंधन ( 1904 ).
in 1893, New जीलैंड, then a self-governing अंग्रेजों उपनिवेश, granted adult women the सही to vote और the self-governing British उपनिवेश of दक्षिण Australia did the same in 1895, लकिन also permitted महिलाओं to run लिये office.
Australia federated in 1901, and महिलाओं acquired the सही to vote and stand in federal elections from 1902, though uneven restrictions on aboriginal महिलाओं मतदान in नेशनल चुनावों यहूद not completely removed until 1962.
the पहला यूरोपीय country to introduce महिलाओं 's suffrage was the Grand duchy of फिनलैंड, then भाग of the Russian साम्राज्य, which भी उत्पादित the संसार 's पहला female members of parliament in the 1907 parliamentary चुनावों.
Norway followed, granting पूरा महिलाओं 's suffrage in 1913.
in most Western देशों, महिलाओं 's suffrage came बाद संसार i War i I, साथ कुछ important लेट adopters being France in 1944 and स्विट्ज़रलैंड in 1971.
Women 's suffrage रै generally been recognized बाद political campaigns to obtain it यहूद waged.
in many देशों it थी granted before universal suffrage.
Women 's suffrage is explicitly stated as a सही अंतर्गत the Convention on the विलोपन of All Forms of पक्षपात Against Women, adopted by the United राष्ट्र in 1979.
the Thirteenth Tale ( 2006 ) by Diane Setterfield is a गोथिक suspense अनोखा, the author 's first published किताब.
यहोवा 's गवाह is a millenarian restorationist ईसाई denomination with nontrinitarian मान्यताओं distinct इससे mainstream Christianity.Sources लिये descriptors : • Millenarian : • Restorationist : • Christian : • Denomination : the organization reports विश्वव्यापी membership of over 7.78 million adherents शामिल in इंजीलवाद, convention attendance of over 12 million, and सालाना मेमोरियल attendance of over 19 लाख.
वे are निर्देशित by the शासी देह of Jehovah 's गवाह, a समूह of elders in ब्रुकलीन, New यॉर्क, कि establishes all doctrines.
यहोवा 's गवाह ' मान्यताओं are based on उनके interpretations of the बाइबल और they prefer to उपयोग उनके अपना अनुवाद, the नई World अनुवाद of the Holy शास्त्रों.
वे believe that the विनाश of the present world system at armageddon is imminent, and that the establishment of God 's kingdom on धरती is the तभी solution for सब problems faced by mankind.
the group emerged from the Bible Student गति —founded in the late 1870s by चार्ल्स taze रसेल साथ the formation of Zion 's देखें मीनार ट्रैक्ट Society —with significant organizational और doctrinal changes under the leadership of Joseph Franklin Rutherford.
The name यहोवा 's witnesses, based on Isaiah 43:10–12, was अपनाया in 1931 to distinguish themselves इससे अन्य बाइबल छात्र groups and symbolize a ब्रेक with the विरासत of Russell 's परंपराओं.
Jehovah 's गवाह हैं best known लिये their door-to-door preaching, distributing literature such as The Watchtower और जाग !
, and refusing military service and रक्त transfusions.
They consider उपयोग of the नाम Jehovah vital for उचित worship.
वे अस्वीकृत Trinitarianism, अंतर्निहित immortality of the आत्मा, और hellfire, जिससे वे consider to be unscriptural doctrines.
वे do नहीं observe क्रिसमस, ईस्टर, birthdays, or अन्य छुट्टियाँ और customs they consider to have pagan origins असंगत with christianity.
adherents commonly refer to their body of मान्यताओं as `` the truth '' और consider themselves to be `` in the सच्चाई ''.
They consider secular society to be morally corrupt और अंतर्गत the influence of शैतानी, and most सीमा their social बातचीत with non-Witnesses.
Congregational अनुशासनात्मक क्रियाएँ शामिल disfellowshipping, उनके term लिये formal expulsion और shunning.
Baptized individuals जो formally leave are माना disassociated and are also shunned.
disfellowshipped और disassociated individuals may eventually be reinstated if deemed repentant.
The धर्म 's position regarding ईमानदार objection to military service और refusal to सलाम नेशनल flags has brought it into conflict with some सरकारें.
नतीजतन, Jehovah 's गवाह have महरूम persecuted and their क्रियाएँ हैं बैन or प्रतिबंधित in some countries.
Persistent legal चुनौतियां by Jehovah 's Witnesses have बहकावे legislation related to सिविल rights in अनेक देशों.
पिछला Tango in पेरिस ( ) is a 1972 Franco-Italian romantic नाटक film directed by बर्नार्डो bertolucci जिससे portrays a recent American widower जो begins an बेनाम यौन संबंध साथ a यंग, betrothed Parisian स्त्री.
it सितारों Marlon ब्रैंडो, Maria श्नाइडर, and jean-pierre Léaud.
The film 's raw portrayal of sexual हिंसा and emotional turmoil led to अंतरराष्ट्रीय controversy और खींचा विभिन्न स्तर of सरकारी सेंसरशिप.
the mpaa दिया the फिल्मी an x दरजा upon release in the संयुक्त States.
बाद revisions were बना to the MPAA ratings code, it थी classified as an nc-17 in 1997.
MGM released a censored r-rated काटें in 1981.
The film has इसके NC-17 दरजा लिये `` some explicit sexual सामग्री. ''
खिड़कियाँ xp is an ऑपरेटिंग system उत्पादित by Microsoft for उपयोग on personal computers, including घर और business desktops, laptops और media centers.
पहला released to कंप्यूटर manufacturers on August 24, 2001, it is the second most लोकप्रिय संस्करण of Windows, based on संस्थापित उपयोक्ता आधार.
The नाम `` xp '' is छोटी लिये `` eXPerience '', highlighting the उन्नत user experience.
Windows xp, the successor to Windows 2000 and खिड़कियाँ me, was the पहला consumer-oriented ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली उत्पादित by Microsoft to be निर्मित on the Windows nt kernel.
खिड़कियाँ XP थी released worldwide लिये खुदरा sale on अक्तूबर 25, 2001, and over 400 लाख copies यहूद in उपयोग in जनवरी 2006.
It was succeeded by खिड़कियाँ Vista in जनवरी 2007.
Direct oem और खुदरा sales of Windows xp ceased on जून 30, 2008.
Microsoft जारी to sell Windows XP through उनके System बिल्डर ( smaller OEMs जो बेचें समवेत कंप्यूटर ) कार्यक्रम until January 31, 2009.
on April 10, 2012, microsoft reaffirmed that विस्तारित support लिये खिड़कियाँ XP और दफ्तर 2003 होता end on अप्रैल 8, 2014 और suggested कि administrators begin preparing to migrate to a newer OS.
the NT -based संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ, which are प्रोग्रामित in C, C++, and assembly, हैं ज्ञात for उनके improved स्थिरता और दक्षता over the 9x versions of Microsoft Windows.
Windows XP presented a significantly redesigned आलेखीय उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस, a change Microsoft promoted as more user-friendly than पिछला versions of Windows.
In an attempt to further ameliorate the `` dll नरक `` that plagued the पास्ट संस्करण of Windows, improved side-by-side assembly technology in Windows xp allows side-by-side संस्थापना, registration और सर्विसिंग of multiple संस्करण of globally shared तन्त्र components in full अलगाव.
it is also the पहला संस्करण of Windows to उपयोग product activation to कॉम्बैट illegal copying.
During Windows xp 's development, the project थी codenamed `` whistler '', after Whistler, अंग्रेजों Columbia, as many microsoft कर्मचारी skied at the whistler-blackcomb ski resort.
According to web analytics आंकड़ा उत्पन्न by जाल Applications, खिड़कियाँ XP was the most widely used operating प्रणाली until August 2012, जब Windows 7 overtook it.
, Windows XP market share is at 38.99 %, having decreased लगभग every month since at तनिक November 2007, the पहला month for which आंकडे are सरेआम उपलब्धियाँ from Net Applications.
`` Por una cabeza '' is an Argentine tango with music और lyrics written in 1935 by Carlos gardel and Alfredo Le प्रभा क्रमशः.
the name is a Spanish horse-racing phrase अर्थ `` by a सिर '', जिससे refers to a घोड़ा जीतना a race by the length of one सिर.
The गीत speak of a बाध्यता horse-track जुआरी जो compares his व्यसन लिये घोड़े with his attraction to महिलाओं.
अल्फ्रेडो le प्रभा was a ब्राज़ीलियाई इससे são Paulo, a much italian-influenced क्षेत्रफल in Brazil, and also the birthplace of Zequinha de Abreu, composer of tico-tico no Fubá.
Le प्रभा और gardel died in an airplane crash in medellín, ( Colombia ), on जून 24, 1935.
Por ऊना Cabeza
the टैंगो रै चूंकि महरूम performed by numerous टैंगो orchestras.
टैंगो दृश्यों with `` पोर una cabeza '' appear in Delicatessen ( 1991 ), Scent of a स्त्री ( 1992 ), schindler 's List ( 1993 ), सच्चा Lies ( 1994 ), टाइटैनिक ( 1996 ), Bad Santa ( Uncut Version, 2003 ), All the किंग 's Men ( 2006 ), Planet 51 ( 2009 ), episode 37 of Nip/Tuck ( 2003–2010 ), episode 9 of South कोरियाई नाटक श्रेणी Sweet Spy ( 2005–08 ), the beginning and ending credits of the South कोरियाई नाटक ब्रॉडकास्ट i 'm Sorry, i Love You ( 2004 ), and the episode `` Down the Rabbit Hole `` ( 2007 ).
in the movie Frida ( सलमा हायेक, 2002 ), Gardel is सुना singing it on a radio.
it is also quoted in दाउद Del Tredici 's `` शुभ न्यूज !
nilda is वापस '' ( from the सोंग cycle Miz inez sez ).
in सैंट of a स्त्री ( 1992 ), the tango is performed by the `` The टैंगो प्रोजेक्ट '', who दरअसल appear in the नाचना scene starring al पचिनो ( the रिकॉर्डिंग प्रयुक्त is available on one of उनके cd albums ).
John Williams arranged a version of the टुकड़ा कि appears on the album `` सिनेमा Serenade '' साथ the सारंगी सोलो performed by Itzhak Perlman.
Perlman और Williams ( conducting ) have भी performed the piece together in live concerts.
in 2012 a नृत्य संस्करण was released by the समूह `` da करेरा '' featuring the असली vocal recording by कार्लोस gardel.
The baroreflex or baroreceptor reflex is एक of the body 's homeostatic mechanisms लिये maintaining रक्त pressure.
It provides a negative feedback लूप in which an elevated रक्त pressure reflexively causes दिल rate to decrease इसलिए causing रक्त pressure to decrease ; likewise, decreased रक्त pressure activates the baroreflex, causing दिल rate to increase thus causing an increase in रक्त pressure.
The प्रणाली relies on specialized न्यूरॉन्स, known as baroreceptors, in the aortic arch, carotid साइनस, and elsewhere to monitor परिवर्तन in blood दबाव और रिले उन्हें to the brainstem.
Subsequent परिवर्तन in blood दबाव are mediated by the autonomic बेचैन system.
Atrial natriuretic पेप्टाइड फ़ॉर्म a समानांतर negative feedback loop in an endocrinological कंट्रास्ट to the renin-angiotensin प्रणाली.
the loma prieta earthquake, भी known as the भूकंप of '89 and the संसार श्रेणी भूकंप, थी a प्रमुख भूकंप कि struck the सैन फ्रांसिस्को Bay क्षेत्रफल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया on October 17, 1989, at 5:04 pm local time.
caused by a स्लिप along the San andreas Fault, the quake lasted 10–15 सेकेंड and measured 6.9 on दोनो the पल magnitude scale ( surface-wave परिमाण 7.1 ) and on the open-ended रिक्टर Scale.
The quake killed 63 people throughout उत्तरी California, injured 3,757 और left some 3,000–12,000 people homeless.
The भूकंप occurred during the warm-up practice for the third game of the 1989 संसार Series, featuring दोनो of the Bay Area 's प्रमुख लीग Baseball teams, the Oakland एथलेटिक्स and the San Francisco Giants.
Because of game-related खेल coverage, इस was the first प्रमुख भूकंप in the United राज्य to have इसके आरंभिक धक्का broadcast सजीव on television.
Pawn in the standard staunton पैटर्न
the pawn ( ♙♟ ) is the most numerous और in most हालातों the weakest टुकड़ा in the game of chess, historically representing infantry or, अधिक विशेषकर, armed peasants or pikemen.
In chess, प्रत्येक खिलाड़ी begins the खेल साथ आठ pawns, one on each वर्गाकार of the rank immediately in सामने of the other pieces.
( In बीजीय notation, the white प्यादे प्रारंभ on a2, b2, c2,..., h2, जबकि ब्लैक प्यादे start on a7, b7, c7,..., h7. )
व्यक्तिगत प्यादे are referred to by the संचिका on जिससे they stand.
लिये उदाहरण, one बोलती of `` श्वेत 's f-pawn '' or `` Black 's b-pawn '', or less commonly ( using वर्णनात्मक संकेतन ), `` White 's king 's bishop साहूकार '' or `` ब्लैक 's महारानी 's knight साहूकार ''.
It is also common to refer to a rook साहूकार, अर्थ कोई pawn on the a- or h-file, a नाईट pawn ( on the b- or g-file ), a बिशप pawn ( on the c- or f-file ), a queen साहूकार ( on the d-file ), a किंग pawn ( on the e-file ), and a सेंट्रल साहूकार ( on either the d- or e-file ).
the military forces of the संसार have differing approaches to the enlistment of homosexual ( gay and लेस्बियन ) and द्विलिंगी individuals.
the armed शक्तियां of सबसे विकसित देशों have अभी removed नीतियों excluding non-heterosexual individuals ( with strict नीतियों on यौन उत्पीड़न ).
Nations that permit gay लोगों to serve openly in the military include the 4 of the 5 सदस्यों of the un सुरक्षा Council ( संयुक्त States, संयुक्त Kingdom, फ़्रांस, और रूस ), the गणतंत्र of China ( Taiwan ), Australia, इसराईल, दक्षिण Africa, अर्जेंटीना, and all नाटो सदस्यों excluding तुर्कों.
Hydrogen production is the परिवार of industrial methods लिये generating हाइड्रोजन.
Currently the dominant technology for सीधा production is steam reforming from hydrocarbons.
Many अन्य विधि हैं ज्ञात including electrolysis and thermolysis.
in 2006, the संयुक्त राज्य was estimated to have a उत्पादन क्षमता of 11 million टन of हाइड्रोजन.
5 लाख टन of हाइड्रोजन were consumed on-site in oil refining, and in the उत्पादन of अमोनिया ( Haber process ) and methanol ( कटौती of carbon monoxide ).
0.4 लाख tonnes were an incidental by-product of the chlor-alkali process.
Hydrogen उत्पादन is an estimated $ 100 billion industry.
A आधार point ( प्रायः denoted as bp, colloquially referred to in the बहुवचन as `` bips '', भी ज्ञात as a `` beep '' ) is a unit equal to एक hundredth of a प्रतिशत पाइंट, or one part per टेन हजार, 1/10000.
the वही ईकाई is भी ( rarely ) called a permyriad, literally meaning 'for ( every ) असंख्य ( ten हजार ) ', and in कि context is written with which looks like a प्रतिशत चिह्न ( % ) साथ दो अतिरिक्त zeroes at the end ( जैसे a stylized form of the four zeros in the denominator, हालांकि it originates as a प्राकृतिक एक्सटेंशन of the percent ( % ) and permille ( ‰ ) लक्षण ).
A basis point is पारिभाषित as:
1 basis पाइंट = 1 permyriad = एक one-hundredth प्रतिशत
1 bp = 1 = 0.01 % = 0.1‰ = 10−4 = = 0.0001
1 % = 100 bp = 100
आधार अंक हैं used as a सुविधाजनक ईकाई of मापन in contexts जहाँ प्रतिशत differences of less than 1 % हैं discussed.
the सबसे common उदाहरण is ब्याज दरों, where differences in ब्याज दरों of less than 1 % per year हैं प्रायः meaningful to talk परिचय.
For example, a अंतर of 0.10 percentage points is equivalent to a change of 10 आधार अंक ( e.g. a 4.67 % रेट increases by 10 basis अंक to 4.77 % ).
जैसे percentage points, basis अंक avoid the ambiguity between सापेक्ष और absolute चर्चाएँ परिचय interest rates by dealing तभी with the absolute बदलें in numeric value of a rate.
For example, if a रपट says there has been a `` 1 % increase '' from a 10 % ब्याज रेट, this could refer to an बढ़ाएँ either from 10 % to 10.1 % ( relative, 1 % of 10 % ), or इससे 10 % to 11 % ( निरपेक्ष, 1 % प्लस 10 % ).
if, however, the रपट says there रै महरूम a `` 10 आधार point बढ़ाएँ '' from a 10 % ब्याज रेट, then we know that the interest रेट of 10 % has increased by 0.10 % ( the निरपेक्ष बदलें ) to a 10.1 % rate.
it is आम अभ्यास in the वित्तीय उद्योग to use आधार अंक to denote a rate बदलें in a financial instrument, or the अंतर ( स्प्रेड ) between दो ब्याज दरों, सहित the yields of fixed-income securities.
Since certain लोन और bonds may commonly be कोटेड in relation to कुछ अनुक्रमणिका or underlying सुरक्षा, वे will often be quoted as a स्प्रेड over ( or अंतर्गत ) the अनुक्रमणिका.
लिये example, a loan कि bears ब्याज of 0.50 % per annum ऊपर the London Interbank offered रेट ( LIBOR ) is कहा to be 50 आधार अंक over LIBOR, जिससे is commonly expressed as `` l+50bps '' or simply `` L+50 ''.
the पद `` आधार पाइंट '' रै its origins in व्यापार the `` basis '' or the स्प्रेड between two interest rates.
Since the basis is usually छोटी, ये हैं quoted multiplied up by 10000, और hence a `` full point '' गति in the `` basis '' is a आधार point.
Contrast with pips in FX forward markets.
The relationship between percentage परिवर्तन and आधार अंक can be summarized as follows : 1 percentage point change = 100 आधार points, and 0.01 प्रतिशत अंक = 1 आधार पाइंट.
So, a बंध जिनकी उपज increases इससे 5 % to 5.5 % is कहा to बढ़ाएँ by 50 आधार अंक ; or ब्याज rates that have risen 1 प्रतिशत पाइंट are said to have increased by 100 basis points.
The अंग्रेजों royal Family is the group of बंद रिश्तेदारों of the monarch of the संयुक्त Kingdom.
the term is also commonly applied to the वही समूह of लोगों who हैं the संबंध of the monarch in her or उसके role as sovereign of any of the अन्य Commonwealth realms, यूँ sometimes at variance with आधिकारिक national terms लिये the family.
सदस्यों of the royal परिवार belong to, either by birth or विवाह, the हाउस of Windsor, since 1917, जब George v बदला the name of the royal house from saxe-coburg and gotha.
इस निर्णय was primarily लिया because ब्रिटेन और her साम्राज्य were at युद्ध साथ जर्मनी and दिए the अंग्रेजों royal परिवार 's strong जर्मनी ancestry ; it थी felt कि इसके public चित्र could be improved by चुनना a अधिक अंग्रेजों house name.
The नई नाम चुनी, Windsor, था बिल्कुल no कनेक्शन other than as the नाम of the किला which थी और continues to be a royal residence.
हालांकि in the United किंगडम वहीँ is no strict विधिक or औपचारिक definition of जो is or is not a सदस्य of the royal परिवार, और अलग lists होगा शामिल different people, those carrying the style उसके or उसके Majesty ( HM ), or उसके or उसके royal highness ( hrh ) हैं सदा माना members, which usually results in the application of the term to the monarch, the consort of the monarch, the widowed consorts of previous monarchs, the children of the monarch और पिछला monarchs, the male-line grandchildren of the monarch और पिछला monarchs, and the spouses और the widows of a monarch 's and पिछला monarch 's sons और male-line grandsons.
on 30 November 1917, King George v जारी अक्षर पेटेंट defining who are members of the royal परिवार ; the टेक्स्ट of the सूचना इससे the लंदन गजट is as follows:

सदस्यों और रिश्तेदारों of the अंग्रेजों Royal परिवार historically represented the monarch in various places throughout the British साम्राज्य, sometimes लिये विस्तारित periods as viceroys, or for specific ceremonies or कार्यक्रम.
आज, they often perform ceremonial और social कर्तव्य throughout the संयुक्त किंगडम और abroad on behalf of the संयुक्त किंगडम.
aside इससे the monarch, उनके तभी संवैधानिक भूमिका in the अफेयर्स of government is to serve, if eligible और जब नियुक्त by letters पेटेंट, as a Counsellor of राज्य, two or अधिक of whom exercise the प्राधिकार of the Crown ( भीतर stipulated limits ) in the indisposal or अनुपस्थिति from the अंग्रेजों realm of the monarch.
in the अन्य realms of the Commonwealth royalty do not serve as counsellors of State.
However in each ऐसे realm the monarch 's परिवार सदस्यों may अधिनियम on निमित्त of, are वित्तपोषित by, और represent the sovereign of that particular state, और नहीं the संयुक्त किंगडम.
the महारानी, her consort, उसके children और grandchildren, as well as सब former sovereigns ' children and grandchildren थाम places in the पहला भाग of the official आदेश of पूर्वता in England and Wales, Scotland, और Northern आयरलैंड.
Wives of the said आनंद their husbands ' पूर्वता, and husbands of princesses हैं unofficially लकिन habitually लगाई साथ उनके पत्नियां as well.
However, the महारानी changed the निजी order of precedence in the royal परिवार in पक्ष of Princesses ऐनी और Alexandra, who henceforth take निजी पूर्वता over the Duchess of कॉर्नवॉल, जो is वरना the फ्रेम 's highest रैंकिंग woman after the महारानी herself.
She किया not alter the सापेक्ष precedence of अन्य born-princesses, such as the daughters of उसके younger बेटे.
हैती ( ; Haitian Creole Ayiti ), officially the Republic of Haiti ( ; ), is a caribbean देश.
it occupies the पश्चिमी, smaller portion of the द्वीप of हिस्पानिओला, in the Greater Antillean archipelago, जिससे it साझा साथ the Dominican गणतंत्र.
Ayiti ( जमीन of ऊँची kyu ) थी the indigenous Taíno or amerindian name for the द्वीप.
The country 's highest point is pic la Selle, at.
The कुल area of हैती is and its capital is port-au-prince.
Haitian Creole and फ्रेंच are the आधिकारिक languages.
Haiti 's क्षेत्रीय, historical, और ethno-linguistic स्थिति is unique लिये several reasons.
It थी the पहला स्वतंत्र स्वदेश of Latin अमेरिका and the Caribbean, the पहला black -led republic in the संसार, and the second गणतंत्र in the americas जब it gained independence in 1804 as part of a कामयाब slave क्रान्ति स्थायी nearly a दशक.
In 2012, Haiti announced इसके इरादे to seek संबद्ध membership औकात in the African Union.
Haiti is the most populous of the predominantly francophone स्वतंत्र राष्ट्र in the americas.
It is one of तभी two independent राष्ट्र in the Americas ( along साथ Canada ) to designate French as an official language ; the other French-speaking क्षेत्रों हैं all overseas départements, or collectivités, of फ़्रांस.
Haiti is the सबसे populous पूरा member-state of the caribbean जातियाँ ( CARICOM ).
It is the poorest country in the Americas as measured by the इंसान Development Index.
राजनैतिक violence has occurred regularly throughout इसके इतिहास, अग्रणी to government instability.
Most recently, in February 2004, a तख्तापलट d'état originating in the उत्तर of the देश मजबूर the इस्तीफा और निर्वासन of अध्यक्ष Jean-Bertrand Aristide.
a provisional government took कंट्रोल with security provided by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र Stabilization Mission in हैती ( minustah ).
michel martelly, the वर्तमान president, थी निर्वाचित in the haitian general चुनाव, 2011.
the द्वीप has had a इतिहास of destructive earthquakes.
a 7.0 magnitude भूकंप struck Haiti on 12 January 2010 और तबाह port-au-prince.
the highest reliable death गिनती was estimated at 220,000.
haitian सरकारी estimates यहूद higher.
The अध्यक्षीय palace, पार्लियामेंट और many अन्य important structures were नष्ट, along with countless घरों और businesses, leaving hundreds of thousands of people बेघर.
the country has yet to recover इससे the 2010 भूकंप ( और subsequent incidents ) due to दोनो the गंभीरता of the damage Haiti endured in 2010, as खूब as a सरकारी that was अप्रभावी well पहले the भूकंप.
United राज्य aid organizations have donated $ 2 अरब.
संयुक्त साथ अन्य अंतरराष्ट्रीय donations, ये निधि हैं intended to contribute to the पुनर्निर्माण of the देश.
The खूनी Beetroots is the pseudonym of Sir Bob Cornelius Rifo, the इतालवी electro हाउस and dance-punk म्यूज़िक producer, dj and photographer.
The Bloody Beetroots is well-known लिये the black Venom mask he wears during performances.

a Motorola Advisor alphanumeric पेजर प्रयुक्त in ब्राज़ील in the 1990s, संचालित by teletrim
a पेजर is a wireless दूरसंचार यंत्र कि receives and displays numeric or टेक्स्ट messages, or receives और announces voice संदेश.
one-way pagers can only receive संदेश, while जवाब pagers and two-way pagers can भी acknowledge, reply to, और originate संदेश using an आतंरिक ट्रांसमीटर.
pagers operate as भाग of a paging प्रणाली जिससे शामिल one or अधिक fixed ट्रांसमीटरों ( or in the case of response pagers and two-way pagers, एक or अधिक आधार stations ), as well as a number of pagers carried by mobile users.
These प्रणालियों can दायरा इससे a restaurant प्रणाली साथ a single low-power ट्रांसमीटर, to a nationwide प्रणाली साथ हज़ारों of high-power आधार स्टेशन.
एक of the पहला practical paging services थी शुभारम्भ in 1950 for physicians in the New York नगर क्षेत्रफल.
Physicians paid us $ 12 per month for the सेवा और carried a ( 6 oz ) पेजर that would receive phone messages भीतर ( 25 mi ) of a सिंगल transmitter मीनार.
The system थी manufactured by the Reevesound कम्पनी and संचालित by telanswerphone.
in 1960, John फ्रांसिस Mitchell संयुक्त तत्व of मोटोरोला 's walkie talkie और automobile रेडियो technologies to create the पहला transistorized पेजर, और from इस पाइंट, paging technology जारी to advance, and पेजर adoption जारी to expand, जबतक the early 1990s.
however, by the mid-1990s, as सेल्यूलर technologies became cheaper and more widely available, उन्नत services began to displace paging as a commercial उत्पाद.
आज, pagers मौजूद largely as niche products, ढूंढना preferential उपयोग in अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as अस्पताल, public safety, और retail स्थितियाँ जहाँ their simplicity, high विश्वसनीयता, and low cost represent significant advantages.
Reevesville is a कस्बा in dorchester काउंटी, South कैरोलिना, United States.
The population थी 196 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.

frida Kahlo de Rivera ( born Magdalena कार्मेन Frieda Kahlo y Calderón ; July 6, 1907 – जुलाई 13, 1954 ) was a मैक्सिकन चित्रकार, born in Coyoacán, who is बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये her self-portraits.
Kahlo 's life began और ended in Mexico नगर, in her घर known as the Blue हाउस.
वो gave उसके birth date as जुलाई 7, 1910, लकिन उसके birth प्रमाणपत्र shows July 6, 1907.
kahlo था allegedly चाही the year of her जनम to coincide with the साल of the शुरूआत of the मैक्सिकन क्रान्ति so कि उसके life होता शुरू with the birth of modern Mexico.
Her कार्य has been मनाये in मैक्सिको as emblematic of नेशनल and indigenous परंपरा, and by feminists लिये its uncompromising चित्रण of the मादा experience and form.
मैक्सिकन culture और amerindian cultural tradition are महत्वपूर्ण in उसके work, which रै been sometimes characterized as naïve आर्ट or folk art.
उसके कार्य has also महरूम वर्णित as `` surrealist '', and in 1938 आंद्रे Breton, principal initiator of the surrealist गति, described kahlo 's art as a `` रिबन around a बमबारी ''.
Kahlo had a volatile marriage with the प्रसिद्ध मैक्सिकन artist Diego रिवेरा.
वो suffered lifelong स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं.
Many of her health समस्याएं were the परिणाम of a ट्रैफ़िक accident वो survived as a किशोरावस्था.
Recovering इससे her injuries पृथक उसके from अन्य people और this अलगाव influenced her works, many of which हैं self-portraits of एक sort or another.
kahlo सुझाया, `` I पेंट myself because i am so प्रायः अलोन and क्युकी i am the विषय i know best. ''
वो भी stated, `` I was born a bitch.
I was born a painter. ''

theresienwiese on the दिन पहले Oktoberfest 2006
oktoberfest is a 16-day पर्व celebrating बियर आयोजित annually in Munich, बायर्न, Germany, running from late September to the first weekend in अक्तूबर.
it is one of the most प्रसिद्ध events in Germany और is the संसार 's largest fair, with अधिक than 6 लाख people इससे around the संसार attending the event प्रत्येक साल.
to the locals, it is नहीं called Oktoberfest, but `` die wiesn '', after the colloquial नाम of the fairgrounds themselves.
the oktoberfest is an important part of bar culture, having महरूम आयोजित since 1810.
Other शहरों across the world also hold Oktoberfest जश्न, modeled बाद the असली Munich event.
The Munich oktoberfest originally took प्लेस during the sixteen days up to, और including, the first संडे in October.
In 1994, the schedule was परिवर्धित in response to जर्मनी reunification so कि if the first Sunday in अक्तूबर जलप्रपात on the 1st or 2nd, तब the festival होता go on जबतक अक्तूबर 3 ( German एकता दिन ).
Thus, the festival is अभी 17 days जब the first Sunday is October 2 and 18 days when it is October 1.
in 2010, the पर्व lasted until the first Monday in अक्तूबर, to mark the anniversary of the इवेंट.
The festival is आयोजित in an क्षेत्रफल नामित the theresienwiese ( field, or meadow, of therese ), often पुकारा wiesn लिये छोटी, स्तिथ near म्यूनिख 's बीच.
Large quantities of Oktoberfest Beer are खपत, with almost 7 लाख liters served दौरान the 16 day पर्व in 2007.
विज़िटर may also आनंद a चौड़ी variety of traditional खाना ऐसे as hendl ( मुर्गा ), schweinebraten ( रोस्ट pork ), schweinshaxe ( ग्रील्ड ham hock ), steckerlfisch ( ग्रील्ड मछली on a stick ), würstl ( sausages ) साथ with brezeln ( pretzel ), knödel ( आलू or ब्रैड पकौड़ी ), käsespätzle ( cheese नूडल्स ), Reiberdatschi ( आलू pancakes ), sauerkraut or rotkohl/blaukraut ( रेड cabbage ) along साथ ऐसे bar delicacies as obatzda ( a spiced cheese-butter स्प्रेड ) और weisswurst ( a श्वेत सॉसेज ).

Wheels of gouda
Cheese is a generic term for a diverse group of milk-based खाना products.
चीज is produced in wide-ranging flavors, textures, and forms.
चीज consists of proteins and मोटे from मिल्क, प्रायः the मिल्क of cows, भैंस, बकरियों, or शीप.
it is produced by coagulation of the milk प्रोटीन casein.
Typically, the मिल्क is acidified और addition of the enzyme rennet causes जामन.
the solids are अलग और pressed into final form.
कुछ cheeses have molds on the rind or throughout.
सबसे cheeses melt at कुकिंग temperature.
Hundreds of types of cheese इससे विभिन्न देशों are उत्पादित.
उनके styles, बनावट और जायका depend on the उत्पत्ति of the milk ( सहित the animal 's diet ), whether they have महरूम pasteurized, the butterfat content, the जीवाणु और mold, the processing, और aging.
herbs, मसाले, or wood smoke may be used as flavoring agents.
the पीला to red रंग of many cheeses, ऐसे as Red Leicester, is सामान्यतः formed इससे adding annatto.
For a few cheeses, the milk is curdled by adding acids such as vinegar or lemon juice.
Most cheeses हैं acidified to a lesser उपाधि by जीवाणु, which फेरे milk sugars into लैक्टिक acid, तब the जोड of rennet completes the curdling.
शाकाहारी alternatives to rennet are available ; most हैं उत्पादित by fermentation of the कवक mucor miehei, but others have महरूम निकाली from various प्रजाति of the Cynara thistle family.
Cheese is valued for its portability, long जीवन, और high सामग्री of मोटे, प्रोटीन, calcium, और phosphorus.
Cheese is more compact and रै a longer shelf जीवन than milk, although how long a cheese will रखना may निर्भर on the प्रकार of चीज ; labels on पैकेट्स of cheese प्रायः अर्जी that a चीज should be खपत भीतर three to पाँच days of खोलने.
generally speaking, hard cheeses पिछला longer than soft cheeses, such as Brie or goat 's milk चीज.
Cheesemakers निकट a dairy प्रदेश may लाभ इससे fresher, lower-priced मिल्क, और lower shipping लागत.
the long storage life of some चीज, विशेषकर if it is encased in a सुरक्षात्मक rind, allows selling when markets हैं अनुकूल.
Additional संघटक may be added to some cheeses, ऐसे as black मिर्च, garlic, chives or cranberries.
A विशेषज्ञ विक्रेता of चीज is sometimes ज्ञात as a cheesemonger.
to become an विशेषज्ञ in इस field, जैसे wine or कुकिंग, requires कुछ formal शिक्षा और सालो of चख और hands-on experience.
This position is typically जिम्मेदार लिये all पहलुओं of the चीज inventory ; selecting the cheese menu, खरीदना, receiving, storage, and ripening.
विधिक citation सिग्नल are a set of ब्रैड abbreviated वाक्यांश or शब्द used to clarify the प्राधिकार or significance of a legal citation as it relates to a proposition.
सिग्नल help a reader quickly discern meaning or उपयोगिता of a particular reference जब the सन्दर्भ itself करता नहीं provide पर्याप्त सूचना.
Most citation सिग्नल हैं लगाई in सामने of the citation to which they apply.
लिये example, in the अनुच्छेद जब writing a विधिक argument, it is important to refer to प्राथमिक स्त्रोत.
to assist पाठक in locating these स्त्रोत, it is वांछनीय to use a मानकीकृत citation format.
देखिए generally Harvard Law Review Association, the Bluebook : A वर्दी System of citation ( 18th ed. 2005 ).
Note, however, that some न्यायालयों may आवश्यकता कोई विधिक papers that are submitted to उन्हें to conform to a अलग citation format.
the signal is the phrase `` देखिए generally, '' जिससे indicates कि the citation `` The Bluebook : A Uniform प्रणाली of citation ( 18th ed. 2005 ) '' provides सामान्य background सूचना on the टॉपिक.
Neil Alden Armstrong ( अगस्त 5, 1930 – August 25, 2012 ) was an अमरीकी astronaut और the पहला व्यक्ति to walk on the चंद्रमा.
he थी भी an aerospace इंजीनियर, नवल aviator, test pilot, और university प्राध्यापक.
पहले becoming an astronaut, आर्मस्ट्रांग थी an अधिकारी in the U.S. नेवी और served in the Korean War.
बाद the war, he अर्जित उसके bachelor 's degree at purdue University and served as a test पायलट at the नेशनल Advisory कमेटी लिये aeronautics High-Speed Flight स्टेशन, now ज्ञात as the ड्राइडेन Flight शोध बीच, जहाँ he logged over 900 flights.
he बाद समाप्त graduate studies at the University of Southern California.
a भागीदार in the u.S. Air Force 's Man in स्पेस soonest and X-20 Dyna-Soar इंसान spaceflight कार्यक्रम, Armstrong joined the नासा astronaut Corps in 1962.
He बना उसके पहला space उड़ान, as command pilot of मिथुन 8, in 1966, becoming NASA 's first civilian astronaut to fly in स्पेस.
on इस मिशन, he performed the first docking of दो spacecraft, with पायलट दाउद स्कॉट.
Armstrong 's दूसरी और last spaceflight थी as मिशन commander of the अपोलो 11 चंद्रमा लैंडिंग, in July 1969.
On this मिशन, आर्मस्ट्रांग और बज़ Aldrin descended to the चंद्र surface और खर्च two and a half hours exploring, जबकि माइकल कॉलिन्स remained in lunar orbit in the कमांड Module.
साथ with Collins और एल्ड्रिन, आर्मस्ट्रांग was awarded the अध्यक्षीय पदक of Freedom by President Richard Nixon ; in 1978, President jimmy कार्टर प्रस्तुत Armstrong the congressional Space पदक of सम्मान in 1978 ; he और his पूर्व crewmates received the Congressional Gold Medal in 2009.
Armstrong died in सिनसिनाटी, Ohio, on अगस्त 25, 2012, at the age of 82, after complications from coronary धमनी बायपास सर्जरी.
Secretariat ( कूच 30, 1970 – October 4, 1989 ) was an अमरीकी Thoroughbred racehorse that in 1973 became the पहला u.s. Triple क्राउन चैंपियन in 25 years.
he set रेस records in सब तीन कार्यक्रम in the श्रेणी — the केंटकी Derby ( 1:59.4 ), the Preakness Stakes ( 1:53 ), and the Belmont stakes ( 2:24 ) — records कि still स्टैंड आज.
he is considered to be one of the greatest thoroughbreds of all समय.
in 1999, ESPN क्रमित सचिवालय the 35th best खिलाड़ी of the 20th century, the highest रैंकिंग racehorse on the सूची URL_http.
he क्रमित second behind Man o ' युद्ध in the blood-horse 's सूची of the शीर्ष 100 u.S. racehorses of the 20th Century.
Secretariat was sired by Bold Ruler out of Somethingroyal, by princequillo.
He थी foaled at the मर्ग in कैरोलीन County, वर्जिनिया.
Like his famous predecessor Man o ' War, Secretariat was a विशाल शाहबलूत colt और was given the same उपनाम, `` Big Red. ''
सचिवालय 's grandsire, nasrullah, is भी the great-great-grandsire of 1977 ट्रिपल Crown विजेता सिएटल slew.
Owned by Penny Chenery, he was trained by lucien laurin and mainly ridden by कनाडाई jockey Ron Turcotte, along साथ प्रशिक्षु jockey पॉल Feliciano ( पहला दो races ), and veteran एडी Maple ( last रेस ).
He raced in chenery 's Meadow Stable 's blue और श्वेत checkered रंगों and उसके दूल्हे थी एडी Sweat.
सचिवालय stood लगभग tall, और weighed, साथ a 75-inch girth, in उसके रेसिंग prime.
मैड्रिड (, ) is the पूंजी और largest city of Spain.
the जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर is roughly 3.3 लाख and the entire population of the Madrid महानगर क्षेत्रफल is calculated to be around 6.5 लाख.
it is the third-largest city in the European संघ, बाद London और Berlin, and its metropolitan area is the third-largest in the यूरोपीय संघ after लंदन and Paris.
the city spans a कुल of.
the city is located on the Manzanares river in the centre of both the देश और the जातियाँ of मैड्रिड ( जिससे comprises the city of मैड्रिड, its conurbation और extended उपनगरों और villages ) ; this जातियाँ is bordered by the autonomous समुदायों of castile और león and Castile-La मांचा.
as the capital city of Spain, seat of सरकारी, and निवास of the Spanish monarch, मैड्रिड is also the political, economic और cultural केन्द्र of Spain.
the current mayor is Ana Botella इससे the लोगों 's Party ( pp ).
the Madrid शहरी agglomeration रै the third-largest जीडीपी in the यूरोपीय Union और इसके प्रभाव in politics, शिक्षा, entertainment, environment, media, fashion, विज्ञान, संस्कृति, और the arts सब contribute to its औकात as one of the संसार 's major global शहरों.
Due to its आर्थिक आउटपुट, ऊँची मानक of जीना, और market आकार, Madrid is considered the major वित्तीय केन्द्र of दक्षिणी Europe और the इबेरिया प्रायद्वीप ; it होस्ट the head offices of the विशाल बहुमत of the major Spanish कंपनियाँ, ऐसे as Telefónica, Iberia or repsol.
मैड्रिड is the सबसे touristic city of स्पेन, the fourth-most touristic of the महाद्वीप, और the seventh most visited city in the संसार according to Forbes.
is the 10th सबसे livable city in the संसार according to Monocle magazine, in its 2010 index.
Madrid भी बाँधने among the 12 greenest यूरोपीय शहरों in 2010. < ref name= '' एचटीटीपी : //www.citymayors.com/environment/greenest-cities-europe.html '' > Madrid is फिलहाल a प्रत्याशी नगर for the 2020 Summer ओलंपिक.
मैड्रिड houses the headquarters of the संसार Tourism Organization ( wto ), belonging to the संयुक्त Nations Organization ( un ), the segib, the Organization of ibero-american राज्य ( OEI ), and the Public ब्याज Oversight Board ( PIOB ).
It भी hosts major international institutions regulators of Spanish : the Standing कमेटी of the संघ of Spanish भाषा Academies, मुख्यालय of the royal Spanish अकादमी ( RAE ), the Cervantes संस्थान और the Foundation of Urgent स्पेनी ( Fundéu ).
मैड्रिड organizes fairs as FITUR, ARCO, simo tci and the Cibeles Madrid Fashion सप्ताह.
While Madrid possesses a modern अवसंरचना, it रै preserved the dekh and महसूस of many of इसके ऐतिहासिक neighbourhoods और streets.
इसके landmarks शामिल the Royal Palace of मैड्रिड ; the Teatro Real ( royal theatre ) with इसके लौटी 1850 ओपेरा House ; the Buen Retiro Park, संस्थापित in 1631 ; the 19th-century नेशनल Library भवन ( संस्थापित in 1712 ) containing some of Spain 's historical archives ; a large number of National museums, and the सुनहरी त्रिभुज of Art, स्तिथ साथ the Paseo del प्राडो and comprising three आर्ट संग्रहालय : प्राडो Museum, the Museo Nacional Centro de arte Reina sofía, a museum of modern art, and the thyssen-bornemisza संग्रहालय, which completes the shortcomings of the अन्य दो संग्रहालय.
cibeles Palace and Fountain have become the स्मारक symbol of the city.
the पाथ of the Via appia और of the Via appia traiana.
Remains of the Appian Way in Rome, near quarto Miglio
निकट Rome.
The Appian Way ( लैटिन और Italian : Via appia ) थी एक of the earliest और रणनीतिक most महत्वपूर्ण रोमन सड़कें of the प्राचीन गणतंत्र.
It connected Rome to brindisi, Apulia, in southeast Italy.
इसके महत्व is indicated by इसके common नाम, recorded by statius :
Appia teritur regina longarum viarum
`` the Appian रास्ता is the महारानी of the long सड़कें ''
The road is नामित बाद Appius Claudius Caecus, the Roman censor जो began and completed the पहला खण्ड as a military सड़क to the south in 312 BC during the Samnite Wars.
the Draupner wave, a सिंगल दानव वेव measured on नई Year 's दिन 1995, आखिरकार पुष्टि the existence of freak waves, जिससे था previously महरूम considered near-mythical
दुष्ट waves ( भी known as freak लहरें, दानव waves, killer waves, extreme waves, और abnormal waves ) are अपेक्षाकृत विशाल और spontaneous समंदर surface waves कि occur far out at sea, and हैं a threat भी to large जहाजों and समंदर liners.
In oceanography, they are अधिक precisely defined as waves whose ऊँचाई is more than twice the significant wave ऊँचाई ( swh ), जिससे is itself defined as the औसत of the largest third of waves in a wave रिकार्ड.
Therefore दुष्ट waves are नहीं necessarily the biggest लहरें found at समुद्र ; वे हैं, rather, surprisingly large लहरें for a दिए sea state.
दुष्ट waves seem not to have a single distinct कारण, लकिन occur जहाँ physical factors such as ऊँची हवाएँ and दमदार currents cause waves to विलय to create a सिंगल exceptionally विशाल वेव.
Electress sophia of हनोवर ( 1630–1714 )
The लकीर of succession to the British सिंहासन is the ordered अनुक्रम of सब those people योग्य to सफल to the सिंहासन of the संयुक्त Kingdom and the other 15 राष्ट्रमंडल realms.
The Act of उपनिवेश 1701 bestowed उत्तराधिकार on the Electress sophia of Hanover और her descendants while excluding रोमन catholics.
The अंग्रेजों government does not प्रकाशित an official सूची of सब those in लकीर to succeed, but the work of genealogical लेखक और amateur researchers suggests कि वहीँ are several हजार लोगों potentially in लकीर.
at a समिट in Perth, Western Australia in 2011, the heads of government of सब 16 राष्ट्रमंडल realms agreed to लो steps to अपनाना absolute primogeniture, end the exclusion of लोगों शादीशुदा to Roman Catholics, और मेक other परिवर्तन in the succession नियम.
The line of उत्तराधिकार is also used to select the counsellors of राज्य ( and a regent if the need arises ) अंतर्गत the provisions of the रीजेंसी Act 1937.
लिये earlier संस्करण of the लकीर of उत्तराधिकार, देखिए इतिहास of the British लकीर of उत्तराधिकार.
एडवर्ड Montgomery Clift ( अक्तूबर 17, 1920July 23, 1966 ) थी an American फिल्मी और स्टेज actor The New York Times’ obituary विख्यात his portrayal of `` moody, sensitive यंग men ''.
He often played outsiders और `` victim-heroes '' ; examples शामिल the social climber in George स्टीवंस 's a Place in the Sun, the anguished Catholic priest in हिचकॉक 's I कबूल, the doomed नियमित सिपाही रॉबर्ट E. ली prewitt in Fred Zinnemann 's इससे Here to Eternity, and the Jewish gi bullied by antisemites in Edward Dmytryk 's the Young Lions.
Later, बाद a disfiguring car crash in 1956, और alcohol and prescription drug गाली, he became erratic.
Nevertheless important भूमिकाएँ were still उसके, सहित `` the reckless, alcoholic, mother-fixated rodeo performer '' in जॉन Huston 's The misfits, the शीर्षक भूमिका in हस्टन 's, और the concentration शिविर शिकार in स्टेनली क्रेमर 's निर्णय at Nuremberg. ''
क्लिफ्ट प्राप्त चार Academy पुरस्कार nominations during उसके करियर, three for बेहतरीन Actor और one for बेहतरीन Supporting Actor.
The युद्ध on आतंक ( भी known as the Global War on Terrorism ) is a पद commonly लागू to an अंतरराष्ट्रीय military अभियान जिससे प्रारंभ as a परिणाम of the 11 September 2001 terrorist हमले on the United States.
इस resulted in an अंतरराष्ट्रीय सैन्य campaign to eliminate al-qaeda and अन्य उग्रवादी organizations.
the संयुक्त किंगडम and अनेक other NATO और non-NATO राष्ट्र participate in the conflict.
The phrase 'War on आतंक ' थी पहला used by us President George W. Bush on 20 सितंबर 2001.
The Bush administration और the Western मीडिया have since used the पद to signify a global military, राजनैतिक, lawful, और conceptual struggle—targeting दोनो organizations designated as terrorist and regimes अभियुक्त of supporting उन्हें.
it was typically प्रयुक्त with a particular फ़ोकस on उग्रवादी islamists, al-Qaeda, and अन्य jihadi groups.
Although the पद is not officially used by the administration of US अध्यक्ष Barack Obama ( जिससे बजाय uses the term विदेशी Contingency Operation ), it is still commonly used by politicians, in the मीडिया and by कुछ पहलुओं of सरकारी officially, ऐसे as the United States ' वैश्विक War on आतंक Service Medal.

the प्रमुख causes of World युद्ध ii यहूद nationalistic issues, unresolved issues, और resentments resulting from World युद्ध I and the interwar period in यूरोपीय, in जोड to the प्रभाव of the Great अवसाद in the 1930s.
The culmination of कार्यक्रम that led to the outbreak of war हैं generally understood to be the 1939 आक्रमण of कैंडल by Germany और Soviet रूस and the 1937 invasion of the Republic of चीन by the साम्राज्य of Japan.
ये सैन्य aggressions यहूद the परिणाम of decisions बना by the सत्तावादी ruling नाजी elite in Germany and by the नेतृत्व of the Kwantung फौज in Japan.
संसार War ii started बाद these aggressive actions were मिले साथ an आधिकारिक declaration of war and/or armed resistance.
