the Mitsubishi galant is an ऑटोमोबाइल manufactured by Mitsubishi मोटर्स between 1969 and 2012.
the नाम थी derived इससे the French शब्द galant, meaning `` chivalrous ''.
There have महरूम नौ distinct पीढियां, और संचयी sales now exceed पाँच million.
it began as a कॉम्पैक्ट सेडान, लकिन over the course of its life has evolved into a larger mid-size car.
Initial उत्पादन was तभी आधारित in Japan, but चूंकि 1994 the American market has been served by vehicles समवेत at the पूर्व Diamond-Star Motors ( dsm ) facility in Normal, Illinois.
Blood pressure ( BP ), sometimes referred to as arterial blood pressure, is the दबाव exerted by circulating रक्त upon the दीवारें of रक्त vessels, और is one of the principal vital लक्षण.
When प्रयुक्त without further specification, `` रक्त दबाव '' usually refers to the arterial दबाव of the प्रणालीगत परिसंचरण.
During each heartbeat, रक्त pressure varies between a maximum ( systolic ) और a न्यूनतम ( diastolic ) pressure.
The blood दबाव in the circulation is principally due to the pumping action of the heart.
मतभेद in औसत blood pressure are responsible लिये blood प्रवाह इससे one स्थान to another in the परिसंचरण.
The rate of औसत blood प्रवाह depends on the प्रतिरोध to flow प्रस्तुत by the blood vessels.
Mean रक्त pressure decreases as the circulating रक्त चालें away from the heart through arteries और capillaries due to viscous नुकसान of energy.
औसत blood pressure बूंदें over the whole circulation, हालांकि सबसे of the fall occurs along the छोटी arteries and arterioles.
गम्भीरता affects blood दबाव via hydrostatic शक्तियां ( e.g., दौरान खड़ा ) and valves in रगों, breathing, and pumping from संकुचन of skeletal muscles also influence रक्त दबाव in veins.
रक्त pressure without further specification प्रायः refers to the systemic arterial दबाव measured at a person 's अपर भुजा and is a measure of the दबाव in the brachial artery, the major धमनी in the अपर भुजा.
a person’s रक्त दबाव is प्रायः expressed in शर्तें of the systolic pressure over diastolic pressure और is measured in millimetres of पारा ( mmhg ), लिये उदाहरण 120/80.
a veto – लैटिन for `` I forbid '' – is the शक्ति ( प्रयुक्त by an अधिकारी of the state, लिये उदाहरण ) to unilaterally रोकें an official कार्रवाई, especially the enactment of विधान.
A वीटो can be absolute, as for instance in the संयुक्त Nations Security Council, जिनकी permanent members ( चीन, फ़्रांस, रूस, United Kingdom, United States of America ) can ब्लाक any resolution.
or it can be limited, as in the legislative process of the संयुक्त States, where a two-thirds vote in both the House और सीनेट may ओवरराइड a अध्यक्षीय वीटो of legislation.
a वीटो only gives शक्ति to रोकें परिवर्तन, नहीं to adopt them ( मगर लिये the rare `` amendatory वीटो '' ).
यूँ a वीटो allows its holder to protect the status quo.
The अवधारणा of a वीटो body originated with the Roman consuls and tribunes.
either of the two consuls पकड़कर office in a दिए year could ब्लाक a military or सिविल निर्णय by the अन्य ; कोई tribune had the शक्ति to unilaterally block विधान passed by the रोमन सीनेट.
गंधक dioxide ( भी गंधक dioxide ) is the रासायनिक यौगिक with the formula.
it is a toxic gas साथ a pungent, तकलीफदेह महकते, कि is released by ज्वालामुखी और in various industrial प्रक्रियाओं.
चूंकि कोयले और petroleum often contain गंधक compounds, their combustion generates गंधक dioxide unless the sulfur compounds हैं removed before burning the fuel.
further oxidation of so2, प्रायः in the उपस्थिति of a उत्प्रेरक ऐसे as NO2, forms H2SO4, और यूँ acid rain.
गंधक dioxide emissions हैं also a precursor to particulates in the atmosphere.
दोनो of these impacts are cause for चिंता over the environmental impact of ये fuels.
myasthenia ग्रेविस ( इससे यूनानी μύς `` muscle '', `` weakness '', और `` गंभीर '' ; abbreviated mg ) is an autoimmune neuromuscular बीमारी leading to fluctuating मांसपेशी weakness और fatigability.
It is an असंक्राम्य disorder, in जिससे कमज़ोरी is caused by circulating antibodies कि ब्लाक acetylcholine receptors at the postsynaptic neuromuscular junction, inhibiting the excitatory प्रभाव of the neurotransmitter acetylcholine on nicotinic receptors throughout neuromuscular junctions.
Myasthenia is treated medically with acetylcholinesterase inhibitors or immunosuppressants, and, in selected मामले, thymectomy.
The disease incidence is 3–30 cases प्रति लाख प्रति year and rising as a परिणाम of increased awareness.
mg must be विशिष्ट इससे जन्मजात myasthenic syndromes that can present समान symptoms लकिन offer no response to immunosuppressive उपचार.
Reflective मुड़ nematic liquid crystal प्रदर्शक.
polarizing फिल्टर film साथ a vertical अक्ष to polarize light as it enters.
कांच substrate with ito electrodes.
the आकार of these electrodes होगा determine the shapes कि होगा appear जब the एलसीडी is turned on.
लंबवत ridges etched on the surface हैं चिकना.
मुड़ nematic द्रव crystal.
Glass substrate साथ common electrode film ( ito ) साथ horizontal ridges to line up with the आड़ा फिल्टर.
Polarizing filter फिल्मी साथ a आड़ा अक्ष to block/pass light.
परावर्तक surface to send लाइट वापस to दर्शक.
( In a backlit एलसीडी, this layer is replaced साथ a light सोर्स. )
a liquid-crystal प्रदर्शक ( एलसीडी ) is a flat panel प्रदर्शक, इलेक्ट्रॉनिक visual प्रदर्शक, or वीडियो प्रदर्शक कि uses the लाइट modulating properties of liquid crystals.
Liquid crystals do not emit light directly.
LCDs हैं उपलब्धियाँ to display arbitrary बिंब ( as in a general-purpose कंप्यूटर display ) or fixed images जिससे can be displayed or छुपा, ऐसे as preset शब्द, अंक, और 7-segment प्रदर्शक as in a डिजिटल clock.
वे उपयोग the same basic technology, except that मनमानी बिंब हैं बना up of a विशाल number of small पिक्सेल, while अन्य displays have larger elements.
LCDs are used in a चौड़ी range of अनुप्रयोग सहित कंप्यूटर monitors, टेलीविज़न, instrument panels, aircraft कॉकपिट displays, and साइनेज.
वे हैं common in consumer डिवाइस ऐसे as वीडियो players, गेमिंग devices, घड़ियाँ, watches, calculators, और telephones, और have replaced cathode रे tube ( CRT ) displays in most applications.
वे हैं available in a wider range of स्क्रीन आकार than CRT and plasma displays, and since वे do नहीं उपयोग phosphors, वे do नहीं suffer चित्र burn-in.
LCDs are, however, susceptible to image हठ.
The LCD screen is अधिक energy कुशल और can be disposed of more safely than a CRT.
Its low विद्युत power consumption enables it to be used in battery -powered इलेक्ट्रॉनिक उपकरण.
It is an electronically modulated ऑप्टिकल यंत्र made up of कोई क्रमांक of segments भर साथ द्रव crystals and arrayed in front of a लाइट सोर्स ( backlight ) or reflector to produce images in रंग or मोनोक्रोम.
द्रव crystals were first खोजा in 1888.
by 2008, worldwide sales of टेलीविज़न साथ LCD screens exceeded सालाना sales of crt इकाई ; the CRT became obsolete for most purposes.
the borgata Hotel Casino और Spa is a luxury होटल, casino, और स्पा in अटलांटिक City, New जर्सी, United राज्य.
It is स्वामित्व by मरीना ज़िला Development, a joint venture between Boyd गेमिंग और a divesture trust established by mgm रिसॉर्ट International.
The $ 1.1 billion कसीनो होटल features 2,002 कक्ष and is the largest hotel in नई Jersey.
the Borgata खोली in July 2003 as a Las vegas-style megaresort और is the top-grossing casino in Atlantic नगर.
a bottle of ऊँची potency b-complex vitamin supplement गोलियां.
A vitamin ( or ) is an organic यौगिक जरूरी by an सजीव as a vital nutrient in सीमित amounts.
an organic रासायनिक यौगिक ( or सम्बन्धित set of compounds ) is पुकारा a vitamin when it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism, and जरूर be प्राप्त इससे the आहार.
यूँ, the term is सशर्त दोनो on the circumstances and on the particular सजीव.
For उदाहरण, ascorbic एसिड ( vitamin c ) is a vitamin for humans, लकिन not लिये most other animals, और biotin and vitamin d are जरूरी in the human diet तभी in certain circumstances.
by convention, the पद vitamin includes neither other essential nutrients, ऐसे as dietary खनिज, essential fatty acids, or अनिवार्य amino acids ( which हैं needed in larger amounts than vitamins ) nor the विशाल क्रमांक of अन्य nutrients that प्रचार health but हैं वरना required कम often.
तेरह विटामिन हैं universally पहचाना at उपस्थित.
विटामिन are classified by their biological and रासायनिक कार्यकलाप, not उनके structure.
Thus, प्रत्येक `` विटामिन '' refers to a number of vitamer यौगिकों that all दिखाएँ the biological कार्यकलाप संबद्ध with a particular विटामिन.
ऐसे a set of chemicals is grouped under an alphabetized vitamin `` जेनेरिक descriptor '' title, such as `` vitamin a ``, which includes the compounds retinal, रेटिनॉल, and four ज्ञात carotenoids.
Vitamers by definition हैं convertible to the क्रियाशील form of the विटामिन in the देह, और हैं sometimes inter-convertible to एक another, as खूब.
Vitamins have विविध biochemical functions.
कुछ have hormone-like कृत्यों as regulators of खनिज metabolism ( such as विटामिन D ), or regulators of cell and ऊतक growth and differentiation ( such as कुछ forms of vitamin a ).
अन्य function as antioxidants ( e.g., विटामिन e और sometimes vitamin C ).
The largest क्रमांक of विटामिन ( such as b जटिल vitamins ) फलन as precursors लिये एंजाइम cofactors, that सहायता enzymes in their work as catalysts in metabolism.
In this role, विटामिन may be tightly bound to एंजाइमों as भाग of prosthetic groups : For उदाहरण, biotin is part of enzymes शामिल in making fatty acids.
विटामिन may भी be कम tightly bound to एंजाइम catalysts as coenzymes, detachable molecules that function to carry chemical समूह or electrons between अणुओं.
लिये उदाहरण, folic एसिड may carry मिथाइल, formyl, and methylene groups in the cell.
Although these भूमिकाएँ in assisting enzyme-substrate प्रतिक्रियाएँ are विटामिन ' best-known function, the other विटामिन कृत्यों are equally important.
Until the mid-1930s, when the पहला commercial yeast-extract विटामिन B जटिल और semi-synthetic vitamin c संपूरक tablets यहूद sold, विटामिन यहूद obtained solely through खाना intake, और changes in आहार ( जिससे, for example, could occur during a particular growing season ) प्रायः greatly altered the types and amounts of vitamins ingested.
However, विटामिन have been उत्पादित as कमोडिटी chemicals and made widely उपलब्धियाँ as inexpensive semisynthetic and synthetic-source multivitamin dietary and food पूरक and additives, चूंकि the middle of the 20th century.

World मुस्लिम जनसांख्यिकी in millions
islam is the world 's दूसरी largest धर्म बाद Christianity.
according to a 2010 study, Islam रै 1.62 अरब adherents, बनाना up over 23 % of the world जनसांख्यिकी.
islam is the predominant धर्म in the मध्य East, in Sahel, in the Horn of अफ़्रीकी और northern Africa, and in कुछ parts of Asia.
Large समुदायों of मुसलमान are also found in China, the balkans, और Russia.
Other भाग of the संसार मेजबान विशाल मुस्लिम अप्रवासी communities ; in Western Europe, लिये instance, islam is the second largest धर्म बाद christianity, जहाँ it represents 6 % of the total population.
According to the pew शोध Center in 2010 वहीँ यहूद 49 Muslim-majority countries.
around 62 % of the world 's Muslims सजीव in दक्षिण and southeast Asia, with over 1 अरब adherents.
The largest Muslim देश is Indonesia, घर to 12.7 % of the संसार 's Muslims, followed by Pakistan ( 11.0 % ), इण्डिया ( 10.9 % ), और बांग्लादेश ( 9.2 % ).
About 20 % of Muslims सजीव in अरब देशों.
In the Middle East, the non-arab countries of Turkey और Iran हैं the largest muslim-majority countries ; in Africa, Egypt and Nigeria have the सबसे populous Muslim समुदायों.
a पढ़ाई conducted by the Pew शोध बीच in 2010 and released January 2011 मिला कि there are 1.62 अरब मुसलमान around the संसार.
the पढ़ाई found more मुसलमान in the United किंगडम than in लेबनान और more in China than in Syria.
Rhode द्वीप ( or ), officially the राज्य of rhode Island and विधाता बागानों, is a राज्य in the New इंग्लैण्ड region of the United राज्य.
rhode द्वीप is the smallest in क्षेत्रफल, the eighth तनिक populous, लकिन the second सबसे densely populated of the 50 US states पीछे New जर्सी.
rhode द्वीप is bordered by कनेक्टिकट to the वेस्ट और Massachusetts to the उत्तर and east, और it shares a water boundary साथ नई York 's Long द्वीप to the दक्षिणपश्चिम.
rhode Island थी the पहला of the 13 असली colonies to घोषित independence from British नियम, declaring itself independent on may 4, 1776, दो महीने before any other colony.
The State was also the पिछला of the thirteen असली colonies to ratify the संयुक्त States संविधान.
rhode Island 's आधिकारिक nickname is `` the समंदर राज्य '', a reference to the राज्य 's geography, चूंकि rhode द्वीप has अनेक large bays and inlets that राशि to परिचय 14 % of इसके total area.
Its जमीन क्षेत्रफल is, लकिन इसके कुल क्षेत्रफल is significantly larger.
दुबई ( ; ', ) is a नगर in the संयुक्त अरब Emirates, located भीतर the अमीर of the same name.
The emirate of दुबई is स्तिथ on the southeast coast of the Persian गल्फ on the Arabian Peninsula and is one of the सात emirates कि मेक up the देश.
It रै the largest जनसांख्यिकी in the UAE ( 2,106,177 ) और the second-largest land territory by area ( 4,114 km2 ) after abu Dhabi.
दुबई और Abu धाबी, the national capital, are the only दो अमीरात to have वीटो power over नाजुक matters of नेशनल importance in the country 's legislature.
The नगर of दुबई is स्तिथ on the अमीर 's northern तटरेखा and heads up the Dubai-Sharjah-Ajman metropolitan क्षेत्रफल.
दुबई is nowadays often misperceived as a country or city-state और, in some मामले, the UAE as a पूरे has महरूम वर्णित as 'dubai '.
The earliest जिक्र of दुबई is in 1095 AD, and the earliest अंकित settlement in the प्रदेश तिथियाँ इससे 1799.
the Sheikhdom of Dubai was formally स्थापित in 1833 by शेख़ maktoum बिन Butti Al-Maktoum जब he persuaded around 800 सदस्यों of उसके जनजाति of the Bani Yas, जीना in what was then the दूसरी सऊदी State और अभी भाग of सऊदी अरब, to follow उसे to the Dubai Creek by the Abu falasa clan of the Bani Yas.
It remained under the जनजाति 's कंट्रोल when the संयुक्त किंगडम assumed protection of the sheikhdom in 1892 और joined the nascent संयुक्त अरब अमीरात upon स्वतंत्रता in 1971 as the देश 's second emirate.
इसके रणनीतिक geographic location made the town an important trading हब and by the शुरूआत of the 20th century, Dubai थी already an important क्षेत्रीय बंदरगाहों.
आज, दुबई रै emerged as a cosmopolitan metropolis that रै grown steadily to become a वैश्विक नगर and a कारोबार और सांस्कृतिक हब of the मध्य ईस्ट और the Persian Gulf प्रदेश.
हालांकि Dubai 's अर्थव्यवस्था थी historically built on the oil industry, the अमीर 's Western-style model of business drives its economy साथ the main revenues now coming इससे पर्यटन, रियल estate, and वित्तीय services.
Dubai रै recently attracted world attention through many innovative विशाल construction प्रोजेक्ट और खेल कार्यक्रम.
The नगर has become सांकेतिक लिये इसके skyscrapers और high-rise इमारतें, such as the world 's tallest burj Khalifa, in जोड to महत्वाकांक्षी development प्रोजेक्ट including man-made islands, होटल, and some of the largest shopping मॉल in the region and the संसार.
इस increased ध्यान has भी highlighted मजदूर और human अधिकारों मुद्दे concerning the city 's largely दक्षिण एशियाई सशुल्क workforce.
Dubai 's property market अनुभवी a major deterioration in 2008–2009 as a result of the विश्वव्यापी economic downturn following the वित्तीय crisis of 2007-2008.
However, Dubai has बना a steady और gradual recovery with सहायता coming इससे neighboring अमीरात.
the handful of नई प्रोजेक्ट that हैं in the pipeline have been समर्थ to सहायता Dubai real estate make a वापसी.
As of 2012, Dubai is the 22nd most expensive नगर in the संसार, और the most expensive city in the मध्य East, surpassing इसराईल 's tel Aviv ( 31st ).
दुबई रै also महरूम rated as one of the best places to live in the मध्य East, सहित by US American global परामर्श firm Mercer जो रेटेड the नगर as the best place to सजीव in the Middle ईस्ट in 2011.

सतह of the Atlantic ocean बैठक the Earth 's planetary boundary परत and troposphere.

This animation uses Earth science आंकड़ा from a variety of सेंसर on NASA धरती observing satellites to माप शारीरिक oceanography parameters ऐसे as ocean currents, ocean हवाएँ, समुद्र surface height और समुद्र surface temperature.
An समंदर ( ; the World Ocean of classical antiquity ) is a देह of saline जल that composes a विशाल भाग of a planet 's जलमंडल.
In the context of धरती, it refers to एक or all of the प्रमुख divisions of the ग्रह 's World Ocean – वे are, in descending अनुक्रम of area, the प्रशांत, Atlantic, भारतीय, Southern ( Antarctic ), and Arctic महासागर.
the शब्द `` sea `` is often प्रयुक्त interchangeably with `` समंदर '', but सख्ती speaking a समुद्र is a body of saline water ( संभवतः a division of the World Ocean ) partly or fully enclosed by जमीन.
Earth is the तभी planet known to have an ocean ( or any large amounts of open liquid water ).
लगभग 72 % of the planet 's surface ( ~3.6x108 km2 ) is covered by saline जल कि is customarily divided into अनेक principal oceans and smaller समंदर, with the समंदर covering approximately 71 % of the धरती 's surface.
in शर्तें of the जलमंडल of the Earth, the ocean contains 97 % of the धरती 's जल.
oceanographers have stated that आउट of 97 %, only 5 % of the ocean as a पूरे on Earth has been छान.
क्युकी it is the principal घटक of धरती 's hydrosphere, the संसार ocean is अभिन्न to all ज्ञात जीवन, forms भाग of the कार्बन cycle, और प्रभाव जलवायु and weather पैटर्न.
the कुल आवाज़ is approximately 1.3 billion cubic किलोमीटर ( 310 लाख cu mi ) साथ an औसत गहराई of.
it is the habitat of 230,000 known species, although much of the ocean 's गहराइयों remain unexplored और it is अनुमानित that over two लाख marine species मौजूद.
The origin of Earth 's oceans is स्टिल unknown, लकिन महासागर हैं believed to have formed in the Hadean period and may have been the impetus for the emergence of जीवन.
extraterrestrial महासागर may be composed of a wide दायरा of elements और compounds.
The only पुष्टि large stable bodies of extraterrestrial सतह liquids हैं the झीलों of Titan, हालांकि there is evidence for the existence of oceans elsewhere in the Solar प्रणाली.
Early in their geologic histories, मंगल और Venus are theorized to have had large water महासागर.
the मंगल ocean परिकल्पना suggests कि nearly a तीसरा of the surface of मंगल थी एकबार covered by जल, though the water on Mars is no longer oceanic, and a runaway greenhouse प्रभाव may have boiled away the global ocean of Venus.
Compounds such as लवण और ammonia dissolved in water निम्नतर its freezing point, so that water might exist in large quantities in extraterrestrial environments as brine or convecting बर्फ.
Unconfirmed oceans are speculated beneath the सतह of many बौना ग्रह and प्राकृतिक satellites ; notably, the ocean of यूरोपा is believed to have over twice the water आवाज़ of धरती.
the Solar System 's gas giant planets हैं भी believed to possess liquid वायुमंडलीय layers of yet to be पुष्टि रचनाएं.
महासागर may भी मौजूद on exoplanets और exomoons, सहित surface महासागर of द्रव जल भीतर a परितारकीय ठहरने मण्डल.
Ocean planets are a hypothetical प्रकार of ग्रह with a surface completely covered with द्रव.
एल्विस Aaron Presley ( जनवरी 8, 1935 – August 16, 1977 ) was an अमरीकी सिंगर और कर्ता.
A सांस्कृतिक icon, he is commonly ज्ञात by the single name Elvis.
एक of the सबसे popular संगीतकारों of the 20th सदी, he is प्रायः referred to as the `` King of चट्टान और फेंकें '' or `` the King ''.
Born in tupelo, मिसिसिपी, प्रेस्ली स्थानांतरित to Memphis, टेनेसी, साथ उसके family at the age of 13.
He began his career वहीँ in 1954, working साथ सूर्य Records owner Sam Phillips, जो wanted to लाओ the sound of african-american म्यूज़िक to a wider audience.
accompanied by guitarist स्कॉटी मूर and bassist विधेयक ब्लैक, प्रेस्ली was the most important popularizer of rockabilly, an uptempo, backbeat -driven संलयन of country और rhythm और ब्लूज़.
आरसीए विक्टर acquired his contract in a deal arranged by Colonel Tom Parker, who गई on to manage the सिंगर for over two decades.
प्रेस्ली 's पहला RCA सिंगल, `` Heartbreak Hotel ``, released in January 1956, was a number-one hit.
He became the अग्रणी figure of the newly popular sound of चट्टान and roll with a series of संजाल television दिखावे और chart-topping records.
उसके energized interpretations of गीतों, अनेक इससे african-american स्त्रोत, and उसके uninhibited performance style made him enormously popular—and controversial.
In November 1956, he made his film debut in Love me Tender.
Drafted into सैन्य सेवा in 1958, Presley relaunched उसके रिकॉर्डिंग career two सालो later with कुछ of उसके most commercially कामयाब कार्य.
He मंचन few concerts however, and guided by Parker, proceeded to devote much of the 1960s to making हॉलीवुड फिल्मों and साउंडट्रैक एल्बम, सबसे of उन्हें critically derided.
In 1968, बाद seven सालो away इससे the स्टेज, he लौटे to सजीव प्रदर्शन in a celebrated comeback टेलीविज़न special that led to an extended लास Vegas कॉन्सर्ट रेसिडेंसी and a string of लाभप्रद टुर.
in 1973 प्रेस्ली मंचन the पहला concert broadcast globally via उपग्रह, aloha इससे Hawaii.
नुस्खा drug गाली severely deteriorated his स्वास्थ्य, and he died एकाएक in 1977 at the आयु of 42.
Presley is regarded as एक of the most important figures of 20th-century लोकप्रिय संस्कृति.
he had a बहुमुखी आवाज़ and unusually wide success encompassing many जाति, सहित देश, पॉप ballads, gospel, और blues.
he is the best-selling सोलो artist in the history of popular म्यूज़िक.
Nominated for 14 प्रतिस्पर्धी grammys, he won three, and प्राप्त the Grammy आजीवन Achievement Award at age 36.
he रै been inducted into अनेक music हॉल of कीर्ति.
a glass of root beer साथ झाग
रूट बियर is a carbonated, sweetened beverage, originally बना using the root of a sassafras संयंत्र ( or the bark of a sassafras पेड़ ) as the primary स्वाद.
रूट बियर, popularized in North अमेरिका, comes in दो forms : alcoholic और नरम पेय.
The ऐतिहासिक root बियर थी analogous to छोटी beer in कि the process provided a पेय साथ a बहुत कम alcohol content.
Although roots हैं प्रयुक्त as the सोर्स of अनेक soft पेय throughout the world, प्रायः different names हैं प्रयुक्त.
fluorescent खनिज emit visible लाइट when exposed to ultraviolet light
प्रतिदीप्ति is the उत्सर्जन of लाइट by a पदार्थ कि रै अवशोषित लाइट or अन्य electromagnetic विकिरण.
It is a रूप of luminescence.
in सबसे मामले, the emitted लाइट रै a longer wavelength, और therefore निम्नतर energy, than the absorbed radiation.
However, when the अवशोषित इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण is intense, it is संभावित for एक electron to अवशोषित दो photons ; this two-photon absorption can lead to उत्सर्जन of विकिरण having a shorter wavelength than the absorbed विकिरण.
the emitted विकिरण may भी be of the वही wavelength as the absorbed विकिरण, termed `` अनुनाद प्रतिदीप्ति ''.
the सबसे striking उदाहरण of fluorescence occur जब the absorbed विकिरण is in the ultraviolet प्रदेश of the spectrum, and यूँ invisible to the इंसान नजर, and the emitted light is in the दृश्य प्रदेश.
प्रतिदीप्ति has अनेक व्यावहारिक applications, including mineralogy, gemology, रासायनिक सेंसर ( fluorescence स्पेक्ट्रमिकी ), fluorescent labelling, dyes, biological detectors, and, सबसे commonly, fluorescent lamps.
Informal logic, intuitively, refers to the सिद्धान्त of logic और लॉजिकल विचार outside of a formal setting.
However, perhaps because of the informal in the title, the precise definition of अनौपचारिक logic is a पदार्थ of some dispute.
Ralph H. जॉनसन और J. एंथोनी Blair define अनौपचारिक logic as `` a शाखा of logic whose task is to develop non-formal मानकों, criteria, प्रक्रियाओं लिये the विश्लेषण, निर्वचन, मूल्यांकन, criticism और निर्माण of argumentation. ''
This definition reflects कया था been अव्यक्त in their practice and what अन्य were doing in their अनौपचारिक लॉजिक texts.
Informal लॉजिक is associated with ( अनौपचारिक ) fallacies, नाजुक सोच, the Thinking Skills गति and the interdisciplinary पूछताछ known as argumentation सिद्धान्त.
Frans H. van eemeren writes कि the लेबल `` informal logic '' कवर a `` संग्रहण of normative approaches to the पढ़ाई of तर्क in ordinary भाषा that remain closer to the अभ्यास of argumentation than formal logic. ''
यूएसए annual real जीडीपी 1910–60, साथ the years of the ग्रेट अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
Unemployment रेट in the US 1910–1960, साथ the years of the Great अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
the ग्रेट Depression began in अगस्त of 1929, जब the संयुक्त राज्य अर्थव्यवस्था पहला गई into an economic मंदी.
हालांकि the country खर्च two months with घटती जीडीपी, it थी not until the Wall Street Crash of अक्तूबर, 1929 that the effects of a घटती economy यहूद लगा, and a major worldwide आर्थिक downturn ensued.
the market क्रैश चिह्नित the beginning of a दशक of high बेरोजगारी, गरीबी, कम profits, अपस्फीति, plunging farm incomes, और lost opportunities for economic विकास and निजी उन्नति.
हालांकि इसके causes are स्टिल uncertain और विवादास्पद, the जाल प्रभाव थी a sudden and सामान्य loss of विश्वास in the economic future.
The usual explanations include numerous factors, विशेषकर ऊँची उपभोक्ता debt, ill-regulated बाज़ार कि permitted overoptimistic लोन by banks और निवेशकों, and the lack of high-growth नई उद्योग, सब interacting to create a downward आर्थिक spiral of reduced spending, falling विश्वास, and lowered उत्पादन.
Industries कि suffered the सबसे included निर्माण, agriculture as dust-bowl शर्तें persisted in the agricultural heartland, shipping, खनन, और logging as well as durable goods like ऑटोमोबाइल और appliances कि could be postponed.
the economy reached नीचे in the winter of 1932–33 ; then आए चार सालो of बहुत रैपिड विकास until 1937, when the मंदी of 1937 brought वापस 1934 levels of बेरोजगारी.
the Depression caused major राजनैतिक परिवर्तन in America.
Three सालो into the अवसाद, हर्बर्ट Hoover lost the 1932 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव to फ्रैंकलिन delano रूज़वेल्ट in a sweeping landslide.
Roosevelt 's economic रिकवरी योजना, the नई Deal, instituted unprecedented कार्यक्रम लिये राहत, रिकवरी और reform, और brought about a प्रमुख realignment of अमरीकी राजनीती.
The Depression भी resulted in an बढ़ाएँ of emigration of people to अन्य देशों for the first time in अमरीकी history.
लिये example, कुछ immigrants गई back to उनके native countries, and some native US नागरिकों went to कनाडा, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, और दक्षिण Africa.
It also resulted in the द्रव्यमान migration of people इससे badly hit क्षेत्रों in the Great मैदान and the South to स्थान such as California और the उत्तर, respectively ( देखिए Okies और the ग्रेट Migration of अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी ).
Racial tensions also increased during इस time.
by the 1940s immigration था returned back to normal, and करणों अस्वीकृत.
A well-known उदाहरण of an emigrant was फ़्रैंक McCourt, जो went to Ireland, as recounted in his book Angela 's राख.
The memory of the अवसाद also shaped आधुनिक theories of अर्थशास्त्र और resulted in many changes in कैसा the government dealt साथ आर्थिक downturns, ऐसे as the use of stimulus पैकेज, Keynesian अर्थशास्त्र, और सोशल सुरक्षा.
It also shaped आधुनिक अमरीकी literature, resulting in प्रसिद्ध novels ऐसे as जॉन Steinbeck 's `` the अंगूर of प्रकोप `` और `` of चूहे और Men ``.
The ग्रेट Depression of the 1930s प्रारंभ with the भण्डार market क्रैश of अक्तूबर 1929.
Turkey ( ), officially the Republic of Turkey, is a transcontinental country, स्तिथ mostly on Anatolia in Western एशिया और on East thrace in southeastern Europe.
तुर्कों is bordered by आठ देशों : Bulgaria to the उत्तरपश्चिम ; यूनानियों to the वेस्ट ; जॉर्जिया to the पूर्वोत्तर ; Armenia, Iran and the Azerbaijani exclave of Nakhchivan to the ईस्ट ; and इराकी और Syria to the southeast.
the भूमध्यसागरीय Sea is to the दक्षिण ; the Aegean समुद्र is to the west ; और the Black Sea is to the उत्तर.
The Sea of मरमरा, the Bosphorus and the dardanelles ( which together form the तुर्की Straits ) demarcate the boundary between thrace and Anatolia ; they भी separate Europe और एशिया.
तुर्कों 's location at the क्रॉसरोड्स of Europe and एशिया makes it a देश of significant geostrategic importance.
The देश 's official भाषा is Turkish, a turkic भाषा, which is spoken by लगभग 85 % of the population as माँ tongue.
the सबसे numerous जातीय समूह is the turks, who constitute between 70 % and 75 % of the population according to the World Factbook.
Kurds are the largest ethnic minority और, according to the same सोर्स, क्रमांक around 18 % of the population while other जातीय minorities हैं estimated to be at 7–12 %.
the vast majority of the जनसांख्यिकी is मुस्लिम.
the क्षेत्रफल अभी called Turkey रै been inhabited चूंकि the paleolithic, including various Ancient Anatolian civilizations और thracian peoples.
After सिकंदर the Great 's conquest, the क्षेत्रफल was hellenized, जिससे जारी with the रोमन नियम और the परिवर्तन into the बीज़ान्टिन Empire.
The सलजूक़ turks began migrating into the area in the 11th century, starting the process of Turkification, which थी greatly accelerated by the सलजूक़ विजय over the byzantines at the बैटल of Manzikert in 1071.
the Seljuk सल्तनत of rûm ruled आनातोलिया until the mongol invasion in 1243, upon जिससे it disintegrated into अनेक छोटी Turkish beyliks.
Starting from the late 13th century, the उस्मानी beylik united Anatolia और created an empire encompassing much of southeastern Europe, पश्चिमी Asia and उत्तर अफ़्रीकी.
After the उस्मानी साम्राज्य collapsed following इसके defeat in संसार War i, भाग of it were occupied by the विजयी Allies.
a संवर्ग of यंग military officers, led by mustafa kemal अतातुर्क and his सहयोगियों, organized a successful resistance to the Allies ; in 1923 they स्थापित the modern गणतंत्र of Turkey, साथ अतातुर्क as its पहला president.
Turkey is a democratic, secular, unitary, संवैधानिक republic साथ a विविध सांस्कृतिक heritage.
तुर्कों has become increasingly एकीकृत साथ the West through membership in संगठनों such as the परिषद of Europe, नाटो, oecd, osce और the G-20 प्रमुख economies.
तुर्कों began पूरा membership negotiations with the European Union in 2005, having महरूम an associate member of the European आर्थिक Community since 1963 और having joined the EU कस्टम Union in 1995.
तुर्कों has also fostered बंद सांस्कृतिक, राजनैतिक and economic relations साथ the Middle ईस्ट, काकेशस, the turkic राज्य of सेंट्रल Asia and the अफ़्रीकी देशों through सदस्यता in संगठनों such as the turkic परिषद, Joint Administration of Turkic Arts और Culture, Organisation of Islamic सहयोग and the Economic सहयोग संगठन.
तुर्कों 's growing economy और diplomatic पहलों have led to its मान्यता as a क्षेत्रीय power.
Turkey is the world 's 17th largest economy by nominal GDP और the 16th largest by खरीदना शक्ति पैरिटी.
caryn Elaine जॉनसन, best ज्ञात as Whoopi Goldberg (, ( born November 13, 1955 ) is an American comedienne, अभिनेत्री, singer-songwriter, राजनैतिक activist, लेखक और talk दिखाएँ host.
गोल्डबर्ग made her फिल्मी डेब्यू in The रंग जामुनी ( 1985 ), playing celie, a mistreated black स्त्री in the गहन दक्षिण.
वो received a nomination लिये the अकादमी Award for बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री और जीती उसके first Golden Globe पुरस्कार for her role in the फिल्मी.
In 1990, वो played oda mae भूरा, a wacky मानसिक helping a slain man ( Patrick Swayze ) save उसके प्रेमी ( demi मूर ) in the blockbuster भुत.
This प्रदर्शन won her a दूसरी Golden Globe and an Academy पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री ; इस made गोल्डबर्ग तभी the दूसरी ब्लैक woman in the history of the Academy Awards to win an एक्टिंग oscar—the पहला being Hattie McDaniel जो जीती for Gone With the Wind in 1939.
Notable बाद films include सिस्टर अधिनियम और Sister Act 2, The Player, Made in America, How स्टेला Got Her नाली वापस, लड़की, बाधित and Rat रेस.
वो is भी acclaimed लिये her भूमिकाएँ as the बारटेंडर guinan in स्टार Trek : the अगला Generation, as Terry doolittle in jumpin ' जोकर Flash, और as Carmen Tibideaux in Glee, as खूब as the आवाज़ of Shenzi the hyena in The Lion किंग.
Goldberg रै महरूम मनोनीत for 13 Emmy Awards लिये उसके कार्य in टेलीविज़न.
She थी co-producer of the लोकप्रिय game दिखाएँ Hollywood वर्गों इससे 1998 to 2004.
She has महरूम the मॉडरेटर of the दिन talk show The View चूंकि 2007.
गोल्डबर्ग रै a Grammy, दो दिन Emmys, two सुनहरी Globes, a टोनी ( लिये production, नहीं एक्टिंग ), और an Oscar.
In addition, गोल्डबर्ग रै a अंग्रेजों अकादमी फिल्मी Award, चार लोगों 's चुनाव पुरस्कार, and रै महरूम honored with a star on the हॉलीवुड चलना of कीर्ति.
वो is एक of the few मनोरंजनकर्ता who have won an एमी, Grammy, ऑस्कर, और टोनी Award.
Augusta is a consolidated नगर in the U.S. राज्य of Georgia, स्तिथ at the fall line of the savannah River, at the सिर of its navigable portion.
as of the 2010 census, the Augusta– रिचमंड काउंटी जनसांख्यिकी was 195,844 not गिनती the unconsolidated शहरों of Hephzibah and blythe.
augusta is the principal city of the augusta – Richmond County Metropolitan Statistical Area, जिससे as of 2010 था an estimated जनसांख्यिकी of 556,877, making it both the second-largest नगर और the second-largest मैट्रो क्षेत्रफल in the state बाद अटलांटा.
It is the 116th-largest नगर in the United राज्य.
Internationally, augusta is best known लिये hosting the Masters Tournament in golf प्रत्येक spring.
A cd-rom ( ) is a pre-pressed कॉम्पैक्ट disc जिससे contains data.
The नाम is an acronym जिससे stands लिये `` कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क read-only memory ``.
कंप्यूटर can read cd-roms, but can नहीं write on them.
cd-roms हैं popularly प्रयुक्त to वितरित कंप्यूटर software, सहित video games and multimedia अनुप्रयोग, हालांकि कोई आंकड़ा can be भंडारित ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ).
Some cds, called enhanced cds, थाम दोनो कंप्यूटर data और ऑडियो साथ the latter capable of being played on a CD खिलाड़ी, जबकि data ( ऐसे as software or digital video ) is तभी usable on a computer ( ऐसे as आईएसओ 9660 स्वरूप pc CD-ROMs ).
The पीला किताब is the तकनीकी standard that defines the स्वरूप of cd-roms.
One of a set of color-bound किताबे कि contain the तकनीकी specifications for all CD formats, the पीला Book, निर्मित by सोनी and फिलिप्स, थी the पहला extension of Compact Disc डिजिटल ऑडियो.
it adapted the format to थाम कोई रूप of data.
the Chicago ब्लैकहॉक्स ( spelled as Black चीलों पहले 1986, and known colloquially as the चीलों ) हैं a पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी टोली आधारित in शिकागो, Illinois.
वे हैं members of the सेंट्रल Division of the Western सम्मेलन of the नेशनल Hockey League ( एनएचएल ).
They have won four Stanley Cup championships since their founding in 1926, सबसे recently in 2009–10.
The Blackhawks हैं एक of the Original Six एनएचएल teams, along with the डेट्रॉयट रेड Wings, मॉन्ट्रियल canadiens, टोरंटो Maple Leafs, Boston Bruins and New यॉर्क रेंजरों.
चूंकि the ब्लैकहॉक्स have played their घर खेल at the United Center बाद having खर्च 65 years playing at शिकागो Stadium.
Lent celebrants carrying आउट a गली बारात दौरान Holy सप्ताह.
The violet color is प्रायः associated with penance and detachment.
समान Christian penitential practice is देखी in other कैथोलिक countries, sometimes संबद्ध with mortification of the flesh.
granada, निकारागुआ.
lent ( Latin : Quadragesima ) is a solemn observance in the liturgical year of many ईसाई denominations, lasting लिये a काल of approximately six सप्ताह leading up to ईस्टर Sunday.
In the सामान्य Latin-rite and most पश्चिमी denominations lent is taken to चलाएं from राख Wednesday to maundy Thursday ( Holy गुरुवार ) morning or to Easter संध्या.
In the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर, lent lasts जबतक पावन गुरुवार, जबकि अन्य denominations run जबतक ईस्टर संध्या.
The traditional purpose of Lent is the preparation of the believer through दुआ, penance, repentance, almsgiving, and self-denial.
इसके institutional purpose is heightened in the सालाना commemoration of पावन सप्ताह, अंकन the death, दफ़न और क़यामत of यीशु, जिससे recalls the events of the Bible जब Jesus is crucified on शुभ Friday, which then culminates in the celebration on ईस्टर Sunday of the क़यामत of यीशु Christ.
दौरान lent, अनेक of the faithful commit to fasting or giving up certain types of luxuries as a रूप of penitence.
the स्टेशन of the Cross, a devotional commemoration of Christ 's carrying the क्रॉस and of his निष्पादन, are प्रायः observed.
अनेक रोमन कैथोलिक and some Protestant चर्च remove flowers from their altars, while crucifixes, religious मूर्तियाँ, and other विस्तृत religious symbols हैं प्रायः रहमत in बैंगनी fabrics in solemn observance of the event.
In certain परहेज़गारों कैथोलिक countries, some adherents mark the ऋतु साथ the परंपरागत abstention from the consumption of meat.
In कुछ countries, ग्रैंड धार्मिक processions and cultural कस्टम हैं observed, और the वफादार attempt to विज़िट सात चर्च दौरान Holy Week in honor of यीशु मसीह heading to माउंट कलवारी.
Lent is traditionally described as स्थायी for forty days, in commemoration of the चालीस days जिससे, according to the gospels of Matthew, Mark and Luke, यीशु spent fasting in the मरुस्थल पहले the शुरूआत of his public मंत्रालय, where he endured temptation by the शैतान.
However, different Christian denominations गणना the forty दिनों of Lent differently.
In सबसे पश्चिमी traditions the Sundays are नहीं counted as भाग of lent ; यूँ the period इससे राख Wednesday until ईस्टर consists of 40 days जब the Sundays are excluded.
however in the रोमन कैथोलिक Church Lent is अभी taken to end on पावन गुरुवार बल्कि than Easter संध्या, and hence lasts 38 दिनों excluding sundays, or 44 दिनों in कुल.
इस event, साथ with its परहेज़गारों customs हैं observed by Catholics, Lutherans, methodists, presbyterians, और anglicans.

the chernobyl विपत्ति (, chornobylska katastrofa – chornobyl प्रलय ) was a अनर्थकारी nuclear दुर्घटना कि occurred on 26 April 1986 at the chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant in युक्त ( then officially the Ukrainian SSR ), जिससे थी under the सीधा jurisdiction of the सेंट्रल authorities of the सोवियत Union.
An explosion and fire released large quantities of radioactive particles into the atmosphere, which स्प्रेड over much of the western USSR and यूरोपीय.
The chernobyl disaster is widely माना to have been the worst नाभिकीय power संयंत्र दुर्घटना in history, and is one of तभी two वर्गीकृत as a level 7 इवेंट on the International नाभिकीय इवेंट Scale ( the other होने the Fukushima daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ).
the बैटल to contain the contamination and avert a greater प्रलय ultimately involved over 500,000 मजदूर और लागत an अनुमानित 18 अरब rubles.
the आधिकारिक सोवियत casualty count of 31 deaths रै महरूम विवादित, और long-term effects such as cancers and deformities are स्टिल being accounted for.
in व्याकरण, a विषय पूरक is a predicative अभिव्यक्ति that follows a linking क्रिया ( copula ) and that complements ( completes ) the subject of the sentence by either ( 1 ) renaming it or ( 2 ) describing it.
In the पूर्व case, a renaming संज्ञा phrase ऐसे as a noun or pronoun is called a predicative nominal.
an adjective following the copula और describing the विषय is पुकारा a predicative adjective.
in either मामला the predicative complement in effect mirrors the विषय.
विषय complements are प्रयुक्त with a छोटी क्लास of verbs पुकारा linking verbs or copula, of जिससे be is the most आम.
चूंकि copula are stative क्रियाएँ, विषय complements हैं नहीं affected by any action of the verb.
Subject complements हैं typically not clause वितर्क, nor हैं वे clause adjuncts.
throughout the fifty-five साल history of the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, अनेक significant रिकॉर्ड have महरूम set.
This पेज only includes the competitive पुरस्कार won by विभिन्न कलाकारों.
This does नहीं include the various special पुरस्कार that हैं प्रस्तुत by the National Academy of Recording Arts और sciences ऐसे as Lifetime उपलब्धि Awards, trustees Awards, तकनीकी Awards or Legend Awards.
The पेज however does include अन्य non-performance सम्बन्धित Grammys ( ज्ञात as the शिल्प & उत्पादन फ़ील्ड ) that may have been प्रस्तुत to the कलाकार ( s ).
मार्शल ब्रूस mathers iii ( born अक्तूबर 17, 1972 ), better ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज name Eminem ( stylized as eminǝm ) and by उसके alter अहंकार पतला छायादार, is an American rapper, रिकार्ड producer, songwriter and कर्ता.
एमिनेम, along with his सोलो करियर, is a सदस्य of his group d12, और also एक हाफ of the hip हॉप duo ख़राब meets Evil, with Royce da 5'9 ''.
Eminem is एक of the best-selling artists in the world और is the best-selling artist of the 2000s.
He रै महरूम सूचीबद्ध and क्रमित as एक of the महानतम कलाकारों of सब time by अनेक मैगज़ीन, सहित रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका जिससे क्रमित him 82nd on its list of the 100 Greatest कलाकारों of All Time.
the वही magazine declared him the किंग of Hip Hop.
सहित उसके work with D12 and Bad Meets Evil, Eminem has हासिल टेन number-one एल्बम on the Billboard 200.
he रै sold अधिक than 100 लाख records worldwide, including 42 million ट्रैक्स and 49.1 million एल्बम in the United States.
As an भूमिगत rapper Eminem released his डेब्यू solo album, अनन्त in 1996.
The एल्बम थी a नाजुक and वाणिज्यिक failure.
He gained मुख्यधारा popularity in 1999 after the रिलीज of उसके major-label डेब्यू एल्बम The पतला छायादार LP.
The lp also earned Eminem his पहला Grammy Award for बेहतरीन रैप एल्बम.
उसके next two रिकॉर्ड The Marshall mathers LP, and The Eminem Show, also won बेहतरीन Rap Album Grammy पुरस्कार, making एमिनेम the पहला कलाकार to जीत Best रैप एल्बम for three consecutive LPs.
This थी followed by another स्टुडियो release in 2004 titled Encore.
Eminem तब गई on अंतराल बाद touring in 2005.
He released उसके पहला album in पाँच सालो titled Relapse, on may 15, 2009.
In 2010, Eminem released उसके सातवाँ स्टुडियो album Recovery.
रिकवरी थी an international कामयाबी and थी नामित the बेहतरीन selling album of 2010 worldwide, joining the एमिनेम दिखाएँ, which was the best विक्रेता of 2002.
एमिनेम won ग्रैमी Awards for दोनो Relapse and Recovery, giving him a total of 13 grammys in his career.
Eminem has opened अन्य ventures, सहित his own record लेबल Shady रिकॉर्ड with उसके manager पॉल rosenberg.
he भी रै उसके own रेडियो चैनल, Shade 45 on sirius XM रेडियो.
Eminem began an acting करियर in 2002, जब he स्ट्रक्चर in the hip हॉप drama फिल्मी 8 मील.
he won the अकादमी Award लिये Best Original Song, becoming the पहला rap artist कभी to जीत the award.
He has also made cameo appearances in The Wash ( 2001 ), मजेदार People ( 2009 ) और the television श्रेणी अनुगामी.
The एकड़ is a ईकाई of area used in the इम्पीरियल and U.S. customary प्रणालियों.
an एकड़ is about 40 % of a hectare – थोड़ा smaller than an अमरीकी football field.
the acre is no longer commonly used, हालांकि a few notable अपवाद शामिल the United States, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Burma और the United Kingdom ( as of 2010, the एकड़ is no longer officially प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त किंगडम, though is still प्रयुक्त in रियल एस्टेट descriptions ).
It is still प्रयुक्त, to some extent, in कनाडा.
the international प्रतीक of the acre is ac, and is पारिभाषित as 1/640 of a square mile.
the सबसे commonly used एकड़ today is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय acre.
In the संयुक्त States दोनो the international एकड़ और the slightly अलग US survey एकड़ are in उपयोग.
The most आम उपयोग of the acre is to माप tracts of land.
एक अंतरराष्ट्रीय acre is defined as 4046.8564224 square metres.
During the मध्य आयु, an एकड़ थी the राशि of जमीन कि could be plowed in एक day साथ a yoke of oxen.
Antoine Lavoisier 's discovery of the Law of Conservation of Mass led to many new निष्कर्षों in the 19th century.
जोसेफ Proust 's law of definite proportions and जॉन Dalton 's परमाणु theory branched इससे the discoveries of Antoine Lavoisier.
लाव्वाज़्ये 's quantitative experiments नाज़िल कि दहन शामिल oxygen बल्कि than what थी previously विचार to be phlogiston.
the विधि of संरक्षण of द्रव्यमान, or principle of द्रव्यमान संरक्षण, राज्य कि लिये कोई system बंद to सब हस्तांतरण of matter and energy ( both of which have द्रव्यमान ), the द्रव्यमान of the system must remain constant over time, as system द्रव्यमान can नहीं बदलें मात्रा if it is नहीं added or removed.
hence, the quantity of द्रव्यमान is `` conserved '' over समय.
The law implies कि द्रव्यमान can neither be created nor नष्ट, although it may be rearranged in space, or the entities संबद्ध साथ it may be बदला in form, as लिये example जब light or शारीरिक कार्य is रूपांतरित into अणु कि contribute the same mass to the system as the लाइट or कार्य had contributed.
The विधि implies ( requires ) that during कोई chemical reaction, nuclear प्रतिक्रिया, or radioactive क्षय in an पृथक प्रणाली, the mass of the reactants or starting सामग्री जरूर बराबर the mass of the products.
The अवधारणा of द्रव्यमान conservation is widely used in अनेक fields such as chemistry, mechanics, और fluid dynamics.
Historically, mass conservation was खोजा in chemical प्रतिक्रियाएँ by एंटोनी लाव्वाज़्ये in the लेट 18th सदी, और was of निर्णायक importance in the प्रगति इससे alchemy to the आधुनिक प्राकृतिक विज्ञान of रसायन.
The closely सम्बन्धित concept of matter conservation was found to hold good in रसायन to such ऊँची approximation that it failed तभी for the high energies treated by the बाद refinements of relativity सिद्धान्त, but वरना remains उपयोगी और sufficiently accurate for सबसे chemical calculations, even in modern अभ्यास.
in special आपेक्षिकता, needed for accuracy when विशाल उर्जा transfers between systems is involved, the difference between thermodynamically बंद और पृथक systems becomes important, चूंकि संरक्षण of द्रव्यमान is सख्ती और perfectly upheld only for so-called isolated systems, i.e. those completely पृथक from सब exchanges साथ the environment.
In इस परिस्थिति, the mass-energy equivalence theorem states कि mass संरक्षण is equivalent to total energy conservation, जिससे is the first law of ऊष्मागतिकी.
by कंट्रास्ट, लिये a thermodynamically closed प्रणाली ( i.e., one जिससे is closed to exchanges of matter, लकिन खोलें to exchanges of non-material energy, ऐसे as ऊष्मा and work, साथ the परिवेश ) mass is ( usually ) तभी approximately conserved.
the input or output of non-material energy must change the mass of the प्रणाली in आपेक्षिकता सिद्धान्त, although the change is प्रायः छोटी, since relatively विशाल amounts of ऐसे उर्जा ( by comparison with ordinary अनुभव ) carry only a छोटी राशि of द्रव्यमान ( again by ordinary standards of मापन ).
In special आपेक्षिकता, द्रव्यमान is नहीं converted to energy, चूंकि energy in all of its forms always retains इसके equivalent amount of द्रव्यमान throughout any transformation or translocation into, or out of, a प्रणाली.
however, निश्चित प्रकार of matter ( a अलग अवधारणा ) may be परिवर्तित to उर्जा, so long as the द्रव्यमान of the system is unchanged in the प्रक्रम.
However, if ऐसे उर्जा is removed from प्रणालियों, they must lose the द्रव्यमान कि is associated with it.
in general relativity, द्रव्यमान ( और उर्जा ) conservation in expanding आयतन of स्पेस is a जटिल अवधारणा, subject to different परिभाषाएं, and neither mass nor energy is as सख्ती and बस conserved as is the मामला in special relativity और in Minkowski स्पेस.
For a discussion, see mass in सामान्य आपेक्षिकता.
a pig is any of the animals in the genus Sus, भीतर the Suidae family of even-toed ungulates.
सूअर include the domestic सुअर, its ancestor the wild boar, और several अन्य जंगली relatives.
Young and small सूअर हैं ज्ञात as piglets.
सूअर हैं omnivores और हैं highly social और intelligent पशु.

A floppy disk, or diskette, is a डिस्क storage मीडियम composed of a disk of पतला और flexible magnetic storage medium, sealed in a आयताकार plastic carrier lined साथ कपड़ा that removes dust particles.
वे हैं read and लिखा by a फ्लॉपी डिस्क ड्राइव ( FDD ).
फ्लॉपी disks, initially as media and बाद in and 3.5-inch ( 90 mm ) आकार, were a सर्वव्यापी रूप of आंकड़ा भंडार and exchange इससे the mid-1970s well into the पहला decade of the 21st century.
By 2010, computer motherboards were rarely manufactured साथ फ्लॉपी ड्राइव support ; `` floppies could be प्रयुक्त as an external USB ड्राइव, but ``, 8 ``, और non-standard drives could only be संभाला by बूढ़ा उपकरण.
While floppy डिस्क drives still have कुछ limited uses, especially with विरासत औद्योगिक computer उपकरण, they have been superseded by data भंडार methods with much greater capacity, ऐसे as USB फ्लैश drives, पोर्टेबल external मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव, optical discs, memory cards, और computer networks.

in बेसबॉल, a कटर, or cut fastball, is a type of fastball जिससे ब्रेक slightly toward the पिचर 's दस्ताने side as it पहुँच home plate.
इस pitch is somewhere between a स्लाइडर और a fastball, as it is usually thrown faster than a स्लाइडर लकिन साथ अधिक motion than a typical fastball.
कुछ pitchers उपयोग a कटर as a way to prevent hitters इससे expecting their regular fastballs.
a common technique प्रयुक्त to throw a कटर is to use a four-seam fastball grip with the baseball set slightly बंद बीच in the hand.
जब a batter is समर्थ to hit a कटर पिच, it often परिणाम in नरम contact और an आसान out, due to the पिच 's गति keeping the ball away from the bat 's sweet spot.
the cutter is typically 2–5 mph धीमा than a pitcher 's four-seam fastball.
in 2010, the औसत pitch वर्गीकृत as a कटर by pitchf/x thrown by a right-handed pitcher थी 88.6 mph ; the औसत four-seamer थी 92.1 mph.
`` What it Takes '' is a शक्ति ballad by American मुश्किल rock band एरोस्मिथ.
it थी लिखा by Steven टायलर, जो Perry, and डेसमंड Child.
It was released in 1990 as the तीसरा single from Aerosmith 's critically and commercially successful 1989 एल्बम Pump.
in the वीडियो the बनाना of पंप, A & R man John kalodner वर्णित the सोंग as `` a कलाकृति ''.
दौरान सजीव performances, Tyler गाती the पहला श्लोक a cappella और बेल्ट आउट एक of his signature चिल्लाती right पहले the कोरस.
The album version of the song is followed by an बेनाम hidden track.

Odysseus ( or ; Greek :, ), also ज्ञात by the रोमन name Ulysses ( ; ), थी a legendary Greek किंग of ithaca और a hero of होमर 's एपिक poem the ओडिसी.
Odysseus also plays a कुंजी role in होमर 's इलियड and other works in that same Epic साईकिल.
husband of पेनेलोप, पिता of telemachus, and son of laërtes ( or sisyphus ) और Anticlea, Odysseus is renowned for उसके brilliance, छल, and versatility ( polytropos ), और is hence known by the epithet odysseus the cunning ( mētis, or `` cunning intelligence `` ).
He is most प्रसिद्ध for the टेन eventful सालो he took to return घर after the decade-long trojan युद्ध and उसके प्रसिद्ध trojan Horse ploy to capture the नगर of ट्रॉय.
erie is a Statutory Town in बोल्डर और Weld काउंटी in the u.S. state of Colorado.
The जनसांख्यिकी according to the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी is 18,135 and was recorded as 6,291 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
The Town of Erie is स्तिथ just वेस्ट of i-25 for easy अभिगम to i-70, डेनवर International Airport और कोलोराडो 's entire सामने दायरा.
erie 's नियोजन Area spans 48 square miles, extending from the उत्तर side of State Highway 52 south to राज्य राजमार्ग 7, and between us 287 on the वेस्ट और Interstate 25 to the ईस्ट.
Erie is लगभग 35 minutes इससे Denver International Airport, 25 minutes to डेनवर and 20 minutes from बोल्डर.
The Board of Trustees serves as the विधान and शासी body of the कस्बा of erie and is responsible for establishing Town नीतियों और goals.
the फलक has the प्राधिकार to adopt laws, ordinances and resolutions as needed to conduct the business of the कस्बा, and by अध्यादेश may enter into contracts or intergovernmental समझौतों to furnish, receive सेवाएं or to provide for cooperative service delivery.
Appointed by and सेवारत at the pleasure of the फलक of Trustees, the Town Administrator is the मुख्य ऑपरेटिंग and administrative officer of the कस्बा and is जिम्मेदार लिये providing पेशेवर leadership in the प्रशासन and execution of नीतियों and उद्देश्य प्रतिपादित by the फलक.
The mission of the erie Police Department is to communicate और work साथ the जातियाँ to maintain a safe पर्यावरण, prevent crime and enforce the विधि, जबकि protecting the अधिकारों of all.
Erie Municipal Airport ( EIK ) is owned and operated by the कस्बा of Erie और is strategically स्तिथ in the denver-boulder महानगर क्षेत्रफल on Colorado Highway 7, a छोटी over three मील west of अंतरराज्यीय 25.
The main runway is concrete paved और 4,700 feet long.
the is a home वीडियो game console उत्पादित by सोनी Computer entertainment.
it is the successor to the PlayStation 2, as part of the PlayStation श्रेणी.
The प्लेस्टेशन 3 competes with Microsoft 's Xbox 360 और Nintendo 's वी as भाग of the seventh पीढी of video game consoles.
It थी पहला released on November 11, 2006, in जापानी, with international markets following shortly thereafter.
the कंसोल थी first officially announced at e3 2005.
Originally नियत for a वसन्त 2006 रिलीज date, it was विलम्बित अनेक टाइम्स until आखिरकार hitting स्टोर्स at the समाप्त of the साल.
it was the first और फिलहाल only console to use Blu-ray डिस्क as इसके प्राथमिक storage मीडियम.
प्रमुख features of the कंसोल शामिल its unified ऑनलाइन गेमिंग सेवा, the प्लेस्टेशन संजाल, and its connectivity with the प्लेस्टेशन पोर्टेबल और PlayStation वीटा, in September 2009 the अद्यतनीकृत PlayStation 3 पतला, थी released.
This पतला is lighter and thinner than the original version, although it lacks प्लेस्टेशन 2 पीछे संगतता ( removed on बाद असली मॉडल ), लकिन notably प्रदर्शित a re-designed लोगो and marketing design.
As of नवम्बर 4, 2012, 70 million PlayStation 3s have been sold worldwide.
इसके successor, PlayStation 4, is set for a q4 2013 release.
Salvador Domingo फेलिप jacinto dalí i Domènech, 1st marqués de dalí de Pubol ( May 11, 1904january 23, 1989 ), ज्ञात as Salvador Dalí ( ), थी a prominent स्पेनी surrealist चित्रकार born in figueres, Spain.
Dalí was a skilled draftsman, best known लिये the striking और विचित्र बिंब in उसके surrealist कार्य.
उसके painterly कौशल are प्रायः attributed to the influence of पुनर्जागरण मास्टर्स.
उसके best-known work, The हठ of मेमोरी, थी completed in 1931.
dalí 's expansive artistic रंगमंडल शामिल film, मूर्तिकला, और photography, in सहयोग with a range of artists in a किस्में of media.
dalí attributed his `` love of सबकुछ that is gilded और excessive, my जुनून लिये लक्ज़री and my love of प्राच्य कपडे '' to a self-styled `` अरब lineage '', claiming that his ancestors were descended इससे the Moors.
dalí थी highly कल्पनाशील, और भी enjoyed indulging in unusual और वैभवशाली बर्ताव.
उसके eccentric manner और attention-grabbing पब्लिक क्रियाएँ sometimes खींचा more ध्यान than his कलाकृति, to the dismay of those who आयोजित उसके work in ऊँची esteem, और to the जलन of उसके आलोचकों.

The मानवता are अकादमिक disciplines that study इंसान संस्कृति, using विधि that are primarily विश्लेषणात्मक, नाजुक, or सट्टे, और having a significant historical element, as distinguished इससे the mainly अनुभवजन्य approaches of the प्राकृतिक sciences.
the humanities include प्राचीन and modern भाषाएं, literature, philosophy, धर्म, और visual और performing कला ऐसे as music and थिएटर.
the मानवता that are also regarded as social sciences शामिल history, anthropology, area अध्ययन, संचार studies, cultural studies, law, अर्थशास्त्र and भाषाविज्ञान.
विद्वानों working in the मानवता हैं sometimes वर्णित as `` humanists ''.
However, that पद also describes the philosophical position of मानवतावाद, जिससे some `` antihumanist `` scholars in the humanities अस्वीकृत.
कुछ secondary schools प्रस्ताव मानवता वर्ग, प्रायः consisting of अंग्रेज़ी साहित्य, global अध्ययन, और art.
Human disciplines like इतिहास, cultural anthropology and psychoanalysis पढ़ाई subject matters to which the प्रायोगिक method does not लागू, and वे have access instead to the तुलनात्मक विधि and comparative शोध.

The White House Christmas पेड़, भी ज्ञात as the Blue रूम Christmas पेड़, is the official indoor Christmas पेड़ at the निवास of the अध्यक्ष of the United राज्य, the White House.
The first indoor क्रिसमस tree थी installed in the White हाउस sometime in the 19th century ( वहीँ हैं varying दावा as to the सटीक year ) और चूंकि 1961 the tree रै had a themed मोटिफ at the discretion of the पहला Lady of the संयुक्त States.
the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States of अमेरिका ( POTUS ) is the सिर of state और head of सरकारी of the United राज्य.
the president leads the executive शाखा of the federal government और is the commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त States Armed शक्तियां.
आलेख II of the u.S. Constitution vests the कार्यपालिका power of the संयुक्त राज्य in the president और charges उसे with the निष्पादन of संघीय law, alongside the responsibility of appointing federal कार्यपालिका, राजनयिक, regulatory, and न्यायिक officers, and concluding treaties साथ विदेशी शक्तियां, साथ the सलाह और सहमति of the Senate.
The अध्यक्ष is further empowered to grant संघीय pardons and reprieves, and to convene and adjourn either or both घरों of कॉंग्रेस under extraordinary circumstances.
Since the founding of the संयुक्त राज्य, the शक्ति of the अध्यक्ष और the federal government have grown substantially और each आधुनिक president, despite possessing no औपचारिक विधान शक्तियां परे signing or vetoing congressionally passed बिल्स, is largely जिम्मेदार for dictating the विधान कार्यसूची of his party and the foreign and घरेलू policy of the संयुक्त States.
the president is अक्सर वर्णित as the सबसे powerful व्यक्ति in the world.
the president is indirectly elected by the people through the Electoral College to a four-year term, और is one of तभी दो nationally elected संघीय अधिकारियों, the other होने the वाइस अध्यक्ष of the United States.
the twenty-second amendment, adopted in 1951, prohibits anyone इससे कभी होने निर्वाचित to the प्रेसिडेंसी for a third full पद.
it भी prohibits a व्यक्ति from being निर्वाचित to the प्रेसिडेंसी अधिक than एकबार if that व्यक्ति previously था परोसा as president, or acting president, for more than two years of another व्यक्ति 's पद as अध्यक्ष.
In सब, 43 individuals have परोसा 55 four-year शर्तें.
on January 20, 2009, Barack ओबामा became the 44th और वर्तमान president.
on November 6, 2012, he थी re-elected और is scheduled to serve until जनवरी 20, 2017.
Senses are physiological capacities of organisms कि provide आंकड़ा for perception.
the होश और उनके आपरेशन, classification, और सिद्धान्त are overlapping topics studied by a किस्में of fields, सबसे notably neuroscience, संज्ञानात्मक psychology ( or cognitive विज्ञान ), and philosophy of बोध.
The nervous प्रणाली रै a विशिष्ट संवेदी प्रणाली or organ, dedicated to each sense.
इंसानो have a multitude of senses.
sight ( ophthalmoception ), सुनना ( audioception ), स्वाद ( gustaoception ), महकते ( olfacoception or olfacception ), और टच ( tactioception ) हैं the पाँच traditionally recognized.
While the क्षमता to detect अन्य stimuli beyond those governed by the परंपरागत senses exists, सहित तापमान ( thermoception ), kinesthetic भाव ( proprioception ), pain ( nociception ), balance ( equilibrioception ), acceleration ( kinesthesioception ), and various internal stimuli ( e.g. the different chemoreceptors लिये detecting नमक and carbon dioxide concentrations in the रक्त ), only a small क्रमांक of ये can सकुशल be वर्गीकृत as पृथक senses in and of themselves.
What constitutes a भाव is a matter of कुछ बहस, leading to difficulties in defining what exactly a भाव is.
Animals also have receptors to भाव the संसार around them, साथ डिग्री of capability varying greatly between प्रजाति.
Humans have a comparatively कमजोर भाव of smell, जबकि कुछ पशु may lack one or अधिक of the परंपरागत पाँच senses.
कुछ पशु may also सेवन और interpret sensory stimuli in बहुत अलग तरीके.
कुछ प्रजाति of पशु हैं समर्थ to sense the संसार in a way that humans can नहीं, with कुछ प्रजाति समर्थ to भाव विद्युत और चुम्बकीय fields, and detect water दबाव and currents.
Spiders ( अनुक्रम Araneae ) are air-breathing arthropods कि have आठ legs और chelicerae साथ fangs कि इंजेक्ट venom.
They हैं the largest order of arachnids and rank seventh in कुल species विविधता among सब other समूह of जीवों.
मकड़ियों हैं मिला विश्वव्यापी on प्रत्येक continent मगर लिये अंटार्कटिक, and have become established in nearly every आवास with the exception of एयर and sea colonization.
As of 2008, at तनिक 43,678 spider species, और 109 परिवारों have been recorded by taxonomists ; however, वहीँ has been confusion भीतर the scientific community as to how सब ये families चाहिए be classified, as evidenced by the over 20 अलग classifications कि have been proposed चूंकि 1900.
Anatomically, spiders differ from other arthropods in that the usual body खण्ड are fused into two tagmata, the cephalothorax और abdomen, और joined by a small, cylindrical pedicel.
नापसंद कीट, spiders do not have antennae.
In सब मगर the most primitive समूह, the Mesothelae, spiders have the most centralized बेचैन systems of सब arthropods, as सब उनके ganglia हैं fused into one mass in the cephalothorax.
Unlike most arthropods, spiders have no extensor muscles in their limbs and बजाय extend them by hydraulic pressure.
Their abdomens भालू appendages that have been परिवर्धित into spinnerets that extrude रेशा from up to छह types of silk ग्रंथियों within उनके abdomen.
मकड़ी webs vary widely in size, आकार और the राशि of sticky लड़ी used.
It अभी appears that the सर्पिल orb web may be एक of the earliest forms, और spiders कि produce tangled cobwebs are more abundant and diverse than orb-web spiders.
Spider-like arachnids साथ silk-producing spigots appeared in the Devonian period about, लकिन ये पशु apparently lacked spinnerets.
True मकड़ियों have been मिला in Carboniferous rocks इससे, and हैं बहुत similar to the सबसे primitive surviving order, the Mesothelae.
the main समूह of आधुनिक spiders, mygalomorphae and Araneomorphae, first appeared in the triassic काल, पहले.
A herbivorous प्रजाति, bagheera kiplingi, was वर्णित in 2008, लकिन all अन्य known species हैं परभक्षी, mostly preying on कीट और on other मकड़ियों, हालांकि a few large species also take birds और lizards.
Spiders use a wide range of strategies to capture prey : trapping it in sticky webs, lassoing it with स्टिकी bolas, mimicking the prey to avoid डिटेक्शन, or कार्यशील it down.
Most detect शिकार मुख्यतः by sensing vibrations, लकिन the क्रियाशील hunters have acute vision, और hunters of the genus Portia दिखाएँ signs of intelligence in their choice of tactics and ability to develop नई ones.
मकड़ियों ' गुस्ताखी are too सीमित to take solids, and वे liquidize उनके food by बाढ़ it with digestive एंजाइमों and पीस it with the bases of their pedipalps, as वे do not have true jaws.
पुरूष मकड़ियों पहचानो themselves by a variety of जटिल प्रेमालाप rituals to avoid होने eaten by the females.
males of सबसे प्रजाति survive a few matings, limited mainly by उनके छोटी life spans.
महिलाओं बुनते रेशा egg-cases, each of जिससे may contain सैंकड़ों of eggs.
Females of अनेक प्रजाति care लिये उनके young, लिये example by carrying them around or by sharing food साथ them.
a minority of प्रजाति हैं social, building सांप्रदायिक webs that may house anywhere from a few to 50,000 individuals.
सोशल बर्ताव ranges from precarious toleration, as in the widow मकड़ियों, to co-operative hunting and food-sharing.
Although most spiders सजीव for at most two years, tarantulas and other mygalomorph मकड़ियों can सजीव up to 25 सालो in captivity.
While the venom of a few प्रजाति is dangerous to humans, वैज्ञानिकों हैं अभी researching the use of spider venom in medicine and as non-polluting pesticides.
Spider silk provides a संयोजन of lightness, strength and लोच that is superior to that of synthetic सामग्री, and spider रेशा genes have महरूम inserted into mammals और पौधे to देखिए if ये can be प्रयुक्त as रेशा कारखानों.
As a परिणाम of उनके wide range of behaviors, spiders have become common symbols in आर्ट और mythology symbolizing विभिन्न combinations of सब्र, क्रूरता और रचनात्मक powers.
धूसर 's anatomy is an American टेलीविज़न medical नाटक कि premiered on the अमरीकी Broadcasting कम्पनी ( ABC ), as a mid-season replacement on March 27, 2005.
the श्रेणी रै aired nine seasons, और focuses on the fictional lives of सर्जिकल interns and निवासियों as they gradually evolve into seasoned doctors, जबकि trying to maintain personal lives.
the दिखाएँ 's premise originated with Shonda Rhimes, जो serves as an कार्यपालिका निर्माता, along साथ Betsy Beers, चिह्नित Gordon, Krista Vernoff, Rob मकई, चिह्नित Wilding, and Allan Heinberg.
the श्रेणी was निर्मित to be racially diverse, utilizing a color-blind casting तकनीक.
it is primarily filmed in लॉस एंजिल्स, California.
The श्रेणी ' protagonist is Dr. मेरेडिथ Grey ( एलेन pompeo ), जो originally is स्वीकृत into the रेसिडेंसी कार्यक्रम at the fictional Seattle अनुग्रह Hospital.
Meredith is आबंटित to work अंतर्गत Dr. मिरांडा Bailey ( चन्द्रा विल्सन ), along with Dr. क्रिस्टीना Yang ( सैंड्रा Oh ), dr. जार्ज o'malley ( T. R. नाईट ), dr. izzie Stevens ( Katherine Heigl ), और Dr. एलेक्स karev ( जस्टिन Chambers ).
Following o'malley 's मौत and स्टीवंस ' प्रस्थान, the हॉस्पिटल 's विलय साथ रहमत वेस्ट brings in Dr. Jackson Avery ( जेसी विलियम्स ) and Dr. अप्रैल kepner ( Sarah Drew ), in the sixth ऋतु.
The सर्जिकल wing is primarily supervised by Dr. Richard webber ( James pickens, Jr. ), who is eventually replaced by Dr. Derek Shepherd ( पैट्रिक Dempsey ), and बाद Dr. Owen Hunt ( Kevin mckidd ).
Dr. Preston Burke ( यशायाह Washington ) departs at the निष्कर्ष of the third season, and is replaced by dr. एरिका hahn ( ब्रुक Smith ), who पत्ते the दिखाएँ दौरान the fifth season, और बाद dr. Teddy Altman ( Kim raver ), जो departs at the समाप्त of the आठवीं ऋतु.
Introduced in the दूसरी season is Dr. Addison मोंटगोमरी ( केट Walsh ), who पत्ते the दिखाएँ at the समाप्त of the third season, in order to launch उसके own spin-off चिकित्सा drama Private अभ्यास.
dr. Callie टोरेस ( Sara Ramirez ) और dr. Mark Sloan ( Eric डेन ) भी डालें the show in the second ऋतु, जबकि the latter dies in the प्रीमियर of the ninth season.
Meredith 's half-sister, Dr. lexie धूसर ( chyler leigh ), appears इससे season तीन और मरता at the समाप्त of season eight.
Dr. एरिज़ोना Robbins ( Jessica capshaw ) is दिए series regular status at the beginning of the छठे ऋतु.
Grey 's Anatomy is the highest-rated नाटक in the key 18–49 demographic.
previously among the overall top-ten rated shows in the संयुक्त राज्य, Grey 's anatomy रै been खूब प्राप्त by आलोचकों.
माना an प्रभाव on culture, the series रै received numerous awards, and रै also महरूम included in various आलोचकों ' top टेन सूचियाँ.
the दिखाएँ has produced अनेक specials, as खूब as distributed all सीज़न to dvd, and released a संग्रहण of merchandise.
In 2012, Grey 's Anatomy थी नामित the fifth-highest आय earning दिखाएँ, in terms of विज्ञापन per half-hour.
on may 11, 2012, the series थी renewed for a नवीं ऋतु, which premiered on September 27, 2012.
Schizophrenia ( or ) is a दिमागी विकार characterized by a breakdown of विचार processes and by a deficit of ठेठ emotional प्रतिक्रियाएँ.
Common लक्षण शामिल auditory hallucinations, paranoid or bizarre delusions, or disorganized speech and thinking, और it is accompanied by significant social or occupational dysfunction.
the onset of लक्षण typically occurs in young adulthood, with a वैश्विक आजीवन prevalence of परिचय 0.3–0.7 %.
Diagnosis is आधारित on observed बर्ताव and the रोगी 's reported experiences.
Genetics, जल्दी environment, neurobiology, और मनोवैज्ञानिक and सोशल processes appear to be important contributory कारकों ; कुछ recreational और prescription drugs appear to cause or worsen लक्षण.
वर्तमान शोध is focused on the role of neurobiology, हालांकि no सिंगल पृथक सशुल्क कारण रै महरूम found.
the अनेक संभावित combinations of symptoms have triggered बहस परिचय whether the निदान represents a single disorder or a क्रमांक of अलहदा syndromes.
despite the etymology of the पद from the यूनानी roots skhizein ( σχίζειν, `` to विभाजित '' ) and phrēn, phren- ( φρήν, φρεν- ; `` दिमाग '' ), schizophrenia करता not imply a `` split personality '', or `` अनेक व्यक्तित्व disorder '' ( which is ज्ञात these दिनों as dissociative पहचान विकार ) —a condition साथ which it is often confused in public बोध.
Rather, the पद means a `` splitting of mental कृत्यों '', because of the symptomatic presentation of the बीमारी.
the mainstay of उपचार is antipsychotic medication, जिससे primarily suppresses dopamine ( और sometimes serotonin ) receptor activity.
मनोचिकित्सा and वोकेशनल and सोशल पुनर्वास are भी महत्वपूर्ण in उपचार.
In more serious cases—where वहीँ is रिस्क to स्वः and others— involuntary hospitalization may be जरुरी, although hospital stays हैं अभी shorter और less बारंबार than they एकबार यहूद.
The disorder is विचार mainly to affect cognition, but it भी प्रायः contributes to chronic problems with बर्ताव and emotion.
People with schizophrenia हैं संभावित to have additional ( comorbid ) conditions, including प्रमुख अवसाद and anxiety विकार ; the आजीवन occurrence of substance उपयोग disorder is लगभग 50 %.
सोशल problems, ऐसे as long-term unemployment, गरीबी, और homelessness are common.
the औसत life expectancy of लोगों साथ the विकार is 12 to 15 years less than those without, the परिणाम of increased शारीरिक स्वास्थ्य problems और a higher suicide रेट ( परिचय 5 % ).
पॉल लेस्ली Snider ( April 15, 1951–August 14, 1980 ) थी the estranged husband and manager of Playboy मॉडल Dorothy Stratten, whom he murdered before हत्या himself the वही day.
the Epic of Gilgamesh, an एपिक कविता इससे मेसोपोटामिया, is amongst the earliest surviving works of literature.
The साहित्यिक history of gilgamesh begins साथ पाँच स्वतंत्र sumerian कविताएं परिचय 'Bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian for Gilgamesh ), king of uruk.
Four of these यहूद प्रयुक्त as source material for a संयुक्त एपिक in Akkadian.
This पहला combined epic, known as the `` Old Babylonian '' version, dates to the 18th सदी bc और is titled after इसके incipit, shūtur एली sharrī ( `` Surpassing सब अन्य Kings '' ).
तभी a few fragments of it have survived.
The बाद `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates इससे the 13th to the 10th centuries BC और bears the incipit Sha naqba īmuru ( `` he जो Saw the Deep '' ).
fragments of लगभग two thirds of इस longer, twelve-tablet version have been बरामद.
Some of the बेहतरीन नक़ल यहूद खोजा in the library तबाह of the 7th-century bc Assyrian किंग ashurbanipal.
the story centers on a friendship between Gilgamesh and Enkidu.
Enkidu is a wild man निर्मित by the देवताओं as gilgamesh 's बराबर to distract उसे from oppressing the people of Uruk.
साथ, वे journey to the देवदार Mountain to defeat Humbaba, इसके monstrous संरक्षक.
Later they मार the सांड of Heaven, जिससे the goddess Ishtar भेजना to punish Gilgamesh लिये spurning उसके अग्रिम.
as a दंड लिये these क्रियाएँ, the gods sentence Enkidu to मौत.
the second half of the epic focuses on Gilgamesh 's distress at Enkidu 's मौत, and his quest for immortality.
In अनुक्रम to learn the secret of अनन्त जीवन, gilgamesh undertakes a long और perilous यात्रा.
He learns कि `` The जीवन कि you हैं seeking तुम होगा never find.
When the देवताओं निर्मित man they आवंटित to him death, लकिन जीवन वे retained in उनके own keeping. ''
इस उद्धरण थी originally attributed to Siduri in the बूढ़ा babylonian version of the एपिक, and then attributed to the immortal flood नायिका utnapishtim in the Akkadian version of the एपिक.
nevertheless, Gilgamesh 's कीर्ति lived on after उसके death, because of उसके ग्रेट भवन प्रोजेक्ट, and his खाता of what Utnapishtim told him happened during the बाढ़.
the स्टोरी रै महरूम translated into अनेक अलग languages, and gilgamesh रै चूंकि become adapted in works of लोकप्रिय fiction.
A eukaryote ( or ) is an organism जिनकी cells contain complex structures enclosed within membranes.
Eukaryotes may more formally be referred to as the taxon eukarya or Eukaryota.
the defining membrane-bound structure that sets eukaryotic कोशिकाएं अलावा इससे prokaryotic cells is the केंद्रक, or nuclear envelope, भीतर which the genetic सामग्री is carried.
the उपस्थिति of a nucleus gives eukaryotes their name, which comes from the यूनानी ( eu, `` good '' ) और ( karyon, `` nut '' or `` kernel '' ).
सबसे eukaryotic कोशिकाएं भी contain अन्य membrane-bound organelles ऐसे as mitochondria, chloroplasts and the Golgi apparatus.
All large complex organisms हैं eukaryotes, सहित animals, plants and fungi.
The group भी शामिल अनेक unicellular organisms.
कोशिका division in eukaryotes is अलग from कि in organisms बगैर a nucleus ( Prokaryote ).
it involves separating the duplicated गुणसूत्रों, through movements directed by microtubules.
वहीँ are two types of प्रभाग processes.
in समसूत्रण, एक कोशिका divides to produce दो genetically identical cells.
In meiosis, which is जरूरी in sexual reproduction, one diploid कोशिका ( having दो instances of each chromosome, एक from प्रत्येक जनक ) undergoes recombination of प्रत्येक pair of parental गुणसूत्रों, और तब दो चरण of cell प्रभाग, resulting in four अगुणित कोशिकाएं ( gametes ).
प्रत्येक gamete has just एक पूरक of chromosomes, प्रत्येक a unique mix of the corresponding जोड़ी of parental chromosomes.
eukaryota appears to be monophyletic, and so makes up one of the तीन डोमेन of life.
The two अन्य domains, Bacteria and आर्किया, हैं prokaryotes and have none of the above features.
eukaryotes represent a छोटा अल्पसंख्यक of सब जीना things ; भी in a human देह there are 10 times more microbes than इंसान cells.
However, due to उनके much larger आकार उनके सामूहिक worldwide बायोमास is अनुमानित at about बराबर to that of prokaryotes.
वे are considered to have first developed approximately 1.6–2.1 अरब years ago.
the उपयोग of अंतरजाल services or software साथ Internet access to defraud पीड़ितों or to otherwise take लाभ of उन्हें, for example by चोरी personal information, जिससे can भी सीसे to identity चोरी.
a बहुत आम रूप of अंतरजाल धोखाधड़ी is the distribution of दुष्ट security तन्त्र.
अंतरजाल services can be प्रयुक्त to present बेईमान solicitations to prospective victims, to conduct बेईमान ट्रांजेक्शन, or to संचारण the proceeds of धोखाधड़ी to financial institutions or to अन्य कनेक्ट साथ the योजना.
Internet धोखाधड़ी can occur in गपशप rooms, email, संदेश फलक, or on वेबसाइटों.
the International Security Assistance फ़ोर्स ( ISAF ) is a नाटो -led security mission in अफगानिस्तान that was स्थापित by the United Nations सुरक्षा Council in December 2001 by रेज़ोल्यूशन 1386, as envisaged by the Bonn Agreement.
Its प्रमुख purpose is to train the Afghan नेशनल Security Forces ( ansf ) and assist अफगानिस्तान in rebuilding कुंजी सरकारी institutions but is also engaged in the 2001-present युद्ध with insurgent समूह.
isaf was initially चार्ज साथ securing काबुल and surrounding areas from the Taliban, al Qaeda and factional warlords, so as to allow for the स्थापना of the Afghan transitional Administration headed by हामिद Karzai.
in अक्तूबर 2003, the un Security Council प्राधिकृत the विस्तार of the ISAF mission throughout Afghanistan, and ISAF subsequently विस्तारित the मिशन in four main stages over the whole of the country.
From 2006 to 2011, ISAF था been शामिल in increasingly अधिक intensive combat operations in दक्षिणी और eastern अफगानिस्तान.
Troop योगदानकर्ता शामिल इससे the संयुक्त राज्य, United Kingdom, NATO सदस्य राज्य और a number of other देशों.
the intensity of the कॉम्बैट faced by contributing nations varies greatly, साथ the संयुक्त States, संयुक्त किंगडम, and Canada sustaining the majority of हताहत in intensive combat परिचालन, साथ other contributors sustaining significantly कम.
As of जल्दी 2010, there were at तनिक 700 सैन्य bases अंदर अफगानिस्तान but more यहूद अपेक्षित to be निर्मित in the coming years.
About 400 of ये यहूद used by American‐led नाटो शक्तियां and 300 by ANSF.
Cocaine ( benzoylmethylecgonine ) ( INN ) is a crystalline tropane एल्कलॉएड कि is प्राप्त from the leaves of the कोका plant.
the name comes इससे `` कोका '' and the alkaloid suffix -ine, forming cocaine.
It is a stimulant, an appetite suppressant, and a topical anesthetic.
biologically, cocaine acts as a serotonin–norepinephrine–dopamine reuptake inhibitor, भी ज्ञात as a triple reuptake inhibitor ( ट्राई ).
it is addictive क्युकी of इसके effect on the mesolimbic बदला pathway.
Unlike most अणुओं, कोका रै pockets with दोनो high hydrophilic और lipophilic efficiency, violating the नियम of hydrophilic-lipophilic संतुलन.
इस causes it to cross the blood–brain अवरोध far बेहतर than other psychoactive रसायन and may even induce blood-brain अवरोध breakdown.
it is illegal to possess, उपज, or distribute cocaine लिये non-medicinal and non-government-sanctioned उद्देश्य in लगभग every देश.
पूरे beef tri-tip rump, roasted medium विरल
The tri-tip is a काटें of beef from the bottom sirloin primal cut.
It is a छोटी triangular मांसपेशी, usually 1.5 to 2.5 पाउंड. ( 675 to 1,150g ) per पक्ष of बीफ.
the scientific नाम of this muscle is प्रदिश fasciae latae, inserted in the fascia lata, the संयोजी tissue covering the quadriceps femoris, भी called quadriceps extensor, a समूह of चार muscles जिससे in फेरे insert in the patella, or घुटना कैप of the एनिमल.
willmar is a city in, और the county सीट of, kandiyohi काउंटी, मिनेसोटा, संयुक्त States.
the population was 19,610 at the 2010 census.
willmar रै महरूम आबंटित zip कोड 56201 by the United States डाक सेवा.
u.s. रूट 12 और 71 और Minnesota राज्य राजमार्गों 23 और 40 are four of the main routes in the city.
the स्पीकर of the संयुक्त States हाउस of प्रतिनिधि ( or Speaker of the हाउस ) is the presiding अधिकारी of the कक्ष.
The office थी established in 1789 by आलेख i, खण्ड 2 of the United राज्य संविधान, जिससे राज्य in part, `` the हाउस of Representatives shall chuse their स्पीकर... ''
The current स्पीकर is जॉन boehner, a रिपब्लिकन जो represents Ohio 's 8th congressional ज़िला.
The Constitution does not आवश्यकता that the Speaker be a सदस्य of Congress, लकिन no non-member has कभी been निर्वाचित to the दफ्तर.
The स्पीकर is दूसरी in the संयुक्त States presidential लकीर of उत्तराधिकार, बाद the वाइस अध्यक्ष and ahead of the President प्रो tempore of the U.S. Senate.
Unlike some Westminster प्रणाली parliaments, in जिससे the office of स्पीकर is considered non-partisan, in the United States the स्पीकर of the हाउस is a leadership स्थिति and the office-holder actively works to set the बहुमत party 's विधान कार्यसूची.
The स्पीकर प्रायः does नहीं personally preside over debates, बजाय delegating the ड्यूटी to members of the House इससे the बहुमत party.
Aside इससे कर्तव्य relating to heading the House और the majority राजनैतिक party, the Speaker भी performs administrative और procedural functions, and represents उसके or her Congressional ज़िला.
A सायकिल फ़्रेम is the main घटक of a bicycle, on to जिससे पहियों and अन्य components are fitted.
The modern और most आम फ़्रेम डिज़ाइन for an upright bicycle is आधारित on the safety bicycle, and consists of two triangles, a प्रमुख त्रिभुज and a paired पश्च triangle.
This is ज्ञात as the डायमंड फ़्रेम.
फ्रेम्स हैं जरूरी to be strong, stiff and light, जिससे वे do by combining अलग सामग्री और shapes.
`` Simple gravity लोलक '' मॉडल assumes no घर्षण or air resistance.
