a pendulum is a वज़न निलंबित इससे a so that it can झूले freely.
When a pendulum is displaced sideways इससे इसके resting equilibrium position, it is subject to a restoring force due to gravity कि होगा accelerate it वापस toward the संतुलन position.
When released, the restoring force combined with the लोलक 's द्रव्यमान कल्याणकारी it to oscillate परिचय the equilibrium position, सुहाने back और forth.
The समय for one पूरा साईकिल, a बाएँ swing और a सही झूले, is called the period.
a लोलक swings with a specific period which depends ( mainly ) on its length.
From इसके discovery around 1602 by Galileo Galilei the नियमित motion of pendulums थी used for timekeeping, and was the world 's most सटीक timekeeping प्रौद्योगिकी until the 1930s.
pendulums हैं प्रयुक्त to विनियमित लोलक clocks, और are used in scientific यंत्र ऐसे as accelerometers और seismometers.
Historically they यहूद प्रयुक्त as gravimeters to measure the त्वरण of गम्भीरता in geophysical सर्वेक्षण, और भी as a standard of length.
the word 'pendulum ' is new Latin, from the Latin pendulus, meaning 'hanging '.
The simple gravity लोलक is an idealized mathematical मॉडल of a pendulum.
इस is a weight ( or bob ) on the समाप्त of a massless cord निलंबित from a, without घर्षण.
When दिए an आरंभिक push, it will झूले back and forth at a निरंतर amplitude.
Real pendulums हैं subject to friction और एयर खीचें, so the आयाम of their swings गिरावट.
The First बैटल of Bull चलाएं, भी known as पहला manassas ( the नाम प्रयुक्त by confederate forces ), was लड़ा on July 21, 1861, in Prince William काउंटी, Virginia, निकट the city of Manassas.
it थी the पहला प्रमुख land battle of the American Civil युद्ध.
बस months after the start of the युद्ध at Fort sumter, the उत्तरी पब्लिक clamored लिये a march against the confederate capital of Richmond, वर्जिनिया, जिससे वे अपेक्षित to bring an early end to the rebellion.
yielding to राजनैतिक pressure, ब्रिगेडियर. gen. Irvin mcdowell led उसके unseasoned Union फौज across सांड चलाएं against the equally अनुभवहीन confederate फौज of Brig. Gen. P. G. T. Beauregard camped निकट manassas जंक्शन.
mcdowell 's महत्वाकांक्षी योजना for a surprise पार्श्व attack on the confederate बाएँ was poorly चलाया by his officers and men ; nevertheless, the Confederates, जो था महरूम planning to आक्रमण the संघ left पार्श्व, found themselves at an initial disadvantage.
Confederate reinforcements अंतर्गत Brig. Gen. Joseph E. Johnston arrived from the Shenandoah Valley by रेलरोड and the कोर्स of the बैटल जल्दी बदला.
a ब्रिगेड of Virginians under a relatively अनजान colonel इससे the वर्जिनिया Military Institute, Thomas J. जैक्सन, stood उनके मैदान and Jackson received his प्रसिद्ध nickname, `` Stonewall Jackson ''.
the Confederates तब शुभारम्भ a strong counterattack, और as the संघ troops began withdrawing under आग, अनेक panicked और it turned into a rout as McDowell 's मेन frantically ran without order in the direction of वॉशिंगटन, d.c.
दोनो armies यहूद sobered by the fierce fighting और अनेक हताहत, और realized the war थी going to be much longer and bloodier than either had anticipated.

मौसम is the राज्य of the atmosphere, to the उपाधि that it is hot or cold, गीला or dry, शांत or stormy, clear or cloudy.
सबसे मौसम phenomena occur in the troposphere, just नीचे the stratosphere.
मौसम generally refers to day-to-day तापमान and precipitation activity, whereas जलवायु is the पद for the average atmospheric शर्तें over longer अवधि of time.
जब used without qualification, `` weather '' is understood to be the मौसम of धरती.
Weather is driven by air pressure ( तापमान और नमी ) differences between one place and another.
These दबाव और temperature मतभेद can occur due to the sun कोण at any particular spot, जिससे varies by latitude इससे the ऊष्णकटिबन्ध.
The strong तापमान contrast between ध्रुवीय और तीव्र air gives वृद्धि to the jet stream.
Weather प्रणालियों in the mid-latitudes, ऐसे as extratropical cyclones, हैं caused by instabilities of the jet स्ट्रीम flow.
क्युकी the Earth 's अक्ष is tilted सापेक्ष to its कक्षीय प्लेन, धूप is incident at different angles at different times of the साल.
On धरती 's सतह, temperatures प्रायः दायरा ±40 °C ( −40 °F to 100 °F ) annually.
over हज़ारों of सालो, changes in धरती 's कक्षा affect the राशि and वितरण of solar energy received by the धरती और influence long-term climate और वैश्विक climate change.
सतह temperature मतभेद in फेरे cause pressure differences.
उच्चतर altitudes are cooler than निम्नतर altitudes due to मतभेद in compressional heating.
मौसम forecasting is the application of science और technology to भविष्यवाणी the राज्य of the atmosphere लिये a भविष्य समय and a given स्थान.
the atmosphere is a chaotic system, so छोटी परिवर्तन to one भाग of the system can grow to have विशाल effects on the प्रणाली as a whole.
इंसान attempts to control the मौसम have occurred throughout human इतिहास, और there is evidence that इंसान कार्यकलाप such as कृषि and उद्योग रै inadvertently परिवर्धित weather patterns.
अध्ययन how the मौसम works on other planets रै been helpful in समझना how weather works on Earth.
A famous landmark in the Solar System, बृहस्पति 's Great Red Spot, is an anticyclonic storm ज्ञात to have existed for at least 300 सालो.
However, weather is नहीं सीमित to planetary लाशें.
A star 's किरीट is constantly being खोया to स्पेस, बनाना कया is essentially a बहुत thin atmosphere throughout the सौर System.
The गति of mass ejected इससे the सूर्य is known as the सौर wind.
Katy पेरी is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter from सांता बारबरा, California.
She हस्ताक्षरित with कैपिटल रिकॉर्ड.
Perry has released three स्टुडियो एल्बम, सहित उसके debut Christian effort कैटी Hudson, One of the लड़कों, और Teenage सपना.
Perry 's मुख्यधारा career थी kicked off with the विशाल चार्ट success of her debut सिंगल `` i चूमा a लड़की ``.
During her career, पेरी has been nominated for numerous प्रमुख music पुरस्कार, primarily लिये teenage Dream and एक of the लड़कों.
the following is a list of sovereign states और territories जहाँ अंग्रेज़ी is an official language or language of सरकारी.
In 2012, वहीँ यहूद 88 states in कुल ( 60 sovereign states and 28 non-sovereign states ).
in अनेक countries English is the प्रबल भाषा, but does नहीं have आधिकारिक औकात.
in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, अंग्रेज़ी is बोला by the vast majority of the जनसांख्यिकी and is the तभी भाषा used in government institutions, but Australia करता नहीं have an official भाषा.
The case is the same in the United Kingdom और the संयुक्त States, हालांकि many states और regions भीतर the u.S. do have अंग्रेज़ी as an आधिकारिक language.
English is the प्रबल भाषा of नई Zealand and an official language of Canada ( साथ साथ French ), India ( साथ with Hindi और अनेक other languages ), आयरलैंड ( साथ with आयरिश ), and the Philippines ( साथ with tagalog ).
अंग्रेज़ी is the sole official भाषा of the Commonwealth of राष्ट्र और the राष्ट्रमंडल खेल.
English is one of the आधिकारिक languages of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र, the यूरोपीय Union and the अंतरराष्ट्रीय ओलम्पिक Committee.
Many of these देशों are current or former colonies or dependencies of the संयुक्त Kingdom ( देखिए भी British साम्राज्य ), or of the संयुक्त States, itself a former उपनिवेश of the uk.
Notable exceptions include Rwanda, जिससे थी a former belgian उपनिवेश and Eritrea, जिससे was an Italian colony where the अंग्रेजों Empire spanned इसके control तभी in World युद्ध ii and shortly after ( 1941-1952 ).
India 's भाषाई picture is complex.
According to the संविधान of इण्डिया, `` Hindi in the Devanagari स्क्रिप्ट '' is the official भाषा of the union ; and English the 'subsidiary official language ' ; however, English is mandated लिये the authoritative ग्रन्थ of सब federal कानून and Supreme अदालत decisions और ( साथ साथ हिंदी ) is एक of the दो languages of the Indian Parliament.
English is used almost exclusively for higher शिक्षा, कारोबार और विज्ञान.
Courses in बहुमत of the स्कूलों हैं taught exclusively in अंग्रेज़ी.
English is extensively प्रयुक्त for administrative purposes in India.
India is the second-largest english-speaking country in the संसार by क्रमांक of speakers, बाद the United राज्य.
As ऐसे, many consider अंग्रेज़ी to be the de facto official language of India.
See Official भाषाएं of इण्डिया.
the linguistic मेकअप of पाकिस्तानी is similarly जटिल.
जबकि the नेशनल भाषा is Urdu, English is an आधिकारिक language और used in business, सरकारी and विधि.
अंग्रेज़ी is a अनिवार्य भाषा in schools.
All स्कूल courses हैं सिखाया in अंग्रेज़ी.
Pakistan is the 9th largest english-speaking देश in the संसार by जनसांख्यिकी.
Southern कोन (, ) is a भौगोलिक region composed of the southernmost क्षेत्रों of दक्षिण America, south of the Tropic of Capricorn.
हालांकि geographically this शामिल Southern और भाग of southeast ( são पाउलो ) of Brazil, in terms of political geography the दक्षिणी कोन रै traditionally comprised अर्जेंटीना, Chile, पैराग्वे, और Uruguay.
In the narrowest sense, it तभी covers Argentina, Chile और उरुग्वे, bounded on the उत्तर by the राज्य of ब्राज़ील, Paraguay, Bolivia and पेरू, on the वेस्ट by the Pacific समंदर, और दक्षिण to the जंक्शन between the प्रशांत and अटलांटिक Oceans, which it is the closest continental क्षेत्रफल of अंटार्कटिक ( 1000 km ).
High life प्रत्याशा, the उच्चतम Human विकास अनुक्रमणिका of Latin अमेरिका, high मानक of living, significant भागीदारी in the वैश्विक markets and the उभरते economy of its सदस्यों make the Southern कोन the most prosperous macro-region in दक्षिण America.
लिये multi-event एथलेटिक प्रतियोगिताओं देखिए Track और फ़ील्ड Competitions, section `` बैठक ''.
बैठक are sometimes held around सम्मेलन tables.
In a बैठक, दो or अधिक लोगों आइये together to discuss one or more topics, often in a औपचारिक सेटिंग.
an आधिकारिक खेल in baseball, also sometimes called a विनियमन game, is a game that has progressed beyond the पाइंट at which it can be माना complete if necessary.
This is approximately the halfway point of the game.
In the मामला of inclement मौसम, any खेल which has पहुँचे this point may be रोका और shortened as needed, साथ the result being फाइनल, और all records और आंकडे गिने.
a खेल जिससे रै नहीं reached इस point पहले होने stopped is either माना a निलंबित game ( to be जारी at a later तिथि इससे the पाइंट of stoppage ), or is simply रद्द and replayed इससे the start.
( This depends on the नियम of each व्यक्तिगत लीग. )
in either मामला, no statistics are गिने जबतक the game becomes official.
चूंकि most पेशेवर baseball games हैं नौ पारी long, the पांचवां inning is used as the दहलीज लिये an official game.
If the visiting टोली is अग्रणी, or the game is tied, the समाप्त of the fifth inning marks this point.
if the home टोली ( which bats पिछला ) is already ahead in the score, and theoretically would नहीं need इसके half of the पांचवां inning, then 41⁄2 पारी ( i.e., the middle of the पांचवां ) is माना an official game.
The खेल is भी considered आधिकारिक if the home टोली स्कोर to take the सीसे in the नीचे of the पांचवां inning, since the खेल would end immediately if the वही thing happened in the ninth.
In nearly all cases, the `` official खेल '' status is प्रयुक्त to determine whether a rain check will be सम्मानित for प्रशंसक पकड़कर tickets.
if a game is started लकिन करता नहीं reach the point of बनने official, प्रशंसक are entitled to a नई टिकट लिये the make-up खेल or ( in सबसे मामले ) कोई अन्य available game of their choice.
If a खेल is halted बाद it becomes official, the game is simply shortened and no बरसात check is given.
the `` official खेल '' statistic प्राप्त some ध्यान दौरान the 1995 season, जब कैलोरी Ripken, Jr. थी approaching the रिकार्ड for consecutive games played, previously held by लू Gehrig.
विशाल संख्याएँ were hung on the पक्ष of the B & O गोदाम at Oriole पार्क at Camden गज to दिखाएँ the क्रमांक of खेल in ripken 's streak.
Each दिन, a नई number थी unfurled during the fifth inning after प्रत्येक game had become आधिकारिक ( since the statistic होता not have गिने if the खेल था महरूम stopped before कि point ).
A समान अभ्यास रै महरूम used to गिनती bas toward the demolition of several stadiums ( सहित दिग्गजों स्टेडियम in Philadelphia in 2003, Busch Memorial Stadium in st. Louis in 2005, और the असली Yankee Stadium और shea Stadium in New यॉर्क City in 2008 ) ; as प्रत्येक game became आधिकारिक, the team would unveil a नई ( निम्नतर ) क्रमांक प्रर्दशित the number of games बाएँ to be played in the स्टेडियम.
A telephone number or phone number is a sequence of digits प्रयुक्त to कॉल इससे एक टेलीफोन line to another in a public switched telephone संजाल.
जब टेलीफोन संख्याएँ were invented, वे were short — as few as एक, two or three अंक — and were दिए orally to a switchboard ऑपरेटर.
as फोन systems have grown और interconnected to encompass the संसार, telephone numbers have become longer.
In जोड to telephones, वे अभी अभिगम other devices, ऐसे as computers and fax मशीने.
The क्रमांक contains the information necessary to पहचानो uniquely the intended endpoint लिये the टेलीफोन कॉल.
प्रत्येक such endpoint जरूर have a unique number within the public switched टेलीफोन संजाल.
सबसे countries use fixed length numbers ( लिये normal lines at तनिक ) और therefore the number of endpoints determines the necessary length of the टेलीफोन क्रमांक.
it is भी possible for प्रत्येक सदस्य to have a नियत of shorter संख्याएँ लिये the endpoints most प्रायः used.
ये `` आशुलिपि '' or `` गति calling '' संख्याएँ हैं automatically अनूदित to unique telephone संख्याएँ पहले the कॉल can be कनेक्ट.
Some खास services have their अपना छोटी संख्याएँ ( e.g., 1-1-9, 9-1-1, 0-0-0, 9-9-9, 1-1-1, और 1-1-2 होने the आपात सेवाएं संख्याएँ for चीन, Japan, South कोरियाई, ताईवान और श्री लंका ; कनाडा and the संयुक्त राज्य ; ऑस्ट्रेलिया ; the संयुक्त किंगडम, Ireland, दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी, Poland, सऊदी Arabia, the संयुक्त अरब Emirates, Morocco, Macao, Bahrain, Qatar, बांग्लादेश, बोत्सवाना, Ghana, Kenya, हांग Kong, Malaysia, Mauritius, Singapore, Zimbabwe, त्रिनिदाद, Tobago ; नई Zealand ; Kuwait and the European Union, क्रमशः. )
अनेक प्रणालियों also allow calls भीतर a लोकल क्षेत्रफल to be बना without dialing the लोकल area कोड.
लिये example, a phone क्रमांक in उत्तर America होगा start साथ तीन संख्याएँ ( ऐसे as 661 ), which is the क्षेत्रफल code, followed by सात अंक विभाजित into sections of three और चार ( ऐसे as 550-1212 ), which is the local number.
Some areas अभी have अनिवार्य ten-digit dialing in place, even for local calls.
Most telephone संजाल today ( अपवाद being निजी intercom और secure phone संजाल ) हैं interconnected in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय telephone network, जहाँ the format of telephone numbers is मानकीकृत by ITU-T in the recommendation E.164.
This specifies that the संपूर्ण number should be 15 अंक or shorter, और शुरू साथ a देश prefix.
For most countries, this is followed by an क्षेत्रफल कोड or नगर कोड और the सदस्य number, जिससे might consist of the कोड लिये a particular टेलीफोन एक्सचेंज.
itu-t recommendation e.123 describes कैसा to represent an international टेलीफोन number in लिखने or छपाई, starting साथ a प्लस चिह्न ( `` + '' ) and the देश कोड.
When कॉलिंग an अंतरराष्ट्रीय number इससे a fixed लकीर phone, the + must be replaced साथ the international call उपसर्ग चुनी by the देश the कॉल is being made from.
Some मोबाईल फोन allow the + to be entered directly.
the format और आवंटन of लोकल फोन संख्याएँ हैं controlled by प्रत्येक स्वदेश 's respective government, either सीधे or by प्रायोजित organizations ( such as NANPA overseen by neustar Inc. ).
पहले a टेलीफोन call is कनेक्ट, the टेलीफोन number must be dialed by the कॉलिंग party or Caller.
the पुकारा party might have उपकरण that presents caller id before the कॉल is answered.
a collection एजेंसी is a कारोबार कि pursues भुगतान of debts owed by individuals or व्यवसायों.
Most संग्रहण agencies operate as agents of creditors और collect debts लिये a शुल्क or प्रतिशत of the कुल राशि owed.
There हैं अनेक types of संग्रहण एजेंसियों.
First-party एजेंसियों are oftentimes subsidiaries of the original company the कर्ज़ is owed to.
third-party एजेंसियों are पृथक companies contracted by a company to collect debts on उनके behalf for a fee.
कर्ज़ buyers purchase the कर्ज़ at a percentage of इसके value, तब attempt to collect it.
प्रत्येक देश रै इसके own rules और regulations regarding them.
Cannabis पुष्प साथ visible trichomes
Cannabis, also known as marijuana ( from the मैक्सिकन स्पेनी marihuana ), and by other names, is a तैयारी of the कैनबिस संयंत्र intended लिये उपयोग as a psychoactive drug and as medicine.
Pharmacologically, the प्रिंसिपल psychoactive constituent of cannabis is tetrahydrocannabinol ( THC ) ; it is one of 483 known यौगिकों in the plant, सहित at least 84 other cannabinoids, such as cannabidiol ( CBD ), cannabinol ( CBN ), tetrahydrocannabivarin ( thcv ).
और cannabigerol ( CBG ).
This is a list of American फ़ुटबॉल quarterbacks जो have प्रारंभ for the वॉशिंगटन redskins, as खूब as इसके पूर्ववर्तियों the बोस्टन Braves ( 1932 ) और बोस्टन Redskins ( 1933 – 1936 ), in the National Football League ( एनएफएल ).
The Washington redskins franchise was originally founded in Boston, मैसाचुसेट्स as the Boston Braves, नामित after the लोकल baseball मताधिकार.
The नाम थी changed the following year to the redskins.
In 1937, the franchise स्थानांतरित to Washington, D.C.
Of the 49 redskins starting quarterbacks, two have महरूम inducted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame : Sammy baugh and सन्नी Jurgensen.

1st Special शक्तियां operational detachment-delta ( 1st sfod-d ), popularly known as Delta फ़ोर्स, is one of the संयुक्त राज्य ' four गुपचुप tier-one counter-terrorism और Special मिशन इकाई.
It was formerly listed as the कॉम्बैट अनुप्रयोग Group by the Department of Defense लकिन रै since महरूम officially re-designated the फौज Compartmented Elements ( ACE ).
जबकि 1st sfod-d is administratively supported by USASOC, it falls अंतर्गत the operational कंट्रोल of the Joint खास परिचालन कमांड.
डेल्टा फ़ोर्स और its नेवी बंटवारा, the नवल खास warfare Development Group, are the संयुक्त States military 's प्राथमिक counter-terrorism units.
Delta फ़ोर्स 's प्राथमिक कार्य हैं counter-terrorism, सीधा कार्रवाई, and नेशनल हस्तक्षेप operations, although it is an extremely बहुमुखी group सक्षम of conducting many types of गुप्त मिशन, सहित, but not सीमित to, hostage rescues और raids.
the Central प्रज्ञा एजेंसी 's अत्यधिक secretive खास क्रियाएँ प्रभाग ( SAD ) और अधिक specifically इसके elite खास परिचालन समूह ( SOG ) often works साथ – and recruits – operators इससे Delta फ़ोर्स.
Alpha क्षय is one उदाहरण type of radioactive decay, in जिससे an परमाणु केंद्रक emits an alpha particle, और thereby transforms ( or 'क्षयs ' ) into an अणु with a mass number 4 less and atomic number 2 less.
Many अन्य types of decays are संभावित.
Radioactive decay, also known as नाभिकीय decay or radioactivity, is the प्रक्रम by which a nucleus of an अस्थिर अणु loses उर्जा by emitting अणु of आयनकारी radiation.
a सामग्री कि अनायास emits this दयालु of विकिरण — जिससे includes the emission of ऊर्जावान अल्फा particles, बीटा अणु, और gamma किरणें — is माना रेडियोसक्रिय.
There are many different प्रकार of रेडियोसक्रिय decay ( see तालिका नीचे ).
A क्षय, or loss of energy, परिणाम जब an atom with one प्रकार of केंद्रक, पुकारा the parent radionuclide, परिणत to an अणु साथ a nucleus in a different राज्य, or to a अलग केंद्रक containing अलग संख्याएँ of protons and neutrons.
either of ये products is named the daughter nuclide.
In कुछ decays the parent and बेटी हैं different रासायनिक तत्व, and thus the decay प्रक्रम परिणाम in nuclear transmutation ( सृष्टि of an atom of a new तत्व ).
the first decay processes to be discovered यहूद अल्फा decay, beta क्षय, and gamma क्षय.
Alpha क्षय occurs जब the nucleus ejects an अल्फा particle ( हीलियम nucleus ).
इस is the सबसे आम process of emitting nucleons, लकिन in rarer types of decays, nuclei can eject protons, or specific nuclei of other elements ( in the प्रक्रम called क्लस्टर decay ).
Beta decay occurs when the केंद्रक emits an electron or positron and a type of neutrino, in a प्रक्रम that changes a proton to a neutron or the other way around.
the nucleus may capture an orbiting electron, converting a proton into a न्यूट्रॉन ( इलेक्ट्रॉन कैप्चर ).
All of ये प्रक्रियाओं परिणाम in नाभिकीय transmutation.
by कंट्रास्ट, there मौजूद रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय processes कि do not result in transmutation.
The उर्जा of an उत्साहित केंद्रक may be emitted as a गामा रे in gamma क्षय, or प्रयुक्त to eject an कक्षीय electron by बातचीत with the उत्साहित nucleus in a प्रक्रम पुकारा internal conversion.
radioisotopes occasionally emit neutrons, and this results in a बदलें in an तत्व इससे one समस्थानिक to another.
One प्रकार of radioactive decay परिणाम in products which हैं नहीं पारिभाषित, but appear in a range of `` pieces '' of the original केंद्रक.
This क्षय is called spontaneous परिवर्द्धन.
This क्षय happens जब a विशाल अस्थिर केंद्रक अनायास splits into दो ( and occasionally तीन ) छोटी बेटी nuclei, और usually emits gamma rays, neutrons, or अन्य अणु as a consequence.
रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय is a stochastic ( i.e., यादृच्छिक ) प्रक्रम at the level of सिंगल अणु, in कि, according to quantum theory, it is नामुमकिन to भविष्यवाणी जब a particular अणु will decay.
However, the मौका कि a given atom होगा क्षय is constant over time.
लिये a large क्रमांक of अणु, the क्षय रेट for the संग्रहण is computable from the measured क्षय constants of the न्यूक्लाइड ( or equivalently from the half-lifes ).
वैक्सिंग is a रूप of semi-permanent बाल हटाना which removes the बाल इससे the रूट.
New बाल will not grow back in the previously waxed क्षेत्रफल लिये two to eight weeks, although some लोगों will प्रारंभ to see regrowth in तभी a सप्ताह.
लगभग any area of the body can be waxed, including eyebrows, face, bikini क्षेत्रफल, टाँगे, arms, वापस, abdomen और फीट.
वहीँ हैं अनेक प्रकार of वैक्सिंग suitable लिये removing unwanted बाल.
Strip waxing is accomplished by spreading a मोम thinly over the skin.
A cloth or पेपर strip is then pressed on the शीर्ष and ripped बंद the direction of बाल विकास.
This removes the मोम along साथ the बाल.
Strip wax can भी be बना at घर using नीबू रस, जल, शुगर and मधु.
hot waxing utilizes hot wax ( as opposed to strip wax ).
in इस case, the wax is applied somewhat thickly and with no cloth or paper स्ट्रिप्स.
The wax तब hardens जब it cools, thus allowing the easy removal by a therapist बगैर the सहायता of cloths.
This वैक्सिंग method is very beneficial to लोगों जो have संवेदनशील skin.
वॉल पेंटिंग ( 1st century ad ) इससे Pompeii depicting a multigenerational banquet
प्राचीन Roman संस्कृति existed throughout the लगभग 1200-year इतिहास of the civilization of प्राचीन Rome.
the term refers to the संस्कृति of the Roman Republic, later the रोमन साम्राज्य, जिससे, at इसके शिखर, covered an क्षेत्रफल from lowland Scotland and Morocco to the euphrates.
जीवन in ancient Rome revolved around the city of Rome, its famed सात पहाड़ियाँ, and इसके monumental structures such as the flavian Amphitheatre ( now पुकारा the कोलोसियम ), the फ़ोरम of त्राजान, and the Pantheon.
the नगर भी had अनेक theaters, gymnasiums, और अनेक taverns, baths, और brothels.
throughout the territory under ancient Rome 's control, residential वास्तुकला ranged from very modest घरों to देश विला, और in the capital city of रोम, वहीँ were imperial निवास on the सुरुचिपूर्ण Palatine हिल, इससे which the word राजमहल is निकला.
the vast बहुमत of the जनसांख्यिकी lived in the नगर center, packed into insulae ( apartment blocks ).
the city of Rome थी the largest megalopolis of कि time, with a population कि may खूब have exceeded one million लोगों, with a ऊँची end अनुमान of 3.6 million and a low end अनुमान of 450,000.
ऐतिहासिक estimates indicate that around 30 percent of the जनसांख्यिकी under the नगर 's jurisdiction lived in innumerable urban centers, साथ जनसांख्यिकी of at तनिक 10,000 and अनेक military settlements, a very ऊँची rate of urbanization by pre-industrial standards.
the most urbanized भाग of the Empire थी Italy, which था an अनुमानित रेट of urbanization of 32 %, the same rate of urbanization of England in 1800.
Most Roman कस्बों और शहरों था a forum, मंदिरों and the same type of इमारतें, on a smaller स्केल, as मिला in Rome.
The विशाल शहरी population जरूरी an endless supply of food जिससे थी a जटिल logistical task, सहित acquiring, transporting, storing and distribution of food for Rome और अन्य urban centers.
Italian खेतो supplied सब्जियां and फल, but मछली and मांस were luxuries.
Aqueducts यहूद निर्मित to bring जल to urban centers and वाइन और oil यहूद आयातित इससे hispania, gaul and Africa.
There थी a बहुत large राशि of commerce between the प्रांतों of the Roman Empire, since इसके परिवहन प्रौद्योगिकी was very कुशल.
The average लागत of transport and the प्रौद्योगिकी यहूद comparable साथ 18th-century Europe.
the बाद city of रोम किया नहीं fill the space within its ancient aurelian walls जबतक after 1870.
Eighty प्रतिशत of the जनसांख्यिकी अंतर्गत the jurisdiction of ancient रोम जिया in the countryside in settlements with less than 10 thousand निवासियों.
जमींदार generally resided in शहरों and their estates were left in the care of फार्म प्रबंधक.
the दुर्दशा of ग्रामीण slaves was generally worse than उनके counterparts working in urban वैभवशाली households.
to stimulate a higher labor उत्पादकता most जमींदार freed a विशाल number of slaves and many प्राप्त wages.
Some रिकॉर्ड indicate that `` as many as 42 people lived in एक small farm हट in मिश्र, while छह families owned a single ज़ैतून tree. ''.
Such a ग्रामीण पर्यावरण जारी to induce माइग्रेशन of population to urban centers जबतक the early 2nd century, जब the शहरी जनसांख्यिकी रोका growing और started to decline.
starting in the middle of the 2nd सदी bc, निजी Greek संस्कृति was increasingly in ascendancy, in spite of tirades against the `` softening '' effects of Hellenized culture from the conservative moralists.
By the समय of Augustus, संस्कारी Greek household slaves taught the Roman यंग ( sometimes even the girls ) ; chefs, decorators, secretaries, doctors, and hairdressers—all आए इससे the Greek ईस्ट.
यूनानी sculptures adorned Hellenistic लैंडस्केप बागवानी on the Palatine or in the विला, or यहूद imitated in Roman मूर्तिकला गज by यूनानी slaves.
the Roman cuisine preserved in the cookery किताबे ascribed to Apicius is essentially यूनानी.
रोमन लेखक disdained Latin for a संस्कारी यूनानी style.
Only in law और शासन थी the तिरछा प्रकृति of रोम 's accretive संस्कृति परम्.
विरूद्ध इस human background, both the शहरी and rural सेटिंग, एक of इतिहास 's सबसे influential सभ्यताओं took आकार, leaving पीछे a सांस्कृतिक legacy कि survives in भाग today.
जेम्स जोसेफ `` डफी '' Waldorf, jr. ( born August 20, 1962 ) is an American पेशेवर golfer.

a season is a subdivision of the साल, चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in weather, ecology, and घंटों of daylight.
Seasons परिणाम from the वार्षिक revolution of the Earth around the Sun और the tilt of the Earth 's axis सापेक्ष to the प्लेन of revolution.
In temperate and polar regions, the सीज़न हैं चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in the intensity of धूप कि reaches the Earth 's सतह, विसंगतियाँ of which may कारण पशु to go into शीतनिष्क्रियता or to migrate, और plants to be dormant.
During May, जून और July, the उत्तरी hemisphere is exposed to more direct धूप because the गोलार्ध चेहरों the sun.
the same is सच्चा of the southern गोलार्ध in November, December and January.
it is the tilt of the Earth that causes the Sun to be higher in the आसमान during the गर्मियाँ months which increases the सौर flux.
however, due to मौसमी lag, June, July और August are the hottest महीने in the उत्तरी hemisphere और December, जनवरी and February are the hottest महीने in the southern hemisphere.
In temperate और subpolar regions, generally four calendar -आधारd सीज़न ( with their adjectives ) हैं पहचाना : spring ( vernal ), गर्मियाँ ( estival ), पतझड़ ( autumnal ) और शीत ( hibernal ).
However, ecologists mostly उपयोग a छह ऋतु मॉडल for शीतोष्ण climate regions कि includes pre-spring ( prevernal ) और लेट गर्मियाँ ( serotinal ) as पृथक सीज़न along साथ the traditional चार.
hot regions have two or three seasons ; the बरसात ( or गीला, or मानसून ) ऋतु and the शुष्क season, and in some tropical areas, a cool or mild season.
In some भाग of the संसार, special `` seasons '' हैं loosely पारिभाषित based on important कार्यक्रम ऐसे as a hurricane ऋतु, tornado ऋतु or a wildfire season.
the six ecological सीज़न
The चार पंचांग सीज़न, चित्रित in an प्राचीन रोमन मोज़ेक इससे ट्यूनीशिया
the बैटल of फोर्ट sumter ( April 12–14, 1861 ) was the बमबारी and आत्मसमर्पण of फोर्ट sumter, near Charleston, South कैरोलिना, that started the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध.
Following घोषणाओं of secession by seven दक्षिणी states, South Carolina मांगे कि the u.S. Army abandon इसके सुविधाएं in Charleston Harbor.
On December 26, 1860, U.S. Major Robert Anderson surreptitiously moved उसके छोटी कमांड इससे the indefensible Fort Moultrie on Sullivan 's द्वीप to फोर्ट Sumter, a substantial fortress controlling the प्रवेश of चार्ल्सटन हार्बर.
An attempt by u.S. President James बुकानन to reinforce और resupply Anderson, using the निहत्थे व्यापारी जलयान स्टार of the West, विफल when it थी fired upon by shore batteries on जनवरी 9, 1861.
दक्षिण Carolina authorities तब seized सब Federal प्रॉपर्टी in the चार्ल्सटन area, मगर for Fort Sumter.
दौरान the early महीने of 1861, the situation around Fort sumter increasingly began to resemble a घेरा.
in कूच, Brig. Gen. P. G. T. Beauregard, the पहला सामान्य officer of the newly formed confederate राज्य of America, थी लगाई in कमांड of Confederate शक्तियां in चार्ल्सटन.
beauregard energetically निर्देशित the strengthening of batteries around Charleston harbor aimed at Fort sumter.
शर्तें in the फोर्ट grew dire as the संघ सैनिको rushed to पूरा the installation of additional बंदूकों.
एंडरसन थी छोटी of men, खाना, and आपूर्तियाँ.
The resupply of फोर्ट Sumter became the पहला crisis of the administration of President Abraham Lincoln.
he notified the Governor of South कैरोलिना, Francis W. pickens, that he थी sending सप्लाई ships, जिससे resulted in an ultimatum from the confederate government : evacuate Fort Sumter immediately.
प्रमुख एंडरसन refused to surrender.
Beginning at 4:30 a.m. on अप्रैल 12, the confederates bombarded the फोर्ट इससे तोपखाने batteries surrounding the harbor.
Although the संघ गैरीसन लौटे आग, वे were significantly outgunned and, बाद 34 hours, प्रमुख एंडरसन सहमत to evacuate.
वहीँ थी no घाटा of जीवन on either पक्ष as a direct result of this सगाई, हालांकि a gun explosion during the surrender ceremonies on April 14 caused दो Union मौतों.
following the बैटल, there थी फैली support from दोनो उत्तर और South for further सैन्य action.
lincoln 's तात्कालिक कॉल लिये 75,000 स्वयंसेवक to दबाने the विद्रोह resulted in an additional चार दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य also declaring their secession और joining the confederacy.
The Civil War had begun.
3G, short for तीसरा Generation, is the third पीढी of मोबाईल telecommunications technology.
3G telecommunication संजाल support services कि provide an information ट्रांसफ़र रेट of at least 200 kbit/s.
However, many services advertised as 3g provide higher गति than the न्यूनतम तकनीकी आवश्यकताएँ लिये a 3G service.
Recent 3G रिलीज, often denoted 3.5g और 3.75g, also provide mobile ब्रॉडबैंड अभिगम of several mbit/s to स्मार्टफ़ोन and mobile modems in laptop computers.
3g finds अनुप्रयोग in बेतार voice telephony, mobile Internet अभिगम, fixed बेतार अंतरजाल access, video calls and mobile TV.
`` mazel Tov ! '' written on a wine कांच tag
traditionally, after the दूल्हे ब्रेक the glass, the guests चिल्लाओ `` mazel tov ! ``.
A birthday केक, iced with the शब्द `` מזל טוב '' ( mazal tov ), as is often किया in Israel.
Here the phrase is written in Hebrew कर्सिव.
`` mazel tov '' or `` mazal tov '' ( यहूदी / यहूदी : `` מזל טוב '', यहूदी : `` mazal tov '' ; Yiddish : `` mazel tov '' ; lit.
`` good लक '' ) is a phrase प्रयुक्त to express बधाई लिये a प्रसन्न and significant occasion or event.
Hepatitis C is an infectious disease affecting primarily the जिगर, caused by the hepatitis C virus ( hcv ).
The संक्रमण is प्रायः asymptomatic, लकिन chronic संक्रमण can lead to scarring of the जिगर और ultimately to cirrhosis, which is generally apparent after many years.
In some cases, those with cirrhosis होगा go on to develop liver failure, liver कर्कट or life-threatening esophageal and gastric varices.
hcv is स्प्रेड primarily by blood-to-blood contact संबद्ध with intravenous ड्रग उपयोग, poorly sterilized चिकित्सा उपकरण and transfusions.
an अनुमानित 130–200 लाख लोगों worldwide हैं संक्रमित with.
the अस्तित्व of ( originally `` non- A non- B hepatitis '' ) was postulated in the 1970s और proven in 1989.
only infects humans and chimpanzees.
the virus persists in the liver in परिचय 85 % of those संक्रमित.
This persistent infection can be treated with दवा : the standard चिकित्सा is a संयोजन of peginterferon and ribavirin, साथ either boceprevir or telaprevir added in कुछ cases.
Overall, 50–80 % of लोगों treated are cured.
those who develop cirrhosis or liver कर्कट may require a liver प्रत्यारोपण.
is the leading कारण of जिगर प्रत्यारोपण, though the वायरस usually बारंबार after प्रत्यारोपण.

A flexible spending खाता ( fsa ), also known as a flexible spending arrangement, is एक of a क्रमांक of tax-advantaged वित्तीय accounts that can be set up through a कैफेटेरिया योजना of an employer in the संयुक्त States.
an FSA allows an employee to नियत aside a portion of आय to pay लिये qualified expenses as स्थापित in the कैफेटेरिया योजना, most commonly for चिकित्सा expenses but often लिये dependent परवाह or अन्य खर्च.
धन deducted from an कर्मचारी 's pay into an fsa is not विषय to payroll taxes, resulting in substantial payroll कर savings.
One significant disadvantage to using an fsa is कि निधि नहीं used by the end of the योजना साल are lost to the employee, ज्ञात as the `` उपयोग it or खोना it '' rule.
the most common प्रकार of लचीली spending account, the medical expense FSA ( भी medical FSA or स्वास्थ्य fsa ), is समान to a health बचत account ( hsa ) or a स्वास्थ्य reimbursement account ( HRA ).
however, while HSAs and HRAs are लगभग exclusively used as components of a consumer driven health care योजना, चिकित्सा FSAs are commonly offered साथ अधिक परंपरागत health योजनाएँ as खूब.
in addition, funds in a health savings खाता are not lost when the plan year is over, unlike निधि in an fsa.
Paper फ़ॉर्म or an FSA debit card, also ज्ञात as a Flexcard, may be प्रयुक्त to अभिगम the खाता निधि.
टेनेसी ( ) ( ) is a U.S. state located in the southeastern संयुक्त राज्य.
Tennessee is the 36th most extensive and the 17th सबसे populous of the 50 United राज्य.
टेनेसी is bordered by केंटकी और वर्जिनिया to the north, उत्तर Carolina to the east, जॉर्जिया, Alabama, और Mississippi to the दक्षिण, और अरकंसास and Missouri to the वेस्ट.
the Appalachian kyu dominate the eastern भाग of the राज्य, और the मिसिसिपी नदी फ़ॉर्म the राज्य 's पश्चिमी border.
टेनेसी 's पूंजी and दूसरी largest city is नैशविले, which रै a population of 609,644.
Memphis is the state 's largest नगर, with a जनसांख्यिकी of 652,050.
The state of टेनेसी is rooted in the watauga Association, a 1772 frontier pact generally regarded as the पहला constitutional सरकारी west of the appalachians.
कया is अभी Tennessee थी initially part of North Carolina, and later part of the दक्षिणपश्चिम territory.
टेनेसी was admitted to the संघ as the 16th state on June 1, 1796.
टेनेसी थी the last state to leave the Union और जुड़ें the confederacy at the outbreak of the u.S. सिविल युद्ध in 1861, and the first state to be readmitted to the संघ at the end of the war.
Tennessee furnished अधिक soldiers लिये the confederate Army than any अन्य राज्य, और more soldiers लिये the संघ फौज than कोई other दक्षिणी राज्य.
In the 20th century, टेनेसी transitioned from an कृषिक economy to a more diversified economy, aided at times by federal entities such as the टेनेसी Valley प्राधिकार.
in the early 1940s, the नगर of ओक Ridge थी established to house the Manhattan Project 's यूरेनियम संवर्धन सुविधाएं, helping to build the world 's पहला परमाणु बमबारी.
Tennessee रै निभाई a नाजुक भूमिका in the विकास of many फ़ॉर्म of अमरीकी लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक, सहित rock और roll, blues, country, और rockabilly.
Beale Street in Memphis is considered by many to be the जन्मस्थान of the blues, साथ संगीतकारों such as W.C. Handy performing in इसके क्लब as जल्दी as 1909.
Memphis थी भी घर to Sun Records, where संगीतकारों ऐसे as Elvis प्रेस्ली, Isaac Hayes, जॉनी नकदी, कार्ल Perkins, Jerry ली लुईस, रॉय orbison, and Charlie Rich began their रिकॉर्डिंग करियर, और where rock और roll took आकार in the 1950s.
The 1927 विक्टर recording सत्र in Bristol generally चिह्नित the beginning of the country म्यूज़िक विधा और the वृद्धि of the Grand ओले Opry in the 1930s helped make नैशविले the center of the देश म्यूज़िक रिकॉर्डिंग industry.
तीन ईंटें और गारा संग्रहालय recognize Tennessee 's भूमिका in nurturing various forms of popular music : the मेम्फिस चट्टान n ' आत्मा संग्रहालय, the देश Music हॉल of Fame और Museum in Nashville, and the International Rock-A-Billy संग्रहालय in जैक्सन.
In addition, the Rockabilly हॉल of कीर्ति, an ऑनलाइन site recognizing the विकास of rockabilly in which टेनेसी निभाई a crucial role, is based in Nashville.
Tennessee 's major उद्योग include कृषि, निर्माण, और पर्यटन.
Poultry, soybeans, और cattle are the राज्य 's प्राथमिक agricultural products, और प्रमुख निर्माण निर्यात शामिल chemicals, transportation equipment, and विद्युत उपकरण.
The Great Smoky kyu National पार्क, the स्वदेश 's सबसे visited नेशनल पार्क, is headquartered in the eastern भाग of the राज्य, and a खण्ड of the Appalachian ट्रेल roughly follows the Tennessee-North Carolina किनारा.
Other major tourist attractions include the टेनेसी Aquarium in Chattanooga, the Sunsphere in knoxville, Dollywood in Pigeon Forge, the Parthenon, the Country Music Hall of Fame and संग्रहालय, और ryman Auditorium in Nashville, and Elvis Presley 's graceland निवास और tomb in मेम्फिस.
एक design variant of a मुर्गा रिंग.
A मुर्गा ring is a ring that can be लगाई around a man 's शिश्न, प्रायः at the base, primarily to slow the प्रवाह of रक्त from the वीर्यपात penile tissue, thus maintaining an स्तंभन for a much longer period of time.
मुर्गा rings can be worn around बस the penis or दोनो the शिश्न and scrotum, or बस the scrotum alone, though इस is प्रायः पुकारा a testicle cuff.
बजती can be बना of a किस्में of अलग सामग्री, सबसे commonly चमड़े, rubber, or silicone, though nylon और मेटल are also प्रयुक्त either as the main component or part of the closure.
the term cock ring is sometimes used as a पर्याय लिये a प्रिंस Albert piercing, a piercing of the penis कि is usually, हालांकि not always, a metal ring.
जब प्रयुक्त in cases of erectile dysfunction they are known by various names ऐसे as `` स्तंभन रिंग '' और `` टेंशन रिंग ''.
The मुख्यालय of Major League Baseball at 245 Park Avenue, Midtown मैनहटन, नई York नगर, यूएसए.
प्रमुख League Baseball ( एमएलबी ) is a पेशेवर बेसबॉल लीग, consisting of teams that खेल in the National League and the American League.
Dating to 1876 and 1901 respectively, the दो leagues merged in 2000 into a सिंगल संगठन led by the कमिश्नर of बेसबॉल, after 100 years as separate legal entities.
MLB constitutes one of the प्रमुख पेशेवर खेल leagues of the संयुक्त States and Canada.
it is composed of 30 टीमों — 29 in the United राज्य and one in कनाडा.
टीमों in एमएलबी खेल 162 खेल each ऋतु over छह months ( अप्रैल through September ).
पाँच teams in प्रत्येक league अग्रिम to a four-round postseason tournament that culminates in the World श्रेणी, a best-of-seven-games championship series between the two league champions जिससे तिथियाँ to 1903.
The संगठन oversees many minor-league baseball लीग which operate about 240 teams संबद्ध साथ the major-league क्लब.
साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय बेसबॉल संघ, the league also manages the international संसार Baseball Classic tournament.
एमएलबी रै the उच्चतम season उपस्थिति of any sports league in the world साथ nearly 75 लाख spectators in 2012.
Delaware ( ) is a u.S. state स्तिथ on the अटलांटिक coast in the mid-atlantic region of the United States.
It is bordered to the दक्षिण and west by Maryland, to the पूर्वोत्तर by नई Jersey, और to the north by Pennsylvania.
the state takes इसके name from थामस वेस्ट, 3rd Baron De la warr, an अंग्रेज़ी nobleman and Virginia 's first colonial governor, बाद जिसको what is अभी पुकारा केप Henlopen थी originally named.
डेलावेयर is स्तिथ in the northeastern portion of the Delmarva प्रायद्वीप और is the second smallest, the sixth least populous, लकिन the छठे most densely आबादी of the पचास संयुक्त States.
डेलावेयर is विभाजित into three काउंटी.
From north to south, ये three counties हैं New किला, Kent, और ससेक्स.
जबकि the southern two counties have historically been predominantly agricultural, New किला काउंटी has been अधिक industrialized.
Before its तटरेखा थी छान by Europeans in the 16th century, Delaware थी inhabited by अनेक समूह of Native अमेरिकी, सहित the Lenape in the उत्तर and Nanticoke in the दक्षिण.
it was initially colonized by डच व्यापारियों at zwaanendael, located near the present town of Lewes, in 1631.
डेलावेयर was one of the 13 colonies participating in the American Revolution और on December 7, 1787, became the पहला राज्य to ratify the संविधान of the संयुक्त राज्य, thereby बनने known as The पहला State.
Energy परिवर्तन in उर्जा प्रणालियों Language
उर्जा transformation or energy परिवर्तन is the process of changing एक form of उर्जा to another.
in भौतिकी, the पद energy describes the क्षमता to produce निश्चित परिवर्तन within a system, without लिहाज़ to limitations in transformation imposed by Entropy.
परिवर्तन in total energy of systems can only be संपन्नता by adding or subtracting उर्जा इससे उन्हें, as उर्जा is a मात्रा which is conserved, according to the first विधि of thermodynamics.
According to special आपेक्षिकता, changes in the energy of systems will भी coincide साथ परिवर्तन in the system 's mass, and the कुल amount of mass of a system is a माप of its energy.
Energy in a system may be transformed so कि it resides in a different state, or a different प्रकार of energy.
उर्जा in many states may be प्रयुक्त to do many varieties of physical कार्य.
Energy may be used in प्राकृतिक प्रक्रियाओं or मशीने, or else to provide कुछ सेवा to समाज ( such as heat, light, or motion ).
For उदाहरण, an आतंरिक दहन engine converts the संभावित रासायनिक उर्जा in gasoline और oxygen into ऊष्मा, जिससे is then transformed into the propulsive उर्जा ( kinetic energy that moves a vehicle ).
A solar कोशिका converts सौर विकिरण into electrical उर्जा that can then be used to light a bulb or power a computer.
The generic name लिये a device which converts energy इससे एक form to another, is a transducer.
in सामान्य, most types of उर्जा, सहेजें for thermal energy, may be converted efficiently to any other दयालु of उर्जा.
Sometimes this occurs with an efficiency of essentially 100 %, ऐसे as when potential energy is परिवर्तित to kinetic energy as an ऑब्जेक्ट जलप्रपात in vacuum, or जब it orbits nearer or farther from another object, in स्पेस.
Conversion of other प्रकार of energies to heat may also occurs with nearly perfect दक्षता ( अनेक प्रकार of friction do इस ).
अपवाद for perfect conversion efficiency ( भी for पृथक प्रणालियों ) occur जब energy रै already been partly वितरित among many उपलब्धियाँ क्वांटम राज्य for a संग्रहण of particles, which are freely अनुमत to explore कोई राज्य of आवेग और स्थिति ( phase space ).
In such हालातों, a measure पुकारा Entropy, or evening-out of उर्जा distribution in ऐसे states, dictates that भविष्य राज्य of the system जरूर be of at least बराबर evenness in energy distribution.
( There is no way, taking the universe as a पूरे, to collect उर्जा into कम states, एकबार it has स्प्रेड to them ).
A consequence of this requirement is कि there are सीमाएं to the दक्षता साथ which thermal energy can be converted to other kinds of energy, चूंकि थर्मल उर्जा in equilibrium at a given temperature already represents the maximal evening-out of उर्जा between सब संभावित states.
Such energy is sometimes considered `` degraded energy, '' क्युकी it is नहीं entirely usable.
The second विधि of thermodynamics is a way of stating that, for this कारण, थर्मल उर्जा in a प्रणाली may be परिवर्तित to other kinds of उर्जा साथ efficiencies approaching 100 %, only if the entropy ( even-ness or disorder ) of the ब्रह्मांड is increased by अन्य means, to compensate for the decrease in एन्ट्रॉपी संबद्ध with the disappearance of the थर्मल energy और इसके entropy content.
वरना, तभी a part of थर्मल energy may be परिवर्तित to other kinds of उर्जा ( और thus, useful work ), चूंकि the remainder of the heat must be reserved to be transferred to a थर्मल reservoir at a lower temperature, in ऐसे a रास्ता that the बढ़ाएँ in Entropy for this process अधिक than compensates for the एन्ट्रॉपी decrease associated साथ transformation of the rest of the heat into अन्य types of energy.
The नेशनल हॉकी लीग ( एनएचएल ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit association '' which operates a major पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी league of 30 franchised सदस्य क्लब, of which seven हैं फिलहाल located in Canada and 23 in the संयुक्त States.
headquartered in नई York City, the एनएचएल is widely considered to be the प्रीमियर पेशेवर बर्फ hockey league in the world, और one of the major professional खेल leagues in the संयुक्त States and कनाडा.
the Stanley कप, the oldest professional sports trophy in उत्तर अमेरिका, is awarded annually to the लीग playoff चैंपियन at the end of प्रत्येक season.
The league was organized on नवम्बर 26, 1917, in मॉन्ट्रियल, Quebec, कनाडा, बाद the suspension of operations of its predecessor संगठन, the National Hockey Association ( नह ), which had been founded in 1909.
it प्रारंभ with चार teams और, through a श्रेणी of expansions, contractions, और relocations, the league is now रचित of 30 active franchises.
the स्वदेश to which the नाम of the league originally referred थी कनाडा, although the लीग has अभी been binational since 1924 जब it expanded into the United राज्य.
After a labour विवाद कि led to the cancellation of the entire 2004–05 season, the लीग resumed खेल under a new collective bargaining agreement कि शामिल a सैलरी cap.
in 2009, the एनएचएल enjoyed रिकार्ड highs in terms of sponsorships, उपस्थिति, और television audiences.
The एनएचएल draws many अत्यधिक skilled players from all over the world और फिलहाल रै players इससे about 20 different देशों.
Although canadians have historically गठित the majority of the players in the एनएचएल, over the past four प्लस दशकों the percentages of us और European players have increased दोनो because of the NHL 's continued विस्तार from six to तीस क्लब since 1967, और the increased उपलब्धता of अत्यधिक skilled यूरोपीय खिलाड़ी.
This is the complete सूची of the ratified and unratified amendments to the United States संविधान जिससे प्राप्त the approval of the United States Congress.
Twenty-seven amendments have महरूम ratified चूंकि the असली signing of the Constitution, the पहला टेन of which are known collectively as the विधेयक of Rights.
The procedure लिये amending the United States संविधान is governed by आलेख V of the original टेक्स्ट.
वहीँ have महरूम अनेक other proposals for amendments to the United राज्य Constitution introduced in Congress, but not सुपुर्द to the राज्य.
पहले an amendment can take effect, it must be प्रस्तावित to the states by a two-thirds vote of both घरों of Congress or by a सम्मेलन ( ज्ञात as an आलेख v convention ) पुकारा by two-thirds of the राज्य, and ratified by three-fourths of the राज्य or by three-fourths of प्रथाओं thereof, the विधि of अनुसमर्थन being संकल्पित by कॉंग्रेस at the time of proposal.
to date, no सम्मेलन लिये proposing amendments रै महरूम पुकारा by the राज्य, and तभी once—in 1933 for the अनुसमर्थन of the twenty-first amendment —has the convention विधि of ratification महरूम employed.
FMR LLC ( Fidelity Management और Research ) or वफ़ादारी Investments is an अमरीकी multinational financial services निगम.
It is एक of the largest mutual निधि और वित्तीय services groups in the संसार.
It थी founded in 1946 और serves North अमरीकी investors.
वफ़ादारी Ventures is इसके venture capital भुजा.
वफ़ादारी International Limited ( FIL ), was an अंतरराष्ट्रीय affiliate founded in 1969, serving most countries in the बाकी of the संसार.
In सितंबर 2011, FIL was rebranded as 'Fidelity विश्वव्यापी Investment '.
वफ़ादारी Investments manages a विशाल family of mutual funds, provides fund वितरण और निवेश सलाह सेवाएं, as खूब as providing छूट brokerage सेवाएं, retirement सेवाएं, wealth प्रबन्धन, प्रतिभूति execution and clearance, जीवन insurance और a number of other services.

Sociology is the scientific study of human समाज and इसके origins, development, organizations, और संस्थानों.
It is a सोशल science which उपयोग विभिन्न methods of अनुभवजन्य investigation and critical analysis to develop a देह of knowledge परिचय human सोशल activity, structures, and functions.
a goal for many sociologists is to conduct research which may be applied directly to सोशल policy and welfare, while others फ़ोकस primarily on refining the सैद्धांतिक समझना of सोशल processes.
विषय matter सीमाएँ इससे the micro level of individual एजेंसी और interaction to the मैक्रो level of systems and the social ढांचा.
the traditional focuses of समाजशास्त्र include सोशल stratification, social class, संस्कृति, रेस and ethnicity, लिंग और sexuality, social गतिशीलता, धर्म, secularization, विधि, और deviance.
As all spheres of human activity are प्रभावित by the interplay between सोशल structure and individual एजेंसी, sociology has gradually विस्तारित इसके focus to further subjects, ऐसे as स्वास्थ्य, चिकित्सा, military and penal संस्थानों, the अंतरजाल, environmental sociology, राजनैतिक economy and the role of social कार्यकलाप in the विकास of scientific knowledge.
The दायरा of सोशल scientific विधि रै also expanded.
सोशल researchers draw upon a किस्में of गुणात्मक and quantitative techniques.
the भाषाई और सांस्कृतिक turns of the mid-twentieth century led to increasingly interpretative, hermeneutic, और philosophic approaches to the विश्लेषण of society.
Conversely, हाल दशकों have देखी the rise of नई analytically, mathematically and computationally rigorous तकनीकों, ऐसे as agent-based मॉडलिंग and सोशल संजाल विश्लेषण.
समाजशास्त्र should not be उलझन with विभिन्न general social अध्ययन पाठ्यक्रम जिससे bear little relation to समाजशास्त्रीय theory or social science शोध methodology.
Thunder is the ध्वनि caused by lightning.
depending on the प्रकृति of the बिजली और distance of the श्रोता, थंडर can range इससे a sharp, लाउड crack to a long, low rumble ( brontide ).
The sudden बढ़ाएँ in दबाव and temperature from बिजली produces rapid विस्तार of the air surrounding और भीतर a bolt of lightning.
In turn, इस विस्तार of एयर creates a सोनिक shock वेव, similar to a sonic boom, जिससे produces the ध्वनि of thunder, often referred to as a clap, क्रैक, or peal of thunder.
The अलहदा of the lightning can be गणना by the श्रोता based on the समय interval इससे when the बिजली is seen to when the sound is heard.
पालमा (,, ), in पूरा पालमा de Mallorca, is the major city and बंदरगाहों on the द्वीप of majorca ( mallorca ) और पूंजी नगर of the autonomous जातियाँ of the balearic आइलैंड्स in Spain.
The names Ciutat de Mallorca ( नगर of Majorca ) और Ciutat ( नगर ) were प्रयुक्त before the War of the Spanish उत्तराधिकार और हैं स्टिल प्रयुक्त by people in Majorca.
However, the official name थी Mallorca, the वही as the द्वीप.
It is situated on the दक्षिण coast of the द्वीप on the खाड़ी of Palma.
as of the 2009 census, the population of the नगर of Palma proper थी 401,270, और the population of the entire शहरी क्षेत्रफल थी 517,285, ranking as the twelfth largest शहरी area of स्पेन.
लगभग half of the कुल जनसांख्यिकी of Majorca सजीव in Palma.
The Cabrera द्वीपसमूह, though widely separated from पालमा proper, is administratively considered part of the municipality.
Its airport, बेटे सन्त जोन, serves over 22 million passengers प्रत्येक year.
The marivent राजमहल was offered by the city to the then Prince जुआन कार्लोस i of Spain.
the royals have since spent their गर्मियाँ छुट्टियाँ in पालमा.
luthor redirects यहाँ.
For अन्य उपयोग, see लूथर ( disambiguation ).
Alexander Joseph `` लेक्स '' Luthor is a fictional character, a supervillain appearing in कॉमिक books प्रकाशित by DC Comics.
luthor is the archenemy of Superman, और as a high-status supervillain, रै भी come into conflict साथ Batman and other superheroes in the DC Universe.
निर्मित by जेरी siegel and Joe shuster, the character first appeared in Action कॉमिक्स # 23 ( April 1940 ).
luthor is वर्णित as `` a power-mad, evil वैज्ञानिक '' of ऊँची intelligence और incredible technological prowess.
Luthor 's goals typically बीच on हत्या Superman, the foremost बाधा to achieving the विलेन 's megalomaniacal लक्ष्य.
despite periodically wearing a powered बहि, Luthor रै traditionally lacked superpowers or a dual identity.
The character थी originally depicted as a mad वैज्ञानिक जो, in the vein of pulp novels, wreaks कहर on the संसार साथ his अत्याधुनिक weaponry.
in उसके earliest appearances, luthor is shown with a full सिर of रेड hair.
Despite this, the अक्षर later became hairless as the परिणाम of an कलाकार 's mistake.
a 1960 story by Jerry siegel expanded upon luthor 's उत्पत्ति and motivations, revealing उसे to be a बाल्यकाल friend of सुपरमैन 's जो lost उसके बाल when a fire destroyed his प्रयोगशाला ; luthor vowed revenge.
following the 1985 सीमित श्रेणी Crisis on Infinite Earths, the अक्षर थी re-imagined as a machiavellian industrialist और white-collar दण्ड, even briefly serving as अध्यक्ष of the United States.
In recent years, various लेखक have revived Luthor 's mad scientist persona from the 1940s.
the अक्षर was क्रमित as the 8th महानतम विलेन by Wizard on its 100 महानतम Villains of All समय list.
IGN 's list of the शीर्ष 100 Comic Book खलनायक of All Time क्रमित luthor as # 4.
Luthor is also described as a `` megavillain '' by comic किताब critic पीटर sanderson, एक of a few genre-crossing खलनायक whose adventures लो place `` in a world in which the ordinary laws of प्रकृति हैं थोड़ा suspended '' ; वर्ण ऐसे as प्राध्यापक Moriarty, Count Dracula, Hannibal Lecter, डॉक्टर यातना, and darth Vader, भी अनुरूप this description.
मार्टिन Luther King, Jr. Day is a संयुक्त राज्य federal अवकाश अंकन the birthday of रेव. Dr. Martin Luther किंग, Jr.
it is observed on the third Monday of January each year, which is around the समय of King 's birthday, जनवरी 15.
the फ्लोटिंग holiday is समान to छुट्टियाँ set under the वर्दी Monday Holiday अधिनियम, though the अधिनियम predated the स्थापना of मार्टिन Luther King, jr. Day by 15 years.
किंग was the chief spokesman for nonviolent सक्रियता in the civil अधिकारों गति, जिससे सफलतापूर्वक protested racial पक्षपात in संघीय और state विधि.
The campaign for a संघीय holiday in किंग 's honor began जल्द बाद उसके assassination in 1968.
Ronald reagan हस्ताक्षरित the holiday into law in 1983, और it थी first observed on जनवरी 20, 1986.
at first, some राज्य resisted observing the holiday as such, giving it alternative names or combining it with other छुट्टियाँ.
it was officially observed in सब 50 states for the पहला समय in 2000.
the camera phone समाधान allows instant sharing of pictures.
As it 's स्वचालित और instant, the उपयोक्ता does not have to उपयोग a केबल or removable मीडिया to कनेक्ट to a निजी computer.
A camera फोन is a mobile phone which is able to कैप्चर still छायाचित्र ( और usually video ).
चूंकि early in the 21st सदी the बहुमत of mobile phones in use हैं camera फोन.
Most कैमरा phones हैं simpler than पृथक डिजिटल कैमरे.
Their usual fixed focus lenses and smaller सेंसर सीमा उनके प्रदर्शन in poor lighting.
Lacking a physical शटर, most have a long शटर lag.
फ्लैश, where उपस्थित, is प्रायः weak.
ऑप्टिकल जूम और तिपाई screws are विरल.
कुछ भी कमी a usb कनेक्शन, removable memory card, or अन्य way of transferring उनके तस्वीरें more quickly than by the phone 's अंतर्निहित communication feature.
Some of the more expensive कैमरा phones have तभी a few of these तकनीकी disadvantages, which apply सबसे acutely in low लाइट शर्तें and in कोई case have not inhibited उनके फैली use.
Most model लाइनों improve in these प्रणाम प्रत्येक year or two.
कुछ, such as the droid अविश्वसनीय only have a मेनू चुनाव to प्रारंभ an application कार्यक्रम to activate the कैमरा.
अन्य, ऐसे as the BlackBerry Storm 2, Droid X, Motorola v980 and Nokia 5800 भी have a separate कैमरा बटन for quickness और convenience.
Windows फोन can be configured to operate as a कैमरा even if the फोन is asleep.
कुछ कैमरा फोन are designed to resemble separate low-end डिजिटल कॉम्पैक्ट cameras in रूप और to some extent in सुविधाएँ and चित्र विशेषता, और are ब्रांडेड as दोनो मोबाईल फोन and cameras, सहित certain Sony फोन.
The प्रिंसिपल लाभ of कैमरा फोन are cost and compactness ; बेशक for a उपयोक्ता who carries a mobile फोन वैसे, the additional size और लागत हैं negligible.
Smartphones कि are camera फोन may run mobile applications to add सामर्थ्य ऐसे as geotagging और चित्र stitching.
a few high end phones can उपयोग their touch स्क्रीन to direct their कैमरा to focus on a particular object in the field of दृश्य, giving even an inexperienced उपयोक्ता a degree of फ़ोकस कंट्रोल exceeded तभी by seasoned photographers using manual focus.
`` Whatever Happened to the man of कल ? '' is a 1986 कॉमिक किताब स्टोरी featuring the DC Comics character of Superman.
लिखा by एलन मूर साथ सहायता from long-time, and जल्द to be retiring, सुपरमैन editor, जूलियस Schwartz, the story was प्रकाशित in two parts, beginning in सुपरमैन # 423 और समाप्ति in कार्रवाई Comics # 583, दोनो प्रकाशित in September 1986.
the story was drawn by long-time कलाकार रूखा swan, in his फाइनल major योगदान to the Superman शीर्षक, and was inked by जार्ज Pérez in the समस्या of सुपरमैन और Kurt schaffenberger in the issue of Action Comics.
The स्टोरी थी an imaginary टेल जिससे बताई the final स्टोरी of the Silver Age Superman और his long इतिहास, which थी होने rebooted following the कार्यक्रम of Crisis on अनन्त Earths, पहले his आधुनिक परिचय in the John Byrne श्रेणी, the man of Steel.
मूर चाही his plot to सम्मान the long इतिहास of the character and to serve as a complete निष्कर्ष to his mythology.
the story is a फ़्रेम story set ten सालो बाद सुपरमैन was पिछला देखी, जहाँ लोइस Lane recounts the tale of the समाप्त of सुपरमैन 's career to a reporter इससे the Daily Planet.
उसके story includes numerous हिंसक हमले विरूद्ध सुपरमैन by उसके दुश्मनों, the पब्लिक revelation of उसके रहस्य पहचान of क्लार्क Kent and a क्रमांक of मौतों of those closest to उसे.
the story has been cited as एक of the बेहतरीन stories of the अक्षर of सुपरमैन, and critics और audiences frequently choose it as एक of the सबसे यादगार comics ever प्रकाशित.
it is used as an उदाहरण of how to close the long-time continuity of a comic किताब character.
the स्टोरी 's legacy has endured with समान कहानियां written as श्रद्धांजलि to it.
the title is a सन्दर्भ to one of the nicknames of सुपरमैन as the Man of Tomorrow, और was प्रयुक्त in the शीर्षक of another Superman.
the bugatti veyron eb 16.4 is a mid-engined grand touring car, designed and developed by the volkswagen समूह and manufactured in molsheim, फ़्रांस by bugatti ऑटोमोबाइल S.A.S.
The Super खेल version of the Veyron is the तीव्रतम street-legal उत्पादन car in the संसार, साथ a top speed of.
the असली version रै a top गति of.
It was named car of the Decade ( 2000–2009 ) by the बीबीसी टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम शीर्ष Gear.
the standard veyron won Top Gears बेहतरीन Car Driven सब साल award in 2005.
on 6 अप्रैल 2013, bugatti नियत the रिकार्ड for the fastest roadster in the world with the veyron ग्रैंड Sport vitesse, reaching on औसत a शीर्ष गति of.
The veyron 's मुख्य designer थी Hartmut Warkuss, and the exterior was designed by Jozef kabaň of Volkswagen, with much of the engineering कार्य होने conducted under the guidance of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber.
a number of खास variants have been produced.
in December 2010, bugatti began offering prospective buyers the क्षमता to मनपसंद exterior and interiors रंग by using the Veyron 16.4 configurator application on the marque 's official जालस्थल.
the institution of the eucharist रै महरूम a key theme in the depictions of the Last भोजन in ईसाई आर्ट, as in इस 16th-century जुआन de Juanes पेंटिंग.
`` at the Last Supper, on the night he was betrayed, हमारी रक्षक instituted the eucharistic sacrifice of उसके Body and Blood. ''
( Catechism of the कैथोलिक Church 1323 )
Eucharist in the कैथोलिक Church refers to both the celebration of the Mass, कि is, the Eucharist liturgy, और the ब्रैड and वाइन जिससे after the consecration are transubstantiated ( changed in substance ) into the body और रक्त of Jesus Christ, Lord and God, a declaration प्रतिपादित by the परिषद of ट्रेंट with an anathema विरूद्ध anyone जो denied इस.
Blessed sacrament is a devotional पद used in the Roman कैथोलिक Church to refer to the eucharistic प्रजाति ( the देह and रक्त of Christ ).
