a short स्टोरी is a brief work of साहित्य, usually लिखा in narrative गद्य.
उभरते इससे earlier oral storytelling परंपराओं in the 17th century, the short स्टोरी has grown to encompass a body of work so विविध as to defy easy characterization.
at its most prototypical the short स्टोरी सुविधाएँ a छोटी डाल of नामित वर्ण, और focuses on a self-contained घटना with the intent of evoking a `` single effect '' or mood.
in so doing, छोटी कहानियां make उपयोग of प्लाट, resonance, और अन्य dynamic components to a दूर वृहद उपाधि than is typical of an anecdote, yet to a far lesser degree than a novel.
While the छोटी स्टोरी is largely पृथक इससे the novel, authors of दोनो generally draw इससे a आम पूल of literary techniques.
छोटी कहानियां have no set length.
in terms of word गिनती there is no official demarcation between an किस्सा, a short स्टोरी, और a अनोखा.
बल्कि, the रूप 's पैरामीटर्स are दिए by the rhetorical and व्यावहारिक कॉन्टेक्स्ट in which a दिए story is उत्पादित and माना, so that what constitutes a छोटी स्टोरी may differ between जाति, देशों, eras, and commentators.
Like the novel, the छोटी story 's predominant shape reflects the मांगे of the उपलब्धियाँ बाज़ार लिये प्रकाशन, और the एवोल्यूशन of the रूप seems closely tied to the evolution of the publishing उद्योग और the submission guidelines of इसके constituent houses.
the short स्टोरी रै been माना both an शिक्षुता form preceding अधिक lengthy works, और a crafted form in इसके अपना right, collected together in books of similar length, price, और वितरण as novels.
Short स्टोरी writers may define their works as part of the कलाकारी और personal अभिव्यक्ति of the form.
वे may भी attempt to resist categorization by genre and fixed form.
क्षेत्रफल कोड in Michigan
Area कोड 810 is the telephone क्षेत्रफल कोड सेवारत पूर्वी मिशिगन.
The raccoon (, procyon lotor ), sometimes spelled racoon, also ज्ञात as the आम raccoon, North अमरीकी raccoon, उत्तरी raccoon and colloquially as coon, is a medium-sized mammal देशी to उत्तर अमेरिका.
The raccoon is the largest of the procyonid family, having a देह length of and a देह वज़न of.
इसके grayish coat mostly consists of घना underfur जिससे insulates विरूद्ध ठंडा मौसम.
Two of the raccoon 's most distinctive features हैं its अत्यधिक dexterous front पंजे और इसके facial मुखौटा, जिससे हैं विषयवस्तु in the mythology of several देशी American tribes.
Raccoons are विख्यात for उनके intelligence, with अध्ययन प्रर्दशित कि वे are able to remember the solution to tasks for up to three years.
The diet of the omnivorous raccoon, जिससे is usually nocturnal, consists of about 40 % invertebrates, 33 % संयंत्र भोजन, और 27 % vertebrates.
the असली habitats of the raccoon are पतझड़ी and मिश्रित forests, लकिन due to their adaptability वे have extended their range to mountainous क्षेत्रों, coastal marshes, and urban areas, जहाँ some homeowners consider उन्हें to be pests.
as a result of escapes और deliberate introductions in the mid-20th सदी, raccoons हैं अभी भी वितरित across the यूरोपीय मेनलैंड, the काकेशस प्रदेश and जापानी.
Though previously विचार to be solitary, there is अभी प्रमाण कि raccoons engage in gender-specific सोशल behavior.
सम्बन्धित females often share a आम area, जबकि unrelated males live साथ in समूह of up to four animals to maintain उनके स्थितियाँ विरूद्ध foreign males दौरान the mating season, and other potential आक्रमणकारियों.
घर range sizes vary anywhere इससे 3 हेक्टेयर ( 7 acres ) for females in शहरों to 50 km2 ( 20 sq mi ) लिये males in prairies.
After a gestation period of परिचय 65 दिनों, दो to five young, ज्ञात as `` kits '', are born in spring.
The kits are subsequently raised by their माँ जबतक dispersion in late पतन.
Although captive raccoons have महरूम known to सजीव over 20 सालो, उनके average जीवन प्रत्याशा in the wild is only 1.8 to 3.1 सालो.
in अनेक areas, शिकार and vehicular injury are the दो सबसे आम causes of death.
the 2010 हैती भूकंप थी a अनर्थकारी magnitude 7.0 Mw earthquake, साथ an उपरिकेंद्र निकट the town of léogâne ( Ouest विभाग ), लगभग west of port-au-prince, हैती 's capital.
the भूकंप occurred at 16:53 local समय ( 21:53 UTC ) on मंगलवार, 12 जनवरी 2010.
By 24 January, at least 52 aftershocks measuring 4.5 or greater था been recorded.
an अनुमानित तीन लाख लोगों were affected by the quake.
The उच्चतम reliable मौत गिनती was अनुमानित at 220,000.
haitian government estimates were उच्चतर.
The government of हैती अनुमानित that 250,000 residences and 30,000 commercial buildings had collapsed or यहूद severely क्षतिग्रस्त.
the earthquake caused प्रमुख damage in Port-au-Prince, jacmel और अन्य settlements in the प्रदेश.
Many notable landmark buildings यहूद significantly damaged or destroyed, including the अध्यक्षीय राजमहल, the National Assembly भवन, the port-au-prince Cathedral, and the प्रमुख jail.
among those मारे यहूद archbishop of Port-au-Prince जोसेफ Serge Miot, and विपक्ष leader Micha gaillard.
The मुख्यालय of the United Nations Stabilization मिशन in हैती ( MINUSTAH ), located in the पूंजी, collapsed, killing many, including the मिशन 's Chief, Hédi annabi.
अनेक देशों responded to appeals लिये humanitarian aid, pledging funds और dispatching rescue और medical टीमों, engineers और support personnel.
संचार systems, एयर, जमीन, और sea हस्तांतरण facilities, hospitals, and electrical संजाल था been क्षतिग्रस्त by the भूकंप, जिससे hampered rescue और सहायता प्रयत्न ; confusion over जो थी in charge, एयर traffic congestion, और समस्याएं with prioritisation of फ़्लाइट further complicated early राहत work.
Port-au-Prince 's morgues were overwhelmed with tens of हज़ारों of लाशें.
ये had to be buried in द्रव्यमान graves.
As rescues tailed बंद, आपूर्तियाँ, medical care and sanitation became प्राथमिकताएं.
देरी in aid वितरण led to एंग्री appeals from सहायता workers and survivors, and looting and sporadic हिंसा were observed.
on 22 जनवरी the United राष्ट्र noted कि the आपात phase of the राहत operation थी आरेखण to a close, and on the following day the Haitian government officially called बंद the search लिये survivors.
Mister ed is a fictional talking घोड़ा, originally appearing in short stories by वाल्टर R. ब्रूक्स, and later in an American टेलीविज़न situation comedy produced by Filmways that पहला aired in syndication इससे January 5 to जुलाई 2, 1961, and then on सीबीएस इससे October 1, 1961 to फ़रवरी 6, 1966.
the stars of the दिखाएँ were Mister ed, a palomino horse जो could `` talk '', played by gelding Bamboo Harvester and voiced by पूर्व Western स्टार allan Lane ( जो went uncredited लिये the entire लंबाई of the series ), and his owner, an eccentric and enormously klutzy, yet दोस्ताना, वास्तु नामित wilbur पोस्ट ( Alan Young ).
Much of the program 's humor stemmed इससे the fact मिस्टर ed होता बोलो तभी to Wilbur, as well as Ed 's notoriety as a troublemaker.
Other कार्यशील चुटकुले centered on Wilbur 's character होने a huge klutz and inadvertently causing harm to himself or अन्य.
According to the दिखाएँ 's producer, आर्थर Lubin, Young was chosen as the lead character because he `` just लगा like the sort of guy a घोड़ा would बात to ''.
Lubin, a dost of Mae West, scored a coup by persuading the screen प्रतीक to guest star in one episode.
In the संयुक्त राज्य, reruns aired on उपनाम at नाइट from कूच 3, 1986, to फ़रवरी 1, 1993.
Sister स्टेशन tv जमीन भी reran the दिखाएँ from 1996–98 और again from 2003-06.
The श्रेणी is currently broadcast प्रत्येक morning on इस TV, along साथ राजमार्ग पैट्रोल, और the Patty ड्यूक Show.
It is also currently broadcast on hallmark Movie Channel.
As of January 1, 2011, the first दो seasons of the दिखाएँ हैं available on Hulu.
The Rapture is a term in Christian eschatology which refers to the `` होने caught up '' discussed in 1 Thessalonians 4:17, when the `` मुर्दे in मसीह '' and `` we who हैं alive and remain '' होगा be `` caught up in the बादल '' to मिलें `` the Lord in the एयर ''.
The term `` Rapture '' is प्रयुक्त in at तनिक two होश.
in the pre-tribulation view, a समूह of लोगों होगा be left पीछे on धरती after another समूह वस्तुतः पत्ते `` to मिलें the Lord in the air. ''
इस is अभी the most आम उपयोग of the पद, especially among fundamentalist ईसाइयों and in the United राज्य.
The other, पुरानी उपयोग of the पद `` rapture '' is बस as a पर्याय लिये the final resurrection generally, बगैर a belief that a group of लोगों is बाएँ पीछे on earth लिये an विस्तारित tribulation काल बाद the events of 1 thessalonians 4:17.
This भेद is important as some types of christianity never refer to `` the rapture '' in धार्मिक शिक्षा, but might use the older और more सामान्य sense of the शब्द `` rapture '' in referring to what happens during the फाइनल क़यामत.
There are many views among Christians regarding the timing of मसीह 's वापसी ( including whether it will occur in one event or दो ), और various दृश्य regarding the destination of the aerial महफ़िल described in 1 thessalonians 4.
Denominations ऐसे as रोमन catholics, Orthodox ईसाइयों, Lutheran Christians, और Reformed ईसाइयों believe in a rapture तभी in the sense of a सामान्य फाइनल क़यामत, when Christ returns a सिंगल समय.
वे do नहीं believe that a समूह of लोगों is बाएँ behind on धरती लिये an विस्तारित tribulation period after the कार्यक्रम of 1 thessalonians 4:17.
pre-tribulation rapture theology was विकसित in the 1830s by जॉन नेल्सन darby और the plymouth Brethren, और popularized in the संयुक्त राज्य in the जल्दी 20th सदी by the चौड़ी परिसंचरण of the Scofield सन्दर्भ बाइबल.
Kris Nathan Humphries ( born फ़रवरी 6, 1985 ) is an American professional basketball player साथ the Brooklyn नेट.
the philistine cities of गाजा, Ashdod, ashkelon, Ekron, और gath
the philistines (,,, or ;, Plištim ), pleshet or peleset, were a people who as भाग of the समुद्र Peoples appeared in the दक्षिणी तटीय क्षेत्रफल of canaan at the शुरूआत of the Iron आयु ( circa 1175 BC ), सबसे संभवतः इससे the ईजियन प्रदेश.
according to the बाइबल, वे शासित the पाँच city-states ( the `` Philistine pentapolis '' ) of गाजा, ashkelon, ashdod, ekron and gath, from Wadi गाजा in the south to the yarqon नदी in the north, लकिन साथ no फिक्स्ड border to the ईस्ट.
the Bible paints them as the किंगडम of इसराईल 's most dangerous enemy.
Originating somewhere in the ईजियन, उनके जनसांख्यिकी थी around 25,000 in the 12th century bc, rising to a peak of 30,000 in the 11th सदी bc, of which the ईजियन element was नहीं more than हाफ the कुल, and perhaps much कम.
Nothing is ज्ञात for निश्चित about the असली भाषा or languages of the Philistines, however they यहूद not भाग of the Semitic canaanite population.
There is some सीमित प्रमाण in favour of the assumption that the Philistines were indo-european-speakers either इससे Greece and/or Luwian अध्यक्षों इससे the coast of Asia नाबालिग.
philistine-related words मिला in the बाइबल हैं नहीं Semitic, और can in some मामले, with reservations, be traced वापस to Proto-Indo-European जड़ें.
by the शुरूआत of the 1st Millennium BCE वे had adopted the सामान्य Canaanite भाषा of the region.
the Armed Services वोकेशनल योग्यता बैटरी ( asvab ) is a multiple चुनाव परीक्षण, administered by the संयुक्त राज्य सैन्य Entrance प्रसंस्करण Command, used to determine qualification for enlistment in the United राज्य armed शक्तियां.
It is often offered to American high school विद्यार्थी जब they हैं in the 10th, 11th and 12th ग्रेड, though anyone योग्य for enlistment may लो it.
Although the परीक्षण is administered by the military, it is not ( and never रै been ) a आवश्यकता that a test-taker साथ a qualifying score enlist in the हथियारबंद शक्तियां.
in financial accounting, a balance चादर or बयान of वित्तीय position is a सारांश of the financial balances of a sole बंदोबस्त, a business partnership, a निगम or other कारोबार संगठन, such as an LLC or an llp.
एसेट, liabilities and ownership इक्विटी हैं listed as of a specific तिथि, such as the समाप्त of its financial साल.
A balance sheet is often described as a `` स्नैपशॉट of a कम्पनी 's वित्तीय condition ''.
of the चार basic financial कथन, the संतुलन चादर is the only statement which applies to a single point in समय of a business ' पंचांग year.
A standard company संतुलन sheet has three भाग : assets, liabilities and स्वामित्व इक्विटी.
The प्रमुख categories of assets हैं usually सूचीबद्ध first, और typically in order of चलनिधि.
एसेट हैं followed by the देनदारी.
the difference between the assets और the देनदारी is ज्ञात as equity or the जाल एसेट or the जाल worth or पूंजी of the company and according to the accounting समीकरण, जाल worth जरूर बराबर assets ऋण देनदारी.
another रास्ता to dekh at the same equation is that assets equals liabilities plus owner 's equity.
looking at the equation in इस way shows कैसा assets were financed : either by उधार धन ( liability ) or by using the मालिक 's money ( owner 's equity ).
Balance चादरें are usually presented साथ assets in one section and liabilities और net लायक in the other section साथ the दो भाग `` balancing. ''
a business ऑपरेटिंग entirely in नकदी can measure इसके profits by withdrawing the entire बैंको balance at the समाप्त of the काल, plus कोई cash in हाथ.
however, many businesses are not सशुल्क तत्काल ; they build up inventories of goods and they acquire buildings and equipment.
In अन्य शब्द : businesses have एसेट और so they can नहीं, even if they want to, तत्काल turn these into नकदी at the end of प्रत्येक period.
Often, these businesses owe धन to suppliers and to tax अधिकारियों, और the proprietors do not withdraw all उनके original capital and profits at the समाप्त of प्रत्येक काल.
in अन्य words व्यवसायों also have liabilities.
.17 hornady Magnum rimfire, commonly ज्ञात as the.17 hmr, is a rimfire राइफल cartridge developed by the ammunition कम्पनी hornady in 2002.
It descended इससे the.22 मैग्नम by necking down the.22 मैग्नम मामला to लो a.17 कैलिबर ( 4.5 mm ) गोली, and it is अधिक costly to shoot than traditional.22 कैलिबर rimfire cartridges.
Commonly loaded साथ a 17 grain ( 1.1 g ) bullet, it can deliver muzzle गतियाँ in excess of 2550 ft/s ( 775 m/s ).
The schaumburg Flyers यहूद a पेशेवर baseball team based in Schaumburg, Illinois, in the United राज्य.
the Flyers यहूद to be a charter member of the उत्तर अमरीकी League, जिससे is नहीं affiliated with प्रमुख League Baseball, however, the टोली folded in कूच 2011, before they began खेल in the nal.
From the 1999 season to the 2010 ऋतु, the Flyers played उनके घर खेल at Alexian फ़ील्ड, निकट the एल्गिन o'hare Expressway.
the team formerly निभाई in थंडर खाड़ी, Ontario, जहाँ they यहूद ज्ञात as the थंडर Bay whiskey jacks.
the team थी originally a member of the Northern League from 1993 to 2010.
on July 27, 2009, the Flyers played host to बैटल of the Sexes ii, which pitted the Flyers against the National प्रो fastpitch सॉफ्टबॉल Champions, the शिकागो डाकुओं.
निभाई by आधिकारिक softball नियम, the खेल थी seen by an overflow रिकार्ड भीड of 8,918, and थी won by the डाकुओं 4-2.
in 1999, the Flyers नियुक्त their first manager, रॉन Kittle.
kittle is बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके playing days साथ the Chicago White sox, and पूर्व Chicago शावक and White Sox खिलाड़ी Greg hibbard थी the pitching कोच.
दौरान the जल्दी सालो of the franchise, Kittle did a श्रेणी of tv commercials to promote the team, using the gimmick `` Ma kittle. '' where he played दोनो himself और उसके `` Ma. ''
the ads were कामयाब at sparking some initial ब्याज in the team as the flyers hoped to steal away प्रशंसक इससे the आसपास केन County Cougars.
The ad mimicked the अत्यधिक कामयाब Converse विज्ञापन जहाँ लैरी जॉनसन स्ट्रक्चर as both himself और `` gramama. ''
At the end of the 2001 season, however, Kittle resigned इससे his managerial position, and Jim boynewicz थी hired to replace him.
in 2004, the Flyers बना it to the Northern लीग Championship Series विरूद्ध the st. Paul Saints.
despite अग्रणी the five-game श्रेणी 2-1, schaumburg आखिरकार खोया the series.
In खेल 5, flyers relief पिचर lyle Prempas allowed a खेल winning ग्रैंड स्लैम by st. पॉल infielder मार्क mirizzi in the नवीं inning.
The flyers appeared in the उत्तरी लीग playoffs four times ( 1999, 2003, 2004, 2006 ) लकिन never won the चैंपियनशिप.
कुछ famous players who played लिये the flyers यहूद पूर्व ओकलैंड a 's outfielder Ozzie Canseco और पूर्व शिकागो शावक outfielder Dwight स्मिथ.
रेचल Hannah वाइज़ ( / वाइस / ; born 7 March 1970 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी फिल्मी और थिएटर अभिनेत्री और former fashion मॉडल.
वाइज़ began उसके एक्टिंग करियर at Trinity हॉल, कैम्ब्रिज in the जल्दी 1990s, तब प्रारंभ working in television, appearing in Inspector मोर्स, the British mini-series स्कारलेट and Black, और the टेलीविज़न फिल्मी Advocates ii.
वो बना उसके film début in the film Death यंत्र ( 1994 ), लकिन उसके breakthrough role came in the फिल्मी Chain प्रतिक्रिया ( 1996 ), leading to a high-profile भूमिका as Evelyn carnahan-o'connell in the films The Mummy ( 1999 ) और The मम्मी रिटर्न ( 2001 ).
अन्य notable films featuring वाइज़ are Enemy at the गेट्स, About a Boy, Constantine, The Fountain और The निरंतर माली, for जिससे she received an Academy पुरस्कार, a सुनहरी Globe और a स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं ' Guild award for उसके supporting role as टेसा Quayle.
She has been labelled an `` अंग्रेज़ी रोज़ '' since her minor role in Stealing सौंदर्य ( 1996 ).
वाइज़ also works in theatre.
Her स्टेज breakthrough थी the 1994 revival of noël Coward 's play डिज़ाइन लिये जीना, which अर्जित her the London Critics वृत्त पुरस्कार for the most promising newcomer.
Weisz 's performances भी include the 1999 donmar गोदाम production of Tennessee विलियम्स ' एकाएक, Last गर्मियाँ, और their 2009 पुनरुद्धार of A स्ट्रीटकार Named Desire.
उसके portrayal of Blanche dubois in the latter खेल earned her the आलोचकों ' Circle Theatre पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री.
वो रै recently played Evanora in Oz the ग्रेट और शक्तिशाली.
the American Civil War ( ACW ), also ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the Civil युद्ध ( see नामकरण ), थी a civil war fought इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त States ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक Southern स्लेव states कि घोषित उनके secession और formed the Confederate States of अमेरिका ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war था इसके उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of slavery, विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the western territories.
विदेशी powers किया not intervene.
बाद four सालो of bloody कॉम्बैट कि बाएँ over 600,000 सैनिको dead and destroyed much of the South 's अवसंरचना, the confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण process of restoring नेशनल unity and guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed स्लेव began.
In the 1860 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, republicans, led by अब्राहम lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त राज्य ' territories.
Lincoln जीती, लकिन before his inauguration on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave राज्य formed the Confederacy.
outgoing Democratic President James बुकानन और the incoming republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his administration होता not initiate सिविल युद्ध.
Eight remaining स्लेव राज्य continued to reject calls लिये secession.
Confederate शक्तियां जब्त numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the confederacy.
A सलाम सम्मेलन failed to ढूँढें a सुलह, and दोनो पहलू prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed कि यूरोपीय देशों were so निर्भर on `` किंग Cotton `` कि they would intervene ; none did और none पहचाना the नई confederate राज्य of अमेरिका.
hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट sumter, a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by Union सैनिकों in दक्षिण कैरोलिना.
lincoln called लिये प्रत्येक state to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; consequently, four अधिक slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union जल्द नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी that अबोध the दक्षिणी economy.
the Eastern Theater थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
The पतझड़ 1862 confederate अभियान into Maryland ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ Confederate retreat at the Battle of antietam, dissuading अंग्रेजों intervention.
Lincoln issued the emancipation उदघोषणा, जिससे made ending गुलामी a war लक्ष्य.
To the वेस्ट, by गर्मियाँ 1862 the संघ destroyed the confederate river navy, तब much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना, and the Union at vicksburg विभाजित the Confederacy in two at the मिसिसिपी नदी.
in 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of gettysburg.
पश्चिमी सफलताओं led to Ulysses S. ग्रान्ट command of सब संघ armies in 1864.
in the Western Theater, विलियम T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta और marched to the समुद्र, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the रास्ता.
The Union marshaled the संसाधन और जनशक्ति to आक्रमण the Confederacy from सब दिशानिर्देश, and could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of attrition through the overland अभियान towards रिचमंड, the Confederate पूंजी.
the defending Confederate army failed, अग्रणी to Lee 's आत्मसमर्पण to Grant at Appomattox अदालत हाउस on अप्रैल 9, 1865.
the अमरीकी Civil War was एक of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक युद्धों.
Railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, और mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
the mobilization of civilian कारखानों, खानों, shipyards, banks, transportation और food आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed World War i.
it remains the deadliest युद्ध in अमरीकी history, resulting in the मौतों of an estimated 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined number of civilian हताहत.
Historian जॉन huddleston estimates the death टोल at ten प्रतिशत of all Northern males 20–45 years बूढ़ा, and 30 percent of सब Southern white males aged 18–40.
Potato bread is a रूप of bread in which potato replaces a portion of the regular wheat आटा.
It is पकाया in a किस्में of methods, सहित by baking it on a hot तवे or pan, or in an oven.
It may be leavened or unleavened, and may have a variety of अन्य ingredients baked into it.
the अनुपात of आलू to गेहूं flour varies significantly from recipe to रेसिपी, with some recipes having a majority of potato, and others having a बहुमत of गेहूं flour.
Some व्यंजनों call लिये mashed potatoes, with अन्य कॉलिंग लिये निर्जलित potato flakes.
it is उपलब्धियाँ as a वाणिज्यिक उत्पाद in अनेक देशों, साथ समान variations in ingredients, cooking method, and अन्य परिवर्तनीय.
the Pacific Time मण्डल observes मानक time by subtracting आठ घंटों इससे Coordinated सार्वभौमिक Time ( ).
The clock time in इस मण्डल is आधारित on the औसत सौर समय of the 120th मध्याह्न वेस्ट of the Greenwich वेधशाला.
During daylight saving time, its समय ऑफसेट is.
In the संयुक्त राज्य और Canada, इस time zone is generically पुकारा Pacific समय ( PT ).
specifically, it is प्रशांत मानक समय ( pst ) जब observing मानक time ( शीत ), and Pacific daylight समय ( PDT ) when observing daylight छायांकन time ( summer ).
सबसे of कनाडा uses daylight छायांकन time.
in मैक्सिको the utc−8 time zone is ज्ञात as the Northwest मण्डल, which is synchronized with the U.S. PDT daylight छायांकन schedule.
the largest नगर in the प्रशांत समय मण्डल is लॉस एंजिल्स in कैलिफ़ोर्निया from USA ; the नगर 's metropolitan area is the largest in the zone.
The मण्डल is एक hour ahead of the अलास्का समय Zone, एक घंटा behind the Mountain Time Zone और three घंटों behind the Eastern समय Zone.
स्टीरियो 8, commonly ज्ञात as the eight-track cartridge, eight-track tape, or simply eight-track, is a magnetic टेप sound recording technology.
it थी popular in the संयुक्त राज्य इससे the mid-1960s through to the early 1980s, लकिन थी अपेक्षाकृत अनजान in many European countries.
it was, however, बहुत लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त Kingdom दौरान this period.
स्टीरियो 8 was निर्मित in 1964 by a consortium led by Bill Lear of Lear जेट Corporation, along with ampex, घाट मोटर कम्पनी, General Motors, मोटोरोला, और RCA Victor रिकॉर्ड ( RCA ).
it थी a further development of the समान stereo-pak four-track कार्ट्रिज निर्मित by Earl `` madman '' muntz.
a बाद quadraphonic संस्करण of the format was announced by आरसीए in April 1970 और first ज्ञात as quad-8, then बाद changed to just q8.
Ramesses ii ( 1303 bc – जुलाई or August 1213 BC ; Egyptian :, alternatively transcribed as rameses और Ramses or ), referred to as रामेसेस the ग्रेट, was the third मिश्र pharaoh ( reigned 1279 bc – 1213 bc ) of the उन्नीसवीं राजवंश.
he is often regarded as the greatest, most celebrated, और सबसे शक्तिशाली pharaoh of the मिश्र साम्राज्य.
उसके successors and later Egyptians पुकारा उसे the `` Great Ancestor. ''
Ramesses II led अनेक military रिझाने into the Levant, re-asserting Egyptian control over canaan.
he also led expeditions to the south, into Nubia, commemorated in inscriptions at beit el-wali और gerf hussein.
at आयु चौदह, Ramesses थी नियुक्त प्रिंस Regent by his पिता सेती I.
He is believed to have लिया the सिंहासन in उसके लेट किशोर और is ज्ञात to have ruled Egypt इससे 1279 BC to 1213 BC लिये 66 years और 2 months, according to both Manetho और Egypt 's समकालीन ऐतिहासिक रिकॉर्ड.
he थी एकबार कहा to have जिया to be 99 years old, but it is अधिक संभावित कि he died in his 90th or 91st year.
If he became Pharaoh in 1279 bc as सबसे Egyptologists आज मानना, he होता have assumed the throne on May 31, 1279 bc, आधारित on उसके known accession date of iii shemu दिन 27.
रामेसेस II मनाये an unprecedented 14 sed festivals ( the first held after तीस years of a pharaoh 's reign, and then प्रत्येक three सालो ) दौरान his reign—more than कोई अन्य pharaoh.
On his death, he थी दफ्न in a tomb in the घाटी of the किंग्स ; उसके देह थी बाद moved to a royal संचय जहाँ it थी खोजा in 1881, and is अभी on प्रदर्शक in the Cairo संग्रहालय.
The जल्दी भाग of his reign was केन्द्रित on भवन cities, temples and monuments.
He established the city of Pi-Ramesses in the Nile Delta as his नई पूंजी and main base for उसके अभियान in सीरियाई.
This city was निर्मित on the remains of the नगर of Avaris, the पूंजी of the Hyksos जब वे took over, और थी the स्थान of the प्रमुख Temple of नियत.
he is also ज्ञात as Ozymandias in the Greek स्त्रोत, from a लिप्यन्तरण into Greek of a part of रामेसेस 's throne नाम,, `` ra 's mighty truth, chosen of ra ''.
The टेक्सास रेंजरों are a professional बेसबॉल टोली located in the dallas-fort लायक metroplex, आधारित in Arlington, टेक्सास.
the Rangers मताधिकार is फिलहाल a member of the पश्चिमी Division of प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल 's अमरीकी लीग.
चूंकि, the Rangers have निभाई in Rangers ballpark in आर्लिंगटन in Arlington, Texas.
The team 's नाम is उधार from the प्रसिद्ध law enforcement agency of the वही name.
The मताधिकार was established in 1961 by the नाम of the वॉशिंगटन सीनेटरों, an expansion team awarded to Washington, d.C., after the नगर 's पहला ballclub, the असली वॉशिंगटन Senators, स्थानांतरित to Minnesota और became the जुड़वा.
बाद the season, the नई Senators moved to आर्लिंगटन, Texas, और debuted as the Rangers the following spring.
The टेक्सास Rangers बेसबॉल Club रै बना six दिखावे in the एमएलबी postseason, all following division championships, in 1996, 1998, 1999, 2010, 2011 और 2012.
In 2010, the रेंजरों advanced past the Division Series for the first समय, defeating the tampa Bay किरणें.
Texas then brought घर उनके पहला अमरीकी League pennant after धड़कन the नई यॉर्क Yankees in छह games.
in the 2010 World Series, the मताधिकार 's पहला, the रेंजरों गिरी to the सैन Francisco दिग्गज in five खेल.
Their लोन victory बना उन्हें the first Texas team to जीत a World Series खेल, the Houston Astros having been swept in their 2005 संसार Series रूप.
They repeated as American लीग champions the following साल, then lost the 2011 संसार Series to the st. लुई कार्डिनल्स in seven games.
Gaius जूलियस सीज़र (, July 100 BC – 15 कूच 44 BC ) थी a रोमन general, statesman, कौंसुल और notable लेखक of Latin गद्य.
he played a critical role in the events that led to the निधन of the रोमन Republic and the rise of the रोमन साम्राज्य.
In 60 BC, Caesar, Crassus और Pompey formed a राजनैतिक alliance कि was to dominate रोमन politics लिये several सालो.
Their attempts to amass शक्ति through populist tactics were opposed by the conservative elite भीतर the रोमन Senate, among उन्हें Cato the Younger with the बारंबार support of सिसरो.
सीज़र 's conquest of gaul, समाप्त by 51 bc, extended रोम 's territory to the अंग्रेज़ी चैनल और the Rhine.
सीज़र became the first रोमन सामान्य to cross दोनो जब he built a bridge आरपार the राइन और conducted the first आक्रमण of ब्रिटेन.
ये उपलब्धियाँ granted उसे unmatched सैन्य शक्ति and threatened to ग्रहण the standing of pompey, who had realigned खुद with the Senate बाद the death of crassus in 53 bc.
With the Gallic युद्धों concluded, the सीनेट ordered Caesar to lay down his सैन्य command और return to रोम.
सीज़र refused, and चिह्नित उसके defiance in 49 bc by crossing the rubicon with a legion, leaving his प्रांत and illegally प्रवेश रोमन territory under बाहें.
सिविल युद्ध resulted, from जिससे he उभरा as the unrivaled leader of रोम.
After assuming कंट्रोल of सरकारी, Caesar began a कार्यक्रम of social और governmental reforms, सहित the creation of the Julian calendar.
He centralised the अफसरशाही of the Republic and थी आखिरकार proclaimed `` तानाशाह in perpetuity ''.
लकिन the underlying political विरोध had नहीं महरूम resolved, और on the ides of कूच ( 15 कूच ) 44 BC, Caesar थी assassinated by a समूह of सीनेटरों led by Marcus junius Brutus.
a new श्रेणी of civil wars broke out, and the संवैधानिक government of the Republic was never restored.
Caesar 's अपनाया heir Octavian, later ज्ञात as Augustus, रोज़ to एकमात्र शक्ति, और the era of the रोमन Empire began.
much of सीज़र 's life is known इससे his own खाते of उसके military campaigns, और from other contemporary sources, mainly the अक्षर और भाषणों of सिसरो और the historical writings of Sallust.
The later biographies of सीज़र by Suetonius और प्लूटार्क हैं भी प्रमुख sources.
Caesar is deemed to be एक of the greatest military कमांडरों of history.
Linguistic मैप of Nigeria, Cameroon, and Benin.
चिह्न in अंग्रेज़ी, बाहर the विश्वविद्यालयों of लागोस
वहीँ हैं hundreds of languages बोला in सीरियल.
The प्रमुख languages are Yoruba, हौसा, Igbo, Edo, fulfulde, कनूरी, और Ibibio.
The आधिकारिक language of Nigeria, English, the पूर्व औपनिवेशिक भाषा, was चुनी to सुकर the cultural और linguistic एकता of the देश.
अंग्रेज़ी, however, remains an विशेष preserve of the country 's urban elite, and is नहीं widely बोला in rural areas, which comprise three quarters of the देशों जनसांख्यिकी.
सीरियल 's भाषाई diversity is a microcosm of Africa as a पूरे, encompassing तीन major अफ़्रीकी languages परिवारों : afroasiatic, nilo-saharan, and Niger–Congo.
सीरियल भी रै several as-yet unclassified languages, such as Cen tuum, which may represent a relic of an भी वृहद विविधता prior to the spread of the current language परिवारों.
daucus carota ( common names शामिल wild गाजर, ( uk ) बर्ड 's घोंसला, bishop 's lace, and Queen Anne 's lace ( उत्तर अमेरिका ) ) is a flowering plant in the family Apiaceae, देशी to temperate regions of यूरोपीय, दक्षिणपश्चिम Asia और naturalised to उत्तर अमेरिका और Australia.
Domesticated गाजर हैं cultivars of a subspecies, daucus carota subsp. sativus.
in the संयुक्त States, the title of federal judge प्रायः अर्थात् a judge appointed by the President of the संयुक्त States and पुष्टि by the United States Senate pursuant to the नियुक्ति Clause in आलेख ii of the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान.
in जोड to the परम् Court of the United States, जिनकी existence और कुछ aspects of whose jurisdiction हैं beyond the constitutional शक्ति of कॉंग्रेस to alter, acts of Congress have स्थापित 13 न्यायालयों of appeals ( भी पुकारा `` सर्किट न्यायालयों '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over अलग regions of the United States, and 94 संयुक्त States ज़िला न्यायालयों.
प्रत्येक judge appointed to ऐसे a court may be categorized as a संघीय न्यायधीश ; such स्थितियाँ include the Chief Justice and संबद्ध Justices of the परम् अदालत, Circuit Judges of the courts of appeals, and district न्यायाधीशों of the United States ज़िला courts.
सब of ये judges वर्णित thus far हैं referred to sometimes as `` आलेख iii judges '' क्युकी they कसरत the न्यायिक शक्ति vested in the judicial शाखा of the संघीय सरकारी by आलेख III of the u.S. संविधान.
in जोड, judges of the अदालत of International व्यापार exercise judicial शक्ति pursuant to आलेख iii.
अन्य judges serving in the federal courts, सहित मजिस्ट्रेट judges and दिवालियापन judges, are also sometimes referred to as `` संघीय न्यायाधीशों '' ; however, वे are neither appointed by the अध्यक्ष nor confirmed by the सीनेट, और उनके power derives इससे Article I instead.
See आलेख i and आलेख iii अधिकरणों.
नेल Kim Furtado ( born December 2, 1978 ) is a कनाडाई सिंगर, songwriter और अभिनेत्री.
She has बेची 20 लाख albums worldwide and अधिक 20 million singles, bringing उसके कुल बिक्री to over 40 लाख records around the संसार.
फ़र्टाडो first gained कीर्ति with her डेब्यू album, वाह, नेल !
, which spawned two कामयाब singles, `` i 'm जैसे a Bird `` and `` Turn Off the लाइट ``. ``
i 'm Like a Bird '' won a 2001 juno Award for सिंगल of the साल और a 2002 ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन मादा पॉप Vocal प्रदर्शन.
in 2003, Furtado released लोकगीत, which उत्पादित तीन international singles— `` powerless ( Say What तुम Want ) ``, `` कोशिश `` और `` força ``.
Three years बाद वो released Loose, a worldwide वाणिज्यिक success.
the एल्बम शाखित चार number-one हिट्स : `` Promiscuous ``, `` maneater ``, `` कह It सही `` and `` All Good Things ( आइये to an End ) ``.
बाद a three-year ब्रेक, वो released उसके पहला full-length स्पेनी एल्बम, Mi Plan, और Furtado received a Latin ग्रैमी for बेहतरीन Female पॉप Vocal Album.
in 2012, फ़र्टाडो 's fourth english-language स्टुडियो एल्बम, the स्पिरिट Indestructible थी released.
फ़र्टाडो 's work has earned उसके numerous पुरस्कार and accolades, including 2 Grammy पुरस्कार, 10 Juno Awards, 3 muchmusic वीडियो पुरस्कार and a स्टार on Canada 's चलना of Fame.
Creatures of the रात्रि is the दसवाँ स्टुडियो एल्बम by Kiss.
it is the band 's last एल्बम for कासाब्लांका रिकॉर्ड, the तभी लेबल the समूह था कभी recorded for at कि point.
The एल्बम was dedicated to the मेमोरी of कासाब्लांका संस्थापक and जल्दी चुंबन supporter neil Bogart, जो था died of cancer during the रिकॉर्डिंग sessions.
It is also the बैंड 's last एल्बम अंकित with Ace frehley credited as an आधिकारिक सदस्य ( जबतक 1998 's Psycho Circus ), and its पहला album with Vinnie विंसेंट as the initially uncredited lead guitarist ( Vincent होता later be credited, but not प्रदर्शित pictorially on the कवर, of 1985 's reissue of the एल्बम ).
Touch is a निर्णायक means of receiving सूचना.
This photo shows tactile markings identifying सीढ़ियाँ for visually impaired people.
the somatosensory प्रणाली is a विविध sensory प्रणाली comprising the receptors और processing centres to उपज the sensory modalities ऐसे as टच, तापमान, proprioception ( body position ), and nociception ( pain ).
The संवेदी receptors कवर the स्किन and epithelia, skeletal muscles, हड्डियों और joints, internal अंगों, और the cardiovascular प्रणाली.
While touch is माना one of the पाँच traditional होश, the impression of टच is formed from several modalities.
in आयुर्विज्ञान, the colloquial पद `` टच '' is प्रायः replaced साथ `` दैहिक होश '' to बेहतर प्रतिबिंबित the किस्में of mechanisms शामिल.
दैहिक होश are sometimes referred to as somesthetic होश, साथ the समझना कि somesthesis includes टच, proprioception and ( depending on usage ) भी haptic बोध.
the system प्रतिक्रियाएँ to diverse stimuli using different receptors : thermoreceptors, nociceptors, mechanoreceptors and chemoreceptors.
Transmission of information from the receptors passes via sensory nerves through tracts in the स्पाइनल cord and into the दिमाग.
Processing primarily occurs in the प्राथमिक somatosensory क्षेत्रफल in the parietal lobe of the दिमागी cortex.
The cortical homunculus was devised by वाइल्डर Penfield.
At its simplest, the system works when activity in a संवेदी न्यूरॉन is triggered by a विशिष्ट stimulus ऐसे as ऊष्मा ; इस signal आखिरकार passes to an क्षेत्रफल in the दिमाग uniquely attributed to कि क्षेत्रफल on the body—this allows the processed stimulus to be felt at the सही स्थान.
the point-to-point मानचित्रण of the body surfaces in the दिमाग is पुकारा a homunculus और is essential in the सृष्टि of a देह image.
इस brain-surface ( `` cortical '' ) मैप is नहीं immutable, however.
नाटकीय shifts can occur in जवाब to स्ट्रोक or चोट.
Magnolia is a विशाल genus of परिचय 210 flowering संयंत्र प्रजाति in the subfamily Magnolioideae of the परिवार Magnoliaceae.
it is नामित बाद फ्रेंच वनस्पतिशास्त्री Pierre Magnol.
magnolia is an ancient genus.
appearing पहले bees did, the पुष्प विकसित to encourage परागण by beetles.
To avoid क्षति from pollinating भृंग, the carpels of magnolia flowers हैं extremely tough.
Fossilised specimens of magnolia acuminata have been मिला डेटिंग to 20 लाख सालो पहले, and of पौधे identifiably belonging to the Magnoliaceae dating to 95 लाख सालो ago.
Another aspect of Magnolias that is considered to represent an ancestral राज्य is कि the पुष्प bud is enclosed in a bract बल्कि than in sepals ; the perianth parts are undifferentiated और पुकारा tepals बल्कि than पृथक sepals और petals.
magnolia साझा the tepal characteristic with several other flowering पौधे near the आधार of the flowering plant lineage such as Amborella and Nymphaea ( as खूब as with अनेक अधिक recently निकला पौधे ऐसे as Lilium ).
the natural दायरा of magnolia प्रजाति is a disjunct वितरण, with a main केन्द्र in east और southeast Asia और a द्वितीयक केन्द्र in पूर्वी North America, सेंट्रल America, the वेस्ट Indies, and कुछ प्रजाति in दक्षिण America.

`` White क्रिसमस '' is an इरविंग बर्लिन song reminiscing about an old-fashioned क्रिसमस सेटिंग.
according to the Guinness Book of World रिकॉर्ड, the संस्करण सुंग by Bing crosby is the best-selling सिंगल of all समय, with estimated sales in excess of 50 लाख नक़ल worldwide.
Accounts vary as to when और where बर्लिन wrote the song.
एक story is कि he wrote it in 1940, in गरम la Quinta, California, while staying at the la quinta होटल, a frequent हॉलीवुड retreat भी favored by writer-producer Frank Capra, although the एरिज़ोना biltmore भी claims the song थी लिखा there.
he प्रायः stayed up सब रात्रि writing — he बताई his सचिव, `` पकड़ें अपना pen और लो bas this सोंग.
i बस wrote the बेहतरीन सोंग I 've कभी लिखा — हेक, I बस wrote the बेहतरीन song that anybody 's ever लिखा ! ''
Cross-country skiing ( or XC स्कीइंग ) is a form of स्की touring in which participants propel themselves आरपार snow-covered terrain using skis और poles.
the activity is popular in अनेक स्थान साथ विशाल snowfields, primarily Northern यूरोपीय, कनाडा, और अलास्का.
Cross-country स्कीइंग is भाग of the Nordic स्कीइंग sport परिवार, जिससे शामिल ski jumping, Nordic combined ( cross-country skiing और स्की कूद ), Biathlon ( skiing और rifle marksmanship ) and ski-orienteering ( जिससे includes मैप navigation along snow trails और tracks ).
cross-country स्कीइंग is the आधुनिक स्टाइल of skiing कि most resembles prehistoric स्कीइंग, विशेषकर जब done in the backcountry.
It is भी सम्बन्धित to Telemark skiing.
A use tax in United States is complementary to sales tax जिससे means, if you ख़रीदे a taxable product/services without paying कोई बिक्री कर to vendor, तुम owe उपयोग tax.
तुम must स्वः assess use tax and अदा it directly to the राज्य जहाँ the उत्पाद were consumed or services यहूद rendered.
उपयोग tax typically is a कर on खपत but if you buy an item ( बगैर paying बिक्री कर ) और स्टोर it in your गोदाम initially, उपयोग tax applies to that location where goods यहूद भंडारित.
बाद on जब the फाइनल consumption takes place at some अन्य स्थान, तुम are required to pay the differential of tax rate to the क्षेत्राधिकार of परम place of consumption.
This really means कि you do n't have to pay both बिक्री Tax as well as उपयोग Tax on एक transaction.
It is तभी one or the other that you are required to pay on purchase of taxable products/services.
If vendor does n't चार्ज कोई Sales कर on इसके चालान then it is the obligation of the buyer to self assess उपयोग tax and pay it to the उचित Jurisdication.
उपयोग कर is generally charged at the वही tax rate of Sales Tax लकिन in some states the कर rate is अलग.
उपयोग tax is also termed as `` खपत Tax '' or `` उपभोक्ता उपयोग Tax ''.
a उपयोग कर is a type of excise tax levied in the संयुक्त राज्य by numerous state सरकारें.
It is assessed upon tangible निजी property purchased by a resident of the assessing राज्य लिये उपयोग, storage, or consumption in that राज्य ( not लिये पुनर्विक्रय ), regardless of जहाँ the purchase took प्लेस.
If a resident of a राज्य makes a purchase भीतर his घर state, पूरा sales tax is सशुल्क at the time of the transaction.
the use tax applies जब a निवासी of the assessing राज्य purchases an item that is नहीं subject to his घर state 's sales कर.
Usually, इस is due to out-of-state purchases, as खूब as ordering items through the मेल, by phone, or over the अंतरजाल इससे अन्य states.
The उपयोग कर is typically assessed at the same रेट as the बिक्री tax कि would have been owed ( if any ) था the same goods been खरीदा in the state of residence.
For उदाहरण, a resident of Massachusetts, with a 6.25 % `` बिक्री and use tax '' on निश्चित goods और services, purchases non-exempt goods or services in New Hampshire लिये use, storage or अन्य खपत in मैसाचुसेट्स.
अंतर्गत नई हैम्पशायर विधि, the New हैम्पशायर vendor collects no sales कर on the goods, but the Massachusetts purchaser/user must स्टिल अदा 6.25 % of the sales price directly to the Department of आय in Massachusetts as a use कर.
If the वही goods are खरीदा in a US राज्य कि करता collect sales tax लिये ऐसे goods at time of खरीदें, whatever कर यहूद सशुल्क by the क्रेता to कि राज्य can be deducted ( as a कर credit ) from the 6.25 % owed for subsequent उपयोग, storage or खपत in Massachusetts.
साथ few अपवाद, no state 's विक्रेता will charge the native state 's sales कर on goods shipped आउट of राज्य, अर्थ all goods ordered इससे out-of-state हैं essentially फ़्री of बिक्री कर.
The purchaser is इसलिए required to declare and pay the उपयोग कर to उसके घर state on ये ordered goods.
the assessing jurisdiction may make the उपयोग कर payable annually, but कुछ states आवश्यकता a मासिक payment.
For example, जहाँ a Vermont resident has not paid at तनिक 6 % बिक्री tax on property brought in for use in the state, Vermont law requires दाखिल a tax वापसी ( रूप SU-452 and भुगतान ) by the 20th दिन of the month following non-exempt purchases to avoid a $ 50 लेट शुल्क, a 5 % दंड per माह, to a अधिकतम of 25 %, प्लस statutory ब्याज on the unpaid tax और penalties.
ठेठ छूटों शामिल purchases by charitable non-profit संगठन or governmental agencies, purchases for पुनर्विक्रय in commerce, और purchases via `` कैज़ुअल बिक्री '' by individuals नहीं in the ordinary course of business.
Also नोट that there are हज़ारों of कर jurisdictions in the U.S. और अनेक have ever-changing lists of विशिष्ट types of goods and सेवाएं कि हैं नहीं taxable.
As an illustration of the complexities : a 2006 मैसाचुसेट्स law requires भुगतान of कर on `` pre-written '' ( not custom ) तन्त्र purchased और डाउनलोड over the अंतरजाल लिये संस्थापना और use in मैसाचुसेट्स, regardless of where it originates.
However, the वास्तविक use of the वही software डाउनलोड by a Massachusetts निवासी to a सर्वर in another राज्य remains a non-taxed `` सेवा ''.
In contrast, Arkansas generally करता नहीं tax anything delivered over the अंतरजाल ( ऐसे as downloaded तन्त्र or music ), except voip which is specifically पारिभाषित as taxable `` दूरसंचार सेवाएं ''.
Software ( pre-written or custom ) `` वितरित thru a tangible medium '' ( i.e., on disk ) in अरकंसास is taxable भी if ordered ऑनलाइन, except `` कस्टम तन्त्र for a particular customer '' which is non-taxable `` programming services '' even if वितरित on a डिस्क.
in most cases, this complexity is भाग of the underlying sales tax कानून ; but जबकि a brick-and-mortar स्टोर रै to deal साथ तभी the sales कर laws of its own location, remote sellers have to सौदे with the use कर कानून of many jurisdictions—up to every us राज्य और मोहल्ले that assesses उन्हें, if the company has a उपस्थिति or `` नेक्सस '' in every state ( as विशाल `` brick-and-mortar '' विक्रेता जैसे wal-mart and Best ख़रीदे do ).
in medicine, pulmonary hypertension ( PH ) is an increase of blood pressure in the pulmonary धमनी, pulmonary vein, or pulmonary capillaries, साथ known as the lung vasculature, अग्रणी to shortness of breath, dizziness, fainting, and अन्य लक्षण, सब of जिससे हैं exacerbated by exertion.
Pulmonary hypertension can be a कठोर disease with a markedly decreased कसरत सहिष्णुता and दिल विफलता.
It थी first पहचाना by dr. अर्नस्ट von Romberg in 1891.
according to the सबसे हाल वर्गीकरण, it can be one of पाँच different प्रकार : arterial, venous, hypoxic, thromboembolic or विविध.

sanuk, a प्रभाग of deckers बाहरी Corporation, is a जूते brand आधारित in दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
sanuk, the Thai word for मजा, थी founded by Southern कैलिफ़ोर्निया देशी जेफ़ kelley जब he started बनाना sandals out of indoor-outdoor पिंजरा.
the पहला उत्पाद निर्मित was ग्रीन carpeted and हकदार the `` Fur Real '' बाद one दूकान मालिक asked if the विलक्षणता चन्दन थी `` For रियल. ''
the Fur रियल पहला became a runaway hit through बुटीक stores and नहीं the intended लहरे दुकानें.
The novelty act थी followed up by a sandal wrapped in तार जाल, a तेंदुआ print संस्करण, and शैलियाँ बना आउट of a poncho सामग्री in a variety of रंगों.
Sanuk रै grown to include style options लिये मेन, women and युवावस्था और is वितरित across the संयुक्त States and in over 50 countries throughout Europe, एशिया, दक्षिण अमेरिका and Australia.
Sanuk centers itself around a धनात्मक जीवनशैली advocating the स्लोगन, `` Smile, Pass it on ! ``.
In कंप्यूटर science, सरणी प्रोग्रामिंग भाषाएं ( भी known as vector or multidimensional languages ) generalize operations on scalars to लागू transparently to vectors, matrices, और उच्चतर आयामी arrays.
Array programming primitives concisely express व्यापक विचार परिचय आंकड़ा manipulation.
The स्तर of conciseness can be dramatic in certain मामले : it is नहीं uncommon to find सरणी programming भाषा one-liners कि आवश्यकता more than a युगल of pages of Java code.
apl, designed by Ken iverson, was the first programming language to provide सरणी programming capabilities.
The mnemonic apl refers to the title of his seminal किताब `` A प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा '' और नहीं to arrays per se. iverson 's योगदान to rigor और clarity was probably अधिक महत्वपूर्ण than the सरल एक्सटेंशन of dimensions to कृत्यों.
In the United States an annuity अनुबंध is created जब an insured पार्टी, प्रायः an व्यक्तिगत, pays a जीवन बीमे कम्पनी a single प्रीमियम कि होगा later be वितरित back to the insured पार्टी over समय.
annuity contracts traditionally provide a गारंटी distribution of आय over time, such as via fixed payments, जबतक the death of the person or व्यक्तियों named in the contract or जबतक a final date, whichever आता पहला.
However, the बहुमत of modern annuity ग्राहक use annuities only to accumulate निधि free of आय और पूंजी gains कर और to later take lump-sum withdrawals without using the guaranteed-income-for-life विशेषता.
अध्यक्ष बराक Obama.
बराक ओबामा साथ उसके first Supreme Court nominee, Sonia सोटोमायोर.
following is a सूची of सब संयुक्त States संघीय judges नियुक्त by अध्यक्ष बराक Obama दौरान his presidency.
as of April 30, 2013, 187 ओबामा नामांकित to आलेख iii judgeships have महरूम confirmed by the संयुक्त राज्य Senate, namely दो justices to the परम् Court of the United राज्य, 35 न्यायाधीशों to the United राज्य न्यायालयों of appeals और 150 न्यायाधीशों to the United States ज़िला courts.
25 further nominations are फिलहाल awaiting Senate कार्रवाई.
वहीँ are currently 16 vacancies on the United States Courts of appeals, 67 vacancies on the United States ज़िला न्यायालयों and 22 additional federal judiciary vacancies कि are anticipated to occur पहले the समाप्त of ओबामा 's second term.
ओबामा रै not made कोई recess नियुक्ति to the संघीय courts.
ओबामा has बना दो nominations to the United States Court of International व्यापार, an आलेख iii tribunal.
ओबामा भी designated sitting न्यायधीश Emily C. हेविट of the संयुक्त राज्य Court of Federal Claims, an Article I court, to be Chief Judge of कि court.
This is a सूची of एयरपोर्ट in मैक्सिको, sorted by location.
मैक्सिको रै परिचय 1,834 एयरपोर्ट, रैंकिंग 2nd in number of airports in उत्तर अमेरिका, and 3rd in the world.
तभी major National और International एयरपोर्ट are दिखाया.
Agency debt also known as an Agency bond is a सुरक्षा, प्रायः a बंध, जारी by a u.S. government-sponsored एजेंसी.
The offerings of these एजेंसियों हैं backed लकिन नहीं guaranteed by the us सरकारी चूंकि the agencies हैं private entities.
कुछ prominent issuers of these प्रतिभूति are छात्र ऋण Marketing संघ ( Sallie mae ), Federal नेशनल बंधक संघ ( fannie mae ) और संघीय घर Loan बंधक Corporation ( फ्रेडी मैक ).
Agency securities are usually exempt from राज्य और लोकल कर, लकिन नहीं संघीय कर.
Agency debt is भी पुकारा an एजेंसी security.
The Susquehanna Steam इलेक्ट्रिक स्टेशन, a boiling water reactor.
The reactors हैं located inside the आयताकार containment इमारतें towards the सामने of the कूलिंग towers.
Three nuclear-powered American warships, ( शीर्ष to bottom ) नाभिकीय cruisers uss Bainbridge and USS Long बीच with uss Enterprise the पहला nuclear-powered वायुयान carrier in 1964.
Crew सदस्यों are spelling आउट Einstein 's mass-energy equivalence formula E = mc2 on the flight deck.
the Russian nuclear-powered icebreaker ns yamal on a 1994 joint expedition साथ the NSF.
Nuclear power is the उपयोग of sustained नाभिकीय परिवर्द्धन to generate heat और विद्युत.
Nuclear शक्ति plants provided परिचय 5.7 % of the संसार 's उर्जा और 13 % of the संसार 's electricity, in 2012.
in 2013, the iaea रपट कि there are 437 operational nuclear power reactors ( हालांकि not सब are producing electricity ), in 31 देशों.
in addition, there हैं लगभग 140 naval बरतन using nuclear propulsion in operation, संचालित by some 180 रिएक्टरों.
वहीँ is an जारी debate परिचय the use of नाभिकीय उर्जा.
Proponents, such as the संसार नाभिकीय संघ, the IAEA and पर्यावरणविद लिये नाभिकीय उर्जा contend कि nuclear power is a चिरस्थायी उर्जा सोर्स कि reduces carbon emissions.
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों, ऐसे as Greenpeace International और NIRS, मानना that नाभिकीय power मुद्राएँ अनेक खतरे to लोगों और the environment.
नाभिकीय power संयंत्र दुर्घटनाओं शामिल the chernobyl विपत्ति ( 1986 ), Fukushima daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति ( 2011 ), और the तीन मील द्वीप accident ( 1979 ).
वहीँ have भी been some nuclear-powered पनडुब्बी mishaps.
Research into safety सुधार is continuing and नाभिकीय संलयन, believed to be safer, may be used in the भविष्य.
as of 2012, according to the IAEA, विश्वव्यापी वहीँ यहूद 68 civil nuclear power रिएक्टरों under construction in 15 देशों.
In the US the पंक्तियां of लगभग हाफ इसके रिएक्टरों have been विस्तारित to 60 सालो, and plans to निर्माण another दर्जन हैं अंतर्गत गंभीर विचार.
However, Japan 's 2011 Fukushima Daiichi nuclear विपत्ति prompted a पुनर्विचार of नाभिकीय उर्जा policy in many countries.
जर्मनी decided to बंद सब its reactors by 2022, and Italy has banned नाभिकीय power.
Following फुकुशिमा, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय उर्जा एजेंसी halved इसके अनुमान of additional nuclear generating capacity to be built by 2035.

The Wall was निर्मित in 1961 to prevent ईस्ट germans इससे fleeing इससे Communism.
It was an iconic प्रतीक of the ठंडा War and इसके पतन in 1989 marked the समाप्त of the युद्ध.
The ठंडा War, often dated इससे 1947 to 1991, was a sustained राज्य of राजनैतिक and military tension between शक्तियां in the Western bloc, वर्चस्व by the United States साथ NATO among its allies, और शक्तियां in the Eastern bloc, वर्चस्व by the सोवियत Union along with the Warsaw अनुबंध.
This began after the कामयाबी of उनके अस्थाई wartime गठबंधन विरूद्ध Nazi Germany, leaving the USSR और the US as two superpowers साथ profound economic and political मतभेद.
A न्यूट्रल गुट arose with the Non-Aligned गति संस्थापित by मिश्र, India, और Yugoslavia ; this गुट rejected association साथ either the US-led West or the Soviet-led ईस्ट.
The Cold युद्ध was so named क्युकी the दो major powers—each possessing nuclear weapons and thereby threatened with mutual assured विनाश —never met in direct military combat.
Instead, in their संघर्ष लिये global influence they engaged in जारी psychological warfare and in regular अप्रत्यक्ष confrontations through proxy wars.
Cycles of सापेक्ष शांत would be followed by high टेंशन, which could have led to world war.
The tensest टाइम्स यहूद दौरान the Berlin Blockade ( 1948–1949 ), the Korean युद्ध ( 1950–1953 ), the स्वेज संकट ( 1956 ), the Berlin संकट of 1961, the Cuban missile संकट ( 1962 ), the Vietnam War ( 1959–1975 ), the Yom kippur War ( 1973 ), the सोवियत युद्ध in अफगानिस्तान ( 1979–1989 ), the सोवियत downing of Korean एयर लाइनों उड़ान 007 ( 1983 ), और the `` Able Archer '' नाटो military exercises ( 1983 ).
The विरोध was expressed through सैन्य coalitions, strategic conventional force deployments, extensive aid to क्लाएंट राज्य, espionage, massive propaganda campaigns, conventional and नाभिकीय arms दौड़, appeals to neutral राष्ट्र, फंसने at sports कार्यक्रम ( in particular the ओलंपिक ), and technological प्रतियोगिताओं ऐसे as the स्पेस Race.
the us and ussr became शामिल in political और सैन्य conflicts in the Third संसार देशों of लैटिन America, Africa, the मध्य East, और Southeast एशिया.
To alleviate the रिस्क of a संभावित नाभिकीय war, both पहलू sought relief of राजनैतिक tensions through détente in the 1970s.
in the 1980s, the United States increased diplomatic, सैन्य, और आर्थिक pressures on the सोवियत Union, at a time जब the कम्युनिस्ट राज्य थी already कष्ट from economic stagnation.
In the mid-1980s, the नई सोवियत अध्यक्ष Mikhail गोर्बाचेव introduced the liberalizing reforms of perestroika ( `` reorganization '', 1987 ) और ग्लास्नोस्त ( `` खुलेपन '', ca. 1985 ).
Pressures लिये national स्वतंत्रता grew stronger in Eastern यूरोपीय, especially कैंडल.
They reached a breaking point when Gorbachev refused to use सोवियत troops to support the faltering सरकारी of ईस्ट जर्मनी in late 1989.
Within सप्ताह सब the satellite states broke फ़्री इससे मास्को in a peaceful wave of revolutions ( वहीँ थी some violence in रोमानिया ).
The pressures escalated अंदर the सोवियत Union, जहाँ Communism fell and the USSR was formally dissolved in late 1991.
The United States remained as the world 's तभी superpower.
The Cold युद्ध और इसके कार्यक्रम have बाएँ a significant legacy, and it is often referred to in popular संस्कृति, विशेषकर in मीडिया featuring themes of espionage and the threat of nuclear warfare.
pikes Peak राज्य पार्क is a राज्य park of आयोवा, यूएसए, featuring a bluff निहार the अपर Mississippi नदी opposite the संगम of the विस्कॉन्सिन नदी.
The park is संचालित by the Iowa Department of Natural संसाधन.
it is nearly a thousand एकड़ ( 4 km2 ) in extent.
the निकटतम नगर is McGregor, Iowa.
Iowa Highway 76 लगभग defines its उत्तरी boundary.
it gets इसके नाम from the Iowa अवतार of pikes Peak, a विशेषकर ऊँची point निहार the gorge of the Upper Mississippi, और like Pikes शिखर in कोलोराडो, is नामित लिये zebulon पाइक.
वहीँ are चढ़ाई trails, campgrounds and rv facilities.
Mountain bikes हैं permitted in निश्चित portions of the park.
aside इससे recreational development, the जमीन in the park was never साफ और to a विशाल extent remains as it थी पहले the advent of white उपनिवेश.
It is part of a larger जटिल of पार्क, reserves और refuges which शामिल Effigy mounds National Monument, the विभिन्न components of the पीला नदी राज्य वन, the विशाल Upper मिसिसिपी River National Wildlife and मछली Refuge and much smaller, much less खूब known Driftless क्षेत्रफल National Wildlife शरण.
the पूर्वोत्तर आयोवा विरासत ट्रेल System is undergoing विकास, and will connect तत्व of these sites.
Zac Brown Band is an American country/folk band आधारित in Atlanta, Georgia.
the lineup consists of Zac भूरा ( सीसे vocals, गिटार ), Jimmy De Martini ( चलाऊ, vocals ), John Driskell हॉपकिंस ( bass गिटार, vocals ), Coy Bowles ( गिटार, keyboards ), क्रिस fryar ( drums ), Clay Cook ( guitar, keyboards, mandolin, steel गिटार, vocals ), और Daniel de los रेयेस ( percussion ).
the बैंड रै toured throughout the United States, सहित a slot on the 2009 and 2010 bonnaroo म्यूज़िक पर्व.
वे have भी अंकित पाँच स्टुडियो एल्बम, and charted nine Number एक singles on the Billboard country चार्ट : `` मुर्गा fried ``, `` Toes ``, `` राजमार्ग 20 सवारी ``, `` Free ``, `` as वो 's चलना Away ``, `` Colder मौसम ``, `` घुटना गहन ``, `` Keep Me in Mind ``, और `` Goodbye in Her आँखें `` in addition to the singles `` Whatever it is `` and `` no Hurry ``, जिससे peaked at क्रमांक 2 on the same चार्ट.
बात रेडियो is a रेडियो format containing discussion परिचय topical issues.
सबसे shows हैं regularly hosted by a सिंगल व्यक्तिगत, and often feature साक्षात्कार with a क्रमांक of different अतिथि.
Talk radio typically शामिल an तत्व of listener भागीदारी, प्रायः by प्रसारण live बातचीत between the मेजबान and listeners who `` कॉल in '' ( प्रायः via telephone ) to the दिखाएँ.
Listener योगदान हैं प्रायः screened by a दिखाएँ 's producer ( s ) in अनुक्रम to अधिकतम audience ब्याज and, in the मामला of वाणिज्यिक बात रेडियो, attract विज्ञापनदाता.
Generally, the shows हैं organized into खण्ड, each separated by a ठहराना for विज्ञापन ; however, in पब्लिक or non-commercial radio, म्यूज़िक is sometimes निभाई in प्लेस of commercials to separate the कार्यक्रम खण्ड.
विसंगतियाँ of बात रेडियो शामिल रूढ़िवादी talk, hot बात, उदार talk और खेल talk.
जबकि talk रेडियो has historically been संबद्ध साथ am/fm, starting around 2005 the technology for internet-based talk-radio shows became cost effective in the form of podcasts.
अभी, it is संभावित लिये an व्यक्तिगत to use a किस्में of सेवाएं to मेजबान an internet-based talk-radio show बगैर carriage by a traditional रेडियो स्टेशन.
in addition TV प्रोग्रामिंग from बात and न्यूज आउटलेट ऐसे as BBC, CNN, Bloomberg और Fox are now often उपलब्धियाँ expanding the world of बात रेडियो further.
Talk radio listening is अभी enjoyed not तभी on radios, लकिन a wide variety of अन्य डिवाइस और services including pcs using itunes, स्टेशन निर्देशिका such as Tunein, दिखाएँ निर्देशिका smartphones with ऐप्स such as stitcher.
hippa is a genus of decapod crustaceans in the family Hippidae, containing the following species:
Hippa adactyla Fabricius, 1787
Hippa admirabilis ( thallwitz, 1892 )
Hippa alcimede ( De Man, 1902 )
hippa australis Hale, 1927
hippa carcineutes Holthuis & Manning, 1970
hippa celaeno ( de man, 1896 )
hippa granulatus ( borradaile, 1904 )
hippa hirtipes ( Dana, 1852 )
Hippa indica haig, मुरुगन & बालकृष्णन नायर, 1986
hippa marmorata ( Hombron & Jacquinot, 1846 )
Hippa ovalis ( A. Milne-Edwards, 1862 )
Hippa picta ( heller, 1861 )
Hippa strigillata ( stimpson, 1860 )
Hippa testudinaria ( Herbst, 1791 )
hippa truncatifrons ( miers, 1878 )
It is closely related to the genus emerita, और species have प्रायः been transferred between the दो genera.
जकार्ता ( ), officially ज्ञात as the खास Capital प्रदेश of जकार्ता ( ), is the पूंजी और largest city of इंडोनेशिया.
स्तिथ on the northwest coast of Java, जकार्ता is the देश 's आर्थिक, सांस्कृतिक और राजनैतिक केन्द्र, और साथ a population of 10,187,595 as of November 2011, it is the most populous city in Indonesia and in Southeast एशिया, और is the thirteenth सबसे populated नगर in the world.
the आधिकारिक महानगर क्षेत्रफल, known as jabodetabek ( a नाम formed by combining the आरंभिक syllables of Jakarta, Bogor, Depok, Tangerang और bekasi ), is the दूसरी largest in the संसार, yet the metropolis 's उपनगरों स्टिल continue परे it.
जकार्ता is सूचीबद्ध as a वैश्विक city in the 2008 Globalization और संसार शहरों Study समूह and संजाल ( GaWC ) शोध.
और has an क्षेत्रफल of.
This area has population of खूब over 28 million, बनाना it one of the world 's largest conurbations in शर्तें of क्रमांक of inhabitants.
In 2011, Jakarta क्रमित 17th among the world 's 200 largest cities, a जम्प from इसके 2007 ranking of 171.
जकार्ता has grown अधिक rapidly than kuala lumpur, बीजिंग and Bangkok.
Established in the चौथी सदी, the city became an important trading port for the किंगडम of sunda.
It थी the de facto capital of the डच East इंडीज ( when it थी ज्ञात as batavia ) और रै जारी as the पूंजी of Indonesia चूंकि the देश 's independence was declared in 1945.
The नगर is the सीट of the आसियान Secretariat.
Jakarta is परोसा by the soekarno–hatta अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport, Halim perdanakusuma International Airport, and Tanjung Priok Harbour ; it is connected by अनेक intercity and commuter railways, and served by several बस लाइनों कार्यशील on सुरक्षित busways.
A typical home एयर conditioning खिड़की unit.
Air conditioning is the process of altering the गुण of air ( primarily तापमान and आर्द्रता ) to more favourable conditions.
More generally, एयर conditioning can refer to कोई रूप of technological cooling, heating, वेंटिलेशन, or कीटाणुशोधन that modifies the condition of air.
an एयर कंडीशनर ( प्रायः referred to as air con, AC or A/C, और नहीं to be confused with the संक्षिप्त for प्रत्यावर्ती वर्तमान ) is a प्रमुख or home appliance, प्रणाली, or mechanism designed to change the एयर तापमान और humidity भीतर an क्षेत्रफल ( used लिये cooling and sometimes हीटिंग depending on the air गुण at a given समय ).
The cooling is typically किया using a simple प्रशीतन cycle, but sometimes evaporation is प्रयुक्त, commonly for comfort cooling in buildings and motor vehicles.
In निर्माण, a पूरा प्रणाली of heating, वेंटिलेशन and एयर कंडीशनिंग is referred to as `` HVAC ``.

dc Talk ( styled as dc Talk ), is a Grammy -winning Christian rap trio.
the group थी formed in Lynchburg, Virginia in 1987 by टोबी McKeehan, Michael tait, और केविन Max Smith.
वे have released पाँच major studio albums together : DC बात ( 1989 ), Nu Thang ( 1990 ), फ़्री at पिछला ( 1992 ), Jesus freak ( 1995 ), and Supernatural ( 1998 ).
In 2002, the Encyclopedia of समकालीन Christian Music पुकारा dc बात `` the सबसे popular overtly ईसाई अधिनियम of सब time. ''
In 2000, the group released an ep titled सोलो जिससे contained दो solo songs from each member.
चूंकि कि समय, dc Talk has महरूम on an indefinite hiatus, and the three band members have प्रत्येक led सोलो careers.
They have performed and recorded individual songs साथ several टाइम्स दौरान the 2000s, although the समूह never officially reunited or disbanded.
the group 's musical style evolved significantly throughout उनके career.
उनके first दो releases, DC Talk और Nu थांग, यहूद of the हिप hop genre.
dc बात 's third एल्बम, Free at पिछला, also mainly took influence इससे the hip हॉप style, हालांकि उनके म्यूज़िक began taking on a rock sound.
The तिकड़ी 's last two albums, Jesus Freak और अलौकिक, यहूद predominantly pop चट्टान.
The Bible is a संकलन of many shorter books written at different times and बाद समवेत into the biblical canon.
All लकिन the shortest of ये books have महरूम विभाजित into chapters, generally a page or so in length, चूंकि the early 13th century.
Since the mid-16th सदी, each chapter has been further divided into `` आयतें '' of a few short लाइनों or sentences.
Sometimes a sentence spans अधिक than one श्लोक, as in the case of, and sometimes there is अधिक than एक sentence in a सिंगल श्लोक, as in the case of.
As the अध्याय और verse divisions यहूद not भाग of the original ग्रन्थ, वे form part of the paratext of the Bible.
the Jewish divisions of the Hebrew text differ at various अंक from those used by Christians.
लिये उदाहरण, in यहूदी tradition, the ascriptions to many Psalms हैं regarded as independent आयतें, making 116 more आयतें, whereas the established Christian अभ्यास is to count और number each psalm ascription together साथ the first verse following it.
Some chapter divisions also occur in अलग स्थान, e.g. in यहूदी Bibles is गिने as in ईसाई अनुवाद.
An index ( बहुवचन : indexes ) is a सूची of words or phrases ( 'headings ' ) and संबद्ध pointers ( 'locators ' ) to where उपयोगी सामग्री relating to that heading can be मिला in a दस्तावेज़.
in a परंपरागत back-of-the-book अनुक्रमणिका the headings होगा शामिल names of people, places and कार्यक्रम, and अवधारणाओं selected by a person as होने relevant और of ब्याज to a possible reader of the book.
The pointers हैं typically page numbers, paragraph संख्याएँ or खण्ड numbers.
in a library कैटलॉग the शब्द हैं authors, titles, subject headings, etc., and the संकेतक हैं कॉल संख्याएँ.
Internet search engines, such as Google, and पूरा टेक्स्ट searching help provide access to सूचना लकिन are नहीं as selective as an index, as they provide non-relevant links, और may miss relevant information if it is not phrased in exactly the way वे expect.
in United States financial regulation, a suspicious कार्यकलाप रपट ( or sar ) is a report बना by a financial संस्था to the Financial Crimes Enforcement संजाल ( FinCEN ), an agency of the संयुक्त States विभाग of the राजकोष, regarding संदिग्ध or potentially संदिग्ध activity.

फेसबुक is an online social नेटवर्किंग सेवा, जिनकी name stems इससे the colloquial name लिये the किताब दिए to विद्यार्थी at the start of the अकादमिक साल by some विश्वविद्यालयों administrations in the संयुक्त राज्य to सहायता students मिलेंगी to जान each other.
It थी founded in February 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg with his college roommates और fellow हार्वर्ड University students Eduardo saverin, Andrew McCollum, डस्टिन Moskovitz और Chris ह्यूजेस.
The website 's membership थी initially सीमित by the संस्थापकों to हार्वर्ड विद्यार्थी, but थी expanded to अन्य कॉलेजों in the Boston area, the Ivy लीग, और स्टैनफोर्ड University.
it gradually added support for students at विभिन्न other विश्वविद्यालयों before opening to high स्कूल students, और eventually to anyone aged 13 और over.
फेसबुक अभी allows कोई उपयोक्ता जो घोषित themselves to be at least 13 सालो old to become registered उपयोक्ता of the site.
Users जरूर register पहले using the site, बाद जिससे वे may create a निजी प्रोफ़ाइल, add other users as मित्रों, and exchange messages, सहित स्वचालित notifications जब they अद्यतन their profile.
additionally, users may join common-interest user groups, organized by कार्यस्थल, school or कॉलेज, or other characteristics, और categorize उनके मित्रों into lists ऐसे as `` People From कार्य '' or `` बंद मित्रों ''.
As of सितंबर 2012, Facebook रै over one billion active उपयोक्ता.
According to a May 2011 Consumer रिपोर्ट्स सर्वेक्षण, there हैं 7.5 लाख children under 13 with खाते और 5 लाख under 10, violating the साईट 's terms of सेवा.
in May 2005, Accel साझेदार invested $ 12.7 million in Facebook, और जिम breyer added $ 1 million of his अपना धन to the घट.
A जनवरी 2009 Compete.com study ranked Facebook as the most used सोशल नेटवर्किंग service by worldwide monthly क्रियाशील users.
Entertainment साप्ताहिक शामिल the site on इसके end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list, saying, `` कैसा on earth किया we stalk our exes, remember our co-workers ' birthdays, कीड़ा our मित्रों, and खेल a rousing खेल of scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
आलोचकों, such as Facebook detox, state कि फेसबुक रै turned into a national obsession in the संयुक्त राज्य, resulting in विशाल amounts of time खोया और encouraging narcissism.
quantcast estimates फेसबुक has 138.9 लाख मासिक अद्वितीय u.S. विज़िटर in may 2011.
according to Social Media आज, in April 2010 an estimated 41.6 % ( 129.5 लाख ) of the U.S. population had a Facebook खाता.
Nevertheless, फेसबुक 's मार्केट growth started to स्टाल in some regions, with the site losing 7 million क्रियाशील उपयोक्ता in the संयुक्त States और कनाडा in May 2011.
Facebook आखिरकार दायर for an initial पब्लिक offering on February 1, 2012, and was headquartered in Menlo पार्क, California.
Facebook inc. began selling भण्डार to the पब्लिक और trading on the नैस्डैक on may 18, 2012.
सल्फोनेमाइड functional समूह
hydrochlorothiazide is a सल्फोनेमाइड और a thiazide.
furosemide is a सल्फोनेमाइड, but not a thiazide.
सल्फोनेमाइड or sulphonamide is the आधार of अनेक समूह of drugs.
The असली जीवाणुरोधी sulfonamides ( sometimes पुकारा sulfa drugs or sulpha drugs ) are synthetic रोगाणुरोधी agents that contain the sulfonamide समूह.
Some sulfonamides are भी devoid of जीवाणुरोधी activity, e.g., the anticonvulsant sultiame.
The sulfonylureas और thiazide diuretics हैं newer ड्रग groups आधारित on the जीवाणुरोधी sulfonamides.
Sulfa allergies हैं आम, hence medications containing sulfonamides are prescribed carefully.
it is महत्वपूर्ण to make a भेद between sulfa drugs और अन्य sulfur-containing दवाएँ and एडिटिव, such as sulfates और sulfites, which are chemically unrelated to the सल्फोनेमाइड group, and do नहीं cause the same hypersensitivity प्रतिक्रियाएँ seen in the sulfonamides.

30 Seconds to Mars is an American rock बैंड from Los Angeles, formed in 1998.
Since 2007, the band has consisted of actor jared Leto ( सीसे vocals, rhythm गिटार, songwriter ), Shannon leto ( ड्रम, percussion ) और tomo miličević ( lead guitar, keyboards ).
Following the प्रस्थान of Matt Wachter ( अभी of फ़रिश्ते & airwaves ) in 2007, Tim kelleher became the bassist for the समूह, performing सजीव तभी साथ both Jared and Miličević रिकॉर्डिंग bass for स्टुडियो recordings, while Braxton Olita ( keyboards ) थी added to the touring लाइनअप in 2009.
previously, the group also featured guitarists solon bixler ( अभी of ग्रेट Northern ) and केविन Drake ( अभी of Polaroid चुंबन ).
To date, 30 सेकेंड to Mars have released three स्टुडियो एल्बम – 30 सेकेंड to Mars ( 2002 ), A खूबसूरत झूठ ( 2005 ), This is युद्ध ( 2009 ) and तीन विस्तारित plays – AOL Sessions Undercover ( 2007 ), to the किनारे of the Earth ( 2008 ), और एमटीवी Unplugged : 30 Seconds to मंगल ( 2011 ).
30 सेकेंड to मंगल ' म्यूज़िक रै महरूम associated mostly with neo-prog, progressive मेटल और post-grunge, but they have भी included भावनाएं, screamo, space rock and synthrock into उनके म्यूज़िक.
They have been compared to Pink Floyd ( who यहूद an influence on उनके कार्य ) and औजार because of their use of philosophical और spiritual गीत, अवधारणा albums और उनके उपयोग of experimental म्यूज़िक.
A क्रिसमस Story is a 1983 American Christmas कॉमेडी फिल्मी based on the छोटी कहानियां और semi-fictional anecdotes of author और raconteur Jean Shepherd, based on उसके book in God we Trust, सब अन्य Pay Cash, with कुछ तत्व निकला from वांडा हिक्की 's Night of सुनहरी Memories.
it थी निर्देशित by bob क्लार्क.
the film रै चूंकि become a holiday classic and is दिखाया numerous टाइम्स on television दौरान the Christmas ऋतु on the संजाल tbs, प्रायः in a 24-hour marathon.
In 2012, the फिल्मी थी चयनित for preservation in the नेशनल फिल्मी रजिस्ट्री by the पुस्तकालयों of Congress for being `` culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant ''.
a जो 's केकड़ा shack branch in सैन डिएगो, CA.

Joe 's केकड़ा shack is an American कड़ी of beach-themed seafood casual dining restaurants owned by ignite रेस्तरां Group.
Founded in ह्यूस्टन, टेक्सास, the रेस्तरां अभी operates स्थितियाँ सब आरपार the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका.
It serves seafood और अमरीकी cuisine.
the रेस्तरां also have a तोहफा दूकान that sells facetious t-shirts featuring phrases advertising Joe 's seafood choices.

नई York City Cruise लाइनर टर्मिनल in नरक 's रसोईघर at 52nd Street.
The नई York यात्री जलयान Terminal ( भी known as the Luxury लाइनर Row or मैनहटन Cruise Terminal or नई यॉर्क Cruise टर्मिनल ) is a टर्मिनल लिये ocean-going passenger ships on मैनहटन 's वेस्ट पक्ष.
the टर्मिनल consists of North नदी Piers 88, 90, 92 and 94 on the हडसन River between West 46th and वेस्ट 54th गली.
( as a सामान्य नियम, pier संख्याएँ in मैनहटन can be determined by adding 40 to the सम्बन्धित cross-street. )
जहाजों now dock at पियर 88, 90 और 92.
बांध 94 on the उत्तर पक्ष is now used लिये प्रदर्शनी स्पेस.
Pier 86, once used by United States Lines, is अभी home to the USS Intrepid.
in 2003, the terminal संभाला 900,000 passengers.
The नगर is forecasting कि 1.5 लाख होगा use the टर्मिनल by 2017.
The piers are long और अलावा.
वे were first completed in 1935 to replace the Chelsea पियर as the नगर 's luxury liner टर्मिनल.
the नई टर्मिनल was built to handle bigger जहाजों that था outgrown the चेल्सी पियर.
The piers were संवर in 1970 और हैं currently undergoing another $ 150 लाख नवीकरण.
the संवर plans call for it to handle तीन large जहाजों at a time.
in doing renovations, the नगर is also considering decommissioning Pier 92.
लोगो of the नई यॉर्क क्रूज terminal.for
decades the terminal थी the तभी ocean-going passenger टर्मिनल in नई यॉर्क harbor.
With an upsurge in क्रूज जलयान traffic और the टर्मिनल 's ability to हैंडल comfortably तभी three large ships at a समय, दो new terminals have opened in the हार्बर — the Cape Liberty Cruise Port opened in 2004 in bayonne, नई जर्सी ( प्रयुक्त by Royal caribbean क्रूज लकीर, Celebrity क्रूज़ और azamara क्रूज़ ), और the Brooklyn Cruise Terminal ( प्रयुक्त by the महारानी Mary 2 and अन्य जहाजों of the Carnival निगम cruise brands ) opened in 2006 in ब्रुकलीन, नई York.
The West पक्ष राजमार्ग takes a छोटी jog east इससे the पियर to नीचे West 42nd गली because जब the terminal थी निर्मित जमीन had to be taken away इससे Manhattan to allow for longer piers.
the us फौज corps of इंजीनियर्स, who control the waterfront आयाम, होता not extend the pierhead line दूर into the river, so the city extended the pier by cutting दूर at the land.
The city पहले did इस लिये the Chelsea पियर ; however in चेल्सी only लैंडफिल थी लिया away.
At the Passenger Terminal actual Manhattan schist was लिया दूर.
From डाउनस्ट्रीम in the river

Norwegian क्रूज लकीर 's जल्द to be नवीनतम जलयान the Norwegian breakaway होगा sail year-round out of the New यॉर्क यात्री Ship Terminal.
The नगर होगा खर्च $ 4 million to renovate and upgrade the क्रूज terminal to accommodate the ship.

ईसाई सही is a पद प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त राज्य to describe right-wing ईसाई political समूह that are characterized by their strong support of socially conservative नीतियों.
ईसाई conservatives principally seek to लागू उनके understanding of the शिक्षाओं of Christianity to राजनीती and पब्लिक policy by proclaiming the मान of those teachings and/or by seeking to use those teachings to influence law and पब्लिक policy.
in the u.S., the Christian सही is an informal coalition formed around a core of धर्मान्तरण protestants that draws `` support इससे नीतियां conservative Catholics, Jews, mormons, और occasionally secularists '' जो share their goals.
the movement रै its जड़ें in अमरीकी politics going वापस as दूर the 1940s and has महरूम विशेषकर influential चूंकि the 1970s.
उनके influence draws, in part, इससे grassroots सक्रियता as खूब as उनके फ़ोकस on social मुद्दे और ability to motivate the electorate around those मुद्दे.
The Christian सही is notable आज लिये advancing socially रूढ़िवादी स्थितियाँ on issues सहित स्कूल prayer, स्टेम cell शोध, समलैंगिकता, contraception, गर्भपात, and pornography.
Although the Christian right is प्रायः संबद्ध साथ the u.S., the movement has been a key factor in the राजनीती of कनाडा, The नीदरलैंड्स, उत्तरी आयरलैंड और Australia, among others.
दूर East गति ( stylized as Far★East Movement or abbreviated FM ) is an American hip हॉप band quartet based in Los एंजिल्स.
the समूह formed in 2003 and consists of Kev nish ( Kevin Nishimura ), Prohgress ( जेम्स Roh ), j-splif ( Jae Choung ), and DJ Virman ( virman Coquia ).
Far ईस्ट Movement 's पहला अर्जी to कीर्ति was their सोंग `` गोलाकार गोलाकार '' प्रदर्शित in the हॉलीवुड movie, the Fast and the Furious : Tokyo Drift, and its subsequent soundtrack, वीडियो game और dvd.
चूंकि `` गोलाकार Round '', the group has महरूम featured on विभिन्न network shows including,, अनुगामी, गपशप Girl, and Finishing the खेल ( a प्रदर्शित फिल्मी at sundance 2007 ).
Their सिंगल `` जैसे a g6 `` hit क्रमांक one on the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 चार्ट and on iTunes as खूब in लेट October 2010.
Far East Movement भी रै the distinction of being the first asian-american group to earn a # 1 hit on the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 in the United States.
lr44 is the आईईसी नामांकन for an alkaline 1.5 वोल्ट button कोशिका, commonly प्रयुक्त in छोटी LED flashlights, डिजिटल thermometers, calculators, calipers, watches, घड़ियाँ, toys and लेज़र pointers.
lr44 alkaline कोशिका
the बैटरी nomenclature is defined by the International विद्युततकनीकी आयोग ( IEC ) in its 60086-3 मानक ( Primary बैटरी, part 3 देखें बैटरी ).
The अक्षर L indicates the electrochemical system used ; a जस्ता ऋणात्मक electrode, manganese डाइऑक्साइड depolarizer और positive electrode, और an क्षारीय electrolyte.
R44 indicates a गोलाकार cell 11.4±0.2 mm व्यास and 5.2±0.2 mm ऊँचाई as defined by the आईईसी standard 60086.
Manufacturers have उनके अपना part numbers लिये IEC type lr44 batteries including:
LR44, lr44g, lr44gd, LR44H
lr1154, L1154, L1154C, L1154F, l1154g, l1154h
6135-99-792-8475 ( nsn )
1166A
ag13, A613, ag14, ag-14, G13A, g13-a
157, 303, 357
a76, GDA76, GP76A, GPA7, gpa75, gpa76, gps76A,
1128MP, 208-904, A-76, ca18, CA19, CR44, D76A, KA, ka76, ms76h, px76a, PX675A, RPX675, RW82, SB-F9, v13ga
4.5-volt, D, c, aa, aaa, aaaa, A23, 9-volt, CR2032 और LR44 batteries
अन्य प्रकार of batteries are or यहूद made in the R44 आकार.
formerly, पारा batteries यहूद made as बटन कोशिकाएं ( types MR44 और nr44 ).
zinc-air बैटरी type pr44 require एयर to work.
silver-oxide batteries प्रकार sr44 may provide extra capacity compared to lr44 types लकिन have slightly different वोल्टेज विशेषताएँ.
प्रदर्शन of a device meant to use a silver-oxide battery may be degraded with substitution of LR44 प्रकार.
