hurricane Katrina was the deadliest और most destructive Atlantic hurricane of the 2005 अटलांटिक hurricane season.
it was the costliest प्राकृतिक disaster, as खूब as एक of the पाँच deadliest hurricanes, in the history of the संयुक्त राज्य.
among recorded अटलांटिक hurricanes, it थी the sixth strongest overall.
at तनिक 1,833 लोगों died in the hurricane और subsequent floods, बनाना it the deadliest u.S. hurricane since the 1928 okeechobee hurricane ; total प्रॉपर्टी क्षति थी estimated at $ 81 billion ( 2005 usd ), nearly ट्रिपल the damage brought by Hurricane एंड्रयू in 1992.
hurricane कैटरीना formed over the Bahamas on August 23, 2005 and crossed दक्षिणी फ्लोरिडा as a मॉडरेट Category 1 hurricane, causing कुछ deaths and बाढ़ there before strengthening rapidly in the Gulf of मैक्सिको.
the hurricane strengthened to a Category 5 hurricane over the गरम Gulf water, but weakened before making इसके दूसरी landfall as a Category 3 hurricane on the morning of सोमवार, अगस्त 29 in southeast Louisiana.
it caused severe विनाश साथ the गल्फ coast इससे central फ्लोरिडा to Texas, much of it due to the तूफ़ान surge.
the सबसे significant number of मौतों occurred in नई Orleans, louisiana, जिससे flooded as the तटबन्ध system catastrophically विफल, in many cases hours after the storm था moved अंतर्देशीय.
आखिरकार 80 % of the city and large tracts of neighboring parishes became flooded, and the floodwaters lingered लिये सप्ताह.
however, the worst property क्षति occurred in coastal क्षेत्रों, such as all मिसिसिपी beachfront कस्बों, which were flooded over 90 % in hours, as boats और casino barges rammed इमारतें, pushing गाड़ियाँ and घरों inland, with waters reaching 6–12 मील ( 10–19 km ) from the beach.
the hurricane surge सुरक्षा failures in नई Orleans हैं माना the worst सिविल engineering विपत्ति in u.S. history and prompted a मुकदमा विरूद्ध the u.S. Army corps of Engineers ( USACE ), the designers और बिल्डर of the levee system as mandated by the Flood कंट्रोल अधिनियम of 1965.
Responsibility for the failures and बाढ़ थी रखी squarely on the Army Corps in January 2008 by न्यायधीश stanwood Duval, U.S. District Court, but the federal agency could नहीं be आयोजित financially liable due to sovereign immunity in the Flood कंट्रोल Act of 1928.
There थी भी an investigation of the responses from federal, state and लोकल सरकारें, resulting in the resignation of संघीय Emergency प्रबन्धन Agency ( FEMA ) director Michael D. भूरा, और of New Orleans पुलिस Department ( NOPD ) अधीक्षक एडी कम्पास.
Several एजेंसियों सहित the संयुक्त States coast Guard ( uscg ), नेशनल Hurricane बीच ( nhc ), and नेशनल Weather Service ( nws ) यहूद commended for उनके क्रियाएँ.
They provided accurate hurricane weather tracking forecasts with sufficient सीसे time.
भी the सबसे insistent appeals from नेशनल, राज्य और local पब्लिक officials to निवासियों to evacuate before the तूफ़ान किया not warn that the levees could breach and fail.
U.S. कर्ज़ from 1940 to 2011.
रेड lines indicate the `` कर्ज़ आयोजित by the पब्लिक '' और ब्लैक लाइनों indicate the कुल नेशनल कर्ज़ or gross public debt.
the अंतर is the `` intragovernmental debt, '' जिससे includes दायित्वों to government programs such as Social Security.
Stated as a सूत्र, National कर्ज़ = Debt आयोजित by the Public + Intragovernmental Debt.
the second panel shows the दो कर्ज़ आंकड़े as a percentage of U.S. GDP ( dollar value of U.S. आर्थिक production for कि साल ).
The शीर्ष फलक is deflated so प्रत्येक साल is in 2010 dollars.
the संयुक्त States पब्लिक debt is the धन borrowed by the federal सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य through the issuing of securities by the Treasury and other federal सरकारी एजेंसियों.
US पब्लिक debt consists of दो घटकs:
Debt held by the पब्लिक शामिल Treasury securities आयोजित by निवेशकों outside the संघीय government, सहित कि held by individuals, corporations, the Federal Reserve प्रणाली and foreign, state and local सरकारें.
Debt आयोजित by सरकारी accounts or intragovernmental debt शामिल non-marketable राजकोष securities held in खाते administered by the संघीय सरकारी कि are owed to program beneficiaries, ऐसे as the Social Security विश्वास Fund.
Debt held by government accounts represents the संचयी surpluses, सहित ब्याज आय, of ये खाते that have महरूम invested in राजकोष securities.
Public कर्ज़ increases or decreases as a परिणाम of the annual एकीकृत बजट deficit or surplus.
The संघीय सरकारी budget deficit or surplus is the difference between government receipts and बिता, ignoring intra-governmental transfers.
however, कुछ spending that is excluded from the deficit ( supplemental appropriations ) also adds to the debt.
historically, the US पब्लिक debt as a share of जीडीपी increased दौरान wars और recessions, और subsequently declined.
लिये उदाहरण, कर्ज़ held by the पब्लिक as a share of GDP peaked just बाद संसार युद्ध II ( 113 % of जीडीपी in 1945 ), लकिन तब fell over the following 30 years.
In recent decades, however, विशाल बजट deficits और the resulting increases in कर्ज़ have led to concern परिचय the long-term sustainability of the संघीय government 's fiscal policies.
On 2 अप्रैल 2013, कर्ज़ held by the पब्लिक थी लगभग $ 11.959 trillion or about 75 % of जीडीपी.
intragovernmental holdings stood at $ 4.846 trillion, giving a संयुक्त कुल public कर्ज़ of $ 16.805 trillion.
As of January 2013, $ 5.6 trillion or लगभग 47 % of the कर्ज़ held by the public was owned by विदेशी investors, the largest of which were the लोगों 's Republic of China और Japan at बस over $ 1.1 trillion each.
in बास्केट, an assist is attributed to a player जो गुजरता the बॉल to a teammate in a way कि leads to a score by फ़ील्ड goal, अर्थ that he or she थी `` assisting '' in the basket.
वहीँ is some judgment शामिल in deciding whether a passer चाहिए be credited साथ an assist.
An assist can be scored for the passer even if the खिलाड़ी जो receives the pass makes a बास्केट after ड्रिब्लिंग the बॉल.
however, the असली definition of an assist किया नहीं शामिल ऐसे situations, so the तुलना of assist आंकडे across eras is a complex matter.
Only the pass directly before the स्कोर may be गिने as an assist, so no more than एक assist can be अंकित per फ़ील्ड लक्ष्य ( unlike in other खेल, ऐसे as बर्फ hockey ).
A pass कि लीड to a शूटिंग बेईमानी and scoring by free throws करता नहीं count as an assist in the एनबीए, but करता in fiba खेल ( only एक assist is awarded प्रति नियत of फ़्री throws in जिससे at least एक free throw is made ).
Point guards tend to get the सबसे assists प्रति game ( apg ), as their भूमिका is primarily कि of a passer और ballhandler.
Centers tend to मिलेंगी कम assists, but centers साथ शुभ floor presence और अदालत दृष्टि can dominate a team by assisting.
होने अंदर the कुंजी, the center प्रायः रै the बेहतरीन कोण and the बेहतरीन स्थिति लिये `` बर्तन '' and other छोटी passes in the स्कोरिंग क्षेत्रफल.
Center Wilt चेम्बरलेन led the NBA in assists in 1968.
a strong center साथ inside-scoring prowess, such as पूर्व NBA बीच Hakeem olajuwon, can भी be an प्रभावी assistor क्युकी the defense 's double-teaming tends to खोलें up offense in the form of निशानेबाज.
The NBA single-game assist record is 30, आयोजित by स्कॉट Skiles of the Orlando जादू against the Denver टेंडर्स, on दिसम्बर 30, 1990.
the NBA record for सबसे career assists is held by John Stockton with 15,806.
the mill or mille ( ) ( sometimes mil in the UK, जब discussing प्रॉपर्टी taxes in the संयुक्त States, or previously in Cyprus और माल्टा ) is a now-abstract ईकाई of currency प्रयुक्त sometimes in accounting.
in the United राज्य, it is a notional ईकाई समतुल्य to of a संयुक्त States dollar ( a दसवाँ of a cent ).
in the United किंगडम it was प्रस्तावित during the दशकों of discussion on the decimalization of the pound as a प्रभाग of the pound sterling.
Several अन्य currencies used the mill, such as the maltese lira.
the term आता इससे the लैटिन `` millesimum '', अर्थ `` thousandth part ''.
The Greco-Persian Wars ( also often called the पारसी Wars ) यहूद a series of विरोध between the Achaemenid Empire of Persia और city-states of the Hellenic world that started in 499 bc और lasted until 449 BC.
the collision between the fractious राजनैतिक world of the यूनानियों और the enormous साम्राज्य of the Persians began when सायरस the ग्रेट conquered ionia in 547 bc.
Struggling to नियम the independent-minded cities of Ionia, the फारसियों नियुक्त tyrants to नियम प्रत्येक of them.
This would prove to be the सोर्स of much trouble for the Greeks और फारसियों alike.
In 499 bc, the तब tyrant of Miletus, Aristagoras, embarked on an expedition to conquer the द्वीप of naxos, साथ पारसी support ; however, the expedition was a debacle and, pre-empting उसके dismissal, aristagoras incited सब of हैलेनिक एशिया Minor into विद्रोह against the फारसियों.
This was the beginning of the आयोनियन Revolt, which होता पिछला जबतक 493 bc, progressively drawing अधिक regions of एशिया नाबालिग into the conflict.
aristagoras secured military support from एथेंस and Eretria, और in 498 BC these forces helped to capture और burn the Persian regional पूंजी of Sardis.
The Persian किंग Darius the ग्रेट vowed to have revenge on एथेंस and eretria for इस act.
The revolt जारी, with the two sides effectively stalemated throughout 497–495 BC.
in 494 bc, the Persians regrouped, और attacked the epicentre of the विद्रोह in Miletus.
at the बैटल of Lade, the ionians suffered a निर्णायक defeat, and the rebellion collapsed, साथ the फाइनल members being stamped आउट the following साल.
seeking to secure his साम्राज्य from further revolts and from the हस्तक्षेप of the mainland यूनानियों, दारा embarked on a scheme to conquer यूनानियों and to punish Athens and eretria लिये burning sardis.
the पहला Persian invasion of यूनानियों began in 492 BC, साथ the Persian general Mardonius conquering Thrace and macedon before अनेक mishaps मजबूर an early समाप्त to the अभियान.
in 490 bc a दूसरी फ़ोर्स was भेजा to Greece, this समय across the ईजियन समुद्र, under the कमांड of Datis और Artaphernes.
इस expedition subjugated the Cyclades, पहले besieging, capturing और razing Eretria.
however, जबकि en route to आक्रमण एथेंस, the Persian force was decisively defeated by the Athenians at the बैटल of Marathon, समाप्ति पारसी प्रयत्न लिये the समय होने.
Darius तब began to plan to पूरा the conquest of Greece, but died in 486 BC और responsibility for the conquest passed to his son xerxes I.
In 480 BC, xerxes personally led the second Persian invasion of यूनानियों with एक of the largest ancient armies ever समवेत.
Victory over the 'Allied ' Greek राज्य ( led by Sparta and Athens ) at the Battle of thermopylae allowed the फारसियों to torch एथेंस और overrun most of Greece.
However, while seeking to destroy the संयुक्त यूनानी बेड़े, the फारसियों suffered a कठोर शिकस्त at the Battle of salamis.
the following year, the confederated यूनानियों went on the अप्रिय, defeating the पारसी फौज at the बैटल of Plataea, and ending the invasion of यूनानियों.
the अलाइड Greeks followed up उनके कामयाबी by destroying the rest of the पारसी fleet at the बैटल of Mycale, पहले expelling Persian garrisons from Sestos ( 479 bc ) और byzantium ( 478 bc ).
The क्रियाएँ of the general pausanias at the घेरा of Byzantium alienated अनेक of the यूनानी states इससे the spartans, and the anti-Persian गठबंधन थी therefore reconstituted around athenian नेतृत्व, as the so-called delian League.
The delian लीग continued to अभियान against फारस for the next तीन decades, शुरूआत साथ the expulsion of the बाकी Persian garrisons इससे यूरोपीय.
At the Battle of the Eurymedon in 466 bc, the लीग जीती a दोगुना victory कि आखिरकार secured freedom for the cities of Ionia.
However, the लीग 's भागीदारी in an Egyptian revolt ( from 460–454 BC ) resulted in a विनाशकारी defeat, and further campaigning थी suspended.
A fleet was भेजा to Cyprus in 451 bc, लकिन हासिल little, and जब it withdrew the Greco-Persian युद्धों drew to a quiet समाप्त.
कुछ ऐतिहासिक स्त्रोत suggest the समाप्त of hostilities was marked by a सलाम treaty between एथेंस और Persia, the so-called सलाम of callias.
hooverville near पोर्टलैंड, Oregon
A `` hooverville '' is the popular नाम for shanty towns built by बेघर लोगों during the Great Depression.
They यहूद named बाद हर्बर्ट हूवर, जो थी अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States during the onset of the अवसाद and widely blamed लिये it.
the पद was coined by Charles Michelson, publicity chief of the लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल Committee.
मैथ्यू माइकल Hasselbeck ( born September 25, 1975 ) is an American football क्वार्टरबैक लिये the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल League ( एनएफएल ).
He थी drafted in the sixth round of the 1998 एनएफएल Draft by the Green खाड़ी Packers.
After a ऋतु on the practice स्क्वाड और दो seasons backing up ब्रेट favre, he थी traded to the सिएटल Seahawks in 2001.
Hasselbeck gained the starting भूमिका in 2003, and led Seattle to छह playoff appearances and a Super Bowl appearance ; he was selected to three प्रो प्याले and an All-Pro selection.
Following ten seasons साथ the Seahawks, hasselbeck joined the Tennessee टाइटन्स in 2011.
hasselbeck तब हस्ताक्षरित a contract साथ the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस in 2013 less than 24 hours बाद being released by the टेनेसी टाइटन्स.
आईसीटी is inevitably related to the computer network.
Information और संचार प्रौद्योगिकी or ( ICT ), is often प्रयुक्त as an विस्तारित synonym for सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी ( IT ), but is a more विशिष्ट term that तनावों the भूमिका of unified संचार और the integration of telecommunications ( telephone lines and बेतार signals ), computers as well as necessary enterprise software, middleware, storage, और audio-visual प्रणालियों, which enable users to access, स्टोर, transmit, and हेरफेर सूचना.
the phrase आईसीटी था महरूम used by अकादमिक शोधकर्ताओं चूंकि the 1980s, लकिन it became popular after it थी used in a रपट to the UK government by Dennis Stevenson in 1997 and in the संशोधित नेशनल Curriculum for England, वेल्स और उत्तरी Ireland in 2000.
the पद ICT is अभी also प्रयुक्त to refer to the convergence of audio-visual और टेलीफोन networks with computer networks through a single cabling or link प्रणाली.
There हैं विशाल आर्थिक incentives ( विशाल लागत savings due to विलोपन of the टेलीफोन संजाल ) to विलय the audio-visual, building प्रबन्धन और टेलीफोन network with the computer network प्रणाली using a single unified system of cabling, सिग्नल distribution और management.
the पद Infocommunications is प्रयुक्त in some cases as a shorter रूप of information और communication ( s ) technology.
In फैक्ट infocommunications is the expansion of दूरसंचार साथ information प्रसंस्करण and content हैंडलिंग functions on a common डिजिटल technology base.
For a तुलना of these और other शर्तें, see.
लिये आईसीटी विकास Index around the संसार, see.
This is a list of characters from George लोपेज़.
a schematic presentation of the प्लम खीर model of the atom ; in thomson 's गणितीय मॉडल the `` corpuscles '' ( or modern electrons ) were arranged non-randomly, in rotating बजती
the वर्तमान मॉडल of the sub-atomic ढांचा involves a dense nucleus surrounded by a probabilistic `` cloud '' of electrons
The प्लम pudding मॉडल of the अणु by J. J. Thomson, who खोजा the electron in 1897, थी प्रस्तावित in 1904 before the डिस्कवरी of the atomic केंद्रक in order to add the इलेक्ट्रॉन to the परमाणु model.
in this model, the atom is रचित of electrons ( जिससे thomson still called `` corpuscles '', हालांकि G. J. Stoney था proposed that atoms of विद्युत be पुकारा electrons in 1894 ) surrounded by a सूप of धनात्मक चार्ज to balance the electrons ' ऋणात्मक charges, जैसे negatively charged `` plums `` surrounded by positively चार्ज `` खीर ``.
the electrons ( as we know them today ) were thought to be positioned throughout the atom, but साथ अनेक structures possible लिये positioning multiple electrons, विशेषकर rotating बजती of electrons ( देखिए below ).
Instead of a soup, the atom थी also sometimes said to have had a `` बादल '' of positive charge.
साथ इस मॉडल, thomson abandoned उसके earlier `` nebular atom '' परिकल्पना in which the atom was रचित of immaterial vortices.
Now, at तनिक part of the atom was to be रचित of Thomson 's particulate negative corpuscles, हालांकि the बाकी of the positively चार्ज part of the अणु remained somewhat nebulous and ill-defined.
The 1904 Thomson model was disproved by the 1909 सुनहरा foil प्रयोग of Hans geiger और अर्नेस्ट Marsden.
This was interpreted by अर्नेस्ट Rutherford in 1911
to imply a very small केंद्रक of the अणु containing a very ऊँची positive charge ( in the case of सुनहरा, पर्याप्त to balance परिचय 100 electrons ), thus अग्रणी to the Rutherford मॉडल of the अणु.
हालांकि सुनहरा रै an atomic क्रमांक of 79, तत्काल बाद रदरफोर्ड 's paper appeared in 1911 antonius Van den broek बना the intuitive सुझाव that atomic क्रमांक is नाभिकीय charge.
the पदार्थ जरूरी प्रयोग to decide.
हेनरी Moseley 's कार्य showed experimentally in 1913 ( देखिए Moseley 's law ) कि the प्रभावी नाभिकीय चार्ज थी very बंद to the atomic क्रमांक ( moseley found तभी one ईकाई difference ), और moseley referenced तभी the papers of Van den Broek और Rutherford.
This work culminated in the solar-system-like ( लकिन quantum-limited ) bohr मॉडल of the atom in the वही साल, in which a nucleus containing an atomic number of धनात्मक charge is घिरी by an बराबर क्रमांक of electrons in कक्षीय शेल.
Bohr था भी inspired Moseley 's work.
Thomson 's model थी compared ( though नहीं by thomson ) to a अंग्रेजों मिठाई पुकारा प्लम pudding, hence the name.
Thomson 's paper was published in the March 1904 edition of the Philosophical पत्रिका, the अग्रणी British विज्ञान journal of the दिन.
In Thomson 's view :... the अणु of the तत्व consist of a number of negatively electrified corpuscles enclosed in a गोला of uniform धनात्मक विद्युतीकरण,...
in इस model, the electrons यहूद फ़्री to rotate भीतर the blob or बादल of positive पदार्थ.
ये orbits यहूद stabilized in the model by the फैक्ट that when an electron स्थानांतरित farther from the बीच of the धनात्मक cloud, it लगा a larger जाल positive inward फ़ोर्स, because वहीँ थी अधिक material of विपरीत चार्ज, अंदर its orbit ( देखिए Gauss 's law ).
in thomson 's मॉडल, electrons यहूद फ़्री to घूर्णन in बजती which were further stabilized by interactions between the electrons, और spectra were to be accounted for by energy differences of different रिंग orbits.
thomson attempted to make उसके model account for कुछ of the प्रमुख spectral lines ज्ञात for some तत्व, but थी नहीं notably successful at इस.
Still, thomson 's model ( साथ with a समान saturnian ring model लिये atomic electrons, also put आगे in 1904 by nagaoka बाद जेम्स क्लर्क Maxwell 's model of शनि 's rings ), यहूद earlier harbingers of the later और अधिक कामयाब solar-system-like Bohr model of the atom.
Typical strip of bacon.
बेकन is a cured meat prepared from a सुअर.
It is पहला cured using विशाल quantities of salt, either in a brine or in a dry packing ; the परिणाम is भैस बेकन ( also ज्ञात as ग्रीन बेकन ).
भैस बेकन may then be further सूखी for weeks or months in ठंडा air, or it may be boiled or स्मोक्ड.
भैस and dried बेकन is typically cooked पहले खाने.
boiled bacon is तैयार to खा, as is कुछ smoked bacon, but may be पकाया further before eating.
बेकन is prepared from several different cuts of मांस.
it is usually बना from side और वापस कटौती of pork, मगर in the संयुक्त राज्य, जहाँ it is almost always prepared from pork पेट ( typically referred to as `` streaky '', `` वसीय '', or `` अमरीकी style '' outside of the us and कनाडा ).
the पक्ष काटें रै more मांस and less fat than the belly.
बेकन may be prepared इससे either of दो पृथक वापस cuts : fatback, which is almost pure मोटे, and पोर्क loin, जिससे is very lean.
Bacon-cured pork loin is ज्ञात as वापस bacon.
Uncooked पोर्क belly बेकन strips.
बेकन may be eaten smoked, boiled, fried, baked, or grilled, or used as a minor ingredient to स्वाद बर्तन.
Bacon is also प्रयुक्त लिये barding and larding roasts, especially खेल, e.g. venison, pheasant.
The word is derived इससे the Old High German bacho, अर्थ `` buttock '', `` ham '' or `` पक्ष of bacon '', और cognate with the बूढ़ा French bacon.
In continental यूरोपीय, इस part of the pig is usually नहीं स्मोक्ड like बेकन is in the United States ; it is प्रयुक्त primarily in घन ( lardons ) as a कुकिंग ingredient, valued both as a source of fat and लिये इसके स्वाद.
in इटली, this is पुकारा pancetta और is प्रायः cooked in छोटी cubes or परोसा uncooked and thinly sliced as भाग of an antipasto.
Meat from अन्य animals, such as बीफ, lamb, chicken, बकरी, or turkey, may also be cut, cured, or वरना prepared to resemble बेकन, and may भी be referred to as `` bacon ''.
Such उपयोग is common in क्षेत्रों with significant यहूदी and मुस्लिम populations.
The यूएसडीए defines bacon as `` the cured belly of a स्वाइन carcass '' ; other cuts and characteristics जरूर be separately qualified ( e.g., `` smoked पोर्क loin बेकन '' ).
लिये safety, बेकन must be treated to prevent trichinosis, caused by trichinella, a parasitic roundworm जिससे can be destroyed by heating, जमने, drying, or धूम्रपान.
Bacon is distinguished इससे नमक पोर्क and ham by differences in the brine ( or dry पैकिंग ).
Bacon brine रै added curing ingredients, सबसे notably sodium nitrite, और occasionally sodium नाइट्रेट or potassium nitrate ( साल्टपीटर ) ; सोडियम ascorbate or erythorbate हैं added to accelerate curing and stabilize रंग.
flavorings ऐसे as brown sugar or मेपल हैं used for some products.
if used, sodium polyphosphates are added to improve sliceability और reduce spattering when the bacon is पण fried.
आज, a brine लिये ham, but नहीं bacon, शामिल a विशाल amount of sugar.
Historically, `` ham '' and `` बेकन '' referred to अलग cuts of मांस कि यहूद brined or packed identically, प्रायः together in the same barrel.
The Employee Retirement आय Security अधिनियम of 1974 ( erisa ) (, संहिताबद्ध in भाग at ) is a federal law जिससे establishes minimum मानकों for pension plans in private industry and provides लिये extensive rules on the federal income कर प्रभाव of ट्रांजेक्शन संबद्ध with employee benefit plans.
ERISA was enacted to protect the रूचि of employee लाभ plan भागीदार और उनके beneficiaries by:
requiring the disclosure of financial और other information concerning the plan to beneficiaries ;
establishing standards of conduct लिये योजना fiduciaries ;
providing लिये appropriate remedies और access to the संघीय न्यायालयों.
erisa is sometimes used to refer to the full body of laws regulating employee benefit plans, which are found मुख्यतः in the Internal Revenue Code and erisa itself.
जिम्मेदारी लिये the interpretation और enforcement of ERISA is विभाजित among the Department of मजदूर, the Department of the राजकोष ( विशेषकर the Internal Revenue Service ), and the पेंशन लाभ Guaranty Corporation.
Illegal immigration to the संयुक्त राज्य is the अधिनियम of विदेशी nationals entering the संयुक्त States, without सरकारी permission और in उल्लंघन of संयुक्त States nationality law, or रहकर beyond the termination date of a visa, भी in violation of the law.
A चेतावनी sign at the international boundary between the United राज्य and Canada in पाइंट रॉबर्ट्स, वॉशिंगटन.
a much अलग दृष्टिकोण at the U.S.-Mexico किनारा near El Paso, Texas
the undocumented immigrant population of the United States in 2008 was estimated by the बीच for Immigration अध्ययन to be about 11 million people, down इससे 12.5 लाख लोगों in 2007.
अन्य estimates दायरा from 7 to 20 लाख.
According to a 2005 pew हिस्पैनिक बीच report, 56 % of undocumented आप्रवासियों यहूद from मैक्सिको ; 22 % were from अन्य Latin American countries ; 13 % were इससे एशिया ; 6 % यहूद इससे Europe and कनाडा ; और 3 % यहूद from अफ़्रीकी और the rest of the संसार.
Alvin स्वतंत्र स्कूल District is a school district आधारित in एल्विन, Texas ( यूएसए ).
एल्विन isd is a large suburban school district दक्षिण of Houston in the communities of Alvin, manvel, Pearland, hillcrest, rosharon, आयोवा Colony, Liverpool, and Amsterdam.
aisd serves Pearland city 's rapidly growing पश्चिमी portion of the नगर सहित the new large master-planned समुदायों of छाया Creek Ranch, South कांटा, and Southern Trails.
एल्विन isd covers of land.
in इंसान anatomy, the ulnar nerve is a nerve जिससे रनों near the ulna bone.
The ulnar collateral स्नायु of elbow संयुक्त is in संबंध साथ the ulnar nerve.
The nerve is the largest unprotected nerve in the इंसान body ( अर्थ unprotected by मांसपेशी or अस्थि ), so चोट is आम.
This तंत्रिका is directly कनेक्ट to the छोटी उंगली, and the adjacent हाफ of the रिंग उंगली, supplying the palmar side of these fingers, including both सामने and back of the नुस्ख़े, शायद as दूर back as the fingernail beds.
एक method of injuring the nerve is to स्ट्राइक the medial epicondyle of the humerus from posteriorly, or inferiorly साथ the elbow flexed.
the ulnar nerve is trapped between the bone and the overlying स्किन at this point.
इस is commonly referred to as bumping एक 's `` funny अस्थि ''.
This नाम is विचार to be a pun, based on the ध्वनि resemblance between the नाम of the अस्थि of the अपर भुजा, the `` humerus `` and the शब्द `` humorous ``.
alternatively, according to the ऑक्सफोर्ड अंग्रेज़ी शब्दकोष it may refer to `` the peculiar सनसनी experienced when it is struck ''.
हॉग्वार्ट्स स्कूल of चुड़ैल और Wizardry, shortened हॉग्वार्ट्स, is a fictional British स्कूल of magic लिये students aged ग्यारह to eighteen, और is the प्राथमिक setting लिये the first six किताबे in j.K. Rowling 's Harry Potter series.
Rowling has suggested कि वो may have inadvertently taken the name from the hogwort plant ( Croton capitatus ), which वो had देखी at Kew gardens कुछ समय पहले writing the श्रेणी, although the names `` The हॉग्वार्ट्स '' और `` Hoggwart '' appear in the 1954 Nigel Molesworth book How To be topp by geoffrey Willans.
Hogwarts school थी voted as the 36th बेहतरीन स्कॉटिश शैक्षणिक स्थापना in a 2008 ऑनलाइन ranking, outranking Edinburgh 's loretto स्कूल.
According to a director of the Independent स्कूलों संजाल rankings, it was added to the schools लिस्टिंग `` लिये fun '' and was then voted on.
the U.S. subprime बंधक संकट थी a नियत of events and conditions कि led to a financial संकट and subsequent recession कि began in 2008.
it was characterized by a rise in subprime mortgage delinquencies और foreclosures, and the resulting decline of प्रतिभूति backed by कहा mortgages.
अनेक major वित्तीय institutions collapsed in सितंबर 2008, साथ significant disruption in the flow of क्रेडिट to व्यवसायों and उपभोक्ता and the onset of a severe वैश्विक recession.
There were many causes of the संकट, with टीकाकारों assigning अलग levels of दोष to वित्तीय संस्थानों, regulators, क्रेडिट एजेंसियों, government housing नीतियों, and उपभोक्ता, among others.
a proximate cause was the वृद्धि in subprime lending.
The percentage of lower-quality subprime mortgages originated दौरान a दिए साल rose इससे the historical 8 % or lower range to लगभग 20 % इससे 2004 to 2006, with much higher ratios in कुछ parts of the u.s.
a high प्रतिशत of these subprime mortgages, over 90 % in 2006 for example, were adjustable-rate mortgages.
These दो changes यहूद भाग of a broader trend of lowered lending standards and higher-risk mortgage products.
Further, U.S. households had become increasingly indebted, साथ the ratio of कर्ज़ to डिस्पोजेबल निजी income rising इससे 77 % in 1990 to 127 % at the end of 2007, much of this increase mortgage-related.
When u.S. home prices declined steeply बाद peaking in mid-2006, borrowers ' ability to refinance their loans became अधिक difficult.
as adjustable-rate mortgages began to reset at उच्चतर ब्याज दरों ( causing उच्चतर monthly भुगतान ), mortgage delinquencies soared.
Securities समर्थित with mortgages, including subprime mortgages, widely held by वित्तीय firms globally, lost most of their मान.
वैश्विक investors also drastically घटाया purchases of mortgage-backed debt and अन्य securities as भाग of a मनाही in the capacity और willingness of the private financial system to support lending.
चिंताएं about the soundness of u.S. credit and financial markets led to tightening क्रेडिट around the world and slowing आर्थिक growth in the U.S. और यूरोपीय.
the crisis था severe, long-lasting consequences लिये the u.S. and यूरोपीय economies.
the u.S. डाला a गहन recession, साथ nearly 9 million कार्य खोया दौरान 2008 and 2009, roughly 6 % of the workforce.
u.S. housing prices fell nearly 30 % on average और the U.S. भण्डार market गिरी approximately 50 % by early 2009.
as of जल्दी 2013, the U.S. stock मार्केट had बरामद to इसके pre-crisis शिखर लकिन housing कीमतें remained near their कम पाइंट और unemployment remained elevated.
आर्थिक विकास remained नीचे pre-crisis levels.
यूरोपीय भी continued to struggle साथ its अपना economic संकट.
Carl जंग in 1910.
Myers and briggs extrapolated उनके mbti सिद्धान्त from जंग 's कृतियाँ in his book मनोवैज्ञानिक प्रकार.
The myers-briggs प्रकार Indicator ( MBTI ) assessment is a psychometric questionnaire designed to माप psychological वरीयताओं in how people perceive the world और make निर्णय.
These preferences were extrapolated इससे the typological theories प्रस्तावित by Carl Gustav Jung और first published in उसके 1921 book Psychological Types ( English edition, 1923 ).
Jung theorized that वहीँ are चार प्रिंसिपल मनोवैज्ञानिक functions by which we experience the संसार : सनसनी, intuition, feeling, और सोच.
One of these four functions is प्रबल most of the time.
the original डेवलपर of the व्यक्तित्व inventory were katharine कुक briggs और her बेटी, इसाबेल Briggs Myers ; these two, having पढ़ाई extensively the work of जंग, turned उनके interest of human बर्ताव into a भक्ति of turning the theory of मनोवैज्ञानिक types to व्यावहारिक उपयोग.
They began creating the indicator दौरान World युद्ध II, believing कि a knowledge of personality वरीयताओं would help women जो were प्रवेश the औद्योगिक workforce लिये the first समय to पहचानो the sort of war-time jobs कि होता be `` सबसे comfortable and effective ''.
the initial प्रश्नावली grew into the Myers-Briggs प्रकार Indicator, जिससे थी first प्रकाशित in 1962.
the mbti focuses on normal populations and emphasizes the value of naturally occurring differences.
रॉबर्ट kaplan and Dennis saccuzzo believe `` the underlying assumption of the MBTI is that we सब have specific preferences in the way we construe our experiences, and ये preferences underlie हमारी interests, needs, मान, and प्रेरणा '' ( p. 499 ).
`` Judas '' is a सोंग by American recording artist Lady गागा, from her second studio एल्बम born इस Way ( 2011 ).
It थी released by interscope रिकॉर्ड on April 15, 2011, four दिनों ahead of its scheduled रिलीज.
लिखा and produced by महिला Gaga and redone, `` Judas '' is a dance और electro house सोंग about a woman in प्रेम साथ a man जो betrayed her.
It embodies the incidents कि have haunted Gaga in the पास्ट, and इसके कोर अर्थ refers to the ऋणात्मक parts of her life that she ca n't escape.
गागा has further explained कि the सोंग was भी परिचय honoring one 's inner darkness in अनुक्रम to bring oneself into the लाइट.
The artwork for the single थी designed by Gaga in microsoft Word.
In spite of a polarizing impact on अनेक religious groups, the song थी generally well received by आलोचकों, who likened the song to `` ख़राब Romance `` साथ some noting it चाहिए have महरूम the album 's सीसे single.
the सोंग has a similar sound to Gaga 's previous redone-produced tracks, including `` पोकर Face ``, `` LoveGame ``, `` Bad Romance '', और `` Alejandro ``.
It contains three distinct hooks and a house -influenced ब्रेक down.
गागा explained कि the लाइनों spoken during the breakdown talk about उसके as beyond मोचन, regarding the परंपरागत दृश्य of कया a स्त्री should be.
`` Judas '' initially had a strong sales opening, but थी less successful commercially in comparison to Gaga 's previous singles.
The song पहुँचे the शीर्ष ten of the चार्ट in most major music बाज़ार, and also पहुँचे the top of the charts in दक्षिण Korea.
A म्यूज़िक वीडियो लिये the सोंग was filmed in April 2011, co-directed by गागा and laurieann गिब्सन and co-starring नॉर्मन Reedus.
It रै a biblical storyline where reedus निभाई यहूदा Iscariot और Gaga निभाई Mary Magdalene.
the वीडियो portrays उन्हें as modern दिन missionaries going to जेरूसलम.
It शामिल the biblical स्टोरी of यहूदा betraying यीशु, और ended with Gaga as magdalene getting stoned to death.
Before इसके रिलीज, the Catholic League condemned गागा लिये the कथित use of religious imagery and उसके भूमिका in the वीडियो.
however, critics generally praised the video, नहीं finding कोई offensive content.
the वीडियो was nominated for दो पुरस्कार at the 2011 MTV Video म्यूज़िक Awards.
गागा रै performed `` यहूदा '' on a क्रमांक of television shows, सहित The ग्राहम Norton दिखाएँ, Saturday Night सजीव, शुभ Morning Americas `` Summer कॉन्सर्ट श्रेणी '', the फ्रेंच x फ़ैक्टर as खूब as on The एलेन degeneres दिखाएँ.
Marvin gaye ( April 2, 1939April 1, 1984 ), born मारविन pentz gay, Jr., was an American singer-songwriter और musician.
Gaye helped to आकार the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s साथ a string of hits सहित `` कैसा मीठी It is ( To Be Loved by तुम ) `` और `` I सुना it through the grapevine `` and duet recordings with Mary Wells and tammi Terrell, बाद कमाई the शीर्षक `` प्रिंस of motown '' and `` Prince of आत्मा ''.
दौरान the 1970s, Gaye अंकित the अवधारणा एल्बम What 's Going On and let 's Get it On और became among the first कलाकारों in Motown to ब्रेक away इससे the reins of इसके उत्पादन company.
Gaye 's बाद रिकार्डिंग बहकावे several R & b subgenres such as शांत storm और neo-soul.
Following a काल in Europe under a tax exile in the जल्दी 1980s, gaye released the 1982 ग्रैमी Award-winning hit `` यौन healing `` and the Midnight Love album.
Since उसके death in 1984, Gaye has been मरणोपरांत सम्मानित by अनेक संस्थानों, सहित the ग्रैमी Lifetime Achievement Award and the चट्टान and Roll Hall of कीर्ति.
the अकादमी Award for बेहतरीन Picture is एक of the अकादमी पुरस्कार of Merit प्रस्तुत annually by the Academy of गति Picture कला and sciences ( ampas ) to निर्माता working in the motion चित्र उद्योग and is the तभी श्रेणी in जिससे प्रत्येक member is योग्य to मनोनीत लिये.
Best Picture is माना the सबसे important of the Academy पुरस्कार, as it represents all the directing, एक्टिंग, म्यूज़िक composing, लिखने, editing and अन्य प्रयत्न put forth into a फिल्मी.
नतीजतन, Best Picture is the फाइनल award और the निष्कर्ष of the annual Academy Awards ceremony.
the ग्रैंड Staircase कालम at the dolby थिएटर in Los Angeles, जहाँ the Academy Awards ceremonies have been आयोजित चूंकि 2002, showcase every फिल्मी कि has जीती the बेहतरीन Picture title since the पुरस्कार 's inception 85 years ago.
भारी बरसात is an interactive नाटक action-adventure video खेल निर्मित by French developer quantic Dream exclusively लिये the PlayStation 3.
The खेल is written and directed by Quantic Dream 's संस्थापक और CEO David पिंजरा.
Heavy Rains स्टोरी is a नाटकीय thriller modelled after फिल्मी noir, featuring four protagonists शामिल साथ the रहस्य of the Origami कातिल, a serial killer who uses extended periods of rainfall to drown उसके पीड़ितों.
ethan मंगल is trying to save उसके बेटे इससे being the अगला victim, while investigative journalist Madison Paige, एफबीआई profiler Norman Jayden, and निजी जासूस स्कॉट शेल्बी हैं each trying to track bas clues to the origami कातिल 's identity.
the player interacts with the खेल by performing क्रियाएँ highlighted on स्क्रीन सम्बन्धित to motions on the controller, और in some cases, performing a श्रेणी of जल्दी time कार्यक्रम दौरान fast-paced action sequences.
The खिलाड़ी 's decisions and actions दौरान the game होगा affect the कथा.
The प्रमुख वर्ण can be killed, और निश्चित actions may lead to different scenes and endings.
a playable डेमो was released on 11 फ़रवरी 2010.
the demo थी released prior to this तिथि for लोगों who took भाग in a Four Day Challenge on 5 February 2010.
A patch to allow use of the PlayStation Move controller to खेल the खेल was released in September 2010.
भारी बरसात was critically acclaimed और has बेची over दो million नक़ल.
it जीती 2010 's Game of the Year from CNN and Gaming Union, और Best PS3 खेल of 2010 by GameSpy और IGN.
A परिवर्धित संस्करण of the खेल was released titled Heavy Rain Edition Modifiée exclusively in France, aimed towards a younger audience.
In 2010, the खेल was included in the किताब 1001 वीडियो खेल तुम जरूर Play Before तुम die.
Total superannuation industry liabilities : members निधि और reserves ( a $ millions ) since 1988.
सालाना कुल superannuation उद्योग एसेट विकास 1996-2005.
Superannuation in ऑस्ट्रेलिया refers to the इंतजाम which लोगों make in ऑस्ट्रेलिया to have funds उपलब्धियाँ लिये them in retirement.
in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, superannuation इंतजाम हैं government-supported और encouraged, and न्यूनतम प्रावधानों are अनिवार्य for कर्मचारी.
For उदाहरण, नियोक्ता हैं जरूरी to pay a proportion of an employee 's salaries और wages ( फिलहाल 9 % ) into a superannuation निधि, but लोगों हैं प्रोत्साहित to put aside अतिरिक्त निधि into superannuation.
the न्यूनतम obligation जरूरी by नियोक्ता is नियत to increase to 12 % gradually stepping annually इससे 2013 to 2020.
An individual can withdraw funds आउट of a superannuation fund when the person meets one of the शर्तें of रिलीज contained in Schedule 1 of the Superannuation उद्योग ( Supervision ) regulations 1994.

Electoral College map प्रर्दशित the परिणाम of the 2012 U.S. presidential चुनाव.
President Barack ओबामा ( D - il ) won the popular vote in 26 states and the District of Columbia ( denoted in blue ) to कैप्चर 332 electoral मत.
पूर्व Governor Mitt romney ( R - MA ) जीती the popular vote in 24 राज्य ( denoted in red ) to capture 206 चुनावी मत.
Cartogram representation of the चुनावी College vote लिये the 2012 election, साथ each वर्गाकार representing एक electoral vote.
The United States चुनावी कॉलेज is the संस्था that officially elects the अध्यक्ष and Vice अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य every four years.
the अध्यक्ष और Vice अध्यक्ष हैं not elected directly by the मतदाता.
बजाय, they हैं elected by `` निर्वाचक '' जो are चुनी by लोकप्रिय vote on a state-by-state basis.
Electors हैं apportioned to प्रत्येक राज्य and the ज़िला of कोलंबिया, लकिन नहीं to territorial possessions of the United राज्य, such as Puerto रीको और गुआम.
The क्रमांक of electors in each state is equal to the number of सदस्यों of कॉंग्रेस to which the राज्य is हकदार.
The Twenty-third Amendment has सदा resulted in the District of कोलंबिया having three electors.
There हैं 538 निर्वाचक, आधारित on वहीँ होने 435 representatives और 100 सीनेटरों, प्लस the तीन निर्वाचक इससे the ज़िला of Columbia.
Electors are pledged to particular अध्यक्षीय and vice presidential candidates, though unpledged निर्वाचक हैं संभावित.
in सब states, except maine and नेब्रास्का, electors are elected on a `` winner-take-all '' आधार.
That is, सब निर्वाचक pledged to the presidential candidate जो विन्स the सबसे votes in a राज्य become निर्वाचक for that state.
Maine and नेब्रास्का use the `` congressional ज़िला विधि '', selecting one elector भीतर each congressional district by लोकप्रिय vote और selecting the बाकी दो निर्वाचक by a राज्यव्यापी लोकप्रिय vote.
हालांकि no elector is जरूरी by संघीय विधि to सम्मान a प्रतिज्ञा, there have only been बहुत few अवसरों when an elector voted contrary to a प्रतिज्ञा.
the Twelfth amendment specifies how a President and वाइस अध्यक्ष हैं elected and requires प्रत्येक elector to डाल one vote for President और another vote लिये Vice President.
आलोचकों argue that the Electoral कॉलेज is inherently undemocratic और gives swing states अनुपातहीन influence in electing the President और वाइस अध्यक्ष.
The चुनावी कॉलेज देता a numeric advantage in the चुनाव of the president to the smaller राज्य, as the न्यूनतम क्रमांक of electors for the छोटी राज्य is three compared to one for the election of प्रतिनिधि.
On the अन्य हाथ, the winner-take-all method of voting favors the larger states.
a number of संवैधानिक amendments have महरूम प्रस्तावित seeking to alter the Electoral कॉलेज or replace it साथ a direct लोकप्रिय vote.
बराक Hussein Obama ii ( ; born अगस्त 4, 1961 ) is the 44th और वर्तमान अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, the first African अमरीकी to थाम the दफ्तर.
Born in Honolulu, हवाई, ओबामा is a graduate of कोलंबिया विश्वविद्यालयों and हार्वर्ड Law School, where he was president of the हार्वर्ड Law Review.
He थी a जातियाँ organizer in Chicago पहले earning his law उपाधि.
he worked as a civil rights attorney in Chicago और taught constitutional law at the University of शिकागो Law School from 1992 to 2004.
he served three terms representing the 13th ज़िला in the Illinois सीनेट इससे 1997 to 2004, कार्यशील unsuccessfully लिये the संयुक्त राज्य House of Representatives in 2000.
in 2004, Obama प्राप्त national attention दौरान उसके campaign to represent Illinois in the संयुक्त राज्य Senate with उसके victory in the कूच लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी प्राथमिक, उसके keynote address at the लोकतांत्रिक National सम्मेलन in July, and his election to the Senate in November.
he began उसके अध्यक्षीय अभियान in 2007, and in 2008, बाद a बंद primary अभियान विरूद्ध हिलेरी Rodham Clinton, he won sufficient delegates in the Democratic पार्टी primaries to receive the अध्यक्षीय नामांकन.
He तब defeated Republican nominee जॉन McCain in the general election, और थी inaugurated as president on January 20, 2009.
Nine महीने later, ओबामा थी नामित the 2009 Nobel सलाम पुरस्कार laureate.
he थी re-elected president in नवम्बर 2012, defeating रिपब्लिकन nominee mitt Romney, and was sworn in for a second term on January 20, 2013.
Early in उसके first पद in office, ओबामा हस्ताक्षरित into law आर्थिक stimulus legislation in जवाब to the ग्रेट Recession in the form of the अमरीकी रिकवरी and Reinvestment Act of 2009 और the Tax Relief, Unemployment Insurance Reauthorization, and Job Creation अधिनियम of 2010.
Other major domestic initiatives in उसके प्रेसिडेंसी include the Patient Protection and Affordable परवाह Act, प्रायः referred to as `` Obamacare '' ; the Dodd–Frank वॉल गली Reform और उपभोक्ता Protection Act ; the Do n't पूछो, do n't Tell repeal Act of 2010 ; the Budget कंट्रोल अधिनियम of 2011 ; and the American करदाताओं Relief Act of 2012.
in May 2012, he became the पहला sitting U.S. अध्यक्ष to publicly support same-sex विवाह and in 2013 his प्रशासन filed briefs जिससे urged the Supreme अदालत to rule in favor of same-sex युगल in two high-profile cases.
in foreign policy, Obama ended u.S. military भागीदारी in the Iraq War, increased troop levels in अफगानिस्तान, signed the New प्रारंभ arms कंट्रोल सन्धि साथ Russia, ordered u.S. military भागीदारी in Libya, and ordered the सैन्य आपरेशन that resulted in the मौत of ओसामा बिन Laden.
The Honda cbr1100xx Super blackbird थी a होंडा motorcycle made इससे 1996 to 2007.
The bike was developed to challenge the Kawasaki निंजा zx-11 as the संसार 's तीव्रतम production मोटरसाइकिल, और होंडा succeeded साथ a शीर्ष speed of.
Two years later the title passed to the suzuki Hayabusa, जिससे पहुँचे.
the blackbird is named after the Lockheed sr-71, also a गति record होल्डर.
नमूना दृश्य of an electronic health रिकार्ड based on images
नमूना view of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक health रिकार्ड
An इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य रिकार्ड ( EHR ) is an evolving अवधारणा पारिभाषित as a व्यवस्थित संग्रहण of electronic स्वास्थ्य information about व्यक्तिगत patients or populations.
it is a रिकार्ड in digital स्वरूप कि is theoretically capable of होने shared across different स्वास्थ्य परवाह जमावट.
In कुछ मामले this sharing can occur by way of network-connected enterprise-wide information प्रणालियों और अन्य सूचना संजाल or exchanges.
ehrs may शामिल a range of आंकड़ा, सहित demographics, medical इतिहास, दवा and allergies, immunization औकात, प्रयोगशाला परीक्षण परिणाम, radiology images, vital signs, personal आंकड़े जैसे आयु और weight, and billing सूचना.
the Mariner up on the mast in a तूफ़ान.
एक of the wood-engraved illustrations by Gustave doré.
the rime of the Ancient Mariner ( originally the Rime of the Ancyent marinere ) is the longest major कविता by the अंग्रेज़ी poet सैमुएल टेलर कॉलरिज, लिखा in 1797–98 और published in 1798 in the first edition of गीतात्मक Ballads.
Modern editions use a बाद संशोधित version मुद्रित in 1817 that featured a gloss.
साथ साथ other कविताएं in गीतात्मक ballads, it थी a सिग्नल shift to आधुनिक poetry and the beginning of अंग्रेजों रोमांटिक literature.
A प्रॉक्सी auto-config ( pac ) संचिका defines how web browsers and other user एजेंटों can automatically चुनें the appropriate proxy server ( access method ) लिये fetching a दिए URL.
A pac संचिका contains a जावास्क्रिप्ट function “FindProxyForURL ( url, मेजबान ) ”.
इस फलन returns a string साथ एक or अधिक अभिगम विधि विशेषताएँ.
ये specifications कारण the user agent to उपयोग a particular प्रॉक्सी server or to connect सीधे.
Multiple specifications provide a fall-back जब a प्रॉक्सी fails to respond.
The ब्राउजर fetches इस PAC संचिका before requesting other URLs.
the url of the pac संचिका is either विन्यस्त manually or संकल्पित automatically by the Web Proxy autodiscovery प्रोटोकॉल.
zendaya Coleman ( born सितंबर 1, 1996 ), known mononymously as zendaya, is an American अभिनेत्री, singer and dancer.
she सितारों on the Disney Channel sitcom Shake it up as Rocky Blue.
वो has starred in दो films and played one of the सीसे भूमिकाएँ in the film frenemies as हैली Brandon.
वो voiced Fern in the pixie खोखला Games.
वो appeared in शुभ लक चार्ली as Rocky ब्लू और in a Good Luck चार्ली और शेक It up crossover शीर्षक Charlie शेक it up.
वो appeared on prankstars as herself in the एपीसोड `` चलना The Prank '' और on a.n.t. फार्म as sequoia Jones in the एपीसोड `` Creative सलाहकार. ''
Zendaya is भी a संगीतकार.
वो signed a सौदे साथ Hollywood Records on August 8, 2012 और प्रारंभ रिकॉर्डिंग songs for her debut एल्बम on August 12, 2012.
वो released a सिंगल from an स्वतंत्र label called `` swag it Out `` और another single with Bella Thorne पुकारा `` Watch Me, '' जिससे is featured on the Break it Down album.
on March 20, 2012, zendaya और बेला Thorne released an एल्बम साथ called Shake it Up : Live 2 Dance, प्रत्येक have their own सोंग on it, along साथ a mash-up of दोनो गीतों साथ as one.
On अगस्त 21, 2012, zendaya और Bella thorne released an EP called Shake it Up : बना in जापानी.
Zendaya रै a Christmas song called `` शेक सांता Shake, '' जिससे is on the डिज़्नी चैनल अवकाश प्लेलिस्ट CD, जिससे was released on अक्तूबर 2, 2012.
on March 5, 2013 the तीसरा Shake it up soundtrack was released, entitled i < 3 Dance ; on it, Zendaya has दो गीतों साथ बेला - `` Contagious प्रेम '' and `` इस Is my Dance Floor '' - as खूब as one solo song, `` ताल of my Drum. ''
इस is a सूची of एयरपोर्ट in Pennsylvania ( a U.S. state ), grouped by प्रकार and sorted by location.
it contains सब public-use and सैन्य एयरपोर्ट in the राज्य.
Some private-use and former airports may be included जहाँ notable, ऐसे as एयरपोर्ट कि were previously public-use, those साथ commercial enplanements अंकित by the FAA or airports आबंटित an IATA विमानक्षेत्र code.
आईओएस ( previously iPhone os ) is a मोबाईल ऑपरेटिंग system developed और वितरित by Apple inc. Originally released in 2007 लिये the iPhone and ipod टच platforms, it has been extended to support other Apple devices such as the iPad और Apple tv.
Unlike microsoft 's Windows फोन and google 's एंड्रॉइड, Apple does not अनुज्ञा iOS for संस्थापना on non-Apple हार्डवेयर.
, ठहराना 's app Store contained अधिक than 700,000 आईओएस अनुप्रयोग, which have collectively महरूम डाउनलोड more than 30 billion times.
it था a 21 % share of the smartphone मोबाईल operating प्रणाली units shipped in the fourth quarter of 2012, पीछे only Google 's Android.
In June 2012, it accounted लिये 65 % of मोबाईल वेब आंकड़ा खपत ( including use on दोनो the ipod टच and the ipad ).
At the हाफ of 2012, वहीँ यहूद 410 million डिवाइस activated.
according to the special media event आयोजित by Apple on सितंबर 12, 2012, 400 लाख devices have महरूम बेची through June 2012.
The user इंटरफ़ेस of आईओएस is आधारित on the concept of सीधा हेरफेर, using multi-touch इशारों.
इंटरफ़ेस control elements consist of sliders, switches, and buttons.
Interaction साथ the OS includes gestures ऐसे as swipe, tap, pinch, और reverse पिंच, सब of which have specific definitions within the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the आईओएस ऑपरेटिंग system and its multi-touch interface.
आतंरिक accelerometers are प्रयुक्त by कुछ अनुप्रयोग to respond to shaking the यंत्र ( one आम result is the undo command ) or घूर्णन it in three dimensions ( one common result is switching from portrait to landscape विधि ).
आईओएस is derived इससे OS X, with which it साझा the Darwin न्यास.
iOS is Apple 's मोबाईल version of the os X ऑपरेटिंग system प्रयुक्त on Apple computers.
in iOS, there are four abstraction layers : the Core os layer, the Core सेवाएं layer, the मीडिया layer, and the Cocoa टच परत.
The current संस्करण of the ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली ( iOS 6.1.3 ) dedicates 1-1.5 gb of the यंत्र 's flash मेमोरी for the system partition, using roughly 800 mb of कि partition ( varying by मॉडल ) for आईओएस itself.
iOS currently runs on iPhone, iPad, ipod टच और ठहराना tv.

A spoiler is an ऑटोमोटिव aerodynamic यंत्र whose intended design function is to 'spoil ' unfavorable एयर movement across a body of a गाडी in motion, usually described as turbulence or drag.
विघ्न on the सामने of a गाडी are प्रायः पुकारा air dams, क्युकी in जोड to directing एयर flow वे भी reduce the amount of एयर flowing underneath the vehicle जिससे generally reduces aerodynamic लिफ्ट और खीचें.
Spoilers are प्रायः fitted to race और high-performance sports गाड़ियाँ, although वे have become आम on passenger vehicles as well.
Some विघ्न हैं added to cars primarily लिये styling उद्देश्य and have either little aerodynamic benefit or even मेक the वायुगतिकी worse.
Spoilers लिये cars हैं often incorrectly confused with, or the पद प्रयुक्त interchangeably with, wings.
Automotive विंग्स are डिवाइस जिनकी intended डिज़ाइन is to generate downforce as एयर passes around them, नहीं simply disrupt existing airflow patterns.
Mario, who serves as Nintendo 's शुभंकर, is a fictional अक्षर निर्मित by खेल designer Shigeru Miyamoto and voiced by चार्ल्स Martinet.
इस is a सूची of video खेल where the character मारियो plays a part, either as the protagonist, विपक्षी, supporting अक्षर, as भाग of an ensemble cast, as a cameo, or in a game within a खेल.
it करता not शामिल simple references to the character, ऐसे as the portraits of Mario found in the Legend of zelda : a Link to the पास्ट.
The year indicated is the year the खेल थी पहला released, सबसे commonly in Japan ; खेल were sometimes released years बाद in other regions of the world.
The सूची शामिल पोर्ट, remakes और compilations.
it does n't include any आभासी कंसोल re-releases.
`` Man of निरंतर विषाद '' ( भी known as `` I Am a man of Constant विषाद '' ) is a traditional American folk सोंग first recorded by लंड burnett, a partially अँधा fiddler from Kentucky.
the song थी originally अंकित by burnett as `` Farewell सोंग '' printed in a Richard Burnett songbook, circa 1913.
an early version was अंकित by Emry आर्थर in 1928 ( Vocalion vo 5208 ).
पब्लिक ब्याज in the सोंग was renewed after the रिलीज of the 2000 फिल्मी O bhai, Where आर्ट thou ?
, as it plays a सेंट्रल role in the film 's plot.
The सोंग was भी included in the फिल्मी 's highly कामयाब, multiple-platinum selling साउंडट्रैक.

The वोल्ट ( symbol : v ) is the si derived ईकाई लिये electric potential ( वोल्टेज ), electric संभावित difference, and विद्युतवाहक force.
The volt is named in सम्मान of the Italian physicist alessandro Volta ( 1745–1827 ), जो invented the वोल्टायिक pile, संभवतः the first chemical battery.
A plaque commemorating the स्थान of the Sarajevo हत्या and steps of gavrilo Princip ( image taken in 1987, पहले कदम were removed in 1992 और plaque बदला इससे Cyrillic to लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट )
a प्लैक commemorating the location of the साराजेवो assassination ( चित्र लिया in 2009 )
on 28 जून 1914, archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of Austria, heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian सिंहासन, and उसके wife, Sophie, duchess of hohenberg, were shot dead in Sarajevo, by gavrilo Princip, एक of a समूह of छह Bosnian Serb हत्यारे coordinated by डेनियल Ilić.
the political objective of the हत्या थी to break off Austria-Hungary 's south-slav प्रांतों so वे could be संयुक्त into a वृहद सर्बिया or a यूगोस्लाविया.
the assassins ' motives यहूद consistent साथ the गति that बाद became ज्ञात as यंग बोस्निया.
Serbian military officers stood पीछे the आक्रमण.
at the शीर्ष of ये Serbian सैन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों was Chief of Serbian Military Intelligence dragutin dimitrijević, उसके righthand man प्रमुख Vojislav tankosić, और Masterspy rade Malobabić.
प्रमुख tankosić हथियारबंद the हत्यारे with bombs और pistols और trained उन्हें.
the हत्यारे यहूद दिए access to the same clandestine टनल of safe-houses और एजेंटों कि rade Malobabić used लिये the infiltration of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary.
The हत्यारे, the key members of the clandestine tunnel, and the कुंजी Serbian military conspirators who were स्टिल alive यहूद arrested, tried, convicted and punished.
those who यहूद गिरफ्तार in Bosnia यहूद tried in साराजेवो in October 1914.
the other conspirators were arrested और आजमाया पहले a सर्बियाई kangaroo court on the French-controlled salonika Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated गलत charges ; Serbia executed तीन of the शीर्ष सैन्य conspirators.
Much of कया is known परिचय the assassinations आता इससे ये दो ट्रायल और related records.
कार्यभार of जिम्मेदारी लिये the bombing and हत्याएं of 28 जून is अत्यधिक controversial क्युकी the attack led to the outbreak of संसार युद्ध i one माह बाद.
मिशन San Juan Capistrano was a स्पेनी मिशन in दक्षिणी California, स्तिथ in present-day San जुआन Capistrano.
it was founded on सब संतो ' Day नवम्बर 1, 1776, by स्पेनी catholics of the Franciscan अनुक्रम.
Named for Giovanni da capistrano, a 15th century theologian और `` योद्धा priest '' जो resided in the abruzzo प्रदेश of Italy, San जुआन Capistrano has the distinction of being घर to the oldest भवन in California still in उपयोग, a चैपल निर्मित in 1782.
ज्ञात alternately as `` Serra 's Chapel '' और `` पिता Serra 's Church, '' it is the only extant ढांचा जहाँ it has been प्रलेखित that the padre Junipero Serra celebrated द्रव्यमान.
One of the बेहतरीन known of the Alta California missions ( and एक of the few missions to have actually महरूम founded twice—others होने Mission सैन जिबरील Arcángel and Mission La Purísima Concepción ).
The साईट थी originally consecrated on October 30, 1775, by Father Fermín lasuén, but was quickly abandoned due to unrest among the indigenous जनसांख्यिकी in सैन डिएगो.
The कामयाबी of the उपनिवेश is evident in इसके historical रिकॉर्ड.
Prior to the arrival of the प्रचारकों, कुछ 550 natives यहूद scattered throughout the local area.
By 1790, the क्रमांक of परिवर्तित Christians had grown to 700, and बस छह years बाद nearly 1,000 `` neophytes `` ( recent converts ) lived in or around the मिशन compound.
1,649 baptisms यहूद conducted कि साल अलोन, आउट of the total 4,639 souls converted between 1776 and 1847.
More than 2,000 former inhabitants ( mostly Juaneño इंडियंस ) are दफ्न in unmarked graves in the मिशन 's कब्रिस्तान ( campo सेंटो ).
The remains of Father ( later Monsignor ) St. जॉन O'Sullivan, who recognized the प्रॉपर्टी 's ऐतिहासिक मान and working tirelessly to conserve और rebuild its structures, हैं buried at the entrance to the कब्रिस्तान on the वेस्ट side of the प्रॉपर्टी, और a statue उठाया in उसके honor stands at the सिर of the crypt.
The surviving chapel भी serves as the फाइनल resting प्लेस of three padres जो passed on while serving at the Mission : fathers जोस Barona, Vicente Fustér, और विसेंट पास्कुआल Oliva are सब entombed beneath the अभयारण्य floor.
the criolla or `` मिशन grape, '' थी पहला planted at San जुआन Capistrano in 1779 ; in 1783, the first wine produced in Alta कैलिफ़ोर्निया emerged from the मिशन 's वाइनरी.
The मिशन entered a long period of क्रमिक decline after secularization in 1833.
numerous प्रयत्न were बना over the सालो to restore the मिशन to its पूर्व glory, लकिन none met साथ ग्रेट success जबतक the arrival of पिता o'sullivan in 1910.
Restoration प्रयत्न continue, and `` सेरा 's चैपल '' is still used for religious सेवाएं.
About half-a-million visitors, including 80,000 school children, आइये to the Mission प्रत्येक साल.
और जबकि the ruins of `` the Great Stone गिरिजाघर '' ( which थी सब लकिन leveled by an 1812 भूकंप ) हैं a प्रसिद्ध architectural wonder, the मिशन is शायद बेहतरीन ज्ञात for the सालाना `` वापसी of the दात '' जिससे is traditionally observed every March 19 ( Saint जोसेफ 's Day ).
Mission San जुआन Capistrano has परोसा as a पसंदीदा subject लिये many notable artists, और रै been immortalized in literature and on फिल्मी numerous टाइम्स, perhaps अधिक than कोई other मिशन.
in 1984, a आधुनिक church complex was constructed just उत्तर and west of the Mission compound and is अभी ज्ञात as Mission Basilica San Juan capistrano.
आज, the मिशन यौगिक serves as a संग्रहालय, साथ the सेरा चैपल भीतर the यौगिक serving as a चैपल for the मिशन मोहल्ला.
Better Off Dead is a 1985 अमरीकी टीन रोमांटिक comedy film अभिनीत John Cusack and written और directed by जंगली Steve Holland.
it tells the स्टोरी of high स्कूल छात्र लेन Myer who is suicidal बाद his girlfriend ब्रेक up साथ him.
Mercedes-Benz superdome ( originally Louisiana superdome और commonly the Superdome ) is a sports और प्रदर्शनी stadium, located in the सेंट्रल कारोबार ज़िला of नई Orleans, louisiana, यूएसए.
योजनाएँ were drawn up in 1967, by the New ऑरलियन्स modernist architectural कड़ of कर्टिस and डेविस.
इसके steel frame कवर a expanse.
इसके dome is made of a Lamella multi-ringed फ़्रेम and has a व्यास of, making it the largest fixed domed structure in the world.
It is home to the NFL 's New ऑरलियन्स Saints, the NCAA 's प्रभाग i-a tulane ग्रीन Wave फ़ुटबॉल टोली ( the largest फ़ुटबॉल stadium in सम्मेलन यूएसए ), the राज्य फार्म bayou Classic, the r+l Carriers New Orleans कटोरी, the allstate शुगर Bowl और, प्रत्येक fourth year, the bcs National चैंपियनशिप Game.
Because of the आकार और स्थान in one of the major tourist गंतव्यों in the संयुक्त राज्य, the superdome routinely makes the `` छोटी list '' of उम्मीदवार being considered for प्रमुख sporting कार्यक्रम, such as the Super कटोरी and the Final चार.
in 2005, the Superdome gained international ध्यान of a अलग type जब it housed thousands of people seeking आश्रय इससे Hurricane कैटरीना.
the भवन suffered extensive क्षति as a परिणाम of the storm, और was closed for अनेक months afterward.
On अक्तूबर 3, 2011, it was announced कि जर्मनी automaker mercedes-benz purchased naming अधिकारों to the स्टेडियम.
The नई नाम took प्रभाव on October 23, 2011.
it is the तीसरा stadium that रै naming अधिकारों इससे mercedes-benz ( and पहला in the United राज्य ), after the Mercedes-Benz Arena, the stadium of bundesliga club vfb stuttgart, in Stuttgart, जर्मनी and the mercedes-benz एरिना in शंघाई, चीन.
