डिज़्नी 's Animal किंगडम आवास is an african-themed deluxe resort at the Walt डिज़्नी World Resort.
It खोली on अप्रैल 16, 2001.
the रिज़ॉर्ट is स्वामित्व और संचालित by वॉल्ट Disney Parks और रिसॉर्ट.
डिज़्नी 's Animal Kingdom Lodge is स्तिथ in the Animal Kingdom Resort क्षेत्रफल, सटा to Disney 's Animal Kingdom.
it gives अतिथि the अवसर to view चरने wildlife बाहर उनके कक्ष और public areas in the रिज़ॉर्ट भीतर निकटता of the पशु, conveying the अहसास of होने in an अफ़्रीकी सवाना.
The People 's पार्टी, भी known as the `` Populists '', थी a short-lived राजनैतिक पार्टी in the United States स्थापित in 1891 दौरान the populist गति ( United States, 19th Century ).
it थी सबसे महत्वपूर्ण in 1892-96, और then rapidly धुंधली away.
आधारित among poor, श्वेत cotton किसानो in the दक्षिण ( especially उत्तर कैरोलिना, Alabama, और टेक्सास ) और hard-pressed wheat farmers in the plains states ( especially Kansas and Nebraska ), it represented a कट्टरपंथी crusading form of agrarianism और दुश्मनी to banks, railroads, और elites generally.
It sometimes formed coalitions with मजदूर unions, और in 1896 the डेमोक्रेट endorsed उनके presidential nominee, विलियम जेनिंग्स Bryan.
The terms `` populist '' and `` populism `` are commonly used for anti-elitist appeals in opposition to established रूचि and मुख्यधारा पार्टियों.
भाषाई map of Nigeria, Cameroon, and बेनिन.
चिह्न in अंग्रेज़ी, outside the विश्वविद्यालयों of लागोस
There हैं hundreds of भाषाएं बोला in Nigeria.
The major भाषाएं हैं Yoruba, हौसा, Igbo, ईदो, fulfulde, Kanuri, और Ibibio.
the आधिकारिक language of Nigeria, English, the former colonial language, थी chosen to सुकर the cultural और linguistic unity of the country.
English, however, remains an exclusive preserve of the country 's शहरी elite, और is नहीं widely बोला in ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों, जिससे comprise three quarters of the countries जनसांख्यिकी.
Nigeria 's linguistic विविधता is a microcosm of अफ़्रीकी as a whole, encompassing तीन प्रमुख African languages परिवारों : Afroasiatic, Nilo-Saharan, और niger–congo.
Nigeria also has several as-yet unclassified भाषाएं, ऐसे as cen tuum, which may represent a relic of an भी greater diversity prior to the spread of the current भाषा परिवारों.
a series of events led to the attack on पर्ल Harbor.
युद्ध between Japan और the संयुक्त States था been a सम्भावना कि प्रत्येक स्वदेश 's military forces planned लिये since the 1920s, though real टेंशन किया नहीं begin जबतक the 1931 आक्रमण of Manchuria by Japan.
over the अगला दशक, Japan expanded धीरे into चीन, leading to सब out war between the two in 1937.
In 1940 Japan invaded फ्रेंच इंडोचायना in an effort to embargo all imports into चीन, including war supplies खरीदा from the u.s.
This move prompted the संयुक्त States to embargo all आयल exports, अग्रणी the Imperial Japanese नेवी to अनुमान that it had कम than दो सालो of बंकर आयल remaining और to support the मौजूदा plans to seize आयल resources in the डच ईस्ट Indies.
Planning था been underway लिये कुछ समय on an आक्रमण on the `` Southern Resource Area '' to add it to the Greater ईस्ट Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere कि जापानी envisioned in the Pacific.
The Philippine आइलैंड्स, at that समय an American territory, यहूद also a Japanese target.
the जापानी सैन्य concluded कि an आक्रमण of the Philippines would provoke an अमरीकी सैन्य response.
Rather than seize and fortify the islands, and इंतजार for the inevitable us counterattack, जापानी 's सैन्य नेताओ बजाय decided on the pre-emptive Pearl Harbor आक्रमण, जिससे they assumed होता negate the अमरीकी शक्तियां needed लिये the मुक्ति और reconquest of the आइलैंड्स.
Planning for the आक्रमण had begun in very जल्दी 1941, by Admiral Isoroku यामामोटो.
He finally won assent from the नवल High Command by, among other things, threatening to इस्तीफा.
the attack was approved in the गर्मियाँ at an Imperial Conference and again at a दूसरी Conference in the fall.
Simultaneously over the साल, पायलटों यहूद प्रशिक्षित, and ships prepared for its निष्पादन.
प्राधिकार for the attack थी granted at the दूसरी इम्पीरियल सम्मेलन if a diplomatic परिणाम संतोषजनक to जापानी थी not reached.
After फाइनल approval by Emperor Hirohito the order to आक्रमण was issued at the शुरूआत of December.
a common दफ्तर stapler
A आम school stapler
a stapler is a mechanical device कि joins चादरें of paper or समान सामग्री by driving a thin metal स्टेपल through the sheets और folding the ends.
staplers are widely प्रयुक्त in सरकारी, कारोबार, offices, homes and schools.
the word `` stapler '' can दरअसल refer to a number of अलग devices of varying uses.
in जोड to joining पेपर sheets together, staplers can also be प्रयुक्त in a सर्जिकल सेटिंग to join tissue together साथ सर्जिकल staples to बंद a surgical wound ( much in the same way as stitches or sutures ).
typically, most staplers are प्रयुक्त to join अनेक चादरें of पेपर.
पेपर staplers come in two पृथक types : हस्तचालित and इलेक्ट्रिक.
Manual staplers are सामान्यतः hand-held, हालांकि models कि are used जबकि set on a डेस्क or other सतह हैं नहीं uncommon.
इलेक्ट्रिक staplers मौजूद in a variety of अलग designs and models.
Their primary operating फलन is to जुड़ें large संख्याएँ of पेपर sheets साथ in रैपिड उत्तराधिकार.
कुछ electric staplers can जुड़ें up to 20 sheets at a समय.
swallowing, ज्ञात scientifically as deglutition, is the प्रक्रम in the human or एनिमल देह that makes कुछ pass from the mouth, to the pharynx, and into the esophagus, जबकि shutting the epiglottis.
If this fails और the object goes through the श्वासनली, तब choking or pulmonary aspiration can occur.
in the इंसान देह it is controlled by the swallowing reflex.
thaddeus Stevens ( April 4, 1792 – अगस्त 11, 1868 ), of पेन्सिलवेनिया, थी a leader of the Radical Republican faction of the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी and a fierce opponent of गुलामी.
He थी one of the most influential सदस्यों in the इतिहास of Congress.
As chairman of the शक्तिशाली House तरीके और अर्थात् कमेटी, स्टीवंस, a witty, व्यंग्यात्मक स्पीकर and flamboyant party leader, dominated the House from 1861 until उसके death.
He लिखा much of the वित्तीय legislation कि paid for the American Civil War.
स्टीवंस and सीनेटर Charles Sumner यहूद the prime नेताओ of the कट्टरपंथी Republicans दौरान the war and पुनर्निर्माण era.
scholarly दृश्य of Stevens have swung sharply चूंकि his death as interpretations of पुनर्निर्माण have changed.
इतिहासकारों of the Dunning स्कूल ( 1890s–1940s ) held Stevens responsible for demanding हर्ष उपचार of the white South and violating अमरीकी परंपराओं of republicanism, depicting स्टीवंस as a विलेन for his advocacy of हर्ष measures in the दक्षिण ऐसे as disfranchising all ex-confederates.
इस highly negative characterization आयोजित sway into the 1950s.
the rise of the neo-abolitionist स्कूल in the 1950s led to a दमदार धनात्मक appreciation of Stevens ' work on civil अधिकारों for Freedmen.
A recent biographer characterizes him as, `` The ग्रेट Commoner, savior of free public education in पेन्सिलवेनिया, नेशनल Republican leader in the struggles against slavery in the United States and intrepid mainstay of the attempt to सुरक्षित जातिगत justice for the Freedmen during Reconstruction, the तभी सदस्य of the House of प्रतिनिधि कभी to have महरूम ज्ञात as the 'dictator ' of Congress. ''
अवलोकन of the अनुवाद of eukaryotic messenger rna
आरेख showing the translation of mRNA और the synthesis of proteins by a राइबोसोम
In molecular जीवविज्ञान and आनुवंशिकी, अनुवाद is the process through जिससे सेल्यूलर ribosomes manufacture प्रोटीन.
it is भाग of the प्रक्रम of जीन अभिव्यक्ति.
In translation, messenger RNA ( mrna ) produced by transcription is decoded by the ribosome to produce a specific अमीनो एसिड chain, or polypeptide, that होगा later मोड़ें into an active प्रोटीन.
in जीवाणु, translation occurs in the cell 's cytoplasm, जहाँ the large and छोटी subunits of the राइबोसोम हैं स्तिथ, और bind to the mrna.
in eukaryotes, translation occurs आरपार the membrane of the endoplasmic reticulum in a process पुकारा vectorial संश्लेषण.
The राइबोसोम facilitates decoding by inducing the बाइंडिंग of trnas with complementary anticodon sequences to कि of the mrna.
The trnas carry विशिष्ट amino acids that हैं chained together into a polypeptide as the mrna passes through और is `` read '' by the राइबोसोम in a fashion reminiscent to कि of a भण्डार ticker and टिकर tape.
In many instances, the संपूर्ण ribosome/mrna जटिल बांधता to the बाहरी झिल्ली of the अशिष्ट endoplasmic reticulum and रिलीज the nascent protein polypeptide inside लिये later vesicle हस्तांतरण और स्राव outside of the कोशिका.
Many प्रकार of transcribed RNA, ऐसे as ट्रांसफ़र rna, ribosomal rna, and छोटी नाभिकीय RNA, do not undergo translation into प्रोटीन.
अनुवाद proceeds in चार phases : दीक्षा, elongation, translocation और termination ( सब describing the growth of the amino एसिड कड़ी, or polypeptide कि is the product of translation ).
Amino acids are brought to ribosomes और समवेत into प्रोटीन.
in activation, the correct अमीनो acid is covalently बंधुआ to the सही ट्रांसफ़र rna ( tRNA ).
the amino acid is joined by इसके carboxyl group to the 3 ' oh of the tRNA by an ester बंध.
जब the trna रै an amino एसिड linked to it, it is termed `` charged ''.
Initiation involves the small subunit of the ribosome binding to the 5 ' समाप्त of mRNA साथ the सहायता of दीक्षा कारकों ( if ).
termination of the polypeptide happens when the A साईट of the राइबोसोम चेहरों a stop codon ( UAA, UAG, or UGA ).
No trna can recognize or bind to this codon.
बजाय, the stop codon induces the बाइंडिंग of a रिलीज फ़ैक्टर protein कि prompts the disassembly of the संपूर्ण ribosome/mRNA जटिल.
a क्रमांक of antibiotics act by inhibiting translation ; these शामिल anisomycin, cycloheximide, chloramphenicol, tetracycline, streptomycin, erythromycin, और puromycin, among अन्य.
Prokaryotic ribosomes have a अलग ढांचा इससे कि of eukaryotic ribosomes, और thus antibiotics can specifically target bacterial infections बगैर any detriment to a eukaryotic मेजबान 's cells.
A multimedia message on a मोबाईल phone.
Multimedia Messaging Service ( MMS ) is a standard way to भेजें messages कि include मल्टीमीडिया सामग्री to और from mobile phones.
it extends the core sms ( Short संदेश Service ) capability कि अनुमत एक्सचेंज of text messages only up to 160 characters in length.
The सबसे popular उपयोग is to भेजें photographs इससे camera-equipped handsets, हालांकि it is भी popular as a विधि of delivering न्यूज और entertainment सामग्री सहित videos, तस्वीरें, टेक्स्ट पृष्ठों and ringtones.
The standard is विकसित by the खोलें मोबाईल Alliance ( OMA ), although during development it थी part of the 3GPP और वैप समूह.
smallpox थी an infectious बीमारी अद्वितीय to humans, caused by either of दो virus variants, Variola major and Variola minor.
The बीमारी is भी known by the Latin names Variola or Variola vera, derived from varius ( `` spotted '' ) or varus ( `` मुंहासे '' ).
the disease was originally known in अंग्रेज़ी as the `` चेचक '' or `` रेड plague '' ; the term `` smallpox '' थी first प्रयुक्त in ब्रिटेन in the 15th सदी to distinguish variola from the `` ग्रेट चेचक '' ( syphilis ).
The पिछला naturally occurring मामला of smallpox ( Variola minor ) was diagnosed on 26 October 1977.
Smallpox localized in small रक्त vessels of the स्किन और in the mouth and throat.
In the skin it resulted in a characteristic maculopapular rash और, later, उठाया fluid-filled blisters.
V. major produces a अधिक गंभीर disease और has an overall मृत्यु रेट of 30–35 %.
V. नाबालिग कल्याणकारी a milder form of बीमारी ( also ज्ञात as alastrim, cottonpox, milkpox, whitepox, और Cuban itch ) जिससे मारता परिचय 1 % of its पीड़ितों.
long-term complications of V. प्रमुख infection शामिल characteristic scars, commonly on the face, which occur in 65–85 % of survivors.
दृष्टिहीनता resulting इससे corneal ulceration and scarring, और limb deformities due to arthritis और osteomyelitis are कम आम complications, देखी in परिचय 2–5 % of मामले.
Smallpox is believed to have उभरा in इंसान populations about 10,000 BC.
The earliest शारीरिक प्रमाण of it is संभवतः the pustular rash on the mummified body of pharaoh Ramses V of Egypt.
The disease killed an estimated 400,000 europeans annually दौरान the closing सालो of the 18th century ( सहित five reigning monarchs ), और was जिम्मेदार for a third of सब blindness.
of सब those संक्रमित, 20–60 % —and over 80 % of संक्रमित children—died from the disease.
Smallpox थी responsible लिये an estimated 300–500 million मौतों दौरान the 20th सदी.
as recently as 1967, the World स्वास्थ्य संगठन ( WHO ) अनुमानित कि 15 million people contracted the disease और कि दो लाख died in कि year.
After टीकाकरण campaigns throughout the 19th और 20th centuries, the WHO certified the eradication of smallpox in 1979.
smallpox is एक of दो संक्रामक रोगों to have महरूम eradicated, the other होने rinderpest, which was घोषित eradicated in 2011.
`` I want to थाम अपना Hand '' is a song by the English चट्टान बैंड the बीटल्स.
Written by जॉन Lennon और पॉल McCartney, और अंकित in October 1963, it थी the first बीटल्स record to be made using four-track equipment.
साथ advance orders exceeding one लाख नक़ल in the United किंगडम, `` I want to थाम अपना हाथ '' होता साधारणतया have गए सीधा to the शीर्ष of the British रिकार्ड charts on its day of रिलीज ( 29 November 1963 ) had it नहीं been अवरोधित by the समूह 's पहला million seller `` वो loves तुम ``, the बीटल्स ' previous UK सिंगल, which was having a resurgent spell in the top position following intense media coverage of the समूह.
Taking two सप्ताह to dislodge इसके पूर्ववर्ती, `` i want to Hold Your हाथ '' ठहरे at number एक लिये पाँच सप्ताह and remained in the UK शीर्ष fifty for twenty-one सप्ताह in total.
it थी भी the group 's first अमरीकी number one, प्रवेश the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 chart on 18 जनवरी 1964 at क्रमांक forty-five and starting the अंग्रेजों आक्रमण of the American म्यूज़िक उद्योग.
by 1 February it आयोजित the क्रमांक एक spot — लिये सात weeks — पहले होने replaced by `` She Loves तुम '', a reverse scenario of कया था occurred in ब्रिटेन, and remained in the us चार्ट लिये a total of पंद्रह weeks.
`` i want to थाम Your Hand '' became the बीटल्स ' best-selling single विश्वव्यापी.
a gasser थी a प्रकार of hot rod originating on the dragstrips of the संयुक्त States in the लेट 1950s और जारी जबतक the जल्दी 1970s.
Gassers were आधारित on उत्पादन models इससे the 1930s to mid-1960s, जिससे have been stripped of extraneous weight और jacked up using a ट्रक बीम धुरी to provide बेहतर वज़न distribution on acceleration ( Beam axles are भी हल्का than an स्वतंत्र front बर्खास्तगी ), though a raised stock front suspension is आम as well.
Common weight reduction techniques शामिल fiberglass body panels, stripped इंटीरियर्स और plexiglass windows ( sometimes color tinted ).
क्युकी they were primarily built लिये रेसिंग, these गाड़ियाँ typically था the इंजन swapped to a larger or more शक्तिशाली एक, the मौजूदा stock इंजन परिवर्धित ( often heavily ) or दोनो.
it थी बहुत common to अनुरूप a Roots supercharger और mechanical ईंधन injection, ऐसे as one from Algon, Hilborn, or crower.
With रूप होने dictated by फलन, their रूप is often बहुत top heavy और ungainly, largely due to सामने ends being उठाया higher than भण्डार, to assist in the weight ट्रांसफ़र during रैपिड त्वरण ( racing ).
Having उनके exhaust pipes exit through the सामने fender खूब is a common characteristic of gassers, as is having लाशें painted in flamboyant metalflakes, pearls, and कैंडी finishes complemented by lettering in जंगली फ़ॉन्ट्स.
The name arose because वे competed in a गैसोलीन -fueled drag रेसिंग class, बल्कि than एक using methanol or nitromethane.
The gasser is the पूर्ववर्ती of the modern मजेदार car.
Twelve-lead EKG of a 26-year-old पुरूष
Electrocardiography ( ECG or ईकेजी from ) is a transthoracic ( आरपार the वक्ष or chest ) interpretation of the electrical कार्यकलाप of the दिल over a काल of time, as detected by electrodes attached to the surface of the skin और recorded by a device बाह्य to the body.
The recording उत्पादित by this noninvasive कार्यविधि is termed an electrocardiogram ( भी ईसीजी or ईकेजी ).
An ईसीजी is used to measure the rate and नियमितता of heartbeats, as खूब as the size और स्थिति of the कक्षों, the presence of कोई क्षति to the heart, और the प्रभाव of drugs or devices प्रयुक्त to विनियमित the heart, ऐसे as a pacemaker.
Most ecgs हैं performed for diagnostic or research उद्देश्य on इंसान दिल, लकिन may भी be performed on animals, usually for निदान of heart abnormalities or शोध.
डोनाल्ड John Trump, Sr. ( born June 14, 1946 ) is an American कारोबार magnate, टेलीविज़न personality और author.
he is the chairman और अध्यक्ष of the Trump Organization और the संस्थापक of Trump entertainment रिसॉर्ट.
ट्रम्प 's हद lifestyle, outspoken manner, and role on the एनबीसी reality show The Apprentice have made उसे a well-known हस्ती who थी No. 14 on the 2012 Forbes हस्ती 100 list.
ट्रम्प is the बेटे of Fred ट्रम्प, a wealthy New York नगर real-estate डेवलपर.
he worked for उसके पिता 's कड़, Elizabeth ट्रम्प & Son, जबकि उपस्थित the व्हार्टन School of the विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया, and in 1968 officially joined the company.
He was दिए कंट्रोल of the कम्पनी in 1971 and renamed it The ट्रम्प संगठन.
in 2010, ट्रम्प expressed an interest in बनने a candidate लिये president of the United राज्य in the 2012 election, though in may 2011, he announced he would नहीं be a प्रत्याशी.
in दिसम्बर 2011, Trump was suggested as a संभावित vice अध्यक्षीय selection by मिशेल bachmann, if she were to जीत the Republican nomination.
`` a बदलें is gon na Come '' is a 1964 सिंगल by r & b singer-songwriter sam Cooke, लिखा and पहला recorded in 1963 and released under the RCA Victor लेबल shortly बाद his death in लेट 1964.
Though तभी a modest hit for cooke in तुलना with his पिछला singles, the song came to exemplify the 1960s ' सिविल अधिकारों गति.
The सोंग has gained in लोकप्रियता और नाजुक acclaim in the decades since its रिलीज, and is # 12 on Rolling Stone 's 500 Greatest Songs of सब समय.
भाप rising from the Nesjavellir Geothermal Power Station in Iceland.
Geothermal energy is थर्मल energy उत्पन्न and भंडारित in the धरती.
Thermal उर्जा is the उर्जा that determines the तापमान of matter.
the geothermal energy of the धरती 's क्रस्ट originates इससे the original गठन of the planet ( 20 % ) और इससे radioactive क्षय of खनिज ( 80 % ).
The geothermal gradient, which is the अंतर in temperature between the core of the planet और its surface, ड्राइव a निरन्तर conduction of थर्मल energy in the रूप of heat from the core to the सतह.
The adjective geothermal originates इससे the यूनानी roots γη ( ge ), meaning धरती, और θερμος ( thermos ), meaning hot.
at the कोर of the Earth, thermal उर्जा is created by radioactive क्षय and temperatures may reach over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ).
Heat conducts from the कोर to surrounding cooler rock.
The high temperature और pressure cause कुछ rock to melt, creating मैग्मा convection upward since it is हल्का than the solid rock.
the magma heats rock और जल in the क्रस्ट, sometimes up to 370 °c ( 700 °F ).
इससे hot स्रोतों, geothermal उर्जा has been used लिये स्नान since paleolithic times और for space हीटिंग since प्राचीन रोमन टाइम्स, but it is अभी better ज्ञात लिये electricity generation.
Worldwide, about 10,715 megawatts ( MW ) of geothermal शक्ति is online in 24 countries.
an additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal heating क्षमता is installed for ज़िला हीटिंग, स्पेस हीटिंग, spas, औद्योगिक प्रक्रियाओं, desalination and agricultural अनुप्रयोग.
Geothermal power is cost प्रभावी, reliable, sustainable, और environmentally दोस्ताना, लकिन has historically महरूम सीमित to areas निकट tectonic plate सीमाएँ.
Recent technological अग्रिम have dramatically विस्तारित the range और size of सुगठित resources, especially for अनुप्रयोग such as घर heating, खोलने a potential लिये फैली exploitation.
geothermal wells रिलीज greenhouse गैसों फंस deep within the धरती, लकिन these emissions are much निम्नतर per energy ईकाई than those of चट्टान fuels.
As a परिणाम, geothermal शक्ति has the संभावित to सहायता mitigate global वार्मिंग if widely तैनात in place of चट्टान fuels.
The धरती 's geothermal resources are theoretically अधिक than पर्याप्त to supply मानवता 's energy needs, लकिन तभी a very small भिन्न may be profitably शोषित.
खुदाई और खोजी लिये deep resources is very महंगी.
Forecasts for the भविष्य of geothermal शक्ति depend on assumptions परिचय प्रौद्योगिकी, उर्जा कीमतें, subsidies, and ब्याज rates.
Pilot कार्यक्रम like EWEB 's ग्राहक opt in ग्रीन शक्ति Program दिखाएँ कि ग्राहक होता be willing to अदा a little अधिक for a बेदर्दी उर्जा source जैसे geothermal.
But as a परिणाम of government assisted शोध and उद्योग अनुभव, the cost of generating geothermal power रै decreased by 25 % over the past दो decades.
in 2001, geothermal energy लागत between two और ten सेंट per सम्पात.
स्वामित्व of प्रॉपर्टी may be private, सामूहिक, or आम और the प्रॉपर्टी may be objects, land/real एस्टेट, or intellectual प्रॉपर्टी.
determining स्वामित्व in विधि involves determining जो has निश्चित अधिकारों और कर्तव्य over the प्रॉपर्टी.
ये rights and कर्तव्य, sometimes पुकारा a 'bundle of rights ', can be separated और held by अलग parties.
The question of ownership reaches वापस to the ancient दार्शनिकों, प्लेटो and अरस्तू, who आयोजित different राय on the विषय.
Plato ( 428/427 BC – 348/347 bc ) thought private property created divisive inequalities, while Aristotle ( 384 bc – 322 BC ) thought निजी property सक्रिय लोगों to प्राप्त the full benefit of उनके labor.
Private प्रॉपर्टी can circumvent कया is अभी referred to as the “ त्रासदी of the commons ” प्रॉब्लम, जहाँ people tend to रुसवा आम property more than वे do निजी property.
Given a short-sighted owner, however, a निजी प्रॉपर्टी system can मेक ये tragedies worse—for example, a निजी owner of a टुकड़ा of oil-rich प्रॉपर्टी, depending on his worldview, might be अधिक interested in short-term financial gain than incremental use साथ an नजर toward other 's चिंताएं ( e.g., those of future generations, the disenfranchised, etc. ).
While Aristotle जायज the अस्तित्व of निजी ownership, he left खोलें questions of ( 1 ) how to allocate property between what is निजी और आम और ( 2 ) how to allocate the निजी property भीतर समाज.
over the millennia, and आरपार संस्कृतियों what can be प्रॉपर्टी और how it is regarded culturally have varied widely.
स्वामित्व is the basis लिये अनेक other concepts that form the मूलाधार of प्राचीन और आधुनिक समाजों ऐसे as money, व्यापार, debt, दिवालियापन, the criminality of चोरी, और निजी vs. पब्लिक प्रॉपर्टी.
Ownership is the key भवन block in the विकास of the पूंजीवादी socio-economic system.
Adam Smith stated कि एक of the sacred laws of justice was to गार्ड a व्यक्ति 's property और possessions.
The प्रक्रम और यांत्रिकी of स्वामित्व are fairly जटिल : one can gain, transfer and lose ownership of प्रॉपर्टी in a number of तरीके.
To acquire प्रॉपर्टी one can खरीदें it साथ धन, व्यापार it लिये अन्य प्रॉपर्टी, प्राप्त it as a gift, steal it, find it, make, it or होमस्टीड it.
एक can ट्रांसफ़र or खोना ownership of property by selling it for धन, exchanging it for अन्य property, giving it as a तोहफा, being robbed of it, it, or having it stripped from one 's ownership through legal means ऐसे as eviction, foreclosure, seizure, or taking.
स्वामित्व is self-propagating in that the owner of कोई property will भी अपना the आर्थिक benefits of कि प्रॉपर्टी.
`` What 's my नाम ? '' is a सोंग अंकित by barbadian रिकॉर्डिंग artist रिहाना, लिये उसके पांचवां स्टुडियो एल्बम लाउड ( 2010 ).
Featuring अतिथि vocals इससे कनाडाई rapper Drake, the song थी released as the second सिंगल इससे Loud on अक्तूबर 29, 2010 through Def Jam रिकार्डिंग.
The r & b सोंग was produced by the Norwegian production duo स्टारगेट, और was written by the duo along with Ester डीन, Traci hale, and ड्रेक.
Lyrically, it incorporates themes of sexual intercourse और रोमांस.
Music critics दिया the सोंग धनात्मक reviews, citing it कुछ of रिहाना 's best vocal कार्य to तिथि ; वहीँ was a तारीफ़ regarding इसके romantic nature, as खूब as इसके यौन टोन.
`` कया 's My Name ? '' थी a वाणिज्यिक success और अव्वल the us Billboard Hot 100 चार्ट, giving Rihanna her तीसरा number-one सिंगल in 2010, as well as her eighth overall on the chart.
The सोंग also topped the charts in हंगेरियाई और the United किंगडम और reached the शीर्ष पाँच in Canada, Ireland, नई Zealand, Norway और स्लोवाक.
the song received a नामांकन at the 54th Grammy Awards for बेहतरीन Rap/Sung Collaboration.
An accompanying म्यूज़िक वीडियो, directed by Philip andelman, portrays a रोमांटिक encounter between Rihanna and Drake in a grocery store साथ साथ romantic दृश्यों between the जोड़ी and Rihanna चलना through मैनहटन 's Lower ईस्ट Side.
`` कया 's My Name ? '' was promoted साथ सजीव प्रदर्शन आरपार दोनो पहलू of the अटलांटिक, सहित शनिवार रात्रि Live in America and the श्रेणी seven finale of The X Factor in the United Kingdom.
The latter प्रदर्शन resulted in an investigation from the country 's मीडिया नियामक, ofcom, लिये the raunchy nature of रिहाना 's पहनावा.
A mathematical निरंतर is a खास number, प्रायः a रियल क्रमांक, कि is `` significantly दिलचस्प in some way ''.
स्थिरांक arise in अनेक अलग areas of mathematics, साथ स्थिरांक ऐसे as e ( mathematical constant ) | और pi| occurring in such विविध contexts as geometry, number theory और calculus.
What it अर्थात् लिये a constant to उठता `` naturally '', and कया makes a constant `` interesting '', is ultimately a पदार्थ of taste, and कुछ mathematical स्थिरांक are notable more लिये historical reasons than for उनके मूलभूत गणितीय ब्याज.
the अधिक popular स्थिरांक have been पढ़ाई throughout the ages और computed to अनेक दशमलव स्थान.
All mathematical स्थिरांक are definable numbers and प्रायः हैं भी computable संख्याएँ ( chaitin 's constant होने a significant exception ).
Elections to the संयुक्त States Senate यहूद आयोजित on November 2, 2010, for 37 of the United States Senate 's 100 सीटे.
( a खास चुनाव on जनवरी 19, 2010 in Massachusetts थी आयोजित पहले in the साल. )
Thirty-four of the seats यहूद लिये six-year terms to the सीनेट 's `` class तीन '', और three यहूद खास elections लिये shorter शर्तें.
Of the 37 elections, 19 featured लाज़िम डेमोक्रेट ( 7 of जिसको रिटायर्ड or were defeated in the primary ) और 18 featured incumbent Republicans ( eight of whom retired or were पराजित in the primary ).
After the पिछला elections ( in 2008 ), the संयुक्त States सीनेट थी रचित of 58 Democrats, 40 Republicans, and 2 independents who caucus with the Democrats.
republicans won चार सीटे आयोजित by retiring Democrats और republicans defeated two लाज़िम डेमोक्रेट.
This was the largest क्रमांक of republicans gains since the 1994 elections और भी the पहला time since कि चुनाव that republicans सफलतापूर्वक defended सब of उनके own seats.
This was the चौथी लगातार चुनाव of `` क्लास 3 '' सीनेटरों जहाँ डेमोक्रेट have विफल to gain सीटे and the third लगातार mid-term election held in a president 's first पद जहाँ Republicans have picked-up सीटे.
Despite ये रिपब्लिकन wins, however, the डेमोक्रेट retained a majority of the सीनेट साथ 51 seats plus 2 independents जो caucus with उन्हें, compared to the 47 Republicans.
A solstice is an खगोलीय इवेंट that occurs twice each year as the सूर्य reaches इसके highest or lowest excursion सापेक्ष to the celestial equator on the celestial गोला.
As a परिणाम, on the day of the संक्रांति, the सूर्य appears to have reached its उच्चतम or न्यूनतम सालाना ऊँचाई in the sky above the क्षितिज at local सौर नून.
the शब्द solstice is derived from the Latin sol ( सूर्य ) और sistere ( to स्टैंड still ), क्युकी at the solstices, the Sun stands still in उतार ; that is, the seasonal गति of the सूर्य 's path ( as देखी इससे धरती ) comes to a रोकें before reversing direction.
The solstices, together साथ the equinoxes, are connected साथ the सीज़न.
in many cultures the solstices चिह्नित either the शुरूआत or the midpoint of शीत और गर्मियाँ.
The term solstice can भी be प्रयुक्त in a broader भाव, as the तिथि ( day ) जब this occurs.
The day of the solstice is either the longest दिन of the year ( in गर्मियाँ ) or the shortest दिन of the year ( in शीत ) लिये any प्लेस बाहर of the tropics.
Jerry ली Lewis ( born सितंबर 29, 1935 ) is an American rock और फेंकें और देश music singer-songwriter और pianist.
He is known by the nickname `` The कातिल '' और is often viewed as “rock & roll 's first great जंगली man”.
An जल्दी पायोनियर of rock और roll म्यूज़िक, in 1956 Lewis बना his पहला recordings at Sun Records.
`` क्रेजी Arms `` sold 300,000 copies in the दक्षिण, but it was his 1957 hit `` पूरे Lotta Shakin ' Going On `` कि शॉट Lewis to fame worldwide.
Lewis followed इस in that वही साल when he recorded गीतों such as `` Great गेंदें of आग ``, `` breathless `` और `` ऊँची School गोपनीय ``.
लुईस बेची अधिक records than Elvis Presley at this time.
However, Lewis ' चट्टान 'n ' roll career faltered in the wake of उसके marriage to उसके young cousin.
He था little success in the चार्ट following the कांड और उसके लोकप्रियता जल्दी धुंधली.
His सजीव प्रदर्शन fees plummeted इससे $ 10,000 प्रति night to $ 250.
In the meantime he थी संकल्पित to लाभ वापस कुछ of उसके popularity.
During the early 60’s he किया n't have much chart success with few अपवाद such as `` What 'd i कह ``.
उसके सजीव performances at this time यहूद increasingly wild and energetic.
His album Live at the स्टार Club, हैम्बर्ग from 1964 is प्रायः regarded by अनेक म्यूज़िक journalists और fans as one of the wildest and greatest rock और roll concert एल्बम ever.
After recording गीतों such as `` i 'm on आग '' for अनेक years with छोटी success, in 1968 Lewis बना a transition into देश म्यूज़िक और था हिट्स साथ गीतों ऐसे as `` Another Place, Another समय ''.
This reignited उसके career and throughout the late '60s और '70s he regularly अव्वल the country-western charts.
His # 1 देश hits शामिल `` to मेक प्रेम मीठी लिये तुम ``, `` वहीँ जरूर be More to Love than This ``, `` होता You Take Another Chance on me `` and `` me And Bobby McGee ``.
लुईस 's successes continued throughout the decade और he embraced his rock 'n ' फेंकें पास्ट with गीतों such as a cover of the बिग Bopper 's `` chantilly फीता `` and `` Rockin ' My Life दूर ``.
In the 21st सदी लुईस continues to दौरे to ऑडियंस around the संसार and स्टिल रिलीज new albums.
One such एल्बम, titled पिछला Man Standing, is उसके best selling to तिथि at over a लाख copies sold विश्वव्यापी.
इस was followed by औसत बूढ़ा Man which has प्राप्त कुछ of the best sales of lewis’s करियर.
लुईस has था a dozen gold रिकॉर्ड in both rock and देश, जीती several Grammy awards, including a आजीवन उपलब्धि Award.
लुईस was inducted into the चट्टान and Roll Hall of कीर्ति in 1986, और उसके pioneering योगदान to the विधा has महरूम पहचाना by the rockabilly हॉल of कीर्ति.
In 1989, his जीवन थी chronicled in the फिल्म Great Balls of आग, starring Dennis quaid.
In 2003, Rolling स्टोन Magazine सूचीबद्ध his बक्सा नियत सब कातिल, no Filler : The Anthology number 242 on their सूची of `` 500 महानतम एल्बम of all time ``.
in 2004, they ranked him number 24 on उनके list of the 100 महानतम Artists of All समय.
Lewis is the पिछला surviving member of सूर्य Records ' लाख डालर quartet और the क्लास of '55 एल्बम, which भी शामिल Johnny नकदी, कार्ल Perkins, Roy Orbison and Elvis Presley.
हेनरी Louis Stephens, untitled watercolor ( 1863 ) of a man reading a newspaper साथ शीर्षक `` अध्यक्षीय उदघोषणा / गुलामी ''.
the emancipation Proclamation was an order issued to all खण्ड of the कार्यपालिका शाखा ( सहित the Army और नेवी ) of the United राज्य by President Abraham Lincoln on जनवरी 1, 1863, दौरान the American Civil युद्ध.
It was based on the president 's संवैधानिक authority as commander in मुख्य of the armed forces ; it was not a विधि passed by Congress.
it proclaimed all those enslaved in confederate territory to be forever free, and ordered the फौज ( and all खण्ड of the कार्यपालिका शाखा ) to treat as फ़्री सब those enslaved in टेन states that were still in rebellion, यूँ applying to 3.1 लाख of the 4 million स्लेव in the u.s.
the उदघोषणा could not be enforced in क्षेत्रों still under rebellion, लकिन as the army took control of Confederate regions, the slaves in those regions यहूद emancipated rather than लौटे to उनके मास्टर्स.
From 20,000 to 50,000 former स्लेव in regions where विद्रोह था already been subdued were immediately emancipated, और over 3 million अधिक यहूद emancipated as the Union फौज उन्नत.
The उदघोषणा किया नहीं apply to the पाँच स्लेव states कि यहूद नहीं in rebellion, nor to most regions already नियंत्रित by the Union army ; emancipation there would आइये बाद पृथक राज्य क्रियाएँ and/or the December 1865 अनुसमर्थन of the तेरहवीं Amendment, which बना slavery illegal everywhere in the u.s.
the Proclamation did नहीं compensate the स्वामी, did not itself गैरकानूनी गुलामी, and किया नहीं make the ex-slaves ( called freedmen ) नागरिकों.
it made the eradication of गुलामी an explicit war goal, in जोड to the लक्ष्य of reuniting the संघ.
On सितंबर 22, 1862, Lincoln had issued a प्रारंभिक proclamation that he होता अनुक्रम the emancipation of all स्लेव in any राज्य of the Confederate राज्य of अमेरिका कि did not return to Union control by जनवरी 1, 1863.
none लौटे, और the अनुक्रम, हस्ताक्षरित और जारी जनवरी 1, 1863, took effect except in स्थितियाँ where the संघ था already ज़्यादातर regained control.
The Proclamation outraged white Southerners who envisioned a race war, angered कुछ Northern Democrats, energized anti-slavery forces, और weakened शक्तियां in यूरोपीय कि wanted to intervene to help the Confederacy.
It also lifted the spirits of African Americans दोनो in the दक्षिणी and उत्तरी States, and led to अनेक slaves escaping उनके masters and कार्यशील behind Union लाइनों in अनुक्रम to have their emancipation enforced.
Sucker Punch is a 2011 American fantasy कार्रवाई film निर्देशित by Zack स्नाइडर और co-written by him और स्टीव शिबुया.
It is Snyder 's first फिल्मी आधारित on an original script.
The फिल्मी सितारों एमिली Browning, abbie Cornish, Jena malone, वैनेसा Hudgens, जेमी Chung, और Carla Gugino.
The कथानक फ़ॉलो the fantasies of a यंग woman who is committed to a दिमागी संस्था, as वो makes a plan to एस्केप the hospital पहले suffering a मस्तिष्कखंडछेदन.
The film was released in दोनो conventional और IMAX थिएटर in the United राज्य at मध्यरात्रि on March 25, 2011.
it प्राप्त generally negative समीक्षाएँ from critics, but was a moderate box office success.

haselblad 503cw साथ ixpress V96C डिजिटल back, an उदाहरण of a पेशेवर डिजिटल कैमरा प्रणाली
a डिजिटल कैमरा ( or digicam ) is a camera that takes video or स्टिल छायाचित्र by recording images on an electronic image सेंसर.
सबसे कैमरे sold today are digital, and digital cameras are incorporated into अनेक devices ranging इससे गुस्से और mobile फोन ( पुकारा कैमरा phones ) to वाहनों.
Digital और फिल्मी कैमरे share an optical प्रणाली, typically using a lens with a परिवर्तनीय diaphragm to focus लाइट onto an image पिकअप device.
The diaphragm and shutter admit the सही राशि of light to the imager, बस as साथ फिल्मी लकिन the image pickup device is electronic बल्कि than रासायनिक.
However, नापसंद film cameras, डिजिटल कैमरे can display बिंब on a screen तत्काल बाद being अंकित, and स्टोर और हटाएँ बिंब इससे मेमोरी.
अनेक digital cameras can भी रिकार्ड चलती वीडियो साथ ध्वनि.
Some digital कैमरे can crop और stitch तस्वीरें and perform other elementary image editing.

Multiple वेब servers may be used लिये a ऊँची ट्रैफ़िक website, here four Sun आग x4200 सर्वर हैं installed साथ
Web server can refer to either the hardware ( the computer ) or the software ( the computer अनुप्रयोग ) that helps to उद्धार वेब content कि can be accessed through the अंतरजाल.
The most common use of web servers is to host websites, लकिन there हैं अन्य uses such as गेमिंग, data storage or running enterprise अनुप्रयोग.
The अमरीकी रेड Cross ( चाप ), also ज्ञात as the अमरीकी नेशनल रेड Cross, is a humanitarian organization कि provides emergency सहायता, विपत्ति राहत और शिक्षा inside the संयुक्त States.
it is the designated u.S. संबद्ध of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ of रेड क्रॉस और Red Crescent समाजों.
आज, in जोड to domestic विपत्ति relief, the American रेड Cross offers services in पाँच other areas : community services कि सहायता the needy ; संचार services and सुकून for सैन्य members और उनके family members ; the collection, प्रसंस्करण and वितरण of blood और रक्त products ; educational कार्यक्रम on preparedness, health, और सुरक्षा ; and international relief और development कार्यक्रम.
Issued a कॉरपोरेट charter by the संयुक्त States कॉंग्रेस under शीर्षक 36 of the United States Code, Section 3001, the अमरीकी नेशनल Red Cross is governed by volunteers and supported by जातियाँ दान, income इससे health और सुरक्षा training और उत्पाद, and income from रक्त products.
The American रेड क्रॉस is headquartered in Washington, d.c.

a मुर्गा ( भी पुकारा a cockerel or cock ) is a male gallinaceous bird.
it usually refers to a पुरूष chicken ( gallus gallus ).
Immature male मुर्गियों कम than एक year बूढ़ा हैं पुकारा cockerels.
the पद `` rooster '' originates in the United States, and the पद is widely प्रयुक्त throughout North अमेरिका, as well as Australia और नई Zealand.
In the United Kingdom और Ireland the पुरानी पद `` cockerel '' is अधिक commonly प्रयुक्त.
`` मुर्गा '' is in general उपयोग as the नाम लिये a पुरूष of other species of bird, for उदाहरण `` मुर्गा गौरैया ''.
`` Roosting '' is the action of perching aloft to नींद at night, और is done by both sexes.
The rooster is polygamous, but can नहीं गार्ड several nests of eggs at एकबार.
He गार्ड the general area जहाँ उसके hens are nesting, and होगा attack अन्य roosters कि डालें उसके territory.
दौरान the दिन, he प्रायः sits on a high पर्च, प्रायः 3–5 फीट off the ground to serve as a lookout for उसके flock.
He will sound a distinctive alarm कॉल if परभक्षी हैं nearby.
The Pokémon Trading Card खेल ( पोकीमॉन TCG ) is a collectible card खेल आधारित on the पोकीमॉन video खेल श्रेणी, first published in अक्तूबर 1996 by Media Factory in जापानी.
In the US, it थी initially प्रकाशित by wizards of the Coast, the कम्पनी that produces, in दिसम्बर 1998.
Nintendo took over प्रकाशन in जून 2003.
it is एक of Nintendo 's last remaining दमदार links to its heritage as a playing कार्ड कम्पनी.
जमीन रोवर is a British car manufacturer साथ its मुख्यालय in gaydon, Warwickshire, United किंगडम जिससे specialises in four-wheel-drive वाहनों.
It is part of the Jaguar जमीन रोवर समूह, a subsidiary of tata Motors of India.
it is the दूसरी oldest four-wheel-drive car brand in the संसार ( after Jeep ).
The जमीन Rover नाम थी originally used by the रोवर Company लिये एक specific गाडी मॉडल, named simply the Land Rover, शुभारम्भ by रोवर in 1948.
over the following years it developed into a marque encompassing a दायरा of four-wheel-drive मॉडल, सहित the Defender, Discovery, Freelander, Range Rover, Range Rover खेल and Range रोवर evoque.
Land Rovers हैं फिलहाल assembled in the कम्पनी 's Halewood and Solihull plants, with शोध and विकास लेने प्लेस at jlr 's gaydon and whitley अभियान्त्रिकी centres.
जमीन रोवर sold 194,000 वाहनों worldwide in 2009.
Although the brand originates from the original 1948 मॉडल, Land Rover as a company has तभी existed चूंकि 1978.
Prior to this, it was a उत्पाद लकीर of the रोवर Company which was subsequently अवशोषित into the rover-triumph प्रभाग of the British Leyland Motor निगम ( bl ) following leyland Motor निगम ’s कब्ज़ा of रोवर in 1967.
the जारी commercial success of the असली Land Rover श्रेणी मॉडल, और latterly the Range Rover in the 1970s in the midst of bl’s खूब प्रलेखित business troubles prompted the स्थापना of a separate जमीन Rover कम्पनी but स्टिल अंतर्गत the bl छतरियाँ, बाकी भाग of the subsequent Rover समूह in 1988, अंतर्गत the स्वामित्व of British Aerospace after the remains of अंग्रेजों leyland were broken up and privatised.
In 1994 Rover Group plc थी acquired by bmw.
In 2000, Rover Group was broken-up by bmw and Land Rover was बेची to घाट मोटर Company, बनने भाग of its Premier ऑटोमोटिव Group.
in 2006 घाट खरीदा the रोवर ब्रांड इससे BMW लिये around £6 million.
This reunited the Rover and Land रोवर brands for the first समय since 2000 when the रोवर group was टूटा up by bmw.
in June 2008, Ford बेची both Land Rover और जैगुआर Cars to tata Motors.
इस sale भी included the dormant रोवर ब्रांड
The कवर of the first dvd संकलन released by Aniplex of The New कप्तान Shūsuke amagai चाप
the ninth ऋतु of the ब्लीच anime श्रेणी is named.
The श्रेणी is based on tite Kubo 's manga साथ same नाम.
the episodes हैं निर्देशित by Noriyuki abe and produced by TV टोकियो, Dentsu, और Studio pierrot.
The episodes ' plot focuses on the परिचय of a new आत्मा Reaper captain, Shūsuke amagai, and the रहस्य surrounding the kasumiōji clan, एक of the परिवारों कि constitute the धामों of आत्मा समाज.
the season began airing on April 23, 2008 in जापानी on tv Tokyo and ended on अक्तूबर 7, 2008.
The English अनुकूलन of the ब्लीच दुश्मनी is licensed by Viz Media, और इस चाप began airing on August 28, 2010 on Cartoon संजाल 's Adult Swim, and समाप्त on जनवरी 29, 2011.
Five dvd compilations, each containing चार episodes of the ऋतु, have been released by aniplex ; the first dvd compilation was released on November 26, 2008 और the पांचवां on कूच 25, 2009.
A dvd बक्सा will be प्रकाशित by Viz मीडिया on December 13, 2011.
The episodes use three pieces of theme music : एक खोलने थीम and दो closing विषयवस्तु.
The खोलने theme is `` Chu-Bura `` by kelun.
the first closing थीम is `` नारंगी '' by lil'b, used लिये episodes 168 to 179, और the second closing theme is `` Gallop '' by pe'zmoku, प्रयुक्त लिये the शेष of the episodes.
the विनियमन of prostitution in the United States is नहीं among the enumerated शक्तियां of the संघीय सरकारी ; Under the Tenth Amendment to the United States Constitution, it is इसलिए exclusively the डोमेन of the states to परमिट, prohibit, or otherwise regulate वाणिज्यिक sex, except insofar as कॉंग्रेस may regulate it as भाग of अंतरराज्यीय कॉमर्स साथ कानून जैसे the Mann Act.
In most states, वेश्यावृति is माना a misdemeanor in the category of public अनुक्रम अपराधों, a अपराधों that disrupts the अनुक्रम of a community.
It थी at एक समय considered to be a vagrancy crime.
फिलहाल, Nevada is the only राज्य to allow brothel वेश्यावृति, the शर्तें of जिससे are stipulated in the नेवाडा संशोधित Statutes.
Only 8 counties currently contain क्रियाशील brothels.
All फ़ॉर्म of वेश्यावृति हैं illegal in क्लार्क काउंटी ( which contains the लास Vegas–Paradise महानगर क्षेत्रफल ), washoe County ( जिससे contains Reno ), कार्सन नगर, Douglas County, and lincoln काउंटी.
the अन्य counties theoretically allow brothel prostitution, but some of ये काउंटी currently have no active brothels.
Street prostitution, `` pandering, '' and living off of the proceeds of a वेश्या remain illegal अंतर्गत Nevada law, as elsewhere in the देश.
As with अन्य countries, prostitution in the संयुक्त राज्य can be विभाजित into तीन broad श्रेणी : street prostitution, वेश्यालय prostitution, और escort वेश्यावृति.
the East coast of the संयुक्त राज्य, also ज्ञात as the Eastern Seaboard or the Atlantic seaboard और commonly shortened to East Coast, refers to the easternmost coast of the United राज्य along the अटलांटिक Ocean.
the states जिससे have shoreline on the ईस्ट Coast are, इससे उत्तर to south, the U.S. states of Maine, New हैम्पशायर, Massachusetts, Rhode द्वीप, कनेक्टिकट, नई York, नई जर्सी, Delaware, मेरीलैंड, वर्जिनिया, North कैरोलिना, दक्षिण कैरोलिना, जॉर्जिया, और फ्लोरिडा.
रिचर्ड Milhous निक्सन ( जनवरी 9, 1913 – April 22, 1994 ) was the 37th President of the संयुक्त राज्य, serving इससे 1969 to 1974, when he became the तभी president to resign the office.
निक्सन था previously served as a रिपब्लिकन u.S. प्रतिनिधि और सीनेटर इससे कैलिफ़ोर्निया and as the 36th Vice अध्यक्ष of the United राज्य इससे 1953 to 1961.
Nixon थी born in yorba Linda, California.
he ग्रैजुएट इससे Whittier College in 1934 and ड्यूक University School of Law in 1937, returning to कैलिफ़ोर्निया to अभ्यास law.
he और his बीवी, पैट Nixon, moved to वॉशिंगटन to work लिये the संघीय सरकारी in 1942.
he subsequently served in the संयुक्त States नेवी during संसार युद्ध II.
Nixon was निर्वाचित in कैलिफ़ोर्निया to the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि in 1946 और to the सीनेट in 1950.
His pursuit of the alger hiss मामला स्थापित his प्रतिष्ठा as a leading anti-communist, और elevated उसे to नेशनल prominence.
he was the कार्यशील mate of ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर, the रिपब्लिकन Party अध्यक्षीय nominee in the 1952 election.
निक्सन served for आठ years as वाइस president.
He waged an unsuccessful अध्यक्षीय campaign in 1960, narrowly losing to जॉन F. Kennedy, and lost a रेस for Governor of कैलिफ़ोर्निया in 1962.
In 1968, he भागा again for the प्रेसिडेंसी और was elected.
हालांकि Nixon initially escalated अमेरिका 's भागीदारी in the Vietnam War, he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973.
Nixon 's विज़िट to the लोगों 's Republic of चीन in 1972 खोली राजनयिक संबंध between the two nations, and he initiated détente और the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty with the Soviet संघ the same year.
domestically, उसके प्रशासन generally embraced नीतियों कि transferred शक्ति इससे वॉशिंगटन to the राज्य.
among अन्य things, he शुभारम्भ पहलों to लड़ो कर्कट और illegal drugs, imposed मजदूरी and दाम नियंत्रण, enforced desegregation of कुछ Southern schools, और established the Environmental सुरक्षा एजेंसी.
Though he presided over the lunar landings beginning with अपोलो 11, he scaled back मानवयुक्त स्पेस exploration.
he was re-elected by a landslide in 1972.
निक्सन 's दूसरी term saw an अरब आयल embargo, the इस्तीफा of his वाइस president, spiro Agnew, और a continuing series of खुलासे about the Watergate scandal और अन्य misconduct by सदस्यों of the administration.
The कांड escalated, costing निक्सन much of उसके राजनैतिक support, और on अगस्त 9, 1974, he resigned in the फेस of लगभग निश्चित impeachment और हटाना इससे office.
After उसके resignation, he controversially प्राप्त a pardon issued by his successor, जेराल्ड घाट.
in रिटायरमेंट, Nixon 's work as an elder statesman, authoring several books और undertaking अनेक foreign यात्राएँ, helped to rehabilitate उसके पब्लिक image.
he suffered a debilitating स्ट्रोक on अप्रैल 18, 1994, and died four दिनों later at the age of 81.
sertraline hydrochloride ( व्यापार names zoloft, Lustral ) is an antidepressant of the चयनात्मक serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( ssri ) क्लास.
it थी introduced to the market by फाइजर in 1991.
sertraline is primarily विहित for प्रमुख depressive विकार in वयस्क outpatients as खूब as obsessive–compulsive, दहशत, और social anxiety disorders in both वयस्कों and children.
In 2011, it थी the second-most prescribed antidepressant on the U.S. retail मार्केट, साथ 37,208,000 prescriptions.
The efficacy of sertraline लिये depression is similar to that of older tricyclic antidepressants, लकिन its पक्ष effects are much less pronounced.
मतभेद साथ नए antidepressants are subtler and भी ज़्यादातर confined to side प्रभाव.
Evidence suggests कि sertraline may कार्य बेहतर than fluoxetine ( prozac ) लिये कुछ subtypes of अवसाद.
Treatment of दहशत disorder साथ sertraline परिणाम in a significant decrease of the number of दहशत हमले and in improved विशेषता of जीवन.
For obsessive-compulsive disorder, sertraline is not as प्रभावी as संज्ञानात्मक behavioral चिकित्सा ; the बेहतरीन परिणाम have महरूम हासिल by combining these दो उपचार.
हालांकि स्वीकृत लिये सोशल phobia और posttraumatic stress विकार, sertraline leads to only modest सुधार in ये शर्तें.
sertraline भी alleviates the लक्षण of premenstrual dysphoric disorder and can be used in sub-therapeutic doses or intermittently for its treatment.
Sertraline shares the common पक्ष प्रभाव and contraindications of other ssris, with ऊँची rates of nausea, अतिसार, अनिद्रा, and sexual side effects ; however, it करता not cause वज़न लाभ, और its effects on both cognition and vigilance are relatively mild.
In pregnant women लेने sertraline, the ड्रग was उपस्थित in significant एकाग्रता in fetal रक्त, and थी भी संबद्ध with a उच्चतर रेट of various जनम defects.
similarly to other antidepressants, the use of sertraline लिये अवसाद may be associated with a उच्चतर रेट of suicidality.
The Five Heartbeats is a 1991 musical drama film directed by रॉबर्ट टाउनसेंड, जो co-wrote the script साथ Keenan Ivory Wayans.
Distributed by 20th सदी फॉक्स, the फिल्मी 's प्रमुख डाल includes टाउनसेंड, Michael Wright, Leon रॉबिन्सन, हैरी J. Lennix, Tico कुएं, Harold Nicholas of the Nicholas भाइयो, and diahann Carroll.
the प्लाट of the film ( जिससे is loosely based on the lives of several कलाकारों : The Dells, the Temptations, चार Tops, विल्सन पिकेट, James भूरा, फ्रेंकी Lymon, sam cooke and अन्य ) फ़ॉलो the तीन दशक career of the R & b vocal समूह The पाँच Heartbeats.
The film depicts the rise and fall of a motown inspired soul act through the आँखें of the फिल्मी 's प्रमुख समर्थक, Donald `` बतख '' Matthews ( portrayed by टाउनसेंड ), जो serves as a narrator throughout the film.
However, a बहुमत of the सिनेमा is प्रस्तुत in a लगातार time लकीर as opposed to traditional flash backs.
The फिल्मी शामिल a significant amount of original म्यूज़िक conceived by विभिन्न artists लिये the फिल्मी 's soundtrack, including singles ऐसे as `` a Heart Is a House for प्रेम ``, `` We Have n't Finished yet '', and `` Nothing लकिन प्रेम ''.
the film थी released to सबसे उत्तर American audiences कूच 29, 1991 however it was नहीं बना available to ऑडियंस in other continents जबतक 2002 when a dvd थी released prior to another DVD release in 2006 लिये the फिल्मी 's 15th anniversary.
The movie received मिश्रित reviews from आलोचकों.
सचिवालय ( March 30, 1970 – October 4, 1989 ) थी an अमरीकी Thoroughbred racehorse कि in 1973 became the पहला U.S. Triple Crown चैंपियन in 25 सालो.
He नियत race रिकॉर्ड in सब three कार्यक्रम in the Series — the केंटकी डर्बी ( 1:59.4 ), the preakness Stakes ( 1:53 ), और the Belmont stakes ( 2:24 ) — रिकॉर्ड that स्टिल स्टैंड आज.
he is considered to be एक of the महानतम thoroughbreds of all time.
In 1999, ईएसपीएन क्रमित सचिवालय the 35th best खिलाड़ी of the 20th सदी, the highest रैंकिंग racehorse on the list url_http.
He ranked second behind man o ' युद्ध in The Blood-Horse 's सूची of the Top 100 u.S. Racehorses of the 20th Century.
सचिवालय was sired by बिंदास Ruler out of Somethingroyal, by Princequillo.
He was foaled at The Meadow in Caroline काउंटी, Virginia.
जैसे his famous पूर्ववर्ती Man o ' युद्ध, Secretariat was a large chestnut टट्टू and थी given the same nickname, `` बिग रेड. ''
Secretariat 's grandsire, Nasrullah, is भी the great-great-grandsire of 1977 Triple Crown विजेता सिएटल slew.
स्वामित्व by Penny chenery, he थी trained by lucien laurin and mainly ridden by कनाडाई jockey रॉन turcotte, साथ with apprentice jockey Paul फेलिसियानो ( पहला दो races ), और दिग्गज Eddie Maple ( last रेस ).
he raced in chenery 's Meadow Stable 's blue and श्वेत checkered रंगों और his groom was Eddie Sweat.
सचिवालय stood लगभग tall, और weighed, साथ a 75-inch girth, in उसके racing प्रधान.
a typical 12 V, 40 ah lead-acid car battery
an ऑटोमोटिव battery is a type of rechargeable battery कि supplies electric उर्जा to an automobile.
प्रायः this refers to an SLI बैटरी ( starting, lighting, ignition ) to शक्ति the starter मोटर, the lights, और the प्रज्वलन प्रणाली of a vehicle’s engine.
ऑटोमोटिव SLI बैटरी हैं usually lead-acid type, and हैं बना of छह galvanic कोशिकाएं in श्रेणी to provide a 12 volt system.
प्रत्येक cell provides 2.1 volts for a कुल of 12.6 वोल्ट at पूरा charge.
Heavy vehicles such as राजमार्ग trucks or tractors, प्रायः equipped साथ diesel इंजन, may have two बैटरी in श्रेणी लिये a 24 वोल्ट प्रणाली, or may have समानांतर स्ट्रिंग्स of batteries.
Lead-acid बैटरी हैं made up of प्लेटों of सीसे और पृथक plates of lead डाइऑक्साइड, जिससे are submerged into an electrolyte solution of परिचय 38 % sulfuric acid और 62 % जल.
इस कल्याणकारी a chemical प्रतिक्रिया कि रिलीज electrons, allowing उन्हें to प्रवाह through conductors to उपज विद्युत.
As the battery discharges, the acid of the electrolyte प्रतिक्रियाएँ with the सामग्री of the plates, changing their surface to lead sulfate.
When the battery is recharged, the chemical reaction is reversed : the सीसे sulfate reforms into lead डाइऑक्साइड और lead.
साथ the प्लेटों लौटी to उनके असली कंडीशन, the प्रक्रम may अभी be repeated.
बैटरी recycling of ऑटोमोटिव batteries reduces the need for resources required for manufacture of new बैटरी, diverts toxic lead इससे landfills, और prevents रिस्क of improper निपटान.
Full-time नियुक्ति is नियुक्ति in which a व्यक्ति works a न्यूनतम क्रमांक of hours पारिभाषित as such by his/her नियोक्ता.
Full-time employment प्रायः आता with लाभ that हैं not typically offered to part-time, अस्थाई, or flexible workers, such as annual छोड़, sickleave, and स्वास्थ्य बीमे.
Full-time कार्य are often माना careers.
They generally pay more than part-time कार्य, and usually carry अधिक hours per week.
The मेला मजदूर Standards अधिनियम ( FLSA ) does नहीं define full-time employment or part-time नियुक्ति.
This is a पदार्थ generally to be determined by the employer ( us विभाग of मजदूर ).
The definition by employer can vary and is generally प्रकाशित in a कम्पनी 's कर्मचारी हैंडबुक.
Companies commonly आवश्यकता from 30–35 or 40 hours per week to be defined as full-time और therefore योग्य for benefits.
full-time status varies between company and is often आधारित on the shift the कर्मचारी जरूर कार्य during प्रत्येक work week.
The `` standard '' work week consists of five eight-hour days, commonly served between 9:00am to 5:00PM totaling 40 घंटों.
जबकि a four-day सप्ताह generally consists of four ten-hour days ; it may also consist of as छोटी as nine hours लिये a कुल of a 36 hour work week.
twelve-hour शिफ्ट are often three days प्रति week, जबतक the company has the intention of paying out the employee overtime.
ओवरटाइम is legally सशुल्क out anytime an कर्मचारी works more than 40 hours प्रति week.
The विधिक न्यूनतम for overtime starts at Base अदा + one-half.
The increased payout is माना to compensate थोड़ा लिये the increased थकान which a person अनुभवों on such long शिफ्ट.
Shifts can also be very irregular, as in retail, लकिन are स्टिल full-time if the required number of घंटों is reached.
वहीँ हैं some परिस्थितियों जहाँ a person जो needs full-time work is dropped to part-time, which is sometimes a रूप of constructive dismissal to avoid paying unemployment benefits to a laid-off कार्यकर्ता.
seahorse is the शीर्षक दिए to 54 species of समुद्री fish in the genus Hippocampus.
`` Hippocampus '' comes from the प्राचीन यूनानी hippos meaning `` horse '' and kampos meaning `` समुद्र monster ''.
the Controlled Substances Act ( सीएसए ) was enacted into law by the Congress of the संयुक्त राज्य as शीर्षक II of the Comprehensive ड्रग Abuse Prevention और कंट्रोल अधिनियम of 1970.
the CSA is the संघीय U.S. ड्रग नीति under which the manufacture, importation, कब्ज़ा, use and वितरण of निश्चित substances is regulated.
The Act also served as the national implementing legislation for the सिंगल सम्मेलन on narcotic दवाएँ.
the विधान created five Schedules ( classifications ), with varying योग्यता for a पदार्थ to be included in प्रत्येक.
दो संघीय एजेंसियों, the ड्रग Enforcement Administration and the Food और Drug Administration, determine जिससे substances are added to or removed इससे the विभिन्न schedules, though the statute passed by कॉंग्रेस निर्मित the initial लिस्टिंग, और Congress has sometimes अनुसूचित other substances through विधान ऐसे as the hillory J. farias and सामन्था Reid Date-Rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000, which placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in अनुसूची I. Classification निर्णय हैं जरूरी to be बना on मापदण्ड including potential for गाली ( an अपरिभाषित पद ), currently स्वीकृत चिकित्सा use in treatment in the United राज्य, और international treaties.
Maya numerals
माया numerals are a vigesimal ( base - बीस ) numeral प्रणाली प्रयुक्त by the Pre-Columbian Maya सभ्यता.
The numerals हैं made up of तीन symbols ; zero ( shell shape ), एक ( a dot ) and five ( a bar ).
For उदाहरण, तेरह is written as तीन dots in a आड़ा row ऊपर दो horizontal लाइनों stacked ऊपर each other.
lyndon Baines जॉनसन ( August 27, 1908 – January 22, 1973 ), often referred to as lbj, was the 36th President of the United States ( 1963–1969 ), a स्थिति he assumed after उसके सेवा as the 37th वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States ( 1961–1963 ).
he is one of only चार people जो परोसा in all four निर्वाचित federal offices of the United राज्य : Representative, सीनेटर, Vice अध्यक्ष, और President.
Johnson, a डेमोक्रेट from Texas, परोसा as a United राज्य प्रतिनिधि from 1937–1949 and as a सीनेटर इससे 1949–1961, including six years as United States Senate Majority नेता, दो as Senate अल्पसंख्यक Leader और two as Senate Majority Whip.
After campaigning unsuccessfully for the Democratic नामांकन in 1960, Johnson थी पूछा by जॉन F. कैनेडी to be his कार्यशील mate for the 1960 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव.
जॉनसन succeeded to the presidency following the assassination of जॉन F. कैनेडी on November 22, 1963, समाप्त Kennedy 's term and थी elected President in उसके own सही, winning by a large हाशिया over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 चुनाव.
Johnson थी greatly समर्थित by the Democratic Party and as President, he थी responsible for डिजाइनिंग the `` Great Society `` विधान कि शामिल कानून that upheld civil अधिकारों, पब्लिक broadcasting, medicare, Medicaid, environmental protection, aid to शिक्षा, और उसके `` War on Poverty. ''
Johnson was renowned for उसके domineering personality और the `` Johnson उपचार, '' उसके coercion of शक्तिशाली राजनेता in order to अग्रिम विधान.
Meanwhile, जॉनसन escalated अमरीकी involvement in the वियतनाम युद्ध, from 16,000 अमरीकी advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 कॉम्बैट सैनिकों in जल्दी 1968, as American casualties soared और the सलाम process bogged down.
The भागीदारी stimulated a large angry antiwar movement आधारित विशेषकर on विश्वविद्यालयों campuses in the u.S. and abroad.
गर्मियाँ riots broke आउट in सबसे प्रमुख शहरों after 1965, and अपराधों rates soared, as his प्रतिद्वंद्वियों उठाया demands for `` विधि और order '' policies.
The Democratic Party विभाजित in multiple feuding गिरोहों, और after Johnson किया poorly in the 1968 नई हैम्पशायर primary, he ended उसके bid for reelection.
रिपब्लिकन Richard निक्सन थी निर्वाचित to succeed उसे.
Historians argue that Johnson 's प्रेसिडेंसी चिह्नित the peak of modern उदारतावाद in the United राज्य after the नई Deal era.
Johnson is ranked favorably by some इतिहासकारों because of उसके domestic policies.
Progesterone also known as P4 ( pregn-4-ene-3,20-dione ) is a c-21 स्टेरॉयड हार्मोन involved in the मादा menstrual साईकिल, pregnancy ( supports gestation ) और embryogenesis of इंसानो and other species.
Progesterone belongs to a class of हार्मोन पुकारा progestogens, और is the प्रमुख naturally occurring इंसान progestogen.
Big बर्ड is a protagonist of the children 's television दिखाएँ Sesame Street.
officially performed by Caroll Spinney चूंकि 1969, he is an eight-foot two-inch ( 249 cm ) लम्बा bright primrose-yellow बर्ड.
he can roller स्केट, बर्फ skate, dance, गाओ, लिखें काव्य, draw और even सवारी a unicycle.
लकिन despite इस wide array of talents, he is prone to बारंबार misunderstandings, on एक अवसर भी गायन the alphabet as one बिग long word ( इससे the song called `` abc-def-ghi, '' pronounced `` ab-keddef-gajihkel-monop-quristuv-wixyz '' ), pondering कया it could ever mean.
He lives in a विशाल nest behind the 123 तिल गली brownstone and रै a टेडी भालू named Radar.

It provides web, social, and मोबाईल analytics और other तन्त्र समाधान सम्बन्धित to विपणन प्रज्ञा.

the Second Crusade ( 1145–1149 ) थी the दूसरी major crusade शुभारम्भ इससे यूरोपीय.
The Second Crusade was started in जवाब to the पतन of the County of Edessa the पिछला साल to the forces of zengi.
the काउंटी था been संस्थापित दौरान the First crusade ( 1096–1099 ) by Baldwin of boulogne in 1098.
जबकि it थी the पहला जेहादी राज्य to be founded, it थी भी the first to fall.
the दूसरी Crusade थी घोषित by पोप Eugene iii, और was the first of the क्रूसेड to be led by यूरोपीय किंग्स, namely Louis सात of फ़्रांस और Conrad iii of Germany, with help from a number of अन्य यूरोपीय nobles.
the सेना of the two किंग्स marched separately across Europe.
After क्रासिंग बीज़ान्टिन territory into Anatolia, दोनो armies यहूद separately पराजित by the Seljuq Turks.
the main पश्चिमी ईसाई source, odo of deuil, और Syriac ईसाई sources claim that the बीज़ान्टिन सम्राट मैनुएल i Comnenus secretly hindered the crusaders ' progress, particularly in Anatolia where he is alleged to have deliberately ordered Turks to attack उन्हें.
Louis and Conrad and the remnants of उनके सेना reached Jerusalem और, in 1148, participated in an ill-advised आक्रमण on Damascus.
the crusade in the east was a failure for the crusaders and a ग्रेट victory for the मुसलमान.
It would ultimately have a कुंजी influence on the fall of Jerusalem और give rise to the तीसरा Crusade at the end of the 12th century.
The तभी कामयाबी of the दूसरी Crusade came to a combined force of 13,000 Flemish, Frisian, नॉर्मन, अंग्रेज़ी, Scottish, and German crusaders in 1147.
यात्राएं from England, by ship, to the पावन Land, the army stopped और helped the छोटी ( 7,000 ) पुर्तगाली फौज in the capture of Lisbon, expelling इसके मूरिश occupants.
wal-mart Stores, Inc. ( ), branded as Walmart, is an अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय खुदरा निगम that runs जंजीरों of विशाल छूट department स्टोर्स और गोदाम स्टोर्स.
The company is the world 's तीसरा largest पब्लिक निगम, according to the Fortune Global 500 सूची in 2012, the biggest private नियोक्ता in the संसार with over दो लाख कर्मचारी, and is the largest रिटेलर in the world.
walmart remains a family-owned business, as the कम्पनी is नियंत्रित by the वाल्टन परिवार, जो own a 48 percent stake in Walmart.
It is भी एक of the संसार 's most मूल्यवान companies.
The company was संस्थापित by Sam वाल्टन in 1962, incorporated on October 31, 1969, और सरेआम traded on the New York भण्डार एक्सचेंज in 1972.
it is headquartered in Bentonville, अरकंसास.
Walmart is also the largest किराना retailer in the संयुक्त States.
in 2009, it उत्पन्न 51 प्रतिशत of इसके us $ 258 billion sales in the u.S. from किराना कारोबार.
It also owns और operates the sam 's क्लबों retail warehouses in North America.
By 1988, wal-mart थी the most profitable रिटेलर in the US, और by नवम्बर 1990, it outsold K-mart.
By 1991 it outsold सियर्स in retail, बनाना it अमेरिका 's largest retailer, a distinction it स्टिल holds.
Walmart रै 8,500 स्टोर्स in 15 देशों, अंतर्गत 55 अलग names.
The कम्पनी operates अंतर्गत the Walmart नाम in the United States, including the 50 राज्य और प्यूर्टो Rico.
It operates in Mexico as Walmex, in the United Kingdom as asda, in जापानी as seiyu, और in इण्डिया as Best दाम.
it रै wholly स्वामित्व operations in अर्जेंटीना, ब्राज़ील, और Canada.
Walmart 's investments outside उत्तर अमेरिका have had मिश्रित results : its परिचालन in the संयुक्त किंगडम, दक्षिण America, and चीन are अत्यधिक कामयाब, whereas ventures in जर्मनी और दक्षिण कोरियाई यहूद unsuccessful.
रॉबर्ट William Gary मूर ( 4 अप्रैल 1952 – 6 फ़रवरी 2011 ), was a उत्तरी Irish संगीतकार, सबसे widely recognised as a सिंगर और guitarist.
in a career dating वापस to the 1960s, Moore निभाई साथ कलाकारों सहित फिल lynott and Brian downey during his teens, leading उसे to memberships साथ the आयरिश bands Skid Row and पतला lizzy on तीन पृथक occasions.
मूर साझा the स्टेज with ऐसे ब्लूज़ and चट्टान luminaries as b.b. King, Albert किंग, Colosseum II, George हैरिसन और ग्रेग Lake, as well as having a successful सोलो करियर.
he guested on a number of albums recorded by ऊँची profile संगीतकारों, including a कैमियो appearance playing the सीसे गिटार सोलो on `` She 's my Baby `` इससे traveling Wilburys आवाज़. 3.

a वेब hosting service is a प्रकार of अंतरजाल होस्टिंग सेवा कि allows individuals and organizations to make their जालस्थल accessible via the World चौड़ी Web.
वेब होस्ट are companies कि provide space on a सर्वर स्वामित्व or leased लिये उपयोग by क्लाइंट, as खूब as providing अंतरजाल कनेक्टिविटी, typically in a data बीच.
Web होस्ट can also provide आंकड़ा center स्पेस and connectivity to the अंतरजाल for अन्य servers located in उनके आंकड़ा center, पुकारा colocation, भी ज्ञात as Housing in लैटिन अमेरिका or France.
The scope of web होस्टिंग services varies greatly.
The most मौलिक is web पेज और small-scale संचिका hosting, where files can be uploaded via संचिका Transfer प्रोटोकॉल ( एफटीपी ) or a Web interface.
the फाइलें हैं प्रायः delivered to the Web `` as is '' or साथ minimal प्रसंस्करण.
अनेक अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाताओं ( ISPs ) offer this सेवा free to सदस्य.
individuals और संगठन may also obtain वेब page hosting इससे alternative सेवा providers.
निजी वेब साईट होस्टिंग is typically free, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
कारोबार web site hosting often has a उच्चतर expense depending upon the आकार and प्रकार of the जालस्थल.
Single पेज hosting is generally sufficient लिये personal web pages.
A जटिल site calls लिये a more comprehensive package कि provides डेटाबेस support and अनुप्रयोग development platforms ( e.g. PHP, जावा, माणिक्य on Rails, ColdFusion, or asp.net ).
ये facilities allow ग्राहक to लिखें or install scripts for अनुप्रयोग जैसे forums and content management.
Also, Secure Sockets Layer ( SSL ) is typically प्रयुक्त for e-commerce.
the host may भी provide an interface or control panel for managing the Web सर्वर and installing scripts, as खूब as other मौड्यूल and सेवा अनुप्रयोग जैसे e-mail.
Some होस्ट specialize in certain software or services ( e.g. e-commerce ), which हैं commonly प्रयुक्त by larger companies कि outsource संजाल infrastructure.
Obstetrics ( इससे the लैटिन obstare, `` to stand by '' ) is the medical specialty dealing साथ the care of all महिलाओं 's reproductive tracts और their children during गर्भावस्था ( prenatal period ), प्रसव and the postnatal period.
Many obstetricians are भी स्त्रीरोग, meaning they perform in दोनो specialties.
in the United राज्य, these physicians are commonly referred to as OB/GYNs.
the राइट भाइयो, Orville ( अगस्त 19, 1871 – January 30, 1948 ) और Wilbur ( April 16, 1867 – May 30, 1912 ), were two अमरीकी brothers, आविष्कारक, and aviation pioneers who यहूद credited साथ inventing और भवन the संसार 's पहला कामयाब airplane और making the first नियंत्रित, powered and sustained heavier-than-air human flight, on दिसम्बर 17, 1903.
From 1905 to 1907, the भाइयो विकसित उनके flying machine into the first व्यावहारिक fixed-wing aircraft.
Although not the पहला to निर्माण and fly experimental aircraft, the राइट brothers यहूद the first to invent aircraft नियंत्रण कि made fixed-wing powered उड़ान संभावित.
The brothers ' fundamental भेदन थी their invention of three-axis कंट्रोल, जिससे सक्रिय the पायलट to steer the aircraft effectively और to maintain its संतुलन.
This method became मानक and remains मानक on fixed-wing aircraft of all kinds.
From the beginning of their aeronautical work, the Wright brothers focused on विकासशील a विश्वसनीय method of पायलट कंट्रोल as the कुंजी to solving `` the उड़ती problem ''.
इस दृष्टिकोण differed significantly इससे अन्य experimenters of the समय who put अधिक जोर on developing powerful इंजन.
Using a छोटी homebuilt wind टनल, the wrights भी collected अधिक सटीक data than कोई before, enabling उन्हें to डिज़ाइन and निर्माण wings and propellers that were more कुशल than कोई पहले.
Their first u.S. पेटेंट, 821,393, did not अर्जी invention of a flying machine, लकिन बल्कि, the आविष्कार of a प्रणाली of aerodynamic कंट्रोल कि manipulated a उड़ती यंत्र 's सतहों.
They gained the mechanical skills अनिवार्य for उनके success by working लिये years in their shop with मुद्रण presses, bicycles, मोटर्स, and अन्य machinery.
Their कार्य साथ bicycles in particular बहकावे उनके विश्वास that an अस्थिर vehicle जैसे a उड़ती machine could be नियंत्रित और balanced with practice.
From 1900 जबतक उनके first powered फ़्लाइट in लेट 1903, they conducted extensive glider परीक्षण that भी विकसित उनके skills as pilots.
उनके bicycle दूकान कर्मचारी Charlie Taylor became an important part of the टोली, भवन उनके first वायुयान इंजन in बंद सहयोग with the भाइयो.
the Wright भाइयो ' status as inventors of the airplane has महरूम subject to counter-claims by various parties.
much controversy persists over the many स्पर्धा claims of जल्दी aviators.

A fashion spread और cover in सत्रह.

The first हाफ of the cycle took place in New यॉर्क नगर, moving the show back इससे Los Angeles पिछला season.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय गंतव्य for इस cycle is São पाउलो, Brazil, the श्रेणी पहला visit to दक्षिण अमेरिका.
The number of girls थी घटाया to 13, the first time चूंकि साईकिल 9, बाद being कायम at 14 in the पिछला two cycles.
