exxon Mobil निगम, or ExxonMobil, is an अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय oil and gas corporation headquartered in Irving, Texas, United राज्य.
it is a सीधा descendant of जॉन D. Rockefeller 's मानक आयल कम्पनी, और थी formed on November 30, 1999, by the merger of exxon और mobil.
it is संबद्ध with Imperial Oil जिससे operates in कनाडा.
exxonmobil is the संसार 's largest company by आय और in 2013, became the largest सरेआम traded कम्पनी by market capitalization in the संसार.
the company is ranked # 5 globally in Forbes Global 2000 list in 2013.
exxon mobil 's reserves were 72 billion oil-equivalent barrels at the end of 2007 और, at तब ( 2007 ) दरों of production, are expected to last over 14 सालो.
With 37 आयल refineries in 21 देशों constituting a combined रोज़ शोधन क्षमता of, Exxon Mobil is the largest refiner in the संसार, a title कि थी भी संबद्ध with मानक आयल since इसके incorporation in 1870.
exxonmobil is the largest of the संसार 's supermajors साथ रोज़ उत्पादन of 3.921 लाख BOE ( barrels of oil समतुल्य ).
In 2008, this थी approximately 3 % of world production, which is कम than अनेक of the largest state-owned petroleum companies.
जब ranked by आयल और गैस reserves it is 14th in the संसार साथ less than 1 % of the कुल.
a 2012 article in The रोज़ टेलीग्राफ says कि exxonmobil has `` grown into एक of the planet’s most hated corporations, समर्थ to determine अमरीकी foreign policy and the fate of संपूर्ण राष्ट्र ''.
in शर्तें of its पर्यावरणीय रिकार्ड, exxonmobil increasingly drills in terrains leased to उन्हें by dictatorships, ऐसे as those in Chad और भूमध्यरेखीय Guinea.
Lee Raymond, the corporation’s मुख्य कार्यपालिका until 2005, was `` notoriously sceptical परिचय climate change and disliked government interference at कोई level ''.
The company was widely criticized for इसके slow जवाब to cleaning इसके 1989 Valdez oil spill in Alaska.
इस article is about the ग्लोब Theatre of शेक्सपियर.
लिये the modern पुनर्निर्माण in London, देखिए Shakespeare 's Globe.
लिये other uses, see Globe थिएटर ( disambiguation ).
the Globe थिएटर थी a थिएटर in लंदन संबद्ध with William Shakespeare.
it was built in 1599 by शेक्सपियर 's playing company, the रब Chamberlain 's Men, on land स्वामित्व by Thomas Brend and inherited by उसके बेटे, निकोलस brend और grandson सर मैथ्यू brend, और थी नष्ट by आग on 29 जून 1613.
A दूसरी Globe Theatre was built on the वही साईट by जून 1614 और बंद in 1642.
a आधुनिक पुनर्निर्माण of the Globe, नामित `` Shakespeare 's Globe ``, opened in 1997 approximately इससे the site of the असली theatre.
It 's a अद्भुत जीवन is a 1946 American क्रिसमस drama फिल्मी उत्पादित और directed by Frank capra, आधारित on the short story `` the Greatest तोहफा ``, which Philip Van Doren stern लिखा in 1939 और privately प्रकाशित in 1945.
The film is considered एक of the सबसे loved films in अमरीकी cinema and has become परंपरागत देखने during the Christmas season, alongside popular classics ऐसे as चार्ल्स डिकेंस ' a क्रिसमस Carol.
the film सितारों James Stewart as George बेली, a man जो रै दिए up his सपनो in अनुक्रम to सहायता others और जिनकी निकट suicide on क्रिसमस संध्या brings about the हस्तक्षेप of उसके संरक्षक angel, Clarence Odbody ( हेनरी Travers ).
Clarence shows जार्ज all the जीवनदान he has छुआ और how अलग जीवन in उसके जातियाँ of Bedford Falls होता be था he never महरूम born.
despite initially performing poorly at the बक्सा दफ्तर due to ऊँची production costs और stiff competition at the time of इसके release, the film has come to be regarded as a क्लासिक and is a staple of क्रिसमस टेलीविज़न around the संसार.
Theatrically, the फिल्मी 's break-even पाइंट was दरअसल $ 6.3 लाख, लगभग twice the उत्पादन लागत, a figure it never came close to achieving in its आरंभिक रिलीज.
an appraisal in 2006 reported : `` हालांकि it थी not the पूरा box दफ्तर failure कि today everyone believes... it थी initially a प्रमुख disappointment and confirmed, at least to the studios, that capra थी no longer capable of turning out the populist सुविधाएँ कि बना his films the must-see, money-making कार्यक्रम they एकबार यहूद. ''
the film थी nominated लिये पाँच Oscars and has been recognized by the American Film Institute as एक of the 100 best American films ever made, रखकर क्रमांक 11 on इसके आरंभिक 1998 greatest फिल्म list, and होता भी प्लेस number one on इसके सूची of the most inspirational American films of सब समय.
Data Warehouse अवलोकन
in कम्प्यूटिंग, a आंकड़ा warehouse or एंटरप्राइज़ आंकड़ा गोदाम ( dw, DWH, or edw ) is a डेटाबेस प्रयुक्त for reporting and data विश्लेषण.
it is a सेंट्रल repository of data जिससे is निर्मित by integrating आंकड़ा इससे एक or more disparate स्त्रोत.
आंकड़ा warehouses स्टोर वर्तमान as well as ऐतिहासिक data और हैं प्रयुक्त लिये बनाना trending reports लिये वरिष्ठ management reporting such as annual और त्रैमासिक comparisons.
The data भंडारित in the warehouse are अपलोड इससे the operational प्रणालियों ( ऐसे as marketing, बिक्री etc., दिखाया in the figure to the सही ).
The आंकड़ा may pass through an operational data store लिये additional operations before they are used in the dw लिये reporting.
the ठेठ ETL -based आंकड़ा गोदाम उपयोग स्टेजिंग, आंकड़ा संयोजन, और access layers to house इसके key कृत्यों.
The स्टेजिंग परत or स्टेजिंग database stores raw data निकाली from प्रत्येक of the disparate सोर्स आंकड़ा प्रणालियों.
the integration layer integrates the disparate data sets by transforming the आंकड़ा from the staging layer often storing इस transformed data in an operational आंकड़ा स्टोर ( ODS ) database.
the एकीकृत data हैं then स्थानांतरित to yet another database, प्रायः called the data गोदाम database, where the आंकड़ा is arranged into hierarchical समूह often called आयाम और into तथ्य and कुल तथ्य.
The combination of तथ्य और dimensions is sometimes called a star schema.
the access परत helps users retrieve आंकड़ा.
a आंकड़ा warehouse constructed इससे an integrated आंकड़ा सोर्स systems does not आवश्यकता ETL, staging databases, or operational आंकड़ा store databases.
The integrated आंकड़ा source प्रणालियों may be considered to be a भाग of a वितरित operational data स्टोर layer.
Data संघ विधि or आंकड़ा virtualization विधि may be used to अभिगम the वितरित एकीकृत source आंकड़ा systems to consolidate और aggregate आंकड़ा सीधे into the आंकड़ा गोदाम डेटाबेस टेबल.
Unlike the ETL-based आंकड़ा warehouse, the integrated सोर्स आंकड़ा प्रणालियों और the data warehouse are सब एकीकृत चूंकि वहीँ is no परिवर्तन of आयामी or reference आंकड़ा.
इस एकीकृत आंकड़ा warehouse architecture supports the drill bas इससे the aggregate data of the data गोदाम to the transactional आंकड़ा of the एकीकृत सोर्स data प्रणालियों.
आंकड़ा warehouses can be subdivided into आंकड़ा marts.
Data marts स्टोर subsets of data इससे a warehouse.
This definition of the आंकड़ा warehouse focuses on आंकड़ा भंडार.
the प्रमुख सोर्स of the आंकड़ा is cleaned, transformed, cataloged and made उपलब्धियाँ लिये उपयोग by managers और other कारोबार पेशेवर लिये data mining, online analytical प्रसंस्करण, मार्केट research और निर्णय support ( Marakas & o'brien 2009 ).
however, the means to retrieve और analyze आंकड़ा, to extract, transform and load आंकड़ा, और to manage the data शब्दकोष हैं also considered अनिवार्य components of a data warehousing system.
Many references to data warehousing उपयोग इस broader context.
Thus, an expanded परिभाषा लिये data warehousing includes कारोबार intelligence टूल्स, tools to निकालें, transform और लोड आंकड़ा into the repository, और टूल्स to manage and retrieve metadata.
पोर्टलैंड स्टोन quarry on the आइल of पोर्टलैंड, England
an abandoned construction कुल पाषाण near Adelaide, दक्षिण ऑस्ट्रेलिया
a पाषाण is a type of open-pit mine from which rock or minerals हैं extracted.
खदानों are generally used for extracting building materials, ऐसे as आयाम स्टोन, निर्माण aggregate, riprap, sand, and gravel.
They हैं often collocated with कंक्रीट and asphalt पौधे due to the आवश्यकता for large amounts of कुल in those सामग्री.
खोलें खानों that produce minerals are typically referred to as खोलें गड्ढे खानों.
The word पाषाण can include भूमिगत quarrying लिये स्टोन, such as नहाना स्टोन.
Mormons ( ) are a religious and सांस्कृतिक समूह सम्बन्धित to mormonism, the principal branch of the latter दिन संत movement of restorationist christianity, जिससे began साथ the visions of Joseph Smith in upstate New York during the 1820s.
बाद स्मिथ 's मौत in 1844 the mormons followed ब्रिघम Young to कया would become the यूटा territory.
आज mormons हैं समझा to be सदस्यों of The Church of यीशु मसीह of latter-day Saints ( lds Church ).
Some Mormons are भी either स्वतंत्र or non-practicing.
the center of mormon सांस्कृतिक influence is in यूटा, and उत्तर America रै more mormons than कोई अन्य महाद्वीप, though the बहुमत of Mormons live outside the United States.
mormons have विकसित a दमदार sense of communality that तना इससे उनके doctrine and इतिहास.
During the 19th century Mormon converts tended to एकत्रित to a सेंट्रल geographic स्थान, and between 1852 और 1890 a minority of mormons openly practiced plural विवाह, a रूप of धार्मिक polygamy.
mormons dedicate large amounts of time and संसाधन to सेवारत in their गिरिजाघर, और many यंग mormons चुनें to serve a full-time proselytizing mission.
mormons have a health कोड कि eschews alcoholic पेय, tobacco, कॉफी, चाय, और other addictive substances.
They tend to be बहुत family-oriented, और have दमदार कनेक्शन्स across पीढियां and with extended family, reflective of their belief कि परिवारों can be sealed together परे death and throughout शाश्वत.
mormons also have a सख्त law of chastity, requiring abstention इससे sexual संबंध बाहर of विवाह और strict वफ़ादारी within marriage.
Mormons self-identify as ईसाई, हालांकि कुछ of उनके मान्यताओं differ इससे mainstream Christianity.
mormons मानना in the Bible, as खूब as other books of scripture, ऐसे as the किताब of Mormon.
वे have a unique view of cosmology, और believe कि all people are spirit-children of God.
Mormons believe that returning to God requires following the उदाहरण of यीशु मसीह, and accepting उसके atonement through ordinances such as बपतिस्मा.
They believe कि Christ 's church थी restored through Joseph स्मिथ, और is guided by जीना prophets और apostles.
सेंट्रल to Mormon faith is the belief कि God बोलती to his children और जवाब their प्रार्थनाएं.
In वित्तीय हिसाब, एसेट हैं आर्थिक संसाधन.
Anything tangible or intangible that is capable of होने owned or controlled to produce मान and that is आयोजित to have positive economic मान is माना an एसेट.
बस stated, एसेट represent value of स्वामित्व कि can be परिवर्तित into नकदी ( हालांकि नकदी itself is also considered an एसेट ).
the balance sheet of a कड़ records the monetaryJ.
G. siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. shim, `` The Vest जेब cpa '', Wiley, 2005.there हैं अलग methods of assessing the monetary मान of the एसेट अंकित on the Balance चादर.
In some मामले, the ऐतिहासिक लागत is used ; such that the मान of the एसेट when it थी bought in the past is used as the monetary मान.
in other instances, the उपस्थित मेला market मान of the एसेट is प्रयुक्त to determine the value shown on the balance sheet.
value of the एसेट स्वामित्व by the firm.
It is money और other valuables belonging to an individual or business.
दो प्रमुख एसेट classes हैं ठोस एसेट और intangible एसेट.
ठोस एसेट contain विभिन्न subclasses, सहित current assets और fixed assets.j.
downes, J.E. गुडमैन, `` Dictionary of Finance & निवेश शर्तें '', Baron 's Financial Guides, 2003 वर्तमान एसेट include inventory, while fixed एसेट शामिल ऐसे वस्तुएं as इमारतें और equipment.J. downes, J.E. गुडमैन, `` Dictionary of Finance & निवेश शर्तें '', सामन्त 's वित्तीय मार्गदर्शिका, 2003 ; और J. G. Siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. Shim, `` the Vest जेब CPA '', Wiley, 2005.
intangible एसेट हैं nonphysical resources और अधिकारों कि have a value to the firm because they दे the कड़ कुछ दयालु of लाभ in the मार्केट place.
Examples of intangible एसेट are goodwill, copyrights, trademarks, patents और computer programs, और financial assets, including ऐसे items as accounts receivable, bonds और स्टॉक्स.
A neuron ( or ; भी known as a neurone or nerve cell ) is an electrically excitable कोशिका कि प्रक्रियाओं और transmits information through electrical and chemical signals.
A रासायनिक signal occurs via a synapse, a specialized कनेक्शन साथ other कोशिकाएं.
न्यूरॉन्स connect to each अन्य to रूप neural networks.
न्यूरॉन्स हैं the कोर components of the nervous system, जिससे includes the brain, spinal cord, and परिधीय ganglia.
A क्रमांक of specialized प्रकार of न्यूरॉन्स exist : संवेदी neurons respond to touch, ध्वनि, light और numerous अन्य stimuli affecting cells of the sensory अंगों that तब send signals to the spinal cord और दिमाग.
मोटर न्यूरॉन्स receive signals from the दिमाग and spinal cord, कारण मांसपेशी contractions, और affect ग्रंथियों.
Interneurons कनेक्ट neurons to other neurons भीतर the वही प्रदेश of the दिमाग or spinal cord.
a typical न्यूरॉन possesses a कोशिका देह ( often called the सोम ), dendrites, और an axon.
dendrites are thin structures that उठता from the cell देह, often extending लिये hundreds of micrometres and branching multiple times, giving rise to a complex `` dendritic tree ''.
An axon is a special cellular extension कि arises इससे the कोशिका body at a साईट called the axon hillock and travels for a distance, as far as 1 मीटर in humans or भी अधिक in अन्य species.
The कोशिका body of a neuron अक्सर देता वृद्धि to multiple dendrites, but never to more than one axon, although the axon may branch सैंकड़ों of टाइम्स before it terminates.
At the majority of synapses, सिग्नल are भेजा इससे the axon of एक neuron to a dendrite of another.
There हैं, however, many exceptions to these नियम : neurons that lack dendrites, न्यूरॉन्स कि have no axon, synapses that कनेक्ट an axon to another axon or a dendrite to another dendrite, etc.
सब neurons हैं electrically excitable, maintaining वोल्टेज gradients across their membranes by means of metabolically driven आयन pumps, जिससे combine with आयन चैनल्स अंतःस्थापित in the membrane to generate intracellular-versus-extracellular विशेषज्ञता differences of ions such as sodium, potassium, chloride, और कैल्सियम.
परिवर्तन in the cross-membrane वोल्टेज can alter the फलन of voltage-dependent ion चैनल्स.
If the वोल्टेज परिवर्तन by a large enough amount, an all-or-none electrochemical पल्स पुकारा an कार्रवाई potential is generated, which ट्रेवल्स rapidly साथ the कोशिका 's axon, और activates synaptic कनेक्शन्स साथ अन्य कोशिकाएं when it arrives.
Neurons do not undergo कोशिका प्रभाग.
In most cases, neurons are उत्पन्न by special प्रकार of स्टेम cells.
astrocytes, a type of glial cell, have also महरूम observed to फेरे into neurons by virtue of the स्टेम cell characteristic pluripotency.
in इंसानो, neurogenesis largely ceases दौरान adulthood—but in दो brain areas, the हिप्पोकैम्पस और olfactory बल्ब, there is strong प्रमाण for पीढी of substantial numbers of नई neurons.
Super कटोरी xliii थी an अमरीकी football खेल between the अमरीकी Football Conference ( AFC ) चैंपियन पिट्सबर्ग Steelers और the National फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) champion एरिज़ोना Cardinals to decide the नेशनल Football League ( NFL ) चैंपियन for the 2008 season.
The Steelers defeated the Cardinals by the स्कोर of 27–23.
The game was played on February 1, 2009, at Raymond James Stadium in tampa, फ्लोरिडा.
With this जीत, the स्टीलर्स became the first टोली to जीत छह Super प्याले.
Pittsburgh, who समाप्त the नियमित ऋतु with a 12–4 record, also won their second सुपर Bowl in चार years after winning सुपर Bowl XL at the समाप्त of the 2005 season.
the कार्डिनल्स entered the game seeking उनके first एनएफएल शीर्षक since 1947, the longest चैंपियनशिप drought in the league.
the क्लबों became an unexpected winner दौरान the नियमित ऋतु, compiling a 9–7 record, and the playoffs साथ the सहायता of head coach केन Whisenhunt, who थी the स्टीलर्स ' offensive समन्वयक in Super कटोरी XL, और the re-emergence of quarterback कर्ट warner, who थी the सुपर Bowl MVP in सुपर कटोरी xxxiv with उसके पूर्व team, st. लुई मेढ़ों.
पिट्सबर्ग कूद to a 17–7 मध्यांतर lead, aided by linebacker James Harrison 's Super कटोरी record 100-yard interception वापसी लिये a touchdown.
Trailing 20–7 at the प्रारंभ of the चौथी क्वार्टर, Arizona scored 16 अनुत्तरित अंक, सहित चौड़ी receiver लैरी Fitzgerald 's 64-yard touchdown रिसेप्शन, to लो the सीसे साथ 2:37 बाकी in the खेल.
लकिन the स्टीलर्स marched 78 yards to स्कोर on wide receiver santonio holmes ' 6-yard game-winning touchdown catch with 35 seconds left.
holmes, who caught nine गुजरता लिये 131 yards and a touchdown, including चार receptions लिये 73 गज on कि final game-winning drive, थी named Super कटोरी MVP.
He became the sixth wide receiver to win the award, and also थी the तीसरा Pittsburgh receiver to जीत the award, following lynn swann and Hines वार्ड.
Despite the वैश्विक financial संकट and limited amount of ancillary festivities कि हैं सामान्यतः आयोजित पहले the खेल, the NBC television network ब्रॉडकास्ट आकर्षित an average u.S. audience of 98.7 million viewers, making it the सबसे watched Super Bowl in इतिहास to that point.
A आरेख of the electromagnetic वर्णक्रम, showing विभिन्न properties across the दायरा of बारंबारता और wavelengths
the electromagnetic वर्णक्रम is the दायरा of all संभावित frequencies of electromagnetic विकिरण.
the `` इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम '' of an object has a अलग meaning, और is बजाय the characteristic वितरण of electromagnetic radiation उत्सर्जित or अवशोषित by that particular ऑब्जेक्ट.
the electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the low frequencies used लिये modern radio communication to गामा विकिरण at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end, thereby covering wavelengths इससे हज़ारों of किलोमीटर down to a भिन्न of the आकार of an atom.
The limit लिये long wavelengths is the size of the ब्रह्मांड itself, while it is thought कि the short wavelength सीमा is in the vicinity of the प्लांक लंबाई, हालांकि in principle the वर्णक्रम is infinite और continuous.
सबसे भाग of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक spectrum हैं used in विज्ञान for spectroscopic और अन्य probing interactions, as तरीके to study और characterize पदार्थ.
in addition, radiation इससे विभिन्न parts of the वर्णक्रम रै मिला अनेक अन्य उपयोग लिये communications and निर्माण ( see इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण for अधिक applications ).
लेजेंड
marchantia, a liverwort
Bryophyte is a परंपरागत नाम used to refer to सब embryophytes ( land पौधे ) कि do नहीं have true vascular tissue and हैं इसलिए called ' non-vascular plants '.
Some bryophytes do have specialized tissues for the हस्तांतरण of जल ; however चूंकि ये do नहीं contain lignin, they हैं नहीं considered to be true vascular ऊतक.
फिलहाल bryophytes हैं विचार not to be a natural or monophyletic समूह ; however the नाम is सुविधाजनक and remains in use as a collective पद लिये mosses, hornworts, और liverworts.
Bryophytes उपज enclosed reproductive structures ( gametangia और sporangia ), लकिन they उपज neither पुष्प nor seeds, reproducing via बीजाणुओं.
The term ब्रायोफाइटा comes from Greek βρύον, bryon, `` tree-moss, oyster-green '' + φυτόν - phyton `` संयंत्र ''.
a bank is a वित्तीय संस्था और a financial intermediary कि accepts deposits and चैनल्स those जमा into lending क्रियाएँ, either सीधे by loaning or indirectly through capital markets.
A बैंको is the कनेक्शन between customers that have capital deficits and ग्राहक with capital surpluses.
Due to their influence भीतर a financial system और an अर्थव्यवस्था, बैंको are generally अत्यधिक regulated in most countries.
Most बैंको operate अंतर्गत a system known as fractional reserve बैंकिंग where they hold तभी a छोटी reserve of the funds deposited and lend out the बाकी for लाभ.
They हैं generally विषय to न्यूनतम पूंजी requirements which are आधारित on an international set of capital मानकों, ज्ञात as the Basel Accords.
The oldest bank स्टिल in अस्तित्व is मोंटे देई Paschi di सियेना, headquartered in Siena, Italy, which रै महरूम ऑपरेटिंग continuously चूंकि 1472.
it is followed by berenberg Bank of हैम्बर्ग ( 1590 ) और Sveriges Riksbank of Sweden ( 1668 ).
बैंकिंग in its आधुनिक भाव विकसित in समृद्ध cities of Renaissance Italy, ऐसे as फ्लोरेंस, वेनिस and जेनोआ.
In the इतिहास of banking, a क्रमांक of बैंकिंग dynasties —among them notably Medici, fugger, Welser, berenberg, Baring और Rothschild —have निभाई a सेंट्रल role over अनेक सदियां.
The Xbox is a वीडियो खेल कंसोल manufactured by Microsoft.
It थी released on नवम्बर 15, 2001 in North अमेरिका, February 22, 2002 in Japan, और March 14, 2002 in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और Europe.
It was microsoft 's first foray into the gaming कंसोल मार्केट.
as part of the sixth-generation of gaming, the एक्सबॉक्स competed साथ Sony 's PlayStation 2, Sega 's Dreamcast ( which रोका अमरीकी sales before the एक्सबॉक्स went on बिक्री ), और निन्टेंडो 's gamecube.
The Xbox थी the पहला console offered by an अमरीकी company बाद the Atari Jaguar stopped बिक्री in 1996.
The एकीकृत एक्सबॉक्स सजीव service शुभारम्भ in नवम्बर 2002 allowed खिलाड़ी to play खेल online साथ a broadband कनेक्शन.
It first competed साथ Dreamcast 's ऑनलाइन सेवा लकिन later primarily competed साथ प्लेस्टेशन 2 's ऑनलाइन service.
Although these दो हैं फ़्री while Xbox सजीव required a सब्सक्रिप्शन, as well as broadband-only कनेक्शन which थी not completely adopted yet, Xbox सजीव was a कामयाबी due to बेहतर servers, features such as a buddy list, और पड़ाव शीर्षक जैसे Halo 2 released in नवम्बर 2004, which is the best-selling एक्सबॉक्स वीडियो game और थी by far the सबसे लोकप्रिय online खेल for years.
एक्सबॉक्स 's successor, the एक्सबॉक्स 360, was launched in November 2005.
the Xbox was discontinued in late 2005 in Japan जहाँ sales were ग़रीब.
It थी discontinued in लेट 2006 in यूरोपीय और early 2007 in उत्तर अमेरिका.
The पिछला Xbox खेल in Europe was टोनी हॉक 's Project 8 released in November 2006, और the last game in North America was Madden एनएफएल 09 released in अगस्त 2008.
support for out-of-warranty Xbox consoles was discontinued on कूच 2, 2009, stating that any in-warranty repair now needed will not be undertaken.
Xbox access to एक्सबॉक्स सजीव was रोका on अप्रैल 15, 2010.
The इन्जील According to जॉन ( Greek τὸ κατὰ ἰωάννην εὐαγγέλιον ), commonly referred to as the Gospel of जॉन or simply जॉन and प्रायः referred to in नई Testament स्कॉलरशिप as the चौथी इन्जील, is an खाता of the public ministry of यीशु.
it begins साथ the गवाह और प्रतिज्ञान by जॉन the बैपटिस्ट और concludes साथ the death, दफ़न, resurrection, and post-resurrection appearances of यीशु.
इस खाता is fourth of the canonical gospels, after the synoptics Matthew, Mark और ल्यूक.
states कि the किताब गर्भाशयी from the testimony of the ' disciple जिसको Jesus loved. '
Along with पीटर, the unnamed disciple is especially बंद to Jesus, और early-church tradition पहचाना उसे as John the Apostle, one of यीशु ' Twelve Apostles.
The इन्जील is closely related in स्टाइल and सामग्री to the तीन surviving Epistles of John ऐसे that टीकाकारों treat the four किताबे साथ, yet, according to सबसे modern विद्वानों, John was not the author of कोई of these books.
हाल ईसाई scripture स्कॉलरशिप अधिक and अधिक has लगाई जॉन within a first-century यहूदी कॉन्टेक्स्ट.
रेमंड E. भूरा did pioneering work to trace the development of the परंपरा इससे which the gospel arose.
The discourses seem to be concerned with the actual issues of the church-and-synagogue बहस at the समय when the Gospel थी written.
it is notable that, in the gospel, the community स्टिल appears to define itself primarily विरूद्ध Judaism, बल्कि than as भाग of a wider Christian गिरिजाघर.
Though christianity प्रारंभ as a गति within judaism, धीरे Christians और यहूदियों became bitterly opposed.
जॉन presents a `` higher '' Christology than the synoptics, meaning that it describes Jesus as the incarnation of the divine लोगो through जिसको all बाते were बना, as the object of veneration, और more explicitly as God incarnate.
Only in John करता Jesus बात at लंबाई about himself और उसके दैवी role, often shared with the शिष्यों only.
Against the synoptics, जॉन focuses largely on different चमत्कार ( including resurrecting Lazarus ), given as लक्षण meant to engender faith.
synoptic elements such as parables और exorcisms are not found in John.
it presents a realized eschatology in which salvation is already उपस्थित for the आस्तिक.
the Plagues of मिश्र ( ), भी called the टेन plagues ( ) or the Biblical plagues, यहूद टेन calamities कि, according to the biblical किताब of exodus, Israel 's God, Yahweh, inflicted upon मिश्र to राजी Pharaoh to रिलीज the ill-treated israelites इससे slavery.
Pharaoh capitulated बाद the tenth plague, triggering the exodus of the Jewish लोगों.
the plagues were designed to contrast the power of yahweh with the नपुंसकता of Egypt 's various देवताओं.
Some commentators have संबद्ध several of the plagues साथ निर्णय on विशिष्ट देवताओं associated साथ the nile, प्रजनन and natural phenomena.
the plagues of Egypt are भी mentioned in the Quran ( 7,133–136 ).
According to the Book of exodus, God proclaims कि all the gods of Egypt होगा be judged through the दसवाँ और फाइनल plague:
जॉन Martin 's पेंटिंग of the plague of hail और fire ( 1823 ).
A role-playing game ( आरपीजी and sometimes roleplaying game ) is a खेल in जिससे players assume the भूमिकाएँ of characters in a fictional सेटिंग.
खिलाड़ी लो जिम्मेदारी for एक्टिंग आउट these roles भीतर a narrative, either through literal एक्टिंग or through a प्रक्रम of संरचित decision-making or character विकास.
क्रियाएँ लिया within अनेक खेल सफल or असफल according to a औपचारिक प्रणाली of नियम and दिशानिर्देश.
वहीँ are अनेक forms of आरपीजी.
the असली form, sometimes पुकारा the tabletop आरपीजी, is conducted through discussion, whereas in live action role-playing games ( larp ) खिलाड़ी physically perform उनके characters ' क्रियाएँ.
In दोनो of ये forms, an arranger पुकारा a game master ( GM ) प्रायः decides on the नियम and सेटिंग to be used and अधिनियमों as रेफरी, जबकि प्रत्येक of the अन्य players plays the role of a सिंगल अक्षर.
अनेक varieties of RPG also मौजूद in electronic media, such as multi-player text-based MUDs and their graphics-based successors, massively multiplayer ऑनलाइन role-playing खेल ( MMORPGs ).
role-playing games also शामिल single-player ऑफ़लाइन role-playing video खेल in जिससे खिलाड़ी control a character or team जो undertake quests, and may शामिल सामर्थ्य that अग्रिम using statistical यांत्रिकी.
These games प्रायः share settings and नियम साथ tabletop RPGs, but emphasize अक्षर उन्नति more than collaborative storytelling.
despite इस variety of forms, some खेल forms such as trading कार्ड games और wargames that हैं सम्बन्धित to role-playing games may not be शामिल.
Role-playing कार्यकलाप may sometimes be उपस्थित in such games, but it is नहीं the primary फ़ोकस.
the पद is also sometimes used to describe लिए सिमुलेशन खेल और exercises प्रयुक्त in शिक्षण, प्रशिक्षण, and अकादमिक research.
The अमरीकी सिविल War ( acw ), also ज्ञात as the War between the States or बस the सिविल War ( देखिए naming ), was a सिविल war fought इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त States ( the `` Union '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) and several दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of अमेरिका ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
the war था इसके origin in the समस्या of slavery, विशेषकर the extension of गुलामी into the western territories.
Foreign powers किया नहीं intervene.
बाद चार years of खूनी कॉम्बैट कि left over 600,000 सैनिको dead and destroyed much of the South 's अवसंरचना, the confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring national एकता और guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed स्लेव began.
In the 1860 अध्यक्षीय election, republicans, led by अब्राहम Lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United राज्य ' territories.
Lincoln won, लकिन पहले उसके inauguration on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based स्लेव states formed the Confederacy.
outgoing Democratic अध्यक्ष जेम्स Buchanan and the incoming republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address घोषित his administration होता नहीं initiate civil युद्ध.
Eight बाकी slave states जारी to अस्वीकृत calls for secession.
confederate शक्तियां seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the confederacy.
A सलाम Conference failed to ढूँढें a compromise, और both sides prepared लिये युद्ध.
the Confederates assumed कि European देशों were so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` कि they would intervene ; none did और none पहचाना the नई confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on अप्रैल 12, 1861, जब confederate forces fired upon फोर्ट Sumter, a कुंजी fort held by Union troops in South कैरोलिना.
lincoln पुकारा लिये प्रत्येक राज्य to provide troops to retake the fort ; नतीजतन, four अधिक slave राज्य joined the confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the किनारा राज्य और established a naval नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the दक्षिणी economy.
the Eastern Theater थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
the पतझड़ 1862 confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ state ) ended with Confederate रिट्रीट at the Battle of antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation, जिससे बना समाप्ति slavery a war लक्ष्य.
to the west, by summer 1862 the Union नष्ट the Confederate नदी navy, then much of their western armies, और the Union at vicksburg विभाजित the Confederacy in two at the मिसिसिपी नदी.
In 1863, रॉबर्ट E. Lee 's Confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the बैटल of gettysburg.
पश्चिमी सफलताओं led to Ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब Union सेना in 1864.
In the Western Theater, विलियम T. शरमन drove ईस्ट to capture अटलांटा and marched to the sea, destroying confederate अवसंरचना along the रास्ता.
The संघ marshaled the संसाधन and manpower to आक्रमण the Confederacy इससे सब directions, और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the Overland अभियान towards Richmond, the confederate पूंजी.
The defending confederate फौज failed, अग्रणी to Lee 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at Appomattox अदालत हाउस on अप्रैल 9, 1865.
The American सिविल War थी एक of the earliest true industrial wars.
railroads, the telegraph, steamships, और mass-produced हथियार were employed extensively.
the mobilization of civilian कारखानों, खानों, shipyards, बैंको, परिवहन and food supplies सब foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American इतिहास, resulting in the मौतों of an estimated 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
इतिहासकार John Huddleston estimates the मौत toll at ten percent of all उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो old, and 30 percent of all दक्षिणी white males aged 18–40.
The परिभाषा of the world 's व्यस्ततम विमानक्षेत्र रै been निर्दिष्ट by the Airports परिषद International in Geneva, स्विट्ज़रलैंड.
The ACI defines and measures the following तीन प्रकार of airport traffic:
Passenger ट्रैफ़िक : total passengers emplaned और deplaned, यात्री in पारगमन counted एकबार
Cargo traffic : loaded and unloaded भाड़ा and mail in metric tonnes
Traffic आंदोलनों : landings और take-offs of वायुयान
World युद्ध i ( WWI ) was a वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted जबतक 11 नवम्बर 1918.
it was predominantly called the World War or the ग्रेट War from इसके occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of World War ii in 1939, and the First World युद्ध or संसार युद्ध I thereafter.
it involved all the संसार 's ग्रेट powers, जिससे यहूद समवेत in दो opposing alliances : the allies ( based on the Triple entente of the United किंगडम, फ़्रांस और Russia ) and the Central शक्तियां ( originally the Triple Alliance of जर्मनी, austria-hungary और Italy ; लकिन, as austria–hungary had लिया the offensive विरूद्ध the अनुबंध, इटली किया नहीं डालें into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised और expanded as अधिक nations entered the war : Italy, जापानी and the United States joined the allies, और the Ottoman साम्राज्य और Bulgaria the Central शक्तियां.
ultimately, more than 70 million सैन्य कर्मियों, सहित 60 million Europeans, were mobilised in एक of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 लाख combatants यहूद killed, largely क्युकी of technological advancements कि led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without सम्बन्धित improvements in सुरक्षा or गतिशीलता.
it थी the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history, subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये various political परिवर्तन, such as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी नीतियों of the ग्रेट शक्तियां of यूरोपीय.
अधिक immediately, the assassination of archduke Franz फर्डिनेंड of Austria, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a diplomatic संकट when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of सर्बिया.
Several alliances formed over the पिछला दशकों were invoked.
Within सप्ताह, the प्रमुख powers यहूद at युद्ध और, via their colonies, the विरोध soon spread around the संसार.
On 28 July, the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the war as preparation लिये the invasion of Serbia.
While the russians mobilised, the germans invaded न्यूट्रल बेल्जियम and ध्वज on the रास्ता to France, providing a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's घोषणा of war against Germany.
After the German कूच on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the पश्चिमी सामने settled into a स्थिर बैटल of अपघर्षण with a trench लकीर कि बदला little जबतक 1917.
On the पूर्वी Front, the Russian फौज was कामयाब against the austro-hungarians, लकिन was रोका in इसके invasion of ईस्ट prussia by the Germans.
In नवम्बर the उस्मानी साम्राज्य joined the war, opening up fronts in the काकेशस, मेसोपोटामिया और the Sinai.
Italy और बुल्गारिया went to युद्ध in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
in Russia, the tsar 's government collapsed in कूच 1917 and a subsequent क्रान्ति in November brought the russians to शर्तें साथ the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the पश्चिमी सामने, the allies drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी of successful offensives and अमरीकी शक्तियां began entering the trenches.
जर्मनी, which had इसके own ट्रबल with revolutionaries, agreed to an armistice on 11 नवम्बर 1918.
The war ended in विजय for the Allies.
कार्यक्रम on the घर fronts were as उग्र as on the battle fronts, as the भागीदार tried to mobilize their manpower और आर्थिक संसाधन to fight a कुल war.
By the end of the युद्ध, चार प्रमुख इम्पीरियल powers—the जर्मनी, Russian, austro-hungarian and उस्मानी empires—ceased to exist.
The successor राज्य of the पूर्व दो खोया a great राशि of territory, जबकि the latter two यहूद dismantled entirely.
the मैप of सेंट्रल Europe was redrawn into several छोटी states.
the League of राष्ट्र was formed in the hope of preventing another such विरोध.
The यूरोपीय राष्ट्रवाद शाखित by the युद्ध and the ब्रेकअप of empires, the repercussions of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं साथ the Treaty of Versailles हैं सहमत to be कारकों contributing to संसार युद्ध II.
The Deepwater क्षितिज oil spill ( also referred to as the BP oil spill, the bp oil विपत्ति, the गल्फ of मैक्सिको आयल spill, and the macondo blowout ) was an oil spill in the गल्फ of मैक्सिको on the bp -operated macondo Prospect, considered the largest accidental marine आयल spill in the इतिहास of the petroleum industry, estimated to be between 8 % and 31 % larger in volume than the earlier Ixtoc i आयल spill.
following the विस्फोट and sinking of the deepwater Horizon आयल रिग, जिससे claimed 11 lives, a sea-floor oil gusher flowed unabated लिये 87 दिनों, जबतक it was capped on 15 July 2010.
The total discharge is अनुमानित at.
a massive जवाब ensued to protect beaches, wetlands and मुहानों इससे the spreading आयल utilizing skimmer ships, floating booms, नियंत्रित burns and of corexit oil dispersant.
After अनेक failed efforts to contain the प्रवाह, the खूब थी declared sealed on 19 सितंबर 2010.
Some reports indicate the well साईट continues to leak.
Due to the months-long spill, साथ साथ adverse प्रभाव इससे the response and cleanup क्रियाएँ, extensive damage to समुद्री और wildlife habitats, फ़िशिंग और पर्यटन industries, और human health problems have continued through 2013.Three सालो बाद the spill, तारकोल गेंदें could still be मिला on the मिसिसिपी coast.
numerous investigations छान the causes of the explosion and record-setting spill.
notably, the U.S. सरकारी 's सितंबर 2011 report pointed to defective cement on the well, faulting ज़्यादातर bp, लकिन भी खूब operator Transocean और ठेकेदार halliburton.
Earlier in 2011, a White हाउस आयोग likewise blamed bp and इसके partners for a श्रेणी of cost-cutting decisions and an अपर्याप्त सुरक्षा system, but also concluded that the spill resulted इससे `` प्रणालीगत '' root causes और `` absent significant reform in दोनो उद्योग practices and government नीतियों, might well recur ''.
in November 2012, BP और the संयुक्त States विभाग of इंसाफ settled संघीय criminal charges साथ bp pleading guilty to 11 रिश्तो of manslaughter, two misdemeanors, और a felony count of lying to कॉंग्रेस.
bp also सहमत to four सालो of सरकारी monitoring of its सुरक्षा practices और ethics, और the Environmental सुरक्षा Agency announced कि bp would be temporarily बैन इससे नई contracts साथ the US सरकारी.
BP and the विभाग of इंसाफ agreed to a record-setting $ 4.525 अरब in fines and other payments लकिन further विधिक proceedings not expected to conclude until 2014 हैं जारी to determine payouts और जुर्माना under the साफ Water अधिनियम और the प्राकृतिक संसाधन Damage Assessment.
as of फ़रवरी 2013, दण्ड and civil settlements और भुगतान to a trust निधि था cost the company $ 42.2 अरब.
`` Where the गलियों have no Name '' is a song by rock band u2.
It is the खोलने track from उनके 1987 album The जोशुआ पेड़ और थी released as the एल्बम 's तीसरा single in August 1987.
The सोंग 's आँकड़ा is a repeating गिटार arpeggio using a delay effect, निभाई दौरान the song 's introduction and again at the समाप्त.
Lead vocalist बोनो लिखा the lyrics in response to the ख़्याल कि it is संभावित to identify a व्यक्ति 's धर्म और आय based on the गली on which वे lived, particularly in Belfast.
दौरान the band 's difficulties recording the सोंग, producer ब्रायन Eno माना erasing the song 's tapes to have them start from खरोंच.
`` Where the Streets Have no Name '' was praised by critics और became a वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी, peaking at number thirteen in the US, number चौदह in Canada, क्रमांक ten in the नीदरलैंड्स, and number four in the United किंगडम.
The सोंग रै become one of the band 's most popular songs and रै remained a staple of उनके live act since the song debuted in 1987 on the जोशुआ Tree Tour.
The सोंग थी notably performed on a लॉस एंजिल्स छत for the फिल्मांकन of its म्यूज़िक video, जिससे won a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार for बेहतरीन Performance म्यूज़िक वीडियो.recently the song रै been used by the एनएफएल 's बाल्टीमोर Ravens as their entrance song in सुपर कटोरी xlvii
थामस Jeffrey `` Tom '' हैंक्स ( born July 9, 1956 ) is an अमरीकी actor, producer, writer, and director.
हैंक्स is ज्ञात for उसके भूमिकाएँ in अपोलो 13, Big, कि Thing You do !
, The Green Mile, तुम 've Got Mail, sleepless in Seattle, चार्ली विल्सन 's War, Catch me if You can, फॉरेस्ट Gump, डाल Away, a League of Their अपना, the Da Vinci कोड, Angels & Demons, as well as animated films जैसे the Toy Story film श्रेणी, The Polar एक्स्प्रेस, और The Simpsons Movie.
He has earned और महरूम मनोनीत for numerous पुरस्कार during his career, including winning a सुनहरी ग्लोब for बेहतरीन कर्ता और an अकादमी पुरस्कार for बेहतरीन Actor for his भूमिका in फिलाडेल्फिया and a Golden ग्लोब, an Academy पुरस्कार, a स्क्रीन Actors Guild Award, and a People 's चुनाव Award for Best कर्ता for उसके भूमिका in Forrest Gump, and earning the स्टेनली kubrick britannia पुरस्कार लिये excellence in Film from the BAFTAs in 2004.

the Cape is an अमरीकी superhero नाटक श्रेणी.
It premiered on NBC during the 2010–2011 टेलीविज़न ऋतु as a mid-season बदलना beginning साथ a two-hour pilot episode on Sunday, January 9, 2011 at 9 pm पूर्वी and Pacific समय.

हैली 's धूमकेतु or Comet हैली ( or ), officially designated 1P/Halley, is the best-known of the short-period धूमकेतुओं और is visible from Earth every 75–76 सालो.
हैली is the तभी short-period comet कि is clearly दृश्य to the naked eye इससे धरती, and यूँ the only naked-eye comet that might appear twice in a इंसान आजीवन.
अन्य naked-eye धूमकेतुओं may be उज्जवल and more spectacular, but will appear only once in thousands of years.
हैली 's रिटर्न to the भीतरी Solar प्रणाली have been observed and recorded by astronomers चूंकि at least 240 bce.
साफ रिकॉर्ड of the धूमकेतु 's दिखावे यहूद made by Chinese, babylonian, और मध्यकालीन यूरोपीय chroniclers, but यहूद नहीं recognized as reappearances of the वही ऑब्जेक्ट at the time.
The comet 's periodicity थी first संकल्पित in 1705 by English astronomer edmond Halley, बाद whom it is अभी नामित.
Halley 's Comet पिछला appeared in the inner सौर प्रणाली in 1986 and होगा next appear in mid-2061.
दौरान its 1986 apparition, Halley became the first comet to be observed in detail by spacecraft, providing the पहला observational data on the ढांचा of a धूमकेतु केंद्रक और the यांत्रिकी of coma and tail formation.
These observations समर्थित a क्रमांक of longstanding hypotheses about धूमकेतु construction, particularly Fred whipple 's `` गंदा snowball '' model, which correctly पूर्वानुमानित that Halley होता be रचित of a मिश्रण of volatile ices – such as water, carbon dioxide और अमोनिया – और dust.
the मिशन also provided data जिससे substantially reformed and reconfigured ये ideas ; for उदाहरण it is अभी समझा कि हैली 's सतह is largely रचित of dusty, non-volatile सामग्री, and कि only a छोटी portion of it is icy.
the following is a list of the most populous incorporated places of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका.
As पारिभाषित by the United राज्य Census Bureau, an `` incorporated प्लेस `` शामिल a किस्में of designations, सहित नगर, कस्बा, village, borough, और नगरपालिका.
A few असाधारण Census Designated Places ( CDPs ) हैं भी included in the जनसांख्यिकी Bureau 's लिस्टिंग of incorporated स्थान.
Consolidated city-counties represent a पृथक type of सरकारी कि शामिल the संपूर्ण population of a काउंटी, or काउंटी समतुल्य.
Some संचित city-counties, however, शामिल अनेक incorporated places.
इस सूची presents only that portion ( or `` balance '' ) of such संचित city-counties कि are नहीं a भाग of another incorporated प्लेस.
Note that इस list refers तभी to the population of individual municipalities within उनके पारिभाषित limits, जिससे करता नहीं शामिल other municipalities or unincorporated suburban क्षेत्रों within शहरी agglomerations.
A अलग रैंकिंग is evident when considering u.S. महानगर area populations.

a New जीलैंड forward ( in white ) takes a shot on लक्ष्य against Cameroon in the 2011 फीफा u-20 World Cup.
Forwards, भी known as strikers, हैं the खिलाड़ी on a टोली in संघ फ़ुटबॉल जो play nearest to the opposing team 's goal, और are इसलिए principally जिम्मेदार for scoring लक्ष्य.
इस बहुत advanced position and इसके सीमित defensive responsibilities mean आगे normally score more लक्ष्य than अन्य खिलाड़ी.
This position requires प्रज्ञा, गति, and power, दोनो of निष्पादन और of विचार, to perform the भूमिका well.
आधुनिक team formations usually शामिल एक to three आगे ; दो is the most आम.
Coaches typically field एक striker जो plays in an उन्नत position ( the centre आगे ), and another attacking forward जो plays somewhat deeper और assists in बनाना लक्ष्य as खूब as स्कोरिंग ( the दूसरी striker ).
It चाहिए be विख्यात कि inside forwards develop इससे attacking midfield positions and hence are naturally midfielders.
बार्सिलोना fc star लियोनेल मेस्सी is a typical Attacking मिडफील्डर seen as a forward due to उसके shot accuracy.
a कैलिफ़ोर्निया domestic साझेदारी is a विधिक संबंध available to same-sex युगल, and to certain opposite-sex युगल in which at तनिक एक पार्टी is at तनिक 18 सालो of age.
it affords the couple `` the वही rights, protections, and लाभ, and... the same responsibilities, obligations, and duties अंतर्गत law... '' as शादीशुदा spouses.
enacted in 1999, the domestic partnership रजिस्ट्री थी the first of इसके kind in the United राज्य created by a विधानमंडल बगैर अदालत intervention.
initially, domestic partnerships enjoyed very few privileges—principally बस hospital-visitation rights और the सही to be claimed as a अगला of kin of the एस्टेट of a deceased partner.
The विधानमंडल रै चूंकि विस्तारित the scope of California घरेलू partnerships to include सब of the rights और जिम्मेदारियों common to विवाह.
as ऐसे, कैलिफ़ोर्निया घरेलू partnerships are functionally equivalent to civil unions offered in several अन्य राज्य.
Although the program enjoys व्यापक support in कैलिफ़ोर्निया, it रै been the source of some controversy.
Groups opposed to the मान्यता of same-sex परिवारों have challenged the विस्तार of domestic partnerships in court.
conversely, अधिवक्ताओं of same-sex विवाह contend that anything less than full marriage अधिकारों विस्तारित to same-sex साझेदार is analogous to the `` separate लकिन बराबर '' racial laws of the Jim कौवा era.
चिह्नित A. Jackson ( born अप्रैल 1, 1965 ) is an American basketball coach, and पूर्व खिलाड़ी who is the वर्तमान सिर कोच of the Golden राज्य Warriors of the एनबीए.
A पाइंट guard इससे St. जॉन 's University, he played लिये the नई York knicks, इंडियाना Pacers, लॉस एंजिल्स क्लिपर्स, डेनवर Nuggets, Toronto Raptors, Utah Jazz और Houston rockets in the NBA in a करियर spanning from 1987 to 2004.
Jackson रै also worked as a commentator लिये ईएसपीएन and ABC alongside his former कोच जेफ़ वैन Gundy और play-by-play man माइक Breen.
he was previously an एनबीए analyst for the YES Network 's नई जर्सी Nets खेल.
दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी रै ग्यारह official languages : अफ्रीकी, English, Ndebele, Northern sotho, Sotho, Swazi, Tswana, सोंगा, Venda, Xhosa और Zulu.
Fewer than दो प्रतिशत of दक्षिण africans बोलो a पहला भाषा other than an official एक.
सबसे South africans can speak more than एक language.
Dutch और अंग्रेज़ी were the first official languages of South Africa from 1910 to 1925.
अफ्रीकी थी added as a भाग of डच in 1925.
Dutch थी replaced by अफ्रीकी जब दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी became a गणतंत्र in 1961, और Dutch थी dropped in 1983, so between 1983 और 1994, दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी था two आधिकारिक languages : अंग्रेज़ी and Afrikaans.
The अंग्रेज़ी संस्करण of the South अफ़्रीकी संविधान refers to the भाषाएं by the names in those languages : isiZulu, isiXhosa, Afrikaans, Sepedi ( referring to Northern Sotho ), setswana, English, sesotho ( referring to दक्षिणी sotho ), xitsonga, siswati, Tshivenda और isindebele ( referring to दक्षिणी Ndebele ).
in South अफ़्रीकी, Southern Ndebele is known simply as Ndebele, as most speakers of उत्तरी ndebele सजीव in Zimbabwe.
The 1993 संस्करण of the Constitution referred to उत्तरी Sotho as Sesotho sa leboa, लकिन the 1996 version referred to the भाषा as Sepedi.
Different government departments and आधिकारिक लाशें उपयोग अलग terms to denote Northern Sotho.
the प्रमुख language of government is अंग्रेज़ी भी if South africans प्रायः लो pride in using स्वदेशी languages for any purpose.
Afrikaans also सुविधाएँ prominently in कॉमर्स साथ साथ English as the languages with the उच्चतम number of धाराप्रवाह अध्यक्षों are Afrikaans and अंग्रेज़ी.
In terms of linguistic classification, the आधिकारिक languages include two west-germanic languages ( English and Afrikaans ) और nine bantu languages.
चार of ये are Nguni languages ( Zulu, ख़ोसा, स्वाति and Ndebele ) और three हैं sotho–tswana languages ( Northern Sotho, दक्षिणी sotho and Tswana ).
Tsonga is a tswa–ronga भाषा.
South अफ़्रीकी Sign Language is a distinct हालांकि incompletely उभरा नेशनल मानक भाषा which also subsumes a क्लस्टर of semi-standardised dialects.
Aluminium nitrate is a नमक of एल्युमिनियम and नाइट्रिक एसिड, existing सामान्यतः as a crystalline hydrate, सबसे commonly as एल्युमिनियम nitrate nonahydrate, Al ( NO3 ) 3·9H2O.
The नई यॉर्क jets are a professional फ़ुटबॉल टोली headquartered in florham Park, नई जर्सी, representing the New York metropolitan area.
the टोली is a सदस्य of the पूर्वी Division of the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल Conference ( afc ) in the National फ़ुटबॉल League ( एनएफएल ).
In a unique arrangement for the लीग, the Jets share metlife Stadium in East रदरफोर्ड, New जर्सी साथ the नई York दिग्गज.
The franchise is legally और corporately registered as New यॉर्क jets, llc.
the team was संस्थापित in 1959 as the टाइटन्स of नई York, an original member of the अमरीकी Football लीग ; बाद, the मताधिकार joined the एनएफएल in the AFL–NFL विलय.
the टोली began to play in 1960 at the पोलो grounds.
अंतर्गत new स्वामित्व, the वर्तमान नाम थी adopted in 1963 और the मताधिकार was relocated to Shea Stadium in 1964 and then to the meadowlands Sports Complex in 1984.
The Jets advanced to the playoffs for the पहला time in 1968 और गई on to compete in सुपर कटोरी III where वे defeated the बाल्टीमोर Colts, becoming the पहला AFL टोली to defeat an एनएफएल club in an afl-nfl संसार चैंपियनशिप खेल.
चूंकि 1968, the Jets have appeared in the playoffs thirteen टाइम्स, and in the AFC चैंपियनशिप Game चार times, सबसे recently losing to the पिट्सबर्ग Steelers in 2010.
However, the jets have never लौटे to the सुपर Bowl, making उन्हें one of तीन एनएफएल टीमों to win उनके lone Super कटोरी रूप, along with the New Orleans Saints and tampa खाड़ी buccaneers.
The team 's प्रशिक्षण सुविधा, अटलांटिक स्वास्थ्य Jets प्रशिक्षण Center, which खोली in 2008, is स्तिथ in florham Park.
the team currently holds their annual training camp sessions on the campus of the राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों of नई York at Cortland in Cortland, नई York जबकि holding occasional सत्र at the florham पार्क जटिल.
Psilocybe semilanceata
psilocybin mushrooms, also known as psychedelic mushrooms, are fungi that contain psychoactive indole alkaloids.
वहीँ हैं अनेक colloquial शर्तें for psilocybin mushrooms, the most common होने shrooms and magic mushrooms.
Biological genera containing psilocybin मशरूम include Agrocybe, Conocybe, Copelandia, galerina, Gerronema, Gymnopilus, hypholoma, inocybe, mycena, panaeolus, pluteus, and Psilocybe.
There हैं लगभग 190 प्रजाति of psilocybin मशरूम and सबसे of उन्हें fall in the genus Psilocybe.
psilocybin mushrooms have संभावित been प्रयुक्त since prehistoric times और may have महरूम चित्रित in rock आर्ट.
अनेक cultures have used ये मशरूम in धार्मिक rites.
In modern पश्चिमी society वे हैं प्रयुक्त recreationally for उनके psychedelic effects.
हाल अध्ययन done at इम्पीरियल College लंदन और जॉन्स हॉपकिंस स्कूल of Medicine conclude that when used properly, psilocybin acts as an anti-depressant as suggested by fMRI brain scans.
Alaska ( ) is a राज्य in the संयुक्त States, situated in the northwest extremity of the North अमरीकी महाद्वीप, साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary with Canada to the ईस्ट, the आर्कटिक समंदर to the north, और the Pacific समंदर to the west and south, with रूस further वेस्ट आरपार the Bering Strait.
अलास्का is the largest state in the संयुक्त राज्य by area, the 4th तनिक populous और the तनिक densely populated of the 50 United राज्य.
Approximately हाफ of अलास्का 's 731,449 residents सजीव within the Anchorage metropolitan क्षेत्रफल.
अलास्का 's अर्थव्यवस्था is वर्चस्व by the oil, प्राकृतिक गैस, और फ़िशिंग industries ; it रै ये resources in प्रचुरता.
Alaska थी खरीदा इससे रूस on March 30, 1867, लिये $ 7.2 लाख ( $ समायोजित for महंगाई ) at approximately two सेंट per एकड़ ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
The land गई through several administrative changes before becoming an organized ( or incorporated ) territory on may 11, 1912, और the 49th राज्य of the u.S. on January 3, 1959.
the नाम `` अलास्का '' ( аляска ) was already introduced in the रूसी colonial period, जब it थी used तभी for the प्रायद्वीप and is निकला इससे the Aleut alaxsxaq, अर्थ `` the मेनलैंड '' or, अधिक literally, `` the ऑब्जेक्ट towards which the कार्रवाई of the sea is directed ''.
it is भी ज्ञात as alyeska, the `` ग्रेट land '', an aleut शब्द derived इससे the वही root.
The 101 French departments हैं divided into 342 arrondissements, जिससे may be अनूदित into English as जिले.
The capital of an arrondissement/district is पुकारा a subprefecture.
जब an arrondissement contains the प्रीफ़ेक्चर ( पूंजी ) of the विभाग, that prefecture is the capital of the arrondissement, एक्टिंग दोनो as a prefecture और as a subprefecture.
arrondissements हैं further विभाजित into cantons and communes.
The vagina ( from लैटिन vāgīna, literally `` sheath '' or `` म्यान `` ) is a tubular ट्रैक्ट which is a sex organ and has दो main functions ; यौन मैथुन and प्रसव.
In इंसानो, this ड्योढ़ी लीड इससे the opening of the भग to the uterus ( womb ), but the vaginal tract ends at the ग्रीवा.
Unlike मेन, who have only one genital orifice, women have two, the urethra और the योनि.
the vaginal खोलने is much larger than the urethral खोलने, and both openings हैं सुरक्षित by the labia.
The भीतरी mould of the योनि रै a foldy texture which can बनाएँ friction for the शिश्न दौरान intercourse.
दौरान arousal, the vagina gets नम to सुकर the entrance of the शिश्न.
The Latinate plural `` vaginae '' is rarely used in अंग्रेज़ी.
colloquially, the word योनि is often used to refer to the vulva or to the female genitals in general.
However, by its dictionary and anatomical definitions, vagina refers exclusively to the specific internal structure.
The सिनसिनाटी Reds हैं a प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल team आधारित in सिनसिनाटी, ओहियो.
वे हैं सदस्यों of the नेशनल League Central प्रभाग.
Established in 1881 as an independent club, the टोली became a charter सदस्य of the अमरीकी संघ in 1882, और joined the नेशनल लीग in 1890.
The club traditionally traces its origin to baseball 's पहला खुलकर professional team in 1869.
The Reds have won five संसार Series titles, one अमरीकी संघ pennant, nine National League pennants and टेन division शीर्षक.
The Reds निभाई in the नेशनल लीग वेस्ट between 1969 and 1993 and have महरूम in the नेशनल League सेंट्रल चूंकि 1994.
Since 2003, the Reds have निभाई at Great अमरीकी बॉल Park, निर्मित next to उनके घर इससे 1970 to 2002, Riverfront स्टेडियम.
bob Castellini has स्वामित्व the Cincinnati लाल चूंकि 2006.
A prank बदबू बमबारी.
a stink bomb is a यंत्र designed to create an अप्रिय smell.
They range in effectiveness इससे simple pranks to सैन्य grade malodorants or riot control chemical एजेंटों.
the गिनीज किताब of Records lists two smelliest substances.
एक is `` us Government मानक Bathroom Malodor '' ; a मिश्रण of आठ रसायन with a stench resembling इंसान feces, तभी much stronger, designed to परीक्षण the efficacy of deodorizers and एयर fresheners.
another एक, `` जो me ? ``, is a मिश्रण of five sulfur-containing रसायन and खुश्बू like rotting food and carcasses.
The कहावत `` a picture is लायक a thousand शब्द '' refers to the notion कि a जटिल idea can be conveyed साथ just a single still image.
it also aptly characterizes एक of the main goals of कल्पना, namely बनाना it संभावित to अवशोषित large amounts of data quickly.
The अभिव्यक्ति `` Use a चित्र.
It 's worth a thousand words. '' appears in a 1911 newspaper आलेख quoting newspaper एडिटर आर्थर Brisbane discussing journalism and publicity.
1913 newspaper advertisement
A similar phrase, `` One Look is Worth A Thousand Words '', appears in a 1913 newspaper advertisement for the piqua Auto सप्लाई House of Piqua, ओहियो.
An early use of the सटीक phrase appears in an 1918 समाचारपत्र advertisement लिये the San Antonio लाइट which says : One of the स्वदेश 's Greatest सम्पादक Says : One चित्र is लायक a Thousand शब्द the सैन Antonio Light 's Pictorial पत्रिका of the युद्ध exemplifies the सच्चाई of the above बयान -- judging इससे the warm reception it has received at the hands of the Sunday लाइट पाठक.
It is believed by कुछ that the आधुनिक use of the phrase stems इससे an article by फ्रेड R. बर्नार्ड in the विज्ञापन trade journal Printers ' Ink, promoting the उपयोग of images in विज्ञापन कि appeared on the sides of streetcars.
The December 8, 1921 issue carries an ad entitled, `` One dekh is लायक a Thousand Words. ''
Another ad by बर्नार्ड appears in the कूच 10, 1927 समस्या साथ the phrase `` एक चित्र Worth Ten Thousand शब्द, '' जहाँ it is labeled a Chinese कहावत ( 一圖勝萬言 ).
The घर Book of Proverbs, Maxims, and Familiar वाक्यांश उद्धरण Barnard as saying he पुकारा it `` a चाइनीज कहावत, so that लोगों would लो it seriously. ''
जल्द after, the कहावत होता become popularly attributed to Confucius.
the चर्चा of `` One Picture लायक हजार Words '' versus `` एक चित्र Worth Ten हजार Words '' wan येन i hua and 10.000 मील लायक 10.000 books is cited in सूचना ग्राफिक्स where the अवधारणा of अनेक in different disciplines and cultures.
A picture is लायक a thousand words
Despite इस आधुनिक उत्पत्ति of the लोकप्रिय phrase, the sentiment रै been expressed by पहले writers.
लिये example the Russian writer इवान तुर्गेन्येव wrote ( in Fathers and बेटे in 1862 ), `` A picture shows me at a glance what it takes दर्जनों of पृष्ठों of a किताब to expound. ''
कंप्यूटर प्रोग्रामर और लेखक Fred Brooks makes an opposite बयान regarding programming in The mythical Man-Month : `` Show me your flowcharts and conceal your tables, and I shall continue to be mystified.
Show me अपना tables, और i won’t प्रायः need अपना flowcharts ; they’ll be obvious. ''
The phrase has भी been spoofed by John McCarthy, the famous computer scientist, to make the opposite पाइंट : `` As the चाइनीज say, 1001 words is worth more than a picture. ''
A season is a subdivision of the year, marked by changes in weather, पारिस्थितिकी, and घंटों of daylight.
Seasons परिणाम इससे the yearly क्रान्ति of the Earth around the सूर्य and the tilt of the Earth 's axis सापेक्ष to the प्लेन of revolution.
in शीतोष्ण और ध्रुवीय regions, the seasons are चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in the intensity of sunlight that पहुँच the धरती 's surface, विसंगतियाँ of जिससे may कारण पशु to go into hibernation or to migrate, और पौधे to be dormant.
During may, जून and July, the northern hemisphere is exposed to अधिक सीधा धूप because the गोलार्ध चेहरों the सूर्य.
The same is true of the southern hemisphere in नवम्बर, December and January.
it is the झुकाव of the धरती कि कल्याणकारी the सूर्य to be higher in the आसमान during the summer months जिससे increases the solar फ्लक्स.
However, due to seasonal lag, जून, जुलाई और अगस्त हैं the hottest महीने in the northern hemisphere and December, जनवरी and फ़रवरी are the hottest months in the southern hemisphere.
In शीतोष्ण और subpolar regions, generally चार calendar -based सीज़न ( साथ उनके adjectives ) are recognized : spring ( vernal ), गर्मियाँ ( estival ), autumn ( autumnal ) and शीत ( hibernal ).
However, ecologists mostly use a six season मॉडल for temperate climate regions कि includes pre-spring ( prevernal ) and लेट summer ( serotinal ) as पृथक सीज़न साथ with the परंपरागत चार.
Hot regions have two or तीन सीज़न ; the rainy ( or गीला, or मानसून ) season और the शुष्क season, और in some tropical areas, a cool or mild season.
in कुछ भाग of the संसार, special `` seasons '' are loosely पारिभाषित based on important कार्यक्रम such as a hurricane season, tornado season or a wildfire season.

at the time of writing the नीदरलैंड्स is the 17th largest अर्थव्यवस्था of the world.
( see : सूची of देशों by जीडीपी ( नाममात्र ) )
GDP per capita is roughly $ 42,000 which puts it in the top 10 of richest nations in the world ( देखिए : सूची of देशों by जीडीपी ( PPP ) per capita ).
between 1996 and 2000 सालाना economic विकास ( GDP ) averaged over 4 %, खूब ऊपर the European average.
Growth slowed considerably in 2001-05 as भाग of the वैश्विक economic slowdown.
2006 और 2007 however showed आर्थिक विकास of 3.4 % and 3.9 %.
The डच अर्थव्यवस्था was hit considerably by the जारी वैश्विक financial crisis और the ensuing European debt संकट.
अनेक बैंको went bankrupt, and a क्रमांक of others had to प्राप्त governmental aid.
in 2009 the economy अस्वीकृत साथ 3.5 %, followed by दो सालो of mild विकास.
the Dutch economy is currently in a मंदी again, साथ an economic मनाही of 0.5 % in 2012.
Inflation is at 3.2 % in फ़रवरी 2013.
बेरोजगारी has been relatively low compared to other eu राष्ट्र for decades but बाद mid-2012 it has देखी a तेज़ increase और in February 2013 it रै hit 7.7 %.
The नीदरलैंड्स प्रबंधित to maintain its aaa दरजा at least until कूच 2013 according to the तीन major credit rating एजेंसियों.
historically, the डच introduced and invented the भण्डार market by the merchandise व्यापार through डच वेस्ट इण्डिया कम्पनी.
The नीदरलैंड्स is a founding member of the European Union, the OECD और the संसार Trade Organization.
Loyal to the Game is the tenth studio एल्बम और sixth studio एल्बम by तुपाक Shakur.

The View is an American बात दिखाएँ broadcast on ABC that debuted in 1997 as भाग of the संजाल 's daytime programming block.
Created by बारबरा Walters और Bill geddie, जो दोनो also serve as the show 's कार्यपालिका निर्माता, the कार्यक्रम features a panel of महिलाओं as co-hosts.
Along साथ walters, the वर्तमान फलक includes Whoopi Goldberg, जो serves as the moderator, Joy Behar, Elisabeth hasselbeck, and Sherri Shepherd.

programs ( 25 ), और the Oprah Winfrey Show ( 25 ).
Prunus virginiana, commonly called bitter-berry, chokecherry, वर्जिनिया bird चेरी और पश्चिमी chokecherry ( also ब्लैक chokecherry लिये P. virginiana var. demissa ), is a प्रजाति of bird चेरी ( prunus subgenus Padus ) native to उत्तर अमेरिका ; the प्राकृतिक historic range of P. virginiana शामिल सबसे of the continent, except लिये the far north and far south.
Los एंजिल्स International Airport is the primary विमानक्षेत्र सेवारत the Greater Los एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल, the second-most आबादी महानगर area in the संयुक्त States.
it is most प्रायः referred to by इसके iata विमानक्षेत्र code LAX, साथ the अक्षर सुनाया individually.
LAX is located in southwestern लॉस Angeles along the Pacific coast in the neighborhood of westchester, from the downtown कोर और is the primary airport of Los एंजिल्स World एयरपोर्ट ( LAWA ), an agency of the लॉस Angeles नगर government formerly ज्ञात as the Department of Airports.
In 2011, lax was the sixth व्यस्ततम विमानक्षेत्र in the संसार after Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport, बीजिंग पूंजी International विमानक्षेत्र, लंदन हीथ्रो विमानक्षेत्र, शिकागो o'hare International Airport, and टोकियो Haneda अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र साथ 61,862,052 यात्री.
the विमानक्षेत्र holds the अर्जी for `` the world 's व्यस्ततम उत्पत्ति and destination ( o & D ) विमानक्षेत्र '' in 2011 that involves non-connecting यात्री traffic.
It is also the तभी airport to रैंक among the top पाँच u.S. एयरपोर्ट लिये both passenger और कार्गो traffic.
LAX is the व्यस्ततम airport in the वृहद Los एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल, लकिन अन्य एयरपोर्ट including Bob आशा Airport, जॉन Wayne Airport, long Beach Airport, LA/Ontario अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र, और Palm Springs International Airport भी serve the प्रदेश.
LAX is also the व्यस्ततम विमानक्षेत्र in California and the वेस्ट Coast of the संयुक्त राज्य in शर्तें of flight परिचालन, passenger traffic and air कार्गो कार्यकलाप, leading it to be referred to as the `` Gateway to the Pacific रिम ``.
peyton विलियम्स मैनिंग ( born कूच 24, 1976 ) is an American football quarterback for the डेनवर broncos of the नेशनल Football League ( NFL ).
He played for the इंडियानापोलिस Colts for 14 seasons इससे 1998 to 2011.
He is the बेटे of former NFL क्वार्टरबैक Archie मैनिंग और an elder brother of नई York दिग्गज क्वार्टरबैक एली Manning.
मैनिंग played college फ़ुटबॉल for the University of Tennessee, अग्रणी the Volunteers to the 1997 सेक चैंपियनशिप in his वरिष्ठ season.
However, No. 3 Tennessee lost to the No. 2 Nebraska Cornhuskers 42-17 in the नारंगी Bowl giving नेब्रास्का and Tom Osborne their 3rd नेशनल championship in 4 सालो.
he थी चुनी by the Indianapolis Colts साथ the first overall चुनें in the 1998 एनएफएल Draft.
From 1998 to 2010, he led the कोल्टस to eight ( seven afc South and one AFC East ) प्रभाग championships, दो afc championships, and to a Super कटोरी championship ( सुपर Bowl XLI ).
he has won a record चार league सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी पुरस्कार, थी the सबसे valuable खिलाड़ी of Super कटोरी XLI, has महरूम नामित to बारह Pro Bowls, has twelve 4,000-yard गुजर सीज़न, और is the Indianapolis Colts ' all-time नेता in गुजर yards ( 54,828 ) और touchdown गुजरता ( 399 ).
in 2009, he was named the बेहतरीन player in the NFL and फॉक्स Sports साथ साथ Sports illustrated नामित him the NFL खिलाड़ी of the दशक of the 2000s.
In may 2011, he underwent neck सर्जरी to alleviate neck पीड़ा and arm weakness he dealt with दौरान the पिछला few seasons पहले हस्ताक्षर a five-year, $ 90 लाख अनुबंध एक्सटेंशन with the कोल्टस in July 2011.
मैनिंग had hoped to खेल in the 2011 season, but in सितंबर 2011, he underwent a much अधिक serious second surgery : a level एक cervical संलयन कार्यविधि.
Manning had never missed an एनएफएल खेल in उसके करियर, लकिन was मजबूर to मिस the संपूर्ण 2011 season.
He थी released by the Colts on कूच 7, 2012, and after an लगभग two-week period जहाँ he visited साथ और worked out for अनेक NFL टीमों, he हस्ताक्षरित साथ the डेनवर broncos on कूच 20, 2012.
मैनिंग 's pre-snap routine रै earned उसे the nickname, `` The शेरिफ '' और is एक of the most recognizable and parodied in the एनएफएल.
The Indianapolis कोल्टस ' almost विशेष उपयोग of the hurry-up ठोकर led to मैनिंग using an array of इशारों and मौखिक commands to कॉल the खेल at the लकीर of मुठभेड़ बल्कि than in the huddle.
the America मीनार of the American सामान्य बीच, the मुख्यालय of बेकर ह्यूजेस
बेकर Hughes is one of the world 's largest oilfield सेवाएं कंपनियाँ.
It operates in over 90 देशों, providing the oil and gas उद्योग with products और सेवाएं for खुदाई, गठन evaluation, पूर्णता, उत्पादन और reservoir consulting.
बेकर ह्यूजेस has इसके मुख्यालय in the America Tower in the अमरीकी General Center in Neartown, ह्यूस्टन.
Baker Hughes Incorporated थी formed when बेकर अंतरराष्ट्रीय and Hughes Tool Company मिलाया in 1987.
Baker Hughes operates worldwide with major offices in लिवरपूल, संयुक्त Kingdom ; सिंगापुर ; Dubai ; a research and maintenance facility in celle, जर्मनी ; lafayette, louisiana ; ह्यूस्टन, टेक्सास ; Pescara, इटली ; और Kuala lumpur, मलेशिया.
The कम्पनी is administered broadly in दो hemispheres : the पूर्वी hemisphere साथ पाँच regions ( यूरोपीय, Africa, the मध्य East, Asia Pacific और Russia/Caspian ) and the western hemisphere with चार regions ( कनाडा, US Land, US गल्फ, and Latin अमेरिका ).
प्रत्येक of these regions is subdivided into बाज़ार.
the संयुक्त States one- cent coin, commonly known as a penny, is a unit of currency equaling one one-hundredth of a United States डालर.
The cent 's symbol is ¢.
Its obverse रै प्रदर्शित the profile of President Abraham Lincoln since 1909, the centennial of उसके birth.
From 1959 ( the sesquicentennial of Lincoln 's birth ) to 2008, the रिवर्स featured the Lincoln मेमोरियल.
Four different reverse designs in 2009 सम्मानित lincoln 's 200th जन्मदिवस and a new, permanent रिवर्स – the संघ Shield – थी introduced in 2010.
The सिक्का is 0.75 inches ( 19.05 mm ) in व्यास और 0.061 inches ( 1.55 mm ) in मोटाई.
the U.S. Mint 's आधिकारिक नाम for a पैनी is `` '' और the u.S. राजकोष 's आधिकारिक name is `` one cent टुकड़ा ''.
The colloquial पद पैनी derives इससे the अंग्रेजों coin of the वही नाम, the pre-decimal version of which had a समान value.
in American English, pennies is the बहुवचन form, other बहुवचन फ़ॉर्म pence and पेशाब ( standard use in British अंग्रेज़ी ) are not used.
As of 2012, it costs the u.S. मिंट 2.00 सेंट to make a cent because of the cost of materials और उत्पादन.
This figure includes the Mint’s फिक्स्ड components for वितरण और fabrication, अनुमानित at $ 13 million in FY 2011.
It भी includes Mint ओवरहेड allocated to the पैनी, जिससे थी $ 17.7 million लिये 2011.
फिक्स्ड लागत and ओवरहेड would have to be अवशोषित by other circulating coins बगैर the पैनी.
the घाटा in profitability due to producing the one cent सिक्का in the संयुक्त States लिये the year of 2012 was $ 58,000,000.
इस was a पतला घटी from 2011, the year before, which था a उत्पादन loss of $ 60,200,000.
or अधिक specifically, are शोभायमान किस्में of domesticated आम कार्प ( Cyprinus carpio ) कि हैं kept for decorative purposes in बाहरी कोई तालाबों or water gardens.
Koi varieties are distinguished by coloration, patterning, और scalation.
Some of the major colors हैं white, black, red, yellow, blue, and cream.

the American संघ of Government Employees ( AFGE ) is an अमरीकी मजदूर union representing over 650,000 employees of the federal सरकारी, about 5,000 employees of the ज़िला of कोलंबिया, और a few सौ निजी सेक्टर कर्मचारी, mostly in and around federal facilities.
afge is the largest संघ लिये civilian, non- postal संघीय employees and the largest संघ for ज़िला of Columbia कर्मचारी who रपट directly to the mayor ( i.e., outside of D.C. पब्लिक स्कूलों ).

The evolution of पौधे has resulted in increasing levels of complexity, from the earliest algal mats, through bryophytes, lycopods, ferns to the complex gymnosperms और angiosperms of आज.
जबकि many of the समूह जिससे appeared पहले continue to thrive, विशेषकर in the environments in जिससे they विकसित, लिये a time प्रत्येक new ग्रेड of संगठन became अधिक `` successful '' than इसके predecessors.
in the ordovician period, around, the पहला जमीन पौधे appeared.
ये began to diversify in the late Silurian काल, around, और the परिणाम of their diversification हैं displayed in उल्लेखनीय विवरण in an जल्दी devonian चट्टान assemblage इससे the rhynie chert.
इस chert preserved early पौधे in cellular detail, petrified in volcanic स्रोतों.
by the middle of the devonian काल, most of the सुविधाएँ recognised in पौधे आज are उपस्थित, including जड़ें, पत्ते और secondary लकडी ; और, by late devonian टाइम्स, बीज था विकसित.
Late Devonian plants था thereby पहुँचे a degree of sophistication that अनुमत them to रूप forests of tall पेड़.
विकासवादी innovation continued into the carboniferous काल and is स्टिल ongoing आज.
Most संयंत्र groups were relatively unscathed by the Permo-Triassic extinction इवेंट, although the structures of communities changed.
इस may have नियत the झाँकी लिये the रूप of the flowering पौधे in the Triassic ( ~ ), and उनके later diversification in the cretaceous and Paleogene.
The latest major समूह of plants to evolve were the grasses, which became important in the mid-Paleogene, इससे around.
the grasses, as खूब as many अन्य समूह, विकसित नई mechanisms of चयापचय to जीवित the low and warm, dry conditions of the ऊष्णकटिबन्ध over the पिछला.
the जीतना Super Bowl टोली receives the Vince Lombardi ट्रॉफी.
the सुपर Bowl is an annual American फ़ुटबॉल game कि determines the चैंपियन of the नेशनल Football लीग ( NFL ).
the प्रतियोगिता is आयोजित in an अमरीकी city कि is chosen तीन to four सालो beforehand, usually in warm-weather or domed sites.
चूंकि 1971, the विजेता of the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( AFC ) चैंपियनशिप खेल रै faced the विजेता of the National फ़ुटबॉल Conference ( nfc ) चैंपियनशिप खेल in the culmination of the एनएफएल playoffs.
पहले the 1970 विलय between the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल League ( afl ) और the National Football League ( NFL ), the दो लीग मिले in चार such contests.
the पहला दो were ज्ञात as the `` afl-nfl World चैंपियनशिप Game. ''
सुपर Bowl III in 1969 was the first such खेल कि carried the `` Super कटोरी '' moniker, the names `` सुपर Bowl I `` और `` Super कटोरी ii `` यहूद retroactively applied to the first two खेल.
The NFC /NFL लीड in Super Bowl विन्स with 25, while the AFC /AFL रै जीती 22.
अठारह अलग franchises, including टीमों that relocated to another city, have won the सुपर Bowl.
The Pittsburgh Steelers have won the most Super Bowls with six championships ( रिकार्ड 6–2 ), while दोनो the डलास cowboys और सैन फ्रांसिस्को 49ers have five wins प्रत्येक ( cowboys 5–3 ; 49ers 5–1 ).
Dallas and पिट्सबर्ग have the most सुपर कटोरी दिखावे साथ आठ, while the भैंस बिल्स have the most लगातार appearances साथ चार losses in a row from 1990 to 1993.
The New इंग्लैण्ड Patriots, डेनवर Broncos and मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स have also खोया a रिकार्ड चार सुपर Bowls.
भैंस and Minnesota are both 0–4, Denver is 2–4 and New इंग्लैण्ड is 3–4.
the रिकार्ड लिये consecutive wins is two और is shared by seven franchises : the 1966-67 Green खाड़ी Packers, the 1972-73 Miami Dolphins, the 1974-75 और 1978-79 Pittsburgh स्टीलर्स ( the तभी team to accomplish this feat twice ), the 1988-89 सैन फ्रांसिस्को 49ers, the 1992-93 डलास Cowboys, the 1997-98 डेनवर Broncos, and the 2003-04 New England देशप्रेमी.
the तभी टोली साथ multiple Super Bowl appearances और no losses is the बाल्टीमोर Ravens, जो in winning सुपर कटोरी xlvii unseated and replaced the 49ers in कि स्थिति.
चार current एनएफएल teams have never appeared in a Super कटोरी, सहित franchise relocations and renaming : the Cleveland Browns, डेट्रॉयट शेर, Jacksonville jaguars, और Houston texans, though दोनो the भूरा और Lions था won NFL चैंपियनशिप खेल prior to the सृष्टि of the सुपर Bowl.

Alkaline phosphatase ( alp, ALKP ) ( ) is a hydrolase enzyme responsible for removing phosphate groups इससे many types of molecules, including nucleotides, प्रोटीन, and alkaloids.
The process of निकालना the फास्फेट समूह is पुकारा dephosphorylation.
as the नाम suggests, क्षारीय phosphatases हैं most प्रभावी in an क्षारीय पर्यावरण.
It is sometimes used synonymously as मौलिक phosphatase.
triticale ( × triticosecale ), ( ) is a संकर of wheat ( Triticum ) और rye ( Secale ) पहला bred in laboratories during the late 19th century.
the grain थी originally करवाया in स्कॉटलैंड और स्वीडन.
Commercially available triticale is almost सदा a दूसरी पीढी hybrid, i.e., a क्रॉस between two kinds of प्राथमिक ( पहला क्रॉस ) triticales.
As a rule, triticale combines the yield संभावित and grain विशेषता of गेहूं साथ the disease और पर्यावरणीय tolerance ( including soil conditions ) of rye.
तभी recently has it been विकसित into a commercially सुगठित क्रॉप.
Depending on the cultivar, triticale can more or कम resemble either of its parents.
it is grown mostly for forage or चारा, although कुछ triticale-based भोजन can be purchased at health खाना स्टोर्स or are to be मिला in some breakfast cereals.
When crossing wheat और rye, गेहूं is used as the मादा parent और rye as the पुरूष जनक ( पराग दाता ).
The resulting संकर is बंध्य, and जरूर be treated with colchicine to induce polyploidy और यूँ the ability to reproduce itself.
The primary producers of triticale हैं कैंडल, जर्मनी, France, Belarus और ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
In 2009, according to the Food और कृषि Organization ( fao ), 15.0 लाख tons यहूद harvested in 29 countries आरपार the world.
The triticale संकरण हैं all amphidiploid, which means the plant is द्विगुणित लिये two genomes निकला इससे different प्रजाति.
In other शब्द, triticale is an allotetraploid.
in पहले years, most कार्य was done on octoploid triticale.
Different ploidy स्तर have been निर्मित और evaluated over time.
The tetraploids दिखाया little promise, but hexaploid triticale थी कामयाब enough to ढूँढें वाणिज्यिक अनुप्रयोग.
The CIMMYT triticale improvement कार्यक्रम wanted to improve food production और पोषण in developing countries.
triticale रै potential in the उत्पादन of ब्रैड and other खाना उत्पाद, ऐसे as cookies, पास्ता, pizza dough and नाश्ता cereals.
The प्रोटीन content is higher than that of wheat, although the glutenin fraction is less.
The grain रै also been stated to have उच्चतर स्तर of lysine than गेहूं.
assuming increased acceptance, the milling industry will have to adapt to triticale, as the milling तकनीकों employed for wheat are मुलम्मा to triticale.
Sell et al. मिला triticale could be प्रयुक्त as a फीड अनाज, and later research found इसके starch थी particularly readily digested.
as a feed अनाज, triticale is already खूब established और of high आर्थिक importance.
It has received attention as a संभावित उर्जा क्रॉप, और research is फिलहाल होने conducted on the उपयोग of the क्रॉप 's बायोमास in bioethanol उत्पादन.

a college football national championship in the highest level of collegiate खेल in the संयुक्त States, फिलहाल the नेशनल कॉलेजिएट Athletic Association ( NCAA ) Division i Football कटोरी subdivision ( FBS ), is a नामांकन awarded annually by विभिन्न third-party संगठन to their selection ( s ) of the बेहतरीन कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल team ( s ).
Division i FBS ( formerly प्रभाग i-a ) फ़ुटबॉल is the तभी NCAA sport in जिससे a yearly चैंपियन is not determined by an NCAA मंजूर चैंपियनशिप event.
क्युकी the championship team is नहीं संकल्पित by a ncaa championship or टूर्नामेंट इवेंट, it is sometimes unofficially referred to as a `` mythical नेशनल championship ``.
चूंकि the ncaa, the खेल 's शासी देह, करता नहीं determine or घोषित a national champion in इस फ़ील्ड, determination of such has प्रायः engendered controversy.
a चैंपियनशिप टोली is independently declared by various individuals and संगठन, often referred to as `` selectors ''.
ये choices हैं sometimes at हालात साथ प्रत्येक other.
जबकि the NCAA रै never officially endorsed an सालाना चैंपियनशिप team, it रै प्रलेखित the चुनाव of several selectors in the आधिकारिक NCAA फ़ुटबॉल Bowl subdivision Records.
in जोड, विभिन्न third पार्टी विश्लेषकों have independently published उनके own सूचियाँ of what they have संकल्पित to be the सबसे legitimate selections for प्रत्येक ऋतु.
These हैं भी प्रायः at odds साथ प्रत्येक अन्य as खूब as individual स्कूल 's claims on नेशनल championships, which, लिये any particular season, may or may not correlate to the selections published elsewhere.
फिलहाल, two widely पहचाना national champions selectors हैं the संबद्ध Press, which conducts a poll of फ़ुटबॉल sportswriters, and the यूएसए Today Coaches ' पोल, a पोल of American फ़ुटबॉल कोच संघ active कोच कि is contractually obligated to नाम the विजेता of the Bowl चैंपियनशिप Series championship खेल as its नेशनल champion.

The Nationals are a member of the East प्रभाग of the नेशनल League of प्रमुख League बेसबॉल ( MLB ).
The team 's घर ballpark is नागरिकों Park, स्तिथ on दक्षिण Capitol गली in Southeast D.C., निकट the Anacostia नदी.
the park खोली in 2008, replacing RFK Stadium, the team 's घर इससे 2005 to 2007.
the नागरिकों ' नाम गर्भाशयी from the पूर्व Washington baseball टोली कि था the वही name ( प्रयुक्त interchangeably साथ Senators ).

An expansion franchise, the क्लबों थी संस्थापित in as the Montreal Expos, the पहला major लीग टोली in कनाडा.
They यहूद आधारित in Montreal, क्यूबेक, and निभाई उनके home games at jarry पार्क स्टेडियम and बाद in ओलम्पिक स्टेडियम.
in, the expos won a प्रभाग चैंपियनशिप, won उनके first-ever playoff श्रेणी by defeating the Philadelphia फ़िलीज़, 3–2, and उन्नत to the National लीग चैंपियनशिप Series, जहाँ वे would go on to खोना to the लॉस एंजिल्स डॉजर्स, 3–2, in their only postseason रूप दौरान the strike-shortened season.

बाद the 2001 season, एमएलबी माना revoking the team 's मताधिकार, साथ साथ either the मिनेसोटा Twins or the tampa खाड़ी Devil किरणें.

a निर्भर शुल्क ( in the United राज्य ) or conditional शुल्क ( in England and Wales ) is any शुल्क लिये सेवाएं provided where the fee is payable only if वहीँ is a favourable परिणाम.
in the law, it is पारिभाषित as a `` शुल्क चार्ज लिये a वकील 's services तभी if the मुकदमा is कामयाब or is favorably settled आउट of अदालत....
Contingent fees हैं usually गणना as a प्रतिशत of the क्लाएंट 's जाल recovery. ''
In the English विधिक system, it is generally referred to as no जीत no fee.
A conditional fee agreement between a विधि firm and a client.
the usual रूप of this agreement is that the solicitor होगा take a law मामला on the समझना कि if lost, no भुगतान is made.
however, if the मामला is won, the वकील होगा be entitled to the normal शुल्क आधारित on hourly बिलिंग, प्लस a success fee.
The success fee in England must be as a percentage no greater than 100 % of the सामान्य fee.
This contrasts साथ the contingency शुल्क in the us, जिससे देता the कामयाब attorney a प्रतिशत of the damages awarded in एहसान of उसके क्लाएंट.
This makes it easier लिये the poor to pursue their सिविल rights since वरना, to मुकदमा someone for a अपकृत्य, एक must पहला be धनवान पर्याप्त to pursue such वाद in the पहला प्लेस.
However, because of the ऊँची risk, few attorneys will लो मामले on a आकस्मिकता आधार unless वे feel the मामला has good merit.
According to a 2004 किताब by विधि प्राध्यापक हर्बर्ट Kritzer, contingent शुल्क were अनुमत as of कि year in the following countries : Australia, ब्राज़ील, Canada, the Dominican गणतंत्र, France, Greece, आयरलैंड, Japan, नई जीलैंड, the United Kingdom and the United States.
वे हैं also allowed in निजी injury क्रियाएँ in लिथुआनिया.
recently, they have been अनुमत in Belgium as well.
A Convocation ( लैटिन 'calling साथ ', translating the Greek ecclesia ) is a group of लोगों formally assembled लिये a special purpose.
