The दिखाएँ centers on protagonist जैक्सन `` Jax '' teller ( चार्ली Hunnam ), the then-vice president of the club, जो begins questioning the क्लबों और himself.
Sons of Anarchy premiered on सितंबर 3, 2008, on केबल network FX.
The third ऋतु of the series आकर्षित an औसत of 4.9 million दर्शक प्रति week, बनाना it FX 's highest rated series कभी, surpassing fx 's अन्य हिट्स the Shield, nip/tuck, and Rescue me.

those involved in the production of the series imply that a सातवाँ and final season is creator Kurt sutter 's plan.
The Grímsvötn sub-glacial lakes ( ; vötn = `` waters '', singular : ) and the ज्वालामुखी of the same नाम हैं in south-east Iceland.
वे are in the हाइलैंड्स of Iceland at the northwestern side of the vatnajökull ice-cap.
The झीलों are at, at an उन्नयन of.
beneath the lakes is the magma कक्ष of the grímsvötn ज्वालामुखी.
Grímsvötn is a basaltic volcano which has the उच्चतम फटना आवृत्ति of all the volcanoes in Iceland and रै a southwest-northeast-trending fissure प्रणाली.
The विशाल climate-impacting laki fissure eruption of 1783–1784 थी a भाग of the same फिशर system.
grímsvötn was erupting at the वही time as laki during 1783, but जारी to erupt जबतक 1785.
Because सबसे of the ज्वालामुखी झूठ underneath Vatnajökull, most of इसके eruptions have been subglacial और the बातचीत of magma and meltwater from the बर्फ कल्याणकारी phreatomagmatic explosive activity.
On 21 May 2011 at 19:25 utc, an फटना began, with ऊँची plumes accompanied by अनेक earthquakes, resulting in रद्दीकरण of 900 flights in आइसलैंड, और in the संयुक्त किंगडम, Greenland, जर्मनी, आयरलैंड and Norway on 22–25 May.
Until 25 may the eruption scale था महरूम larger than कि of the 2010 eruption of Eyjafjallajökull.
The eruption stopped at 02:40 UTC on 25 may 2011, हालांकि there थी कुछ explosive कार्यकलाप from the tephra vents affecting तभी the area around the crater.

caesars Entertainment Corporation ( formerly harrah 's entertainment इससे 1995 to 2010 ) is an अमरीकी पब्लिक gaming corporation that owns and operates over 50 casinos, होटल, and seven गोल्फ़ पाठ्यक्रम under अनेक brands.
the company, आधारित in Paradise, Nevada, is the largest गेमिंग कम्पनी in the world, with annual revenues of $ 8.9 billion ( 2010 ).
caesars is a पब्लिक company, with a joint venture of Apollo वैश्विक Management और Texas Pacific Group ownig a विशाल portion of the stack और blackstone समूह also पकड़कर a significant हिस्सेदारी.
the नाम change from `` Harrah 's entertainment Inc. '' to `` Caesars entertainment Corporation '' was made official on November 23, 2010.
Harrah 's remains a key ब्रांड in the कम्पनी.

a स्थाई निवासी in कनाडा is a person जो is not a Canadian नागरिक लकिन जो has महरूम granted अनुमति to live और work in Canada without any time सीमा on उसके or उसके रहो.
a स्थाई resident must सजीव in Canada for two सालो out of प्रत्येक पाँच or risk खोने that status.
a Permanent निवासी holds अनेक of the वही अधिकारों and responsibilities as a कनाडाई नागरिक, among अन्य the सही to work लिये कोई enterprise as well as for the federal or प्रांतीय सरकारी ( under restriction of अभिगम rights to निश्चित regulated professions ).
the प्रमुख मतभेद are that residents can नहीं :
vote in elections in कनाडा ;
चलाएं for elected office ;
hold Canadian passports ;
In जोड, they may be allowed to जुड़ें Canada 's हथियारबंद forces if the नेशनल ब्याज होता नहीं be prejudiced.
स्थाई residents also risk deportation for गंभीर crimes committed जबकि निवासी in कनाडा.
स्थाई निवासियों may apply लिये कनाडाई citizenship बाद three years in Canada ; however this is not अनिवार्य.

regarding the north-american मार्केट, TV Guide काल्स her `` unequivocally the most famous साबुन opera अक्षर in the history of दिन tv '', and शामिल उसके in उनके 2013 सूची of the 60 Nastiest खलनायक of सब समय.
a आलेख of the us cpi from 1913 to 2006 ( in blue ), और इसके प्रतिशत सालाना बदलें ( in red )
A उपभोक्ता price index ( cpi ) उपायों changes in the price स्तर of a market बास्केट of उपभोक्ता goods और services खरीदा by households.
The cpi in the संयुक्त राज्य is पारिभाषित by the ब्यूरो of Labor आंकडे as `` a माप of the average change over समय in the कीमतें paid by शहरी उपभोक्ता for a मार्केट बास्केट of consumer goods और services. ''
The CPI is a statistical अनुमान constructed using the कीमतें of a sample of representative items जिनकी prices हैं एकत्रित periodically.
Sub-indexes और sub-sub-indexes are computed for different श्रेणी और sub-categories of goods और सेवाएं, होने संयुक्त to produce the overall अनुक्रमणिका साथ weights reflecting उनके साझा in the कुल of the उपभोक्ता expenditures covered by the index.
it is one of several price indices calculated by सबसे national statistical एजेंसियों.
the annual प्रतिशत बदलें in a cpi is used as a measure of inflation.
A cpi can be used to index ( i.e., समायोजन for the effect of inflation ) the real value of मजदूरी, salaries, pensions, लिये regulating कीमतें and for deflating monetary magnitudes to show परिवर्तन in रियल मान.
in most देशों, the CPI is, along with the जनसांख्यिकी census और the USA नेशनल आय और Product Accounts, एक of the most closely watched national आर्थिक आंकडे.
knocking on wood, or to टच लकडी, refers to the apotropaic tradition in western folklore of literally touching/knocking on लकडी, or merely stating कि you हैं doing or intend same, in order to avoid `` tempting fate `` after बनाना a favourable observation, a boast, or declaration concerning एक 's अपना मौत.
Rocker arm
generally referred to भीतर the context of the internal दहन engine of automotive, समुद्री, motorcycle और reciprocating विमानन engines, the रॉकर arm is an oscillating lever कि conveys रेडियल movement इससे the कैम पालि into रैखिक movement at the poppet valve to खोलें it.
एक end is raised and lowered by a rotating पालि of the camshaft ( either directly or via a tappet ( lifter ) और pushrod ) while the अन्य end अधिनियमों on the valve stem.
जब the camshaft पालि उठाता the outside of the भुजा, the inside presses down on the वाल्व स्टेम, opening the valve.
When the बाहर of the भुजा is permitted to वापसी due to the camshafts रोटेशन, the अंदर rises, allowing the valve spring to close the वाल्व.
The ड्राइव कैम is driven by the camshaft.
इस pushes the rocker arm up and down परिचय the trunnion pin or rocker शाफ्ट.
Friction may be घटाया at the पाइंट of सम्पर्क with the valve stem by a रोलर cam follower.
A समान व्यवस्था transfers the गति via another roller कैम follower to a दूसरी rocker arm.
This rotates about the rocker शाफ्ट, and हस्तांतरण the motion via a tappet to the poppet valve.
In इस मामला इस opens the intake valve to the बेलन सिर.
the प्रभावी leverage of the भुजा ( और यूँ the फ़ोर्स it can exert on the valve stem ) is determined by the रॉकर arm ratio, the ratio of the अलहदा इससे the rocker arm 's बीच of रोटेशन to the tip विभाजित by the अलहदा from the center of rotation to the पाइंट acted on by the camshaft or pushrod.
Current automotive design favors rocker arm ratios of about 1.5:1 to 1.8:1.
however, in the पास्ट smaller धनात्मक ratios ( the valve lift is greater than the कैम लिफ्ट ) और भी ऋणात्मक ratios ( वाल्व लिफ्ट smaller than the cam लिफ्ट ) have महरूम प्रयुक्त.
Many pre-WW2 engines use 1:1 ( न्यूट्रल ) ratios.
लिये car इंजन the rocker arms are generally steel stampings, providing a reasonable balance of शक्ति, weight और किफायती लागत.
क्युकी the rocker arms हैं, in part, reciprocating वज़न, excessive mass विशेषकर at the लीवर ends limits the engine 's ability to reach ऊँची operating speeds.
`` The रात्रि the Lights Went Out in Georgia '' is a Southern गोथिक song written by songwriter Bobby Russell and performed in 1972 by his then-wife vicki Lawrence.
reba mcentire बाद covered it in 1991.
Recorded in लेट अक्तूबर 1972 in United/Western Studios on सूर्यास्त in Hollywood और released less than two weeks बाद in November 1972, the सोंग centers around the older bhai of the narrator, falsely convicted of and चलाया for a murder, which the narrator herself रै वचनबद्ध.
in डाक mail, a वापसी पता is an सुस्पष्ट समावेश of the address of the person sending the संदेश.
it provides the recipient ( and sometimes प्राधिकृत intermediaries ) साथ a अर्थात् to determine कैसा to respond to the sender of the संदेश if needed.
the return पता need नहीं include a sender 's name, लकिन should शामिल पता or p.o. बक्सा details in the same रास्ता as the डिलीवरी पता चाहिए.
in some countries, the return address is conventionally स्तिथ in the अपर बाएँ हाथ कोने of the लिफाफा, कार्ड, or label.
in the United किंगडम, the वापसी address is प्रायः लगाई on the रिवर्स of the envelope, निकट the शीर्ष.
Businesses प्रायः उपयोग लिफाफे preprinted साथ a return address.
अनेक individuals have sheets of adhesive labels preprinted साथ उनके home पता to affix to उनके correspondence.
Charities sometimes include ऐसे चादरें in mailshots.
रोल्स of वापसी Address लेबल्स can be purchased from कंपनियाँ that sell personalized labels to provide individuals an easy way to peel और स्टिक return address labels to their लिफाफे.
The वापसी address is नहीं required on डाक mail.
however, lack of a वापसी पता prevents the postal सेवा इससे होने able to वापसी the मद if it proves undeliverable ; ऐसे as इससे क्षति, postage due, or invalid गंतव्य.
Such mail may यूँ become dead letter मेल.
चाहिए the return address be of a अलग state or country, the मेल may be routed through कि स्थान लिये ease of वापसी.
A तंत्रिका guidance conduit ( भी referred to as an कृत्रिम तंत्रिका conduit or कृत्रिम तंत्रिका graft, as opposed to an autograft ) is an कृत्रिम means of guiding axonal regrowth to facilitate nerve regeneration और is one of अनेक नैदानिक treatments लिये nerve चोटों.
When सीधा suturing of the two आउट of a severed तंत्रिका can नहीं be accomplished without टेंशन, the standard नैदानिक treatment लिये परिधीय nerve चोटों is autologous तंत्रिका कलम.
Due to the limited उपलब्धता of दाता tissue और functional recovery in autologous तंत्रिका कलम, neural ऊतक अभियान्त्रिकी research रै focused on the development of bioartificial nerve मार्गदर्शन conduits as an alternative treatment, especially for विशाल defects.
Similar तकनीकों हैं भी होने explored लिये nerve repair in the स्पाइनल cord लकिन तंत्रिका regeneration in the सेंट्रल बेचैन प्रणाली मुद्राएँ a वृहद चुनौती क्युकी its axons do not regenerate appreciably in their देशी environment.
The creation of कृत्रिम conduits is भी ज्ञात as entubulation because the तंत्रिका ends and intervening gap हैं enclosed भीतर a ट्यूब रचित of biological or सिंथेटिक सामग्री.
Whether the conduit is in the form of a biologic ट्यूब, synthetic ट्यूब or tissue-engineered conduit, it should सुकर neurotropic and neurotrophic संचार between the proximal and distal ends of the तंत्रिका गैप, block बाह्य inhibitory factors, and provide a physical guidance लिये axonal regrowth.
the सबसे basic उद्देश्य of a nerve मार्गदर्शन conduit is to combine physical, chemical, and biological cues अंतर्गत conditions कि will foster tissue गठन.
सामग्री that have been used to मेक biologic tubes include blood vessels and skeletal muscles, while nonabsorbable and bioabsorbable synthetic tubes have महरूम बना from silicone and polyglycolide respectively.
tissue-engineered तंत्रिका guidance conduits हैं a संयोजन of many तत्व : scaffold ढांचा, scaffold material, cellular therapies, neurotrophic factors और biomimetic सामग्री.
the चुनाव of जिससे शारीरिक, रासायनिक and biological cues to use is आधारित on the properties of the nerve पर्यावरण, which is critical in बनाना the most desirable environment लिये axon regeneration.
the कारकों that कंट्रोल material चयन include biocompatibility, biodegradability, mechanical अखंडता, controllability दौरान nerve growth, implantation and sterilization.
Hardcore साहूकार is an अमरीकी वास्तविकता television series produced by rdf USA ( बाद Zodiak USA ) and Richard Dominick प्रोडक्शन्स for trutv परिचय the day-to-day परिचालन of अमरीकी Jewelry और Loan, a family-owned pawn दूकान located at 20450 Greenfield सड़क, between 8 मील Road और the जॉन C. आवास फ्रीवे in Detroit, Michigan.
The श्रेणी premiered on अगस्त 16, 2010, delivering two million दर्शक, सेटिंग a रिकार्ड as truTV 's most-watched series प्रीमियर कभी.
Amoxicillin bp
Amoxicillin ( इन ), formerly amoxycillin ( BAN ), और abbreviated amox, is a moderate-spectrum, bacteriolytic, β-lactam antibiotic प्रयुक्त to treat bacterial infections caused by susceptible microorganisms.
It is प्रायः the drug of चुनाव within the क्लास क्युकी it is बेहतर absorbed, following मौखिक प्रशासन, than other β-lactam एंटीबायोटिक.
Amoxicillin is एक of the most common एंटीबायोटिक prescribed लिये children.
the ड्रग became available in 1972.
amoxicillin is susceptible to degradation by β-lactamase -producing जीवाणु, जिससे are resistant to a broad वर्णक्रम of β-lactam antibiotics, such as पेनिसिलीन.
लिये this कारण, it is प्रायः combined साथ clavulanic acid, a β-lactamase inhibitor.
This increases effectiveness by reducing इसके susceptibility to β-lactamase प्रतिरोध.
Lyndon baines Johnson ( August 27, 1908 – जनवरी 22, 1973 ), प्रायः referred to as LBJ, थी the 36th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1963–1969 ), a position he assumed बाद उसके service as the 37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ).
he is एक of तभी चार people who परोसा in all चार निर्वाचित federal कार्यालयों of the United States : Representative, सीनेटर, वाइस President, and अध्यक्ष.
जॉनसन, a Democrat from Texas, served as a United राज्य Representative इससे 1937–1949 and as a Senator from 1949–1961, including six years as संयुक्त राज्य Senate बहुमत नेता, two as Senate अल्पसंख्यक Leader और दो as Senate बहुमत चाबुक.
बाद campaigning unsuccessfully लिये the Democratic नामांकन in 1960, जॉनसन was पूछा by John F. Kennedy to be उसके running mate लिये the 1960 presidential चुनाव.
जॉनसन succeeded to the presidency following the हत्या of John F. कैनेडी on November 22, 1963, completed Kennedy 's term and was elected अध्यक्ष in उसके own right, winning by a large margin over Barry goldwater in the 1964 चुनाव.
Johnson थी greatly supported by the Democratic Party और as President, he थी जिम्मेदार लिये डिजाइनिंग the `` ग्रेट समाज `` विधान that शामिल laws कि upheld सिविल अधिकारों, public प्रसारण, Medicare, medicaid, environmental protection, aid to शिक्षा, और his `` War on Poverty. ''
जॉनसन was प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके domineering व्यक्तित्व and the `` Johnson उपचार, '' his coercion of शक्तिशाली politicians in अनुक्रम to advance विधान.
Meanwhile, Johnson escalated American भागीदारी in the वियतनाम युद्ध, इससे 16,000 अमरीकी advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 कॉम्बैट सैनिकों in early 1968, as American हताहत soared और the सलाम process bogged bas.
The involvement stimulated a large एंग्री antiwar गति based विशेषकर on university campuses in the u.S. and abroad.
Summer दंगे broke आउट in सबसे प्रमुख शहरों बाद 1965, और अपराधों rates soared, as उसके प्रतिद्वंद्वियों raised मांगे लिये `` law और order '' नीतियों.
the Democratic पार्टी split in multiple feuding factions, and after Johnson did poorly in the 1968 New Hampshire primary, he ended उसके बोली लिये reelection.
रिपब्लिकन रिचर्ड निक्सन थी elected to सफल him.
इतिहासकारों argue that Johnson 's प्रेसिडेंसी चिह्नित the peak of आधुनिक liberalism in the United States after the New सौदे era.
Johnson is क्रमित favorably by some historians because of उसके domestic policies.
the Big बंग Theory डाल at कॉमिक Con 2009, from left : Kunal Nayyar, साइमन Helberg, kaley Cuoco, जिम पार्सन्स, और Johnny Galecki
the American sitcom The Big Bang सिद्धान्त, निर्मित और कार्यपालिका produced by चक Lorre and विधेयक prady, premiered on सीबीएस on सितंबर 24, 2007.
the show centers on five characters : roommates शेल्डन कूपर and लियोनार्ड Hofstadter, दो Caltech physicists ; पैनी, a वेट्रेस and aspiring अभिनेत्री who जीवनदान आरपार the hall ; and Leonard and शेल्डन 's मित्रों and co-workers aerospace engineer हावर्ड Wolowitz, और astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali.
Over समय, अनेक supporting characters have been प्रचारित to starring roles : Leslie Winkle ( season 1 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 2 regular ; ऋतु 3 guest ), a physicist सहयोगी, और, at अलग times, a प्रेमी of both लियोनार्ड और हावर्ड ; bernadette rostenkowski-wolowitz ( ऋतु 3 recurring ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ), a microbiologist, हावर्ड 's fiancée और subsequent बीवी, और पूर्व part-time waitress alongside पैनी ; neuroscientist एमी farrah Fowler ( season 3 guest ; season 4 recurring ; ऋतु 4-present regular ), जो joins the समूह after होने matched to शेल्डन on a डेटिंग जालस्थल ; और कॉमिक book store-owner, Stuart खिलते ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; ऋतु 6-present regular ), जो replaces हावर्ड as राज 's best dost जब हावर्ड is in स्पेस.
the दिखाएँ also सुविधाएँ numerous supporting characters, प्रत्येक of whom plays a prominent भूमिका in a small समूह of episodes.
The अमरीकी सिविल War ( acw ), also ज्ञात as the War between the States or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए naming ), थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा from 1861 to 1865 between the United राज्य ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) और several Southern slave राज्य कि declared their secession और formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
the war था its origin in the समस्या of गुलामी, विशेषकर the extension of slavery into the पश्चिमी territories.
Foreign शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene.
After four सालो of bloody combat that बाएँ over 600,000 soldiers मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the South 's अवसंरचना, the Confederacy collapsed, गुलामी थी abolished, और the difficult Reconstruction प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल unity and guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, republicans, led by Abraham lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United राज्य ' territories.
lincoln जीती, लकिन before his inauguration on March 4, 1861, सात cotton-based स्लेव states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्ष James बुकानन and the आवक republicans rejected secession as illegal.
lincoln 's inaugural पता घोषित his प्रशासन होता not initiate civil war.
Eight remaining slave राज्य continued to reject calls लिये secession.
Confederate forces जब्त numerous federal दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the confederacy.
A सलाम सम्मेलन failed to ढूँढें a compromise, और दोनो sides prepared for युद्ध.
The Confederates assumed that European देशों यहूद so निर्भर on `` King कपास `` कि वे would intervene ; none did and none पहचाना the नई confederate States of अमेरिका.
hostilities began on April 12, 1861, जब Confederate forces fired upon फोर्ट Sumter, a कुंजी फोर्ट held by संघ सैनिकों in South कैरोलिना.
lincoln called for प्रत्येक state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently, four more slave राज्य joined the Confederacy, bringing their कुल to ग्यारह.
the Union soon controlled the किनारा राज्य और established a नवल नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the southern अर्थव्यवस्था.
the Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The पतझड़ 1862 confederate campaign into Maryland ( a संघ state ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British हस्तक्षेप.
Lincoln issued the emancipation Proclamation, जिससे बना समाप्ति slavery a युद्ध goal.
To the वेस्ट, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river नेवी, तब much of their western armies, और the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the मिसिसिपी नदी.
in 1863, रॉबर्ट E. ली 's confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the बैटल of Gettysburg.
पश्चिमी सफलताओं led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all Union सेना in 1864.
In the Western थिएटर, विलियम T. Sherman drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the sea, destroying confederate अवसंरचना along the रास्ता.
the संघ marshaled the resources and जनशक्ति to आक्रमण the Confederacy इससे all directions, और could afford to fight battles of अपघर्षण through the overland Campaign towards Richmond, the confederate capital.
the defending confederate army failed, अग्रणी to Lee 's आत्मसमर्पण to Grant at appomattox अदालत House on अप्रैल 9, 1865.
the अमरीकी सिविल War थी one of the earliest true industrial युद्धों.
railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, खानों, shipyards, बैंको, परिवहन and खाना आपूर्तियाँ all foreshadowed संसार War I.
It remains the deadliest war in अमरीकी इतिहास, resulting in the मौतों of an estimated 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined number of civilian हताहत.
Historian जॉन huddleston estimates the मौत टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of all उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा, and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
Human evolution refers to the evolutionary process अग्रणी up to the रूप of modern humans.
जबकि it began साथ the पिछला आम पूर्वज of सब जीवन, the टॉपिक usually कवर तभी the विकासवादी इतिहास of primates, in particular the genus Homo, and the emergence of होमो sapiens as a पृथक species of hominids ( or `` ग्रेट apes '' ).
The study of इंसान evolution involves अनेक scientific disciplines, including शारीरिक मानवशास्त्र, primatology, archaeology, भाषाविज्ञान, evolutionary मनोविज्ञान, embryology और आनुवंशिकी.
according to genetic अध्ययन, primates diverged from other स्तनधारियों about in the Late Cretaceous period, and the earliest जीवाश्मों appear in the Paleocene, around.
the family Hominidae diverged इससे the hylobatidae ( Gibbon ) family 15-20 million years पहले, and around, the Ponginae ( orangutans ), diverged इससे the Hominidae परिवार.
bipedalism is the basic adaption of the Hominin line, और the earliest bipedal hominin is considered to be either sahelanthropus or orrorin, with ardipithecus, a full bipedal, coming somewhat later.
The gorilla और चिंपैंजी diverged around the वही समय, परिचय 4-6 million सालो ago, और either Sahelanthropus or orrorin may be हमारी पिछला साझा ancestor with them.
the early bipedals आखिरकार evolved into the australopithecines and बाद the genus Homo.
the earliest documented सदस्यों of the genus होमो हैं होमो habilis जिससे evolved around ; the earliest species लिये which there is positive evidence of use of stone टूल्स.
the दिमाग of these early hominins were about the वही आकार as कि of a चिंपैंजी.
दौरान the next लाख सालो a process of encephalization began, और with the arrival of Homo erectus in the चट्टान record, cranial क्षमता था doubled to 850 cm3.
Homo erectus और होमो ergaster were the पहला of the hominina to leave अफ़्रीकी, और ये प्रजाति spread through Africa, Asia, and Europe between.
It is believed कि these species यहूद the first to use आग और जटिल टूल्स.
according to the हाल अफ़्रीकी Ancestry सिद्धान्त, आधुनिक humans विकसित in Africa संभवतः इससे होमो heidelbergensis, होमो rhodesiensis or Homo antecessor and migrated out of the महाद्वीप कुछ 50,000 to 100,000 सालो ago, replacing लोकल populations of Homo erectus, Homo denisova, Homo floresiensis और Homo neanderthalensis.
archaic होमो sapiens, the forerunner of anatomically modern इंसानो, evolved between 400,000 and 250,000 years ago.
हाल DNA प्रमाण suggests कि several haplotypes of neanderthal उत्पत्ति are present among सब non-african populations, और Neanderthals और other hominids, such as Denisova hominin may have contributed up to 6 % of their genome to present-day humans. < ref name= '' 10.1126/science.1209202 '' > anatomically आधुनिक humans evolved from archaic Homo sapiens in the Middle paleolithic, about 200,000 सालो पहले.
The transition to behavioral modernity साथ the विकास of सांकेतिक culture, भाषा, और specialized lithic प्रौद्योगिकी happened around 50,000 सालो ago according to many anthropologists although कुछ suggest a क्रमिक change in बर्ताव over a longer time स्पैन.
लिसा cuddy, M.D., is a fictional character on the फॉक्स network medical drama हाउस.
She is portrayed by Lisa edelstein.
cuddy was the डीन of आयुर्विज्ञान and hospital administrator of the fictional princeton-plainsboro Teaching हॉस्पिटल in New Jersey.
वो भी becomes House 's प्रेम ब्याज through the years to प्रारंभ a relationship साथ him in ऋतु seven.
cuddy छोड़ो her job बाद the events of season सात 's finale `` Moving on ``.
Track and फ़ील्ड is a खेल comprising various प्रतिस्पर्धी एथलेटिक प्रतियोगिताओं based on running, jumping, और फेंकना.
the नाम of the खेल derives from the प्रतियोगिता venue : a stadium with an oval running track around a ग्रास फ़ील्ड.
The फेंकना and कूद कार्यक्रम generally take place in the सेंट्रल enclosed area.
Track और फ़ील्ड falls under the umbrella sport of एथलेटिक्स, जिससे भी includes सड़क running, क्रॉस देश कार्यशील, and रेस walking.
The two most prestigious international track और field competitions are आयोजित under the ध्वज of एथलेटिक्स : the athletics competition at the ओलम्पिक Games और the आइएएएफ संसार championships in Athletics.
the International Association of Athletics Federations is the international शासी देह लिये track and field.
Track और field कार्यक्रम are generally व्यक्तिगत खेल साथ athletes चुनौतीपूर्ण each other to decide a सिंगल victor.
The racing कार्यक्रम are जीती by the खिलाड़ी with the तीव्रतम time, while the कूद और throwing कार्यक्रम हैं जीती by the athlete जो रै achieved the महानतम अलहदा or height in the contest.
The कार्यशील कार्यक्रम are categorised as sprints, middle and long-distance कार्यक्रम, relays, and hurdling.
नियमित jumping कार्यक्रम include long jump, triple जम्प, high जम्प and pole वॉल्ट, जबकि the सबसे common फेंकना events are शॉट put, javelin, discus और hammer.
वहीँ हैं also `` संयुक्त कार्यक्रम '', ऐसे as heptathlon और decathlon, in जिससे एथलीट compete in a number of the ऊपर कार्यक्रम.
रिकॉर्ड are रखा of the बेहतरीन प्रदर्शन in विशिष्ट events, at world और national levels, सही down to a निजी स्तर.
however, if athletes हैं deemed to have violated the event 's rules or regulations, वे are disqualified from the competition and their marks are erased.
In उत्तर अमेरिका, the term track and field may be used to refer to athletics in general, rather than specifically track और फ़ील्ड events.
the Gulf War ( 2 अगस्त 1990 – 28 February 1991 ), codenamed Operation Desert Storm ( 17 जनवरी 1991 – 28 फ़रवरी 1991 ) was a युद्ध waged by a u.n.-authorized गठबन्धन force from 34 राष्ट्र led by the United States, against इराकी in जवाब to इराकी 's आक्रमण और annexation of कुवैत.
the युद्ध is भी known अंतर्गत other names, ऐसे as the पारसी Gulf युद्ध, पहला गल्फ War, गल्फ युद्ध i, or the पहला इराकी युद्ध, before the term `` Iraq War '' became identified बजाय साथ the 2003 Iraq युद्ध ( भी referred to in the u.S. as `` Operation इराकी स्वतंत्रता '' ).
कुवैत 's आक्रमण by इराकी सैनिकों कि began 2 August 1990 was met साथ international condemnation, and brought immediate economic प्रतिबंधों against Iraq by सदस्यों of the U.N. सुरक्षा Council.
U.S. अध्यक्ष George H. W. Bush तैनात u.S. forces into सऊदी Arabia, और urged other देशों to send their own forces to the scene.
an सरणी of राष्ट्र joined the गठबन्धन.
The ग्रेट बहुमत of the Coalition 's military शक्तियां यहूद इससे the U.S., with सऊदी Arabia, the संयुक्त किंगडम और Egypt as leading contributors, in that order.
Saudi अरब सशुल्क around US $ 36 अरब of the US $ 60 अरब लागत.
the war was marked by the शुरूआत of सजीव न्यूज on the सामने लाइनों of the लड़ो, with the primacy of the u.S. network सीएनएन.
The युद्ध has भी earned the उपनाम वीडियो खेल युद्ध after the daily ब्रॉडकास्ट images on board the u.S. bombers दौरान आपरेशन मरुस्थल Storm.
The आरंभिक विरोध to निकाल इराकी troops इससे Kuwait began with an aerial बमबारी on 17 जनवरी 1991.
इस was followed by a मैदान उत्पीड़न on 24 February.
This was a decisive विजय for the गठबन्धन शक्तियां, who liberated कुवैत और advanced into इराकी territory.
the गठबन्धन ceased उनके अग्रिम, and घोषित a cease-fire 100 घंटों बाद the मैदान अभियान started.
aerial और ground कॉम्बैट was confined to इराकी, कुवैत, और areas on Saudi Arabia 's border.
इराकी शुभारम्भ Scud missiles विरूद्ध गठबन्धन military targets in सऊदी अरब and विरूद्ध इसराईल.
The nickel, in अमरीकी उपयोग, is a five- cent सिक्का जारी by the United States मिंट.
Composed of 75 % तांबे and 25 % nickel, the piece रै been struck चूंकि 1866.
The चांदी हाफ dime, equal to पाँच सेंट, था महरूम issued since the 1790s.
the अमरीकी Civil War caused economic hardship, driving gold और silver from circulation ; in response, in प्लेस of low-value सिक्के, the सरकारी at first जारी पेपर करेंसी.
in 1865, Congress abolished the five-cent fractional currency नोट after स्पेंसर M. Clark, head of the Currency ब्यूरो ( today the Bureau of Engraving and Printing ), लगाई his own portrait on the denomination.
बाद successful introduction of two-cent और three-cent pieces, बगैर अनमोल मेटल, Congress भी authorized a five-cent टुकड़ा consisting of आधार मेटल ; the मिंट began striking इस version in 1866.
The आरंभिक डिज़ाइन of the Shield nickel थी struck until 1883, then replaced by the स्वतंत्रता Head nickel.
The Buffalo निकल was introduced in 1913 as भाग of a ड्राइव to increase the सौंदर्य of American coinage ; in 1938, the जेफरसन निकल followed.
in 2004 और 2005, special डिजाइन in सम्मान of the bicentennial of the Lewis और Clark expedition were issued.
in 2006, the Mint reverted to using Jefferson निकल designer Felix schlag 's original रिवर्स ( or `` tails '' पक्ष ), हालांकि a new obverse, by Jamie franki, थी substituted.
as of 2013, it costs more than ग्यारह cents to उपज a निकल ; the मिंट is exploring the सम्भावना of reducing लागत by using कम expensive metals.
a पोस्टर साथ flowers or क्लस्टर of flowers produced by twelve प्रजाति of flowering पौधे इससे अलग परिवारों
a पुष्प, sometimes known as a bloom or खिलना, is the reproductive structure मिला in flowering plants ( पौधे of the प्रभाग Magnoliophyta, भी पुकारा angiosperms ).
the biological फलन of a पुष्प is to प्रभाव जनन, usually by providing a mechanism for the union of शुक्राणु साथ अंडे.
पुष्प may facilitate outcrossing ( संलयन of शुक्राणु and अंडे from अलग individuals in a population ) or allow selfing ( संलयन of शुक्राणु और अंडा इससे the वही flower ).
कुछ पुष्प उपज diaspores without fertilization ( parthenocarpy ).
पुष्प contain sporangia and हैं the साईट where gametophytes develop.
Flowers give rise to फल और seeds.
Many पुष्प have evolved to be attractive to animals, so as to cause them to be सदिश लिये the ट्रांसफ़र of पराग.
in addition to facilitating the reproduction of flowering plants, flowers have long been admired और used by humans to beautify their environment, and भी as objects of romance, ritual, religion, medicine और as a source of खाना.
The mcdonnell डगलस ( now बोइंग ) F-15 Eagle is a twin-engine, all-weather tactical fighter designed by McDonnell डगलस to gain और maintain एयर superiority in aerial कॉम्बैट.
it is माना among the most successful आधुनिक fighters, with over 100 aerial कॉम्बैट victories with no losses in dogfights.
Following reviews of proposals, the संयुक्त States Air फ़ोर्स selected mcdonnell डगलस ' डिज़ाइन in 1967 to मिलें the service 's need for a समर्पित air superiority सेनानी.
the त्रिभुज first उड़ाया in July 1972, और entered service in 1976.
Since the 1970s, the त्रिभुज has been exported to Israel, Japan, Saudi Arabia, and अन्य राष्ट्र.
the F-15 थी originally envisioned as a pure air बड़प्पन aircraft.
इसके डिज़ाइन included a द्वितीयक ground-attack काबिलियत that was largely अप्रयुक्त.
The design proved लचीली enough that an all-weather strike derivative, the F-15E स्ट्राइक Eagle, थी बाद developed, और डाला service in 1989.
The F-15 त्रिभुज is अपेक्षित to be in service with the U.S. एयर Force past 2025.
mimio is a ब्रांड नाम of a लकीर of technology products aimed at the शिक्षा market.
the primary products are focused around computer whiteboard interactive शिक्षण devices.
mimiocapture डिवाइस also allow users to capture all of the ink स्ट्रोक्स कि हैं लिखा on the whiteboard.
जब प्रयुक्त in संयोजन साथ a video प्रोजेक्टर it turns the ordinary whiteboard सतह into a fully interactive whiteboard.
the product लकीर was originally designed by Virtual स्याही.
on अक्तूबर 4, 2006 Newell Rubbermaid acquired the Mimio इंटरैक्टिव whiteboard ( iwb ) product line.
rahab of जेरिको
Rahab, ( ; ; ) was, according to the किताब of जोशुआ, a स्त्री जो lived in जेरिको in the promised जमीन and assisted the Israelites in capturing the city.
Nearly all अंग्रेज़ी अनुवाद of Joshua describe her as a harlot or वेश्या.
The Organization of American राज्य ( Spanish : organización de लॉस estados americanos, Portuguese : organização dos Estados Americanos, फ्रेंच : Organisation des états américains ), or the oas, is a regional international संगठन.
the oas was संस्थापित on 30 April 1948, and has its मुख्यालय in Washington, d.C., United States.
इसके members हैं the 35 स्वतंत्र states of the Americas.
चूंकि 26 may 2005, the Secretary General of oas has been José Miguel insulza.
Christopher कोलंबस ( Italian : cristoforo कोलोन ; Spanish : Cristóbal colón ; Portuguese : Cristóvão Colombo ; पहले 31 अक्तूबर 145120 may 1506 ) थी an Italian एक्सप्लोरर, नाविक, and colonizer, born in the गणतंत्र of जेनोआ, in what is आज northwestern इटली.
Under the auspices of the Catholic monarchs of Spain, he completed चार voyages आरपार the अटलांटिक Ocean that led to general European जागरूकता of the American continents.
those voyages, और his efforts to establish स्थाई settlements on the island of Hispaniola, initiated the Spanish colonization of the नई संसार.
In the context of उभरते पश्चिमी imperialism और economic competition between यूरोपीय kingdoms seeking wealth through the स्थापना of trade रूट and colonies, कोलंबस 's सट्टे proposal, to पहुँचें the East इंडीज by sailing westward, eventually प्राप्त the support of the स्पेनी क्राउन, जिससे देखी in it a promise, however remote, of gaining the अपर hand over प्रतिद्वंद्वी शक्तियां in the contest for the lucrative spice व्यापार साथ Asia.
दौरान his first voyage in 1492, instead of reaching जापानी as he had intended, कोलंबस landed in the बहामा archipelago, at a locale he named सैन Salvador.
over the course of तीन अधिक voyages, Columbus visited the Greater and Lesser Antilles, as well as the caribbean coast of Venezuela and Central America, claiming them for the स्पेनी Empire.
हालांकि कोलंबस was नहीं the first यूरोपीय explorer to reach the americas ( having been preceded by the नॉर्स expedition led by Leif ericson in the 11th century ), Columbus 's voyages led to the पहला स्थायी यूरोपीय contact with the Americas, inaugurating a period of यूरोपीय खोजी, conquest, and colonization कि lasted लिये अनेक centuries.
They had, therefore, an विशाल प्रभाव in the historical विकास of the modern पश्चिमी world.
कोलंबस himself देखी his accomplishments primarily in the light of the spreading of the ईसाई धर्म.
Never admitting कि he था reached a महाद्वीप previously unknown to Europeans, rather than the East इंडीज he had set आउट लिये, कोलंबस called the निवासियों of the lands he visited indios ( Spanish for `` Indians `` ).
कोलंबस 's strained relationship with the Spanish क्राउन और its appointed colonial प्रशासकों in अमेरिका led to his गिरफ़्तार और dismissal as राज्यपाल of the settlements on the island of Hispaniola in 1500, and later to protracted litigation over the लाभ जिससे कोलंबस and उसके वारिस claimed were owed to them by the crown.
Bred in Germany, the boxer is a breed of stocky, medium-sized, short-haired कुत्तो.
The कोट is smooth और tight-fitting ; रंगों are fawn or brindled, with or without श्वेत markings, which may कवर the संपूर्ण body.
Boxers हैं brachycephalic ( वे have broad, short skulls ), and have a वर्गाकार muzzle, mandibular prognathism ( an underbite ), बहुत दमदार जबड़े, and a powerful bite आदर्श for फांसी on to large prey.
the Boxer was bred from the Old अंग्रेज़ी Bulldog and the now extinct Bullenbeisser, और is भाग of the Molosser समूह.
मुक्केबाज यहूद पहला exhibited in a श्वान दिखाएँ लिये St. Bernards in म्यूनिख in 1895, the पहला Boxer club होने founded the अगला साल.
Based on 2012 American Kennel क्लबों आंकडे, मुक्केबाज held steady as the seventh सबसे लोकप्रिय नस्ल of dog in the संयुक्त States लिये the तीसरा consecutive साल.
सीरियल ata ( SATA ) is a computer bus interface that connects मेजबान बस adapters to द्रव्यमान भंडार devices such as मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव and optical drives.
सीरियल ata replaces the पुरानी at Attachment मानक ( ata ; later referred to as समानांतर ATA or pata ), offering several लाभ over the older इंटरफ़ेस : reduced cable आकार and लागत ( seven conductors बजाय of 40 ), native hot swapping, तेज़ आंकड़ा transfer through उच्चतर signalling दरों, and more efficient ट्रांसफ़र through an ( वैकल्पिक ) i/o queuing प्रोटोकॉल.
SATA मेजबान adapters and devices communicate via a high-speed सीरियल cable over two pairs of conductors.
In कंट्रास्ट, parallel ata ( the redesignation for the legacy ata specifications ) used a 16-bit चौड़ी आंकड़ा बस साथ अनेक अतिरिक्त support और कंट्रोल signals, सब operating at much lower आवृत्ति.
to ensure पिछड़ा संगतता साथ विरासत ata तन्त्र और अनुप्रयोग, SATA उपयोग the वही मौलिक ATA और atapi command-set as legacy ATA devices.
SATA has replaced parallel ata in उपभोक्ता desktop और laptop कंप्यूटर, and रै largely replaced PATA in नई embedded अनुप्रयोग.
SATA 's market share in the desktop PC मार्केट was 99 % in 2008.
pata remains widely प्रयुक्त in industrial and embedded applications that use CompactFlash भंडार, even though the new CFast मानक is based on sata.
Serial ata उद्योग compatibility विशेषताएँ originate from The Serial ATA अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन ( उर्फ.
sata-io, serialata.org ).
the sata-io group collaboratively creates, reviews, ratifies, और publishes the interoperability specifications, the परीक्षण cases, and plug-fests.
as साथ अनेक other industry compatibility मानकों, the SATA सामग्री ownership is transferred to अन्य industry लाशें : primarily the INCITS t13 subcommittee ata, the incits T10 subcommittee ( SCSI ) ; a subgroup of t10 जिम्मेदार for Serial संलग्न scsi ( SAS ).
The complete specification इससे SATA-IO.
the शेष of इस आलेख होगा try to उपयोग the terminology and विशेषताएँ of SATA-IO.
the history of the अंतरजाल began with the विकास of electronic computers in the 1950s.
the पब्लिक was पहला introduced to the concepts कि होता lead to the Internet जब a message was भेजा over the arpanet इससे computer विज्ञान प्राध्यापक Leonard Kleinrock 's प्रयोगशाला at University of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, Los एंजिल्स ( ucla ), बाद the दूसरी piece of संजाल उपकरण थी संस्थापित at Stanford Research संस्थान ( श्री ).
Packet switched संजाल such as arpanet, Mark I at NPL in the UK, CYCLADES, Merit Network, Tymnet, और Telenet, यहूद developed in the late 1960s और early 1970s using a variety of protocols.
the ARPANET in particular led to the development of protocols for internetworking, in जिससे अनेक पृथक networks could be joined साथ into a संजाल of networks.
in 1982, the Internet प्रोटोकॉल सुइट ( tcp/ip ) was मानकीकृत, और नतीजतन, the concept of a world-wide network of interconnected tcp/ip संजाल, पुकारा the Internet, was introduced.
अभिगम to the ARPANET थी विस्तारित in 1981 when the National Science न्यास ( nsf ) developed the Computer विज्ञान संजाल ( CSNET ) and again in 1986 when NSFNET provided access to supercomputer साइट in the United राज्य from शोध और education organizations.
वाणिज्यिक Internet service providers ( ISPs ) began to emerge in the लेट 1980s and जल्दी 1990s.
the arpanet थी decommissioned in 1990.
the Internet थी commercialized in 1995 जब nsfnet was decommissioned, निकालना the पिछला restrictions on the use of the अंतरजाल to carry वाणिज्यिक ट्रैफ़िक.
चूंकि the mid-1990s, the Internet has था a revolutionary प्रभाव on संस्कृति और कॉमर्स, including the rise of near-instant communication by electronic mail, instant messaging, Voice over Internet प्रोटोकॉल ( VoIP ) `` phone काल्स '', two-way इंटरैक्टिव वीडियो काल्स, and the संसार चौड़ी Web साथ इसके चर्चा forums, blogs, social networking, and online shopping साइट.
the research और education community continues to develop and use advanced संजाल such as nsf 's very high speed Backbone संजाल सेवा ( vbns ), Internet2, और नेशनल lambdarail.
increasing amounts of आंकड़ा हैं transmitted at उच्चतर और उच्चतर speeds over fiber optic संजाल operating at 1-Gbit/s, 10-gbit/s, or more.
The Internet 's कब्ज़ा over the global communication लैंडस्केप was लगभग instant in ऐतिहासिक terms : it only communicated 1 % of the सूचना बहती through two-way दूरसंचार संजाल in the साल 1993, already 51 % by 2000, and अधिक than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007.
Today the Internet continues to grow, चलित by ever greater amounts of ऑनलाइन सूचना, commerce, entertainment, और सोशल नेटवर्किंग.
The Gift is the दूसरी album by स्कॉटिश singer सुसान बॉयल, which was released on 8 November 2010.
बॉयल hinted कि the एल्बम रै a 1960s feel `` because कि थी [ her ] era ''.

प्राध्यापक ऐल्बस Percival wulfric ब्रायन Dumbledore is a major अक्षर and protagonist of J. K. रोलिंग 's Harry कुम्हार series.
For most of the series, he is the हेडमास्टर of the wizarding school हॉग्वार्ट्स.
as part of his backstory, it is revealed कि he is the founder और leader of the Order of the फीनिक्स, an organisation dedicated to fighting the प्रमुख विपक्षी of the श्रेणी, रब Voldemort.

रोलिंग stated she chose the नाम Dumbledore, जिससे is an जल्दी आधुनिक अंग्रेज़ी शब्द for `` bumblebee ``, because of Dumbledore 's प्रेम of म्यूज़िक : वो imagined him walking around `` humming to खुद a लॉट ''.
calcitonin ( भी known as thyrocalcitonin ) is a 32-amino एसिड linear polypeptide हार्मोन that is produced in humans primarily by the parafollicular कोशिकाएं ( also ज्ञात as C-cells ) of the थायराइड, और in many other पशु in the ultimobranchial body.
it acts to reduce blood calcium ( ca2+ ), opposing the effects of parathyroid हार्मोन ( PTH ).
calcitonin has been found in मछली, सरीसृपों, पक्षियों, and स्तनधारियों.
इसके importance in humans has नहीं been as well established as इसके महत्व in अन्य पशु, as its function is usually नहीं significant in the विनियमन of normal calcium homeostasis.
it belongs to calcitonin-like protein परिवार.
a mousepad with a padded कलाई rest.
A mousepad ( us ) or mouse mat ( UK ) is a सतह लिये रखकर and चलती a कंप्यूटर mouse.
a mousepad enhances the उपयोगिता of the mouse compared to using a mouse directly on a table by providing a surface to allow the tracking led or ball ( in पूर्व मॉडल ) to माप movement accurately और बगैर जिटर.
कुछ mousepads increase ergonomics by providing a padded wrist rest.

a छोटी portion of the Riverfront Stadium site is now occupied by the Reds ' हॉल of कीर्ति and संग्रहालय and Main गली, which थी extended when the नई park थी निर्मित.
The सिनसिनाटी bengals ' Paul Brown स्टेडियम is in the अलहदा.
Riverfront Stadium ( 1970–1995 ), बाद ज्ञात as cinergy Field ( 1996–2002 ), थी the घर of the Cincinnati लाल नेशनल League baseball team और the Cincinnati bengals नेशनल Football League team.
Located on the ओहियो River in शहर सिनसिनाटी, the स्टेडियम थी best ज्ञात as the घर of `` The बिग रेड यंत्र ``, as the Reds were often पुकारा in the 1970s.
Construction began on फ़रवरी 1, 1968, और थी completed at a cost of कम than $ 50 million.
on जून 30, 1970, the लाल hosted the अटलांटा Braves in their grand opening, with Hank आरोन hitting the पहला ever घर चलाएं at riverfront.
Two सप्ताह बाद on July 14, 1970, Riverfront hosted the 1970 Major League Baseball all-star खेल.
इस game is best remembered लिये the often-replayed collision at घर थाली between लाल star Pete Rose और catcher Ray fosse of the Cleveland इंडियंस.
in सितंबर 1996, Riverfront स्टेडियम was renamed `` Cinergy फ़ील्ड '' in a प्रायोजन deal साथ वृहद सिनसिनाटी 's energy कम्पनी, Cinergy Corporation.
In 2001, to make room लिये ग्रेट अमरीकी Ball Park, the seating क्षमता at Cinergy Field थी reduced to 39,000.
There was a विशाल वॉल in बीच Field दृश्य after the renovations, to serve as the batter 's नजर.
The स्टेडियम was demolished by implosion on दिसम्बर 29, 2002.

the company 's name is reflected in the कम्पनी slogan, `` Next सदी टायर. ''
The मूक majority is an unspecified विशाल बहुमत of लोगों in a country or समूह who do नहीं एक्स्प्रेस उनके opinions सरेआम.
The पद थी popularized ( हालांकि नहीं पहला प्रयुक्त ) by u.S. अध्यक्ष रिचर्ड निक्सन in a नवम्बर 3, 1969, वाक in जिससे he said, `` And so tonight—to you, the ग्रेट मूक majority of my fellow americans—i पूछो for your support. ''
In this usage it referred to those Americans जो किया नहीं जुड़ें in the large demonstrations against the Vietnam युद्ध at the समय, who किया not join in the counterculture, and जो did not participate in public प्रवचन.
निक्सन साथ साथ अनेक अन्य देखी इस समूह of Middle Americans as being निष्प्रभ in the मीडिया by the more vocal minority.
the phrase was used in the 19th century as a प्रेयोक्ति referring to all the people who have died, and others have used it before और बाद Nixon to refer to समूह of voters in विभिन्न nations of the संसार.
sam, a rhesus मंकी, उड़ाया to an ऊँचाई of 88 km in 1959.
( नासा )
Before इंसानो went into स्पेस, several animals were शुभारम्भ into space, including numerous बंदरों, so that scientists could investigate the biological प्रभाव of space travel.
the United राज्य launched flights containing primate कार्गो primarily between 1948-1961 with one उड़ान in 1969 and एक in 1985.
फ़्रांस शुभारम्भ two monkey-carrying फ़्लाइट in 1967.
The सोवियत Union and Russia शुभारम्भ बंदरों between 1983 and 1996.
सबसे बंदरों were anesthetized पहले lift-off.
Overall thirty-two monkeys उड़ाया in the space program ; none flew अधिक than एकबार.
Numerous back-up monkeys also went through the programs but never उड़ाया.
बंदरों from अनेक species यहूद प्रयुक्त, including rhesus बंदरों, cynomolgus बंदरों, squirrel monkeys, and pig-tailed macaques.
कुछ chimpanzees ( which हैं apes rather than बंदरों ) यहूद also used.
रेड ( redundant सरणी of independent डिस्क, originally अनावश्यक array of inexpensive disks ) is a storage technology कि combines multiple डिस्क drive components into a लॉजिकल unit.
आंकड़ा is वितरित आरपार the drives in one of अनेक ways called `` RAID स्तर '', depending on the level of redundancy and performance required.
the term `` रेड '' was पहला पारिभाषित by दाउद Patterson, garth A. Gibson, and रैंडी Katz at the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, Berkeley in 1987.
विपणक representing industry RAID निर्माताओं later attempted to reinvent the term to describe a redundant array of स्वतंत्र डिस्क as a अर्थात् of disassociating a low-cost अपेक्षा इससे RAID technology.
RAID is now प्रयुक्त as an umbrella पद for कंप्यूटर आंकड़ा भंडार schemes कि can divide and replicate आंकड़ा among multiple शारीरिक ड्राइव : RAID is an उदाहरण of storage आभासीकरण and the array can be accessed by the operating प्रणाली as one single drive.
the different schemes or architectures are named by the word रेड followed by a क्रमांक ( e.g. रेड 0, रेड 1 ).
Each योजना provides a different balance between the कुंजी goals : reliability and उपलब्धता, performance और क्षमता.
रेड स्तर greater than रेड 0 provide सुरक्षा against unrecoverable ( sector ) read errors, as well as पूरे डिस्क विफलता.
A lymphocyte is a type of श्वेत blood cell in the vertebrate immune system.
अंतर्गत the सूक्ष्मदर्शी, lymphocytes can be विभाजित into विशाल lymphocytes और small lymphocytes.
Large granular lymphocytes शामिल प्राकृतिक कातिल कोशिकाएं ( nk कोशिकाएं ).
Small lymphocytes consist of T cells and B cells.
the Big Lebowski is a 1998 dark कॉमेडी फिल्मी written and directed by जोएल and Ethan कोएन.
Jeff पुलों सितारों as Jeff Lebowski, an बेरोजगार लॉस एंजिल्स slacker और avid bowler, nicknamed `` the Dude. ''
After a मामला of mistaken पहचान, the Dude is introduced to a millionaire भी नामित जेफरी lebowski.
जब the millionaire Lebowski 's trophy wife is later kidnapped, he commissions The यार to deliver the फिरौती to secure her release.
the plan goes awry जब The Dude 's friend वाल्टर sobchak ( जॉन गुडमैन ) schemes to keep the पूरा फिरौती.
स्टीव buscemi, फिलिप Seymour हॉफमन, David huddleston, julianne मूर, tara Reid, और John turturro also star in the film, which is narrated by a cowboy ज्ञात only as `` the अजनबी '', निभाई by sam elliott.
the film is loosely प्रेरित by the कार्य of Raymond Chandler.
जोएल कोएन stated : `` We wanted to do a Chandler दयालु of story – कैसा it moves episodically, and deals with the वर्ण trying to unravel a रहस्य, as well as having a hopelessly complex plot that 's ultimately unimportant. ''
The original स्कोर was रचित by Carter Burwell, a longtime collaborator of the कोएन Brothers.
The Big Lebowski was a निराशा at the u.S. box office और received मिश्रित समीक्षाएँ at the समय of its release.
समीक्षाएँ have trended towards the positive over time, and the फिल्मी has become a cult पसंदीदा, noted लिये its idiosyncratic characters, सपना sequences, unconventional dialogue, और eclectic साउंडट्रैक.
Severus snape is a fictional character in the हैरी Potter book series लिखा by J.K. Rowling.
in the पहला novel of the series, he is hostile toward Harry और is निर्मित up to be the primary विपक्षी until the final अध्याय.
As the श्रेणी progresses, Snape 's character becomes more layered और complex.
रोलिंग does नहीं fully खुलासा the details of उसके सच्चा loyalties until the समाप्त of the फाइनल book, Harry कुम्हार and the deathly hallows.
over the course of the श्रेणी, snape 's portrayal evolves इससे कि of a malicious and partisan teacher to that of a pivotal अक्षर of considerable जटिलता और moral ambiguity.
Snape primarily teaches potions at हॉग्वार्ट्स, though in the छठे अनोखा he teaches Defence Against the अंधेरा Arts, a स्थिति जिससे he थी ज्ञात to have desired throughout the श्रेणी.
He ultimately becomes Headmaster of हॉग्वार्ट्स in the फाइनल अनोखा.
रोलिंग रै वर्णित him as `` a तोहफा of a अक्षर ''.
grits refers to a ground-corn खाना of देशी अमरीकी उत्पत्ति, कि is common in the दक्षिणी संयुक्त States and mainly eaten at breakfast.
आधुनिक grits are commonly made of alkali-treated मकई ज्ञात as hominy.
Grits हैं समान to अन्य मोटा maize-based porridges from around the संसार ऐसे as polenta or the thinner farina.
`` Instant grits '' have महरूम processed to गति cooking.
the word `` grits '' derives from the बूढ़ा English word `` grytt, '' अर्थ coarse meal.
This शब्द originally referred to गेहूं and other porridges अभी known as groats in parts of the u.K..
मक्का, अनजान in यूरोपीय in the Middle आयु, is a food derived from corn ( a नई संसार plant ) and `` corn '' था been used to describe wheat products in many European regions.
`` grits '' may be either एकवचन or बहुवचन ; historically, in the अमरीकी South the शब्द was invariably singular notwithstanding इसके plural form ( cf. such खाना names as `` स्पघेटी '' or `` linguine '', likewise plural in रूप, लकिन एकवचन in उपयोग ).
sometimes, grits are called sofkee or sofkey ( इससे a देशी अमरीकी muskogee word ).
In आणविक जीवविज्ञान, human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) is a हार्मोन उत्पादित by the fertilized अंडा बाद conception.
Later दौरान pregnancy it is बना by the विकासशील placenta, and later by the placental component syncytiotrophoblast.
Some cancerous tumors produce इस hormone ; इसलिए, elevated levels measured जब the patient is नहीं गर्भवती can lead to a कर्कट निदान.
However, it is नहीं known whether this production is a contributing कारण or an प्रभाव of tumorigenesis.
The pituitary analogue of hCG, known as luteinizing hormone ( lh ), is उत्पादित in the pituitary ग्रंथि of males और females of सब आयु.
, the एफडीए रै prohibited the बिक्री of `` homeopathic '' and over the काउंटर hCG diet उत्पाद और declared them fraudulent और illegal.
The लास वेगास Strip संसार of coca-cola संग्रहालय in 2003
Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink बेची in stores, restaurants, and vending मशीने in प्रत्येक country मगर Cuba and उत्तर Korea.
it is उत्पादित by the Coca-Cola कम्पनी of Atlanta, Georgia, and is often referred to simply as Coke ( a registered trademark of the coca-cola कम्पनी in the United States since March 27, 1944 ).
Originally intended as a patent medicine जब it was invented in the late 19th century by John pemberton, coca-cola थी bought आउट by businessman Asa griggs Candler, whose विपणन tactics led Coke to its dominance of the संसार soft-drink market throughout the 20th सदी.
The कम्पनी produces concentrate, which is तब बेची to licensed coca-cola bottlers throughout the संसार.
The bottlers, जो hold territorially exclusive अनुबंध with the कम्पनी, उपज finished product in डिब्बे and बोतलों इससे the concentrate in संयोजन साथ filtered water और sweeteners.
The bottlers then sell, वितरित and merchandise coca-cola to खुदरा स्टोर्स और वेंडिंग machines.
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola उद्यमों, जिससे is the largest single coca-cola bottler in उत्तर अमेरिका and पश्चिमी Europe.
The Coca-Cola कम्पनी भी बिकता concentrate for सोडा स्रोतों to major restaurants और food सेवा वितरकों.
The coca-cola कम्पनी has, on occasion, introduced अन्य कोला पेय under the कोक ब्रांड नाम.
The सबसे common of ये is आहार Coke, साथ others सहित caffeine-free Coca-Cola, Diet Coke caffeine-free, coca-cola Cherry, coca-cola Zero, coca-cola वैनिला, और special संस्करण with lemon, lime or कॉफी.
Based on Interbrand 's बेहतरीन वैश्विक brand 2011, Coca-Cola was the world 's सबसे valuable brand.
An ombudsman is an आधिकारिक, usually नियुक्त by the government or by parliament लकिन साथ a significant उपाधि of स्वतंत्रता, जो is चार्ज साथ representing the interests of the public by investigating और addressing शिकायत of maladministration or violation of rights.
in कुछ countries an Inspector सामान्य, नागरिक एडवोकेट or other आधिकारिक may have कर्तव्य similar to those of a नेशनल ombudsman, और may भी be नियुक्त by the legislature.
नीचे the नेशनल level an ombudsman may be नियुक्त by a state, local or नगरपालिका सरकारी, और unofficial ombudsmen may be नियुक्त by, or even work लिये, a corporation ऐसे as a यूटिलिटी प्रदायक or a समाचारपत्र, लिये an ngo, or लिये a professional regulatory body.
Whether appointed by the विधानमंडल, the executive, or an संगठन ( or, less अक्सर, elected by the constituency कि he or वो serves ), the typical कर्तव्य of an ombudsman are to investigate शिकायत और attempt to निराकरण them, प्रायः through recommendations ( बाइंडिंग or not ) or मध्यस्थता.
Ombudsmen sometimes भी aim to पहचानो systemic मुद्दे अग्रणी to ग़रीब सेवा or breaches of people 's अधिकारों.
At the नेशनल स्तर, सबसे ombudsmen have a चौड़ी mandate to deal साथ the entire पब्लिक sector, और sometimes also elements of the निजी सेक्टर ( लिये example, contracted सेवा प्रदाताओं ).
In some cases, there is a more प्रतिबंधित mandate, for उदाहरण साथ particular sectors of society.
अधिक हाल developments have included the creation of specialised Children 's ombudsman and सूचना कमिश्नर एजेंसियों.
in कुछ jurisdictions an ombudsman charged साथ the handling of चिंताएं about नेशनल सरकारी is more formally referred to as the `` Parliamentary Commissioner '' ( e.g. the संयुक्त किंगडम Parliamentary कमिश्नर लिये Administration, और the पश्चिमी ऑस्ट्रेलियाई state ombudsman ).
In अनेक countries where the ombudsman 's remit extends beyond dealing साथ alleged maladministration to promoting और protecting इंसान rights, the ombudsman is recognised as the नेशनल इंसान rights institution.
The पोस्ट of ombudsman had by the end of the 20th सदी महरूम instituted by most सरकारें and by some intergovernmental organizations ऐसे as the यूरोपीय संघ.
बनाना a complaint to an ombudsman is प्रायः free of चार्ज.

पतन foliage in the कस्बा of स्टो, Vermont
New England is a region in the northeastern corner of the संयुक्त States consisting of the छह राज्य of Maine, नई Hampshire, Vermont, मैसाचुसेट्स, rhode द्वीप, और Connecticut.
New इंग्लैण्ड is bordered by नई यॉर्क राज्य to the दक्षिणपश्चिम, Quebec to the northwest, and New Brunswick और the अटलांटिक समंदर to the ईस्ट.
in एक of the earliest अंग्रेज़ी settlements in North America, Pilgrims इससे England पहला settled in नई इंग्लैण्ड in 1620, to form Plymouth Colony.
टेन सालो later, the puritans settled north of plymouth उपनिवेश in बोस्टन, यूँ forming मैसाचुसेट्स Bay उपनिवेश.
over the next 130 सालो, नई इंग्लैण्ड लड़ा in four फ्रेंच और भारतीय Wars, until the British defeated the फ्रेंच and their native allies in उत्तर अमेरिका.
in the late 18th century, the New इंग्लैण्ड colonies initiated the प्रतिरोध to the अंग्रेजों पार्लियामेंट 's efforts to impose new कर बगैर the सहमति of the colonists.
The बोस्टन चाय पार्टी थी a protest to जिससे ग्रेट Britain responded साथ a series of punitive कानून stripping मैसाचुसेट्स of self-government, which were termed the `` असहनीय Acts `` by the colonists.
The confrontation led to खोलें warfare in 1775, the expulsion of the अंग्रेजों authorities from नई इंग्लैण्ड in spring 1776, और the घोषणा of Independence in जुलाई 1776.
Some of the पहला आंदोलनों of American literature, philosophy, and शिक्षा originated in New इंग्लैण्ड.
the प्रदेश played a prominent भूमिका in the movement to abolish slavery, और थी the first region of the United States to be रूपांतरित by the Industrial क्रान्ति.
आज, New इंग्लैण्ड is a major world बीच of education, high technology, बीमे, और medicine.
Boston is इसके सांस्कृतिक, financial, शैक्षणिक, medical और परिवहन center.
प्रत्येक राज्य is प्रधानतया subdivided into small incorporated municipalities known as New England towns, which are often governed by town meeting.
The only unincorporated territory in New England exists in the sparse, northern regions of Vermont, New Hampshire, and Maine.
Since 1970, मतदाता have अधिक often supported उदार उम्मीदवार at the state and federal level than those of any अन्य प्रदेश in the United States.
नई इंग्लैण्ड is the तभी one of the संयुक्त States Census ब्यूरो 's नौ क्षेत्रीय divisions जिनकी नाम does not derive इससे इसके भूगोल, और it is the तभी multi-state region with clear, consistent सीमाएँ.
it maintains a strong भाव of cultural identity set apart इससे the बाकी of the country, although the शर्तें of इस पहचान हैं प्रायः contested, combining Puritanism with उदारतावाद, agrarian जीवन with उद्योग, और isolation with आव्रजन.

is an अमरीकी television श्रेणी कि combines the medical नाटक और action-adventure genres.
it was उत्पादित by Mark VII Limited and distributed by सार्वभौमिक Studios.
it debuted as a midseason बदलना on January 15, 1972, on एनबीसी, replacing the दो short-lived series the साझेदार and The Good जीवन, and ran until September 3, 1977, with छह अतिरिक्त two-hour television films दौरान the following दो सालो.
