थी निर्मित और उत्पादित by Jack Webb and रॉबर्ट A. cinader, both of whom were भी responsible लिये the पुलिस dramas Adam-12 और Dragnet.
The पूर्वी समय मण्डल ( et ) encompasses 17 u.S. राज्य in the पूर्वी part of the संलग्न United States, भाग of कनाडा and three देशों in South अमेरिका.
स्थान that उपयोग Eastern Standard Time ( est ) जब observing मानक time ( autumn/winter ) हैं 5 घंटों पीछे Coordinated Universal Time ( ).
पूर्वी daylight समय ( EDT ), when observing daylight saving समय ( spring/summer ) is 4 hours पीछे Coordinated सार्वभौमिक Time ( ).
In the उत्तरी भाग of the time मण्डल, during the second संडे in कूच, at 2:00 a.m. EST, घड़ियाँ are advanced to 3:00 a.m. EDT leaving a एक hour `` गैप. ''
During the पहला संडे in November, at 2:00 a.m. edt, घड़ियाँ are moved वापस to 1:00 a.m. EST, thus `` duplicating '' एक घंटा.
Southern भाग of the zone ( पनामा and the Caribbean ) do नहीं observe daylight छायांकन.
Standard form of the periodic table.
the colors represent different श्रेणी of तत्व समझाया नीचे.
the आवधिक table is a tabular प्रदर्शक of the chemical तत्व, व्यवस्थित on the basis of their atomic numbers, इलेक्ट्रॉन configurations, and पुनरावर्ती chemical properties.
तत्व are presented in अनुक्रम of increasing atomic number ( number of protons ).
the standard रूप of table comprises an 18 × 7 grid or प्रमुख body of तत्व, positioned above a smaller दोगुना पंक्ति of तत्व.
The तालिका can also be deconstructed into चार rectangular blocks : the s-block to the left, the p-block to the सही, the d-block in the मध्य, and the f-block नीचे that.
The पंक्ति of the table हैं called अवधि ; the columns of the s-, d-, और p-blocks are पुकारा समूह, साथ कुछ of these having names ऐसे as the halogens or the प्रतिष्ठित gases.
चूंकि, by परिभाषा, a periodic तालिका incorporates पुनरावर्ती रुझान, any ऐसे table can be used to derive relationships between the properties of the elements और predict the गुण of नई, yet to be discovered or synthesized, elements.
As a result, a आवधिक table—whether in the मानक रूप or some अन्य variant—provides a उपयोगी फ्रेमवर्क for analyzing रासायनिक बर्ताव, और such tables are widely प्रयुक्त in रसायन and अन्य sciences.
हालांकि precursors मौजूद, Dmitri mendeleev is generally credited with the प्रकाशन, in 1869, of the first widely पहचाना आवधिक तालिका.
he developed उसके तालिका to illustrate periodic trends in the गुण of the then-known elements.
Mendeleev also predicted कुछ properties of then-unknown तत्व कि होता be अपेक्षित to भरण gaps in this table.
Most of his पूर्वानुमान were proved सही when the तत्व in सवाल यहूद subsequently खोजा.
mendeleev 's periodic table रै चूंकि महरूम विस्तारित and परिष्कृत साथ the डिस्कवरी or संश्लेषण of further new तत्व and the development of new theoretical मॉडल to explain chemical बर्ताव.
All तत्व from परमाणु numbers 1 ( हाइड्रोजन ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have been discovered or synthesized.
The elements from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have been found to मौजूद naturally, although कुछ are found only in ट्रेस amounts और were initially discovered by synthesis in laboratories.
The तत्व बाद 98 have तभी been synthesized in laboratories.
उत्पादन of elements परे ununoctium is being pursued, साथ the question of कैसा the periodic table may need to be परिवर्धित to accommodate any ऐसे additions होने a पदार्थ of जारी बहस.
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring तत्व have भी been produced in laboratories.
Minecraft is a सैंडबॉक्स indie खेल originally created by स्वीडिश प्रोग्रामर markus `` Notch '' Persson and बाद विकसित and published by Mojang.
It थी सरेआम released लिये the pc on may 17, 2009, as a developmental alpha संस्करण और, after क्रमिक updates, थी published as a पूरा release version on November 18, 2011.
A version लिये एंड्रॉइड was released a माह पहले on अक्तूबर 7, and an iOS version थी released on November 17, 2011.
On May 9, 2012, the game was released on एक्सबॉक्स 360 as an Xbox Live Arcade game, co-developed by 4j studios.
All संस्करण of minecraft प्राप्त आवधिक अद्यतन.
The creative and भवन पहलुओं of Minecraft allow players to build constructions आउट of textured cubes in a 3d procedurally उत्पन्न संसार.
Other क्रियाएँ in the खेल शामिल खोजी, gathering resources, crafting and कॉम्बैट.
gameplay in इसके वाणिज्यिक release रै two प्रिंसिपल modes : survival, जिससे requires players to acquire संसाधन और maintain उनके स्वास्थ्य और भूख ; and रचनात्मक, where खिलाड़ी have an unlimited supply of resources, the क्षमता to मक्खी, and no स्वास्थ्य or भूख.
a तीसरा gameplay mode named हार्डकोर is the same as अस्तित्व, differing तभी in परेशानी ; it is set to hardest setting और respawning is निष्क्रिय, forcing खिलाड़ी to हटाएँ उनके worlds upon death.
Minecraft प्राप्त five awards इससे the 2011 खेल Developers Conference : it was awarded the Innovation Award, बेहतरीन Downloadable Game Award, और the Best Debut खेल पुरस्कार from the खेल डेवलपर Choice Awards ; and the दर्शक पुरस्कार, as well as the seumas mcnally Grand पुरस्कार, from the Independent Games पर्व in 2011.
in 2012, minecraft was awarded a सुनहरी जॉयस्टिक Award in the श्रेणी बेहतरीन downloadable खेल.
as of April 8, 2013, the खेल has sold over 10 million copies on pc और as of जनवरी 22, 2013, over 20 लाख नक़ल आरपार सब प्लेटफ़ॉर्म.
the अंधेरा Knight is a 2008 British-American superhero फिल्मी directed, produced, और co-written by क्रिस्टोफर Nolan.
Based on the DC कॉमिक्स character बैटमैन, the film is the second भाग of नोलन 's Batman फिल्मी श्रेणी और a sequel to 2005 's Batman begins.
Christian bale reprises the lead role of Bruce wayne/batman, with a returning cast of Michael caine as अल्फ्रेड Pennyworth, Gary oldman as James गॉर्डन and Morgan Freeman as लुसियस Fox.
The film introduces the character of Harvey डेंट ( Aaron eckhart ), Gotham 's newly elected ज़िला Attorney और the consort of Bruce वेन 's बाल्यकाल friend Rachel dawes ( Maggie जिलएनहॉल ), who joins बैटमैन and the पुलिस in combating the नई उठती threat of a criminal मास्टरमाइंड calling himself `` the Joker `` ( झाड़ Ledger ).
Nolan 's प्रेरणा for the film was the जोकर 's comic book debut in 1940, the 1988 ग्राफिक अनोखा, और the 1996 श्रेणी, जिससे retold two-face 's origin.
the nickname `` the अंधेरा Knight '' was first applied to बैटमैन in बैटमैन No. 1 ( 1940 ), in a स्टोरी लिखा by विधेयक उंगली.
The अंधेरा नाईट थी filmed primarily in Chicago, as well as in अनेक other स्थितियाँ in the संयुक्त States, the संयुक्त Kingdom, और Hong काँग.
नोलन used an IMAX कैमरा to फिल्मी some sequences, including the Joker 's पहला रूप in the film.
On जनवरी 22, 2008, some months after he था completed filming on The अंधेरा नाईट और छह महीने पहले the फिल्मी 's रिलीज, झाड़ Ledger died from a toxic संयोजन of prescription drugs, अग्रणी to तीव्र ध्यान from the दबायें और movie-going पब्लिक.
Warner भाईs. had initially निर्मित a वाइरल marketing अभियान लिये The अंधेरा नाईट, developing promotional websites और trailers highlighting screen shots of Ledger as the Joker, लकिन after लेजर 's मौत, the स्टुडियो refocused इसके promotional campaign.
the Dark नाईट was released on जुलाई 16, 2008 in Australia, on July 18, 2008 in उत्तर अमेरिका, और on जुलाई 24, 2008 in the United किंगडम.
Considered one of the best films of the 2000s और एक of the best superhero films कभी बना, the फिल्मी प्राप्त highly positive reviews and set numerous records during its नाट्य चलाएं.
With over $ 1 अरब in revenue worldwide, it is the 14th-highest-grossing फिल्मी of all time, unadjusted लिये inflation.
The film received आठ Academy Award nominations ; it जीती the award for Best ध्वनि संपादन और लेजर was posthumously awarded Best supporting कर्ता.
The अंधेरा Knight उदय, the final part of the trilogy, was released on जुलाई 20, 2012.
the समयरेखा of रेडियो सूचियाँ within the इतिहास of radio, the technology and कार्यक्रम कि produced instruments that उपयोग radio waves and activities that people undertook.
बाद, the इतिहास is dominated by programming and सामग्री, जिससे is करीब to सामान्य history.
The सिडनी ओपेरा हाउस is a multi-venue performing arts centre in New South Wales, Australia.
it was conceived और largely built by Danish architect Jørn utzon, opening in 1973 after a long gestation that began साथ उसके competition-winning design in 1957.
जोसेफ Cahill 's नई दक्षिण वेल्स Government दिया the go-ahead for कार्य to begin in 1958.
The सरकारी 's bold decision to चुनें utzon 's डिज़ाइन is often overshadowed by the कांड कि followed.
it is on Bennelong Point in Sydney Harbour, close to the सिडनी harbour Bridge.
It sits at the northeastern टिप of the सिडनी central कारोबार district ( the सीबीडी ), surrounded on three पहलू by the harbour ( सिडनी Cove और Farm कोव ) और inland by the royal botanic Gardens.
contrary to इसके नाम, it घरों multiple performance venues.
it is among the व्यस्ततम performing arts केंद्रों in the संसार, होस्टिंग over 1,500 performances each साल attended by some 1.2 लाख लोगों.
It provides a स्थान for many performing-arts companies, सहित the four key resident companies Opera Australia, the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई Ballet, the सिडनी Theatre Company and the Sydney सिंफनी ऑर्केस्ट्रा, और presents a चौड़ी दायरा of productions on इसके own account.
It is also एक of the most popular visitor attractions in Australia, with more than seven लाख लोगों visiting each year, 300,000 of whom take a हिदायत दौरे.
It is administered by the Sydney Opera हाउस Trust, under the नई दक्षिण Wales Ministry of the Arts.
On 28 जून 2007, it was made a युनेस्को World Heritage साईट.
it is एक of the 20th सदी 's सबसे distinctive इमारतें और one of the most प्रसिद्ध performing arts केंद्रों in the world.
A आलेख of देह द्रव्यमान index as a function of देह द्रव्यमान and देह ऊँचाई is दिखाया ऊपर.
The dashed lines represent subdivisions within a major क्लास.
For उदाहरण the `` underweight '' वर्गीकरण is further विभाजित into `` severe '', `` moderate '', and `` mild '' subclasses.
The देह द्रव्यमान अनुक्रमणिका ( बीएमआई ), or Quetelet अनुक्रमणिका, is a माप for human देह आकार आधारित on an व्यक्तिगत 's weight और height.
It was devised between 1830 and 1850 by the belgian बहुश्रुत Adolphe Quetelet दौरान the कोर्स of developing `` social physics ''.
देह द्रव्यमान अनुक्रमणिका is defined as the व्यक्तिगत 's देह द्रव्यमान divided by the वर्गाकार of उनके height.
The formulae universally used in आयुर्विज्ञान उपज a ईकाई of माप of kg/m2.
BMI can भी be determined using a बीएमआई chart, जिससे displays बीएमआई as a फलन of weight ( horizontal axis ) and height ( लंबवत अक्ष ) using contour लाइनों लिये अलग values of BMI or रंगों for अलग BMI श्रेणी.
† The फ़ैक्टर for UK/US units is अधिक precisely 703.06957964, but कि level of परिशुद्धता is not meaningful for इस गणना.
To work from stone और पाउंड first गुणा the स्टोन by 14 तब add the pounds to दे the whole द्रव्यमान in pounds ; to work इससे feet and inches first गुणा the feet by 12 then add the इंच to दे the पूरे height in इंच.
Thomas paine ( जनवरी 29, 1737 ( ns February 9, 1737 ) – जून 8, 1809 ) was an english-american political activist, author, political theorist and क्रांतिकारी.
as the लेखक of दो highly influential pamphlets at the start of the अमरीकी Revolution, he प्रेरित the देशप्रेमी in 1776 to घोषित independence from ब्रिटेन.
उसके विचार reflected आत्मज्ञान era बयानबाजी of transnational इंसान rights.
he रै been पुकारा `` a corsetmaker by व्यापार, a journalist by व्यवसायिक, और a propagandist by inclination. ''
born in Thetford, इंग्लैण्ड, in the county of नॉर्फ़ोक, Paine emigrated to the अंग्रेजों अमरीकी colonies in 1774 with the सहायता of Benjamin Franklin और he arrived in time to participate in the अमरीकी क्रान्ति.
His principal योगदान यहूद the शक्तिशाली, widely read pamphlet आम Sense ( 1776 ), the all-time best-selling American किताब कि advocated औपनिवेशिक अमेरिका 's स्वतंत्रता इससे the Kingdom of Great Britain, and The American संकट ( 1776–83 ), a pro-revolutionary pamphlet series.
आम भाव was so influential कि जॉन Adams कहा, `` बगैर the pen of the लेखक of आम Sense, the तलवार of वॉशिंगटन होता have been उठाया in vain.”
paine lived in फ़्रांस लिये सबसे of the 1790s, बनने deeply involved in the French Revolution.
he wrote the अधिकारों of man ( 1791 ), in भाग a रक्षा of the फ्रेंच Revolution against इसके critics.
His हमले on British लेखक एडमंड बुर्के led to a विचारण और conviction in absentia in 1792 for the crime of seditious मानहानि.
in 1792, despite not being able to बोलो French, he was निर्वाचित to the French National Convention.
The girondists regarded उसे as an ally.
Consequently, the montagnards, विशेषकर robespierre, regarded उसे as an enemy.
In December 1793, he was गिरफ्तार और imprisoned in पेरिस, then released in 1794.
He became बदनाम because of the Age of कारण ( 1793–94 ), उसके book that advocates deism, promotes कारण और freethinking, and argues विरूद्ध institutionalized धर्म in general and ईसाई doctrine in particular.
He भी wrote the pamphlet Agrarian इंसाफ ( 1795 ), discussing the origins of प्रॉपर्टी, and introduced the concept of a गारंटी minimum income.
In 1802, he लौटे to America where he died on June 8, 1809.
तभी छह लोगों attended his funeral as he had been ostracized for उसके ridicule of christianity.
Clinical ट्रायल हैं sets of tests in चिकित्सा शोध और drug विकास that generate सुरक्षा and efficacy आंकड़ा ( or more specifically, information परिचय adverse ड्रग reactions और adverse प्रभाव of अन्य treatments ) लिये health interventions ( e.g., drugs, नैदानिक, devices, चिकित्सा protocols ).
वे are conducted तभी बाद संतोषजनक information रै महरूम gathered on the विशेषता of the गैर clinical सुरक्षा, और स्वास्थ्य authority/ethics committee approval is granted in the देश where approval of the ड्रग or device is sought.
previously, many emerging देशों did नहीं आवश्यकता लोकल trials for उत्पाद approvals.
अभी, though उभरते देशों still accept data from U.S./Europe, they भी require some लोकल trials.
depending on the type of product and the stage of its development, investigators initially enroll स्वयंसेवक and/or मरीजों into छोटी पायलट अध्ययन, and subsequently conduct larger scale अध्ययन in मरीजों कि प्रायः compare the नई उत्पाद साथ others already स्वीकृत लिये the affliction of interest.
As positive safety और efficacy आंकड़ा हैं gathered, the number of मरीजों is typically increased.
नैदानिक ट्रायल can vary in size, और can involve a single research entity in one देश or अनेक such entities in multiple देशों.
a full श्रेणी of ट्रायल may incur sizable costs, and the burden of paying for all the जरुरी people और सेवाएं is प्रायः borne by the sponsor, जिससे may be a governmental संगठन or a फार्मास्युटिकल, biotechnology or चिकित्सा यंत्र company.
जब the diversity of जरूरी support भूमिकाएँ exceeds the संसाधन of the sponsor, a नैदानिक विचारण is managed by an outsourced partner, ऐसे as a अनुबंध research organization or a नैदानिक trials unit in the academic सेक्टर.
the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स are an अमरीकी football टोली आधारित in ग्रीन खाड़ी, विस्कॉन्सिन.
वे हैं सदस्यों of the उत्तर Division of the National Football Conference ( NFC ) in the नेशनल Football लीग ( एनएफएल ).
Green खाड़ी is the third-oldest मताधिकार in the NFL, having been organized and playing in 1919.
The पैकर्स हैं the तभी non-profit, community-owned major लीग पेशेवर खेल टोली in the United राज्य.
the Packers are the पिछला vestige of `` छोटी town teams '' कि यहूद एकबार आम in the एनएफएल दौरान the 1920s और 1930s.
संस्थापित in 1919 by Earl `` घुंघराले '' lambeau ( hence the नाम Lambeau फ़ील्ड on जिससे the टोली plays ) and George Whitney Calhoun, the Green Bay पैकर्स can ट्रेस उनके lineage to अन्य semi-professional टीमों in Green खाड़ी डेटिंग वापस to 1896.
In 1919 और 1920 the Packers competed as a semi-professional फ़ुटबॉल team against क्लब इससे around विस्कॉन्सिन and the Midwest.
वे joined the अमरीकी पेशेवर Football संघ ( apfa ) in 1921, the forerunner to what is ज्ञात today as the नेशनल Football लीग ( एनएफएल ).
हालांकि ग्रीन खाड़ी is the पिछला एनएफएल `` छोटी town '' टोली, इसके लोकल fan base और मीडिया extends into आसपास Milwaukee ; the team also played selected home खेल there between 1933 और 1994.
The Green खाड़ी Packers have जीती 13 league championships ( अधिक than any other team in the NFL ), including नौ एनएफएल championships prior to the Super Bowl era and four सुपर कटोरी victories —in 1967 ( सुपर Bowl I ), 1968 ( सुपर कटोरी II ), 1997 ( Super कटोरी xxxi ) और 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ).
the पैकर्स have long-standing, bitter rivalries with their NFC उत्तर ( formerly the NFC Central ) प्रतिद्वंद्वियों, the शिकागो Bears, Minnesota Vikings और the Detroit Lions.
the bears-packers फंसने is one of the oldest rivalries in NFL history, dating back to 1921.
Ethanol ईंधन is इथेनॉल ( ethyl alcohol ), the same प्रकार of alcohol found in alcoholic beverages.
it is most often प्रयुक्त as a motor fuel, mainly as a biofuel additive for gasoline.
संसार ethanol production लिये हस्तांतरण fuel tripled between 2000 and 2007 from 17 अरब to more than 52 अरब liters.
From 2007 to 2008, the share of इथेनॉल in global gasoline प्रकार ईंधन उपयोग increased इससे 3.7 % to 5.4 %.
in 2011 विश्वव्यापी ethanol fuel उत्पादन reached 22.36 अरब u.S. liquid gallons ( bg ) ( 84.6 billion liters ), with the संयुक्त States as the top निर्माता साथ 13.9 bg ( 52.6 अरब liters ), accounting for 62.2 % of वैश्विक उत्पादन, followed by Brazil with 5.6 bg ( 21.1 अरब liters ).
इथेनॉल fuel रै a `` गैसोलीन गैलन equivalency `` ( gge ) मान of, जिससे अर्थात् 1.5 गैलन of ethanol produce the energy of एक gallon of गैसोलीन.
Ethanol fuel is widely प्रयुक्त in ब्राज़ील and in the संयुक्त States, और साथ दोनो देशों were जिम्मेदार for 87.1 % of the world 's ethanol fuel उत्पादन in 2011.
Most गाड़ियाँ on the सड़क आज in the U.S. can run on मिश्रणों of up to 10 % इथेनॉल, और ethanol represented 10 % of the U.S. gasoline fuel सप्लाई निकला इससे domestic sources in 2011.
Since 1976 the ब्राज़ीलियाई government has made it mandatory to मिश्रण ethanol with गैसोलीन, और चूंकि 2007 the विधिक मिश्रण is around 25 % इथेनॉल और 75 % gasoline ( e25 ).
by दिसम्बर 2011 Brazil had a बेड़े of 14.8 लाख flex-fuel automobiles और light trucks और 1.5 लाख flex-fuel मोटरसाइकिल कि regularly उपयोग neat ethanol fuel ( known as e100 ).
bioethanol is a रूप of बेदर्दी energy that can be उत्पादित from agricultural feedstocks.
It can be made इससे very common crops ऐसे as sugar cane, आलू, manioc and corn.
There रै been considerable बहस परिचय कैसा useful bioethanol होगा be in replacing गैसोलीन.
Concerns about its उत्पादन और use relate to increased food कीमतें due to the विशाल राशि of arable land जरूरी लिये फसलों, as खूब as the उर्जा and प्रदूषण संतुलन of the whole साईकिल of इथेनॉल production, especially from मकई.
हाल developments with cellulosic इथेनॉल उत्पादन and commercialization may allay some of these concerns.
cellulosic ethanol offers वादा क्युकी cellulose मछली, a प्रमुख और सार्वभौमिक घटक in संयंत्र कोशिकाएं walls, can be used to उपज इथेनॉल.
according to the International Energy एजेंसी, cellulosic ethanol could allow इथेनॉल fuels to play a much bigger role in the भविष्य than previously विचार.
साब 9-3 SportCombi BioPower.
The दूसरी e85 flexifuel मॉडल introduced by साब in the Swedish मार्केट.
A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination और कदम of gavrilo princip ( image taken in 1987, पहले steps were removed in 1992 and plaque बदला from Cyrillic to लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट )
A प्लैक commemorating the location of the Sarajevo हत्या ( चित्र लिया in 2009 )
on 28 जून 1914, Archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया, heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian सिंहासन, और his बीवी, सोफी, duchess of Hohenberg, यहूद शॉट dead in साराजेवो, by Gavrilo princip, one of a समूह of छह Bosnian serb assassins coordinated by Danilo Ilić.
The political objective of the assassination was to break बंद Austria-Hungary 's south-slav provinces so वे could be combined into a Greater Serbia or a यूगोस्लाविया.
The assassins ' motives यहूद consistent साथ the movement कि later became ज्ञात as Young बोस्निया.
सर्बियाई सैन्य officers stood पीछे the आक्रमण.
At the top of these सर्बियाई सैन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों थी मुख्य of Serbian Military Intelligence dragutin dimitrijević, his righthand man Major Vojislav tankosić, और masterspy Rade Malobabić.
Major Tankosić armed the assassins साथ bombs और pistols and trained them.
The हत्यारे were given अभिगम to the same clandestine tunnel of safe-houses और एजेंटों that Rade malobabić प्रयुक्त लिये the घुसपैठ of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary.
The हत्यारे, the key members of the clandestine टनल, और the key सर्बियाई सैन्य conspirators जो यहूद स्टिल जिंदा यहूद गिरफ्तार, आजमाया, convicted और punished.
those who यहूद गिरफ्तार in बोस्निया were tried in साराजेवो in October 1914.
The other षड्यंत्रकारियों यहूद गिरफ्तार and tried before a सर्बियाई kangaroo court on the French-controlled salonika सामने in 1916–1917 on unrelated false charges ; सर्बिया चलाया तीन of the top military षड्यंत्रकारियों.
Much of कया is ज्ञात परिचय the assassinations आता from these two ट्रायल and सम्बन्धित records.
कार्यभार of जिम्मेदारी लिये the bombing and हत्याएं of 28 जून is highly विवादास्पद क्युकी the आक्रमण led to the outbreak of संसार युद्ध i एक माह बाद.
renée Kathleen Zellweger ( born April 25, 1969 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री and producer.
Zellweger first gained फैली ध्यान लिये her भूमिका in the film Jerry मैग्वायर ( 1996 ), and subsequently received two nominations लिये the Academy Award लिये Best Actress for her भूमिकाएँ as Bridget जोन्स in the comedy Bridget Jones 's डायरी ( 2001 ), और as roxie Hart in the musical Chicago ( 2002 ).
She won the अकादमी Award for बेहतरीन Supporting अभिनेत्री लिये her प्रदर्शन in the drama ठंडा पहाड़ ( 2003 ).
वो has won an Academy पुरस्कार, three सुनहरी Globe Awards, three स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार, and a bafta Award ; was नामित Hasty Pudding 's स्त्री of the साल in 2009 ; और established herself as एक of the highest-paid हॉलीवुड actresses as of 2007.
the ossicles ( भी पुकारा auditory ossicles ) are the तीन smallest हड्डियों in the इंसान body, the malleus, the incus और the stapes.
वे are contained भीतर the मध्य कान space and serve to transmit sounds इससे the एयर to the fluid-filled labyrinth ( cochlea ).
The अनुपस्थिति of the auditory ossicles would constitute a moderate-to-severe hearing घाटा.
The पद `` ossicles '' literally means `` छोटा bones '' और commonly refers to the auditory ossicles, though the पद may refer to कोई छोटी अस्थि throughout the body.
The New वचन ( यहूदी • • — Greek • • diatheke kaine ) is a biblical निर्वचन originally निकला इससे a phrase in the किताब of यिर्मयाह, in the Hebrew शास्त्रों.
It is often thought of as an eschatological मुक्तिदाता Age or world to आइये and is related to the biblical concept of the किंगडम of God.
generally, ईसाइयों मानना कि the नई Covenant was instituted at the Last Supper as भाग of the eucharist, which in the इन्जील of जॉन includes the नई commandment.
वहीँ are several Christian eschatologies कि further define the नई Covenant, as an उदाहरण an inaugurated eschatology defines and describes the New वचन as an जारी relationship between ईसाई believers और God कि will be in पूरा फलीभूत after the Second coming of मसीह ; that is, it होगा नहीं तभी be in पूरा fruition in believing दिल, लकिन in the भविष्य बाह्य world as well.
the कनेक्शन between the रक्त of Christ और the नई वचन is देखी in most modern अंग्रेज़ी अनुवाद of the New Testament with the saying : `` this cup कि is poured out for you is the new वचन in my रक्त ''.
Christians मानना कि Jesus is the mediator of the नई Covenant, and कि the Blood of Christ shed at his crucifixion is the जरूरी blood of the covenant.
as with सब covenants between God and man वर्णित in the बाइबल, the New वचन is माना `` a bond in रक्त sovereignly administered by God. ''
It रै been theorized कि the नई वचन is the विधि of Christ as spoken दौरान his उपदेश on the माउंट.
The following सूची of लोगों pardoned or granted clemency by the अध्यक्ष of the United States दस्तावेज़ the most prominent मामले of प्रत्येक प्रेसिडेंसी.
As granted by the Constitution ( आलेख II, Section 2, clause 1 ), Presidents have the power to ग्रान्ट clemency in one or more of the following तरीके : the ability to ग्रान्ट a पूरा pardon, to भ्रमण a sentence, or to तोड़ना a fine.
U.S. राष्ट्रपतियों have no शक्ति to ग्रान्ट दया लिये अपराधों prosecuted under राज्य law.
As to the difference between a pardon और a commutation:
a pardon is an कार्यपालिका अनुक्रम vacating a conviction.
A commutation is the शमन of the वाक्य of किसी currently serving a वाक्य लिये a अपराधों pursuant to a conviction, without vacating the conviction itself.
Approximately 20,000 pardons and clemencies were issued by U.S. राष्ट्रपतियों in the 20th सदी अलोन.
The records of acts of clemency were public until 1934.
in 1981 the दफ्तर of the Pardon attorney was created और रिकॉर्ड from अध्यक्ष H. W. Bush आगे are अभी listed.
इस सूची शामिल pardons और commutations.
tampa ( ) is a नगर in the U.S. state of Florida.
it serves as the काउंटी सीट for Hillsborough काउंटी और is located on the वेस्ट coast of Florida, on tampa खाड़ी near the Gulf of मैक्सिको.
the जनसांख्यिकी of Tampa in 2011 was 346,037.
the वर्तमान स्थान of Tampa थी once inhabited by indigenous peoples of the Safety हार्बर culture, सबसे notably the tocobaga and the Pohoy, जो जिया साथ the shores of tampa Bay.
It was briefly explored by स्पेनी explorers in the जल्दी 16th century, but वहीँ were no permanent अमरीकी or European settlements within today 's city limits until बाद the United States था acquired फ्लोरिडा from स्पेन in 1819.
In 1824, the संयुक्त राज्य Army स्थापित a frontier outpost पुकारा फोर्ट ब्रुक at the मुँह of the hillsborough नदी, near the site of आज 's Tampa Convention बीच.
The first civilian निवासियों were pioneers जो settled near the fort for सुरक्षा from the nearby seminole जनसांख्यिकी.
the कस्बा grew धीरे until the 1880s, when रेलरोड links, the discovery of फास्फेट, and the आगमन of the cigar उद्योग jump-started tampa 's development and helped it to grow into an महत्वपूर्ण नगर by the जल्दी 1900s.
Today, tampa is a भाग of the metropolitan क्षेत्रफल most commonly referred to as the tampa खाड़ी Area.
For U.S. जनसांख्यिकी purposes, Tampa is part of the Tampa-St. Petersburg-Clearwater, फ्लोरिडा महानगर Statistical क्षेत्रफल.
the four-county क्षेत्रफल is composed of roughly 2.7 million निवासियों, making it the second largest महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल ( MSA ) in the state, और the fourth largest in the southeastern United राज्य, पीछे Miami, Washington, D.C., और Atlanta.
The वृहद tampa खाड़ी area has बस over 4 million residents and generally includes the Tampa and sarasota मैट्रो areas.
The Tampa Bay साझेदारी and U.S. जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़ा दिखाया an औसत सालाना growth of 2.47 प्रतिशत, or a gain of approximately 97,000 निवासियों प्रति साल.
between 2000 और 2006, the वृहद Tampa Bay Market अनुभवी a संयुक्त growth रेट of 14.8 प्रतिशत, growing इससे 3.4 million to 3.9 million और hitting the 4 million लोगों mark on अप्रैल 1, 2007.
a 2012 अनुमान shows the tampa Bay क्षेत्रफल जनसांख्यिकी to have 4,310,524 लोगों and a 2017 प्रक्षेप of 4,536,854 लोगों.
tampa रै a क्रमांक of खेल टीमों, ऐसे as the tampa खाड़ी buccaneers of the National फ़ुटबॉल League, the tampa Bay बिजली of the नेशनल Hockey लीग, और the Tampa खाड़ी तूफ़ान of the Arena फ़ुटबॉल लीग.
The Tampa खाड़ी Rays in प्रमुख League Baseball और the Tampa Bay rowdies of the उत्तर American Soccer League खेल उनके घर खेल in neighboring st. पीटर्सबर्ग, Florida.
in 2008, Tampa was क्रमित as the 5th best बाहरी नगर by फोर्ब्स.
A 2004 सर्वेक्षण by the nyu newspaper Washington वर्गाकार News ranked tampa as a शीर्ष नगर लिये `` twenty-somethings. ''
tampa is now ranked as a `` गामा '' संसार city by loughborough विश्वविद्यालयों.
according to loughborough, tampa ranks alongside other world शहरों ऐसे as फीनिक्स, Santo डोमिंगो, और ओसाका.
In हाल years tampa has seen a notable upsurge in high-market demand from consumers, signaling अधिक wealth concentrated in the area.
Tampa hosted the 2012 रिपब्लिकन National Convention.
The Chevrolet Cavalier was a कॉम्पैक्ट ऑटोमोबाइल उत्पादित इससे 1982 to 2005 by सामान्य मोटर्स.
निर्मित on the कम्पनी 's j platform, the cavalier produced the उच्चतम sales in 1984.
AT & t Mobility LLC branded और referred to as AT & T ( formerly cingular बेतार llc ), is a wholly owned subsidiary of AT & T Inc. कि provides बेतार सेवाएं to 107 लाख subscribers in the संयुक्त States, सहित Puerto Rico और the U.S. Virgin आइलैंड्स.
at & t गतिशीलता is the second largest wireless दूरसंचार provider in the United राज्य और Puerto Rico, behind Verizon बेतार, जिससे serves 115.78 लाख ग्राहक as of the चौथी क्वार्टर of 2012.
at & T गतिशीलता is headquartered in the Lenox पार्क area of DeKalb co. Georgia, just बाहर Atlanta.
Originally Cingular Wireless LLC इससे 2000 to 2007, a संयुक्त venture between SBC Communications and BellSouth, the company acquired the old at & T बेतार in 2004 ; sbc later acquired the original at & t और re-branded as `` at & t ''.
Cingular became wholly स्वामित्व by AT & T in December 2006 as a परिणाम of at & t 's acquisition of BellSouth.
in January 2007, cingular पुष्टि it होता re-brand itself under the AT & t नाम.
हालांकि the विधिक corporate name change occurred तत्काल, लिये दोनो regulatory और brand-awareness reasons both ब्रांड्स यहूद used in the company 's signage और विज्ञापन दौरान a परिवर्तन काल.
The transition concluded in लेट June, बस prior to the rollout of the Apple iphone.
On March 20, 2011, AT & T Mobility announced its इरादे to acquire t-mobile USA इससे डॉयचे telekom लिये $ 39 billion.
If it था प्राप्त government and regulatory approval, at & T होता have था more than 130 लाख subscribers.
however, the U.S. Department of Justice, the Federal संचार आयोग, and AT & T Mobility 's प्रतिस्पर्धी ( ऐसे as Sprint Nextel ) opposed the मूव on the grounds that it होता reduce प्रतियोगिता in the सेल्यूलर संचार मार्केट.
In December 2011, in the face of both governmental और फैली उपभोक्ता विपक्ष, AT & T withdrew their offer to पूरा the विलय.
मार्टिन Luther King, jr. ( January 15, 1929 – April 4, 1968 ) थी an American clergyman, activist, and नेता in the african-american सिविल अधिकारों Movement.
He is best known for his भूमिका in the advancement of civil rights using nonviolent civil disobedience.
किंग रै become a national icon in the history of अमरीकी प्रगतिवाद.
A Baptist मंत्री, किंग became a सिविल rights activist जल्दी in उसके career.
he led the 1955 मोंटगोमरी बस बहिष्कार and helped मिला the Southern Christian Leadership Conference ( sclc ) in 1957, सेवारत as its first president.
साथ the sclc, King led an unsuccessful संघर्ष विरूद्ध segregation in albany, Georgia, in 1962, and organized nonviolent विरोध in बर्मिंघम, Alabama, that attracted नेशनल attention following television news coverage of the क्रूर पुलिस जवाब.
King भी helped to organize the 1963 कूच on वॉशिंगटन, जहाँ he वितरित his `` I Have a Dream `` वाक.
There, he established his reputation as one of the greatest orators in अमरीकी history.
He also established उसके प्रतिष्ठा as a कट्टरपंथी, और became an object of the संघीय Bureau of छानबीन 's cointelpro लिये the rest of his जीवन.
एफबीआई agents investigated उसे for संभावित कम्युनिस्ट ties, अंकित his extramarital liaisons और reported on them to सरकारी officials, और on एक अवसर, mailed किंग a threatening anonymous अक्षर that he interpreted as an attempt to मेक him कमिट suicide.
on October 14, 1964, किंग received the नोबेल सलाम पुरस्कार for combating जातिगत inequality through nonviolence.
In 1965, he और the SCLC helped to व्यवस्थित the selma to मोंटगोमरी marches और the following साल, he took the movement उत्तर to Chicago.
In the final years of his life, King expanded उसके फ़ोकस to include poverty and the Vietnam War, alienating अनेक of his उदार allies साथ a 1967 speech titled `` परे वियतनाम ''.
किंग was planning a नेशनल occupation of वॉशिंगटन, D.C., पुकारा the Poor People 's अभियान.
किंग थी assassinated on April 4, 1968, in Memphis, टेनेसी.
His death was followed by riots in अनेक U.S. शहरों.
Allegations कि James Earl रे, the man convicted of killing King, था been framed or acted in concert with सरकारी एजेंटों persisted लिये दशकों बाद the शूटिंग, and the jury of a 1999 सिविल trial मिला loyd Jowers to be complicit in a षड्यंत्र against King.
King was awarded the Presidential पदक of स्वतंत्रता और the Congressional सुनहरा पदक मरणोपरांत.
Martin Luther King, jr. दिन was established as a U.S. संघीय holiday in 1986.
Hundreds of streets in the U.S. have महरूम renamed in his honor.
a memorial statue on the National मॉल थी opened to the public in 2011.
The tiger ( Panthera tigris ) is the largest बिल्ली प्रजाति, reaching a कुल body length of up to and weighing up to.
It is the तीसरा largest जमीन carnivore ( पीछे तभी the ध्रुवीय bear and the brown bear ).
इसके सबसे recognizable feature is a पैटर्न of अंधेरा लंबवत धारियाँ on reddish-orange fur with a lighter underside.
it रै exceptional stout teeth, and the canines हैं the longest among जीना felids with a क्राउन ऊँचाई of as much as or even.
In zoos, टाइगर्स have जिया for 20 to 26 सालो, which भी seems to be उनके longevity in the wild.
वे are territorial और generally solitary लकिन सोशल पशु, often requiring विशाल संलग्न क्षेत्रों of आवास that support their शिकार आवश्यकताएँ.
This, coupled साथ the fact that they हैं indigenous to कुछ of the अधिक densely आबादी स्थान on Earth, रै caused significant conflicts साथ humans.
टाइगर्स एकबार ranged widely आरपार Asia, इससे Turkey in the वेस्ट to the eastern coast of रूस.
Over the पास्ट 100 years, they have खोया 93 % of their historic दायरा, and have been extirpated from southwest and सेंट्रल एशिया, from the islands of जावा and Bali, और from large क्षेत्रों of southeast और Eastern एशिया.
आज, they दायरा इससे the Siberian taiga to open grasslands और तीव्र mangrove swamps.
The बाकी छह बाघ subspecies have been वर्गीकृत as endangered by आईयूसीएन.
the वैश्विक population in the जंगली is estimated to क्रमांक between 3,062 and 3,948 individuals, bas from around 100,000 at the start of the 20th century, साथ सबसे बाकी populations occurring in small pockets पृथक from प्रत्येक other.
Major reasons for जनसांख्यिकी मनाही include habitat विनाश, आवास fragmentation और poaching.
The extent of क्षेत्रफल occupied by tigers is अनुमानित at कम than, a 41 % मनाही इससे the area estimated in the mid-1990s.
टाइगर्स are among the सबसे recognisable और लोकप्रिय of the world 's charismatic megafauna.
वे have featured prominently in प्राचीन mythology and folklore, और continue to be चित्रित in आधुनिक films और साहित्य.
टाइगर्स appear on अनेक flags, coats of arms, और as mascots लिये sporting टीमों.
the Bengal tiger is the नेशनल animal of दोनो India and Bangladesh.
the सरलीकृत आतंरिक structure of a हरितलवक
Overview of the Calvin साईकिल और कार्बन fixation
the light-independent reactions of photosynthesis हैं chemical reactions that convert carbon डाइऑक्साइड and other यौगिकों into glucose.
These reactions occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled area of a chloroplast बाहर of the thylakoid membranes.
ये reactions take the light-dependent प्रतिक्रियाएँ और perform further chemical प्रक्रियाओं on them.
वहीँ हैं three phases to the light-independent reactions, collectively called the calvin साईकिल : carbon fixation, reduction प्रतिक्रियाएँ, and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration.
Despite इसके नाम, this process occurs तभी जब light is उपलब्धियाँ.
पौधे do not carry out the Calvin cycle by night.
They, बजाय, release sucrose into the phloem इससे उनके starch reserves.
इस प्रक्रम happens when light is available स्वतंत्र of the kind of photosynthesis ( C3 कार्बन fixation, c4 कार्बन fixation, और crassulacean एसिड चयापचय ) ; कैम plants स्टोर malic acid in their vacuoles every रात्रि and रिलीज it by day in अनुक्रम to मेक इस प्रक्रम work.
A लिनेन handkerchief साथ खींचा लड़ी कढ़ाई around the edges
Linen cloth बरामद इससे Qumran गुफा 1 near the Dead समुद्र.
लिनेन ( ) is a textile बना इससे the fibers of the flax संयंत्र, Linum usitatissimum.
लिनेन is labor-intensive to manufacture, but when it is made into garments, it is valued for its exceptional coolness और freshness in hot weather.
The word `` linen '' is of West germanic उत्पत्ति and cognates with the Latin name लिये the flax plant linum, और the earlier Greek λινόν ( linon ).
इस word history रै दिए rise to a number of अन्य terms in English, the सबसे notable of जिससे is the English शब्द line, निकला from the उपयोग of a linen ( flax ) thread to determine a straight line.
वस्त्र in a linen weave texture, भी जब made of कपास, गांजा और other non-flax fibers हैं भी loosely referred to as `` linen ''.
ऐसे fabrics generally have उनके own विशिष्ट names अन्य than लिनेन ; for उदाहरण, fine cotton धागे in a linen-style weave is पुकारा Madapolam.
the सामूहिक पद `` linens `` is still often used generically to describe a class of woven and even knitted bed, नहाना, तालिका and kitchen textiles.
The नाम linens is retained क्युकी traditionally, linen थी used for अनेक of ये items.
in the past, the word `` linens '' थी also प्रयुक्त to mean lightweight undergarments ऐसे as shirts, chemises, waistshirts, lingerie ( a word भी cognate साथ लिनेन ), and detachable shirt छल्लों and cuffs, जिससे यहूद historically बना almost exclusively आउट of लिनेन.
The inside cloth layer of ठीक composite clothing garments ( as for उदाहरण jackets ) was traditionally बना of linen, and this is the origin of the शब्द lining.
लिनेन वस्त्र appear to be कुछ of the oldest in the world : उनके इतिहास goes वापस अनेक हज़ारों of years.
fragments of स्ट्रॉ, seeds, मछली, yarns, and various प्रकार of fabrics which तिथि वापस to about 8000 bc have been found in Swiss lake dwellings.
dyed flax fibers मिला in a प्रागैतिहासिक गुफा in Georgia सुझाएँ the उपयोग of woven linen fabrics इससे जंगली flax may date वापस भी पहले to 36,000 BP.
Linen थी sometimes प्रयुक्त as करेंसी in ancient Egypt.
Egyptian mummies यहूद wrapped in लिनेन because it was seen as a symbol of light और purity, और as a प्रदर्शक of माल.
Some of these fabrics, woven इससे हाथ spun yarns, were very ठीक for their day, but हैं coarse compared to आधुनिक लिनेन.
आज, linen is usually an महंगी वस्त्र, and is उत्पादित in relatively छोटी quantities.
it has a long `` स्टेपल '' ( व्यक्तिगत fiber लंबाई ) सापेक्ष to कपास and अन्य natural मछली.
अनेक उत्पाद are बना of linen : aprons, bags, तौलिये ( swimmers, bath, beach, देह और wash तौलिये ), napkins, bed linens, लिनेन चौके, धावक, chair कवर, and men 's & women 's wear.
the फीफा संसार कप, प्रायः simply the World कप, is an international संघ फ़ुटबॉल प्रतियोगिता लडे by the senior men 's नेशनल teams of the सदस्यों of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ), the sport 's global governing body.
the championship has महरूम awarded प्रत्येक चार years since the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1930, मगर in 1942 और 1946 जब it थी नहीं आयोजित because of the दूसरी संसार युद्ध.
The वर्तमान champions हैं Spain, who जीती the 2010 टूर्नामेंट.
The current स्वरूप of the tournament involves 32 टीमों competing लिये the title at venues भीतर the host स्वदेश ( s ) over a काल of परिचय a माह ; this phase is प्रायः पुकारा the संसार Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which currently takes place over the preceding तीन सालो, is प्रयुक्त to determine जिससे टीमों qualify लिये the टूर्नामेंट साथ with the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ).
the 19 संसार Cup tournaments have महरूम won by eight अलग नेशनल टीमों.
Brazil have जीती पाँच टाइम्स, and they हैं the तभी टोली to have played in every टूर्नामेंट.
the other संसार Cup विजेता are Italy, साथ चार titles ; Germany, with तीन शीर्षक ; अर्जेंटीना and inaugural winners उरुग्वे, साथ two शीर्षक each ; और इंग्लैण्ड, France, and Spain, with एक शीर्षक each.
the World कप is the world 's सबसे widely viewed sporting event ; an estimated 715.1 million people देखी the final match of the 2006 FIFA संसार Cup held in जर्मनी.
the next three संसार cups will be hosted by Brazil in 2014, रूस in 2018, and क़तर in 2022.
The is an expansion device for the Wii रिमोट video game controller for the Wii कि allows it to more accurately कैप्चर complex motion.
according to निन्टेंडो, the सेंसर in the यंत्र पूरक the accelerometer and सेंसर Bar सामर्थ्य of the वी Remote to enable actions to be rendered identically on the screen in real समय.
The वी 's successor कंसोल, the Wii u, supports the वी motionplus and इसके peripherals in games where use of इसके touchscreen-built-in primary controller is नहीं जरुरी.
majulah singapura ( Onward Singapore ) is the national गान of सिंगापुर.
रचित by zubir कहा in 1958 as a थीम सोंग लिये official functions of the City Council of सिंगापुर, the song थी selected in 1959 as the द्वीप 's anthem when it attained self-government.
Upon पूरा independence in 1965, Majulah Singapura थी formally अपनाया as सिंगापुर 's नेशनल anthem.
By विधि the गान may तभी be sung साथ its original मलय गीत, although वहीँ मौजूद authorized translations of the lyrics of the anthem in Singapore 's तीन other official languages : English, Mandarin और Tamil.
originally रचित in the कुंजी of g major, in 2001 the नेशनल anthem was officially relaunched in the निम्नतर key of F major as this थी कहा to allow for a `` grander और अधिक प्रेरणादायी व्यवस्था ''.
The national anthem is regularly performed or सुंग in स्कूलों and हथियारबंद शक्तियां शिविरों at ceremonies आयोजित at the शुरूआत and/or the end of each दिन, during जिससे the national flag is भी उठाया और lowered और the नेशनल pledge is लिया.
singaporeans are especially प्रोत्साहित to गाओ the national गान on अवसरों of नेशनल celebration or नेशनल significance ऐसे as at the नेशनल दिन Parade, at नेशनल दिन observance ceremonies conducted by शैक्षणिक institutions and government departments, and at sporting कार्यक्रम at जिससे सिंगापुर teams हैं participating.
An expedition 's shipwrights भवन a brigantine, 1541.
shipbuilding is the construction of जहाजों and फ्लोटिंग बरतन.
it सामान्यतः takes place in a specialized सुविधा known as a shipyard.
Shipbuilders, also called shipwrights, follow a specialized occupation that traces its जड़ें to before recorded इतिहास.
shipbuilding और ship मरम्मत, both commercial and military, हैं referred to as `` naval engineering ''.
the construction of boats is a समान activity पुकारा boat भवन.
The dismantling of जहाजों is पुकारा ship breaking.
wakonda is a कस्बा in मिट्टी काउंटी, दक्षिण डकोटा, संयुक्त राज्य.
the population थी 321 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
The following is a list of the सबसे populous incorporated places of the संयुक्त States of अमेरिका.
As पारिभाषित by the United States Census Bureau, an `` incorporated place `` शामिल a किस्में of designations, सहित city, town, village, बरो, and municipality.
A few exceptional जनसांख्यिकी Designated स्थान ( CDPs ) हैं also included in the Census ब्यूरो 's लिस्टिंग of incorporated स्थान.
Consolidated city-counties represent a distinct type of government that includes the संपूर्ण जनसांख्यिकी of a काउंटी, or county equivalent.
कुछ संचित city-counties, however, शामिल अनेक incorporated places.
इस list presents तभी that portion ( or `` संतुलन '' ) of such संचित city-counties कि हैं नहीं a part of another incorporated place.
नोट that this list refers only to the जनसांख्यिकी of individual municipalities within their defined हद, which does नहीं शामिल other municipalities or unincorporated suburban areas भीतर शहरी agglomerations.
a different ranking is evident जब considering U.S. metropolitan क्षेत्रफल populations.

Nintendo ds storage devices are डिवाइस प्रयुक्त to store a licensed developer 's work-in-progress images, homebrew video खेल और डाउनलोड वाणिज्यिक खेल ( since the निन्टेंडो ds is not sold साथ a rewritable भंडार मीडियम ).
Licensed डेवलपर, however, can उपयोग a blue Intelligent Systems नाइट्रो emulator box to फ्लैश ताश.
These devices are also known as `` flashcarts '' or `` flashcards ''.
There हैं दो main classes of flashcarts : older डिवाइस which अनुरूप in slot-2 ( the Game Boy Advance खेल पाक slot ) and newer डिवाइस कि अनुरूप in slot-1 ( the DS खेल Card slot ).
Slot-2 ( or first-generation ) डिवाइस have महरूम historically सस्ता due to economies of स्केल ( inherited इससे उनके use साथ खेल लड़के अग्रिम ), but आवश्यकता a booting tool in Slot-1 in अनुक्रम to उपयोग the टच स्क्रीन and अन्य DS features.
Second-generation डिवाइस ( those जिससे तभी उपयोग Slot-1 ) do not कार्य साथ GBA homebrew, लकिन became कम expensive और easier to उपयोग, rivaling अनेक slot-2 devices in price.
first-generation डिवाइस शामिल gba flash कारतूस, gbamp CF, supercard, and m3.
Second-generation डिवाइस शामिल R4 Revolution, CycloDS, G6 Real and DS-X.
the storage device either contains फ्लैश memory or a slot लिये a मेमोरी कार्ड to स्टोर homebrew.
भंडार devices with a memory-card slot usually have अधिक storage capacity than flash-memory devices.
Although flash-memory क्षमता is usually measured in megabits ( mb ), memory-card क्षमता is usually measured in मेगाबाइट ( MB ) ( जहाँ 8 Mb is 1 MB ).
Storage-device ब्रांड्स differ in उनके support लिये homebrew ; ds and Game लड़के Advance roms ; special features ( such as ability to खेल media फाइलें ) ; physical size and cost.
सख्ती speaking, a भंडार device is not necessary लिये ds साथ FlashMe installed क्युकी homebrew can be भेजा to the DS using WMB.
However, this is नहीं an easily-portable विधि because the DS needs to be within range of a suitable wi-fi card.
हैं अमरीकी लोगों of जापानी heritage.
Japanese अमेरिकी have historically been among the three largest Asian अमरीकी समुदायों, but in हाल decades, it रै become the छठे largest समूह at roughly 1,304,286, including those of mixed-race or mixed-ethnicity.
in the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, the largest जापानी अमरीकी समुदायों यहूद मिला in California साथ 272,528, Hawaii साथ 185,502, New यॉर्क with 37,780, वॉशिंगटन with 35,008, and Illinois with 17,542.
दक्षिणी California has the largest Japanese-American जनसांख्यिकी in उत्तर अमेरिका.

This is a व्यापक लिस्टिंग which highlights significant उपलब्धियाँ and milestones आधारित upon Billboard पत्रिका 's singles चार्ट, most notably the Billboard Hot 100.
This list spans from the issue दिनाँक जनवरी 1, 1955 to present.
The Billboard Hot 100 began with the समस्या दिनाँक August 4, 1958, and is फिलहाल the standard popular म्यूज़िक chart in the United राज्य.
prior to the सृष्टि of the hot 100, Billboard प्रकाशित चार singles charts : `` Best Sellers in स्टोर्स '', `` Most निभाई by jockeys '', `` Most निभाई in Jukeboxes '' and `` The Top 100 ''.
These चार्ट, जिससे ranged इससे 20 to 100 स्लॉट, were phased आउट at अलग times between 1957 और 1958.
Though technically नहीं भाग of the hot 100 चार्ट इतिहास, उनके आंकड़ा is शामिल लिये computational purposes, and to avoid unenlightening or misleading characterizations.
सब वस्तुएं सूचीबद्ध नीचे हैं इससे the Hot 100 era, unless otherwise noted ( pre-hot 100 charts ).

A remake of the 1983 miniseries निर्मित by केनेथ Johnson, the new series क्रॉनिकल्स the arrival on Earth of a technologically advanced alien प्रजाति which ostensibly comes in peace, लकिन दरअसल has sinister motives.
V सितारों Morena Baccarin, Lourdes Benedicto, Morris शाहबलूत, जोएल Gretsch, लोगन Huffman, Charles Mesure, एलिज़ाबेथ Mitchell, लौरा Vandervoort and Scott Wolf, and थी executive produced by Scott rosenbaum, यवेस Simoneau, Scott Peters, and Jace हॉल.

Geocaching is an बाहरी recreational कार्यकलाप, in जिससे the participants use a वैश्विक positioning प्रणाली ( GPS ) receiver or मोबाईल device and other navigational तकनीकों to छुपा और तलाश containers, पुकारा `` geocaches '' or `` caches '', anywhere in the world.
a typical cache is a small waterproof संग्राहक containing a logbook जहाँ the geocacher enters the तिथि वे found it और signs it with their established कोड नाम.
बाद हस्ताक्षर into the log, the cache जरूर be लगाई वापस exactly where the person found it.
larger containers such as प्लास्टिक storage containers ( tupperware or similar ) or ammunition बाक्स can भी contain items लिये trading, प्रायः toys or trinkets of छोटी मान.
geocaching shares many aspects with benchmarking, trigpointing, orienteering, treasure-hunting, letterboxing, and waymarking.
Boogie bas प्रोडक्शन्स थी a hip हॉप समूह कि was originally रचित of krs-one, D-Nice, और DJ Scott la चट्टान.
dj Scott La चट्टान was murdered on अगस्त 27, 1987, महीने बाद the release of bdp 's डेब्यू album, दण्ड Minded.
The नाम of the समूह, Boogie bas, गर्भाशयी from a nickname लिये the दक्षिण bronx section of The Bronx, एक of the five boroughs of नई York City.
the समूह pioneered the fusion of डांसहॉल reggae and hip हॉप music और उनके डेब्यू LP Criminal minded contained फ़्रैंक descriptions of जीवन in the South bronx of the late 1980s यूँ सेटिंग the stage लिये कया would आखिरकार become gangsta rap.
A municipal बंध is a bond जारी by a लोकल सरकारी, or their agencies.
संभावित issuers of municipal bonds include states, cities, काउंटी, redevelopment एजेंसियों, special-purpose जिले, स्कूल districts, public यूटिलिटी जिले, publicly owned airports and seaports, and कोई other governmental entity ( or समूह of governments ) at or नीचे the राज्य level.
Municipal bonds may be सामान्य obligations of the जारीकर्ता or secured by specified revenues.
In the संयुक्त राज्य, interest income received by धारकों of municipal bonds is प्रायः exempt इससे the संघीय income कर and from the income tax of the राज्य in which they हैं जारी, हालांकि municipal bonds issued लिये निश्चित purposes may not be tax exempt.
Unlike नई issue स्टॉक्स that are brought to market साथ दाम restrictions until the सौदे is बेची, नगरपालिका bonds are free to व्यापार at कोई time एकबार they are purchased by the निवेशकों.
Professional व्यापारियों regularly trade और retrade the same bonds several टाइम्स a week.

The version जारी in the UK ( and probably सबसे of यूरोपीय ) is different from कि issued in the us on the United कलाकारों label, होने धीमा, और lacking the बैकिंग vocals और `` live sounding '' प्रदर्शन मिला on the US सिंगल.

the अंतरजाल Movie Database ( IMDb ) is an online database of सूचना सम्बन्धित to films, टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम, and video खेल.
इस शामिल अभिनेताओं, production क्रू personnel, और fictional characters प्रदर्शित in ये three विज़ुअल entertainment मीडिया.
it is एक of the सबसे popular ऑनलाइन entertainment destinations, साथ over 100 million unique उपयोक्ता each month और a ठोस और rapidly growing मोबाईल उपस्थिति.

Fibre Channel मेजबान Bus Adapter ( 64-bit PCI-X card )
scsi Host Bus Adapter ( 16-bit isa card )
In कंप्यूटर हार्डवेयर, a मेजबान controller, host एडाप्टर, or host bus adapter ( hba ) connects a host प्रणाली ( the कंप्यूटर ) to other network और storage devices.
The terms हैं primarily used to refer to डिवाइस for connecting scsi, Fibre चैनल और eSATA devices.
However, devices लिये connecting to आईडीई, ईथरनेट, firewire, usb and अन्य systems may भी be पुकारा मेजबान adapters.
recently, the आगमन of iSCSI और Fibre चैनल over Ethernet has brought परिचय ईथरनेट hbas, which are अलग इससे Ethernet nics in कि they include TCP offload Engines.
There are भी converged HBAs कि support दोनो Ethernet और fibre Channel पुकारा Converged Network Adapters ( cnas ).
Cashmere स्कार्फ
आधुनिक men 's cashmere sweaters लिये बिक्री.
cashmere wool, usually simply known as cashmere, is a रेशा obtained इससे cashmere बकरियों and other types of बकरी.
The word cashmere गर्भाशयी from an old स्पेलिंग of Kashmir.
Cashmere is ठीक in texture, strong, लाइट, और नरम.
garments made इससे it provide बेहतरीन इन्सुलेशन.
In the United States, under the u.s. Wool Products labeling Act of 1939, as amended, ( 15 uction 68b ( a ) ( 6 ) ), राज्य that a ऊन or वस्त्र उत्पाद may नहीं be labeled as containing cashmere unless:
such ऊन उत्पाद is the ठीक ( dehaired ) undercoat fibers produced by a cashmere बकरी ( Capra hircus laniger ) ;
the औसत व्यास of the रेशा of ऐसे ऊन उत्पाद does not exceed 19 microns ; और
ऐसे ऊन उत्पाद does नहीं contain अधिक than 3 percent ( by वज़न ) of cashmere fibers with average diameters that exceed 30 माइक्रोन.
the average fiber diameter may be विषय to a गुणांक of variation around the mean that shall not exceed 24 प्रतिशत.
जेनिफर Convertibles inc. is the मालिक और licensor of sofabed and leather specialty retail स्टोर्स in the संयुक्त राज्य, with stores located throughout the Eastern seaboard, in the Midwest, on the West Coast और in the दक्षिणपश्चिम.

it subsequently उभरा from Chapter 11 under the कंट्रोल of इसके major प्रदायक, the haining mengnu समूह.
अंडा roll is a term प्रयुक्त लिये अनेक अलग भोजन around the संसार.
2__egg_roll __ किस्में of egg रोल्स are मिला in mainland चीन, अनेक chinese-speaking regions of एशिया, and Chinese immigrant communities around the world.
Egg rolls as referred to in China.
In guangdong और Hong Kong, अंडा roll usually refers to बिस्किट फेंकें.
इस is a प्रकार of biscuit.
The संघटक शामिल अंडा, flour और शुगर.
अंडा roll also is a डिश in कैण्टन and Hong काँग, इस is usually made साथ सब्ज़ी.
Within China egg rolls हैं eaten predominantly in the southeast and are नहीं as commonly consumed in the उत्तर and पश्चिमी parts of चीन.
In अमरीकी Chinese cuisine, an egg फेंकें is a savory डिश typically served as an क्षुधावर्धक.
It is प्रायः भरवां with chicken, पोर्क or shrimp, गोभी, गाजर, टमाटर, bean sprouts और अन्य सब्जियां, और then गहन fried.
इस variety of the अंडा फेंकें is बहुत आम and लोकप्रिय, across भी क्षेत्रीय varieties of American Chinese food, और is प्रायः शामिल as part of a `` संयोजन platter ''.
in मॉन्ट्रियल, कनाडा, open-ended eggrolls are a Jewish-Chinese fusion dish.
They can be either कोषेर certified or merely कोषेर style.
Pain और suffering is the विधिक पद लिये the शारीरिक और emotional तनाव caused from an चोट ( देखिए also pain and suffering ).
कुछ क्षतिपूर्ति कि might be अंतर्गत this category होता be : aches, अस्थाई and स्थाई limitations on कार्यकलाप, potential shortening of जीवन, depression or scarring.
जब दाखिल a मुकदमा as a परिणाम of an चोट, it is आम for someone to तलाश धन both in compensation for actual money that is खोया and लिये the पीड़ा और तनाव संबद्ध with वस्तुतः any injury.
In a suit, पीड़ा और suffering is part of the `` सामान्य क्षतिपूर्ति '' खण्ड of the claimant 's अर्जी, or, alternatively, it is an element of `` compensatory '' non-economic damages that allows recovery for the mental anguish and/or physical pain endured by the claimant as a result of चोट लिये जिससे the अभियोक्ता seeks redress.
अलावा इससे धन damages awarded in trial, money क्षतिपूर्ति are भी given informally बाहर the judicial प्रणाली in mediations, मध्यस्थता ( दोनो of which may be court annexed or non litigated claims ) as well as in routine insurance settlements.
Individual claimants or those represented by lawyers प्रायः present demands to insurers to settle लिये money.
These माँग for bodily injury मुआवजे monies प्रायः set आउट damages कि हैं similarly प्रयुक्त in the अदालत litigated pleadings.
Demands हैं usually लिखा summaries of a claimant 's चिकित्सा care और the facts जिससे resulted in the injury.
Sample of a medallion हस्ताक्षर गारंटी stampin
the संयुक्त States and कनाडा, a medallion हस्ताक्षर guarantee is a special signature गारंटी for the ट्रांसफ़र of प्रतिभूति.
It is a गारंटी by the transferring वित्तीय संस्था that the हस्ताक्षर is genuine और the वित्तीय institution accepts liability for any जालसाजी.
Signature guarantees protect shareholders by preventing unauthorized हस्तांतरण और possible investor नुकसान.
They also limit the देयता of the ट्रांसफ़र एजेंट जो स्वीकृत the certificates.
Different संस्थानों have अलग नीतियों as to कया प्रकार of identification वे require to provide the गारंटी और whether वे चार्ज a शुल्क लिये ऐसे सेवा ( प्रायः नाममात्र if any ).
Most संस्थानों will नहीं guarantee a signature of someone जो has नहीं already been their ग्राहक.
a medallion signature गारंटी is not the वही as an acknowledgment by a notary public, in the sense कि a `` हस्ताक्षर guarantee '' is a प्रमाणन by the संस्था कि the signature is authentic, and an acknowledgment is a certification by a नोटरी public attesting कि the signer हस्ताक्षरित a document voluntarily.
कुछ banks may no longer provide this service, however, many स्टिल do as खूब as अन्य financial institutions ऐसे as a Savings and Loans and क्रेडिट Unions.
At their sole discretion, ये संस्थानों may still decline to provide the Medallion Signature guarantees.
When us citizens are विदेश, कुछ वित्तीय संस्थानों may accept United States Embassy Seals, in place of the medallion Signature गारंटी Stamp.
Pacific Electric रेल streetcars stacked at a junkyard on टर्मिनल Island, Los एंजिल्स काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, कूच 1956
The सामान्य मोटर्स स्ट्रीटकार conspiracy ( भी known as the ग्रेट American स्ट्रीटकार कांड ) refers to दोषारोपण and convictions in relation to a कार्यक्रम by General Motors ( GM ) and अन्य companies जो खरीदा and तब dismantled streetcar and इलेक्ट्रिक train systems in many American शहरों.
Between 1936 और 1950, नेशनल City Lines and प्रशांत City लाइनों —with निवेश इससे gm, firestone Tire, Standard आयल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, phillips पेट्रोलियम, Mack ट्रक, and the संघीय अभियान्त्रिकी corporation—bought over 100 इलेक्ट्रिक surface-traction प्रणालियों in 45 शहरों सहित Baltimore, Newark, Los एंजिल्स, New York नगर, Oakland and San Diego और converted उन्हें into bus आपरेशन.
Several of the कंपनियाँ शामिल यहूद convicted in 1949 of conspiracy to monopolize अंतरराज्यीय कॉमर्स लकिन यहूद acquitted of conspiring to monopolize the स्वामित्व of ये companies.
कुछ suggest कि इस program निभाई a key role in the मनाही of पब्लिक transit in cities आरपार the संयुक्त States ; notably Edwin J. quinby, जो first खींचा attention to the कार्यक्रम in 1946, and तब Bradford C. Snell, an anti-trust attorney for the United राज्य सीनेट whose controversial 1974 गवाही to a Senate inquiry brought the समस्या to नेशनल awareness.
दोनो Quinby and Snell argued that the deliberate विनाश of streetcars was भाग of a larger strategy to push the United राज्य into ऑटोमोबाइल dependency.
अन्य say that independent आर्थिक कारकों brought about परिवर्तन in the पारगमन system, including the ग्रेट Depression, the पब्लिक Utility पकड़कर Company अधिनियम of 1935, मजदूर unrest, market forces, rapidly increasing ट्रैफ़िक जमघट, शहरी sprawl, कराधान नीतियों कि favored निजी गाडी स्वामित्व, और सामान्य enthusiasm लिये the automobile.
एक writer on the विषय रै सुझाया कि Snell and अन्य fell into simplistic षड्यंत्र theory thinking, bordering on paranoid delusions saying `` Clearly, gm waged a युद्ध on electric traction.
It was indeed an all आउट assault, लकिन by no अर्थात् the single reason for the विफलता of rapid transit.
Also, it is just as साफ कि क्रियाएँ and inactions by सरकारी contributed significantly to the विलोपन of इलेक्ट्रिक कर्षण. ''
Only a छोटी handful of u.S. cities have surviving effective rail-based शहरी transport systems आधारित on streetcars or trams, सहित न्यूर्क, फिलाडेल्फिया, San Francisco, Pittsburgh, and बोस्टन ; अन्य are re-introducing them.
the story has been छान several times in print, film and other media, notably in Who Framed रोजर खरगोश, Taken for a Ride और The End of Suburbia.

अमरीकी colonial वास्तुकला includes several building डिज़ाइन styles संबद्ध साथ the औपनिवेशिक period of the United States, सहित First Period अंग्रेज़ी ( late-medieval ), फ्रेंच Colonial, स्पेनी औपनिवेशिक, डच Colonial and जॉर्जियाई.
These शैलियाँ are संबद्ध with the घरों, चर्च and सरकारी इमारतें of the period from परिचय 1600 through the 19th century.

it topped the charts in 1940 in the u.S. और one साल बाद was featured in the movie सूर्य घाटी serenade.

the NEPTUNE Canada project is the world’s पहला regional-scale भाटे समंदर observatory कि plugs सीधे into the अंतरजाल.
चूंकि दिसम्बर 2009, it रै अनुमत people to `` लहरे '' the seafloor while समंदर scientists run deep-water experiments from लैब्स और विश्वविद्यालयों around the संसार.
साथ साथ its sister प्रोजेक्ट, VENUS, NEPTUNE offers a अद्वितीय approach to समंदर science.
Traditionally, समंदर वैज्ञानिकों have relied on infrequent ship क्रूज़ or space-based satellites to carry out their research, while the वरुण project उपयोग a remotely संचालित क्रॉलर.
a gramophone रिकार्ड, commonly known as a phonograph record ( in अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी ), vinyl record ( in सन्दर्भ to विनाइल, the सामग्री सबसे commonly used after परिचय 1950 ), or colloquially, `` a record '', is an एनालॉग sound भंडार मीडियम consisting of a flat disc with an inscribed, modulated सर्पिल groove.
the groove usually starts निकट the periphery और ends near the center of the disc.
Phonograph रिकॉर्ड हैं generally वर्णित by उनके diameter in inches ( 12-inch, 10-inch, 7-inch, etc. ), the rotational गति at which वे are played ( `` 33 rpm ``, `` 78 '', `` 45 '', etc. ), उनके time क्षमता ( `` long playing '' ), their reproductive सटीकता, or `` fidelity `` ( `` high वफ़ादारी '', `` Orthophonic '', `` full-range '', इत्यादि. ), और the number of चैनल्स of ऑडियो provided ( `` mono ``, `` stereo ``, `` quadraphonic ``, इत्यादि. ).
Phonograph records यहूद the प्राथमिक मीडियम प्रयुक्त for music जनन for most of the 20th century, replacing the phonograph cylinder, साथ जिससे it था co-existed, by the 1920s.
by the late 1980s, digital media था gained a larger market share, और the विनाइल record left the मुख्यधारा in 1991.
They continue to be manufactured और sold in the 21st century.
in 2008, nearly 2.9 लाख units shipped, the most in कोई साल since 1998 और the format रै जारी to धीरे regain लोकप्रियता.
वे हैं विशेषकर प्रयुक्त by djs and audiophiles for अनेक types of music.
As of 2013, vinyl records continue to be प्रयुक्त लिये distribution.

Grasslands are क्षेत्रों where the वनस्पति is dominated by grasses ( पोएसी ), however sedge ( Cyperaceae ) और फटाफट ( Juncaceae ) families can भी be found.
Grasslands occur naturally on सब continents मगर अंटार्कटिक.
in शीतोष्ण latitudes, such as northwestern यूरोपीय और the ग्रेट Plains and कैलिफ़ोर्निया in North अमेरिका, native grasslands हैं dominated by perennial गुच्छा ग्रास प्रजाति, whereas in warmer climates annual प्रजाति form a वृहद घटक of the vegetation.
grasslands हैं found in most ecoregions of the धरती.
लिये उदाहरण there हैं five स्थलीय ecoregion classifications ( subdivisions ) of the शीतोष्ण grasslands, savannas, and shrublands biome ( ' ecosystem ' ), जिससे is one of आठ स्थलीय ecozones of the Earth 's सतह.
Henna ( lawsonia inermis, also पुकारा henna पेड़ ) or Hina is a flowering संयंत्र, the एकमात्र प्रजाति in the genus lawsonia in the परिवार Lythraceae.
the English name `` हिना '' आता from the Arabic ( ALA-LC : ḥinnāʾ / सुनाया ) or colloquially, loosely सुनाया.
the name is also प्रयुक्त for dye preparations निकला from the संयंत्र, and लिये the आर्ट of अस्थाई tattooing आधारित on those dyes.
हिना रै been प्रयुक्त चूंकि antiquity to dye skin, hair, and fingernails, as खूब as fabrics including Silk, wool और चमड़े.
Additionally, the name is misused for अन्य skin और बाल dyes, such as black henna or न्यूट्रल हिना, which are not derived इससे the संयंत्र.
A thin film is a परत of material ranging from fractions of a nanometer ( monolayer ) to several micrometers in thickness.
Electronic सेमीकंडक्टर devices and optical coatings हैं the main applications benefiting from thin-film construction.
a familiar अनुप्रयोग of पतला films is the household दर्पण, which typically has a पतला metal कोटिंग on the वापस of a sheet of glass to रूप a परावर्तक interface.
the प्रक्रम of silvering थी एकबार commonly प्रयुक्त to produce mirrors.
A very-thin-film कोटिंग ( less than a nanometer thick ) is used to उपज two-way mirrors.
the performance of ऑप्टिकल coatings ( e.g. antireflective, or ar, coatings ) हैं typically उन्नत when the thin-film coating consists of multiple परतों having varying thicknesses और refractive indices.
Similarly, a periodic ढांचा of प्रत्यावर्ती पतला films of अलग materials may collectively form a so-called superlattice which exploits the phenomenon of quantum कारावास by restricting इलेक्ट्रॉनिक phenomena to two-dimensions.
Work is being किया साथ ferromagnetic and ferroelectric thin films for उपयोग as कंप्यूटर मेमोरी.
It is also होने लागू to दवाएँ, via thin-film drug delivery.
Thin-films हैं प्रयुक्त to produce thin-film batteries.
Thin films हैं भी used in dye-sensitized सौर cells.
सिरेमिक पतला films are in wide use.
the अपेक्षाकृत high कठोरता और inertness of सिरेमिक सामग्री make this type of पतला coating of interest for सुरक्षा of substrate सामग्री विरूद्ध corrosion, ऑक्सीकरण and wear.
In particular, the उपयोग of such coatings on कटिंग tools can extend the life of these items by several orders of परिमाण.
Research is होने किया on a नई class of thin-film inorganic oxide materials, पुकारा amorphous heavy-metal cation multicomponent आक्साइड, which could be used to मेक पारदर्शी transistors कि हैं inexpensive, stable, and environmentally benign.
गियर्स of युद्ध is a military विज्ञान fiction third-person shooter वीडियो खेल विकसित by Epic Games and published by microsoft खेल Studios.
It थी initially released as an exclusive शीर्षक लिये the Xbox 360 in नवम्बर 2005 in North अमेरिका, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, और most of यूरोपीय और included a `` सीमित कलेक्टर 's संस्करण '' साथ added सामग्री and an आर्ट किताब titled Destroyed सौंदर्य that विस्तृत much of the game 's back-story.
despite the initial statements of Xbox 360 exclusivity, a microsoft खिड़कियाँ संस्करण of the खेल was developed in संयोजन साथ People can मक्खी और released a year later, featuring new सामग्री including additional अभियान स्तर, a new एकाधिक खेल mode, और Games for Windows सजीव functionality.
the game focuses on the सैनिकों of डेल्टा Squad as they wield a desperate, last-ditch attempt to सहेजें the remaining इंसान निवासियों of the fictional ग्रह sera from a अथक और seemingly अजेय subterranean दुश्मन known as the Locust Horde.
the player assumes the role of मार्कस fenix ( लकिन can भी खेल as डोमिनिक सैंटियागो ), a पूर्व कैदी and war-hardened soldier.
The game is आधारित on the उपयोग of cover and रणनीतिक fire for the player to advance through the scenarios ; a दूसरी खिलाड़ी can खेल cooperatively through the प्रमुख अभियान to assist.
the खेल भी features अनेक online एकाधिक game modes लिये up to आठ players.
Gears of युद्ध sold over तीन लाख copies in बस ten सप्ताह and थी the fastest-selling वीडियो खेल of 2005 as खूब as the second-most played खेल over Xbox सजीव दौरान.
It फिलहाल stands as the 5th best selling एक्सबॉक्स 360 game of all time.
The game रै चूंकि sold over five लाख नक़ल by September 2008.
the खेल थी खूब received by critics, who praised इसके gameplay और detailed visuals, and it जीती several `` खेल of the साल '' पुरस्कार in 2006.
The success of the खेल रै led to the development of the गियर्स of War franchise, सहित the 2008 sequel गियर्स of युद्ध 2 and its follow-up, गियर्स of युद्ध 3, जिससे थी released on September 20, 2011, बाद having initially been set to have been released on अप्रैल 5, 2011, the तिथि upon जिससे एपिक Games ' चट्टान Bleszinski थी a अतिथि on लेट Night साथ Jimmy fallon.

संसार map with the intertropical मण्डल highlighted in red.
तीव्र जलवायु zones of the धरती जहाँ सब बारह months have औसत temperatures above 18 °C ( 64 °f ).
the tropics is a region of the Earth surrounding the Equator.
it is limited in latitude by the Tropic of कर्कट in the northern गोलार्ध at लगभग n और the tropic of Capricorn in the southern hemisphere at S ; ये latitudes correspond to the axial tilt of the धरती.
The tropics are also referred to as the tropical मण्डल और the torrid मण्डल ( see geographical zone ).
The tropics शामिल all the areas on the धरती where the Sun reaches a पाइंट directly overhead at least एकबार during the सौर year.
The ऊष्णकटिबन्ध हैं विशिष्ट इससे the other climatic and biomatic regions of धरती, the middle latitudes और the ध्रुवीय regions on either पक्ष of the भूमध्यरेखीय zone.

`` What You Need '' is an एपीसोड of the अमरीकी television anthology series the गोधूलि मण्डल.
it is based on the छोटी स्टोरी of the वही नाम by लुईस Padgett ( Henry kuttner और C. L. Moore ).
PlayhouseSquare, in the क्लीवलैंड थिएटर ज़िला in शहर क्लीवलैंड, Ohio, is the second-largest थिएटर जटिल in the संयुक्त States, second only to नई York City 's Lincoln Center ).

Their renovation and reopening helped usher in a new era of downtown revitalization in Cleveland, and थी called `` one of the top टेन successes in Cleveland history. ''

an एयरबैग is a vehicle safety यंत्र.
it is an occupant restraint प्रणाली consisting of a लचीली fabric envelope or cushion designed to inflate rapidly during an ऑटोमोबाइल टक्कर.
इसके purpose is to cushion occupants दौरान a crash and provide सुरक्षा to उनके bodies जब they स्ट्राइक आंतरिक वस्तुएँ such as the steering wheel or a window.
Modern वाहनों may contain multiple airbag मौड्यूल in various पक्ष और frontal स्थितियाँ of the passenger seating स्थितियाँ, and सेंसर may तैनात one or more airbags in an impact मण्डल at परिवर्तनीय rates based on the प्रकार, angle और severity of प्रभाव ; the एयरबैग is designed to तभी inflate in मॉडरेट to severe frontal crashes.
Airbags हैं normally designed साथ the इरादे of supplementing the protection of an occupant जो is correctly restrained साथ a seatbelt.
सबसे designs हैं inflated through pyrotechnic अर्थात् and can तभी be संचालित एकबार.
Newer side-impact airbag मौड्यूल consist of संपीडित एयर cylinders कि हैं triggered in the इवेंट of a side impact गाडी impact.
the first commercial designs were introduced in यात्री automobiles during the 1970s with limited कामयाबी.
Broad commercial adoption of airbags occurred in अनेक markets दौरान the late 1980s और early 1990s साथ a driver एयरबैग, and a front यात्री एयरबैग as well on some cars ; and many आधुनिक vehicles now include चार or more units.
irs tax forms are प्रयुक्त लिये करदाताओं और tax-exempt संगठन to report financial information to the आतंरिक आय सेवा ( irs ) of the संयुक्त राज्य.
They are प्रयुक्त to report income, गणना taxes to be सशुल्क to the federal सरकारी of the संयुक्त States, and disclose other सूचना as जरूरी by the आतंरिक आय Code ( IRC ).
There are over 800 various फ़ॉर्म and schedules.
The best-known of ये is Form 1040 used by individuals.
In the संयुक्त राज्य, ड्राइवर 's पंक्तियां are issued by each individual state ( including Washington, d.C. and territories ), बल्कि than the संघीय सरकारी क्युकी of the राजनैतिक concept of संघवाद.
ड्राइवर हैं normally जरूरी to obtain a license इससे their राज्य of निवास and all राज्य recognize प्रत्येक अन्य 's licenses लिये temporary visitors subject to normal age requirements.
a state may also बर्खास्तगी an individual 's ड्राइविंग privilege भीतर its सीमायें for ट्रैफ़िक violations.
Many राज्य share a आम प्रणाली of license classes, with कुछ अपवाद, and commercial अनुज्ञा classes हैं standardized by संघीय regulation at 49 CFR part 383.
चीन रै been the source of अनेक inventions, सहित the चार Great आविष्कारों : papermaking, the कम्पास, gunpowder, और मुद्रण ( दोनो woodblock और movable प्रकार ).
The सूची below contains ये and अन्य आविष्कारों.
the Chinese invented technologies involving mechanics, hydraulics, और mathematics applied to horology, metallurgy, खगोलशास्त्र, agriculture, engineering, म्यूज़िक सिद्धान्त, craftsmanship, nautics, and warfare.
By the युद्धरत राज्य काल ( 403–221 bc ), वे था advanced metallurgic technology, सहित the blast furnace और cupola भट्टी, while the finery forge और puddling process यहूद ज्ञात by the Han Dynasty ( 202 BC – AD 220 ).
a sophisticated economic system in China दिया जनम to inventions ऐसे as paper धन during the सोंग Dynasty ( 960–1279 ).
the आविष्कार of gunpowder by the 10th century led to an array of inventions ऐसे as the आग तलवार, जमीन mine, नवल mine, hand तोपों, exploding गोलों, multistage rocket, and प्रक्षेपास्त्र bombs with aerodynamic wings और explosive payloads.
With the navigational aid of the 11th-century compass and क्षमता to steer at high समुद्र with the 1st-century sternpost अरित्र, premodern चाइनीज sailors sailed as दूर as East Africa और मिश्र.
In water-powered clockworks, the premodern Chinese था used the escapement mechanism since the 8th सदी and the endless power-transmitting कड़ी drive in the 11th सदी.
वे also made विशाल mechanical कठपुतली theaters चलित by waterwheels and carriage पहियों और wine-serving automatons चलित by paddle व्हील boats.
the contemporaneous Peiligang and Pengtoushan संस्कृतियों represent the oldest Neolithic cultures of China and यहूद formed around 7000 bc.
Some of the first inventions of Neolithic, प्रागैतिहासिक चीन include semilunar and आयताकार स्टोन knives, स्टोन hoes and spades, the cultivation of बाजरा, राइस and the सोयाबीन, the refinement of sericulture, the building of rammed धरती structures with lime -plastered हाउस floors, the सृष्टि of the कुम्हार 's wheel, the सृष्टि of pottery with cord-mat-basket डिजाइन, the सृष्टि of pottery tripods and pottery steamers, and the विकास of ceremonial vessels और scapulimancy for purposes of भविष्यवाणी.
Francesca ब्रे argues कि the domestication of the ox and भैंस during the Longshan culture ( c. 3000–c. 2000 bc ) period, the absence of longshan-era सिंचाई or high-yield crops, पूरा प्रमाण of longshan cultivation of dry-land खाद्यान्न फसलों जिससे दिया ऊँची yields `` only when the soil was carefully cultivated, '' suggest कि the plow was known at least by the longshan culture काल and explains the high agricultural उत्पादन yields जिससे अनुमत the rise of चाइनीज civilization during the शांग Dynasty ( c. 1600–c. 1050 bc ).
With बाद आविष्कारों such as the multiple-tube बीज drill and भारी moldboard iron हल, China 's agricultural आउटपुट could sustain a much larger population.
For the उद्देश्य of this list, inventions are regarded as technological firsts developed in चीन, और as ऐसे करता नहीं शामिल foreign technologies which the चाइनीज acquired through सम्पर्क, ऐसे as the पवनचक्की from the मध्य ईस्ट or the दूरदर्शी from Early modern यूरोपीय.
it भी does नहीं शामिल technologies विकसित elsewhere and later invented separately by the Chinese, ऐसे as the odometer and कड़ी pump.
वैज्ञानिक, mathematic or natural discoveries, changes in minor अवधारणाओं of design or स्टाइल and artistic नवप्रवर्तनों can नहीं be regarded as inventions और do नहीं appear on the list.
Gross घरेलू product in 2011 us डॉलर प्रति capita, समायोजित लिये महंगाई and खरीदना शक्ति पैरिटी ( log स्केल ) from 1860 to 2011, with जनसांख्यिकी ( disk क्षेत्रफल ) लिये the US ( yellow ), UK ( orange ), जापानी ( रेड ), China ( red ), और इण्डिया ( ब्लू ).
वैश्वीकरण ( or globalisation—see spelling मतभेद ) is the प्रक्रम of international integration arising इससे the interchange of संसार views, उत्पाद, ideas, and अन्य aspects of संस्कृति.
Put in सरल terms, वैश्वीकरण refers to प्रक्रियाओं that promote world-wide exchanges of नेशनल and सांस्कृतिक resources.
Advances in transportation and telecommunications infrastructure, सहित the rise of the Internet, हैं major factors in वैश्वीकरण, generating further interdependence of आर्थिक and सांस्कृतिक activities.
हालांकि अनेक विद्वानों प्लेस the origins of globalization in आधुनिक times, others ट्रेस its history long पहले the European आयु of डिस्कवरी and voyages to the New संसार.
कुछ even trace the origins to the third millennium BCE.
चूंकि the beginning of the 20th सदी, the pace of globalization has intensified at a rapid rate, especially during the Post Cold War era.
The पद globalization रै been in increasing उपयोग चूंकि the mid-1980s and विशेषकर चूंकि the mid-1990s.
in 2000, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मौद्रिक निधि ( imf ) पहचाना चार basic aspects of वैश्वीकरण : व्यापार and transactions, पूंजी और निवेश movements, माइग्रेशन and movement of people और the dissemination of knowledge.
Further, environmental challenges such as climate change, cross-boundary जल and air pollution, and over-fishing of the समंदर are linked साथ globalization.
Globalizing प्रक्रियाओं affect और are affected by business और कार्य organization, अर्थशास्त्र, socio-cultural resources, और the प्राकृतिक environment.

It stars Keanu Reeves, जीन hackman, और Brooke langton.
