( as of December 2012 )
the list includes the नगर, देश, the कोड of the International Air हस्तांतरण Association ( iata विमानक्षेत्र कोड ) और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय सिविल Aviation Organization ( icao airport code ), and the airport 's नाम, with the airline 's hubs, focus शहरों और मौसमी गंतव्यों marked.
The सूची भी contains गंतव्यों no longer served by the एयरलाइन, which हैं marked as terminated destinations.
it करता not include गंतव्यों served लिये अमरीकी Airlines by इसके regional affiliates American त्रिभुज Airlines, कार्यपालिका Airlines, and americanconnection.
`` day-o ( the Banana Boat सोंग ) '' is a traditional jamaican mento folk song, the best-known version of which थी सुंग by Harry Belafonte और an वैकल्पिक संस्करण interspersed साथ another jamaican folksong, Hill and गुल्ली सवार, by dame शर्ली bassey.
Despite the सोंग 's mento प्रभाव, `` Day-O ( the Banana Boat सोंग ) '' is widely ज्ञात as an उदाहरण of calypso म्यूज़िक.
it is a work सोंग, इससे the point of view of डॉक workers working the रात्रि शिफ़्ट loading केले onto ships.
Daylight has come, the shift is over and वे want उनके कार्य to be counted up so that they can go home.
World War i ( WWI ) was a वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in Europe कि began on 28 July 1914 and lasted जबतक 11 नवम्बर 1918.
it थी predominantly पुकारा the संसार युद्ध or the Great War इससे its occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार War ii in 1939, और the First World War or संसार युद्ध I thereafter.
it involved सब the संसार 's ग्रेट powers, which यहूद assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल Entente of the United किंगडम, France और Russia ) and the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary and इटली ; but, as austria–hungary had लिया the अप्रिय विरूद्ध the agreement, Italy किया not enter into the युद्ध ).
ये alliances यहूद दोनो reorganised और expanded as अधिक राष्ट्र डाला the युद्ध : Italy, जापानी और the संयुक्त States joined the Allies, and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the सेंट्रल शक्तियां.
Ultimately, more than 70 लाख military personnel, सहित 60 million Europeans, were mobilised in एक of the largest युद्धों in history.
अधिक than 9 million combatants were मारे, largely because of technological advancements कि led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without सम्बन्धित सुधार in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world इतिहास, subsequently paving the way for various political changes, such as revolutions in many of the राष्ट्र शामिल.
एक of the long-term causes of the युद्ध was the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी नीतियों of the ग्रेट powers of यूरोपीय.
अधिक तत्काल, the assassination of archduke Franz फर्डिनेंड of Austria, the heir to the throne of austria-hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist gavrilo princip in Sarajevo triggered a राजनयिक संकट जब Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the किंगडम of सर्बिया.
Several alliances formed over the पिछला decades were invoked.
भीतर सप्ताह, the प्रमुख powers were at war और, via their colonies, the conflict जल्द spread around the world.
on 28 जुलाई, the Austro-Hungarians fired the पहला गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as preparation for the invasion of सर्बिया.
While the russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral बेल्जियम and ध्वज on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli for ब्रिटेन 's declaration of war against जर्मनी.
बाद the जर्मनी कूच on Paris थी brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the पश्चिमी सामने settled into a स्थिर बैटल of attrition with a trench line कि changed छोटी until 1917.
on the पूर्वी Front, the Russian फौज थी successful against the Austro-Hungarians, but थी रोका in its invasion of ईस्ट prussia by the Germans.
in नवम्बर the Ottoman Empire joined the war, opening up fronts in the Caucasus, मेसोपोटामिया and the Sinai.
Italy और बुल्गारिया went to युद्ध in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
in Russia, the त्सार 's सरकारी collapsed in कूच 1917 and a subsequent क्रान्ति in November brought the russians to terms साथ the Central शक्तियां.
After a 1918 German अप्रिय along the western front, the allies drove back the Germans in a श्रेणी of कामयाब offensives और American forces began प्रवेश the trenches.
जर्मनी, which had its अपना ट्रबल साथ revolutionaries, सहमत to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
the युद्ध ended in victory लिये the allies.
Events on the घर fronts यहूद as tumultuous as on the बैटल fronts, as the भागीदार tried to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और आर्थिक resources to fight a कुल युद्ध.
By the समाप्त of the युद्ध, four major imperial powers—the जर्मनी, Russian, austro-hungarian and उस्मानी empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the former two lost a ग्रेट amount of territory, जबकि the latter दो यहूद dismantled entirely.
The मैप of central यूरोपीय was redrawn into several छोटी राज्य.
the League of Nations was formed in the आशा of preventing another such विरोध.
The यूरोपीय राष्ट्रवाद spawned by the युद्ध और the ब्रेकअप of empires, the repercussions of जर्मनी 's defeat और problems with the Treaty of versailles are सहमत to be factors contributing to World युद्ध II.
नर्स Jackie is an American series that premiered on June 8, 2009, on showtime, फिल्म सेंट्रल और the Movie संजाल.
The series stars Edie Falco as the शीर्षक अक्षर जैकी Peyton, an आपात department nurse at सब Saints ' Hospital in नई यॉर्क City.
लिये जैकी, `` प्रत्येक दिन is a ऊँची तार act of juggling मरीजों, doctors, fellow nurses and उसके own indiscretions. ''
keeping up with the Kardashians ( प्रायः referred to simply as The kardashians ) is an अमरीकी reality television series that premiered on October 14, 2007, on e !.
It फ़ॉलो the जीवनदान of the Kardashian/Jenner family, including sisters Kourtney, Kim, and Khloé कार्दशियन.
The श्रेणी ' success has led to the spin-offs Kourtney and Kim लो New यॉर्क, khloé & लैमर, कोर्टनी और Khloé लो Miami, and कोर्टनी and Kim Take Miami.
Afghanistan ( ; ; ), officially the इस्लामी गणतंत्र of Afghanistan, is a landlocked sovereign state forming part of दक्षिण Asia, सेंट्रल एशिया, और to some extent पश्चिमी एशिया.
It रै a population of around 30 million inhabiting an क्षेत्रफल of approximately, बनाना it the 42nd most populous और 41st largest स्वदेश in the संसार.
it is bordered by पाकिस्तानी in the south और the ईस्ट, Iran in the वेस्ट, तुर्कमेनिस्तान, Uzbekistan and ताजिकिस्तान in the north, and चीन in the दूर northeast.
Afghanistan रै महरूम an ancient फोकल point of the रेशा सड़क और human migration.
Archaeologists have मिला evidence of इंसान habitation इससे as far back as the Middle paleolithic.
शहरी सभ्यता may have begun in the area as early as 3,000 to 2,000 BCE.
बैठे at an महत्वपूर्ण geostrategic location that connects the Middle ईस्ट culture with सेंट्रल Asia और the Indian उपमहाद्वीप, the जमीन has been घर to विभिन्न peoples through the ages और witnessed अनेक सैन्य अभियान, notably by Alexander the ग्रेट, Genghis Khan, and in modern era Western शक्तियां.
The जमीन also served as a सोर्स from which the greco-bactrians, kushans, Hephthalites, Saffarids, ghaznavids, ghorids, khiljis, timurids, मुगलों, durranis, and अन्य have risen to form major empires.
The राजनैतिक history of the modern state of Afghanistan begins in 1709, when the Hotaki dynasty थी स्थापित in कांधार followed by अहमद शाह दुर्रानी 's वृद्धि to शक्ति in 1747.
In the late 19th सदी, Afghanistan became a बफ़र राज्य in the `` ग्रेट खेल `` between the अंग्रेजों और Russian empires.
following the 1919 anglo-afghan युद्ध, किंग Amanullah began a European style modernization of the country but was रोका by the ultra-conservatives.
During the ठंडा War, बाद the वापसी of the British इससे neighboring India in 1947, the United राज्य and the Soviet Union began spreading influences in अफगानिस्तान, जिससे led to a खूनी युद्ध between the US-backed mujahideen forces और the soviet-backed अफगान government in which over a लाख Afghans खोया उनके जीवनदान.
This was followed by the 1990s civil युद्ध, the वृद्धि and fall of the extremist तालिबान government और the 2001–present युद्ध.
In December 2001, the संयुक्त Nations Security Council authorized the सृष्टि of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय सुरक्षा सहायता फ़ोर्स ( ISAF ) to help maintain security in अफगानिस्तान और assist the Karzai प्रशासन.
तीन दशकों of युद्ध बना अफगानिस्तान one of the world 's most खतरनाक countries, including the largest producer of refugees और asylum seekers.
While the international community is rebuilding war-torn Afghanistan, आतंकवादी समूह ऐसे as the हक्कानी संजाल और hezbi Islami are actively शामिल in a nationwide तालिबान -led insurgency, which शामिल hundreds of assassinations and आत्महत्या हमले.
according to the संयुक्त Nations, the insurgents यहूद responsible for 80 % of civilian हताहत in 2011 और 2012.
the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध ( acw ), भी known as the युद्ध between the राज्य or simply the Civil युद्ध ( see नामकरण ), was a civil युद्ध लड़ा from 1861 to 1865 between the United राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और several Southern स्लेव राज्य कि declared उनके secession और formed the Confederate राज्य of अमेरिका ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` दक्षिण '' ).
The war had इसके origin in the issue of गुलामी, especially the एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the western territories.
Foreign शक्तियां किया not intervene.
बाद four सालो of bloody कॉम्बैट that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना, the Confederacy collapsed, गुलामी थी abolished, और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल एकता and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, republicans, led by अब्राहम Lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United राज्य ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before उसके inauguration on March 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave states formed the confederacy.
outgoing लोकतांत्रिक President जेम्स बुकानन and the incoming republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address घोषित उसके administration होता not initiate civil war.
Eight बाकी स्लेव states continued to अस्वीकृत calls for secession.
confederate forces seized numerous संघीय forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy.
a Peace Conference विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह, और both पहलू prepared for war.
the Confederates assumed कि यूरोपीय देशों यहूद so dependent on `` King कपास `` कि they होता intervene ; none किया and none recognized the new confederate States of अमेरिका.
hostilities began on अप्रैल 12, 1861, when Confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट Sumter, a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by संघ सैनिकों in South Carolina.
Lincoln पुकारा for each राज्य to provide troops to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन, चार more slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing उनके total to eleven.
The संघ जल्द controlled the border states और established a naval blockade that अबोध the southern अर्थव्यवस्था.
The पूर्वी Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
the autumn 1862 confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ state ) ended with confederate रिट्रीट at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading अंग्रेजों हस्तक्षेप.
lincoln issued the emancipation उदघोषणा, which बना ending slavery a युद्ध लक्ष्य.
To the वेस्ट, by summer 1862 the संघ destroyed the confederate नदी नेवी, तब much of their पश्चिमी सेना, and the संघ at Vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in two at the मिसिसिपी River.
In 1863, रॉबर्ट E. Lee 's Confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the बैटल of gettysburg.
पश्चिमी सफलताओं led to Ulysses S. Grant command of सब Union सेना in 1864.
In the Western थिएटर, विलियम T. Sherman drove east to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the समुद्र, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the रास्ता.
The Union marshaled the संसाधन और जनशक्ति to attack the Confederacy from सब directions, and could afford to लड़ो battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the confederate capital.
the defending Confederate army विफल, अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox Court House on अप्रैल 9, 1865.
the American Civil War was one of the earliest सच्चा industrial wars.
Railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, and mass-produced हथियार यहूद employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, खानों, shipyards, banks, transportation and खाना supplies सब foreshadowed संसार युद्ध i.
it remains the deadliest युद्ध in American history, resulting in the मौतों of an estimated 750,000 सैनिको and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
इतिहासकार John huddleston estimates the death टोल at ten प्रतिशत of सब Northern males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा, and 30 प्रतिशत of all दक्षिणी श्वेत males aged 18–40.
लागत of goods sold ( cogs ) refer to the inventory लागत of those goods a कारोबार रै sold during a particular काल.
Costs हैं associated साथ particular goods using एक of several formulas, including विशिष्ट पहचान, first-in first-out ( fifo ), or average cost.
Costs include सब costs of खरीदें, costs of conversion और other costs incurred in bringing the inventories to उनके उपस्थित स्थान और कंडीशन.
Costs of goods made by the कारोबार शामिल सामग्री, मजदूर, and allocated overhead.
The costs of those goods not yet sold are deferred as लागत of inventory until the inventory is बेची or लिखा bas in मान.

A confectionery स्टोर ( अधिक commonly referred to as a sweet shop in the United किंगडम, a candy स्टोर in the North America, or a lolly दूकान in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ) sells confectionery और is प्रायः targeted to children.
सबसे confectionery stores हैं filled साथ an assortment of मिठाई दूर larger than a पंसारी or convenience स्टोर could accommodate.
They प्रायः offer a selection of old fashioned treats, और मिठाई from different देशों.
बहुत प्रायः अपरिवर्तित in layout चूंकि उनके inception, confectioneries are ज्ञात लिये their वार्मिंग and उदासीन feel.
The village of pateley सेतु claims to have the oldest confectionery store in इंग्लैण्ड.
The oldest मीठी दूकान in इंग्लैण्ड, in the गाँव of pateley सेतु
Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa, cay : Gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a राज्य स्तिथ in West दक्षिण Central United States.
ओक्लाहोमा is the 20th सबसे extensive and the 28th most populous of the 50 संयुक्त States.
the state 's नाम is derived इससे the choctaw शब्द okla and humma, अर्थ `` रेड लोगों '', और it is known informally by इसके nickname, the sooner State.
Formed by the संयोजन of ओक्लाहोमा territory और भारतीय Territory on November 16, 1907, ओक्लाहोमा थी the 46th state to enter the संघ.
Its निवासियों are known as oklahomans or, informally `` Okies '', और its पूंजी and largest city is ओक्लाहोमा नगर.
a प्रमुख निर्माता of natural गैस, oil, और कृषि, Oklahoma relies on an आर्थिक आधार of विमानन, energy, दूरसंचार, और जैवप्रौद्योगिकी.
It has one of the fastest growing economies in the स्वदेश, ranking among the top states in प्रति capita income growth और सकल घरेलू उत्पाद विकास.
Oklahoma नगर और Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's primary आर्थिक anchors, साथ nearly दो thirds of oklahomans जीना भीतर उनके महानगर statistical areas.
With small mountain ranges, prairie, mesas, और पूर्वी forests, सबसे of Oklahoma lies in the Great मैदान और the u.s. आंतरिक हाइलैंड्स —a प्रदेश especially prone to कठोर weather.
In जोड to having a व्यापकता of English, German, Scottish, Irish and Native अमरीकी ancestry, अधिक than 25 देशी अमरीकी भाषाएं are spoken in Oklahoma, दूसरी only to California.
ओक्लाहोमा is located on a संगम of तीन प्रमुख American cultural regions और historically served as a route लिये cattle ड्राइव, a destination लिये दक्षिणी settlers, and a government-sanctioned territory लिये देशी Americans.
stacked और खड़ा car tires
a टायर ( or टायर ) is a ring-shaped covering कि fits around a व्हील 's रिम to protect it and enable better गाडी performance.
सबसे tires, such as those for automobiles and साइकिल, provide कर्षण between the गाडी और the road while providing a लचीली cushion that absorbs shock.
The सामग्री of आधुनिक pneumatic टायर are synthetic रबर, प्राकृतिक rubber, कपड़ा और wire, along साथ कार्बन ब्लैक और अन्य रासायनिक यौगिकों.
वे consist of a tread और a body.
The tread provides कर्षण जबकि the देह provides containment लिये a मात्रा of संपीडित एयर.
पहले रबर थी developed, the पहला संस्करण of टायर यहूद बस bands of मेटल that fitted around लकड़ी wheels to prevent पहनें and tear.
Early रबर tires यहूद solid ( not pneumatic ).
आज, the बहुमत of टायर हैं pneumatic inflatable structures, comprising a doughnut-shaped body of cords and wires encased in रबर और generally filled with compressed air to रूप an inflatable cushion.
Pneumatic tires are used on many types of vehicles, सहित cars, bicycles, मोटरसाइकिल, trucks, earthmovers, and aircraft.
मेटल टायर हैं स्टिल प्रयुक्त on इंजनों and railcars, और ठोस rubber ( or other पॉलिमर ) tires are still used in विभिन्न non-automotive applications, such as कुछ casters, कार्ट, lawnmowers, and wheelbarrows.
dr. जोसेफ Warren ( June 11, 1741 – June 17, 1775 ) was an American डॉक्टर who played a leading भूमिका in American Patriot organizations in Boston in जल्दी दिनों of the अमरीकी Revolution, eventually सेवारत as president of the क्रांतिकारी मैसाचुसेट्स प्रांतीय कॉंग्रेस.
Warren आयोजिक Paul Revere and William dawes on अप्रैल 18, 1775, to छोड़ बोस्टन and spread the सचेतक that the अंग्रेजों garrison in Boston थी सेटिंग आउट to raid the कस्बा of concord और गिरफ़्तार विद्रोही नेताओ जॉन hancock and सैमुएल Adams.
Warren participated in the अगला day 's लड़ाइयों of lexington and concord, which are commonly considered to be the opening engagements of the American क्रांतिकारी War.
Warren था महरूम commissioned a प्रमुख सामान्य in the उपनिवेश 's मिलिशिया shortly पहले the June 17, 1775 बैटल of बंकर Hill.
Rather than exercising उसके रैंक, Warren परोसा in the बैटल as a निजी soldier, and was killed in combat when अंग्रेजों सैनिकों stormed the redoubt atop Breed 's हिल.
उसके death, immortalized in जॉन trumbull 's painting, The Death of सामान्य वारेन at the बैटल of बंकर 's हिल, जून 17, 1775, जस्ती the विद्रोही शक्तियां, and he रै महरूम स्मरणीय in many प्लेस names in the United राज्य.
stm चित्र of self-assembled supramolecular जंजीरों of the organic semiconductor Quinacridone on ग्रेफाइट.
an सशुल्क सेमीकंडक्टर is an organic सामग्री with semiconductor गुण, कि is, साथ an विद्युत conductivity between that of insulators और कि of metals.
Single अणुओं, छोटी कड़ी ( oligomers ) और organic polymers can be semiconductive.
Semiconducting small molecules ( aromatic hydrocarbons ) include the polycyclic aromatic compounds pentacene, anthracene, and rubrene.
polymeric सशुल्क semiconductors शामिल बहु ( 3-hexylthiophene ), बहु ( p-phenylene vinylene ), as खूब as polyacetylene and its derivatives.
There are दो major अतिव्यापी वर्ग of सशुल्क semiconductors.
These हैं organic charge-transfer complexes and विभिन्न linear-backbone conductive polymers derived इससे polyacetylene.
रैखिक रीढ़ सशुल्क semiconductors include polyacetylene itself और its डेरिवेटिव polypyrrole, और polyaniline.
at least locally, charge-transfer देवालय often प्रदर्शनी समान conduction mechanisms to अकार्बनिक semiconductors.
ऐसे mechanisms उठता from the presence of छेद and electron conduction layers separated by a बैंड gap.
जबकि ऐसे क्लासिक mechanisms हैं important locally, as साथ अकार्बनिक amorphous semiconductors, tunnelling, स्थानीयकृत states, गतिशीलता gaps, और phonon -assisted hopping also significantly contribute to conduction, particularly in polyacetylenes.
Like अकार्बनिक semiconductors, organic semiconductors can be doped.
Organic semiconductors susceptible to doping ऐसे as polyaniline ( Ormecon ) और are also ज्ञात as सशुल्क metals.
Typical वर्तमान carriers in सशुल्क semiconductors हैं छेद और electrons in π-bonds.
लगभग सब सशुल्क solids are insulators.
लकिन जब their constituent अणुओं have π-conjugate systems, electrons can move via π-electron cloud overlaps, especially by hopping, tunnelling और सम्बन्धित mechanisms.
Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons and phthalocyanine salt crystals हैं उदाहरण of इस प्रकार of सशुल्क semiconductor.
मुख्यतः due to कम गतिशीलता, भी unpaired electrons may be stable in charge-transfer complexes.
Such unpaired electrons can function as वर्तमान carriers.
This प्रकार of सेमीकंडक्टर is भी प्राप्त by pairing an electron दाता अणु with an electron acceptor अणु.
मादा स्खलन is the expulsion of fluid by इंसान females from the paraurethral ducts through and around the female urethra दौरान or before an orgasm.
it is भी ज्ञात colloquially as gushing or squirting, हालांकि these हैं considered to be different phenomena in कुछ शोध publications.
The सटीक सोर्स और प्रकृति of the fluid continue to be a topic of debate among medical पेशेवर, which is भी सम्बन्धित to संदेह over the existence of the G-Spot.
The FIFA Women 's World Cup is an international संघ football competition contested by the वरिष्ठ महिलाओं 's national टीमों of the सदस्यों of fédération internationale de फ़ुटबॉल Association ( फीफा ), the sport 's global शासी body.
The चैंपियनशिप has महरूम awarded प्रत्येक चार सालो चूंकि the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1991.
जापानी won the 2011 tournament in a दंड shootout.
the वर्तमान स्वरूप of the टूर्नामेंट involves 16 टीमों स्पर्धा लिये the शीर्षक at venues within the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a काल of परिचय तीन सप्ताह ; – इस phase is often पुकारा the World Cup फाइनल.
a qualification phase, which फिलहाल takes place over the preceding तीन years, is प्रयुक्त to determine which teams qualify लिये the tournament together with the मेजबान nation ( s ).
the फीफा महिलाओं 's संसार Cup is पहचाना as the most महत्वपूर्ण International competition in women 's फ़ुटबॉल and is निभाई amongst women 's national फ़ुटबॉल टीमों of the member states of FIFA, the खेल 's वैश्विक governing body.
the first महिलाओं 's World Cup tournament, नामित the Women 's संसार चैंपियनशिप, थी आयोजित in 1991, sixty-one सालो after the men 's पहला FIFA संसार Cup tournament in 1930.
the six संसार कप tournaments have been won by four different national टीमों.
The next World कप होगा be hosted by Canada in 2015.
scorpions is a यंग वयस्क अनोखा written by वाल्टर डीन Myers, first प्रकाशित in the United राज्य by हार्पर & पंक्ति on June 20, 1988.
सामने page of a 17th century यहूदी Bible by जोसेफ athias, now at Beth Hatefutsoth, इसराईल
'Son of man ' is the translation of विभिन्न Hebrew and यूनानी phrases used in both the यहूदी बाइबल and the New Testament.
it रै विविध meanings, ranging इससे a normal human होने to a prophesied अनन्त, दैवी ruler.
The Hebrew अभिव्यक्ति `` son of man '' ( בן–אדם i.e. ben-'adam ) appears one सौ and सात टाइम्स in the यहूदी बाइबल.
इस is the most आम Hebrew construction लिये the एकवचन लकिन is used mostly in Ezekiel ( 93 टाइम्स ) और 14 times elsewhere.
In thirty दो मामले the phrase appears in इंटरमीडिएट बहुवचन रूप `` बेटे of मेन '', i.e. human beings.
As generally interpreted by Jews, it denotes humankind generally.
In the koine यूनानी of the नई वसीयत, `` the son of man '' is invariably प्रयुक्त as `` ὁ υἱὸς τοὺ ἀνθρώπου '' with a definite आलेख.
The use of the definite article in `` the बेटे of man '' in the ईसाई gospels is अनोखा, और before its use वहीँ, no records of its use in any of the surviving Greek documents of प्राचीनता exist.
geza Vermes has stated that `` the बेटे of man '' in the Christian gospels is unrelated to यहूदी बाइबल usages.
In Christian usage, नापसंद the Son of परमेश्वर शीर्षक, which रै been an अनिवार्य तत्व of Christian creeds since the अपोस्टोलिक age, the उदघोषणा of `` यीशु as the बेटे of man '' has never महरूम an आलेख of आस्था in christianity.
The निर्वचन of the use of `` the Son of man '' in the नई Testament has remained challenging and after 150 years of बहस no consensus on the समस्या रै emerged among scholars.
निपुण of foxhounds leads the फ़ील्ड from powderham Castle in Devon, इंग्लैण्ड, with the hounds in सामने.
Fox शिकार is an कार्यकलाप involving the ट्रैकिंग, chase, और sometimes killing of a फॉक्स, traditionally a रेड fox, by प्रशिक्षित foxhounds or other सैंट hounds, और a समूह of निहत्थे अनुसरणकर्ता led by a master of foxhounds, जो follow the hounds on foot or on horseback.
Fox शिकार originated in the form practised until recently in the United किंगडम in the 16th सदी, but is practised all over the world, सहित in Australia, Canada, France, आयरलैंड, इटली और the संयुक्त राज्य.
in Australia, the पद भी refers to the शिकार of foxes with firearms समान to spotlighting or deer शिकार.
In much of the संसार शिकार in general is समझा to relate to any game animals or हथियार ( e.g., deer शिकार with धनुष and तीर ) ; in ब्रिटेन and Ireland, `` hunting '' बगैर योग्यता implies fox शिकार ( or अन्य forms of शिकार साथ hounds- beagling, स्टैग शिकार, mink शिकार, खीचें शिकार or शिकार the साफ boot ) as वर्णित यहाँ.
the sport is controversial, विशेषकर in the UK, जहाँ it was बैन in स्कॉटलैंड in 2002, and in England and Wales in November 2004 ( law enforced इससे February 2005 ), though shooting foxes as vermin remained विधिक.
Proponents of fox hunting view it as an important भाग of ग्रामीण culture और उपयोगी लिये reasons of संरक्षण और pest control, जबकि opponents argue कि it is बेदर्द and unnecessary.

It is अभी एक of the सबसे अत्यधिक regulated फ़ॉर्म of विपणन.
कुछ or सब फ़ॉर्म of tobacco विज्ञापन are बैन in अनेक देशों.
Bally Technologies, Inc. is a manufacturer of स्लॉट machines और other gaming technology based in Las वेगास, नेवाडा.
The company थी founded in 1968 as Advanced पेटेंट प्रौद्योगिकी.
It आखिरकार बदला इसके name to Alliance गेमिंग और acquired, in 1996, Bally Gaming International, a पूर्व division of Bally Manufacturing.

gustave doré 's engravings illustrated the दैवी कॉमेडी ( 1861–1868 ) ; यहाँ, Dante is lost in canto 1 of the inferno.
inferno ( इतालवी for `` नरक `` ) is the पहला भाग of दांते Alighieri 's 14th-century epic कविता Divine Comedy.
It is followed by Purgatorio and Paradiso.
it is an allegory telling of the journey of दांते through नरक, guided by the रोमन कवि वर्जिल.
in the कविता, नरक is depicted as nine circles of suffering स्तिथ within the धरती.
Allegorically, the Divine कॉमेडी represents the journey of the आत्मा towards God, साथ the inferno describing the recognition and rejection of sin.
स्मरनॉफ is a ब्रांड of वोदका स्वामित्व और produced by the British company Diageo.
the स्मरनॉफ brand began साथ a vodka distillery संस्थापित in मास्को by pyotr arsenievich Smirnov ( 1831–1898 ).

The Serenity दुआ is the आम नाम for an originally बेनाम prayer by the American theologian Reinhold Niebuhr ( 1892–1971 ).
It has been adopted by Alcoholics Anonymous and अन्य twelve-step programs.

The courage to change the बाते i can,
और अक्ल to जान the अंतर.
the घोषणा and Resolves of the First महाद्वीपीय Congress ( also known as the घोषणा of Colonial अधिकारों, or the घोषणा of अधिकारों ), थी a बयान अपनाया by the First महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस on अक्तूबर 14, 1774, in जवाब to the असहनीय Acts passed by the अंग्रेजों पार्लियामेंट.
the Declaration outlined colonial objections to the Intolerable Acts, listed a colonial विधेयक of अधिकारों, and provided a detailed सूची of grievances.
it was समान to the Declaration of अधिकारों और Grievances, passed by the Stamp अधिनियम कॉंग्रेस a दशक पहले.
The घोषणा concluded with an रूपरेखा of Congress 's plans : to enter into a boycott of अंग्रेजों व्यापार ( the Continental Association ) जबतक उनके grievances were redressed, to प्रकाशित पता to the people of Great Britain and अंग्रेजों America, और to send a याचिका to the किंग.
Pulse दबाव is the दबाव कि is लगा when feeling the pulse.
measured in millimeters of पारा ( mmhg ), the दबाव difference between the systolic और diastolic pressures is the दबाव change to create the पल्स, जिससे is the pulse दबाव.
if resting रक्त दबाव is ( systolic/diastolic ) 120/80 millimeters of पारा ( mmHg ), पल्स pressure is 40.
the Hills is a वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी which originally aired on एमटीवी इससे May 31, 2006 जबतक जुलाई 13, 2010.

in poker, ख़राब beat is a subjective term for a hand in which a खिलाड़ी with what appear to be strong cards nevertheless loses.
it सबसे often occurs where one player bets the clearly stronger hand और their प्रतिद्वन्दी makes a poor कॉल कि eventually `` हिट्स '' और विन्स.
There is no consensus among पोकर खिलाड़ी as to what exactly constitutes a bad ताल और प्रायः खिलाड़ी will असहमत about whether a particular hand was a bad beat.
The goldfish ( carassius auratus auratus ) is a freshwater fish in the family Cyprinidae of अनुक्रम Cypriniformes.
it थी एक of the earliest मछली to be domesticated, and is एक of the most commonly रखा aquarium fish.
A relatively छोटी member of the carp family ( which भी includes the koi carp और the crucian carp ), the goldfish is a domesticated version of a less-colorful carp ( Carassius auratus ) native to east एशिया.
it थी पहला domesticated in China more than a हजार सालो पहले, और अनेक distinct breeds have चूंकि महरूम विकसित.
Goldfish breeds vary greatly in आकार, देह आकार, fin configuration और coloration ( various combinations of श्वेत, पीला, नारंगी, रेड, भूरा, और black हैं known ).
uncooked Rouladen
rouladen ( or rinderroulade, एकवचन : roulade ) is a जर्मनी मांस roulade usually consisting of बेकन, onions, सरसों and pickles लपेटा in thinly sliced बीफ which is तब पकाया.
in some countries, the roulade is also ज्ञात as `` beef ज़ैतून ''.
Beef or वील is प्रयुक्त as मांस हालांकि कुछ खाना विद्वानों tend to believe that the original version थी probably venison or pork, और पोर्क is still popular in कुछ areas.
the बीफ rouladen as we जान उन्हें today have become लोकप्रिय over the last century.
The काटें is प्रायः topside बीफ or silverside since इस is the cheaper cut.
the more महंगी संस्करण would be the गोलाकार स्टीक, also ज्ञात as rump steak.
the मांस is काटें into large, thin slices.
the filling is a mixture of स्मोक्ड और cooked पोर्क पेट, कटा प्याज और chopped अचार ( gurken ) which is at टाइम्स varied by adding minced मांस, सॉसेज मांस, pine nuts और mustard.
The मिश्रण varies इससे region to प्रदेश.
Rouladen हैं traditionally served लिये डिनर.
रेड wine is often परोसा with इस डिश.
Typical eukaryotic cell.
सेल्यूलर श्वसन is the नियत of the metabolic reactions और प्रक्रियाओं कि लो प्लेस in the cells of जीवों to बदलें biochemical उर्जा from nutrients into एडीनोसिन ट्राइफॉस्फेट ( ATP ), और then release बर्बाद उत्पाद.
the प्रतिक्रियाएँ involved in श्वसन are catabolic reactions, जिससे break विशाल molecules into छोटी ones, releasing उर्जा in the process as कमजोर so-called `` high-energy '' bonds are replaced by stronger bonds in the उत्पाद.
श्वसन is एक of the कुंजी ways a कोशिका gains उपयोगी energy to ईंधन cellular कार्यकलाप.
Cellular respiration is considered an ऊष्माक्षेपी रेडॉक्स reaction.
the overall प्रतिक्रिया is टूटा into many smaller ones when it occurs in the body, most of जिससे are रेडॉक्स reactions themselves.
हालांकि technically, सेल्यूलर श्वसन is a combustion reaction, it clearly does नहीं resemble one when it occurs in a जीना cell.
This difference is because it occurs in अनेक पृथक कदम.
जबकि the overall reaction is a combustion प्रतिक्रिया, no single reaction that comprises it is a combustion reaction.
nutrients that हैं commonly प्रयुक्त by animal and संयंत्र cells in respiration include sugar, अमीनो acids और वसीय acids, and a common oxidizing एजेंट ( इलेक्ट्रॉन acceptor ) is आणविक ऑक्सीजन ( O2 ).
The energy stored in ATP ( इसके third phosphate group is weakly bonded to the rest of the अणु और is cheaply broken allowing stronger bonds to form, thereby transferring उर्जा for उपयोग by the cell ) can then be प्रयुक्त to ड्राइव processes requiring energy, including जैवसंश्लेषण, locomotion or transportation of molecules across cell membranes.
Countries by 2011 जीडीपी ( नाममात्र ) according to the CIA संसार Factbook.
इस article शामिल a list of countries in the world sorted by their सकल domestic product ( GDP ), the मार्केट मान of all फाइनल goods और services from a nation in a given year.
The जीडीपी डालर estimates presented यहाँ are calculated at market or सरकारी official exchange rates.
Several economies जिससे हैं not considered to be countries ( संसार, the EU, and कुछ dependent territories ) are included in the सूचियाँ because they appear in the sources.
ये economies हैं not ranked in the charts यहाँ, लकिन are listed जहाँ लागू.
the figures प्रस्तुत here do नहीं लो into account मतभेद in the cost of living in different countries, and the परिणाम can vary greatly इससे एक साल to another आधारित on fluctuations in the exchange rates of the country 's currency.
ऐसे fluctuations may बदलें a country 's ranking इससे एक साल to the next, भी हालांकि they often make छोटी or no अंतर to the standard of living of its population.
Therefore these आंकड़े should be used with सावधानी.
Some countries/regions may have नागरिकों जिससे हैं on औसत धनवान.
ये countries/regions could appear in इस सूची as having a छोटी जीडीपी.
This would be because the country/region सूचीबद्ध has a small population, and इसलिए छोटी कुल अर्थव्यवस्था ; the GDP is गणना as the population टाइम्स the wealth प्रति capita.
Comparisons of नेशनल wealth हैं also अक्सर बना on the आधार of purchasing power पैरिटी ( ppp ), to समायोजन for मतभेद in the लागत of जीना in different देशों.
( देखिए सूची of countries by जीडीपी ( ppp ) )
PPP largely removes the एक्सचेंज rate problem, but has इसके own drawbacks ; it does नहीं reflect the मान of economic आउटपुट in अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार, and it also requires more estimation than nominal GDP.
on the whole, PPP per capita figures are more narrowly spread than नाममात्र GDP per capita आंकड़े.
the पहला सूची शामिल data compiled by the United राष्ट्र आंकडे प्रभाग लिये 2011.
the second list largely शामिल आंकड़ा ( estimate ) compiled by the International मौद्रिक निधि for 2012.
the third list shows the World बैंको 's mostly 2011 estimates, और the fourth सूची includes mostly 2012 estimates इससे the सीआईए संसार Factbook.
Lapping is a machining process, in जिससे two surfaces are rubbed together साथ an अक्खड़ between them, by hand movement or by रास्ता of a यंत्र.
This can take दो फ़ॉर्म.
The first type of lapping ( traditionally पुकारा grinding ), typically involves rubbing a भंगुर सामग्री ऐसे as glass विरूद्ध a सतह ऐसे as iron or glass itself ( भी ज्ञात as the `` lap '' or grinding tool ) with an अक्खड़ ऐसे as एल्यूमिनियम ऑक्साइड, jeweller 's रूज, optician 's रूज, एमरी, silicon carbide, डायमंड, etc., in between them.
इस produces microscopic conchoidal fractures as the अक्खड़ रोल्स परिचय between the दो surfaces और removes material इससे both.
the other form of lapping involves a softer सामग्री ऐसे as pitch or a ceramic for the गोद, which is `` charged '' with the abrasive.
The गोद is तब used to cut a harder material—the workpiece.
the अक्खड़ embeds within the softer material which holds it और permits it to score across और cut the harder सामग्री.
Taken to a महीन सीमा, this will उपज a polished surface ऐसे as with a पॉलिशिंग cloth on an automobile, or a पॉलिशिंग cloth or polishing पिच upon glass or steel.
लिया to the ultimate सीमा, with the सहायता of सटीक interferometry and specialized polishing मशीने or skilled hand पॉलिशिंग, lensmakers can उपज surfaces कि हैं चपटा to बेहतर than 30 nanometers.
This is एक बीसवीं of the wavelength of light इससे the commonly प्रयुक्त 632.8 nm हीलियम नियॉन laser light source.
सतहों this flat can be molecularly bonded ( optically contacted ) by bringing उन्हें साथ अंतर्गत the right शर्तें.
( इस is not the वही as the wringing प्रभाव of Johansson blocks, although it is समान ).

a पिकअप ट्रक or pick-up, प्रायः simply referred to as a पिकअप, is a लाइट motor गाडी साथ an open-top, पश्च कार्गो क्षेत्रफल ( bed ).
In उत्तर अमेरिका, the पद pickup is used लिये लाइट ट्रक with a lighter duty chassis और फैक्टरी निर्मित, एकीकृत bed, as खूब as for coupé यूटिलिटी vehicles, often based on a personal car chassis, लकिन also often on a special समर्पित chassi लिये such उपयोग.
Some देशों have उनके अपना terms similar to pickup, such as ute in Australia and नई Zealand, or bakkie in South Africa.
विशाल पिकअप ट्रक are somewhat विरल in Europe, where vans और लाइट lorries are commonly used for समान roles.
the President of the United राज्य of America ( POTUS ) is the सिर of state and head of government of the United States.
the president लीड the कार्यपालिका branch of the संघीय government और is the commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त राज्य Armed शक्तियां.
आलेख ii of the U.S. Constitution vests the executive शक्ति of the United राज्य in the अध्यक्ष and आरोप him साथ the निष्पादन of federal विधि, alongside the responsibility of appointing federal कार्यपालिका, राजनयिक, नियामक, और न्यायिक अधिकारियों, and concluding treaties with विदेशी powers, साथ the advice and सहमति of the सीनेट.
the president is further empowered to ग्रान्ट federal pardons और reprieves, और to convene and adjourn either or both houses of कॉंग्रेस under extraordinary हालातों.
Since the founding of the United राज्य, the शक्ति of the अध्यक्ष and the संघीय government have grown substantially और each modern अध्यक्ष, despite possessing no औपचारिक legislative शक्तियां परे signing or vetoing congressionally passed बिल्स, is largely responsible लिये dictating the विधान agenda of his पार्टी and the foreign and domestic policy of the United States.
The president is frequently described as the most powerful व्यक्ति in the world.
The president is indirectly निर्वाचित by the लोगों through the Electoral कॉलेज to a four-year पद, and is one of तभी दो nationally निर्वाचित संघीय अधिकारियों, the other being the वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य.
The twenty-second amendment, अपनाया in 1951, prohibits anyone इससे ever होने elected to the प्रेसिडेंसी for a तीसरा पूरा पद.
it भी prohibits a person इससे होने निर्वाचित to the presidency अधिक than एकबार if कि person previously था परोसा as अध्यक्ष, or एक्टिंग अध्यक्ष, for more than दो years of another person 's term as अध्यक्ष.
in all, 43 individuals have served 55 four-year terms.
on जनवरी 20, 2009, Barack Obama became the 44th और current अध्यक्ष.
on नवम्बर 6, 2012, he थी re-elected and is scheduled to serve जबतक जनवरी 20, 2017.
बोतलबंद mineral water
Bottled water is drinking water ( e.g., well जल, आसुत water, खनिज जल, or spring water ) packaged in प्लास्टिक or glass जल bottles.
Bottled जल may be carbonated or नहीं.
Sizes range इससे छोटी single serving बोतलों to विशाल carboys लिये water coolers.
मैप of the major rivers, झीलों, and टंकी in India
Map प्रर्दशित नदियाँ और बाढ़ prone areas in India
Rivers of इण्डिया खेल an महत्वपूर्ण role in the जीवनदान of the Indian लोगों.
The नदी systems provide irrigation, potable water, cheap परिवहन, electricity, और the livelihoods for a विशाल number of लोगों सब over the देश और to rural areas.
इस easily explains क्यों nearly all the प्रमुख शहरों of इण्डिया are स्तिथ by the बैंको of rivers.
the rivers भी have an महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in हिन्दू mythology and हैं considered holy by सब हिन्दुओं in the country.
Seven प्रमुख नदियाँ along with their numerous tributaries मेक up the river system of India.
Most of the rivers pour उनके waters into the खाड़ी of Bengal ; however, some of the नदियाँ जिनकी पाठ्यक्रम take उन्हें through the western भाग of the country और towards the ईस्ट of the राज्य of himachal Pradesh empty into the arabian Sea.
Parts of Ladakh, उत्तरी parts of the aravlli दायरा and the arid भाग of the Thar Desert have अंतर्देशीय नाले.
Dr.Francis बुकानन surveyed the पाठ्यक्रम of the rivers of India along with उनके tributaries और branches in 1810-11 ad and प्रस्तुत a minute account of it.
The shifting of the पाठ्यक्रम और bed over the सदियां is very remarkable.
अनेक of the चैनल्स mentioned in that सर्वेक्षण have अभी become dead, dried or even विलुप्त.
All प्रमुख rivers of India originate from एक of the तीन प्रमुख watersheds :
the Himalaya and the Karakoram ranges
विंध्य और satpura सीमाएँ और chotanagpur plateau in सेंट्रल India
sahyadri or Western ghats in western India
The bretton वुड्स system of monetary management स्थापित the नियम लिये commercial and financial संबंध among the world 's major औद्योगिक states in the mid-20th century.
The Bretton वुड्स प्रणाली थी the first उदाहरण of a fully negotiated मौद्रिक order intended to govern monetary relations among independent nation-states.
Preparing to rebuild the अंतरराष्ट्रीय आर्थिक system as संसार War II was still raging, 730 delegates इससे all 44 Allied राष्ट्र gathered at the माउंट Washington होटल in bretton वुड्स, New हैम्पशायर, United राज्य, for the United राष्ट्र मौद्रिक और वित्तीय सम्मेलन.
The delegates deliberated दौरान 1–22 जुलाई 1944, और signed the Agreement on इसके फाइनल दिन.
Setting up a system of rules, institutions, and प्रक्रियाओं to regulate the international मौद्रिक प्रणाली, the planners at bretton वुड्स established the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मौद्रिक निधि ( IMF ) and the अंतरराष्ट्रीय बैंको लिये Reconstruction और विकास ( IBRD ), जिससे today is भाग of the संसार बैंको Group.
These संगठन became operational in 1945 बाद a sufficient क्रमांक of देशों था ratified the agreement.
The chief features of the bretton Woods system यहूद an दायित्व लिये each country to अपनाना a मौद्रिक नीति कि कायम the exchange rate by tying इसके currency to the u.S. dollar और the ability of the imf to bridge temporary imbalances of payments.
On 15 August 1971, the United राज्य unilaterally terminated convertibility of the us $ to सुनहरा.
इस brought the bretton Woods system to an समाप्त और saw the dollar become fiat currency.
इस action, referred to as the निक्सन शॉक, निर्मित the हालात in जिससे the United States dollar became a reserve currency प्रयुक्त by many states.
At the वही समय, many फिक्स्ड currencies ( such as GBP, for example ), भी became free floating.
Ducati मोटर पकड़कर s.p.A. is an Italian company that designs और manufactures motorcycles.
headquartered in Bologna, इटली, Ducati is स्वामित्व by Audi through इसके Italian subsidiary लेम्बोर्गिनी.
A क्रेडिट स्कोर is a numerical expression based on a statistical analysis of a person 's क्रेडिट फाइलें, to represent the creditworthiness of कि व्यक्ति.
A क्रेडिट score is primarily based on credit रपट सूचना typically sourced इससे क्रेडिट bureaus.
lenders, ऐसे as banks and क्रेडिट कार्ड companies, use क्रेडिट स्कोर to evaluate the संभावित risk posed by lending money to उपभोक्ता and to mitigate नुकसान due to ख़राब debt.
Lenders उपयोग credit स्कोर to determine जो qualifies लिये a ऋण, at what interest rate, and कया क्रेडिट limits.
lenders also उपयोग क्रेडिट scores to determine which ग्राहक हैं संभावित to लाओ in the सबसे revenue.
the use of credit or पहचान स्कोरिंग prior to authorizing अभिगम or granting क्रेडिट is an implementation of a trusted प्रणाली.
क्रेडिट scoring is not limited to banks.
अन्य organizations, ऐसे as मोबाईल फोन कंपनियाँ, insurance कंपनियाँ, जमींदार, and सरकारी विभाग employ the वही techniques.
Credit स्कोरिंग also रै a lot of ओवरलैप साथ आंकड़ा खनन, which उपयोग अनेक similar तकनीकों.
These techniques combine thousands of factors but they are more or less similar or the same.
the सात SI base units और the interdependency of their definitions : for उदाहरण, to निकालें the definition of the metre इससे the गति of light, the definition of the second must be known जबकि the ampere और candela हैं both निर्भर on the परिभाषा of उर्जा जिससे in फेरे is defined in terms of लंबाई, mass and समय.
the अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रणाली of Units ( SI ) defines सात इकाई of measure as a basic set इससे जिससे सब अन्य SI इकाई हैं derived.
ये si आधार इकाई and उनके physical quantities are:
मीटर लिये लंबाई ( US English : मीटर )
kilogram लिये mass ( नोट : not the ग्राम )
दूसरी for समय
ampere लिये इलेक्ट्रिक current
kelvin for तापमान
candela for luminous तीव्रता
mole for the amount of substance.
the si आधार quantities form a नियत of mutually independent आयाम as required by dimensional analysis commonly employed in विज्ञान और प्रौद्योगिकी.
However, in a given realization of ये units वे may well be interdependent, i.e. defined in शर्तें of प्रत्येक अन्य.
the names of SI इकाई हैं written in लोअरकेस वर्ण ( the 'degree Celsius ' meets इस नियम, as 'degree ' is the ईकाई, and 'celsius ' is a modifier ).
the प्रतीकों of इकाई are written in lowercase ( e.g. metre रै the symbol m ), except that symbols लिये इकाई named बाद व्यक्तियों are लिखा साथ an आरंभिक capital अक्षर ( e.g., the हर्ट्ज़ रै the अपरकेस प्रतीक Hz ).
अनेक other इकाई, such as the litre ( us अंग्रेज़ी : लीनियर ), हैं formally not part of the si, but हैं accepted लिये उपयोग साथ si.
Monument canyon
कोलोराडो नेशनल स्मारक ( locally referred to as the Monument ) is a भाग of the नेशनल पार्क सेवा near the नगर of ग्रैंड Junction, Colorado.
spectacular canyons cut deep into sandstone and even granite–gneiss–schist rock formations, in some क्षेत्रों.
This is an क्षेत्रफल of desert land high on the Colorado पठार, with pinion और juniper forests on the plateau.
The park hosts a चौड़ी दायरा of wildlife, सहित red-tailed hawks और golden eagles, ravens, jays, desert bighorn शीप, और coyotes.
क्रियाएँ include hiking, horseback सवारी, सड़क bicycling, और scenic drives ; a visitor बीच on the वेस्ट पक्ष contains a natural history museum और gift shop.
वहीँ are भव्य दृश्य from trails and the Rim Rock ड्राइव, which winds along the plateau.
आसपास are the किताब cliffs, and the largest flat-topped mountain in the world, the ग्रैंड mesa.
Its feature आकर्षण is Monument canyon, which रनों the चौडाई of the park, और शामिल rock formations such as Independence Monument, the चुंबन युगल, और कोक चूल्हों.
The monument शामिल 20,500 एकड़ ( 32 वर्गाकार miles ), much of जिससे रै been recommended to कॉंग्रेस for designation as wilderness.
बाएँ to सही : Utility Uniform, ब्लू Dress वर्दी, Service Uniform, and Evening पोशाक वर्दी
the वर्दी of the United राज्य समुद्री corps serve to फर्क Marines इससे सदस्यों of अन्य services.
among current uniforms in the United States हथियारबंद शक्तियां, the Marines ' uniforms have been in service the longest.
the समुद्री Dress ब्लू वर्दी रै, साथ few परिवर्तन, been worn in essentially its current रूप चूंकि the 19th सदी.
उत्तर American टेलीफोन क्षेत्रफल codes 419 and 567 serve the northwest quadrant of the U.S. राज्य of Ohio.
The largest city परोसा by these area कोड is टोलेडो ( और इसके suburbs of Holland, Maumee, northwood, ऑरेगॉन, Ottawa पहाड़ियाँ, Perrysburg, Rossford, Sylvania, swanton, waterville, and Whitehouse ).
अन्य cities परोसा by these क्षेत्रफल codes include Ada, ashland, Bellevue, Bluffton, Bowling Green, ब्रायन, Bucyrus, Celina, क्लाइड, Crestline, defiance, Delphos, एडिसन, erastus, Findlay, fostoria, Fremont, Galion, kenton, लीमा, मैन्सफील्ड, माउंट gilead, Napoleon, Norwalk, ओक Harbor, बंदरगाहों क्लिंटन, Sandusky, Shelby, St. Marys, Tiffin, Upper sandusky, Van wert, wapakoneta, Wauseon, Willard.
अन्य क्षेत्रों served include the झील Erie Islands उत्तर of Port Clinton and west of sandusky.
The प्रमुख क्षेत्रफल code, 419, was created as one of the original क्षेत्रफल codes in अक्तूबर 1947 ; the ओवरले क्षेत्रफल code 567 was निर्मित on जनवरी 1, 2002.
despite the presence of टोलेडो, the state 's fourth-largest city, 419 was the last of ओहियो 's original चार area codes to have महरूम विभाजित or overlaid.
Mickey लेरॉय gilley ( born March 9, 1936 ) is an American देश म्यूज़िक सिंगर और musician.
हालांकि he प्रारंभ आउट गायन straight-up देश and पश्चिमी सामग्री in the 1970s, he moved towards a more pop -friendly ध्वनि in the 1980s, bringing him further कामयाबी on not just the देश चार्ट, लकिन the पॉप charts as well.
Among his biggest हिट्स are `` Room पूरा of गुलाब, '' `` Do n't the लड़कियों सब मिलेंगी Prettier at closing समय, '' and the remake of the आत्मा hit `` स्टैंड by Me ``.
he is भी the cousin of Jerry ली Lewis, कार्ल mcvoy, Jim Gilley and jimmy swaggart.
according to the Federal विमानन Administration, gilley is a licensed pilot, जो holds an यंत्र दरजा साथ commercial pilot privileges for multi-engine airplanes, as well as private pilot privileges for सिंगल engine वायुयान.
the सितंबर 11 हमले ( भी referred to as सितंबर 11, सितंबर 11th, or 9/11 ) were a series of four coordinated terrorist हमले शुभारम्भ by the Islamic terrorist group al-qaeda upon the संयुक्त राज्य in New York नगर and the Washington, D.C. क्षेत्रफल on September 11, 2001.
चार यात्री airliners यहूद hijacked by 19 al-Qaeda terrorists so वे could be flown into इमारतें in आत्महत्या attacks.
Two of those planes, American Airlines Flight 11 and संयुक्त Airlines उड़ान 175, were crashed into the उत्तर और दक्षिण मीनारें, respectively, of the संसार Trade बीच complex in नई यॉर्क नगर.
Within two घंटों, दोनो towers collapsed साथ मलबा और the resulting फ़ायर causing आंशिक or पूरा पतन of all अन्य buildings in the WTC जटिल, as well as प्रमुख क्षति to टेन other large surrounding structures.
a third plane, American Airlines Flight 77, थी crashed into the Pentagon ( the headquarters of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of रक्षा ), अग्रणी to a आंशिक पतन in its western side.
the चौथी plane, United एयरलाइंस Flight 93, थी targeted at the संयुक्त States कैपिटल in Washington, d.C., but crashed into a field near Shanksville, पेन्सिलवेनिया, after its passengers आजमाया to overcome the hijackers.
In कुल, almost 3,000 people died in the attacks, including the 227 civilians and 19 hijackers सवार the चार planes.
Suspicion quickly गिरी on al-Qaeda.
हालांकि the group 's नेता, ओसामा bin लादेन, initially denied any भागीदारी, in 2004 he claimed responsibility लिये the attacks.
al-qaeda और bin Laden cited U.S. support of इसराईल, the presence of U.S. troops in Saudi Arabia, और प्रतिबंधों विरूद्ध इराकी as motives for the हमले.
the संयुक्त States responded to the हमले by शुभारंभ the युद्ध on आतंक and invading Afghanistan to depose the तालिबान, which था harbored al-Qaeda.
Many countries strengthened उनके anti-terrorism legislation और expanded law enforcement powers.
having evaded कैप्चर for years, bin लादेन थी स्तिथ और killed by u.S. शक्तियां in May 2011.
the destruction of the जुड़वा Towers and अन्य गुण caused serious damage to the economy of निम्नतर मैनहटन and had a significant प्रभाव on global markets.
क्लीनअप of the World Trade Center site was completed in may 2002, और the Pentagon was repaired भीतर a year.
Numerous memorials have महरूम constructed, सहित the National September 11 Memorial & Museum in नई York, the प्रस्तुतीकरण Memorial, और the Flight 93 नेशनल Memorial in Pennsylvania.
After a lengthy विलंब, the एक संसार Trade बीच is expected to be समाप्त at Ground Zero in New York नगर in 2013.
ढूंढना nemo is a 2003 अमरीकी computer-animated comedy-drama adventure film written and निर्देशित by Andrew Stanton, released by Walt डिज़्नी Pictures, और the पांचवां film produced by पिक्चर्स एनिमेशन studios.
It tells the स्टोरी of the over-protective clownfish नामित marlin ( Albert Brooks ) who, साथ with a राजसी तंग named Dory ( एलेन DeGeneres ), खोज for his abducted son Nemo ( Alexander gould ) सब the रास्ता to Sydney harbour.
Along the way, Marlin learns to लो risks and let nemo लो परवाह of खुद.
it is Pixar 's पहला film to be released in cinemas in the उत्तरी hemisphere summer.
The फिल्मी was re-released लिये the first समय in 3D on September 14, 2012, और it थी released on Blu-ray on December 4, 2012.
A sequel, Finding Dory, is फिलहाल in विकास, नियत to be released on नवम्बर 25, 2015.
the film प्राप्त universal critical acclaim and जीती the अकादमी Award लिये Best Animated Feature, और थी मनोनीत in three अधिक categories सहित बेहतरीन असली पटकथा.
it was the second highest-grossing फिल्मी of 2003, कमाई a total of $ 921 million worldwide.
Finding nemo is भी the best-selling dvd of सब समय, साथ over 40 लाख नक़ल बेची as of 2006, and थी the highest-grossing G-rated फिल्मी of सब time before पिक्चर्स 's अपना Toy स्टोरी 3 overtook it.
It is भी the 23rd highest-grossing film of all time, as well as the 3rd highest-grossing एनिमेटेड film.
In 2008, the अमरीकी फिल्मी Institute named it the tenth महानतम एनिमेटेड फिल्मी कभी made during their शीर्ष 10.
The sixth ऋतु of America 's Best Dance क्रू, भी ज्ञात as America 's Best नृत्य क्रू : ऋतु of the सुपरस्टार, premiered on April 7, 2011 and concluded on जून 5, 2011.
Auditions यहूद आयोजित in four cities इससे जनवरी 21 through February 5 : Chicago, Houston, नई यॉर्क, और Los Angeles.
This ऋतु takes a different route from past सीज़न.
The क्रू जरूर perform to the music of one विशिष्ट artist each week, सहित रिहाना, लील वेन, and अन्य लोकप्रिय stars.
इस ऋतु also सुविधाएँ खास अतिथि दिखावे by various music हस्तियाँ including Justin बीबर, The Black eyed मटर, Katy Perry, kesha, Nicki Minaj, और kanye वेस्ट.
डोमिनिक `` D-Trix '' Sandoval, a former member of क्वेस्ट Crew, the विजेता of the तीसरा ऋतु of America 's बेहतरीन Dance Crew, joins returning न्यायाधीशों Lil मामा and JC Chasez as the newest न्यायधीश.
in the season finale, i aM me थी घोषित the winner of Season 6 और प्राप्त the $ 100,000 ( USD ) prize.
In the संयुक्त राज्य, Social सुरक्षा refers to the Old-Age, survivors, और विकलांगता बीमे ( oasdi ) संघीय program.
the असली Social सुरक्षा Act ( 1935 ) और the current संस्करण of the अधिनियम, as amended, encompass several social welfare and social insurance कार्यक्रम.
सोशल सुरक्षा is primarily funded through dedicated payroll taxes पुकारा Federal बीमे योगदान अधिनियम tax ( FICA ).
Tax deposits are formally entrusted to the Federal old-age and survivors बीमे विश्वास Fund, the संघीय Disability बीमे विश्वास Fund, the Federal Hospital Insurance विश्वास निधि, or the Federal Supplementary Medical Insurance विश्वास Fund which comprise the Social सुरक्षा विश्वास Fund.
Upward redistribution of आय is responsible लिये परिचय 43 % of the प्रक्षिप्त सोशल सुरक्षा shortfall over the अगला 75 सालो.
According to अर्थशास्त्री मार्टिन feldstein, the combined बिता लिये सब social insurance कार्यक्रम in 2003 गठित 37 % of सरकारी expenditure and 7 % of the gross घरेलू उत्पाद.
सोशल Security is फिलहाल अनुमानित to रखना roughly 40 percent of सब अमेरिकी आयु 65 or पुरानी आउट of गरीबी.
The सोशल Security Administration is headquartered in woodlawn, Maryland, बस west of Baltimore.
the दारू by volume shown on a बोतल of absinthe.
दारू by volume ( abbreviated as ABV, abv, or alc/vol ) is a standard माप of how much दारू ( ethanol ) is contained in an alcoholic beverage ( expressed as a percentage of total volume ).
The ABV मानक is used worldwide.
in कुछ देशों, alcohol by आवाज़ is referred to as डिग्री Gay-Lussac ( after the French chemist जोसेफ लुई gay-lussac ).

the जनसांख्यिकी was 1,952 at the 2010 census.
चार्ल्स जॉन huffam डिकेंस ( ; 7 फ़रवरी 1812 – 9 जून 1870 ) थी an English writer और social critic.
he created कुछ of the संसार 's most यादगार fictional characters और is generally regarded as the महानतम novelist of the Victorian काल.
दौरान his life, his works enjoyed unprecedented fame, and by the twentieth सदी his साहित्यिक प्रतिभाशाली was broadly acknowledged by आलोचकों और विद्वानों.
उसके novels और छोटी कहानियां continue to be widely लोकप्रिय.
born in Portsmouth, England, Dickens left school to work in a फैक्टरी बाद उसके पिता थी thrown into debtors ' थाना.
Although he था little औपचारिक शिक्षा, his जल्दी impoverishment drove उसे to succeed.
over his करियर he edited a weekly जर्नल for 20 सालो, लिखा 15 novels, 5 novellas and hundreds of छोटी कहानियां and non-fiction आलेख, lectured और performed extensively, थी an indefatigable अक्षर लेखक, और campaigned vigorously लिये children 's rights, education, और other सोशल reforms.
डिकेंस sprang to कीर्ति साथ the 1836 serial प्रकाशन of The Pickwick papers.
भीतर a few सालो he had become an international literary हस्ती, प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके humour, satire, और keen अवलोकन of character and समाज.
उसके novels, सबसे published in मासिक or weekly किश्तों, pioneered the सीरियल प्रकाशन of narrative fiction, which became the dominant विक्टोरियन विधि for अनोखा प्रकाशन.
the instalment स्वरूप अनुमत डिकेंस to evaluate his audience 's reaction, और he often परिवर्धित उसके plot और character विकास based on ऐसे प्रतिक्रिया.
लिये उदाहरण, when his wife 's chiropodist expressed तकलीफ at the way मिस mowcher in David कॉपरफील्ड लगा to reflect her disabilities, डिकेंस गई on to improve the अक्षर with धनात्मक lineaments.
fagin in ओलिवर Twist apparently mirrors the famous बाड़ ikey Solomon ; उसके कैरीकेचर of leigh Hunt in the फिगर of mr Skimpole in bleak House was likewise toned down on सलाह from some of उसके मित्रों, as they read episodes.
in the वही अनोखा, both लॉरेंस Boythorne और मूनी the beadle are drawn from रियल जीवन – boythorne from Walter जंगली landor और Mooney from 'Looney ', a beadle at salisbury Square.
His plots यहूद carefully constructed, और डिकेंस प्रायः wove in elements from topical events into उसके narratives.
Masses of the अनपढ़ ग़रीब chipped in ha'pennies to have प्रत्येक नई monthly एपीसोड पढ़ा to them, खोलने up and inspiring a नई class of पाठक.
डिकेंस was regarded as the literary colossus of his आयु.
उसके 1843 novella, A Christmas कैरोल, is एक of the सबसे influential works कभी लिखा, and it remains लोकप्रिय और continues to inspire adaptations in every कलाकारी genre.
His रचनात्मक genius has महरूम praised by fellow writers—from leo Tolstoy to G. K. Chesterton और George Orwell —for its यथार्थवाद, comedy, prose स्टाइल, अद्वितीय characterisations, और सोशल criticism.
On the other हाथ ऑस्कर वाइल्ड, Henry James और वर्जिनिया woolf complained of a कमी of psychological depth, loose writing, and a रग of saccharine sentimentalism.
मार्टिन Luther King and other civil rights leaders in front of the प्रतिमा of Abraham lincoln, August 28, 1963
the civil अधिकारों गति थी a श्रेणी of worldwide राजनैतिक आंदोलनों लिये समता before the law that peaked in the 1960s.
in many situations it took the form of campaigns of सिविल resistance aimed at achieving बदलें by nonviolent फ़ॉर्म of resistance.
In some situations it थी accompanied, or followed, by civil unrest and हथियारबंद rebellion.
The process थी long and tenuous in many countries, and many of these movements किया not fully achieve उनके लक्ष्य although, the प्रयत्न of ये movements did lead to सुधार in the विधिक rights of previously oppressed समूह of people.
The प्रमुख उद्देश्य of the civil rights movement शामिल, and शामिल, ensuring that the rights of all people are equally protected by the law, including the rights of minorities.
Civil अधिकारों आंदोलनों ranging from the global lgbt अधिकारों movement to the global महिलाओं 's अधिकारों गति to various जातिगत minority rights movements around the संसार continue.
the 2010 FIFA World कप was the 19th फीफा संसार Cup, the world चैंपियनशिप for men 's national association फ़ुटबॉल टीमों.
it took place in South अफ़्रीकी from 11 June to 11 जुलाई 2010.
the bidding process लिये होस्टिंग the टूर्नामेंट फाइनल थी खोलें only to African राष्ट्र ; in 2004, the international फ़ुटबॉल संघ, FIFA, selected दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी over Egypt और Morocco to become the first अफ़्रीकी nation to host the फाइनल.
the मिलान were played in ten stadiums in nine मेजबान शहरों around the country, with the फाइनल निभाई at the सॉकर City स्टेडियम in दक्षिण Africa 's largest city, Johannesburg.
Thirty-two टीमों यहूद selected for भागीदारी via a worldwide qualification tournament कि began in August 2007.
In the पहला गोलाकार of the टूर्नामेंट finals, the teams competed in round-robin समूह of four teams for points, with the top दो teams in प्रत्येक समूह proceeding.
ये sixteen teams advanced to the knockout स्टेज, where three rounds of खेल decided जिससे teams would participate in the final.
In the final, Spain, the European champions, पराजित third-time finalists the नीदरलैंड्स 1–0 बाद अतिरिक्त समय, with Andrés iniesta 's लक्ष्य in the 116th minute giving स्पेन उनके पहला संसार title, becoming the eighth स्वदेश to win the टूर्नामेंट, और the first European nation to जीत the tournament outside इसके घर continent.
Host स्वदेश South अफ़्रीकी, 2006 संसार champions Italy और 2006 runners-up फ़्रांस were सब eliminated in the first round of the tournament.
it थी the पहला समय कि the hosts यहूद eliminated in the पहला round.
New Zealand साथ their तीन draws यहूद the only undefeated team in the टूर्नामेंट, but were also eliminated in the first round.

जॉन लेनन was an English musician who gained विश्वव्यापी fame as one of the founders of The Beatles, for उसके subsequent सोलो career, और लिये his political सक्रियता और pacifism.
he was शॉट by चिह्नित David chapman at the प्रवेश of the building जहाँ he lived, The डकोटा, in New York City on 8 December 1980.
लेनन had बस returned from रिकार्ड संयंत्र Studio साथ his wife, योको ओनो.
लेनन थी pronounced dead on arrival at st. Luke's-Roosevelt हॉस्पिटल Center, जहाँ it थी stated कि nobody could have lived for अधिक than a few मिनट्स बाद sustaining such injuries.
Shortly बाद local news स्टेशन reported Lennon 's death, crowds gathered at Roosevelt हॉस्पिटल और in सामने of the डकोटा.
Lennon थी cremated on 10 December 1980 at the ferncliff कब्रिस्तान in Hartsdale, New यॉर्क ; the राख were given to Ono, who chose नहीं to थाम a अंत्येष्टि लिये उसे.
the पहला report of Lennon 's मौत to a U.S. national दर्शक was घोषित by Howard Cosell, on एबीसी 's सोमवार रात्रि Football.
New Orleans ( or, locally or ; ) is a major संयुक्त राज्य बंदरगाहों and the largest नगर और महानगर area in the state of Louisiana.
The जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर थी 343,829 as of the 2010 u.S. जनसांख्यिकी.
the New ऑरलियन्स metropolitan area ( नई orleans–metairie–kenner महानगर सांख्यिकीय Area ) था a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,167,764 in 2010 और थी the 46th largest in the संयुक्त राज्य.
the New Orleans–Metairie–Bogalusa Combined सांख्यिकीय Area, a larger trading क्षेत्रफल, had a 2010 population of 1,214,932.
the city is named बाद Orléans, a city located on the loire नदी in Centre, फ़्रांस, and is खूब ज्ञात for इसके पृथक फ्रेंच Creole architecture, as well as इसके cross-cultural और बहुभाषी विरासत.
New Orleans is भी famous लिये इसके cuisine, music ( particularly as the जन्मस्थान of जैज़ ), and इसके सालाना celebrations and त्यौहार, सबसे notably mardi Gras.
the city is often referred to as the `` most unique '' in America.
New Orleans is स्तिथ in southeastern louisiana, straddling the मिसिसिपी नदी.
The city और ऑरलियन्स मोहल्ला ( ) हैं.
The नगर और parish are bounded by the parishes of st. Tammany to the north, st. बर्नार्ड to the ईस्ट, Plaquemines to the south and जेफरसन to the south and वेस्ट.
Lake Pontchartrain, भाग of जिससे is शामिल in the city हद, झूठ to the north and झील borgne lies to the ईस्ट.
the संयुक्त राज्य presidential चुनाव of 1968 was the 46th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, held on मंगलवार, November 5, 1968.
The Republican nominee, पूर्व Vice-President रिचर्ड Nixon, won the चुनाव over the Democratic nominee, incumbent Vice-President Hubert Humphrey.
निक्सन भागा on a campaign that promised to restore law और अनुक्रम to the nation 's cities, torn by riots और crime.
विश्लेषकों have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning election as it permanently disrupted the नई Deal Coalition that था dominated अध्यक्षीय राजनीती लिये 36 सालो.
coming four सालो बाद Democrat Lyndon B. जॉनसन won in a historic landslide, the चुनाव saw the लाज़िम अध्यक्ष मजबूर out of the race and a Republican elected for the first time in बारह सालो.
it थी a विदारक national अनुभव, conducted दौरान a साल of violence कि included the assassination of सिविल rights leader Martin लूथर किंग, jr., and subsequent रेस दंगे आरपार the स्वदेश, the assasination of लोकतांत्रिक presidential प्रत्याशी रॉबर्ट F. Kennedy, फैली opposition to the वियतनाम War आरपार university campuses, और violent confrontations between police and anti-war प्रदर्शनकारियों at the 1968 लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल सम्मेलन as the Democratic party split again and again.
the चुनाव featured the strongest third party प्रयत्न चूंकि 1912 by पूर्व अलबामा राज्यपाल जार्ज Wallace, a डेमोक्रेट.
Because Wallace 's campaign opposed federal intervention in the South to समाप्त school segregation, he carried the Deep दक्षिण और भागा well in ethnic industrial जिले in the North.
This was the पिछला चुनाव in which New York had the सबसे मत in the electoral college ( 43 votes ).
After the 1970 census, California gained the most चुनावी votes और रै remained the सबसे populous state since then.
This is the latest election जहाँ a अध्यक्षीय ticket जीती बगैर carrying the वाइस presidential प्रत्याशी 's घर राज्य.
करक ( ; भी ज्ञात as garak, Garrak, और Gorg ) is a village in gamasiyab Rural ज़िला, in the सेंट्रल ज़िला of Nahavand County, हमादान प्रांत, Iran.
at the 2006 जनसांख्यिकी, इसके population थी 294, in 65 families.

कर्ट Donald कोबेन ( February 20, 1967 – April 5, 1994 ) थी an अमरीकी musician और artist, best ज्ञात as the सीसे सिंगर, guitarist and प्राथमिक songwriter of the grunge band निर्वाण.
कोबेन formed निर्वाण with krist novoselic in एबरडीन, वॉशिंगटन in 1985 and स्थापित it as part of the सिएटल music झाँकी, having its डेब्यू album ब्लीच released on the स्वतंत्र record लेबल sub Pop in 1989.
बाद हस्ताक्षर with प्रमुख लेबल dgc Records, the बैंड found भेदन कामयाबी साथ `` खुश्बू Like Teen Spirit `` from its दूसरी album Nevermind ( 1991 ).
following the कामयाबी of nevermind, निर्वाण थी labeled `` the flagship बैंड '' of Generation x, और कोबेन hailed as `` the प्रवक्ता of a पीढी ''.
Cobain, however, was often uncomfortable and कुंठित, believing his message और artistic vision to have been misinterpreted by the public, साथ उसके personal issues प्रायः विषय to media attention.
he challenged Nirvana 's audience with its final studio एल्बम In Utero ( 1993 ).
During the पिछला years of उसके जीवन, कोबेन struggled साथ हेरोइन व्यसन, बीमारी and अवसाद.
he also had परेशानी coping साथ his fame और पब्लिक चित्र, and the पेशेवर and lifelong निजी pressures surrounding खुद और उसके बीवी, संगीतकार Courtney Love.
On April 8, 1994, कोबेन थी found dead at his home in सिएटल, the victim of what was officially ruled a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun घाव to the head.
the हालातों of his death at age 27 have become a टॉपिक of पब्लिक fascination और बहस.
Since their debut, निर्वाण, with Cobain as a songwriter, रै sold over 25 लाख एल्बम in the U.S., और over 50 million विश्वव्यापी.
a millwright is a craftsman or tradesman सगाई with the construction और maintenance of मशीनरी.
अधिक generally in the English बोलना संसार, early millwrights were specialist carpenters जो erected मशीने used in कृषि, खाना प्रसंस्करण और processing lumber and पेपर.
In the जल्दी भाग of the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति, उनके skills यहूद दबाया into सेवा भवन the earliest powered textile मिलों.
आधुनिक millwrights work with स्टील and अन्य सामग्री in addition to wood and must प्रायः combine the skills of अनेक skilled trades in अनुक्रम to सफलतापूर्वक fabricate औद्योगिक मशीनरी or to assemble मशीने इससे pre-fabricated parts.
The modern millwright must भी be able to पढ़ा blueprints and other schematics to सहायता उसे in the construction of जटिल प्रणालियों.
Millwrights are अक्सर unionized, with around 45 % unionized in the us, हालांकि अनुभवी millwrights प्रायः नियत themselves up as स्वतंत्र ठेकेदारों.
The Adjustment Bureau is a 2011 American रोमांटिक action थ्रिलर फिल्मी loosely आधारित on the फिलिप K. लंड छोटी स्टोरी, `` समायोजन Team ``.
the फिल्मी थी लिखा और निर्देशित by जार्ज nolfi and stars Matt Damon and एमिली Blunt.
The cast भी शामिल Anthony mackie, John Slattery, माइकल Kelly, और टेरेंस Stamp.
the score थी रचित by Thomas Newman, साथ two songs by Richard Ashcroft ( `` Future 's उज्जवल '' लिये the खोलने अनुक्रम ; `` Are You तैयार ? '' लिये the closing क्रेडिट ).
Sodium azide is the inorganic compound with the formula NaN3.
इस colorless salt is the gas-forming घटक in अनेक car airbag systems.
it is प्रयुक्त लिये the तैयारी of अन्य azide यौगिकों.
it is an ionic पदार्थ, is अत्यधिक घुलनशील in water, और is very acutely toxic.
Double रेनबो और supernumerary rainbows on the अंदर of the प्राथमिक arc.
The छाया of the फ़ोटोग्राफ़र 's सिर on the नीचे marks the centre of the rainbow circle ( antisolar पाइंट ).
A रेनबो is an optical और meteorological घटना that is caused by प्रतिबिंब of लाइट in जल droplets in the धरती 's atmosphere, resulting in a वर्णक्रम of light appearing in the sky.
it takes the रूप of a multicoloured चाप.
rainbows caused by sunlight सदा appear in the खण्ड of sky directly opposite the सूर्य.
In a `` primary रेनबो '', the चाप shows रेड on the outer भाग and violet on the भीतरी पक्ष.
This रेनबो is caused by light being refracted जबकि प्रवेश a droplet of जल, तब reflected inside on the वापस of the droplet and refracted again जब leaving it.
In a double रेनबो, a second arc is देखी बाहर the primary चाप, और has the order of इसके colours reversed, रेड facing toward the अन्य one, in both rainbows.
इस दूसरी rainbow is caused by light reflecting twice अंदर water droplets.
the Conservative Party, officially the रूढ़िवादी and यूनियनिस्ट Party and colloquially referred to as the Tory Party or the tories, is a centre-right political पार्टी in the संयुक्त किंगडम कि espouses the philosophies of conservatism and अंग्रेजों unionism.
it is the largest political पार्टी in the United Kingdom, being the largest single पार्टी in the House of कॉमन्स साथ 303 MPs, the largest पार्टी in local सरकारी साथ 9,391 पार्षदों, और the largest अंग्रेजों पार्टी in the European पार्लियामेंट with 25 meps.
it governs in coalition साथ the उदार Democrats, with party leader David cameron as प्रधान Minister.
the Conservative Party थी संस्थापित in 1834, and थी एक of two प्रबल parties in the 19th सदी, साथ साथ the Liberal Party.
it changed इसके name to the रूढ़िवादी and Unionist Party in 1912 बाद merging with the Liberal Unionist Party, although that name is rarely प्रयुक्त and it is generally referred to as बस the Conservative Party.
in the 1920s, the Liberal vote greatly diminished and the श्रमिक Party became the conservatives ' main rivals.
Conservative Prime मंत्रियों led governments लिये 57 सालो of the 20th सदी, including विंस्टन Churchill ( 1940–45, 1951–55 ) और मार्गरेट थैचर ( 1979–90 ).
Thatcher 's tenure led to wide-ranging economic liberalisation and saw the Conservatives become the most eurosceptic of the तीन major parties.
The party was लौटे to सरकारी in गठबन्धन, having विफल to जीत a majority, in 2010 अंतर्गत the अधिक `` उदार '' leadership of दाउद Cameron.
In the यूरोपीय पार्लियामेंट, the Conservatives are the largest British party साथ 25 MEPs, who बैठना साथ the soft eurosceptic European conservatives और Reformists ( ECR ) संसदीय समूह, while the पार्टी itself is a member of the Alliance of यूरोपीय Conservatives and Reformists ( aecr ) Europarty.
They are the third-largest पार्टी in the Scottish पार्लियामेंट and second-largest in the वेल्श Assembly.
They were formally allied to the Ulster Unionist पार्टी ( uup ) as part of the ulster conservatives and Unionists arrangement, with the uup currently participating in the five-party Northern Ireland कार्यपालिका.
नियति 's Child was an अमरीकी r & b girl group whose final, और शायद सबसे recognizable, line-up comprised Beyoncé Knowles, Kelly Rowland and Michelle विलियम्स.
formed in 1990 in Houston, Texas, नियति 's चाइल्ड members began their musical endeavors as लड़की 's टीमे comprising, among अन्य, Knowles, rowland, LaTavia Roberson और LeToya luckett.
बाद सालो of limited कामयाबी, वे were signed to Columbia रिकॉर्ड as नियति 's Child.
Destiny 's Child was शुभारम्भ into mainstream recognition following the release of their best-selling second एल्बम, The Writing 's on the वॉल, जिससे contained the number-one singles `` बिल्स, Bills, Bills `` और `` कह My Name ``.
Despite critical and commercial success, the group थी plagued by आतंरिक conflict and legal turmoil, as Roberson and Luckett attempted to विभाजित from the group 's manager Mathew Knowles, citing favoritism of Knowles और Rowland, उसके daughter and भांजी, respectively.
Both Roberson और Luckett यहूद soon replaced with विलियम्स और farrah फ्रैंकलिन ; however, in 2000, फ्रैंकलिन थी dismissed, leaving उन्हें as a trio.
उनके third album, उत्तरजीवी, which contains themes the पब्लिक interpreted as a चैनल to the समूह 's अनुभव, contains the विश्वव्यापी हिट्स `` Independent Women ``, `` उत्तरजीवी `` and `` bootylicious ``.
In 2002, वे घोषित a hiatus और re-united two सालो later for the release of उनके fourth studio album, नियति fulfilled ( 2004 ).
नियति 's Child रै बेची more than 50 million records विश्वव्यापी to date.
Billboard पत्रिका ranks the group as एक of the महानतम musical trios of सब समय, the ninth सबसे successful artist/band of the 2000s, and लगाई the समूह 68th in its all-time hot 100 Artists list in 2008.
The centers for Disease कंट्रोल and रोकथाम ( CDC ) is a संयुक्त States संघीय एजेंसी अंतर्गत the Department of स्वास्थ्य and इंसान Services headquartered in Druid पहाड़ियाँ, unincorporated dekalb काउंटी, Georgia, in Greater Atlanta.
it works to protect पब्लिक health और सुरक्षा by providing सूचना to enhance health निर्णय, and it promotes health through partnerships साथ राज्य health विभाग and other organizations.
the CDC फ़ोकस नेशनल ध्यान on developing और applying disease रोकथाम और कंट्रोल ( विशेषकर infectious रोगों और foodborne pathogens and other सूक्ष्मजैविक infections ), environmental स्वास्थ्य, occupational सुरक्षा and स्वास्थ्य, स्वास्थ्य promotion, injury prevention और शिक्षा क्रियाएँ designed to improve the स्वास्थ्य of the people of the United राज्य.
the सीडीसी is the संयुक्त States ' national public health institute और is a founding सदस्य of the International Association of National Public स्वास्थ्य संस्थान.
भूकंप भविष्यवाणी `` is प्रायः पारिभाषित as the specification of the समय, location, and magnitude of a future earthquake भीतर stated हद '', and विशेषकर of `` the next दमदार earthquake to occur in a region. ''
इस can be विशिष्ट from भूकंप forecasting, जिससे is the probabilistic assessment of सामान्य earthquake जोखिम, सहित the frequency and magnitude of damaging earthquakes, in a दिए area over periods of years or decades.
This can be further विशिष्ट इससे real-time earthquake warning systems, which, upon डिटेक्शन of a severe भूकंप, can provide neighboring regions a few सेकेंड चेतावनी of potentially significant shaking.
To be useful, an earthquake भविष्यवाणी must be precise enough to वारंट the cost of increased precautions, including disruption of ordinary activities and कॉमर्स, और timely enough that तैयारी can be बना.
Predictions must भी be reliable, as गलत alarms and cancelled सचेतक हैं नहीं only economically costly, but seriously undermine confidence in, और thereby the प्रभावकारिता of, कोई दयालु of warning.
साथ over 7,000 भूकंप around the संसार प्रत्येक साल with a magnitude of 4.0 or वृहद, trivial कामयाबी in भूकंप भविष्यवाणी is easily obtained using fear broad parameters of time, location, or magnitude.
however, ऐसे trivial `` कामयाब predictions '' हैं नहीं useful.
प्रमुख earthquakes are often followed by रिपोर्ट्स कि they were predicted, or at least anticipated, but no claim of a successful prediction of a प्रमुख भूकंप रै बच close inquiry.
In the 1970s वहीँ was intense आशावाद amongst वैज्ञानिकों that कुछ विधि of predicting भूकंप might be मिला, but by the 1990s continuing failure led many scientists to question whether it थी भी possible.
While many scientists स्टिल थाम that, given enough संसाधन, भविष्यवाणी might be possible, many others maintain that earthquake भविष्यवाणी is inherently नामुमकिन.
Deborah ऐन `` Debby '' Ryan ( born may 13, 1993 ) is an American अभिनेत्री, singer, musician, songwriter और record producer.
Ryan is best ज्ञात for अभिनीत as बेली Pickett in the डिज़्नी Channel असली श्रेणी the सुइट जीवन on डेक.
In 2008, the सुइट Life on Deck ranked as TV 's top series among kids 6-11 and the no. 2 scripted series among tweens 9-14.
रयान started acting in पेशेवर theatres at the age of seven ; in 2007 वो appeared in the Barney & Friends straight-to-DVD फिल्मी बार्नी : Let 's go to the फायरहाउस and तब थी discovered in a nationwide search by डिज़्नी.

तब, in 2010, she starred in the फिल्मी 16 बधाइयां, जिससे थी the most watched cable program on the day of its प्रीमियर on the डिज़्नी चैनल.
16 Wishes introduced रयान to new audiences ; the फिल्म प्राप्त ऊँची viewership in the वयस्कों demographic ( 18-34 ).
जल्द बाद कि, रयान स्ट्रक्चर in the independent नाट्य film, What if..., जिससे premiered on अगस्त 20, 2010.
