released February 17, 2012.
Ryan stars in the titular role in the Disney Channel Original Series, Jessie.
stührling tourbillon Movement ( ).
in horology, a tourbillon ( ; `` whirlwind '' ) is an जोड to the यांत्रिकी of a देखें escapement.
विकसित around 1795 by the french-swiss घड़ीसाज़ abraham-louis Breguet from an पहले विचार by the अंग्रेज़ी chronometer मेकर जॉन Arnold, a tourbillon aims to counter the प्रभाव of गम्भीरता by mounting the escapement और balance व्हील in a घूर्णन cage, to negate the effect of gravity जब the timepiece ( यूँ the escapement ) is stuck in a certain position.
Originally an attempt to improve accuracy, tourbillons are स्टिल शामिल in कुछ महंगी आधुनिक घड़ियाँ as a विलक्षणता and demonstration of watchmaking virtuosity.
the यांत्रिकी is प्रायः उजागर on the देखें 's face to show it बंद.
The खिड़कियाँ installer ( previously known as Microsoft installer ) is a software घटक प्रयुक्त for the installation, maintenance, और removal of software on आधुनिक Microsoft Windows systems.
The installation information, and often the files themselves, हैं packaged in installation पैकेज, loosely relational databases structured as com संरचित storages and commonly ज्ञात as `` MSI files '', from उनके default संचिका एक्सटेंशन.
खिड़कियाँ Installer contains significant changes इससे इसके पूर्ववर्ती, सेटअप API.
New features include a जीयूआई फ्रेमवर्क और स्वचालित generation of the uninstallation sequence.
Windows Installer is positioned as an alternative to stand-alone executable installer frameworks ऐसे as पुरानी संस्करण of InstallShield and NSIS.
microsoft encourages तीसरा parties to उपयोग खिड़कियाँ Installer as the basis for संस्थापना frameworks, so कि वे synchronize correctly with अन्य installers and keep the internal डेटाबेस of installed उत्पाद consistent.
Important सुविधाएँ such as rollback और versioning निर्भर on a सतत आतंरिक डेटाबेस लिये reliable आपरेशन.
furthermore, Windows Installer facilitates the principle of least privilege by performing तन्त्र installations by प्रॉक्सी for unprivileged users.
Four लोको is a line of alcoholic पेय, originally marketed as energy drinks, बेची by Phusion Projects of शिकागो, इलिनोइस.
phusion operates as Drink चार Brewing कम्पनी.
Four लोको, the कम्पनी 's सबसे popular पेय, debuted in the संयुक्त States मार्केट in 2005.
it is now sold in 48 states, और in कनाडा, the Bahamas, बोलीविया, Honduras, और यूरोपीय.
The नाम `` चार '' is निकला from the original उर्जा drink 's चार प्रमुख ingredients : alcohol, caffeine, taurine, and guarana.
Four branded products have महरूम the ऑब्जेक्ट of legal, ethical, and स्वास्थ्य चिंताएं सम्बन्धित to the company allegedly विपणन उन्हें to the underaged and the purported खतरे of combining alcohol और कैफीन.
बाद the पेय थी banned in several states, a उत्पाद reintroduction in दिसम्बर 2010 removed caffeine, taurine, और guarana as ingredients, और the malt beverage is no longer marketed as an उर्जा पेय.
the neck of a गिटार प्रर्दशित the नट ( in the background, coloured white ) और first चार metal frets.
A fret is a उठाया तत्व on the गर्दन of a stringed instrument.
frets प्रायः extend आरपार the पूरा width of the neck.
On most modern western fretted instruments, frets हैं मेटल स्ट्रिप्स inserted into the fingerboard.
on कुछ ऐतिहासिक यंत्र और non-European instruments, frets are made of टुकड़े of string tied around the गर्दन.
frets divide the गर्दन into fixed segments at intervals सम्बन्धित to a musical framework.
On instruments such as guitars, प्रत्येक fret represents एक semitone in the मानक पश्चिमी प्रणाली where one अष्टक is divided into twelve semitones.
fret is प्रायः used as a क्रिया, अर्थ बस `` to press bas the स्ट्रिंग पीछे a fret. ''
Fretting प्रायः refers to the frets and/or their system of अवस्थिति.
There थी खपत of दारू both दौरान and बाद निषेध.
The 18th amendment prohibited the production, वितरण और sale of alcoholic पेय in the संयुक्त States और थी widely समर्थित by the American public when it गई into effect in 1920.
the temperance गति had popularized the विश्वास that दारू थी the major cause of most निजी और सोशल समस्याएं और prohibition थी देखी as the solution to the nation 's poverty, अपराधों, हिंसा, and other ills.
Upon अनुसमर्थन of the amendment, the प्रसिद्ध इंजीलवादी Billy Sunday कहा कि `` The slums will soon be तभी a memory.
We होगा फेरे our जेलों into कारखानों and हमारी jails into storehouses और corncribs. ''
( compare Christianity और alcohol. )
Since दारू थी to be बैन और since it थी seen as the cause of most, if not सब, अपराधों, some communities sold their jails.
The स्वदेश was highly आशावादी and the leading prohibitionist in the United States Congress confidently asserted कि `` वहीँ is as much मौका of repealing the eighteenth Amendment as वहीँ is for a hummingbird to मक्खी to the planet Mars साथ the वॉशिंगटन Monument tied to its tail.”
The metre ( meter in अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी ), ( si unit प्रतीक : m ; si dimension प्रतीक : l ), is the fundamental ईकाई of length in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रणाली of Units ( si ).
Originally intended to be one ten-millionth of the अलहदा from the धरती 's equator to the North ध्रुव ( at sea स्तर ), its परिभाषा रै महरूम periodically refined to प्रतिबिंबित growing knowledge of metrology.
चूंकि 1983, it रै been पारिभाषित as `` the लंबाई of the path travelled by light in vacuum दौरान a time interval of 1/299,792,458 of a second. ''
Geologists exploring Jurassic sedimentary रॉक्स in makhtesh Gadol, negev मरुस्थल, इसराईल
Geologists explaining the importance of volcanic राख परतों to विद्यार्थी on फ़ील्ड in Iceland
a geologist is a scientist जो अध्ययन the solid and द्रव matter that constitutes the धरती as खूब as the processes और history that रै तराशा it.
Geologists प्रायः engage in studying भूविज्ञान.
Geologists, अध्ययन अधिक of an applied science than a theoretical one, must approach Geology using भौतिकी, रसायन and जीवविज्ञान as well as other sciences.
geologists, compared to scientists सगाई in अन्य fields, हैं generally अधिक exposed to the outdoors than staying in laboratories ; हालांकि some geologists prefer to perform सबसे of उनके studies in the lab.
Geologists हैं सगाई in exploration लिये mining companies in ढूंढें of धातुओं, oils, और अन्य Earth संसाधन.
They are also in the forefront of प्राकृतिक जोखिमों और आपदाओं warning और शमन, studying भूकंप, volcanic activity, tsunamis, मौसम तूफ़ान, and the like ; उनके अध्ययन are प्रयुक्त to warn the सामान्य पब्लिक of the occurrence of these कार्यक्रम.
Currently, geologists हैं also engaged in the discussion of climate बदलें, as वे पढ़ाई the history and प्रमाण for इस Earth process.

Modern वैक्यूम tubes, ज़्यादातर miniature style
In इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स, a वैक्यूम ट्यूब, electron tube ( in North अमेरिका ), thermionic वाल्व, ट्यूब, or वाल्व is a यंत्र controlling इलेक्ट्रिक current through a vacuum in a sealed container.
the संग्राहक is often पतला transparent कांच in a roughly cylindrical shape.
the सरलतम vacuum ट्यूब, the डायोड, is essentially an incandescent light bulb साथ an added electrode inside.
जब the बल्ब 's filament is heated white-hot, electrons are `` boiled '' बंद इसके surface and into the vacuum अंदर the बल्ब.
If the electrode -- पुकारा a `` थाली '' or `` धनाग्र '' -- is made more धनात्मक than the hot filament, a direct current flows through the वैक्यूम to the electrode ( a demonstration of the Edison effect ).
as the current only flows in one दिशा, it makes it संभावित to convert an प्रत्यावर्ती current applied to the filament to सीधा वर्तमान.
the परिचय of a तीसरा एलेक्ट्रोड, a grid between the filament and the थाली, yields another function.
A वोल्टेज applied to the grid controls the current बहती इससे the फिलामेंट to the plate.
Thus, it allows the device to be प्रयुक्त as an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक amplifier.
Vacuum tubes हैं thus प्रयुक्त लिये rectification, प्रवर्धन, switching, or similar processing or creation of विद्युत सिग्नल.
the vast बहुमत of modern दिन tubes consist of a sealed संग्राहक साथ a वैक्यूम अंदर, और essentially rely on तापायनिक उत्सर्जन of electrons from a hot filament or a cathode heated by the filament.
कुछ exceptions to इस are dealt with in the section about gas-filled tubes below.
Vacuum tubes were critical to the विकास of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक प्रौद्योगिकी, which drove the विस्तार and commercialization of रेडियो broadcasting, television, radar, sound reinforcement, ध्वनि recording और reproduction, large टेलीफोन संजाल, analog and digital computers, और औद्योगिक process control.
हालांकि कुछ applications था counterparts using पहले technologies ऐसे as the spark गैप ट्रांसमीटर or mechanical कंप्यूटर, it थी the invention of the वैक्यूम tube साथ three electrodes ( called a triode ) and इसके capability of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक प्रवर्धन that बना these technologies widespread and व्यावहारिक.
in most अनुप्रयोग, solid-state devices such as transistors और अन्य सेमीकंडक्टर devices have replaced tubes.
solid-state devices last longer और are smaller, more कुशल, अधिक विश्वसनीय, और cheaper than tubes.
Tubes can be नाजुक, sometimes generate significant unwanted ऊष्मा, और can लो अनेक seconds—many मिनट्स in critical applications—after powering on to गरम to a तापमान जहाँ वे perform within operational tolerance.
However, tubes स्टिल find uses जहाँ solid-state डिवाइस have not been developed, are impractical, or जहाँ a tube रै superior performance, as with some डिवाइस in professional audio और high-power रेडियो ट्रांसमीटरों.
tubes हैं still उत्पादित लिये such अनुप्रयोग.
tubes हैं less संभावित than semiconductor devices to be नष्ट by the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक पल्स produced by नाभिकीय explosions and geomagnetic storms produced by दानव सौर flares.
Skittles is a ब्रांड of fruit-flavoured मिठाई, फिलहाल produced and marketed by the Wm. Wrigley jr. कम्पनी, a प्रभाग of मंगल, inc.
वे have मुश्किल शुगर शेल which carry the letter s.
the अंदर is mainly sugar, मकई syrup, और hydrogenated palm kernel आयल साथ with फल juice, साइट्रिक एसिड, और प्राकृतिक और artificial flavours.
the confectionery has been बेची in a variety of flavour संग्रहण, ऐसे as तीव्र और जंगली बेरी.
Sir विंस्टन Leonard Spencer-Churchill, ( 30 नवम्बर 1874 – 24 जनवरी 1965 ) थी a अंग्रेजों राजनेता जो was the Prime मंत्री of the United Kingdom from 1940 to 1945 and again from 1951 to 1955.
widely regarded as एक of the greatest wartime leaders of the 20th सदी, चर्चिल थी also an अधिकारी in the British फौज, a इतिहासकार, a writer, और an artist.
he is the only अंग्रेजों प्रधान मंत्री in history to have received the Nobel Prize in साहित्य, और थी भी the पहला व्यक्ति to be made an Honorary Citizen of the United States.
चर्चिल was born into an aristocratic परिवार as the grandson of the 7th Duke of Marlborough.
उसके पिता, Lord Randolph Churchill, थी a charismatic राजनेता जो served as Chancellor of the Exchequer ; उसके mother, jennie Jerome, थी an अमरीकी socialite.
As a young फौज officer, he देखी action in अंग्रेजों इण्डिया, The Sudan, और the दूसरी Boer War.
He gained fame as a war correspondent and wrote books about his campaigns.
at the forefront of राजनीती लिये पचास years, he आयोजित अनेक राजनैतिक और cabinet positions.
Before the पहला संसार युद्ध, he परोसा as President of the Board of Trade, घर Secretary, and First Lord of the Admiralty as भाग of the Asquith Liberal सरकारी.
दौरान the युद्ध, he जारी as First रब of the admiralty जबतक the disastrous gallipoli अभियान caused his departure from सरकारी.
he तब briefly resumed क्रियाशील फौज सेवा on the Western Front as कमांडर of the 6th बटालियन of the royal Scots fusiliers.
he returned to सरकारी as मंत्री of munitions, Secretary of State लिये War, और सचिव of State लिये Air.
बाद the युद्ध, चर्चिल परोसा as Chancellor of the exchequer in the रूढ़िवादी ( baldwin ) सरकारी of 1924–29, controversially returning the pound स्टर्लिंग in 1925 to the सुनहरा standard at इसके pre-war पैरिटी, a move widely seen as बनाना deflationary दबाव on the uk economy.
Also विवादास्पद was उसके विपक्ष to increased घर rule for India and उसके प्रतिरोध to the 1936 abdication of एडवर्ड viii.
Out of office and नीतियां `` in the wilderness '' during the 1930s, Churchill took the lead in चेतावनी परिचय Nazi Germany और in campaigning for rearmament.
On the outbreak of the दूसरी संसार युद्ध, he थी again नियुक्त पहला रब of the admiralty.
following the resignation of Neville Chamberlain on 10 May 1940, चर्चिल became प्रधान Minister.
उसके steadfast refusal to consider defeat, surrender, or a compromise सलाम helped inspire अंग्रेजों resistance, विशेषकर during the मुश्किल जल्दी days of the युद्ध when Britain stood alone among यूरोपीय देशों in its क्रियाशील विपक्ष to Adolf हिटलर.
Churchill was विशेषकर noted लिये his speeches and radio broadcasts, which helped inspire the अंग्रेजों people.
he led ब्रिटेन as Prime Minister until victory over Nazi जर्मनी had महरूम secured.
After the रूढ़िवादी Party lost the 1945 चुनाव, he became Leader of the Opposition to the Labour ( Attlee ) government.
बाद जीतना the 1951 election, he again became Prime Minister, before retiring in 1955.
Upon उसके मौत, Elizabeth II granted him the इज्ज़त of a राज्य funeral, which saw एक of the largest सभाओं of world statesmen in इतिहास.
नामित the Greatest Briton of सब समय in a 2002 poll, Churchill is widely regarded as होने among the सबसे influential people in अंग्रेजों इतिहास.

घाट began बिक्री of the Focus to यूरोपीय in जुलाई 1998 and in उत्तर अमेरिका during 1999 लिये the 2000 मॉडल year.
In यूरोपीय, दक्षिण अमेरिका, उत्तर America और South Africa, the फ़ोकस replaced the विभिन्न संस्करण of the Ford Escort बेची in those markets.
In Asia and australasia, it replaced the Ford लेज़र.

An agar थाली -- an example of a बैक्टीरियल growth मीडियम.
specifically, it is a streak थाली ; the orange lines और dots हैं formed by bacterial colonies.
A growth मीडियम or culture medium is a द्रव or gel designed to support the विकास of microorganisms or cells, or small पौधे like the मॉस Physcomitrella patens.
There are different types of media for growing different प्रकार of कोशिकाएं.
There are two major प्रकार of growth media : those used for cell culture, जिससे use specific cell types निकला इससे पौधे or पशु, और microbiological culture, जिससे हैं प्रयुक्त लिये growing microorganisms, ऐसे as जीवाणु or खमीर.
the most आम विकास मीडिया लिये microorganisms हैं nutrient broths और आगर plates ; specialized मीडिया हैं sometimes required लिये microorganism और cell संस्कृति विकास.
कुछ जीवों, termed सुकुमार organisms, आवश्यकता specialized environments due to जटिल nutritional आवश्यकताएँ.
वाइरस, for example, are obligate intracellular परजीवी और require a growth मीडियम containing living कोशिकाएं.
A talent एजेंट, or बुकिंग agent, is a व्यक्ति जो पाता कार्य लिये अभिनेताओं, authors, film directors, musicians, models, producers, professional एथलीट, लेखक और अन्य people in various entertainment businesses.
An agent also defends, supports और promotes the ब्याज of his/her clients.
Agents can नहीं उपज their own shows due to विरोध of interest.
A talent एजेंट must be familiar साथ उनके क्लाइंट.
an agent रै to know what kind of work the क्लाएंट can and can not do in अनुक्रम to match उन्हें with विभिन्न jobs.
Having an एजेंट is नहीं required, but करता सहायता the artist in getting jobs.
in many मामले ढलाई निर्देशकों, or other व्यवसायों, go to talent agencies to ढूँढें कलाकारों वे हैं looking लिये.
the agent is paid a percentage of the स्टार 's earnings ( typically 10 % ).
एजेंटों sometimes होगा be referred to as `` 10 percenters. ''
There are अलग regulations कि govern different प्रकार of एजेंटों कि हैं established by artist 's संघ and the legal क्षेत्राधिकार in which the एजेंट operates.
There हैं भी पेशेवर organizations that अनुज्ञा talent agencies.
चूंकि the मनाही in viewership in theaters, इससे the 1950s to 1960s, this caused a स्मारकीय shift in कैसा studios would produce films and thus reducing the लागत of विशेष and expensive actors.
Actors और अभिनेत्रियों यहूद working for the studios but यहूद not स्वामित्व by एक major studio entity और so were समर्थ to work on within उनके समय and साथ अन्य studios.
Because of इस, agents यहूद now देखी as a necessity instead of an option.
Agents now became third parties that negotiated between studios और clients, this making their सेवाएं imperative between प्रत्येक पार्टी.
Since हुनर एजेंसियों are working with lucrative contracts, all talent एजेंसियों must be licensed under खास sections of the California Labor Code, which काल्स an एजेंट a `` व्यक्ति or corporation who engages in the occupation of procuring, offering, होनहार, or attempting to procure नियुक्ति लिये कलाकार or artists. ''
मंगल has two known moons, phobos and Deimos, which हैं thought to be captured asteroids.
Both satellites were discovered in 1877 by Asaph हॉल and हैं नामित बाद the characters phobos ( panic/fear ) and Deimos ( terror/dread ) who, in यूनानी mythology, accompanied their पिता एरीस, परमेश्वर of युद्ध, into बैटल.
Ares थी ज्ञात as मंगल to the romans.
it is possible कि मंगल may have moons smaller than 50 - 100 meters और a धूल रिंग between phobos and deimos may be present but none have महरूम खोजा.
In law प्रवर्तन parlance, the term हत्या book refers to the मामला संचिका of a murder investigation.
Typically, murder किताबे शामिल crime झाँकी छायाचित्र and sketches, autopsy और forensic reports, transcripts of जांचकर्ताओं ' notes और witness interviews.
The murder book encapsulates the पूरा paper ट्रेल of a murder investigation, from the समय the murder is first reported through the arrest of a suspect.
विधि enforcement agencies typically गार्ड murder किताबे carefully, and it is unusual for civilians to be given unfettered अभिगम to ये kinds of records, especially for unsolved मामले.
A melon baller
melon गेंदें हैं balls of melon बना using a melon baller कि varies इससे around 1 centimeter to 3 centimeters ( परिचय 3/8 इंच to 1 इंच ).
They are generally used in फल सलाद.
a ksa, or Knowledge, Skills, और abilities, is a series of narrative statements that हैं जरूरी जब applying to United राज्य संघीय government job openings.
ksas हैं used to determine, along with resumes, who the बेहतरीन आवेदकों हैं जब अनेक candidates qualify for a job.
The ज्ञान, skills और abilities ( ksas ) necessary लिये the कामयाब प्रदर्शन of a position हैं contained on each जॉब रिक्ति घोषणा.
In 2009 the दफ्तर of निजी प्रबन्धन पूछा संघीय एजेंसियों to रोकें requiring job applicants to भरण आउट the questionnaires, to be phased out within a year.
KSAs हैं ब्रैड और केन्द्रित essays परिचय एक 's करियर and educational background कि presumably qualify एक to perform the कर्तव्य of the स्थिति being applied for.
a knowledge, कौशल, और abilities ( ksa ) is a संक्षिप्त निबन्ध परिचय one 's हुनर और expertise और related अनुभवों ( कार्य, education, स्वयंसेवी ) and accomplishments.
a series of ksa कथन हैं प्रायः required जब applying for सबसे federal government और कुछ state और नगर government कार्य.
KSAs हैं used as a yardstick to assess the सामर्थ्य of a prospective आवेदक in शर्तें of likely क्षमता to perform the duties of the जॉब.
Most सरकारी भर्ती officials look for a short, कुरकुरे and साफ KSA कि emphasizes results or accomplishments obtained in previous कार्य.
ksa statements are भी ज्ञात as Evaluation कारकों.
अन्य agencies sometimes कॉल उन्हें `` Rating Factors '', `` विशेषता रैंकिंग Factors '', `` Knowledge, abilities, skills and Other विशेषताएँ '', or `` Job Elements ''.
The name can be just a name but प्रायः it प्रभाव सामग्री and length of the निबन्ध.
प्रत्येक agency has its own regulations but most of the समय the प्रत्येक KSA फ़ैक्टर should be 1/2 to 11⁄2 pages long.
the नीचे परिभाषाएं हैं defined by the u.S. दफ्तर of Personnel Management :
ज्ञान, कौशल, and Abilities ( KSAs ) - the गुण required to perform a job और are generally demonstrated through qualifying service, education, or training.
ज्ञान - Is a body of information applied सीधे to the प्रदर्शन of a फलन.
Skill - is an observable competence to perform a सीखे psychomotor act.
Ability - Is competence to perform an observable behavior or a बर्ताव कि परिणाम in an observable उत्पाद.
the scoring of KSA essays is based on a scale of इससे एक to 100.
Job applicants must score ऊपर 70 to be माना for the position.
ऊँची स्कोर हैं derived through answering the KSA question as specifically as संभावित, providing उदाहरण इससे previous employment or प्रशिक्षण that clearly demonstrate you मिलें the योग्यता.
When applying to federal government स्थितियाँ, a Federal Resume is usually जरूरी in जोड to KSA statements.

Love सदा is the डेब्यू album of अमरीकी r & b duo K-Ci & JoJo, released on June 17, 1997, by mca रिकॉर्ड.
it थी अंकित at विभिन्न studios in New यॉर्क और the लॉस Angeles क्षेत्रफल in 1996 और 1997.
It थी produced by जोजो and several others, सहित DeVante Swing, जेम्स Mtume, and Jeff redd.
The duo यहूद originally a part of Jodeci पहले this एल्बम.
The एल्बम peaked at छठे on the US बिलबोर्ड 200 और भी appeared on international charts.
The सिंगल `` All my Life `` charted क्रमांक one in multiple देशों, and all four of the एल्बम 's singles peaked above the top 25 in the us Hot r & B/Hip-Hop Songs और the New जीलैंड शीर्ष 40 singles.
Love Always थी प्राप्त favorably by आलोचकों, who praised the भाइयो ' singing क्षमता और the उत्पादन.
The album has been certified तीन टाइम्स platinum by the Recording उद्योग Association of America ( RIAA ) और सुनहरा by म्यूज़िक Canada and IFPI स्वीडन.
as of जून 1999 it था बेची 2.9 लाख नक़ल in the United States.
A variable-rate mortgage, adjustable-rate बंधक ( भुजा ), or ट्रैकर बंधक is a बंधक ऋण साथ the ब्याज rate on the नोट periodically समायोजित based on an index जिससे reflects the cost to the lender of उधार on the क्रेडिट बाज़ार.
the ऋण may be offered at the lender 's standard परिवर्तनीय चूहाe/ आधार rate.
वहीँ may be a सीधा और legally-defined कड़ी to the underlying अनुक्रमणिका, लकिन जहाँ the lender offers no विशिष्ट link to the underlying मार्केट or अनुक्रमणिका the रेट can be changed at the lender 's discretion.
The term `` variable-rate बंधक '' is सबसे आम outside the संयुक्त राज्य, whilst in the संयुक्त States, `` adjustable-rate बंधक '' is सबसे common, और implies a mortgage regulated by the Federal government, with caps on आरोप.
In many countries, समायोज्य rate mortgages are the norm, and in such places, may बस be referred to as mortgages.
among the सबसे आम indices हैं the दरों on 1-year constant-maturity Treasury ( CMT ) प्रतिभूति, the लागत of निधि अनुक्रमणिका ( cofi ), and the London interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ).
A few lenders use उनके own cost of funds as an अनुक्रमणिका, बल्कि than using other indices.
This is done to ensure a steady हाशिया लिये the lender, जिनकी own cost of funding will usually be related to the index.
Consequently, भुगतान made by the borrower may change over समय with the बदलना ब्याज rate ( alternatively, the term of the loan may change ).
इस is पृथक इससे the ग्रैजुएट भुगतान बंधक, which offers changing भुगतान amounts but a फिक्स्ड ब्याज रेट.
अन्य फ़ॉर्म of बंधक loan include the ब्याज only mortgage, the fixed रेट बंधक, the ऋणात्मक amortization mortgage, and the गुब्बारा payment बंधक.
Adjustable rates transfer भाग of the ब्याज रेट रिस्क from the lender to the borrower.
वे can be प्रयुक्त where unpredictable ब्याज दरों make fixed rate लोन difficult to obtain.
the borrower लाभ if the ब्याज रेट falls but loses if the ब्याज rate increases.
The borrower benefits from reduced मार्जिन to the underlying cost of उधार compared to fixed or capped रेट mortgages.
The assassination of रॉबर्ट फ्रांसिस `` Bobby '' कैनेडी, a संयुक्त States Senator और bhai of assassinated अध्यक्ष जॉन fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy, took प्लेस shortly after मध्यरात्रि on जून 5, 1968, in Los एंजिल्स, California, during the अभियान ऋतु for the United States अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, 1968.
After winning the कैलिफ़ोर्निया and South डकोटा प्राथमिक elections लिये the Democratic nomination for President of the संयुक्त राज्य, कैनेडी was शॉट as he walked through the kitchen of the दूत होटल and died in the शुभ Samaritan Hospital twenty-six घंटों बाद.
sirhan Sirhan, a 24-year-old फिलीस्तीनी / Jordanian immigrant, was convicted of कैनेडी 's murder and is सेवारत a life sentence लिये the crime.
Sirhan 's वकील have released कथन claiming प्रमाण कि he was framed.
The शूटिंग थी अंकित on audio टेप by a freelance newspaper reporter, और the aftermath was captured on film.
Kennedy 's देह lay in repose at st. Patrick 's गिरजाघर in नई York for दो दिनों before a funeral द्रव्यमान was held on June 8.
उसके देह थी interred near उसके bhai जॉन at Arlington नेशनल कब्रिस्तान.
उसके मौत prompted the protection of presidential उम्मीदवार by the United States रहस्य सेवा.
ह्यूबर्ट humphrey went on to win the Democratic नामांकन for the presidency, but ultimately narrowly खोया the election to रिचर्ड निक्सन.
As साथ his brother जोकर 's death, Bobby 's assassination और the circumstances surrounding it have शाखित a variety of conspiracy theories.
As of 2013 Kennedy remains एक of तभी दो बैठे United राज्य सीनेटरों to be assassinated ( the अन्य होने Huey Long ).
the Modern आयु of कॉमिक किताबे is an informal name लिये the period in the इतिहास of मुख्यधारा अमरीकी कॉमिक books generally माना to पिछला from the mid-1980s जबतक उपस्थित दिन.
In इस period, कॉमिक book characters generally became गहरा और more psychologically complex, creators became better-known and active in changing the उद्योग, स्वतंत्र comics flourished, और larger प्रकाशन houses became more commercialized.
an alternate नाम for this काल is the अंधेरा आयु of Comic Books, due to the लोकप्रियता और कलाकारी influence of grim शीर्षक, such as और वॉचमेन.
जब हैरी Met सैली... is a 1989 अमरीकी रोमांटिक कॉमेडी फिल्मी लिखा by Nora Ephron and directed by Rob reiner.
it सितारों बिली Crystal as Harry और Meg रयान as Sally.
the स्टोरी फ़ॉलो the शीर्षक वर्ण इससे the समय वे meet बस पहले sharing a cross-country ड्राइव, through twelve सालो or so of chance encounters in नई York नगर.
The फिल्मी raises the question `` Can मेन and महिलाओं ever just be friends ? '' और अग्रिम अनेक ideas about संबंध that became household concepts, ऐसे as those of the `` '' girlfriend and the `` transitional व्यक्ति ''.
the origins of the film आए इससे Reiner 's return to single life बाद a divorce.
An interview Ephron conducted साथ reiner provided the आधार for Harry.
Sally was based on ephron and कुछ of उसके friends.
Crystal आए on फलक and बना उसके own योगदान to the पटकथा, making Harry funnier.
Ephron supplied the ढांचा of the फिल्मी with much of the संवाद आधारित on the real-life friendship between reiner और Crystal.
the साउंडट्रैक consists of मानकों performed by हैरी Connick, jr., साथ a बिग band और ऑर्केस्ट्रा arranged by Marc shaiman.
connick जीती his पहला Grammy Award लिये बेहतरीन Jazz Male Vocal प्रदर्शन.
Columbia Pictures released the फिल्मी using the `` मंच '' तकनीक, जिससे involved खोलने it in a few select cities, letting positive शब्द of मुँह generate ब्याज, and तब gradually expanding distribution over subsequent weeks.
जब Harry मिले सैली... grossed a total of us $ 92.8 लाख in North America.
Ephron received a British अकादमी Film Award, an Oscar nomination, and a Writers गिल्ड of अमेरिका पुरस्कार नामांकन for उसके पटकथा.
The film is ranked 23rd on एएफआई 's 100 सालो... 100 हंसते सूची of the top कॉमेडी films in अमरीकी cinema and क्रमांक 60 on Bravo 's `` 100 funniest Movies ''.
in early 2004, the फिल्मी थी adapted लिये the स्टेज in a उत्पादन starring ल्यूक Perry and alyson Hannigan.

हैमबर्गर Helper is a लकीर of packaged खाना उत्पाद primarily consisting of boxed पास्ता bundled with a packet or packets of powdered sauce or seasonings.
the contents of each box हैं combined साथ browned ground बीफ, जल और मिल्क to बनाएँ a पूरा डिश.
The product लकीर भी सुविधाएँ उत्पाद साथ other starches such as राइस or potatoes बजाय of पास्ता.
It is made by General मिलों.
हालांकि the classic boxed Hamburger हेल्पर products only supply the starch item और the सॉस packets, some varieties of the उत्पाद include ground beef.
These include a frozen food line, जिससे features some of the brand 's classic किस्में in a पूरा भोजन kit form, साथ frozen ground बीफ and frozen sauce packaged separately इससे the noodles in the same थैला.
There is भी an `` तत्काल '' संस्करण of Hamburger Helper containing dehydrated meat, noodles और seasonings in a small थैली, requiring तभी जल to be added.
the Hamburger Helper mascot is the `` Helping हाथ '', an anthropomorphic एनिमेटेड, four fingered left-hand glove, which appears in the product 's television commercials and on the packages.

a बौना planet is a planetary-mass object that is neither a ग्रह nor a satellite.
More explicitly, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Astronomical Union ( iau ) defines a बौना planet as a celestial body in direct कक्षा of the सूर्य that is विशाल पर्याप्त लिये इसके आकार to be controlled by gravitation, but that नापसंद a ग्रह has नहीं साफ इसके orbital region of other objects.
The term बौना ग्रह was अपनाया in 2006 as part of a three-way categorization of bodies orbiting the सूर्य, brought परिचय by an increase in discoveries of trans-neptunian objects that rivaled Pluto in आकार, and finally precipitated by the discovery of an even more massive ऑब्जेक्ट, Eris.
इस वर्गीकरण states कि bodies विशाल पर्याप्त to have साफ the neighbourhood of उनके कक्षा हैं defined as planets, जबकि those कि हैं नहीं विशाल पर्याप्त to be rounded by their अपना गम्भीरता हैं defined as छोटी सौर System लाशें.
बौना ग्रह come in between.
the exclusion of बौना ग्रह इससे the रोस्टर of ग्रह by the IAU has महरूम both praised और criticized ; it थी said to be the `` सही decision '' by Mike भूरा, who discovered and अन्य नई बौना ग्रह, but has महरूम rejected by एलन stern, जो था coined the term dwarf planet in 1990.
The IAU फिलहाल recognizes पाँच dwarf ग्रह in the Solar System :, प्लूटो,,, and.
However, तभी two of ये लाशें, Ceres और प्लूटो, have महरूम observed in पर्याप्त detail to demonstrate कि वे fit the परिभाषा.
Eris has महरूम स्वीकृत as a dwarf planet क्युकी it is more massive than प्लूटो.
The iau subsequently decided कि unnamed trans-neptunian वस्तुएँ with an absolute magnitude brighter than +1 ( and hence a diameter of ≥838 km assuming a geometric ऐल्बीडो of ≤1 ) are to be named अंतर्गत the assumption that they are dwarf planets.
The तभी दो ऐसे वस्तुएँ ज्ञात at the समय, माकेमाके और Haumea, went through इस naming procedure and यहूद declared to be बौना ग्रह.
It is suspected कि another hundred or so ज्ञात objects in the Solar System हैं बौना ग्रह.
Estimates हैं कि up to 200 बौना planets may be found when the entire region known as the kuiper belt is छान, and that the number may exceed 10,000 जब वस्तुएँ बिखरे outside the Kuiper belt are considered.
व्यक्तिगत खगोलशास्त्रियों recognize several of these, और in August 2011 Mike भूरा प्रकाशित a सूची of 390 candidate वस्तुएँ, ranging इससे `` nearly certain '' to `` possible '' बौना planets. '
भूरा identifies नौ known objects – the पाँच accepted by the iau प्लस,,, and – as `` virtually निश्चित '', साथ another दो dozen highly संभावित, and वहीँ हैं probably a सौ or so such वस्तुएँ in total.
the classification of bodies in अन्य planetary प्रणालियों with the विशेषताएँ of dwarf planets has नहीं महरूम addressed.
A डेबिट card ( भी known as a बैंको कार्ड or जाँच card ) is a प्लास्टिक भुगतान कार्ड that provides the cardholder electronic अभिगम to his or उसके bank खाता ( s ) at a financial संस्था.
Some ताश have a भंडारित मान with which a payment is made, while most रिले a message to the cardholder 's bank to withdraw funds इससे a payee 's designated बैंको account.
The कार्ड, where स्वीकृत, can be प्रयुक्त instead of नकदी जब बनाना purchases.
in some मामले, the primary account number is assigned exclusively लिये use on the Internet और वहीँ is no शारीरिक card.
In अनेक countries, the उपयोग of डेबिट ताश has become so फैली that उनके आवाज़ has overtaken or entirely replaced cheques और, in some उदाहरण, नकदी transactions.
The विकास of डेबिट ताश, unlike क्रेडिट ताश और चार्ज ताश, रै generally been देश विशिष्ट resulting in a क्रमांक of different systems around the संसार, which were often incompatible.
चूंकि the mid-2000s, a number of पहलों have allowed debit cards issued in एक country to be used in अन्य countries and allowed their use लिये internet and फोन purchases.
नापसंद क्रेडिट and चार्ज ताश, भुगतान using a debit कार्ड are तत्काल transferred इससे the cardholder 's designated बैंको खाता, बजाय of उन्हें paying the धन वापस at a बाद तिथि.
डेबिट cards usually also allow for तत्काल withdrawal of cash, acting as the ATM card लिये withdrawing नकदी.
Merchants may भी प्रस्ताव cashback facilities to ग्राहक, where a ग्राहक can withdraw नकदी along साथ उनके खरीदें.
francois henri `` Jack '' LaLanne ( सितंबर 26, 1914 - January 23, 2011 ) was an American फ़िटनेस, कसरत, and nutritional expert और प्रेरक स्पीकर जो is sometimes called `` the godfather of fitness '' और the `` first फ़िटनेस सुपरहीरो. ''
He वर्णित himself as होने a `` sugarholic '' और a `` junk खाना junkie '' जबतक he was 15.
he also had behavioral समस्याएं, लकिन `` turned his जीवन around '' बाद सुनना to a पब्लिक lecture by Paul Bragg, a well-known पोषण speaker.
दौरान his career, he आए to मानना कि the देश 's overall health depended on the स्वास्थ्य of इसके population, लिखने कि `` शारीरिक संस्कृति and nutrition — is the मोक्ष of अमेरिका. ''
दशकों before health and fitness began होने प्रचारित by celebrities जैसे जेन Fonda and Richard सीमन्स, lalanne was already widely पहचाना for publicly preaching the स्वास्थ्य लाभ of regular कसरत और a शुभ आहार.
he published numerous books on फ़िटनेस and hosted a फ़िटनेस television show between 1953 and 1985.
As early as 1936, at age 21, he खोली एक of the स्वदेश 's first fitness gyms in ओकलैंड, California, जिससे became a prototype लिये dozens of समान gyms using his name.
One of his 1950s television कसरत programs थी aimed toward महिलाओं, जिसको he भी encouraged to join his health clubs.
he invented a क्रमांक of exercise मशीने, सहित leg-extension and pulley डिवाइस.
Besides producing his अपना श्रेणी of वीडियो, he coached the elderly और disabled नहीं to forgo कसरत, believing it would enable them to बढ़ाएँ their शक्ति.
lalanne also gained recognition लिये उसके कामयाबी as a bodybuilder, as well as लिये his prodigious feats of strength.
अर्नाल्ड श्वार्ज़नेगर once stated, `` कि जोकर lalanne 's an animal !, '' after lalanne, at 54, ताल a 21-year-old श्वार्ज़नेगर `` badly '' in an informal प्रतियोगिता.
On the अवसर of LaLanne 's मौत, श्वार्ज़नेगर credited LaLanne for होने `` an apostle for fitness '' by प्रेरणादायी `` अरबों all over the संसार to live healthier जीवनदान, '' and, as राज्यपाल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, had earlier लगाई उसे on his Governor 's Council on शारीरिक फ़िटनेस.
स्टीव रीव्स credited LaLanne as उसके प्रेरणा to build his muscular physique while keeping a slim कमर.
He थी inducted to the कैलिफ़ोर्निया हॉल of Fame और has a स्टार on the हॉलीवुड Walk of Fame.
Air forces of most of the countries उपयोग प्रणाली similar to Armies.
However, the RAF and the एयर forces of many राष्ट्रमंडल countries, or those formerly under a British influence, use a different नियत of ranks loosely आधारित on naval equivalents ; लेफ्टिनेंट, कमांडर, Captain और Commodore are prefixed लिये एयर फ़ोर्स उपयोग साथ उड़ान, Wing, समूह और Air, क्रमशः ( the पहला three being the units that they प्रयुक्त to कमांड ).
Penélope Cruz Sánchez ( ; born अप्रैल 28, 1974 ) is a स्पेनी अभिनेत्री.
Signed by an agent at आयु 15, she made her एक्टिंग डेब्यू at 16 on टेलीविज़न and उसके विशेषता फिल्मी डेब्यू the following year in jamón, jamón ( 1992 ), to नाजुक acclaim.
उसके subsequent roles in the 1990s और 2000s included खोलें अपना आँखें ( 1997 ), The Hi-Lo देश ( 1999 ), the लड़की of Your सपनो ( 2000 ) और स्त्री on Top ( 2000 ).
Cruz achieved recognition लिये her सीसे roles in the 2001 films Vanilla Sky और Blow.
She रै since built a कामयाब करियर, appearing in films इससे a wide दायरा of जाति, including the कॉमेडी waking up in Reno ( 2002 ), the थ्रिलर Gothika ( 2003 ), the क्रिसमस movie नोएल ( 2004 ), और the कार्रवाई adventure Sahara ( 2005 ).
She रै received नाजुक acclaim for उसके roles in volver ( 2006 ) and नौ ( 2009 ) receiving सुनहरी ग्लोब और अकादमी Award nominations लिये प्रत्येक.
वो won the अकादमी Award लिये बेहतरीन supporting Actress in 2008 लिये विक्की Cristina बार्सिलोना.
वो was the first Spanish actress in history to प्राप्त an Academy Award और the first स्पेनी actress to receive a star at the हॉलीवुड Walk of Fame.
Cruz रै modeled लिये कंपनियाँ ऐसे as आम, ralph Lauren और l'oréal.
पेनेलोपे और उसके younger sister Mónica Cruz have designed items लिये Mango.
वो has दान दोनो उसके समय and धन to धर्मार्थ.
Cruz has volunteered in युगांडा and India, where she spent one week working लिये Mother Teresa ; she donated उसके सैलरी इससे ' to सहायता fund the लेट nun 's mission.
a मोम मूर्तिकला of Cruz will be लगाई in a premier स्पॉट in the Grevin मोम संग्रहालय in पेरिस.
File एक्सप्लोरर, previously known as खिड़कियाँ एक्सप्लोरर, is a file manager अनुप्रयोग and भी a navigation औजार कि is included with releases of the microsoft खिड़कियाँ operating system from Windows 95 onwards.
It provides a आलेखीय user इंटरफ़ेस for accessing the संचिका systems.
it is also the component of the operating प्रणाली that presents अनेक user interface वस्तुएं on the मॉनिटर ऐसे as the taskbar and डेस्कटॉप.
controlling the कंप्यूटर is possible बगैर Windows Explorer running ( for उदाहरण, the File | Run कमांड in कार्य मैनेजर on nt-derived versions of Windows will फलन without it, as will commands typed in a command prompt window ).
स्तिथ in the C : \Windows directory, it is sometimes referred to as the Windows shell, explorer.exe, or बस “explorer”.
the परवाह bears हैं वर्ण निर्मित by अमरीकी बधाई in 1981 for use on ग्रीटिंग ताश.
The असली कलाकृति for the ताश was painted by artist Elena Kucharik.
in 1983, kenner turned the Care Bears into plush टेडी bears.
the परवाह bears appeared in उनके अपना tv specials पुकारा The परवाह bears in the जमीन बगैर जज्बात ( 1983 ) and the परवाह Bears Battle the Freeze यंत्र ( 1984 ).
वे भी था उनके own टेलीविज़न series from 1985 to 1988, in जोड to three विशेषता films : the परवाह bears फिल्म ( 1985 ), Care Bears Movie ii : A New पीढी ( 1986 ), और the परवाह Bears Adventure in वंडरलैंड ( 1987 ).
Each परवाह Bear आता in a different रंग and has a specialized तमगा on इसके belly कि represents its duty और personality.
This तमगा थी ज्ञात as their `` tummy symbol. ''
However, the movie परवाह Bears : Oopsy Does It ! renamed उन्हें `` पेट badges ''.
Adding to the परवाह भालू परिवार हैं the `` परवाह भालू Cousins '', जिससे विशेषता a lion, rabbit, penguin, raccoon, and अन्य ऐसे animals निर्मित in the वही style as the teddy bears.
In 2002, the bears were reintroduced with नई toys.
बना by Play-Along Toys, the new toys offered सुविधाएँ such as illuminated bellies upon touch, aerobic bears, और glow-in-the-dark bears.
as part of this comeback, the Bears have appeared in दो computer-animated movies : Care Bears : यात्रा to joke-a-lot ( 2004 ) and the परवाह bears ' बिग काश फिल्म ( 2005 ).
In 2007, the मताधिकार मनाये its 25th वर्षगांठ ; another relaunch took place, as well as the release of परवाह bears : Oopsy करता It !.
in mid-2011, ag घोषित a पुनरुद्धार tv animated श्रेणी titled `` Care bears : स्वागत to Care-a-Lot ``.
The premiere of the series utilizes `` 30 years of देखभाल ''.
it premiered on The Hub on June 2, 2012.
as of 2013, Care Bears merchandise is स्टिल being marketed.

अंतरराज्यीय 70 ( I-70 ) is an Interstate राजमार्ग in the United States कि runs इससे Interstate 15 near Cove फोर्ट, यूटा, to a पार्क और सवारी near Baltimore, मेरीलैंड.
it was the first अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग प्रोजेक्ट in the संयुक्त States.
i-70 approximately traces the path of u.S. रूट 40 ( और भी the old नेशनल Road ) east of the रॉकी kyu.
West of the Rockies, the route of I-70 थी निकला from multiple स्त्रोत.
I-70 is the fifth longest अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग, after i-90, I-80, I-40, and i-10.
the निर्माण of I-70 in Colorado and Utah is considered an engineering marvel as the रूट गुजरता through the आइज़नहावर Tunnel, Glenwood canyon, and the सैन राफेल Swell.
The आइज़नहावर Tunnel is the highest point साथ the अंतरराज्यीय Highway प्रणाली साथ an elevation of.
The भाग of the interstate in मिसौरी और कान्सास have laid claim to be the पहला interstate in the संयुक्त States.
हालांकि disputed, the संघीय Highway Administration रै claimed the खण्ड of i-70 through Glenwood canyon, completed in 1992, थी the last टुकड़ा of the अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग प्रणाली, as originally नियोजित, to open to traffic.
Photo of 1999 कुल eclipse
as देखी इससे the Earth, a सौर eclipse occurs जब the Moon गुजरता between the Sun और Earth, and the चंद्रमा fully or partially ब्लॉक ( `` occults `` ) the Sun.
This can happen तभी at new चंद्रमा, जब the Sun और the Moon हैं in संयोजन as देखी from Earth in an संरेखण referred to as syzygy.
in a कुल eclipse, the disk of the सूर्य is fully obscured by the Moon.
in partial and annular eclipses only part of the Sun is obscured.
If the चंद्रमा were in a perfectly circular कक्षा, a छोटी closer to the Earth, and in the same कक्षीय plane, वहीँ होता be total सौर eclipses प्रत्येक single month.
however, the Moon 's orbit is inclined ( tilted ) at अधिक than 5 डिग्री to धरती 's orbit around the सूर्य ( see ecliptic ) so its छाया at नई चंद्रमा प्रायः misses धरती.
धरती 's orbit is called the ecliptic plane as the चंद्रमा 's कक्षा must क्रॉस इस प्लेन in order लिये an ग्रहण ( both सौर as well as lunar ) to occur.
in addition, the चंद्रमा 's वास्तविक कक्षा is अंडाकार, often लेने it far पर्याप्त दूर इससे धरती कि इसके apparent size is not large enough to block the Sun totally.
The orbital planes cross each साल at a line of nodes resulting in at least दो, and up to पाँच, सौर eclipses occurring प्रत्येक साल ; no more than two of जिससे can be total eclipses.
however, कुल सौर eclipses हैं rare at any particular स्थान because totality exists only साथ a सीमित path on Earth 's सतह traced by the चंद्रमा 's छाया or umbra.
an ग्रहण is a natural घटना.
Nevertheless, in some ancient और modern संस्कृतियों, solar eclipses have महरूम attributed to supernatural कल्याणकारी or regarded as ख़राब omens.
a कुल solar ग्रहण can be frightening to people who are बेखबर of its खगोलीय स्पष्टीकरण, as the Sun seems to गायब during the day और the sky darkens in a पदार्थ of मिनट्स.
क्युकी it is dangerous to look सीधे at the Sun, observers should use खास eye protection or indirect viewing तकनीकों when viewing a partial eclipse, or the आंशिक phases of a कुल eclipse.
It is सुरक्षित to दृश्य the कुल phase of a total solar ग्रहण साथ the unaided नजर and without सुरक्षा, however.
People referred to as ग्रहण chasers or umbraphiles will travel to रिमोट locations to observe or witness पूर्वानुमानित central सौर eclipses.
a राजनैतिक party ( from, genitive partis, `` भाग '', `` portion '' ) is a राजनैतिक organization that typically seeks to influence, or entirely कंट्रोल, सरकारी policy, usually by nominating candidates साथ aligned राजनैतिक दृश्य and trying to seat them in political office.
पार्टियों participate in electoral campaigns और educational मंगवाने or protest क्रियाएँ.
Parties often espouse an ideology or vision, expressed in a party program, bolstered by a लिखा platform साथ विशिष्ट goals, forming a गठबन्धन among disparate रूचि.
The आम is a मांसल स्टोन fruit belonging to the genus Mangifera, consisting of numerous tropical fruiting पेड़ in the flowering plant परिवार Anacardiaceae.
the आम is native to South Asia, इससे जहाँ it has been वितरित विश्वव्यापी to become one of the most cultivated fruits in the tropics.
While other Mangifera species ( e.g. horse आम, M. foetida ) हैं also grown on a अधिक स्थानीयकृत basis, mangifera इंडिका – the 'common आम ' or 'इण्डियाn mango ' – is the only mango tree commonly cultivated in many tropical और subtropical regions.
it is the नेशनल fruit of India, पाकिस्तानी and Philippines.
In several संस्कृतियों, इसके फल और पत्ते are ritually प्रयुक्त as floral decorations at विवाह, पब्लिक celebrations और religious ceremonies.
Gill arnette byrd, < संदर्भ name > एचटीटीपी : //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/B/ByrdGi00.htm ( born February 20, 1961 in सैन फ्रांसिस्को, कैलिफ़ोर्निया ) is a former पेशेवर अमरीकी football खिलाड़ी.
he थी a दो time Pro Bowl cornerback in 1991 and 1992 for the San डिएगो chargers बाद graduating इससे San जोस State विश्वविद्यालयों.
Byrd was inducted into the Chargers हॉल of कीर्ति in 1998.
he was an all-city कार्यशील back और defensive वापस at Lowell ऊँची School ( San फ्रांसिस्को ), helping to सीसे the Cardinals to the नगर चैंपियनशिप in उसके senior season of 1978.

the Tropic of कर्कट, भी referred to as the Northern tropic, is the वृत्त of latitude on the धरती that marks the सबसे northerly स्थिति at जिससे the सूर्य may appear सीधे ओवरहेड at its zenith.
This इवेंट occurs once per year, at the time of the June संक्रांति, when the Northern Hemisphere is tilted toward the Sun to its maximum extent.
It फिलहाल ( Year 2013 ) lies at 23° 26′ 15.143′′ उत्तर of the equator.
इसके Southern गोलार्ध counterpart, marking the सबसे southerly position at which the Sun may appear सीधे ओवरहेड, is the tropic of Capricorn.
These tropics हैं two of the पाँच प्रमुख उपाधि measures or प्रमुख वृत्त of अक्षांश that चिह्नित मानचित्र of the Earth, besides the आर्कटिक और Antarctic वृत्त and the equator.
the positions of these वृत्त of अक्षांश ( other than the Equator ) हैं लिखवाई by the झुकाव of the Earth 's अक्ष of रोटेशन सापेक्ष to the plane of इसके orbit.
DVD-Video is a consumer video format प्रयुक्त to स्टोर digital video on DVD discs, और is फिलहाल the प्रबल consumer video format in एशिया, उत्तर America, Europe, और ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
discs using the dvd-video specification आवश्यकता a dvd ड्राइव and an H.262/MPEG-2 भाग 2 decoder ( e.g., a dvd player, or a कंप्यूटर dvd ड्राइव with a तन्त्र dvd खिलाड़ी ).
Commercial DVD फिल्मों हैं एनकोडेड using a combination of h.262/mpeg-2 भाग 2 compressed वीडियो and audio of varying स्वरुप ( प्रायः multi-channel स्वरुप as described नीचे ).
typically, the आंकड़ा रेट लिये dvd फिल्मों सीमाएँ from 3 mbit/s to 9.5 mbit/s, and the बिट रेट is usually adaptive.
it was first available लिये खुदरा around 1997.
The DVD-Video specification थी created by DVD Forum and can be obtained from dvd Format/Logo Licensing Corporation लिये a fee of $ 5,000.
The specification is not publicly उपलब्धियाँ, because प्रत्येक सदस्य must sign a non-disclosure अनुबंध.
निश्चित सूचना in the DVD किताब is proprietary and गोपनीय.
In computing और specifically अंतरजाल, a leech is एक जो benefits, usually deliberately, from others ' information or प्रयत्न but करता not offer anything in return, or makes तभी टोकन offerings in an attempt to avoid होने called a leech.
In economics, इस प्रकार of बर्ताव is पुकारा `` फ़्री riding '' और is associated with the free rider प्रॉब्लम.
Depending on context, leeching does नहीं necessarily refer to illegal उपयोग of कंप्यूटर संसाधन, लकिन प्रायः बजाय to greedy उपयोग according to तहज़ीब : to wit, using too much of कया is freely दिए without contributing a reasonable राशि back to the community कि provides it.
The नाम गर्भाशयी from the leech, an animal that झंझट रक्त और then tries to leave unnoticed.
अन्य terms are प्रयुक्त, such as `` freeloader '', लकिन जोंक is the most आम.
the full त्रिभुज logo, used in विभिन्न संस्करण इससे 1970 to 1993.
the United राज्य Postal Service ( usps ), also ज्ञात as the पोस्ट दफ्तर and U.S. Mail, is an स्वतंत्र एजेंसी of the United States संघीय government responsible लिये providing postal सेवा in the United राज्य.
It is one of the few government एजेंसियों explicitly प्राधिकृत by the United States संविधान.
The USPS traces its roots to 1775 during the Second Continental Congress, where Benjamin फ्रैंकलिन थी नियुक्त the पहला postmaster general.
the cabinet-level पोस्ट Office विभाग was निर्मित in 1792 from Franklin 's operation और transformed into its current form in 1971 under the Postal reorganization अधिनियम.
The usps employs over 574,000 workers और operates over 260,000 वाहनों.
The USPS is the operator of the largest गाडी बेड़े in the world.
the USPS is legally obligated to serve all अमेरिकी, regardless of भूगोल, at वर्दी price और quality.
The USPS रै exclusive access to अक्षर boxes marked `` u.S. मेल '' and personal letterboxes in the United States, but स्टिल competes विरूद्ध private पैकेज डिलीवरी सेवाएं, ऐसे as UPS और FedEx.
The USPS has नहीं सीधे received taxpayer-dollars चूंकि the early 1980s साथ the minor exception of subsidies लिये लागत associated with the disabled and overseas voters.
चूंकि the 2006 all-time peak मेल volume, बाद which Congress passed the डाक जवाबदेही and Enhancement Act ``, ( which mandated $ 5.5 billion per year to be paid into an खाता to pre-fund retiree health-care, 75 years into the future, a आवश्यकता अद्वितीय among संगठन और businesses in the U.S. ), आय dropped sharply due to recession-influenced declining mail volume, prompting the डाक सेवा to dekh to other sources of आय जबकि कटिंग लागत to reduce its बजट deficit.
वॉशिंगटन, D.C. has been the capital of the United राज्य चूंकि 1800.
आठ अन्य cities have served as the बैठक place लिये कॉंग्रेस and are therefore माना to have once महरूम the पूंजी of the United राज्य.
in जोड, each of the 50 U.S. राज्य और the five प्रिंसिपल territories of the United States maintains इसके अपना पूंजी.
Princess cut diamond नियत in a ring
The राजकुमारी काटें is the second सबसे लोकप्रिय काटें shape for diamonds, अगला to a round शानदार.
the face-up shape of the राजकुमारी काटें is square or rectangular and the प्रोफ़ाइल or side-on आकार is समान to that of an inverted पिरामिड साथ चार beveled sides.
The राजकुमारी काटें is a relatively new diamond काटें, having been created in the 1960s.
it has gained in लोकप्रियता in हाल years as a more distinctive alternative to the अधिक लोकप्रिय round brilliant cut, in which the शीर्ष of diamond, called the क्राउन, is cut with a गोलाकार face-up shape और the bottom, called the pavilion, is तराशा समान to a कोन.
a राजकुमारी cut साथ the वही width as the diameter of a round शानदार will तौल अधिक as it रै four किनारे जिससे would otherwise have been cut बंद और rounded to form a गोलाकार शानदार.
the राजकुमारी काटें is sometimes referred to as a square modified brilliant.
however, while displaying the वही high degree of brilliance, its faceting स्टाइल is अद्वितीय and completely different इससे that of a round brilliant.
The राजकुमारी cut had इसके origins in the early `` फ्रेंच '' cut, having a step-modified `` double-french '' or `` क्रॉस '' cut crown and a श्रेणी of unique, chevron-shaped facets in the pavilion जिससे combine to give a पृथक cross-shaped reflection when the स्टोन is viewed directly through the तालिका.
effectively, the Princess काटें combines the ऊँची degree of लाइट वापसी of a round शानदार काटें with a distinctive square or आयताकार आकार.
the square princess काटें डायमंड is प्रायः थोड़ा सस्ता than गोलाकार brilliant cut diamonds of the वही carat weight क्युकी it retains परिचय 80 % of the अशिष्ट डायमंड, as opposed to the round शानदार जिससे retains तभी about 50 % of the rough.
The क्षमता to retain अधिक क्रिस्टल वज़न makes इस आकार लोकप्रिय amongst diamond cutters.
accredited Gem Appraisers ( AGA ) and American gem Society Laboratory ( AGSL ) और European gem Laboratories-USA ( egl-usa ) are currently the तभी labs that ग्रेड the राजकुमारी काटें for cut.
There is no universal परिभाषा of कया measurements मेक an ideal princess काटें diamond and many डायमंड manufacturers मार्केट ideal ईंट with differing facet पैटर्न और कोण as `` ideal cut ''.
In contrast to the agsl, AGA, and egl-usa the Gemological संस्थान of America ( GIA ) रै stated कि there is नहीं पर्याप्त उद्योग सर्वसम्मति or अनुभवजन्य आंकड़ा to specify cut ग्रेडिंग मानकों लिये Princess cut ईंट and to do so is at the रिस्क of consumers जो may be धोखे by ईंट accompanied by unqualified Ideal or Excellent cut grades.
the name `` Princess काटें '' थी originally प्रयुक्त in कनेक्शन साथ another डायमंड cut, otherwise known as the `` प्रोफ़ाइल '' काटें, designed by Arpad nagy, a London कटर, in 1961.
The वही name was बाद used और बना popular by ygal पर्लमैन, Betzalel Ambar, and Israel itzkowitz in Israel in 1979.
a समान काटें with only 49 facets, as opposed to the original 58 facets of the राजकुमारी cut, was बाद ब्रांडेड the `` Quadrillion '' and initially distributed by ambar Diamonds in Los Angeles.
तीन years of ऑप्टिकल शोध yielded a square stone with faceting समान to that of a गोलाकार brilliant काटें डायमंड.
a तुलना
the क्रमांक of chevrons can affect the overall outlook of a राजकुमारी cut डायमंड.
इस can usually be संकल्पित by the तार diagram कि is plotted in डायमंड grading reports.
By adding अधिक chevrons on the pavilion पक्ष of the diamond, the individual facets of the diamond होगा अभी be broken bas into छोटी facets.
As a परिणाम, it can give a princess काटें डायमंड a `` crushed बर्फ '' look.
वाइस versa, when a राजकुमारी काटें diamond रै lesser chevrons, it tends to दे the diamond a चंकी आउटलुक due to broader facets.
the घरेलू dog ( Canis lupus familiaris ) is a subspecies of the gray wolf ( Canis lupus ), a सदस्य of the कैनिडाए परिवार of the mammalian अनुक्रम carnivora.
the term `` घरेलू श्वान '' is generally प्रयुक्त लिये दोनो domesticated and feral varieties.
the श्वान has been the first एनिमल to be domesticated and has महरूम the सबसे widely kept working, शिकार, और पालतु एनिमल in human history.
the word `` श्वान '' may also औसत the पुरूष of a canine species, as opposed to the word `` bitch '' for the मादा of the प्रजाति.
MtDNA evidence shows an विकासवादी विभाजित between the आधुनिक श्वान 's lineage and the modern भेड़िया 's lineage around 100,000 सालो ago but,, the oldest चट्टान specimens genetically linked to the modern dog 's lineage तिथि to approximately 33,000-36,000 सालो पहले.
कुत्तो ' value to early human hunter-gatherers led to उन्हें जल्दी becoming ubiquitous across संसार संस्कृतियों.
कुत्तो perform अनेक roles for people, ऐसे as शिकार, herding, pulling loads, सुरक्षा, assisting पुलिस और सैन्य, companionship, and, अधिक recently, aiding handicapped individuals.
This impact on इंसान समाज has given उन्हें the उपनाम `` man 's बेहतरीन dost '' in the पश्चिमी संसार.
in कुछ संस्कृतियों, कुत्तो are also a source of मांस.
in 2001, वहीँ were अनुमानित to be 400 million dogs in the world.
Most breeds of कुत्तो हैं at सबसे a few सौ years बूढ़ा, having महरूम artificially चयनित लिये particular morphologies और व्यवहार by लोगों for विशिष्ट कार्यात्मक भूमिकाएँ.
Through इस चयनात्मक प्रजनन, the श्वान रै developed into hundreds of varied breeds, and shows अधिक behavioral and morphological विभिन्नता than any अन्य land mammal.
लिये example, height measured to the withers ranges from in the Chihuahua to about in the आयरिश wolfhound ; color varies इससे श्वेत through grays ( usually called `` ब्लू '' ) to ब्लैक, and भूरा इससे लाइट ( tan ) to अंधेरा ( `` रेड '' or `` chocolate '' ) in a चौड़ी विभिन्नता of पैटर्न ; coats can be छोटी or long, coarse-haired to wool-like, straight, घुंघराले, or smooth.
it is आम for most breeds to शेड this coat.
आरेख of a हस्तांतरण electron microscope
a 1973 siemens इलेक्ट्रॉन microscope, musée देस कला et Métiers, पेरिस
An electron सूक्ष्मदर्शी ( EM ) is a प्रकार of सूक्ष्मदर्शी कि उपयोग an इलेक्ट्रॉन beam to illuminate a specimen and produce a magnified चित्र.
an em has वृहद resolving power than a light microscope and can खुलासा the ढांचा of छोटी objects because electrons have wavelengths परिचय 100,000 टाइम्स shorter than visible light photons.
वे can achieve बेहतर than 50 pm रेज़ोल्यूशन और magnifications of up to about 10,000,000x whereas ordinary, non-confocal light microscopes are limited by diffraction to परिचय 200 nm रेज़ोल्यूशन और उपयोगी magnifications नीचे 2000x.
the electron सूक्ष्मदर्शी uses electrostatic and electromagnetic lenses to control the electron बीम और focus it to form an image.
ये electron ऑप्टिकल lenses are analogous to the कांच lenses of a लाइट ऑप्टिकल सूक्ष्मदर्शी.
Electron microscopes are प्रयुक्त to investigate the ultrastructure of a चौड़ी दायरा of biological और अकार्बनिक नमूनों सहित microorganisms, cells, large molecules, biopsy samples, metals, and crystals.
Industrially, the electron microscope is प्रायः प्रयुक्त लिये विशेषता कंट्रोल और failure analysis.
Modern electron microscopes उपज इलेक्ट्रॉन micrographs, using specialized digital cameras or फ़्रेम grabbers to capture the image.
Popeyes Louisiana रसोईघर is a कड़ी of fried chicken fast खाना रेस्तरां founded in 1972 in New ऑरलियन्स, louisiana.
Often referred to as popeyes और sometimes as popeyes Chicken & Biscuits or Popeyes Chicken & seafood, it थी acquired by sandy स्रोतों, जॉर्जिया -based afc Enterprises, originally अमेरिका 's Favorite मुर्गा कम्पनी, in 1993.
according to a company दबायें रिलीज dated जून 29, 2007, popeyes is the second-largest `` quick-service chicken रेस्तरां group, measured by क्रमांक of units '', साथ अधिक than 1,800 रेस्तरां in more than 40 राज्य and the ज़िला of Columbia, और over 22 countries विश्वव्यापी including तुर्कों, Northern Cyprus, Bahrain, China, हांग Kong, इराकी, इंडोनेशिया, जॉर्डन, कुवैत, संयुक्त Arab Emirates, Japan, Malaysia, Saudi अरब, South कोरियाई, सिंगापुर, कनाडा, जमैका, गुयाना, सूरीनाम, मैक्सिको, त्रिनिदाद, प्यूर्टो Rico, होंडुरास, वियतनाम, पनामा, पेरू, और Costa Rica.
परिचय तीस स्थितियाँ हैं company-owned, the बाकी franchised.
the leg दबायें is a weight training exercise in जिससे the व्यक्तिगत pushes a वज़न or resistance दूर from उन्हें using उनके टाँगे.
The पद leg दबायें भी refers to the apparatus प्रयुक्त to perform इस कसरत.
the लेग press can be प्रयुक्त to evaluate an athlete 's overall lower देह strength ( from knee संयुक्त to hip ).
using the diagonal sled-type लेग press machine.
वहीँ हैं दो प्रमुख types of लेग press:
the तिर्यक or लंबवत 'sled ' प्रकार leg press.
Weight disks ( plates ) हैं संलग्न सीधे to the sled, which is आरोहित on rails.
the उपयोक्ता sits below the sled और pushes it upward with उनके फीट.
These मशीने normally include adjustable safety कोष्ठक that prevent the उपयोक्ता इससे being trapped अंतर्गत the वज़न.
the 'cable ' प्रकार लेग press, or 'seated लेग दबायें ', commonly मिला on multigyms.
The user sits कतरा और pushes forward साथ their फीट onto a plate that is संलग्न to the वज़न stack by अर्थात् of a long steel cable.
वेन्डी विलियम्स शिकारी ( born वेन्डी Joan Williams ; जुलाई 18, 1964 ) is an अमरीकी मीडिया व्यक्तित्व, अभिनेत्री और लेखक.
She hosts a syndicated television बात show, the वेन्डी विलियम्स दिखाएँ.
Prior to television, Williams was a `` shock jockette `` on several रेडियो shows.
Williams has gained notoriety for her on-air spats साथ celebrities.
वो थी the subject of the 2006 VH1 reality tv श्रेणी पुकारा the Wendy विलियम्स अनुभव which broadcast कार्यक्रम surrounding उसके रेडियो show.
वो has written an autobiography and अनेक अन्य किताबे, और रै created a उत्पाद लकीर called Adorn by वेन्डी विलियम्स.
पैट्रिक Henry `` देशद्रोह '' वाक पहले the House of Burgesses in an 1851 painting by पीटर F. rothermel
`` Give me स्वतंत्रता, or give me death ! '' is a quotation attributed to Patrick हेनरी from a speech he बना to the वर्जिनिया सम्मेलन.
On that day, at st. John 's Church in रिचमंड, Virginia, और is credited with having swung the संतुलन in convincing the Virginia हाउस of Burgesses to pass a रेज़ोल्यूशन delivering the Virginia troops to the Revolutionary War.
among the delegates to the convention यहूद future US Presidents थामस जेफरसन and George वॉशिंगटन.
Newfoundland और Labrador (, locally ) is the easternmost province of कनाडा.
situated in the country 's अटलांटिक region, it incorporates the island of Newfoundland and मेनलैंड labrador to the उत्तरपश्चिम, with a combined क्षेत्रफल of.
In 2011, the province 's जनसांख्यिकी was 514,536.
Approximately 92 प्रतिशत of the प्रांत 's population lives on the Island of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड ( सहित its संबद्ध छोटी islands ), of जिससे more than हाफ live on the avalon Peninsula.
the प्रांत is कनाडा 's सबसे linguistically homogenous, with 97.6 % of निवासियों reporting अंग्रेज़ी ( न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड English ) as उनके mother tongue in the 2006 जनसांख्यिकी ;.
Historically, Newfoundland was भी घर to अद्वितीय किस्में of फ्रेंच, and आयरिश, as खूब as the now-extinct beothuk भाषा.
In labrador, लोकल dialects of innu-aimun और Inuktitut are also spoken.
न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड and labrador 's capital और largest city, St. जॉन 's, is कनाडा 's 20th-largest Census Metropolitan Area, और is home to लगभग 40 प्रतिशत of the province 's जनसांख्यिकी.
St. जॉन 's is the seat of सरकारी, home to the हाउस of Assembly of Newfoundland and labrador और the उच्चतम अदालत in the क्षेत्राधिकार, the न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और Labrador Court of अपील.
A पूर्व उपनिवेश और डोमिनियन of the United किंगडम, न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और Labrador became the tenth province to enter the Canadian कनफेडरेशन on March 31, 1949, as न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड.
on December 6, 2001, an amendment थी बना to the Constitution of कनाडा to change the प्रांत 's आधिकारिक नाम to Newfoundland और Labrador.
in day-to-day वार्तालाप, however, Canadians generally स्टिल refer to the province itself as न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और to the region on the कनाडाई मेनलैंड as Labrador.
Theodore `` t.r. ''
रूज़वेल्ट, Jr. ( ; अक्तूबर 27, 1858—January 6, 1919 ) थी the 26th President of the United राज्य ( 1901–1909 ).
He is noted लिये उसके exuberant व्यक्तित्व, range of रूचि and achievements, and उसके नेतृत्व of the Progressive गति, as well as his `` काउंटी `` persona और मजबूत masculinity.
he थी a leader of the रिपब्लिकन Party and संस्थापक of the first अवतार of the short-lived Progressive ( `` Bull Moose '' ) Party of 1912.
पहले becoming अध्यक्ष, he held कार्यालयों at the नगर, राज्य, and संघीय स्तर.
रूज़वेल्ट 's achievements as a naturalist, एक्सप्लोरर, hunter, author, और soldier are as much a भाग of his fame as कोई दफ्तर he held as a politician.
Roosevelt was 42 years old जब sworn in as अध्यक्ष of the United राज्य in 1901, making उसे the youngest अध्यक्ष ever ; he ताल आउट the youngest elected अध्यक्ष, जॉन F. Kennedy, by only one year.
Roosevelt was also the पहला of only तीन बैठे राष्ट्रपतियों to have जीती the Nobel सलाम Prize.
the Teddy भालू is named after him, despite his अवमानना लिये being पुकारा `` टेडी ''.
Born into a धनवान परिवार in नई यॉर्क नगर, Roosevelt थी a sickly चाइल्ड who suffered from asthma and stayed at home अध्ययन natural इतिहास.
To overcome उसके physical weakness, he embraced a ज़ोरदार जीवन.
Home-schooled, he became an eager छात्र of प्रकृति.
He attended हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों, where he पढ़ाई biology, boxed and विकसित an interest in नवल अफेयर्स.
in 1881, एक साल आउट of हार्वर्ड, he was elected to the New यॉर्क राज्य सभा, जहाँ he became a नेता of the सुधार गुट of his रिपब्लिकन Party ( the `` gop '' ).
उसके the नवल War of 1812 ( 1882 ) स्थापित his पेशेवर प्रतिष्ठा as a गंभीर historian ; he लिखा numerous किताबे on शिकार, the बाहरी, और वर्तमान political issues, as खूब as frontier history.
in 1884, उसके पहला wife और उसके mother died on the वही day.
He temporarily left politics and गई to the frontier, becoming a rancher in the `` Badlands '' in the dakotas.
Returning to नई York नगर, he भागा लिये महापौर in 1886, finishing third with 60,000 मत.
He बाद gained fame by taking vigorous charge of the नगर police.
at the नेशनल स्तर, he was a नेता in सिविल सेवा सुधार.
The spanish–american युद्ध broke out in 1898 while Roosevelt was, effectively, running the विभाग of the Navy.
he promptly resigned और formed the अशिष्ट Riders – a स्वयंसेवी प्यादे regiment कि fought in Cuba.
the war hero was elected राज्यपाल in 1898 और in 1900 was nominated for वाइस अध्यक्ष.
He सफलतापूर्वक energized the GOP base as a highly दृश्य campaigner to reelect अध्यक्ष William mckinley on a platform of high tariffs, the gold मानक, साम्राज्यवाद, prosperity at घर and विजय विदेश.
In 1901, अध्यक्ष William mckinley was assassinated and रूज़वेल्ट became अध्यक्ष.
he attempted to मूव the Republican पार्टी ( gop ) toward Progressivism, including trust busting and increased विनियमन of व्यवसायों.
रूज़वेल्ट became the first person निर्वाचित to a पद in उसके अपना right in 1904 after having ascended to the Presidency ( from the vice-presidency ) upon the मौत of उसके पूर्ववर्ती, जीतना the largest percentage of the लोकप्रिय vote since the uncontested चुनाव of 1820.
रूज़वेल्ट coined the phrase `` Square Deal `` to describe उसके घरेलू agenda, emphasizing कि the औसत citizen would मिलेंगी a fair share under his policies.
as an outdoorsman और naturalist, he promoted the conservation गति.
On the world स्टेज, Roosevelt 's policies यहूद characterized by his slogan, `` Speak softly और carry a big स्टिक ``.
a cousin is a सापेक्ष साथ whom a व्यक्ति shares one or more आम ancestor ( s ) ( अन्य than a जनक, child/descendant, sibling, child/descendant of a सहोदर, or सहोदर of a parent/ancestor ).
however in आम parlance, `` cousin '' सामान्यतः specifically अर्थात् `` पहला cousin ''.
प्रणालियों of `` डिग्री '' और `` removals '' हैं प्रयुक्त in the english-speaking world to describe the exact relationship between दो cousins ( in the broad sense ) and the पूर्वज they have in आम.
विभिन्न सरकारी entities have established systems for विधिक उपयोग that can more precisely specify kinships with common पूर्वजो मौजूदा any क्रमांक of पीढियां in the पास्ट, हालांकि आम usage प्रायः eliminates the degrees और removals और refers to people with आम ancestry as simply `` distant cousins '' or `` relatives ''.
वेबस्टर is an American situation comedy that aired on एबीसी from सितंबर 16, 1983 जबतक may 8, 1987, and in first-run syndication from September 21, 1987 जबतक March 10, 1989.
the श्रेणी was निर्मित by Stu Silver.
the show stars Emmanuel लुईस in the title भूमिका as a यंग लड़के who, after खोने उसके parents, is अपनाया by his एनएफएल -pro गॉडफादर, portrayed by Alex Karras, and उसके नई socialite बीवी, निभाई by सुसान क्लार्क.
The focus थी largely on how इस impulsively married couple था to समायोजन to their नई जीवनदान and अचानक parenthood, but it थी the अनुकूल वेबस्टर खुद जो drove much of the plot.
The series थी produced by Georgian खाड़ी ltd., Emmanuel Lewis entertainment उद्यमों, Inc. ( 1986-1989 ) और सर्वोपरि टेलीविज़न.
Like एनबीसी 's पहले hit Diff'rent Strokes, वेबस्टर प्रदर्शित a यंग african-american लड़के adopted by a श्वेत परिवार.
Three types of cell division
Cell प्रभाग is the process by जिससे a जनक कोशिका divides into दो or more बेटी कोशिकाएं.
कोशिका division usually occurs as भाग of a larger कोशिका cycle.
in eukaryotes, there हैं two पृथक प्रकार of कोशिका division : a vegetative division, whereby each बेटी cell is genetically एकसमान to the parent cell ( समसूत्रण ), और a reductive कोशिका division, whereby the क्रमांक of गुणसूत्रों in the बेटी कोशिकाएं is घटाया by half, to produce haploid गैमीट ( meiosis ).
दोनो of these कोशिका प्रभाग cycles हैं जरूरी in sexually reproducing जीवों at कुछ पाइंट in उनके life साईकिल, और दोनो are believed to be present in the पिछला eukaryotic common पूर्वज Prokaryotes भी undergo a vegetative कोशिका प्रभाग known as binary fission, where their जेनेटिक सामग्री is segregated equally into two daughter cells.
All कोशिका विभाजन, regardless of सजीव, are preceded by a single गोलाकार of डीएनए replication.
For सरल unicellular जीवों such as the amoeba, one cell division is equivalent to reproduction – an संपूर्ण new organism is निर्मित.
on a larger scale, mitotic cell division can create progeny इससे बहुकोशिकीय जीवों, ऐसे as पौधे कि grow इससे cuttings.
Cell प्रभाग भी enables sexually reproducing organisms to develop from the one-celled zygote, which itself थी उत्पादित by कोशिका division from गैमीट.
और बाद growth, कोशिका प्रभाग allows for continual construction और मरम्मत of the organism.
a human being 's body अनुभवों about 10,000 खरब कोशिका divisions in a आजीवन.
कोशिका division has महरूम modeled by परिमित subdivision rules.
the प्राथमिक concern of cell प्रभाग is the मेंटेनेंस of the original cell 's genome.
Before division can occur, the genomic information that is भंडारित in गुणसूत्रों जरूर be replicated, and the duplicated genome जरूर be अलग cleanly between कोशिकाएं.
A ग्रेट deal of cellular अवसंरचना is involved in keeping genomic information सतत between `` generations ''.
पहाड़ ranges of मैसाचुसेट्स, संयुक्त राज्य.
हावर्ड जोन्स ( born John Howard Jones, 23 February 1955, Southampton, Hampshire, England ) is a अंग्रेजों संगीतकार, सिंगर और songwriter.
According to the Guinness किताब of British hit singles & एल्बम, `` जोन्स is an accomplished singer-songwriter जो थी a regular चार्ट visitor in the mid-1980s with his brand of synthpop.
जोन्स, who थी equally लोकप्रिय in the u.S., appeared at Live Aid ``.
Allmusic journalist, Stephen थामस erlewine adds, `` जोन्स was एक of the धमक आंकड़े of mid-1980s synthpop.
उसके music मिलाया the प्रौद्योगिकी intensive ध्वनि of New वेव with the cheery आशावाद of hippies और late 1960s pop.
जोन्स racked up a string of hits in the मिड and late 1980s, पहले he retreated into being a cult फिगर in the 1990s ''.
the International Isle of Man tt ( पर्यटक Trophy ) रेस is a motorcycle रेसिंग इवेंट held on the Isle of man and was for अनेक सालो the सबसे prestigious motorcycle रेस in the world.
the इवेंट was भाग of the fim मोटरसाइकिल Grand Prix World Championship during the period 1949–1976 पहले होने transferred to the United किंगडम बाद safety चिंताएं and run by the fim as the अंग्रेजों ग्रैंड Prix for the 1977 ऋतु.
the आइल of man tt Races became part of the TT Formula 1 Championship from 1977 to 1990 to preserve the event 's रेसिंग औकात.
From 1989 the रेसिंग has been developed by the आइल of man Department of पर्यटन as the Isle of man TT पर्व.
the race is run in a time-trial format on पब्लिक सड़कें बंद for रेसिंग by the provisions of an अधिनियम of Tynwald ( the पार्लियामेंट of the आइल of man ).
The पहला race थी आयोजित on Tuesday 28 may 1907 और थी called the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Auto-Cycle Tourist Trophy.
the इवेंट was संगठित by the Auto-Cycle क्लबों over 10 गोद of the St John 's छोटी Course of 15 मील 1,470 गज for road-legal touring motorcycles with exhaust silencers, saddles, pedals और mud-guards.
the winner of the single-cylinder class, and overall विजेता of the first event in 1907, थी Charlie Collier सवारी a Matchless motorcycle in a समय of 4 घंटों, 8 minutes and 8 seconds at an average रेस speed of 38.21 mph.
the winner of the twin-cylinder class was rem Fowler riding a Peugeot एंजिन नॉर्टन in a time of 4 घंटों 21 minutes और 52 seconds at an average रेस गति of 36.21 mph.
The ट्रॉफी presented to Charlie Collier as the winner of the 1907 आइल of man TT रेस, थी दान by the Marquis de mouzilly st. मंगल.
It प्रदर्शित a stylised संस्करण of Olympic God hermes by Giovanni da Bologna as a चांदी figurine astride a winged व्हील.
The ट्रॉफी थी similar in design to the 18 कैरेट सुनहरा montague Trophy presented to जॉन नेपियर ( Arrol-Johnston ) as the inaugural विजेता of the Isle of Man पर्यटक Trophy car race in 1905 अभी ज्ञात as the rac Tourist Trophy.
The Marquis de Mouzilly St. Mars Trophy is now प्रस्तुत annually to the winner of the Isle of Man वरिष्ठ TT Motor-Cycle Race.
The 2007 Isle of Man tt was the centenary event which भागा between 26 may and 8 June 2007 और प्रदर्शित a खास Re-enactment of the 1907 आइल of man tt रेस आयोजित on the village green अगला to Tynwald हिल in st John 's on Monday 28 may 2007.
the विंटेज परेड of 100 क्लासिक motorcycles for the Centenary re-enactment on the असली st जॉन 's छोटी Course थी flagged away by former World motor-cycle Champion ज्यॉफ ड्यूक.
the पहला of the भागीदार to be flagged away थी the recently लौटी twin-cylinder Peugeot-Norton ridden by Rem Fowler during the पहला आइल of man TT Race in 1907.
भी participating in the 2007 Re-enactment थी tt race competitor guy Martin सवारी a 1938 Triumph बाघ 100 500 cc और अन्य former TT competitors including एलन Cathcart, सैमी Miller, Nick jefferies and मिक Grant भी समाप्त the re-enactment गोद.

बेरोजगारी ( or joblessness ) occurs जब people हैं without work and actively seeking work.
the बेरोजगारी रेट is a माप of the prevalence of बेरोजगारी and it is calculated as a प्रतिशत by dividing the number of बेरोजगार individuals by all individuals currently in the मजदूर force.
During periods of मंदी, an अर्थव्यवस्था प्रायः experiences a अपेक्षाकृत ऊँची unemployment रेट.
according to अंतरराष्ट्रीय श्रमिक Organization report, अधिक than 197 million लोगों globally are आउट of कार्य or 6 % of the world 's workforce यहूद बगैर a job in 2012.
There remains considerable सैद्धांतिक बहस regarding the causes, consequences and समाधान लिये बेरोजगारी.
शास्त्रीय economics, नई classical अर्थशास्त्र, and the Austrian School of अर्थशास्त्र argue that market mechanisms हैं विश्वसनीय means of resolving बेरोजगारी.
These theories argue against interventions imposed on the मजदूर market from the outside, ऐसे as unionization, न्यूनतम मजदूरी laws, कर, और अन्य regulations कि they अर्जी discourage the hiring of workers.
keynesian अर्थशास्त्र emphasizes the cyclical nature of बेरोजगारी and अनुशंसा government interventions in the economy that it दावा होगा reduce unemployment दौरान recessions.
इस theory focuses on तूल झटके that एकाएक reduce aggregate माँग लिये goods और services और यूँ reduce demand लिये मजदूर.
Keynesian models recommend सरकारी interventions designed to increase demand लिये workers ; these can include वित्तीय stimuli, publicly वित्तपोषित job creation, और expansionist monetary नीतियों.
In addition to these comprehensive theories of unemployment, वहीँ are a few categorizations of unemployment कि are used to more precisely model the effects of बेरोजगारी within the economic प्रणाली.
The main प्रकार of unemployment include संरचनात्मक बेरोजगारी जिससे focuses on संरचनात्मक समस्याएं in the economy और inefficiencies inherent in labour markets, सहित a mismatch between the सप्लाई और माँग of laborers साथ जरुरी कौशल सेट.
संरचनात्मक वितर्क emphasize causes and solutions सम्बन्धित to विघटनकारी technologies and globalization.
चर्चाएँ of frictional बेरोजगारी फ़ोकस on voluntary decisions to कार्य based on प्रत्येक individuals ' valuation of उनके own work and कैसा कि compares to वर्तमान wage rates प्लस the time and प्रयत्न जरूरी to ढूँढें a job.
Causes और solutions for frictional unemployment प्रायः address जॉब entry दहलीज और मजदूरी rates.
Behavioral economists हाइलाइट individual biases in decision बनाना, and often involve समस्याएं and solutions concerning sticky मजदूरी और दक्षता मजदूरी.
Collectivism is any philosophic, राजनैतिक, धार्मिक, आर्थिक, or social outlook that emphasizes the interdependence of every human being in a समाज or civilization.
Collectivism is a basic cultural element that exists as the reverse of व्यक्तिगत in human nature ( in the वही way high कॉन्टेक्स्ट संस्कृति exists as the रिवर्स of low कॉन्टेक्स्ट culture ).
Collectivist orientations stress the importance of cohesion within सोशल समूह ( ऐसे as an `` in-group '', in what specific कॉन्टेक्स्ट it is defined ) and in कुछ cases, the priority of समूह goals over व्यक्तिगत goals.
Collectivists प्रायः focus on community, society, स्वदेश or country.
It has been used as an तत्व in many different और विविध प्रकार of सरकारी और political, आर्थिक और शैक्षणिक तत्त्वज्ञान throughout history and most इंसान समाजों in अभ्यास contain elements of both व्यक्तिगत and collectivism.
कुछ उदाहरण of collectivist संस्कृतियों शामिल इण्डिया और जापानी.
collectivism can be divided into horizontal collectivism and vertical collectivism.
Horizontal collectivism तनावों सामूहिक decision-making among बराबर individuals, and is thus प्रायः based on decentralization and समतावाद.
लंबवत collectivism is आधारित on hierarchical structures of power and on moral और cultural conformity, और is therefore आधारित on centralization और पदानुक्रम.
a सहकारी enterprise would be an उदाहरण of आड़ा collectivism, whereas a military पदानुक्रम होता be an example of लंबवत collectivism.
Acute disseminated encephalomyelitis ( adem ) is an प्रतिरक्षा mediated बीमारी of the brain.
It प्रायः occurs following a viral संक्रमण but may appear following टीकाकरण, bacterial or parasitic संक्रमण, or even appear अनायास.
As it involves असंक्राम्य demyelination, it is समान to multiple sclerosis, और is considered part of the अनेक sclerosis borderline diseases.
The incidence rate is about 8 per 1,000,000 लोगों प्रति साल.
Although it occurs in सब ages, सबसे reported cases हैं in children and adolescents, साथ the average age around 5 to 8 सालो बूढ़ा.
The मृत्यु रेट may be as ऊँची as 5 %, पूरा रिकवरी is देखी in 50 to 75 % of cases, while up to 70 to 90 % recover with कुछ minor अवशेष विकलांगता.
The average time to रिकवर is one to छह months.
ADEM produces अनेक inflammatory lesions in the दिमाग and spinal cord, particularly in the white matter.
प्रायः ये are मिला in the subcortical और सेंट्रल श्वेत matter and cortical gray-white जंक्शन of both cerebral hemispheres, cerebellum, brainstem, और स्पाइनल cord, लकिन periventricular white matter और gray matter of the cortex, thalami and basal ganglia may भी be शामिल.
जब the रोगी पीड़ित अधिक than one demyelinating episode, it is called तूल disseminated encephalomyelitis or multiphasic disseminated encephalomyelitis ( mdem ).
the पेट is a muscular, hollow, dilated part of the पाचन प्रणाली which कृत्यों as an महत्वपूर्ण अंग of the digestive ट्रैक्ट in कुछ पशु, including vertebrates, echinoderms, कीट ( mid-gut ), और molluscs.
it is शामिल in the दूसरी phase of digestion, following mastication ( चबाने ).
The पेट is located between the esophagus and the small आंत.
it secretes protein-digesting एंजाइमों पुकारा protease और दमदार acids to सहायता in food पाचन, ( sent to it via esophageal peristalsis ) through smooth muscular contortions ( पुकारा segmentation ) before sending partially digested food ( chyme ) to the छोटी आंतों.
The word stomach is derived from the Latin stomachus which is निकला from the यूनानी word stomachos ( στόμαχος ), ultimately from stoma ( ), `` मुँह ''.
The words gastro- and gastric ( meaning सम्बन्धित to the stomach ) are दोनो derived इससे the Greek शब्द gaster ( ).

a woodie is a car body स्टाइल, especially a स्टेशन wagon, जहाँ the rear bodywork is constructed of wood फ्रेमवर्क with infill panels of wood or painted मेटल.
After the demise of actual wood construction, manufacturers used अनुकरण woodgrain चादर vinyl—sometimes augmented with three-dimensional, अनुकरण framework—to recall wood construction.
