a pearl is a hard ऑब्जेक्ट produced within the soft tissue ( specifically the mantle ) of a जीना shelled mollusc.
बस जैसे the शेल of a clam, a पर्ल is बना up of कैल्सियम carbonate in minute crystalline form, which has been deposited in केंद्रिय layers.
the आदर्श pearl is perfectly गोलाकार और चिकना, but अनेक other आकार of मोती ( baroque pearls ) occur.
The finest quality natural pearls have been highly valued as gemstones और वस्तुएँ of beauty for many सदियां, and because of this, the word pearl रै become a metaphor लिये something very rare, fine, admirable, और valuable.
the सबसे valuable मोती occur spontaneously in the wild, लकिन वे हैं अत्यधिक rare.
These wild pearls are referred to as natural pearls.
Cultured or farmed मोती from पर्ल oysters and freshwater mussels मेक up the majority of those that हैं फिलहाल sold.
Imitation pearls हैं भी widely बेची in inexpensive jewelry, but the विशेषता of उनके iridescence is usually बहुत poor, and often, कृत्रिम मोती हैं easily distinguished इससे genuine मोती.
Pearls have महरूम harvested and cultivated primarily लिये उपयोग in आभूषण, लकिन in the past they were भी stitched onto lavish clothing.
मोती have also महरूम कुचल और used in cosmetics, दवाइयाँ, and in paint formulations.
Whether जंगली or cultured, gem quality मोती are लगभग always nacreous and, as is the interior of the शेल that produces उन्हें.
however, almost सब species of shelled molluscs are सक्षम of producing pearls ( formally referred to as `` calcareous concretions '' by some sources ) of lesser shine or less गोलाकार shape.
Although these may also be legitimately referred to as `` मोती '' by gemological लैब्स and भी under u.S. संघीय व्यापार Commission नियम, and हैं formed in the वही रास्ता, most of उन्हें have no value, except as curiosities.
Bing ( known previously as Live Search, खिड़कियाँ सजीव Search, और एमएसएन Search ) is a web search इंजन ( advertised as a `` decision इंजन `` ) इससे microsoft.
bing थी unveiled by Microsoft CEO स्टीव Ballmer on may 28, 2009 at the सब Things डिजिटल सम्मेलन in सैन Diego लिये release on June 1.
notable परिवर्तन शामिल the लिस्टिंग of ढूंढें सुझाव while प्रश्नों are डाला and a सूची of related खोज ( called `` Explore फलक '' ) आधारित on semantic प्रौद्योगिकी इससे powerset which microsoft purchased in 2008.
On जुलाई 29, 2009, Microsoft और याहू ! घोषित a सौदे in जिससे bing होता power याहू ! Search.
सब Yahoo ! ढूंढें global customers and partners हैं expected to have made the transition by जल्दी 2012.
in अक्तूबर 2011, bing announced it थी working on new back-end ढूंढें अवसंरचना, with the goal of delivering तेज़ और slightly अधिक relevant search results लिये users.
Known as `` बाघ '', the नई index-serving प्रौद्योगिकी has been incorporated into Bing globally, since August 2011.
In May 2012, bing घोषित another redesign of इसके search इंजन कि includes `` Sidebar '', a सोशल feature कि खोज उपयोक्ता ' सोशल networks लिये information प्रासंगिक to the ढूंढें query.

in अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल, प्रत्येक टोली has ग्यारह खिलाड़ी on the फ़ील्ड at एक time.
The विशिष्ट role that a player takes on the फ़ील्ड is called उनके स्थिति.
Under the आधुनिक rules of American फ़ुटबॉल, teams हैं अनुमत असीमित subsititutions, that is teams may बदलें कोई number of खिलाड़ी बाद कोई खेल.
इस रै resulted in the विकास of three `` platoons '' of players, the ठोकर ( the टोली with the ball, जो is trying to score ), the defense ( the टोली trying to prevent the other team from scoring, and to take the ball from उन्हें ), और the special teams ( who play in kicking परिस्थितियों ).
भीतर those platoons, various विशिष्ट positions exist depending on कया the player 's main जॉब is.
the आयरिश लोगों ( or na hÉireannaigh ; Ulster-Scots : Airish fowk ) हैं an जातीय समूह who originate in आयरलैंड, an island in northwestern Europe.
आयरलैंड has been populated लिये around 9,000 सालो ( according to पुरातत्व studies, see प्रागैतिहासिक Ireland ).
The Irish लोगों 's earliest पूर्वजो are recorded in महापुरूष – they are claimed to be descended इससे groups such as the nemedians, Fomorians, Fir bolg, Tuatha Dé Danann और the milesians.
Lebor gabála Érenn, a book of Irish mythology tells कि Milesians were स्काइथियन वंशजों.
The प्रमुख समूह कि interacted with the Irish in the Middle आयु include the picts, स्कॉट्स, and the Vikings.
due to इस सम्पर्क, icelanders are noted लिये having some Irish descent.
The Anglo-Norman आक्रमण of the High मध्य आयु, the English बागानों and the subsequent English नियम of the देश introduced the Normans और फ्लेमिश into Ireland.
Welsh, Picts, bretons, और छोटी पार्टियों of Gauls और भी anglo-saxons are known in आयरलैंड from much earlier टाइम्स.
There have been अनेक notable आयरिश लोगों throughout इतिहास.
The 6th century आयरिश monk and missionary Columbanus is regarded as one of the `` fathers of यूरोपीय '', followed by kilian of würzburg and vergilius of Salzburg.
The वैज्ञानिक Robert Boyle is माना the `` father of chemistry ``.
प्रसिद्ध Irish explorers include Brendan the नाविक, Robert McClure, अर्नेस्ट Shackleton और Tom Crean.
By some खाते, the पहला European child born in North America had आयरिश descent on दोनो sides ; and an irishman was the first यूरोपीय to नियत foot on अमरीकी मृदा in Columbus ' expedition of 1492.
There are descendants of आयरिश लोगों जीना in many western देशों, particularly in English-speaking देशों.
Historically, emigration has महरूम caused by politics, अकाल and आर्थिक मुद्दे.
An estimated 50 to 80 लाख लोगों हैं descendants of Irish लोगों, primarily in the संयुक्त किंगडम, the United States, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Canada and Iceland ; there are भी छोटी संख्याएँ in Argentina, चिली, Mexico, जमैका, Barbados, दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी, नई Zealand, फ़्रांस, जर्मनी और ब्राज़ील.
the largest number of descendants of Irish people live in the United राज्य.
the number of लोगों जीना in Australia जो are of आयरिश descent is higher, as a percentage of कुल जनसांख्यिकी, than that of any अन्य देश.
लगभग forty प्रतिशत of the उपनिवेश population of आइसलैंड came from Ireland or स्कॉटलैंड.
the बहुत पहला inhabitants of Iceland यहूद Irish.
The Hubble स्पेस दूरदर्शी ( hst ) is a स्पेस telescope that थी carried into कक्षा by a Space Shuttle in 1990 और remains in आपरेशन.
A aperture telescope in कम Earth orbit, हबल 's four प्रमुख यंत्र observe in the निकट पराबैंगनी, दृश्य, and near इन्फ्रारेड.
the दूरदर्शी is नामित after the astronomer एडविन हबल.
हबल 's कक्षा outside the distortion of Earth 's माहौल allows it to take अत्यधिक sharp बिंब साथ लगभग no background light.
हबल 's गहन फ़ील्ड have महरूम some of the सबसे detailed visible-light images कभी, allowing a गहन दृश्य into स्पेस and समय.
अनेक हबल observations have led to breakthroughs in astrophysics, such as accurately determining the रेट of expansion of the universe.
Although नहीं the पहला स्पेस telescope, हबल is one of the largest और most versatile, और is well known as दोनो a vital शोध औजार and a पब्लिक relations बून for खगोलशास्त्र.
the hst was built by the United States स्पेस agency NASA, with योगदान इससे the यूरोपीय Space एजेंसी, और is operated by the स्पेस Telescope Science Institute.
the hst is एक of NASA 's ग्रेट Observatories, साथ with the Compton Gamma Ray वेधशाला, the Chandra x-ray वेधशाला, and the Spitzer स्पेस दूरदर्शी.
स्पेस telescopes यहूद proposed as जल्दी as 1923.
Hubble थी वित्तपोषित in the 1970s, with a proposed लॉन्च in 1983, but the प्रोजेक्ट was घिरा by तकनीकी देरी, budget समस्याएं, and the Challenger disaster.
जब finally launched in 1990, वैज्ञानिकों found कि the main दर्पण था been मैदान incorrectly, compromising the दूरदर्शी 's capabilities.
The दूरदर्शी थी लौटी to its intended quality by a सर्विसिंग mission in 1993.
हबल is the only दूरदर्शी designed to be सर्विस in स्पेस by astronauts.
Between 1993 and 2002, four missions repaired, upgraded, और replaced systems on the दूरदर्शी ; a पांचवां mission थी canceled on सुरक्षा grounds following the Columbia विपत्ति.
However, बाद spirited पब्लिक चर्चा, नासा administrator Mike griffin approved एक final सर्विसिंग मिशन, समाप्त in 2009 by स्पेस Shuttle अटलांटिस.
The telescope is अभी अपेक्षित to फलन जबतक at least 2013.
Its scientific successor, the जेम्स Webb Space दूरदर्शी ( JWST ), is to be launched in 2018 or संभवतः बाद.
anti-inflammatory refers to the property of a substance or treatment कि reduces सूजन.
anti-inflammatory दवाएँ मेक up परिचय हाफ of analgesics, remedying पीड़ा by reducing सूजन as opposed to opioids, which affect the central nervous प्रणाली.
the Tonight Show is a us late-night बात दिखाएँ कि has aired on एनबीसी चूंकि 1954.
it is the longest currently running regularly अनुसूचित entertainment कार्यक्रम in the US and the third longest-running दिखाएँ on एनबीसी बाद मिलें the Press and Today.
The tonight Show थी hosted by Steve एलन ( 1954–1957 ), जोकर paar ( 1957–1962 ), Johnny कार्सन ( 1962–1992 ), Jay लीनो ( 1992–2009, 2010–present ), and Conan O'Brien ( 2009–2010 ).
अनेक अतिथि hosts भी appeared, विशेषकर during the paar और कार्सन eras.
the longest-serving मेजबान to तिथि थी Johnny Carson, जो hosted The Tonight Show Starring जॉनी Carson for 30 सीज़न इससे the पतन of 1962 through the spring of 1992.
The वर्तमान मेजबान of the दिखाएँ is Jay लीनो, जो had previously hosted the show इससे 1992 to 2009 और began उसके दूसरी tenure on कूच 1, 2010.
On April 3, 2013, एनबीसी घोषित Jimmy fallon होता become the नई host of the Tonight Show.
the Tonight Show साथ Jimmy fallon होगा premiere फ़रवरी 24, 2014, the दिन बाद the closing ceremonies of the 2014 Winter ओलंपिक.
ss एंड्रिया Doria.
सुनाया थी an ocean liner for the इतालवी Line ( società di navigazione Italia ) home ported in जेनोआ, Italy, most प्रसिद्ध for its डूब in 1956, जब 52 लोगों died ( 51 from immediate प्रभाव ).
Named after the 16th-century Genoese admiral एंड्रिया डोरिया, the जलयान had a gross पंजीकरण tonnage of 29,100 और a capacity of परिचय 1,200 passengers and 500 crew.
For a देश attempting to rebuild इसके economy and प्रतिष्ठा after World War ii, Andrea Doria थी an icon of इतालवी national अभिमान.
Of सब Italy 's ships at the time, Andrea डोरिया थी the largest, fastest and supposedly safest.
शुभारम्भ on 16 जून 1951, the जलयान undertook its maiden voyage on 14 January 1953.
On 25 July 1956, जबकि the Andrea डोरिया was approaching the coast of nantucket, मैसाचुसेट्स, bound लिये नई यॉर्क नगर, the eastbound of the स्वीडिश American लकीर collided साथ it in what became one of history 's most infamous maritime आपदाओं.
Struck in the side, the top-heavy एंड्रिया डोरिया तत्काल started to list severely to starboard, which बाएँ हाफ of its lifeboats अनुपयोगी.
the consequent shortage of lifeboats might have resulted in significant घाटा of जीवन, लकिन the दक्षता of the ship 's technical design allowed it to रहो afloat लिये over 11 घंटों after the ramming.
The good behavior of the क्रू, improvements in communications और the रैपिड जवाब of अन्य जहाजों averted a disaster समान in स्केल to that of the in 1912.
1,660 यात्री and crew यहूद बचाया and survived, while 46 people died as a consequence of the collision.
the evacuated luxury liner capsized और sank the following morning.
This दुर्घटना remains the worst मेरीटाइम विपत्ति to occur in संयुक्त States waters since the डूब of the in 1915.
The incident और इसके aftermath यहूद heavily covered by the न्यूज media.
जबकि the बचाव efforts यहूद दोनो कामयाब and commendable, the cause of the टक्कर साथ the स्टॉकहोम और the घाटा of एंड्रिया डोरिया उत्पन्न much interest in the media and अनेक lawsuits.
Largely because of an out-of-court उपनिवेश agreement between the दो शिपिंग companies दौरान hearings immediately बाद the विपत्ति, no determination of the कारण ( s ) थी ever formally प्रकाशित.
हालांकि वृहद दोष appeared initially to पतन on the इतालवी liner, more हाल discoveries have indicated that a misreading of रडार on the Swedish ship may have initiated the collision कोर्स, अग्रणी to errors on both ships.
एंड्रिया डोरिया was the पिछला प्रमुख transatlantic passenger vessel to sink before वायुयान became the preferred method of सफर.
Dialysis tubing
डायलिसिस tubing is a प्रकार of सेमi- or partially permeable membrane tubing बना from regenerated cellulose or cellophane.
It can be used लिये diffusion साथ solutes or परासरण if प्रयुक्त साथ water only.
Osmosis is when जल passes through a semi-permeable परत to पहुँचें संतुलन.
diffusion, on the other हाथ, allows the गति of अणुओं इससे ऊँची विशेषज्ञता to low concentration.
it will only allow अणुओं to pass through a semi-permeable झिल्ली or layer if the अणु is छोटी पर्याप्त to fit through the झिल्ली or a झिल्ली 's pore.
इस प्रायः परिणाम with the effects of diffusion through a membrane तभी really affects छोटी अणुओं, and लगभग never larger molecules.
डायलिसिस tubing is used in clinical हालातों to ensure a filtered प्रवाह of molecules, preventing the flow of larger solute molecules.
Small molecules can be `` washed '' out of a solution which is उत्तेजित through the tubing into a solvent, प्रायः जल, जिससे surrounds it और in which वे can be flushed दूर.
In demonstrations of semi-permeable membranes, a समाधान containing several प्रकार of अणुओं, usually glucose और starch, is लगाई into a semi-permeable dialysis थैला, ऐसे as a cellulose membrane with pores, और the थैला is sealed with a गांठ or elastic band.
the sealed dialysis bag is लगाई in a container of a different solution, or जल.
अणुओं small enough to pass through the tubing ( water, लवण, monosaccharides, और other small अणुओं ) tend to move into or आउट of the डायलिसिस bag in the दिशा of अवरोहण concentration, therefore displaying diffusion.
larger molecules ( ऐसे as proteins, or polysaccharides ) कि have dimensions significantly वृहद than the pore diameter हैं retained अंदर the dialysis थैला.
The जल और smaller solutes in a hypotonic solution ( a solution that has a lesser solute विशेषज्ञता than the solution it is referenced to ) will क्रॉस a semi-permeable membrane, जैसे डायलिसिस tubing, into a hypertonic समाधान ( a solution कि रै a उच्चतर solute विशेषज्ञता than the solution it is संदर्भित to ) in an attempt to reach संतुलन, where the solute concentration of each समाधान is in equilibrium.
Mercury प्रयोगशाला थर्मामीटर
a थर्मामीटर ( from the यूनानी, thermos, अर्थ `` hot '' and μἐτρον, metron, `` माप '' ) is a यंत्र that उपायों temperature or तापमान अनुपात using a variety of different principles.
a थर्मामीटर has दो महत्वपूर्ण elements : the temperature सेंसर ( e.g. the bulb on a mercury-in-glass थर्मामीटर ) in जिससे some physical बदलें occurs साथ temperature, plus कुछ means of converting this शारीरिक बदलें into a numerical value ( e.g. the visible scale कि is marked on a mercury-in-glass थर्मामीटर ).
There are many types and अनेक उपयोग लिये thermometers, as detailed नीचे in भाग of इस आलेख.
Snow श्वेत और the सात Dwarfs is a 1937 American animated musical fantasy film produced by Walt डिज़्नी and released by rko Radio तस्वीरें.
आधारित on the जर्मनी fairy tale by the Brothers grimm, it is the first full-length cel एनिमेटेड विशेषता फिल्मी और the earliest in the वॉल्ट Disney एनिमेटेड क्लासिक series.
The स्टोरी थी adapted by स्टोरीबोर्ड कलाकारों डोरोथी ऐन Blank, Richard creedon, मेरिल de Maris, ओटो englander, Earl hurd, लंड Rickard, Ted सियर्स and webb स्मिथ.
दाउद हाथ थी the supervising निदेशक, while William cottrell, Wilfred Jackson, Larry morey, Perce pearce, and Ben Sharpsteen directed the film 's व्यक्तिगत sequences.
Snow श्वेत premiered at the Carthay Circle Theatre on December 21, 1937, followed by a nationwide रिलीज on February 4, 1938, and with international earnings of $ 8 million during इसके initial release briefly assumed the record of highest grossing sound फिल्मी at the समय.
the लोकप्रियता of the film रै led to it being re-released theatrically अनेक टाइम्स, जबतक its घर video रिलीज in the 1990s.
Adjusted लिये महंगाई, it is एक of the शीर्ष ten performers at the North American box दफ्तर.
at the 11th अकादमी पुरस्कार, वॉल्ट डिज़्नी was awarded an मानद ऑस्कर, और the फिल्मी थी nominated लिये बेहतरीन Musical Score.
It was added to the संयुक्त राज्य National Film Registry in 1989 और is ranked in the American Film Institute 's सूची of the 100 महानतम American films, who also named the film as the greatest American एनिमेटेड फिल्मी of all time in 2008.
Disney 's लो on the परी टेल has था a big cultural impact, resulting in a लोकप्रिय theme पार्क आकर्षण, a वीडियो खेल, and a Broadway musical.
Childbirth, labour, डिलीवरी, जनम, partus, or parturition is the culmination of a गर्भावस्था काल with the expulsion of one or अधिक नवजात infants from a स्त्री 's गर्भाशय.
The प्रक्रम of normal childbirth is categorized in three चरण of labour : the shortening and dilation of the cervix, descent और birth of the शिशु, and जनम of the placenta.
In many cases and साथ increasing आवृत्ति, childbirth is achieved through प्रेरण of labor or caesarean खण्ड, which is the removal of the neonate through a सर्जिकल incision in the उदर, बल्कि than through vaginal जनम.
प्रसव by C-Sections increased 50 % in the U.S. from 1996 to 2006, and comprise nearly 32 % of births in the u.S. and कनाडा.
With आदर to induced मजदूर, अधिक than 22 % of women undergo प्रेरण of श्रमिक in the United राज्य.
Medical पेशेवर policy makers find that induced births और elective cesarean can be नुकसानदेह to the fetus और neonate as well as नुकसानदेह or बगैर लाभ to the माँ, and have established सख्त दिशानिर्देश for non-medically indicated induced births और elective cesarean पहले 39 weeks.

the दिखाएँ ran लिये 5 सीज़न between 2003 और 2005.

It थी बना in the साझेदारी between Aardman एनिमेशन and DreamWorks Animation, and is Aardman 's पहला completely computer-animated विशेषता as opposed to the usual stop-motion.
The फिल्मी stars the voice talents of Hugh Jackman, Kate Winslet, Andy serkis, Bill Nighy, इयान McKellen, Shane Richie और जां रेनो.
the स्टोरी थी by sam गिरी, Peter रब, लंड सहनशील, and Ian La frenais, और the पटकथा थी written by Dick सहनशील, इयान la Frenais, क्रिस्टोफर लॉयड, जो Keenan, and William Davies.
the फिल्मी थी released in US on 3 नवम्बर 2006, और in uk on December 1 2006, and थी distributed by Paramount तस्वीरें, मगर लिये स्विट्ज़रलैंड, Spain, और the Netherlands, which were handled by सार्वभौमिक Pictures.
the Atlanta Braves are a professional बेसबॉल टोली based in Atlanta.
The Braves हैं a सदस्य of the पूर्वी प्रभाग of प्रमुख लीग Baseball 's National League.
The Braves have निभाई in Turner Field चूंकि 1997.
the `` Braves '' नाम, which थी पहला used in 1912, originates from a पद लिये a Native American warrior.
वे हैं nicknamed `` the Bravos '', and often referred to as `` अमेरिका 's Team `` in सन्दर्भ to the टोली 's खेल being ब्रॉडकास्ट on the nationally उपलब्धियाँ tbs इससे the 1970s until 2007, gaining a wide fanbase.
From 1991 to 2005 the Braves were one of the सबसे successful franchises in बेसबॉल, winning division titles an unprecedented 14 लगातार टाइम्स in that काल ( omitting the strike-shortened 1994 ऋतु in which there यहूद no आधिकारिक division champions ).
the Braves जीती the nl वेस्ट 1991–93 और the nl ईस्ट 1995–2005, और returned to the playoffs as the National League जंगली कार्ड in 2010.
the Braves उन्नत to the World Series पाँच टाइम्स in the 1990s, winning the title in 1995.
चूंकि their डेब्यू in the नेशनल League in 1876, the franchise has जीती 16 डिवीजनल titles, 17 National लीग pennants, as खूब as three World श्रेणी championships—in 1914 as the बोस्टन braves, in 1957 as the मिल्वौकी braves, और in 1995 in Atlanta.
The Braves हैं the तभी MLB franchise to have won the World श्रेणी in three अलग home शहरों.
the club is one of the National लीग 's दो remaining charter franchises ( the other होने the Chicago शावक ) and थी संस्थापित in बोस्टन, Massachusetts, in 1871 as the बोस्टन रेड stockings ( नहीं to be उलझन साथ the American League 's Boston Red Sox ).
They are माना `` the oldest continuously playing टोली in major उत्तर अमरीकी sports. ''
वहीँ is an तर्क as to जो is दरअसल older क्युकी हालांकि the शावक हैं a पूरा ऋतु `` पुरानी '' ( formed as the Chicago White stockings in 1870 ) Chicago खोया two सीज़न to the ग्रेट शिकागो आग, thus the braves have played more consecutive सीज़न.
बाद various नाम परिवर्तन ( ऐसे as the Boston beaneaters ), the टोली संचालित as the Boston Braves for सबसे of the first half of the 20th century.
in 1953, the team moved to मिल्वौकी, Wisconsin और became the मिल्वौकी Braves, followed by the मूव to अटलांटा in 1966.
The टोली 's tenure in अटलांटा is famous लिये Hank Aaron breaking बेब Ruth 's करियर घर चलाएं record in 1974, हालांकि the बहुमत of Aaron 's घर रनों were hit while the टोली was in मिल्वौकी.
उसके रिकार्ड stood जबतक 2007, when सैन फ्रांसिस्को बाएँ क्षेत्ररक्षक Barry bonds broke the record.
the leaves of a beech tree
3D रेंडरिंग of a μct स्कैन of a पत्ता टुकड़ा, रेज़ोल्यूशन circa 40 μm/ voxel.
A पत्ता is an organ of a vascular plant, as defined in वनस्पति शर्तें, and in particular in संयंत्र morphology.
Foliage is a mass noun that refers to leaves as a विशेषता of plants.
Typically a पत्ता is a thin, flattened अंग borne ऊपर मैदान and specialized for photosynthesis, लकिन अनेक types of पत्ते हैं adapted in तरीके almost unrecognisable in those terms : some are नहीं चपटा ( लिये example many रसीले पत्ते and conifers ), कुछ हैं not ऊपर ground ( ऐसे as bulb तराजू ), और some हैं बगैर major photosynthetic फलन ( consider लिये उदाहरण cataphylls, spines, and cotyledons ).
Conversely, अनेक structures of non-vascular plants, or भी of some lichens, जिससे are नहीं plants at all ( in the sense of being members of the किंगडम Plantae ), do look and फलन much जैसे leaves.
Furthermore, several structures found in vascular पौधे dekh like leaves लकिन हैं not दरअसल leaves ; they differ from leaves in their structures और origins.
Examples include phyllodes, cladodes, and phylloclades.
Title card लिये the 1937 हमारी गिरोह कॉमेडी rushin ' Ballet.
हमारी गिरोह ( भी known as the Little Rascals or एचएएल रोच 's Rascals ) are a series of American comedy छोटी films about a समूह of poor पड़ोस children and their adventures.
Created by comedy producer Hal Roach, the series is विख्यात for showing children behaving in a relatively natural रास्ता, as रोच और original director Robert F. McGowan worked to फिल्मी the unaffected, raw nuances apparent in नियमित children rather than have them imitate वयस्क एक्टिंग शैलियाँ.
In जोड, हमारी गिरोह notably put लड़कों, girls, whites और blacks together in a group as equals, something कि `` broke नई मैदान, '' according to film historian Leonard maltin.
ऐसे a thing था never been किया before in सिनेमा लकिन has चूंकि been दोहराया बाद the कामयाबी of Our Gang.
The first उत्पादन at the Roach studio in 1922 was a श्रेणी of मूक छोटी subjects.
जब रोच changed वितरकों इससे Pathé to metro-goldwyn-mayer ( MGM ) in 1927, and converted the श्रेणी to ध्वनि in 1929, the श्रेणी took बंद भी further.
उत्पादन जारी at the रोच studio जबतक 1938, जब the series was बेची to MGM, who तब continued producing the comedies जबतक 1944.
The हमारी Gang series includes a total of 220 shorts and one विशेषता फिल्मी, सामान्य spanky, featuring over forty-one चाइल्ड अभिनेताओं.
as mgm retained the rights to the हमारी Gang trademark following their खरीदें of the production rights, the 80 roach-produced `` टॉकीज़ '' were syndicated लिये टेलीविज़न under the title The Little Rascals beginning in 1955.
दोनो रोच 's the छोटी दुष्टों पैकेज ( अभी स्वामित्व by सीबीएस टेलीविज़न वितरण ) and mgm 's हमारी गिरोह पैकेज ( अभी owned by warner Bros. entertainment ) have चूंकि remained in syndication, साथ आवधिक नई productions based on the shorts surfacing over the सालो, including a 1994 छोटी Rascals feature film released by सार्वभौमिक तस्वीरें.
Zacharias Janssen ( भी Zacharias जानसन or sacharias Jansen ) ( b.1580-88, d.pre-1632 to 1638 ) was a Dutch spectacle-maker इससे Middelburg associated with the आविष्कार of the first ऑप्टिकल telescope.
janssen is sometimes भी credited लिये inventing the पहला truly यौगिक microscope.
However, the उत्पत्ति of the microscope, just like the उत्पत्ति of the telescope, is a पदार्थ of बहस.
Lake tahoe ( ; washo : dáʔaw ) is a विशाल freshwater झील in the Sierra Nevada of the संयुक्त राज्य.
At a सतह elevation of, it is स्तिथ साथ the किनारा between California and Nevada, वेस्ट of कार्सन नगर.
Lake Tahoe is the largest अल्पाइन झील in उत्तर अमेरिका.
इसके गहराई is, making it the संयुक्त राज्य 's second-deepest ( the deepest is crater Lake in ऑरेगॉन, होने deeper, at ).
additionally, झील tahoe is सूचीबद्ध as the 26th largest झील by आवाज़ in the world at.
the lake थी formed परिचय 2 लाख सालो पहले और is a भाग of the झील Tahoe Basin with the modern lake being तराशा during the ice ages.
it is ज्ञात लिये the स्पष्टता of इसके जल और the परिदृश्य of surrounding kyu on all sides.
The क्षेत्रफल surrounding the झील is also referred to as Lake Tahoe, or बस tahoe.
झील Tahoe is a major पर्यटक attraction in both नेवाडा और California.
it is घर to a क्रमांक of ski resorts, summer बाहरी मनोरंजन, and पर्यटक आकर्षण.
Snow और skiing are a significant भाग of the क्षेत्रफल 's अर्थव्यवस्था और प्रतिष्ठा.
पहाड़ और lake scenery are attractions throughout the साल.
The नेवाडा side भी includes large कसीनो.
राजमार्गों provide year-round access इससे रेनो, कार्सन City, and sacramento.

The Twenty-seventh amendment ( amendment XXVII ) prohibits कोई law कि increases or decreases the salary of सदस्यों of the Congress इससे लेने effect जबतक the प्रारंभ of the next नियत of शर्तें of दफ्तर लिये प्रतिनिधि.
it is the most recent amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य Constitution.
It was सुपुर्द to the राज्य for अनुसमर्थन in 1789 और थी adopted in 1992.
“First they आए... ” is a famous statement and provocative कविता attributed to पादरी Martin niemöller ( 1892–1984 ) about the sloth of जर्मनी intellectuals following the nazis ' rise to power and the subsequent purging of उनके chosen लक्ष्य, group after समूह.
There is कुछ असहमति over the exact wording of the quotation और जब it was निर्मित ; the content of the quotation may have been presented differently by niemöller on अलग occasions.

चार Thirds लोगो
The Four Thirds system is a standard निर्मित by ओलम्पस और कोडक for digital single-lens reflex कैमरा ( DSLR ) design and development. < ref name='DPReview.com 2001-02-13 ' >
the प्रणाली provides a standard कि, साथ डिजिटल कैमरे and lenses उपलब्धियाँ इससे अनेक निर्माताओं, allows लिये the interchange of lenses और लाशें from different निर्माताओं.
seems to cover the मानक.
Proponents describe it as an open मानक, but कंपनियाँ may तभी उपयोग it under a non-disclosure अनुबंध.
नापसंद पुरानी slr systems, Four तिहाई रै महरूम designed इससे the मैदान up to be entirely डिजिटल.
Many lenses are extensively computerized, to the पाइंट that Olympus offers firmware updates for many of उन्हें.
Lens design रै महरूम tailored to the आवश्यकताएँ of digital sensors, most notably through telecentric डिजाइन.
The size of the सेंसर is significantly smaller than for सबसे dslrs और this implies कि lenses, especially telephoto lenses, can be छोटी.
लिये उदाहरण, a Four Thirds लेंस साथ a 300 mm focal length would cover about the वही angle of दृश्य as a 600 mm focal length लेंस for the 35 mm फिल्मी standard, और is correspondingly अधिक compact.
यूँ, the Four Thirds प्रणाली has क्रॉप फ़ैक्टर ( focal length multiplier ) of परिचय 2, and while this enables longer focal लंबाई for greater magnification, it करता n't aid the manufacture of wide angle lenses.
The image sensor स्वरूप, generally intermediate between those of larger slrs और smaller compact कैमरे, generally देता levels of cost, performance and convenience intermediate between those two वर्ग.
hvac प्रणालियों use वेंटिलेशन एयर ducts संस्थापित throughout a building to supply conditioned एयर to a रूम through आउटलेट vents, called diffusers ; और नलिकाएं to हटाएँ एयर through return-air grilles.
HVAC ( हीटिंग, ventilation, और air कंडीशनिंग ) is the technology of अंदर and automotive environmental comfort.
HVAC प्रणाली डिज़ाइन is a subdiscipline of mechanical अभियान्त्रिकी, based on the सिद्धान्त of thermodynamics, द्रव mechanics, and heat transfer.
प्रशीतन is sometimes added to the फ़ील्ड 's abbreviation as hvac & R or hvacr, or ventilating is dropped as in hacr ( such as the designation of hacr-rated सर्किट breakers ).
HVAC is important in the डिज़ाइन of medium to विशाल औद्योगिक और दफ्तर buildings ऐसे as skyscrapers और in marine environments such as aquariums, जहाँ सुरक्षित और स्वस्थ भवन शर्तें हैं regulated साथ respect to temperature and आर्द्रता, using fresh एयर इससे outdoors.
वेंटिलेशन on the downdraught system, by impulsion, or the 'plenum ' principle, लागू to schoolrooms ( 1899 )
Heating, ventilating, and एयर conditioning is आधारित on inventions and discoveries made by Nikolay Lvov, Michael फैराडे, Willis वाहक, reuben trane, जेम्स Joule, William Rankine, sadi Carnot, and many अन्य.
The invention of the components of hvac systems गई hand-in-hand साथ the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति, and नई methods of modernization, higher efficiency, और system कंट्रोल are constantly introduced by companies और आविष्कारक विश्वव्यापी.
the three सेंट्रल functions of heating, ventilating, और air-conditioning हैं interrelated, विशेषकर साथ the need to provide thermal comfort और स्वीकार्य indoor air विशेषता within उचित installation, operation, and मेंटेनेंस लागत.
hvac प्रणालियों can provide वेंटिलेशन, reduce एयर घुसपैठ, और maintain pressure relationships between spaces.
The अर्थात् of air delivery और removal इससे स्पेसेस is known as रूम एयर distribution.
the starting पाइंट in carrying आउट an अनुमान दोनो लिये कूलिंग और हीटिंग depends on the exterior climate और आंतरिक specified शर्तें.
However पहले लेने up the heat लोड calculation, it is जरुरी to find भैस एयर आवश्यकताएँ लिये प्रत्येक क्षेत्रफल in विवरण, as pressurization is an important विचार.
In modern buildings the design, installation, और control प्रणालियों of ये कृत्यों are integrated into एक or more hvac systems.
लिये very small buildings, contractors normally capacity engineer और select hvac प्रणालियों and उपकरण.
For larger इमारतें, building services designers and इंजीनियर्स, ऐसे as mechanical, architectural, or भवन सेवाएं इंजीनियर्स analyze, डिज़ाइन, और specify the HVAC systems, और specialty mechanical contractors fabricate और commission उन्हें.
भवन permits और code-compliance inspections of the installations are normally जरूरी for सब sizes of इमारतें.
The hvac उद्योग is a worldwide एंटरप्राइज़, साथ roles including operation and मेंटेनेंस, प्रणाली डिज़ाइन and construction, equipment manufacturing और sales, and in शिक्षा और research.
The HVAC industry थी historically regulated by the निर्माताओं of HVAC उपकरण, लकिन regulating and मानकों संगठन such as HARDI, ashrae, SMACNA, ACCA, Uniform Mechanical कोड, International mechanical कोड, and amca have been स्थापित to support the उद्योग and encourage ऊँची standards and achievement.
royal Navy Commander James बंध, CMG, RNVR, is a fictional character निर्मित by British पत्रकार and novelist Ian Fleming in 1953.
he is the समर्थक of the जेम्स बंध श्रेणी of novels, films, कॉमिक्स और वीडियो games.
फ्लेमिंग लिखा बारह Bond novels और दो short स्टोरी collections पहले his death, although the last दो books— The Man साथ the Golden Gun और octopussy और the Living Daylights —were published मरणोपरांत.
the बंध अक्षर is a Secret Service एजेंट, कोड क्रमांक 007, residing in London but क्रियाशील internationally.
Bond थी a composite अक्षर जो थी आधारित on a क्रमांक of commandos whom Fleming knew दौरान his service in the नवल प्रज्ञा Division during World युद्ध II, to जिसको Fleming added his अपना style and a number of उसके own tastes ; बंध 's नाम was appropriated इससे अमरीकी ornithologist जेम्स बंध.
Bond रै a क्रमांक of character traits जिससे चलाएं throughout the किताबे, including an enjoyment of गाड़ियाँ, a love of खाना and drink, और an औसत intake of sixty custom-made cigarettes a day.
चूंकि Fleming 's मौत in 1964, there have been अन्य authorised लेखक of Bond सामग्री, including John Gardner, who wrote fourteen novels और दो novelizations and Raymond Benson, जो लिखा छह novels, three novelizations और तीन short कहानियां.
वहीँ have भी been तीन लेखक जो लिखा one किताब प्रत्येक, किंग्सले Amis ( लिखने as रॉबर्ट Markham ), Sebastian faulks and jeffery deaver.
additionally a series of novels based on बंध 's youth— Young Bond —was लिखा by Charlie higson.
As spin-offs इससे the साहित्यिक works, there was a टेलीविज़न अनुकूलन of the first novel, कसीनो royale, in जिससे बंध was played as an American agent.
a कॉमिक strip series also ran in the Daily Express समाचारपत्र.
वहीँ have भी महरूम twenty-five बंध films ; सात अभिनेताओं have निभाई Bond in these films.
`` Nature लड़के '' is a सोंग by Eden ahbez, प्रकाशित in 1947.
The song tells a fantasy of a `` अजीब enchanted boy... who wandered बहुत far '' तभी to learn कि `` the greatest thing... was बस to love और be loved in वापसी ''.
Nat King Cole 's 1948 recording of the सोंग थी a प्रमुख hit and `` Nature लड़के '' रै चूंकि become a पॉप और jazz standard, with dozens of major कलाकारों interpreting the सोंग.
Louisiana ( or ;, ; louisiana Creole : Léta de la Lwizyàn ) is a राज्य located in the southern region of the United राज्य of अमेरिका.
Louisiana is the 31st most extensive और the 25th most populous of the 50 United राज्य.
Its पूंजी is Baton Rouge और largest नगर is नई ऑरलियन्स.
Louisiana is the तभी state in the U.S. with political subdivisions termed parishes, जिससे are local सरकारी 's समतुल्य to काउंटी.
the largest parish by जनसांख्यिकी is ईस्ट baton Rouge मोहल्ला, and the largest by जमीन area is cameron मोहल्ला.
much of the state 's lands यहूद formed from sediment धोया down the Mississippi नदी, leaving विशाल deltas और vast areas of coastal दलदल और swamp.
ये contain a rich दक्षिणी biota ; ठेठ examples include birds such as आइबिस और egrets.
There हैं also many प्रजाति of पेड़ frogs, and fish such as sturgeon and paddlefish.
in अधिक elevated areas, fire is a प्राकृतिक process in the landscape, और रै produced extensive areas of longleaf पाइन वन और wet savannas.
ये support an exceptional विशाल क्रमांक of संयंत्र प्रजाति, सहित many species of orchids और मांसाहारी पौधे.
Some Louisiana urban environments have a multicultural, बहुभाषी heritage, होने so strongly influenced by an admixture of 18th-century French, Spanish, Native American ( Indian ) and अफ़्रीकी संस्कृतियों that वे are माना to be somewhat exceptional in the U.S.
पहले the अमरीकी purchase of the territory, the वर्तमान Louisiana State had been दोनो a Spanish and French उपनिवेश.
In addition, the pattern of विकास शामिल importing numerous African slaves in the 18th सदी, with many from the वही region of West Africa, यूँ concentrating their culture.
in the post-civil War पर्यावरण, Anglo-Americans increased the दबाव लिये anglicization, and in 1915, English was बना the तभी आधिकारिक language of the राज्य.
Women 's अधिकारों हैं the rights and entitlements claimed for women and लड़कियों of अनेक समाजों worldwide.
in कुछ स्थान ये अधिकारों are institutionalized or supported by law, लोकल कस्टम, और behaviour, whereas in others वे may be उपेक्षित or suppressed.
They differ from broader धारणाएं of human rights through claims of an अंतर्निहित ऐतिहासिक और परंपरागत पूर्वाग्रह विरूद्ध the exercise of rights by महिलाओं and girls in पक्ष of men और boys.
Issues commonly associated with धारणाएं of women 's rights include, हालांकि are नहीं सीमित to, the right : to bodily अखंडता and स्वायत्तता ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to थाम public दफ्तर ; to कार्य ; to fair wages or equal अदा ; to own property ; to शिक्षा ; to serve in the सैन्य or be conscripted ; to डालें into legal contracts ; और to have marital, parental and धार्मिक rights.
The laws of विज्ञान or scientific laws are statements कि describe, predict, और perhaps बताइये why, a दायरा of phenomena व्यवहार as they appear to in प्रकृति.
The term `` विधि '' रै विविध उपयोग in अनेक मामले : सन्निकट, accurate, broad or narrow theories, in सब प्राकृतिक scientific disciplines ( भौतिकी, रसायन, biology, भूविज्ञान, खगोलशास्त्र इत्यादि. ).
an analogous पद लिये a scientific law is a principle.
Scientific laws:
summarize a विशाल collection of facts determined by प्रयोग into a single statement,
can usually be formulated mathematically as एक or अनेक statements or equation, or at least stated in a सिंगल sentence, so कि it can be used to predict the outcome of an प्रयोग, दिए the initial, boundary, और other शारीरिक conditions of the processes जिससे take place,
are strongly supported by अनुभवजन्य evidence - वे are वैज्ञानिक knowledge कि experiments have repeatedly verified ( और never falsified ).
Their accuracy करता not बदलें when नई theories are worked out, लकिन बल्कि the scope of application, since the समीकरण ( if any ) representing the law करता नहीं change.
As साथ other वैज्ञानिक knowledge, वे do नहीं have निरपेक्ष certainty like गणितीय theorems or identities, and it is always संभावित लिये a law to be overturned by future observations.
are प्रायः कोटेड as a आधारभूत controlling influence rather than a वर्णन of observed facts.
i.e. `` the कानून of motion आवश्यकता कि ''
Laws differ from hypotheses और postulates, which are प्रस्तावित दौरान the scientific process पहले and दौरान validation by experiment and अवलोकन.
ये हैं not laws चूंकि they have नहीं been सत्यापित to the same उपाधि and may नहीं be fear सामान्य, हालांकि they may lead to the formulation of laws.
a law is a more solidified and formal बयान, distilled from दोहराया प्रयोग.
Although the अवधारणाओं of a विधि or principle in nature is borderline to philosophy, और presents the गहराई to जिससे गणित can describe nature, scientific कानून are considered इससे a scientific perspective and follow the वैज्ञानिक विधि ; they `` serve उनके purpose '' बल्कि than `` questioning वास्तविकता '' ( philosophical ) or `` statements of logical absolution '' ( गणितीय ).
लिये example, whether a विधि `` refers to वास्तविकता '' is a philosophical issue, rather than scientific.
Fundamentally, सब scientific laws follow इससे भौतिकी, laws which occur in other sciences ultimately follow from physical कानून.
प्रायः, from mathematically fundamental viewpoints, universal constants emerge इससे scientific कानून.

Lauren Fenmore baldwin ( formerly विलियम्स and Grainger ) is a fictional अक्षर from the CBS साबुन operas The Young और the Restless and the बिंदास और the Beautiful, portrayed by ट्रेसी E. Bregman.
She made उसके डेब्यू during the episode airing on January 21, 1983.
In 1992, bregman began बनाना sporadic appearances on The Bold and the Beautiful, later resulting in the अक्षर migrating वहीँ fully in 1995.
Following a guest appearance in 2000, bregman लौटे to The यंग and the Restless on अगस्त 24, 2001, बाकी on recurring औकात.
in 2013, it थी घोषित कि Bregman had been लगाई on अनुबंध.

लॉरेन is भी प्रसिद्ध for उसके long, हिंसक rivalry with Sheila Carter.
The 2010 NBA Finals थी the नेशनल बास्केट संघ ( NBA ) चैंपियनशिप series for the 2009–10 season.
the best-of-seven playoff was लडे between the लॉस Angeles लेकर्स, champions of the पश्चिमी सम्मेलन and defending NBA champions, और the बोस्टन सेल्टिक्स, champions of the Eastern सम्मेलन.
The लेकर्स पराजित the Celtics, चार खेल to तीन, to win the franchise 's 16th NBA championship.
The 64th edition of the चैंपियनशिप series थी निभाई between June 3 और जून 17, was broadcast on एबीसी, and was देखी by an average of 18.1 million लोगों.
The Celtics earned उनके berth into the playoffs by जीतना the Atlantic Division.
The Lakers जीती the Pacific Division to earn उनके berth.
the Celtics पहुँचे the एनबीए फाइनल by defeating the मियामी ऊष्मा in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference पहला Round, the Cleveland Cavaliers in the best-of-seven Eastern सम्मेलन Semifinals, and defending पूर्वी सम्मेलन champion Orlando जादू in the best-of-seven Eastern सम्मेलन Finals.
The Lakers reached the NBA Finals by defeating the Oklahoma नगर थंडर in the best-of-seven Western Conference पहला गोलाकार, the यूटा Jazz in the best-of-seven Western सम्मेलन Semifinals, and the फीनिक्स Suns in the best-of-seven पश्चिमी सम्मेलन Finals.
the एनबीए Finals यहूद scheduled in the प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल World श्रेणी 2–3–2 seven game स्वरूप, साथ the लेकर्स possessing home-court advantage as a बदला for finishing साथ better regular season record than the Celtics.
दोहराया baskets इससे स्टार्टर Kobe Bryant, Pau gasol, और Ron artest brought the लेकर्स बंद to विजय in Game 1.
A record तोड़कर performance इससे रे Allen 's eight three-point baskets ensured the सेल्टिक्स a खेल 2 triumph.
डेरेक Fisher ’s 11 अंक in the चौथी quarter helped the लेकर्स win Game 3.
The सेल्टिक्स जीती खेल 4 ; it did n't hurt कि वे netted an बेहतरीन performance in baskets by the team’s reserves, while Paul Pierce led the टोली to a Game 5 win with 27 अंक on 57 % shooting from the floor.
The Lakers avoided elimination by जीतना a निर्णायक खेल 6 with 24 points contributed by उनके बेंच.
Although they trailed the Celtics by 13 अंक early in the तीसरा क्वार्टर, the Lakers rallied and won their second लगातार चैंपियनशिप by taking over an exciting Game 7 aided by late contributions on ठोकर by Pau gasol and artest and rebounding.
Bryant was named Most मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी of the फाइनल लिये his second consecutive ट्रॉफी.
This थी the पहला NBA फाइनल to go the full सात खेल चूंकि and तभी the fourth since the एनबीए फाइनल लौटे to a 2–3–2 format in.
the laker मताधिकार has 16 NBA championships ( पाँच in Minneapolis, 11 in लॉस Angeles ) trailing the Celtics ' seventeen championships.
The NBA Finals used the `` संसार Series '' स्वरूप in 1949 मिनियापोलिस Lakers पराजित the वॉशिंगटन capitols 4 खेल to 2 ; in 1953 Minneapolis defeated the नई York Knicks 4 games to 1 ; in 1954 मिनियापोलिस defeated the syracuse Nationals 4 games to 3 ; and in 1955 syracuse नागरिकों पराजित the Fort Wayne Pistons 4 games to 3.
the एनबीए होता return to the 2–2–1–1–1 National Hockey लीग सात खेल series स्वरूप जबतक 1985.
ब्लैक pepper ( पाइपर nigrum ) is a flowering बेल in the family piperaceae, cultivated लिये इसके फल, जिससे is प्रायः सूखी और used as a spice और seasoning.
The fruit, known as a peppercorn when सूखी, is लगभग in व्यास, अंधेरा red जब fully mature, and, जैसे all drupes, contains a single seed.
peppercorns, and the मैदान pepper derived from उन्हें, may be वर्णित simply as pepper, or अधिक precisely as ब्लैक pepper ( cooked और सूखी unripe फल ), ग्रीन pepper ( सूखी unripe फल ) and white pepper ( dried ripe बीज ).
ब्लैक pepper is native to south इण्डिया, and is extensively cultivated वहीँ और elsewhere in tropical regions.
Currently Vietnam is the संसार 's largest निर्माता and exporter of pepper, producing 34 % of the संसार 's Piper nigrum crop as of 2008.
सूखी ground pepper रै been प्रयुक्त since antiquity for both इसके फ्लेवर और as a आयुर्विज्ञान.
ब्लैक pepper is the संसार 's most traded मसाला.
It is one of the most common spices added to European cuisine and its descendants.
the spiciness of black pepper is due to the रासायनिक piperine, not to be उलझन साथ the capsaicin that gives fleshy peppers theirs.
It is in the आधुनिक world, often paired with नमक.
in cardiovascular physiology, ejection भिन्न ( EF ) represents the आयतनी भिन्न of रक्त pumped out of the ventricle ( दिल ) साथ each heart ताल or हृदय cycle.
It can be लागू to either the सही ventricle जिससे ejects via the pulmonary वाल्व into the pulmonary circulation or the बाएँ ventricle which ejects via the aortic वाल्व into the प्रणालीगत circulation.
Imaging of the physiology of the mammalian दिल is the आर्ट कि allows सार्थक गणितीय expression धमक ef.
Noninvasive cardiac इमेजिंग रै become a worldwide यूटिलिटी enabling पढ़ाई of cardiac प्रदर्शन reproducibly and inexpensively.
सरलीकृत, ejection भिन्न is a गणितीय product अनुमत by हृदय imaging.
As a mathematical पद, Ejection भिन्न is an एक्सटेंशन of the work of एडाल्फ Fick in हृदय आउटपुट.
समर्पित प्रौद्योगिकी such as Echocardiography, computed टोमोग्राफी, Magnetic Resonance Imaging and muga स्कैनिंग have definitively allowed clinically relevant mathematics regarding ischemia, Congenital Heart बीमारी and दिल Failure.
The अभियोजक is the मुख्य विधिक representative of the अभियोजन in देशों साथ either the common law adversarial system, or the सिविल law inquisitorial system.
the अभियोजन is the legal party जिम्मेदार for पेश the case in a दण्ड trial against an व्यक्तिगत accused of breaking the विधि.

abū al-Qāsim muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh इब्न ʿAbd al-muṭṭalib ibn hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 June 632 ), भी transliterated as Muhammad ( ), was a religious, political, और सैन्य नेता इससे Mecca who एकीकृत Arabia into a single धार्मिक polity under islam.
He is believed by Muslims and Bahá'ís to be a मेसेंजर and नबी of परमेश्वर.
Muhammad is लगभग universally माना by मुसलमान as the last prophet भेजा by God for mankind.
Non-Muslims लिहाज़ Muhammad as the founder of islam.
मुसलमान consider him to be the restorer of an अनछुए असली monotheistic faith of आदम, Noah, Abraham, Moses, Jesus, and अन्य नबियों.
born in परिचय 570 ce in the Arabian city of मक्का, he was अनाथ at an जल्दी age और brought up under the परवाह of his ताऊ abu तालिब.
He बाद worked mostly as a व्यापारी, as खूब as a shepherd, और was पहला शादीशुदा by आयु 25.
होने in the habit of periodically retreating to a गुफा in the surrounding mountains for several nights of seclusion और prayer, he बाद reported कि it was there, at age 40, that he received उसके first रहस्योद्घाटन from God.
Three years after इस इवेंट मुहम्मद प्रारंभ उपदेश ये revelations publicly, proclaiming कि `` परमेश्वर is एक ``, कि complete `` आत्मसमर्पण '' to Him ( lit.
islām ) is the तभी रास्ता ( dīn ) स्वीकार्य to परमेश्वर, और that he खुद थी a नबी और मेसेंजर of God, in the वही रग as अन्य इस्लामी prophets.
मुहम्मद gained few अनुसरणकर्ता जल्दी on, और थी मिले साथ दुश्मनी from कुछ meccan जनजातियों ; he और उसके अनुसरणकर्ता were treated harshly.
to escape persecution, मुहम्मद भेजा कुछ of his अनुसरणकर्ता to Abyssinia before he and his followers in Mecca migrated to मदीना ( then ज्ञात as yathrib ) in the year 622.
इस इवेंट, the हिज्र, marks the शुरूआत of the Islamic calendar, which is भी ज्ञात as the Hijri Calendar.
in Medina, Muhammad united the tribes under the Constitution of मदीना.
After eight years of लड़ with the meccan जनजातियों, उसके followers, जो by तब था grown to 10,000, took control of Mecca in the largely शांतिपूर्ण conquest of मक्का.
He नष्ट the pagan मूर्तियों in the city और then भेजा his अनुसरणकर्ता out to destroy सब of the बाकी pagan मंदिरों in पूर्वी अरब.
In 632, a few महीने after returning to मदीना from The विदाई यात्राएं, मुहम्मद fell ill और died.
By the time of his मौत, सबसे of the arabian प्रायद्वीप था परिवर्तित to Islam, और he था united अरब into a सिंगल मुस्लिम धार्मिक polity.
The revelations ( or ayah, lit.
`` लक्षण [ of God ] '' ) — जिससे मुहम्मद reported receiving जबतक his death – रूप the आयतें of the Quran, regarded by मुसलमान as the `` शब्द of God '' and around जिससे the धर्म is आधारित.
Besides the कुरान, Muhammad 's life ( सिरा ) and परंपराओं ( sunnah ) हैं भी upheld by मुसलमान as the स्त्रोत of sharia law.
वे discuss मुहम्मद and other नबियों of Islam with reverence, adding the phrase सलाम be upon उसे whenever their names are उल्लेखित.
While conceptions of मुहम्मद in medieval christendom and premodern टाइम्स were largely ऋणात्मक, appraisals in आधुनिक history have been दूर कम so.
The ग्रेट किताबे ( दूसरी edition )
Great किताबे of the Western संसार is a श्रेणी of books originally प्रकाशित in the संयुक्त राज्य in 1952 by Encyclopædia विश्वकोष Inc. to उपस्थित the Great किताबे in a सिंगल package of 54 आयतन.
The series is अभी in its second edition और contains 60 volumes.
the असली सम्पादक of the series chose three criteria लिये समावेश : a book जरूर be प्रासंगिक to contemporary मुद्दे, और नहीं तभी महत्वपूर्ण in its ऐतिहासिक कॉन्टेक्स्ट ; it जरूर बदला rereading ; और it जरूर be a भाग of `` the great conversation परिचय the great विचार, '' relevant to at least 25 of the 102 great ideas identified by the editors.
Books यहूद नहीं चुनी on the आधार of ethnic or cultural inclusiveness, historical influence, or the editors ' agreement साथ the दृश्य expressed.
`` Cocaine '' is a सोंग written और अंकित by jj cale in 1976, but also ज्ञात as a कवर version अंकित by Eric क्लैप्टन.
Allmusic काल्स the latter `` among [ Clapton 's ] most enduringly लोकप्रिय हिट्स '' and notes कि `` even for an artist जैसे Clapton साथ a huge body of high-quality कार्य, 'cocaine ' ranks among his best. ''
Glyn Johns, who had previously worked with The Who, led zeppelin and the रोलिंग Stones, produced the Clapton रिकॉर्डिंग, जिससे थी released on Clapton 's 1977 एल्बम Slowhand and as a single in 1980.
the live version of `` कोका '', from the बस One रात्रि album recorded in टोकियो, charted on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 as the b-side of `` Tulsa समय ``, जिससे was a No. 30 hit in 1980. ``
कोका '' थी एक of अनेक of cale 's songs recorded by Clapton, including `` बाद Midnight `` and `` Travelin ' लाइट ''.
The आक्रमण on Pearl हार्बर ( called हवाई Operation or आपरेशन ai by the Japanese Imperial सामान्य मुख्यालय ( Operation z in नियोजन ) और the बैटल of Pearl Harbor ) was a आश्चर्य सैन्य strike conducted by the Imperial जापानी नेवी against the United राज्य नवल base at पर्ल Harbor, Hawaii, on the morning of दिसम्बर 7, 1941 ( दिसम्बर 8 in जापानी ).
इससे the standpoint of the defenders, the attack commenced at 7:48 a.m. हवाई समय.
The आक्रमण थी intended as a preventive कार्रवाई in order to रखना the u.S. Pacific Fleet from interfering with military actions the साम्राज्य of जापानी was नियोजन in Southeast Asia विरूद्ध विदेशी territories of the United किंगडम, the नीदरलैंड्स, और the United राज्य.
the आधार was attacked by 353 जापानी सेनानी, bombers और torpedo planes in दो लहरें, launched इससे छह वायुयान carriers.
सब eight U.S. नेवी battleships were damaged, with चार होने sunk.
दो of ये were later raised, and साथ the remaining four repaired, six battleships लौटे to service बाद in the युद्ध.
The जापानी भी sank or damaged तीन cruisers, तीन destroyers, an anti-aircraft प्रशिक्षण जलयान, और एक minelayer.
188 u.S. वायुयान यहूद destroyed ; 2,402 Americans यहूद मारे और 1,282 wounded.
महत्वपूर्ण आधार संस्थापना ऐसे as the शक्ति station, shipyard, मेंटेनेंस, और fuel and torpedo storage सुविधाएं, as खूब as the पनडुब्बी piers and मुख्यालय building ( also home of the प्रज्ञा section ) यहूद not attacked.
Japanese नुकसान यहूद light : 29 aircraft और five midget submarines lost, and 65 servicemen मारे or wounded.
एक जापानी नाविक थी captured.
the attack आए as a profound shock to the अमरीकी लोगों and led directly to the अमरीकी प्रविष्टि into World War II in दोनो the Pacific and European थिएटर.
The following दिन ( December 8 ), the United States declared युद्ध on Japan.
घरेलू support लिये non-interventionism, which था महरूम strong, disappeared.
Clandestine support of ब्रिटेन ( लिये उदाहरण the neutrality Patrol ) थी replaced by क्रियाशील alliance.
subsequent परिचालन by the U.S. prompted जर्मनी and इटली to declare युद्ध on the U.S. on December 11, which थी reciprocated by the U.S. the वही day.
वहीँ were numerous historical precedents लिये unannounced सैन्य action by Japan.
However, the lack of कोई औपचारिक warning, particularly जबकि negotiations यहूद still apparently ongoing, led President फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट to proclaim December 7, 1941, `` a तिथि which होगा सजीव in infamy ``.
Project रनवे ऋतु 2 थी the दूसरी ऋतु of ब्रावो 's successful Project Runway, a reality competition लिये फ़ैशन designers.
ऋतु 2 began airing on दिसम्बर 7, 2005.
following a देशभर search earlier in the साल, सोलह designers यहूद चुनी as semi-finalists और brought to नई York City in जून, 2005.
After the पहला challenge, called `` Road to the Runway '', fourteen गई on to compete as finalists.
the जीतना designer, क्लो Dao, received $ 100,000 in बीज धन to सहायता launch her own लकीर, a 2007 शनि Sky roadster, a spread in ELLE पत्रिका, और a mentorship साथ the banana Republic Design Team.
जीतना alongside dao थी उसके model, Grace kelsey, जो प्राप्त the elle Magazine स्प्रेड.
Michael kors और Nina Garcia returned as judges लिये the दूसरी ऋतु.
the चौथी judging seat घुमाया each week, based on the challenge.
Tim Gunn, fashion chair at पार्सन्स the New School लिये Design, returned as a mentor for the designers.
कारा janx later appeared in Project रनवे : सब सितारों in 2012, where she समाप्त 7th out of 13.

an उदाहरण of a heraclius खच्चर
in numismatics, a खच्चर is a coin or medal minted with obverse और रिवर्स designs not सामान्यतः seen on the वही piece.
These can be जानबूझकर or produced by गलती.
This प्रकार of गलती is अत्यधिक sought बाद, और उदाहरण can लाने steep कीमतें from collectors.
the earliest mules are मिला among ancient यूनानी और Roman सिक्के.
Opinion is विभाजित between those जो think कि they हैं accidental, the result of an incorrect combination of a new die with one कि था officially been withdrawn from use, or the कार्य of coiners working साथ मरता stolen इससे an official mint, शायद at a समय when one of them चाहिए have been destroyed.
the नाम derives इससे the mule, the hybrid offspring of a horse and a गधा, due to ऐसे a सिक्का having दो पहलू intended लिये अलग coins, much as a mule रै अभिभावक of two अलग प्रजाति.
इस page दस्तावेज़ the tornadoes और बवंडर outbreaks of 2010.
the majority of tornadoes form in the U.S., but they can occur लगभग anywhere अंतर्गत the सही conditions.
A lesser number occur outside the U.S., सबसे notably in भाग of neighboring southern Canada दौरान the उत्तरी गोलार्ध 's summer ऋतु, लकिन हैं also known in दक्षिण अमेरिका, Europe, एशिया, और Australia.
There यहूद 1,531 tornadoes reported in the United राज्य in 2010 ( of जिससे at तनिक 1,266 यहूद पुष्टि ), साथ 45 पुष्टि fatalities.
Elsewhere in the world, 11 लोगों यहूद मारे in tornadoes, छह in अर्जेंटीना, तीन in the बहामा, one in Bangladesh, और one in जर्मनी.
The साल थी निकट average for tornadoes despite an extremely quiet early spring period, however ऐसे बदला बाद a विशाल upswing starting in late April and a busy लेट वसन्त and summer period.
The autumn महीने were थोड़ा above औसत.
A lymphocyte is a type of white blood cell in the vertebrate प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली.
अंतर्गत the सूक्ष्मदर्शी, lymphocytes can be विभाजित into large lymphocytes and छोटी lymphocytes.
Large granular lymphocytes include natural कातिल कोशिकाएं ( NK कोशिकाएं ).
Small lymphocytes consist of T cells और b कोशिकाएं.
Windows PowerShell is microsoft 's कार्य स्वचालन फ्रेमवर्क, consisting of a command-line शेल and associated एनक्रिप्शन भाषा built on.neT Framework.
powershell provides full अभिगम to COM and WMI, enabling administrators to perform प्रशासनिक tasks on दोनो लोकल and remote Windows systems.
in powershell, प्रशासनिक tasks are generally performed by cmdlets ( pronounced command-lets ), जिससे are specialized.NET classes implementing a particular operation.
सेट of cmdlets may be combined together in स्क्रिप्ट, executables ( which हैं स्टैंडअलोन अनुप्रयोग ), or by instantiating नियमित.NET वर्ग ( or wmi/com वस्तुएँ ).
ये work by accessing आंकड़ा in अलग data स्टोर्स, like the filesystem or रजिस्ट्री, which हैं बना उपलब्धियाँ to the powershell runtime via Windows PowerShell प्रदाताओं.
खिड़कियाँ powershell भी provides a hosting API with which the Windows PowerShell runtime can be अंतःस्थापित inside other applications.
These applications can then use खिड़कियाँ powershell कार्यक्षमता to implement निश्चित operations, सहित those exposed via the graphical इंटरफ़ेस.
इस काबिलियत has been used by microsoft Exchange सर्वर 2007 to expose इसके management कार्यक्षमता as powershell cmdlets and प्रदाताओं और implement the graphical management tools as PowerShell होस्ट जिससे invoke the जरुरी cmdlets.
अन्य Microsoft अनुप्रयोग सहित microsoft एसक्यूएल Server 2008 भी expose उनके management interface via PowerShell cmdlets.
साथ PowerShell, आलेखीय interface-based प्रबन्धन applications on खिड़कियाँ are layered on top of Windows PowerShell.
A PowerShell scripting interface लिये Windows products is mandated by the आम अभियान्त्रिकी मापदण्ड.
खिड़कियाँ PowerShell includes इसके own extensive, console-based सहायता, similar to man पृष्ठों in यूनिक्स shells, via the get-help cmdlet.
Mary poppins is a 1964 musical फिल्मी अभिनीत जूली एंड्रयूज, Dick Van Dyke, दाउद tomlinson, और Glynis जॉन्स, produced by Walt डिज़्नी, and based on the मरियम Poppins books श्रेणी by P. L. ट्रेवर्स.
The फिल्मी was निर्देशित by Robert stevenson and written by Bill वाल्श and Don DaGradi, with songs by the शरमन भाइयो.
it थी शॉट at Walt डिज़्नी studios in Burbank, California.
Julie एंड्रयूज won the Academy पुरस्कार for बेहतरीन Actress for उसके performance as Mary poppins और the फिल्मी also won Oscars for Best फिल्मी संपादन, Original Music स्कोर, बेहतरीन सोंग for `` Chim Chim Cher-ee '' and Best Visual प्रभाव, and प्राप्त a total of 13 nominations.
a story arc is an विस्तारित or continuing कथानक in episodic storytelling मीडिया such as television, कॉमिक किताबे, comic strips, boardgames, video games, और in कुछ मामले, films.
On a television program, for example, the story would unfold over अनेक एपीसोड.
In television, the उपयोग of the स्टोरी चाप is much अधिक common in dramas than in comedies, especially in soap operas.
Webcomics हैं more likely to use story arcs than newspaper कॉमिक्स, as सबसे वेब कॉमिक्स have readable archives ऑनलाइन that a newcomer to the strip can read in अनुक्रम to understand what is going on.
Although स्टोरी arcs have existed for दशकों, the term `` स्टोरी arc '' थी coined in 1988 in relation to the television series wiseguy, and थी quickly adapted for अन्य uses.
Many अमरीकी comic किताब series are अभी written in चार or six-issue arcs, within a continuing series.
छोटी स्टोरी arcs हैं easier to package as व्यापार paperbacks for पुनर्विक्रय, and अधिक accessible to the casual reader than the never-ending continuity कि एकबार characterised कॉमिक्स.
Black शुक्रवार is the day following थैंक्सगिविंग Day in the संयुक्त राज्य, often regarded as the beginning of the क्रिसमस खरीदारी ऋतु.
In हाल सालो, सबसे major retailers have खोली extremely जल्दी और offered promotional बिक्री to लात बंद the holiday खरीदारी ऋतु, समान to Boxing दिन बिक्री in अनेक राष्ट्रमंडल राष्ट्र.
Black Friday is not an official public अवकाश as ऐसे, लकिन अनेक non-retail कर्मचारी और schools have both Thanksgiving और the दिन बाद बंद, followed by a वीकेंड, thereby increasing the क्रमांक of potential shoppers.
It रै routinely महरूम the busiest shopping day of the year since 2005, although न्यूज reports, जिससे at कि समय यहूद inaccurate, have described it as the busiest खरीदारी day of the year for a much longer काल of समय.
The day 's नाम originated in फिलाडेल्फिया, where it originally was प्रयुक्त to describe the heavy और disruptive पैदल और गाडी traffic which would occur on the day बाद Thanksgiving.
उपयोग of the पद started before 1961 और began to see broader use outside Philadelphia around 1975.
बाद an alternative explanation began to be offered : कि `` ब्लैक Friday '' indicates the point at जिससे retailers शुरू to फेरे a profit, or हैं `` ''.
लिये अनेक years, it थी आम लिये रिटेलर to खोलें at 6:00 a.m., लकिन in the लेट 2000s अनेक था crept to 5:00 or even 4:00.
This थी लिया to a new चरम in 2011, when several retailers ( including Target, Kohl 's, macy 's, बेहतरीन Buy, and bealls ) opened at मध्यरात्रि for the पहला समय.
in 2012, Walmart और several अन्य retailers announced कि they होता open सबसे of उनके स्टोर्स at 8:00 p.m. on थैंक्सगिविंग Day ( except in राज्य जहाँ opening on Thanksgiving is prohibited due to blue laws, such as मैसाचुसेट्स जहाँ they still opened around मध्यरात्रि ), prompting calls for a walkout among some workers.
ब्लैक Friday shopping is known लिये attracting aggressive crowds, with annual रिपोर्ट्स of assaults, shootings, और throngs of people trampling on other shoppers in an attempt to get the बेहतरीन सौदे on a product पहले supplies चलाएं out.
The परिवार कि Preys is a 2008 American movie drama लिखा, produced, और निर्देशित by Tyler पेरी.
The पटकथा focuses on two परिवारों, one wealthy और the other working क्लास, जिनकी lives are intertwined in दोनो love और business.
the फिल्म is the second of चार in which पेरी 's signature अक्षर, madea, करता नहीं मेक an रूप.
it is भी the second Perry-directed फिल्मी ( alongside Daddy 's छोटी Girls ) that is नहीं आधारित on कोई of the फिल्मकार 's stage plays.
Net 10, जाल 15, Net 30 और जाल 60 ( भी जाल 10 दिनों, et al ) are फ़ॉर्म of व्यापार क्रेडिट which specify कि the जाल राशि ( the total outstanding on the चालान ) is expected to be paid in full and received by the विक्रेता भीतर 10, 15, 30 or 60 दिनों बाद the goods हैं dispatched or सेवा is completed.
जाल 30 or जाल 60 शर्तें हैं often coupled with a क्रेडिट for early भुगतान.
the word net in this भाव means `` total बाद सब छूट. ''
It originally derives इससे the Latin nitere ( to shine ) and nitidus ( सुरुचिपूर्ण, trim ), and अधिक recently from the फ्रेंच net ( शार्प, neat, clean ).
roadtown, Tortola
The British वेस्ट इंडीज were the आइलैंड्स in और around the Caribbean कि यहूद part of the British साम्राज्य.
In 1912, the British वेस्ट Indies यहूद divided into आठ colonies : the Bahamas, बारबाडोस, British guiana, British होंडुरास, Jamaica ( साथ इसके dependencies the Turks और caicos आइलैंड्स and the केमन Islands ), त्रिनिदाद और Tobago, the Windward Islands and the Leeward Islands.
Between 1958 and 1962, सब of the island territories except the अंग्रेजों Virgin Islands, the बहामा, अंग्रेजों Honduras and अंग्रेजों Guiana यहूद organised into the वेस्ट Indies Federation.
it was hoped कि the Federation होता become independent as a सिंगल स्वदेश, but it had सीमित शक्तियां, अनेक practical समस्याएं, and a कमी of लोकप्रिय support.
Consequently, the वेस्ट इंडीज संघ was dissolved.
Most of the territories, including all the larger ones, are अभी स्वतंत्र as पृथक देशों, with membership to अनेक international forums such as the Organization of American States, the संघ of caribbean States, the संसार Trade Organization, the United Nations, the Caribbean जातियाँ, the Commonwealth of Nations और the caribbean Development Bank among others.
the शेष हैं अंग्रेजों overseas territories.
All the पूर्व राष्ट्र of the अंग्रेजों West Indies, except the Commonwealth of Dominica, Guyana और त्रिनिदाद and टोबैगो, are राष्ट्रमंडल Realms.
the पद is still प्रयुक्त लिये अंग्रेजों विदेशी territories in the caribbean, ऐसे as the केमन आइलैंड्स.
the बाकी अंग्रेजों West Indies
`` What a Wonderful संसार '' is a song लिखा by bob Thiele ( as `` George Douglas '' ) और George दाउद वेइस.
It was पहला recorded by Louis आर्मस्ट्रांग and released as a single in 1967.
thiele और Weiss यहूद both prominent in the म्यूज़िक world ( thiele as a producer और वेइस as a composer/performer ).
आर्मस्ट्रांग 's रिकॉर्डिंग was inducted in the ग्रैमी Hall of कीर्ति in 1999.
The publishing for this सोंग is controlled by मेमोरी लेन Music समूह, कार्लिन म्यूज़िक Corp., और Bug Music, Inc.
उद्घाटन Day 2009 on the वेस्ट कदम of the U.S. कैपिटल.
अध्यक्ष George W. Bush and First Lady Laura बुश सीसे the inaugural parade bas पेन्सिलवेनिया Avenue to the White House, 2005
the inauguration of the president of the United States is a ceremonial event marking the शुरुआत of a new four-year पद of a अध्यक्ष of the United राज्य.
the दिन a presidential उद्घाटन occurs is ज्ञात as `` उद्घाटन दिन '' और occurs on जनवरी 20 ( or 21st if the 20th is a संडे ).
( prior to the बीसवीं Amendment, the date was March 4, the day of the साल on which the संविधान of the United States first took effect in 1789 ; the पिछला inauguration to take place on the older date थी फ्रैंकलिन D. Roosevelt 's पहला एक on कूच 4, 1933. )
The सबसे हाल public presidential उद्घाटन ceremony, the swearing in of President बराक Obama to begin उसके दूसरी four-year term in दफ्तर, took प्लेस on सोमवार, जनवरी 21, 2013.
the तभी उद्घाटन element mandated by the United States Constitution is कि the president मेक an oath or प्रतिज्ञान पहले that व्यक्ति can `` enter on the Execution '' of the office of the presidency.
however, over the सालो, विभिन्न traditions have arisen that have expanded the inauguration इससे a simple oath-taking रस्म to a day-long event, including parades, भाषणों, and balls.
From the presidency of Andrew जैक्सन through कि of jimmy कार्टर, the primary उद्घाटन दिन रस्म took प्लेस on the कैपिटल 's East portico.
चूंकि the 1981 उद्घाटन of रोनाल्ड Reagan, the रस्म रै महरूम held at the Capitol 's West Front.
the inaugurations of विलियम Howard Taft in 1909 and reagan in 1985 were स्थानांतरित indoors at the कैपिटल due to cold weather.
The War of 1812 और संसार War II caused two inaugurations to be held at other स्थितियाँ in वॉशिंगटन, d.c.
When George वॉशिंगटन थी उदघाटन, the oath was administered by Robert Livingston, चांसलर of नई यॉर्क State, in 1789, और by William Cushing, संबद्ध Justice of the परम् Court, in 1793.
Since मुख्य इंसाफ Oliver एल्सवर्थ swore in अध्यक्ष John एडम्स, no मुख्य इंसाफ has छूटी an Inauguration Day.
जब Inauguration दिन has गिरे on a Sunday, the chief justice has administered the शपथ to the अध्यक्ष on the Sunday privately और then again the next day publicly.
जब a नई अध्यक्ष takes over mid-term due to the death or इस्तीफा of a अध्यक्ष, the शपथ of दफ्तर is administered लकिन formal, पब्लिक inauguration events have नहीं been आयोजित.
stefani जोआन एंजेलीना germanotta ( ; born कूच 28, 1986 ), known by her स्टेज नाम Lady गागा, is an American सिंगर, songwriter, रिकार्ड निर्माता, नर्तकी, activist, businesswoman, fashion designer, actress and लोकसेवक.
Born and उठाया in नई यॉर्क नगर, she primarily studied at the Convent of the Sacred दिल और briefly attended New York University 's tisch स्कूल of the कला before withdrawing to फ़ोकस on her musical करियर.
वो soon began performing in the rock म्यूज़िक झाँकी of मैनहटन 's निम्नतर ईस्ट पक्ष.
By the end of 2007, रिकार्ड कार्यपालिका and निर्माता Vincent हर्बर्ट signed her to his label streamline रिकॉर्ड, an imprint of Interscope Records.
initially working as a songwriter at Interscope Records, उसके गायन abilities captured the ध्यान of रिकॉर्डिंग artist एकॉन, who also signed her to Kon सजीव Distribution, his अपना लेबल अंतर्गत Interscope.
Lady Gaga came to prominence as a recording कलाकार following the रिलीज of उसके डेब्यू album, the Fame ( 2008 ), which was a critical and commercial success that अव्वल charts around the संसार and included the अंतरराष्ट्रीय number-one singles `` Just Dance `` और `` Poker Face ``.
After embarking on the The कीर्ति बॉल Tour, वो followed the album with The कीर्ति दानव ( 2009 ), which शाखित the विश्वव्यापी hit singles `` ख़राब रोमांस ``, `` टेलीफोन ``, and `` alejandro ``.
the कीर्ति Monsters success allowed उसके to embark on the eighteen-month long Monster बॉल Tour, which बाद became एक of the highest-grossing कॉन्सर्ट टुर of all समय.
उसके सबसे हाल एल्बम, born इस रास्ता ( 2011 ), topped the charts of सबसे major markets और उत्पन्न more international chart-topping singles, including `` Born This रास्ता ``, `` Judas ``, and `` The किनारे of Glory ``.
बहकावे by Britney स्पीयर्स, दाउद Bowie, Michael जैक्सन, Madonna, और महारानी, महिला Gaga is recognized for उसके flamboyant, diverse और outré contributions to the म्यूज़िक industry through उसके fashion, performances और music videos.
as of October 2011, she रै बेची an अनुमानित 23 लाख एल्बम और 64 लाख singles विश्वव्यापी and उसके singles are some of the best-selling worldwide.
उसके achievements include five ग्रैमी पुरस्कार और 13 MTV Video म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार.
Lady गागा रै consecutively appeared on बिलबोर्ड magazine 's कलाकारों of the Year ( scoring the definitive शीर्षक in 2010 ), क्रमित fourth in VH1 's सूची of 100 महानतम Women in म्यूज़िक, is the sixth बेहतरीन selling digital singles कलाकार in us according to riaa, is regularly लगाई on lists composed by Forbes magazine and was named एक of the सबसे influential people in the संसार by समय पत्रिका.
besides her musical करियर, वो involves herself with humanitarian causes and lgbt सक्रियता.

The फ्लोरिडा gators बेसबॉल team represents the University of Florida in the खेल of बेसबॉल.

A political campaign is an organized effort which seeks to influence the निर्णय बनाना process within a विशिष्ट समूह.
In democracies, राजनैतिक अभियान often refer to चुनावी अभियान, wherein प्रतिनिधि are चुनी or referendums are decided.
In आधुनिक politics, the most ऊँची profile political campaigns हैं focused on candidates for head of राज्य or सिर of government, often a President or Prime Minister.
एलिज़ाबेथ Cady stanton and her बेटी, Harriot
Elizabeth cady stanton ( नवम्बर 12, 1815 – अक्तूबर 26, 1902 ) was an American सोशल activist, abolitionist, and अग्रणी figure of the early महिलाओं 's rights गति.
Her Declaration of Sentiments, presented at the पहला women 's rights convention held in 1848 in Seneca Falls, नई York, is प्रायः credited साथ initiating the पहला व्यवस्थित महिलाओं 's rights and women 's suffrage आंदोलनों in the संयुक्त States.
Before stanton narrowed her political फ़ोकस लगभग exclusively to women 's rights, she was an active abolitionist together with her husband, हेनरी Brewster Stanton और cousin, Gerrit स्मिथ.
नापसंद many of those involved in the women 's rights गति, Stanton addressed विभिन्न मुद्दे pertaining to women beyond मतदान rights.
Her concerns included women 's parental और custody अधिकारों, property अधिकारों, नियुक्ति and income rights, divorce, the economic health of the family, and birth कंट्रोल.
She थी also an outspoken समर्थक of the 19th-century temperance गति.
बाद the American सिविल War, Stanton 's commitment to मादा suffrage caused a schism in the women 's अधिकारों movement जब she, साथ साथ सुसान B. एंथोनी, declined to support ड्योढ़ी of the fourteenth और Fifteenth amendments to the संयुक्त States Constitution.
She opposed giving added legal सुरक्षा and voting अधिकारों to African American men जबकि women, black and white, यहूद denied those वही rights.
उसके position on इस समस्या, together with her thoughts on व्यवस्थित christianity और महिलाओं 's मुद्दे परे मतदान अधिकारों, led to the formation of दो separate women 's rights संगठन that were आखिरकार rejoined, साथ Stanton as president of the joint organization, लगभग twenty years बाद उसके ब्रेक from the असली women 's suffrage गति.
stanton died in 1902 having authored दोनो the स्त्री 's बाइबल और her autobiography, along साथ many आलेख और pamphlets concerning मादा suffrage and women 's अधिकारों.
My Fair Lady is a musical based upon George बर्नार्ड शॉ 's Pygmalion और साथ book and lyrics by Alan Jay Lerner और म्यूज़िक by Frederick loewe.
The स्टोरी चिंताएं eliza Doolittle, a Cockney flower लड़की who takes वाक lessons from प्राध्यापक हेनरी Higgins, a phoneticist, so कि she may pass as a well-born lady.
The musical 's 1956 Broadway उत्पादन was a hit, सेटिंग कया थी तब the रिकार्ड for the longest चलाएं of any major musical theatre उत्पादन in history.
It थी followed by a hit लंदन उत्पादन, a popular film संस्करण, and numerous revivals.
It has been called `` the perfect musical ''.
deregulation is the अधिनियम or प्रक्रम of निकालना or reducing state regulations.
it is इसलिए विपरीत of विनियमन, which refers to the प्रक्रम of the सरकारी regulating निश्चित क्रियाएँ.

`` वहीँ होगा Come नरम Rains '' is a short story by विज्ञान fiction author Ray bradbury जिससे was पहला published in the may 6, 1950 issue of Collier 's.
Later that वही year the स्टोरी was included in Bradbury 's The martian Chronicles ( 1950 ).
With over 1.2 billion people, हान Chinese is the largest ethnic group in the संसार.

They number around 50 million.

नस्ल or ethnic समूह is a socially defined श्रेणी आधारित on common culture or राष्ट्रीयता.
नस्ल can, but करता not have to, शामिल आम ancestry, appearance, cuisine, dressing स्टाइल, heritage, इतिहास, language or dialect, धर्म, symbols, traditions, or other सांस्कृतिक फ़ैक्टर.
जातीय पहचान is constantly reinforced through आम characteristics जिससे नियत the group अलावा from other groups.
the 19.9 MW gemasolar solar plant in Spain सुविधाएँ 15 घंटों of storage और can सप्लाई power 24 घंटों a day.
सौर energy, radiant लाइट और ऊष्मा from the sun, रै महरूम harnessed by humans since ancient टाइम्स using a range of ever-evolving technologies.
सौर energy technologies शामिल solar heating, solar photovoltaics, सौर thermal electricity, सौर वास्तुकला और artificial photosynthesis, जिससे can मेक considerable contributions to solving कुछ of the सबसे urgent उर्जा समस्याएं the world now चेहरों.
सौर technologies are broadly characterized as either passive सौर or active solar depending on the way they capture, convert and वितरित solar energy.
क्रियाशील solar तकनीकों include the use of photovoltaic panels और solar थर्मल collectors to दोहन the energy.
Passive सौर तकनीकों include orienting a building to the Sun, selecting सामग्री साथ favorable थर्मल mass or लाइट dispersing properties, और designing spaces that naturally circulate air.
In 2011, the International उर्जा एजेंसी कहा कि `` the विकास of सस्ती, inexhaustible और clean सौर energy technologies होगा have विशाल longer-term लाभ.
it will बढ़ाएँ countries’ उर्जा security through रिलायंस on an indigenous, inexhaustible और mostly import-independent संसाधन, बढ़ाएँ sustainability, reduce pollution, निम्नतर the लागत of mitigating climate बदलें, और keep चट्टान ईंधन कीमतें निम्नतर than वरना.
ये advantages हैं global.
Hence the अतिरिक्त costs of the incentives for early deployment should be माना सीखना निवेश ; they जरूर be wisely spent and need to be widely shared ''.
the classical Latin वर्णमाला or रोमन alphabet विकसित from a पश्चिमी variety of the Greek वर्णमाला पुकारा the Cumaean वर्णमाला, which was adopted and परिवर्धित by the etruscans जो शासित early Rome.
The etruscan alphabet थी in turn adopted और further परिवर्धित by the ancient romans to लिखें the Latin language.
During the मध्य आयु, the लैटिन वर्णमाला थी adapted to Romance languages, सीधा वंशजों of Latin, as well as to Celtic, Germanic, बाल्टिक, and some स्लावी भाषाएं.
साथ the आयु of colonialism and ईसाई इंजीलवाद, the लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट was स्प्रेड विदेशी, and लागू to indigenous अमरीकी, ऑस्ट्रेलियाई, ऑस्ट्रोनीशियाई, Austroasiatic, और African भाषाएं.
अधिक recently, linguists have also tended to prefer the लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट or the International Phonetic वर्णमाला ( itself largely based on Latin स्क्रिप्ट ) जब transcribing or creating लिखा मानकों लिये non-european भाषाएं, such as the African सन्दर्भ alphabet.
The पद Latin वर्णमाला may refer to either the वर्णमाला प्रयुक्त to लिखें Latin ( as described in this article ), or अन्य alphabets आधारित on the लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट, which is the मौलिक set of letters common to the विभिन्न alphabets descended from the classical लैटिन एक, ऐसे as the अंग्रेज़ी alphabet.
ये Latin-derived alphabets may discard अक्षर, जैसे the Rotokas alphabet, or add new अक्षर, like the डैनिश and Norwegian alphabet.
Letter shapes have बदला over the centuries, including the creation लिये Medieval Latin of lower case forms जिससे did नहीं मौजूद in the शास्त्रीय काल.
the हत्या of United States President अब्राहम Lincoln took place on Good Friday, अप्रैल 14, 1865, as the American सिविल युद्ध was आरेखण to a बंद.
the assassination occurred five days after the commander of the Confederate Army of Northern Virginia, General रॉबर्ट E. ली, surrendered to लेफ्टिनेंट General Ulysses S. Grant और the Union फौज of the Potomac.
Lincoln was the first अमरीकी अध्यक्ष to be assassinated, हालांकि an unsuccessful attempt था been made on Andrew जैक्सन 30 years before in 1835.
the assassination was नियोजित और carried out by the well-known स्टेज actor जॉन Wilkes Booth, as भाग of a larger conspiracy in a bid to revive the Confederate cause.
बूथ 's co-conspirators यहूद लुईस पावेल और दाउद Herold, जो यहूद आबंटित to kill सचिव of State William H. seward, और George Atzerodt who थी to मार Vice अध्यक्ष एंड्रयू Johnson.
by simultaneously eliminating the शीर्ष three लोगों in the administration, Booth और his co-conspirators hoped to sever the निरंतरता of the United States सरकारी.
Lincoln थी shot जबकि watching the खेल Our अमरीकी cousin साथ his बीवी मरियम Todd lincoln at घाट 's Theatre in वॉशिंगटन, d.C. on the रात्रि of अप्रैल 14, 1865.
He died जल्दी the next morning.
the बाकी of the षड्यंत्रकारियों ' प्लाट failed ; पावेल only managed to wound Seward, जबकि atzerodt, Johnson 's would-be assassin, खोया उसके nerve and fled Washington.
add-on might mean:
Plug-in ( कम्प्यूटिंग ), a piece of software which enhances another software application और प्रायः can नहीं be चलाएं independently
Browser extension, which modifies the interface and/or बर्ताव of web browsers

क्लबों level seating is a special खण्ड of seating in आधुनिक sports स्टेडियम.
The Club स्तर is usually located towards the middle of the stage of seating भाग, ऊपर the निम्नतर deck but नीचे the अपर डेक.
They are usually right अगला to the लक्ज़री Boxes, either सही above, सही below, or sandwiched between दो स्तर of Luxury बाक्स.
क्लबों स्तर seating is considered as higher class than sitting anywhere else in the एरिना, लकिन lower क्लास compared to the लक्ज़री Boxes.
Unlike the Luxury बाक्स, सबसे क्लबों स्तर do not wrap entirely around the एरिना.
कुछ club स्तर रोकें at a certain पाइंट, giving way to an expansion of the Mezzanine, जबकि अन्य give रास्ता to lower क्लास Luxury Boxes ( such as `` Party Suites '' ).
a notable एक्सेप्शन to this is Emirates स्टेडियम in London, which रै a पूरा टियर of club seating.
क्लबों स्तर allow प्रशंसक multiple स्तर of entertainment.
क्लबों स्तर seating is open to the elements, as opposed to the entirely enclosed luxury boxes, which gives more of an outdoors छाप at roofless and open-roof स्टेडियम and arenas.
Club स्तर seating is सामान्यतः खरीदा on a अनुबंध आधार to allow लिये maximum profit on the भाग of the स्टेडियम.
The Club Level provides प्रशंसक साथ खास अभिगम to an अंदर part of the एरिना विशेष to fans साथ खास टिकटें.
ये क्षेत्रों are air conditioned and allow access to special रेस्तरां, merchandise स्टैंड, और लाउंज क्षेत्रों of the stadium that हैं नहीं वरना उपलब्धियाँ.
रियायत स्टैंड और विक्रेता on the क्लबों Level भी प्रायः प्रस्ताव अलग menus than in other stands to दे more of a special feel to the क्लबों.
These areas हैं बंद off to the बाकी of the stadium, and वे प्रायः can तभी be पहुँचा through the exclusive, निजी club entrances.
sophia लोरेन ( ; born सोफिया Villani scicolone ; 20 सितंबर 1934 ) is an इतालवी अभिनेत्री.
Loren is widely recognized as इटली 's सबसे renowned and honored अभिनेत्री.
वो थी the पहला actress of the talkie era to win an Academy Award for a non-english-speaking प्रदर्शन, for her portrayal of Cesira in vittorio De सिका 's Two Women.

in 1995 वो प्राप्त the Cecil B. demille Award for आजीवन achievements, one of अनेक such पुरस्कार.
उसके films include : houseboat ( 1958 ), El सीआईडी ( 1961 ), कल, आज और Tomorrow ( 1963 ), विवाह Italian-Style ( 1964 ), and a Special Day ( 1977 ).
In later years वो रै appeared in American blockbusters such as Grumpier Old Men ( 1995 ), and नौ ( 2009 ).

Deaths लिये self-inflicted चोटों प्रति 100,000 निवासियों in 2004.
Incidence of suicide is underreported due to दोनो religious and social pressures, और possibly completely unreported in some क्षेत्रों.
nevertheless, इससे reported cases, certain रुझान हैं apparent.
Since the data is skewed, comparing suicide दरों between राष्ट्र is statistically unsound.
The trends themselves हैं नहीं the कारण, but may be indicative of a रूट कारण.

the अकादमी थी संस्थापित by ओपरा विनफ्रे with the लक्ष्य of providing educational और leadership अवसर लिये academically gifted लड़कियों from impoverished backgrounds.

digicel is a मोबाईल phone network प्रदाता operating in 31 बाज़ार across the caribbean, सेंट्रल अमेरिका, और महासागरीय regions.
the company is स्वामित्व by irishman Denis O'Brien, is incorporated in Bermuda, and आधारित in Jamaica.
It रै परिचय 13 million बेतार users.
As of 2012, digicel 's बाज़ार comprise : Anguilla, अण्टीगुआ and Barbuda, अरूबा, बारबाडोस, Bermuda, Bonaire, the अंग्रेजों Virgin आइलैंड्स, the Cayman आइलैंड्स, Curacao, Dominica, El Salvador, फिजी, French Guiana, हरा, Guadeloupe, गुयाना, हैती, Jamaica, Martinique, Nauru, Panama, Papua New Guinea, समोआ, संत किट्स और नेविस, संत लूसिया, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, सूरीनाम, Tonga, Trinidad & टोबैगो, turks और Caicos, और Vanuatu.
