हॉस्पिटल आपात Codes are प्रयुक्त in अस्पताल worldwide to alert स्टाफ to various emergencies.
the use of कोड is intended to convey अनिवार्य information जल्दी and साथ minimal गलतफहमी to staff, जबकि preventing तनाव and panic among विज़िटर to the हॉस्पिटल.
These कोड may be posted on placards throughout the हॉस्पिटल, or मुद्रित on employee पहचान बैज for तैयार reference.
Back of a hospital ID badge प्रर्दशित disaster कोड.
Hospital आपात codes may denote different कार्यक्रम at different अस्पताल, सहित आसपास ones.
क्युकी many physicians work at more than एक सुविधा, this may lead to confusion in emergencies, so uniform systems have महरूम प्रस्तावित.
the route of the Eifel aqueduct, साथ its औसत slope.
The eifel जलसेतु थी one of the longest aqueducts of the रोमन साम्राज्य.
The जलसेतु, constructed in AD 80, carried जल कुछ from the hilly eifel region of what is now जर्मनी to the ancient city of colonia Claudia आरा Agrippinensium ( present-day Cologne ).
if the auxiliary spurs to additional springs हैं included, the length थी.
The construction थी almost entirely below मैदान, and the flow of the water थी उत्पादित entirely by gravity.
A few bridges, सहित एक up to in लंबाई, were needed to pass over घाटियों.
नापसंद कुछ of the other famous Roman aqueducts, the Eifel aqueduct was specifically designed to minimize the above-ground portion to protect it from क्षति और freezing.
in chemistry, a disulfide बंध ( Br.E. disulphide बंध ) is a covalent bond, usually derived by the coupling of दो thiol समूह.
the linkage is also पुकारा an ss-bond or disulfide सेतु.
the overall connectivity is इसलिए R-S-S-R.
the terminology is widely used in biochemistry.
In औपचारिक शर्तें, the कनेक्शन is a persulfide, in analogy to its congener, परऑक्साइड ( R-O-O-R ), लकिन इस शब्दावली is obscure and is no longer प्रयुक्त ( मगर in सन्दर्भ to R-S-S-H or h-s-s-h यौगिकों ).
Formal चित्रण of disulfide बंध गठन as an oxidation.
वेस्टमिंस्टर Abbey is प्रयुक्त for the राजतिलक of अंग्रेजों monarchs
धर्म in the United किंगडम और in the देशों कि preceded it, रै महरूम वर्चस्व, लिये over 1,400 सालो, by various forms of Christianity.
According to some सर्वेक्षण, a majority of नागरिकों still पहचानो साथ christianity, हालांकि regular गिरिजाघर उपस्थिति has गिरे dramatically since the middle of the 20th century, और immigration and जनसांख्यिकी change have contributed to the विकास of other faiths.
Religious affiliations of uk नागरिकों are अंकित by नियमित surveys, the four major ones being the UK जनसांख्यिकी, the Labour फ़ोर्स Survey, the अंग्रेजों सोशल Attitudes survey और the European सोशल Survey.
According to the 2001 uk जनसांख्यिकी, Christianity is the major धर्म, followed by Islam, हिंदुत्व, sikhism, Judaism और Buddhism in शर्तें of क्रमांक of adherents.
This, और the relatively large number of individuals साथ नाममात्र or no religious संबद्धों has led commentators to variously describe the United Kingdom as a multi-faith, secularised, or post-Christian society.
the United किंगडम थी formed by the संघ of previously independent देशों from 1707, and consequently most of the largest religious groups do नहीं have UK-wide organisational structures.
While कुछ समूह have पृथक structures लिये the व्यक्तिगत देशों of the United Kingdom, अन्य may have a single ढांचा covering England and Wales or Great ब्रिटेन.
similarly, due to the relatively हाल सृष्टि of Northern आयरलैंड in 1921, सबसे major धार्मिक groups in Northern Ireland are organised on an all-ireland आधार.
The 1967 न्यूर्क दंगे were a प्रमुख सिविल disturbance that occurred in the city of न्यूर्क, नई Jersey between जुलाई 12 and जुलाई 17, 1967.
the six दिनों of rioting, लूटने, and विनाश बाएँ 26 मुर्दे and सैंकड़ों घायल.
In United राज्य कॉलेज एथलेटिक्स, redshirt is a delay or बर्खास्तगी of an athlete 's participation in अनुक्रम to lengthen his or उसके काल of पात्रता.
Typically, a छात्र 's एथलेटिक eligibility in a दिए खेल is चार सीज़न, a क्रमांक derived इससे the चार सालो of academic classes that हैं सामान्यतः required to obtain a स्नातक 's उपाधि at an American college or विश्वविद्यालयों.
however, a student खिलाड़ी may be offered the opportunity to redshirt लिये up to two years, which allows the athlete to spread those चार सालो of eligibility over five, or sometimes छह years.
In a redshirt year, a student खिलाड़ी may attend classes at the college or विश्वविद्यालयों, practice with an athletic टोली, और dress लिये खेल लकिन he or she may not compete दौरान the game.
Using इस यांत्रिकी, a student खिलाड़ी has up to five academic सालो to use the four सालो of पात्रता, thus becoming a fifth-year senior.
The term is प्रयुक्त as a क्रिया, noun, और adjective.
लिये example, a कोच may choose to redshirt a खिलाड़ी जो is then referred to as a redshirt freshman or simply a redshirt.
The opposite of this is a `` true freshman. ''
World युद्ध i ( WWI ) थी a वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in Europe that began on 28 जुलाई 1914 and lasted until 11 नवम्बर 1918.
It थी predominantly पुकारा the World युद्ध or the Great War इससे its occurrence until the प्रारंभ of World युद्ध ii in 1939, और the First World War or World युद्ध i thereafter.
it involved सब the world 's great शक्तियां, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the allies ( based on the Triple entente of the United Kingdom, फ़्रांस और Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the ट्रिपल गठबंधन of जर्मनी, austria-hungary और इटली ; but, as austria–hungary था taken the offensive विरूद्ध the agreement, इटली did नहीं डालें into the युद्ध ).
ये alliances यहूद both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the युद्ध : Italy, जापानी and the United राज्य joined the Allies, और the उस्मानी Empire and बुल्गारिया the Central शक्तियां.
ultimately, अधिक than 70 million military personnel, सहित 60 लाख Europeans, were mobilised in one of the largest wars in इतिहास.
अधिक than 9 million combatants were मारे, largely क्युकी of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons बगैर सम्बन्धित सुधार in सुरक्षा or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest विरोध in world history, subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न political changes, ऐसे as revolutions in many of the राष्ट्र involved.
One of the long-term causes of the युद्ध थी the resurgence of साम्राज्यवाद in the foreign policies of the great शक्तियां of Europe.
More तत्काल, the हत्या of archduke फ्रांज Ferdinand of Austria, the heir to the सिंहासन of Austria-Hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by Yugoslav राष्ट्रवादी Gavrilo Princip in साराजेवो triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the किंगडम of सर्बिया.
अनेक alliances formed over the पिछला दशकों यहूद invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers यहूद at war and, via उनके colonies, the conflict जल्द स्प्रेड around the संसार.
on 28 July, the austro-hungarians fired the पहला shots of the युद्ध as तैयारी लिये the invasion of सर्बिया.
जबकि the russians mobilised, the Germans invaded न्यूट्रल बेल्जियम और ध्वज on the way to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli लिये Britain 's घोषणा of युद्ध विरूद्ध जर्मनी.
After the जर्मनी कूच on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the Marne —the Western सामने settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench लकीर that changed little जबतक 1917.
On the Eastern सामने, the Russian army थी successful विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians, but थी रोका in इसके आक्रमण of ईस्ट prussia by the germans.
In November the उस्मानी साम्राज्य joined the war, खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस, Mesopotamia और the sinai.
इटली और बुल्गारिया went to war in 1915 और रोमानिया in 1916.
In Russia, the त्सार 's सरकारी collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November brought the Russians to terms साथ the सेंट्रल शक्तियां.
बाद a 1918 German offensive साथ the western front, the allies drove back the Germans in a श्रेणी of successful offensives और अमरीकी शक्तियां began entering the trenches.
जर्मनी, जिससे था इसके own trouble with क्रांतिकारियों, सहमत to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in victory for the allies.
Events on the home fronts यहूद as tumultuous as on the बैटल fronts, as the participants tried to mobilize their जनशक्ति and आर्थिक resources to लड़ो a total war.
by the समाप्त of the युद्ध, four प्रमुख imperial powers—the German, Russian, Austro-Hungarian और उस्मानी empires—ceased to exist.
The successor राज्य of the पूर्व दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of सेंट्रल यूरोपीय थी redrawn into several smaller राज्य.
The League of राष्ट्र थी formed in the hope of preventing another such conflict.
The यूरोपीय राष्ट्रवाद spawned by the युद्ध और the ब्रेकअप of empires, the परखना of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त and समस्याएं साथ the सन्धि of Versailles are सहमत to be कारकों contributing to संसार युद्ध II.
Map of countries कि घोषित themselves to be socialist राज्य अंतर्गत the marxist–leninist or माओवादी definition - that is to say, `` कम्युनिस्ट states '' - between 1979 और 1983.
This period चिह्नित the महानतम territorial extent of Communist राज्य.
A कम्युनिस्ट राज्य is a राज्य where the means of production हैं collectively स्वामित्व by the society.
It has a form of सरकारी characterized by single-party rule or dominant-party नियम of a communist party ( referred as Dictatorship of the proletariat by its proponents ) and a professed allegiance to a Leninist or Marxist–Leninist ideology as the guiding principle of the state.
technically, `` कम्युनिस्ट राज्य '' is a contradictio in terminis as a कम्युनिस्ट society as defined by both Marxists और anarcho-communists is in principle stateless.
From इस perspective, the पद Marxist-Leninist राज्य is more उचित.
historically, a `` कम्युनिस्ट राज्य '' referred to a system where public स्वामित्व of all or सबसे अर्थात् of production by the Communist party -run state is deemed necessary to further the रूचि of the working क्लास ; today, a कम्युनिस्ट राज्य can also, लिये उदाहरण, refer to समकालीन चीन और Vietnam, where a Communist party-run state exists alongside a मिश्रित अर्थव्यवस्था.
according to marxist–leninists, the state is a औजार in the hands of the ruling क्लास, which in a समाजवादी society is the working क्लास, so a समाजवादी state is, according to Leninists, a state of the working class.
in अभ्यास, communist states do not actually refer to themselves as ऐसे.
वे do this नहीं to भेस the fact कि the सत्ताधारी party is कम्युनिस्ट, लकिन बल्कि because वे do not consider themselves to be a communist समाज at उपस्थित.
बजाय, वे constitutionally identify themselves as socialist राज्य or workers ' states.
the प्राथमिक goal of ये states, जिससे also explains their आधिकारिक नाम, is to guide उनके respective देशों in the process of building socialism, ultimately अग्रणी to communism.
Communist राज्य may have अनेक legal political पार्टियों, लकिन the communist party is प्रायः granted a खास or प्रबल role in government, प्रायः by statute or under the constitution.
Consequently, the institutions of the state and of the कम्युनिस्ट party become intimately entwined, ऐसे as in the development of parallel institutions.
In the 20th सदी, सबसे कम्युनिस्ट राज्य adopted नियोजित economies.
However, there यहूद exceptions : the Soviet संघ दौरान the 1920s and late 1980s and Yugoslavia after संसार युद्ध ii allowed सीमित बाज़ार and a उपाधि of worker self-management, जबकि China, वियतनाम and लाओस introduced far-reaching मार्केट reforms after the 1980s.
in the 21st century, China और वियतनाम have अनुमत a मिश्रित अर्थव्यवस्था to develop.
the आधारभूत अवधारणाओं of communist states प्रायः diverge from the असली socio-economic ideologies इससे जिससे they develop.
as a result, many adherents of these विचारधाराओं प्रायः oppose the राजनैतिक systems commonly associated साथ these states.
For example, dissenting communists such as trotskyists यहूद often opposed to the communist राज्य of the 20th century, claiming either कि they था nothing to do with `` real '' communism or that the ideology of such राज्य had पहुँचे a पाइंट of अटल corruption.
Michael फ्रेड Phelps II ( born June 30, 1985 ) is a रिटायर्ड अमरीकी तैराक और the most decorated ओलंपियन of all time, साथ a कुल of 22 medals.
Phelps also holds the all-time रिकॉर्ड लिये ओलम्पिक gold medals ( 18, double the दूसरी उच्चतम record धारकों ), Olympic gold medals in व्यक्तिगत कार्यक्रम ( 11 ), and ओलम्पिक medals in individual कार्यक्रम for a male ( 13 ).
In जीतना आठ gold medals at the 2008 बीजिंग खेल, Phelps took the रिकार्ड लिये the most first-place finishes at कोई सिंगल ओलम्पिक Games.
पाँच of those victories were in व्यक्तिगत events, tying the सिंगल खेल रिकार्ड.
in the 2012 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक in London, Phelps won four golds और दो silver medals, making him the most successful athlete of the Games लिये the third Olympics in a पंक्ति.
Phelps is the long कोर्स संसार recordholder in the 100-meter butterfly, 200-meter butterfly और 400-meter individual medley as खूब as the पूर्व long course world recordholder in the 200-meter freestyle and 200-meter individual medley.
he रै जीती a total of 71 medals in प्रमुख international long-course प्रतियोगिता, 57 सुनहरा, 11 चांदी, and three कांस्य spanning the ओलंपिक, the World, and the पण Pacific championships.
Phelps 's international शीर्षक and record-breaking प्रदर्शन have earned him the संसार Swimmer of the साल पुरस्कार seven times and अमरीकी तैराक of the साल पुरस्कार nine times as well as the फिना Swimmer of the Year पुरस्कार in 2012.
उसके unprecedented ओलम्पिक कामयाबी in 2008 अर्जित फेल्प्स Sports Illustrated magazine 's sportsman of the साल पुरस्कार.
बाद the 2008 गर्मियाँ Olympics, Phelps प्रारंभ the माइकल फेल्प्स Foundation, which focuses on growing the sport of swimming and promoting healthier lifestyles.
He expects to do further कार्य साथ his न्यास after the 2012 Olympics, जिससे he रै कहा होगा be उसके पिछला.
लेनोवो Group Limited ( ) is a चाइनीज बहुराष्ट्रीय computer hardware and electronics कम्पनी with इसके मुख्यालय in बीजिंग, China and morrisville, उत्तर कैरोलिना and its registered office in Hong Kong, चीन.
इसके उत्पाद include personal कंप्यूटर, tablet computers, मोबाईल फोन, workstations, servers, electronic भंडार devices, IT प्रबन्धन तन्त्र और smart televisions.
लेनोवो is the संसार 's second-largest PC विक्रेता by 2012 ईकाई sales.
it markets the थिंकपैड लकीर of notebook कंप्यूटर और the thinkcentre line of desktops.
Lenovo रै operations in अधिक than 60 countries और बिकता its उत्पाद in around 160 देशों.
Lenovo थी founded in बीजिंग in 1984 और incorporated in हांग काँग in 1988 अंतर्गत इसके पिछला नाम, Legend.
लेनोवो is सूचीबद्ध on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the Hang सेंग china-affiliated corporations अनुक्रमणिका.
स्लग is a common name लिये an apparently shell-less स्थलीय gastropod mollusk.
the word `` slug '' is भी often प्रयुक्त as part of the common name of कोई gastropod mollusc कि रै no शेल, रै a very घटाया शेल, or has तभी a small internal shell.
( इस is in कंट्रास्ट to the आम name `` घोंघा ``, जिससे is लागू to gastropods कि have a नतीजे shell कि is large enough that the soft भाग of the एनिमल can retract fully into it. )
slugs मौजूद on land and in the sea, और there is even one genus of freshwater slugs, Acochlidium.
The unadorned शब्द `` slug '' is however लागू primarily to जमीन slugs, whereas slugs इससे the sea or इससे freshwater are usually referred to as `` समुद्र slugs `` और `` freshwater slugs ''.
Land gastropods with a shell कि is नहीं काफी vestigial, लकिन is too छोटी to retract into ( जैसे अनेक in the family urocyclidae ), हैं known as semislugs.
the various taxonomic families of slugs form भाग of अनेक quite अलग विकासवादी lineages जिससे भी include घोंघे.
Thus, for उदाहरण, the विभिन्न families of land slugs हैं नहीं बहुत closely सम्बन्धित to एक another, despite a superficial similarity in the overall body रूप.
The shell-less condition has arisen अनेक times independently दौरान the विकासवादी पास्ट, and thus the category `` स्लग '' is emphatically a polyphyletic one.
slugs, like all other gastropods, undergo torsion ( a 180° twisting of the internal organs ) during development.
Internally, slug anatomy clearly shows the effects of इस rotation, but externally the लाशें of जमीन slugs appear to be more or less सममित, except लिये the positioning of the pneumostome, जिससे is on one side of the animal, सामान्यतः the right hand side.
The soft, slimy लाशें of slugs हैं prone to desiccation, so land-living slugs हैं confined to नम environments और जरूर रिट्रीट to damp hiding स्थान जब the मौसम is dry.
The subsequent information in इस article applies to land slugs.
is a Latin शब्द that means `` thus '' or, in लिखने, `` it थी यूँ in the सोर्स सामग्री ''.

sic, cluj, a कम्यून in रोमानिया
SIC, the regional code for सिसिली

`` ( sic ) '', a सोंग by American band Slipknot on the एल्बम slipknot
SIC, the आरंभिक of मार्को Simoncelli.

sic, Silicon carbide, a semiconducting material, also used to मेक धातुकर्म टूल्स

अंतरराष्ट्रीय Standard औद्योगिक Classification a UN system for आर्थिक activities
Shetland Islands परिषद
the स्विस Interbank clearing system
सैन Isidro Club, an Argentine rugby संघ क्लबों

Second-in-command in the field of aviation

Segmented पूर्णांक Counter विधि, a mode of आपरेशन in क्रिप्टोग्राफी
sepang International सर्किट, a high-end racetrack कि hosts the Malaysian गोलाकार of Formula 1

Imperial मानक of नेपोलियन I
Napoleon बोनापार्ट (, ; 15 अगस्त 1769 – 5 may 1821 ) was a फ्रेंच military और political leader who rose to prominence during the latter stages of the फ्रेंच Revolution and its associated युद्धों in यूरोपीय.
as नेपोलियन I, he was Emperor of the फ्रेंच from 1804 to 1815.
His विधिक सुधार, the Napoleonic कोड, रै महरूम a प्रमुख influence on many सिविल law jurisdictions worldwide, लकिन he is best remembered लिये उसके भूमिका in the युद्धों led विरूद्ध France by a series of coalitions, the so-called napoleonic युद्धों.
he established hegemony over most of continental Europe और sought to spread the ideals of the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति, while consolidating an इम्पीरियल साम्राज्य जिससे restored aspects of the अपदस्थ ancien régime.
due to उसके कामयाबी in these wars, often against numerically superior enemies, he is generally regarded as एक of the महानतम सैन्य commanders of all time, और उसके campaigns हैं studied at सैन्य अकादमियों worldwide.
नेपोलियन थी born at ajaccio in corsica in a family of प्रतिष्ठित Italian ancestry which had settled corsica in the 16th century.
He प्रशिक्षित as an तोपखाने अधिकारी in mainland फ़्रांस.
he रोज़ to prominence अंतर्गत the फ्रेंच First गणतंत्र and led कामयाब campaigns against the पहला और दूसरी Coalitions arrayed against फ़्रांस.
He led a कामयाब आक्रमण of the इतालवी peninsula.
in 1799, he staged a तख्तापलट d'état and संस्थापित खुद as First कौंसुल ; five सालो बाद the French सीनेट proclaimed उसे emperor, following a plebiscite in उसके favour.
in the first दशक of the 19th सदी, the French Empire अंतर्गत नेपोलियन engaged in a series of conflicts—the napoleonic Wars —that involved every प्रमुख European शक्ति.
बाद a streak of victories, France secured a प्रबल position in महाद्वीपीय Europe, और Napoleon कायम the फ्रेंच गोला of influence through the formation of extensive alliances और the नियुक्ति of friends और परिवार सदस्यों to rule अन्य European देशों as French क्लाएंट राज्य.
The Peninsular युद्ध और 1812 फ्रेंच आक्रमण of रूस चिह्नित turning points in Napoleon 's fortunes.
His ग्रांडे Armée थी badly damaged in the अभियान और never fully recovered.
in 1813, the छठे Coalition defeated उसके forces at लिपजिग ; the following year the Coalition invaded फ़्रांस, forced नेपोलियन to abdicate and exiled उसे to the island of एल्बा.
कम than a साल बाद, he escaped एल्बा और लौटे to power, but was पराजित at the Battle of Waterloo in जून 1815.
नेपोलियन spent the last six years of his life in कारावास by the British on the island of Saint हेलेना.
An पोस्टमार्टम concluded he died of stomach कर्कट, but वहीँ रै been कुछ बहस परिचय the कारण of his death, as कुछ विद्वानों have speculated कि he was a शिकार of आर्सेनिक विषाक्तता.
इस is a chronological लिस्टिंग of the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटरों from Pennsylvania.
United States Senators हैं popularly elected, लिये a six-year term, beginning January 3.
Elections are आयोजित the first Tuesday after November 1.
Before 1914, they यहूद chosen by the Pennsylvania सामान्य Assembly, and before 1935, उनके terms began March 4.
the दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी नेशनल रग्बी संघ team ( ज्ञात as the springboks ) represents South Africa in rugby union.
वे compete in the annual Rugby चैंपियनशिप, along with southern-hemisphere counterparts अर्जेंटीना, Australia और New Zealand.
They have जीती इस चैंपियनशिप on तीन occasions in सोलह सालो.
They हैं currently ranked दूसरी in the संसार by the International Rugby फलक, and were नामित 2008 संसार Team of the साल at the Laureus संसार खेल पुरस्कार.
हालांकि दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी थी इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in the सृष्टि of the Rugby World कप competition, the springboks did नहीं compete in the first two World Cups in 1987 and 1991 because of anti-apartheid sporting boycotts of दक्षिण Africa.
The टोली बना its संसार कप debut in 1995, जब the newly लोकतांत्रिक दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी hosted the tournament.
the springboks then पराजित the All Blacks 15–12 in the फाइनल, which is अभी remembered as एक of the महानतम moments in South Africa 's sporting इतिहास, और a watershed पल in the post-apartheid nation-building process.
South अफ़्रीकी regained their title as champions 12 सालो later, जब they पराजित इंग्लैण्ड 15–6 in the 2007 फाइनल.
as a result of the 2007 संसार Cup tournament the springboks यहूद प्रचारित to पहला place in the IRB संसार Rankings, a स्थिति वे held जबतक जुलाई the following year जब New जीलैंड regained the शीर्ष spot.
the springboks खेल in green and सुनहरा jerseys, and उनके emblems हैं the springbok and the protea.
the पक्ष has been playing international रग्बी since 1891, when a अंग्रेजों Isles पक्ष toured the nation, playing South अफ़्रीकी in their first Test on 30 जुलाई.
दक्षिण Africa was coached by जेक White, जो led the Boks to the 2007 World कप शीर्षक, announcing his इस्तीफा effectively from the समाप्त of 2007.
उसके बदलना 's ( Peter de Villiers ) अनुबंध expired in 2011, following a 11–9 शिकस्त to ऑस्ट्रेलिया in the रग्बी World कप quarter-final, जो तब stated he होता not be हस्ताक्षर a new deal.
the previous captain थी जॉन Smit, who पहले he रिटायर्ड in 2011 played वेश्या for most of उसके career, although he रै also been a prop, mainly in 2008 और 2009.
Due to Smit होने unavailable लिये the November 2010 परीक्षण बाद surgery, ताला विक्टर Matfield took Smit 's place as captain for that tour.
the current captain is Jean de Villiers.
the बैटल of Gettysburg (, with an sound ), थी लड़ा July 1–3, 1863, in और around the town of gettysburg, Pennsylvania.
it थी the battle with the largest number of हताहत in the अमरीकी सिविल War and is often वर्णित as the war 's turning point.
संघ Maj. gen. George Gordon meade 's फौज of the potomac पराजित हमले by confederate Gen. रॉबर्ट E. ली 's Army of Northern Virginia, समाप्ति ली 's invasion of the North.
After his success at chancellorsville in वर्जिनिया in may 1863, Lee led उसके फौज through the shenandoah घाटी to begin his दूसरी आक्रमण of the north—the gettysburg Campaign.
साथ उसके फौज in ऊँची आत्माओं, ली intended to shift the फ़ोकस of the गर्मियाँ अभियान इससे war-ravaged northern Virginia and hoped to influence Northern politicians to give up their अभियोजन of the war by penetrating as far as harrisburg, पेन्सिलवेनिया, or even Philadelphia.
prodded by अध्यक्ष अब्राहम lincoln, maj. Gen. Joseph Hooker स्थानांतरित उसके army in pursuit, but was relieved बस तीन days before the बैटल and replaced by Meade.
Elements of the दो armies initially collided at Gettysburg on जुलाई 1, 1863, as ली तत्काल concentrated his forces वहीँ, his उद्देश्य being to engage the Union फौज और destroy it.
कम ridges to the northwest of town were defended initially by a संघ प्यादे division अंतर्गत Brig. gen. जॉन Buford, and soon reinforced साथ two corps of Union infantry.
However, दो large confederate corps assaulted उन्हें इससे the northwest and उत्तर, collapsing the hastily developed Union lines, sending the defenders retreating through the streets of town to the hills बस to the south.
On the second day of battle, सबसे of दोनो सेना था समवेत.
The Union line थी रखी out in a defensive formation resembling a fishhook.
in the late afternoon of July 2, Lee launched a भारी assault on the Union left flank, और fierce fighting raged at छोटी गोलाकार शीर्ष, the wheatfield, Devil 's Den, and the आड़ू बाग़.
On the संघ right, demonstrations escalated into full-scale assaults on culp 's हिल and कब्रिस्तान Hill.
All across the battlefield, despite significant losses, the संघ defenders held their lines.
On the third day of बैटल, July 3, लड़ resumed on Culp 's हिल, और प्यादे लड़ाइयों raged to the east and दक्षिण, but the main event was a नाटकीय infantry assault by 12,500 Confederates against the बीच of the संघ लकीर on कब्रिस्तान Ridge, known as पिकेट 's Charge.
the charge थी repulsed by संघ rifle and artillery आग, at ग्रेट losses to the Confederate army.
Lee led उसके फौज on a torturous retreat back to Virginia.
Between 46,000 और 51,000 soldiers इससे both सेना were हताहत in the three-day battle.
कि November, अध्यक्ष lincoln प्रयुक्त the समर्पण रस्म for the gettysburg नेशनल Cemetery to honor the fallen संघ soldiers and redefine the purpose of the युद्ध in his historic gettysburg पता.
An academic discipline, or फ़ील्ड of पढ़ाई, is a branch of ज्ञान that is सिखाया और शोधकार्य at the कॉलेज or university level.
Disciplines are पारिभाषित ( in भाग ), and पहचाना by the academic journals in which शोध is प्रकाशित, और the learned societies and academic विभाग or faculties to जिससे their practitioners belong.
However, वहीँ exists no औपचारिक criteria for जब शैक्षणिक कार्यक्रम and scholarly journals रूप an अकादमिक discipline.
a huge अंतर exists between, on the one hand, well established disciplines that मौजूद in almost सब विश्वविद्यालयों all over the world, have a long इतिहास, और have a well established set of journals और सम्मेलनों, and, on the other हाथ, सुझाव for नई फ़ील्ड समर्थित only by few विश्वविद्यालयों और publications.
फ़ील्ड of study usually have several sub-disciplines or branches, और the distinguishing लाइनों between these हैं often both arbitrary और अस्पष्ट.
PHP is a server-side scripting भाषा designed लिये web विकास but also प्रयुक्त as a general-purpose प्रोग्रामिंग language.
पीएचपी is अभी installed on अधिक than 244 लाख websites और 2.1 million web servers.
Originally निर्मित by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1995, the सन्दर्भ implementation of PHP is अभी उत्पादित by the PHP समूह.
जबकि पीएचपी originally stood लिये Personal Home पेज, it now stands लिये PHP : Hypertext Preprocessor, a recursive acronym.
PHP कोड is interpreted by a web सर्वर with a पीएचपी processor मोड्यूल which generates the resulting वेब पेज : पीएचपी कमांड can be अंतःस्थापित directly into an एचटीएमएल source दस्तावेज़ बल्कि than कॉलिंग an external file to process data.
it has भी विकसित to शामिल a command-line इंटरफ़ेस capability और can be used in standalone आलेखीय applications.
पीएचपी is फ़्री तन्त्र released अंतर्गत the PHP अनुज्ञा, which is असंगत with the ग्नू General Public License ( GPL ) due to प्रतिबंध on the उपयोग of the term PHP.
PHP can be तैनात on सबसे वेब सर्वर and also as a standalone शेल on almost प्रत्येक operating system and मंच, फ़्री of चार्ज.
जॉन Fitzgerald `` जोकर '' कैनेडी ( may 29, 1917 – November 22, 1963 ), often referred to by उसके initials jfk, थी the 35th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States, सेवारत from 1961 जबतक his मौत in 1963.
After सैन्य सेवा as commander of the मोटर Torpedo Boats pt-109 and pt-59 दौरान संसार War II in the South प्रशांत, Kennedy represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional ज़िला in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a डेमोक्रेट.
thereafter, he परोसा in the U.S. Senate from 1953 जबतक 1960.
कैनेडी defeated Vice अध्यक्ष and रिपब्लिकन candidate रिचर्ड Nixon in the 1960 u.S. presidential election.
At 43 years of आयु, he is the youngest to have been elected to the office, the second-youngest अध्यक्ष ( बाद थियोडोर Roosevelt ), and the first person born in the 20th century to serve as president.
A कैथोलिक, Kennedy is the only non- प्रोटोस्टेंट president, और is the only अध्यक्ष to have जीती a Pulitzer पुरस्कार.
Events during his प्रेसिडेंसी शामिल the Bay of सूअर आक्रमण, the Cuban Missile संकट, the building of the बर्लिन वॉल, the Space रेस, the african-american Civil अधिकारों गति, and जल्दी चरण of the वियतनाम War.
Therein, कैनेडी increased the number of military advisers, खास आपरेशन शक्तियां, और helicopters in an प्रयत्न to कोर the स्प्रेड of साम्यवादी in दक्षिण East Asia.
The Kennedy administration adopted the policy of the रणनीतिक हैमलेट Program जिससे was implemented by the दक्षिण Vietnamese government.
it involved certain मजबूर relocation, गाँव internment, and पृथक्करण of ग्रामीण दक्षिण Vietnamese from the northern and दक्षिणी कम्युनिस्ट insurgents.
Kennedy थी assassinated on नवम्बर 22, 1963 in डलास, Texas.
ली घनघोर ओसवाल्ड थी charged साथ the crime, but he was shot और मारे by Jack माणिक्य two days बाद, पहले a विचारण could take place.
The FBI और the Warren Commission officially concluded that Oswald was the lone assassin.
However, the United States हाउस चुनें कमेटी on assassinations ( HSCA ) concluded कि those investigations यहूद flawed और कि कैनेडी थी probably assassinated as the परिणाम of a षड्यंत्र.
however, एबीसी न्यूज in उनके छानबीन, The Kennedy Assassination : परे Conspiracy, पुष्टि the निष्कर्षों of the Warren आयोग ; having concluded Oswald acted अलोन.
Kennedy 's विवादास्पद विभाग of रक्षा tfx fighter bomber program led to a Congressional investigation कि lasted इससे 1963 to 1970.
चूंकि the 1960s information concerning Kennedy 's private जीवन रै आइये to light.
विवरण of Kennedy 's health समस्याएं in which he struggled have become बेहतर known, especially since the 1990s.
Although initially kept रहस्य इससे the general पब्लिक, रिपोर्ट्स of Kennedy 's philandering have garnered much press.
कैनेडी बाँधने highly in पब्लिक राय ratings of U.S. राष्ट्रपतियों.
`` स्टैंड by me '' is a सोंग originally performed by Ben E. King and लिखा by किंग, Jerry leiber, और माइक Stoller, प्रेरित by the आध्यात्मिक `` Lord स्टैंड by me, '' प्लस two lines rooted in Psalms 46:2–3.
There have been over 400 recorded संस्करण of the song.
A राजनैतिक cartoon इससे an 1894 पक पत्रिका by इलस्ट्रेटर s.d. Ehrhart, shows a farm woman labeled `` Democratic पार्टी '' sheltering इससे a बवंडर of political change.
A metaphor is a फिगर of वाक that describes a subject by asserting कि it is, on कुछ point of comparison, the वही as another वरना unrelated ऑब्जेक्ट.
Metaphor is a type of सादृश्य and is closely सम्बन्धित to other rhetorical आंकड़े of speech that achieve their effects via association, तुलना or resemblance including allegory, hyperbole, और simile.
In simpler terms, a रूपक compares two objects or things बगैर using the words `` like '' or `` as ''.
एक of the most prominent उदाहरण of a metaphor in English साहित्य is the All the संसार 's a stage monologue from As तुम जैसे It :
सब the संसार 's a स्टैगe,
और all the men and women merely players ;
They have their exits and their entrances ; — William Shakespeare, as You जैसे It, 2/7
This उद्धरण is a metaphor because the संसार is नहीं literally a stage.
by figuratively asserting that the world is a स्टेज, Shakespeare uses the points of तुलना between the संसार and a स्टेज to convey an समझना about the mechanics of the world and the जीवनदान of the people भीतर it.

rembrandt van Rijn, self-portrait, etching, c.1630
Francisco गोया, There is No One To Help Them, आपदाओं of War series, aquatint c.1810
Felix Vallotton, la raison probante ( The cogent कारण ), woodcut इससे the श्रेणी intimités, 1898
printmaking is the process of बनाना artworks by मुद्रण, normally on paper.
Printmaking normally covers तभी the process of creating prints साथ an element of मौलिकता, rather than just being a photographic reproduction of a पेंटिंग.
Except in the case of monotyping, the प्रक्रम is सक्षम of producing multiples of the same टुकड़ा, जिससे is पुकारा a print.
प्रत्येक छपाई produced is नहीं considered a `` नक़ल '' but बल्कि is माना an `` original ''.
This is because typically each छपाई varies to an extent due to परिवर्तनीय intrinsic to the printmaking process, और भी because the imagery of a छपाई is typically not simply a reproduction of another work लकिन बल्कि is प्रायः a unique चित्र designed इससे the start to be expressed in a particular printmaking तकनीक.
a print may be known as an impression.
Printmaking ( अन्य than monotyping ) is not chosen only लिये its क्षमता to produce multiple impressions, but बल्कि for the अद्वितीय qualities कि each of the printmaking processes lends itself to.
prints are created by transferring स्याही from a matrix or through a prepared screen to a sheet of पेपर or other सामग्री.
आम types of matrices शामिल : metal plates, usually तांबे or zinc, or polymer plates लिये engraving or etching ; स्टोन, एल्यूमिनियम, or पॉलिमर लिये lithography ; ब्लॉक of लकडी for woodcuts और लकडी engravings ; और linoleum लिये linocuts.
screens made of silk or synthetic fabrics हैं used लिये the screenprinting प्रक्रम.
अन्य प्रकार of मेट्रिक्स substrates and सम्बन्धित प्रक्रियाओं are discussed below.
Multiple impressions printed इससे the वही मेट्रिक्स रूप an संस्करण.
चूंकि the लेट 19th century, artists have generally signed individual impressions इससे an edition और often number the impressions to form a limited edition.
prints may also be printed in book रूप, such as illustrated books or कलाकार 's books.
Il divo is an अंग्रेज़ी बहुराष्ट्रीय operatic pop vocal समूह निर्मित by म्यूज़िक मैनेजर, कार्यपालिका, and वास्तविकता TV star साइमन cowell.
formed in the संयुक्त किंगडम, they are also signed to cowell 's record label, Syco Music.
il Divo is a group of four पुरूष गायकों : French पॉप singer सेबेस्तियन Izambard, Spanish baritone कार्लोस marín, अमरीकी टेनर दाउद मिलर, और Swiss tenor Urs Bühler.
To date, they have बेची अधिक than 26 million albums विश्वव्यापी.

an interceptor वायुयान ( or बस interceptor ) is a प्रकार of सेनानी aircraft designed specifically to prevent मिशन of enemy वायुयान, particularly बमवर्षक and reconnaissance aircraft, and नष्ट them, relying प्रायः on great गति और शक्तिशाली armament.
Being used since the First संसार War, बाद the लेट 1960s, interceptors became less important due to shifting इससे bombers to intercontinental ballistic missiles ( icbms ) for nuclear warfare.
a वियतनामी अमरीकी ( ) is an American of Vietnamese descent.
वे make up about half of all overseas Vietnamese ( Người việt hải Ngoại ) और हैं the fourth-largest Asian अमरीकी समूह.
द्रव्यमान वियतनामी आव्रजन to the संयुक्त राज्य started after 1975, after the समाप्त of the वियतनाम युद्ध.
Early immigrants were शरणार्थी boat people fleeing persecution or poverty.
Forced to flee from उनके मातृभूमि और often thrust into poor शहरी neighborhoods, these newcomers have nevertheless प्रबंधित to establish दमदार communities in a short amount of समय.
अधिक than साठ प्रतिशत of वियतनामी Americans reside in the राज्य of California, Texas, वॉशिंगटन, फ्लोरिडा, और वर्जिनिया.

एडोल्फ Hitler वचनबद्ध आत्महत्या by gunshot on 30 April 1945 in उसके führerbunker in बर्लिन.
His बीवी Eva ( née braun ) committed suicide साथ him by ingesting साइनाइड.
That afternoon, in accordance with Hitler 's prior instructions, उनके remains were carried up the stairs through the बंकर 's emergency exit, doused in पेट्रोल and नियत alight in the Reich chancellery गार्डन outside the bunker.
the सोवियत archives रिकार्ड कि their burnt remains were बरामद और interred in successive locations जबतक 1970 जब वे were again exhumed, cremated and the राख scattered.
खाते differ as to the कारण of मौत ; एक कि he died by poison तभी और another कि he died by a self-inflicted gunshot, while biting bas on a साइनाइड कैप्सूल.
समकालीन इतिहासकारों have rejected ये accounts as being either सोवियत प्रचार or an attempted सुलह in order to reconcile the different conclusions.
One eye-witness अंकित कि the देह दिखाया signs of having महरूम shot through the mouth, लकिन this रै been proven unlikely.
There is also विवाद regarding the authenticity of कपाल और jaw fragments जिससे यहूद recovered.
In 2009, डीएनए tests were performed on a कपाल Soviet officials था long believed to be हिटलर 's.

Location of मिसौरी
the दारू कानून of Missouri हैं among the तनिक प्रतिबंधक and सबसे lax and permissive in the संयुक्त States.
मिसौरी is ज्ञात throughout the मिडवेस्ट for its largely laissez-faire approach to दारू विनियमन, in sharp कंट्रास्ट to the very strict दारू laws of कुछ of its पड़ोसी, like Kansas और ओक्लाहोमा.
necrotizing fasciitis ( or ) or NF, commonly known as flesh-eating disease or flesh-eating bacteria सिंड्रोम, is a विरल infection of the deeper layers of स्किन and subcutaneous ऊतकों, easily spreading आरपार the fascial प्लेन within the subcutaneous tissue.
necrotizing fasciitis is जल्दी progressing, having greater रिस्क of विकासशील in the immunocompromised due to शर्तें जैसे मधुमेह, कर्कट, इत्यादि.
It is a कठोर बीमारी of अचानक onset and is प्रायः treated immediately with ऊँची doses of intravenous antibiotics.
Type i describes a polymicrobial संक्रमण, whereas Type ii describes a monomicrobial संक्रमण.
Many प्रकार of जीवाणु can कारण necrotizing fasciitis ( e.g., Group A streptococcus ( Streptococcus pyogenes ), staphylococcus aureus, clostridium perfringens, Bacteroides fragilis, aeromonas hydrophila ).
Such infections हैं अधिक संभावित to occur in लोगों with compromised प्रतिरक्षा प्रणालियों.
historically, समूह a streptococcus made up सबसे मामले of Type II infections.
however, चूंकि as जल्दी as 2001, another serious रूप of monomicrobial necrotizing fasciitis रै been observed with increasing frequency, caused by methicillin-resistant staphylococcus aureus ( मरसा ).
Some published case reports have implied a संभावित कड़ी between उपयोग of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory दवाएँ and NF, though the evidence of the link was said to be weak क्युकी of a छोटी number of case patients और it was unclear whether the drugs just नकाबपोश the symptoms of a द्वितीयक infection or were a cause per se.
संसार युद्ध ii ( wwii or WW2 ), भी known as the Second World युद्ध, थी a वैश्विक युद्ध that lasted इससे 1939 to 1945.
It शामिल the विशाल बहुमत of the संसार 's nations —including all of the great शक्तियां —eventually forming दो opposing military alliances : the allies और the अक्ष.
it थी the सबसे widespread युद्ध in इतिहास, with more than 100 लाख people serving in सैन्य इकाई from over 30 different देशों.
in a state of `` total war ``, the major participants लगाई उनके entire आर्थिक, industrial, and वैज्ञानिक सामर्थ्य at the सेवा of the war प्रयत्न, erasing the distinction between civilian and military संसाधन.
Marked by द्रव्यमान मौतों of नागरिकों, including the holocaust and the तभी उपयोग of नाभिकीय weapons in warfare, it resulted in 50 लाख to over 75 लाख fatalities.
ये deaths make World युद्ध ii by दूर the deadliest conflict in human इतिहास.
the साम्राज्य of जापानी aimed to dominate ईस्ट Asia and थी already at war with the गणतंत्र of चीन in 1937, but the संसार युद्ध is generally said to have begun on 1 सितंबर 1939 साथ the invasion of Poland by Germany और subsequent घोषणाओं of युद्ध on जर्मनी by फ़्रांस और Britain.
इससे लेट 1939 to जल्दी 1941, in a series of campaigns and treaties, Germany formed the अक्ष alliance with इटली, conquering or subduing much of continental Europe.
following the molotov–ribbentrop अनुबंध, Germany और the सोवियत Union partitioned and annexed territories between themselves of उनके European पड़ोसी, सहित कैंडल.
the संयुक्त Kingdom and the other members of the अंग्रेजों Commonwealth were the only major Allied शक्तियां continuing the fight विरूद्ध the Axis, साथ लड़ाइयों taking प्लेस in North अफ़्रीकी as well as the long-running बैटल of the अटलांटिक.
in जून 1941, the European अक्ष शुभारम्भ an invasion of the सोवियत संघ, giving a start to the largest land theatre of war in history, which tied bas the major भाग of the अक्ष ' military forces for the rest of the युद्ध.
in December 1941, Japan joined the अक्ष, attacked the संयुक्त राज्य और European territories in the Pacific Ocean, and quickly conquered much of the Western प्रशांत.
the Axis अग्रिम was रोका in 1942, after Japan lost a श्रेणी of naval battles and European Axis सैनिकों were defeated in उत्तर Africa and, decisively, at stalingrad.
in 1943, with a श्रेणी of जर्मनी defeats in पूर्वी यूरोपीय, the अलाइड invasion of इटली, और American victories in the प्रशांत, the अक्ष lost the initiative और undertook strategic रिट्रीट on all fronts.
in 1944, the पश्चिमी allies invaded France, while the Soviet संघ regained सब of इसके territorial नुकसान and invaded Germany और its allies.
दौरान 1944 और 1945 the संयुक्त राज्य पराजित the Japanese Navy and captured कुंजी पश्चिमी Pacific islands.
the war in Europe ended with the capture of बर्लिन by सोवियत and पॉलिश troops and the subsequent जर्मनी unconditional surrender on 8 May 1945.
following the पॉट्सडैम घोषणा by the allies on 26 जुलाई 1945, the संयुक्त States dropped atomic बम on the Japanese शहरों of हिरोशिमा on 6 August, and नागासाकी on 9 अगस्त.
साथ an आक्रमण of the जापानी द्वीपसमूह imminent, और the सोवियत Union having घोषित war on Japan by invading मंचूरिया, Japan surrendered on 15 August 1945, ending the युद्ध in Asia and cementing the कुल विजय of the allies over the Axis.
World War II altered the political alignment and social ढांचा of the संसार.
the संयुक्त Nations ( UN ) थी established to फोस्टर अंतरराष्ट्रीय सहयोग और prevent भविष्य conflicts.
the ग्रेट powers that यहूद the victors of the war—the संयुक्त States, the Soviet संघ, China, the संयुक्त Kingdom, और France—became the permanent सदस्यों of the United राष्ट्र सुरक्षा Council.
The सोवियत संघ और the United राज्य emerged as rival superpowers, setting the stage लिये the Cold War, which lasted for the अगला 46 सालो.
Meanwhile, the influence of European great शक्तियां प्रारंभ to मनाही, जबकि the decolonisation of एशिया and अफ़्रीकी began.
सबसे countries whose उद्योग था महरूम क्षतिग्रस्त moved towards economic recovery.
Political integration, विशेषकर in यूरोपीय, उभरा as an effort to stabilise postwar relations और लड़ो अधिक effectively in the Cold युद्ध.
A सीमित liability company ( LLC ) is a flexible form of एंटरप्राइज़ कि blends elements of साझेदारी और कॉरपोरेट structures.
Note than an LLC is नहीं a निगम, और calling an llc a निगम is technically incorrect.
an llc is a विधिक रूप of कम्पनी कि provides सीमित देयता to its owners in the विशाल majority of United राज्य jurisdictions.
llcs do not need to be व्यवस्थित लिये लाभ.
पाँच k-cups
The अंदर of a प्रयुक्त k-cup, with the शीर्ष foil and the used कॉफी grounds removed.
इस shows the फिल्टर अंदर the k-cup.
K-Cup portion पैक are used साथ keurig or other single कप brewing प्रणालियों to brew a कप of coffee, चाय, or hot chocolate.
प्रत्येक k-cup is a plastic संग्राहक with a कॉफी फिल्टर inside.
Ground कॉफी सेम are packed in the k-cup और sealed air-tight साथ a combination plastic and foil ढक्कन.
जब the K-Cup is लगाई in a Keurig brewer, the brewer punctures the foil lid and the bottom of the K-Cup and शक्तियां hot जल अंतर्गत pressure through the k-cup और into a मग.
keurig licenses इसके k-cup technology to कॉफी roasters and चाय makers such as Green पहाड़ कॉफी roasters, diedrich/ Gloria जीन्स, Timothy 's संसार Coffee, वैन Houtte, हिरण कॉफी, celestial Seasonings, bigelow चाय Company, Twinings, टली 's, Coffee लोगों and न्युमैन 's Own.
keurig 's patents on the original k-cup डिज़ाइन समाप्त in सितंबर 2012.
Keurig holds at least एक additional, still-active US patent and another पेटेंट अनुप्रयोग, detailing improvements कि have subsequently been incorporated in their K-Cup डिज़ाइन.
electa Pocket chronograph ( ca. 1890s ) manufactured by the gallet देखें Company in la Chaux-de-Fonds, स्विट्ज़रलैंड.
Gallet multichron Astronomic ( ca. 1959 ) —complex mechanical chronograph with 12 घंटा recoding capabilities, स्वचालित day, तिथि, माह, और moon phase display
A modern Seiko क्वार्ट्ज wristwatch using the chronograph फलन ( गति 7T92 ).
Citizen Atessa Eco-Drive atv53-3023 analog-digital chronograph साथ 4 area रेडियो Controlled रिसेप्शन ( उत्तर America, यूरोपीय, चीन, Japan ).
A chronograph is a विशिष्ट प्रकार of देखें कि is प्रयुक्त as a stopwatch combined साथ a display watch.
A basic chronograph रै an independent स्वीप second हाथ ; it can be started, रोका, और लौटे to शून्य by successive pressure on the stem.
लुई moinet invented the chronograph in 1816
conventional पीसीआई ( पीसीआई is an initialism formed from परिधीय घटक Interconnect, part of the पीसीआई Local Bus मानक और प्रायः shortened to just पीसीआई ) is a लोकल कंप्यूटर बस for attaching हार्डवेयर devices in a computer.
The PCI बस supports the कृत्यों मिला on a प्रोसेसर bus, but in a standardized format that is स्वतंत्र of any particular processor.
डिवाइस connected to the बस appear to the प्रोसेसर to be connected सीधे to the प्रोसेसर बस, and हैं assigned addresses in the processor 's address स्पेस.
संलग्न devices can take either the रूप of an एकीकृत circuit fitted onto the motherboard itself, पुकारा a planar device in the पीसीआई specification, or an expansion card कि fits into a slot.
the पीसीआई लोकल बस थी first implemented in ibm PC compatibles, जहाँ it displaced the संयोजन of isa प्लस one vesa लोकल Bus as the बस configuration.
It रै subsequently महरूम अपनाया लिये other कंप्यूटर प्रकार.
PCI and pci-x हैं being replaced by पीसीआई Express, लकिन, most motherboards are still बना साथ one or more पीसीआई slots, which are sufficient लिये अनेक uses.
The पीसीआई specification कवर the शारीरिक आकार of the बस ( सहित the size and अंतरण of the circuit board किनारे विद्युत contacts ), electrical characteristics, bus timing, and प्रोटोकॉल.
the specification can be खरीदा इससे the पीसीआई Special Interest समूह ( pci-sig ).
Typical PCI cards प्रयुक्त in pcs शामिल : network ताश, sound cards, modems, अतिरिक्त ports ऐसे as usb or serial, TV tuner cards and डिस्क परिरक्षक.
पीसीआई वीडियो ताश replaced ISA और vesa cards, जबतक growing bandwidth आवश्यकताएँ outgrew the capabilities of पीसीआई ; the preferred इंटरफ़ेस लिये वीडियो ताश became अगप, and then पीसीआई Express.
पीसीआई video cards remain available लिये use with old PCs without अगप or पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस स्लॉट.
अनेक डिवाइस previously provided on PCI expansion cards are अभी commonly integrated onto motherboards or available in सार्वभौमिक सीरियल बस और PCI एक्स्प्रेस versions.
Michael whitaker Smith ( born October 7, 1957 ) is an अमरीकी contemporary ईसाई संगीतकार, जो has charted primarily in the contemporary ईसाई and occasionally in the मुख्यधारा charts.
उसके biggest कामयाबी in mainstream music was in 1991 जब `` प्लेस in इस संसार '' hit No. 6 on the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100.
Smith is a three-time Grammy पुरस्कार विजेता, और रै अर्जित 40 Dove Awards.
over the कोर्स of उसके करियर, he बेची अधिक than 13 लाख albums and recorded 29 No. 1 Hit गीतों, चौदह सुनहरा albums, and five प्लेटिनम albums.
Smith is an American Music पुरस्कार प्राप्तकर्ता ; he was भी नामित one of लोगों पत्रिका 's `` Most Beautiful People ''.
an American poster from the World War II -era that was used to inform people परिचय कया they चाहिए do if they suspect sabotage.
तोड़फोड़ is a deliberate action aimed at weakening another एंटिटी through subversion, रुकावट, disruption, or destruction.
in a workplace setting, sabotage is the सचेत वापसी of efficiency generally directed at causing some change in कार्यस्थल conditions.
एक जो engages in sabotage is a saboteur.
As a नियम, saboteurs कोशिश to conceal उनके पहचान क्युकी of the consequences of उनके actions.
For उदाहरण, whereas an environmental दबाव group might be प्रसन्न to be पहचाना with an act of sabotage, it होता not want the individual identities of the perpetrators ज्ञात.
पैट्रिक Henry College ( phc ) is a निजी, स्वतंत्र college with an धर्मान्तरण ईसाई basis कि focuses on teaching शास्त्रीय liberal कला and government, located in purcellville, वर्जिनिया, संयुक्त राज्य.
पैट्रिक हेनरी is ज्ञात लिये its रूढ़िवादी धर्मान्तरण Christian फ़ोकस.
As of अप्रैल 17, 2007, the कॉलेज was accredited by the transnational संघ of Christian कॉलेजों and Schools, a national faith-related accrediting संगठन पहचाना by the विभाग of शिक्षा and the परिषद लिये Higher शिक्षा Accreditation.
The school was founded with the सहायता of the घर स्कूल Legal Defense Association, and अभी serves as the headquarters for the organization, with जिससे it is still closely कनेक्ट.
the इतिहास of टेलीविज़न comprises the work of numerous engineers और inventors in अनेक देशों over many दशकों.
the earliest प्रस्ताव was in 1908, in a पेपर by a. A. Campbell-Swinton and postulated the उपयोग of cathode किरणें.
The first practical demonstrations of television, however, were विकसित using electromechanical विधि to स्कैन, transmit, and reproduce an चित्र.
as electronic कैमरा and प्रदर्शक tubes यहूद perfected, electromechanical television gave रास्ता to all-electronic systems in nearly all applications.
L'Idéal cinéma - ज़ाक Tati at aniche खोली November 23rd 1905 ; the oldest still-active movie theater in the संसार
A सिनेमा in ऑस्ट्रेलिया
A typical मल्टीप्लेक्स ( AMC सैर 16 in वुडलैंड Hills, Los एंजिल्स, u.S. )
A movie theater ( भी called a cinema, फिल्म house, film house, फिल्मी theater or चित्र house ) is a venue, प्रायः a भवन, for viewing films.
Most but नहीं सब फिल्म थिएटर are वाणिज्यिक operations केटरिंग to the general पब्लिक, who attend by खरीदना a ticket.
the फिल्म is projected with a फिल्म प्रोजेक्टर onto a विशाल प्रक्षेप screen at the front of the auditorium.
Most फिल्म theaters are अभी equipped लिये digital cinema प्रक्षेप, removing the need to बनाएँ and transport a physical film छपाई.
Southern कैलिफ़ोर्निया Norton मालिक 's क्लबों on कैलिफ़ोर्निया State Route 41, near creston.
a motorcycle क्लबों is a group of individuals जिनकी primary ब्याज और activities involve मोटरसाइकिल.
Lyme बीमारी, Lyme borreliosis is an infectious बीमारी caused by at least three species of bacteria belonging to the genus borrelia.
borrelia burgdorferi sensu stricto is the main cause of lyme बीमारी in North America, whereas Borrelia afzelii and Borrelia garinii कारण most European cases.
The disease is नामित after the कस्बों of lyme and Old Lyme, कनेक्टिकट, यूएसए, where a number of मामले यहूद identified in 1975.
Although Allen Steere एहसास कि lyme बीमारी was a tick-borne disease in 1978, the कारण of the बीमारी remained a mystery until 1981, जब B. burgdorferi थी identified by विली burgdorfer.
lyme बीमारी is the most common tick-borne disease in the उत्तरी Hemisphere.
borrelia is transmitted to इंसानो by the काटना of संक्रमित ticks belonging to a few species of the genus Ixodes ( `` hard ticks '' ).
जल्दी symptoms may include ज्वर, सिरदर्द, fatigue, depression, और a characteristic गोलाकार स्किन rash called erythema migrans ( EM ).
बाएँ अनुपचारित, बाद लक्षण may involve the joints, दिल, and central बेचैन system.
In सबसे cases, the संक्रमण and its symptoms are eliminated by एंटीबायोटिक, विशेषकर if the बीमारी is treated early.
Delayed or inadequate treatment can सीसे to अधिक गंभीर लक्षण, जिससे can be disabling and मुश्किल to treat.

शिश्न ( plural penises or penes ) is a सामान्य पद लिये the अंगों with which male and hermaphrodite animals introduce शुक्राणु into receptive महिलाओं दौरान copulation.
Such organs occur in many पशु, both vertebrate and invertebrate, but males do not bear a penis in प्रत्येक एनिमल species, और in those species in which the male does भालू a so-called शिश्न, the penes in the विभिन्न प्रजाति are नहीं necessarily समजात.
For उदाहरण, the penis of a mammal is at सबसे analogous to the शिश्न of a male कीट or barnacle.
The पद penis applies to many reproductive intromittent organs, लकिन not to all ; for example the intromittent organ of सबसे cephalopoda is the hectocotylus, a specialised भुजा, and male spiders use उनके pedipalps.
in most प्रजाति of पशु in जिससे there is an अंग कि might reasonably be described as a penis, it रै no प्रमुख फलन other than intromission, or at तनिक conveying the शुक्राणु to the female, लकिन in the placental स्तनधारियों the शिश्न bears the distal भाग of the urethra, जिससे discharges both urine during urination and semen during copulation as the occasion requires.
Artists और रंगमंडल ( a & r ) is the division of a रिकार्ड लेबल or music publishing कम्पनी that is responsible for हुनर scouting और overseeing the कलाकारी development of रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकारों and/or songwriters.
it भी acts as a liaison between artists and the record लेबल or publishing कम्पनी ; प्रत्येक activity involving कलाकारों to the पाइंट of एल्बम रिलीज is generally माना under the purview of, और responsibility of, A & r.
a furlong is a measure of अलहदा in इम्पीरियल इकाई और U.S. प्रथागत units बराबर to one-eighth of a मील, समतुल्य to 220 गज, 660 फीट, 40 rods, or 10 chains.
The सटीक value of the furlong varies slightly among english-speaking देशों.
Five furlongs are approximately 1 किलोमीटर ( 1.0058 km is a closer approximation ).
चूंकि the असली definition of the मीटर थी one-quarter of one ten-millionth of the circumference of the Earth ( साथ the great वृत्त coincident with the meridian of longitude passing through Paris ), the परिधि of the Earth is about 40,000 km or about 200,000 furlongs.

Lithium 9 volt, aa, & aaa आकार
लिथियम बैटरी are डिस्पोजेबल ( primary ) batteries कि have लिथियम metal or लिथियम compounds as an anode.
वे स्टैंड apart from other बैटरी in उनके ऊँची चार्ज घनत्व ( long जीवन ) and high लागत प्रति ईकाई.
depending on the डिज़ाइन and chemical compounds प्रयुक्त, lithium cells can produce voltages इससे 1.5 v ( comparable to a zinc–carbon or alkaline battery ) to परिचय 3.7 V. Lithium बैटरी हैं widely used in उत्पाद such as पोर्टेबल उपभोक्ता electronic devices.
रेमंड `` Ray '' Charles जोकर LaMontagne ( ; born June 18, 1973 ) is an American singer-songwriter.
lamontagne रै released four studio albums, ट्रबल, Till the Sun turns ब्लैक, Gossip in the अनाज and God Willin ' & the Creek do n't वृद्धि.
he was born in New Hampshire और was प्रेरित to create music बाद सुनना an album by स्टीफन Stills.
Critics have compared lamontagne 's music to कि of the बैंड, Van मॉरिसन, Nick ड्रेक, और टिम buckley.
he lives in मैसाचुसेट्स साथ उसके wife और दो children.

फेसबुक on the Ad-tech 2010
Facebook is an ऑनलाइन social नेटवर्किंग सेवा, whose नाम तना इससे the colloquial नाम for the किताब दिए to विद्यार्थी at the start of the अकादमिक year by some विश्वविद्यालयों administrations in the संयुक्त States to सहायता विद्यार्थी मिलेंगी to जान each other.
It थी संस्थापित in February 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg with उसके कॉलेज roommates and fellow हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों विद्यार्थी एडुआर्डो Saverin, एंड्रयू mccollum, Dustin moskovitz और क्रिस ह्यूजेस.
the website 's सदस्यता थी initially limited by the संस्थापकों to हार्वर्ड विद्यार्थी, but थी विस्तारित to other colleges in the Boston area, the आइवी League, और Stanford University.
It gradually added support for students at various अन्य universities before खोलने to high स्कूल विद्यार्थी, and eventually to anyone aged 13 and over.
फेसबुक अभी allows कोई users who घोषित themselves to be at least 13 years बूढ़ा to become registered users of the साईट.
Users जरूर register पहले using the site, after जिससे वे may create a निजी प्रोफ़ाइल, add other उपयोक्ता as मित्रों, और exchange messages, including स्वचालित सूचनाएं when they अद्यतन their profile.
Additionally, users may join common-interest user groups, organized by workplace, स्कूल or college, or other विशेषताएँ, और categorize उनके friends into सूचियाँ such as `` लोगों From Work '' or `` बंद Friends ''.
As of सितंबर 2012, फेसबुक has over one billion active उपयोक्ता.
according to a may 2011 उपभोक्ता Reports survey, वहीँ are 7.5 लाख children अंतर्गत 13 साथ accounts and 5 लाख under 10, violating the साईट 's शर्तें of सेवा.
in May 2005, accel partners invested $ 12.7 लाख in Facebook, and जिम Breyer added $ 1 लाख of उसके अपना धन to the घट.
a January 2009 compete.com study ranked Facebook as the most प्रयुक्त सोशल नेटवर्किंग service by विश्वव्यापी मासिक active users.
Entertainment Weekly included the साईट on इसके end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list, saying, `` How on earth did we stalk हमारी exes, याद our co-workers ' जन्मदिन, कीड़ा our मित्रों, and खेल a rousing game of scrabulous पहले Facebook ? ''
आलोचकों, ऐसे as फेसबुक Detox, state that फेसबुक रै turned into a नेशनल obsession in the United States, resulting in vast amounts of समय खोया and प्रोत्साहित narcissism.
Quantcast estimates फेसबुक has 138.9 million मासिक अद्वितीय U.S. visitors in May 2011.
according to Social मीडिया Today, in अप्रैल 2010 an estimated 41.6 % ( 129.5 million ) of the U.S. population था a Facebook खाता.
nevertheless, Facebook 's मार्केट विकास started to स्टाल in कुछ regions, with the site खोने 7 million active उपयोक्ता in the संयुक्त States और Canada in May 2011.
Facebook eventually दायर लिये an आरंभिक पब्लिक offering on फ़रवरी 1, 2012, and was headquartered in Menlo पार्क, California.
फेसबुक Inc. began selling stock to the पब्लिक और trading on the नैस्डैक on May 18, 2012.
अर्विन Johannes Eugen ख़बरों ( 15 नवम्बर 1891 – 14 अक्तूबर 1944 ), popularly known as The मरुस्थल Fox ( wüstenfuchs, ), थी a जर्मनी Field Marshal of World War ii.
he अर्जित the respect of दोनो his own सैनिकों और the enemies he fought.
Rommel थी a highly decorated officer in संसार युद्ध I and was awarded the Pour le mérite for उसके exploits on the Italian front.
In संसार War ii, he further विशिष्ट himself as the commander of the 7th Panzer प्रभाग during the 1940 आक्रमण of फ़्रांस.
उसके नेतृत्व of German and इतालवी शक्तियां in the उत्तर अफ़्रीकी अभियान स्थापित him as एक of the सबसे able कमांडरों of the युद्ध, और अर्जित उसे the appellation of the मरुस्थल फॉक्स.
he is regarded as एक of the सबसे skilled commanders of मरुस्थल warfare in the विरोध.
He later commanded the German शक्तियां opposing the Allied cross-channel invasion in Normandy.
His कार्यभार never took उसे to the Eastern Front.
ख़बरों is regarded as having महरूम a दयालु and पेशेवर अधिकारी.
His Afrika कोर्प्स थी never अभियुक्त of war अपराधों, और soldiers captured during उसके अफ़्रीकी campaign were reported to have been treated humanely.
Orders to kill Jewish soldiers, civilians and captured कमांडो were उपेक्षित.
लेट in the युद्ध, ख़बरों थी linked to the षड्यंत्र to assassinate Adolf हिटलर.
Since ख़बरों थी a नेशनल hero, Hitler desired to eliminate उसे quietly.
he forced Rommel to कमिट suicide with a साइनाइड pill, in वापसी लिये आश्वासनों that Rommel 's परिवार होता नहीं be persecuted following his death.
Stained कांच प्रतिनिधित्व of the Holy स्पिरिट as a dove, c. 1660.
the seven gifts of the पावन स्पिरिट is an enumeration of seven spiritual उपहार originating with patristic authors, later elaborated by five intellectual virtues और four other समूह of ethical characteristics.
They are : wisdom, समझना, wonder and डरते ( भय of the रब ), counsel, ज्ञान, fortitude, and piety ( reverence ).
The धरती Day ध्वज, the latest proposal of John McConnell for a flag of Earth Day
Earth दिन is an सालाना इवेंट, मनाये on अप्रैल 22, on जिससे events are held विश्वव्यापी to demonstrate support लिये पर्यावरणीय protection.
it was first celebrated in 1970, और is अभी coordinated globally by the Earth Day Network, and मनाये in अधिक than 192 countries प्रत्येक साल.
In 1969 at a UNESCO सम्मेलन in San Francisco, the date प्रस्तावित थी March 21, 1970, the पहला दिन of spring in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध.
This दिन of प्रकृति 's equipoise थी later sanctioned in a Proclamation हस्ताक्षरित by सचिव General u Thant at the United Nations.
a month later a पृथक Earth दिन थी संस्थापित by United States Senator gaylord Nelson as an environmental teach-in पहला आयोजित on अप्रैल 22, 1970.
नेल्सन was later awarded the Presidential Medal of स्वतंत्रता Award in recognition of उसके कार्य.
जबकि this April 22 Earth दिन थी focused on the United राज्य, an organization launched by Denis Hayes, जो was the असली national समन्वयक in 1970, took it अंतरराष्ट्रीय in 1990 and व्यवस्थित कार्यक्रम in 141 nations.
Numerous communities celebrate Earth सप्ताह, an संपूर्ण सप्ताह of activities केन्द्रित on पर्यावरणीय issues.
आयोडीन is a chemical तत्व साथ symbol i and परमाणु क्रमांक 53.
the नाम is from Greek ioeidēs, अर्थ बैंगनी or जामुनी, due to the color of elemental आयोडीन vapor.
आयोडीन and इसके यौगिकों are primarily प्रयुक्त in पोषण, and industrially in the उत्पादन of एसिटिक acid और निश्चित polymers.
आयोडीन 's अपेक्षाकृत ऊँची atomic क्रमांक, low toxicity, और ease of अनुलग्नक to organic यौगिकों have बना it a भाग of many X-ray contrast materials in आधुनिक medicine.
Iodine has तभी one stable समस्थानिक.
a number of iodine radioisotopes हैं also used in चिकित्सा अनुप्रयोग.
आयोडीन is found on धरती mainly as the अत्यधिक water-soluble iodide आयन, i−, जिससे concentrates it in oceans और brine तालों.
जैसे the अन्य हैलोजन्स, फ़्री iodine occurs मुख्यतः as a diatomic अणु I2, and तब only momentarily बाद होने oxidized इससे आयोडाइड by an oxidant जैसे फ़्री ऑक्सीजन.
In the ब्रह्मांड और on Earth, आयोडीन 's high परमाणु क्रमांक makes it a relatively rare element.
however, इसके उपस्थिति in ocean जल रै given it a भूमिका in जीवविज्ञान.
it is the heaviest अनिवार्य तत्व utilized widely by जीवन in biological कृत्यों ( only टंगस्टन, employed in enzymes by a few species of bacteria, is अत्यधिक ).
आयोडीन 's rarity in many soils, due to initial कम abundance as a crust-element, and also leaching of घुलनशील आयोडाइड by rainwater, has led to many कमियां समस्याएं in land पशु और अंतर्देशीय इंसान populations.
Iodine deficiency affects परिचय दो अरब लोगों और is the अग्रणी preventable cause of intellectual disabilities.
Iodine is required by उच्चतर animals, which उपयोग it to synthesize thyroid हार्मोन, which contain the element.
क्युकी of इस function, radioisotopes of आयोडीन हैं concentrated in the thyroid ग्रंथि साथ with nonradioactive आयोडीन.
if inhaled, the radioisotope iodine-131, जिससे has a high fission product उपज, concentrates in the थायराइड, लकिन is easily remedied साथ पोटैशियम आयोडाइड उपचार.
lobbying ( also लॉबी ) is the act of attempting to influence निर्णय made by officials in the सरकारी, most प्रायः विधायक or सदस्यों of regulatory एजेंसियों.
lobbying is किया by many अलग प्रकार of लोगों and organized समूह, including individuals in the निजी sector, corporations, fellow विधायक or government officials, or advocacy groups ( interest groups ).
lobbyists may be among a legislator 's constituencies, अर्थ a voter or bloc of मतदाता within his or her चुनावी district, or नहीं ; वे may engage in lobbying as a business, or नहीं.
पेशेवर lobbyists are लोगों जिनकी कारोबार is trying to influence legislation on behalf of a समूह or व्यक्तिगत जो hires उन्हें.
Individuals और nonprofit organizations can also lobby as an अधिनियम of स्वयंसेवा or as a छोटी part of their सामान्य जॉब ( लिये उदाहरण, a CEO बैठक with a representative about a project important to his/her company, or an activist meeting with his/her legislator in an unpaid capacity ).
सरकारें often define and regulate organized समूह lobbying कि रै become influential.
the आचार और morality of lobbying are.
lobbying is often spoken of with अवमानना, जब the implication is कि people with अत्यधिक socioeconomic power हैं corrupting the law ( टेढ़ी it दूर इससे fairness ) in अनुक्रम to serve उनके अपना conflict of ब्याज.
लकिन another side of lobbying is making sure कि अन्य ' interests are विधिवत defended against अन्य ' भ्रष्टाचार, or even बस making यकीनन कि minority interests हैं fairly defended against mere जुल्म of the बहुमत.
लिये example, a medical association, or a trade association of स्वास्थ्य insurance कंपनियाँ, may lobby a legislature in अनुक्रम to counteract the influence of तम्बाकू कंपनियाँ, in which case the lobbying would be viewed by most लोगों as justified ( विधिवत defending विरूद्ध others ' corruption ).
The परेशानी in drawing उद्देश्य lines between which lobbyists are `` good lobbyists '' and जिससे ones are `` ख़राब ones '' is compounded by the cleverness साथ जिससे lobbyists or उनके क्लाइंट can argue कि उनके own lobbying is of the `` good '' kind.
At heart, the प्रयत्न to influence विधान is a शक्ति संघर्ष.
As in अन्य फ़ॉर्म of power struggle, ऐसे as war or law प्रवर्तन, motives range इससे to self-defense to लड़ लिये इंसाफ, और the dividing लकीर between predation और justice is विषय to rationalization.
सनशाइन of अपना प्रेम गिटार riff
मलाई were a 1960s अंग्रेजों rock supergroup consisting of bassist/vocalist Jack Bruce, guitarist/vocalist Eric क्लैप्टन, and वादक Ginger Baker.
उनके ध्वनि was characterised by a hybrid of ब्लूज़ चट्टान, मुश्किल rock और साइकेडेलिक चट्टान, combining the psychedelia-themed lyrics, eric क्लैप्टन 's blues गिटार playing and vocals, जोकर ब्रूस 's आवाज़ और prominent बास playing and Ginger बेकर 's jazz -influenced drumming.
The समूह 's तीसरा album, पहियों of आग, थी the संसार 's first platinum-selling दोगुना album.
मलाई हैं widely regarded as being the world 's पहला कामयाब supergroup.
in उनके करियर, वे बेची over 15 लाख एल्बम विश्वव्यापी.
Cream 's म्यूज़िक शामिल songs आधारित on traditional ब्लूज़ ऐसे as `` Crossroads `` and `` spoonful ``, और आधुनिक blues ऐसे as `` Born Under a ख़राब चिह्न ``, as well as more eccentric गीतों ऐसे as `` अजीब Brew ``, `` किस्से of वीर ulysses `` और `` Toad ``.
मलाई 's biggest hits were `` i Feel Free `` ( uk, number 11 ), `` सनशाइन of Your प्रेम `` ( us, number 5 ), `` श्वेत Room `` ( US, number 6 ), `` Crossroads '' ( US, number 28 ), और `` Badge `` ( uk, क्रमांक 18 ).
मलाई made a significant impact on the popular music of the समय, और, along with जिमि हेंड्रिक्स, और टेरी कठ of शिकागो, popularised the उपयोग of the wah-wah पैदल.
They provided a heavy yet technically निपुण musical थीम कि foreshadowed and बहकावे the emergence of British bands such as The Jeff Beck Group in the late 1960s.
the बैंड 's live performances बहकावे प्रगतिशील rock अधिनियमों such as फटाफट.
मलाई यहूद inducted into the चट्टान और फेंकें Hall of कीर्ति in 1993.
वे यहूद शामिल in दोनो Rolling Stone और vh1 's सूचियाँ of the `` 100 महानतम Artists of All समय ''.
वे यहूद भी क्रमित number 16 on VH1 's `` 100 महानतम Artists of मुश्किल चट्टान ''.
Hairspray is a 1988 कॉमेडी फिल्मी लिखा और directed by John Waters, और starring ricki झील, सन्नी Bono, डिब्बी Harry, माइकल St. जेरार्ड, shawn थॉम्पसन, colleen Fitzpatrick, जेरी stiller, and in उसके पिछला film भूमिका, Divine.
Hairspray was a dramatic प्रस्थान from waters ' पहले works, साथ a much broader intended audience.
In फैक्ट, hairsprays pg is the mildest दरजा a Waters film has received ; most of his previous films were rated X by the MPAA.
नियत in 1962 बाल्टीमोर, Maryland, the film घूमती around self-proclaimed `` pleasantly plump '' किशोरावस्था Tracy Turnblad as she pursues stardom as a dancer on a लोकल tv show और रैलियों विरूद्ध जातिगत पृथक्करण.
hairspray थी only a moderate success upon इसके आरंभिक नाट्य रिलीज, earning a modest gross of $ 8 लाख.
however, it प्रबंधित to attract a larger audience on home वीडियो in the early 1990s और became a cult classic.
Most आलोचकों praised the film, although some were displeased साथ the overall campiness.
in 2002, the film थी adapted into a Broadway musical of the वही name, which जीती आठ टोनी Awards, including Best musical in 2003.
A second फिल्मी संस्करण of hairspray, an adaptation of the स्टेज musical, थी भी released by New लकीर Cinema in 2007, which included many परिवर्तन of scripted items from the असली.
The फिल्मी भी ranks # 444 on साम्राज्य पत्रिका 's 2008 सूची of the 500 महानतम फिल्मों of सब time.
a Christian denomination is an identifiable धार्मिक देह under a आम name, structure, and doctrine within christianity.
Some groups शामिल do नहीं consider themselves a denomination ( e.g., the Catholic Church considers itself the एक सच्चा church और the अपोस्टोलिक See, और as pre-denominational ).
Some समूह viewed by non-adherents as denominational actively resist being पुकारा a denomination और do not have any औपचारिक denominational structure, प्राधिकार, or record-keeping परे the लोकल congregation ; several समूह within बहाली Movement fall into this श्रेणी.
Some समूह हैं विशाल ( e.g. catholics, lutherans, anglicans or baptists ), जबकि अन्य हैं just a few small चर्च, और in most मामले the relative आकार is not evident in इस सूची.
आधुनिक movements ऐसे as fundamentalist Christianity, pietism, evangelicalism, Pentecostalism और the Holiness गति sometimes क्रॉस denominational lines, or in कुछ cases बनाएँ नई denominations out of two or more continuing groups, ( as is the मामला for many संयुक्त and uniting churches, for उदाहरण ).
ऐसे subtleties and complexities हैं not clearly चित्रित here.
प्रमुख विभाजन भीतर christianity.
Note : This is नहीं a complete सूची, लकिन aims to provide a comprehensible overview of the diversity among denominations of Christianity.
As there हैं reported to be लगभग 41,000 ईसाई denominations, अनेक of जिससे can नहीं be सत्यापित to be significant, only those denominations with विकिपीडिया articles will be सूचीबद्ध in अनुक्रम to ensure कि सब प्रविष्टियां on इस list are notable and verifiable.
Between denominations, theologians, और तुलनात्मक religionists वहीँ हैं considerable disagreements परिचय which समूह can be properly पुकारा ईसाई, मतभिन्नता arising primarily from doctrinal मतभेद between समूह.
लिये the purpose of सादगी, इस list is intended to प्रतिबिंबित the self-understanding of प्रत्येक denomination.
Explanations of अलग राय concerning उनके औकात as ईसाई denominations can be मिला at उनके respective आलेख.
There is no आधिकारिक recognition in most parts of the world for religious लाशें, and there is no आधिकारिक clearinghouse जिससे could determine the औकात or respectability of religious लाशें.
प्रायः वहीँ is considerable असहमति between various churches about whether अन्य churches चाहिए be labeled with pejorative शर्तें ऐसे as `` cult '', or about whether इस or कि समूह enjoys some माप of respectability.
Such considerations प्रायः vary इससे place to प्लेस, जहाँ एक religious group may enjoy बहुमत औकात in one प्रदेश, but be widely regarded as a `` dangerous cult '' in another भाग of the संसार.
Inclusion on इस सूची करता नहीं indicate कोई निर्णय about the size, महत्व, or character of a group or इसके सदस्यों.
1804 मैप of `` louisiana ``, edged on the वेस्ट by the Rocky kyu.
the Louisiana खरीदें ( `` बिक्री of louisiana '' ) थी the अधिग्रहण by the संयुक्त States of अमेरिका in 1803 of of फ़्रांस 's अर्जी to the territory of Louisiana.
the U.S. paid 50 million francs ( $ 11,250,000 ) प्लस cancellation of debts worth 18 लाख francs ( $ 3,750,000 ), लिये a कुल योग of 15 लाख dollars ( कम than 3 सेंट प्रति एकड़ ) लिये the Louisiana territory ( $ लाख in डॉलर, कम than 42 सेंट प्रति acre ).
the Louisiana territory encompassed सब or part of 15 उपस्थित U.S. states और दो कनाडाई प्रांतों.
The land purchased contained सब of present-day Arkansas, Missouri, आयोवा, Oklahoma, Kansas, and Nebraska ; भाग of Minnesota that were वेस्ट of the मिसिसिपी नदी ; सबसे of उत्तर डकोटा ; सबसे of दक्षिण Dakota ; northeastern नई मैक्सिको ; northern Texas ; the portions of मोंटाना, व्योमिंग, and कोलोराडो ईस्ट of the महाद्वीपीय divide ; Louisiana west of the Mississippi नदी, including the city of New Orleans ; and छोटी portions of land that would आखिरकार become भाग of the Canadian provinces of अलबर्टा और Saskatchewan.
फ़्रांस नियंत्रित this vast area from 1699 जबतक 1762, the year it gave the territory to इसके ally Spain.
Under नेपोलियन Bonaparte, France took back the territory in 1800 in the आशा of भवन an साम्राज्य in North अमेरिका.
A slave विद्रोह in हैती और an impending युद्ध साथ Britain, however, led फ़्रांस to लापरवाही these plans और sell the संपूर्ण territory to the United States, जो had originally intended तभी to तलाश the खरीदें of नई ऑरलियन्स और इसके adjacent lands.
the खरीदें of the territory of Louisiana took place दौरान the प्रेसिडेंसी of Thomas Jefferson.
at the time, the purchase faced घरेलू opposition because it थी thought to be unconstitutional.
हालांकि he सहमत that the U.S. संविधान किया नहीं contain provisions लिये acquiring territory, जेफरसन decided to go ahead with the purchase anyway in अनुक्रम to हटाएँ France 's presence in the region और to protect both U.S. trade access to the port of New ऑरलियन्स and free ड्योढ़ी on the मिसिसिपी नदी.
Ceremony at प्लेस d'armes, नई ऑरलियन्स अंकन transfer of Louisiana to the United States, 10 कूच 1804, as चित्रित by Thure de Thulstrup.
`` कूल Jerk '' is a लोकप्रिय सोंग लिखा by Donald Storball and originally performed by the capitols.
Released in 1966, it reached No. 2 on the American R & b चार्ट और No. 7 on the पॉप चार्ट.
the बैकिंग track लिये इस सोंग was दरअसल अंकित ( secretly ) by the motown house band The दुर्गंध भाइयो.
Per one of the Funk भाइयो, the सोंग थी originally to be called `` Pimp Jerk. ''
This was लिया इससे watching पड़ोस pimps, who होता dance in the क्लब, लकिन यहूद too `` cool '' to do the jerk like regular folks.
उनके संस्करण थी subsequently named `` the Pimp झटका. ''
The producer थी afraid कि a सोंग साथ the word pimp in the title would be बैन or not receive much positive ध्यान, और था the शीर्षक बदला to इसके current form.
the go-go 's, Todd rundgren, बिग ट्रबल, इंसान Sexual जवाब, the La de da 's, the सृष्टि, और The coasters have covered the song.
Todd Rundgren did his version in an odd समय हस्ताक्षर ( 7/4 ), giving an obviously jerky महसूस to the song.
