despite इस reason, it is listed in कुछ variations of the फिल्मी 's soundtrack.
A league is a unit of length ( or, rarely, क्षेत्रफल ).
It was long आम in Europe and Latin America, but it is no longer an official ईकाई in any स्वदेश.
the league originally referred to the अलहदा a person could walk in an घंटा.
Since the मध्य आयु, many मान have महरूम निर्दिष्ट in several countries.
in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of nautical दूरियाँ, the 3 मील ( 4.8 km ) distance corresponds to how far an observer of औसत height ( 5'9 '' or 1.78 m ) can see जब खड़ा at समुद्र level.
यूँ, a जलयान traveling one `` league '' has reached what was previously the farthest visible distance on the क्षितिज.
The lack of a ऐतिहासिक and वैश्विक standard लिये the सटीक माप of a `` लीग '' can be accounted for by the variable उन्नयन of the observer ( i.e., sightings इससे a जलयान 's deck vs. masthead ).
the Irish राज्य आए into होने in 1922 as the आयरिश फ़्री राज्य, a dominion of the British राष्ट्रमंडल, having seceded इससे the संयुक्त Kingdom under the anglo-irish Treaty.
It comprises 26 of आयरलैंड 's 32 counties.
चूंकि 1949 it रै existed as the Republic of आयरलैंड.
इससे इसके foundation, the आयरिश Free State थी embroiled in a सिविल war between nationalists supporting the सन्धि and opponents जो समर्थित a गणतंत्र.
The pro-treaty पक्ष, organised as cumann na nGaedheal उभरा विजयी from the conflict and won subsequent elections.
वे formed the सरकारी of the राज्य जबतक 1932, when they peacefully handed over शक्ति to the anti-Treaty faction in fianna Fáil, जो पराजित उन्हें in an election.
The Irish राज्य, despite इसके violent beginnings, रै remained a उदार लोकतंत्र throughout its अस्तित्व.
A new constitution in 1937 removed अनेक of the links साथ Britain established अंतर्गत the Treaty और Ireland 's neutrality in the Second World युद्ध demonstrated इसके स्वतंत्रता in foreign नीति matters इससे ब्रिटेन.
in 1948 Ireland formally बाएँ the अंग्रेजों Commonwealth and adopted the title of `` Republic ''.
in the economic sphere, the Irish state has था a mixed performance.
on independence, it was one of the wealthier देशों in Europe प्रति सिर of जनसांख्यिकी.
however it also inherited from अंग्रेजों नियम the problems of बेरोजगारी, emigration, uneven भौगोलिक development and कमी of a native industrial आधार.
For much of इसके history, the state struggled to rectify ये problems.
particular चोटियों of emigration यहूद अंकित during the लेट 1930s, 1950s और 1980s, when the आयरिश economy अंकित little विकास.
In the 1930s, fianna Fáil सरकारें attempted to बनाएँ Irish घरेलू industries using subsidies and सुरक्षात्मक tarifs.
in the late 1950s, these नीतियों were dropped in पक्ष of free trade with selected countries and encouraging of विदेशी investment with low कर.
इस थी expanded when आयरलैंड entered the European Economic Community in 1972.
in the 1990s और 2000s, Ireland अनुभवी an economic boom ज्ञात as the सेल्टिक Tiger, in which the country 's जीडीपी surpassed अनेक of इसके European neighbours.
आव्रजन भी surpassed emigration, bringing the state 's population up to over 4 लाख.
however, since 2008, आयरलैंड रै experienced a severe संकट in the banking sector and साथ sovereign कर्ज़.
the resultant economic slump has deepened the effect of the संसार recession on Ireland.
From 1937 to 1998, the आयरिश संविधान included a अर्जी on उत्तरी Ireland as a भाग of the नेशनल territory.
However, the राज्य भी opposed और used its सुरक्षा शक्तियां against those हथियारबंद groups - प्रधानतया the अस्थायी आयरिश Republican फौज, who आजमाया to एकजुट आयरलैंड by फ़ोर्स.
इस occurred in the 1950s, throughout the 1970s and 1980s और रै जारी on a reduced स्केल.
आयरिश governments meanwhile आजमाया to दलाली an अनुबंध to the conflict known as The परेशानियों within उत्तरी आयरलैंड from 1968 to the late 1990s.
The अंग्रेजों government officially recognised the सही of the आयरिश सरकारी to be a party to the उत्तरी negotiations in the Anglo-Irish अनुबंध of 1985.
in 1998, as part of the शुभ Friday Agreement, the Irish constitution थी altered by referendum to remove the territorial claim to उत्तरी आयरलैंड and बजाय extend the सही of आयरिश नागरिकता to all the people of the island चाहिए वे wish to have it.
John क्विंसी एडम्स ( July 11, 1767February 23, 1848 ) was the sixth अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1825–1829 ).
He परोसा as American diplomat, सीनेटर, और Congressional representative.
He थी a member of the Federalist, Democratic-Republican, नेशनल Republican, and बाद Anti-Masonic and whig parties.
Adams was the son of former President John Adams और Abigail Adams.
as a राजनयिक, Adams played an महत्वपूर्ण role in negotiating अनेक international treaties, सबसे notably the सन्धि of ghent, जिससे ended the War of 1812.
As Secretary of State, he negotiated साथ the United Kingdom over America 's उत्तरी किनारा with Canada, negotiated साथ स्पेन the annexation of Florida, and authored the Monroe doctrine.
इतिहासकारों agree he was one of the महानतम राजनयिकों and secretaries of राज्य in अमरीकी इतिहास.
as अध्यक्ष, he sought to modernize the American अर्थव्यवस्था and प्रचारित education.
Adams enacted a part of his agenda and paid बंद much of the national debt.
He थी stymied by a कॉंग्रेस controlled by his दुश्मनों, and उसके कमी of patronage networks helped राजनेता eager to undercut him.
he lost उसके 1828 bid लिये re-election to एंड्रयू Jackson.
In doing so, he became the पहला president चूंकि his पिता to serve a single term.
Adams is best known as a राजनयिक जो तराशा America 's विदेशी नीति in लकीर साथ his ardently राष्ट्रवादी प्रतिबद्धता to America 's रिपब्लिकन values.
More recently Howe ( 2007 ) portrayed Adams as the exemplar और moral leader in an era of modernization.
दौरान एडम्स ' lifetime, technological innovations और नई means of संचार स्प्रेड संदेश of religious पुनरुद्धार, social reform, और पार्टी politics.
goods, money, and लोगों traveled अधिक rapidly and efficiently than कभी before.
एडम्स थी निर्वाचित a U.S. प्रतिनिधि इससे मैसाचुसेट्स बाद leaving office, serving for the पिछला 17 years of उसके life साथ far greater acclamation than he था हासिल as अध्यक्ष.
he is, so दूर, the only president बाद elected to the संयुक्त States हाउस of Representatives ( though जॉन टायलर थी निर्वाचित to the House of प्रतिनिधि of the confederate States बस पहले उसके मौत in 1862 ).
Animated by his growing revulsion against गुलामी, एडम्स became a अग्रणी प्रतिद्वन्दी of the स्लेव शक्ति.
He predicted that if a civil war were to ब्रेक आउट, the अध्यक्ष could abolish गुलामी by using उसके war powers.
एडम्स भी पूर्वानुमानित the संघ 's dissolution over the गुलामी समस्या, but said that if the दक्षिण became independent there होता be a series of खूनी स्लेव revolts.
खिड़कियाँ Internet Explorer 9 ( IE9 ) is a संस्करण of the अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर web browser इससे microsoft.
it was released to the पब्लिक on कूच 14, 2011.
microsoft रै released Internet Explorer 9 as a major out-of-band संस्करण कि is नहीं tied to the रिलीज schedule of कोई particular संस्करण of Windows, नापसंद पिछला versions.
It is the first संस्करण since अंतरजाल Explorer 2 to not be bundled with a खिड़कियाँ ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली, although some oems have संस्थापित it with खिड़कियाँ 7 on their PCs, as well as new Windows 7 laptops.
The system आवश्यकताएँ for Internet Explorer 9 हैं Windows 7, खिड़कियाँ Server 2008 r2, खिड़कियाँ विस्टा सेवा पैक 2 or Windows सर्वर 2008 SP2 with the Platform Update.
Windows xp और पहले are नहीं समर्थित.
अंतरजाल Explorer 9 is the last version of Internet एक्सप्लोरर to be समर्थित on खिड़कियाँ Vista.
दोनो ia-32 and x64 builds are available.
अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर 9 supports अनेक सीएसएस 3 properties, embedded ICC v2 or v4 रंग profiles support via खिड़कियाँ Color प्रणाली, and रै improved जावास्क्रिप्ट performance.
it is the last of the five major web browsers to implement support लिये स्केलेबल Vector Graphics ( svg ).
It also features hardware-accelerated graphics रेंडरिंग using Direct2D, hardware-accelerated text rendering using directwrite, hardware-accelerated वीडियो rendering using Media Foundation, imaging support provided by Windows Imaging Component, and ऊँची fidelity printing संचालित by the xml पेपर specification ( XPS ) छपाई पाइपलाइन.
Internet Explorer 9 also supports the HTML5 वीडियो और audio टैग और the Web खोलें फ़ॉन्ट स्वरूप.
alka-seltzer is an effervescent antacid और पीड़ा reliever पहला marketed by the Dr. मील Medicine Company.
it थी developed by Maurice treener, सिर केमिस्ट at मील, in elkhart, इंडियाना.
alka-seltzer is marketed for राहत of minor aches, pains, inflammation, fever, headache, heartburn, खट्टा पेट, अपच, and hangovers, जबकि neutralizing excess stomach acid.
it थी launched in 1931.
a spin-off of Alka-Seltzer बना to relieve colds और फ्लू, Alka-Seltzer प्लस, was बाद introduced.
A short-lived antacid non-aspirin variant, Alka-Mints, थी introduced in 1994 और discontinued in 1997.
Alka-Seltzer is फिलहाल owned by Bayer schering फार्मा ag, Germany.
the नाम `` Alka-Seltzer '' रै been विस्तारित to incorporate an संपूर्ण लकीर of medications sold over the counter and taken by means of rapidly dissolving tablets कि रूप a carbonated समाधान in जल.

चित्र showing the छह most आम speleothems with labels.

a stalactite (, ; from the Greek stalasso, ( σταλάσσω ), `` to drip '', और meaning `` कि which drips '' ) is a type of speleothem ( secondary mineral ) that hangs इससे the ceiling of चूना caves.
It is a type of dripstone.
the सम्बन्धित formation on the floor of the गुफा is ज्ञात as a stalagmite.
उपाधि abbreviations are प्रयुक्त as an alternative रास्ता to बताएँ an academic degree बजाय of स्पेलिंग आउट the title in full, such as in reference books जैसे जो 's जो और on कारोबार ताश.
Many डिग्री have more than एक संक्षिप्त.
In the uk, it is not generally the custom to punctuate abbreviations for डिग्री साथ पूरा stops ( e.g. `` BSc '' बल्कि than `` b.sc. ``.
रेस is a classification system प्रयुक्त to categorize humans into large and पृथक populations or groups by anatomical, सांस्कृतिक, ethnic, जेनेटिक, भौगोलिक, ऐतिहासिक, linguistic, धार्मिक, or social संबद्ध.
पहला used to denote नेशनल affiliations, the term began to be used to relate to physical traits in the 17th century.
in the जल्दी 20th सदी the term थी often प्रयुक्त, in a taxonomic sense, to denote genetically differentiated human populations पारिभाषित by phenotype.
जबकि biologists sometimes उपयोग the concept of race to make भेद among fuzzy sets of traits, others in the scientific जातियाँ suggest कि the idea of race often is used in a naive or simplistic रास्ता, i.e. कि among humans, रेस रै no taxonomic significance : सब जीना humans belong to the same प्रजाति, Homo sapiens and subspecies, होमो sapiens sapiens.
Social conceptions और groupings of races vary over time, involving folk taxonomies
that define of individuals आधारित on perceived traits.
वैज्ञानिकों consider biological essentialism obsolete, and generally discourage racial स्पष्टीकरण लिये सामूहिक differentiation in both physical और behavioral traits.
चूंकि the second हाफ of the 20th century the associations of रेस साथ the विचारधाराओं and theories that grew out of the work of 19th-century विज्ञानियों and physiologists रै led to the use of the शब्द रेस itself बनने problematic.
Although स्टिल used in सामान्य contexts, it is अभी often replaced by अन्य words which are less ambiguous and emotionally charged, ऐसे as populations, लोगों ( s ), जातीय groups or communities depending on कॉन्टेक्स्ट.
लुसी स्टोन ( अगस्त 13, 1818 – अक्तूबर 19, 1893 ) थी a prominent अमरीकी abolitionist और suffragist, और a vocal एडवोकेट और organizer promoting अधिकारों लिये women.
In 1847, Stone became the पहला स्त्री from मैसाचुसेट्स to earn a कॉलेज उपाधि.
वो spoke out लिये women 's अधिकारों and against slavery at a time जब महिलाओं यहूद discouraged और prevented इससे public speaking.
स्टोन थी the पहला recorded American woman to retain उसके own last नाम after marriage.
स्टोन 's organizational क्रियाएँ लिये the cause of महिलाओं 's rights yielded ठोस gains in the difficult राजनैतिक पर्यावरण of the 19th century.
स्टोन helped initiate the first National महिलाओं 's अधिकारों Convention और she supported and sustained it annually साथ साथ a number of अन्य local, state और regional activist प्रथाओं.
Stone spoke in सामने of a क्रमांक of विधान bodies to प्रचार laws giving more rights to महिलाओं.
वो assisted in establishing the स्त्री 's नेशनल वफ़ादार लीग to सहायता pass the Thirteenth Amendment and thereby abolish slavery, after which she helped रूप the largest समूह of like-minded महिलाओं 's अधिकारों reformers, the politically मॉडरेट American स्त्री suffrage संघ, जिससे worked लिये दशकों at the state स्तर in एहसान of women 's सही to vote.
Stone लिखा extensively about a wide range of महिलाओं 's अधिकारों, publishing and distributing भाषणों by herself और अन्य, and सम्मेलन कार्यवाही.
In the long-running and influential Woman 's जर्नल, a साप्ताहिक periodical that she established and promoted, स्टोन aired दोनो उसके अपना and differing views about women 's rights.
Called `` the orator '' and `` the morning स्टार of the woman 's rights movement '', Stone वितरित a वाक जिससे sparked सुसान B. Anthony to लो up the cause of महिलाओं 's suffrage.
एलिज़ाबेथ cady Stanton लिखा that `` Lucy Stone थी the पहला person by whom the दिल of the अमरीकी पब्लिक was deeply stirred on the woman question. ''
Together, Anthony, Stanton, और स्टोन have महरूम called the 19th century `` triumvirate `` of women 's suffrage और नारीवाद.
in वित्त, a bond is an instrument of indebtedness of the bond जारीकर्ता to the holders.
it is a debt security, under which the issuer owes the धारकों a कर्ज़ और, depending on the terms of the bond, is obliged to अदा उन्हें ब्याज ( the coupon ) or to repay the principal at a later date, termed the maturity.
Interest is प्रायः payable at fixed intervals ( semiannual, सालाना, sometimes मासिक ).
बहुत often the बंध is परक्राम्य, i.e. the ownership of the यंत्र can be transferred in the secondary market.
यूँ a bond is a रूप of loan or IOU : the holder of the bond is the lender ( creditor ), the जारीकर्ता of the बंध is the borrower ( debtor ), and the coupon is the interest.
bonds provide the borrower with external निधि to finance long-term निवेश, or, in the case of government bonds, to वित्त वर्तमान expenditure.
प्रमाणपत्र of जमा ( CDs ) or छोटी term commercial पेपर हैं considered to be money मार्केट यंत्र और नहीं bonds : the main अंतर is in the लंबाई of the term of the instrument.
bonds और स्टॉक्स हैं both प्रतिभूति, but the प्रमुख difference between the दो is कि ( पूंजी ) stockholders have an इक्विटी हिस्सेदारी in the company ( i.e. वे are स्वामी ), whereas bondholders have a creditor हिस्सेदारी in the company ( i.e. they हैं lenders ).
another difference is कि bonds usually have a defined term, or परिपक्वता, बाद which the बंध is redeemed, whereas stocks may be outstanding indefinitely.
An एक्सेप्शन is an irredeemable bond, ऐसे as consols, जिससे is a perpetuity, i.e. a बंध with no maturity.

a स्केल मॉडल is a शारीरिक model, a प्रतिनिधित्व or नक़ल of an ऑब्जेक्ट कि is larger or छोटी than the वास्तविक size of the object, which seeks to maintain the सापेक्ष proportions ( the scale factor ) of the physical आकार of the original ऑब्जेक्ट.
Very often the scale model is used as a मार्गदर्शिका to बनाना the ऑब्जेक्ट in पूरा आकार.
स्केल models are निर्मित or collected for अनेक कारण.
The zune HD was a portable मीडिया खिलाड़ी in the Zune product family released on September 15, 2009 by microsoft.
it थी a सीधा प्रतिस्पर्धी with the Apple iPod and iphone series of मोबाईल devices.
it थी initially released in 16 and 32 gb capacities.
a 64 GB संस्करण थी released on अप्रैल 9, 2010.
It utilized a touchscreen interface for नेविगेशन और included wi-fi for तुल्यकालन, access to the zune मार्केटप्लेस और Web browsing.
The Zune hd utilized the Nvidia tegra APX 2600 chip, allowing it to play 720p video through the optional hdmi Zune dock on a high-definition टेलीविज़न.
वरना, content would be scaled bas to 480x272 पिक्सेल on the player 's OLED touchscreen.
बूढ़ा sparky, the इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी प्रयुक्त at गाओ Sing prison
Execution by electrocution, प्रायः performed using an इलेक्ट्रिक chair, is an execution method originating in the United राज्य in which the condemned व्यक्ति is strapped to a specially निर्मित wooden chair और electrocuted through electrodes placed on the देह.
इस execution विधि थी निर्मित by employees of थामस एडिसन during the युद्ध of currents, और रै महरूम प्रयुक्त तभी in the United States and, लिये a period of several decades, in the Philippines ( इसके पहला use there in 1924 अंतर्गत अमरीकी occupation, पिछला in 1976 ).
historically, once the condemned व्यक्ति थी attached to the chair, various चक्र ( differing in वोल्टेज and अवधि ) of प्रत्यावर्ती current होता be passed through the individual 's देह, in order to कारण fatal क्षति to the internal organs ( सहित the brain ).
the पहला jolt of electric वर्तमान थी designed to कारण immediate unconsciousness and दिमाग death ; the second एक थी designed to कारण fatal damage to the vital organs.
मौत थी frequently caused by विद्युत overstimulation of the heart.
हालांकि in the United States the इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी रै become a प्रतीक of the मौत दंड, इसके उपयोग is in मनाही due to the वृद्धि of lethal इंजेक्शन, जिससे is widely believed to be a more दयालु method of execution.
हालांकि some states स्टिल maintain electrocution as a विधि of निष्पादन, today it is तभी कायम as a द्वितीयक विधि that may be chosen over lethal इंजेक्शन at the निवेदन of the कैदी.
as of 2010, electrocution is an optional रूप of निष्पादन in Alabama, Florida, दक्षिण Carolina और Virginia.
They allow the prisoner to choose lethal injection as an वैकल्पिक method.
In the राज्य of Kentucky and Tennessee, the इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी has महरूम रिटायर्ड except for those जिनकी पूंजी crimes were committed prior to legislated तिथियाँ in 1998 ( Kentucky : कूच 31, 1998 ; टेनेसी : December 31, 1998 ) and जो chose electrocution.
In both states, inmates जो do not चुनें electrocution or inmates who वचनबद्ध their अपराधों after the designated date हैं killed by lethal injection.
The electric कुर्सी is an alternate रूप of निष्पादन approved लिये potential उपयोग in Arkansas and ओक्लाहोमा if other forms of निष्पादन are मिला unconstitutional in the state at the time of निष्पादन.
it is the sole method of निष्पादन in Vermont, where देशद्रोह is the only capital अपराधों.
On February 8, 2008, the नेब्रास्का Supreme अदालत determined that execution by electric chair was a `` cruel and unusual दंड '' अंतर्गत the state 's constitution.
इस brought executions of this type to an end in नेब्रास्का, the तभी बाकी state to retain electrocution as its sole method of execution for murder.
the मेरीलैंड हाउस of Delegates is the lower हाउस of the सामान्य Assembly, the state विधानमंडल of the अमरीकी राज्य of मेरीलैंड, और is रचित of 141 Delegates elected from 47 districts.
The हाउस of Delegates Chamber is located in the Maryland State House ( राज्य कैपिटल ) on State वृत्त in Annapolis, which is the राज्य capital.
The राज्य House भी houses the मेरीलैंड राज्य Senate कक्ष और the कार्यालयों of the राज्यपाल और लेफ्टिनेंट Governor of the State of मेरीलैंड.
प्रत्येक Delegate has कार्यालयों in Annapolis, in the आसपास Casper R. Taylor, jr. House दफ्तर Building.
The मुक्ति of पेरिस ( भी ज्ञात as the बैटल for Paris ) took place during World युद्ध II इससे 19 अगस्त 1944 until the surrender of the occupying German garrison on 25 अगस्त.
the मुक्ति of Paris started साथ an uprising by the French Resistance विरूद्ध the German गैरीसन.
on 24 अगस्त, the French शक्तियां of the Interior ( शक्तियां françaises de l'intérieur, FFI ) received सुदृढीकरण इससे the फ़्री फ्रेंच Army of मुक्ति and from the U.S. Third Army अंतर्गत General patton.
the पूंजी region of फ़्रांस था been governed by नाजी Germany since the signing of the दूसरी compiègne armistice in जून 1940, जब the जर्मनी फौज occupied उत्तरी and westernmost France, and when the कठपुतली शासन of Vichy France थी established in the कस्बा of Vichy in सेंट्रल France.
This battle marked the liberation of Paris and the निर्वासन of the vichy government to sigmaringen in जर्मनी.
however, there थी still much heavy लड़ to be किया before France थी liberated, सहित the अभियान in दक्षिणी फ़्रांस दौरान august-september ( in provence and extending into the southwestern प्रदेश of the vosges kyu ), साथ the German-held seaports of पश्चिमी फ़्रांस ( ऐसे as at brest और dunkirk ), in alsace और लोरेन in पूर्वी फ़्रांस, और in northeastern फ़्रांस, such as साथ the राइन and Moder Rivers.
The जर्मनी फौज और SS लड़ा doggedly in ये क्षेत्रों for the remainder of 1944 and into 1945.
`` feelin ' alright ? '' also known as `` Feeling Alright '' is a सोंग written by डेव मेसन of the अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान band ट्रैफ़िक इससे their eponymous 1968 एल्बम, ट्रैफ़िक.
The song थी also a hit सिंगल for several performers : Joe Cocker ( 1969, # 69, recharted in 1972, US # 33 ), mongo santamaría ( 1969, # 95 ) और ग्रैंड Funk Railroad ( 1971, US # 54 ).
It has भी महरूम recorded by तीन Dog रात्रि ( 1969 ), The 5th आयाम ( 1970 ), लू राल्स, फ्रेडी किंग, पॉल weller, Lulu, Chairmen of the फलक ( 1970 ), Rare Earth, The Electric Concept Orchestra, माँ 's Finest ( 1973 ), the ओहियो खिलाड़ी ( 1971 ), Diana रॉस साथ the Jackson 5 ( 1971 ), maceo Parker, Gladys नाईट & the Pips, फैली Panic और the ब्लैक crowes.
a Steel Drum संस्करण by त्रिनिदाद Oil Company थी reissued on the dancefloor जैज़ compilation ब्लू रस 2.
it थी also featured in the 2000 फिल्मी Duets, सुंग by Huey लुईस.
Both the original and the Joe cocker cover यहूद प्रदर्शित in the फिल्म उड़ान, अभिनीत डेंज़ल Washington.
देवों werkheiser ( born कूच 8,1991 ) is an अमरीकी कर्ता, आवाज़ कर्ता, सिंगर, songwriter और musician, बेहतरीन ज्ञात for उसके अभिनीत भूमिका as ned bigby on the Nickelodeon sitcom ned 's declassified स्कूल Survival Guide and लिये उसके भूमिका in the 2007 tv फिल्म shredderman Rules, as the सीसे अक्षर Nolan byrd.
Werkheiser भी played Peter Parkes in the fourth और फाइनल ऋतु of the ABC Family दिखाएँ Greek.

नमूना view of an electronic health रिकार्ड
An इलेक्ट्रॉनिक health record ( ehr ) is an evolving concept पारिभाषित as a systematic संग्रहण of electronic स्वास्थ्य information परिचय व्यक्तिगत मरीजों or populations.
it is a record in digital format कि is theoretically सक्षम of being साझा आरपार different स्वास्थ्य care जमावट.
In कुछ मामले this sharing can occur by way of network-connected enterprise-wide information प्रणालियों और अन्य सूचना संजाल or exchanges.
ehrs may include a range of आंकड़ा, including demographics, चिकित्सा इतिहास, medication and allergies, immunization status, प्रयोगशाला test results, radiology images, vital signs, personal आंकड़े like age and weight, and billing सूचना.
Loan origination is the process by which a borrower applies लिये a new loan, और a lender processes कि अनुप्रयोग.
Origination generally includes all the steps from लेने a loan अनुप्रयोग up to disbursal of निधि ( or घटती the अनुप्रयोग ).
Loan सर्विसिंग कवर everything बाद disbursing the निधि until the loan is fully paid बंद.
ऋण origination is a specialized संस्करण of नई account खोलने for वित्तीय सेवाएं संगठन.
निश्चित लोगों and organizations specialize in loan origination.
Mortgage brokers और अन्य बंधक originator कंपनियाँ serve as a prominent example.
वहीँ हैं अनेक different types of loans.
For more सूचना on ऋण प्रकार, see the loan and consumer lending articles.
कदम शामिल in originating a loan vary by ऋण type, विभिन्न kinds of ऋण रिस्क, नियामक, lender नीति, and अन्य factors.
शीर्ष left : the टेनेसी Valley Authority, part of the नई सौदे, being signed into law in 1933.
Top right : फ्रैंकलिन delano Roosevelt, who was responsible लिये पहलों और programs collectively ज्ञात as the New Deal.
नीचे : A पब्लिक mural इससे one of the कलाकारों employed by the नई सौदे.
the नई Deal was a series of आर्थिक कार्यक्रम enacted in the United राज्य between 1933 and 1936.
They involved अध्यक्षीय कार्यपालिका आदेश or कानून passed by कॉंग्रेस during the first पद of President Franklin D. रूज़वेल्ट.
The कार्यक्रम were in response to the Great अवसाद, and focused on what इतिहासकारों कॉल the `` 3 Rs '' : राहत, रिकवरी, and Reform.
कि is राहत लिये the unemployed और ग़रीब ; Recovery of the economy to सामान्य levels ; और सुधार of the financial system to prevent a repeat depression.
The नई सौदे उत्पादित a राजनैतिक realignment, बनाना the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी the majority ( as well as the पार्टी that आयोजित the White House लिये seven आउट of nine अध्यक्षीय terms इससे 1933 to 1969 ), साथ its base in liberal विचार, the white South, traditional Democrats, big नगर machines, और the newly सशक्त labor unions और जातीय अल्पसंख्यकों.
The Republicans यहूद split, साथ conservatives opposing the संपूर्ण नई Deal as an दुश्मन of कारोबार और विकास, और liberals accepting कुछ of it and promising to make it अधिक efficient.
the realignment crystallized into the नई Deal गठबन्धन कि वर्चस्व सबसे अध्यक्षीय चुनावों into the 1960s, while the opposition Conservative Coalition largely नियंत्रित Congress इससे 1937 to 1963.
by 1936 the term `` liberal '' typically was प्रयुक्त लिये supporters of the नई सौदे, and `` conservative `` लिये its opponents.
From 1934 to 1938, रूज़वेल्ट थी assisted in his endeavours by a “pro-spender” majority in Congress ( drawn इससे two-party, competitive, non-machine, Progressive, and बाएँ party districts ).
As noted by सिकंदर हिक्स, “roosevelt, समर्थित by rare, non-Southern डेमोक्रेट majorities — 270 non-southern Democrat representatives और 71 non-southern डेमोक्रेट सीनेटरों — spelled दूसरी नई Deal reform.”
अनेक historians फर्क between a `` पहला नई Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) and a `` Second New Deal '' ( 1935–38 ), with the second एक अधिक liberal और अधिक controversial.
The `` पहला नई Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) dealt साथ diverse groups, from बैंकिंग and railroads to उद्योग and खेती, सब of which मांगे help for economic अस्तित्व.
the Federal Emergency Relief प्रशासन, for instance, provided $ 500 million लिये relief परिचालन by states and शहरों, जबकि the short-lived cwa ( सिविल Works Administration ) gave बस्तियों money to operate make-work प्रोजेक्ट in 1933-34.
the `` Second नई Deal `` in 1935–38 included the वेगनर अधिनियम to promote labor unions, the Works Progress प्रशासन ( WPA ) relief कार्यक्रम ( जिससे made the संघीय सरकारी by far the largest single नियोक्ता in the स्वदेश ), the Social Security अधिनियम, और new programs to aid tenant किसानो and migrant मजदूर.
the फाइनल major items of New Deal legislation यहूद the creation of the संयुक्त राज्य आवास प्राधिकार and फार्म Security Administration, दोनो in 1937, and the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938, which set maximum घंटों and न्यूनतम मजदूरी लिये most categories of workers.
the economic downturn of 1937–38, and the कड़वा विभाजित between the afl and cio मजदूर संघ led to major Republican gains in Congress in 1938.
रूढ़िवादी republicans और डेमोक्रेट in Congress joined in the informal Conservative Coalition.
by 1942–43 they shut bas राहत कार्यक्रम such as the WPA और ccc और blocked major liberal प्रस्ताव.
Roosevelt खुद turned his attention to the युद्ध effort, और won reelection in 1940 और 1944.
the परम् अदालत घोषित the National रिकवरी प्रशासन ( nra ) and the पहला संस्करण of the agricultural Adjustment अधिनियम ( AAA ) unconstitutional, however the aaa थी rewritten और then upheld.
As the पहला रिपब्लिकन अध्यक्ष निर्वाचित बाद fdr, Dwight D. आइज़नहावर ( 1953–61 ) left the New सौदे largely intact, even expanding it in some क्षेत्रों.
In the 1960s, Lyndon B. जॉनसन 's ग्रेट समाज used the नई Deal as प्रेरणा लिये a नाटकीय expansion of उदार programs, which रिपब्लिकन रिचर्ड M. निक्सन generally retained.
After 1974, however, the कॉल लिये deregulation of the अर्थव्यवस्था gained bipartisan support.
The नई सौदे विनियमन of बैंकिंग ( glass–steagall Act ) थी निलंबित in the 1990s.
अनेक नई सौदे कार्यक्रम remain active, साथ कुछ स्टिल operating अंतर्गत the असली names, including the Federal जमा Insurance Corporation ( FDIC ), the Federal क्रॉप Insurance निगम ( fcic ), the संघीय आवास प्रशासन ( fha ), और the Tennessee घाटी Authority ( त्व ).
The largest कार्यक्रम स्टिल in अस्तित्व आज हैं the सोशल Security प्रणाली और the Securities और एक्सचेंज आयोग ( सेक ).
a स्त्री ( ), pl : women ( ) is a मादा इंसान.
the पद स्त्री is प्रायः सुरक्षित लिये an वयस्क, साथ the पद लड़की being the usual पद for a मादा चाइल्ड or adolescent.
However, the पद woman is also sometimes used to identify a female इंसान, regardless of आयु, as in phrases such as `` Women 's rights ``.
महिलाओं हैं typically सक्षम of giving जनम, though older महिलाओं who have गए through रजोनिवृत्ति और कुछ intersex महिलाओं can नहीं.
`` I Do n't want to Miss a बात '' is a सोंग performed by अमरीकी चट्टान band Aerosmith for the 1998 फिल्मी Armageddon.
Written by डायने वारेन, the सोंग debuted at number one on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 ( the पहला # 1 लिये the band बाद 28 years साथ ).
the सोंग ठहरे at number एक for चार weeks इससे सितंबर 5 to सितंबर 26, 1998.
The song भी ठहरे at number 1 लिये अनेक सप्ताह in अनेक other countries.
in the UK, the song peaked at number four, becoming Aerosmith 's highest charting सोंग in the UK, where it थी the 17th best-selling single of 1998, and रै बेची over a लाख नक़ल.
हालांकि नहीं प्रयुक्त by the बहुमत of the संसार 's देशों, daylight saving समय is common in the पश्चिमी world.
daylight छायांकन time ( DST ) —also गर्मियाँ समय in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी — is the practice of advancing clocks दौरान the हल्का months so that evenings have अधिक daylight और mornings have कम.
typically घड़ियाँ हैं adjusted आगे one घंटा near the प्रारंभ of वसन्त and are समायोजित पिछड़ा in autumn.
the आधुनिक idea of daylight छायांकन was first proposed in 1895 by जार्ज Vernon हडसन और it थी first implemented during the पहला संसार युद्ध.
Many देशों have used it at various times चूंकि then.
Much of the संयुक्त राज्य प्रयुक्त DST in the 1950s और 1960s, और DST उपयोग विस्तारित following the 1970s उर्जा संकट और has been widely प्रयुक्त in उत्तर America and Europe चूंकि तब.
the practice रै महरूम दोनो praised and criticized.
Adding daylight to evenings लाभ retailing, sports, and अन्य activities कि exploit sunlight बाद working hours, but can cause problems लिये संध्या entertainment और अन्य occupations tied to the सूर्य.
Although an जल्दी goal of DST was to reduce संध्या उपयोग of incandescent lighting ( formerly a primary use of electricity ), modern हीटिंग and cooling उपयोग patterns differ greatly, and शोध about how dst currently affects उर्जा उपयोग is limited or contradictory.
dst क्लॉक shifts present other चुनौतियां.
वे complicate timekeeping, और can disrupt meetings, travel, बिलिंग, रिकार्ड keeping, चिकित्सा डिवाइस, भारी equipment, और नींद patterns.
Software can प्रायः adjust computer घड़ियाँ automatically, but this can be सीमित और error-prone, विशेषकर जब dst dates हैं बदला.
floorplan of the Château de Montargis
montargis is a commune in the Loiret विभाग in north-central France on the loing river.
the town is स्तिथ about दक्षिण of पेरिस and ईस्ट of Orléans in the gâtinais.
montargis is the second largest नगर in the loiret, बाद orléans.
It is near a large वन, और contains light उद्योग and खेती, including केसरिया.
due to its numerous नहरों and पुलों, montargis sometimes बिल्स itself as the `` वेनिस of the gâtinais. ''
Though quite आधुनिक, it retains a मध्यकालीन charm in its शहर क्षेत्रफल.
in computer storage, a logical unit क्रमांक, or lun, is a number used to identify a लॉजिकल ईकाई, which is a device addressed by the scsi protocol or protocols which encapsulate SCSI, such as fibre Channel or iSCSI.
A lun may be used with कोई यंत्र जिससे supports read/write परिचालन, such as a tape ड्राइव, but is सबसे प्रायः used to refer to a लॉजिकल डिस्क as created on a सैन.
Though not technically correct, the पद `` LUN '' is often भी used to refer to the logical disk itself.
The Gospel According to Mark (,, to euangelion kata markon ), commonly shortened to the Gospel of Mark or simply चिह्नित, is the दूसरी किताब of the New वसीयत.
इस canonical account of the जीवन of Jesus of Nazareth is one of the तीन synoptic gospels.
it थी विचार to be an निचोड़, जिससे accounts लिये इसके प्लेस as the दूसरी gospel in the Bible.
However, सबसे समकालीन विद्वानों now लिहाज़ it as the earliest of the canonical gospels ( c 70 ).
कि Mark थी प्रयुक्त as a सोर्स लिये the other synoptic gospels Gospel of Matthew and इन्जील of ल्यूक is widely held by many, हालांकि नहीं सब, New वसीयत scholars.
the इन्जील of चिह्नित narrates the Ministry of Jesus from उसके बपतिस्मा by John the Baptist to his मौत and resurrection.
It focuses विशेषकर on the पिछला week of his life ( अध्याय 11–16 ) in जेरूसलम.
Its swift narrative portrays यीशु as a वीर man of action, an exorcist, healer और miracle worker.
an important theme of Mark is the Messianic Secret.
Jesus silences the demoniacs he heals, tries unsuccessfully to keep उसके मुक्तिदाता identity रहस्य, और conceals his संदेश with parables.
Meanwhile, the शिष्यों fail to understand both the implication of the चमत्कार of Jesus and the अर्थ of the things he predicts परिचय his arrest, death और resurrection.
Most scholars मानना कि the original टेक्स्ट of the gospel ends at चिह्नित 16:8 with the discovery of यीशु ' खाली मकबरा और that the following खाता of his resurrection दिखावे is a बाद addition.
according to परंपरा and कुछ जल्दी गिरिजाघर writers, the author is चिह्नित the इंजीलवादी, the साथी of the apostle पीटर.
the इन्जील, however, appears to rely on अनेक underlying sources, varying in रूप and in theology, which tells against the tradition that the gospel थी based on Peter 's उपदेश.
the टेक्स्ट is a compilation which may शामिल eye-witness accounts as well as ज्ञात apostolic preachings, and pre-existing written records that do not मौजूद आज लकिन can be पुष्टि इससे 2nd-century commentators.
कुछ of the stories in the gospel may have been transmitted orally पहले being लिखा down.
Various elements भीतर the इन्जील suggest that the लेखक लिखा in Syria or फिलिस्तीन लिये a non-jewish ईसाई community.
The रब of the बजती is an epic high fantasy अनोखा लिखा by English भाषाशास्त्री and University of ऑक्सफोर्ड professor J. R. R. tolkien.
the स्टोरी began as a sequel to Tolkien 's 1937 children 's काल्पनिक अनोखा The होब्बिट, लकिन eventually विकसित into a much larger कार्य.
It was लिखा in चरण between 1937 and 1949, much of it during संसार War ii.
It is the दूसरी best-selling novel ever written, साथ over 150 million नक़ल sold.
the title of the novel refers to the स्टोरी 's प्रमुख antagonist, the अंधेरा Lord sauron, जो had in an पहले age निर्मित the One Ring to नियम the other बजती of शक्ति as the परम weapon in his campaign to जीतें and नियम सब of middle-earth.
From quiet beginnings in the Shire, a Hobbit land नहीं unlike the English countryside, the स्टोरी ranges across north-west middle-earth, following the course of the युद्ध of the Ring through the आँखें of its वर्ण, notably the hobbits Frodo baggins, samwise `` Sam '' gamgee, meriadoc `` मैरी '' Brandybuck and peregrin `` Pippin '' Took, but भी the hobbits ' chief allies and यात्राएं companions : aragorn, a Human Ranger ; boromir, a man इससे gondor ; gimli, a Dwarf योद्धा ; legolas, an Elven प्रिंस ; and gandalf, a जादूगर.
the work थी initially intended by tolkien to be one आवाज़ of a two-volume set, with the other being the Silmarillion, लकिन this विचार थी बर्खास्त by his publisher.
it was decided लिये आर्थिक reasons to प्रकाशित The रब of the बजती as three आयतन over the कोर्स of a year इससे 29 जुलाई 1954 to 20 अक्तूबर 1955, thus creating the now परिचित Lord of the बजती त्रयी.
the three आयतन were entitled The Fellowship of the रिंग, the Two Towers, and the वापसी of the King.
structurally, the अनोखा is विभाजित internally into छह books, दो प्रति volume, with several appendices of पृष्ठभूमि material included at the समाप्त of the तीसरा आवाज़.
The Lord of the बजती रै चूंकि been reprinted numerous टाइम्स and अनूदित into अनेक languages.
tolkien 's work रै महरूम the subject of extensive analysis of its themes और origins.
Although a प्रमुख work in itself, the स्टोरी थी only the पिछला गति of a larger epic tolkien had worked on since 1917, in a process he described as mythopoeia.
प्रभाव on इस earlier कार्य, और on the story of the रब of the बजती, शामिल philology, mythology, धर्म और the author 's distaste लिये the प्रभाव of industrialization, as खूब as earlier fantasy works और Tolkien 's अनुभवों in World युद्ध i.
The रब of the बजती in इसके फेरे is माना to have था a great प्रभाव on modern काल्पनिक ; the impact of Tolkien 's works is ऐसे that the उपयोग of the words `` tolkienian '' और `` tolkienesque '' have been recorded in the Oxford English शब्दकोष.
The enduring popularity of The रब of the Rings has led to numerous सन्दर्भ in लोकप्रिय culture, the founding of many societies by प्रशंसक of tolkien 's works, और the publication of अनेक किताबे परिचय tolkien and his works.
The Lord of the Rings has प्रेरित, and continues to inspire, कलाकृति, म्यूज़िक, films और television, video games, and subsequent साहित्य.
Award-winning adaptations of the Lord of the बजती have महरूम made लिये radio, theatre, और फिल्मी.

the series debuted on जनवरी 11, 2004.
A TV फिल्मी मैरी Christmas, Drake & जोश was made अलावा from the नियमित series on दिसम्बर 5, 2008.
There are a total of 60 episodes यहूद produced spanning four seasons.
Drake घंटी, Josh पेक, and मिरांडा Cosgrove were the तभी actors to appear in all 60 episodes.
The सैन फ्रांसिस्को 49ers conduct प्रशिक्षण camp at the team 's headquarters and अभ्यास सुविधा in Santa क्लारा, कैलिफ़ोर्निया in अगस्त 2010.
The ठोकर is wearing red jerseys साथ the एक्सेप्शन of क्वार्टरबैक Alex Smith, जो is in a ब्लैक jersey ; the defense in श्वेत.
In the National फ़ुटबॉल लीग, training शिविर refers to the समय before the season commences.
दौरान this time, teams will sometimes congregate at an बाहर location, usually a विश्वविद्यालयों, to conduct प्रशिक्षण शिविर for at least the first few weeks.
इस is समान to baseball 's वसन्त प्रशिक्षण.
Training शिविर is प्रयुक्त in several different तरीके.
New players and coaches उपयोग it to acclimate themselves to नई teammates and systems.
लिये younger खिलाड़ी, it serves as a काल of मूल्यांकन ; for दिग्गजों, it is time to round वापस into form.
प्रशिक्षण शिविर is divided into अनेक different components.
the पहला is scrimmages.
ये are pseudo-games जहाँ टीमों चलाएं nearly पूरा खेल ' लायक of plays.
sometimes, दो अभ्यास सत्र are held on the same दिन.
इस अवधारणा is referred to as two-a-days.
Other parts of training शिविर शामिल drills, meetings साथ coaches and other players at एक 's position, weight प्रशिक्षण, और pre-season games.
The latter half of training शिविर leads सीधे into the exhibition season.
साथ NFL प्रशिक्षण शिविरों starting in late-july, the biggest चिंता has महरूम निर्जलीकरण.
in 2001, मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स खिलाड़ी Korey Stringer died of a चिकित्सा condition based इससे निर्जलीकरण and heatstroke.
The death of stringer prompted the एनएफएल to change उनके प्रशिक्षण नीतियों.
at each practice, every team must have the टोली doctor and प्रशिक्षकों on the field ; additionally, an एम्बुलेंस must be उपस्थित दौरान practices.
साथ एनएफएल प्रशिक्षण camps beginning in late July, कठोर मौसम can affect अभ्यास और प्रदर्शनी खेल.
in 2002, a Cleveland भूरा प्रदर्शनी खेल ended due to lightning near क्लीवलैंड भूरा Stadium, और कठोर storms have been ज्ञात to disrupt training शिविरों.
Fans हैं often able to विज़िट their पसंदीदा team 's प्रशिक्षण camp to catch an early dekh at the players ; admission to practices is प्रायः फ़्री or substantially less expensive than a game टिकट, making प्रशिक्षण camp यात्राएँ a popular विकल्प for fans who can नहीं attend many खेल due to financial or अन्य कारण.
एनएफएल टीमों often बेचें souvenirs और concessions at camp साइट along with offering activities and कार्यक्रम to मेक प्रशिक्षण शिविर a अधिक fan-friendly अनुभव.
In computing, a file प्रणाली ( or filesystem ) is a प्रकार of data स्टोर जिससे can be used to स्टोर, retrieve और update a नियत of files.
The पद could refer to the अमूर्त data structures used to define files, or to the actual software or फर्मवेयर components that implement the अमूर्त विचार.
कुछ संचिका प्रणालियों हैं used on local data storage डिवाइस ; others provide file access via a संजाल protocol ( e.g. NFS, smb, or 9p क्लाइंट ).
Some file प्रणालियों हैं `` आभासी '', in that the `` फाइलें '' supplied are computed on request ( e.g. procfs ) or हैं merely a मानचित्रण into a अलग file system used as a बैकिंग स्टोर.
the file system manages access to both the सामग्री of फाइलें and the मेटाडेटा about those फाइलें.
It is जिम्मेदार लिये arranging storage स्पेस ; reliability, दक्षता, and tuning साथ regard to the physical भंडार मीडियम are महत्वपूर्ण डिज़ाइन considerations.
William हावर्ड Taft ( September 15, 1857 – कूच 8, 1930 ) थी the 27th अध्यक्ष of the United States ( 1909–1913 ) and later the tenth मुख्य इंसाफ of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1921–1930 ).
he is the only व्यक्ति to have served in both of these कार्यालयों.
पहले बनने President, Taft, a रिपब्लिकन, थी चयनित to serve on the श्रेष्ठ Court of Cincinnati in 1887.
In 1890, Taft थी नियुक्त solicitor सामान्य of the United राज्य और in 1891 a न्यायधीश on the United States Court of appeals for the Sixth Circuit.
In 1900, अध्यक्ष William McKinley नियुक्त taft Governor-General of the फिलीपीन.
In 1904, President Theodore रूज़वेल्ट appointed Taft Secretary of War in an प्रयत्न to groom Taft, then उसके close political ally, into उसके handpicked presidential successor.
Taft assumed a prominent भूमिका in प्रॉब्लम solving, assuming on कुछ occasions the role of एक्टिंग Secretary of राज्य, जबकि घटती दोहराया offers इससे रूज़वेल्ट to serve on the Supreme Court.
Riding a wave of popular support लिये fellow Republican Roosevelt, taft जीती an आसान विजय in उसके 1908 बोली for the presidency.
in उसके तभी term, Taft 's domestic agenda emphasized trust-busting, civil सेवा reform, strengthening the Interstate Commerce Commission, improving the performance of the डाक service, and passage of the Sixteenth Amendment.
Abroad, Taft sought to further the आर्थिक development of nations in लैटिन अमेरिका and Asia through `` डालर Diplomacy ``, और showed decisiveness और restraint in जवाब to revolution in Mexico.
the task-oriented Taft was oblivious to the political ramifications of his निर्णय, often alienated his own कुंजी constituencies, and was overwhelmingly defeated in उसके बोली for a second पद in the presidential चुनाव of 1912.
In surveys of presidential scholars, taft is प्रायः क्रमित निकट the मध्य of सूचियाँ of सब अमरीकी Presidents.
बाद leaving office, taft spent उसके time in academia, मध्यस्थता, and the search for संसार सलाम through his self-founded League to Enforce सलाम.
in 1921, after the पहला संसार War, President वारेन G. Harding appointed Taft मुख्य Justice of the संयुक्त राज्य.
Taft served in this capacity until shortly पहले his मौत in 1930.
The टेन Commandments is a 1956 एपिक film produced and निर्देशित by सेसिल B. DeMille that dramatized the biblical story of the Exodus, in जिससे the Hebrew-born Moses, an adopted Egyptian प्रिंस, becomes the deliverer of the यहूदी slaves.
it स्ट्रक्चर चार्ल्टन Heston in the lead role, Yul Brynner as उसके adoptive brother, pharaoh rameses ii, Anne Baxter as nefretiri, एडवर्ड G. रॉबिन्सन as dathan, yvonne de कार्लो as sephora, Debra पेजेट as Lilia, and John Derek as जोशुआ.
the supporting cast includes Sir सेड्रिक hardwicke as pharaoh सेती I, Nina Foch as Bithiah, मार्था स्कॉट as yoshebel, Judith Anderson as Memnet, Vincent Price as baka, और जॉन carradine as आरोन.
The film थी released by सर्वोपरि तस्वीरें in VistaVision on अक्तूबर 5, 1956.
the टेन Commandments, which demille narrated, was the last फिल्मी कि he directed.
he was set to सीधा the 1958 remake of उसके 1938 फिल्मी the Buccaneer, but his फाइनल बीमारी मजबूर उसे to relinquish the directing chores to his son-in-law, actor Anthony Quinn.
demille had also planned to film the जीवन of Lord baden Powell, the founder of the स्काउट movement, with David niven ; this project was never realized.
the Ten Commandments is a partial remake of demille 's 1923 मूक फिल्मी.
Some of the डाल और crew of the 1956 संस्करण worked on the असली.
It has since महरूम remade as a television miniseries ब्रॉडकास्ट in अप्रैल 2006.
The Ten Commandments is one of the most financially successful films कभी बना, grossing over $ 65 लाख at the U.S. बक्सा दफ्तर.
adjusting for inflation, this makes it the छठे highest-grossing फिल्मी domestically, with an समायोजित total of $ 1,025,730,000 in 2012.
the बक्सा office website `` the Numbers '' सूचियाँ the घरेलू सकल at $ 80 लाख.
in 1999, the Ten Commandments was चयनित लिये preservation in the United राज्य नेशनल फिल्मी रजिस्ट्री by the पुस्तकालयों of Congress as being `` culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant ''.
in June 2008, the अमरीकी Film संस्थान नाज़िल its `` Ten Top टेन `` —the बेहतरीन टेन films in टेन American फिल्मी genres—after polling over 1,500 people from the creative community.
the टेन आयतें थी listed as the tenth बेहतरीन film in the एपिक genre.

Louisville (, or ) is a major नगर and the largest नगर in the U.S. राज्य of Kentucky और the काउंटी seat of Jefferson County.
चूंकि 2003, the city 's borders have महरूम साथ those of the काउंटी क्युकी of a city-county विलय.
The नगर 's total संचित population at the 2010 census थी 741,096 ( Louisville 's balance कुल, 602,011, excludes semi-autonomous कस्बों and is the population सूचीबद्ध in सबसे sources और national rankings ).
As of 2010, the louisville महानगर क्षेत्रफल ( MSA ) था a population of 1,307,647 ranking 42nd nationally.
the metro area includes Louisville-Jefferson County और 12 surrounding काउंटी, eight in केंटकी और four in दक्षिणी इंडियाना ( देखिए Geography नीचे ).
The louisville संयुक्त Statistical Area, having a population of 1,451,564, शामिल the MSA, Hardin काउंटी and larue काउंटी in केंटकी, और स्कॉट County, इंडियाना.
an important internal shipping port in the 19th century, Louisville आज is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the स्थान of the Kentucky डर्बी, the first of तीन annual thoroughbred घोड़ा races बनाना up the ट्रिपल क्राउन.
a ठेठ experimental setup लिये an aldol reaction.
Both flasks हैं submerged in a शुष्क ice/acetone कूलिंग bath ( −78 °C ) the temperature of which is being monitored by a thermocouple ( the wire on the बाएँ ).
a cooling bath, in प्रयोगशाला chemistry ( प्रायः लकिन not always organic रसायन ) practice, is a liquid मिश्रण जिससे is used to maintain कम temperatures, typically between 13 °C and −196 °C.
These low temperatures are प्रयुक्त to collect liquids बाद distillation, to हटाएँ solvents using a रोटरी evaporator, or to perform a chemical reaction below रूम temperature ( see : kinetic control ).
Cooling baths हैं generally एक of दो types : ( a ) a cold fluid ( विशेषकर liquid nitrogen, जल, or even एयर ) — but सबसे commonly the term refers to ( b ) a मिश्रण of 3 components : ( 1 ) a cooling एजेंट ( such as dry बर्फ or water बर्फ ) ; ( b ) a द्रव 'कैरीr ' ( ऐसे as liquid जल, ethylene ग्लाइकोल, acetone, इत्यादि. ), जिससे transfers ऊष्मा between the bath and the पोत ; ; और ( c ) an additive to गुमसुम the melting-point of the solid/liquid system.
( A परिचित उदाहरण of इस is the उपयोग of an ice/rock-salt मिश्रण to फ्रीज बर्फ cream.
the phase-change of ice into द्रव water requires energy, 'pulling ' ऊष्मा from the प्रणाली.
adding नमक lowers the temp at which इस happens, अर्थ अधिक energy has to be अवशोषित from the environment in order to melt the ice.
This effectively makes the बर्फ 'colder ' — it जरूर 'pull ' more ऊष्मा from इसके पर्यावरण to become द्रव. )
खाने विकार are conditions defined by abnormal eating habits कि may involve either insufficient or excessive खाना intake to the detriment of an individual 's physical और mental स्वास्थ्य.
bulimia नर्वोज़ा और anorexia नर्वोज़ा are the most common विशिष्ट फ़ॉर्म in the United किंगडम.
अन्य प्रकार of खाने विकार include binge खाने विकार and खाने विकार नहीं वरना निर्दिष्ट.
bulimia nervosa is a विकार characterized by binge eating and purging.
purging can शामिल self-induce उल्टी, over-exercising, and the उपयोग of diuretics, enemas, and laxatives.
Anorexia nervosa is characterized by extreme खाना restriction to the point of self-starvation और excessive weight loss.
हालांकि primarily thought of as affecting महिलाओं ( an estimated 5–10 लाख being affected in the u.K. ), eating disorders affect males as खूब.
An अनुमानित 10 – 15 % of people साथ eating disorders हैं males ( Gorgan, 1999 ).
( an अनुमानित 1 लाख U.K. males being affected ).
Although eating विकार are increasing all over the world among दोनो मेन and महिलाओं, there is evidence to suggest कि it is महिलाओं in the Western world who हैं at the उच्चतम risk of developing उन्हें और the उपाधि of westernization increases the risk.
Nearly half of सब अमेरिकी personally know someone with an eating विकार.
the कौशल to comprehend the central प्रक्रियाओं of appetite has increased tremendously चूंकि leptin थी discovered, और the कौशल to observe the कृत्यों of the brain as well.
interactions between motivational, homeostatic and self-regulatory control प्रक्रियाओं हैं शामिल in eating behaviour, जिससे is a कुंजी घटक in खाने विकार.
The precise कारण of eating disorders is नहीं entirely समझा, but there is प्रमाण that it may be linked to अन्य medical conditions और situations.
Cultural idealization of thinness और youthfulness have contributed to eating disorders affecting विविध populations.
एक study दिखाया कि लड़कियों साथ ADHD have a वृहद मौका of getting an eating disorder than those नहीं प्रभावित by ADHD.
Another पढ़ाई suggested that women with ptsd, especially due to sexually related trauma, हैं more likely to develop एनोरेक्सिया नर्वोज़ा.
One पढ़ाई showed that फोस्टर लड़कियों हैं more संभावित to develop bulimia नर्वोज़ा.
कुछ सोचो कि peer दबाव और idealized body-types देखी in the media are भी a significant factor.
Some research show that लिये certain लोगों वहीँ are genetic reasons why वे may be prone to developing an खाने disorder.
Recent अध्ययन have found प्रमाण a सहसंबंध between patients with bulimia nervosa और substance use विकार.
In addition, anxiety disorders and व्यक्तित्व disorders हैं common आवृत्ति साथ clients of eating disorders.
While उचित treatment can be highly effective for many suffering from specific types of खाने disorders, the consequences of खाने विकार can be कठोर, including मौत ( whether from सीधा medical effects of disturbed खाने आदतें or इससे comorbid conditions ऐसे as suicidal thinking ).
Slavery in the संयुक्त राज्य existed इससे the early years of the colonial काल ; it थी firmly established by the समय the United States sought independence इससे ग्रेट Britain in 1776.
however, by 1804, all राज्य north of the Mason and डिक्सन Line था either abolished गुलामी outright or passed laws for the gradual abolition of गुलामी.
In 1787 Congress निषिद्ध गुलामी in the उत्तरपश्चिम Territory.
लकिन गुलामी gained new life in the South with the cotton उद्योग बाद 1800, और expanded into the Southwest.
The nation was polarized into slave और free राज्य along the mason-dixon लकीर, जिससे अलग पेन्सिलवेनिया and Maryland.
the United States और Great Britain दोनो निषिद्ध the अंतरराष्ट्रीय slave trade in 1808, लकिन the domestic व्यापार, साथ sales to the गहन दक्षिण, विस्तारित dramatically, और अनेक captives were shipped by the coastwise स्लेव trade.
Before the 1840s, the South was vigorously defending slavery और इसके expansion into the territories.
in the उत्तर कुछ abolitionists denounced it as गुनाहगार, और numerous anti-slavery forces rejected it as detrimental to the rights of free मेन.
After विफल compromises and अब्राहम Lincoln 's election, in 1861 ग्यारह स्लेव states broke दूर to form the Confederate States of अमेरिका, अग्रणी to the American सिविल युद्ध.
The federal सरकारी in 1862 बना abolition of गुलामी a war लक्ष्य.
in January 1863 President Lincoln freed स्लेव in the confederacy through the emancipation उदघोषणा.
After the युद्ध, the Thirteenth Amendment, effective December 1865, abolished गुलामी throughout the संपूर्ण United राज्य, including the किनारा राज्य और the Indian territories.
इससे the 16th to the 19th सदियां, an estimated 12 million africans यहूद shipped as स्लेव to the americas.
See Slavery in the americas.
The ग्रेट majority went to the sugar बागानों of the वेस्ट Indies or ब्राज़ील, जहाँ मृत्यु थी ऊँची.
परिचय 645,000 यहूद brought to what is अभी the United राज्य.
By the 1860 United राज्य Census, the slave जनसांख्यिकी in the अमरीकी South था grown to चार लाख.
Of all 1,515,605 families in the 15 स्लेव states, nearly 400,000 आयोजित slaves ( roughly एक in चार ), amounting to 8 % of all American परिवारों.
जबकि कुछ स्लेव worked as house बन्दों और शहरी artisans, the great majority worked on बागानों or large farms, cultivating lucrative नकदी फसलों, such as rice, तम्बाकू, sugar and, after 1800, chiefly cotton.
by 1860 सबसे स्लेव were आयोजित in the Deep South, where वे served in work-gangs ; two-thirds worked in कपास.
In छोटी operations, they worked with their स्वामी.
In large बागानों वे were directed by white paid overseers.
अंतर्गत the system कि became chattel गुलामी ( स्वामित्व of a human being, और of his/her descendants ), a racial element थी fundamental : स्लेव were blacks of अफ़्रीकी descent and स्वामित्व, लगभग universally, by whites of European descent.
In the 17th century, Virginia, followed by other southern colonies, enacted law that children of स्लेव mothers यहूद born into गुलामी.
स्लेव could लाभ freedom only by कार्यशील दूर ( जिससे was difficult and illegal to do ), or by manumission by owners, जिससे थी regulated by states, और became increasingly मुश्किल or निषिद्ध.
In the earliest era of chattel गुलामी, the colonies भी organized work by a system of bonded मजदूर ज्ञात as indentured servitude.
इस typically lasted for अनेक सालो for दोनो poor Europeans और africans alike, to pay बंद the लागत of हस्तांतरण to the colonies.
वे contracted for such इंतजाम क्युकी of poor economies in their घर countries.
between 1680 और 1700, as कम europeans migrated to the colonies, planters began to आयात अधिक africans as slaves.
recognizing the महत्व of slavery, the हाउस of burgesses in वर्जिनिया enacted a new slave code in 1705 ; it संयुक्त a किस्में of विधान और added नई provisions enforcing white supremacy in the विधि.
Schematic cross section of part of पत्ता, xylem shown as रेड circles at figure 8.
जाइलम is one of the two प्रकार of transport tissue in vascular पौधे ( phloem is the other ).
the word जाइलम is derived from the Greek शब्द ξύλον ( xylon ), meaning `` लकडी '' ; the best-known xylem tissue is लकडी, हालांकि it is found throughout the संयंत्र.
इसके basic function is to हस्तांतरण जल, but it also transports कुछ nutrients through the संयंत्र.
This clock प्रतिनिधित्व shows कुछ of the major इकाई of geological समय and definitive कार्यक्रम of Earth history.
the Hadean इओन represents the समय पहले fossil record of जीवन on Earth ; इसके upper boundary is now regarded as 4.0 ga ( billion years ago ).
Other subdivisions प्रतिबिंबित the evolution of जीवन ; the archean and Proterozoic are दोनो eons, the Palaeozoic, mesozoic और cenozoic are eras of the phanerozoic eon.
The two लाख year Quaternary काल, the time of recognizable humans, is too छोटी to be visible at इस scale.
the भूगर्भिक time scale is a प्रणाली of chronological मापन that relates stratigraphy to time, और is used by geologists, paleontologists, and other earth वैज्ञानिकों to describe the समय and relationships between कार्यक्रम that have occurred throughout Earth 's history.
the तालिका of भूगर्भिक time spans presented यहाँ agrees with the dates and नामकरण set forth by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Commission on स्तरिकी standard color कोड of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Commission on स्तरिकी.
प्रमाण from radiometric dating indicates that the धरती is about 4.54 अरब सालो बूढ़ा.
The geology or deep समय of धरती 's पास्ट रै been organized into विभिन्न इकाई according to events which took प्लेस in प्रत्येक period.
अलग spans of time on the gts हैं प्रायः सीमांकित by परिवर्तन in the संयोजन of strata जिससे correspond to उन्हें, indicating प्रमुख geological or paleontological कार्यक्रम, ऐसे as द्रव्यमान extinctions.
लिये उदाहरण, the boundary between the cretaceous काल and the Paleogene काल is defined by the cretaceous–paleogene extinction event, जिससे चिह्नित the निधन of the dinosaurs और अनेक अन्य समूह of life.
Older time spans which predate the विश्वसनीय fossil रिकार्ड ( before the Proterozoic इओन ) हैं defined by absolute आयु.
the TI-82 is a graphing परिपथ made by Texas यंत्र.
The TI-82 was designed in 1993 as a stripped down, अधिक उपयोक्ता friendly संस्करण of the TI-85, and as a बदलना लिये the TI-81.
It was the सीधा predecessor of the TI-83.
it shares साथ the TI-85 a 6 mhz Zilog z80 microprocessor.
जैसे the TI-81, the TI-82 सुविधाएँ a 96x64 pixel display, और the core विशेषता नियत of the ti-81 with अनेक new features.
The डाल of वर्ण of The किंग of Fighters xi.
the King of सेनानी fighting game श्रेणी, produced by snk playmore, includes a wide cast of वर्ण, कुछ of which are taken from अन्य snk games.
the story takes प्लेस in a fictional ब्रह्मांड in जिससे an सालाना series of 3-on-3 or 4-on-4 लड़ tournaments are held.
the first game in the series introduces the initial प्रमुख अक्षर of the श्रेणी, Kyo Kusanagi, a यंग जापानी सेनानी who is the वारिस to a शक्तिशाली group of martial artists having pyrokinetic abilities.
kyo fights विरूद्ध the kusanagi clan 's enemies, उसके प्रतिद्वंद्वी Iori yagami, और the परमेश्वर orochi and its human अनुसरणकर्ता, among अन्य.
The पहला four games in the series revolve परिचय these fights, while The King of सेनानी '99 introduces a new story चाप, revolving around K ', a यंग man जो seeks to destroy the रहस्यमय NESTS organization because वे kidnapped him at an जल्दी आयु and stripped उसे of उसके past memories, so that they could force him to be a सेनानी अंतर्गत उनके कंट्रोल.
in the किंग of सेनानी 2003, a new character named Ash Crimson enters the टूर्नामेंट, to steal the शक्तियां of the clans जो sealed the Orochi in the पास्ट लिये an unknown कारण.
A नई समूह of antagonists, known as those From the पास्ट, भी appears in the श्रेणी ; they want to obtain orochi 's शक्ति for the purpose of giving it to उनके अनजान निपुण.
The plot और the वर्ण came from the Yamata no orochi legend.
वहीँ are also अनेक characters in the games कि are parodies or homages to several लोकप्रिय anime, manga, और films.
merchandise आधारित on the characters has also महरूम released, सहित कार्रवाई आंकड़े और keychains.
The वर्ण have garnered praise इससे several video game publications for the quality of उनके डिजाइन और movesets.
टिप्पणी focused on the lack of improvements in some of the वर्ण, but added कि the roster is greatly diverse.
Whale युद्धों is a weekly American documentary-style reality television series that premiered on नवम्बर 7, 2008 on the एनिमल Planet केबल channel.
the कार्यक्रम follows पॉल Watson, संस्थापक of the समुद्र Shepherd Conservation Society, as he और the क्रू aboard उनके various vessels harass Japanese whalers बंद the coast of अंटार्कटिक.
On January 5, 2013, Animal Planet नवीनीकृत the series for a छठे season.
The harpy त्रिभुज ( Harpia harpyja ) is a neotropical प्रजाति of eagle.
It is sometimes known as the American harpy Eagle to distinguish it इससे the पापुआई Eagle which is sometimes known as the नई गिनी Harpy त्रिभुज or Papuan Harpy त्रिभुज.
it is the largest and most शक्तिशाली रैप्टर found in the americas, और among the largest extant प्रजाति of ईगल्स in the world.
it प्रायः inhabits तीव्र lowland rainforests in the upper ( emergent ) canopy परत.
Destruction of इसके natural habitat has seen it vanish from many parts of its पूर्व दायरा, and it is nearly extirpated in सेंट्रल America.
biological वर्गीकरण, or वैज्ञानिक वर्गीकरण in जीवविज्ञान, is a method of scientific taxonomy प्रयुक्त to group और categorize organisms into समूह such as genus or species.
ये समूह are ज्ञात as taxa ( singular : टैक्सोन ).
आधुनिक biological classification रै इसके रूट in the कार्य of Carolus Linnaeus, who grouped प्रजाति according to shared शारीरिक characteristics.
ये groupings have since महरूम revised to improve consistency with the Darwinian principle of common descent.
With the introduction of the cladistic विधि in the late 20th सदी, phylogenetic taxonomy in जिससे जीवों are grouped आधारित purely on inferred evolutionary relatedness, ignoring morphological समानता, रै become common in कुछ क्षेत्रों of biology.
Molecular phylogenetics, which uses DNA sequences as data, has भी चलित अनेक recent revisions और is likely to continue doing so.
Biological classification belongs to the science of biological systematics.
Lennon 's हस्ताक्षर
John Winston Ono लेनन, ( born John विंस्टन लेनन ; 9 October 1940 – 8 December 1980 ) was an English musician, singer and songwriter जो rose to worldwide कीर्ति as a संस्थापक सदस्य of the बीटल्स, एक of the सबसे commercially successful and critically acclaimed अधिनियमों in the history of popular म्यूज़िक.
साथ Paul McCartney, he formed एक of the most celebrated songwriting partnerships of the 20th सदी.
Born and उठाया in लिवरपूल, as a teenager लेनन became शामिल in the skiffle craze ; उसके पहला band, the Quarrymen, evolved into the Beatles in 1960.
as the समूह disintegrated towards the end of the decade, Lennon embarked on a सोलो करियर that produced the critically acclaimed एल्बम जॉन lennon/plastic ओनो बैंड और imagine, and iconic songs ऐसे as `` दे सलाम a Chance `` और `` imagine ``.
After उसके विवाह to Yoko Ono in 1969, he changed his नाम to जॉन ओनो लेनन.
Lennon disengaged himself इससे the म्यूज़िक business in 1975 to devote समय to raising उसके infant son Sean, but re-emerged with Ono in 1980 साथ the नई album दोगुना काल्पनिक.
He थी murdered three weeks बाद इसके रिलीज.
लेनन revealed a rebellious nature and acerbic wit in उसके music, लिखने, drawings, on फिल्मी और in interviews.
Controversial through उसके political and सलाम सक्रियता, he स्थानांतरित to New यॉर्क नगर in 1971, where his आलोचना of the Vietnam War resulted in a lengthy attempt by Richard Nixon 's प्रशासन to निर्वासन उसे, जबकि कुछ of उसके songs यहूद अपनाया as anthems by the anti-war movement.
as of 2012, Lennon 's सोलो album बिक्री in the United States exceed 14 लाख units, and as लेखक, co-writer or performer, he is जिम्मेदार लिये 25 number-one singles on the US hot 100 chart.
In 2002, a BBC poll on the 100 Greatest Britons voted उसे eighth, and in 2008, Rolling Stone क्रमित उसे the fifth-greatest सिंगर of all time.

`` rip Van Winkle '' is a short स्टोरी by American author Washington Irving published in 1819, as खूब as the name of the story 's fictional protagonist.
लिखा जबकि इरविंग थी living in Birmingham, England, it was part of a collection entitled the स्केच किताब of geoffrey Crayon.
Although the स्टोरी is set in नई York 's catskill kyu, Irving बाद admitted, `` जब I लिखा the story, I था never महरूम on the Catskills. ''
throughout the fifty-five साल इतिहास of the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, many significant रिकॉर्ड have महरूम नियत.
इस पेज only includes the प्रतिस्पर्धी awards won by विभिन्न कलाकारों.
This does not include the various special awards कि are presented by the नेशनल Academy of रिकॉर्डिंग कला और Sciences such as Lifetime Achievement पुरस्कार, trustees पुरस्कार, तकनीकी पुरस्कार or लेजेंड Awards.
the पेज however does शामिल other non-performance सम्बन्धित Grammys ( ज्ञात as the Craft & उत्पादन फ़ील्ड ) कि may have महरूम प्रस्तुत to the कलाकार ( s ).
pee-wee herman is a कॉमिक fictional अक्षर निर्मित and portrayed by अमरीकी हास्य पॉल Reubens.
He is best known for उसके दो टेलीविज़न series and फिल्मी श्रेणी दौरान the 1980s.
the childlike Pee-wee Herman character developed as a stage अधिनियम कि quickly led to an HBO खास in 1981.
As the स्टेज प्रदर्शन gained further popularity, reubens took the character to motion picture साथ Pee-wee 's Big Adventure in 1985, toning bas the वयस्क innuendo for the अपील of children.
इस paved the रास्ता for Pee-wee 's Playhouse, an Emmy Award winning children 's श्रेणी कि भागा on सीबीएस इससे 1986-1991.
Another film, Big Top Pee-wee, was released in 1988.
due to negative मीडिया attention following a कांड in 1991, reubens decided to shelve his alter ego during the 1990s, और तब gradually resurrected it during the following decade.
It was at कि समय कि Reubens addressed योजनाएँ to write a नई Pee-wee film, pee-wee 's Playhouse : the फिल्म.
In June 2007, reubens appeared as Pee-wee herman लिये the first time since 1991 at Spike TV 's Guys ' चुनाव Awards.
कि '70s दिखाएँ is an American टेलीविज़न काल sitcom कि centers on the जीवनदान of a समूह of teenage friends living in the fictional suburban कस्बा of Point Place, Wisconsin, इससे May 17, 1976, to December 31, 1979.

कान्सास ( ) is a U.S. state located in the midwestern संयुक्त राज्य.
It is नामित after the कान्सास नदी जिससे बहती through it, जिससे in फेरे was named after the कंस Native American tribe, जिससे inhabited the क्षेत्रफल.
The जनजाति 's name ( natively kką : ze ) is often said to औसत `` people of the हवा '' or `` people of the south wind, '' हालांकि इस was संभवतः नहीं the term 's original meaning.
Residents of Kansas are called `` kansans. ''
लिये thousands of years कया is अभी कान्सास was घर to numerous और diverse Native American जनजातियों.
Tribes in the Eastern भाग of the state generally lived in villages साथ the river घाटियों.
जनजातियों in the Western part of the राज्य यहूद सेमi- nomadic and hunted large herds of बाइसन.
कान्सास थी first settled by European Americans in the 1830s, but the pace of उपनिवेश accelerated in the 1850s, in the midst of political wars over the गुलामी issue.
When officially opened to उपनिवेश by the u.S. सरकारी in 1854, abolitionist free-staters from नई England and pro-slavery settlers from neighboring Missouri rushed to the territory to determine if Kansas होता become a फ़्री state or a स्लेव राज्य.
Thus, the area थी a hotbed of हिंसा and अराजकता in its early days as these forces collided, and थी known as Bleeding कान्सास.
the abolitionists आखिरकार prevailed और on जनवरी 29, 1861, Kansas डाला the Union as a फ़्री राज्य.
After the सिविल War, the population of Kansas grew rapidly, जब लहरें of immigrants turned the प्रेयरी into farmland.
आज, Kansas is एक of the सबसे उत्पादक agricultural states, producing high yields of wheat, ज्वार और sunflowers.
Kansas is the 15th most extensive and the 33rd most populous of the 50 संयुक्त राज्य.
मनोविज्ञान is an अकादमिक और applied अनुशासन that involves the वैज्ञानिक पढ़ाई of mental functions and behaviors.
Psychology रै the immediate goal of समझना individuals और समूह by both establishing general सिद्धान्त और researching विशिष्ट मामले, and by अनेक accounts it ultimately aims to benefit समाज.
In this फ़ील्ड, a professional or शोधकर्ता is called a मनोवैज्ञानिक और can be classified as a सोशल, behavioral, or संज्ञानात्मक scientist.
Psychologists attempt to understand the role of दिमागी functions in व्यक्तिगत और social behavior, जबकि also exploring the physiological और neurobiological प्रक्रियाओं that underlie निश्चित cognitive functions और व्यवहार.
Psychologists explore अवधारणाओं ऐसे as perception, संज्ञान, ध्यान, जज्बात, phenomenology, motivation, brain functioning, व्यक्तित्व, बर्ताव, और interpersonal relationships.
psychologists of विविध stripes also consider the unconscious दिमाग.
psychologists employ अनुभवजन्य विधि to infer causal और correlational relationships between psychosocial परिवर्तनीय.
In addition, or in opposition, to employing अनुभवजन्य and deductive methods, some—especially clinical and counseling psychologists—at टाइम्स rely upon सांकेतिक निर्वचन और अन्य आगमनात्मक techniques.
Psychology रै महरूम described as a `` hub science '', साथ मनोवैज्ञानिक findings linking to शोध and perspectives इससे the social sciences, प्राकृतिक sciences, medicine, और the humanities, such as दर्शनशास्त्र.
जबकि मनोवैज्ञानिक knowledge is often लागू to the मूल्यांकन and उपचार of दिमागी health समस्याएं, it is भी directed towards understanding और solving समस्याएं in अनेक अलग spheres of इंसान activity.
The majority of psychologists are involved in some दयालु of therapeutic भूमिका, practicing in clinical, counseling, or स्कूल जमावट.
अनेक do वैज्ञानिक research on a wide range of topics related to mental प्रक्रियाओं और behavior, और typically कार्य in university psychology departments or teach in अन्य अकादमिक settings ( e.g., medical स्कूलों, अस्पताल ).
Some हैं employed in औद्योगिक and organizational settings, or in अन्य क्षेत्रों ऐसे as human development and वृद्धावस्था, खेल, health, और the मीडिया, as well as in forensic छानबीन और other aspects of law.
थामस Jefferson ( अप्रैल 13, 1743 ( अप्रैल 2, 1743 o.S. ) – जुलाई 4, 1826 ) थी an American founding पिता, the principal author of the घोषणा of Independence ( 1776 ) and the तीसरा President of the United राज्य ( 1801–1809 ).
At the beginning of the अमरीकी क्रान्ति, he परोसा in the Continental Congress, representing वर्जिनिया और तब परोसा as a wartime Governor of Virginia ( 1779–1781 ).
Just बाद the युद्ध ended, from mid-1784 जेफरसन परोसा as a राजनयिक, stationed in पेरिस.
In may 1785, he became the United States Minister to फ़्रांस.
Jefferson was the first संयुक्त राज्य Secretary of State ( 1790–1793 ) सेवारत अंतर्गत अध्यक्ष George Washington.
With उसके close friend जेम्स मैडिसन he organized the democratic-republican Party, and subsequently resigned from Washington 's कैबिनेट.
निर्वाचित Vice अध्यक्ष in 1796, when he came in दूसरी to जॉन एडम्स of the federalists, जेफरसन opposed एडम्स and साथ मैडिसन secretly wrote the केंटकी और Virginia Resolutions, जिससे attempted to nullify the Alien और Sedition अधिनियमों.
निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष in कया जेफरसन called the क्रान्ति of 1800, he oversaw the purchase of the vast Louisiana territory from फ़्रांस ( 1803 ), और भेजा the लुईस and क्लार्क Expedition ( 1804–1806 ) to explore the नई वेस्ट.
His दूसरी पद was beset साथ troubles at घर, such as the विफल देशद्रोह trial of his पूर्व Vice President आरोन Burr.
With escalating trouble with Britain जो थी challenging अमरीकी neutrality और threatening shipping at समुद्र, he आजमाया economic warfare साथ his embargo laws which only damaged American trade.
In 1803, अध्यक्ष Jefferson initiated a प्रक्रम of Indian tribal हटाना और relocation to the Louisiana territory वेस्ट of the Mississippi नदी, in order to open lands for eventual अमरीकी settlers.
a नेता in the Enlightenment, Jefferson थी a polymath जो spoke पाँच languages fluently और was deeply interested in science, आविष्कार, architecture, religion और philosophy, interests कि led him to the founding of the University of Virginia बाद उसके presidency.
he designed his own विशाल mansion on a 5,000 एकड़ वृक्षारोपण निकट Charlottesville, वर्जिनिया, जिससे he नामित Monticello.
जबकि not a notable orator, Jefferson थी a skilled writer and corresponded with many influential लोगों in America और यूरोपीय throughout his वयस्क जीवन.
हालांकि जेफरसन स्वामित्व अनेक स्लेव, he opposed the संस्था सब उसके life और consequently treated और took परवाह of them बहुत खूब और अपेक्षित them to कार्य no more than free किसानो.
चूंकि 1802 इतिहासकारों और अन्य have महरूम विभाजित over the controversy of whether Jefferson was the father of one or more children belonging to Sally hemings, a slave at Monticello. ''
इतिहासकारों हैं also in disagreement with कैसा much Jefferson थी वचनबद्ध to the anti-slavery cause.
In 1807, अध्यक्ष Jefferson signed into law a विधेयक कि बैन the importation of स्लेव into the संयुक्त States.
बाद मार्था जेफरसन, उसके बीवी of ग्यारह सालो, died in 1782, जेफरसन remained a विधुर for the बाकी of उसके जीवन ; their विवाह produced six children, of whom दो survived to adulthood.
Though Jefferson रै been criticized by अनेक आधुनिक day विद्वानों over the issue of slavery, he remains rated as एक of the greatest U.S. राष्ट्रपतियों.
`` Sun नगर '' is a 1985 विरोध सोंग written by Steven वैन Zandt, produced by वैन zandt और आर्थर Baker and recorded by कलाकारों संयुक्त Against रंगभेद to convey विपक्ष to the South African policy of रंगभेद.
The primary अर्थात् of that विपक्ष is to घोषित कि सब the कलाकारों शामिल होता इंकार कोई और सब offers to perform at सूर्य City, a रिज़ॉर्ट which was located in bantustan of Bophuthatswana, एक of a क्रमांक of internationally अपरिचित supposed `` स्वतंत्र '' states निर्मित by the South African सरकारी to forcibly relocate its black जनसांख्यिकी.

The National बास्केट Association ( NBA ) is a प्रमुख professional basketball लीग in North अमेरिका.
It थी founded in 1946 as the बास्केट Association of अमेरिका ( BAA ).
the लीग अपनाया its वर्तमान नाम at the start of the when it मिलाया with the नेशनल Basketball लीग ( NBL ).
the NBA Finals is the championship श्रेणी लिये the एनबीए और the conclusion of the खेल 's postseason.
The winning team of the श्रेणी receives the Larry o'brien Championship ट्रॉफी.
खिलाड़ी from the जीतना team प्रायः receive चैंपियनशिप rings इससे the team honoring उनके contribution.
however, in some rare occasion, the टीमों opted to दिया other commemorative items, such as wrist घड़ियाँ, instead of rings.
The number of championships won by NBA सुपरस्टार is प्रायः used as a मापन of their greatness.
Boston सेल्टिक्स center Bill रसेल holds the record for the most एनबीए championships won साथ 11 शीर्षक दौरान उसके 13-year playing करियर.
He won his first चैंपियनशिप साथ the Boston Celtics in उसके rookie साल.
afterwards, he गई on to win 10 championships in the next 12 सालो, सहित आठ लगातार championships इससे 1959 to 1966.
He won the पिछला two championships in 1968 and 1969 as player-coach.
Russell 's teammate, Sam Jones, won 10 championships इससे 1959 to 1969, the दूसरी सबसे in एनबीए इतिहास.
Four सेल्टिक्स खिलाड़ी, tom Heinsohn, K. C. Jones, Satch Sanders and John havlicek, जीती आठ championships प्रत्येक.
दो other सेल्टिक्स, Jim loscutoff and Frank Ramsey, won seven championships प्रत्येक.
Four players, bob cousy, kareem abdul-jabbar, माइकल जॉर्डन और Scottie Pippen, जीती छह championships प्रत्येक.
Jordan और Pippen are members of the शिकागो bulls team who जीती three लगातार championships twice in the 1990s.
Robert Horry और John Salley are the तभी खिलाड़ी to have जीती the championships with three अलग टीमों.
horry won seven championships साथ the Houston rockets, the लॉस Angeles Lakers and the सैन Antonio स्पर्स, while Salley won four championships साथ the डेट्रॉयट पिस्टन्स, the bulls और the Lakers.
फ़्रैंक शाऊल and स्टीव Kerr हैं the तभी players to win two championships with दो अलग टीमों in consecutive seasons.
Saul won consecutive championships with the Rochester रॉयल्स and the Minneapolis Lakers in the 1950s, while Kerr won लगातार championships साथ the bulls and the Spurs in the 1990s,
सटीकता indicates proximity of मापन results to the सच्चा value, परिशुद्धता to the repeatability, or reproducibility of the मापन
In the fields of science, अभियान्त्रिकी, industry, और statistics, the सटीकता of a measurement system is the उपाधि of निकटता of माप of a quantity to that मात्रा 's वास्तविक ( true ) मान.
The precision of a measurement प्रणाली, also पुकारा reproducibility or repeatability, is the उपाधि to which repeated measurements under अपरिवर्तित शर्तें show the वही परिणाम.
Although the two words reproducibility and repeatability can be synonymous in colloquial use, वे are deliberately contrasted in the context of the वैज्ञानिक method.
A मापन प्रणाली can be सटीक लकिन not precise, precise but not सटीक, neither, or both.
लिये example, if an प्रयोग contains a व्यवस्थित गलती, तब increasing the sample size generally increases परिशुद्धता but does not improve accuracy.
The परिणाम would be a consistent yet inaccurate string of परिणाम इससे the flawed experiment.
eliminating the व्यवस्थित गलती improves सटीकता लकिन does नहीं बदलें परिशुद्धता.
a measurement system is designated valid if it is दोनो accurate and precise.
सम्बन्धित terms include bias ( non- यादृच्छिक or निर्देशित प्रभाव caused by a फ़ैक्टर or कारकों unrelated to the स्वतंत्र परिवर्तनीय ) और गलती ( यादृच्छिक variability ).
The शब्दावली is भी applied to अप्रत्यक्ष measurements—that is, मान प्राप्त by a कम्प्यूटेशनल procedure from observed data.
in जोड to सटीकता and precision, माप may भी have a मापन रेज़ोल्यूशन, जिससे is the smallest change in the underlying शारीरिक मात्रा that produces a response in the मापन.
In the case of पूरा reproducibility, such as when rounding a क्रमांक to a representable फ्लोटिंग point क्रमांक, the शब्द precision has a meaning नहीं सम्बन्धित to reproducibility.
लिये example, in the IEEE 754-2008 मानक it means the number of बिट्स in the significand, so it is प्रयुक्त as a measure for the relative सटीकता साथ which an arbitrary number can be represented.
Fuck in इसके शाब्दिक अर्थ refers to the act of यौन intercourse.
It is an English शब्द that is प्रायः used as a profanity, either to denote disdain or as an intensifier.
the उत्पत्ति of the word is obscure.
it is usually माना to be पहला attested to around 1475, लकिन it may be considerably older.
In modern उपयोग, बकवास और its derivatives ( such as कमीने and fucking ) can be प्रयुक्त in the स्थिति of a संज्ञा, a क्रिया, an adjective or an adverb.
वहीँ हैं many आम phrases जिससे make use of the शब्द, as खूब as a क्रमांक of compounds incorporating it, such as motherfucker.
एनिमेटेड, color-coded map प्रर्दशित the various continents और regions.
Depending on the convention and model, कुछ continents may be संचित or subdivided : लिये example, यूरेशिया is सबसे प्रायः subdivided into Europe और Asia ( रेड शेड्स ), जबकि उत्तर and दक्षिण America हैं sometimes पहचाना as one अमरीकी महाद्वीप ( green shades ).
A महाद्वीप is एक of अनेक बहुत large landmasses on धरती.
वे are generally पहचाना by convention rather than any सख्त मापदण्ड, साथ up to seven regions commonly regarded as continents—they are ( from largest in आकार to smallest ) : एशिया, Africa, North अमेरिका, दक्षिण अमेरिका, Antarctica, यूरोपीय, and ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
In भूविज्ञान, continents हैं वर्णित by means of tectonic plates.
थाली tectonics is the process और study of the गति, collision और प्रभाग of महाद्वीपों, पहले known as continental drift.
