it stars laurence फिशबर्न, Djimon Hounsou, डेरेक Luke, Meagan Good, और Larenz टेट और is written and निर्देशित by reggie चट्टान Bythewood.
It भी सुविधाएँ Lisa Bonet, ऑरलैंडो जोन्स, बच्चा चट्टान and वैनेसा घंटी calloway.
लिये the Steel पैंथर सोंग, देखिए Feel the Steel.
जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी is a वैवाहिक property शासन that originated in सिविल law jurisdictions और is अभी भी मिला in कुछ common विधि jurisdictions.
The राज्य of the संयुक्त States कि recognize जातियाँ property हैं primarily in the वेस्ट ; it थी inherited from मैक्सिको 's ganancial community system, which itself थी inherited from स्पेनी विधि ( a Roman -derived civil विधि system ) और ultimately इससे the Visigoths.
While under स्पेनी rule louisiana अपनाया the ganancial जातियाँ प्रणाली of acquests और gains, जिससे replaced the traditional French जातियाँ of movables और acquests in इसके सिविल विधि प्रणाली.
Map of the संयुक्त States with जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी राज्य highlighted in red.
in addition to the highlighted states, Alaska is a separate property state that permits couples to opt into a जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी arrangement.
In a community property क्षेत्राधिकार, सबसे प्रॉपर्टी acquired during the marriage ( except लिये gifts or inheritances ) —the community, or communio bonorum—is स्वामित्व jointly by both spouses और is विभाजित upon तलाक, annulment or मौत.
Joint ownership is automatically presumed by law in the अनुपस्थिति of specific evidence कि होता point to a contrary निष्कर्ष for a particular piece of प्रॉपर्टी.
Division of जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी may take place by मद, by splitting सब वस्तुएं or by मान.
in some jurisdictions, such as कैलिफ़ोर्निया, a 50/50 प्रभाग of जातियाँ property is strictly mandated by statute, meaning कि the फ़ोकस then शिफ्ट to whether particular वस्तुएं are to be वर्गीकृत as community or separate property.
in अन्य jurisdictions, ऐसे as Texas, a तलाक court may डिक्री an `` equitable वितरण `` of community प्रॉपर्टी, which may result in an गैरबराबरी प्रभाग of such.
In non-community प्रॉपर्टी states property may be विभाजित by निष्पक्ष वितरण.
Generally speaking, the प्रॉपर्टी that each partner brings into the marriage or receives by gift, bequest or devise during विवाह is called पृथक प्रॉपर्टी ( i.e., नहीं community property ).
See division of प्रॉपर्टी.
प्रभाग of जातियाँ debts may नहीं be the same as division of community प्रॉपर्टी.
लिये उदाहरण, in California, community प्रॉपर्टी is required to be divided `` equally '' while जातियाँ debt is जरूरी to be विभाजित `` equitably ''.
प्रॉपर्टी that is स्वामित्व by one जीवनसाथी पहले the marriage is the separate property of कि spouse, unless the प्रॉपर्टी is `` transmuted '' into community property.
the नियम लिये this vary इससे jurisdiction to jurisdiction.
the ड्यूक and duchess of Cambridge waving to the भीड at the मॉल shortly बाद the विवाह.
The विवाह of प्रिंस विलियम, Duke of Cambridge, and कैथरीन Middleton took place on 29 अप्रैल 2011 at Westminster Abbey in लंदन.
the दूल्हे, प्रिंस William, Duke of Cambridge, is the eldest son of Charles, Prince of वेल्स, and is second in the line of succession to the अंग्रेजों Throne and the तख्तों of fifteen अन्य Commonwealth realms.
the bride, Catherine `` केट '' मिडलटन is the ज्येष्ठ of three children of Michael और Carole मिडलटन of bucklebury, बर्कशायर.
the Dean of Westminster, जॉन Hall, presided at the service ; the Archbishop of Canterbury, Rowan विलियम्स, conducted the marriage ; Richard chartres, the Bishop of London, preached the उपदेश ; और a पढना was दिए by the बहू 's brother, जेम्स.
William 's बेहतरीन man थी his brother, Prince हैरी, जबकि the बहू 's सिस्टर, पिप्पा, थी नौकरानी of honour.
the रस्म थी attended by the bride 's and दूल्हे 's families, as well as many विदेशी रॉयल्स, राजनयिकों, और the युगल 's चुनी personal guests.
बाद the रस्म, the युगल बना the traditional रूप on the बालकनी of बकिंघम राजमहल.
as Prince William was not the वारिस apparent to the throne, the विवाह was not a पूरा state occasion और अनेक विवरण were बाएँ to the युगल to decide, such as much of the अतिथि list of परिचय 1,900.
प्रिंस विलियम और Kate मिडलटन met in 2001.
उनके engagement on 20 October 2010 was announced on 16 November 2010.
the build-up to the wedding और the occasion itself attracted much मीडिया ध्यान, being compared in many तरीके साथ the 1981 विवाह of विलियम 's अभिभावक.
The अवसर was a पब्लिक अवकाश in the United किंगडम and प्रदर्शित many ceremonial पहलुओं, including use of the state carriages and भूमिकाएँ for the पैर Guards and household Cavalry.
कार्यक्रम were आयोजित around the Commonwealth to mark the wedding ; संगठनों और hotels आयोजित events आरपार Canada, over 5,000 गली parties यहूद आयोजित throughout the United किंगडम, and one million लोगों lined the route between वेस्टमिंस्टर Abbey and Buckingham राजमहल.

वैनेसा आनन्द lachey ( née minnillo ; born November 9, 1980 ) is an अमरीकी television व्यक्तित्व, टेलीविज़न host, फ़ैशन model, and अभिनेत्री.

A हाथ ( med. / lat. : manus, pl. manūs ) is a prehensile, multi- fingered extremity located at the समाप्त of an arm or forelimb of primates and इंसानो, chimpanzees, monkeys, and lemurs.
A few अन्य vertebrates ऐसे as the कोआला ( which has two opposable thumbs on प्रत्येक `` hand '' और फिंगरप्रिंट remarkably समान to human fingerprints ) are often वर्णित as having either `` हैंड्स '' or `` पंजे '' on their सामने limbs.
Hands हैं the main structures लिये physically manipulating the environment, प्रयुक्त for both gross मोटर कौशल ( such as grasping a विशाल object ) और ठीक motor कौशल ( ऐसे as picking up a small pebble ).
The उंगलियों contain कुछ of the densest क्षेत्रों of तंत्रिका endings on the body, are the richest source of tactile feedback, और have the महानतम positioning काबिलियत of the देह ; thus the भाव of touch is intimately associated with hands.
जैसे अन्य paired अंगों ( आँखें, फीट, टाँगे ), each hand is dominantly controlled by the opposing दिमाग hemisphere, so कि handedness, or the preferred hand चुनाव लिये single-handed activities ऐसे as writing साथ a pencil, reflects व्यक्तिगत दिमाग functioning.
कुछ evolutionary anatomists use the पद hand to refer to the appendage of अंक on the forelimb अधिक generally — for उदाहरण, in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of whether the three अंक of the बर्ड hand शामिल the वही homologous loss of दो digits as in the dinosaur hand.
The human हाथ रै 27 bones, not सहित the sesamoid हड्डियों जिससे क्रमांक varies between लोगों.
14 of which हैं the phalanges ( proximal, इंटरमीडिएट और distal ) of the उंगलियाँ.
The metacarpals हैं the bones कि connects the fingers और the कलाई.
Each इंसान hand रै 5 metacarpals and 8 carpal हड्डियों.

Basic डिजिटल सचेतक क्लॉक बगैर a रेडियो.
The चिह्नित in the top-left of the प्रदर्शक indicates that the समय is 4:00pm, नहीं 4:00am.
A 1969 रेडियो सचेतक clock ( Sony digimatic 8fc-59w ) with an early mechanical-digital display.
a डिजिटल क्लॉक is a प्रकार of clock that displays the time digitally, i.e. in numerals or other symbols, as opposed to an analog क्लॉक, where the समय is indicated by the positions of rotating हैंड्स.
Digital घड़ियाँ हैं प्रायः संबद्ध साथ electronic drives, लकिन the `` डिजिटल '' वर्णन refers only to the प्रदर्शक, not to the drive mechanism.
( Both एनालॉग and डिजिटल घड़ियाँ can be चलित either mechanically or electronically, but `` clockwork '' mechanisms साथ digital displays हैं rare. )
the biggest digital क्लॉक is the Lichtzeitpegel ( `` लाइट समय स्तर '' ) on the टेलीविज़न मीनार rheinturm düsseldorf, Germany.
Family Guy creator Seth macfarlane भी provides the voices of Peter griffin, Stewie griffin, Brian Griffin, और ग्लेन कीचड़.
Family Guy is an American animated sitcom that सुविधाएँ पाँच main voice अभिनेताओं, और numerous regular cast and recurring guest stars.
The principal आवाज़ cast consists of दिखाएँ creator सेठ macfarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth ग्रीन, mila Kunis ( who replaced लेसी chabert after the first season ) and माइक Henry और now, the new actor beau Osborne.
Recurring आवाज़ actors शामिल पैट्रिक warburton, आदम West, जॉन G. ब्रेनन, Nicole सुलीवान और Jennifer tilly, and repeat guest stars शामिल फिलिस Diller, चार्ल्स Durning, फटाफट limbaugh, and फिल lamarr.
अनेक डाल सदस्यों provide voices for multiple वर्ण.
The आवाज़ अभिनेताओं, in portraying the various अक्षर personalities on the show, draw inspiration इससे celebrities और पॉप culture.
Family guy वर्ण have been played by अधिक than एक actor, बाद members of the दिखाएँ left the series or था conflicting दायित्वों.
kunis was nominated लिये an Annie Award for voicing मेग griffin in the ऋतु 5 एपीसोड `` Barely विधिक `` and MacFarlane रै also won an Emmy Award for Outstanding voice-over Performance and an Annie पुरस्कार लिये Best Voice Acting in an एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न Production, हालांकि no अन्य cast सदस्य has won an पुरस्कार for उनके work on the series.
The five सेट of the board खेल एकाधिकार चित्रित यहाँ show the एवोल्यूशन of the खेल 's कलाकृति and डिजाइन in the United राज्य from 1935–2005.
the history of the board game एकाधिकार can be traced back to the जल्दी 20th century.
The earliest ज्ञात डिज़ाइन was by the American, एलिज़ाबेथ magie, patented in 1904 लकिन मौजूदा as जल्दी as 1902.
Magie 's original intent थी to प्रकाशित a फलक खेल to illustrate an economic principle, namely the georgist concept of a सिंगल जमीन value tax.
a श्रेणी of फलक खेल यहूद विकसित इससे 1906 through the 1930s that शामिल the buying and selling of जमीन and the विकास of that जमीन.
By 1934, a फलक खेल had been निर्मित much like the version of Monopoly बेची by Parker भाइयो and इसके related कंपनियाँ through the rest of the 20th सदी, और into the 21st.
अनेक लोगों, mostly in the midwestern United राज्य और निकट the ईस्ट coast, contributed to the game 's design and एवोल्यूशन.
By the 1970s, the विचार कि the game had महरूम निर्मित solely by चार्ल्स Darrow had become popular लोकगीत ; it was printed in the खेल 's निर्देश for many सालो, in a 1974 book devoted to Monopoly, और was cited in a general book परिचय toys भी as recently as 2007.
भी a मार्गदर्शिका to family games published लिये Reader 's Digest in 2003 only दिया क्रेडिट to darrow और Elizabeth Magie, erroneously stating कि magie 's असली game was निर्मित in the 1800s, and not acknowledging any of the खेल 's विकास between Magie 's सृष्टि of the game, and the eventual प्रकाशन by पार्कर भाइयो.
भी in the 1970s, Professor Ralph anspach, who had himself प्रकाशित a फलक खेल intended to illustrate the सिद्धान्त of both monopolies और विश्वास busting, fought पार्कर Brothers and इसके तब parent कम्पनी, सामान्य मिलों, over the trademarks of the Monopoly फलक game.
through the शोध of anspach and others, much of the early history of the खेल was `` rediscovered ''.
Anspach confronted Maxine Brady, लेखक of the 1974 book The Monopoly Book : रणनीति और Tactics of the संसार 's Most लोकप्रिय Game over the वास्तविक इतिहास of the खेल on Barry farber 's New York City talk दिखाएँ in 1975.
क्युकी of the lengthy अदालत प्रक्रम, including appeals, the legal औकात of पार्कर भाइयो ' trademarks on the game थी not settled जबतक 1985.
the game 's name remains a registered trademark of पार्कर Brothers, as do इसके विशिष्ट design तत्व.
at the निष्कर्ष of the court case, the game 's लोगो and ग्राफिक design तत्व became भाग of a larger Monopoly brand, licensed by Parker Brothers ' जनक companies onto a variety of items through the present day.
Despite the `` rediscovery '' of the board game 's early history in the 1970s and 1980s, and अनेक books और जर्नल articles on the विषय, हास्ब्रो ( Parker भाइयो ' वर्तमान parent company ) did not acknowledge any of the खेल 's इतिहास before चार्ल्स Darrow on इसके official Monopoly website as recently as जून 2012.
nor किया हास्ब्रो acknowledge anyone other than darrow in सामग्री published or प्रायोजित by उन्हें, at least as recently as 2006.
International tournaments, पहला आयोजित in the early 1970s, continue to the present, साथ the next world चैंपियनशिप संभावित scheduled लिये 2013.
Starting in 1985, a new generation of spin-off फलक games और कार्ड खेल appeared on both sides of the अटलांटिक Ocean.
in 1989, the first of many video खेल और कंप्यूटर खेल editions was published.
चूंकि 1994, अनेक आधिकारिक variants of the खेल, based on locations अन्य than Atlantic नगर, New जर्सी ( the official u.S. setting ) or London ( the आधिकारिक राष्ट्रमंडल setting, excepting कनाडा ), have been published by हास्ब्रो or its licensees.
In 2008, हास्ब्रो permanently changed the रंग scheme and कुछ of the gameplay of the मानक u.s. Edition of the game to मैच the UK संस्करण, हालांकि the u.S. मानक संस्करण maintains the Atlantic City property names.
हास्ब्रो भी परिवर्धित the आधिकारिक logo to दे the `` Mr. एकाधिकार '' character a 3-d computer-generated dekh, जिससे has चूंकि महरूम adopted by licensees USAopoly, Winning चालें and जीतना समाधान.
And हास्ब्रो रै भी been including the Speed die, introduced in 2006 's एकाधिकार : the Mega संस्करण by Winning Moves खेल, in संस्करण उत्पादित directly by Hasbro ( ऐसे as the 2009 चैंपियनशिप Edition ).
in बेसबॉल, a sacrifice fly is a batted बॉल कि satisfies चार criteria:
There हैं fewer than two outs जब the ball is hit.
the बॉल is hit to the outfield ( fair or foul ), or to infield foul territory.
the बैटर is put आउट क्युकी an outfielder ( or an infielder running in the outfield, or foul territory ) catches the ball on the मक्खी ( alternatively if the बैटर होता have महरूम आउट if not लिये an गलती or if the outfielder बूंदें the बॉल और another runner is put out ).
a धावक जो is already on base स्कोर on the play.
It is पुकारा a `` बलिदान '' fly because the batter presumably intends to कारण a teammate to स्कोर a run, जबकि sacrificing his own क्षमता to do so.
मिनेसोटा ( ) is a U.S. state स्तिथ in the Midwestern United States.
Minnesota थी carved आउट of the पूर्वी half of the Minnesota Territory and admitted to the Union as the 32nd राज्य on may 11, 1858.
ज्ञात as the `` जमीन of 10,000 Lakes '', the state 's नाम comes from a Dakota word लिये `` sky-tinted जल ''.
those waters, साथ with forests, पार्क, and wilderness क्षेत्रों, प्रस्ताव residents and tourists a variety of outdoor recreational opportunities.
Minnesota is the 12th most extensive और the 21st सबसे populous of the U.S. states.
Nearly 60 % of its residents सजीव in the minneapolis–saint पॉल metropolitan area ( known as the `` Twin शहरों '' ), the बीच of परिवहन, कारोबार, industry, education, सरकारी and घर to an internationally ज्ञात कला community.
The remainder of the राज्य consists of पश्चिमी prairies अभी given over to intensive कृषि ; पतझड़ी forests in the southeast, now साफ, farmed और settled ; and the कम populated उत्तर Woods, प्रयुक्त for mining, forestry, और recreation.
Minnesota is known for इसके अपेक्षाकृत mixed सोशल और राजनैतिक orientations, and has a ऊँची rate of नागरिक participation और वोटर turnout.
मिनेसोटा बाँधने among the healthiest states, और has a अत्यधिक साक्षर population.
the विशाल majority of residents हैं of Scandinavian and जर्मनी descent.
the राज्य is known as a बीच of Scandinavian American संस्कृति.
Ethnic diversity has increased in हाल decades.
Substantial influxes of एशियाई, African, और Latin अमरीकी immigrants have joined the descendants of European settlers और the original Native American inhabitants.
Grants हैं non-repayable निधि by one party ( ग्रान्ट makers ), प्रायः a government department, corporation, न्यास or trust, to a, often ( लकिन not always ) a nonprofit एंटिटी, शैक्षणिक institution, कारोबार or an व्यक्तिगत.
In अनुक्रम to receive a grant, some रूप of `` ग्रान्ट लिखने '' often referred to as either a proposal or an अनुप्रयोग is प्रायः required.
Most अनुदान हैं made to निधि a specific प्रोजेक्ट and require कुछ level of compliance and रिपोर्टिंग.
The ग्रान्ट writing process involves an applicant submitting a proposal ( or सबमिशन ) to a potential funder, either on the applicant 's अपना पहल or in response to a Request for प्रस्ताव from the funder.
अन्य grants can be दिए to individuals, ऐसे as victims of प्राकृतिक आपदाओं or individuals जो seek to खोलें a छोटी कारोबार.
sometimes grant makers आवश्यकता ग्रान्ट जरुरतमंदों to have कुछ रूप of tax-exempt status, be a पंजीकृत nonprofit संगठन or a local government.
लिये उदाहरण, tiered funding लिये a फ्रीवे are very large अनुदान negotiated at सरकारी नीति स्तर.
however smaller अनुदान may be provided by a सरकारी एजेंसी ( e.g. municipal सरकारी ).
project-related funding involving सरकारें, कारोबार, communities, और individuals is often arranged by application either in writing or online.
naturally occurring cobalt ( co ) is composed of 1 stable isotope, 59co. 28 radioisotopes have been characterized साथ the most stable being 60Co साथ a half-life of 5.2714 सालो, 57co साथ a half-life of 271.79 दिनों, 56Co साथ a half-life of 77.27 days, और 58Co with a half-life of 70.86 दिनों.
सब of the remaining रेडियोसक्रिय isotopes have half-lives कि हैं less than 18 घंटों और the majority of ये have half-lives that are कम than 1 second.
This element also रै 11 मेटा राज्य, all of which have half-lives less than 15 minutes.
the isotopes of cobalt range in परमाणु weight इससे 47co to 75co.
The primary क्षय mode लिये isotopes साथ atomic द्रव्यमान ईकाई मान less than that of the सबसे abundant stable isotope, 59co, is इलेक्ट्रॉन कैप्चर और the प्राथमिक mode of क्षय लिये those of वृहद than 59 atomic द्रव्यमान इकाई is beta क्षय.
the primary क्षय उत्पाद पहले 59Co are आयरन isotopes और the primary products after are निकल isotopes.
Standard परमाणु mass : 58.933195 ( 5 ) u
Who स्थानांतरित my चीज ?
An अद्भुत रास्ता to Deal with Change in अपना Work and in Your जीवन, published in 1998, is a motivational किताब by स्पेंसर Johnson written in the style of a मिसाल or कारोबार fable.
it describes बदलें in एक 's कार्य और life, and चार typical reactions to कहा change by दो चूहे and दो `` littlepeople '', दौरान उनके हंट for cheese.
a New यॉर्क टाइम्स business bestseller चूंकि रिलीज, जो Moved my Cheese ?
remained on the list for almost पाँच सालो और खर्च over 200 weeks on Publishers Weekly 's सजिल्द nonfiction list.
It रै बेची अधिक than 26 लाख नक़ल worldwide in 37 भाषाएं और remains to be एक of the best-selling business books.
निकिता Sergeyevich Khrushchev ( – सितंबर 11, 1971 ) led the Soviet संघ during भाग of the ठंडा युद्ध.
He served as पहला सचिव of the Communist Party of the सोवियत Union from 1953 to 1964, and as अध्यक्ष of the परिषद of मंत्रियों, or प्रीमियर, from 1958 to 1964.
Khrushchev थी जिम्मेदार for the partial de-stalinization of the Soviet संघ, लिये बैकिंग the progress of the early Soviet space कार्यक्रम, और लिये several अपेक्षाकृत उदार reforms in areas of घरेलू नीति.
khrushchev 's पार्टी colleagues removed him इससे शक्ति in 1964, replacing उसे साथ लियोनिद brezhnev as First सचिव और Alexei kosygin as Premier.
khrushchev was born in the रूसी village of Kalinovka in 1894, close to the present-day किनारा between रूस और युक्त.
He was employed as a metalworker in उसके युवावस्था, और during the रूसी सिविल War was a political commissar.
With the help of Lazar kaganovich, he worked his रास्ता up the सोवियत hierarchy.
He supported जोसेफ स्टालिन 's purges, and स्वीकृत हज़ारों of arrests.
In 1939, Stalin sent उसे to govern Ukraine, and he जारी the purges वहीँ.
During what was known in the Soviet संघ as the ग्रेट Patriotic युद्ध ( पूर्वी Front of World War II ), Khrushchev थी again a commissar, serving as an intermediary between स्टालिन और his generals.
Khrushchev थी उपस्थित at the खूनी defense of stalingrad, a fact he took great अभिमान in throughout his जीवन.
बाद the युद्ध, he लौटे to Ukraine before being recalled to मास्को as एक of Stalin 's close advisers.
In the शक्ति struggle triggered by स्टालिन 's death in 1953, Khrushchev, after several years, emerged victorious.
on February 25, 1956, at the 20th पार्टी Congress, he delivered the `` Secret Speech, '' denouncing Stalin 's purges and ushering in a less repressive era in the Soviet संघ.
उसके domestic नीतियों, aimed at bettering the जीवनदान of ordinary citizens, यहूद often ineffective, विशेषकर in the क्षेत्रफल of agriculture.
Hoping आखिरकार to rely on missiles for नेशनल रक्षा, Khrushchev ordered major cuts in conventional forces.
despite the cuts, khrushchev 's rule देखी the tensest सालो of the ठंडा युद्ध, culminating in the Cuban Missile संकट.
Some of khrushchev 's नीतियों यहूद देखी as erratic, विशेषकर by उसके emerging विरोधियों, who quietly रोज़ in शक्ति और अपदस्थ him in अक्तूबर 1964.
he किया नहीं suffer the deadly भाग्य of some previous losers of Soviet शक्ति struggles, लकिन was pensioned off with an apartment in Moscow and a dacha in the countryside.
उसके lengthy memoirs यहूद smuggled to the वेस्ट and published in part in 1970.
Khrushchev died in 1971 of heart disease.
अपर जठरांत्र ( GI ) bleeding refers to hemorrhage in the upper gastrointestinal ट्रैक्ट.
The anatomic cut-off लिये अपर gi bleeding is the स्नायु of treitz, जिससे connects the fourth portion of the duodenum to the diaphragm near the splenic flexure of the colon.
अपर GI bleeds हैं माना चिकित्सा emergencies, and require admission to हॉस्पिटल for तात्कालिक निदान और management.
Due to अग्रिम in medications और endoscopy, upper GI hemorrhage is now प्रायः treated बगैर surgery.
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100, आधारित on un 2010 projections ( रेड, orange, green ) and us Census ब्यूरो ऐतिहासिक estimates ( ब्लैक ).
वास्तविक अंकित population figures हैं in blue.
according to the highest अनुमान, the संसार जनसांख्यिकी may rise to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate, it may मनाही to 6 अरब.
The world population is the कुल number of जीना humans on धरती.
As of today, it is अनुमानित to number billion by the United राज्य Census Bureau ( USCB ).
The USCB estimates that the संसार population exceeded 7 अरब on कूच 12, 2012.
according to a पृथक estimate by the United राष्ट्र Population निधि, it reached इस milestone on October 31, 2011.
the संसार जनसांख्यिकी has अनुभवी निरन्तर विकास चूंकि the समाप्त of the Great अकाल और the Black मौत in 1350, जब it stood at around 370 million.
The highest rates of growth – global population increases above 1.8 % प्रति साल – यहूद देखी briefly during the 1950s, and लिये a longer काल during the 1960s and 1970s.
the growth रेट peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, और had declined to 1.1 % by 2011.
कुल सालाना births were highest in the लेट 1980s at about 138 लाख, और are now expected to remain essentially निरंतर at their 2011 level of 134 लाख, while मौतों number 56 लाख per year, और are expected to increase to 80 million प्रति year by 2040.
Current projections दिखाएँ a continued increase in जनसांख्यिकी in the near future ( लकिन a steady मनाही in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास rate ), साथ the वैश्विक population expected to पहुँचें between 7.5 और 10.5 अरब by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates predict further विकास, stagnation, or even overall decline in the global population by 2150.
Some विश्लेषकों have questioned the sustainability of further world जनसांख्यिकी विकास, citing the growing pressures on the environment, global food supplies, and energy resources.

Knuckle mnemonic for the number of days in each month of the Gregorian Calendar.
Each projecting knuckle represents a 31-day month.
A mnemonic (, with a मूक `` m '' ), or mnemonic यंत्र, is कोई learning technique कि एड्स सूचना स्तंभन.
mnemonics aim to translate सूचना into a रूप कि the इंसान brain can retain बेहतर than its original form.
Even the प्रक्रम of applying इस conversion might already aid the transfer of सूचना to long-term मेमोरी.
commonly encountered mnemonics हैं प्रायः लिये सूचियाँ and in auditory रूप, such as short कविताएं, acronyms, or memorable phrases, but mnemonics can भी be for other types of information and in visual or kinesthetic forms.
उनके use is आधारित on the observation कि the इंसान mind अधिक easily remembers स्थानिक, निजी, आश्चर्यजनक, physical, sexual, humorous, or otherwise 'relatable ' information, rather than अधिक abstract or impersonal forms of information.
The शब्द mnemonic is निकला from the प्राचीन यूनानी word μνημονικός ( mnēmonikos ), meaning `` of memory '' and is related to mnemosyne ( `` remembrance '' ), the name of the देवी of मेमोरी in यूनानी mythology.
Both of these शब्द हैं derived from μνήμη ( mnēmē ), `` स्मरण, memory ''.
Mnemonics in प्राचीनता यहूद सबसे प्रायः माना in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of कया is today known as the Art of memory.
Ancient यूनानियों और romans विशिष्ट between two types of memory : the 'natural ' memory and the 'artificial ' मेमोरी.
The पूर्व is inborn, and is the one कि everyone uses automatically and without thinking.
the artificial मेमोरी in कंट्रास्ट रै to be प्रशिक्षित and विकसित through the सीखना and practicing of a variety of mnemonic techniques.
Mnemonic systems हैं special techniques or strategies consciously used to improve मेमोरी, it helps employ information already भंडारित in long-term memory to मेक memorization an easier कार्य.
अध्यक्ष Bush signing the no चाइल्ड Left Behind Act at हैमिल्टन H.S. in हैमिल्टन, Ohio.
The no चाइल्ड Left पीछे अधिनियम of 2001 ( nclb ) is a United States Act of कॉंग्रेस कि is a reauthorization of the Elementary और द्वितीयक Education Act, जिससे शामिल Title I, the government 's flagship aid कार्यक्रम for सुविधाहीन students.
NCLB supports standards-based शिक्षा सुधार based on the आधार that setting ऊँची standards and establishing measurable लक्ष्य can improve individual outcomes in education.
the अधिनियम requires राज्य to develop assessments in basic कौशल.
राज्य जरूर give these आकलन to सब students at चुनें ग्रेड levels in order to receive संघीय स्कूल funding.
the Act does not assert a नेशनल उपलब्धि मानक ; standards हैं नियत by प्रत्येक individual state.
nclb विस्तारित the federal भूमिका in पब्लिक education through सालाना testing, सालाना academic progress, report ताश, teacher qualifications, and funding परिवर्तन.
The bill passed in the U.S. Congress with bipartisan support.

A पिकअप ट्रक or pick-up, often बस referred to as a पिकअप, is a लाइट motor गाडी with an open-top, rear कार्गो क्षेत्रफल ( bed ).
In उत्तर अमेरिका, the पद पिकअप is used for light ट्रक with a lighter ड्यूटी chassis और फैक्टरी निर्मित, एकीकृत bed, as well as for coupé utility vehicles, often based on a personal car chassis, but भी often on a special समर्पित chassi for ऐसे use.
कुछ देशों have their own terms समान to पिकअप, ऐसे as ute in Australia and New Zealand, or bakkie in दक्षिण Africa.
विशाल पिकअप trucks are somewhat rare in यूरोपीय, where वैन और light lorries are commonly प्रयुक्त लिये समान भूमिकाएँ.
This 15th-century depiction of Charlemagne and पोप एड्रियन I shows a well-bred मध्यकालीन घोड़ा with मेहराबदार neck, refined head and elegant gait.
Horses in the Middle आयु differed in आकार, build और breed from the आधुनिक horse, and यहूद, on औसत, छोटी.
They यहूद also more सेंट्रल to समाज than their modern counterparts, being अनिवार्य for war, कृषि, और transport.
नतीजतन, specific types of घोड़ा developed, अनेक of which have no modern समतुल्य.
While an समझना of आधुनिक घोड़ा breeds and equestrianism is vital लिये any विश्लेषण of the medieval घोड़ा, शोधकर्ताओं also need to consider documentary ( दोनो written and सचित्र ) and archaeological evidence.
घोड़े in the मध्य Ages were rarely differentiated by breed, लकिन बल्कि by उपयोग.
इस led उन्हें to be described, for example, as `` chargers `` ( युद्ध घोड़े ), `` palfreys `` ( riding horses ), कार्ट घोड़े or packhorses.
Reference is also given to उनके place of origin, ऐसे as `` Spanish horses, '' but whether this referred to एक नस्ल or several is अनजान.
Another difficulty arising during any study of मध्यकालीन documents or literature is the लचीलापन of the medieval भाषाएं, where अनेक शब्द can be प्रयुक्त लिये एक thing ( or, conversely, अनेक objects हैं referred to by एक शब्द ).
शब्द such as ' courser ' and 'चार्जr ' हैं used interchangeably ( भी भीतर एक document ), और where एक एपिक may speak disparagingly of a rouncey, another praises its कौशल and swiftness.
Significant technological अग्रिम in घुड़सवार equipment, often introduced from अन्य संस्कृतियों, अनुमत for significant परिवर्तन in दोनो warfare और कृषि.
In particular, improved designs लिये the solid-treed saddle as well as the आगमन of the stirrup, नाल and horse collar were significant अग्रिम in मध्यकालीन समाज.
नतीजतन, the assumptions और theories विकसित by इतिहासकारों हैं not definitive, और debate स्टिल rages on अनेक issues, such as the breeding or size of the horse, and a number of स्त्रोत जरूर be consulted in अनुक्रम to understand the breadth of the विषय.
the म्यूज़िक Man is a musical with book, music, and lyrics by Meredith willson, based on a story by willson और फ्रैंकलिन Lacey.
The plot concerns कॉन man Harold हिल, who poses as a लड़कों ' बैंड organizer and leader and sells बैंड यंत्र और uniforms to naive townsfolk before skipping कस्बा with the cash.
In नदी City, आयोवा, prim लाइब्रेरियन and पियानो टीचर Marian paroo sees through him, लकिन जब हिल helps उसके younger bhai overcome उसके fear of सोशल interactions due to उसके लिस्प, marian begins to पतन in love साथ Harold.
हेरोल्ड, in फेरे गिरना for marian, risks होने caught to win her.
in 1957, the show became a hit on ब्रॉडवे, winning five Tony Awards, including Best Musical, and running लिये 1,375 performances.
the डाल album won the first Grammy पुरस्कार for `` Best असली डाल एल्बम '' and थी number one on the Billboard charts for 245 weeks.
the show 's success led to revivals and a लोकप्रिय 1962 फिल्मी अनुकूलन और a 2003 television रीमेक.
It अक्सर is produced by both professional और amateur थिएटर कंपनियाँ.
Surveyor 's व्हील
A निरीक्षक 's व्हील, also called a clickwheel, hodometer, waywiser, trundle wheel, measuring wheel, or perambulator is a device for measuring distance.
Largest non-polar रेगिस्तान
Sand dunes in the Rub ' al Khali ( `` खाली quarter '' ) of सऊदी Arabia.
Makhtesh रेमन, Negev desert, Israel
A मरुस्थल is a landscape or region of जमीन that is बहुत शुष्क because of low वर्षा amounts ( वर्षण ), प्रायः रै little coverage by plants, और in जिससे streams शुष्क up unless they हैं supplied by water from बाहर क्षेत्रों.
रेगिस्तान can भी be वर्णित as areas where अधिक जल is lost by evapotranspiration than जलप्रपात as वर्षण.
Desert पौधे must have special adaptations to survive साथ इस छोटी जल.
Deserts generally receive कम than 25 cm of rain ( वर्षण ) प्रत्येक साल.
Semideserts or steppes हैं regions which receive between और.
in the Köppen climate वर्गीकरण system, deserts हैं classed as BWh ( hot desert ) or BWk ( temperate desert ).
In the Thornthwaite जलवायु वर्गीकरण system, रेगिस्तान would be classified as arid megathermal climates.
संसार युद्ध i ( wwi ) थी a global war केंद्रित in Europe कि began on 28 जुलाई 1914 और lasted until 11 November 1918.
It थी predominantly पुकारा the संसार War or the ग्रेट War इससे इसके occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार War II in 1939, and the पहला World युद्ध or World War I thereafter.
it involved सब the world 's great शक्तियां, जिससे were समवेत in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( आधारित on the Triple entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम, France और रूस ) and the Central Powers ( originally the ट्रिपल Alliance of Germany, austria-hungary और इटली ; लकिन, as austria–hungary था लिया the offensive विरूद्ध the अनुबंध, इटली किया नहीं enter into the युद्ध ).
ये alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the युद्ध : इटली, Japan and the संयुक्त राज्य joined the Allies, and the उस्मानी साम्राज्य और Bulgaria the Central Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 million military कर्मियों, सहित 60 लाख europeans, were mobilised in one of the largest युद्धों in history.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely क्युकी of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of हथियार without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility.
it थी the fifth- deadliest विरोध in world history, subsequently paving the रास्ता for various राजनैतिक changes, ऐसे as revolutions in many of the nations शामिल.
एक of the long-term कल्याणकारी of the युद्ध was the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the foreign नीतियों of the great शक्तियां of Europe.
अधिक immediately, the हत्या of Archduke Franz फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया, the वारिस to the throne of austria-hungary, on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis जब austria-hungary subsequently वितरित an ultimatum to the किंगडम of Serbia.
अनेक alliances formed over the पिछला दशकों यहूद invoked.
Within weeks, the प्रमुख powers were at war and, via their colonies, the conflict soon स्प्रेड around the संसार.
on 28 जुलाई, the austro-hungarians fired the first shots of the war as तैयारी for the आक्रमण of सर्बिया.
जबकि the russians mobilised, the germans invaded न्यूट्रल बेल्जियम and ध्वज on the way to France, providing a casus belli लिये Britain 's घोषणा of war विरूद्ध Germany.
बाद the जर्मनी march on पेरिस was brought to a halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the marne —the पश्चिमी Front settled into a static बैटल of attrition साथ a गर्त लकीर कि changed छोटी until 1917.
on the पूर्वी सामने, the Russian army थी कामयाब against the austro-hungarians, but was stopped in इसके आक्रमण of East prussia by the germans.
in November the Ottoman साम्राज्य joined the war, खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस, मेसोपोटामिया और the Sinai.
Italy और Bulgaria गई to युद्ध in 1915 और रोमानिया in 1916.
in रूस, the tsar 's सरकारी collapsed in कूच 1917 and a subsequent revolution in नवम्बर brought the Russians to शर्तें साथ the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the पश्चिमी सामने, the allies drove back the germans in a series of successful offensives और American forces began प्रवेश the trenches.
Germany, which था its अपना trouble साथ revolutionaries, सहमत to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The युद्ध ended in विजय लिये the allies.
कार्यक्रम on the home fronts यहूद as उग्र as on the battle fronts, as the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize their जनशक्ति and आर्थिक संसाधन to लड़ो a कुल युद्ध.
By the end of the war, four major इम्पीरियल powers—the German, रूसी, Austro-Hungarian and उस्मानी empires—ceased to मौजूद.
The successor राज्य of the former two lost a great राशि of territory, while the latter दो were dismantled entirely.
the मैप of सेंट्रल यूरोपीय was redrawn into अनेक smaller राज्य.
the लीग of Nations थी formed in the आशा of preventing another ऐसे conflict.
The European राष्ट्रवाद spawned by the war and the breakup of empires, the परखना of जर्मनी 's defeat and समस्याएं साथ the Treaty of versailles हैं agreed to be factors contributing to World युद्ध ii.
`` Girls Just Want to have मजा '' is a 1979 song originally लिखा by Robert Hazard और बना प्रसिद्ध by सिंगर Cyndi lauper.
it थी the first प्रमुख सिंगल released by Lauper as a सोलो कलाकार और the lead-off सिंगल from her डेब्यू एल्बम She 's so असामान्य.
Lauper’s संस्करण gained recognition as a feminist गान and प्रचारित by an award-winning वीडियो.
it has महरूम covered on either an एल्बम or in सजीव कॉन्सर्ट by over 30 अन्य कलाकारों.
The single थी Lauper 's भेदन hit, reaching # 2 on the Billboard Hot 100 and becoming a विश्वव्यापी hit throughout late 1983 and जल्दी 1984.
It remains एक of Lauper 's signature songs and was a widely लोकप्रिय song during the era of its release, the 1980s.
the `` Rolling Stone & एमटीवी : '100 Greatest Pop गीतों ' : 1-50 '', `` Rolling Stone : `` The 100 शीर्ष Music वीडियो '' '' and the `` vh1 : 100 Greatest Videos '' सूचियाँ क्रमित the song at # 22, # 39 और # 45, क्रमशः.
the song received a ग्रैमी Award nomination for Record of the Year और बेहतरीन Female Pop Vocal Performance.
View of defibrillator एलेक्ट्रोड स्थिति और अवस्थिति.
Defibrillation is a आम उपचार for life-threatening cardiac dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, and pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of electrical उर्जा to the affected heart with a device पुकारा a defibrillator.
इस depolarizes a नाजुक mass of the heart muscle, terminates the dysrhythmia, और allows normal sinus लय to be reestablished by the देह 's प्राकृतिक pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the heart.
defibrillators can be external, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the प्रकार of यंत्र used or needed.
कुछ बाह्य units, known as automated external defibrillators ( AEDs ), automate the निदान of treatable लय, meaning that lay responders or bystanders हैं समर्थ to उपयोग them successfully साथ little, or in some मामले no प्रशिक्षण at सब.
The Cato Institute is an अमरीकी libertarian सोचो टैंक headquartered in Washington, d.c.
It थी founded as the Charles koch न्यास in 1974 by मरे rothbard, ed Crane और Charles Koch, अध्यक्ष of the फलक and chief executive officer of the conglomerate koch उद्योग, inc..
in July 1976, the name थी बदला to the Cato संस्थान.
according to the 2011 वैश्विक go To Think Tank अनुक्रमणिका, Cato is the 6th सबसे influential US based सोचो tank, रैंकिंग 3rd in आर्थिक नीति और 2nd in सोशल नीति.
the संस्थान 's stated मिशन is `` to increase the understanding of पब्लिक नीतियों based on the सिद्धान्त of limited सरकारी, free बाज़ार, व्यक्तिगत liberty, and peace.
The संस्थान will use the most effective means to originate, advocate, promote, and disseminate लागू policy प्रस्ताव that बनाएँ free, खोलें, और civil समाजों in the संयुक्त राज्य और throughout the world. ''
केटो विद्वानों यहूद नाजुक of George W. Bush 's Republican प्रशासन ( 2001–2009 ) on several issues, सहित the Iraq War, सिविल लिबर्टीज, शिक्षा, कृषि, उर्जा policy, और excessive government बिता.
on अन्य issues, they समर्थित बुश administration initiatives, most notably health परवाह, Social सुरक्षा, वैश्विक वार्मिंग, tax नीति, and आव्रजन.
दौरान the 2008 u.S. अध्यक्षीय election, Cato विद्वानों criticized दोनो major-party candidates, जॉन McCain and Barack ओबामा.
केटो रै criticized President ओबामा 's stances on policy मुद्दे चूंकि his inauguration, such as फिस्कल stimulus, healthcare सुधार, foreign policy, and the युद्ध on Drugs, while supporting उसके stance on the repeal of do n't Ask, do n't Tell और liberal immigration policy.
ड्रैकुला is an 1897 Gothic हॉरर अनोखा by Irish author ब्राम स्टोकर.
Famous for introducing the अक्षर of the पिशाच Count ड्रैकुला, the अनोखा tells the स्टोरी of ड्रैकुला 's attempt to relocate इससे Transylvania to England, and the battle between ड्रैकुला and a small समूह of men और महिलाओं led by Professor Abraham Van helsing.
Dracula has महरूम assigned to many literary जाति सहित पिशाच literature, horror fiction, the gothic अनोखा and आक्रमण literature.
The अनोखा touches on विषयवस्तु ऐसे as the role of women in विक्टोरियन culture, यौन conventions, आव्रजन, उपनिवेशवाद, और post-colonialism.
Although स्टोकर किया नहीं इफ़तेरा the पिशाच, he defined इसके modern form, and the अनोखा has शाखित numerous theatrical, फिल्मी और television interpretations.
quidditch is a competitive sport in the wizarding संसार of the हैरी कुम्हार universe, and is इससे the श्रेणी of children 's novels और movies.
It is an extremely अशिष्ट but बहुत लोकप्रिय semi-contact sport, played by wizards और witches.
मिलान हैं played between दो टीमों of seven players सवारी उड़ती broomsticks, using चार balls and six elevated ring-shaped लक्ष्य, three on each side of the quidditch pitch ( फ़ील्ड ).
in the Harry Potter ब्रह्मांड, quidditch holds a fervent following समान to the position कि संघ फ़ुटबॉल holds as a globally लोकप्रिय खेल.
the sport is monumental throughout the wizarding संसार.
हैरी plays an महत्वपूर्ण स्थिति लिये his हाउस team at हॉग्वार्ट्स : he is the seeker and becomes the captain in his छठे year there.
Regional और international competitions are mentioned throughout the series.
in Goblet of Fire, Quidditch at हॉग्वार्ट्स is cancelled लिये the tri-wizard Tournament, but हैरी and the weasleys attend the Quidditch संसार Cup.
in जोड, हैरी उपयोग उसके quidditch कौशल to capture a golden अंडा इससे a ड्रैगन called the Hungarian horntail ( in the पहला कार्य of the Tri-Wizard Tournament ), to कैप्चर a उड़ती key in Philosopher 's स्टोन, and on two key occasions in deathly hallows — getting थाम of Ravenclaw 's diadem, and दौरान the final fight with voldemort — the `` unerring skill of the seeker '' is उपयोगी to him in snatching the Elder wand out of the air.
Harry कुम्हार has owned two broomsticks, the Nimbus 2000 और the firebolt, दोनो of which are नष्ट by the series ' समाप्त.
the game रै been अपनाया in the रियल world in the रूप of मगलू Quidditch.
the United राज्य Congress is the bicameral legislature of the संघीय सरकारी of the United States consisting of two houses : the निम्नतर हाउस known as the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि और the upper हाउस known as the सीनेट.
कॉंग्रेस meets in the कैपिटल in वॉशिंगटन, D.C.
दोनो representatives and सीनेटरों are chosen through direct चुनाव.
कॉंग्रेस रै a कुल of 535 मतदान members : 435 सदस्यों in the House of Representatives and 100 members in the Senate.
सदस्यों of the House of Representatives serve two-year terms representing the लोगों of a ज़िला.
Congressional जिले are apportioned to राज्य by population using the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी परिणाम, each राज्य in the union having at least one प्रतिनिधि in the हाउस of Representatives.
Regardless of जनसांख्यिकी, प्रत्येक of the 50 राज्य has two senators ; the 100 senators प्रत्येक serve a six-year पद.
The शर्तें are staggered so प्रत्येक दो सालो approximately one-third of the Senate is up लिये चुनाव.
प्रत्येक लड़खड़ाते group of one-third of the सीनेटरों are पुकारा 'classes '.
no राज्य of the United राज्य रै two सीनेटरों from the वही क्लास.
Most incumbents तलाश re-election, और उनके historical likelihood of winning subsequent elections exceeds 90 प्रतिशत.
in अगस्त 2012, a gallup पोल reported that Congress’s approval rating amongst अमेरिकी थी at 10 %, मिलान a 38-year कम पहुँचे in नवम्बर 2011.
`` a Little More Country Than That '' is the title of a सोंग लिखा by जॉय + Rory 's रोरी Lee Feek, Wynn varble, और डॉन Poythress, and recorded by अमरीकी country कलाकार ईस्टन कोर्बिन.
it थी released in August 2009 as Corbin 's डेब्यू single और is included on उसके self-titled debut एल्बम.
In अप्रैल 2010, the सोंग पहुँचे Number एक on the country music चार्ट, making Corbin the first पुरूष सोलो कलाकार in seven years to send a डेब्यू सिंगल to Number एक.
It रै महरूम certified Gold by the riaa.
The BlackBerry is a लकीर of wireless handheld डिवाइस and सेवाएं designed और marketed by शोध in गति सीमित ( RIM ) operating as ब्लैकबेरी.
The first ब्लैकबेरी यंत्र, an email पेजर, was released in 1999 ; the most हाल ब्लैकबेरी devices, the Z10 और q10, यहूद announced on January 30, 2013.
the user इंटरफ़ेस varies by model ; most विशेषता a physical क्वर्टी keyboard, while newer generations have relied on a multi-touch स्क्रीन और virtual keyboard.
A ब्लैकबेरी can shoot वीडियो, take फ़ोटो, खेल music, and perform online functions ऐसे as web-browsing and emailing.
वे can भी send and receive push ईमेल और तत्काल संदेश while maintaining a ऊँची level of security through on-device संदेश एन्क्रिप्शन, and हैं designed to function as personal डिजिटल assistants.
BlackBerry डिवाइस support a large variety of तत्काल messaging features, साथ the most लोकप्रिय being the proprietary BlackBerry Messenger सेवा.
the ब्लैकबेरी PlayBook is a टैब्लेट computer offered by the कम्पनी.
The 100 millionth ब्लैकबेरी स्मार्टफोन was shipped in June quarter of 2010 and the 200 millionth smartphone was shipped in September quarter of 2012.
ब्लैकबेरी accounts लिये 3 % of मोबाईल यंत्र बिक्री worldwide in 2011, making its manufacturer the sixth सबसे popular device मेकर ( 25 % of mobile यंत्र बिक्री are स्मार्टफ़ोन ).
the consumer ब्लैकबेरी Internet सेवा is available in 91 देशों worldwide on over 500 mobile service operators using विभिन्न मोबाईल technologies.
as of सितंबर 2012, there were eighty million सदस्य विश्वव्यापी to BlackBerry.
In 2011 the Caribbean और Latin America had the highest penetrations of BlackBerry smartphones worldwide, साथ up to about 45 प्रति cent in the प्रदेश having a RIM device.
ब्लैकबेरी, iphone, एंड्रॉइड, and खिड़कियाँ Phone हैं considered the चार प्रमुख स्मार्टफोन ब्रांड्स.
ब्लैकबेरी is widely referred to as `` crackberry '' in the संयुक्त राज्य, which alludes to इसके excessive use by its स्वामी and is a reference to the addictiveness of crack कोका.
Use of the term crackberry became so फैली कि in नवम्बर 2006 Webster 's नई World कॉलेज Dictionary named `` crackberry '' the `` नई शब्द of the साल. ''
An example of a माँग curve shifting.
the shift इससे d1 to D2 अर्थात् an increase in demand with consequences for the other variables
in economics, the माँग वक्र is the आलेख depicting the relationship between the price of a certain कमोडिटी and the amount of it that उपभोक्ता हैं willing और समर्थ to purchase at that given दाम.
it is a ग्राफिक representation of a demand schedule.
the demand वक्र लिये सब consumers together फ़ॉलो from the माँग वक्र of every व्यक्तिगत उपभोक्ता : the व्यक्तिगत demands at प्रत्येक price are added साथ.
Demand curves are used to अनुमान व्यवहार in competitive बाज़ार, और हैं प्रायः संयुक्त with सप्लाई curves to estimate the संतुलन दाम ( the दाम at which sellers together are willing to sell the वही amount as buyers together हैं willing to buy, भी ज्ञात as मार्केट clearing price ) और the equilibrium मात्रा ( the amount of that good or सेवा कि होगा be उत्पादित and bought without surplus/excess supply or shortage/excess माँग ) of that मार्केट.
In a monopolistic मार्केट, the demand curve facing the monopolist is simply the market माँग curve.
historia
by Nikolaos Gysis ( 1892 )
इतिहास ( from यूनानी - historia, meaning `` पूछताछ, ज्ञान acquired by छानबीन '' ) is an छतरियाँ term that relates to past events as well as the discovery, collection, organization, और प्रस्तुतीकरण of सूचना about ये events.
the term includes लौकिक, geologic, और सशुल्क इतिहास, but is often generically implied to औसत इंसान history.
Scholars who write परिचय इतिहास हैं पुकारा इतिहासकारों.
History can भी refer to the अकादमिक discipline जिससे uses a narrative to जाँचें and analyse a sequence of पास्ट कार्यक्रम, and objectively determine the patterns of cause और प्रभाव कि determine उन्हें.
इतिहासकारों sometimes बहस the प्रकृति of इतिहास और इसके उपयोगिता by discussing the study of the discipline as an end in itself and as a रास्ता of providing `` परिप्रेक्ष्य '' on the समस्याएं of the उपस्थित.
कहानियां आम to a particular संस्कृति, लकिन not समर्थित by बाह्य स्त्रोत ( ऐसे as the किस्से surrounding किंग Arthur ) are प्रायः वर्गीकृत as cultural विरासत or legends, because they do नहीं support the `` disinterested investigation '' जरूरी of the discipline of इतिहास.
Events occurring prior to लिखा record are माना prehistory.
Herodotus, a 5th century B.C. यूनानी इतिहासकार is माना within the Western tradition to be the `` father of history '', and, along साथ his contemporary Thucydides, helped form the मूलाधार लिये the आधुनिक पढ़ाई of human इतिहास.
Their कार्य continues to be read आज and the divide between the culture-focused Herodotus and the military-focused Thucydides remains a पाइंट of contention or दृष्टिकोण in आधुनिक historical writing.
In the Eastern परंपरा, a राज्य वृत्तान्त the वसन्त और पतझड़ Annals थी ज्ञात to be compiled इससे as early as 722 bce हालांकि only 2nd सदी BCE ग्रन्थ बच.
Ancient influences have helped spawn variant interpretations of the nature of इतिहास जिससे have विकसित over the centuries और continue to बदलें आज.
the modern पढ़ाई of इतिहास is wide-ranging, and शामिल the पढ़ाई of specific regions और the study of निश्चित topical or thematical elements of ऐतिहासिक investigation.
प्रायः इतिहास is taught as part of primary और secondary शिक्षा, और the अकादमिक पढ़ाई of इतिहास is a प्रमुख अनुशासन in विश्वविद्यालयों studies.
मैल्कम x ( ; may 19, 1925february 21, 1965 ), born Malcolm Little and also ज्ञात as el-hajj Malik El-Shabazz ( ), थी an african-american Muslim मंत्री and human अधिकारों activist.
to उसके admirers, he थी a courageous एडवोकेट लिये the अधिकारों of blacks, a man जो indicted white अमेरिका in the harshest शर्तें for इसके अपराधों against ब्लैक अमेरिकी.
detractors अभियुक्त him of उपदेश racism, ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता, and हिंसा.
He रै महरूम पुकारा एक of the महानतम and सबसे influential अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी in इतिहास.
मैल्कम x 's पिता died—killed by white supremacists, it थी rumored—when he was यंग, and at तनिक one of his uncles was lynched.
जब he was 13, उसके mother was placed in a mental hospital, and he थी लगाई in a series of फोस्टर घरों.
in 1946, at age 20, he went to थाना लिये तोड़कर and entering.
In थाना, Malcolm X became a सदस्य of the Nation of Islam ; after his parole in 1952, he quickly रोज़ to become one of इसके leaders.
For a दर्जन years, Malcolm X थी the पब्लिक face of the विवादास्पद समूह, लकिन मोहभंग साथ स्वदेश of islam सिर इलियास Muhammad led उसे to छोड़ the स्वदेश in March 1964.
After a period of सफर in Africa and the Middle ईस्ट, he लौटे to the संयुक्त States, where he संस्थापित मुस्लिम Mosque, Inc. and the Organization of Afro-American एकता.
in February 1965, कम than a साल after leaving the Nation of islam, he was assassinated by तीन members of the समूह.
Malcolm X 's expressed मान्यताओं बदला substantially over समय.
As a प्रवक्ता लिये the स्वदेश of islam he सिखाया ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता and advocated separation of black और श्वेत अमेरिकी —in contrast to the civil rights movement 's emphasis on संयोजन.
बाद breaking साथ the Nation of islam in 1964—saying of his संघ with it, `` i किया many बाते as a [ Black ] Muslim कि i 'm sorry लिये अभी.
I थी a zombie then... pointed in a निश्चित direction and told to कूच '' —and बनने a सुन्नी मुस्लिम, he disavowed racism and expressed willingness to work with civil अधिकारों leaders, he continued to emphasize Pan-Africanism, ब्लैक self-determination, and self-defense.
हेनरी merritt `` Hank '' Paulson, Jr. ( born March 28, 1946 ) is an अमरीकी बैंकर जो परोसा as the 74th संयुक्त States Secretary of the Treasury.
He had परोसा as the अध्यक्ष और Chief Executive अधिकारी of गोल्डमैन Sachs, and is now chairman of the Paulson संस्थान, जिससे he founded in 2011 to प्रचार चिरस्थायी आर्थिक growth और a क्लीनर पर्यावरण around the world, with an आरंभिक focus on the United राज्य and China.
A आभासी machine ( vm ) is a software implemented abstraction of the underlying हार्डवेयर, जिससे is प्रस्तुत to the अनुप्रयोग layer of the प्रणाली.
आभासी machines may be आधारित on specifications of a hypothetical कंप्यूटर or emulate the कंप्यूटर architecture और कृत्यों of a रियल world computer.
Spiders ( order Araneae ) हैं air-breathing arthropods that have eight legs और chelicerae साथ fangs that inject venom.
They are the largest order of arachnids और rank सातवाँ in कुल species विविधता among सब other समूह of organisms.
मकड़ियों are मिला विश्वव्यापी on प्रत्येक महाद्वीप मगर for अंटार्कटिक, और have become established in nearly every आवास with the एक्सेप्शन of एयर और समुद्र colonization.
as of 2008, at तनिक 43,678 spider प्रजाति, और 109 families have been अंकित by taxonomists ; however, there रै been भ्रम within the scientific community as to how सब ये परिवारों should be वर्गीकृत, as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications that have been proposed चूंकि 1900.
anatomically, मकड़ियों differ from अन्य arthropods in कि the usual body खण्ड हैं fused into दो tagmata, the cephalothorax और abdomen, and joined by a छोटी, बेलनाकार pedicel.
Unlike कीट, मकड़ियों do not have antennae.
In सब मगर the सबसे आदिम समूह, the Mesothelae, spiders have the most centralized nervous प्रणालियों of सब arthropods, as सब उनके ganglia are fused into एक द्रव्यमान in the cephalothorax.
नापसंद सबसे arthropods, spiders have no extensor मांसपेशियां in उनके limbs and बजाय extend उन्हें by हाइड्रोलिक pressure.
उनके abdomens भालू appendages कि have महरूम परिवर्धित into spinnerets that extrude silk इससे up to six types of silk glands within उनके उदर.
मकड़ी webs vary widely in size, shape and the राशि of स्टिकी लड़ी used.
It अभी appears कि the सर्पिल orb वेब may be एक of the earliest फ़ॉर्म, and मकड़ियों that produce tangled cobwebs हैं more abundant और विविध than orb-web spiders.
spider-like arachnids साथ silk-producing spigots appeared in the devonian काल about, लकिन these पशु जाहिर lacked spinnerets.
सच्चा मकड़ियों have been found in carboniferous रॉक्स from, और are बहुत समान to the सबसे आदिम surviving अनुक्रम, the mesothelae.
The प्रमुख groups of modern spiders, Mygalomorphae and araneomorphae, पहला appeared in the triassic काल, before.
a herbivorous species, bagheera kiplingi, was described in 2008, but all other known species हैं परभक्षी, mostly preying on कीट and on अन्य spiders, हालांकि a few विशाल species भी take birds और lizards.
Spiders use a wide range of strategies to capture prey : trapping it in sticky webs, lassoing it with स्टिकी bolas, mimicking the शिकार to avoid detection, or running it down.
सबसे detect prey मुख्यतः by संवेदन कंपन, but the क्रियाशील hunters have अधि दृष्टि, और hunters of the genus portia show लक्षण of प्रज्ञा in their चुनाव of tactics और ability to develop new ones.
मकड़ियों ' guts are too narrow to take solids, और they liquidize their food by flooding it साथ digestive enzymes और grinding it with the bases of their pedipalps, as वे do नहीं have सच्चा जबड़े.
Male spiders पहचानो themselves by a किस्में of complex प्रेमालाप संस्कार to avoid होने eaten by the females.
males of सबसे species जीवित a few matings, limited मुख्यतः by उनके छोटी life spans.
महिलाओं बुनते रेशा egg-cases, each of जिससे may contain सैंकड़ों of अंडे.
महिलाओं of अनेक प्रजाति परवाह लिये their यंग, लिये example by carrying उन्हें around or by sharing खाना with them.
a अल्पसंख्यक of species are social, building communal webs that may house anywhere इससे a few to 50,000 individuals.
सोशल बर्ताव ranges from precarious toleration, as in the विधवा spiders, to co-operative शिकार और food-sharing.
हालांकि most मकड़ियों live for at सबसे two सालो, tarantulas and other mygalomorph मकड़ियों can सजीव up to 25 सालो in captivity.
While the venom of a few species is dangerous to इंसानो, scientists are now researching the उपयोग of spider venom in medicine and as non-polluting pesticides.
मकड़ी रेशा provides a संयोजन of lightness, strength and elasticity that is superior to कि of synthetic सामग्री, और मकड़ी silk genes have महरूम inserted into mammals and plants to देखिए if these can be प्रयुक्त as रेशा factories.
As a परिणाम of उनके wide range of behaviors, spiders have become common प्रतीकों in आर्ट और mythology symbolizing विभिन्न combinations of patience, क्रूरता और creative powers.

मध्य US household income, 2001-2011
Household income is a माप commonly प्रयुक्त by the United राज्य government और निजी institutions.
Each household is measured by the income of प्रत्येक निवासी over the आयु of 15.
आय includes मजदूरी और salaries, बेरोजगारी insurance, disability payments, चाइल्ड support payments received, नियमित rental रसीदें, as खूब as any personal कारोबार, investment, or other kinds of income प्राप्त routinely.
While inflation-adjusted ( `` रियल '' ) household आय था महरूम increasing almost every year from 1945 to 1999, it रै चूंकि been चपटा and भी decreased recently.
u.S. median household income fell from $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011.
चरम गरीबी in the United States, meaning households जीना on कम than $ 2 per day before government benefits, doubled इससे 1996 to 1.5 लाख households in 2011, including 2.8 million children.
The residents of the household do नहीं have to be सम्बन्धित to the head of the household for their आय to be considered भाग of the household 's income.
As households tend to share a समान economic कॉन्टेक्स्ट, the उपयोग of household आय remains among the सबसे widely स्वीकृत measures of आय.
कि the size of a household is not commonly लिया into account in ऐसे measures may विकृत कोई विश्लेषण of fluctuations भीतर or among the household income categories, और may रेंडर direct comparisons between quintiles मुश्किल or even नामुमकिन.
a पंजीकृत एजेंट, भी ज्ञात as a निवासी एजेंट or statutory agent, in संयुक्त States business law, is a कारोबार or व्यक्तिगत designated to receive सेवा of process ( sop ) when a कारोबार entity is a party in a legal action such as a मुकदमा or समन.
The registered एजेंट 's address may also be where the राज्य होगा send the paperwork for the yearly नवीकरण of the कारोबार एंटिटी 's charter.
The पंजीकृत agent for a कारोबार एंटिटी may be an individual member of the कम्पनी, or ( अधिक प्रायः ) a तीसरा पार्टी, such as the organization 's lawyer or a सेवा company.
विफलता to properly maintain a registered agent can affect a कम्पनी negatively.

`` जीवन, स्वतंत्रता, और the pursuit of Happiness '' is a well-known phrase in the United राज्य घोषणा of Independence.
The phrase is meant to exemplify the `` unalienable rights '' साथ which सब human beings हैं endowed by their creator for उनके protection of which they संस्थान सरकारें.
तलवारबाजी, is typically विभाजित into ओलम्पिक fencing, शास्त्रीय fencing and historical तलवारबाजी,.
The खेल of fencing ( commonly called ओलम्पिक fencing or competitive fencing ) is divided into three हथियार categories : foil, sabre and épée.
Classical fencing uses the same three हथियार, लकिन approaches fencing as a martial आर्ट.
प्रतिस्पर्धी तलवारबाजी is एक of five खेल which रै महरूम प्रदर्शित at प्रत्येक एक of the आधुनिक Olympic Games, the other four being Athletics, साइकिलिंग, Swimming, and Gymnastics.
The quadriceps femoris ( Latin लिये `` four-headed मांसपेशी of the femur `` ), भी पुकारा simply the quadriceps, quadriceps extensor, quads, is a विशाल muscle group that शामिल the चार प्रचलित मांसपेशियां on the front of the जांघ.
it is the great extensor मांसपेशी of the knee, forming a विशाल fleshy mass जिससे कवर the front and पहलू of the femur.
The proper Latin plural form of the adjective quadriceps would be quadricipites.
In modern English usage, quadriceps is used in both एकवचन और बहुवचन.
The singular रूप quadricep, उत्पादित by hypercorrection, is frequently used.
rms टाइटैनिक was a अंग्रेजों यात्री लाइनर that sank in the North Atlantic समंदर on 15 April 1912 बाद colliding साथ an iceberg दौरान her maiden voyage from Southampton, uk to New York नगर, US.
The डूब of Titanic caused the deaths of 1,502 लोगों in एक of the deadliest peacetime maritime आपदाओं in modern history.
The rms Titanic was the largest ship afloat at the time of उसके maiden voyage.
वो was the दूसरी of three ओलम्पिक क्लास ocean liners operated by the White Star Line, और she थी built by the harland और Wolff shipyard in belfast साथ Thomas Andrews, जो perished with the जलयान, as उसके नवल architect.
on उसके maiden voyage, वो carried 2,224 passengers and crew.
अंतर्गत the कमांड of एडवर्ड Smith, उसके यात्री included कुछ of the wealthiest people in the संसार, as खूब as सैंकड़ों of emigrants from Great Britain और आयरलैंड, Scandinavia and elsewhere throughout Europe seeking a नई जीवन in North America.
the जलयान थी designed to be the पिछला शब्द in सुकून and लक्ज़री, साथ an on-board gymnasium, तैराकी पूल, पुस्तकालयों, high-class रेस्तरां and opulent केबिन.
She भी था a शक्तिशाली wireless telegraph provided लिये the convenience of यात्री as well as लिये operational use.
Though she had उन्नत safety सुविधाएँ ऐसे as watertight compartments and remotely activated watertight doors, she lacked enough lifeboats to accommodate all of those सवार.
क्युकी of outdated मेरीटाइम safety regulations, she carried तभी पर्याप्त lifeboats for 1,178 people—slightly अधिक than half of the क्रमांक travelling on the maiden voyage, और one-third उसके कुल passenger and क्रू क्षमता.
After leaving southampton on 10 April 1912, Titanic पुकारा at Cherbourg in फ़्रांस और Queenstown ( now Cobh ) in आयरलैंड पहले heading westwards towards नई York.
on 14 April 1912, four दिनों into the क्रासिंग and परिचय 375 miles ( 600 km ) south of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड, she hit an हिमशैल at 11:40 pm ship 's time.
the glancing collision caused Titanics hull प्लेटों to बकल inwards along उसके स्टारबोर्ड पक्ष और opened five of उसके सोलह watertight compartments to the sea ; the ship धीरे भर with water.
meanwhile, यात्री and some crew सदस्यों were evacuated in lifeboats, many of which यहूद launched तभी partly loaded.
A disproportionate क्रमांक of मेन यहूद बाएँ aboard because of a `` women and children first `` protocol followed by some of the officers लदान the lifeboats.
By 2:20 am, वो broke अलावा और foundered, साथ खूब over one हजार लोगों स्टिल सवार.
Just under two hours बाद the टाइटैनिक foundered, the Cunard लाइनर RMS Carpathia arrived on the scene of the sinking, जहाँ she brought aboard an अनुमानित 705 survivors.
The विपत्ति was greeted with worldwide शॉक और outrage at the विशाल loss of जीवन and the regulatory and operational failures that had led to it.
Public inquiries in Britain and the संयुक्त राज्य led to major improvements in मेरीटाइम safety.
One of their सबसे important legacies थी the establishment in 1914 of the International Convention लिये the Safety of Life at समुद्र ( solas ), which still governs मेरीटाइम सुरक्षा आज.
additionally, अनेक new wireless regulations यहूद passed around the संसार in an प्रयत्न to सीख from the अनेक missteps in बेतार communications -- -which could have saved अनेक more यात्री.
Many of the survivors खोया सब of उनके धन and possessions and यहूद बाएँ destitute ; अनेक families, विशेषकर those of क्रू members इससे southampton, lost their प्राथमिक bread-winners.
वे यहूद helped by an outpouring of public sympathy और charitable donations.
कुछ of the पुरूष survivors were accused of cowardice लिये leaving the जलयान while लोगों यहूद still on फलक ; the White Star Line 's अध्यक्ष, J. Bruce Ismay, faced social ostracism लिये the बाकी of उसके life.
The wreck of the Titanic remains on the समुद्रतल, split in two and gradually disintegrating at a depth of.
चूंकि its डिस्कवरी in 1985, हज़ारों of artefacts have been recovered और put on प्रदर्शक at museums around the संसार.
Titanic has become एक of the most famous ships in इतिहास, उसके मेमोरी kept जिंदा by numerous किताबे, folk songs, films, exhibits, और memorials.
the इंसान leg is the संपूर्ण lower extremity or limb of the इंसान body, including the foot, जांघ और भी the हिप or gluteal region ; however, the precise definition in human anatomy refers तभी to the खण्ड of the lower limb extending from the घुटना to the ankle.
Legs हैं प्रयुक्त for standing, walking, कूद, कार्यशील, kicking, और similar क्रियाएँ, और constitute a significant portion of a व्यक्ति 's द्रव्यमान.
This आलेख is परिचय the demographic features of the population of तुर्कों, including जनसांख्यिकी density, नस्ल, education level, health of the populace, आर्थिक status, religious संबद्धों and other पहलुओं of the population.
as of 2010, the population of Turkey is अनुमानित to be 73.7 लाख with a growth rate of 1.21 % प्रति annum ( 2009 फिगर ).
the जनसांख्यिकी is relatively यंग साथ 26.6 % falling in the 0-14 आयु bracket.
According to the OECD/World बैंको population आंकडे in Turkey the population विकास from 1990 to 2008 was 16 लाख or 29 %.

James मैडिसन, jr. ( March 16, 1751 ( o.s. कूच 5 ) – जून 28, 1836 ) थी an अमरीकी statesman and political theorist, the चौथी President of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1809–1817 ).
He is hailed as the “father of the constitution” लिये being instrumental in the drafting of the संयुक्त States Constitution and as the कुंजी champion and लेखक of the संयुक्त राज्य Bill of अधिकारों.
He परोसा as a राजनेता much of उसके adult जीवन.
बाद the संविधान had महरूम drafted, Madison became एक of the leaders in the movement to ratify it.
उसके collaboration with Alexander Hamilton and John Jay उत्पादित the federalist Papers ( 1788 ).
Circulated only in नई यॉर्क at the समय, वे होता later be माना among the most important polemics in support of the संविधान.
He was भी a प्रतिनिधि to the वर्जिनिया संवैधानिक ratifying convention, और थी इंस्ट्रूमेंटल to the successful अनुसमर्थन effort in Virginia.
Like most of उसके contemporaries, मैडिसन बदला his राजनैतिक दृश्य दौरान his life.
दौरान the drafting और ratification of the constitution, he favored a दमदार national सरकारी, हालांकि बाद he grew to favor stronger राज्य सरकारें, before settling between the दो extremes लेट in his life.
in 1789, मैडिसन became a leader in the नई हाउस of Representatives, drafting many मौलिक कानून.
he is notable for drafting the first ten amendments to the Constitution, और thus is ज्ञात as the `` Father of the विधेयक of अधिकारों ``.
Madison worked closely with President George वॉशिंगटन to organize the नई संघीय government.
तोड़कर साथ हैमिल्टन and कया became the federalist Party in 1791, मैडिसन और थामस Jefferson व्यवस्थित कया वे called the Republican पार्टी ( later called by इतिहासकारों the Democratic-Republican पार्टी )
as jefferson’s Secretary of राज्य ( 1801–1809 ), Madison पर्यवेक्षित the Louisiana खरीदें, जिससे doubled the nation’s size.
बाद his election to the प्रेसिडेंसी, he presided over नवीनीकृत prosperity for अनेक सालो.
As president ( 1809–17 ), बाद the विफलता of राजनयिक विरोध और a व्यापार embargo against Great Britain, he led the nation into the युद्ध of 1812.
he was responding to अंग्रेजों encroachments on अमरीकी honor and rights ; in addition, he wanted to समाप्त the influence of the British among उनके Indian allies, whose resistance अवरोधित United राज्य उपनिवेश in the Midwest around the ग्रेट झीलों.
मैडिसन found the युद्ध to be an administrative nightmare, as the संयुक्त States had neither a strong फौज nor वित्तीय system ; as a result, he afterward समर्थित a stronger नेशनल government और a दमदार military, as खूब as the national बैंको, जिससे he had long opposed.
जैसे अन्य Virginia कूटनीतिज्ञों in the slave society, he was a slaveholder जो inherited his वृक्षारोपण ज्ञात as Montpelier, and owned hundreds of slaves during his lifetime to cultivate तम्बाकू और other crops.
मैडिसन supported the three-fifths compromise that अनुमत three-fifths of the enumerated population of स्लेव to be counted for प्रतिनिधित्व.
`` रोमन 's Revenge '' is a सोंग performed by American rapper Nicki minaj इससे उसके debut स्टुडियो album Pink शुक्रवार.
it थी लिखा by Minaj और rapper एमिनेम, who is भी featured in the song, और थी उत्पादित by swizz Beatz.
It थी released exclusively on October 30, 2010 through the US itunes स्टोर, as a promotional रिलीज preceding the एल्बम 's release.
the song initiated a feud between लील ' Kim and Minaj, where अनेक लोगों लगा the song थी directed at लील ' Kim और regarded around उसके जज्बात towards minaj 's वृद्धि to fame.
the song references Minaj 's alter-ego, रोमन Zolanski, and एमिनेम 's alter-ego, पतला Shady.
The song garnered बहुत धनात्मक reviews इससे आलोचकों, most of जिससे praised the song as a stand-out track on the एल्बम.

हाइड्रोलिक fluid being poured.
हाइड्रोलिक fluids, भी पुकारा हाइड्रोलिक liquids, are the medium by which power is transferred in hydraulic machinery.
Common hydraulic fluids are आधारित on mineral आयल or water.
Examples of equipment that might use हाइड्रोलिक fluids शामिल excavators and backhoes, हाइड्रोलिक brakes, शक्ति steering systems, transmissions, garbage ट्रक, वायुयान उड़ान कंट्रोल प्रणालियों, lifts, और industrial मशीनरी.
Hydraulic प्रणालियों जैसे the ones उल्लेखित ऊपर will कार्य most efficiently if the हाइड्रोलिक द्रव used रै no compressibility
Mahindra Tractor
महिंद्रा Tractors, the farm उपकरण division of महिंद्रा & महिंद्रा, builds और sources tractors that are बेची विश्वव्यापी आरपार छह continents.
महिंद्रा is also among the शीर्ष तीन ट्रैक्टर manufacturers in the world.
महिंद्रा रै a विशाल consumer base in India, चीन and अमेरिका और a growing आधार in Australia.
the company builds अधिक tractors in इण्डिया than कोई other निर्माता, और रै the क्षमता to build 150,000 tractors a साल.
In 1963, m & M formed a संयुक्त venture with International Harvester to manufacture tractors carrying the Mahindra nameplate लिये the Indian market.
हथियारबंद साथ engineering, tooling और निर्माण know-how gained from this relationship, m & m developed its first ट्रैक्टर, the B-275.
महिंद्रा tractors साथ sales of nearly 85,000 इकाई annually is एक of the largest tractor companies in the world, and is number one in sales in India - the largest tractor मार्केट in the world.
To विस्तार into the growing tractor मार्केट in China, महिंद्रा acquired majority stake in Jiangling.
To raise awareness about Mahindra in the us, महिंद्रा USA announced इसके new प्रायोजन in the nascar देशभर Series with r3 Motorsports, which is participating साथ a # 23 Mahindra Tractors शेवरलेट.
The car will be driven by रॉबर्ट Richardson, jr. Mahindra USA, inc. घोषित a 17-race प्राथमिक and 18-race associate प्रायोजन लिये the 2009 NASCAR Nationwide श्रेणी.

The POWER6 is a microprocessor developed by IBM that implemented the शक्ति isa v.2.03.
जब it became उपलब्धियाँ in systems in 2007, it succeeded the शक्ति5+ as ibm 's flagship शक्ति माइक्रोप्रोसेसर.
it is part of the eCLipz प्रोजेक्ट, कहा to have a goal of converging IBM 's server हार्डवेयर जहाँ practical ( hence `` ipz '' in the एक्रोनिम : iSeries, pseries, और zseries ).
the American मध्य क्लास is a सोशल class in the United राज्य.
जबकि the अवधारणा is typically ambiguous in लोकप्रिय opinion और common language use, contemporary सोशल scientists have put आगे अनेक, more or less congruent, theories on the American middle class.
depending on क्लास model प्रयुक्त, the मध्य class may constitute anywhere इससे 25 % to 66 % of households.
एक of the first major अध्ययन of the middle क्लास in अमेरिका थी श्वेत कॉलर : the अमरीकी Middle वर्ग, प्रकाशित in 1951 by sociologist C. राइट Wright_Mills Mills Wright_Mills.
Later sociologists ऐसे as Dennis गिल्बर्ट of Hamilton कॉलेज commonly divide the मध्य class into दो sub-groups.
constituting roughly 15 % to 20 % of households is the अपर or पेशेवर मध्य क्लास consisting of अत्यधिक educated, वेतनभोगी professionals और managers.
Constituting roughly one तीसरा of households is the निम्नतर middle क्लास consisting ज़्यादातर of semi-professionals, skilled कारीगरों and lower-level management.
Middle-class व्यक्तियों commonly have a आरामदायक मानक of living, significant आर्थिक सुरक्षा, considerable कार्य autonomy and rely on their expertise to sustain themselves.
Members of the मध्य क्लास belong to विविध groups which overlap साथ प्रत्येक अन्य.
overall, middle-class persons, विशेषकर upper-middle-class individuals, हैं characterized by conceptualizing, creating और परामर्श.
Thus, college शिक्षा is one of the प्रमुख indicators of middle-class औकात.
largely attributed to the nature of middle-class occupations, मध्य class मान tend to emphasize independence, adherence to मूलभूत मानकों, valuing innovation और respecting non-conformity.
Politically more क्रियाशील than other demographics, कॉलेज शिक्षित मध्य क्लास पेशेवर हैं विभाजित between the two major parties.
Income varies considerably from निकट the national median to खूब in excess of $ 100,000.
Household income figures, however, do नहीं सदा प्रतिबिंबित क्लास औकात and standard of जीना, as they are largely बहकावे by the क्रमांक of income earners and fail to recognize household आकार.
it is इसलिए संभावित for a विशाल, dual-earner, lower middle क्लास household to out-earn a small, one-earner, upper मध्य class household.
the मध्य classes are very influential, as they encompass the बहुमत of voters, लेखक, शिक्षक, journalists, and editors.
Most societal रुझान in the US originate भीतर the मध्य वर्ग.
