तबाह इससे the 1906 सैन फ्रांसिस्को भूकंप, remembered as one of the worst प्राकृतिक disasters in संयुक्त राज्य इतिहास
a विपत्ति is a प्राकृतिक or man-made ( or technological ) hazard resulting in an event of substantial extent causing significant शारीरिक क्षति or destruction, loss of जीवन, or drastic बदलें to the environment.
a विपत्ति can be ostensively पारिभाषित as कोई tragic इवेंट stemming इससे events such as earthquakes, floods, catastrophic accidents, फ़ायर, or explosions.
It is a घटना कि can cause damage to life और property और destroy the economic, social और सांस्कृतिक life of people.
in समकालीन academia, disasters हैं seen as the consequence of inappropriately प्रबंधित रिस्क.
These risks हैं the product of a combination of दोनो hazard/s और vulnerability.
Hazards कि स्ट्राइक in areas साथ कम vulnerability will never become disasters, as is the case in uninhabited regions.
Developing देशों suffer the greatest costs when a विपत्ति हिट्स – अधिक than 95 percent of सब मौतों caused by disasters occur in विकासशील countries, and losses due to natural disasters हैं 20 टाइम्स वृहद ( as a प्रतिशत of जीडीपी ) in developing देशों than in industrialized देशों.
In कम्प्यूटिंग, booting ( also ज्ञात as booting up ) is the initial नियत of परिचालन that a कंप्यूटर प्रणाली performs जब विद्युत power to the CPU is switched on.
the process begins when a computer is turned on for the पहला समय or is re-energized after being turned बंद, और ends when the कंप्यूटर is ready to perform its normal परिचालन.
On modern general purpose computers, this can take tens of seconds और typically involves performing a power-on self-test, locating और initializing peripheral डिवाइस, और then finding, लदान और starting an operating प्रणाली.
अनेक कंप्यूटर प्रणालियों भी allow these operations to be initiated by a तन्त्र command बगैर cycling power, in what is known as a soft रिबूट, हालांकि कुछ of the initial परिचालन might be छोड़ा on a soft रिबूट.
A boot लोडर is a कंप्यूटर program that loads the main operating प्रणाली or runtime environment for the कंप्यूटर after completion of the self-tests.
The कंप्यूटर पद बूट is छोटी लिये बूटस्ट्रैप or bootstrap load और derives from the phrase to खींचो oneself up by one 's bootstraps.
the उपयोग calls attention to the आवश्यकता that, if सबसे software is loaded onto a computer by other तन्त्र already कार्यशील on the computer, some यांत्रिकी जरूर मौजूद to लोड initial software onto the कंप्यूटर.
Early computers प्रयुक्त a variety of ad-hoc विधि to get a छोटी program into memory to solve this प्रॉब्लम.
the आविष्कार of integrated सर्किट read-only memory ( rom ) of various types solved इस paradox by allowing computers to be shipped साथ a start up program कि could नहीं be erased.
विकास in the capacity of rom has अनुमत कभी अधिक विस्तृत start up procedures to be implemented.
on general purpose computers, the boot process begins with the execution of an initial कार्यक्रम भंडारित in boot ROMs or पढ़ा in another fashion.
in some पुरानी computers, the आरंभिक program might have been the अनुप्रयोग to run, if no ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली was प्रयुक्त, or the ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली.
In other computers, the initial program is a boot loader कि may then लोड into random-access मेमोरी ( राम ), इससे nonvolatile द्वितीयक भंडार ( ऐसे as a मुश्किल disk ड्राइव ) or, in some older कंप्यूटर, from a मीडियम ऐसे as punched ताश, punched tape, or magnetic टेप in पुरानी computers, the binary code of an operating system or runtime environment and तब execute it.
if the boot लोडर is limited in its size and सामर्थ्य, it may, instead, load a larger and अधिक capable secondary बूट लोडर, जिससे would तब लोड the ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली or runtime environment.
कुछ अंतःस्थापित प्रणालियों do नहीं आवश्यकता a noticeable बूट अनुक्रम to शुरू functioning and when turned on may simply run operational programs कि are भंडारित in ROM.
firebird is an खोलें सोर्स एसक्यूएल relational database management प्रणाली that runs on Linux, Windows, and a variety of Unix.
the database forked from Borland 's खोलें source edition of InterBase in 2000, but चूंकि Firebird 1.5 the code रै been largely rewritten.
आउटसोर्सिंग is the contracting आउट of an आतंरिक business process to a third-party संगठन.
the practice of contracting a कारोबार process out to a third party बल्कि than staffing it internally is common in the आधुनिक economy.
the पद `` outsourcing '' became popular in the संयुक्त राज्य near the फेरे of the 21st सदी.
आउटसोर्सिंग sometimes involves transferring कर्मचारी and एसेट from एक firm to another, लकिन not always.
The परिभाषा of आउटसोर्सिंग includes both विदेशी और domestic contracting, और sometimes includes offshoring, जिससे अर्थात् relocating a कारोबार function to another देश.
वित्तीय savings इससे निम्नतर अंतरराष्ट्रीय labor दरों is a big motivation for outsourcing/offshoring.
The opposite of outsourcing is called insourcing, जिससे entails bringing processes handled by third-party firms in-house, और is sometimes संपन्नता via लंबवत integration.
However, a कारोबार can provide a अनुबंध service to another कारोबार without necessarily insourcing कि business process.
इंसान immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) is a lentivirus ( धीरे replicating retrovirus ) that कल्याणकारी acquired immunodeficiency syndrome ( AIDS ), a कंडीशन in इंसानो in which progressive विफलता of the immune प्रणाली allows life-threatening opportunistic infections and cancers to thrive.
संक्रमण with HIV occurs by the transfer of रक्त, वीर्य, vaginal द्रव, pre-ejaculate, or breast milk.
Within these bodily fluids, hiv is present as दोनो फ़्री वायरस particles और virus भीतर infected immune कोशिकाएं.
hiv infects vital कोशिकाएं in the human प्रतिरक्षा system such as helper t cells ( specifically CD4 + T cells ), macrophages, and dendritic cells.
HIV infection लीड to कम levels of cd4+ T cells through a number of mechanisms including : apoptosis of uninfected bystander कोशिकाएं, direct वाइरल killing of संक्रमित cells, और killing of infected cd4+ T कोशिकाएं by cd8 cytotoxic lymphocytes कि recognize संक्रमित cells.
When CD4+ T cell संख्याएँ decline नीचे a critical level, cell-mediated immunity is lost, और the देह becomes progressively अधिक susceptible to opportunistic infections.
the firepole in a fire station in टोरंटो
a फायरमैन 's pole ( भी पुकारा a स्लाइडिंग ध्रुव or firepole ) is a wooden ध्रुव or a मेटल ट्यूब or pipe संस्थापित between floors in आग stations, allowing firefighters responding to an सचेतक to quickly descend to the ground मंजिल तेज़ than by using a मानक staircase.
the device थी invented in the 1870s by David Kenyon, in Chicago, Illinois, although it is प्रायः incorrectly credited to the बोस्टन आग Department.
मरियम poppins is the title अक्षर of a श्रेणी of children 's किताबे लिखा by P. L. Travers.
throughout the Mary poppins श्रेणी, which lasted इससे 1934 to 1988, मरियम Shepard was the इलस्ट्रेटर और acted as a second author.
The books केन्द्र on a magical अंग्रेज़ी nanny, Mary Poppins.
She is blown by the ईस्ट हवा to क्रमांक सत्रह Cherry Tree लेन, लंदन, and into the बैंको ' household to care for उनके children.
Encounters with चिमनी sweeps, दुकानदारों and विभिन्न adventures follow until Mary Poppins abruptly leaves, i.e., `` pops-out ''.
The adventures लो प्लेस over a कुल of आठ books.
however, only the first three books feature Mary Poppins arriving और leaving.
the later पाँच किताबे recount previously unrecorded adventures इससे her असली तीन visits.
as P. L. Travers explains in उसके परिचय to मरियम poppins in the Park, `` वो can नहीं forever arrive and depart. ''
The books यहूद adapted in 1964 into a musical Disney film starring जूली Andrews and Dick Van Dyke.
In 2004, डिज़्नी नाट्य उत्पादित a स्टेज musical अनुकूलन in the वेस्ट End थिएटर.
The stage musical was transferred to ब्रॉडवे in 2006 जहाँ it ran until its closing on March 3, 2013.
It has महरूम highly successful, as थी the 1964 फिल्मी.
The Last सोंग is a 2010 American coming of आयु टीन romantic नाटक फिल्मी विकसित alongside निकोलस स्पार्क्स ' अनोखा by the same name.
The फिल्मी थी निर्देशित by Julie ऐनी Robinson in her विशेषता film directorial डेब्यू और co-written by Sparks और Jeff वैन wie.
the पिछला Song stars Miley सायरस, Liam Hemsworth, और Greg Kinnear and follows a troubled किशोरावस्था as वो reconnects साथ her estranged father और falls in love दौरान a गर्मियाँ in a quiet Southern संयुक्त राज्य बीच कस्बा.
the film is वितरित by touchstone तस्वीरें.
Sparks थी approached to write both the फिल्मी 's पटकथा और the novel.
स्पार्क्स completed the screenplay in January 2009, prior to the completion of the novel, making the पिछला Song उसके first script to be optioned for film.
The setting, originally in North कैरोलिना like the novel, moved to जॉर्जिया बाद the राज्य था campaigned लिये महीने to मेजबान production.
Upon beginning उत्पादन in tybee द्वीप, जॉर्जिया and आसपास savannah, The Last Song became the पहला फिल्म to be दोनो शॉट और नियत in tybee द्वीप.
फिल्मांकन lasted from जून 15 to August 18, 2009 with much of it occurring on the island 's बीच और बांध.
the पिछला Song थी originally अनुसूचित लिये चौड़ी रिलीज on January 8, 2010, but was स्थगित to March 31, 2010.
Written Simlish
Simlish is a fictional language प्रदर्शित in EA Games ' Sim श्रेणी of खेल.
It debuted in SimCopter, और रै been especially prominent in the Sims, The Sims 2 और The Sims 3.
The Sims development team created the unique Simlish भाषा by experimenting with fractured Ukrainian, फ्रेंच, Latin, Finnish, English, Fijian, सेबुआनो, और tagalog.
simlish can भी be heard in simcity 4, SimCity Societies and simcity 2013, लकिन far कम अक्सर.
Civilized Creatures in spore can भी be taught to बोलो simlish.
It is भी featured to an extent in Firaxis खेल ' सिड Meier 's simgolf.
Designer Will Wright was conscious of the need लिये संवाद in the game, but thought that using a रियल language would मेक it ध्वनि too repetitive और होता भी be too costly to hire अनुवादक लिये संसार भाषाएं.
initially, inspired by the देशी अमरीकी code talkers of World War II, सीम निर्माता होगा राइट and language विशेषज्ञ मार्क gimbel suggested experimenting साथ the navajo language to बनाएँ simlish.
however, they ultimately decided कि simlish worked बेहतरीन as a `` language '' made up of gibberish words कि could n't be अनूदित, so that its अर्थ would be बाएँ open to the कल्पना of the player.
Wright later commented that using `` nonsense भाषा '' turned out to be the right development choice, as लोगों यहूद सक्षम of imagining it more realistically than a computer could simulate a real one.
The actual sound of Simlish was created improvisationally by आवाज़ अभिनेताओं Stephen Kearin और Gerri Lawlor.
An उदाहरण of अल्ट्रासोनिक परीक्षण ( UT ) on blade जड़ें of a v2500 IAE aircraft इंजन.
Step 1 : the UT probe is लगाई on the रूट of the ब्लेड to be inspected with the सहायता of a special borescope औजार ( वीडियो probe ).
Step 2 : यंत्र जमावट are input.
कदम 3 : The जांच is scanned over the blade root.
In इस case, an indication ( peak in the data ) through the red line ( or फाटक ) indicates a good ब्लेड ; an indication to the बाएँ of कि range indicates a crack.
Principle of अल्ट्रासोनिक परीक्षण.
बाएँ : a probe भेजना a ध्वनि wave into a परीक्षण सामग्री.
There are two indications, one इससे the initial pulse of the probe, and the second due to the back wall echo.
सही : A defect creates a तीसरा indication and simultaneously reduces the आयाम of the back वॉल indication.
the गहराई of the defect is determined by the अनुपात d/e
In अल्ट्रासोनिक परीक्षण ( ut ), बहुत short अल्ट्रासोनिक pulse-waves with बीच frequencies ranging इससे 0.1-15 MHz and occasionally up to 50 mhz हैं शुभारम्भ into materials to detect आतंरिक खामियां or to characterize materials.
a common example is अल्ट्रासोनिक thickness measurement, जिससे परीक्षण the thickness of the test ऑब्जेक्ट, लिये उदाहरण, to मॉनिटर pipework संक्षारण.
Ultrasonic परीक्षण is often performed on steel and अन्य metals और alloys, हालांकि it can भी be used on कंक्रीट, wood और composites, albeit with कम रेज़ोल्यूशन.
It is a form of non-destructive परीक्षण used in अनेक उद्योग including aerospace, ऑटोमोटिव और other परिवहन सेक्टर.
the vas deferens ( बहुवचन : vasa deferentia ), भी पुकारा ductus deferens ( Latin : `` carrying-away vessel '' ; बहुवचन : ductus deferentes ), is भाग of the male anatomy of many vertebrates ; वे transport sperm इससे the epididymis in पुट of ejaculation.
Vascular ischemia of the toes with characteristic cyanosis.
in आयुर्विज्ञान, ischemia, भी spelled as ischaemia or ischæmia, ( ; इससे यूनानी भाषा ισχαιμία, ischaimía ; isch- रूट denoting a restriction or thinning or to make or grow thin/lean, haema रक्त ) is a restriction in रक्त supply to tissues, causing a shortage of oxygen and ग्लूकोज needed लिये cellular चयापचय ( to keep ऊतक alive ).
ischemia is generally caused by समस्याएं with blood बरतन, साथ resultant damage to or dysfunction of tissue.
it भी अर्थात् लोकल anemia in a दिए भाग of a देह sometimes resulting इससे जमघट ( ऐसे as vasoconstriction, घनास्रता or embolism ).
Down syndrome ( DS ) or bas 's syndrome, also known as trisomy 21, is a genetic disorder caused by the presence of all or भाग of a तीसरा copy of chromosome 21.
bas syndrome is the सबसे आम chromosome abnormality in इंसानो.
it is typically associated with a delay in संज्ञानात्मक क्षमता ( mental retardation, or mr ) and physical growth, और a particular नियत of facial characteristics.
the average iq of यंग वयस्कों with bas सिंड्रोम is around 50, whereas young adults without the condition typically have an IQ of 100.
( mr रै historically महरूम defined as an iq below 70. )
a विशाल proportion of individuals with bas सिंड्रोम have a कठोर degree of intellectual विकलांगता.
Down syndrome is named after जॉन Langdon Down, the British चिकित्सक who वर्णित the syndrome in 1866.
the कंडीशन थी clinically described पहले by जां etienne dominique Esquirol in 1838 और Edouard Seguin in 1844.
bas syndrome was पहचाना as a chromosome 21 trisomy by Dr. jérôme lejeune in 1959.
bas syndrome can be identified in a baby at birth or पहले birth by prenatal screening.
Pregnancies with this diagnosis are often terminated.
The सीडीसी estimates that परिचय एक of every 691 babies born in the United States each साल is born साथ Down syndrome.
अनेक children साथ bas syndrome हैं educated in नियमित स्कूल वर्ग while अन्य आवश्यकता specialised educational सुविधाएं.
Some children ग्रैजुएट from ऊँची स्कूल, और, in the us, वहीँ are increasing opportunities for participating in post-secondary शिक्षा.
Education और उचित care रै महरूम दिखाया to improve विशेषता of जीवन significantly.
अनेक adults साथ bas Syndrome are able to कार्य at सशुल्क employment in the जातियाँ, जबकि others आवश्यकता a more sheltered work environment.

the Servicemen 's Readjustment अधिनियम of 1944 ( p.l. 78-346, 58 Stat. 284m ), ज्ञात informally as the G.I. Bill, थी a विधि that provided a range of लाभ for returning संसार War ii veterans ( commonly referred to as g.i.s ).
Benefits शामिल low-cost mortgages, low-interest लोन to प्रारंभ a कारोबार or farm, नकदी भुगतान of ट्यूशन and जीना expenses to attend कॉलेज, ऊँची स्कूल or vocational शिक्षा, as खूब as एक year of unemployment compensation.
It थी उपलब्धियाँ to प्रत्येक दिग्गज who had been on क्रियाशील duty during the war सालो for at तनिक ninety दिनों and had नहीं महरूम dishonorably discharged ; combat थी not जरूरी.
By the end of the कार्यक्रम in 1956, roughly 2.2 million veterans had प्रयुक्त the g.i. Bill education benefits in अनुक्रम to attend colleges or universities, और an additional 6.6 लाख used these benefits लिये कुछ kind of प्रशिक्षण program.
Since the original 1944 law, the पद रै आइये to शामिल other दिग्गज benefit programs निर्मित to assist veterans of subsequent युद्धों as खूब as peacetime सेवा.
इतिहासकारों and अर्थशास्त्रियों consider the g.i. Bill a प्रमुख राजनैतिक success—especially in कंट्रास्ट to the treatments of संसार War i veterans—and a major contribution to America 's भण्डार of human पूंजी that sped long-term economic growth.
the Watergate scandal was a political scandal that occurred in the United राज्य in the 1970s as a परिणाम of the जून 17, 1972 break-in at the Democratic नेशनल कमेटी headquarters at the वाटरगेट office जटिल in वॉशिंगटन, D.C., and the निक्सन प्रशासन 's attempted cover-up of its involvement.
The scandal eventually led to the इस्तीफा of Richard Nixon, the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, on August 9, 1974 — the only resignation of a U.S. President.
The scandal भी resulted in the indictment, विचारण, conviction, and incarceration of forty-three persons, dozens of whom were निक्सन 's शीर्ष प्रशासन officials.
The affair began साथ the arrest of five मेन लिये तोड़कर and entering into the Democratic National Committee ( dnc ) मुख्यालय at the Watergate जटिल on जून 17, 1972.
the Federal ब्यूरो of Investigation ( FBI ) connected नकदी मिला on the burglars to a slush fund used by the कमेटी लिये the Re-Election of the President, the आधिकारिक organization of Nixon 's अभियान.
in जुलाई 1973, as प्रमाण mounted विरूद्ध the president 's स्टाफ, सहित testimony provided by former स्टाफ सदस्यों in an investigation conducted by the Senate वाटरगेट कमेटी, it थी revealed that अध्यक्ष निक्सन था a tape-recording system in उसके offices और he था recorded अनेक conversations.
रिकार्डिंग from ये टेपों implicated the president, revealing he था attempted to कवर up the questionable ( and illegal ) goings-on that had taken place during his प्रशासन, दोनो पहले and after the break-in.
After a protracted श्रेणी of कड़वा court battles, the U.S. परम् Court unanimously ruled कि the president था to हाथ over the tapes to government investigators ; he ultimately complied.
facing near-certain महाभियोग in the House of Representatives and a strong सम्भावना of a conviction in the सीनेट, Nixon resigned the presidency on August 9, 1974.
उसके successor, जेराल्ड Ford, तब issued a pardon to him.
एलिज़ाबेथ imogene webber ( formerly lansing and Spencer ) is a fictional अक्षर on the एबीसी दिन soap opera General Hospital.
Elizabeth is the पोती of dr. स्टीव हार्डी ( John beradino ), one of the originating core वर्ण of the series.
Rebecca Herbst originated the अक्षर on August 1, 1997 and रै been the तभी contract अभिनेत्री to खेल the भूमिका.
एलिज़ाबेथ is भाग of दो supercouple pairings, Lucky Spencer और Elizabeth webber and Jason Morgan और एलिज़ाबेथ Webber.
the संयुक्त राज्य प्रेसिडेंसी of रोनाल्ड Reagan, also known as the Reagan administration, was a Republican administration headed by Ronald Reagan इससे January 20, 1981, to जनवरी 20, 1989.
Domestically, the प्रशासन favored reducing सरकारी programs और introduced the largest across-the-board कर कटौती in अमरीकी history.
the economic policies enacted in 1981, known as `` Reaganomics ``, were an उदाहरण of supply-side economics.
reagan aimed to प्रोत्साहित entrepreneurship and सीमा the growth of सोशल spending, as well as the reduction of regulation और inflation.
आर्थिक विकास saw a strong recovery in the 1980s, helping reagan to win a landslide re-election.
the national debt increased significantly, however.
Regarding विदेशी policy, the administration थी steadfastly anti-communist, calling the Soviet Union an `` evil empire `` and ending 1970s détente.
reagan accelerated the massive buildup of the military started by उसके predecessor, सहित an आक्रमण of हरा, the first major overseas action by u.S. सैनिकों since the end of the वियतनाम युद्ध.
The `` reagan Doctrine `` controversially granted aid to अर्धसैनिक forces seeking to फेकने communist सरकारें, particularly in war-torn Central America और अफगानिस्तान.
reagan also प्रचारित नई technologies ऐसे as मिसाइल रक्षा प्रणालियों in अनुक्रम to confront the soviets और उनके allies.
in कूटनीति, reagan forged a दमदार alliance with UK प्रधान Minister मार्गरेट थैचर, and he मिले with Soviet सामान्य Secretary मिखाइल गोर्बाचेव four टाइम्स, aiming to shrink the superpowers ' नाभिकीय arsenals.
Reagan 's प्रेसिडेंसी रै been termed the `` reagan Revolution '', or the Age of Reagan in मान्यता of the राजनैतिक realignment दोनो भीतर और beyond the u.S. in favor of his ब्रांड of conservatism and उसके faith in free बाज़ार.
The Reagan प्रशासन worked toward the collapse of Soviet Communism, और it did collapse बस as he बाएँ दफ्तर.
विजय in the ठंडा War led to a unipolar world with the U.S. as the संसार 's एकमात्र महाशक्ति.
जबकि the damaging Iran-Contra affair engulfed several reagan aides during उसके दूसरी पद, reagan खुद left दफ्तर साथ a 63 percent approval दरजा, one of the उच्चतर स्वीकृति ratings of दूँ presidents.
After सालो of unstinting praise इससे the सही, and unrelenting आलोचना इससे the left, historian दाउद हेनरी पाता कि by 2009 a consensus had emerged among विद्वानों कि reagan revived कोसा और turned the nation to the सही by demonstrating a `` pragmatic कोसा '' that प्रचारित ideology within the constraints imposed by the विभाजित राजनैतिक प्रणाली.
furthermore, says Henry, the consensus viewpoint agrees कि he revived आस्था in the presidency और American self-confidence, and contributed critically to समाप्ति the ठंडा War.
Crude मौत रेट by देश ( 2006 ).
मृत्यु रेट is a माप of the क्रमांक of deaths ( in सामान्य, or due to a विशिष्ट कारण ) in a जनसांख्यिकी.
Scaled to the आकार of that जनसांख्यिकी, प्रति ईकाई of time.
मृत्यु रेट is typically expressed in इकाई of deaths per 1000 individuals per year ; यूँ, a mortality रेट of 9.5 ( आउट of 1000 ) in a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,000 would औसत 9.5 deaths per साल in कि entire जनसांख्यिकी, or 0.95 % आउट of the total.
it is distinct from morbidity rate, which refers to the क्रमांक of individuals in ग़रीब स्वास्थ्य दौरान a दिए time period ( the व्यापकता rate ) or the क्रमांक of newly appearing मामले of the disease per ईकाई of time ( incidence रेट ).
the पद `` मृत्यु `` is भी sometimes inappropriately used to refer to the क्रमांक of deaths among a set of diagnosed हॉस्पिटल cases for a disease or injury, बल्कि than for the general population of a देश or जातीय समूह.
इस बीमारी mortality statistic is more precisely referred to as `` मामला fatality रेट `` ( CFR ).
एक distinguishes:
the crude death रेट, the कुल क्रमांक of deaths प्रति year per 1000 people.
the crude मौत रेट for the पूरे संसार is about 8.37 per 1000 per साल according to the वर्तमान CIA संसार Factbook.
The perinatal mortality रेट, the योग of neonatal deaths and fetal deaths ( stillbirths ) per 1000 births.
the मातृ mortality ratio, the number of मातृ मौतों प्रति 100,000 सजीव births in same time काल.
The मातृ मृत्यु rate, the number of maternal मौतों प्रति 1,000 महिलाओं of reproductive age in the जनसांख्यिकी ( generally defined as 15–44 सालो of age ).
The शिशु मृत्यु rate, the क्रमांक of deaths of children कम than 1 साल old per 1000 सजीव births.
The child mortality रेट, the क्रमांक of deaths of children less than 5 years old per 1000 सजीव births.
the standardised mortality अनुपात ( SMR ) - This represents a proportional तुलना to the संख्याएँ of deaths that would have been अपेक्षित if the population had महरूम of a standard संयोजन in terms of age, लिंग, इत्यादि.
The age-specific मृत्यु rate ( ASMR ) - इस refers to the total क्रमांक of deaths per year per 1000 people of a दिए आयु ( e.g. age 62 पिछला birthday ).
in regard to the or विफलता of चिकित्सा उपचार or प्रक्रियाओं, one would also distinguish:
the early मृत्यु rate, the कुल number of deaths in the early चरण of an जारी उपचार, or in the period तत्काल following an उपचार.
The लेट मृत्यु रेट, the total क्रमांक of deaths in the late चरण of an जारी उपचार, or a significant length of समय after an अधि उपचार.
Note that the crude death रेट as पारिभाषित ऊपर and लागू to a whole population can give a misleading impression.
the crude death रेट depends on the age ( and gender ) विशिष्ट mortality rates and the आयु ( and लिंग ) वितरण of the population.
The number of deaths प्रति 1000 people can be higher लिये विकसित राष्ट्र than in less-developed देशों, despite जीवन expectancy होने higher in developed countries due to मानकों of health being better.
This happens because विकसित countries typically have a completely different जनसांख्यिकी age distribution, with a much higher proportion of पुरानी people, due to both निम्नतर recent जनम दरों and निम्नतर mortality rates.
A अधिक complete picture of मृत्यु is given by a life तालिका जिससे shows the mortality रेट separately for each age.
A जीवन तालिका is जरुरी to दे a शुभ अनुमान of life expectancy.
an otoacoustic उत्सर्जन ( OAE ) is a sound which is generated from within the inner ear.
having महरूम predicted by थामस सुनहरा in 1948, इसके अस्तित्व थी first demonstrated experimentally by दाउद kemp in 1978 and otoacoustic emissions have since महरूम shown to arise by a क्रमांक of अलग cellular mechanisms भीतर the inner ear.
Studies have shown that oaes disappear बाद the भीतरी कान रै महरूम क्षतिग्रस्त, so oaes are प्रायः प्रयुक्त in the प्रयोगशाला and the क्लिनिक as a measure of inner ear स्वास्थ्य.
Broadly speaking, वहीँ हैं two types of otoacoustic emissions : spontaneous otoacoustic emissions ( soaes ), which can occur बगैर बाह्य उत्तेजनाओं, और evoked otoacoustic emissions ( eoaes ), which आवश्यकता an evoking stimulus.
hurricane Tomas थी the उन्नीसवीं नामित storm और बारहवीं hurricane of the 2010 अटलांटिक hurricane season.
टॉमस developed इससे a तीव्र वेव ईस्ट of the windward Islands on अक्तूबर 29.
जल्दी intensifying into a hurricane, it स्थानांतरित through the windward Islands and passed बहुत निकट संत लूसिया.
बाद reaching श्रेणी 2 status on the Saffir-Simpson scale, Tomas जल्दी weakened to a tropical storm in the central caribbean Sea, due to दमदार हवा shear and dry air.
टॉमस बाद regained hurricane औकात as it reorganized near the Windward ड्योढ़ी.
throughout the hurricane 's path, 71 लोगों हैं known to have महरूम killed, 14 of whom यहूद in संत लूसिया.
Monetary losses throughout the windward Islands यहूद estimated at us $ 588 लाख, mainly in संत लूसिया.
in the वेक of the storm in Haiti, flooding intensified an ongoing cholera outbreak indirectly causing more fatalities.
According to a report released in December 2010, 55 people यहूद killed in Cuba और hispanola, though the distribution of these fatalities हैं अनजान.
overall क्षति from the तूफ़ान was at least $ 741 लाख.
Victoria Jackson ( born अगस्त 2, 1959 ) is an American comedian, अभिनेत्री, satirist, सिंगर और internet blogger बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a cast सदस्य of the एनबीसी टेलीविज़न sketch कॉमेडी series Saturday रात्रि सजीव ( SNL ) from 1986 to 1992.
वो रै प्राप्त ध्यान as a vocal आलोचक of अध्यक्ष Barack ओबामा, और is an क्रियाशील भागीदार in the Tea Party गति.
postmodern literature is साहित्य characterized by भारी reliance on techniques जैसे fragmentation, विरोधाभास, और questionable narrators, and is प्रायः ( though नहीं exclusively ) पारिभाषित as a स्टाइल or ट्रेंड which उभरा in the post–World युद्ध II era.
postmodern works हैं देखी as a reaction विरूद्ध Enlightenment सोच और modernist approaches to literature.
postmodern literature, like postmodernism as a पूरे, tends to resist definition or वर्गीकरण as a `` गति ''.
बेशक, the convergence of postmodern साहित्य साथ विभिन्न modes of critical theory, particularly reader-response and deconstructionist approaches, और the subversions of the implicit अनुबंध between लेखक, टेक्स्ट और reader by जिससे इसके works are often characterised, have led to pre-modern fictions such as cervantes ' Don quixote ( 1605,1615 ) and laurence sterne 's eighteenth-century व्यंग्य Tristram Shandy being retrospectively inducted into the fold.
While वहीँ is little consensus on the precise characteristics, पैमाना, और महत्व of postmodern literature, as is प्रायः the case साथ artistic movements, postmodern literature is commonly पारिभाषित in relation to a precursor.
लिये example, a postmodern साहित्यिक work tends नहीं to conclude साथ the neatly tied-up समाप्ति as is प्रायः मिला in modernist literature, but often parodies it.
Postmodern लेखक tend to celebrate chance over शिल्प, and further employ metafiction to undermine the writer 's प्राधिकार.
another characteristic of postmodern literature is the questioning of भेद between ऊँची और low संस्कृति through the use of pastiche, the संयोजन of subjects and जाति not previously deemed अनुरूप लिये साहित्य.
पहेली is an electronic musical project संस्थापित in Germany by Michael Cretu, दाउद Fairstein and Frank पीटरसन in 1990.
the Romanian-born cretu conceived the पहेली प्रोजेक्ट while working in जर्मनी, but based उसके recording स्टुडियो a.r.t. studios in ibiza, Spain, इससे the जल्दी 1990s until May 2009, where he रै अंकित सब of Enigma 's स्टुडियो रिलीज to तिथि.
Cretu is both the composer और the producer of the project.
His former wife, pop singer Sandra, often provided vocals on Enigma ट्रैक्स.
जेंस Gad co-arranged और निभाई guitar on तीन of the पहेली एल्बम.
Peter कॉर्नेलियस भी contributed to पहेली during the 1990s.
Seven studio albums have been produced अंतर्गत the नाम of the project.
Scooby-Doo is an American animated कार्टून मताधिकार, comprising अनेक एनिमेटेड television series produced इससे 1969 to the present दिन.
the original series, Scooby-Doo, जहाँ Are तुम !
, was created for hanna-barbera प्रोडक्शन्स by लेखक Joe माणिक्य और Ken Spears in 1969.
इस शनिवार morning कार्टून series featured four teenagers— फ्रेड जोन्स, Daphne Blake, Velma Dinkley, and Norville `` shaggy '' Rogers — and their talking भूरा ग्रेट डेन श्वान नामित Scooby-Doo, who solve mysteries involving माना supernatural creatures through a series of हरकतों and missteps.
Following the कामयाबी of the असली श्रेणी, Hanna-Barbera और इसके successor Warner Bros. Animation have produced numerous follow-up और spin-off एनिमेटेड श्रेणी and several related works, including टेलीविज़न specials and telefilms, a लकीर of direct-to-video films, और दो warner भाईs. –produced नाट्य विशेषता films.
कुछ संस्करण of Scooby-Doo विशेषता different variations on the show 's अलौकिक theme, and include वर्ण ऐसे as Scooby 's cousin Scooby-Dum और nephew Scrappy-Doo in जोड to or instead of some of the असली characters.
Scooby-Doo थी originally broadcast on CBS from 1969 to 1976, when it moved to ABC.
ABC aired the show जबतक canceling it in 1986, और presented a spin-off featuring the characters as children, a Pup Named scooby-doo, from 1988 until 1991.

and shaggy and scooby-doo मिलेंगी a a सुराग ! ] ], aired as part of बच्चे wb on The WB संजाल और its successor, the CW संजाल, इससे 2002 until 2008.
the most हाल Scooby-Doo श्रेणी, Scooby-Doo !
Mystery incorporated, aired on Cartoon Network from 2010 to 2013.
Repeats of the विभिन्न Scooby-Doo श्रेणी are ब्रॉडकास्ट अक्सर on Cartoon संजाल and Boomerang in the United States and अन्य देशों.
Call of ड्यूटी is a first-person और third-person शूटर computer/ वीडियो game मताधिकार.
the series began on the pc, और later विस्तारित to consoles और handhelds.
अनेक spin-off games have also been released.
The पहले games in the श्रेणी हैं set primarily in World War ii, this शामिल : कॉल of Duty, कॉल of Duty 2, and कॉल of Duty 3.
Beginning साथ Modern Warfare, which is नियत in modern टाइम्स, the श्रेणी रै shifted फ़ोकस away from World War II.
Call of Duty 4 : आधुनिक warfare ( released November 2007 ) was followed by कॉल of Duty : संसार at युद्ध और Call of ड्यूटी : आधुनिक Warfare 2.
Black Ops ( released November 2010 ) takes place in the ठंडा युद्ध, while आधुनिक warfare 3 ( released November 2011 ) takes प्लेस in the near-future setting.
Black Ops 2 ( Released November 13, 2012 ) takes place in the year 2025.
the Call of ड्यूटी खेल हैं प्रकाशित and स्वामित्व by एक्टिविजन साथ aspyr Media publishing it for Apple OS X.
जबकि the स्टुडियो Infinity वार्ड primarily स्टिल develops them, Treyarch has भी विकसित several of the titles साथ the रिलीज of the studios ' games interlaced साथ each अन्य.
कुछ games have been developed by धूसर पदार्थ इंटरैक्टिव, चिंगारी Unlimited, विस्मित Entertainment, n-Space, Rebellion developments, Ideaworks Game Studio, Sledgehammer Games and nstigate Games.
the games use a variety of engines, including the id तकनीक 3, the treyarch NGL, and the IW 5.0.
अन्य उत्पाद in the मताधिकार include a लकीर of action आंकड़े designed by Plan-B Toys, a card game created by अपर Deck, and a कॉमिक book mini-series प्रकाशित by wildstorm.

the estate tax in the संयुक्त राज्य is a कर imposed on the transfer of the `` taxable estate `` of a deceased व्यक्ति, whether ऐसे प्रॉपर्टी is transferred via a होगा, according to the राज्य laws of intestacy or वरना बना as an घटना of the मौत of the owner, ऐसे as a transfer of प्रॉपर्टी from an intestate estate or विश्वास, or the भुगतान of निश्चित जीवन बीमे लाभ or financial खाता रकम to beneficiaries.
The estate tax is one भाग of the Unified तोहफा और Estate कर प्रणाली in the United राज्य.
the अन्य भाग of the प्रणाली, the तोहफा tax, imposes a tax on हस्तांतरण of प्रॉपर्टी दौरान a व्यक्ति 's life ; the gift tax prevents avoidance of the estate कर चाहिए a person want to दे दूर his/her estate.
In जोड to the federal government, many राज्य also impose an एस्टेट कर, साथ the state version पुकारा either an estate कर or an उत्तराधिकार tax.
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों of the एस्टेट कर कॉल it the `` death tax ''.
if an asset is बाएँ to a जीवनसाथी or a Federally recognized charity, the कर प्रायः करता नहीं लागू.
in addition, up to $ 5,250,000 can be दिए by an व्यक्तिगत, पहले and/or upon उनके death, without incurring federal gift or estate कर.
गेविन मैकग्रेगर rossdale ( born 30 October 1967 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी actor और संगीतकार, ज्ञात as the lead singer and rhythm guitarist of the rock बैंड Bush.
Following बुश 's separation in 2002, which lasted for eight सालो, he was the सीसे सिंगर और guitarist for संस्थान, और later began a सोलो करियर.
जब performing solo, Gavin plays गीतों from his extensive musical libraries.

raffaello sanzio da urbino ( अप्रैल 6 or March 28, 1483 – April 6, 1520 ), बेहतर ज्ञात simply as Raphael, थी an इतालवी painter and architect of the High Renaissance.
His कार्य is admired लिये इसके clarity of form और आसानी of composition और for its visual achievement of the Neoplatonic आदर्श of इंसान वैभव.
साथ साथ Michelangelo and Leonardo da Vinci, he forms the traditional trinity of ग्रेट masters of that काल.
राफेल थी enormously उत्पादक, कार्यशील an unusually विशाल workshop, and despite उसके death at 37, a विशाल देह of his कार्य remains.
Many of उसके works are found in the Vatican राजमहल, where the frescoed राफेल कक्ष were the central, and the largest, कार्य of उसके career.
The best known work is the स्कूल of एथेंस in the वेटिकन Stanza della Segnatura.
बाद उसके early years in रोम much of उसके work was self-designed, but for the सबसे भाग executed by the workshop इससे उसके drawings, with considerable loss of विशेषता.
he थी अत्यधिक influential in his आजीवन, हालांकि outside रोम उसके कार्य थी ज़्यादातर ज्ञात इससे his collaborative printmaking.
After उसके मौत, the influence of his ग्रेट प्रतिद्वंद्वी Michelangelo was अधिक widespread until the 18th और 19th centuries, जब राफेल 's अधिक निर्मल और harmonious qualities were again regarded as the उच्चतम मॉडल.
His करियर जलप्रपात naturally into three phases और तीन styles, first described by giorgio Vasari : उसके जल्दी सालो in Umbria, then a period of about four years ( इससे 1504–1508 ) absorbing the कलाकारी परंपराओं of Florence, followed by his पिछला hectic and triumphant twelve सालो in Rome, working लिये दो Popes and their बंद शरीक.
Julia फिओना Roberts ( born अक्तूबर 28, 1967 ) is an अमरीकी actress.
She became a Hollywood star after headlining the रोमांटिक कॉमेडी pretty स्त्री ( 1990 ), जिससे grossed $ 464 million worldwide.
After receiving Golden ग्लोब पुरस्कार and अकादमी पुरस्कार nominations लिये स्टील Magnolias ( 1989 ) और Pretty स्त्री, she जीती the Academy पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री for her प्रदर्शन in Erin Brockovich ( 2000 ).
Her films The pelican ब्रैड ( 1993 ), My बेहतरीन Friend 's विवाह ( 1997 ), रहस्यवादी Pizza ( 1988 ), Notting हिल ( 1999 ), Runaway बहू ( 1999 ), Ocean 's ग्यारह ( 2001 ), समंदर 's Twelve ( 2004 ), Charlie विल्सन 's War ( 2007 ), Valentine 's Day ( 2010 ), Eat दुवा Love ( 2010 ), और Mirror दर्पण ( 2012 ) have collectively brought box दफ्तर रसीदें of over $ 2.6 अरब, बनाना her one of the सबसे कामयाब actresses in terms of box दफ्तर receipts.
रॉबर्ट्स था become एक of the highest-paid actresses in the संसार, टॉपिंग The हॉलीवुड पत्रकारों सालाना `` power सूची '' of top-earning female सितारों from 2005 to 2006.
उसके fee for 1990 's Pretty Woman थी $ 300,000 ; in 2003, वो थी सशुल्क an unprecedented $ 25 लाख for उसके भूमिका in mona लिसा Smile ( 2003 ).
As of 2010, Roberts 's net worth was अनुमानित to be $ 140 लाख.
रॉबर्ट्स has महरूम नामित one of People पत्रिका 's `` 50 Most खूबसूरत लोगों in the संसार '' ग्यारह times, tied with Halle बेरी.
in 2011, she was named एक of the `` 100 hottest महिलाओं of All-Time '' by मेन 's Health.
in 2001, Ladies Home Journal ranked her as the 11th most powerful woman in the संयुक्त States.
Mark Elliot zuckerberg ( born may 14, 1984 ) is an American कंप्यूटर programmer and अंतरजाल उद्योगों.
he is best known as one of पाँच co-founders of the सोशल networking website Facebook.
As of अप्रैल 2013, Zuckerberg is the अध्यक्ष and मुख्य executive of Facebook, inc. and in 2013 उसके personal wealth was अनुमानित to be US $ 13.3 billion.
साथ with his college roommates and fellow हार्वर्ड University students एडुआर्डो saverin, एंड्रयू mccollum, डस्टिन Moskovitz and Chris ह्यूजेस, Zuckerberg launched Facebook from हार्वर्ड 's शयनागार कक्ष.
The समूह then introduced Facebook onto अन्य campuses nationwide and moved to Palo आल्टो, California, United राज्य ( U.S. ) shortly afterwards.
In 2007, at the age of twenty-three सालो, Zuckerberg became a अरबपति as a परिणाम of Facebook and the number of फेसबुक users worldwide reached a total of एक billion in 2012.
Zuckerberg was शामिल in विभिन्न legal विवादों that were initiated by अन्य in the समूह, जो claimed a share of the company based upon their भागीदारी दौरान the development phase of Facebook.
Since 2010, zuckerberg रै महरूम नामित among the 100 wealthiest and सबसे influential people in the संसार by Time पत्रिका as a भाग of इसके व्यक्ति of the Year accolade.
zuckerberg थी played by कर्ता जेसी eisenberg in the 2010 Hollywood फिल्मी The सोशल संजाल in जिससे the वृद्धि of Facebook is portrayed.
the mayflower was the ship कि in 1620 transported 102 English तीर्थयात्रियों, सहित a core समूह of separatists, to New इंग्लैण्ड.
Their स्टोरी is एक of travail और अस्तित्व in a harsh New World पर्यावरण.
framedthe
कमेटी of तरीके और अर्थात् is the मुख्य tax -writing committee of the United राज्य हाउस of Representatives.
Members of the तरीके और Means कमेटी are not allowed to serve on कोई other हाउस Committees unless वे apply लिये a waiver इससे उनके party 's congressional leadership.
The Committee रै jurisdiction over all taxation, tariffs and other revenue-raising measures, as खूब as a number of अन्य programs including:
सोशल सुरक्षा
Unemployment benefits
Medicare
Enforcement of child support कानून
Temporary सहायता लिये मोहताज Families, a federal welfare program
फोस्टर परवाह और adoption programs
The u.S. Constitution requires कि all बिल्स regarding taxation must originate in the House of Representatives.
चूंकि हाउस procedure is that सब बिल्स regarding taxation must go through इस committee, the committee is very influential, as is इसके सीनेट बंटवारा, the U.S. सीनेट कमेटी on वित्त.
The तरीके and अर्थात् Committee in the 111th कॉंग्रेस was chaired by Charlie rangel, who था लिया a leave of absence as chairman जबतक House आचार violations were resolved.
However, उसके छोड़ of अनुपस्थिति as chairman was शासित to be a इस्तीफा.
पीट स्टार्क resigned as acting chairman, so sander levin held that स्थिति until the प्रारंभ of the 112th कॉंग्रेस.
डेव Camp became the कमेटी chair लिये the 112th कॉंग्रेस, बाद the republicans जीती कंट्रोल of the हाउस in the 2010 चुनाव.
The blue whale ( balaenoptera musculus ) is a समुद्री mammal belonging to the suborder of baleen whales ( called mysticeti ).
At in length and or more in वज़न, it is the largest ज्ञात एनिमल to have ever existed.
long and slender, the ब्लू whale 's देह can be various शेड्स of bluish-grey dorsally और somewhat lighter underneath.
वहीँ are at least तीन पृथक subspecies : B. m. musculus of the उत्तर Atlantic and उत्तर प्रशांत, B. m. intermedia of the दक्षिणी Ocean and B. m. brevicauda ( also ज्ञात as the pygmy ब्लू व्हेल ) मिला in the Indian समंदर और दक्षिण Pacific समंदर.
B. m. इंडिका, मिला in the Indian Ocean, may be another subspecies.
As साथ अन्य baleen whales, its आहार consists almost exclusively of small crustaceans known as krill.
Blue whales यहूद abundant in nearly सब the oceans on Earth until the शुरूआत of the बीसवीं सदी.
लिये over a century, they यहूद hunted almost to extinction by whalers until protected by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय जातियाँ in 1966.
A 2002 रपट अनुमानित वहीँ यहूद 5,000 to 12,000 ब्लू whales worldwide, located in at तनिक five groups.
अधिक हाल शोध into the सानो subspecies suggests this may be an underestimate.
पहले whaling, the largest जनसांख्यिकी was in the Antarctic, क्रमांकन approximately 239,000 ( दायरा 202,000 to 311,000 ).
वहीँ remain only much smaller ( around 2,000 ) concentrations in प्रत्येक of the पूर्वी North प्रशांत, Antarctic, और भारतीय समंदर समूह.
वहीँ are दो more groups in the North Atlantic, और at तनिक two in the दक्षिणी Hemisphere.
The ग्लोब artichoke ( cynara cardunculus var. scolymus ) is a variety of a species of thistle cultivated as a खाना.
The खाद्य पदार्थ is buds that form within the flower heads before the पुष्प आइये into bloom.
The कलियों go दूर or बदलें to a coarse, barely edible रूप जब the पुष्प blooms.
the uncultivated or जंगली variety of the प्रजाति is called a cardoon.
it is a बारहमासी plant native to the Mediterranean प्रदेश.
the United States one hundred-dollar bill ( $ 100 ) is a denomination of United States currency.
U.S. statesman, आविष्कारक, और diplomat Benjamin फ्रैंकलिन is currently featured on the obverse of the bill.
On the reverse of the banknote is an चित्र of Independence हॉल.
the $ 100 bill is the largest denomination कि रै been मुद्रित since जुलाई 13, 1969, जब the denominations of $ 500, $ 1,000, $ 5,000, and $ 10,000 यहूद retired.
the ब्यूरो of नक्काशी और Printing says the औसत जीवन of a $ 100 bill in परिसंचरण is 90 months ( 7.5 years ) before it is replaced due to wear और आंसू.
the bills हैं also commonly referred to as `` benjamins '', in सन्दर्भ to the use of बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन 's portrait on the denomination, or `` c-notes '', based on the रोमन numeral लिये 100.
the विधेयक is one of दो denominations printed today that करता not feature a अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States ; the other is the $ 10 bill, featuring Alexander हैमिल्टन.
The समय on the क्लॉक of Independence Hall on the reverse, according to the u.S. ब्यूरो of नक्काशी और Printing, shows approximately 4:10.
One hundred hundred-dollar bills are वितरित by Federal Reserve बैंको in mustard-colored straps ( $ 10,000 ).
the श्रेणी 2009 $ 100 bill redesign was unveiled on अप्रैल 21, 2010, and थी to be issued to the public on February 11, 2011, लकिन उत्पादन थी shut down in December 2010 because as many as 30 % were unusable due to a manufacturing flaw.
A लंबवत crease in the पेपर reveals a blank स्पेस on the विधेयक when खींचा आउट.
In उनके replacement, और continuing the high माँग of this denomination, the Series 2006a was launched retaining the previous डिज़ाइन ( 1996-generation ).
On April 24, 2013, the Federal Reserve घोषित the नई $ 100 विधेयक would डालें circulation on अक्तूबर 8, 2013.
किंग दाउद in robes of a Byzantine emperor.
miniature इससे the पेरिस Psalter.
David ( ; आईएसओ 259-3 Dawid ; ' ; Strong 's : daveed ) according to the Hebrew बाइबल, was the second किंग of the United किंगडम of इसराईल, and according to the नई Testament gospels of मैथ्यू और Luke, an ancestor of Jesus.
उसके life is conventionally dated to c. 1040–970 BCE, उसके reign over Judah c. 1010–1002 BCE, and उसके शासनकाल over the United Kingdom of Israel c. 1002–970 bce.
The Books of Samuel, 1 Kings, and 1 क्रॉनिकल्स हैं the तभी स्त्रोत of सूचना on David, although the Tel Dan stele ( dated c. 850–835 bce ) contains the phrase ( bytdwd ), पढ़ा as `` हाउस of दाउद '', जिससे सबसे scholars take as पुष्टि of the existence in the mid-9th century bce of a Judean royal dynasty called the हाउस of दाउद.
he is depicted as a righteous king, हालांकि not बगैर faults, as खूब as an acclaimed योद्धा, संगीतकार, और poet, traditionally credited for composing अनेक of the psalms contained in the Book of Psalms.
दाउद is सेंट्रल to Jewish, Christian, और Islamic doctrine and संस्कृति.
biblical परंपरा maintains कि a सीधा वंशज of David होगा be the मसीहा.
in Islam he is माना to be a prophet और the किंग of a स्वदेश.
काठमांडू ( ; ) is the पूंजी and largest urban agglomerate of नेपाल.
The agglomerate consists of काठमांडू महानगर City at इसके core, and its सिस्टर cities patan, Kirtipur, Thimi, and भक्तपुर.
it also शामिल the recently recognized शहरी क्षेत्रों of Shankhapur, karyabinayak, and champapur.
Banepa, dhulikhel, and Panauti are उपग्रह शहरी क्षेत्रों of Kathmandu located बस बाहर the Kathmandu valley.
काठमांडू is also ज्ञात informally as `` ktm '' or the `` tri-city ''.
According to a जनसांख्यिकी conducted in 2011, Kathmandu metropolis alone has 975,453 inhabitants ; और the agglomerate रै a population of more than 2.5 million inhabitants.
the metropolitan नगर क्षेत्रफल is और has a population घनत्व of 19,250 प्रति km2.
The नगर स्टैंड at an उन्नयन of approximately in the bowl-shaped काठमांडू Valley of सेंट्रल नेपाल.
it is surrounded by चार major kyu : Shivapuri, phulchoki, nagarjun, and चंद्रगिरि.
काठमांडू घाटी is भाग of तीन districts ( काठमांडू, Lalitpur, और Bhaktapur ), रै the highest population घनत्व in the देश, and is घर to about a twelfth of Nepal 's population.
During rana and Shah eras, the name `` नेपाल '' referred तभी to the Kathmandu Valley ; it was what people जो जिया बाहर the घाटी called it.
दौरान इस period, अंग्रेजों इतिहासकारों पुकारा the घाटी itself `` नेपाल उचित ''.
आज, Kathmandu is not only the capital of the संघीय लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of नेपाल, लकिन भी the मुख्यालय of the Central Development Region of नेपाल.
The Central प्रदेश comprises three zones : bagmati, narayani, and Janakpur.
Kathmandu is स्तिथ in the Bagmati मण्डल.
Kathmandu is the गेटवे to पर्यटन in Nepal.
it is also the nerve बीच of the देश 's अर्थव्यवस्था.
it रै the most उन्नत infrastructure of कोई urban area in नेपाल, and its economy is केन्द्रित on tourism, which accounted लिये 3.8 % of नेपाल 's GDP in 1995–96.
( पर्यटन in Kathmandu declined thereafter दौरान a काल of political अशांति, but चूंकि तब has improved. )
The नगर रै a rich इतिहास, spanning nearly 2000 years, as inferred इससे inscriptions मिला in the घाटी.
धार्मिक और cultural festivities form a प्रमुख part of the lives of लोगों residing in Kathmandu.
सबसे of Kathmandu 's people follow हिंदुत्व and many others follow Buddhism.
There are लोगों of other religious beliefs as खूब, giving काठमांडू a cosmopolitan culture.
नेपाली is the most commonly spoken भाषा in the नगर.
नेपाल bhasa is the स्वदेशी language बोला by the नेवार people.
Hindi is widely समझा and English is understood by Kathmandu 's educated residents.
the city 's literacy रेट is 98 %.
Kathmandu 's sister cities ( Lalitpur Patan ) और Bhaktapur are integral to काठमांडू 's cultural heritage, पर्यटन उद्योग, and economy ; इसलिए युनेस्को 's संसार Heritage Site सूचियाँ सब three cities ' monuments और attractions साथ अंतर्गत one heading, `` Kathmandu Valley- युनेस्को संसार विरासत साईट ``.
Field हॉकी, usually referred to बस as hockey, is a team sport of the hockey family which is निभाई between दो teams of eleven खिलाड़ी साथ hockey sticks और a hard, solid plastic बॉल.
at the फेरे of the 21st सदी, the game is निभाई globally, साथ particular popularity throughout Europe, एशिया, Oceania, और दक्षिण America – in addition to होने the national sport of पाकिस्तानी और India.
The term `` फ़ील्ड हॉकी '' is used primarily in Canada, the संयुक्त States, और other regions of the world जहाँ the sport of बर्फ हॉकी is अधिक लोकप्रिय.
दौरान play, लक्ष्य keepers हैं the only खिलाड़ी जो हैं अनुमत to touch the बॉल साथ कोई भाग of their body ( साथ the एक्सेप्शन of a player 's hand considered 'part of the stick ' ), साथ this only applying within the shooting वृत्त ( also ज्ञात as the D, or shooting चाप, or बस the circle ), जबकि फ़ील्ड खिलाड़ी खेल the बॉल with the चपटा side of उनके स्टिक.
the टोली कि स्कोर the most लक्ष्य by the समाप्त of the मैच wins.
if the स्कोर is tied at the end of the game, either a draw is declared or the game goes into अतिरिक्त time and/or a दंड shootout, depending on the प्रतियोगिता 's format.
the governing देह of hockey is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय हॉकी संघ ( fih ), साथ men and women होने represented internationally in competitions including the ओलम्पिक खेल, Commonwealth खेल, हॉकी World Cup, Champions ट्रॉफी and जूनियर हॉकी संसार कप, with अनेक countries कार्यशील extensive junior, वरिष्ठ, और masters ' क्लबों प्रतियोगिताओं.
The FIH is भी जिम्मेदार लिये organising the हॉकी Rules फलक और developing the नियम for the खेल.
a popular रूपांतर of फ़ील्ड hockey is indoor hockey, which differs in a number of respects while embodying the प्राथमिक principles of हॉकी.
अंदर hockey is a 6-a-side variant, with a फ़ील्ड which is घटाया to लगभग 40m × 20m.
With many of the rules बाकी the वही, including रुकावट and फीट, वहीँ are several कुंजी विसंगतियाँ - खिलाड़ी may not उठाएँ the ball unless shooting on goal, players may नहीं hit the बॉल ( बजाय utilising pushes to ट्रांसफ़र the ball ), and the sidelines हैं replaced साथ ठोस barriers which the ball will rebound off.
Ethan `` Cane '' ashby ( né Atkinson ) is a fictional character from the अमरीकी CBS साबुन opera the यंग और the बेचैन.
He is portrayed by Australian कर्ता डेनियल Goddard, जो originally auditioned for Brad Snyder on as the World Turns but थी अनुशंसित लिये a भूमिका on the यंग और the बेचैन बजाय.
the role was to be portrayed as an American, but गोडार्ड 's ऑस्ट्रेलियाई descent बहकावे the character 's पृष्ठभूमि.
Former सिर writer lynn Marie लैथम introduced उसे during the episode airing on January 12, 2007 as an ऑस्ट्रेलियाई bartender in ढूंढें of his family, a डेब्यू कि received a mixed जवाब.
लैथम created cane as the son of Phillip Chancellor II ( Donnelly Rhodes ) और Jill Foster Abbott ( Jess वाल्टन ) लकिन the character 's background was rewritten by मरिया एरिना घंटी in 2009, reestablishing him as the बेटे of कोलिन और Genevieve एटकिन्सन ( ट्रिस्टन Rogers और Genie फ्रांसिस ).
Though characterized as `` रहस्यमय '', cane is `` loyal and dedicated '', while Goddard described the अक्षर as a `` typical ऑस्ट्रेलियाई, working-class kind of guy ''.
he was the first सदस्य of the एटकिन्सन परिवार to appear on the series, followed by उसके अभिभावक और identical जुड़वा brother.
जल्द after उसके डेब्यू, he became a leading character, a निर्णय praised by दर्शक and critics.
The character has महरूम शामिल साथ Amber मूर ( Adrienne Frantz ), क्लो Mitchell ( Elizabeth Hendrickson ) and सबसे notably Lily सर्दियों ( Christel Khalil ), a romance that garnered significant fan attention.
in 2009, Cane और लिली यहूद married ; वैश्विक BC होता बाद कॉल लिली the love of cane 's life.
The जोड़ी था दो children, चार्ली और mattie Ashby.
in 2011, the actor थी fired, and cane थी shot to death onscreen.
however, Goddard was rehired जल्द बाद viewers campaigned for his वापसी, revealing that cane 's एकसमान जुड़वा bhai was in फैक्ट the man who died.
इस sacrificed उसके marriage to Lily, but the couple were remarried on वेलेंटाइन 's दिन in 2012.
Goddard has महरूम widely acclaimed लिये his portrayal ; canyon न्यूज said कि he portrays the character honestly, and is `` सदा dependable, on आग and रोमांचक ''.
John क्रिस्टोफर `` Johnny '' Depp ii ( born June 9, 1963 ) is an अमरीकी actor, film निर्माता, and musician.
He has won the Golden Globe Award और स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार for Best कर्ता.
डेप rose to prominence on the 1980s television श्रेणी 21 जम्प Street, becoming a teen idol.
असंतुष्ट with कि औकात, Depp turned to फिल्मी for more challenging भूमिकाएँ ; he played the title अक्षर of the acclaimed एडवर्ड scissorhands ( 1990 ) और बाद मिला बक्सा दफ्तर success in films ऐसे as Sleepy Hollow ( 1999 ), चार्ली और the चॉकलेट Factory ( 2005 ), ऐलिस in वंडरलैंड ( 2010 ), rango ( 2011 ) और the Pirates of the caribbean film श्रेणी ( 2003–present ).
he रै collaborated साथ निदेशक and friend टिम Burton in आठ films ; the सबसे recent being अंधेरा साए ( 2012 ).
डेप रै gained acclaim लिये his portrayals of such people as Ed लकडी in ed Wood, Joseph D. Pistone in donnie Brasco, Hunter S. थॉम्पसन in Fear and loathing in Las Vegas, George जंग in उड़ा, और the bank robber जॉन dillinger in Michael मन 's Public Enemies.
Films featuring डेप have grossed over $ 3.1 billion at the United राज्य बक्सा office और over $ 7.6 billion worldwide.
He रै महरूम मनोनीत for शीर्ष awards many times, winning the Best कर्ता पुरस्कार इससे the सुनहरी –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy Globes –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy for स्वीनी टॉड : the Demon Barber of बेड़े Street and from the Screen Actors गिल्ड for Pirates of the Caribbean : the अभिशाप of the ब्लैक पर्ल.
He also रै garnered a sex symbol status in American सिनेमा, being twice नामित as the `` sexiest Man जिंदा `` by लोगों पत्रिका in 2003 and 2009.
he रै महरूम सूचीबद्ध in the 2012 Guinness किताब of World रिकॉर्ड as the उच्चतम paid कर्ता, साथ $ 75 million.
the World Wide Web ( abbreviated as www or W3, commonly ज्ञात as the वेब ), is a system of interlinked hypertext दस्तावेज़ पहुँचा via the अंतरजाल.
साथ a web ब्राउजर, one can view web पृष्ठों कि may contain टेक्स्ट, images, videos, and other multimedia, और navigate between them via hyperlinks.
Using concepts इससे उसके पहले hypertext प्रणालियों like ENQUIRE, British engineer, कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक and at that time employee of the CERN, सर टिम berners-lee, अभी Director of the संसार Wide Web consortium ( W3C ), लिखा a प्रस्ताव in कूच 1989 for what would आखिरकार become the World Wide Web.
at CERN, a European research संगठन near Geneva straddling the किनारा between France और स्विट्ज़रलैंड, Berners-Lee और belgian कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक Robert Cailliau प्रस्तावित in 1990 to use hypertext `` to link and अभिगम सूचना of विभिन्न kinds as a वेब of नोड in which the उपयोक्ता can ब्राउज़ at will '', and they सरेआम introduced the प्रोजेक्ट in December of the same year.
चिह्नित Travis जॉन सांचेज़ ( born November 11, 1986 ) is an American football क्वार्टरबैक for the नई यॉर्क jets of the National फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( NFL ).
he थी drafted in the पहला round of the 2009 एनएफएल Draft as the पांचवां overall चयन by the Jets and the second क्वार्टरबैक taken overall.
he played कॉलेज football at the विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिणी California ( USC ).
सांचेज़ grew up in a well-disciplined and एथलेटिक परिवार.
In the eighth grade, he began to play फ़ुटबॉल and learn the intricacies of the क्वार्टरबैक position, training साथ his father, Nick.
A well-regarded prospect, Sanchez committed to दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया following his successful high स्कूल करियर in which he led उसके team to a championship शीर्षक during his final season.
at यूएससी, Sanchez was relegated as the backup क्वार्टरबैक दौरान his first तीन सालो हालांकि he rose to prominence due to उसके brief appearances on the field in 2007 due to चोटों suffered by starting quarterback जॉन दाउद Booty.
सांचेज़ also became popular within the community due to उसके mexican-american heritage.
Named the starter in 2008, Sanchez led यूएससी to a 12–1 रिकार्ड और won the रोज़ Bowl विरूद्ध penn State for which सांचेज़ was awarded the Most मूल्यवान Player पुरस्कार लिये his performance on ठोकर.
Although many माना him too inexperienced, सांचेज़ घोषित his intention to enter the 2009 एनएफएल Draft.
He was selected by the jets after they traded up साथ the क्लीवलैंड Browns, and थी named the starting क्वार्टरबैक prior to the start of the season.
despite a subpar प्रदर्शन, Sanchez led the Jets to the AFC Championship Game, a losing effort to the इंडियानापोलिस Colts, becoming the fourth rookie क्वार्टरबैक in NFL इतिहास to जीत his पहला playoff game और the second to जीत two playoff खेल.
in उसके second season, Sanchez जारी to develop और led the jets to the playoffs and the team 's second consecutive AFC चैंपियनशिप खेल where वे narrowly lost to the Pittsburgh स्टीलर्स, 24–19.
साथ the win over the New इंग्लैण्ड Patriots the सप्ताह prior, Sanchez tied चार अन्य quarterbacks for the दूसरी सबसे post-season सड़क victories by a क्वार्टरबैक in NFL history.
in leading the Jets to दो लगातार सम्मेलन championships, सांचेज़ joined क्वार्टरबैक बेन roethlisberger as the तभी two quarterbacks in एनएफएल इतिहास to पहुँचें the सम्मेलन championship in उनके पहला two seasons in the लीग.
The next दो सीज़न would be a regression लिये दोनो the टोली और सांचेज़ as they failed to पहुँचें the playoffs.
प्रशंसक और media critics पुकारा for a struggling सांचेज़ to be benched.
He आखिरकार थी replaced towards the end of the 2012 season with Greg McElroy.
पॉल एवेरी ( April 2, 1934December 10, 2000 ) थी an American police रिपोर्टर, best known लिये उसके कहानियां on the infamous serial killer known as the Zodiac, and later लिये his कार्य on the Patricia Hearst अपहरण.
a small submersible AC sump पंप with a garden नली कनेक्टर
A sump पंप is a पंप used to हटाएँ water that रै accumulated in a water collecting sump जलाशय, commonly found in the basement of homes.
the water may enter via the घेरा drains of a तहखाने waterproofing प्रणाली, funneling into the basin or because of बरसात or प्राकृतिक मैदान water, if the तहखाने is नीचे the जल तालिका level.
sump pumps हैं प्रयुक्त where basement flooding happens regularly and to remedy dampness जहाँ the जल table is above the foundation of a home.
Sump पंपों send जल दूर from a हाउस to any place where it is no longer problematic, ऐसे as a municipal storm नाली or a शुष्क खूब.
पंपों may discharge to the sanitary सीवर in पुरानी संस्थापना.
एकबार considered स्वीकार्य, this practice may now violate the plumbing कोड or नगरपालिका bylaws, because it can overwhelm the नगरपालिका मलजल treatment system.
municipalities urge homeowners to डिस्कनेक्ट and reroute sump पंप discharge दूर इससे sanitary sewers.
Fines may be imposed लिये noncompliance.
अनेक homeowners have inherited उनके sump pump configurations और do नहीं एहसास कि the पंप discharges to the सीवर.
If the discharge is खिलाया to a laundry डूबना in the तहखाने, it 's likely going to the sewer.
Usually hardwired into a घर 's विद्युत प्रणाली, sump pumps may have a battery backup.
The घर 's pressurized water सप्लाई शक्तियां some पंपों, eliminating the need for विद्युत at the expense of using potable जल, potentially making उन्हें अधिक महंगी to operate than विद्युत पंपों and creating an अतिरिक्त water निपटान problem.
Since a sump जलाशय may overflow if नहीं constantly उत्तेजित, a बैकअप system is important for cases जब the main power is आउट लिये prolonged अवधि of समय, as during a severe storm.
वहीँ are generally two types of sump पंपों — pedestal और submersible.
the pedestal pump 's मोटर is mounted ऊपर the sump, where it is more easily serviced, but is also more conspicuous.
the पंप impeller is driven by a long, vertical extension शाफ्ट और the impeller is in a स्क्रॉल आवास in the आधार of the पंप.
The submersible पंप is entirely mounted अंदर the sump, and is specially sealed to prevent electrical छोटी circuits.
sump पंप प्रणालियों are भी utilized in industrial and commercial अनुप्रयोग to कंट्रोल जल तालिका -सुनानाd problems in surface मृदा.
An artesian aquifer or periodic high जल table हालात can कारण the ground to become अस्थिर due to water saturation.
as long as the पंप functions, the सतह soil will remain stable.
These sumps are typically ten feet in गहराई or अधिक ; lined साथ corrugated मेटल pipe कि contains perforations or नाली holes throughout.
They may शामिल इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कंट्रोल प्रणालियों साथ visual and audible alarms और are usually covered to prevent debris और पशु from गिरना in.
Bleeding कान्सास, Bloody Kansas or the किनारा War, थी a series of violent राजनैतिक confrontations involving anti-slavery Free-Staters और pro-slavery `` Border ruffian `` elements, that took place in the कान्सास territory और the neighboring कस्बों of Missouri between 1854 and 1861.
at the heart of the विरोध was the question of whether Kansas would enter the Union as a फ़्री state or स्लेव राज्य.
As ऐसे, Bleeding Kansas was a proxy war between northerners and southerners over the समस्या of slavery in the United राज्य.
The term `` Bleeding Kansas '' was coined by Horace Greeley of the New यॉर्क Tribune ; the कार्यक्रम it encompasses सीधे presaged the American सिविल युद्ध.
कॉंग्रेस had long struggled to balance the interests of pro-slavery forces और anti-slavery शक्तियां.
The कार्यक्रम later known as Bleeding Kansas were नियत into motion by the Kansas–Nebraska अधिनियम of 1854, जिससे nullified the Missouri सुलह और instead implemented the अवधारणा of लोकप्रिय sovereignty.
an ostensibly democratic idea, popular sovereignty stated कि the निवासियों of प्रत्येक territory or राज्य should decide whether it होता be a फ़्री or slave राज्य ; however, इस resulted in immigration en masse to Kansas by कार्यकर्ताओं from दोनो पहलू.
At एक पाइंट, Kansas था two separate governments, each with its अपना constitution, हालांकि तभी one थी federally recognized.
on जनवरी 29, 1861, Kansas was admitted to the Union as a फ़्री राज्य, less than तीन months before the बैटल of फोर्ट sumter जिससे began the सिविल युद्ध.
बेंजीन is an organic रासायनिक यौगिक with the आणविक सूत्र c6 H|Hydrogen|H6.
इसके molecule is composed of 6 carbon अणु joined in a ring, साथ 1 हाइड्रोजन atom attached to प्रत्येक कार्बन अणु.
Because its molecules contain only कार्बन और हाइड्रोजन अणु, benzene is classed as a hydrocarbon.
बेंजीन is a प्राकृतिक constituent of crude oil, और is एक of the सबसे basic petrochemicals.
बेंजीन is an खुशबूदार hydrocarbon और the दूसरी [ n ] - annulene ( [ 6 ] -annulene ), a cyclic हाइड्रोकार्बन साथ a निरन्तर pi bond.
It is sometimes abbreviated Ph –H. बेंजीन is a colorless और highly ज्वलनशील liquid साथ a sweet smell.
it is मुख्यतः प्रयुक्त as a precursor to heavy chemicals, such as ethylbenzene and cumene, जिससे are उत्पादित on a अरब किलोग्राम स्केल.
क्युकी it has a high octane number, it is an important घटक of gasoline, composing a few percent of its mass.
Most non-industrial अनुप्रयोग have been limited by benzene 's carcinogenicity.
Giovanni Virginio स्क्यापारेल्ली ( ; 14 March 1835 – 4 July 1910 ) was an इतालवी astronomer and science historian.
वी homebrew refers to the reuse of Nintendo 's Wii game console to run तन्त्र कि रै not महरूम प्राधिकृत by Nintendo.
It achieves इस by defeating the Wii 's copy protection और कोड हस्ताक्षर उपायों.
in more सामान्य terms, वी Homebrew refers to the use of the Wii 's hardware, accessories और software लिये purposes बाहर those intended by the निर्माता.
असली प्रयत्न केन्द्रित on using the वी रिमोट as a pointing यंत्र on other ऑपरेटिंग systems, or running web-based खेल in the built-in web ब्राउजर.
subsequent developments in खेल exploits, ऐसे as the `` Twilight hack ``, `` Bannerbomb '' and its बाद incarnation `` LetterBomb '', `` तोड़ Stack '', `` Indiana Pwns '', `` Yu-Gi-OWNED '', `` bathaxx '', and `` Return of the Jodi '', बना installing the `` Homebrew Channel `` संभावित.
हैडली ( सही ) discussing the 2006 israel-lebanon crisis साथ Bush and Rice.
Stephen John हैडली ( born February 13, 1947 ) थी the 21st U.S. Assistant to the President for नेशनल Security Affairs ( commonly referred as नेशनल सुरक्षा सलाहकार ), सेवारत under President George W. Bush.
Take identical growing plants और give उर्वरक to हाफ of उन्हें.
If there are differences between the fertilized संयंत्र group और the unfertilized `` कंट्रोल '' group, these मतभेद may be due to the उर्वरक.
a scientific control is an प्रयोग or अवलोकन designed to minimize the प्रभाव of परिवर्तनीय other than the सिंगल independent variable.
This increases the विश्वसनीयता of the परिणाम, often through a comparison between कंट्रोल माप और the other माप.
Scientific नियंत्रण हैं a भाग of the वैज्ञानिक विधि.
For उदाहरण, during drug testing, वैज्ञानिकों होगा कोशिश to control दो समूह to keep them as एकसमान as possible, then allow एक समूह to try the ड्रग.
another उदाहरण might be परीक्षण plant उर्वरक by giving it to तभी हाफ the plants in a गार्डन : the plants that प्राप्त no fertilizer are the control group, क्युकी they स्थापित the baseline level of growth कि the fertilizer-treated plants will be compared against.
Without a control समूह, the experiment can नहीं determine whether the fertilizer-treated plants grow more than वे would have if untreated.
ideally, सब परिवर्तनीय in an प्रयोग will be नियंत्रित ( accounted for by the control माप ) and none होगा be uncontrolled.
in such an experiment, if सब the controls work as अपेक्षित, it is संभावित to conclude कि the प्रयोग is working as intended and that the results of the experiment are due to the प्रभाव of the परिवर्तनीय being tested.
कि is, scientific नियंत्रण allow an अन्वेषक to make a claim like `` दो situations यहूद एकसमान जबतक फ़ैक्टर x occurred.
चूंकि factor X is the only difference between the two situations, the new निष्कर्ष was caused by factor x. ''

जॉन Adams ( October 30, 1735 ( o.s. October 19, 1735 ) – July 4, 1826 ) थी the दूसरी president of the United States ( 1797–1801 ), having earlier served as the first वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States.
an American Founding पिता, he was a statesman, राजनयिक, and a leading एडवोकेट of अमरीकी स्वतंत्रता इससे ग्रेट Britain.
खूब educated, he was an आत्मज्ञान राजनैतिक theorist जो प्रचारित republicanism and लिखा prolifically परिचय his often seminal विचार, दोनो in published works and in अक्षर to उसके बीवी and कुंजी adviser Abigail as खूब as to अन्य founding Fathers.
एडम्स आए to prominence in the जल्दी चरण of the American Revolution.
A lawyer और पब्लिक figure in Boston, as a प्रतिनिधि इससे Massachusetts to the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस, he played a अग्रणी भूमिका in persuading Congress to घोषित independence.
He assisted Thomas जेफरसन in drafting the Declaration of Independence in 1776, and थी its प्राथमिक एडवोकेट in the Congress.
Later, as a diplomat in यूरोपीय, he helped negotiate the eventual peace सन्धि साथ Great ब्रिटेन, और was जिम्मेदार for obtaining vital governmental loans इससे एम्सटर्डम बैंकर्स.
A political theorist and इतिहासकार, Adams largely लिखा the मैसाचुसेट्स Constitution in 1780, which together with his earlier विचार on Government, influenced American political thought.
एक of उसके greatest roles was as a judge of character : in 1775, he मनोनीत जार्ज वॉशिंगटन to be commander-in-chief, and 25 सालो बाद मनोनीत John Marshall to be मुख्य Justice of the संयुक्त राज्य.
Adams ' revolutionary credentials secured him two terms as George वॉशिंगटन 's vice अध्यक्ष और उसके अपना election in 1796 as the दूसरी president.
दौरान his one term, he encountered ferocious हमले by the jeffersonian Republicans, as खूब as the प्रबल faction in उसके अपना Federalist पार्टी led by his bitter दुश्मन Alexander Hamilton.
एडम्स हस्ताक्षरित the controversial एलियन और राजद्रोह Acts, और निर्मित up the army and नेवी especially in the face of an undeclared नवल war ( पुकारा the `` quasi-war `` ) साथ फ़्रांस, 1798–1800.
the प्रमुख accomplishment of his प्रेसिडेंसी was his शांतिपूर्ण resolution of the conflict in the face of हैमिल्टन 's विपक्ष.
in 1800, एडम्स was पराजित लिये re-election by Thomas जेफरसन और retired to Massachusetts.
he later resumed उसके दोस्ती साथ जेफरसन.
he and उसके wife, अबीगैल Adams, संस्थापित an accomplished family लकीर of राजनेता, diplomats, और इतिहासकारों अभी referred to as the एडम्स राजनैतिक परिवार.
एडम्स थी the father of जॉन क्विंसी एडम्स, the sixth President of the United States.
उसके achievements have प्राप्त वृहद recognition in modern times, हालांकि his contributions यहूद नहीं initially as celebrated as those of अन्य Founders.
Adams was the पहला U.S. president to reside in the भवन that eventually became ज्ञात as the White हाउस.
a Watt भाप इंजन.
The भाप इंजन, fuelled primarily by coal, propelled the Industrial Revolution in Great Britain और the world.
The Industrial क्रान्ति was the परिवर्तन to नई manufacturing processes that occurred in the period from परिचय 1760 to कुछ समय between 1820 और 1840.
This transition included going from हाथ production methods to मशीने, नई रासायनिक manufacturing and iron उत्पादन processes, improved दक्षता of जल power, the increasing उपयोग of steam power और development of machine tools.
The transition also शामिल the बदलें from wood and अन्य bio-fuels to coal.
the औद्योगिक revolution began in ब्रिटेन और भीतर a few दशकों स्प्रेड to Western Europe और the संयुक्त States.
The औद्योगिक Revolution marks a प्रमुख turning point in history ; almost every aspect of रोज़ life was बहकावे in कुछ way.
Most notably, औसत income और जनसांख्यिकी began to exhibit unprecedented sustained विकास.
In the शब्द of Nobel पुरस्कार winner Robert E. लुकास, Jr., `` लिये the first time in history, the living standards of the masses of ordinary लोगों have begun to undergo sustained growth... nothing remotely जैसे this आर्थिक बर्ताव is mentioned by the classical अर्थशास्त्रियों, even as a theoretical possibility. ''
William Bell Scott Iron and Coal, 1855-60
the period of time covered by the Industrial Revolution varies साथ different historians.
eric Hobsbawm held कि it 'broke out ' in ब्रिटेन in the 1780s and थी not fully felt जबतक the 1830s or 1840s, while T. S. Ashton held कि it occurred roughly between 1760 and 1830.
कुछ 20th-century इतिहासकारों ऐसे as John Clapham and Nicholas crafts have argued that the process of economic और सोशल बदलें took place धीरे और the पद revolution is a misnomer.
इस is still a subject of debate among इतिहासकारों.
GDP per capita थी broadly stable before the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति और the emergence of the modern पूंजीवादी अर्थव्यवस्था.
The औद्योगिक Revolution began an era of per-capita economic विकास in capitalist economies.
आर्थिक इतिहासकारों are in agreement that the onset of the Industrial क्रान्ति is the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण इवेंट in the history of मानवता since the domestication of पशु और plants.
the पहला Industrial Revolution विकसित into the Second Industrial Revolution in the transition सालो between 1840 and 1870, जब technological और आर्थिक progress gained momentum with the increasing adoption of steam-powered नौकाएँ, जहाजों और रेल, the large scale manufacture of यंत्र tools और the increasing उपयोग of steam powered कारखानों.
Juliet AnnMarie huddy ( born सितंबर 27, 1969 ), is an American टेलीविज़न news रिपोर्टर, currently appearing on Fox न्यूज चैनल.
This list बाँधने u.S. शहरों by जमीन area ( not including लाशें of water ).
कुल क्षेत्रों ( including water ) हैं भी दिए, but note that, when क्रमित by कुल area, a क्रमांक of coastal cities appear disproportionately `` larger ''.
सैन फ्रांसिस्को is an extreme उदाहरण ; जल makes up nearly 80 % of इसके total क्षेत्रफल of 232 square मील ( 601 km2 ).
Note भी that in अनेक मामले a city may be geographically large primarily because इसके municipal सरकारी रै merged साथ the सरकारी of the surrounding county.
In some cases the काउंटी no longer exists, जबकि in अन्य the व्यवस्था has formed a संचित city–county ( or city- borough in अलास्का, or city- parish in Louisiana ).
ये are दिखाया in बिंदास in the सूची नीचे ( लकिन नहीं all examples may be indicated ).
** ये are स्वतंत्र cities, meaning they हैं not a भाग of any county.
The विशाल आंत ( or bowel, colon ) is the पिछला भाग of the digestive system in vertebrate पशु.
इसके function is to अवशोषित water इससे the बाकी indigestible खाना पदार्थ, and then to pass useless waste सामग्री from the देह.
इस आलेख is primarily परिचय the human gut, हालांकि the information about its processes are सीधे applicable to सबसे स्तनधारियों.
the विशाल आंत consists of the cecum, मलाशय and गुदा canal.
it starts in the सही iliac region of the pelvis, बस at or below the सही waist, जहाँ it is joined to the नीचे end of the छोटी आंत.
From यहाँ it continues up the उदर, तब आरपार the width of the abdominal cavity, और तब it turns bas, continuing to इसके endpoint at the anus.
the large आंत is about long, जिससे is about one-fifth of the पूरे length of the intestinal कनाल.
In Terminologia Anatomica the large आंत includes the cecum, कोलन, मलाशय, और anal कनाल.
However, some sources exclude the गुदा कनाल.
The Green खाड़ी Packers हैं an American फ़ुटबॉल team आधारित in ग्रीन Bay, विस्कॉन्सिन.
They हैं सदस्यों of the North Division of the National Football Conference ( NFC ) in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ).
Green Bay is the third-oldest franchise in the एनएफएल, having महरूम व्यवस्थित and playing in 1919.
The Packers are the तभी non-profit, community-owned major लीग professional खेल टोली in the संयुक्त राज्य.
The Packers are the last vestige of `` छोटी कस्बा टीमों '' that यहूद एकबार common in the एनएफएल during the 1920s and 1930s.
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name lambeau Field on which the team plays ) और जार्ज व्हिटनी calhoun, the Green खाड़ी पैकर्स can ट्रेस उनके lineage to other semi-professional teams in Green Bay dating वापस to 1896.
in 1919 and 1920 the पैकर्स competed as a semi-professional फ़ुटबॉल team against clubs from around Wisconsin and the Midwest.
वे joined the American Professional फ़ुटबॉल Association ( APFA ) in 1921, the forerunner to what is known today as the National Football League ( NFL ).
Although Green Bay is the पिछला एनएफएल `` छोटी town '' टोली, its local fan base and media extends into nearby Milwaukee ; the team भी निभाई selected home खेल वहीँ between 1933 और 1994.
the ग्रीन Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than any other टोली in the एनएफएल ), including नौ NFL championships prior to the सुपर Bowl era और four सुपर Bowl victories —in 1967 ( सुपर कटोरी I ), 1968 ( सुपर Bowl ii ), 1997 ( Super Bowl xxxi ) और 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ).
the Packers have long-standing, bitter rivalries with their nfc North ( formerly the nfc सेंट्रल ) opponents, the शिकागो Bears, Minnesota वाइकिंग्स और the Detroit Lions.
the bears-packers rivalry is एक of the oldest rivalries in एनएफएल history, डेटिंग वापस to 1921.
The San फर्नांडो Valley ( locally ज्ञात as `` the घाटी '' ) is an urbanized घाटी स्तिथ in the Los Angeles metropolitan area of southern कैलिफ़ोर्निया, United राज्य, defined by the kyu of the अनुप्रस्थ Ranges circling it.
घर to 1.76 लाख लोगों, it lies north of the larger and अधिक populous Los एंजिल्स जलाशय.
nearly two तिहाई of the Valley 's जमीन area is part of the नगर of लॉस Angeles.
The अन्य incorporated cities in the valley are Glendale, Burbank, San फर्नांडो, Hidden Hills और calabasas.

the संसार of coca-cola, is a स्थाई प्रदर्शनी featuring the इतिहास of the coca-cola कम्पनी.

as भाग of जॉर्जिया 's संग्रहालय.

it खोली to the public on may 24, 2007, relocating from और replacing the असली exhibit.
pretties is a 2005 science fiction अनोखा and the second book of the Uglies Trilogy लिखा by स्कॉट Westerfeld.
It is नियत in a future dystopian संसार in which everyone is turned `` Pretty '' by चरम कॉस्मेटिक surgery upon reaching आयु 16.
It tells the story of किशोरावस्था टैली youngblood who विद्रोहियों against समाज 's enforced conformity.
सुसान Leigh Vaughan Smith ( born सितंबर 26, 1971 ) is an American woman sentenced to जीवन in prison लिये murdering उसके children.
born in संघ, South Carolina, और a former student of the विश्वविद्यालयों of South Carolina संघ, she was convicted on जुलाई 22, 1995 for murdering उसके two बेटे, 3-year-old Michael Daniel स्मिथ, born October 10, 1991, and 14-month-old Alexander Tyler स्मिथ, born अगस्त 5, 1993.
the case gained worldwide attention shortly after it developed, due to उसके claiming that a black man चुराया उसके car and kidnapped उसके बेटे.
वो later claimed कि वो suffered from दिमागी health issues that impaired her निर्णय.
according to the South कैरोलिना विभाग of corrections, स्मिथ होगा be eligible लिये parole on November 4, 2024, after serving a minimum of तीस years.
वो is incarcerated at South Carolina 's Leath correctional Institution, निकट greenwood.
माउंट mckinley ( भी known as denali taken from the इनुइट koyukon Athabaskan भाषा meaning `` The ग्रेट एक '' ) is the उच्चतम पहाड़ peak in the संयुक्त States और in North America साथ a समिट elevation of above sea स्तर.
At कुछ, the base to शिखर rise is considered the largest of any mountain situated entirely above sea level.
measured by स्थलाकृतिक prominence, it is the third सबसे prominent peak बाद Mount Everest and अकोंकागुआ.
Located in the अलास्का दायरा in the interior of us state of Alaska, it is the centerpiece of Denali National पार्क and बचाना.
the पहला European to दस्तावेज़ sighting the mountain थी जार्ज Vancouver in 1794.
in 1903, जेम्स Wickersham recorded the first attempt at climbing McKinley which थी unsuccessful.
in 1906, फ्रेडरिक कुक claimed the first ascent which थी बाद proven to be गलत.
The पहला verifiable ascent to McKinley 's summit थी हासिल on June 7, 1913 by चढना Hudson Stuck, हैरी karstens, वाल्टर Harper, and रॉबर्ट Tatum.
in 1951, Bradford Washburn pioneered the West Buttress route considered to be the safest and easiest route and therefore the most लोकप्रिय फिलहाल in उपयोग.
the होंडा s600 is an ऑटोमोबाइल manufactured by Honda.
it was शुभारम्भ in कूच 1964.
उपलब्धियाँ as a roadster – bearing strong प्रतिरूप to the Honda s500 – और as a fastback coupé – introduced in March 1965 – the s600 was the first Honda उपलब्धियाँ in दो trim स्तर.
During इसके production run up to 1966, the model styling होता remain pretty much the same, with the सबसे notable changes coming to the front grille, बम्पर, and headlights.
संचालित by a DOHC, water-cooled, four-cylinder inline engine साथ four carburetors, the engine क्षमता was increased to 606 cc इससे the S500 's 531 cc.
The engine उत्पादित at 8,500 आरपीएम और had a top speed of.
साथ the convertible weighing in at mere, the अतिरिक्त चादर metal of the coupe तभी added to the overall वज़न.
Suspension थी स्वतंत्र साथ sealed रोलर chain ड्राइव to each पश्च व्हील.
The s600 थी the first mass marketed Honda car.
First offered तभी in right-hand drive, it soon became available in left-hand drive to अपील to निर्यात बाज़ार.
There यहूद a few pre-production s500s manufactured in left hand drive, दो or तीन भी होने दिखाया in कुछ early sales brochures.
दोनो the s600 roadster और coupé were available in standard trim and a खास, upgraded package called the sm600 which included, among अन्य items, special पेंट रंगों, exclusive badging, a standard रेडियो and speaker, a खास antenna in the यात्री side सूर्य visor, मानक reversing लाइट्स, a standard सिगरेट lighter, a standard हीटर, बेहतर cushioned सीटे, और a detachable सीट track for quick removal of the passenger seat.
Honda built 3,912 roadsters in 1964, with production climbing to 7,261 convertibles and 1,519 coupes in 1965.
उत्पादन dropped बंद in 1966 ( as they यहूद shifting to the S800 ) साथ only 111 roadsters and 281 coupes, giving tallies of 11,284 convertibles and 1,800 coupes for the 3 year स्पैन.
everybody Hates Chris is an American टेलीविज़न period sitcom कि depicts the teenage experiences of comedian Chris चट्टान ( who is also the narrator ) जबकि growing up in the bedford-stuyvesant पड़ोस of Brooklyn, नई यॉर्क.
the show is set between 1983 and 1987 ; however, चट्टान खुद थी a किशोरावस्था between 1978 and 1983.
चट्टान grew up साथ a boy named Kenny montero, whom he रै प्रायः referred to as the प्रेरणा लिये a लॉट of the episodes.
in many साक्षात्कार, Rock रै वर्णित केनी as the reason he मिला into comedy in the first place.
The show 's title parodies the CBS sitcom Everybody loves Raymond.
Rock stated : `` everybody loves रेमंड but everybody hates Chris ! ``.
the show 's lead अभिनेताओं are Tyler James विलियम्स, टेरी क्रू, Tichina Arnold, Tequan Richmond, imani Hakim, और Vincent martella.
in Fall 2008, the The cw स्थानांतरित everybody hates क्रिस and the Game to the Friday रात्रि death स्लॉट.
the fourth season of the श्रेणी premiered Friday, अक्तूबर 3, 2008, at 8:00pm Eastern/7:00PM Central.
On may 21, 2009, the CW announced कि it था रद्द Everybody hates क्रिस.
