pleural effusion is excess fluid that accumulates between the दो pleural परतों, the fluid-filled space कि surrounds the lungs.
excessive amounts of such fluid can impair breathing by limiting the expansion of the lungs during वेंटिलेशन.
बियोवुल्फ़ ( ; in बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी or ) is the conventional शीर्षक of an बूढ़ा English heroic epic poem consisting of 3182 alliterative long लाइनों, set in Scandinavia, commonly cited as एक of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण works of Anglo-Saxon साहित्य.
it survives in a सिंगल manuscript ज्ञात as the nowell codex.
Its संयोजन by an बेनाम Anglo-Saxon कवि is dated between the 8th और the जल्दी 11th सदी.
In 1731, the manuscript थी badly damaged by a fire कि swept through a building आवास a संग्रहण of मध्यकालीन manuscripts assembled by Sir रॉबर्ट Bruce कपास.
The कविता गिरी into अस्पष्टता for दशकों, और its अस्तित्व किया नहीं become widely ज्ञात again until it was मुद्रित in 1815 in an संस्करण prepared by the Icelandic-Danish विद्वान Grímur jónsson Thorkelin.
In the कविता, बियोवुल्फ़, a नायिका of the geats in Scandinavia, comes to the help of hroðgar, the king of the Danes, whose मीड hall ( in Heorot ) has been अंतर्गत attack by a monster known as Grendel.
After Beowulf slays him, Grendel 's माँ हमले the hall और is then also पराजित.
विजयी, Beowulf goes घर to geatland in स्वीडन and later becomes king of the geats.
बाद a काल of पचास सालो has passed, Beowulf defeats a ड्रैगन, लकिन is fatally wounded in the battle.
After his मौत, उसके attendants bury उसे in a tumulus, a burial mound, in Geatland.
Shem Ham and japheth by जेम्स tissot 1904.
shem ( ; Sēm ; Arabic : Sām ; ge'ez : ሴም, Sēm ; `` renown ; समृद्धि ; name '' ) was एक of the बेटे of Noah in the Hebrew Bible as खूब as in इस्लामी literature.
he is most popularly regarded as the ज्येष्ठ बेटे, though some traditions लिहाज़ उसे as the दूसरी बेटे.
Genesis 10:21 refers to सापेक्ष ages of Shem और उसके bhai Japheth, लकिन with sufficient ambiguity to have yielded अलग अनुवाद.
The verse is translated in the kjv as `` unto Shem also, the father of all the children of eber, the bhai of Japheth the elder, भी to him यहूद children born. ``.
however, the नई American Standard बाइबल gives, `` Also to shem, the father of all the children of eber, और the पुरानी brother of Japheth, children यहूद born. ''
उत्पत्ति 11:10 records that shem थी स्टिल 100 सालो old at the जनम of arphaxad, ( but nearly 101 - देखिए कालक्रम नोट, ) दो सालो बाद the flood, making him मुश्किल 99 at the time the बाढ़ began ; और that he lived लिये another 500 years बाद this, making उसके आयु at death 600 सालो.
the children of Shem यहूद Elam, Asshur, Arphaxad, Lud, and aram, in addition to daughters.
अब्राहम, the patriarch of the Hebrews and Arabs, थी one of the वंशजों of Arphaxad.
Islamic साहित्य describes shem as one of the believing sons of नूह.
कुछ sources even पहचानो Shem as a नबी in his own सही और that he थी the अगला नबी बाद his father.
in एक Muslim legend, shem थी one of the people कि God made यीशु resurrect as a sign to the Children of इसराईल.
The 1st सदी historian Flavius josephus, among अनेक अन्य, recounted the tradition that ये पाँच बेटे were the progenitors of the राष्ट्र of Elam, Assyria, chaldea, Lydia, और सीरियाई, क्रमशः.
Semitic is still a commonly used पद for the सामीती भाषाएं, as a subset of the Afro-Asiatic भाषाएं, denoting the आम भाषाई विरासत of अरबी, Aramaic, Akkadian, Ethiopic, Hebrew और फ़ोनीशियाई languages.
According to कुछ यहूदी परंपराओं ( e.g., B. talmud Nedarim 32b ; Genesis Rabbah 46:7 ; Genesis rabbah 56:10 ; Leviticus Rabbah 25:6 ; Numbers rabbah 4:8. ), shem is believed to have महरूम melchizedek, King of सलेम whom अब्राहम is recorded to have met बाद the बैटल of the four किंग्स.
In a few of the many extra-biblical sources that describe him, Shem is भी credited with हत्या Nimrod, बेटे of Cush.
Shem is mentioned in Genesis 5:32, 6:10 ; 7:13 ; 9:18,23,26-27 ; 10 ; 11:10 ; also in 1 Chronicles 1:4.
भौगोलिक identifications of Flavius josephus, c. 100 ad ; Japheth 's sons दिखाया in रेड, Ham 's sons in blue, shem 's बेटे in ग्रीन.
Go पापा or Go Daddy Group Inc. is a privately held company that is primarily an internet domain रजिस्ट्रार और web hosting कम्पनी.
go Daddy समूह Inc. दायर for an ipo in 2006, लकिन बाद canceled it, due to `` market uncertainties ''.
in जोड to domain पंजीकरण and होस्टिंग go Daddy भी sells e-business सम्बन्धित software और services.
On June 24, 2011, The Wall Street जर्नल reported that private-equity firms केकेआर and चांदी झील Partners, साथ साथ a तीसरा निवेशकों, यहूद nearing a deal to buy the कम्पनी लिये between $ 2–2.5 billion.
on July 1, 2011 go पापा confirmed that KKR, चांदी Lake साझेदार और प्रौद्योगिकी क्रॉसओवर ventures had closed the सौदे.
हालांकि the purchase दाम थी नहीं officially announced it was reported to be $ 2.25 अरब, लिये 65 % of the company.

Andorra ( ;, ), officially the Principality of अंडोरा ( ), also पुकारा the principality of the घाटियों of Andorra, ( ), is a landlocked microstate in Southwestern यूरोपीय, located in the पूर्वी pyrenees kyu और bordered by Spain and France.
it is the sixth smallest स्वदेश in Europe, having an area of and an अनुमानित population of 85,000 in 2012.
Its capital, अंडोरा la Vella, is the highest पूंजी नगर in Europe, at an elevation of ऊपर समुद्र level.
The official भाषा is Catalan, हालांकि Spanish, Portuguese, और French हैं भी commonly spoken.
निर्मित अंतर्गत a charter in 988, the उपस्थित principality थी formed in 1278.
it is ज्ञात as a principality as it is a monarchy headed by two co-princes – the Bishop of urgell और the President of फ़्रांस.
अंडोरा is a prosperous देश mainly because of its पर्यटन उद्योग, जिससे सेवाएं an estimated 10.2 million विज़िटर annually, and भी क्युकी of its औकात as a कर haven.
it is not a सदस्य of the यूरोपीय Union, but the यूरोपियन is the de facto currency.
The लोगों of Andorra have the 4th highest human जीवन expectancy in the world — 82 years at birth.
The जार्ज Washington University ( gw, GWU, or जार्ज Washington ) is a व्यापक private, coeducational research विश्वविद्यालयों located in वॉशिंगटन, d.C..
it पुरस्कार certificates, स्नातक degrees, मास्टर्स डिग्री, और PhDs आरपार several दर्जन disciplines.

Kimberly नोएल `` Kim '' Kardashian ( born अक्तूबर 21, 1980 ) is an अमरीकी socialite, television personality और occasional actress.
In 2007, वो gained सुर्खी as the subject of a sex टेप कि subsequently resulted in a अदालत awarding उसके $ 5 लाख ; बाद in कि same year, she और उसके परिवार rose to prominence with उनके e !
वास्तविकता television series Keeping Up साथ the Kardashians, and its subsequent spin-offs, सहित कोर्टनी and किम Take New York and कोर्टनी and Kim लो Miami.

in August 2011, कार्दशियन married basketball खिलाड़ी क्रिस Humphries in a widely publicized रस्म.
That अक्तूबर, कार्दशियन दायर लिये divorce following 72 days of विवाह.

oahu ( ) or Oahu, known as `` the Gathering Place '', is the तीसरा largest of the हवाई आइलैंड्स और the most populous of the आइलैंड्स in the u.S. state of Hawaii.
the राज्य capital, होनोलूलू, is on oahu 's southeast coast.
सहित छोटी close-in offshore आइलैंड्स such as Ford Island and the islands in Kaneohe Bay and off the eastern ( windward ) coast, it रै a कुल land क्षेत्रफल of, बनाना it the 20th largest island in the United States.
In the महानतम आयाम, इस volcanic island is long and आरपार.
The लंबाई of the shoreline is.
The island is the परिणाम of two separate शील्ड ज्वालामुखी : waianae और koolau, साथ a व्यापक `` घाटी '' or काठी ( the central oahu मैदान ) between उन्हें.
the उच्चतम point is Mt. Ka'ala in the waianae दायरा, उठती to above समुद्र level.
The आधार करेंसी of the संयुक्त States is the U.S. डालर, and is मुद्रित on बिल्स in denominations of $ 1, $ 2, $ 5, $ 10, $ 20, $ 50, और $ 100.
at one time, however, u.S. currency शामिल five larger denominations.
Notes in the denominations of $ 500, $ 1,000, $ 5,000, और $ 10,000 were मुद्रित लिये सामान्य use, और a $ 100,000 note was मुद्रित for निश्चित internal transactions.
British होंडुरास was a अंग्रेजों colony in सेंट्रल America.
in 1981, the उपनिवेश gained full independence, and is अभी the independent स्वदेश of बेलीज़.
First colonised by spaniards in the 17th century, the territory on the east coast of Central America, south of मैक्सिको, became a अंग्रेजों crown उपनिवेश in 1862.
in 1964, it became a self-governing उपनिवेश.
Belize became fully independent इससे the संयुक्त Kingdom in 1981.
Belize थी the last महाद्वीपीय कब्ज़ा of the United किंगडम in the Americas.
spelt, also ज्ञात as dinkel wheat, or hulled गेहूं, is an ancient species of wheat from the पांचवां मिलेनियम BC.
spelt थी an महत्वपूर्ण स्टेपल in भाग of Europe इससे the Bronze आयु to medieval times ; it now survives as a relict crop in सेंट्रल यूरोपीय और northern Spain और रै मिला a new market as a health food.
Spelt is sometimes considered a subspecies of the closely सम्बन्धित प्रजाति common गेहूं ( T. aestivum ), in जिससे case its वनस्पति name is considered to be Triticum aestivum subsp. spelta.
it is a hexaploid wheat, जिससे अर्थात् it रै six sets of गुणसूत्रों.
शर्लक Holmes ( or ) is a fictional detective निर्मित by author और physician Sir आर्थर कोनन डोयल.
A london-based `` consulting जासूस '' whose abilities किनारा on the fantastic, holmes is प्रसिद्ध for his astute लॉजिकल reasoning, उसके ability to अपनाना लगभग any disguise, और उसके उपयोग of forensic science कौशल to solve difficult cases.
Holmes, who पहला appeared in प्रकाशन in 1887, थी प्रदर्शित in four novels और 56 छोटी stories.
the first novel, A Study in Scarlet, appeared in beeton 's क्रिसमस Annual in 1887 and the दूसरी, The चिह्न of the चार, in Lippincott 's मासिक पत्रिका in 1890.
The अक्षर grew tremendously in लोकप्रियता with the पहला श्रेणी of short stories in the strand पत्रिका, शुरूआत साथ a कांड in बोहेमिया in 1891 ; further श्रेणी of short stories and दो novels प्रकाशित in सीरियल रूप appeared between तब and 1927.
The कहानियां cover a period from around 1880 up to 1914.
सब लकिन चार कहानियां हैं narrated by holmes 's dost and biographer, dr. John H. Watson ; दो are narrated by Holmes himself ( `` the blanched सिपाही `` और `` the Lion 's Mane `` ) and दो others हैं written in the तीसरा व्यक्ति ( `` the Mazarin Stone `` and `` उसके Last धनुष `` ).
In two कहानियां ( `` The musgrave Ritual `` और `` the ग्लोरिया स्कॉट `` ), Holmes tells Watson the main story इससे उसके यादें, जबकि Watson becomes the narrator of the frame story.
The first और चौथी novels, a Study in स्कारलेट और The Valley of Fear, each शामिल a long interval of सर्वज्ञ narration recounting events unknown to either holmes or Watson.
the संयुक्त States House of प्रतिनिधि is एक of the दो घरों of the United States Congress ( a bicameral विधानमंडल ).
It is frequently referred to as the हाउस.
the अन्य house is the सीनेट.
The संयोजन and powers of the हाउस हैं स्थापित in आलेख एक of the संयुक्त States Constitution.
the major शक्ति of the House is to pass federal विधान कि affects the entire country although its bills must भी be passed by the Senate and further agreed to by the u.S. President पहले becoming विधि ( unless both the House and सीनेट re-pass the विधान with a two-thirds बहुमत in प्रत्येक chamber ).
the हाउस रै several exclusive powers : the power to initiate revenue बिल्स, to impeach officials, and to elect the U.S. अध्यक्ष in मामला there is no majority in the Electoral कॉलेज.
प्रत्येक u.S. राज्य is represented in the हाउस in proportion to its जनसांख्यिकी but is entitled to at least one representative.
The सबसे populous राज्य, California, फिलहाल रै 53 representatives.
The total number of मतदान representatives is फिक्स्ड by विधि at 435.
Each representative serves लिये a two-year पद.
the स्पीकर of the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of Representatives, who presides over the chamber, is elected by the members of the House, and is therefore traditionally the नेता of the House Democratic Caucus or the हाउस रिपब्लिकन Conference, whichever पार्टी has अधिक मतदान members.
The House meets in the south wing of the संयुक्त राज्य कैपिटल.
jell-o is a brand नाम belonging to U.S.-based kraft भोजन for a number of जिलेटिन desserts, सहित फल gels, puddings और no-bake cream pies.
the brand 's लोकप्रियता रै led to it होने प्रयुक्त as a generic term for gelatin dessert आरपार the U.S. and कनाडा.
Kennywood is an मनोरंजन पार्क located in वेस्ट mifflin, Pennsylvania, a उपनगरीय of पिट्सबर्ग.
the पार्क first opened in 1898 as a `` ट्राली पार्क '' attraction at the समाप्त of the mellon परिवार 's Monongahela Street Railway.
the park was purchased in 1906 by F. W. henninger and Andrew mcswigan और यूँ began the kennywood Entertainment कम्पनी that रै remained a closely held परिवार business लिये over 100 years.
इस परंपरागत amusement पार्क still has structures and यात्राएँ डेटिंग back to its खोलने and the जल्दी 1900s.
Along साथ Rye playland Park, it is one of only two amusement parks सूचीबद्ध in the National पंजीकरण of Historic Places.
Kennywood is owned by kennywood entertainment Company, which जबतक December 2007 was a closely held family business स्वामित्व by the Henninger and McSwigan families.
Kennywood entertainment is now operated by California-based Palace entertainment, a subsidiary of parques Reunidos, an international मनोरंजन park कम्पनी based in मैड्रिड, Spain.
parque Reunidos is in turn a subsidiary of Candover Investments, an investment fund आधारित in the UK.
A सोशल सुरक्षा कार्ड जारी by the Railroad Retirement फलक in 1943 to a अभी deceased person.
In the संयुक्त States, a सोशल Security number ( SSN ) is a nine-digit क्रमांक issued to U.S. citizens, स्थाई निवासियों, and temporary ( working ) निवासियों under section 205 ( c ) ( 2 ) of the सोशल Security अधिनियम, संहिताबद्ध as.
The number is जारी to an individual by the Social सुरक्षा Administration, an independent agency of the United राज्य सरकारी.
इसके प्राथमिक purpose is to track individuals लिये Social Security उद्देश्य.
a Social सुरक्षा क्रमांक may be प्राप्त by applying on रूप SS-5, `` अनुप्रयोग लिये a Social Security Number कार्ड ''.
Minimalism describes आंदोलनों in विभिन्न forms of आर्ट and design, विशेषकर विज़ुअल आर्ट and music, जहाँ the कार्य is नियत out to expose the essence or identity of a विषय through eliminating all non-essential forms, सुविधाएँ or अवधारणाओं.
Minimalism is any डिज़ाइन or style in जिससे the सरलतम and fewest तत्व हैं used to create the अधिकतम प्रभाव.
As a विशिष्ट movement in the कला it is पहचाना साथ developments in post–World युद्ध II Western आर्ट, सबसे strongly with American विज़ुअल arts in the 1960s और early 1970s.
Prominent artists संबद्ध with this गति include डोनाल्ड Judd, जॉन mccracken, agnes मार्टिन, Dan Flavin, रॉबर्ट Morris, Anne truitt, and फ़्रैंक स्टेला.
it is rooted in the reductive पहलुओं of modernism, and is often interpreted as a reaction विरूद्ध अमूर्त expressionism and a सेतु to postminimal art practices.
the terms have विस्तारित to encompass a गति in म्यूज़िक which features repetition और iteration, as in the रचनाएं of La मोंटे यंग, Terry रिले, Steve reich, Philip कांच, and जॉन एडम्स.
Minimalist compositions हैं sometimes known as systems म्यूज़िक.
the पद `` अल्पतम '' is प्रायः applied colloquially to designate anything कि is spare or stripped to its अनिवार्य.
it has also been used to describe the plays और novels of सैमुएल beckett, the films of Robert Bresson, the stories of Raymond carver, and even the ऑटोमोबाइल डिजाइन of कोलिन chapman.
The शब्द was पहला प्रयुक्त in English in the early 20th century to describe the mensheviks.
In chemistry and physics, Dalton 's law ( also पुकारा Dalton 's law of partial pressures ) राज्य कि the कुल दबाव exerted by the मिश्रण of non-reactive gases is बराबर to the sum of the partial pressures of व्यक्तिगत गैसों.
इस empirical law was observed by जॉन Dalton in 1801 और is related to the आदर्श गैस कानून.
mathematically, the दबाव of a मिश्रण of gases can be defined as the summation
or
where represent the partial pressure of प्रत्येक component.
it is assumed कि the गैसों do not react साथ प्रत्येक other
जहाँ is the mole fraction of the i-th component in the total mixture of n components.
The relationship below provides a way to determine the volume based विशेषज्ञता of any individual gaseous घटक
जहाँ is the विशेषज्ञता of the i-th घटक expressed in ppm.
Dalton 's विधि is नहीं exactly followed by रियल गैसों.
those deviations हैं considerably विशाल at high pressures.
in such conditions, the आवाज़ occupied by the molecules can become significant compared to the फ़्री स्पेस between उन्हें.
In particular, the छोटी average दूरियाँ between molecules उठाता the intensity of intermolecular शक्तियां between गैस molecules पर्याप्त to substantially बदलें the pressure exerted by them.
neither of those effects are considered by the ideal gas मॉडल.
इस is a सूची of the largest United राज्य कॉलेजों and universities by नामांकन लिये कॉलेजों and विश्वविद्यालयों in the संयुक्त States.
कया इस list शामिलs:
कॉलेजों और universities within the United राज्य
विश्वविद्यालयों systems if the system is run अंतर्गत a सिंगल प्रशासन
नामांकन is the sum of the headcount of undergraduate और graduate विद्यार्थी
Enrollment is counted by the एकीकृत Post-secondary Education प्रणाली भीतर the u.S. Department of Education.
Enrollment is the 12-month unduplicated headcount, indicating the number of अद्वितीय students जो attended the university दौरान the साल.
What this list does not include:
Any indication of कैसा many of the नामांकित विद्यार्थी हैं full or part time ( e.g., some universities may have a ऊँची नामांकन, लकिन have सबसे students नामांकित in only a सिंगल class )

`` सही गोलाकार '' is a सोंग performed by American rapper Flo rida, released as the lead सिंगल from his दूसरी studio album, r.o.o.t.s. ( 2009 ).
The सोंग features अतिथि vocals from kesha.
it was released to radio on 27 जनवरी 2009 and थी डिजिटली released on 10 February by Poe Boy entertainment and Atlantic Records.
the सोंग lyrically speaks of Flo rida 's net बॉल रेफरी enthusiasm, while adapting the chorus of the 1984 Dead or Alive सोंग `` तुम Spin me गोलाकार ( Like a Record ) `` in its आँकड़ा.
according to one of the song 's लेखक, the कोरस refers to मौखिक sex.
Kesha contributed guest vocals to the song, लकिन in the संयुक्त राज्य, दौरान the चलाएं atop the chart, kesha was uncredited.
the सोंग received mostly ऋणात्मक reviews इससे critics, who claimed it was kitsch और misogynistic.
However, it थी a वाणिज्यिक success, reaching the शीर्ष टेन of the चार्ट in nineteen देशों worldwide.
in the संयुक्त राज्य, it became Flo rida 's second number-one सिंगल and broke the रिकार्ड लिये first-week sales when it थी released to digital रिटेलर.
The सिंगल 's accompanying म्यूज़िक video थी निर्देशित by Malcolm Jones और nominated लिये an एमटीवी Video म्यूज़िक Award.
the song रै been used in several movies, ऐसे as the Hangover, the Ugly सच्चाई और the तेलुगु movie pilla Zamindar.
in the फिल्म पिच Perfect, the song is performed by the a cappella group the Treblemakers.
the मुख्य इंसाफ of the संयुक्त राज्य is the head of the United States संघीय अदालत प्रणाली ( the judicial branch of the federal government of the संयुक्त States ) and the मुख्य judge of the Supreme Court of the United States.
the Chief इंसाफ is one of nine परम् अदालत justices ; the other eight are the संबद्ध justices of the परम् Court of the United States.
From 1789 जबतक 1866, the office was ज्ञात as the Chief Justice of the Supreme अदालत.
the Chief इंसाफ is the उच्चतम judicial अधिकारी in the देश, और acts as a chief administrative officer लिये the federal courts and as head of the Judicial Conference of the United States appoints the director of the Administrative दफ्तर of the संयुक्त राज्य Courts.
the Chief इंसाफ भी serves as a spokesperson लिये the judicial शाखा.
the Chief इंसाफ लीड the कारोबार of the Supreme अदालत.
he presides over मौखिक वितर्क before the अदालत.
When the अदालत renders an opinion, the Chief justice—when in the majority—decides who writes the court 's राय.
The Chief Justice भी रै significant agenda-setting शक्ति over the अदालत 's meetings.
in the case of an impeachment of a President of the संयुक्त States, जिससे has occurred twice, the Chief इंसाफ presides over the विचारण in the सीनेट.
in modern tradition, the मुख्य Justice has the ceremonial ड्यूटी of administering the शपथ of दफ्तर of the President of the United राज्य.
the first मुख्य इंसाफ थी John Jay.
The 17th and current Chief Justice is John G. रॉबर्ट्स, jr.
हिरण near prudhoe Bay, 1973
prudhoe Bay आयल Field is a विशाल आयल फ़ील्ड on Alaska 's उत्तर Slope.
it is the largest आयल field in दोनो the United States and in North America, covering और originally containing approximately of आयल.
the राशि of recoverable आयल in the field is more than दोगुना that of the next largest field in the संयुक्त States, the East टेक्सास आयल field.
The field is संचालित by BP ; साझेदार हैं ExxonMobil और ConocoPhillips Alaska.
Labor संघ are legally recognized as प्रतिनिधि of मजदूर in अनेक उद्योग in the United States.
उनके कार्यकलाप today centers on collective bargaining over wages, benefits, and working शर्तें लिये उनके सदस्यता, and on representing उनके members in विवादों साथ management over उल्लंघनों of अनुबंध provisions.
Larger unions भी typically engage in lobbying activities और electioneering at the state और federal level.
Most unions in America are aligned with one of दो larger umbrella organizations : the AFL-CIO created in 1955, and the Change to जीत Federation जिससे विभाजित इससे the AFL-CIO in 2005.
दोनो एडवोकेट नीतियों and legislation on निमित्त of मजदूर in the United States और Canada, and take an active भूमिका in politics.
The afl-cio is विशेषकर चिंतित with global व्यापार issues.
In 2010, the percentage of मजदूर belonging to a union in the संयुक्त राज्य ( or कुल मजदूर संघ `` घनत्व '' ) was 11.4 %, compared to 18.4 % in Germany, 27.5 % in कनाडा, और 70 % in Finland.
संघ membership in the private sector has गिरे अंतर्गत 7 % — levels नहीं seen since 1932.
Unions allege that employer-incited opposition रै contributed to this decline in membership.
the most prominent unions हैं among public sector कर्मचारी such as शिक्षक और police.
सदस्यों of unions हैं disproportionately पुरानी, पुरूष और residents of the Northeast, the Midwest, and California.
संघ workers average 10-30 % उच्चतर अदा than non-union in America after controlling लिये individual, जॉब, और labor market characteristics.
हालांकि much छोटी compared to उनके शिखर सदस्यता in the 1950s, अमरीकी संघ remain a prominent political factor, दोनो through mobilization of उनके अपना memberships और through coalitions with like-minded activist organizations around मुद्दे such as अप्रवासी rights, trade policy, health परवाह, and जीना wage अभियान.
To लड़ो कथित नियोक्ता anti-union programs, unions are currently वकालत new `` card जाँच `` संघीय विधान कि would आवश्यकता employers to bargain with a संघ if अधिक than 50 % of workers हस्ताक्षरित फ़ॉर्म, or `` cards, '' stating they wish to be represented by कि union.
the current procedure involves waiting 45 to 90 दिनों for a federally supervised secret-ballot employee referendum on the subject.
The economist जोसेफ stiglitz रै asserted that, `` दमदार unions have helped to reduce असमानता, whereas weaker unions have बना it easier for ceos, sometimes working with मार्केट शक्तियां कि वे have helped shape, to increase it. ''
the मनाही in unionization चूंकि WWII in the संयुक्त States रै महरूम संबद्ध with a pronounced वृद्धि in income and माल असमानता.
A Christian Lacroix fashion बुटीक
A बुटीक is a छोटी खरीदारी outlet, especially एक that specializes in elite and fashionable वस्तुएं such as कपडे और आभूषण.
the word is फ्रेंच for `` दूकान '', via लैटिन इससे यूनानी ἀποθήκη ( apothēkē ), `` storehouse ''.
The term entered into रोज English उपयोग in the लेट 1960s when, for a brief period, लंदन थी the केन्द्र of the fashion trade.
Carnaby गली और the Kings Road यहूद the focus of much मीडिया ध्यान as घर to the most फैशनेबल boutiques of the era.
अभी the East of London रै been regenerated और अधिक boutiques पॉप up in फैशनेबल क्षेत्रों, such as मीनार Bridge सड़क.
it can भी refer to a specialised firm ऐसे as a boutique निवेश बैंको or boutique law कड़.
The word is often प्रयुक्त to describe a प्रॉपर्टी in the स्वतंत्र section of the hotel market ( ऐसे as The rockwell in लंदन ) in order to फर्क themselves इससे larger जंजीरों ( ऐसे as हिल्टन Hotels ).
in ऐसे cases the establishments aim to convey the विचार कि the operation is elite and highly specialised.
In the strictest sense of the word, boutiques would be one-of-a-kind but अधिक generally speaking, कुछ जंजीरों can be referred to as boutiques if वे specialize in particular styles.
recently, the पद `` boutique '' has प्रारंभ being applied to normally-mass-market वस्तुएं that हैं either niche or produced in intentionally छोटी संख्याएँ at very ऊँची prices.
This may be referred to as boutique निर्माण.
लिये उदाहरण, before the release of the वी, a समय Magazine आलेख suggested that निन्टेंडो could become a `` boutique video-game company '', producing games लिये niche ऑडियंस, rather than trying to compete सीधे साथ Microsoft and Sony.
In the traditional luxury- देखें उद्योग scalfaro International is माना as the precursor in manufacturing और बिक्री of bespoke घड़ियाँ.
The Swiss company उपयोग a highly flexible boutique निर्माण साईट, which allows producing छोटी series or भी अद्वितीय timepieces.
हालांकि कुछ boutiques specialise in hand-made items और other truly one-of-a-kind items, others बस produce t-shirts, stickers, and other फ़ैशन accessories in artificially छोटी runs and बेचें उन्हें at unusually ऊँची prices.
in the जल्दी 1990s Selena प्रारंभ निर्माण her own लकीर of महिलाओं 's clothing.
खोलने two boutiques labeled as `` Selena Etc. बुटीक & Salon '' One स्तिथ in कॉर्पस christi and one located in सैन अंतोनियो, टेक्सास.
One थी due to खोलें in monterrey, Mexico, in 1995 but due to उसके death it थी नहीं खोली.
Around 1999 the San अंतोनियो स्थान closed और the कॉर्पस christi location was closed in 2009.
In लेट 1990s कुछ European खुदरा व्यापारियों विकसित the idea of tailoring a दूकान towards a lifestyle theme, in the form of `` concept स्टोर्स '', which specialised in cross-selling without using separate departments.
One of the पहला अवधारणा स्टोर्स was 10 Corso como in मिलान, Italy followed by colette in Paris and quartier 206 in बर्लिन.
Several well-known अमरीकी जंजीरों such as Urban Outfitters, d-a-s-h, and The गैप, Australian कड़ी Billabong and, though कम आम, रब & टेलर adapted to the concept store ट्रेंड after 2000.
Navy संघीय Credit Union ( or नेवी संघीय ) is a क्रेडिट संघ headquartered in वियना, वर्जिनिया, chartered और regulated under the प्राधिकार of the National क्रेडिट संघ Administration ( ncua ) of the u.S. federal सरकारी.
Navy Federal is the largest natural सदस्य ( or खुदरा ) credit संघ in the संसार, दोनो in asset size and in membership.
as of September 2012, Navy संघीय था over $ 50 billion usd in एसेट, और over 4 लाख सदस्यों.
stevland Hardaway Morris ( born may 13, 1950 as Stevland Hardaway judkins ), known by his स्टेज name Stevie अचरज, is an American सिंगर, songwriter, और multi-instrumentalist, a child prodigy जो विकसित into एक of the most creative musical आंकड़े of the late 20th सदी.
अँधा since shortly after birth, Wonder हस्ताक्षरित साथ Motown 's Tamla लेबल at the आयु of ग्यारह, और continues to perform और रिकार्ड for motown to this दिन.
among अचरज 's बेहतरीन known works हैं singles such as `` अंधविश्वास ``, `` सर Duke ``, `` You हैं the Sunshine of my Life `` और `` I Just Called to कह i प्रेम You ``.
खूब ज्ञात एल्बम भी शामिल talking किताब, innervisions and गीतों in the Key of जीवन.
He has recorded more than तीस U.S. शीर्ष टेन हिट्स और प्राप्त twenty-two ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, the most कभी awarded to a male सोलो artist.
अचरज is also noted लिये his कार्य as an activist for राजनैतिक कल्याणकारी, सहित उसके 1980 अभियान to make Martin लूथर King, jr. 's जन्मदिवस a अवकाश in the United राज्य.
In 2009, Wonder was named a United Nations मेसेंजर of Peace.
In 2008, Billboard magazine released a सूची of the hot 100 all-time Top कलाकारों to celebrate the US singles चार्ट 's fiftieth वर्षगांठ, साथ Wonder at number five.
By popular vote, Stevie थी inducted into The soulmusic Hall of कीर्ति at soulmusic.com in दिसम्बर 2012.
मनस्ताप ( इससे the यूनानी ψυχή `` psyche '', लिये mind/soul, और -ωσις `` -ओएसआईs '', लिये असामान्य कंडीशन or derangement ) refers to an असामान्य कंडीशन of the mind, and is a generic psychiatric term लिये a दिमागी राज्य often वर्णित as involving a `` घाटा of सम्पर्क with वास्तविकता ``.
लोगों suffering from psychosis हैं described as psychotic.
Psychosis is दिए to the more कठोर फ़ॉर्म of मनोरोग disorder, during which hallucinations and delusions, gross excitement or stupor and impaired इनसाइट may occur.
the पद `` मनस्ताप '' is very व्यापक and can mean anything इससे अपेक्षाकृत सामान्य aberrant अनुभवों through to the complex and catatonic expressions of schizophrenia और bipolar प्रकार 1 disorder.
Moreover a चौड़ी किस्में of सेंट्रल बेचैन system diseases, from दोनो external substances और internal physiologic बीमारी, can उपज लक्षण of psychosis.
This led अनेक पेशेवर to कह that मनस्ताप is not specific पर्याप्त as a diagnostic term.
despite इस, `` मनस्ताप '' is generally दिए to noticeable deficits in normal बर्ताव ( negative signs ) और अधिक commonly to विविध types of hallucinations or delusional beliefs ( e.g. grandiosity, delusions of persecution ).
किसी exhibiting very obvious signs may be described as `` frankly psychotic '', whereas एक exhibiting very subtle signs could be classified in the श्रेणी of an `` attenuated psychotic risk syndrome ''.
An excess in dopaminergic signalling is traditionally linked to the positive लक्षण of मनस्ताप, विशेषकर those of schizophrenia.
This is thought to occur through a mechanism of aberrant salience of पर्यावरणीय stimuli.
Many antipsychotic दवाएँ accordingly target the dopamine system ; meta-analyses of placebo-controlled ट्रायल of ये drugs, however, दिखाएँ either no significant difference between ड्रग और placebo, or a very छोटी प्रभाव आकार, suggesting कि the pathophysiology of psychosis is much more जटिल than an overactive dopamine system.
People experiencing मनस्ताप may exhibit some personality परिवर्तन और thought विकार.
depending on इसके severity, इस may be accompanied by असामान्य or विचित्र behavior, as well as difficulty with सोशल बातचीत and पुतलियों in carrying out daily जीवन क्रियाएँ.
सामान्य grievous is a fictional अक्षर in the स्टार युद्धों universe.
a recurring antagonist, he is the Supreme Commander of the confederacy of Independent Systems, a राजनैतिक गुट of planetary systems waging war on the Galactic गणतंत्र.
Trained in सब seven forms of lightsaber combat by Count dooku, he is a निष्ठुर और powerful योद्धा devoted to Jedi 's destruction दौरान the Clone Wars.
His अधिनियमों of wanton आक्रामकता और high Jedi body गिनती होता संकेत the galaxy to दे him the nickname the knightslayer.
Though the notorious Jedi slayer थी the being in the galaxy दौरान the Clone Wars जो था मारे the most जेडी in सिंगल combat, he किया नहीं संकोच to भागो इससे battles he knew he would खोना.
Statistics खेल an important role in summarizing बेसबॉल performance and evaluating खिलाड़ी in the खेल.
चूंकि the flow of a baseball game रै natural breaks to it, और सामान्यतः खिलाड़ी अधिनियम individually rather than performing in क्लस्टर, the खेल lends itself to easy record-keeping and statistics.
Statistics have been रखा for professional बेसबॉल चूंकि the creation of the National League और American लीग, now भाग of प्रमुख League Baseball.
Many statistics are भी उपलब्धियाँ इससे बाहर of प्रमुख League बेसबॉल, इससे लीग ऐसे as the National Association of Professional आधार Ball खिलाड़ी and the नीग्रो लीग.
Dorothea lange 's Migrant Mother depicts अक्षम pea pickers in California, centering on फ्लोरेंस ओवेन्स Thompson, आयु 32, a माँ of seven children, in Nipomo, California, March 1936.
यूएसए सालाना रियल GDP इससे 1910–60, साथ the years of the Great अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
the बेरोजगारी रेट in the us 1910–1960, with the years of the ग्रेट अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The Great अवसाद थी a कठोर worldwide economic depression in the decade preceding World युद्ध ii.
The timing of the Great Depression varied across राष्ट्र, लकिन in सबसे countries it started in 1930 और lasted until the late 1930s or मध्य 1940s.
it थी the longest, most widespread, and deepest depression of the 20th century.
in the 21st सदी, the ग्रेट अवसाद is commonly used as an उदाहरण of कैसा far the world 's अर्थव्यवस्था can मनाही.
The अवसाद originated in the U.S., after the पतन in भण्डार prices कि began around सितंबर 4, 1929, and became worldwide न्यूज साथ the stock मार्केट क्रैश of अक्तूबर 29, 1929 ( known as ब्लैक मंगलवार ).
the Great Depression था devastating प्रभाव in countries समृद्ध और poor.
निजी आय, कर आय, profits और कीमतें dropped, while अंतरराष्ट्रीय trade plunged by more than 50 %.
Unemployment in the U.S. रोज़ to 25 %, and in some countries rose as ऊँची as 33 %.
शहरों all around the संसार यहूद hit मुश्किल, especially those dependent on भारी industry.
निर्माण was virtually halted in अनेक देशों.
खेती and ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों suffered as crop कीमतें fell by approximately 60 %.
Facing plummeting माँग साथ few alternate स्त्रोत of कार्य, क्षेत्रों dependent on प्राथमिक सेक्टर उद्योग ऐसे as cash cropping, खनन और लॉगिंग suffered the सबसे.
कुछ economies started to recover by the mid-1930s.
in अनेक countries, the negative effects of the ग्रेट अवसाद lasted until the समाप्त of संसार War ii.
A असामयिक ventricular संकुचन ( PVC ), भी ज्ञात as a असामयिक ventricular complex, ventricular premature contraction ( or जटिल or देवालय ) ( VPC ), ventricular असामयिक beat ( VPB ), or ventricular extrasystole ( ves ), is a अपेक्षाकृत common event where the धड़कन is initiated by purkinje fibres in the ventricles बल्कि than by the sinoatrial node, the सामान्य धड़कन initiator.
the electrical कार्यक्रम of the heart detected by the electrocardiogram allow a पीवीसी to be easily विशिष्ट from a सामान्य heart beat.
a पीवीसी may be perceived as a `` छोड़ा ताल `` or लगा as palpitations in the chest.
in a normal heartbeat, the ventricles contract after the atria have helped to fill उन्हें by contracting ; in इस रास्ता the ventricles can pump a maximized amount of blood both to the फेफड़े and to the rest of the देह.
in a पीवीसी, the ventricles अनुबंध first और before the atria have optimally भर the ventricles with blood, which अर्थात् that परिसंचरण is अकुशल.
however, single ताल PVC arrhythmias do not usually pose a danger and can be asymptomatic in healthy individuals.
विलियम गेरी Busey ( born जून 29, 1944 ), बेहतर known as Gary busey, is an American फिल्मी and स्टेज कर्ता, और artist.
he has appeared in a किस्में of films, including lethal Weapon, Point Break, and Under Siege, as well as अतिथि दिखावे on Gunsmoke, Walker, टेक्सास Ranger, Law & Order, and अनुगामी.
He थी nominated लिये an Academy पुरस्कार for बेहतरीन Actor in 1978 for उसके role in The Buddy Holly Story.
The anti-counterfeiting Trade अनुबंध ( ACTA ), is a बहुराष्ट्रीय treaty लिये the purpose of establishing international standards लिये intellectual property अधिकारों प्रवर्तन.
The अनुबंध aims to स्थापित an international legal फ्रेमवर्क लिये targeting नकली goods, generic दवाइयाँ and copyright infringement on the अंतरजाल, और होता create a new शासी body बाहर existing forums, such as the संसार व्यापार Organization, the संसार Intellectual प्रॉपर्टी संगठन, or the संयुक्त Nations.
the अनुबंध was हस्ताक्षरित in अक्तूबर 2011 by Australia, कनाडा, जापानी, Morocco, नई जीलैंड, Singapore, South कोरियाई, और the United राज्य.
in 2012, मैक्सिको, the European संघ और 22 countries which are सदस्य राज्य of the यूरोपीय Union हस्ताक्षरित as well.
एक signatory ( Japan ) रै ratified ( formally approved ) the अनुबंध, जिससे would come into फ़ोर्स in countries कि ratified it after अनुसमर्थन by six देशों.
Supporters have वर्णित the agreement as a जवाब to `` the बढ़ाएँ in global व्यापार of counterfeit goods और pirated copyright सुरक्षित works ''.
Trades संघ representing मजदूर in the music, film and TV उद्योग and large बौद्धिक property-based संगठन such as the Motion Picture Association of America and Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of अमेरिका यहूद क्रियाशील in the treaty 's विकास.
Opponents कह the सम्मेलन adversely affects आधारभूत rights सहित स्वतंत्रता of अभिव्यक्ति और privacy.
ACTA has भी been criticised by डॉक्टर Without सीमायें for endangering access to medicines in विकासशील countries.
The रहस्य प्रकृति of negotiations has excluded सिविल समाज groups, developing देशों and the general पब्लिक इससे the अनुबंध 's negotiation प्रक्रम and it has been वर्णित as policy laundering by critics including the Electronic Frontier न्यास and the entertainment Consumers संघ.
The signature of the EU और अनेक of its member राज्य resulted in the इस्तीफा in protest of the European Parliament 's appointed मुख्य investigator, rapporteur कादर Arif, as खूब as widespread protests आरपार Europe.
In 2012 the newly-appointed rapporteur, British mep David मार्टिन, अनुशंसित against the treaty, stating : `` the intended लाभ of इस अंतरराष्ट्रीय agreement are far outweighed by the संभावित खतरे to सिविल liberties ''.
On 4 July 2012, the यूरोपीय पार्लियामेंट अस्वीकृत the agreement in plenary session, साथ 478 मतदान against the treaty, 39 in पक्ष and 165 meps abstaining.
faw semi-trailer ट्रक in चीन
Tractor with side dump trailer semi-trailer
a ट्रैक्टर साथ an auto-transport semi-trailer.
Semi-trailer ट्रक साथ sleeper पीछे the टैक्सी.
A semi-trailer truck is an articulated गाडी कि consists of a towing इंजन, known as a tractor in the संयुक्त States and truck in अनेक अन्य places, संलग्न to one or अधिक semi-trailers to carry भाड़ा.
It is also known as a हस्तांतरण in Canada, prime mover in Australia, semi, tractor-trailer, truck and ट्रेलर, ट्रांसफ़र ट्रक, 18-wheeler, mack ट्रक, big रिग in the संयुक्त States, or artic, short लिये articulated लारी, in ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड.
a semi-trailer does नहीं ट्रेल completely behind the towing vehicle, लकिन is attached at a point that is बस forward of the rear-most धुरी of the towing ईकाई.
This is किया so कि a भिन्न of the वज़न of the ट्रेलर is carried by the prime mover.
This व्यवस्था अर्थात् that दोनो tractor और semi-trailer होगा have a distinctly अलग design than a rigid ट्रक और trailer.
the Pittsburgh Steelers are a पेशेवर football टोली based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
the टोली फिलहाल belongs to the North Division of the अमरीकी Football Conference ( AFC ) in the National फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ).
Founded in, the स्टीलर्स हैं the oldest franchise in the AFC.
पिट्सबर्ग has जीती more सुपर कटोरी शीर्षक ( छह ), won more AFC Championship Games ( eight ) and निभाई in ( fifteen ) and hosted more ( eleven ) सम्मेलन championship games than any अन्य AFC or nfc team.
the Steelers share the record लिये most सुपर Bowl appearances साथ the डलास Cowboys ( eight ).
The Steelers won उनके सबसे हाल चैंपियनशिप, सुपर कटोरी XLIII, on February 1, 2009.
The स्टीलर्स were founded as the पिट्सबर्ग pirates on July 8, 1933, by आर्ट रूनी, लेने its original नाम from the baseball team of the वही नाम, as was common अभ्यास for एनएफएल टीमों to do at the समय.
The स्वामित्व of the Steelers रै remained within the रूनी परिवार चूंकि its founding.
the वर्तमान मालिक is Art 's बेटे, Dan Rooney, who has दिए much कंट्रोल of the मताधिकार to उसके son Art रूनी II.
Long one of the NFL 's flagship टीमों, the Steelers enjoy a large, फैली fanbase nicknamed steeler Nation.
The Steelers फिलहाल खेल उनके घर खेल at हाइन्ज़ फ़ील्ड on Pittsburgh 's उत्तर पक्ष in the उत्तर shore पड़ोस, which भी होस्ट the विश्वविद्यालयों of Pittsburgh Panthers.
Built in 2001, the stadium replaced Three नदियाँ स्टेडियम which hosted the Steelers for 31 seasons.
Prior to Three नदियाँ, the स्टीलर्स था निभाई उनके games in Pitt स्टेडियम and Forbes फ़ील्ड.
तीन अलग kinds of wheat और rye flour
आटा is a powder which is made by grinding खाद्यान्न दाने, or अन्य बीज or जड़ें ( जैसे कसावा ).
it is the प्रमुख ingredient of bread, जिससे is a staple खाना लिये अनेक cultures, making the उपलब्धता of adequate आपूर्तियाँ of flour a major आर्थिक and राजनैतिक समस्या at various times throughout history.
Wheat flour is one of the most important भोजन in यूरोपीय, North अमरीकी, Middle Eastern, भारतीय and उत्तर अफ़्रीकी संस्कृतियों, और is the defining संघटक in सबसे of उनके शैलियाँ of breads and pastries.
जबकि गेहूं is the सबसे आम base for आटा, corn आटा has महरूम important in mesoamerican भोजन चूंकि प्राचीन times, and remains a स्टेपल throughout the americas.
Rye आटा is an महत्वपूर्ण constituent of bread in much of सेंट्रल Europe, and rice can also be used in आटा, हालांकि this is relatively uncommon.
Heart रेट is the क्रमांक of heartbeats per ईकाई of time, typically expressed as beats प्रति minute ( bpm ).
दिल rate can vary as the देह 's need to absorb ऑक्सीजन and excrete carbon dioxide changes, ऐसे as during physical exercise, नींद, illness, or as a परिणाम of ingesting दवाएँ :
सेंट्रल बेचैन प्रणाली stimulants ऐसे as amphetamines बढ़ाएँ दिल रेट.
सेंट्रल nervous system depressants or sedatives decreases the दिल rate ( apart इससे some particularly अजीब ones with बराबर अजीब प्रभाव, ऐसे as केटामाइन जिससे can cause - amongst अनेक other things - stimulant-like effects ऐसे as tachycardia ).
There हैं अनेक ways in जिससे the heart रेट speeds up or slows bas.
Most involve stimulant-like endorphins और hormones होने released in the दिमाग, many of which are those that हैं 'forced'/'enticed ' out by the ingestion और processing of दवाएँ.
Due to individuals having a निरंतर blood आवाज़, एक of the physiological ways to उद्धार अधिक oxygen to an अंग is to बढ़ाएँ दिल rate to परमिट रक्त to pass by the organ अधिक प्रायः.
Normal resting दिल दरों दायरा from 60-100 bpm.
मंदनाड़ी is पारिभाषित as a resting heart rate नीचे 60 bpm.
however, दिल rates from 50 to 60 bpm are आम among healthy people and do not necessarily आवश्यकता खास attention.
Tachycardia is पारिभाषित as a resting दिल rate ऊपर 100 bpm, हालांकि persistent rest rates between 80-100 bpm, mainly if वे हैं present दौरान sleep, may be signs of hyperthyroidism or anemia ( देखिए below ).

A carriage is a wheeled vehicle for people, usually horse-drawn ; litters ( palanquins ) और sedan कुर्सियां are excluded, since they हैं wheelless vehicles.
The carriage is विशेषकर designed for निजी passenger उपयोग and for सुकून or elegance, हालांकि कुछ हैं भी प्रयुक्त to transport goods.
it may be लाइट, smart and fast or भारी, विशाल और comfortable.
carriages सामान्यतः have suspension using leaf springs, elliptical springs ( in the 19th century ) or leather strapping.
a public passenger vehicle होता not प्रायः be called a carriage – शर्तें लिये ऐसे शामिल stagecoach, charabanc और omnibus.
working वाहनों ऐसे as the ( four-wheeled ) wagon and ( two-wheeled ) कार्ट share महत्वपूर्ण parts of the history of the carriage, as is the fast ( two-wheeled ) रथ.
the 2004 Indian समंदर earthquake was an undersea megathrust earthquake that occurred at 00:58:53 utc on संडे, 26 December 2004, साथ an epicentre off the वेस्ट coast of सुमात्रा, इंडोनेशिया.
The भूकंप itself is known by the वैज्ञानिक जातियाँ as the sumatra–andaman earthquake.
The resulting सुनामी थी दिए विभिन्न names, सहित the 2004 भारतीय समंदर सुनामी, दक्षिण Asian सुनामी, Indonesian tsunami, और the Boxing दिन tsunami.
the earthquake was caused by subduction और triggered a श्रेणी of विनाशकारी tsunamis साथ the coasts of most landmasses bordering the Indian Ocean, हत्या over 230,000 लोगों in fourteen देशों, and inundating coastal समुदायों with waves up to high.
it थी एक of the deadliest natural disasters in recorded history.
इंडोनेशिया was the hardest-hit देश, followed by श्री लंका, India, and थाईलैंड.
With a परिमाण of Mw 9.1–9.3, it is the third largest भूकंप ever recorded on a seismograph.
The भूकंप had the longest अवधि of faulting ever observed, between 8.3 और 10 minutes.
It caused the entire ग्रह to vibrate as much as और triggered अन्य earthquakes as far दूर as अलास्का.
Its epicentre थी between simeulue और मेनलैंड इंडोनेशिया.
The दुर्दशा of the affected लोगों और देशों prompted a विश्वव्यापी humanitarian response.
In all, the विश्वव्यापी community donated more than $ 14 अरब ( 2004 US $ ) in humanitarian aid.
Steam rising from the Nesjavellir geothermal शक्ति स्टेशन in Iceland.
geothermal energy is थर्मल उर्जा उत्पन्न and stored in the Earth.
थर्मल उर्जा is the उर्जा that determines the temperature of matter.
The geothermal energy of the Earth 's crust originates इससे the original गठन of the ग्रह ( 20 % ) और from रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय of minerals ( 80 % ).
the geothermal gradient, जिससे is the difference in तापमान between the core of the planet और इसके surface, ड्राइव a continuous conduction of थर्मल उर्जा in the form of heat इससे the core to the surface.
The adjective geothermal originates from the Greek roots γη ( ge ), meaning धरती, और θερμος ( thermos ), meaning hot.
At the कोर of the Earth, thermal उर्जा is निर्मित by रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय और temperatures may पहुँचें over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ).
Heat conducts इससे the कोर to surrounding कूलर चट्टान.
The ऊँची तापमान and दबाव कारण some चट्टान to melt, creating magma संवहन upward चूंकि it is हल्का than the ठोस rock.
the मैग्मा heats चट्टान and water in the crust, sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °f ).
From hot springs, geothermal energy has महरूम प्रयुक्त for bathing चूंकि Paleolithic टाइम्स and for space हीटिंग चूंकि ancient Roman times, लकिन it is now better known लिये विद्युत पीढी.
Worldwide, about 10,715 megawatts ( MW ) of geothermal शक्ति is online in 24 countries.
an additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal हीटिंग क्षमता is संस्थापित for ज़िला हीटिंग, space heating, spas, industrial processes, desalination and agricultural अनुप्रयोग.
geothermal power is cost प्रभावी, reliable, चिरस्थायी, और environmentally दोस्ताना, but has historically महरूम limited to areas near tectonic थाली सीमाएँ.
Recent technological advances have dramatically विस्तारित the दायरा और size of viable संसाधन, विशेषकर लिये applications such as home heating, खोलने a संभावित for widespread शोषण.
Geothermal wells release greenhouse गैसों trapped deep within the earth, but ये emissions are much lower per उर्जा unit than those of fossil fuels.
As a परिणाम, geothermal शक्ति रै the संभावित to help mitigate वैश्विक warming if widely तैनात in place of fossil fuels.
The Earth 's geothermal संसाधन हैं theoretically अधिक than पर्याप्त to supply humanity 's energy needs, but तभी a बहुत small fraction may be profitably exploited.
खुदाई and खोजी for deep resources is very महंगी.
Forecasts for the भविष्य of geothermal शक्ति निर्भर on assumptions about प्रौद्योगिकी, energy prices, subsidies, और interest rates.
Pilot कार्यक्रम जैसे EWEB 's customer opt in Green Power कार्यक्रम दिखाएँ that customers would be willing to pay a little अधिक लिये a renewable energy सोर्स जैसे geothermal.
लकिन as a परिणाम of government assisted research और industry experience, the लागत of generating geothermal शक्ति रै decreased by 25 % over the पास्ट two decades.
In 2001, geothermal energy cost between दो and टेन सेंट प्रति सम्पात.
the पद घन पैर is an इम्पीरियल और US प्रथागत ( non- मीट्रिक ) unit of volume, प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त राज्य and the संयुक्त Kingdom.
It is पारिभाषित as the आवाज़ of a घन with sides of one पैर ( 0.3048 m ) in लंबाई.
to calculate cubic feet multiply लंबाई x width x height.
hồ chí Minh ( उत्तरी Vietnamese pronunciation :, Southern वियतनामी उच्चारण : ) ; 19 may 1890 – 2 September 1969 ), born Nguyễn Sinh cung and also known as nguyễn Tất Thành और nguyễn ái quốc, थी a वियतनामी कम्युनिस्ट revolutionary leader जो थी प्रधान मंत्री ( 1945–1955 ) and अध्यक्ष ( 1945–1969 ) of the Democratic गणतंत्र of वियतनाम ( उत्तर वियतनाम ).
He was a कुंजी figure in the foundation of the लोकतांत्रिक Republic of Vietnam in 1945, as खूब as the People’s फौज of वियतनाम ( PAVN ) and the việt cộng ( NLF or vc ) दौरान the Vietnam युद्ध.
he led the Việt Minh स्वतंत्रता movement इससे 1941 onward, establishing the communist -नियमd Democratic गणतंत्र of वियतनाम in 1945 and defeating the फ्रेंच संघ in 1954 at the battle of Điện Biên Phủ.
he officially stepped bas from power in 1955 due to स्वास्थ्य problems, लकिन remained a अत्यधिक visible figurehead और प्रेरणा लिये those Vietnamese fighting लिये his cause—a संयुक्त, कम्युनिस्ट vietnam—until his मौत.
After the युद्ध, Saigon, पूंजी of the गणतंत्र of Vietnam, was renamed Hồ chí Minh नगर.
सब Roads Lead Home is a feature फिल्मी released on सितंबर 26, 2008.
निर्देशित by Dennis Fallon, it stars पीटर Boyle, Patton Oswalt, जेसन लंदन, vivien cardone, Vanessa Branch, Peter कायोटी, स्टीफन Milton, and allan Kayser.
The movie थी फिल्माया in and around Kansas City, मिसौरी.
The फिल्म बना its World प्रीमियर जनवरी 27 at the सांता बारबरा अंतरराष्ट्रीय Film पर्व.
The फिल्मी रै also recently महरूम in अनेक फिल्मी त्यौहार, and has प्राप्त bad समीक्षाएँ.
पीटर Boyle died पहले the movie 's रिलीज.
It was the पिछला movie he appeared in.
Sales कर in the United States are कर placed on the sale or पट्टे of goods और services in the United राज्य.
While no नेशनल सामान्य sales कर exists, the federal government levies अनेक नेशनल चयनात्मक बिक्री कर on the sale or lease of particular goods और services.
furthermore, forty-five states, the ज़िला of कोलंबिया, and गुआम थोपने सामान्य बिक्री taxes that लागू to the बिक्री or lease of most goods and some सेवाएं, and राज्य also may लेवी चयनात्मक sales taxes on the बिक्री or पट्टे of particular goods or services.
राज्य may also प्रतिनिधि to local governments the authority to थोपने additional general or चयनात्मक बिक्री taxes.
बिक्री कर is गणना by multiplying the खरीदें दाम by the applicable कर rate.
कर rates vary widely by क्षेत्राधिकार और दायरा इससे कम than 1 % to over 10 %.
बिक्री कर is एकत्रित by the विक्रेता at the समय of बिक्री.
उपयोग कर is self assessed by a खरीदार who has नहीं सशुल्क sales कर on a taxable purchase.
Unlike the मान added tax, a बिक्री tax is imposed तभी एकबार, at the retail स्तर.
however, in मामले where items are बेची at खुदरा अधिक than एकबार, ऐसे as प्रयुक्त cars, the बिक्री कर can be charged on the वही item indefinitely.
the definition of खुदरा sales और कया goods and सेवाएं हैं taxable vary among the राज्य.
Nearly सब jurisdictions provide numerous श्रेणी of goods and सेवाएं that हैं exempt इससे बिक्री tax, or taxed at घटाया दरों.
the purchase of goods for further manufacture or लिये पुनर्विक्रय is uniformly exempt from sales tax.
Most jurisdictions exempt खाना बेची in किराना स्टोर्स, prescription medications, and many agricultural supplies.
बिक्री taxes, including those imposed by लोकल सरकारें, हैं generally administered at the state level.
राज्य imposing sales tax आवश्यकता खुदरा विक्रेता to collect tax from customers, संचिका returns, और remit the कर to the राज्य.
प्रक्रियात्मक नियम vary widely.
विक्रेता generally जरूर collect कर इससे in-state purchasers unless the purchaser provides an exemption प्रमाणपत्र.
Most राज्य allow or require इलेक्ट्रॉनिक remittance.
A सेंट्रल प्रसंस्करण ईकाई ( CPU ), also referred to as a सेंट्रल processor ईकाई, is the hardware भीतर a computer that carries आउट the निर्देश of a कंप्यूटर कार्यक्रम by performing the basic arithmetical, logical, and input/output परिचालन of the system.
The term रै been in उपयोग in the कंप्यूटर industry at तनिक since the जल्दी 1960s.
the form, डिज़ाइन, and क्रियान्वयन of CPUs have changed over the कोर्स of उनके इतिहास, but their fundamental आपरेशन remains much the वही.
A कंप्यूटर can have अधिक than one cpu ; this is called multiprocessing.
Some integrated circuits ( ics ) can contain multiple CPUs on a single चिप ; those ics are पुकारा multi-core processors.
दो typical components of a CPU हैं the गणित लॉजिक ईकाई ( ALU ), which performs arithmetic और लॉजिकल परिचालन, and the control unit ( cu ), which extracts instructions from मेमोरी और decodes and चलाता उन्हें, calling on the ALU जब necessary.
Not all कम्प्यूटेशनल प्रणालियों rely on a central प्रसंस्करण ईकाई.
an array processor or vector processor रै अनेक समानांतर कम्प्यूटिंग तत्व, with no one unit considered the `` बीच ''.
In the distributed computing model, problems are हल by a distributed interconnected set of processors.
RFID chip next to a grain of rice.
इस chip contains a radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक field कुंडली कि modulates an external चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड to transfer a coded identification number जब queried by a reader यंत्र.
इस small प्रकार is incorporated in consumer products, and implanted in pets, लिये identification उद्देश्य.
radio-frequency identification ( rfid ) is the बेतार non-contact use of radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र आंकड़ा, लिये the उद्देश्य of automatically identifying और ट्रैकिंग टैग संलग्न to वस्तुएँ.
the tags contain electronically भंडारित information.
कुछ टैग are powered और पढ़ा at short सीमाएँ ( a few मीटर ) via magnetic fields ( इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक प्रेरण ).
Others use a local शक्ति source such as a battery, or else have no बैटरी but collect उर्जा इससे the interrogating EM field, and तब act as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or uhf radio waves ( i.e., electromagnetic radiation at high बारंबारता ).
बैटरी powered टैग may operate at सैंकड़ों of meters.
Unlike a bar code, the टैग does नहीं necessarily need to be भीतर लकीर of sight of the रीडर, and may be अंतःस्थापित in the tracked object.
RFID tags हैं used in अनेक industries.
An RFID टैग संलग्न to an automobile दौरान production can be used to track its प्रगति through the assembly line.
दवाएँ can be tracked through warehouses.
Livestock और pets may have tags injected, allowing positive पहचान of the animal.
Since rfid tags can be संलग्न to clothing, possessions, or भी implanted भीतर लोगों, the possibility of पढना personally-linked information without consent has उठाया privacy चिंताएं.
Overtime is the राशि of समय someone works परे normal working घंटों.
सामान्य hours may be determined in अनेक रास्ताs:
by custom ( कया is माना healthy or reasonable by समाज ),
by practices of a given व्यापार or profession,
by legislation,
by agreement between employers and workers or their प्रतिनिधि.
Most nations have overtime मजदूर laws designed to dissuade or prevent employers इससे forcing उनके कर्मचारी to कार्य excessively long घंटों.
ये कानून may take into account अन्य considerations than the humanitarian, ऐसे as preserving the स्वास्थ्य of workers so कि वे may continue to be उत्पादक, or increasing the overall level of employment in the अर्थव्यवस्था.
एक आम approach to regulating overtime is to require employers to अदा workers at a higher hourly रेट for ओवरटाइम कार्य.
कंपनियाँ may चुनें to अदा workers higher overtime pay even if नहीं obliged to do so by विधि, विशेषकर if they मानना कि वे face a पिछड़ा झुकने supply curve of श्रमिक.
ओवरटाइम pay rates can कारण workers to work longer घंटों than they would at a flat hourly rate.
Overtime कानून, attitudes toward overtime और hours of work vary greatly इससे country to देश और between different आर्थिक सेक्टर.
कल्पना of links between pages on a विक using a force-directed लेआउट.
force-directed आलेख drawing algorithms हैं a class of algorithms लिये आरेखण graphs in an aesthetically pleasing रास्ता.
उनके purpose is to position the नोड of a आलेख in two-dimensional or three-dimensional स्पेस so कि सब the edges हैं of अधिक or कम equal length और वहीँ हैं as few crossing edges as संभावित, by assigning forces among the नियत of किनारे and the set of नोड, आधारित on their relative positions, and then using ये शक्तियां either to simulate the motion of the किनारे और nodes or to minimize their energy.
जबकि आलेख drawing can be a मुश्किल प्रॉब्लम, force-directed algorithms, होने physical simulations, usually require no special knowledge परिचय आलेख theory such as planarity.
खरीदना शक्ति ( sometimes retroactively called adjusted for inflation ) is the राशि of goods or सेवाएं कि can be purchased साथ a unit of करेंसी.
For उदाहरण, if you था taken एक डालर to a store in the 1950s, you would have been समर्थ to ख़रीदे a वृहद क्रमांक of items than तुम would today, indicating कि तुम होता have था a वृहद purchasing शक्ति in the 1950s.
करेंसी can be either a कमोडिटी money, like सुनहरा or silver, or fiat करेंसी, or free-floating market-valued करेंसी like us डॉलर.
As Adam स्मिथ noted, having money gives एक the क्षमता to `` कमांड '' others ' labor, so purchasing शक्ति to कुछ extent is power over अन्य लोगों, to the extent that they हैं willing to व्यापार उनके labor or goods लिये धन or currency.
if one 's monetary income stays the वही, but the price level increases, the purchasing power of कि income falls.
Inflation does नहीं सदा imply falling purchasing शक्ति of one 's money income since it may rise तेज़ than the दाम level.
A उच्चतर real income means a higher purchasing power चूंकि real आय refers to the income समायोजित for महंगाई.
लिये a दाम index, its value in the आधार साल is usually सामान्यीकृत to a value of 100.
The purchasing power of a ईकाई of करेंसी, कह a डालर, in a दिए year, expressed in डॉलर of the आधार साल, is 100/p, where P is the price index in that साल.
So, by definition the खरीदना शक्ति of a डालर decreases as the price level उदय.
The purchasing शक्ति in today 's money of an amount c of धन, t years into the भविष्य, can be computed साथ the सूत्र लिये the present मान :
where in इस मामला i is an assumed भविष्य annual महंगाई रेट.
Education in दक्षिण कोरियाई is viewed as being crucial for success और प्रतियोगिता is consequently very heated and fierce.
A सेंट्रल प्रशासन oversees the process लिये the education of children इससे किंडरगार्टन to the third and फाइनल year of ऊँची स्कूल.
Mathematics, science, Korean, अंग्रेज़ी, and सोशल studies हैं generally considered to be the most important subjects.
सामान्यतः physical शिक्षा is नहीं considered important as it is नहीं recognised, by the generally academic elitist दक्षिण Korean populace, as education और इसलिए many स्कूलों कमी high-quality gymnasiums and varsity एथलेटिक्स.
दक्षिण कोरियाई was the पहला देश in the संसार to provide high-speed अंतरजाल access to सब primary, जूनियर, and ऊँची schools.
Although South Korean विद्यार्थी प्रायः rank अत्यधिक on अंतरराष्ट्रीय तुलनात्मक आकलन when compared to students of most पश्चिमी education systems, the South कोरियाई education system is criticised for emphasising too much upon passive learning and memorisation.
The South कोरियाई शिक्षा system is बल्कि notably strict and overly संरचित as compared to its counterparts in most पश्चिमी समाजों.
भी, the prevalence of non-school for-profit निजी institutes ऐसे as अकादमियों or cram-schools ( Hagwon [ 학원 ] ), which too emphasise on passive memorisation, as opposed to conceptual understanding, in विद्यार्थी are criticised as a प्रमुख social प्रॉब्लम.
The My lai Massacre (, ;,, or ) थी the Vietnam War द्रव्यमान हत्या of between 347 और 504 निहत्थे civilians in दक्षिण वियतनाम on March 16, 1968, by संयुक्त States फौज soldiers of `` Charlie '' Company of 1st बटालियन, 20th Infantry Regiment, 11th Brigade of the Americal प्रभाग.
पीड़ितों included women, men, children, and infants.
Some of the महिलाओं were gang-raped and उनके लाशें were बाद found to be mutilated and अनेक महिलाओं यहूद allegedly raped prior to the हत्याओं.
जबकि 26 u.S. soldiers were initially charged साथ criminal offenses for their क्रियाएँ at Mỹ lai, तभी दूसरी लेफ्टिनेंट विलियम Calley, a प्लाटून नेता in चार्ली कम्पनी, थी convicted.
मिला अपराधी of हत्या 22 ग्रामीणों, he was originally दिए a जीवन वाक्य, लकिन only served three and a half years अंतर्गत हाउस arrest.
the massacre took place in the hamlets of my Lai and My Khe of बेटे my village.
the event is also ज्ञात as the बेटे my नरसंहार, especially in the वियतनामी state media.
the U.S. सैन्य codeword for the `` viet Cong stronghold '' थी `` Pinkville ''.
The घटना prompted वैश्विक outrage जब it became पब्लिक knowledge in 1969.
the massacre भी increased घरेलू opposition to the u.S. involvement in the Vietnam War.
तीन U.S. servicemen जो had tried to halt the नरसंहार and protect the wounded यहूद initially denounced by अनेक u.s. कांग्रेसियों as traitors.
They प्राप्त नफ़रत mail and death threats और मिला mutilated animals on उनके doorsteps.
the three यहूद later widely praised और decorated by the फौज लिये their heroic actions.
The hijackers in the September 11 attacks यहूद 19 मेन संबद्ध साथ al-Qaeda, and 15 of the 19 were citizens of सऊदी अरब.
अन्य यहूद इससे Egypt, Lebanon, and the UAE.
the hijackers were व्यवस्थित into चार टीमों, प्रत्येक led by a pilot-trained hijacker साथ four `` मांसपेशी hijackers '' जो were प्रशिक्षित to help subdue the pilots, यात्री, and crew.
the first hijackers to arrive in the United States were खालिद al-Mihdhar और Nawaf al-hazmi, who settled in the San डिएगो क्षेत्रफल in January 2000.
वे यहूद followed by three hijacker-pilots, Mohamed Atta, Marwan al-shehhi, and Ziad Jarrah जल्दी in the summer of 2000 to undertake flight training in दक्षिण Florida.
The चौथी hijacker-pilot, Hani Hanjour, arrived in San डिएगो in December 2000.
the rest of the `` मांसपेशी hijackers '' arrived in the spring and early summer of 2001, just महीने पहले the September 11 हमले.
abū al-Qāsim muḥammad ibn ʿabd Allāh ibn ʿabd al-muṭṭalib ibn hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 जून 632 ), also transliterated as मुहम्मद ( ), थी a धार्मिक, political, और military leader इससे मक्का who unified अरब into a single धार्मिक polity अंतर्गत Islam.
He is believed by मुसलमान और bahá'ís to be a मेसेंजर और नबी of God.
मुहम्मद is almost universally considered by Muslims as the पिछला prophet sent by God for mankind.
non-muslims regard Muhammad as the संस्थापक of islam.
Muslims consider him to be the restorer of an unaltered original monotheistic faith of Adam, Noah, Abraham, मूसा, Jesus, और other नबियों.
born in परिचय 570 ce in the Arabian नगर of मक्का, he was अनाथ at an early आयु और brought up under the care of his uncle abu तालिब.
he बाद worked mostly as a व्यापारी, as well as a shepherd, और थी first married by age 25.
होने in the आदत of periodically retreating to a गुफा in the surrounding mountains लिये अनेक nights of seclusion and prayer, he बाद reported कि it was there, at आयु 40, कि he प्राप्त उसके first revelation इससे परमेश्वर.
तीन सालो after this event Muhammad प्रारंभ preaching ये खुलासे publicly, proclaiming कि `` God is One ``, that पूरा `` आत्मसमर्पण '' to Him ( lit.
islām ) is the only रास्ता ( dīn ) स्वीकार्य to परमेश्वर, and कि he खुद was a prophet और messenger of परमेश्वर, in the वही रग as other Islamic नबियों.
Muhammad gained few अनुसरणकर्ता early on, और was met साथ दुश्मनी from some Meccan जनजातियों ; he and उसके followers were treated harshly.
to एस्केप persecution, मुहम्मद sent some of his अनुसरणकर्ता to Abyssinia पहले he and उसके followers in Mecca migrated to मदीना ( तब ज्ञात as Yathrib ) in the year 622.
इस event, the हिज्र, marks the beginning of the Islamic पंचांग, जिससे is भी ज्ञात as the Hijri Calendar.
In Medina, मुहम्मद संयुक्त the जनजातियों under the संविधान of Medina.
बाद आठ years of fighting साथ the Meccan tribes, उसके अनुसरणकर्ता, जो by then था grown to 10,000, took control of Mecca in the largely peaceful conquest of Mecca.
he destroyed the pagan idols in the नगर and then भेजा his followers आउट to destroy all of the बाकी pagan मंदिरों in पूर्वी अरब.
in 632, a few महीने बाद returning to मदीना इससे The विदाई Pilgrimage, मुहम्मद fell ill and died.
By the समय of उसके मौत, most of the Arabian Peninsula था converted to Islam, and he था संयुक्त Arabia into a सिंगल मुस्लिम religious polity.
The खुलासे ( or ayah, lit.
`` Signs [ of परमेश्वर ] '' ) — जिससे Muhammad reported receiving जबतक उसके death – form the verses of the कुरान, regarded by मुसलमान as the `` Word of परमेश्वर '' और around which the धर्म is based.
Besides the Quran, Muhammad 's जीवन ( sira ) और परंपराओं ( sunnah ) हैं भी upheld by मुसलमान as the sources of शरीयत विधि.
वे discuss Muhammad और अन्य नबियों of islam साथ reverence, adding the phrase सलाम be upon उसे whenever their names are mentioned.
While conceptions of Muhammad in medieval Christendom and premodern टाइम्स were largely negative, appraisals in modern history have महरूम far कम so.
इस is a list of टेबल of the सत्यापित oldest people in the world in ordinal रैंक, ऐसे as oldest person or oldest man.
in ये टेबल, a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his or her claim रै been validated by an अंतरराष्ट्रीय body कि specifically सौदे in longevity research, such as the जराविद्या Research Group ( grg ) or गिनीज World Records.
the longest unambiguously documented इंसान lifespan is कि of jeanne calment of फ़्रांस ( 1875–1997 ), who died at आयु 122 सालो, 164 दिनों.
She met विंसेंट van Gogh जब वो थी 12 or 13.
इस led to news media attention in 1985, after calment turned 110.
Subsequent छानबीन मिला documentation for calment 's आयु, beyond any reasonable सवाल, in the रिकॉर्ड of her native city, Arles, France.
More प्रमाण of calment 's जीवनकाल रै महरूम उत्पादित than लिये कोई other supercentenarian ; her मामला serves as an archetype in the methodology लिये verifying the आयु of the world 's oldest लोगों.
the longest undisputed lifespan for male supercentenarians is कि of Jiroemon किमुरा, जो currently जीवनदान in Japan और is आयु as of.
Since the death of 115-year old दीना Manfredini of the संयुक्त States, on 17 December 2012, Kimura, born 19 अप्रैल 1897, is the oldest जीना व्यक्ति in the world whose age can be documented.
He रै भी been the oldest जीना man चूंकि the मौत of 114-year बूढ़ा वाल्टर breuning on 14 अप्रैल 2011.
चूंकि the मौत of 115-year बूढ़ा koto Okubo of जापानी on 12 January 2013, the oldest जीना woman रै been -year-old misao okawa, also इससे जापानी, born on 5 कूच 1898.
इस is a timeline of the African-American सिविल Rights गति.
the सिविल Rights गति was a स्वतंत्रता struggle by अफ़्रीकी Americans in the 1950s और 1960s to लाभ equality.
the goals of the movement यहूद स्वतंत्रता from पक्षपात, बराबर opportunity in employment, education और housing, the right to vote and बराबर अभिगम to public facilities.
भारी metal ( often referred to as metal ) is a विधा of rock म्यूज़िक कि विकसित in the late 1960s और early 1970s, largely in the संयुक्त Kingdom and in the संयुक्त States.
With जड़ें in ब्लूज़ चट्टान and साइकेडेलिक rock, the bands that created heavy metal developed a thick, विशाल ध्वनि, characterized by highly प्रवर्धित distortion, विस्तारित guitar solos, emphatic बीट्स, and overall loudness.
Heavy मेटल lyrics and प्रदर्शन शैलियाँ हैं generally associated साथ मर्दानगी and machismo.
The first heavy मेटल bands ऐसे as Led Zeppelin, Deep Purple and Black Sabbath attracted विशाल ऑडियंस, though they were प्रायः derided by critics, a औकात common throughout the history of the genre.
in the mid-1970s Judas Priest helped spur the genre 's evolution by discarding much of its ब्लूज़ influence ; motörhead introduced a punk rock sensibility and an increasing emphasis on गति.
Bands in the New वेव of British भारी मेटल such as Iron maiden followed in a समान रग.
Before the end of the दशक, heavy metal fans became ज्ञात as `` metalheads `` or `` headbangers ``.
During the 1980s, glam मेटल became a वाणिज्यिक force with groups like Mötley Crüe और ज़हर.
भूमिगत scenes उत्पादित an array of more extreme, aggressive शैलियाँ : thrash मेटल broke into the मुख्यधारा with bands such as Metallica, मेगाडेथ, Slayer, and एंथ्रेक्स, जबकि other styles of the most extreme subgenres of metal जैसे death metal and black metal remain subcultural phenomena.
चूंकि the mid-1990s, popular शैलियाँ ऐसे as nu मेटल, which often incorporates तत्व of grunge और हिप hop ; and metalcore, जिससे मिश्रणों extreme metal साथ hardcore पंक, have further विस्तारित the definition of the genre.
The far-right ( भी ज्ञात as the चरम सही ) refers to the उच्चतम degree of rightism in right-wing politics.
दूर सही राजनीती involves support of दमदार or complete सोशल पदानुक्रम in society, और supports सर्वोच्चता of निश्चित individuals or समूह deemed to be innately श्रेष्ठ or अस्तबलों जो हैं to be more valued than those deemed to be innately inferior or undesirable.
The far right 's advocacy of supremacism is आधारित on कया its adherents perceive as स्वाभाविक characteristics of people that can not be changed.
This स्टैंड as a पाइंट of अंतर with the centre-right 's attribution of behaviours, ऐसे as laziness or decadence, as the primary स्त्रोत of social inequalities.
The centre right—unlike the far right—claims that लोगों can end their behavioural हीनता through बदलना उनके आदतें और choices.
the original far सही, which उभरा in फ़्रांस बाद the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति, refused to accept the French गणतंत्र and supported a counter-revolution to restore the French साम्राज्य and aristocracy.
the far right is commonly संबद्ध साथ व्यक्तियों or समूह जो थाम extreme राष्ट्रवादी, xenophobic, racist, धार्मिक fundamentalist or प्रतिक्रियावादी views.
the सबसे extreme-right movements have धड़ा दमन और genocide against समूह of people on the basis of their alleged inferiority.
Thomas hobbes of Malmesbury ( 5 अप्रैल 1588 – 4 December 1679 ), in कुछ older ग्रन्थ थामस हाब्स of malmsbury, थी an English पारस, best known आज लिये उसके work on राजनैतिक दर्शनशास्त्र.
उसके 1651 book Leviathan established the न्यास for सबसे of पश्चिमी political philosophy इससे the परिप्रेक्ष्य of social अनुबंध theory.
hobbes was a champion of absolutism लिये the sovereign, but he also विकसित some of the fundamentals of यूरोपीय उदार thought : the सही of the व्यक्तिगत ; the natural equality of सब मेन ; the कृत्रिम अक्षर of the राजनैतिक order ( जिससे led to the later भेद between सिविल society and the state ) ; the view कि all legitimate political शक्ति must be `` प्रतिनिधि '' और based on the सहमति of the लोगों ; and a उदार interpretation of विधि which पत्ते people free to do whatever the law does not explicitly forbid.
He was एक of the founders of modern political दर्शनशास्त्र.
His understanding of इंसानो as being matter और गति, obeying the same physical laws as other matter और गति, remains influential ; and his खाता of human nature as self-interested cooperation, और of political समुदायों as being based upon a `` सोशल अनुबंध `` remains एक of the प्रमुख विषय of political philosophy.
in जोड to राजनैतिक दर्शनशास्त्र, hobbes also contributed to a diverse सरणी of other fields, including history, भूगोल, the भौतिकी of gases, धर्मशास्त्र, ethics, और general philosophy.
Emotional intelligence ( EI ) is the क्षमता to identify, assess, and control the भाव of oneself, of others, and of समूह.
it can be विभाजित into ability EI और trait ei.
क्षमता ei is प्रायः measured using maximum प्रदर्शन परीक्षण और रै stronger संबंध साथ परंपरागत प्रज्ञा, whereas trait EI is usually measured using self-report questionnaires and has stronger संबंध साथ व्यक्तित्व.
Criticisms have केन्द्रित on whether EI is a रियल intelligence and whether it has वृद्धिशील वैध over IQ and the बिग Five personality traits.
Heredity is the गुजर of traits to औलाद from इसके parents or पूर्वज.
This is the process by which an औलाद cell or organism acquires or becomes predisposed to the विशेषताएँ of its parent cell or सजीव.
through आनुवंशिकता, variations exhibited by individuals can accumulate और cause कुछ प्रजाति to evolve.
The study of आनुवंशिकता in biology is पुकारा आनुवंशिकी, which includes the field of epigenetics.
For संयुक्त राज्य individual आय कर, adjusted सकल income ( agi ) is total gross income ऋण specific reductions.
Taxable आय is समायोजित सकल income ऋण allowances लिये personal exemptions and itemized deductions.
For सबसे individual कर purposes, AGI is more relevant than सकल आय.
Gross income is sales दाम of goods or property, ऋण लागत of the property बेची, plus अन्य आय.
It includes मजदूरी, interest, dividends, business income, rental income, और all अन्य प्रकार of income.
समायोजित सकल आय is सकल income कम deductions from a कारोबार or rental कार्यकलाप और 21 other विशिष्ट items.
अनेक deductions ( e.g. medical खर्च और miscellaneous itemized deductions ) हैं limited based on a प्रतिशत of agi.
Certain phase outs, सहित those of lower tax rates और itemized deductions, are आधारित on levels of agi.
अनेक states base राज्य आय tax on agi with certain deductions.
`` Lazy नजर '' is the third सिंगल from Silversun pickups ' debut एल्बम carnavas.
the band performed the सोंग on the लेट दिखाएँ साथ दाउद लेटरमैन, The tonight Show with jay लीनो, बाद साथ jools हॉलैंड, and पिछला कॉल with कार्सन Daly.
The सोंग is a playable track on चट्टान Band 2 और गिटार Hero : World Tour.

A telephone prefix is the पहला set of digits of a telephone क्रमांक ; in the उत्तर American Numbering योजना countries ( देश कोड 1 ), it is the first तीन अंक of a seven-digit phone क्रमांक.
in अन्य देशों दोनो the उपसर्ग and the क्रमांक may have different lengths.
It shows जिससे एक्सचेंज the बाकी संख्याएँ refer to.
A full टेलीफोन number is usually made up of देश code ( required for international काल्स only ), क्षेत्रफल code ( जरूरी for काल्स between टेलीफोन areas ), उपसर्ग, and सदस्य क्रमांक.
कुछ स्थान सीमित निश्चित prefixes to फैक्स numbers or cell फोन तभी ; in other स्थान ऐसे समर्पित prefixes हैं नहीं used.
as telephone प्रौद्योगिकी उन्नत, the precise significance of the उपसर्ग became धुंधला in अनेक places ; 485 in London, UK, थी once the GULliver exchange, but अभी 44207485xxxx is बस माना one of अनेक number ब्लॉक served by the CLKEN Kentish कस्बा एक्सचेंज ; 4420770703xx is another.
metformin ( bp, pronounced, ; originally बेची as glucophage ) is an मौखिक antidiabetic ड्रग in the biguanide क्लास.
it is the first-line drug of choice लिये the treatment of type 2 मधुमेह, in particular, in overweight और मोटे लोगों और those with सामान्य kidney function.
इसके use in gestational मधुमेह has been सीमित by सुरक्षा चिंताएं.
It is also प्रयुक्त in the उपचार of polycystic ovary syndrome, और रै been investigated लिये अन्य रोगों जहाँ insulin प्रतिरोध may be an महत्वपूर्ण factor.
Metformin works by suppressing glucose उत्पादन by the जिगर.
Metformin is the only antidiabetic drug that रै महरूम conclusively दिखाया to prevent the cardiovascular complications of diabetes.
It helps reduce LDL cholesterol and triglyceride levels, और is नहीं संबद्ध साथ वज़न लाभ.
, metformin is एक of only दो मौखिक antidiabetics in the संसार Health संगठन मॉडल सूची of अनिवार्य दवाइयाँ ( the अन्य होने glibenclamide ).
When विहित appropriately, metformin कल्याणकारी few प्रतिकूल प्रभाव ( the सबसे आम is जठरांत्र परेशान ) और is संबद्ध साथ a low risk of hypoglycemia.
Lactic acidosis ( a buildup of lactate in the रक्त ) can be a गंभीर concern in overdose and when it is prescribed to people with contraindications, but वरना, वहीँ is no significant risk.
पहला synthesized और found to reduce blood sugar in the 1920s, metformin was forgotten for the next two दशकों as शोध shifted to insulin और अन्य antidiabetic drugs.
Interest in metformin थी rekindled in the लेट 1940s after अनेक reports that it could reduce रक्त sugar स्तर in लोगों, and in 1957, फ्रेंच चिकित्सक जां sterne प्रकाशित the पहला clinical विचारण of metformin as a उपचार लिये diabetes.
it थी introduced to the United किंगडम in 1958, कनाडा in 1972, and the United States in 1995.
Metformin is now believed to be the सबसे widely prescribed antidiabetic drug in the world ; in the United राज्य alone, अधिक than 48 लाख prescriptions यहूद filled in 2010 लिये इसके जेनेरिक formulations.
The माउंट rushmore नेशनल Memorial is a मूर्तिकला carved into the granite face of Mount Rushmore निकट Keystone, South डकोटा, in the United States.
sculpted by danish-american Gutzon borglum और his बेटे, lincoln Borglum, माउंट Rushmore सुविधाएँ sculptures of the heads of four संयुक्त States राष्ट्रपतियों : जार्ज Washington, थामस जेफरसन, Theodore Roosevelt और अब्राहम lincoln.
The संपूर्ण memorial covers and is ऊपर समुद्र स्तर.
The tallest mountain in the region is harney शिखर ( ).
दक्षिण Dakota इतिहासकार दोने Robinson is credited with conceiving the विचार of carving the likenesses of famous people into the ब्लैक पहाड़ियाँ region of South Dakota in अनुक्रम to प्रचार पर्यटन in the region.
रॉबिन्सन 's initial विचार थी to sculpt the Needles ; however, gutzon Borglum rejected the needles site क्युकी of the ग़रीब विशेषता of the granite and strong opposition इससे पर्यावरणविद and Native American groups.
वे settled on the माउंट rushmore location, which भी has the लाभ of facing southeast लिये अधिकतम सूर्य एक्सपोज़र.
रॉबिन्सन चाही it to विशेषता western heroes like लुईस and क्लार्क, रेड बादल और Buffalo Bill कोड़ी लकिन borglum decided the मूर्तिकला चाहिए have a अधिक national फ़ोकस, and chose the चार राष्ट्रपतियों whose likenesses would be carved into the mountain.
After securing संघीय funding, construction on the मेमोरियल began in 1927, और the राष्ट्रपतियों ' चेहरों were समाप्त between 1934 और 1939.
upon Gutzon Borglum 's death in कूच 1941, उसके son Lincoln Borglum took over construction.
हालांकि the आरंभिक अवधारणा पुकारा लिये प्रत्येक अध्यक्ष to be चित्रित from सिर to कमर, lack of funding मजबूर construction to end in लेट October 1941.
The U.S. National Park सेवा took control of the memorial in 1933, जबकि it थी still under construction, and रै managed the मेमोरियल to the उपस्थित दिन.
it attracts nearly three million people annually.

a कमीज़, dress shirt, button-front, button-front कमीज़, or button-up कमीज़ is a garment साथ a collar, a full-length खोलने at the front from the collar to the हेम, and sleeves with cuffs.
शर्ट हैं predominantly प्रयुक्त by मेन, since महिलाओं usually पहनें blouses.
the front opening is fastened using बटन or studs, और the cuffs बंद with बटन or कफ कड़ी.
शर्ट are normally made इससे woven cloth, और are often accompanied by a jacket and tie, for उदाहरण साथ a सूट or formalwear, but shirts are भी worn अधिक casually.
in British अंग्रेज़ी, dress shirt अर्थात् specifically the more औपचारिक evening परिधान worn साथ black- or white- tie, also discussed नीचे.
Some of these औपचारिक shirts have stiff fronts and detachable छल्लों attached with collar studs.
The term `` button-down '' ( जिससे refers a प्रकार of कमीज़ जिससे has a collar fastened bas by बटन ) is sometimes used in गलती to लागू to सब shirts ( with or without buttoned down छल्लों ), being used as a synonym for `` button-up '' or `` button-front ''.
प्रशासनिक Professionals Day ( also known as Secretaries दिन or Admin Day ) is an unofficial धर्मनिरपेक्ष अवकाश observed in several देशों to recognize the work of secretaries, प्रशासनिक assistants, receptionists, and अन्य administrative support पेशेवर.
in उत्तर अमेरिका, it is celebrated on the बुधवार of the पिछला पूरा सप्ताह of April ( April 24 in 2013 ).
In France it is मनाये on the third Thursday in April ( April 18 in 2013 ).
in Australia it is मनाये on the पहला Friday in May
