निकोलस Poussin ( ; 15 June 1594 – 19 November 1665 ) was the अग्रणी painter of the शास्त्रीय French Baroque style, although he खर्च most of उसके working जीवन in Rome.
उसके work is characterized by स्पष्टता, logic, और अनुक्रम, और favors लकीर over color.
Until the 20th century he remained a major inspiration लिये such classically oriented artists as Jacques-Louis David, jean-auguste-dominique Ingres and Paul cézanne.
he worked in Rome for a वृत्त of अग्रणी collectors there and elsewhere, मगर लिये a short काल जब Cardinal Richelieu ordered him वापस to फ़्रांस to serve as पहला चित्रकार to the King.
सबसे of his works are इतिहास paintings of religious or पौराणिक subjects कि बहुत often have a large landscape तत्व.
Jackie Keith whitley ( जुलाई 1, 1954Stambler, Irwin, and grelun landon ( 2000 ). - Country म्यूज़िक : The Encyclopedia. - New York : St. Martin 's दबायें. - p.533. - isbn 978-0-312-26487-1.—Carlin, Richard ( 2003 ). - देश म्यूज़िक : a Biographical Dictionary. - नई York : Routledge - p.427. - ISBN 978-0-415-93802-0.—Larkin, Colin ( 1995 ). - The Guinness ज्ञानकोष of लोकप्रिय Music. - नई यॉर्क : Stockton दबायें - p.4462. - isbn 978-0-85112-662-3.—Stanton, Scott ( 2003 ). - the Tombstone पर्यटक : Musicians. - नई York : Pocket Books. - p.395. - ISBN 978-0-7434-6330-0.—Hicks, जोकर. - `` सिंगर कैथ whitley 's Memory Alive through Songs, प्रेम in घर कस्बा ''. - The Kentucky पोस्ट. - सितंबर 25, 1991.— '' Country Music Star Keith Whitley मुर्दे at 33 ''. - Lexington herald-leader. - may 10, 1989.——hurst, जोकर. - `` whitley 's Last Days ''. - शिकागो ट्रिब्यून. - May 14, 1989.— '' Alcohol मारता Country Singer Keith Whitley ''. - संयुक्त दबायें अंतरराष्ट्रीय. - ( c/o The सैन Francisco Chronicle ). - may 10, 1989. — may 9, 1989 ), known professionally as Keith whitley, was an American देश music सिंगर.
whitley 's brief career in mainstream country म्यूज़िक lasted from 1984 until his death in 1989, but he continues to influence an संपूर्ण पीढी of singers और songwriters.
he charted 19 singles on the Billboard देश चार्ट, सहित five लगातार क्रमांक ones : `` Do n't Close Your Eyes ``, `` When तुम कह nothing at सब ``, `` i 'm no अजनबी to the Rain ``, `` I अचरज Do तुम Think of Me `` and `` it ai n't nothin ' `` ( the पिछला दो posthumously ).

a statute is a औपचारिक written enactment of a विधान authority that governs a state, नगर, or काउंटी.
Typically, statutes कमांड or prohibit कुछ, or declare नीति.
the word is प्रायः used to फर्क विधि बना by विधान लाशें इससे मामला law, decided by courts, और regulations issued by government agencies.
statutes are sometimes referred to as विधान or `` ब्लैक अक्षर law. ''
as a source of विधि, statutes हैं considered प्राथमिक authority ( as opposed to secondary प्राधिकार ).
Ideally सब statutes must be in सामंजस्य साथ the आधारभूत विधि of the जमीन ( संवैधानिक ).
इस word is प्रयुक्त in contradistinction to the आम law.
Statutes acquire उनके फ़ोर्स इससे the time of उनके ड्योढ़ी, however unless वरना provided.
Statutes are of अनेक kinds ; namely, पब्लिक or निजी.
declaratory or remedial.
Temporary or perpetual.
a temporary statute is एक which is सीमित in its duration at the time of its enactment.
It continues in फ़ोर्स until the time of its limitation रै expired, unless sooner repealed.
a perpetual statute is एक for the फिराकर of which वहीँ is no सीमित समय, हालांकि it may not be expressly declared to be so.
if, however, a statute जिससे did not itself contain कोई limitation is to be governed by another जिससे is temporary only, the पूर्व will also be अस्थाई और निर्भर upon the existence of the latter.
पहले a statute becomes law in कुछ देशों, it जरूर be agreed upon by the highest executive in the सरकारी, और आखिरकार प्रकाशित as भाग of a code.
in many देशों, statutes हैं व्यवस्थित in topical arrangements ( or `` संहिताबद्ध '' ) भीतर publications called कोड, ऐसे as the United राज्य कोड.
In अनेक राष्ट्र statutory विधि is विशिष्ट इससे and अधीनस्थ to constitutional law.
The बाह्य iliac arteries are two प्रमुख arteries जिससे bifurcate बंद the आम iliac धमनियों अग्रवर्ती to the sacroiliac joint of the pelvis.
वे proceed अग्रवर्ती और अवर along the medial border of the psoas major मांसपेशियां.
They exit the pelvic girdle posterior and अवर to the वंक्षण ligament परिचय one third laterally इससे the प्रविष्ट point of the वंक्षण ligament on the pubic tubercle at which point they हैं referred to as the नैया धमनियों.
the external iliac धमनी is usually the artery प्रयुक्त to संलग्न the renal धमनी to the प्राप्तकर्ता of a kidney प्रत्यारोपण.
Steam is a digital वितरण, डिजिटल rights management, एकाधिक और संचार platform developed by वाल्व निगम.
It is used to distribute खेल and related media ऑनलाइन, from छोटी independent developers to larger तन्त्र houses ; in अक्तूबर 2012, Valve expanded the service to शामिल non-gaming software.
भाप provides the user साथ संस्थापना और automatic प्रबन्धन of तन्त्र across अनेक कंप्यूटर, जातियाँ features ऐसे as मित्रों सूचियाँ and समूह, बादल छायांकन, and in-game voice और गपशप functionality.
The तन्त्र provides a freely उपलब्धियाँ application programming इंटरफ़ेस, Steamworks, कि developers can लो लाभ of to integrate अनेक of भाप 's functions within उनके तन्त्र products, including copy protection, networking और matchmaking, in-game achievements और micro-transactions, और support for user-created content through भाप कार्यशाला.
हालांकि initially विकसित लिये use on Microsoft खिड़कियाँ, the क्लाएंट रै विस्तारित to शामिल os x and Linux संस्करण, and क्लाइंट साथ सीमित functionality on the प्लेस्टेशन 3 console and for दोनो iOS and Android मोबाईल devices.
In जोड to होने a सेंट्रल हब लिये गेमिंग तन्त्र, वाल्व रै निर्मित a संस्करण of Steam साथ altered कार्यक्षमता to be used in स्कूलों for educational software, सहित a परिवर्धित संस्करण of पोर्टल 2 लिये शिक्षण विज्ञान और नाजुक सोच lessons.
, there हैं nearly 2000 खेल उपलब्धियाँ through Steam, और 54 million active user accounts.
As of January 2013, भाप रै seen over 6.6 million concurrent players.
Steam has an अनुमानित 50–70 % share of the डिजिटल वितरण मार्केट लिये video खेल.
The Steam logo is a stylised left-side fly-crank and rod from the walschaerts valve gear of a steam locomotive.
Jerry Lewis ( born March 16, 1926 ) is an अमरीकी हास्य, actor, singer, film producer, screenwriter और film director.
He is ज्ञात for उसके slapstick humor in film, television, stage और रेडियो.
He was originally paired up साथ डीन Martin in 1946, forming the famed कॉमेडी टोली of Martin and लुईस.
In addition to the duo 's popular nightclub कार्य, वे स्ट्रक्चर in a कामयाब श्रेणी of कॉमेडी films for सर्वोपरि Pictures.
लुईस is भी ज्ञात for his charity fund-raising telethons and स्थिति as national अध्यक्ष लिये the Muscular dystrophy संघ ( mda ).
Lewis has जीती अनेक awards लिये lifetime achievements from The American Comedy पुरस्कार, Los Angeles Film आलोचकों संघ, and Venice फिल्मी पर्व, और he has दो सितारों on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
in 2005, he received the Governors पुरस्कार of the Academy of टेलीविज़न Arts & Sciences Board of राज्यपालों, जिससे is the highest एमी पुरस्कार प्रस्तुत.
On फ़रवरी 22, 2009, the अकादमी of गति Picture कला और Sciences awarded लुईस the Jean Hersholt humanitarian पुरस्कार.
The Rhine ( ; ; ) is a European नदी that रनों from the Swiss कैण्टन of grisons in the southeastern Swiss Alps through जर्मनी and eventually बहती into the North समुद्र coast in the नीदरलैंड्स और is the twelfth longest river in Europe, at about, with an औसत discharge of अधिक than.
The Rhine और the Danube formed most of the उत्तरी अंतर्देशीय frontier of the रोमन Empire and, since those days, the Rhine has महरूम a vital and navigable जलमार्ग carrying trade and goods गहन inland.
it रै भी served as a रक्षात्मक विशेषता और has महरूम the आधार for क्षेत्रीय and international borders.
the many castles और prehistoric fortifications along the Rhine गवाही to इसके महत्व as a जलमार्ग.
River traffic could be रोका at these स्थितियाँ, प्रायः लिये the purpose of collecting tolls, by the राज्य that controlled that portion of the river.
Sri ( सिंहली )
श्री ( Devanagari : श्री, iast ; śrī ), भी transliterated as Sree or shri or श्री is a word of Sanskrit उत्पत्ति, used in the भारतीय उपमहाद्वीप as विनम्र form of address equivalent to the English `` mr. '' in लिखा and spoken भाषा, or as a शीर्षक of veneration लिये deities ( usually अनूदित as `` Holy '' ).
Design of complex structures like the अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्पेस स्टेशन needs in-depth understanding of Structural विश्लेषण.
Civil engineering is a professional engineering discipline that सौदे साथ the डिज़ाइन, निर्माण, and maintenance of the शारीरिक and naturally निर्मित environment, सहित works like roads, पुलों, canals, dams, and इमारतें.
सिविल engineering is the oldest अभियान्त्रिकी discipline after सैन्य अभियान्त्रिकी, और it थी defined to distinguish non-military अभियान्त्रिकी इससे सैन्य अभियान्त्रिकी.
It is traditionally broken into अनेक sub-disciplines including पर्यावरणीय अभियान्त्रिकी, geotechnical अभियान्त्रिकी, geophysics, भूगणित, कंट्रोल engineering, structural engineering, biomechanics, nanotechnology, परिवहन अभियान्त्रिकी, धरती science, वायुमंडलीय sciences, forensic engineering, municipal or शहरी अभियान्त्रिकी, जल संसाधन अभियान्त्रिकी, सामग्री अभियान्त्रिकी, coastal engineering, सर्वेक्षण, and निर्माण engineering.
सिविल अभियान्त्रिकी takes place on all स्तर : in the public sector इससे municipal through to नेशनल governments, और in the निजी sector from individual homeowners through to अंतरराष्ट्रीय companies.

Katherine Dunham ( June 22, 1909 – May 21, 2006 ) was an American dancer, कोरियोग्राफर, author, educator, और सोशल activist.
Dunham had one of the most कामयाब dance careers in American and European थिएटर of the 20th सदी, और directed her अपना नृत्य कम्पनी for many years.
She has महरूम called the `` matriarch and महारानी माँ of ब्लैक नृत्य ''.
During her heyday in the 1940s और 1950s, Dunham थी प्रसिद्ध throughout यूरोपीय और लैटिन अमेरिका और was widely लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त States, जहाँ the Washington Post पुकारा her `` dancer कैथरीन the ग्रेट ''.
लिये almost तीस years वो कायम the Katherine dunham नृत्य कम्पनी, the only self-supported अमरीकी ब्लैक dance troupe at that time, और over her long करियर she choreographed more than नब्बे व्यक्तिगत dances.
Dunham थी an innovator in African-American modern नृत्य as खूब as a leader in the field of नृत्य anthropology, or ethnochoreology.
Sphagnum is a genus of between 1510 और 3500 प्रजाति of mosses, commonly called peat मॉस due to इसके prevalence in गीला habitats where it contributes to the formation of peat bogs and mires.
sphagnum accumulations can स्टोर जल, चूंकि both जीना and मुर्दे plants can थाम large quantities of water inside their कोशिकाएं ; पौधे may hold इससे 16-26 टाइम्स as much water as their शुष्क वज़न depending on the प्रजाति.
the खाली कोशिकाएं help retain जल in drier शर्तें.
Hence, as sphagnum मॉस grows, it can धीरे स्प्रेड into drier conditions, forming larger peatlands, दोनो raised bogs and blanket bogs.
These peat accumulations तब provide habitat for a wide सरणी of peatland पौधे, including sedges और ericaceous shrubs, as well as orchids and carnivorous plants.
Sphagnum और the peat formed from it do नहीं क्षय readily क्युकी of the phenolic compounds embedded in the मॉस 's कोशिका दीवारें.
In addition, bogs, like सब वेटलैंड्स, develop anaerobic soil शर्तें, which produces धीमा अवायवीय decay बल्कि than aerobic microbial action.
Peat मॉस can also acidify इसके surroundings by लेने up cations, such as calcium और magnesium, और releasing हाइड्रोजन ions.
Under the right conditions, peat can accumulate to a गहराई of अनेक मीटर.
Different प्रजाति of Sphagnum have अलग सहिष्णुता हद लिये बाढ़ and ph, so any one peatland may have a क्रमांक of अलग sphagnum प्रजाति.
Individual peat moss पौधे consist of a प्रमुख स्टेम, साथ tightly arranged clusters of branch fascicles प्रायः consisting of two or three spreading शाखाओं और दो to four hanging शाखाओं.
the top of the संयंत्र, or capitulum, has compact clusters of young शाखाओं.
Along the stem are बिखरे पत्ते of विभिन्न आकार, named stem leaves ; the आकार varies according to species.
the पत्ते consist of दो kinds of cells ; small, ग्रीन, living कोशिकाएं ( chlorophyllose कोशिकाएं ), और विशाल, clear, structural, dead cells ( hyaline cells ).
the latter have the large water-holding क्षमता.
the earliest संस्करण of the संजाल Card, जारी manually बल्कि than through an APTIS यंत्र.
The first APTIS संस्करण of the Network Card.
This was used इससे the start of the aptis era in 1986/1987 जबतक खूब into the 1990s, as स्टॉक्स had to be प्रयुक्त up despite the introduction of the new-look orange-banded संस्करण in 1991.
the introduction of the weekday minimum fare कंडीशन in 2002 resulted in a minor बदलें : the रेड `` R '' shows that this is the `` Revised '' संस्करण of the railcard.
This version is still in उपयोग as of 2007.
The Network railcard is a छूट कार्ड introduced in 1986 by British Rail, upon the creation of their Network southeast क्षेत्रफल around London, England.
The card is intended to encourage अवकाश travel by रेल by offering discounts लिये वयस्कों and accompanying children on a wide range of off-peak किराए.
the range of छूट उपलब्धियाँ, and the price of the card, have varied चूंकि that समय, लकिन the कार्ड रै सदा been मान्य for a साल 's असीमित use.
It can be खरीदा by कोई person aged 16 or over from कोई staffed National Rail स्टेशन or रेल नियुक्त Travel Agent, by completing an application रूप - no photographic identification or other दस्तावेज़ीकरण is needed to ख़रीदे or उपयोग the कार्ड.
it is एक of a क्रमांक of concessionary किराया योजनाएं available on the अंग्रेजों रेल प्रणाली.
the United राष्ट्र ( un ; French : Organisation des Nations unies, onu ) is the world 's largest, foremost, and सबसे prominent international संगठन.
The stated aims of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र शामिल promoting और facilitating सहयोग in अंतरराष्ट्रीय विधि, international security, आर्थिक development, सोशल प्रगति, human अधिकारों, सिविल अधिकारों, सिविल लिबर्टीज, राजनैतिक freedoms, democracy, and the उपलब्धि of स्थायी संसार सलाम.
The un थी founded in 1945 after संसार War II to replace the League of Nations, to stop wars between countries, और to provide a मंच लिये संवाद.
It contains अनेक subsidiary organizations to carry out इसके मिशन.
At its founding, the un had 51 सदस्य राज्य ; as of 2011, वहीँ हैं 193.
From इसके कार्यालयों around the world, the un और इसके specialized agencies decide on substantive and प्रशासनिक मुद्दे in नियमित बैठक आयोजित throughout the year.
The संगठन रै six प्रिंसिपल अंगों : the सामान्य सभा ( the main deliberative सभा ) ; the Security परिषद ( for deciding निश्चित resolutions लिये peace and सुरक्षा ) ; the Economic और सोशल Council ( for assisting in promoting अंतरराष्ट्रीय economic और social cooperation और विकास ) ; the Secretariat ( for providing studies, सूचना, और facilities needed by the UN ) ; the International Court of Justice ( the primary न्यायिक organ ) ; और the संयुक्त Nations Trusteeship परिषद ( जिससे is फिलहाल निष्क्रिय ).
Other prominent un System एजेंसियों include the संसार Health संगठन ( जो ), the World Food Programme ( WFP ) and संयुक्त Nations Children 's Fund ( UNICEF ).
The UN 's most prominent स्थिति is that of the office of Secretary-General which has been held by Ban ki-moon of South Korea since 2007.
the United राष्ट्र Headquarters resides in international territory in नई York City, साथ further प्रमुख कार्यालयों at Geneva, Nairobi, and वियना.
The संगठन is financed इससे assessed और voluntary contributions इससे its member states, and has six आधिकारिक भाषाएं : Arabic, चाइनीज, English, फ्रेंच, Russian, and स्पेनी.
दक्षिण बीच, also nicknamed sobe, is a पड़ोस in the city of मियामी बीच, Florida, United राज्य, located due east of Miami नगर proper between biscayne Bay और the अटलांटिक समंदर.
the area encompasses सब of the अवरोध आइलैंड्स of मियामी बीच south of भारतीय क्रीक.
इस area was the पहला section of Miami Beach to be विकसित, starting in the 1910s, thanks to the development प्रयत्न of Carl G. Fisher, the lummus Brothers, और John S. Collins, the latter whose construction of the कॉलिन्स Bridge provided the पहला vital जमीन link between मेनलैंड Miami and the समुद्रतट.
The क्षेत्रफल has गए through numerous artificial and प्राकृतिक परिवर्तन over the years, including a booming regional अर्थव्यवस्था, increased tourism, और the 1926 hurricane, which destroyed much of the area.
as of 2010, परिचय 39,186 निवासियों सजीव in South Beach.
The United राज्य अध्यक्षीय election of 1960 was the 44th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, आयोजित on मंगलवार, November 8, 1960.
The रिपब्लिकन Party मनोनीत लाज़िम Vice-President रिचर्ड Nixon, जबकि the लोकतांत्रिक Party nominated John F. कैनेडी, Senator from मैसाचुसेट्स.
The incumbent अध्यक्ष, रिपब्लिकन Dwight D. आइज़नहावर, थी not eligible for re-election बाद सेवारत the maximum दो terms allowed by the Twenty-second amendment.
Kennedy was निर्वाचित with a lead of 112,827 votes, or 0.17 % of the popular vote, giving him a victory of 303 to 219 in the चुनावी College, the closest since 1916.
इस थी the पहला election in which सब पचास of the current United राज्य participated.
a क्रमांक of factors explain why the election थी so close.
कैनेडी gained since there थी an आर्थिक मंदी जिससे ठेस the लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन, and he had the लाभ of 17 million अधिक पंजीकृत डेमोक्रेट than republicans.
furthermore, the नई मत that कैनेडी gained among catholics लगभग neutralized the new मत Nixon gained among Protestants.
कैनेडी 's campaigning skills decisively outmatched निक्सन 's.
In the end, निक्सन 's जोर on उसके अनुभव carried little वज़न, और he wasted energy by campaigning in all 50 states instead of concentrating on the swing states.
Kennedy used उसके large, well-funded campaign organization to win the नामांकन, secure endorsements, और, साथ the सहायता of the पिछला of the big-city bosses, to get out the vote in the बिग शहरों.
he relied on कार्यशील mate lyndon B. जॉनसन to hold the दक्षिण and प्रयुक्त television effectively.
इस चुनाव is notable as being the first time in U.S. history that दो sitting U.S. Senators ( Kennedy and Johnson ) यहूद elected as president और vice-president, a phenomenon that has महरूम दोहराया once, by Barack Obama and जो बिडेन in 2008 ( in both cases, the president थी the younger, अधिक junior senator ).
A पोस्टर लिये a c. 1884 American production of Macbeth, अभिनीत थामस W. keene.
Depicted, काउंटर clockwise from top-left, are : Macbeth और banquo meet the witches ; just बाद the हत्या of Duncan ; Banquo 's भुत ; मैकबेथ duels macduff ; और Macbeth.
Macbeth is a खेल written by William Shakespeare.
it is considered one of his darkest और most शक्तिशाली tragedies.
नियत in स्कॉटलैंड, the खेल dramatizes the corroding मनोवैज्ञानिक और राजनैतिक प्रभाव उत्पादित when its protagonist, the स्कॉटिश रब मैकबेथ, chooses दुष्ट as the way to fulfill उसके ambition for शक्ति.
He commits regicide to become किंग and तब furthers his moral descent with a reign of murderous terror to रहो in power, eventually plunging the country into सिविल युद्ध.
In the end, he loses सबकुछ कि gives meaning और purpose to his life before losing his जीवन itself.
The play is believed to have been लिखा between 1603 और 1607, और is most commonly dated 1606.
The earliest account of a performance of what was probably शेक्सपियर 's play is April 1611, जब साइमन forman recorded देखकर such a play at the Globe Theatre.
it was पहला प्रकाशित in the Folio of 1623, संभवतः इससे a prompt किताब.
It थी most likely लिखा during the reign of जेम्स I, जो had महरूम जेम्स vi of स्कॉटलैंड before he succeeded to the English throne in 1603.
जेम्स थी a संरक्षक of shakespeare’s एक्टिंग company, and of सब the plays शेक्सपियर लिखा दौरान James’s शासनकाल, Macbeth most clearly reflects the playwright’s relationship साथ the sovereign.
Macbeth is Shakespeare’s shortest tragedy, and tells the story of a वीर Scottish सामान्य नामित मैकबेथ who receives a prophecy इससे a trio of witches कि एक दिन he होगा become King of Scotland.
Consumed by महत्वाकांक्षा और spurred to action by his बीवी, Macbeth हत्याएं King डंकन और takes the throne for खुद.
उसके शासनकाल is racked with guilt and paranoia, and he soon becomes a tyrannical ruler as he is मजबूर to कमिट अधिक और more हत्याएं to protect खुद इससे enmity और suspicion.
the bloodbath swiftly takes मैकबेथ और Lady मैकबेथ into realms of arrogance, दीवानगी, और मौत.
Shakespeare 's सोर्स for the tragedy is the खाता of King मैकबेथ of स्कॉटलैंड, macduff, and Duncan in holinshed 's क्रॉनिकल्स ( 1587 ), a history of England, स्कॉटलैंड और आयरलैंड परिचित to Shakespeare और उसके contemporaries, although the कार्यक्रम in the खेल differ extensively इससे the history of the real Macbeth.
In the backstage world of थिएटर, some मानना that the खेल is शापित, और will नहीं mention its title aloud, referring to it instead as `` the स्कॉटिश खेल ``.
over the कोर्स of अनेक सदियां, the खेल has attracted some of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध actors to the भूमिकाएँ of मैकबेथ और Lady Macbeth.
It has been adapted to फिल्मी, television, ओपेरा, novels, कॉमिक किताबे, and अन्य media.
the मिल्टन Hershey School is a निजी परोपकारी ( pre-K through 12 ) बोर्डिंग school in hershey, पेन्सिलवेनिया.
Originally नामित the Hershey Industrial स्कूल, the institution was संस्थापित and वित्तपोषित by chocolate उद्योगपति Milton snavely hershey and his wife, कैथरीन Sweeney hershey.
the स्कूल थी originally स्थापित for impoverished, healthy, Caucasian, male orphans, while today it serves विद्यार्थी of विभिन्न backgrounds.
the मिल्टन Hershey स्कूल विश्वास, जिससे funds the स्कूल, owns controlling interest in the hershey Company और owns the hershey Entertainment और Resorts Company ( HERCO ) which oversees many of the क्षेत्रफल hotels along साथ a theme park called Hersheypark.
With over six billion डॉलर in assets, the Milton Hershey स्कूल is one of the wealthiest स्कूलों in the संसार.
the स्कूल is overseen by a Board of Managers.
The school currently serves 1,818 students, और plans to grow to 2,100 students by 2013.
a member of CORE : गठबन्धन लिये Residential Education, it is the largest residential education कार्यक्रम in the us.

the Controlled substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the कॉंग्रेस of the United राज्य as शीर्षक ii of the व्यापक Drug Abuse रोकथाम और Control अधिनियम of 1970.
the सीएसए is the federal u.S. drug नीति under जिससे the manufacture, importation, कब्ज़ा, उपयोग and distribution of certain substances is regulated.
the Act भी परोसा as the national implementing legislation लिये the सिंगल सम्मेलन on Narcotic दवाएँ.
the legislation created five schedules ( classifications ), with varying योग्यता for a पदार्थ to be included in प्रत्येक.
Two federal एजेंसियों, the Drug प्रवर्तन प्रशासन और the Food and ड्रग प्रशासन, determine which substances are added to or removed इससे the विभिन्न schedules, हालांकि the statute passed by कॉंग्रेस created the initial लिस्टिंग, और Congress has sometimes अनुसूचित other substances through legislation such as the hillory J. Farias and सामन्था reid date-rape Prevention अधिनियम of 2000, which लगाई gamma hydroxybutyrate in अनुसूची i. वर्गीकरण निर्णय are जरूरी to be बना on मापदण्ड सहित potential लिये abuse ( an अपरिभाषित term ), currently accepted medical उपयोग in उपचार in the संयुक्त States, और अंतरराष्ट्रीय treaties.
Second-language अधिग्रहण or second-language learning is the प्रक्रम by which लोगों सीख a दूसरी language.
second-language acquisition ( प्रायः abbreviated to sla ) also refers to the वैज्ञानिक अनुशासन devoted to अध्ययन that प्रक्रम.
Second language refers to कोई language सीखे in जोड to a व्यक्ति 's पहला language ; although the concept is नामित second-language acquisition, it can also incorporate the learning of third, चौथी, or subsequent भाषाएं.
Second-language अधिग्रहण refers to what learners do ; it करता not refer to practices in भाषा teaching.
The academic अनुशासन of second-language acquisition is a subdiscipline of लागू linguistics.
it is broad-based और अपेक्षाकृत नई.
as खूब as the विभिन्न शाखाओं of भाषाविज्ञान, second-language acquisition is भी closely related to psychology, cognitive psychology, and education.
To पृथक the academic अनुशासन इससे the learning प्रक्रम itself, the शर्तें second-language अधिग्रहण शोध, second-language अध्ययन, और second-language acquisition अध्ययन हैं also used.
SLA research began as an interdisciplinary फ़ील्ड, and क्युकी of this it is मुश्किल to पहचानो a precise starting तिथि.
however, it करता appear to have developed a ग्रेट सौदे since the mid-1960s.
the पद अधिग्रहण was originally used to emphasize the अवचेतन प्रकृति of the learning प्रक्रम, लकिन in हाल सालो learning और acquisition have become largely synonymous.
second-language अधिग्रहण can incorporate विरासत language सीखना, but it does not प्रायः चरितार्थ bilingualism.
Most SLA researchers see bilingualism as being the end result of learning a भाषा, नहीं the process itself, and see the पद as referring to native-like fluency.
लेखक in fields such as education and psychology, however, प्रायः उपयोग bilingualism loosely to refer to all forms of बहुभाषिकता.
second-language acquisition is भी not to be contrasted with the अधिग्रहण of a विदेशी language ; बल्कि, the learning of दूसरी भाषाएं and the learning of foreign भाषाएं involve the वही fundamental processes in अलग situations..
वहीँ has महरूम much debate परिचय exactly कैसा language is सीखे, और many मुद्दे are still अनसुलझे.
There are many theories of second-language acquisition, लकिन none हैं accepted as a complete explanation by सब sla शोधकर्ताओं.
Due to the interdisciplinary प्रकृति of the फ़ील्ड of second-language acquisition, इस is नहीं अपेक्षित to happen in the foreseeable future.
फोर्ब्स सूची of billionaires is an सालाना रैंकिंग of the संसार 's wealthiest लोगों, compiled and published by Forbes, an अमरीकी नेशनल business पत्रिका.
The कुल net लायक of each व्यक्तिगत on the सूची is estimated, in United राज्य डॉलर, based on उनके assets and हिसाब for कर्ज़.
The list तभी represents each व्यक्ति 's valuation on a single दिन, due to daily fluctuations among exchange rates और stock valuations.
the United राज्य Secret सेवा is a u.S. संघीय विधि enforcement agency that is part of the संयुक्त States विभाग of Homeland सुरक्षा.
the sworn members are divided among the खास Agents and the uniformed Division.
Until March 1, 2003, the सेवा थी भाग of the United राज्य विभाग of the राजकोष.
The u.S. Secret Service रै दो पृथक areas of responsibility:
Financial अपराधों, covering missions ऐसे as रोकथाम और छानबीन of counterfeiting of u.S. currency और u.S. treasury securities, and छानबीन of प्रमुख धोखाधड़ी.
सुरक्षा, which entails ensuring the safety of वर्तमान और former नेशनल नेताओ and their families, such as the President, past राष्ट्रपतियों, vice राष्ट्रपतियों, presidential candidates, visiting heads of state, और foreign embassies ( प्रति an अनुबंध with the U.S. State विभाग 's ब्यूरो of राजनयिक Security ( DS ) Office of विदेशी Missions ( OFM ), etc. )
the Secret Service 's आरंभिक responsibility was to investigate counterfeiting of U.S. करेंसी, which थी अनियंत्रित following the u.S. सिविल War.
The एजेंसी तब विकसित into the United राज्य ' पहला घरेलू प्रज्ञा और counterintelligence एजेंसी.
Many of the agency 's मिशन यहूद बाद लिया over by subsequent एजेंसियों such as the Federal ब्यूरो of Investigation ( एफबीआई ), Bureau of Alcohol, तम्बाकू, Firearms and Explosives ( ATF ), Immigration and Customs Enforcement ( बर्फ ), and आतंरिक Revenue Service ( IRS ).
`` me और Bobby mcgee '' is a song लिखा by क्रिस kristofferson और Fred फोस्टर, originally performed by रोजर Miller.
Others performed the सोंग later, including kristofferson himself, और janis joplin who topped the U.S. singles chart साथ the सोंग in 1971 बाद her death, making the सोंग the second posthumous number-one सिंगल in U.S. chart इतिहास after `` ( sittin ' On ) The Dock of the खाड़ी `` by ओटिस redding.
फ्रैंकलिन Delano रूज़वेल्ट ( or ; January 30, 1882 – April 12, 1945 ), भी ज्ञात by his initials, FDR, थी the 32nd President of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1933–1945 ) and a सेंट्रल figure in संसार events दौरान the mid-20th सदी, leading the संयुक्त States during a समय of विश्वव्यापी आर्थिक depression and कुल युद्ध.
A प्रबल leader of the लोकतांत्रिक Party और the तभी American president elected to अधिक than two शर्तें, he निर्मित a New सौदे गठबन्धन that realigned अमरीकी politics बाद 1932, as his घरेलू policies defined अमरीकी liberalism लिये the middle तीसरा of the 20th सदी.
साथ the bouncy popular सोंग `` प्रसन्न दिनों हैं Here Again `` as उसके campaign थीम, fdr पराजित incumbent रिपब्लिकन हर्बर्ट Hoover in नवम्बर 1932, at the depth of the ग्रेट अवसाद.
सक्रिय by his personal victory over polio, fdr 's unfailing आशावाद and activism contributed to a renewal of the national स्पिरिट.
He worked closely with अंग्रेजों Prime मंत्री विंस्टन चर्चिल and सोवियत सामान्य सचिव जोसेफ स्टालिन in अग्रणी the Allies विरूद्ध जर्मनी और जापानी in संसार युद्ध II, and restoring prosperity to the स्वदेश 's economy.
in उसके first hundred दिनों in दफ्तर, which began March 4, 1933, रूज़वेल्ट पथप्रदर्शन major legislation and जारी a profusion of कार्यपालिका आदेश that instituted the नई Deal —a variety of programs designed to produce relief ( government कार्य लिये the बेरोजगार ), recovery ( आर्थिक growth ), and reform ( through विनियमन of वॉल Street, बैंको and परिवहन ).
the अर्थव्यवस्था improved rapidly इससे 1933 to 1937, but तब relapsed into a deep recession.
the bipartisan Conservative गठबन्धन कि formed in 1937 prevented his पैकिंग the Supreme Court or गुजर कोई considerable विधान ; it abolished अनेक of the राहत programs जब unemployment diminished during World War II.
Most of the regulations on business यहूद ended परिचय 1975–85, मगर लिये the regulation of Wall Street by the Securities और Exchange आयोग, जिससे स्टिल exists.
साथ with several smaller programs, major surviving programs शामिल the संघीय Deposit Insurance Corporation, जिससे थी created in 1933, and सोशल Security, जिससे Congress passed in 1935.
As संसार War ii loomed after 1938, साथ the जापानी invasion of China and the aggression of Nazi Germany, FDR gave दमदार राजनयिक and वित्तीय support to चीन और Great Britain, while remaining officially neutral.
उसके लक्ष्य was to मेक America the `` आर्सेनल of लोकतंत्र `` which होता supply munitions to the allies.
in कूच 1941, Roosevelt, साथ Congressional स्वीकृति, provided lend-lease aid to the देशों fighting विरूद्ध नाजी Germany साथ ब्रिटेन.
With बहुत दमदार नेशनल support, he made war on Japan और जर्मनी बाद the जापानी attack on Pearl हार्बर on December 7, 1941, calling it a `` तिथि जिससे will live in infamy ``.
He supervised the mobilization of the u.S. अर्थव्यवस्था to support the Allied युद्ध effort.
as an active सैन्य leader, रूज़वेल्ट implemented an overall युद्ध रणनीति on two fronts कि ended in the defeat of the Axis Powers and the विकास of the संसार 's first अणु bomb.
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the internment of 100,000 Japanese American नागरिकों.
Unemployment dropped to 2 %, राहत programs largely ended, and the industrial economy grew rapidly to new heights as लाखो of people स्थानांतरित to नई jobs in युद्ध centers, और 16 million मेन और 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for सैन्य सेवा.
रूज़वेल्ट वर्चस्व the American political scene not only दौरान the बारह years of his प्रेसिडेंसी, लकिन भी लिये decades afterward.
He orchestrated the realignment of voters कि created the Fifth पार्टी प्रणाली.
fdr 's नई सौदे गठबन्धन united मजदूर संघ, big नगर machines, white ethnics, African अमेरिकी and rural white southerners.
he also influenced the बाद सृष्टि of the संयुक्त Nations and Bretton Woods.
रूज़वेल्ट is consistently रेटेड by विद्वानों as एक of the top तीन U.S. राष्ट्रपतियों, along साथ Abraham lincoln and George वॉशिंगटन.
a liberal डेमोक्रेट, रूज़वेल्ट defined उसके वैचारिक position as `` a छोटी बाएँ of बीच. ''
मारा salvatrucha ( commonly abbreviated as MS, मारा, and ms-13 ) is a transnational दण्ड gang that originated in लॉस एंजिल्स and रै spread to अन्य parts of the संयुक्त States, कनाडा, मैक्सिको, और सेंट्रल America.
The majority of the गिरोह is ethnically रचित of Central अमेरिकी and active in शहरी और suburban क्षेत्रों.
in the U.S., the MS-13 रै an विशेषकर भारी presence in लॉस Angeles काउंटी और the San फ्रांसिस्को Bay Area in Northern कैलिफ़ोर्निया ; the वॉशिंगटन, d.C. महानगर क्षेत्रों of Fairfax काउंटी, वर्जिनिया, मोंटगोमरी काउंटी, मेरीलैंड, और Prince जार्ज 's काउंटी, मेरीलैंड ; long Island, नई यॉर्क ; the Boston, Massachusetts क्षेत्रफल ; Charlotte, North कैरोलिना ; और Houston, Texas.
There is भी a उपस्थिति of MS-13 in टोरंटो, Ontario, कनाडा.
सदस्यों of ms distinguish themselves by tattoos covering the देह and भी often the फेस, as well as the उपयोग of their own चिह्न language.
They are बदनाम लिये उनके उपयोग of हिंसा and a subcultural moral कोड that predominantly consists of merciless revenge और बेदर्द retributions.
This cruelty of the distinguished सदस्यों of the `` maras '' or `` Mareros '' अर्जित उन्हें a path to be recruited by the Sinaloa Cartel battling विरूद्ध Los zetas in an जारी ड्रग war दक्षिण of the संयुक्त States किनारा.
उनके wide-ranging activities have drawn the ध्यान of the एफबीआई and Immigration and Customs प्रवर्तन, जो have initiated wide-scale छापे against ज्ञात और suspected गिरोह members – netting सैंकड़ों of रखवाले across the देश.
हड्डियों is an American crime comedy-drama television series that premiered on the फॉक्स संजाल in the संयुक्त States on सितंबर 13, 2005.
the दिखाएँ is based on forensic मानवशास्त्र और forensic पुरातत्व, साथ प्रत्येक episode focusing on an एफबीआई case संचिका concerning the रहस्य पीछे इंसान remains brought by FBI Special Agent Seeley बूथ ( David boreanaz ) to the forensic anthropologist dr. temperance `` Bones '' Brennan ( Emily deschanel ).
The बाकी of the प्रमुख cast शामिल Michaela conlin, T. J. thyne, eric millegan, Tamara टेलर, जोनाथन एडम्स, और जॉन फ्रांसिस Daley.
Created by हार्ट Hanson, the series is very loosely based on the life और writings of novelist and forensic anthropologist Kathy reichs, who also produces the दिखाएँ.
Its शीर्षक अक्षर, temperance ब्रेनन, is named बाद the protagonist of reichs ' अपराधों novel श्रेणी.
Conversely, Dr. ब्रेनन writes कामयाब रहस्य novels आधारित around a fictional ( in the Bones universe ) forensic anthropologist नामित Kathy Reichs.
Bones is a संयुक्त उत्पादन by Josephson Entertainment, दूर Field प्रोडक्शन्स and 20th सदी Fox टेलीविज़न.
the श्रेणी रै समाप्त airing इसके आठवीं ऋतु और रै been renewed for a नवीं ऋतु.
सुपर कटोरी XXV was an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल खेल between the अमरीकी Football सम्मेलन ( AFC ) चैंपियन Buffalo बिल्स और the National Football Conference ( nfc ) champion नई यॉर्क दिग्गज to decide the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल League ( एनएफएल ) चैंपियन लिये the 1990 season.
the दिग्गज defeated the बिल्स by the स्कोर of 20–19, winning उनके दूसरी ever सुपर कटोरी.
It is the only Super Bowl decided by one पाइंट.
The game थी held at Tampa Stadium in tampa, Florida, on January 27, 1991, दौरान the ऊँचाई of the गल्फ War.
it थी यूँ निभाई अंतर्गत much patriotic fervor.
The कार्यवाही included a rousing rendition of `` The star-spangled ध्वज `` by Whitney Houston during the pregame ceremonies.
the बिल्स और their विस्फोटक no-huddle ठोकर यहूद बनाना their first सुपर कटोरी appearance after finishing the नियमित ऋतु with a 13-3 record, और leading the league in total अंक scored साथ 428.
in advancing to उनके दूसरी Super Bowl, the दिग्गज भी posted a 13-3 नियमित ऋतु रिकार्ड, but with a ball-control offense और a रक्षा that allowed a league कम 211 अंक.
The खेल is बेहतरीन remembered लिये Bills placekicker स्कॉट नॉर्वुड 's last-second field लक्ष्य attempt जिससे went wide सही of the uprights, leading to a Giants विजय, and starting a four-game खोने streak in the Super कटोरी लिये the Bills.
The Giants set a सुपर Bowl record पकड़कर कब्ज़ा of the ball for 40 मिनट्स and 33 seconds.
New York भी overcame a 12-3 second-quarter deficit, और बना a 75-yard touchdown ड्राइव that consumed a सुपर कटोरी record 9:29 off the क्लॉक.
दिग्गज running back ottis Anderson, who carried the बॉल 21 times for 102 yards और एक touchdown, थी नामित Super कटोरी mvp.
he थी the पहला awardee to receive the newly नामित `` Pete rozelle Trophy '' ( नामित for the पूर्व कमिश्नर ).
एंडरसन भी अंकित one रिसेप्शन for सात yards.
मैल्कम x ( ; May 19, 1925february 21, 1965 ), born मैल्कम Little and also known as El-Hajj Malik el-shabazz ( ), थी an african-american मुस्लिम minister और human rights activist.
to उसके admirers, he थी a courageous एडवोकेट लिये the अधिकारों of अश्वेतों, a man who indicted white अमेरिका in the harshest terms लिये its crimes विरूद्ध black अमेरिकी.
Detractors accused him of preaching racism, ब्लैक supremacy, and हिंसा.
he रै been called एक of the महानतम and सबसे influential African Americans in history.
Malcolm x 's father died—killed by श्वेत supremacists, it थी rumored—when he was young, और at least one of his uncles थी lynched.
जब he was 13, उसके माँ थी लगाई in a दिमागी hospital, और he was लगाई in a श्रेणी of foster घरों.
in 1946, at आयु 20, he गई to prison लिये तोड़कर and प्रवेश.
In थाना, Malcolm x became a सदस्य of the स्वदेश of Islam ; after उसके पैरोल in 1952, he जल्दी रोज़ to become one of इसके leaders.
लिये a दर्जन years, मैल्कम x थी the पब्लिक फेस of the विवादास्पद समूह, लकिन disillusionment with स्वदेश of islam head Elijah Muhammad led him to leave the स्वदेश in कूच 1964.
बाद a period of travel in अफ़्रीकी and the मध्य ईस्ट, he returned to the संयुक्त राज्य, जहाँ he संस्थापित Muslim मस्जिदे, inc. और the संगठन of Afro-American एकता.
In February 1965, less than a year बाद leaving the स्वदेश of islam, he थी assassinated by three members of the समूह.
Malcolm x 's expressed beliefs बदला substantially over time.
As a प्रवक्ता लिये the स्वदेश of islam he सिखाया ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता और advocated separation of black और श्वेत अमेरिकी —in contrast to the civil rights गति 's जोर on integration.
बाद तोड़कर साथ the Nation of islam in 1964—saying of उसके संघ with it, `` I किया अनेक बाते as a [ Black ] मुस्लिम कि I 'm sorry for now.
I was a zombie तब... pointed in a certain दिशा और बताई to march '' —and बनने a सुन्नी मुस्लिम, he disavowed जातिवाद and expressed willingness to कार्य साथ सिविल अधिकारों leaders, he continued to emphasize Pan-Africanism, ब्लैक self-determination, and self-defense.
the third ऋतु of 90210, an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न श्रेणी, premiered on सोमवार सितंबर 13, 2010.
The cw officially नवीनीकृत the दिखाएँ for a third season on February 16, 2010.
With the reveal of the संजाल पतन 2010 अनुसूची, वे घोषित उनके decision to मूव 90210 to सोमवार nights at 8:00 pm, as a lead-in to गपशप Girl.
It premiered on सितंबर 13, 2010 and was मिले with generally धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ इससे critics.
the season चयन up at the समाप्त of summer and focuses on the students senior year of ऊँची स्कूल.
it follows adrianna 's rise to fame, a new संबंध between Silver and Navid and a उलझन टेडी जो decides to reveal to उसके family and मित्रों he is gay.
It also सौदे साथ the aftermath of नाओमी क्लार्क 's assault.
नियमित डाल सदस्यों लिये the ऋतु included Shenae Grimes, Tristan Wilds, annalynne mccord, Ryan eggold, Jessica stroup, Michael steger, Jessica lowndes, Matt lanter, गिलियन zinser, ट्रेवर Donovan और लोरी Loughlin.
रेबेका sinclair continued उसके भूमिका as executive producer लिये the ऋतु.
The season premiered to 1.96 million viewers and a 0.9 rating in the adults 18–49 demographic.
Christmas-themed episode `` Holiday दीवानगी '', hit season highs in सब कुंजी demos with 2.1 in the CW 's निशाना डेमो of women 18–34, a 1.4 in adults 18–34 and a 1.1 in adults 18–49.
It थी भी the सबसे watched एपीसोड in over a year with 2.2 million दर्शक tuning in.
The season finale aired on may 16, 2011.
the season averaged 1.75 लाख live दर्शक and a 0.9 adults 18–49 rating.
it थी released on DVD in the संयुक्त राज्य on अगस्त 30, 2011.
Elizabeth ii ( Elizabeth एलेक्जेंड्रा Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch of 16 sovereign राज्य, known as the Commonwealth realms, and their territories और dependencies, and head of the 54-member राष्ट्रमंडल of Nations.
वो is Supreme Governor of the Church of England and, in some of उसके realms, carries the शीर्षक of Defender of the Faith as भाग of उसके full शीर्षक.
on उसके accession on 6 फ़रवरी 1952, एलिज़ाबेथ became सिर of the राष्ट्रमंडल और queen regnant of सात independent Commonwealth देशों : the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, नई Zealand, South अफ़्रीकी, Pakistan और Ceylon.
From 1956 to 1992, the क्रमांक of उसके realms varied as territories gained स्वतंत्रता and some realms became republics.
at उपस्थित, in addition to the first four aforementioned देशों, Elizabeth is Queen of Jamaica, Barbados, the बहामा, Grenada, Papua नई गिनी, the सुलेमान Islands, Tuvalu, Saint Lucia, Saint विंसेंट और the Grenadines, Belize, Antigua और Barbuda और Saint किट्स और नेविस.
Her शासनकाल of years is currently the दूसरी longest for a British monarch ; तभी Queen Victoria has reigned longer at over 63 सालो.
एलिज़ाबेथ थी born in लंदन और educated privately at home.
उसके father acceded to the सिंहासन as जार्ज vi in 1936 on the abdication of उसके brother एडवर्ड viii, from which समय she was the वारिस presumptive.
वो began to undertake public कर्तव्य दौरान the Second संसार युद्ध, in which she served in the auxiliary territorial Service.
In 1947, वो शादीशुदा Prince Philip, ड्यूक of Edinburgh, with whom वो has चार children : Charles, ऐनी, एंड्रयू, और एडवर्ड.
उसके राजतिलक service took प्लेस in 1953 और was the पहला to be televised.
The महारानी 's many historic विज़िट और meetings include a state विज़िट to the गणतंत्र of आयरलैंड and reciprocal visits to और इससे the Pope.
The महारानी has seen major संवैधानिक changes in her realms, such as devolution in the United किंगडम and the patriation of the कनाडाई constitution.
Times of personal significance have included the births और विवाह of उसके children, the births of उसके grandchildren, the प्रतिष्ठापन of the Prince of वेल्स, and the celebration of milestones ऐसे as उसके Silver, सुनहरी, and डायमंड Jubilees in 1977, 2002, and 2012, क्रमशः.
Major कार्यक्रम in the महारानी 's reign have included the Troubles in Northern आयरलैंड, the falklands War, wars साथ इराकी और the War in Afghanistan.
There have महरूम times of निजी sorrow for उसके जिससे शामिल the death of her father at 56, the assassination of प्रिंस फिलिप 's ताऊ, रब माउंटबेटन, the breakdown of उसके children 's विवाह in 1992 ( a year deemed her annus horribilis ), the मौत in 1997 of उसके पूर्व daughter-in-law, Diana, Princess of Wales, और the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002.
The Queen has occasionally faced severe press criticism of the royal family और रिपब्लिकन sentiments, but support for the साम्राज्य and उसके निजी लोकप्रियता remain ऊँची.
the 2010 संयुक्त States सीनेट चुनाव in Florida took place on नवम्बर 2, 2010 साथ with अन्य elections to the संयुक्त States सीनेट in अन्य राज्य as well as all चुनावों to the संयुक्त States House of Representatives and विभिन्न state and local elections.

उपग्रह view of दोहा
Doha (, ' or ', वस्तुतः : `` the big tree '' ) is the capital city of the state of क़तर.
स्तिथ on the coast of the पारसी Gulf,
it था a population of 998,651 in 2008, and is also one of the municipalities of क़तर.
दोहा is क़तर 's largest city, with over 60 % of the nation 's जनसांख्यिकी residing in दोहा or इसके surrounding suburbs, and is also the आर्थिक केन्द्र of the देश.
दोहा also serves as the seat of government of क़तर, जिससे is शासित by Sheikh हमद bin खलीफा Al थानी.
दोहा is घर to the Education City, an क्षेत्रफल devoted to research and education.
दोहा was the site of the first ministerial-level meeting of the Doha विकास गोलाकार of World Trade Organization negotiations.
The city of Doha आयोजित the 2006 एशियाई Games, which was the largest एशियाई Games कभी आयोजित.
Doha also hosted the 2011 पण Arab खेल and most of the games at the 2011 AFC एशियाई Cup.
Doha hosted the unfccc Climate negotiations ( COP 18 ) December 2012 और will मेजबान a विशाल क्रमांक of the venues for the 2022 FIFA संसार कप.
The संसार पेट्रोलियम Council आयोजित the 20th संसार Petroleum सम्मेलन in दोहा in December 2011.
paranasal sinuses हैं a group of four युग्म air-filled spaces कि surround the nasal cavity ( maxillary sinuses ), above the eyes ( frontal साइनस ), between the आँखें ( ethmoid sinuses ), and पीछे the ethmoids ( sphenoid sinuses ).
the sinuses हैं named for the facial हड्डियों in जिससे they हैं located.
Lean निर्माण, झुकना एंटरप्राइज़, or lean उत्पादन, often बस, `` झुकना, '' is a उत्पादन practice that considers the expenditure of संसाधन for any लक्ष्य other than the सृष्टि of value for the end ग्राहक to be wasteful, और यूँ a निशाना लिये विलोपन.
working इससे the perspective of the customer who consumes a product or सेवा, `` value '' is पारिभाषित as कोई कार्रवाई or प्रक्रम that a ग्राहक would be willing to अदा लिये.
essentially, झुकना is centered on preserving मान साथ less work.
झुकना manufacturing is a प्रबन्धन दर्शनशास्त्र निकला ज़्यादातर from the Toyota उत्पादन System ( tps ) ( hence the पद Toyotism is also prevalent ) and identified as `` झुकना '' तभी in the 1990s.
TPS is प्रसिद्ध for its फ़ोकस on कटौती of the original Toyota सात wastes to improve overall ग्राहक value, लकिन there हैं varying perspectives on कैसा this is best हासिल.
The steady growth of Toyota, from a small कम्पनी to the संसार 's largest automaker, रै focused ध्यान on how it रै हासिल this success.
iCarly लोगो
icarly is an American sitcom that airs on Nickelodeon, जिससे premiered on सितंबर 8, 2007.
निकलोडियन प्रचारित many एपीसोड so far ऐसे as `` iDo '', `` iHire an Idiot '', `` iPity the Nevel '', `` iDate Sam & फ्रेडी '', etc. as specials, despite their being नियमित episodes.
Every एपीसोड title begins साथ a निम्नतर case i which represents the internet, as in `` iCarly ''.
the दिखाएँ was nominated for an Emmy पुरस्कार for बकाया children 's कार्यक्रम in 2009.
the series अभिनीत मिरांडा cosgrove as कार्ली शे, a 13-year-old who becomes an अंतरजाल star.
The series ended on नवम्बर 23, 2012 with the one-hour खास एपीसोड `` iGoodbye ''.
a कुल of 7 सीज़न और 109 episodes यहूद broadcast.
The largest दर्शक of the series थी 11.2 million viewers, with the special episode `` isaved अपना Life '' premiered in January 2010.
जब कार्ली ( मिरांडा Cosgrove ) और her sassy बेहतरीन dost Sam ( jennette mccurdy ) act funny at a school talent show audition, tech-savvy फ्रेडी ( Nathan Kress ) टेपों it and पोस्ट it ऑनलाइन बगैर telling उन्हें.
After देखकर the लड़कियों ' दमदार chemistry and banter, the ऑनलाइन दर्शक clamors for more and the icarly webcast is born.
While grappling with typical issues of किशोरावस्था, Carly, sam, और Freddie ढूँढें out कि they have भी become online celebrities as their दिखाएँ – which सुविधाएँ हुनर प्रतियोगिताओं, recipes, problem-solving, और random dancing – garners अंतरराष्ट्रीय accolades.
Carly जीवनदान in Seattle, वॉशिंगटन with her 26-year-old brother and संरक्षक Spencer ( जेरी trainor ) and produces the दिखाएँ in a makeshift third-floor studio loft in उनके apartment.
उनके माँ has never been seen or mentioned, but their पिता, स्टीवन Shay ( दाउद Chisum ), is a u.S. एयर फ़ोर्स officer temporarily stationed on a submarine, and is प्रायः mentioned लकिन is तभी seen in व्यक्ति during the श्रेणी finale episode, `` iGoodbye ''.
westlife यहूद an Irish लड़के बैंड जिससे formed in 1998 and disbanded in 2012.
Originally signed by Simon cowell और managed by Louis वाल्श, the group 's final line-up consisted of Nicky Byrne, Kian Egan, Mark Feehily and शेन filan.
ब्रायन McFadden थी a member from 1998 जबतक उसके departure in 2004.
Westlife sold over 50 million रिकॉर्ड worldwide, a कुल कि included studio albums, singles, video रिलीज, and संकलन एल्बम.
The group accumulated 14 number-one singles in the United Kingdom ( the third-highest in UK history ), tying साथ Cliff Richard और रैंकिंग just behind the बीटल्स और Elvis प्रेस्ली.
वे achieved a total of 26 top टेन singles over उनके 14-year career.
by 2010, Westlife थी सूचीबद्ध in the गिनीज संसार रिकॉर्ड, as the UK 's top-selling album समूह of the 21st century.
वे also won The Record of the Year ( the तभी music award आधारित on public votes in the UK ) a record-breaking four times and in 2012, the Official चार्ट Company listed Westlife 34th amongst the biggest-selling singles कलाकारों in British music history.
Despite उनके यूरोपीय and एशियाई success, westlife never managed to ब्रेक into the U.S. market, achieving only एक hit single in 2000 : `` कसम It again ``.
in अक्तूबर 2011, Westlife announced उनके intention to split in 2012, following उनके महानतम हिट्स Tour और the रिलीज of उनके महानतम हिट्स एल्बम.
the boyband 's final कॉन्सर्ट were आयोजित on 22 और 23 June 2012 at Croke पार्क स्टेडियम in डबलिन.

विटामिन a is a समूह of nutritionally असंतृप्त hydrocarbons, which include रेटिनॉल, retinal, retinoic एसिड और अनेक provitamin A carotenoids among जिससे beta-carotene is the सबसे important.
Vitamin A has अनेक functions, it is महत्वपूर्ण for विकास और development, for the maintenance of the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली और शुभ vision.
Vitamin a is needed by the retina of the eye in the form of retinal, which combines साथ protein opsin to form rhodopsin the light-absorbing अणु, कि is necessary for both low-light ( scotopic दृष्टि ) and color vision.
विटामिन a भी functions in a very different भूमिका as an irreversibly oxidized form of retinol ज्ञात as retinoic एसिड, जिससे is an important hormone-like growth फ़ैक्टर लिये epithelial and अन्य कोशिकाएं.
in foods of एनिमल origin, the प्रमुख रूप of विटामिन a is an ester, primarily retinyl palmitate, जिससे is परिवर्तित to retinol ( chemically an दारू ) in the छोटी आंत.
the रेटिनॉल रूप कृत्यों as a भंडार form of the विटामिन, and can be converted to और इससे its visually क्रियाशील सुव्युद रूप, retinal.
The संबद्ध एसिड ( retinoic acid ), a metabolite कि can be irreversibly synthesized इससे विटामिन a, has only partial vitamin A कार्यकलाप, और करता not फलन in the retina for the विज़ुअल साईकिल.
Retinoic एसिड is प्रयुक्त लिये विकास और सेल्यूलर differentiation.
All forms of vitamin A have a beta-ionone ring to which an isoprenoid कड़ी is attached, called a retinyl group.
दोनो structural features are essential लिये vitamin activity.
The orange pigment of carrots – beta-carotene – can be represented as दो कनेक्ट retinyl समूह, which हैं प्रयुक्त in the body to contribute to vitamin a levels.
Alpha-carotene और gamma-carotene भी have a सिंगल retinyl group, which give उन्हें some विटामिन activity.
None of the other carotenes have विटामिन activity.
the carotenoid beta- cryptoxanthin possesses an ionone समूह and has विटामिन activity in इंसानो.
विटामिन a can be found in दो प्रिंसिपल फ़ॉर्म in foods :
Retinol, the form of vitamin a absorbed when eating एनिमल food sources, is a yellow, fat-soluble पदार्थ.
Since the pure दारू form is unstable, the vitamin is found in ऊतकों in a form of retinyl ester.
It is भी commercially produced और administered as esters ऐसे as retinyl एसीटेट or palmitate.
The carotenes alpha-carotene, beta-carotene, gamma-carotene ; and the xanthophyll beta-cryptoxanthin ( all of जिससे contain beta-ionone rings ), but no अन्य carotenoids, फलन as provitamin a in herbivores और सर्वाहारी पशु, which possess the एंजाइम ( 15-15'-dioxygenase ) जिससे cleaves beta-carotene in the intestinal mucosa और converts it रेटिनॉल.
In सामान्य, carnivores are poor converters of ionine-containing carotenoids, and pure carnivores such as cats and ferrets कमी 15-15'-dioxygenase और can not convert any carotenoids to retinal ( resulting in none of the carotenoids being forms of vitamin a लिये ये species ).
Selena Marie गोमेज़ ( born July 22, 1992 ) is an American सिंगर और actress.
वो बना her डेब्यू as a child actress in बार्नी & Friends.
In 2007, गोमेज़ आए to prominence as a starring cast सदस्य in the television श्रेणी wizards of waverly Place.
She हस्ताक्षरित to Hollywood Records the following साल, and became the संस्थापक और सीसे सिंगर of the पॉप band Selena Gomez & the झाँकी.
Their studio albums Kiss & बताना ( 2009 ), a साल बगैर बरसात ( 2010 ), and When the Sun Goes Down ( 2011 ) were certified सुनहरा by the Recording Industry संघ of America ( RIAA ) और have spawned platinum-certified singles `` Naturally ``, `` Who says ``, और `` प्रेम You like a Love सोंग ``.
After the release of television films और उनके accompanying soundtracks, गोमेज़ made उसके नाट्य फिल्मी debut in ramona and beezus in 2010 and starred in मोंटे Carlo in 2011.
Upon the निष्कर्ष of wizards of waverly प्लेस और the hiatus of Selena गोमेज़ & the झाँकी in 2012, वो केन्द्रित on उसके फिल्मी करियर, serving as a voice actress in Hotel Transylvania और starring in Spring Breakers the following साल.
उसके debut solo एल्बम is tentatively अनुसूचित to be released in गर्मियाँ 2013, and is preceded by its lead single `` आइये & Get it ``.
Outside of her work in the entertainment उद्योग, गोमेज़ is शामिल in philanthropic activities through charity work and various social and पर्यावरणीय कल्याणकारी.
Tracie monique Spencer ( born July 12, 1976 ) is an अमरीकी R & b and पॉप singer-songwriter, अभिनेत्री, and model.
Sacramento is the capital city of the u.S. राज्य of California and the सीट of सरकारी of sacramento काउंटी.
It is स्तिथ at the confluence of the Sacramento River और the अमरीकी नदी in the northern portion of California 's expansive सेंट्रल Valley.
साथ an estimated 2011 जनसांख्यिकी of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest नगर in California and the 35th largest city in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Sacramento is the कोर cultural और आर्थिक बीच of the sacramento metropolitan क्षेत्रफल which includes सात counties साथ an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123.
इसके metropolitan area is the fourth largest in California after the वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल, San Francisco Bay Area, और the San Diego महानगर area, as well as the 25th largest in the United राज्य.
sacramento was cited by समय पत्रिका as अमेरिका 's most ethnically और racially एकीकृत नगर in 2002.
Sacramento became a city through the प्रयत्न of the स्विस immigrant जॉन sutter, sr., उसके बेटे John Sutter, jr., and James W. Marshall.
sacramento grew quickly thanks to the protection of Sutter 's फोर्ट, जिससे was स्थापित by Sutter in 1839.
During the California Gold फटाफट, Sacramento थी a प्रमुख distribution पाइंट, a वाणिज्यिक and agricultural center, and a terminus लिये wagon trains, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the टट्टू एक्स्प्रेस, and the पहला Transcontinental रेलरोड.
कैलिफ़ोर्निया राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों, sacramento, अधिक commonly ज्ञात as Sacramento राज्य or Sac State, is the largest लोकल विश्वविद्यालयों.
it is एक of the twenty-three campuses of the California राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों प्रणाली.
Drexel विश्वविद्यालयों sacramento is स्तिथ in शहर, sacramento.
University of the Pacific 's McGeorge School of Law is स्तिथ in the Oak पार्क पड़ोस.
In addition, the विश्वविद्यालयों of California, डेविस is located in nearby डेविस, west of the पूंजी.
the uc डेविस Medical Center, a world-renowned research hospital, is स्तिथ in the city of Sacramento.
मेमोरियल दिन is a United States federal अवकाश which occurs प्रत्येक साल on the फाइनल सोमवार of may.
Memorial Day is a day of remembering the men और महिलाओं who died जबकि सेवारत in the संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद शक्तियां.
Formerly known as सजावट Day, it originated after the अमरीकी Civil War to commemorate the संघ और Confederate soldiers जो died in the Civil युद्ध.
By the 20th century Memorial दिन had महरूम extended to honor all अमेरिकी जो have died in all युद्धों.
it typically marks the start of the गर्मियाँ अवकाश ऋतु, जबकि मजदूर दिन marks इसके end.
Many people visit कब्रिस्तान and memorials, particularly to honor those जो have died in military सेवा.
Many स्वयंसेवक प्लेस an American ध्वज on each संगीन in नेशनल कब्रिस्तान.
by the जल्दी 20th century, Memorial दिन थी an अवसर for more general expressions of मेमोरी, as people visited the graves of their मृतक रिश्तेदारों in गिरिजाघर कब्रिस्तान, whether वे had परोसा in the military or not.
It also became a long वीकेंड increasingly devoted to shopping, परिवार महफिलों, आतिशबाजी, यात्राएँ to the बीच, and नेशनल media events.
सालाना सजावट Days लिये particular cemeteries हैं held on a Sunday in late spring or जल्दी गर्मियाँ in कुछ rural क्षेत्रों of the अमरीकी South, notably in the kyu.
In मामले involving a family graveyard where रिमोट ancestors as खूब as those who यहूद मृतक अधिक recently हैं दफ्न, इस may take on the अक्षर of an extended परिवार पुनर्मिलन to जिससे some people travel hundreds of miles.
लोगों gather on the designated day और put पुष्प on graves and renew सम्पर्क साथ kinfolk and अन्य.
वहीँ प्रायः is a धार्मिक service and a `` डिनर on the ground, '' the परंपरागत term लिये a potluck भोजन in जिससे लोगों प्रयुक्त to स्प्रेड the dishes आउट on sheets or tablecloths on the ग्रास.
It is believed कि this अभ्यास began before the अमरीकी सिविल War and यूँ may reflect the real उत्पत्ति of the `` मेमोरियल दिन '' idea.
Memorial Day is not to be confused with दिग्गजों Day ; Memorial दिन is a दिन of remembering the मेन और women जो died while सेवारत, while दिग्गजों Day celebrates the service of all u.S. military veterans, living or dead.

स्वतंत्रता Summer ( भी ज्ञात as the मिसिसिपी Summer Project ) was a campaign in the संयुक्त States शुभारम्भ in जून 1964 to attempt to पंजीकरण as अनेक अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी voters as possible in Mississippi, which था historically excluded most अश्वेतों इससे मतदान.
The project भी set up dozens of स्वतंत्रता Schools, Freedom घरों, and जातियाँ centers in छोटी कस्बों throughout मिसिसिपी to aid the local ब्लैक population.
the प्रोजेक्ट was organized by the परिषद of Federated Organizations ( COFO ), a coalition of the मिसिसिपी branches of the four major civil rights organizations ( sncc, कोर, naacp और SCLC ).
सबसे of the impetus, नेतृत्व, and financing for the Summer Project आए इससे the sncc.
रॉबर्ट parris Moses, sncc फ़ील्ड secretary और co-director of cofo, directed the summer project.
Blues is the नाम given to both a musical form and a music विधा that originated in समुदायों of primarily the `` Deep दक्षिण `` of the United States around the समाप्त of the 19th century इससे spirituals, work गीतों, फ़ील्ड hollers, shouts and chants, and rhymed सरल narrative ballads.
the blues form, ubiquitous in jazz, लय और ब्लूज़, और rock और फेंकें is characterized by विशिष्ट कॉर्ड progressions, of which the twelve-bar ब्लूज़ chord progression is the सबसे common.
the ब्लू notes कि, लिये अर्थपूर्ण purposes are सुंग or निभाई flattened or gradually bent ( minor 3rd to major 3rd ) in संबंध to the पिच of the प्रमुख scale, are also an महत्वपूर्ण part of the ध्वनि.
the ब्लूज़ genre is आधारित on the blues रूप लकिन possesses other characteristics ऐसे as विशिष्ट गीत, bass लाइनों, और instruments.
ब्लूज़ can be subdivided into several subgenres ranging from country to शहरी ब्लूज़ that were more or कम popular दौरान अलग periods of the 20th सदी.
Best known are the डेल्टा, piedmont, Jump, and Chicago ब्लूज़ styles.
संसार War II चिह्नित the transition from acoustic to electric blues and the प्रगतिशील खोलने of blues म्यूज़िक to a wider दर्शक, especially श्वेत श्रोता.
In the 1960s और 1970s, a hybrid form पुकारा blues-rock विकसित.
the term `` the blues '' refers to the `` blue devils '', अर्थ वेदना और उदासी ; an जल्दी उपयोग of the term in this sense is मिला in George colman 's one-act तमाशा ब्लू शैतानों ( 1798 ).
हालांकि the उपयोग of the phrase in African-American म्यूज़िक may be पुरानी, it has महरूम attested to चूंकि 1912, when हार्ट wand 's `` Dallas Blues `` became the first copyrighted blues संयोजन.
In lyrics the phrase is often used to describe a depressed मनोदशा.
A quarter डालर, commonly shortened to क्वार्टर, is a सिक्का लायक 1⁄4 of a United राज्य dollar or 25 सेंट.
the क्वार्टर रै महरूम उत्पादित since 1796.
the चुनाव of 25¢ as a denomination, as opposed to 20¢ which is अधिक आम in अन्य parts of the world, originated with the practice of dividing स्पेनी Milled डॉलर into आठ कील shaped खण्ड ( cf. `` टुकड़े of eight `` ).
At एक समय `` दो बिट्स ``, i.e. two wedges, each wedge an आठवीं, यूँ a क्वार्टर of the Spanish real, थी a common nickname लिये a क्वार्टर.
Day of the Dead ( ) is a Mexican holiday celebrated throughout Mexico और around the world in other संस्कृतियों.
the holiday focuses on महफिलों of परिवार and friends to pray for और remember मित्रों and परिवार सदस्यों जो have died.
It is विशेषकर मनाये in मैक्सिको, जहाँ it is a नेशनल अवकाश, and all बैंको हैं बंद.
the जश्न takes प्लेस on November 1 and 2, in कनेक्शन साथ the कैथोलिक holidays of All संतो ' Day और All Souls ' दिन.
परंपराओं connected साथ the holiday include भवन private altars honoring the मृतक using शुगर skulls, marigolds, और the favorite foods and पेय of the रजि and visiting क़ब्रों with these as उपहार.
They also छोड़ possessions of the deceased.
Scholars ट्रेस the origins of the आधुनिक मैक्सिकन holiday to स्वदेशी observances dating वापस सैंकड़ों of years and to an एज़टेक festival समर्पित to the देवी mictecacihuatl.
the अवकाश has spread throughout the world : in Brazil, dia de Finados is a public holiday कि many brazilians celebrate by visiting cemeteries and चर्च.
in Spain, वहीँ are त्यौहार and parades, and, at the समाप्त of the दिन, लोगों gather at कब्रिस्तान and दुवा for उनके dead loved ones.
समान observances occur elsewhere in Europe, and similarly themed जश्न appear in many एशियाई और African संस्कृतियों.
ANITA Mk viii.
The अनीता चिह्नित VII and ANITA चिह्नित viii calculators यहूद launched simultaneously in late 1961 as the world 's first all- electronic डेस्कटॉप calculators.
Designed और built by the घंटी Punch co.
in Britain, और marketed through its sumlock Comptometer division, वे प्रयुक्त vacuum tubes and cold-cathode switching tubes in उनके logic circuits और nixie tubes लिये उनके numerical displays.
They were the first of a series of desktop and hand-held electronic calculators कि the कम्पनी was to develop and sell under the ANITA नाम into the mid-1970s.
जार्ज वॉशिंगटन ( –, 1799 ) थी the पहला अध्यक्ष of the United States ( 1789–1797 ), the commander-in-chief of the महाद्वीपीय Army दौरान the American क्रांतिकारी War, and एक of the founding Fathers of the United States.
he presided over the सम्मेलन कि drafted the Constitution, which replaced the आलेख of कनफेडरेशन और established the स्थिति of अध्यक्ष.
Washington थी निर्वाचित President as the सर्वसम्मत चुनाव of the 69 निर्वाचक in 1788, और he served two terms in दफ्तर.
He oversaw the सृष्टि of a strong, well-financed national सरकारी that कायम neutrality in the wars raging in यूरोपीय, suppressed विद्रोह, and won acceptance among Americans of all types.
उसके leadership style established many फ़ॉर्म and rituals of government कि have been प्रयुक्त चूंकि, such as using a cabinet प्रणाली and delivering an inaugural address.
Further, the peaceful परिवर्तन from उसके presidency to the presidency of जॉन एडम्स established a परंपरा कि continues into the 21st सदी.
Washington थी hailed as `` पिता of his देश `` even during उसके lifetime.
वॉशिंगटन थी born into the प्रांतीय gentry of Colonial वर्जिनिया ; his wealthy planter परिवार owned tobacco plantations and स्लेव.
After दोनो उसके father and पुरानी brother died when he was यंग, Washington became personally और professionally संलग्न to the powerful William फेयरफैक्स, जो promoted his करियर as a surveyor और सिपाही.
Washington जल्दी became a senior अधिकारी in the colonial शक्तियां दौरान the पहला चरण of the French और भारतीय War.
Chosen by the Second Continental Congress in 1775 to be commander-in-chief of the महाद्वीपीय Army in the American क्रान्ति, Washington प्रबंधित to force the British out of Boston in 1776, but थी defeated और लगभग captured बाद that साल जब he lost New यॉर्क City.
बाद क्रासिंग the डेलावेयर River in the मुर्दे of winter, he पराजित the British in two लड़ाइयों, retook नई जर्सी and restored momentum to the Patriot कारण.
क्युकी of उसके रणनीति, क्रांतिकारी शक्तियां captured दो major अंग्रेजों armies at Saratoga in 1777 और yorktown in 1781.
इतिहासकारों laud वॉशिंगटन लिये his selection and supervision of his सेनापतियों, encouragement of morale and क्षमता to थाम साथ the army, समन्वय साथ the राज्य governors और state मिलिशिया units, relations with कॉंग्रेस और attention to supplies, लोजिस्टिक्स, and प्रशिक्षण.
in बैटल, however, Washington थी repeatedly outmaneuvered by British generals with larger armies.
बाद विजय had been finalized in 1783, Washington resigned as Commander-in-chief rather than seize शक्ति, proving उसके विपक्ष to dictatorship और उसके commitment to अमरीकी republicanism.
असंतुष्ट साथ the weaknesses of the आलेख of Confederation, in 1787 Washington presided over the संवैधानिक Convention कि drafted the United States Constitution.
निर्वाचित unanimously as the first President of the United States in 1789, he attempted to bring rival factions together to unify the स्वदेश.
he supported सिकंदर हैमिल्टन 's programs to pay बंद all state और नेशनल debt, to implement an प्रभावी tax system and to create a नेशनल bank ( despite opposition इससे थामस Jefferson ).
वॉशिंगटन proclaimed the United States neutral in the युद्धों raging in Europe बाद 1793.
He avoided युद्ध साथ Great ब्रिटेन और गारंटी a दशक of सलाम और profitable व्यापार by securing the Jay सन्धि in 1795, despite intense विपक्ष from the Jeffersonians.
Although never officially joining the federalist Party, he समर्थित इसके कार्यक्रम.
Washington 's Farewell Address was an influential प्राइमर on रिपब्लिकन virtue and a warning विरूद्ध partisanship, sectionalism, and involvement in foreign wars.
he retired इससे the प्रेसिडेंसी in 1797 और लौटे to his home, माउंट Vernon, और उसके घरेलू जीवन जहाँ he managed a किस्में of enterprises.
He freed all उसके slaves by his फाइनल होगा.
वॉशिंगटन था a दृष्टि of a ग्रेट और शक्तिशाली स्वदेश कि would be निर्मित on रिपब्लिकन लाइनों using संघीय power.
he sought to उपयोग the national government to बचाना liberty, improve अवसंरचना, open the western lands, प्रचार कॉमर्स, found a permanent capital, reduce क्षेत्रीय तनाव और प्रचार a spirit of अमरीकी राष्ट्रवाद.
At his death, वॉशिंगटन थी eulogized as `` first in युद्ध, first in peace, और first in the hearts of his countrymen '' by Henry ली.
The federalists made him the symbol of उनके party but लिये अनेक years, the jeffersonians जारी to अविश्वास उसके influence और विलम्बित building the Washington Monument.
as the नेता of the पहला कामयाब क्रान्ति विरूद्ध a औपनिवेशिक साम्राज्य in world इतिहास, वॉशिंगटन became an अंतरराष्ट्रीय icon for liberation and राष्ट्रवाद, विशेषकर in फ़्रांस और लैटिन अमेरिका.
फिस्कल Year 2012 U.S. Federal बिता – नकदी or Budget आधार.
फिस्कल साल 2012 u.S. संघीय Receipts.
The बजट of the United States Government often begins as the President 's proposal to the U.S. Congress which recommends funding स्तर for the अगला fiscal साल, beginning अक्तूबर 1.
however, Congress is the body required by विधि to pass a बजट annually और to submit the बजट passed by दोनो houses to the अध्यक्ष लिये हस्ताक्षर.
congressional निर्णय are governed by rules और विधान regarding the संघीय budget प्रक्रम.
बजट committees नियत spending हद for the House and सीनेट समितियों और लिये Appropriations subcommittees, जिससे तब स्वीकृति individual appropriations बिल्स to allocate funding to विभिन्न संघीय कार्यक्रम.
If कॉंग्रेस fails to pass an annual budget ( as has महरूम the मामला चूंकि 2009 ), a श्रेणी of Appropriations बिल्स must be passed as `` रोकें गैप '' उपायों.
बाद कॉंग्रेस approves an appropriations bill, it is sent to the President, who may चिह्न it into विधि, or may veto it ( as he would a budget when passed by the कॉंग्रेस ).
a vetoed विधेयक is sent back to कॉंग्रेस, जिससे can pass it into विधि साथ a two-thirds majority in प्रत्येक कक्ष.
कॉंग्रेस may भी combine सब or कुछ appropriations bills into an omnibus reconciliation विधेयक.
In जोड, the president may निवेदन और the Congress may pass supplemental appropriations bills or emergency supplemental appropriations बिल्स.
Several government agencies provide बजट data और analysis.
ये शामिल the सरकारी Accountability दफ्तर ( gao ), Congressional Budget Office, the Office of Management और Budget ( omb ) और the U.S. राजकोष Department.
These agencies have reported that the federal सरकारी is facing a series of महत्वपूर्ण financing चुनौतियां.
in the short-run, tax revenues have अस्वीकृत significantly due to a severe मंदी and tax policy चुनाव, while expenditures have विस्तारित लिये wars, unemployment बीमे and other safety जाल spending.
in the long-run, expenditures सम्बन्धित to healthcare programs ऐसे as Medicare और Medicaid हैं प्रक्षिप्त to grow faster than the economy overall as the जनसांख्यिकी matures.
New गिनी ( भी, टोक पिसिन : niugini, डच : nieuw Guinea, और ; historically : पापुआ ) is the संसार 's second largest द्वीप, after ग्रीनलैंड, covering a जमीन क्षेत्रफल of 786,000 km2.
स्तिथ in the southwest प्रशांत Ocean, it lies geographically to the ईस्ट of the Malay Archipelago, साथ which it is sometimes शामिल as part of a वृहद Indo-Australian द्वीपसमूह.
geologically it is a part of the वही tectonic plate as ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
जब world sea स्तर were कम, the two shared shorelines ( जिससे अभी lie 100 to 140 metres below समुद्र स्तर ), combining साथ lands अभी inundated into the tectonic continent of Sahul, भी ज्ञात as वृहद Australia.
the two landmasses became separated when the area now known as the टोरेस जलसन्धि flooded बाद the समाप्त of the पिछला glacial काल.
Anthropologically, नई गिनी is considered part of मॅलानिशिया.
Politically, the western हाफ of the द्वीप comprises दो Indonesian प्रांतों : Papua and वेस्ट पापुआ.
the पूर्वी हाफ forms the मेनलैंड of the country of Papua New Guinea.
The द्वीप रै a population of about 7.5 लाख, with a बहुत कम population घनत्व of तभी 8 inh/km2.
New Guinea is differentiated इससे इसके drier, flatter, और कम fertile दक्षिणी counterpart, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, by इसके much higher वर्षा and इसके क्रियाशील volcanic geology, साथ its उच्चतम point, Puncak jaya, reaching an उन्नयन of 4,884 m ( 16,023 ft ).
Yet the दो land masses share a similar animal fauna, साथ marsupials, including wallabies and possums, and the egg-laying monotreme, the spiny anteater, or एकिडना.
Other than bats and कुछ दो दर्जन indigenous rodent genera, there हैं no pre-human स्वदेशी placental स्तनधारियों.
सूअर, several additional प्रजाति of चूहे, और the ancestor of the नई Guinea Singing Dog यहूद introduced with human colonization.
the इंसान उपस्थिति on the island dates back at least 40,000 years to the oldest इंसान migrations out of Africa.
Research indicates कि the highlands यहूद an early और independent बीच of कृषि, with evidence of सिंचाई going वापस at तनिक 10,000 years.
Because of the समय गहराई of इसके inhabitation और इसके highly fractured लैंडस्केप, an unusually ऊँची number of languages हैं बोला on the द्वीप, with कुछ 1,000 languages ( a फिगर higher than कि of most continents ) having been catalogued out of an अनुमानित world-wide pre-columbian कुल of 6,000 इंसान dialects.
सबसे हैं वर्गीकृत as Papuan भाषाएं, a generally स्वीकृत भौगोलिक term which a अल्पसंख्यक of लेखक hold to be a genetic one.
a क्रमांक of ऑस्ट्रोनीशियाई भाषाएं हैं spoken on the coast और on offshore islands.
In the 16th सदी स्पेनी explorers खोजा the द्वीप and called it Nueva Guinea.
in हाल history western नई Guinea was included in the डच East Indies colony.
the Germans annexed the northern coast of the पूर्वी हाफ of the द्वीप as German नई Guinea in their pre–World युद्ध I effort to स्थापित themselves as a colonial power, whilst the south eastern portion थी reluctantly claimed by Britain.
following the Treaty of Versailles, the जर्मनी portion was awarded to Australia ( which was already governing the अंग्रेजों अर्जी, नामित the territory of Papua ) as a League of Nations mandate.
The eastern half of the द्वीप थी granted स्वतंत्रता from Australia as Papua नई गिनी in 1975.
the western हाफ gained independence इससे the डच in 1961, but became भाग of इंडोनेशिया जल्द afterwards in विवादास्पद हालातों.
`` the Van buren लड़कों '' is the 148th एपीसोड of the sitcom seinfeld, and name of a fictional नई यॉर्क गली गिरोह.
उनके sign is crossing the हैंड्स, with एक हाथ with सब the fingers 'up ' और स्प्रेड out.
the अन्य hand रै all लकिन the अंगूठा and pointer finger up, लिये a total of आठ ( 8 ).
The gang is नामित लिये the 8th अध्यक्ष of the United राज्य, Martin वैन buren ( जो was the पहला president इससे New यॉर्क ).
इस was the 14th एपीसोड लिये the 8th ऋतु.
it aired on February 6, 1997.
Bevo sign
Bevo थी a non-alcoholic malt पेय, or near beer, brewed in the संयुक्त राज्य by the anheuser-busch कम्पनी शुरूआत in the early 20th century.
bevo enjoyed इसके greatest कामयाबी during the time of निषेध, when beer, wine और distilled liquors, यहूद made illegal for thirteen सालो.
The Anheuser-Busch कम्पनी प्रारंभ brewing Bevo when alcoholic पेय were निषिद्ध in 1916 by the संयुक्त States armed शक्तियां.
उत्पादन rose greatly with national निषेध in 1919, और bevo थी by दूर the most popular of the many `` खाद्यान्न पेय '' or `` near beers '' of the समय.
at the शिखर of its लोकप्रियता in the जल्दी 1920s, more than five million cases of bevo यहूद sold annually.
Renard with a mug of Bevo, चित्रित in terra cotta on the interior walls of the bevo भवन, st. लुई
Labels on the bottles billed it as `` bevo the Beverage ''.
the नाम `` bevo '' was coined इससे the शब्द `` पेय '' और the स्लावी भाषा शब्द लिये बियर `` pivo '', and थी सुनाया `` bee-vo ''.
कुछ bevo advertising featured the character `` renard the फॉक्स `` ( based on the protagonist of a मध्यकालीन फ्रेंच folk-tale ), and promotional मग with this अक्षर were manufactured.
In 1930 Anheuser-Busch निर्मित a series of boat-bodied गाड़ियाँ in इसके St. Louis दुकानें पुकारा the `` Bevo नौकाएँ '' which यहूद प्रयुक्त लिये promotion.
सात हैं believed to have been built on pierce-arrow 8-cylinder chassis जबकि एक surviving example थी based upon 1930 कैडिलैक 353 v8.
Billboard advertising Bevo in Trenton, नई Jersey, 1917
A contemporary विज्ञापन पढ़ा `` कूलिंग and invigorating, Bevo the Beverage.
अनुक्रम by the case from अपना पंसारी, druggist, or dealer. ''
the पेपर लेबल on the back of the बोतल पढ़ा `` the All-Year-Round Soft Drink.
appetizing - healthful - पौष्टिक - Refreshing.
Milk or जल may contain जीवाणु.
bevo never does. ''
Bevo became part of the popular संस्कृति of the समय, और is उल्लेखित in various लोकप्रिय songs and Vaudeville skits of the era.
This led to द्वितीयक कठबोली उपयोग of the शब्द ; for उदाहरण, in American सैन्य slang a यंग and inexperienced अधिकारी थी called a `` Bevo ''.
The University of टेक्सास named its शुभंकर `` Bevo '', a name जिससे has stuck to इस day.
Irving बर्लिन शामिल a paean to the पेय, `` You Ca n't रहो Up on bevo '', in उसके 1917 army revue, Yip यिप Yaphank.
in the late 1920s smuggled बूटलेग बियर and liquor as खूब as `` homebrew ``, cut into bevo 's marketshare.
With बिक्री flattening to 100,000 cases by 1929, Anheuser-Busch रोका production.
The bevo Mill, St. लुई, in 2008
the Bevo building, साथ the Renard अक्षर prominently displayed at the किनारे, स्टिल operates as a bottling facility at their main ब्रेवरी in St. Louis, मिसौरी.

Mylanta is an over the काउंटर medication used लिये the उपचार of एसिड reflux, heartburn, और gastroesophageal reflux बीमारी ( भी ज्ञात as गर्ड ).
