a कांच of pasteurized cow मिल्क
मिल्क is a white द्रव उत्पादित by the mammary glands of स्तनधारियों.
it is the प्राथमिक source of nutrition लिये यंग mammals पहले they are able to डाइजेस्ट अन्य प्रकार of food.
Early- lactation मिल्क contains colostrum, जिससे carries the माँ 's antibodies to the baby and can reduce the risk of many रोगों in the baby.
It भी contains many other nutrients.
As an agricultural product, मिल्क is निकाली from स्तनधारियों और used as food for humans.
विश्वव्यापी, दुग्ध farms produced about 730 million टन of मिल्क in 2011.
इण्डिया is the संसार 's largest producer और उपभोक्ता of milk, yet neither निर्यात nor imports मिल्क.
नई जीलैंड, the European संघ 's 27 member राज्य, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, and the संयुक्त राज्य are the संसार 's largest निर्यातक of मिल्क और मिल्क उत्पाद.
China and Russia are the संसार 's largest importers of milk and मिल्क उत्पाद.
throughout the world, there हैं अधिक than 6 अरब उपभोक्ता of milk and milk products.
Over 750 लाख लोगों सजीव भीतर दुग्ध खेती households.
मिल्क is a कुंजी योगदानकर्ता to improving पोषण और food सुरक्षा particularly in developing countries.
Improvements in livestock and दुग्ध technology offer significant promise in reducing poverty और malnutrition in the संसार.
मोटरसाइकिल speedway, usually referred to as speedway, is a motorcycle sport involving चार और sometimes up to छह riders स्पर्धा over four anti-clockwise laps of an ओवल सर्किट.
स्पीडवे motorcycles उपयोग only एक gear and have no brakes and racing takes place on a चपटा oval track प्रायः consisting of dirt or loosely packed shale.
प्रतिस्पर्धी उपयोग this सतह to slide उनके मशीने sideways, powersliding or broadsiding into the bends.
on the straight sections of the track the motorcycles reach speeds of up.
The सटीक origins of the sport हैं unknown but there is evidence of a प्रकार of speedway racing होने practised in the यूएसए पहले the First संसार War and in Australia in the late 1910s और जल्दी 1920s.
वहीँ हैं अभी दोनो domestic और international प्रतियोगिताओं in a क्रमांक of देशों सहित the स्पीडवे संसार Cup whilst the उच्चतम overall scoring व्यक्तिगत in the स्पीडवे Grand प्रिक्स events is pronounced the संसार champion.
Speedway is popular in central और northern Europe और to a lesser extent in Australia and North अमेरिका.
a रूपांतर of track racing, स्पीडवे is administered internationally by the Fédération internationale de motocyclisme ( fim ).
Domestic speedway कार्यक्रम हैं regulated by fim संबद्ध national मोटर sport federations.
Vitamin D is a group of fat-soluble secosteroids जिम्मेदार लिये intestinal absorption of calcium and फास्फेट.
in इंसानो, the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण related compounds of vitamin D are विटामिन D2 and विटामिन d3.
Cholecalciferol ( विटामिन d3 ) और ergocalciferol ( विटामिन D2 ) are अद्वितीय as वे constitute what we जान as vitamin D and can be ingested from the आहार and/or supplements.
The body can भी synthesize विटामिन D ( इससे कोलेस्ट्रॉल ) when sun एक्सपोज़र is पर्याप्त ( hence its nickname, the `` sunshine vitamin '' ).
Although vitamin D is commonly called a vitamin, it is नहीं दरअसल an essential dietary vitamin in the सख्त sense, as it can be synthesized in पर्याप्त amounts by most mammals exposed to धूप.
( Cats and dogs can नहीं synthesize विटामिन D efficiently and must प्राप्त it in उनके आहार. )
an organic रासायनिक compound ( or related set of compounds ) is only scientifically पुकारा a विटामिन जब it can नहीं be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an सजीव, और जरूर be obtained from their आहार.
however, as with other यौगिकों commonly पुकारा vitamins, विटामिन d was discovered in an effort to find the dietary substance कि was lacking in a disease, namely, rickets, the childhood रूप of osteomalacia.
additionally, जैसे other यौगिकों called विटामिन, in the developed संसार विटामिन D is added to staple भोजन, such as milk, to avoid बीमारी due to deficiency.
उपायों of सीरम levels प्रतिबिंबित endogenous synthesis इससे एक्सपोज़र to sunlight as well as सेवन from the diet, और it is believed कि synthesis may contribute generally to the मेंटेनेंस of adequate सीरम concentrations.
The evidence indicates that the संश्लेषण of vitamin d from sun एक्सपोज़र works in a feedback loop कि prevents toxicity but, क्युकी of uncertainty about the cancer रिस्क इससे धूप, no recommendations are issued by the संस्थान of आयुर्विज्ञान, USA, for the राशि of सूर्य एक्सपोज़र required to मिलें विटामिन d requirements.
तदनुसार, the dietary Reference intakes for विटामिन D assume कि no synthesis occurs और कि सब of a व्यक्ति 's विटामिन d is from their diet, although कि will rarely occur in practice.
In the जिगर vitamin d is converted to calcidiol, जिससे is भी ज्ञात as calcifediol ( INN ), 25-hydroxycholecalciferol, or 25-hydroxyvitamin d—abbreviated 25 ( OH ) D ; and which is the विशिष्ट vitamin D metabolite कि is measured in serum to determine a व्यक्ति 's vitamin D status.
भाग of the calcidiol is converted by the kidneys to calcitriol, the biologically active form of विटामिन D. Calcitriol circulates as a हार्मोन in the blood, regulating the विशेषज्ञता of calcium and phosphate in the bloodstream and promoting the healthy growth and remodeling of अस्थि.
calcidiol is भी परिवर्तित to calcitriol outside of the गुर्दे लिये अन्य उद्देश्य, such as the proliferation, differentiation और apoptosis of कोशिकाएं ; calcitriol also affects neuromuscular function और सूजन.
परे इसके उपयोग to prevent osteomalacia or rickets, the प्रमाण for other health प्रभाव of vitamin D supplementation in the general population is inconsistent.
the best evidence of benefit is लिये अस्थि health और a घटी in mortality in बुजुर्ग महिलाओं.
The duramax is a General मोटर्स diesel engine family लिये light- और medium ड्यूटी ट्रक, designed by isuzu.
The 6.6-liter Duramax is produced by dmax, a joint venture between GM और Isuzu in Moraine, ओहियो.
This इंजन थी initially installed in 2001 model year चेवी और जीएमसी trucks and रै महरूम an विकल्प चूंकि then in pickups, vans, and medium-duty trucks.
In 2006, उत्पादन at moraine थी reportedly सीमित to लगभग 200,000 इंजन प्रति साल.

Balto ( 1919 – कूच 14, 1933 ) was a siberian हस्की sled श्वान who led उसके टोली on the फाइनल leg of the 1925 सीरम run to nome, in which डिप्थीरिया antitoxin was transported from anchorage, अलास्का, to nenana, Alaska, by ट्रैन और तब to nome by श्वान sled to कॉम्बैट an outbreak of the बीमारी.
the चलाएं is commemorated by the सालाना Iditarod Trail Sled श्वान Race.
balto was नामित बाद the Sami एक्सप्लोरर Samuel Balto.
balto died at the age of 14.

The origins of the Maxima began in जुलाई 1976 as the Datsun 810, an upscale six-cylinder संस्करण of the bluebird, and was spun into इसके अपना लकीर in 1981, having been made लगातार चूंकि तब.

Most pre-2004 maximas यहूद निर्मित in oppama, Japan, until the current उत्तर अमरीकी Maximas प्रारंभ being समवेत in smyrna, टेनेसी.

Propolis as छत्ता sealing
Propolis is a resinous mixture कि honey bees collect इससे tree कलियों, sap flows, or अन्य वनस्पति sources.
It is प्रयुक्त as a sealant for unwanted open स्पेसेस in the hive.
Propolis is प्रयुक्त लिये छोटी gaps ( approximately or less ), जबकि larger spaces are प्रायः भर साथ beeswax.
Its रंग varies depending on its botanical सोर्स, the most common being dark भूरा.
Propolis is स्टिकी at और ऊपर रूम तापमान,.
at lower temperatures, it becomes मुश्किल और very भंगुर.
Steven Tyler ( born Steven Victor tallarico ; कूच 26, 1948 ) is an अमरीकी सिंगर, songwriter, और multi-instrumentalist, बेहतरीन known as the frontman और सीसे सिंगर of the Boston -based चट्टान band Aerosmith, in जिससे he भी plays the हार्मोनिका, and occasional पियानो and percussion.
He is known as the `` Demon of screamin ' '' due to उसके high screams and उसके चौड़ी गायन दायरा.
he is also ज्ञात for उसके on-stage acrobatics.
दौरान his high-energy performances, he प्रायः dresses in उज्जवल, रंगीन outfits with his ट्रेडमार्क स्कार्फ hanging from his microphone स्टैंड.
in the 1970s, टायलर रोज़ to prominence as the frontman of Aerosmith, जिससे released such milestone hard चट्टान एल्बम as खिलौने in the Attic and रॉक्स.
in the लेट 1970s और जल्दी 1980s, Tyler had a heavy ड्रग and alcohol addiction, and the band 's लोकप्रियता waned.
He completed drug पुनर्वास in 1986 and subsequently maintained गम्भीरता for over 20 सालो, but had a पतन with नुस्खा painkillers in the late 2000s, for जिससे he successfully प्राप्त उपचार in 2009.
बाद एरोस्मिथ शुभारम्भ a उल्लेखनीय वापसी in the late 1980s and early 1990s with the एल्बम स्थाई अवकाश, पंप, और Get a Grip, टायलर became a household name and रै remained a relevant चट्टान प्रतीक.
As a परिणाम, he रै चूंकि embarked on अनेक solo endeavors सहित guest दिखावे on अन्य कलाकारों ' म्यूज़िक, फिल्मी and TV भूमिकाएँ ( सहित as a judge on American Idol ), authoring a bestselling किताब, और solo work ( including a शीर्ष 40 hit सिंगल in 2011 ).
however, he has continued to record म्यूज़िक and perform साथ एरोस्मिथ, बाद more than 43 सालो in the बैंड.
the बैंड 's नवीनतम एल्बम, म्यूज़िक इससे Another Dimension !
, was released on नवम्बर 6, 2012.
टायलर is included among Rolling पत्थरों 100 Greatest गायकों.
he थी भी क्रमित 3rd on Hit parader 's शीर्ष 100 मेटल vocalists of सब Time.
In 2001 he थी inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of कीर्ति with Aerosmith, and he थी the प्रस्तुतकर्ता when AC/DC was inducted into the हॉल of Fame in 2003.
In 2013, टायलर and उसके songwriting partner Joe पेरी होगा be प्राप्तकर्ता of the ASCAP संस्थापकों पुरस्कार और will also be inducted into the songwriters Hall of कीर्ति.
The liver produces urea in the urea cycle as a बर्बाद उत्पाद of the पाचन of प्रोटीन.
Normal human वयस्क blood should contain between 7 to 21 mg of यूरिया nitrogen per 100 ml ( 7–21 mg/ dl ) of रक्त.
Individual laboratories may have different सन्दर्भ ranges, and this is क्युकी the procedure may vary.
Wayne Fontes ( born February 2, 1940 ) is a पूर्व American football coach और college and पेशेवर football player जो was the सिर coach of the NFL 's डेट्रॉयट शेर इससे 1988 to 1996.
His 67 विन्स और 71 losses are each the सबसे for a सिर कोच in team history.
the यहूदियों ( ISO 259-3 israeli pronunciation ), also known as the यहूदी लोगों, हैं a nation and an ethnoreligious group, originating in the Israelites or Hebrews of the Ancient निकट ईस्ट.
The Jewish नस्ल, nationality, and religion are strongly interrelated, as judaism is the traditional आस्था of the यहूदी nation.
Converts to Judaism, जिनकी औकात as यहूदियों within the यहूदी ethnos is बराबर to those born into it, have महरूम absorbed into the यहूदी people throughout the सहस्राब्दियों.
In यहूदी परंपरा, Jewish ancestry is traced to the Biblical patriarchs अब्राहम, Isaac and याक़ूब in the दूसरी millennium bce.
The modern State of इसराईल थी established as a यहूदी nation-state, और defines itself as such in इसके Basic Laws.
इसके विधि of वापसी grants the right of citizenship to any Jew जो requests it.
Israel is the तभी country जहाँ Jews हैं a majority of the जनसांख्यिकी.
यहूदियों also enjoyed political स्वायत्तता twice before in प्राचीन इतिहास.
the पहला of ये अवधि lasted इससे 1350 to 586 bce, और encompassed the अवधि of the Judges, the संयुक्त Monarchy, और the Divided Monarchy of the Kingdoms of Israel और यहूदा, समाप्ति साथ the विनाश of the First टेम्पल.
The दूसरी was the period of the Hasmonean Kingdom spanning from 140 to 37 BCE.
चूंकि the विनाश of the First टेम्पल, most यहूदियों have जिया in diaspora.
A minority in प्रत्येक देश in जिससे they सजीव ( मगर इसराईल ), वे have अक्सर अनुभवी persecution throughout इतिहास, resulting in a population that रै fluctuated दोनो in numbers and distribution over the सदियां.
the संसार Jewish जनसांख्यिकी पहुँचे a शिखर of 15 लाख prior to the दूसरी World War, लकिन six million Jews यहूद मारे in the holocaust.
Since तब the population has risen again and, थी अनुमानित at 13.4 लाख by the उत्तर अमरीकी यहूदी आंकड़ा बैंको, or less than 0.2 % of the total संसार जनसांख्यिकी ( roughly एक in every 514 people ).
According to this report, about 42.5 % of सब यहूदियों reside in इसराईल ( 5.7 million ), और 39.3 % in the United States ( 5.3 लाख ), with सबसे of the शेष living in यूरोपीय ( 1.5 लाख ) and Canada ( 0.4 million ).
ये संख्याएँ शामिल सब those जो consider themselves यहूदियों, whether or not they हैं संबद्ध with a Jewish organization.
the total संसार Jewish population, however, is difficult to measure.
In addition to मुद्दे with census methodology, वहीँ हैं halakhic विवादों regarding जो is a Jew और धर्मनिरपेक्ष, राजनैतिक, और ancestral identification कारकों कि may affect the फिगर considerably.
Corpus christi बारात.
आयल on कैनवास by Carl एमिल doepler.
कॉर्पस domini redirects here.
लिये other उपयोग देखिए Corpus Domini ( बहुविकल्पी )
The feast of कॉर्पस christi ( लैटिन लिये देह of मसीह ), भी ज्ञात as Corpus Domini, is a लैटिन Rite liturgical solemnity celebrating the परंपरा and belief in the देह and blood of Jesus मसीह and his रियल Presence in the Eucharist.
It emphasizes the आनन्द of the institution of the eucharist, जिससे थी observed on Holy Thursday in the somber atmosphere of the nearness of शुभ शुक्रवार.
in the present रोमन missal, the feast is designated the solemnity of The Most Holy देह और Blood of मसीह.
it is भी celebrated in कुछ Anglican, लूथरन, and Old Catholic चर्च that थाम समान beliefs regarding the Real उपस्थिति.
the feast is liturgically celebrated on the Thursday after Trinity संडे or, `` where the Solemnity of the सबसे Holy Body and Blood of Christ is नहीं a Holy दिन of Obligation, it is आबंटित to the Sunday after the सबसे पावन ट्रिनिटी as its proper दिन ''.
at the end of पावन द्रव्यमान, there is often a बारात of the धन्य sacrament, generally प्रदर्शित in a monstrance.
the बारात is followed by सुनाकर of the धन्य sacrament.
A notable Eucharistic बारात is that presided over by the Pope प्रत्येक साल in रोम, where it begins at the archbasilica of St. John lateran and makes इसके way to the Basilica of संत Mary Major, जहाँ it concludes साथ सुनाकर.
C-reactive प्रोटीन ( CRP ) is a प्रोटीन found in the रक्त, the स्तर of which rise in जवाब to inflammation ( i.e. c-reactive protein is an acute-phase protein ).
Its physiological भूमिका is to bind to phosphocholine expressed on the सतह of मुर्दे or dying cells ( और some types of bacteria ) in अनुक्रम to activate the पूरक प्रणाली via the C1Q complex.
सीआरपी is synthesized by the जिगर in response to कारकों released by macrophages and मोटे कोशिकाएं ( adipocytes ).
it is a सदस्य of the pentraxin family of proteins.
It is नहीं सम्बन्धित to c-peptide or protein c.
c-reactive protein थी the पहला पैटर्न मान्यता receptor ( prr ) to be identified.
the start of the systematic European colonization of the americas is typically dated to 1492, when a स्पेनी expedition headed by Christopher कोलंबस sailed लिये India to open trade but inadvertently खोजा the americas.
European conquest, large-scale exploration and colonization जल्द followed.
देखकर that यूरोपीय was preoccupied with many internal युद्धों और थी धीरे recovering इससे the many मौतों that the bubonic प्लेग caused, the rapid expansion at जिससे it grew in wealth और power was unforeseeable in the जल्दी 1400s.
the पहला expeditions occurred साथ the caribbean coasts on the आइलैंड्स of हिस्पानिओला, Puerto रीको and Cuba, and after 1500 extended into the इंटीरियर्स of दोनो North और दक्षिण अमेरिका.
In 1497, sailing इससे the उत्तर on behalf of इंग्लैण्ड, John cabot landed on the उत्तर अमरीकी coast, और a year later, कोलंबस 's तीसरा voyage reached the दक्षिण अमरीकी coast.
फ़्रांस founded colonies in much of पूर्वी North अमेरिका, on a number of Caribbean आइलैंड्स, and in South अमेरिका.
Portugal colonized ब्राज़ील.
आखिरकार, the संपूर्ण Western Hemisphere came अंतर्गत the कंट्रोल of European सरकारें, अग्रणी to profound परिवर्तन to इसके landscape, जनसांख्यिकी, और संयंत्र and animal जीवन.
in the 19th सदी alone over 50 लाख लोगों left यूरोपीय for the americas.
the post-1492 era is known as the काल of the Columbian एक्सचेंज.
Keith रिचर्ड्स ( born 18 December 1943 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी संगीतकार, singer-songwriter और संस्थापक member of the अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान band the Rolling पत्थरों.
Rolling स्टोन पत्रिका कहा Richards had निर्मित `` rock 's महानतम single body of riffs '', रैंकिंग उसे 4th on इसके सूची of 100 best guitarists.
Fourteen गीतों Richards wrote साथ the Rolling पत्थरों ' सीसे vocalist Mick Jagger हैं listed among रोलिंग Stone magazine 's `` 500 महानतम गीतों of All समय ``.
Richards ' notoriety for अवैध drug उपयोग stems in भाग from several ड्रग busts during the late 1960s and 1970s and his candour regarding his व्यसन to और eventual abstinence इससे हेरोइन.
Testosterone is a स्टेरॉयड hormone इससे the androgen group और is मिला in स्तनधारियों, reptiles, पक्षियों, और अन्य vertebrates.
In mammals, टेस्टोस्टेरोन is primarily स्रावित in the अंडकोष of males और the अंडाशय of females, हालांकि small amounts हैं भी स्रावित by the अधिवृक्क glands.
It is the principal पुरूष sex hormone और an anabolic स्टेरॉयड.
In मेन, testosterone plays a कुंजी भूमिका in the विकास of पुरूष reproductive ऊतकों such as the testis और prostate as खूब as promoting द्वितीयक sexual विशेषताएँ ऐसे as increased muscle, अस्थि द्रव्यमान, and the विकास of body बाल.
in जोड, टेस्टोस्टेरोन is essential for health और well-being as well as the रोकथाम of ऑस्टियोपोरोसिस.
on औसत, in वयस्क human males, the प्लाज्मा विशेषज्ञता of टेस्टोस्टेरोन is परिचय 7–8 times as great as the विशेषज्ञता in वयस्क human females ' plasma, लकिन as the metabolic खपत of testosterone in males is greater, the रोज़ उत्पादन is about 20 times वृहद in men.
महिलाओं भी हैं अधिक संवेदनशील to the hormone.
Testosterone is observed in most vertebrates.
Fish make a थोड़ा अलग रूप पुकारा 11-ketotestosterone.
Its बंटवारा in कीट is ecdysone.
These सर्वव्यापी steroids सुझाएँ that sex hormones have an ancient विकासवादी इतिहास.
Cluster sampling is a sampling technique प्रयुक्त जब `` प्राकृतिक '' but relatively homogeneous groupings हैं evident in a सांख्यिकीय जनसांख्यिकी.
It is often used in marketing शोध.
In this तकनीक, the total जनसांख्यिकी is divided into these groups ( or clusters ) और a सरल यादृच्छिक sample of the groups is selected.
Then the जरूरी सूचना is collected from a simple random sample of the elements भीतर each selected समूह.
This may be done for every element in ये groups or a subsample of तत्व may be selected within each of these समूह.
a आम प्रेरणा for cluster sampling is to reduce the कुल number of interviews and लागत given the desired सटीकता.
assuming a fixed नमूना size, the तकनीक देता more सटीक परिणाम when सबसे of the variation in the population is भीतर the groups, नहीं between them.
Jamestown is a town in guilford County, North कैरोलिना, United राज्य, and is a उपनगरीय of the आसपास शहरों of Greensboro and High पाइंट.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 3,382 at the 2010 census.
नताली Portman ( born Natalie hershlag ; ; June 9, 1981 ) is an अभिनेत्री and मॉडल with डुअल अमरीकी और Israeli citizenship.
उसके first role was as an orphan taken in by a हिटमैन in the 1994 कार्रवाई film, लकिन मुख्यधारा success came जब she was cast as padmé amidala in the Star युद्धों prequel त्रयी ( released in 1999, 2002 and 2005 ).
In 1999, वो enrolled at Harvard University to study मनोविज्ञान जबकि स्टिल working as an actress.
वो completed उसके स्नातक 's degree in 2003.
in 2001, पोर्टमैन opened in New यॉर्क नगर 's पब्लिक थिएटर उत्पादन of Anton चेखव 's The Seagull.
in 2005, पोर्टमैन received a नामांकन for the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये Best Supporting अभिनेत्री और won the सुनहरी ग्लोब Award for Best supporting अभिनेत्री - गति Picture for the नाटक Closer.
She won a Constellation Award लिये बेहतरीन Female Performance और a Saturn Award for Best अभिनेत्री लिये उसके starring role in V for Vendetta ( 2006 ).
She निभाई leading भूमिकाएँ in the historical dramas गोया 's भूत ( 2006 ) and The अन्य Boleyn Girl ( 2008 ).
In May 2008, she served as the youngest member of the 61st सालाना Cannes फिल्मी Festival jury.
पोर्टमैन 's directorial debut, Eve, opened the 65th Venice International फिल्मी Festival 's shorts प्रतियोगिता in 2008.
Portman निर्देशित a segment of the collective film नई यॉर्क, i प्रेम तुम.
in 2011, Portman जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार, the Golden ग्लोब Award, the bafta पुरस्कार, the स्क्रीन Actors Guild पुरस्कार, और the Independent Spirit पुरस्कार for उसके lead performance as नीना sayers in ब्लैक Swan.
तांबे is a रासायनिक तत्व with the प्रतीक cu ( इससे ) and atomic number 29.
it is a ductile metal with very ऊँची thermal and विद्युत conductivity.
pure तांबे is soft और malleable ; a freshly exposed surface रै a reddish-orange रंग.
it is used as a कंडक्टर of heat and विद्युत, a भवन सामग्री, and a constituent of various metal alloys.
The मेटल और its alloys have been used लिये हज़ारों of years.
in the Roman era, copper थी principally mined on साइप्रस, hence the origin of the नाम of the मेटल as сyprium ( मेटल of Cyprus ), later shortened to сuprum.
Its यौगिकों are commonly encountered as copper ( ii ) लवण, जिससे often impart ब्लू or ग्रीन colors to minerals such as azurite और turquoise and have महरूम widely प्रयुक्त historically as pigments.
Architectural structures built with तांबे corrode to दे ग्रीन verdigris ( or patina ).
सजावटी art prominently सुविधाएँ copper, both by itself and as भाग of pigments.
तांबे is अनिवार्य to all जीना जीवों as a trace dietary खनिज क्युकी it is a key constituent of the respiratory एंजाइम complex cytochrome c oxidase.
in molluscs and crustacea copper is a constituent of the blood pigment hemocyanin, जिससे is replaced by the iron-complexed हीमोग्लोबिन in मछली और अन्य vertebrates.
the main areas जहाँ copper is मिला in vertebrates are जिगर, muscle और bone.
in sufficient concentration, तांबे यौगिकों हैं जहरीला to उच्चतर जीवों and are used as bacteriostatic substances, fungicides, and wood preservatives.
The major professional sports leagues, or बस प्रमुख लीग, in the United States and Canada हैं the highest professional प्रतियोगिताओं of टोली sports in the two countries.
हालांकि व्यक्तिगत खेल ऐसे as golf, टेनिस, और auto racing are also very popular, the पद is usually limited to team sports.
The पद `` major लीग '' was पहला प्रयुक्त in 1921 in सन्दर्भ to Major League Baseball ( एमएलबी ), the top level of पेशेवर American baseball.
Today, the major northern उत्तर America पेशेवर team खेल लीग are प्रमुख लीग Baseball ( एमएलबी ), the National Basketball Association ( एनबीए ), the नेशनल Football League ( एनएफएल ), and the नेशनल Hockey League ( एनएचएल ).
अन्य notable leagues शामिल प्रमुख लीग Soccer ( MLS ), the कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल League ( cfl ), the Arena Football League, प्रमुख League lacrosse, the National lacrosse League and the Women 's National बास्केट संघ.
the NFL, MLB, NBA, and NHL हैं commonly referred to as the Big चार.
Each of ये is the richest पेशेवर club competition in इसके खेल worldwide.
The best players can become cultural icons in दोनो देशों and elsewhere in the संसार, because the leagues आनंद a significant प्लेस in popular culture in the US और कनाडा.
The एनएफएल has 32 teams, और the others have 30 each.
the विशाल majority of major लीग टीमों हैं concentrated in the most populous metropolitan क्षेत्रों of the United States.
Baseball, football, हॉकी, और सॉकर have था पेशेवर लीग लिये over 100 सालो ; early leagues such as the National Association, Ohio लीग, and National Hockey संघ formed the basis of the modern एमएलबी, एनएफएल and एनएचएल क्रमशः.
सॉकर थी first professionalized in 1894, but लीग suffered greatly इससे lack of स्थिरता and seldom lasted अधिक than a decade.
Soccer 's greatest सफलताओं were in the रूप of the अमरीकी Soccer लीग ( 1921-1933 ), the असली North अमरीकी Soccer League ( 1968-1984 ), the नेशनल पेशेवर Soccer League ( 1984-2001 ) और, फिलहाल, Major लीग सॉकर ( 1996-present ).
बास्केट is a अपेक्षाकृत नई development ; the एनबीए विकसित इससे the नेशनल बास्केट League and इसके splinter group the Basketball संघ of America, taking on इसके current form in 1949.
प्रत्येक major league averages 15,000 fans in attendance प्रति game or higher as of 2011.
Meridian Altitude is an खगोलीय नेविगेशन method of calculating an निरीक्षक 's अक्षांश.
अर्जित value प्रबन्धन ( EVM ), or अर्जित मान project/performance management ( EVPM ) is a प्रोजेक्ट प्रबन्धन technique for measuring project performance और progress in an उद्देश्य manner.
क्युकी evm has the क्षमता to combine माप of :
scope
schedule
and cost,
in a सिंगल integrated प्रणाली, अर्जित मान Management is able to provide सटीक forecasts of project प्रदर्शन समस्याएं, which is an important योगदान for प्रोजेक्ट प्रबन्धन.
जल्दी evm शोध showed कि the areas of नियोजन और कंट्रोल हैं significantly impacted by इसके उपयोग ; और similarly, using the methodology improves दोनो पैमाना परिभाषा as well as the analysis of overall प्रोजेक्ट प्रदर्शन.
More recent research अध्ययन have दिखाया कि the सिद्धान्त of evm हैं positive predictors of project success.
Popularity of EVM रै grown significantly in हाल सालो beyond सरकारी contracting, in which सेक्टर its importance continues to वृद्धि ( e.g., हाल new dfar rules ), in भाग क्युकी EVM can also सतह in और help substantiate contract disputes.

Spring is one of the चार conventional temperate सीज़न, following शीत और preceding गर्मियाँ.
वहीँ हैं विभिन्न technical परिभाषाएं of spring, लकिन local usage of the पद varies according to local climate, संस्कृतियों and customs.
जब it is spring in the northern गोलार्ध, it will be पतझड़ in the दक्षिणी hemisphere.
at the spring equinox, days are close to 12 घंटों long साथ दिन length increasing as the season progresses.
Spring and `` springtime '' refer to the season, और also to ideas of rebirth, कायाकल्प, नवीकरण, क़यामत, और regrowth, with festivals such as कार्निवल, ईस्टर and Holi होने celebrated at this समय.
jamestown थी a settlement in the उपनिवेश of Virginia, the पहला permanent अंग्रेज़ी settlement in the americas.
Established by the Virginia कम्पनी of London as `` जेम्स फोर्ट '' on may 14, 1607 ( O.S., May 24, 1607 N.S. ), it followed अनेक earlier failed कोशिशें, including the खोया उपनिवेश of Roanoke.
jamestown परोसा as the पूंजी of the colony for 83 सालो, इससे 1616 जबतक 1699.
The उपनिवेश was स्तिथ भीतर the territory of a political एंटिटी ज्ञात as tsenacommacah, the state of the powhatan Confederacy, साथ around 14,000 देशी inhabitants, and specifically was in भाग of the subdivision known as the paspahegh जनजाति.
The natives initially सत्कार the colonists with नाचना, feasting and तम्बाकू ceremonies, और वे provided निर्णायक provisions and support लिये the survival of the colonists, who यहूद नहीं agriculturally inclined, हालांकि relations साथ the newcomers भी soured fairly जल्दी on, leading to the total annihilation of the Paspahegh in warfare within 3 years.
भीतर a साल of Jamestown 's founding, the Virginia कम्पनी brought पॉलिश और डच colonists to help improve the उपनिवेश.
in 1619, the पहला प्रलेखित Africans were brought to Jamestown, हालांकि the modern धारणा of slavery in the भविष्य United राज्य did नहीं शुरू in Virginia until 1660.
When the उपनिवेश थी subdivided into the असली eight shires of Virginia in 1634, the कस्बा became स्तिथ in the eponymous जेम्स City Shire.
the London Company 's दूसरी settlement, बरमूडा, दावा to be the साईट of the oldest कस्बा in the अंग्रेज़ी नई World, as st. जार्ज 's, Bermuda was officially established ( as New लंदन ) in 1612, whereas James फोर्ट, in Virginia, was नहीं to be परिवर्तित into James towne until 1619, and further किया नहीं survive into the present दिन.
in 1699, the capital was relocated इससे Jamestown to what is today Williamsburg, after which Jamestown ceased to मौजूद as a settlement, existing today तभी as an archaeological साईट.
Today, Jamestown is एक of तीन स्थितियाँ comprising the Historic Triangle of औपनिवेशिक वर्जिनिया, साथ साथ Williamsburg and yorktown, with दो primary heritage साइट.
ऐतिहासिक Jamestowne, the archaeological साईट on jamestown Island, is a cooperative प्रयत्न by Jamestown National ऐतिहासिक साईट ( part of औपनिवेशिक National ऐतिहासिक Park ), और Preservation Virginia.
The jamestown उपनिवेश, a living इतिहास interpretive साईट, is संचालित by the jamestown yorktown न्यास in संयोजन साथ the राष्ट्रमंडल of वर्जिनिया.
जेम्स Christopher फ्रे ( born सितंबर 12, 1969 ) is an अमरीकी लेखक.
His books A Million Little Pieces ( 2003 ) और My dost लियोनार्ड ( 2005 ), as खूब as Bright Shiny morning ( 2008 ), यहूद bestsellers.
he थी the विषय of a scandal when जांचकर्ताओं discovered that prison समय and the extent of निश्चित चोटों were अतिरंजित in a Million छोटी टुकड़े, a purportedly autobiographical खाता of the लेखक 's संघर्ष साथ addiction.
Deere & Company, सबसे commonly known by its name John deere, is an अमरीकी corporation आधारित in moline, Illinois, and one of the largest manufacturers of agricultural machinery in the संसार.
in 2012, it थी सूचीबद्ध as 97th in the सौभाग्य 500 America 's ranking and 190th in the Fortune 500 वैश्विक रैंकिंग.
Deere और कम्पनी agricultural products, sold अंतर्गत the John deere नाम, शामिल tractors, combine harvesters, cotton harvesters, balers, planters / seeders, sprayers, और utvs.
the कम्पनी is also a निर्माता of construction equipment और forestry equipment, as well as a प्रदायक of डीज़ल engines और drivetrains ( axles, ट्रांसमिशन, gearboxes ) प्रयुक्त in heavy उपकरण.
additionally, John Deere manufactures equipment used in lawn, grounds, और turf परवाह, such as walk-behind lawn mowers, zero-turn लॉन mowers, lawn tractors, और snowthrowers.
to support the कोर businesses, जॉन Deere भी provides financial सेवाएं and other related क्रियाएँ.
the company 's स्लोगन is `` nothing रनों जैसे a Deere '' and has a picture of a leaping हिरण as a लोगो, a शब्द खेल pun on `` nothing runs जैसे a हिरण ''.
Carl westby coined the phrase `` nothing रनों Like a Deere '' for a marketing अभियान to बेचें snowmobiles.
the कम्पनी 's products हैं also identifiable by इसके distinctive shade of ग्रीन paint, usually augmented by पीला trim.
The United States ten-dollar bill ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of United राज्य करेंसी.
The first U.S. सचिव of the राजकोष ( 1789–95 ), सिकंदर हैमिल्टन, is फिलहाल प्रदर्शित on the obverse of the विधेयक, जबकि the u.S. Treasury भवन is featured on the रिवर्स.
( हैमिल्टन is one of two non-presidents featured on currently issued u.S. bills.
The other is बेंजामिन Franklin, on the $ 100 bill.
Hamilton is एक of तभी four लोगों प्रदर्शित on U.S. paper currency ( 1861 to the present ) who was नहीं born in the महाद्वीपीय संयुक्त States, as he थी इससे the West इंडीज.
the others are : Albert gallatin, स्विट्ज़रलैंड ( $ 500 1862/63 विधिक Tender ) ; George Meade, स्पेन ( $ 1,000 1890/91 राजकोष Note ) ; और रॉबर्ट मॉरिस, England ( $ 1,000 1862/63 विधिक Tender ; $ 10 1878/80 चांदी प्रमाणपत्र ).
In addition, Kamehameha i, appears on the 2008 हवाई राज्य quarter. )
सब $ 10 bills जारी today are संघीय आरक्षित टीप.
The Bureau of Engraving and मुद्रण says the औसत life of a $ 10 विधेयक in circulation is 18 months पहले it is replaced due to पहनें.
Approximately 6 % of सब us banknotes मुद्रित in 2009 were $ 10 bills.
Ten dollar bills are वितरित by संघीय आरक्षित बैंको in yellow straps.
The source of the face on the $ 10 विधेयक is जॉन Trumbull ’s 1805 पोर्ट्रेट of हैमिल्टन that belongs to the पोर्ट्रेट collection of New York City Hall.
The $ 10 विधेयक is the only u.S. paper currency in परिसंचरण in which the पोर्ट्रेट faces to the left ( the $ 100,000 bill प्रदर्शित a पोर्ट्रेट of Woodrow विल्सन facing to the left, लकिन was used तभी for intra-government ट्रांजेक्शन ).
एंडी सैमुएल Griffith ( June 1, 1926 – July 3, 2012 ) was an American कर्ता, टेलीविज़न producer, Grammy पुरस्कार -winning southern-gospel singer, और writer.
He was a टोनी पुरस्कार nominee लिये two roles, और gained prominence in the अभिनीत भूमिका in निदेशक Elia कज़न 's फिल्मी A Face in the Crowd ( 1957 ) before he became better ज्ञात for his television roles, playing the सीसे वर्ण in the 1960–1968 हालात comedy The Andy ग्रिफ़िथ दिखाएँ और in the 1986–1995 legal नाटक Matlock.
Theresa पेनेलोप `` terri '' इरविन, ( née Raines ; born July 20, 1964 ) is an ऑस्ट्रेलियाई -based, अमरीकी -born naturalist, author, the widow of ऑस्ट्रेलियाई naturalist Steve Irwin और मालिक of Australia Zoo at Beerwah, क्वींसलैंड, ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
वो co-starred साथ उसके husband on The Crocodile Hunter, उनके unconventional टेलीविज़न प्रकृति वृत्तचित्र श्रेणी साथ with इसके spin-off series, Croc Files and The Crocodile Hunter Diaries.
She has lived in ऑस्ट्रेलिया चूंकि 1992, when वो married Steve Irwin.
andreas cellarius 's उदाहरण of the Copernican प्रणाली, इससे the harmonia Macrocosmica ( 1660 ).
Heliocentrism, or heliocentricism, is the astronomical model in जिससे the धरती और planets revolve around a relatively stationary सूर्य at the बीच of the सौर System.
the word आता from the Greek ( helios `` sun '' और kentron `` बीच '' ).
Historically, heliocentrism थी opposed to geocentrism, which placed the धरती at the center.
The notion that the Earth revolves around the सूर्य had महरूम proposed as जल्दी as the 3rd century BC by aristarchus of samos, but Aristarchus 's heliocentrism attracted little attention जबतक कोपरनिकस revived and elaborated it.
लुसियो Russo, however, argues कि इस is a भ्रामक छाप resulting from the loss of scientific works of the hellenistic Era.
Using अप्रत्यक्ष प्रमाण he argues that a heliocentric दृश्य थी expounded in Hipparchus 's work on गम्भीरता.
it was नहीं जबतक the 16th century that a fully predictive गणितीय मॉडल of a heliocentric प्रणाली was प्रस्तुत, by the पुनर्जागरण गणितज्ञ, astronomer, and कैथोलिक मौलवी Nicolaus कोपरनिकस of Poland, leading to the copernican Revolution.
In the following century, योहानेस कॅप्लर elaborated upon और विस्तारित this model to include elliptical orbits, और supporting observations बना using a telescope were प्रस्तुत by Galileo Galilei.
With the observations of विलियम Herschel, फ्रेडरिक bessel, और अन्य, खगोलशास्त्रियों एहसास that the सूर्य was नहीं the बीच of the universe और by the 1920s एडविन Hubble had shown कि it थी भाग of a आकाशगंगा ( the Milky रास्ता ) कि was only एक of many अरबों.
नोराह जोन्स ( born geetali Norah जोन्स Shankar ; कूच 30, 1979 ) is an American singer-songwriter, pianist, and actress.
She is the daughter of भारतीय sitar खिलाड़ी Ravi शंकर और Sue जोन्स.
वो is also Anoushka शंकर 's half-sister.
In 2002, वो शुभारम्भ her solo music करियर with the रिलीज of the commercially successful और critically acclaimed album Come Away साथ Me, a संलयन of देश music और पॉप साथ तत्व of जैज़ जिससे थी certified डायमंड एल्बम, selling over 26 million copies.
the रिकार्ड अर्जित जोन्स पाँच Grammy Awards, सहित the एल्बम of the Year, Record of the साल, और Best नई कलाकार.
उसके subsequent स्टुडियो एल्बम, feels जैसे घर, released in 2004, Not Too लेट, released in 2007, the same साल वो made her फिल्मी debut in My Blueberry Nights, and her 2009 release The Fall all gained प्लेटिनम status, selling over a million नक़ल और were generally खूब received by critics.
जोन्स ' पांचवां स्टुडियो album, Little Broken Hearts, was released on अप्रैल 27, 2012.
जोन्स has won नौ ग्रैमी पुरस्कार और was 60th on Billboard पत्रिका 's कलाकारों of the 2000–2009 दशक chart.
Throughout उसके career, Jones has won numerous awards and रै sold more than 50 million एल्बम विश्वव्यापी.
बिलबोर्ड नामित उसके the top jazz कलाकार of the 2000–2009 decade.

लिये other उपयोग, देखिए Dimension ( disambiguation ).
इससे left to right, the square, the cube, and the tesseract.
The वर्गाकार is bounded by 1-dimensional lines, the cube by 2-dimensional areas, and the tesseract by 3-dimensional आयतन.
a प्रक्षेप of the घन is दिए since it is viewed on a two-dimensional screen.
The same applies to the tesseract, जिससे additionally can तभी be shown as a projection even in three-dimensional space.
A diagram प्रर्दशित the first four spatial आयाम.
In physics और mathematics, the dimension of a स्पेस or ऑब्जेक्ट is informally defined as the minimum number of coordinates needed to बताएँ कोई point भीतर it.
Thus a line रै a dimension of one क्युकी only एक निर्देशांक is needed to specify a पाइंट on it ( लिये उदाहरण, the पाइंट at 5 on a number लकीर ).
a सतह ऐसे as a प्लेन or the surface of a cylinder or गोला has a dimension of two क्युकी दो निर्देशांक are needed to specify a point on it ( लिये उदाहरण, to locate a point on the सतह of a sphere you need दोनो इसके अक्षांश and its longitude ).
the अंदर of a घन, a cylinder or a गोला is three-dimensional क्युकी three coordinates are needed to locate a point भीतर ये spaces.
In शारीरिक terms, dimension refers to the constituent ढांचा of सब स्पेस ( आवाज़ ) और its स्थिति in time ( perceived as a अदिश आयाम साथ the t-axis ), as well as the spatial constitution of objects within—structures कि correlate with both particle and फ़ील्ड conceptions, interact according to relative properties of द्रव्यमान —and हैं fundamentally mathematical in वर्णन.
These, or other अक्ष, may be संदर्भित to uniquely पहचानो a पाइंट or structure in its attitude और relationship to अन्य objects and आवृत्ति.
Physical theories that चरितार्थ time, ऐसे as general आपेक्षिकता, हैं said to work in 4-dimensional `` spacetime ``, ( पारिभाषित as a मिन्कोवस्की स्पेस ).
Modern theories tend to be `` higher-dimensional '' सहित quantum फ़ील्ड and string theories.
The state-space of क्वांटम mechanics is an infinite-dimensional फलन स्पेस.
The अवधारणा of dimension is not प्रतिबंधित to physical objects.
high-dimensional स्पेसेस occur in mathematics और the sciences लिये many reasons, frequently as विन्यास spaces such as in लाग्रांजीय or हेमिल्टोनीय यांत्रिकी ; these हैं abstract spaces, independent of the physical स्पेस we सजीव in.
fontana ( ) is a city of 200,762 residents in सैन bernardino काउंटी, California.
Founded in 1913, it remained essentially rural until World War II, when entrepreneur हेनरी J. कैसर निर्मित a large steel मिल in the क्षेत्रफल.
It is now a क्षेत्रीय hub of the trucking उद्योग, with Interstate 10 और State रूट 210 transecting the नगर from east to वेस्ट, और Interstate 15 गुजर diagonally through its northwestern quadrant.
It is घर to the largest of the सैन Bernardino काउंटी system पुस्तकालयों, a renovated historic थिएटर, a municipal पार्क, और the स्वचालित क्लबों स्पीडवे on the साईट of the कैसर स्टील Mill.
fontana also hosts the Fontana Days Half मैराथन और 5K चलाएं.
इस race is the तीव्रतम half-marathon कोर्स in the संसार.
The U.S. 2012 Census reported कि fontana 's जनसांख्यिकी थी 200,762 in 2012, making it the second most populous नगर in सैन Bernardino county county and 14th in the राज्य.
cowboys स्टेडियम is a स्टेडियम with a retractable छत in आर्लिंगटन, Texas.
it serves as the home of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग 's Dallas Cowboys.
It replaced the partially covered Texas Stadium, जिससे खोली in 1971, और served as the Cowboys ' घर through the 2008 season.
it was completed on May 27, 2009.
the stadium seats 85,000, बनाना it the third largest stadium in the एनएफएल by seating capacity.
The अधिकतम capacity of the स्टेडियम, including standing रूम, is 105,000.
the Party Pass ( खोलें क्षेत्रों ) भाग हैं behind seats in each end मण्डल and on a series of छह elevated प्लेटफ़ॉर्म कनेक्ट by stairways.
it रै the संसार 's largest column-free interior and the fourth largest ऊँची definition video screen, जिससे hangs from 20 यार्ड line to 20 यार्ड line.
The facility can भी be used लिये a variety of अन्य क्रियाएँ outside of its main purpose ( professional football ) ऐसे as concerts, basketball खेल, मुक्केबाज़ी matches, कॉलेज football and ऊँची school football प्रतियोगिताओं, soccer matches, and motocross races.
कनाडाई इतिहासकारों until the 1980s tended to फ़ोकस on आर्थिक इतिहास, including श्रमिक इतिहास.
in भाग इस is क्युकी कनाडा has था far कम राजनैतिक or सैन्य conflicts than अन्य societies.

अनेक of the सबसे prominent English कनाडाई historians from this काल यहूद economic इतिहासकारों, such as हेरोल्ड Innis, Donald Creighton और आर्थर R. M. Lower
विद्वानों of Canadian history were वारिस to the परंपराओं कि विकसित in Europe and the संयुक्त राज्य, लकिन frameworks that worked खूब elsewhere प्रायः failed in कनाडा.
the heavily Marxist influenced आर्थिक history that dominates Europe रै छोटी relevance to सबसे of कनाडाई history.
a फ़ोकस on क्लास, urban क्षेत्रों, और उद्योग fails to पता कनाडा 's ग्रामीण and resource आधारित अर्थव्यवस्था.
Similarly, the monetarist स्कूल कि is प्रबल in the United States also रै been difficult to ट्रांसफ़र north of the border.
the पढ़ाई of आर्थिक इतिहास in Canada became highly केन्द्रित on आर्थिक geography, और for many सालो the dominant स्कूल of thought रै महरूम the स्टेपल्स लेख.
This school of विचार bases the पढ़ाई of the Canadian economy on the study of natural resources.
इस दृष्टिकोण has since also become प्रयुक्त outside of Canada in Australia और in many विकासशील राष्ट्र.
पहले the arrival of europeans, the पहला राष्ट्र of what होता become कनाडा had a large and vibrant trade network.
furs, tools, decorative वस्तुएं, and अन्य goods यहूद often transported हज़ारों of किलोमीटर, ज़्यादातर by canoe throughout the अनेक rivers और lakes of the region.
the early यूरोपीय history of the कनाडाई economy is usually पढ़ाई through the staples लेख जिससे argues the Canadian अर्थव्यवस्था developed through the शोषण of a series of staples that होता be exported to Europe.
carbon-14, 14c, or radiocarbon, is a रेडियोसक्रिय isotope of कार्बन with a nucleus containing 6 protons and 8 neutrons.
Its उपस्थिति in सशुल्क materials is the basis of the radiocarbon डेटिंग विधि pioneered by willard Libby और colleagues ( 1949 ) to तिथि पुरातत्व, geological and hydrogeological नमूने.
Carbon-14 was discovered on 27 फ़रवरी 1940, by मार्टिन Kamen and Sam Ruben at the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया विकिरण Laboratory in बर्कली, हालांकि इसके existence था महरूम सुझाया by Franz kurie in 1934.
वहीँ are three naturally occurring isotopes of कार्बन on धरती : 99 % of the carbon is carbon-12, 1 % is carbon-13, और carbon-14 occurs in trace amounts, i.e., बनाना up about 1 part प्रति खरब ( 0.0000000001 % ) of the कार्बन in the atmosphere.
The half-life of carbon-14 is 5,730±40 सालो.
Carbon-14 decays into nitrogen-14 through beta क्षय.
The प्राथमिक प्राकृतिक सोर्स of carbon-14 on धरती is लौकिक ray कार्रवाई upon नाइट्रोजन in the माहौल, और it is इसलिए a cosmogenic nuclide.
however, open-air nuclear testing between 1955–1980 contributed to इस pool.
the different isotopes of carbon do नहीं differ appreciably in उनके रासायनिक गुण.
इस is प्रयुक्त in chemical और biological research, in a तकनीक called carbon labeling : carbon-14 अणु can be प्रयुक्त to replace nonradioactive कार्बन, in अनुक्रम to trace रासायनिक and biochemical प्रतिक्रियाएँ involving कार्बन atoms from any given organic compound.
बिजली is a अत्यधिक दृश्य रूप of energy transfer
बिजली strikes are विद्युत discharges on a विशाल scale between the माहौल और an earth-bound object.
They mostly originate in thunderclouds and terminate on the मैदान, पुकारा Cloud to मैदान ( CG ) lightning.
However, they may भी be initiated इससे a very लम्बा grounded ऑब्जेक्ट and reach into the clouds.
Although `` a lightning स्ट्राइक '' is commonly used to describe all बिजली, it is बल्कि ग़लत and a misnomer, as only परिचय 25 % of सब बिजली कार्यक्रम विश्वव्यापी are CG, the विशाल बल्क of lightning कार्यक्रम हैं Intracloud ( ic ) or Cloud to Cloud ( cc ), जहाँ discharge तभी occurs high in the atmosphere.
The scientific नाम लिये the complete प्रक्रम of a single lightning event is a and it is a बहुत complex, अनेक stepped interaction, which is not completely समझा.
Most CG flashes तभी `` strike '' one शारीरिक स्थान, referred to as a termination.
The primary conducting channel, the bright coursing light तुम may देखिए और call a `` स्ट्राइक '', is only परिचय 1 इंच in diameter, although to our eyes it looks much larger.
They are मील long, upwards of tens of मील.
And the संपूर्ण फ्लैश, lasts only a few fractions of a दूसरी, most of which is not visible to इंसान आँखें.
थंडर is always उत्पादित by lightning.
Just like lightning, that deceives our eyes, usually looking larger or closer than it really is, the धरती 's माहौल and हमारी brain 's perception of the बाहर world, ultimately determines whether it is `` heard '' or not.
Lightning can नहीं happen in a वैक्यूम devoid of ions, nor can thunder occur बगैर अणुओं to हिलना.
थंडर is a शारीरिक absolute for every single flash of lightning.
contrary to लोकप्रिय belief, a बिजली स्ट्राइक itself is प्रायः नहीं responsible for multiple मौतों or injuries इससे a सिंगल event.
it would be नामुमकिन दिए the प्राकृतिक tendencies of a फ्लैश, unless people or पशु यहूद stacked on top of each other, or वे यहूद somehow arranged vertically और भाग of the फ्लैश channel.
When बिजली ignites an available fuel source और an विस्फोट occurs, it is the shock wave or fire causing the injuries, not the स्ट्राइक itself.
Ground Currents, also पुकारा कदम संभावित, of an earth termination is कया truly causes सबसे injuries or मौत to humans and animals.
The near instantaneous rush of सतह charges, induced by the ओवरहेड thundercloud itself, race to the strike पाइंट इससे सैंकड़ों to हज़ारों of फीट away during निर्वहन.
इस वर्तमान, caused दौरान प्रत्येक स्ट्रोक, takes the path of तनिक प्रतिरोध, which may be आयन rich इंसान or animal टाँगे, over poorly conducting धरती.
इस is क्यों it is बेहतरीन to crouch, with फीट बंद साथ, if कभी caught in the खोलें during a अंधड़.
दुर्भाग्यवश, most रिपोर्ट्स do not चित्रण a भेद between the रियल कारण of injury or मौत, be it the स्ट्राइक itself, a resulting विस्फोट or आग, or प्रायः responsible step potential.

Sealing is an अध्यादेश ( अनुष्ठान ) performed in Latter Day Saints मंदिरों by a व्यक्ति पकड़कर the sealing प्राधिकार.
The purpose of this अध्यादेश is to मुहर परिचित संबंध, बनाना possible the existence of परिवार relationships throughout eternity.
LDS teachings प्लेस ग्रेट महत्व on the specific authority जरूरी to perform these sealings.
Church doctrine सिखाती कि इस प्राधिकार, called the priesthood, corresponds to कि दिए to Saint पीटर in.
Sealings हैं typically performed as विवाह or as sealing of children to अभिभावक.
They were performed prior to the death of जोसेफ स्मिथ, jr. ( the main founder of the latter Day Saint movement ), और हैं फिलहाल performed in the गिरिजाघर of Jesus मसीह of latter-day Saints.
हालांकि some other denominations, ऐसे as the Community of Christ, view sealing as an artifact of Smith 's practice of बहुवचन विवाह, कुछ do स्टिल perform them.
The 2000s, pronounced `` two हज़ारों '', थी a दशक कि began on January 1, 2000, और ended on December 31, 2009.
वैश्वीकरण, which था accelerated बाद the early 1990s पतन of communism, जारी to be a force in the 2000s.
the growth of the Internet थी one of the प्रधान contributors to वैश्वीकरण दौरान the decade, making it संभावित लिये people to interact साथ अन्य people, express ideas, introduce अन्य to अलग cultures और पृष्ठभूमि, use goods and सेवाएं, sell and buy online, शोध and learn परिचय बाते, along with experiencing the world without having to leave घर.
The संस्थानों, linkages and technologies कि उभरा or were redefined earlier would subsequently in इस decade लाभ many countries, in particular China and इण्डिया.
However, in अन्य भाग of the संसार such प्रगति विफल to address ongoing struggles with modernity, सबसे notably characterized by the rise of al-qaeda and अन्य Islamist समूह.
The सितंबर 11 attacks in 2001 led to the संयुक्त राज्य, संयुक्त किंगडम, Spain, Canada and other राष्ट्र आक्रमणकारी Afghanistan, as खूब as implementing various anti-terrorist measures at home और abroad in कया थी known as the युद्ध on Terror.

The gunfight at the O.K. Corral was a gunfight कि took प्लेस at about 3:00 p.m. on बुधवार, अक्तूबर 26, 1881, in tombstone, Arizona territory, and is generally regarded as the most प्रसिद्ध gunfight in the history of the American Old West.
the gunfight, believed to have lasted तभी about thirty seconds, थी लड़ा between the outlaw cowboys Billy Claiborne, आइक और बिली clanton, और Tom and फ़्रैंक mclaury, and the opposing कस्बा मार्शल Virgil Earp और his भाइयो सहायक कस्बा Marshal Morgan और temporary lawman व्याट, aided by दस्तावेज़ Holliday designated as a temporary मार्शल by Virgil.
Ike Clanton and Billy Claiborne भागा from the fight unharmed, लकिन Ike 's brother बिली Clanton थी killed, along साथ दोनो mclaurys.
Lawmen Virgil और Morgan earp और दस्तावेज़ Holliday were wounded.
तभी व्याट earp came through the लड़ो unharmed.
The लड़ो रै come to represent a time in अमरीकी इतिहास जब the frontier थी खोलें दायरा लिये outlaws opposed by विधि प्रवर्तन कि was spread thin over vast territories, leaving कुछ areas unprotected.
The gunfight थी not well known to the अमरीकी public जबतक 1931 when लेखक Stuart झील published कया has since been संकल्पित to be a largely fictionalized biography, Wyatt Earp : frontier मार्शल, दो years बाद Earp 's death.
झील retold उसके story in a 1946 book that निदेशक जॉन Ford विकसित into the फिल्म my darling clementine.
बाद the फिल्म Gunfight at the O.K. Corral थी released in 1957, the shootout आए to be known by that name.
चूंकि then, the विरोध has been portrayed with varying डिग्री of सटीकता in numerous पश्चिमी films and books.
despite इसके नाम, the gunfight actually occurred in a narrow lot six doors west of the rear प्रवेश to the o.k. Corral on fremont गली, and also in the street.
The दो opposing parties यहूद initially तभी about अलावा.
About तीस गोलियाँ यहूद fired in thirty seconds.
Ike Clanton दायर murder आरोप against the earps and Doc Holliday but वे यहूद आखिरकार exonerated by a लोकल judge after a 30-day preliminary सुनना और then again by a लोकल ग्रैंड जूरी.
On दिसम्बर 28, 1881, Virgil Earp was maimed in an हत्या attempt by the outlaw cowboys, and on March 18, 1882, वे assassinated Morgan earp.
The suspects furnished solid alibis, और newly appointed डिप्टी U.S. मार्शल व्याट earp took matters into उसके अपना hands दौरान the Earp वेंडेट्टा सवारी, ironically धड़ा by काउंटी Sheriff Johnny behan with वारंट लिये the Earp 's गिरफ़्तार.
HDMI ( high-definition Multimedia इंटरफ़ेस ) is a compact audio/video इंटरफ़ेस लिये transferring uncompressed वीडियो आंकड़ा और compressed/uncompressed digital audio data from a HDMI-compliant device ( `` the सोर्स device '' ) to a compatible computer monitor, video प्रोजेक्टर, डिजिटल television, or डिजिटल audio device.
hdmi is a डिजिटल replacement लिये मौजूदा analog video standards.
वहीँ are a क्रमांक of hdmi-standard केबल कनेक्टर्स उपलब्धियाँ, प्रत्येक of which can be प्रयुक्त लिये any uncompressed TV or pc video format, सहित मानक, उन्नत, high definition, और 3d वीडियो signals ; up to 8 channels of compressed or uncompressed digital audio ; a CEC ( Consumer इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स कंट्रोल ) connection ; and an ईथरनेट data कनेक्शन.
hdmi implements the eia/cea-861 मानकों, which define video स्वरुप and waveforms, हस्तांतरण of compressed, uncompressed, and LPCM ऑडियो, auxiliary आंकड़ा, and implementations of the VESA edid.
the CEC allows HDMI devices to कंट्रोल प्रत्येक other जब necessary and allows the उपयोक्ता to operate अनेक डिवाइस साथ one रिमोट control हैंडसेट.
Because HDMI is electrically संगत साथ the CEA-861 signals used by digital visual इंटरफ़ेस ( dvi ), no सिग्नल conversion is जरुरी, nor is वहीँ a loss of वीडियो quality when a DVI-to-HDMI एडाप्टर is used.
As an uncompressed CEA-861 कनेक्शन, HDMI is स्वतंत्र of the विभिन्न डिजिटल television मानकों used by व्यक्तिगत devices, such as ATSC and DVB, as ये are encapsulations of संपीडित एमपीईजी वीडियो streams ( which can be decoded और output as an uncompressed वीडियो स्ट्रीम on HDMI ).
Production of उपभोक्ता HDMI उत्पाद started in लेट 2003.
In Europe either DVI-HDCP or HDMI is included in the hd ready in-store labeling specification for tv sets लिये HDTV, formulated by eicta with ses Astra in 2005.
hdmi began to appear on consumer hdtv camcorders और डिजिटल still cameras in 2006.
As of January 8, 2013, which is ten years after the रिलीज of the first HDMI specification, over 3 अरब hdmi डिवाइस have shipped since the launch of the hdmi मानक.
ब्री Van de Kamp ( née मेसन ; भी ज्ञात in the series as ब्री होज and ब्री Weston ) is a fictional character और one of the four protagonists on the एबीसी television series हताश Housewives.
She is निभाई by अभिनेत्री Marcia Cross, जो has प्राप्त अनेक awards और nominations for her portrayal, including an Emmy पुरस्कार nomination, तीन सुनहरी Globe Award nominations, and two स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार.
Cross 's portrayal of Bree has been widely praised by critics and प्रशंसक.
Cross originally auditioned for the role of Mary ऐलिस Young, but श्रेणी निर्माता मार्क Cherry thought वो थी बेहतर suited लिये the भूमिका of ब्री.
Dana delany, जो आखिरकार थी cast as Katherine mayfair, was originally chosen for the role लकिन turned it bas, saying it थी too similar to उसके भूमिका in Pasadena.
ब्री 's प्रमुख struggle throughout the series has been उसके attempts to maintain a पूर्ण life despite various obstacles such as widowhood, तलाक, और alcoholism hindering her.
वो has महरूम शादीशुदा three times ; to Rex Van de kamp ( स्टीवन Culp ), orson होज ( Kyle MacLachlan ) और ट्रिप Weston ( Scott bakula ).

Algoma is a नगर in kewaunee County in the U.S. राज्य of विस्कॉन्सिन.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 3,167 at the 2010 census.
algoma is भाग of the ग्रीन खाड़ी महानगर Statistical क्षेत्रफल.
The Hangover Part ii is a 2011 अमरीकी कॉमेडी film उत्पादित by Legendary तस्वीरें और distributed by warner भाईs. Pictures.
It is the sequel to 2009 's the hangover and the second film in the hangover मताधिकार.
टॉड Phillips directed the film in जोड to co-authoring the script with Craig mazin, and Scot आर्मस्ट्रांग.
The फिल्मी सितारों ब्राडली कूपर, Ed Helms, Zach galifianakis, केन Jeong, Jeffrey Tambor, जस्टिन bartha and Paul giamatti.
the Hangover Part II tells the स्टोरी of Phil, Stu, एलन, और डग as वे travel to थाईलैंड for stu 's विवाह.
बाद the bachelor party in लास Vegas, stu takes no chances और opts लिये a safe, subdued pre-wedding brunch.
However, things do नहीं go as planned, resulting in another ख़राब hangover साथ no memories of the पिछला रात्रि.
विकास of the hangover भाग ii began in April 2009, दो महीने before the Hangover थी released.
The principal अभिनेताओं were cast in March 2010 to reprise their roles इससे the पहला film.
Production began in अक्तूबर 2010, in ओंटारियो, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, before moving on स्थान in थाईलैंड.
The फिल्मी थी released on may 26, 2011 and, despite receiving mostly ऋणात्मक reviews from critics, it became the highest-grossing r-rated कॉमेडी दौरान इसके नाट्य चलाएं.
A third फिल्मी is set लिये on May 24, 2013.

The English पुनर्जागरण was a सांस्कृतिक and artistic गति in इंग्लैण्ड dating from the late 15th and early 16th centuries to the जल्दी 17th century.
It is संबद्ध साथ the pan-european पुनर्जागरण that is प्रायः regarded as beginning in इटली in the लेट 14th सदी.
Like most of उत्तरी Europe, इंग्लैण्ड देखी little of ये developments जबतक more than a century बाद.
The beginning of the अंग्रेज़ी Renaissance is often taken, as a convenience, to be 1485, when the Battle of Bosworth Field ended the युद्धों of the Roses and उदघाटन the Tudor राजवंश.
पुनर्जागरण style और ideas, however, were slow in penetrating इंग्लैण्ड, and the Elizabethan era in the second हाफ of the 16th century is usually regarded as the height of the English पुनर्जागरण.
एलिज़ाबेथ Ann Bloomer Warren `` Betty '' घाट ( April 8, 1918 – जुलाई 8, 2011 ), was First महिला of the United States इससे 1974 to 1977 during the प्रेसिडेंसी of her husband जेराल्ड घाट.
as पहला Lady, she was क्रियाशील in social policy और created precedents as a politically active presidential wife.
Throughout उसके husband 's पद in office, she maintained high स्वीकृति ratings despite विपक्ष from कुछ रूढ़िवादी republicans जो objected to her अधिक मॉडरेट और liberal स्थितियाँ on सोशल issues.
Ford थी विख्यात for raising breast कर्कट जागरूकता following उसके 1974 mastectomy and was a passionate supporter of, and activist for, the Equal Rights amendment ( era ).
Pro-choice on abortion और a नेता in the Women 's गति, वो gained कीर्ति as one of the most निष्कपट पहला ladies in इतिहास, commenting on प्रत्येक hot-button issue of the time, including feminism, equal अदा, the era, sex, दवाएँ, abortion, और गन कंट्रोल.
She also उठाया awareness of addiction when वो घोषित उसके long-running battle with alcoholism in the 1970s.
following उसके श्वेत हाउस years, she जारी to lobby लिये the era and remained क्रियाशील in the feminist गति.
She was the founder, and परोसा as the पहला chair of the board of directors, of the बेट्टी घाट बीच for substance abuse and व्यसन and is a प्राप्तकर्ता of the Congressional सुनहरा पदक ( co-presentation with उसके husband, जेराल्ड R. घाट, अक्तूबर 21, 1998 ) and the Presidential Medal of स्वतंत्रता ( अलोन, प्रस्तुत 1991, by George H. W. Bush ).
Platelet endothelial कोशिका adhesion अणु ( PECAM-1 ) भी known as क्लस्टर of differentiation 31 ( CD31 ) is a protein that in human is एनकोडेड by the pecam1 जीन मिला on chromosome 17.
pecam-1 plays a key role in निकालना aged neutrophils from the देह.

The Miss Florida USA competition is the pageant that selects the प्रतिनिधि for the state फ्लोरिडा in the Miss USA pageant.
जबकि Florida रै महरूम कामयाब in शर्तें of runners-up, finalists and semi-finalists, the राज्य रै never जीती the मिस USA pageant, although चेरिल patton became मिस USA after Sylvia Hitchcock won Miss Universe.
Florida 's best परिणाम were during the mid-1960s to mid-1970s.
उनके सबसे recent फाइनलिस्ट थी lissette Garcia who placed in the शीर्ष 16 in 2011.
Two पूर्व Miss Florida Teen USA titleholders have जीती this प्रतियोगिता, and तीन titleholders have also competed at Miss America.
The current titleholder is Michelle Aguirre of hialeah.
anglo-saxon इंग्लैण्ड refers to the काल of the इतिहास of the भाग of ब्रिटेन that became known as इंग्लैण्ड, स्थायी इससे the end of रोमन occupation and establishment of anglo-saxon kingdoms in the 5th सदी जबतक the नॉर्मन conquest of इंग्लैण्ड in 1066 by विलियम the Conqueror.
anglo-saxon is a general पद referring to the Germanic peoples जो आए to ब्रिटेन दौरान the 5th and 6th centuries, including कोण, saxons, frisii, and jutes.
The पद भी refers to the भाषा बोला at the time in इंग्लैण्ड, which is अभी पुकारा बूढ़ा English, and to the संस्कृति of the era, which has long attracted लोकप्रिय and scholarly attention.
जबतक the 9th सदी Anglo-Saxon England थी dominated by the Heptarchy, the kingdoms of नॉर्थम्ब्रिया, mercia, ईस्ट Anglia, Essex, Kent, ससेक्स, and Wessex.
in शर्तें of धर्म the kingdoms followed anglo-saxon paganism दौरान the जल्दी period, लकिन converted to christianity दौरान the 7th century.
Paganism had a फाइनल stronghold in a काल of mercian आधिपत्य during the 640s, समाप्ति with the मौत of Penda of mercia in 655.
Facing the threat of Viking invasions, the House of wessex became dominant दौरान the 9th सदी, under the नियम of Alfred the ग्रेट.
During the 10th सदी, the व्यक्तिगत kingdoms एकीकृत under the नियम of wessex into the किंगडम of इंग्लैण्ड, जिससे stood opposed to the Danelaw, the viking kingdoms स्थापित इससे the 9th सदी in the उत्तर and east of इंग्लैण्ड.
The Kingdom of इंग्लैण्ड गिरी in the viking invasion from डेनमार्क in 1013 और was ruled by the हाउस of डेनमार्क जबतक 1042, जब the Anglo-Saxon House of Wessex थी लौटी.
The पिछला anglo-saxon king, हेरोल्ड Godwinson, was मारे in 1066 at the Battle of हास्टिंग्स.

Smoked salmon is a तैयारी of सामन, typically a fillet that has been cured और hot or cold smoked.
Due to its मध्यम high दाम, smoked सामन is माना a delicacy.
हालांकि the term lox is sometimes applied to smoked salmon, वे हैं अलग उत्पाद.
दृश्य of defibrillator electrode position and placement.
Defibrillation is a आम treatment लिये life-threatening cardiac dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, और pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of विद्युत उर्जा to the प्रभावित दिल with a device called a defibrillator.
This depolarizes a नाजुक द्रव्यमान of the heart मांसपेशी, terminates the dysrhythmia, और allows सामान्य sinus rhythm to be reestablished by the body 's प्राकृतिक pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the दिल.
Defibrillators can be external, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the type of यंत्र used or needed.
कुछ बाह्य इकाई, ज्ञात as स्वचालित बाह्य defibrillators ( AEDs ), automate the diagnosis of treatable लय, अर्थ कि lay responders or bystanders are समर्थ to use उन्हें successfully with छोटी, or in some मामले no training at सब.
Gabrielle `` कोको '' bonheur Chanel ( August 19, 1883 – जनवरी 10, 1971 ) was a फ्रेंच fashion पंक्तियां और संस्थापक of the चैनल brand.
वो was the only fashion पंक्तियां to appear on समय पत्रिका 's list of the 100 most influential people of the 20th century.
साथ with Paul poiret, Chanel was credited साथ liberating women इससे the constraints of the `` corseted silhouette '' and popularizing the acceptance of a sportive, कैज़ुअल chic as the feminine मानक in the post- World War I era.
a prolific फ़ैशन creator, Chanel 's influence extended beyond couture कपडे.
Her डिज़ाइन aesthetic थी realized in आभूषण, handbags, and महक.
Her signature सैंट, Chanel no. 5, रै become an iconic उत्पाद.
Chanel was known लिये उसके lifelong determination, ambition और energy जिससे she applied to her पेशेवर और social जीवन.
She achieved both कामयाबी as a businesswoman and social prominence thanks to the connections वो made through her कार्य.
These शामिल अनेक कलाकारों और craftspeople to जिसको she became a patron.
however, Chanel 's highly प्रतिस्पर्धी, opportunistic व्यक्तित्व led her to मेक questionable जीवन choices which have उत्पन्न विवाद around उसके प्रतिष्ठा, particularly her आचरण दौरान the German occupation of फ़्रांस in World युद्ध II.

A gristmill ( भी : grist mill, मकई mill or आटा mill ) grinds grain into आटा.

Romania ( ; dated spellings Roumania and Rumania ; ) is a country स्तिथ at the intersection of सेंट्रल and Southeastern यूरोपीय, bordering on the Black Sea.
रोमानिया साझा a border साथ हंगेरियाई and Serbia to the west, Ukraine and Moldova to the पूर्वोत्तर and ईस्ट, and Bulgaria to the दक्षिण.
At, रोमानिया is the आठवीं largest country of the European संघ by क्षेत्रफल, और has the सातवाँ largest जनसांख्यिकी of the यूरोपीय Union with more than 19 लाख people.
इसके capital और biggest नगर is बुखारेस्ट, the 11th largest नगर in the EU.
the संयुक्त Principalities emerged when the territories of moldavia और Wallachia were united under Prince सिकंदर ioan cuza in 1859.
In 1866 Prince Karl of hohenzollern-sigmaringen थी called to the throne as the Ruling Prince of the रोमानियाई principate और in 1881 he was आखिरकार पहनाया as किंग Carol i the first monarch of the Kingdom of Romania.
Independence इससे the Ottoman साम्राज्य was declared on 9 may 1877, और थी internationally पहचाना the following साल.
At the समाप्त of संसार युद्ध i, Transylvania, bukovina and Bessarabia united साथ the किंगडम of रोमानिया.
World युद्ध ii दिया cause to the वृद्धि of a सैन्य dictatorship in Romania under फासिस्ट General आयन Antonescu, जो chose to लड़ो on the पक्ष of the Axis powers इससे 1941 to 1944.
After उसके removal, Romania switched पहलू in 1944 and joined the allies.
by the समाप्त of the war, कुछ formerly Romanian northeastern territories were occupied by the सोवियत Union, with Red Army units stationed on रोमानियाई मृदा.
In 1947 Romania forcibly became a People 's Republic ( 1947-1965 ) और a member of the Warsaw अनुबंध.
In 1965 Nicolae Ceauşescu became General सचिव of the रोमानियाई कम्युनिस्ट Party, and the harsh austerity उपायों, राजनैतिक repression, और cult of personality he implemented led to the समाजवादी गणतंत्र of Romania ( 1965-1989 ) बनने the most stalinist police राज्य in the Eastern bloc.
Eventually उसके authoritarian government थी toppled in December 1989 दौरान the रोमानियाई क्रान्ति of 1989.
With the fall of the Iron Curtain, रोमानिया began its परिवर्तन towards लोकतंत्र and a पूंजीवादी मार्केट अर्थव्यवस्था.
After a decade of post-revolution आर्थिक problems and living-standards decline, extensive reforms fostered आर्थिक रिकवरी.
as of 2010, Romania is an upper-middle-income देश साथ a high इंसान विकास अनुक्रमणिका.
Romania joined नाटो on 29 March 2004, and the यूरोपीय Union on 1 जनवरी 2007.
It is also a member of the : लैटिन संघ, francophonie, OSCE, WTO, bsec, संयुक्त Nations, etc.
आज, रोमानिया is a एकात्मक semi-presidential republic, in which the executive शाखा consists of the अध्यक्ष और the Government.
`` प्राचीन '' redirects here.
लिये अन्य उपयोग, see Antiquity ( बहुविकल्पी ).
The टाइम्स before writing belong either to protohistory or to prehistory.
khafre 's Pyramid ( 4th राजवंश ) और Great Sphinx of गीज़ा ( c. 2500 bc or perhaps पहले )
Ancient history is the पढ़ाई of the written पास्ट from the शुरूआत of recorded human history to the जल्दी मध्य आयु.
the स्पैन of अंकित इतिहास is roughly 5,000 years, साथ cuneiform स्क्रिप्ट, the oldest discovered form of सुसंगत writing, इससे the protoliterate काल around the 30th सदी bc.
इस is the beginning of इतिहास, as opposed to प्रागितिहास, according to the परिभाषा used by सबसे इतिहासकारों.
the term classical प्राचीनता is often used to refer to history in the Old संसार इससे the beginning of अंकित Greek history in 776 bc ( पहला ओलंपियाड ).
इस roughly coincides with the परंपरागत date of the founding of Rome in 753 BC, the शुरूआत of the इतिहास of ancient रोम, और the beginning of the archaic काल in Ancient Greece.
Although the समाप्ति तिथि of प्राचीन इतिहास is विवादित, कुछ Western विद्वानों use the fall of the Western रोमन साम्राज्य in 476 AD, the closure of the Platonic अकादमी in 529 ad, the death of the emperor जुस्तिनियन I, the coming of Islam or the वृद्धि of शारलेमेन as the end of ancient and शास्त्रीय यूरोपीय इतिहास.
in India, the काल शामिल the जल्दी काल of the Middle kingdoms, और, in चीन, the time up to the Qin राजवंश is included.
Methylcobalamin ( shown ) is a form of vitamin b12.
physically it resembles the other forms of vitamin b12, occurring as dark रेड crystals कि freely रूप cherry-colored पारदर्शी समाधान in water.
Vitamin b12, vitamin b12 or vitamin b-12, भी called cobalamin, is a water-soluble विटामिन साथ a key role in the सामान्य functioning of the brain and बेचैन प्रणाली, और लिये the formation of रक्त.
It is एक of the आठ b vitamins.
it is normally शामिल in the चयापचय of प्रत्येक cell of the इंसान देह, especially affecting डीएनए synthesis and regulation, but also fatty एसिड संश्लेषण and energy production.
neither fungi, पौधे, nor पशु are capable of producing विटामिन B12.
तभी जीवाणु and archaea have the enzymes जरूरी लिये इसके संश्लेषण, हालांकि many भोजन are a natural source of b12 क्युकी of बैक्टीरियल symbiosis.
The विटामिन is the largest and सबसे structurally complicated vitamin and can be उत्पादित industrially only through bacterial fermentation-synthesis.
विटामिन B12 consists of a class of chemically related यौगिकों ( vitamers ), all of जिससे have विटामिन कार्यकलाप.
It contains the biochemically rare element कोबाल्ट.
जैवसंश्लेषण of the basic ढांचा of the विटामिन is संपन्नता तभी by bacteria ( which प्रायः produce hydroxocobalamin ), लकिन conversion between different forms of the विटामिन can be संपन्नता in the human body.
A आम semi-synthetic रूप of the विटामिन, cyanocobalamin, करता नहीं occur in प्रकृति, लकिन is उत्पादित इससे bacterial hydroxocobalamin and तब used in many दवाएँ और पूरक, और as a खाना योगात्मक, because of इसके स्थिरता and निम्नतर उत्पादन cost.
In the देह it is परिवर्तित to the इंसान physiological forms methylcobalamin और adenosylcobalamin, leaving पीछे the साइनाइड, albeit in minimal विशेषज्ञता.
अधिक recently, hydroxocobalamin, methylcobalamin, और adenosylcobalamin can be found in अधिक महंगी pharmacological products and food supplements.
The extra यूटिलिटी of these is currently debated.
Vitamin B12 was खोजा from its संबंध to the बीमारी pernicious anemia, जिससे is an असंक्राम्य disease in जिससे parietal cells of the stomach जिम्मेदार for secreting मूलभूत factor are नष्ट.
मूलभूत factor is निर्णायक for the normal अवशोषण of B12, so a lack of मूलभूत factor, as देखी in घातक रक्ताल्पता, कल्याणकारी a विटामिन b12 कमियां.
अनेक other subtler kinds of vitamin b12 कमियां और their biochemical effects have चूंकि महरूम elucidated.
The रोमन साम्राज्य ( ) थी the post- Republican period of the ancient रोमन civilization, characterised by an autocratic रूप of सरकारी and large territorial holdings around the भूमध्यसागरीय in Europe, अफ़्रीकी, और Asia.
the 500-year-old रोमन गणतंत्र, which preceded it, था महरूम destabilized through a series of सिविल युद्धों.
Several कार्यक्रम marked the परिवर्तन from गणतंत्र to Empire, including Julius Caesar 's नियुक्ति as perpetual तानाशाह ( 44 BC ) ; the Battle of actium ( 31 bc ) ; और the granting of the honorific augustus to Octavian by the रोमन सीनेट ( 27 BC ).
The first दो centuries of the साम्राज्य यहूद a period of unprecedented स्थिरता and prosperity ज्ञात as the Pax Romana ( `` Roman Peace '' ).
It पहुँचे इसके महानतम expanse दौरान the शासनकाल of त्राजान ( 98–117 ad ).
in the 3rd century, the Empire underwent a crisis that threatened its अस्तित्व, but was reunified और stabilized अंतर्गत the emperors Aurelian और diocletian.
Christians रोज़ to power in the 4th century, during which time a system of dual rule थी विकसित in the Latin West and Greek East.
After the collapse of सेंट्रल government in the वेस्ट in the 5th सदी, the eastern हाफ continued as what होता बाद be known as the बीज़ान्टिन Empire.
क्युकी of the साम्राज्य 's vast extent और long सहनशीलता, the संस्थानों and culture of Rome had a profound and स्थायी influence on the development of language, धर्म, वास्तुकला, दर्शनशास्त्र, law, and forms of government in the territory it governed, particularly Europe, and by means of यूरोपीय expansionism throughout the आधुनिक संसार.
Total देह सतह area ( TBSA ) is an assessment measure of burns of the skin.
in वयस्कों, the `` rule of nines '' is used to determine the कुल प्रतिशत of area burned for each प्रमुख खण्ड of the body.
In कुछ cases, the burns may कवर more than one देह part, or may नहीं fully cover ऐसे a part ; in these मामले, burns हैं measured by using the casualty 's ताड़ as a सन्दर्भ पाइंट लिये 1 % of the देह.
लिये children and infants, the Lund-Browder chart is प्रयुक्त to assess the burned देह सतह area.
अलग percentages हैं used because the ratio of the combined सतह क्षेत्रफल of the सिर and गर्दन to the सतह क्षेत्रफल of the limbs is typically larger in children than कि of an adult.
ठेठ मान लिये common समूह of humans follow.
( Due to rounding, values may नहीं add to 100 %. )
संसार infant मृत्यु दरों by पाँच सालो averages in 2008.
This is a सूची of देशों by infant mortality रेट.
यूनुस किर्स्टन Sorrentino ( born June 26, 1975 ), बेहतर known by his स्टेज नाम KJ-52, is a Christian rapper इससे Tampa, Florida.
the `` kj '' part of his name refers to उसके बूढ़ा रैप alias, `` किंग J. Mac, '' a name जिससे he बाद वर्णित in एक of his podcasts as `` horribly cheesy. ''
`` 52 '', which is pronounced `` पाँच दो '', not `` fifty-two '', is a reference to the Biblical story of Jesus feeding the multitude with पाँच loaves और two मछली, which is also sung परिचय in उसके song `` धक्का Up '' from the Yearbook and in the `` kj Five Two '' on It 's सुनाया 'five Two.
he was awarded the rap/hip Hop अंकित Song of the Year for `` Never dekh Away '' और Rap/Hip हॉप एल्बम of the Year at the जीएमए Dove पुरस्कार of 2007.
On July 28, 2009, KJ-52 released `` End of my रस्सी '', जिससे is the पहला सिंगल लिये उसके album five-two Television.
His song `` डिअर Slim '' is based on एमिनेम 's सोंग `` Stan `` and is a sort of personal संदेश इससे KJ-52 to एमिनेम.
The degree प्रतीक ( ° ) is a typographical symbol that is प्रयुक्त, among अन्य बाते, to represent डिग्री of चाप ( e.g. in भौगोलिक निर्देशांक प्रणालियों ), hours ( in the medical field ), or डिग्री of temperature.
The symbol consists of a छोटी उठाया circle, historically a शून्य glyph.
in युनिकोड it is एनकोडेड at.
इस is a list of जड़ें, प्रत्यय, and prefixes used in medical शब्दावली, their meanings, और their etymology.
There are a few rules when using चिकित्सा roots.
Firstly, prefixes and प्रत्यय, primarily in Greek, but भी in Latin, have a droppable -o-.
as a general rule, this -o- almost सदा अधिनियमों as a joint-stem to कनेक्ट two consonantal जड़ें, e.g. arthr- + -o- + logy = arthrology.
लकिन generally, the -o- is dropped when connecting to a vowel-stem ; e.g. arthr- + itis = गठिया, instead of arthr-o-itis.
secondly, medical roots generally go together according to भाषा : यूनानी prefixes go with यूनानी प्रत्यय और लैटिन prefixes with Latin प्रत्यय.
Although international वैज्ञानिक शब्दावली is नहीं stringent परिचय segregating combining forms of अलग भाषाएं, it is advisable when coining new words not to मिक्सर different lingual जड़ें.
Stomach कर्कट, or gastric कर्कट, refers to कर्कट arising from कोई part of the पेट.
Stomach cancer causes परिचय 800,000 मौतों worldwide per year.
Prognosis is ग़रीब ( 5-year अस्तित्व < 5 to 15 % ) क्युकी most patients उपस्थित साथ advanced बीमारी.
सारा Lynn Evans ( born February 5, 1971 ) is an अमरीकी देश singer और songwriter.
For उसके entire करियर, she has महरूम हस्ताक्षरित to RCA रिकॉर्ड Nashville.

वो followed this up with no Place कि Far ( 1998 ), Born to मक्खी ( 2000 ), Restless ( 2003 ) and रियल ठीक Place ( 2005 ).

ये discs शामिल the क्रमांक 1 singles `` No Place That दूर ``, `` Born to मक्खी ``, `` suds in the बाल्टी `` and `` A रियल Fine प्लेस to प्रारंभ ``, प्लस the top 10 hits `` I Could Not पूछो for अधिक `` ( a cover of the Edwin McCain सोंग ), `` i रखना Looking ``, `` Perfect `` और `` cheatin ' ``.
