इवांस has भी won एक award प्रत्येक from Billboard, the अकादमी of Country म्यूज़िक, देश Music संघ, Broadcast म्यूज़िक Incorporated ( बीएमआई ) and a dove Award.
The संसार 's प्रिंसिपल धर्मों and आध्यात्मिक परंपराओं may be classified into a small क्रमांक of प्रमुख समूह, although this is by no अर्थात् a वर्दी अभ्यास.
This सिद्धान्त began in the 18th सदी with the goal of recognizing the relative levels of civility in societies.
Berliners watching a C-54 land at Tempelhof विमानक्षेत्र ( 1948 )
The बर्लिन नाकेबंदी ( 24 जून 1948 – 12 may 1949 ) was one of the पहला प्रमुख अंतरराष्ट्रीय crises of the ठंडा युद्ध.
दौरान the बहुराष्ट्रीय occupation of post–world War ii जर्मनी, the Soviet संघ blocked the पश्चिमी allies ' railway, road, और canal access to the sectors of बर्लिन under अलाइड control.
उनके aim थी to force the western powers to allow the Soviet zone to प्रारंभ supplying Berlin with food और fuel, thereby giving the Soviets practical control over the entire city.
In response, the पश्चिमी Allies व्यवस्थित the बर्लिन airlift to carry आपूर्तियाँ to the लोगों in West Berlin.
Aircrews इससे the United States Air फ़ोर्स, the British royal एयर फ़ोर्स, the royal Australian एयर Force, the Royal कनाडाई Air फ़ोर्स, the royal New जीलैंड Air फ़ोर्स, and the दक्षिण African Air Force flew over 200,000 फ़्लाइट in एक year, providing up to 4700 tons of daily necessities such as ईंधन और खाना to the Berliners.
by the वसन्त of 1949, the प्रयत्न was clearly succeeding और, by अप्रैल, the airlift was delivering अधिक कार्गो than था previously been transported into the city by रेल.
The कामयाबी of the बर्लिन Airlift brought embarrassment to the Soviets who था refused to believe it could मेक a difference.
The blockade was lifted in may 1949 और resulted in the creation of दो पृथक German states.
The संघीय गणतंत्र of Germany ( वेस्ट Germany ) and the जर्मनी Democratic Republic ( East Germany ) split up Berlin.
In स्मरण of the airlift, three airports in the former western zones of the city served as the प्राथमिक gateways to Germany लिये another fifty सालो.
The यूरोपियन sign ; logotype और हस्तलिखित.
The यूरोपियन sign is the currency चिह्न प्रयुक्त लिये the euro, the official currency of the Eurozone in the यूरोपीय Union ( EU ).
the design was presented to the public by the यूरोपीय Commission on 12 दिसम्बर 1996.
The international three-letter code ( according to ISO मानक आईएसओ 4217 ) for the euro is EUR.
in Unicode it is एनकोडेड at.
in अंग्रेज़ी, the चिह्न precedes the value.
In some styleguides, but not अन्य, the यूरोपियन sign is unspaced.
mate (, ; sometimes also spelled maté ), भी known as chimarrão ( ) or cimarrón ( ), is a परंपरागत South अमरीकी infused drink, particularly in अर्जेंटीना, उरुग्वे, Paraguay and the southern राज्य of ब्राज़ील और to a lesser उपाधि in दक्षिण of चिली, the bolivian Chaco, Syria और Lebanon.
It is prepared from steeping सूखी पत्ते of yerba mate ( llex paraguariensis, known in पुर्तगाली as erva-mate ) in hot जल.
Mate is परोसा with a मेटल स्ट्रॉ इससे a साझा hollow calabash gourd.
The straw is called a bombilla in कुछ लैटिन अमरीकी countries, a bomba in पुर्तगाली, and a bombija or, अधिक generally, a masassa ( type of straw ) in अरबी.
the straw is traditionally made of silver.
Modern, commercially available लोभी हैं typically बना of निकल चांदी, called Alpaca ; stainless स्टील, or hollow-stemmed cane.
the करेले is ज्ञात as a mate or a guampa ; जबकि in ब्राज़ील, it रै the specific नाम of cuia, or भी cabaça ( the नाम लिये Indigenous-influenced calabash gourds in अन्य regions of Brazil, स्टिल used for सामान्य food and पेय in remote regions ).
भी if the जल is supplied इससे a modern thermos, the infusion is traditionally drunk from mates or cuias.
As with अन्य brewed herbs, yerba mate leaves are dried, chopped, and ground into a powdery mixture called yerba.
the bombilla अधिनियमों as both a straw और a sieve.
The submerged end is flared, साथ small holes or slots कि allow the brewed liquid in, लकिन ब्लाक the chunky matter कि makes up much of the mixture.
a modern bombilla design उपयोग a straight ट्यूब साथ holes, or spring sleeve to अधिनियम as a sieve.
`` tea-bag '' type infusions of mate ( mate cocido ) have महरूम on the market in Argentina, पैराग्वे and Uruguay लिये many सालो under ऐसे trade names as `` taragüí vitality '' in Argentina, `` Pajarito '' and `` Kurupí '' in पैराग्वे, और in ब्राज़ील अंतर्गत the नाम `` mate leão ''.
This is माना a completely अलग पेय.
it is never drunk इससे cuias or called chimarrão, nor is it संबद्ध with the gaucho/gaúcho culture.
the ऑटोमोटिव industry is a पद that कवर a wide दायरा of कंपनियाँ and संगठनों involved in the डिज़ाइन, development, manufacture, विपणन, और selling of मोटर वाहनों, towed वाहनों, motorcycles और mopeds.
it is एक of the world 's सबसे important आर्थिक sectors by आय.
the पद automotive उद्योग प्रायः करता नहीं शामिल उद्योग समर्पित to the मेंटेनेंस of automobiles following delivery to the end-user, such as repair shops और motor ईंधन भरना स्टेशन.
the पद automotive was created इससे यूनानी autos ( स्वः ), and लैटिन motivus ( of गति ) to represent any form of self-powered vehicle.
इस term was प्रस्तावित by sae सदस्य Elmer Sperry.
दाउद Michael `` Dave '' bautista, jr. ( born जनवरी 18, 1969 ), is an अमरीकी मिश्रित martial artist, bodybuilder, कर्ता, और former पेशेवर wrestler best known लिये उसके समय in संसार कुश्ती entertainment स्पर्धा अंतर्गत the रिंग नाम Batista.
in डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई, he became a six-time world चैंपियन, जीतना the World Heavyweight चैंपियनशिप चार times, और the WWE चैंपियनशिप two times.
he is the longest-reigning World Heavyweight चैंपियन in डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई history.
In जोड to these championships, बतिस्ता has जीती the World Tag Team चैंपियनशिप three times ( twice with ric Flair और एकबार साथ John Cena ) और the डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई Tag Team चैंपियनशिप एकबार ( with Rey Mysterio ).
Batista was also the विजेता of the 2005 Royal rumble मैच and गई on to शीर्षक रेसलमेनिया 21, one of the शीर्ष पाँच highest-grossing pay-per-view कार्यक्रम in प्रो कुश्ती इतिहास.
After trying out at संसार Championship कुश्ती 's Power Plant, बतिस्ता signed a contract साथ the WWF in 2000 और थी sent to its developmental territory, ओहियो Valley Wrestling ( OVW ), जहाँ he won the OVW Heavyweight Championship.
In August 2012, bautista signed a contract with Classic entertainment & Sports to fight in mixed martial arts.
He won his mma debut on अक्तूबर 6, 2012, defeating विंस lucero via TKO in the पहला round.
Henry T. थामस Sampson, jr. ( born in Jackson, मिसिसिपी in 1934 ) is an African-American आविष्कारक.
He ग्रैजुएट इससे high school in 1951 इससे lanier ऊँची स्कूल in जैक्सन, Mississippi.
He then attended Morehouse कॉलेज for a युगल of सालो पहले transferring to purdue विश्वविद्यालयों जहाँ he became a member of the ओमेगा Psi फाई बिरादरी.
he प्राप्त a स्नातक 's उपाधि in science इससे purdue University in 1956.
he ग्रैजुएट with an MS उपाधि in engineering इससे the University of California, लॉस एंजिल्स in 1961.
Sampson also received his ms in नाभिकीय Engineering इससे the विश्वविद्यालयों of इलिनोइस Urbana-Champaign in 1965, और his PhD in 1967.
he is the पहला अफ़्रीकी American to earn a Ph.D.in Nuclear Engineering in the United States.
Some of उसके accomplishments include being a member of the United States Navy between the years 1962 and 1964 and कमाई an परमाणु Energy आयोग honor between 1964 और 1967.
Later he was awarded the ब्लैक Image पुरस्कार इससे Aerospace Corporation in 1982.
He was awarded the अश्वेतों in अभियान्त्रिकी, Applied Science Award, और prize लिये शिक्षा, by the Los एंजिल्स परिषद of Black पेशेवर इंजीनियर्स in 1983.
in June 2007, sampson was शादीशुदा to लौरा howzell Young in st. Thomas, u.S. वर्जिन Islands.
Young-Sampson is a professor in the कॉलेज of Education at कैलिफ़ोर्निया राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों San Bernardino.
Robert Lane गिब्स ( born March 29, 1971 ) is a वरिष्ठ campaign adviser लिये US President Barack Obama.
previously, he थी the 28th White House दबायें सचिव.
Gibbs was the संचार director for then- u.s. सीनेटर Obama और उसके 2008 presidential अभियान.
Gibbs, who has worked साथ Obama since 2004, थी press सचिव of जॉन Kerry 's 2004 presidential campaign and has previously specialized in सीनेट campaigns, having परोसा as communications निदेशक लिये the लोकतांत्रिक Senatorial अभियान Committee and लिये चार व्यक्तिगत Senate अभियान, including those of Obama in 2004 और फ्रिट्ज़ hollings in 1998.
Gibbs थी भी the press secretary of Representative bob Etheridge.
on नवम्बर 22, 2008, गिब्स was announced as the press secretary of the Obama administration.
he assumed the भूमिका of दबायें सचिव on जनवरी 20, 2009, और दिया his first official drug on January 22.
On January 5, 2011, Gibbs घोषित कि he होता छोड़ the White हाउस to become an outside adviser to the administration.
He बाएँ on फ़रवरी 11, 2011.
On February 12, 2013, it was घोषित that Gibbs had been नियुक्त as a योगदानकर्ता लिये cable-news चैनल एमएसएनबीसी.
उसके पहला रूप was on the same night prior to the 2013 State of the संघ पता.
Armando pérez ( born January 15, 1981 ), बेहतर known by his stage name Pitbull, is an American rapper, songwriter, और record निर्माता.
His first अंकित performance was from the लील jon एल्बम Kings of Crunk in 2002.
In 2004, he released his डेब्यू album titled M.I.A.M.I. ( छोटी for Money is A Major समस्या ) under TVT Records.
Since तब, he has released तीन other albums under the लेबल : el mariel in 2006, the Boatlift in 2007, और ग्रह Pit in 2011.
He released rebelution in 2009, which included singles `` i जान You want Me ( calle ocho ) `` और `` Krazy ``.
the latter peaked at No. 30 on the hot 100 and no. 11 on the hot Rap Tracks charts while `` I Know तुम want me '' peaked at no. 2 on the hot 100 and peaked भीतर the शीर्ष टेन धब्बे of charts in the UK, Canada, Italy, and the नीदरलैंड्स.
The सोंग पहुँचे No. 1 in फ़्रांस and the European hot 100 on the सप्ताह समाप्ति August 29, 2009 according to Billboard magazine.
He later signed with Polo grounds म्यूज़िक through सोनी Music and निर्मित his अपना लेबल Mr. 305 inc.
another सिंगल from rebelution थी `` होटल रूम सेवा ``, जिससे peaked at No. 8 on the hot 100.
rebelution went on to बेचें over 7.5 लाख worldwide digital singles और albums combined.
nevertheless, he dropped a तोड़ called `` Give Me Everything '' जिससे reached # 1 विश्वव्यापी, और प्रदर्शित कलाकारों ne-yo, Nayer, and Afrojack.
He रै भी performed as a प्रदर्शित कलाकार in the remixes of अनेक other hit songs, जैसे Tik Tok, चीख & Shout, lo Hecho Esta Hecho, Bad, Papi, Diamonds, How Low, tonight ( I 'm lovin ' तुम ), वीडियो Phone, over to You अभी and bumpy Ride.
Pérez is also the host of his अपना spanish-language program on the cable चैनल Mun2 titled la esquina ( स्पेनी for the कोने ).
in 2005 Pérez और rapper शॉन 'diddy ' combs co-founded ख़राब Boy लातीनी, a subsidiary of Combs ' ख़राब Boy Records label.
it primarily focuses on Latin हिप हॉप, लैटिन आत्मा, लैटिन pop और अन्य Tropical music, and has offices in नई York और मियामी, फ्लोरिडा.
Along with co-founding it, pérez फिलहाल heads the a & r division of the लेबल.
pérez रै become a product endorser, representing alongside Drake, रिहाना, और Trey Songz the “So Kodak” अभियान लिये the Kodak brand और embarking on a partnership with the नरम drink दानव dr Pepper as भाग of the campaign “ Vida 23 ” लिये which he अंकित the सोंग specifically featured on his album अरमांडो.
Pitbull भी announced he has become the spokesperson for Voli वोदका, in which he holds a बहुमत equity stake, and Budweiser रै चुनी pitbull to प्रचार इसके Bud लाइट line of beer.
the commercials currently हाइलाइट pitbull dancing और gyrating on स्टेज holding up a बोतल of Bud लाइट.
pitbull has also purchased an इक्विटी stake in Miami subs Pizza and Grill.
Halloween or hallowe'en ( a संकुचन of `` All hallows ' Evening `` ), भी ज्ञात as सब Hallows ' संध्या, is a वार्षिक जश्न observed in a number of countries on अक्तूबर 31, the संध्या of the Western Christian feast of सब hallows ( or All Saints ) और the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas.
According to अनेक विद्वानों, All Hallows ' संध्या is a Christianised feast originally influenced by पश्चिमी European कटाई festivals, and त्यौहार of the मुर्दे साथ संभावित pagan roots, particularly the सेल्टिक samhain.
अन्य scholars maintain that it originated independently of Samhain and has solely ईसाई जड़ें.
Typical त्यौहार Halloween क्रियाएँ शामिल trick-or-treating ( भी ज्ञात as `` guising `` ), attending costume पार्टियों, carving pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, ठहराना bobbing, visiting haunted attractions, playing pranks, telling scary कहानियां, और watching हॉरर films.
स्वतंत्रता of speech is the political right to communicate one 's राय और ideas using one 's body और property to anyone जो is willing to प्राप्त them.
the पद स्वतंत्रता of expression is sometimes प्रयुक्त synonymously, लकिन शामिल कोई अधिनियम of seeking, receiving और imparting सूचना or ideas, regardless of the मीडियम used.
in अभ्यास, the सही to स्वतंत्रता of वाक is नहीं absolute in any देश and the right is commonly subject to limitations, as साथ libel, slander, obscenity, राजद्रोह ( सहित, लिये example inciting जातीय द्वेष ), copyright उल्लंघन, revelation of information कि is classified or वरना.
The सही to freedom of अभिव्यक्ति is recognized as a इंसान right अंतर्गत आलेख 19 of the सार्वभौमिक Declaration of Human अधिकारों and पहचाना in अंतरराष्ट्रीय human अधिकारों law in the International वचन on सिविल and Political Rights ( ICCPR ).
आलेख 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold राय without interference '' और `` everyone shall have the सही to स्वतंत्रता of अभिव्यक्ति ; इस सही shall include स्वतंत्रता to तलाश, receive और impart सूचना and ideas of सब kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in writing or in print, in the रूप of art, or through any अन्य media of his choice ''.
Article 19 goes on to कह that the कसरत of ये rights carries `` खास कर्तव्य and responsibilities `` और may `` therefore be subject to निश्चित restrictions '' when जरुरी `` [ f ] or respect of the rights or reputation of others '' or `` [ f ] or the सुरक्षा of नेशनल सुरक्षा or of पब्लिक order ( order public ), or of पब्लिक health or नैतिकता ''.
Freedom of वाक may be legally curtailed in some religious legal systems and in धर्मनिरपेक्ष jurisdictions where it is मिला to cause धार्मिक ठोकर, such as the अंग्रेजों Racial और धार्मिक Hatred Act 2006.
सिडनी harbour from the एयर, प्रर्दशित the ओपेरा हाउस, the सीबीडी, गोलाकार quay, the सेतु, the parramatta नदी, North Sydney और kirribilli in the foreground
the सिडनी harbour सेतु is a steel through arch bridge आरपार Sydney harbour कि carries रेल, vehicular, सायकिल और पैदल ट्रैफ़िक between the सिडनी सेंट्रल कारोबार district ( सीबीडी ) and the उत्तर shore.
The dramatic view of the सेतु, the harbour, और the आसपास Sydney ओपेरा हाउस is an iconic चित्र of Sydney, New दक्षिण Wales, और Australia.
the सेतु is nicknamed `` The Coathanger '' because of its arch-based design.
Under the दिशानिर्देश of Dr J.J.C. Bradfield of the nsw Department of Public works, the सेतु was designed and निर्मित by British कड़ dorman long और co ltd of Middlesbrough और opened in 1932.
the सेतु 's design थी influenced by the Hell फाटक Bridge in New यॉर्क.
it थी the world 's widest long-span सेतु, at 48.8 meters ( 160 feet ) चौड़ी, जबतक निर्माण of the नई Port मन Bridge in वैंकूवर.
it is भी the पांचवां longest spanning-arch सेतु in the संसार, and it is the tallest steel मेहराब bridge, measuring from top to water level.
Until 1967 the harbour Bridge थी Sydney 's tallest structure.
The Hawaii हॉटस्पॉट is a volcanic hotspot स्तिथ निकट the namesake हवाई Islands, in the उत्तरी प्रशांत Ocean.
एक of the most well-known and heavily studied hotspots in the world, the हवाई plume is जिम्मेदार लिये the सृष्टि of the हवाई – Emperor seamount chain, an over 5,800 किलोमीटर ( 3,600 mi ) long chain of ज्वालामुखी, चार of जिससे are क्रियाशील, two of which are dormant, और more than 123 of जिससे हैं extinct, many having चूंकि महरूम मैदान beneath the waves by अपरदन as seamounts and atolls.
The chain extends इससे दक्षिण of the द्वीप of हवाई to the edge of the Aleutian गर्त, निकट the पूर्वी किनारे of Russia.
जबकि most volcanoes are created by geological activity at tectonic थाली boundaries, the Hawaii हॉटस्पॉट is located far इससे nearby plate boundaries ; the क्लासिक hotspot सिद्धान्त, first प्रस्तावित in 1963 by John Tuzo विल्सन, proposes that a single, fixed mantle plume builds volcanoes that तब, cut off from their source by the movement of the Pacific Plate, become increasingly निष्क्रिय और आखिरकार इरोड नीचे sea level over millions of सालो.
According to this सिद्धान्त, the nearly 60° बेंड separating the सम्राट and हवाई खण्ड of the chain थी caused by a sudden shift in the गति of the प्रशांत थाली.
In 2003, भैस investigations of this irregularity led to the proposal of a मोबाईल हॉटस्पॉट सिद्धान्त, suggesting कि hotspots are mobile, नहीं फिक्स्ड, and कि the 47 million साल बूढ़ा बेंड was caused by a शिफ़्ट in the hotspot 's motion बल्कि than the plate 's.
प्राचीन hawaiians were the first to recognize the increasing age and weathered state of the volcanoes to the उत्तर as वे progressed on fishing रिझाने साथ the आइलैंड्स.
The volatile राज्य of the हवाई ज्वालामुखी and their constant बैटल साथ the समुद्र थी a major तत्व in हवाई mythology, समाविष्ट in Pele, the देवता of ज्वालामुखी.
After the आगमन of europeans on the द्वीप, in 1880-1881 जेम्स Dwight दाना directed the पहला formal geological study of the hotspot 's volcanics, confirming the relationship long observed by the natives.
1912 marked the founding of the हवाई ज्वालामुखी वेधशाला by volcanologist Thomas Jaggar, initiating continuous scientific observation of the आइलैंड्स.
in the 1970s, a mapping प्रोजेक्ट थी initiated to लाभ more information about the complex geology of हवाई 's seafloor.
The हॉटस्पॉट has since been tomographically imaged, प्रर्दशित it to be चौड़ी और up to गहन, और olivine और garnet -based अध्ययन have दिखाया इसके मैग्मा chamber is approximately.
In इसके at least 85 लाख सालो of activity the hotspot रै produced an अनुमानित of rock.
The chain 's rate of drift रै धीरे increased over time, causing the राशि of time each individual volcano is active to decrease, from 18 million years for the 76 लाख year old डेट्रॉयट seamount, to बस अंतर्गत 900,000 लिये the one लाख year-old Kohala ; on the other हाथ, eruptive आवाज़ रै increased इससे per साल to परिचय.
Overall, इस has caused a ट्रेंड towards more active but quickly-silenced, closely spaced volcanoes—whereas ज्वालामुखी on the near side of the हॉटस्पॉट overlap प्रत्येक other ( forming ऐसे superstructures as Hawaii island and the ancient मावी नुई ), the oldest of the Emperor seamounts are spaced as दूर as अलावा.
दाउद पामर, निदेशक of the दिखाएँ, घोषित that the ऋतु 4 finale is the श्रेणी finale क्युकी निकलोडियन canceled the show.
याचिकाएं are होने हस्ताक्षरित to लाओ the show for a पांचवां ऋतु.
the show airs on treehouse tv Canada and Nick Jr. ( formerly Noggin ).

Osteonecrosis of the जबड़ों ( onj ) is a कठोर अस्थि बीमारी that affects the maxilla and the mandible.
विभिन्न forms of ONJ have been described over the last 160 सालो, and a क्रमांक of कल्याणकारी have been suggested in the literature.
Osteonecrosis of the jaws संबद्ध साथ bisphosphonate चिकित्सा, जरूरी by some cancer उपचार regimens, रै महरूम पहचाना और पारिभाषित as a pathological entity चूंकि 2003.
the संभावित रिस्क from lower मौखिक doses of bisphosphonates, taken by मरीजों to prevent or treat ऑस्टियोपोरोसिस, remains अनिश्चित.
Various treatment विकल्प have been छान, however severe cases of ONJ still आवश्यकता सर्जिकल removal of the प्रभावित bone.
A thorough history and assessement of pre-existing प्रणालीगत समस्याएं and possible साइट of dental संक्रमण हैं जरूरी to सहायता prevent the कंडीशन, especially if bisphosphonate चिकित्सा is considered.
The Boston Red sox are a पेशेवर बेसबॉल team based in Boston, Massachusetts, और a member of Major लीग बेसबॉल 's अमरीकी लीग Eastern प्रभाग.
संस्थापित in as एक of the अमरीकी League 's eight चार्टर franchises, the रेड sox 's home ballpark has been fenway Park since.
The `` Red sox '' name थी चुनी by the team मालिक, John I. टेलर, around, following पिछला Boston टीमों कि had been ज्ञात as the `` Red stockings ``.
वे have played in 11 World Series, जीतना 7.
बोस्टन was a प्रबल team in the new league, defeating the पिट्सबर्ग Pirates in the पहला संसार श्रेणी in and winning चार अधिक championships by.
However, they then went into one of the longest championship droughts in बेसबॉल इतिहास, पुकारा by कुछ the `` Curse of the Bambino `` after इसके alleged शुरूआत साथ the रेड sox 's sale of Babe Ruth to the प्रतिद्वंद्वी Yankees two सालो after उनके संसार चैंपियनशिप in 1918, an 86-year इंतजार पहले the team 's छठे संसार चैंपियनशिप in.
however, the टोली 's history दौरान कि काल थी hardly एक of futility, लकिन थी बल्कि punctuated with some of the सबसे यादगार पल in World Series history, सहित enos Slaughter 's `` mad डैश `` in, the `` नामुमकिन Dream `` of, कार्लटन फिस्क 's home run in, और Bill Buckner 's error in.
Red Sox history रै भी been चिह्नित by the team 's intense फंसने साथ the नई York यांकीज़, arguably the fiercest और सबसे ऐतिहासिक in उत्तर American पेशेवर खेल.
the Boston रेड sox are स्वामित्व by Fenway खेल Group, जो also own Liverpool फ़ुटबॉल क्लबों of the Premier लीग in इंग्लैण्ड.
The रेड Sox are consistently one of the top MLB teams in औसत road attendance, जबकि the small capacity of fenway पार्क रोकता them इससे अग्रणी in overall उपस्थिति.
इससे May 15, 2003 to April 10, 2013, the रेड sox sold out प्रत्येक home game-a total of 820 games ( 794 regular season ) लिये a major पेशेवर sports record that lasted almost a दशक.
mince pie भर साथ mincemeat
mincemeat is a मिश्रण of कटा सूखी fruit, distilled आत्माओं और spices, and sometimes beef suet, beef, or venison.
originally, mincemeat always contained मांस.
अनेक आधुनिक recipes contain beef suet, हालांकि vegetable shortening is sometimes used in इसके प्लेस.
विसंगतियाँ of mincemeat हैं found in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, ब्रिटनी, Canada, उत्तरी यूरोपीय, Ireland, दक्षिण Africa, the संयुक्त किंगडम and the संयुक्त States.
in some देशों the पद mincemeat refers to minced or ground meat.
डायना, Princess of वेल्स ( डायना Frances ; née स्पेंसर ; 1 July 1961 – 31 August 1997 ) थी the first wife of Charles, Prince of Wales, the ज्येष्ठ son और वारिस apparent of महारानी Elizabeth II.
She was well ज्ञात लिये उसके fund-raising work for अंतरराष्ट्रीय धर्मार्थ और as an प्रतिष्ठित हस्ती of the late 20th century.
उसके विवाह to the प्रिंस of वेल्स on 29 जुलाई 1981 was आयोजित at St Paul 's Cathedral और देखी by a वैश्विक टेलीविज़न दर्शक of over 750 million.
While married वो bore the titles Princess of वेल्स, Duchess of कॉर्नवॉल, Duchess of Rothesay, Countess of चेस्टर and बैरोनेस of renfrew.
the विवाह produced two sons, the princes William और हैरी, जो became second and third in line to the British सिंहासन.
डायना थी born into an वैभवशाली अंग्रेज़ी परिवार साथ royal ancestry.
वो was the fourth child of जॉन स्पेंसर, 8th Earl Spencer and उसके wife Frances, daughter of Maurice रोश, 4th Baron fermoy.
She became a public figure with the घोषणा of उसके सगाई.
वो भी प्राप्त मान्यता for her charity work and for her support of the International Campaign to Ban landmines.
इससे 1989, वो थी the president of the Great Ormond गली Hospital लिये children, in addition to दर्जनों of other charities.
Diana remained the object of विश्वव्यापी मीडिया scrutiny दौरान and after her विवाह, which ended in divorce on 28 August 1996.
मीडिया attention and पब्लिक शोक यहूद considerable following her मौत in a car crash in पेरिस on 31 August 1997.
अर्जेंटीना, officially the Argentine गणतंत्र ( ), is the दूसरी largest country in both दक्षिण अमेरिका और the Latin अमेरिका प्रदेश.
The देश is a federation of 23 provinces और the autonomous city of Buenos Aires, its capital और largest city.
it is the eighth -largest country in the संसार by जमीन area और the largest among Spanish-speaking nations by geographical area of 2,780,400 km2 और is the fourth by population, साथ over 41 लाख people.
अर्जेंटीना is a founding member of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र, Mercosur, the संघ of South अमरीकी राष्ट्र, the संगठन of ibero-american States, the संसार Bank समूह और the World व्यापार संगठन, and is one of the G-15 and g-20 major economies.
Argentina is स्तिथ in दक्षिण अमेरिका, bordered by चिली to the वेस्ट and दक्षिण, Bolivia और Paraguay to the उत्तर और ब्राज़ील and Uruguay to the पूर्वोत्तर.
Argentina दावा sovereignty over भाग of Antarctica, the Falkland Islands ( ) और South जॉर्जिया और the South सैंडविच आइलैंड्स.
Argentina is the successor राज्य of the Viceroyalty of the Río de la Plata, an overseas colony of the Spanish Empire.
Argentina declared स्वतंत्रता दौरान the अर्जेंटाइन War of स्वतंत्रता, जिससे थी followed by the अर्जेंटाइन Civil युद्धों during सबसे of the 19th century.
the देश faced several military coups and राजनैतिक अस्थिरता during the 20th सदी, साथ with periodic आर्थिक crisis that continue to इस day.
A पहचाना दक्षिणी Cone power, और middle शक्ति, Argentina is Latin अमेरिका 's third-largest अर्थव्यवस्था, with a `` बहुत ऊँची '' दरजा on the इंसान development अनुक्रमणिका.
भीतर लैटिन America, Argentina रै the fifth highest nominal जीडीपी per capita and the उच्चतम in खरीदना power terms.
the Legatum Institute have argued that the country रै a `` foundation for future growth due to its market आकार, levels of विदेशी direct निवेश, और प्रतिशत of high-tech निर्यात as share of total manufactured goods '', and it is classed by निवेशकों as middle emerging अर्थव्यवस्था.
Argentina is the लैटिन अमरीकी देश साथ the most Nobel Prizes, लिये a total of five, सब प्राप्त दौरान the दूसरी half of the twentieth century.
the देश has three नोबेल prizes in विज्ञान and दो of सलाम.
the most महत्वपूर्ण aspects of science और प्रौद्योगिकी in अर्जेंटीना हैं concerned with medicine, nuclear physics, biotechnology, nanotechnology, space और प्रक्षेपास्त्र technology and several फ़ील्ड related to the देश 's Main Economic क्रियाएँ.
The country also रै the आचमन प्रदर्शनी center of science, प्रौद्योगिकी, industry and art that are लैटिन अमेरिका 's largest.

Polyethylene terephthalate ( sometimes written poly ( एथिलीन terephthalate ) ), commonly abbreviated पालतु, PETE, or the obsolete petp or PET-P, is a thermoplastic polymer resin of the पॉलिएस्टर family and is प्रयुक्त in सिंथेटिक मछली ; पेय, food and other liquid containers ; thermoforming applications ; और अभियान्त्रिकी resins often in combination साथ कांच fiber.
the पद polyethylene terephthalate is a सोर्स of confusion because this पदार्थ, पालतु, does not contain polyethylene.
Thus, the alternate रूप, बहु ( एथिलीन terephthalate ), is often used in scholarly जर्नल्स लिये the खातिर of सटीकता and clarity.
Depending on इसके processing और thermal history, polyethylene terephthalate may मौजूद both as an amorphous ( transparent ) और as a semi-crystalline पॉलिमर.
the semicrystalline material might appear पारदर्शी ( कण आकार < 500 nm ) or opaque और श्वेत ( particle आकार up to a few माइक्रोन ) depending on its crystal structure and particle आकार.
इसके monomer ( bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate ) can be synthesized by the esterification प्रतिक्रिया between terephthalic एसिड and ethylene glycol with water as a byproduct, or by transesterification reaction between ethylene ग्लाइकोल और dimethyl terephthalate with methanol as a byproduct.
बहुलकीकरण is through a polycondensation reaction of the monomers ( done तत्काल बाद esterification/transesterification ) साथ जल as the byproduct.
The बहुमत of the world 's पालतु उत्पादन is लिये synthetic fibers ( in excess of 60 % ), with bottle उत्पादन हिसाब लिये around 30 % of वैश्विक माँग.
In the context of textile अनुप्रयोग, PET is referred to by इसके common name, `` polyester, '' whereas the एक्रोनिम `` PET '' is generally used in relation to packaging.
पॉलिएस्टर makes up परिचय 18 % of संसार पॉलिमर production and is the third-most-produced पॉलिमर ; polyethylene ( pe ) and polypropylene ( PP ) हैं first और second, respectively.
पालतु consists of polymerized units of the मोनोमर ethylene terephthalate, साथ repeating c10h8o4 इकाई.
PET is commonly recycled, and रै the क्रमांक `` 1 '' as its रीसाइक्लिंग प्रतीक.

ब्लैक pudding, blood खीर or blood सॉसेज is a type of sausage made by cooking रक्त or सूखी blood with a फिलर until it is thick पर्याप्त to congeal जब cooled.
The dish exists in various संस्कृतियों इससे Asia to यूरोपीय and the Americas.
सुअर, चौपायों, शीप, बतख, और बकरी blood can be used depending on अलग countries.
in Europe and the americas, typical fillers शामिल मांस, मोटे, suet, ब्रैड, cornmeal, मीठी potato, onion, chestnuts, जौ, and oatmeal.
In स्पेन, Portugal और एशिया, आलू is often replaced by rice.
शेयरधारक may refer to:
शेयरधारक ( corporate ), a व्यक्ति, समूह, organization, सदस्य or प्रणाली who affects or can be प्रभावित by an संगठन 's क्रियाएँ
Stakeholder, an entity that can be affected by the परिणाम of कि in जिससे वे are कहा to be हितधारकों, i.e., कि in which they have a हिस्सेदारी.
प्रोजेक्ट stakeholder, a व्यक्ति, group or organization साथ an interest in a project
Stakeholder सिद्धान्त, a सिद्धान्त that identifies और models the groups which are stakeholders of a corporation or प्रोजेक्ट
शेयरधारक विश्लेषण, the प्रक्रम of identifying those affected by a project or event
Stakeholder ( law ), a third पार्टी जो temporarily holds धन or प्रॉपर्टी जबकि इसके मालिक is still होने determined
जोकर smight ( कूच 9, 1925 - September 1, 2003 ) was an अमरीकी theatre and फिल्मी निदेशक.
smight was born in Minneapolis, Minnesota and went to school with future कर्ता Peter Graves.
His फिल्मी क्रेडिट include the traveling Executioner, खरगोश, Run, Loving Couples, मिडवे, हार्पर, Airport 1975, फटकार Alley and the Emmy Award -winning एडी, as well as many एपीसोड of टेलीविज़न series ऐसे as the गोधूलि Zone और The अल्फ्रेड Hitchcock घंटा.
He also निर्देशित the 1960 ब्रॉडवे play the 49th cousin and composed the म्यूज़िक लिये the फिल्मी adaption of Roll of Thunder Hear my Cry.
smight died इससे cancer in लॉस Angeles, California.
dmitri ivanovich Mendeleev ( ; 8 February 1834 – 2 फ़रवरी 1907 O.S. 27 जनवरी 1834 – 20 जनवरी 1907 ) was a Russian केमिस्ट and inventor.
he formulated the Periodic विधि, created his अपना version of the periodic तालिका of elements, और प्रयुक्त it to correct the गुण of some already discovered elements और भी to predict the गुण of तत्व yet to be खोजा !
Modesto ( Spanish for `` modest '' ), officially the नगर of modesto, is the county सीट and largest city of stanislaus County, California, संयुक्त राज्य.
With a population of लगभग 201,165 at the 2010 census, Modesto ranks as the 18th largest city in the राज्य of California.
The modesto Census County Division, जिससे शामिल the शहरों of ceres और riverbank, has a population of 312,842 as of 2010.
Modesto is स्तिथ in the सेंट्रल valley area of Northern कैलिफ़ोर्निया, 90 मील उत्तर of Fresno, 92 miles ईस्ट of सैन Francisco, 68 मील south of the राज्य capital of sacramento, 66 मील वेस्ट of yosemite नेशनल Park, and 24 miles दक्षिण of स्टॉकटन.
modesto, a 29-time पेड़ City USA honoree, is surrounded by rich farmland, lending to a रैंकिंग for the county as 6th among सब California काउंटी in farm production.
Led by मिल्क, बादाम, मुर्गियों, walnuts, and corn साइलेज, the काउंटी grossed nearly $ 3.1 billion in agricultural production in 2011.
Modesto was immortalized in the 1973 George लुकास फिल्मी American Graffiti.
the पुरस्कार जीतना फिल्मी captured the स्पिरिट of `` cruising '' और दोस्ती on 10th और 11th Streets in 1962 and led to the पुनरुद्धार of 1950 's nostalgia that शामिल the TV show प्रसन्न दिनों और the other spin-offs.
रॉन हावर्ड, Harrison Ford और Richard dreyfuss starred in the film.
the साउंडट्रैक थी a huge success.
निदेशक George Lucas is a native of modesto, graduating from Downey ऊँची स्कूल in 1962.
The Gallup-Healthways Well-Being अनुक्रमणिका लिये 2011, which साक्षात्कार 1,000 participants daily और asks individuals to assess their कार्य, finances, शारीरिक health, emotional राज्य of दिमाग और समुदायों, ranked Modesto 126 आउट of the 190 शहरों surveyed.
In दिसम्बर 2009, फोर्ब्स क्रमित Modesto 48th आउट of 100 among `` Best Bang-for-the-Buck शहरों ''.
in इस रैंकिंग, Modesto क्रमित 8th in housing affordability और travel समय but also ranked 86th in जॉब forecast विकास और 99th in foreclosures.
स्वतंत्रता दिन, commonly known as the चौथी of July, is a federal holiday in the संयुक्त States commemorating the adoption of the Declaration of स्वतंत्रता on जुलाई 4, 1776, declaring स्वतंत्रता इससे the Kingdom of Great Britain.
स्वतंत्रता Day is commonly संबद्ध with आतिशबाजी, parades, barbecues, carnivals, fairs, picnics, कॉन्सर्ट, baseball खेल, family reunions, and राजनैतिक speeches and ceremonies, in addition to विभिन्न अन्य पब्लिक and निजी कार्यक्रम celebrating the इतिहास, government, and परंपराओं of the संयुक्त States.
Independence दिन is the नेशनल day of the संयुक्त States.
a gender प्रतीक denotes the sex of an organism or characterizes an agent by लिंग.
The two मानक लिंग symbols denoting पुरूष ♂ और मादा ♀ are निकला इससे astrological प्रतीकों, denoting the classical planets मंगल and Venus, क्रमशः.
These प्रतीकों have been in उपयोग चूंकि the पुनर्जागरण भी denoting elements in alchemy, specifically the धातुओं आयरन और copper.
They were first प्रयुक्त to denote the effective लिंग of पौधे ( i.e. sex of individual in a given crossbreed, since सबसे plants हैं hermaphroditic ) by carolus लीनियस in 1751.
A leasehold estate is an ownership of a temporary right to थाम जमीन or प्रॉपर्टी in which a lessee or a किरायेदार holds अधिकारों of रियल property by some form of title from a lessor or landlord.
Although a किरायेदार करता थाम अधिकारों to रियल प्रॉपर्टी, a leasehold estate is typically considered निजी property.
Leasehold is a form of land tenure or property tenure जहाँ एक पार्टी buys the right to occupy land or a भवन for a दिए length of समय.
as पट्टे is a विधिक estate, leasehold एस्टेट can be bought और sold on the open market.
A leasehold यूँ differs इससे a freehold or fee सरल where the ownership of a property is purchased outright and thereafter आयोजित for an indeterminate लंबाई of time, and also differs from a tenancy where a प्रॉपर्टी is let ( rented ) on a periodic आधार such as weekly or मासिक.
जबतक the end of the पट्टे काल ( often measured in दशकों or centuries ; a 99 year पट्टे is काफी आम ) the leaseholder रै the सही to remain in occupation as an assured किरायेदार paying an सहमत किराया to the मालिक.
Terms of the अनुबंध are contained in a पट्टे, जिससे has तत्व of contract and property law intertwined.
the पद एस्टेट लिये सालो may occasionally be प्रयुक्त.
इस refers to a leasehold एस्टेट for कोई विशिष्ट काल of time ( the word `` सालो '' is भ्रामक ).
an एस्टेट for सालो is नहीं automatically नवीनीकृत.
Colloquially, `` lease '' और `` leasing `` are प्रायः a formalization of a longer, specific period as compared with a `` rental '' कि निर्मित a tenancy at will, terminable or renewable at the समाप्त of a छोटी काल.
ओलिविया ( also ज्ञात as स्वागत to the संसार of the Pig ओलिविया ) is a british-american children 's animated television series उत्पादित by media कम्पनी Chorion और आधारित on Ian falconer 's किताबे.

Location of Panama between Pacific ( bottom ) और caribbean ( top ), साथ canal at top बीच
the Panama Canal ( ) is a ship canal in Panama that connects the Atlantic Ocean ( via the caribbean Sea ) to the प्रशांत Ocean.
The कनाल cuts आरपार the Isthmus of पनामा and is a कुंजी conduit लिये international मेरीटाइम व्यापार.
वहीँ are ताले at each end to lift ships up to Gatun झील ( ऊपर sea-level ).
Gatun Lake was created to reduce the amount of कार्य जरूरी for the canal.
The वर्तमान locks हैं wide.
A third, wider लेन of locks is होने built.
फ़्रांस began कार्य on the canal in 1881, but had to रोकें because of अभियान्त्रिकी समस्याएं और high mortality due to बीमारी.
the United States ( us ) later took over the प्रोजेक्ट and took a दशक to पूरा the canal in 1914, enabling जहाजों to avoid the lengthy Cape Horn रूट around the southernmost tip of South America ( via the Drake Passage ) or to navigate the जलसन्धि of magellan.
One of the largest और सबसे difficult अभियान्त्रिकी projects ever undertaken, the Panama Canal शॉर्टकट made it संभावित लिये ships to सफर between the अटलांटिक और Pacific महासागर in हाफ the time previously जरूरी.
The shorter, faster, safer route to the us वेस्ट Coast और to राष्ट्र in and along the Pacific समंदर allowed those स्थान to become more integrated साथ the world economy.
During this time, ownership of the territory that is now the पनामा कनाल was first कोलम्बियाई, then फ्रेंच, and then American ; the United राज्य completed the construction.
the कनाल थी लिया over in 1999 by the panamanian सरकारी, as long नियोजित.
Annual ट्रैफ़िक रै risen from परिचय 1,000 जहाजों when the कनाल opened in 1914, to 14,702 vessels in 2008, the latter measuring a कुल of 309.6 लाख Panama canal/universal मापन System ( pc/ums ) tons.
By 2008, अधिक than 815,000 बरतन था passed through the canal, अनेक of them much larger than the असली planners could have envisioned ; the largest जहाजों कि can transit the canal today are called panamax.
The American Society of सिविल Engineers रै named the Panama Canal एक of the सात wonders of the आधुनिक संसार.
बेंजामिन Franklin ( अप्रैल 17, 1790 ) was एक of the Founding Fathers of the संयुक्त राज्य.
a विख्यात बहुश्रुत, Franklin was a leading author, printer, राजनैतिक theorist, राजनेता, postmaster, वैज्ञानिक, संगीतकार, आविष्कारक, satirist, नागरिक activist, statesman, और diplomat.
as a वैज्ञानिक, he was a major फिगर in the अमरीकी Enlightenment और the इतिहास of physics for उसके discoveries और theories regarding विद्युत.
He invented the lightning rod, bifocals, the फ्रैंकलिन stove, a carriage odometer, और the glass 'armonica '.
He facilitated अनेक civic संगठन, including a आग department and a university.
फ्रैंकलिन earned the शीर्षक of `` the First अमरीकी '' for उसके early और indefatigable campaigning for औपनिवेशिक एकता ; as an लेखक and प्रवक्ता in लंदन for several colonies, then as the पहला United States दूत to फ़्रांस, he exemplified the उभरते American nation.
फ्रैंकलिन थी foundational in धमक the अमरीकी ethos as a marriage of the practical values of thrift, मुश्किल work, शिक्षा, community स्पिरिट, self-governing institutions, and opposition to authoritarianism दोनो political and religious, साथ the scientific and tolerant मान of the आत्मज्ञान.
In the शब्द of historian हेनरी Steele commager, `` In a Franklin could be मिलाया the virtues of Puritanism without its दोषों, the illumination of the Enlightenment without इसके heat. ''
to वाल्टर isaacson, this makes Franklin `` the सबसे accomplished American of his age and the most influential in inventing the type of society अमेरिका would become. ''
फ्रैंकलिन, always गर्व of his working class roots, became a कामयाब समाचारपत्र एडिटर and मुद्रक in फिलाडेल्फिया, the leading city in the colonies.
He was भी partners with विलियम गोडार्ड और जोसेफ Galloway the three of whom प्रकाशित the पेन्सिलवेनिया वृत्तान्त, a समाचारपत्र कि थी ज्ञात लिये its क्रांतिकारी sentiments और criticisms of the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य in the अमरीकी colonies.
he became धनवान publishing Poor रिचर्ड 's almanack और the पेन्सिलवेनिया गजट.
Franklin gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय renown as a scientist for his प्रसिद्ध experiments in electricity और लिये his अनेक inventions, especially the बिजली लाठी.
He निभाई a प्रमुख role in establishing the University of Pennsylvania and थी elected the first president of the American Philosophical समाज.
फ्रैंकलिन became a national hero in अमेरिका when he पथप्रदर्शन the effort to have पार्लियामेंट repeal the unpopular स्टैम्प Act.
an संपन्नता राजनयिक, he थी widely admired among the फ्रेंच as अमरीकी मंत्री to पेरिस और थी a major figure in the विकास of positive franco-american relations.
लिये many years he थी the British postmaster for the colonies, जिससे enabled उसे to set up the first national संचार संजाल.
He थी active in जातियाँ affairs, औपनिवेशिक and state politics, as well as national और international affairs.
इससे 1785 to 1788, he served as राज्यपाल of Pennsylvania.
Toward the end of his जीवन, he freed his slaves और became one of the most prominent abolitionists.
His colorful जीवन और legacy of scientific और राजनैतिक achievement, और status as one of अमेरिका 's most influential Founding fathers, have देखी Franklin honored on coinage and money ; warships ; the names of many towns, counties, educational institutions, namesakes, और companies ; and more than two सदियां after his death, countless सांस्कृतिक references.
दण्ड Minds is an अमरीकी पुलिस प्रक्रियात्मक television कार्यक्रम कि premiered सितंबर 22, 2005, on सीबीएस.
The श्रेणी फ़ॉलो a team of profilers इससे the एफबीआई 's Behavioral विश्लेषण ईकाई ( bau ) आधारित in क्वांटिको, वर्जिनिया.
the BAU is भाग of the FBI नेशनल बीच for the विश्लेषण of हिंसक Crime.
The दिखाएँ differs from अनेक procedural dramas by focusing on प्रोफाइलिंग the criminal, बल्कि than the अपराधों itself.
The दिखाएँ is उत्पादित by The चिह्नित Gordon कम्पनी in संघ with सीबीएस Television studios ( originally Paramount Network टेलीविज़न तब सीबीएस Paramount संजाल टेलीविज़न ) और ABC studios ( originally Touchstone टेलीविज़न ).
सीबीएस announced in अक्तूबर 2009 कि विरासत Interactive होता develop a video game based on the show.
the game would आवश्यकता players to जाँचें crime दृश्यों लिये clues to सहायता solve murder रहस्यों.
the interactive puzzle game थी released in 2012, but did not feature any of the आवाज़ें of the show 's cast, nor थी the cast शामिल with the project.
On March 14, 2012, CBS नवीनीकृत दण्ड minds लिये an eighth ऋतु, जिससे premiered on सितंबर 26, 2012.
`` Heart-Shaped बक्सा '' is a सोंग by the अमरीकी grunge band Nirvana, written by vocalist और guitarist Kurt Cobain.
the सोंग थी released as the first सिंगल इससे the समूह 's तीसरा and फाइनल studio एल्बम, in Utero, in 1993.
it थी one of दो songs इससे the album मिश्रित by स्कॉट litt in अनुक्रम to augment the original उत्पादन by निर्माता Steve albini.
While निर्वाण 's label DGC रिकॉर्ड किया not रिलीज a physical सिंगल लिये sale in the संयुक्त States, `` Heart-Shaped बक्सा '' प्राप्त much अमरीकी radio airplay, reaching number एक on the Billboard आधुनिक चट्टान ट्रैक्स chart.
the अंतरराष्ट्रीय रिलीज of the single reached क्रमांक five on the UK singles चार्ट.
The song 's music video, directed by एंटोन corbijn, garnered नाजुक plaudits.
the orbital गति of a देह, generally a planet, a प्राकृतिक उपग्रह, an artificial उपग्रह, or a multiple स्टार, is the गति at which it orbits around the barycenter of a प्रणाली, usually around a अधिक massive body.
it can be प्रयुक्त to refer to either the mean कक्षीय speed, the average गति as it completes an कक्षा, or instantaneous कक्षीय speed, the speed at a particular पाइंट in इसके orbit.
the orbital speed at कोई स्थिति in the orbit can be computed from the अलहदा to the सेंट्रल देह at कि position, and the विशिष्ट orbital energy, which is independent of स्थिति : the kinetic उर्जा is the कुल उर्जा minus the संभावित उर्जा.
Brown राजमहल आंतरिक और Atrium
Brown राजमहल होटल is the second-oldest operating होटल in Denver, Colorado और is एक of the पहला atrium-style hotel कभी built.
it is अभी operated by कोरम होटल and Resorts.
it थी built in 1892, एक year later than the ऑक्सफोर्ड होटल.
It was नामित लिये its original मालिक, हेनरी C. भूरा, और was designed with इसके odd triangular आकार by architect फ़्रैंक edbrooke.
the होटल is स्तिथ at 321 17th St, Denver, co between 17th Street, Broadway और tremont Street/Pl in downtown Denver behind the गणतंत्र Plaza.
The main प्रवेश द्वार is on tremont गली.
DVD-Video is a उपभोक्ता video format used to store digital video on DVD discs, और is currently the dominant उपभोक्ता वीडियो format in Asia, उत्तर America, Europe, और Australia.
Discs using the DVD-Video specification require a dvd ड्राइव और an h.262/mpeg-2 Part 2 decoder ( e.g., a DVD player, or a कंप्यूटर DVD ड्राइव साथ a तन्त्र DVD player ).
Commercial dvd फिल्मों हैं encoded using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 compressed वीडियो और ऑडियो of varying formats ( प्रायः multi-channel स्वरुप as described नीचे ).
typically, the data rate लिये DVD फिल्मों सीमाएँ from 3 mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s, and the बिट rate is प्रायः अनुकूली.
It थी first उपलब्धियाँ लिये खुदरा around 1997.
The dvd-video specification थी created by DVD Forum और can be प्राप्त from DVD Format/Logo Licensing निगम लिये a शुल्क of $ 5,000.
the specification is नहीं सरेआम उपलब्धियाँ, because every सदस्य must sign a non-disclosure agreement.
Certain information in the dvd Book is proprietary और गोपनीय.
The nautical mile ( symbol M, nm or nmi ) is a unit of लंबाई कि is परिचय one minute of चाप of अक्षांश measured along any meridian, or about एक मिनट of arc of देशांतर at the equator.
by अंतरराष्ट्रीय अनुबंध it रै महरूम नियत at 1,852 मीटर exactly ( about 6,076 feet ).
it is a non- SI ईकाई ( although accepted for उपयोग in the International प्रणाली of इकाई by the BIPM ) प्रयुक्त especially by navigators in the shipping और विमानन उद्योग, और भी in ध्रुवीय exploration.
It is commonly प्रयुक्त in international विधि and treaties, विशेषकर regarding the हद of territorial waters.
it विकसित इससे the समुद्र मील and the सम्बन्धित geographical मील.
The nautical mile remains in use by समुद्र और air navigators विश्वव्यापी because of इसके convenience जब working with चार्ट.
सबसे nautical चार्ट use the Mercator प्रक्षेप जिनकी स्केल varies by परिचय a factor of छह इससे the equator to 80° latitude, so charts covering विशाल क्षेत्रों can नहीं उपयोग a single रैखिक scale.
The nautical मील is nearly equal to a मिनट of अक्षांश on a chart, so a अलहदा measured with a chart divider can be roughly converted to nautical मील using the चार्ट 's latitude स्केल.
Shippensburg is a बरो in कम्बरलैंड and फ्रैंकलिन काउंटी in the u.S. state of पेन्सिलवेनिया.
Settled in 1730, shippensburg झूठ in the Cumberland Valley, 41 miles ( 66 km ) west-southwest of Harrisburg, और is भाग of the Harrisburg– Carlisle महानगर सांख्यिकीय Area.
in 1900, 3,228 लोगों lived वहीँ ; in 1910, 3,457 ; and in 1940, 5,244 लोगों lived there.
the जनसांख्यिकी थी 5,492 at the 2010 census.
shippensburg थी incorporated as a बरो on January 21, 1819.
in the पास्ट, वहीँ were फर्नीचर कारखानों, इंजन और pump works, और अन्य industrial works स्तिथ within the कस्बा.
shippensburg is also the home of The beistle Company, the oldest और largest निर्माता of decorations और party goods, which sells its distinctive honeycomb पेपर सजावट विश्वव्यापी.
It is भी the location of Pague and Fegan, the oldest लगातार संचालित hardware स्टोर in Pennsylvania.
In may 2012, Volvo निर्माण उपकरण began a $ 100 लाख expansion प्रोजेक्ट to लाओ इसके अमरीकी headquarters to shippensburg.
shippensburg is also home to shippensburg University of पेन्सिलवेनिया, one of 14 विश्वविद्यालयों of the पेन्सिलवेनिया State प्रणाली of Higher शिक्षा.
वार्षिक the पिछला full सप्ताह of जुलाई, the shippensburg जातियाँ Fair is आयोजित.
begun in 1958, the मेला bills itself as पेन्सिलवेनिया 's largest bi-county fair.
The मेला शामिल agricultural exhibits, a craft show, food विक्रेता, और कार्निवल rides amongst अन्य things.
Every गर्मियाँ on the last Saturday of August, Shippensburg holds the Corn पर्व, an इवेंट that brings क्षेत्रीय artisans और विक्रेता to operate स्टैंड downtown.
The downtown is बंद to ट्रैफ़िक लिये at least 5 ब्लॉक for most of the day.
Average उपस्थिति at the पर्व is estimated at 60,000 - 70,000 each साल.
ब्लैक hairy tongue ( BHT, also termed lingua villosa nigra ) refers to a condition of the tongue जहाँ the filiform papillae elongate साथ ब्लैक or भूरा discoloration, giving a ब्लैक and hairy appearance.
The appearance may be alarming, लकिन it is a harmless कंडीशन.
Predisposing factors include धूम्रपान, xerostomia ( शुष्क मुँह ), नरम आहार, poor मौखिक hygiene और certain medications.
प्रबन्धन is by improving oral hygiene, विशेषकर scraping or brushing the tongue.
The IEEE 1394 इंटरफ़ेस is a serial बस interface मानक for high-speed संचार and isochronous real-time आंकड़ा transfer.
it was developed in the लेट 1980s और early 1990s by ठहराना, जो पुकारा it FireWire.
The 1394 इंटरफ़ेस is comparable to usb, और often those two technologies हैं considered साथ, हालांकि USB रै अधिक मार्केट share.
Apple पहला शामिल FireWire in some of इसके 1999 models, और सबसे ठहराना कंप्यूटर चूंकि the year 2000 have शामिल firewire पोर्ट, though, as of 2013, nothing beyond the 800 version ( ieee-1394b ).
the इंटरफ़ेस is भी ज्ञात by the brand i.LINK ( सोनी ), and लिंक्स ( टेक्सास यंत्र ).
आईईईई 1394 replaced parallel SCSI in अनेक अनुप्रयोग, क्युकी of lower implementation लागत and a सरलीकृत, more adaptable cabling system.
the 1394 standard also defines a backplane interface, though इस is नहीं as widely used.
IEEE 1394 is the high-definition Audio-Video संजाल गठबंधन ( HANA ) मानक connection इंटरफ़ेस लिये A/V ( audio/visual ) component संचार and कंट्रोल.
firewire is भी उपलब्धियाँ in बेतार, रेशा optic, और समाक्षीय संस्करण using the isochronous प्रोटोकॉल.
स्टीफन `` Stevie '' रे Vaughan ( October 3, 1954 – August 27, 1990 ) was an American guitarist, singer-songwriter, और record producer.
प्रायः referred to by his initials srv, vaughan is बेहतरीन known as a founding member and नेता of दोगुना Trouble.
Together with वादक क्रिस Layton और bassist Tommy शैनन, they ignited the blues revival of the 1980s.
साथ a करियर spanning seven सालो, vaughan और दोगुना Trouble consistently sold out concerts जबकि their एल्बम frequently went सुनहरा.
he was born और raised in डलास, टेक्सास, and for a छोटी period of time lived in Graham, टेक्सास.
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan, Vaughan प्रारंभ playing the guitar at आयु सात और formed अनेक bands कि occasionally performed in लोकल nightclubs.
at age 17, he dropped आउट of high school और moved to Austin to further pursue उसके musical करियर, joining समूह such as Krackerjack, the nightcrawlers, and the cobras.
in 1977, he formed ट्रिपल threat Revue, a बैंड that eventually evolved into Double Trouble और regularly performed around Austin.
in 1982, Vaughan and Double Trouble performed at the montreux Jazz Festival in Switzerland, catching the ध्यान of संगीतकारों दाउद बोवी और जैक्सन browne.
बोवी asked vaughan to play on उसके upcoming स्टुडियो album Let 's नृत्य, while Browne offered the बैंड फ़्री use of उसके personal स्टुडियो in Los एंजिल्स to record an album.
In March 1983, Vaughan और Double ट्रबल यहूद हस्ताक्षरित to Epic Records by veteran रिकार्ड निर्माता John Hammond Sr. और released उनके debut album, टेक्सास बाढ़ in June of that year.
After successful touring, the समूह released the albums, could n't स्टैंड the Weather ( 1984 ) और आत्मा to आत्मा ( 1985 ), the latter of which प्रदर्शित नई keyboardist Reese wynans.
हालांकि उसके करियर था progressed सफलतापूर्वक, Vaughan checked into a rehabilitation हॉस्पिटल in अटलांटा, Georgia to दे up a cocaine और alcohol आदत और returned to touring साथ the बैंड.
In June 1989, In Step was released और earned उन्हें a Grammy Award for बेहतरीन Contemporary ब्लूज़ प्रदर्शन.
on August 27, 1990, vaughan थी killed in a helicopter क्रैश following a प्रदर्शन in East Troy, विस्कॉन्सिन.
vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet तीव्र style was derived from a variety of musical जाति.
He was influenced by ब्लूज़ संगीतकारों including अल्बर्ट किंग, Freddie किंग, ओटिस फटाफट, और Muddy waters, और चट्टान guitarists such as Jimi हेंड्रिक्स और Lonnie mack.
His guitar playing reflected the क्लासिक blues and pentatonic तराजू.
He रै received wide नाजुक मान्यता लिये उसके गिटार playing, रैंकिंग at # 6 on रोलिंग पत्थरों सूची of `` 100 Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011.
he थी मरणोपरांत inducted into the ब्लूज़ हॉल of कीर्ति in 2000 और a memorial statue was erected in ऑस्टिन 's ऑडिटोरियम shores park.
Stevie Ray vaughan is widely considered to be one of the महानतम musicians to आइये from the state of टेक्सास.

In कंप्यूटर networking, gigabit Ethernet ( GbE or 1 gige ) is a term describing विभिन्न technologies for transmitting ईथरनेट frames at a rate of a gigabit per दूसरी ( 1,000,000,000 bits प्रति दूसरी ), as defined by the IEEE 802.3-2008 standard.
it आए into उपयोग beginning in 1999, gradually supplanting Fast ईथरनेट in wired local networks, where it performed considerably तेज़.
The केबल और equipment are बहुत समान to पिछला standards and यहूद very आम and economical by 2010.
half-duplex gigabit links कनेक्ट through hubs are allowed by the specification, but full-duplex उपयोग with switches is much more common.

The main components of a stamp:
1. Image
2. perforations
3. Denomination
4. देश नाम
a postage स्टैम्प is a छोटी टुकड़ा of पेपर that is purchased and displayed on an item of mail as प्रमाण of payment of postage.
typically, stamps हैं बना इससे special पेपर, with a national designation और denomination ( दाम ) on the फेस, और a gum चिपकने on the reverse side.
Postage stamps हैं purchased इससे a डाक administration or अन्य प्राधिकृत विक्रेता and are प्रयुक्त to अदा for the लागत involved in moving mail as well as अन्य कारोबार necessities ऐसे as insurance and पंजीकरण.
The stamp’s आकार is प्रायः that of a small rectangle of varying proportions, though triangles or other shapes are occasionally प्रयुक्त.
The stamp is affixed to an लिफाफा or अन्य डाक cover ( i.e., packet, बक्सा, mailing cylinder ) that the customer बधाइयां to send.
The मद is तब processed by the डाक system, where a postmark, sometimes known as a रद्दीकरण चिह्नित, is प्रायः लागू over the stamp and कवर ; this procedure marks the स्टैम्प as प्रयुक्त, जिससे रोकता its reuse.
the postmark indicates the date और point of origin of the mailing.
The mailed मद is then वितरित to the पता कि the customer has लागू to the लिफाफा or कवर.
postage stamps have facilitated the delivery of mail चूंकि the 1840s.
Before this time, ink और hand-stamps ( hence the word 'stamp ' ), usually made from लकडी or cork, यहूद प्रायः used to फ़्रैंक the mail और confirm the भुगतान of postage.
The first adhesive postage stamp, commonly referred to as the Penny ब्लैक, was issued in the संयुक्त Kingdom in 1840.
The आविष्कार of the स्टैम्प was a भाग of the attempt to सुधार और improve the डाक प्रणाली in the United Kingdom of ग्रेट Britain और Ireland, जिससे in the जल्दी 19th century थी in disarray और rife साथ corruption.
वहीँ हैं varying खाते of the आविष्कारक or आविष्कारक of the stamp.
पहले the परिचय of postage stamps, मेल in the uk थी paid लिये by the recipient, a प्रणाली that was associated साथ an irresolvable problem : the लागत of delivering मेल were नहीं recoverable by the postal service जब recipients were unable or unwilling to pay for delivered items, and प्रेषकों had no incentive to restrict the number, आकार, or weight of वस्तुएं भेजा, whether or not वे would ultimately be सशुल्क लिये.
the postage stamp resolved इस issue in a सरल और सुरुचिपूर्ण manner, with the अतिरिक्त benefit of रूम लिये an element of सौंदर्य to be introduced.
बाद related inventions include postal स्टेशनरी such as prepaid-postage लिफाफे, post ताश, lettercards, aerogrammes और wrappers, postage मीटर, and, अधिक recently, specialty boxes and envelopes provided free to the ग्राहक by the u.S. postal सेवा लिये priority or express mailing.
The postage स्टैम्प afforded convenience लिये दोनो the मेलर और डाक officials, more efficiently recovered लागत for the postal service, और ultimately resulted in a बेहतर, faster डाक प्रणाली.
साथ the conveniences stamps offered, उनके उपयोग resulted in greatly increased mailings दौरान the 19th and 20th centuries.
Postage stamps दौरान इस era were the सबसे लोकप्रिय way of paying for मेल, लकिन by the समाप्त of the 20th सदी were rapidly होने आत by the use of metered postage and बल्क mailing by व्यवसायों. )
The वही परिणाम with respect to संचार by private parties occurred over the last दशक of the 20th सदी and the पहला दशक of the 21st due to declining cost of long distance telephone संचार और the विकास और विस्फोटक स्प्रेड of electronic mailing ( `` e-mail '' via the Internet ) and bill paying systems था.
as postage stamps साथ their engraved imagery began to appear on a फैली basis, historians और collectors began to take सूचना.
The पढ़ाई of postage stamps and उनके use is referred to as philately.
स्टैम्प collecting can be दोनो a शौक and a form of ऐतिहासिक पढ़ाई और सन्दर्भ, as government-issued postage stamps और उनके mailing प्रणालियों have सदा been शामिल with the history of nations.
the विश्वविद्यालयों of अलबामा at बर्मिंघम ( uab ) is a public विश्वविद्यालयों in Birmingham in the U.S. state of अलबामा.
Developing from an एक्सटेंशन बीच स्थापित in 1936, the संस्था became an autonomous संस्था in 1969 and is आज एक of three institutions in the विश्वविद्यालयों of अलबामा System.
uab offers over 140 programs of study in 12 academic divisions leading to bachelor 's, master 's, doctoral, and professional डिग्री in the सोशल and behavioral sciences, the liberal arts, कारोबार, शिक्षा, engineering, and health-related fields such as medicine, dentistry, optometry, nursing, और public health.
the स्कूल is highly प्रसिद्ध for इसके medical research और प्राकृतिक sciences programs.
the uab स्वास्थ्य प्रणाली, एक of the largest अकादमिक चिकित्सा centers in the संयुक्त राज्य, is affiliated with the university.
UAB Hospital प्रायोजकों रेसिडेंसी programs in विभिन्न medical specialties, including internal आयुर्विज्ञान, न्यूरोलॉजी, सर्जरी, radiology, and anesthesiology.
uab हॉस्पिटल is the only ACS सत्यापित Level I trauma बीच in Alabama, as rated by the American कॉलेज of Surgeons Trauma Program.
uab is the state 's largest नियोक्ता, with more than 18,000 faculty and staff और over 53,000 कार्य at the विश्वविद्यालयों और in the स्वास्थ्य system.
an estimated 10 percent of the jobs in the Birmingham-Hoover Metropolitan क्षेत्रफल और 1 in 33 कार्य in the राज्य of अलबामा are directly or indirectly सम्बन्धित to uab.
The विश्वविद्यालयों 's overall सालाना आर्थिक impact was estimated to be $ 4.6 billion in 2010.
In the पतन of 2012, the विश्वविद्यालयों of Alabama at बर्मिंघम नामांकित 17,999 students from अधिक than 110 countries, सहित 1,605 freshmen.
वहीँ are योजनाएँ to commence with an `` aggressive '' विकास in नामांकन at UAB.
the वर्तमान uab President is dr. रे L. watts.
टोफू, also पुकारा bean दही, is a food made by coagulating सोया juice और तब दबाने the resulting curds into नरम white blocks.
It is a घटक in many East एशियाई and southeast Asian व्यंजन.
There हैं अनेक अलग किस्में of टोफू, including भैस टोफू and tofu कि has महरूम processed in कुछ way.
Tofu has a हल्का स्वाद और can be प्रयुक्त in savory and sweet dishes.
It is often seasoned or marinated to सूट the डिश.
Tofu originated in प्राचीन चीन some 2,000 years ago.
Chinese legend ascribes इसके आविष्कार to प्रिंस लियू An ( चाइनीज : 劉安 liú Ān, 179–122 bc ).
Tofu और its उत्पादन technique यहूद introduced into Korea and then Japan during the Nara काल.
it spread into other parts of ईस्ट एशिया as well.
This स्प्रेड likely coincided साथ the spread of buddhism because it is an important source of प्रोटीन in the शाकाहारी diet of East एशियाई Buddhism.
Li shizhen in the Ming Dynasty वर्णित a method of making tofu in bencao Gangmu.
टोफू has a low कैलोरी count, अपेक्षाकृत large amounts of प्रोटीन, and छोटी fat.
it is ऊँची in iron and depending on the coagulant used in निर्माण, may also be high in calcium and/or magnesium.
Bubbles ( born 1983 ) is a common चिंपैंजी, ज्ञात for होने the one-time pet of अमरीकी रिकॉर्डिंग artist Michael Jackson, जो bought the primate from a टेक्सास research facility in the जल्दी 1980s.
The animal थी a बारंबार सफर companion to the सिंगर, जिनकी अनुलग्नक to the एनिमल led to media mockery और, among अन्य कारकों, to a public perception of जैक्सन as an eccentric.
During the Bad World दौरे, for उदाहरण, Jackson brought Bubbles with him to जापानी, where वे both पिया tea साथ the mayor of ओसाका.
Bubbles was initially kept at the Jackson family 's home in encino, Los एंजिल्स, but थी स्थानांतरित to Neverland Ranch in 1988.
There, he slept in a crib in जैक्सन 's bedroom, used the singer 's प्रसाधन, and ate candy in the Neverland फिल्म theater.
in 2003 the public सीखे that, like सब खिलाते chimpanzees, Bubbles था matured into a विशाल and aggressive वयस्क chimp unsuitable as a साथी animal.
he was भेजा to a कैलिफ़ोर्निया animal प्रशिक्षक, जहाँ he थी reported to have attempted आत्महत्या.
When the प्रशिक्षक shut bas his operation in 2004, Bubbles थी स्थानांतरित to the Center for ग्रेट apes, a sanctuary in wauchula, Florida, where he रै जिया चूंकि 2005.
Muse are an अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान band from Teignmouth, देवों, जिससे formed in 1994.
The बैंड consists of school मित्रों Matthew Bellamy ( lead vocals, lead guitar, piano, keyboards, keytar ), Christopher wolstenholme ( bass, vocals, keyboards, लय गिटार, harmonica ) and Dominic Howard ( drums, percussion, synthesisers, sampling ).
Since the रिलीज of their 2006 album Black छेद और खुलासे, keyboardist और percussionist Morgan Nicholls रै performed live साथ the band.
Muse are known लिये their energetic और extravagant सजीव प्रदर्शन and their संलयन of many म्यूज़िक genres, including space चट्टान, progressive चट्टान, वैकल्पिक rock, भारी metal, शास्त्रीय म्यूज़िक और इलेक्ट्रॉनिका.
चिंतन have released छह studio एल्बम : showbiz ( 1999 ), उत्पत्ति of Symmetry ( 2001 ), Absolution ( 2003 ), Black छेद और Revelations ( 2006 ), The प्रतिरोध ( 2009 ) और The 2nd Law ( 2012 ).
वे have also जारी three live एल्बम, hullabaloo साउंडट्रैक ( 2002 ), जिससे is also a संकलन of b-sides, absolution Tour ( 2005 ), and haarp ( 2008 ), which documents the बैंड 's performances at वेम्बली Stadium in 2007.
ब्लैक छेद and खुलासे अर्जित the band a पारा पुरस्कार नामांकन and a तीसरा प्लेस समाप्त in the NME Albums of the साल सूची for 2006.
चिंतन have also जीती a संग्रहण of music पुरस्कार throughout उनके history, सहित five MTV Europe Music पुरस्कार, six Q Awards, आठ NME Awards, two ब्रिट पुरस्कार —winning `` बेहतरीन British Live अधिनियम '' twice, an एमटीवी वीडियो Music Award, four Kerrang !
Awards and an American म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार.
They यहूद भी मनोनीत for पाँच ग्रैमी Awards, of which they जीती बेहतरीन Rock एल्बम, लिये उनके पांचवां studio album the प्रतिरोध ( 2009 ).
Muse have बेची over 15 लाख albums विश्वव्यापी.
Bloemfontein (, ; Dutch लिये `` fountain of flowers '' ) is the capital city of the Free State प्रांत of दक्षिण Africa ; and, as the judicial capital of the nation, one of दक्षिण Africa 's तीन नेशनल राजधानी – the other दो होने Cape Town, the विधान capital, and Pretoria, the प्रशासनिक capital.
bloemfontein is popularly and poetically known as `` the city of गुलाब ``, owing to the प्रचुरता of these पुष्प और the annual rose पर्व आयोजित there.
The city 's sesotho नाम is mangaung, अर्थ `` प्लेस of cheetahs `` and it रै been शामिल in the Mangaung Local Municipality चूंकि 2000.
bloemfontein is situated on dry घासभूमि at, at an altitude of above समुद्र level.
The नगर is home to 369,568 निवासियों, जबकि the Mangaung Local नगरपालिका has a जनसांख्यिकी of 645,455.

The अर्थ of life is a philosophical question concerning the significance of जीवन or अस्तित्व in सामान्य.
it can also be expressed in अलग forms, ऐसे as `` Why हैं we here ? ``, `` कया is जीवन all परिचय ? ``, और `` What is the purpose of existence ? ''
it रै been the विषय of much philosophical, scientific, and theological speculation throughout history.
There have महरूम a विशाल क्रमांक of प्रस्तावित answers to ये questions इससे अनेक अलग cultural and वैचारिक backgrounds.
The meaning of life is in the philosophical और religious conceptions of अस्तित्व, सोशल ties, चेतना, and happiness, and सीमायें on अनेक other issues, such as सांकेतिक अर्थ, ontology, मान, purpose, ethics, good और दुष्ट, free will, the existence of एक or अनेक Gods, conceptions of God, the आत्मा, and the आफ्टरलाइफ.
वैज्ञानिक योगदान फ़ोकस primarily on describing सम्बन्धित अनुभवजन्य facts परिचय the universe, exploring the कॉन्टेक्स्ट और पैरामीटर्स concerning the 'how ' of जीवन.
Science भी अध्ययन and can provide सुझाव for the pursuit of well-being और a related धारणा of morality.
an alternative, humanistic दृष्टिकोण poses the सवाल `` What is the meaning of my life ? ''
The मान of the सवाल pertaining to the purpose of जीवन may coincide साथ the achievement of ultimate वास्तविकता, or a अहसास of oneness, or भी a अहसास of sacredness.
परिवार guy निर्माता सेठ MacFarlane भी provides the voices of पीटर griffin, stewie griffin, ब्रायन griffin, और Glenn Quagmire.
Family guy is an American animated sitcom कि features पाँच main voice actors, और numerous regular डाल and पुनरावर्ती अतिथि stars.
The प्रिंसिपल आवाज़ cast consists of दिखाएँ निर्माता सेठ macfarlane, एलेक्स borstein, सेठ ग्रीन, Mila kunis ( जो replaced Lacey Chabert after the पहला season ) and Mike हेनरी और now, the नई actor Beau Osborne.
पुनरावर्ती आवाज़ actors include Patrick warburton, आदम वेस्ट, John G. Brennan, Nicole Sullivan and जेनिफर Tilly, और repeat guest stars include Phyllis diller, Charles Durning, Rush limbaugh, और फिल LaMarr.
अनेक cast members provide voices for अनेक characters.
The voice actors, in portraying the various अक्षर personalities on the show, draw प्रेरणा from हस्तियाँ and पॉप संस्कृति.
परिवार guy वर्ण have been played by अधिक than एक कर्ता, बाद सदस्यों of the show बाएँ the series or had conflicting obligations.
Kunis थी मनोनीत for an Annie Award for voicing Meg Griffin in the ऋतु 5 episode `` मुश्किल विधिक `` and macfarlane रै also जीती an Emmy पुरस्कार लिये Outstanding Voice-Over Performance और an एनी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन Voice Acting in an एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न उत्पादन, though no other डाल member रै जीती an पुरस्कार for their कार्य on the series.
