`` the Princess and the मटर '' ( ; शाब्दिक translation : `` the राजकुमारी on the Pea '' ) is a literary fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen about a यंग स्त्री जिनकी royal identity is स्थापित by a test of उसके physical sensitivity.
The टेल थी पहला प्रकाशित with तीन others by Andersen in an inexpensive पुस्तिका on 8 May 1835 in Copenhagen by c.a. Reitzel.
Andersen had सुना the स्टोरी as a child, और it likely रै इसके source in लोक सामग्री, possibly originating इससे Sweden as it is unknown in the डैनिश मौखिक tradition.
Neither `` the राजकुमारी और the मटर '' nor Andersen 's other किस्से of 1835 यहूद well प्राप्त by Danish आलोचकों, who disliked their कैज़ुअल, chatty style, and उनके lack of नैतिकता.
In 1959 `` the राजकुमारी और the मटर '' was adapted to the musical stage in a उत्पादन called एकबार Upon a गद्दा starring Carol Burnett.
जर्मनी Americans ( ) are नागरिकों of the संयुक्त States who were either born in Germany or हैं of German ancestry.
वे comprise about 50 million people, making उन्हें the largest ancestry group ahead of Irish अमेरिकी, अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी और अंग्रेज़ी अमेरिकी.
वे comprise परिचय 1/3 of the German diaspora all over the world.
None of the German states had New World colonies.
Not until the 1670s किया the first significant groups of जर्मनी immigrants arrive in the अंग्रेजों colonies, settling primarily in नई York और पेन्सिलवेनिया.
Immigration continued in very large numbers during the 19th सदी, with कुछ आठ million arrivals from Germany.
वे were pulled by the attractions of land और धार्मिक स्वतंत्रता, और pushed आउट of Europe by shortages of land and धार्मिक or राजनैतिक oppression.
अनेक arrived seeking religious or political स्वतंत्रता, अन्य लिये economic opportunities greater than those in यूरोपीय, और others बस लिये the मौका to start fresh in the New World.
the arrivals पहले 1850 यहूद mostly farmers who sought आउट the सबसे productive जमीन, where उनके intensive खेती techniques होता अदा off.
बाद 1840, many came to शहरों, where `` germania '' —german-speaking districts—soon emerged.
जर्मनी अमेरिकी established the पहला kindergartens in the United राज्य, introduced the क्रिसमस पेड़ परंपरा, and originated लोकप्रिय American foods ऐसे as hot कुत्तो and hamburgers.
German अमरीकी जश्न हैं आयोजित throughout the country, एक of the सबसे well-known होने the german-american steuben Parade in नई यॉर्क City, held प्रत्येक तीसरा शनिवार in सितंबर.
There are भी प्रमुख सालाना events in Chicago, सिनसिनाटी, मिल्वौकी, Pittsburgh, St. Louis और other cities.
Like many अन्य आप्रवासियों कि आए to the संयुक्त राज्य, an overwhelming क्रमांक of people of जर्मनी or आंशिक जर्मनी descent have essentially become Americanized.
the प्रस्तावना to the संयुक्त States संविधान is a ब्रैड introductory बयान of the Constitution 's fundamental उद्देश्य and guiding principles.
it राज्य in general शर्तें, and न्यायालयों have referred to it as reliable evidence of, the founding fathers ' intentions regarding the Constitution 's अर्थ और what they hoped the Constitution would achieve as it pertains to सब of the people of the संयुक्त राज्य.
as the phrase, `` we the लोगों '' suggests कि the new सरकारी originates from the लोगों of the संयुक्त States और it सेट into motion a सवाल as it pertains to that विशाल जनसांख्यिकी concerning the व्यक्तिगत rights और समता among सब लोगों ; this can be देखी most broadly in the divide between republicanism और सोशल democracy.
The history of the अंतरजाल began with the विकास of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कंप्यूटर in the 1950s.
the public was first introduced to the concepts that होता सीसे to the अंतरजाल when a message थी sent over the ARPANet from computer विज्ञान Professor Leonard Kleinrock 's laboratory at विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, Los एंजिल्स ( ucla ), after the दूसरी टुकड़ा of network equipment was संस्थापित at Stanford शोध संस्थान ( श्री ).
Packet switched संजाल ऐसे as arpanet, चिह्नित I at NPL in the UK, cyclades, मेरिट संजाल, Tymnet, और telenet, यहूद developed in the लेट 1960s and early 1970s using a variety of protocols.
The arpanet in particular led to the development of protocols लिये internetworking, in जिससे अनेक पृथक संजाल could be joined साथ into a संजाल of networks.
in 1982, the Internet प्रोटोकॉल suite ( TCP/IP ) was मानकीकृत, और consequently, the concept of a world-wide network of interconnected TCP/IP networks, पुकारा the Internet, थी introduced.
अभिगम to the ARPANET थी expanded in 1981 when the नेशनल Science न्यास ( NSF ) developed the कंप्यूटर विज्ञान Network ( csnet ) and again in 1986 जब NSFNET provided access to supercomputer sites in the संयुक्त राज्य इससे शोध and शिक्षा संगठन.
वाणिज्यिक अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाताओं ( ISPs ) began to emerge in the late 1980s और जल्दी 1990s.
The ARPANET थी decommissioned in 1990.
the अंतरजाल was commercialized in 1995 when NSFNET was decommissioned, removing the last प्रतिबंध on the use of the अंतरजाल to carry वाणिज्यिक traffic.
चूंकि the mid-1990s, the Internet has had a revolutionary प्रभाव on संस्कृति और commerce, सहित the वृद्धि of near-instant संचार by electronic mail, instant messaging, आवाज़ over Internet प्रोटोकॉल ( VoIP ) `` फोन काल्स '', two-way इंटरैक्टिव वीडियो calls, and the संसार Wide वेब साथ its discussion forums, blogs, social नेटवर्किंग, और ऑनलाइन खरीदारी साइट.
the research and education community continues to develop और उपयोग उन्नत networks ऐसे as nsf 's very high गति रीढ़ संजाल सेवा ( vbns ), Internet2, and National LambdaRail.
increasing amounts of data हैं transmitted at higher और higher speeds over रेशा ऑप्टिक networks operating at 1-gbit/s, 10-gbit/s, or अधिक.
the अंतरजाल 's takeover over the global संचार landscape was almost instant in ऐतिहासिक शर्तें : it only communicated 1 % of the सूचना flowing through two-way telecommunications संजाल in the साल 1993, already 51 % by 2000, और more than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007.
आज the Internet continues to grow, driven by कभी greater amounts of ऑनलाइन information, commerce, entertainment, और social networking.
दक्षिणपश्चिम Airlines co. ( ) is a major u.S. airline and the world 's largest low-cost वाहक, headquartered in डलास, टेक्सास.
It was established in 1967 and adopted इसके वर्तमान name in 1971.
The airline रै more than 46,000 employees और operates अधिक than 3,400 फ़्लाइट प्रति day.
as of जून 5, 2011, it carries the सबसे घरेलू passengers of कोई U.S. airline.
As of April 2013, दक्षिणपश्चिम एयरलाइंस has अनुसूचित service to 84 destinations in 41 states और Puerto रीको.
दक्षिणपश्चिम Airlines रै solely operated बोइंग 737s, मगर लिये a few years in the 1970s और 1980s, when it operated Boeing 727s.
As of August 2012, Southwest is the largest ऑपरेटर of the 737 विश्वव्यापी with over 550 in service, each ऑपरेटिंग an average of छह फ़्लाइट per day.
in may 2011, the airline acquired airtran एयरवेज़, साथ संयोजन of the वाहक अपेक्षित to be complete by 2014.
on कूच 1, 2012, the company was जारी a सिंगल operating प्रमाणपत्र, technically becoming एक airline.
रोलिंग Rock is a 4.6 % abv pale lager launched in 1939 by the Latrobe brewing Company.
Although संस्थापित as a local बियर in पश्चिमी पेन्सिलवेनिया, it was marketed aggressively and eventually became a national उत्पाद.
The brand was sold to Anheuser-Busch of st. Louis, Missouri, in mid 2006, जिससे transferred brewing परिचालन to New जर्सी.
Benedict xvi (,, ; born Joseph aloisius ratzinger on 16 April 1927 ) is Pope emeritus of the कैथोलिक Church.
he served as Pope from 2005 to 2013.
In कि स्थिति, he थी both the नेता of the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर और sovereign of the वेटिकन नगर State.
बेनेडिक्ट was elected on 19 अप्रैल 2005 in a papal conclave, celebrated his Papal उद्घाटन Mass on 24 अप्रैल 2005, and took कब्ज़ा of उसके गिरजाघर, the archbasilica of St. जॉन Lateran, on 7 may 2005.
Ordained as a priest in 1951 in उसके native Bavaria, Ratzinger established himself as a highly regarded university theologian by the लेट 1950s and was नियुक्त a full प्राध्यापक in 1958.
After a long career as an academic, serving as a प्राध्यापक of theology at अनेक German universities—the last being the विश्वविद्यालयों of regensburg, where he served as वाइस अध्यक्ष of the university in 1976 and 1977—he was appointed Archbishop of म्यूनिख और freising and cardinal by Pope पॉल vi in 1977, an असामान्य promotion लिये किसी with little लुभावने experience.
in 1981, he settled in रोम when he became Prefect of the सभा for the Doctrine of the Faith, one of the most महत्वपूर्ण dicasteries of the रोमन Curia.
इससे 2002 until उसके election as pope, he was भी डीन of the कॉलेज of कार्डिनल्स, and as such, the प्राइमस इंटर pares among the कार्डिनल्स.
Prior to बनने पोप, he थी `` a major फिगर on the वेटिकन stage for a क्वार्टर of a सदी '' as `` one of the सबसे respected, influential और विवादास्पद members of the College of Cardinals '' ; he had an influence `` दूसरी to none when it आए to setting गिरिजाघर प्राथमिकताएं और directions '' as one of Pope जॉन Paul II 's closest confidants.
he was originally a उदार theologian, but अपनाया conservative views after 1968.
उसके सफल कृतियाँ बचाव traditional कैथोलिक doctrine and मान.
During उसके papacy, Benedict xvi advocated a return to fundamental ईसाई values to counter the increased secularisation of many पश्चिमी countries.
he views relativism 's denial of उद्देश्य सच्चाई, और the denial of moral truths in particular, as the central problem of the 21st century.
He सिखाया the importance of both the कैथोलिक Church और an understanding of परमेश्वर 's redemptive प्रेम.
पोप बेनेडिक्ट also revived a number of परंपराओं सहित elevating the Tridentine द्रव्यमान to a more prominent position.
he renewed the relationship between the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर और आर्ट, viewing the उपयोग of beauty as a path to the पवित्र, प्रचारित the उपयोग of लैटिन, और reintroduced परंपरागत papal garments, for which reason he was पुकारा `` the pope of aesthetics ''.
he रै been described as `` the प्रमुख बौद्धिक force in the गिरिजाघर '' since the mid-1980s.
Several of पोप Benedict 's students इससे उसके अकादमिक career are भी prominent churchmen आज and confidantes of उसे, notably क्रिस्टोफ Schönborn.
On 11 फ़रवरी 2013, Pope बेनेडिक्ट announced उसके resignation in a speech in Latin पहले the कार्डिनल्स, citing a `` कमी of strength of mind and देह '' due to उसके उन्नत age.
His resignation became effective on 28 फ़रवरी 2013.
He is the first pope to resign चूंकि Pope ग्रेगरी बारहवीं in 1415, and the पहला to do so on उसके अपना initiative चूंकि पोप celestine v in 1294.
as पोप emeritus, Benedict retains the style of His Holiness, और the शीर्षक of Pope, और will continue to dress in the papal colour of श्वेत.
He थी succeeded by पोप Francis on 13 कूच 2013, और he स्थानांतरित into the newly संवर Mater ecclesiae मठ for his retirement on 2 May 2013..
जेब stereoscope साथ original परीक्षण चित्र.
Used by सैन्य to जाँचें stereoscopic pairs of aerial छायाचित्र.
View of बोस्टन, c. 1860 ; an जल्दी stereoscopic कार्ड for viewing a झाँकी from nature
kaiser-panorama consisted of a multi-station देखने apparatus and sets of stereo slides.
Patented by A. fuhrmann around 1890.
Company of महिलाओं watching stereoscopic छायाचित्र, पेंटिंग by Jacob spoel, पहले 1868.
A very early चित्रण of लोगों using a stereoscope.
Stereoscopy ( also called stereoscopics or 3D इमेजिंग ) is a तकनीक for creating or बढ़ाना the भ्रम of गहराई in an चित्र by अर्थात् of stereopsis लिये binocular vision.
the word stereoscopy derives from the Greek `` στερεός '' ( stereos ), `` कड़, solid '' + `` σκοπέω '' ( skopeō ), `` to look '', `` to see ''.
सबसे stereoscopic methods उपस्थित दो ऑफसेट images separately to the बाएँ and right नजर of the दर्शक.
ये two-dimensional बिंब are तब combined in the दिमाग to दे the बोध of 3d depth.
इस technique is विशिष्ट from 3d प्रदर्शक कि प्रदर्शक an चित्र in three full dimensions, allowing the observer to बढ़ाएँ सूचना about the 3-dimensional वस्तुएँ होने प्रदर्शित by head और eye movements.
John एडम्स ( October 30, 1735 ( o.s. October 19, 1735 ) – July 4, 1826 ) थी the दूसरी president of the संयुक्त States ( 1797–1801 ), having earlier परोसा as the first vice अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States.
An American founding Father, he थी a statesman, diplomat, and a leading advocate of अमरीकी स्वतंत्रता इससे ग्रेट ब्रिटेन.
खूब शिक्षित, he थी an Enlightenment राजनैतिक theorist who प्रचारित republicanism and लिखा prolifically about his प्रायः seminal विचार, दोनो in प्रकाशित works and in letters to his wife and key adviser अबीगैल as well as to अन्य founding fathers.
Adams आए to prominence in the जल्दी stages of the अमरीकी क्रान्ति.
A lawyer and public figure in बोस्टन, as a delegate इससे मैसाचुसेट्स to the Continental Congress, he played a अग्रणी भूमिका in persuading कॉंग्रेस to घोषित स्वतंत्रता.
He assisted Thomas Jefferson in drafting the Declaration of Independence in 1776, and was इसके primary advocate in the Congress.
बाद, as a diplomat in यूरोपीय, he helped negotiate the eventual peace सन्धि with Great Britain, और थी जिम्मेदार लिये obtaining vital governmental loans from Amsterdam बैंकर्स.
A राजनैतिक theorist and इतिहासकार, Adams largely wrote the मैसाचुसेट्स संविधान in 1780, which together with his earlier Thoughts on सरकारी, बहकावे अमरीकी political thought.
One of his greatest भूमिकाएँ थी as a न्यायधीश of अक्षर : in 1775, he nominated George Washington to be commander-in-chief, and 25 सालो बाद मनोनीत John मार्शल to be मुख्य Justice of the United States.
एडम्स ' revolutionary credentials secured उसे दो शर्तें as George Washington 's वाइस अध्यक्ष और उसके अपना चुनाव in 1796 as the दूसरी अध्यक्ष.
दौरान उसके one term, he encountered ferocious हमले by the Jeffersonian republicans, as खूब as the प्रबल गुट in his अपना federalist Party led by his bitter enemy सिकंदर Hamilton.
Adams हस्ताक्षरित the विवादास्पद एलियन and Sedition अधिनियमों, and निर्मित up the army और नेवी विशेषकर in the face of an undeclared नवल युद्ध ( called the `` quasi-war `` ) साथ फ़्रांस, 1798–1800.
the major accomplishment of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी थी उसके peaceful रेज़ोल्यूशन of the विरोध in the फेस of Hamilton 's विपक्ष.
in 1800, Adams थी defeated for re-election by थामस Jefferson और retired to Massachusetts.
He बाद resumed उसके friendship साथ जेफरसन.
He and उसके बीवी, Abigail एडम्स, संस्थापित an संपन्नता family लकीर of राजनेता, diplomats, and इतिहासकारों अभी referred to as the Adams political family.
Adams थी the पिता of जॉन क्विंसी Adams, the छठे अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य.
उसके उपलब्धियाँ have received वृहद मान्यता in आधुनिक times, though उसके योगदान were नहीं initially as मनाये as those of other Founders.
एडम्स थी the पहला u.S. अध्यक्ष to reside in the भवन कि आखिरकार became ज्ञात as the श्वेत हाउस.
The United राज्य ten-dollar विधेयक ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of संयुक्त States करेंसी.
the first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ), सिकंदर Hamilton, is फिलहाल featured on the obverse of the विधेयक, while the U.S. राजकोष भवन is featured on the रिवर्स.
( Hamilton is एक of two non-presidents प्रदर्शित on फिलहाल issued U.S. बिल्स.
the other is बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन, on the $ 100 bill.
हैमिल्टन is एक of only चार people प्रदर्शित on u.S. paper currency ( 1861 to the present ) who was नहीं born in the continental United States, as he was from the West Indies.
the अन्य are : अल्बर्ट Gallatin, स्विट्ज़रलैंड ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender ) ; जार्ज meade, स्पेन ( $ 1,000 1890/91 राजकोष Note ) ; and Robert मॉरिस, इंग्लैण्ड ( $ 1,000 1862/63 विधिक टेंडर ; $ 10 1878/80 Silver प्रमाणपत्र ).
In जोड, Kamehameha i, appears on the 2008 Hawaii state क्वार्टर. )
All $ 10 बिल्स जारी आज हैं संघीय Reserve टीप.
the Bureau of नक्काशी और मुद्रण says the average life of a $ 10 विधेयक in परिसंचरण is 18 महीने पहले it is replaced due to पहनें.
Approximately 6 % of all us banknotes मुद्रित in 2009 यहूद $ 10 बिल्स.
टेन डालर बिल्स are delivered by Federal आरक्षित Banks in yellow straps.
The सोर्स of the face on the $ 10 विधेयक is John trumbull ’s 1805 portrait of हैमिल्टन कि belongs to the portrait संग्रहण of New York नगर Hall.
The $ 10 विधेयक is the तभी u.S. paper करेंसी in परिसंचरण in जिससे the portrait faces to the left ( the $ 100,000 bill featured a पोर्ट्रेट of Woodrow विल्सन facing to the बाएँ, but was used only लिये intra-government ट्रांजेक्शन ).
a सवार on a यामाहा Waverunner xl performing a high-speed फेरे.
A jetboat is a नाव propelled by a jet of water ejected from the वापस of the craft.
नापसंद a powerboat or motorboat कि uses a propeller in the water नीचे or पीछे the boat, a jetboat draws the water इससे under the नाव into a पंप inside the नाव, तब expels it through a nozzle at the stern.
Jetboats यहूद originally designed by सर विलियम हैमिल्टन ( who developed a waterjet in 1954 ) for आपरेशन in the fast-flowing and shallow नदियाँ of नई Zealand, specifically to overcome the problem of propellers striking रॉक्स in ऐसे waters.
Previous attempts at waterjet नोदन had very short lifetimes, generally due to the अकुशल design of the इकाई और the fact that वे offered few advantages over conventional propellers.
Unlike ये पिछला waterjet developments, ऐसे as Campini 's and the hanley Hydrojet, हैमिल्टन था a specific need for a नोदन प्रणाली to operate in very-shallow water, और the waterjet proved to be the आदर्श समाधान.
From this, the popularity of the जेट unit और jetboat increased rapidly.
through further developments, it थी found the waterjet offered several अन्य लाभ over propellers for a wide दायरा of vessel types, and as such, waterjets are used widely today for अनेक high-speed vessels, सहित यात्री ferries, rescue शिल्प, patrol boats और offshore सप्लाई बरतन.
Jetboats हैं highly maneuverable, and अनेक can, इससे पूरा speed, be reversed and brought to a stop within little more than their own length, in a maneuver known as a `` क्रैश stop ''.
the खूब ज्ञात Hamilton फेरे or `` जेट स्पिन '' is a high-speed maneuvre where the नाव 's engine throttle is cut, the परिचालन is turned sharply और the throttle खोली again, causing the boat to spin जल्दी around साथ a विशाल spray of water.
There is no engineering सीमा to the size of jetboats, हालांकि the वैध of उनके use depends a लॉट on the प्रकार of application.
क्लासिक prop-drives हैं generally more कुशल and economical at कम speeds, up to परिचय, but as नाव गति increases परे इस, the अतिरिक्त hull resistance generated by struts, rudders, shafts ( etc. ) means waterjets are अधिक कुशल in the 20-50 गांठ range ( up to ).
Also, in परिस्थितियों साथ very large propellers turning at slow speeds ( ऐसे as tug boats ), the समतुल्य size waterjet would be too बिग to be practical.
For ये कारण, the विशाल majority of waterjet units are installed in high-speed vessels and in particular situations जहाँ shallow draught, maneuverability, and लोड flexibility हैं main concerns.
the biggest jet-driven बरतन हैं मिला in सैन्य use or the high-speed passenger/car ferry उद्योग.
South Africa 's s ( लगभग long ) हैं the biggest jet-propelled vessels so दूर.
भी these German-built बरतन are सक्षम of performing `` crash stops ''.
Uveitis is broadly defined as सूजन of the uvea.
The uvea consists of the मध्य, pigmented, vascular structures of the eye और includes the iris, ciliary देह, and choroid.
uveitis requires an urgent referral और thorough examination by an ophthalmologist or optometrist साथ साथ urgent treatment to control the सूजन.

मर्फी is a fictional character on the comedy-drama television series अनुगामी.
He is played by Kevin connolly.
The Shining is a 1980 psychological horror फिल्मी produced and directed by Stanley Kubrick, co-written with novelist डायने जॉनसन, और अभिनीत जोकर Nicholson, शेली Duvall, scatman crothers, and डैनी लॉयड.
The फिल्मी is आधारित on the Stephen किंग अनोखा the जगमगाता.
a लेखक, जोकर torrance, takes a जॉब as an off-season caretaker at an पृथक hotel.
His young बेटे possesses psychic abilities और is समर्थ to देखिए things from the past and future, ऐसे as the ghosts who inhabit the होटल.
जल्द after settling in, the परिवार is trapped in the होटल by a snowstorm, and Jack धीरे becomes बहकावे by a supernatural उपस्थिति ; he descends into दीवानगी और attempts to murder his बीवी and बेटे.
Unlike previous kubrick films, जिससे विकसित an दर्शक धीरे by भवन on word-of-mouth, The जगमगाता थी released as a mass-market फिल्मी, खोलने at पहला in बस दो शहरों on मेमोरियल Day, then देशभर a month बाद.
Although आरंभिक response to the फिल्मी was मिश्रित, बाद नाजुक assessment थी more अनुकूल and it is now viewed as a classic of the horror genre.
Film director मार्टिन Scorsese, writing in The रोज़ जानवर, क्रमित it as one of the 11 scariest हॉरर फिल्मों of सब समय.
फिल्मी आलोचकों, फिल्मी students, और kubrick 's निर्माता, Jan Harlan, have remarked on the विशाल influence the फिल्मी has had on लोकप्रिय संस्कृति.
The initial European release of The Shining थी 25 मिनट्स shorter than the अमरीकी version, हासिल by निकालना most of the दृश्यों लेने प्लेस outside the environs of the hotel.
Patio Cola बोतल
Patio Diet Cola was a ब्रांड of diet soda introduced by पेप्सी in 1963.
It थी created in response to Diet Rite Cola, which was the first diet cola on the मार्केट.
Fitness प्रवर्तक डिब्बी Drake थी आँगन आहार Cola 's spokesperson.
In 1964, आँगन released orange, अंगूर, और रूट beer flavors.
इस स्वाद line थी नहीं meant to compete साथ ब्रांड्स like Orange Crush, लकिन बल्कि fill आउट the लकीर.
Patio sodas यहूद available in the cold-bottle मार्केट : grocery और mom-and-pop stores.
विज्ञापन लिये आँगन was comparatively scarce ; at the time, bottlers were regionally franchised, और सम्बन्धित advertising थी necessarily लोकल.
in 1964, आँगन diet cola became Diet पेप्सी.
the newly ब्रांडेड आहार सोडा थी advertised alongside पेप्सी with the टैगलाइन `` Pepsi either way '', जिससे replaced the स्लोगन `` dances साथ स्वाद ''.
The छोटी life स्पैन of Patio आहार कोला makes it a great जोड लिये bottle collectors.
सबसे of the remaining Patio लकीर of जायका यहूद phased out by the early 1970s, जबकि a few बच until the मिड 70s
अवसंरचना is basic physical and organizational structures needed for the आपरेशन of a समाज or एंटरप्राइज़, or the सेवाएं and facilities necessary for an economy to function.
it can be generally defined as the set of interconnected structural तत्व कि provide framework supporting an entire structure of development.
It is an महत्वपूर्ण term लिये judging a country or प्रदेश 's विकास.
The पद typically refers to the technical structures that support a समाज, such as roads, bridges, जल सप्लाई, sewers, विद्युत ग्रिड, telecommunications, और so forth, and can be defined as `` the physical components of interrelated systems providing commodities and services essential to enable, sustain, or enhance societal जीना शर्तें. ''
Viewed functionally, infrastructure facilitates the production of goods and सेवाएं, और also the वितरण of finished products to बाज़ार, as well as basic सोशल services such as schools and hospitals ; for example, roads enable the हस्तांतरण of कच्चा सामग्री to a factory.
In सैन्य parlance, the पद refers to the buildings and permanent संस्थापना जरुरी for the support, redeployment, and operation of military शक्तियां.
To make it simple, अवसंरचना is anything that is needed everyday, an everyday मद.

Mitochondrial DNA.
इंसान जेनेटिक विभिन्नता is the genetic मतभेद both within और among populations.
There may be multiple variants of कोई दिए gene in the इंसान population ( जीनों ), leading to बहुरूपता.
अनेक genes are नहीं बहुरूपी, अर्थ that only a सिंगल allele is present in the population : the gene is तब कहा to be fixed.
No दो इंसानो are genetically identical.
भी monozygotic जुड़वा, जो develop इससे one zygote, have infrequent जेनेटिक differences due to mutations occurring during development और gene नक़ल क्रमांक variation.
Differences between individuals, even closely related individuals, हैं the key to तकनीकों such as genetic फिंगरप्रिंटिंग.
Alleles occur at different frequencies in different इंसान populations, साथ populations कि are more geographically और ancestrally remote tending to differ अधिक.
कल्याणकारी of differences between individuals include the exchange of जीनों दौरान meiosis and विभिन्न mutational events.
There हैं at तनिक दो कारण क्यों genetic विभिन्नता exists between populations.
प्राकृतिक चयन may confer an adaptive advantage to individuals in a विशिष्ट environment if an allele provides a प्रतिस्पर्धी advantage.
alleles under चयन are likely to occur only in those geographic regions where वे confer an लाभ.
the second main कारण of genetic variation is due to the high degree of neutrality of most mutations.
सबसे mutations do not appear to have any चयनात्मक effect one रास्ता or the other on the organism.
the प्रमुख cause is जेनेटिक drift, इस is the प्रभाव of यादृच्छिक परिवर्तन in the gene पूल.
in इंसानो, founder effect और past छोटी जनसांख्यिकी आकार ( increasing the likelihood of genetic drift ) may have था an important influence in neutral मतभेद between populations.
the सिद्धान्त that humans recently migrated out of अफ़्रीकी supports this.
The पढ़ाई of इंसान जेनेटिक विभिन्नता रै both evolutionary significance और चिकित्सा applications.
it can सहायता scientists understand प्राचीन इंसान population migrations as खूब as how different human groups हैं biologically सम्बन्धित to one another.
लिये आयुर्विज्ञान, study of human genetic विभिन्नता may be महत्वपूर्ण because some disease-causing alleles occur more प्रायः in लोगों इससे विशिष्ट भौगोलिक regions.
New निष्कर्षों दिखाएँ कि each इंसान has on औसत 60 नई mutations compared to their parents.
Apart from mutations, अनेक genes कि may have aided humans in प्राचीन टाइम्स प्लेग इंसानो today.
लिये example, it is suspected कि जीनों कि allow इंसानो to more efficiently process खाना are those कि मेक people susceptible to obesity and diabetes today.
Tea पार्टी protesters on the West लॉन of the u.S. कैपिटल और the National मॉल at the Taxpayer कूच on Washington on सितंबर 12, 2009.
the चाय पार्टी movement is an American राजनैतिक गति कि advocates strict adherence to the United राज्य संविधान, reducing U.S. सरकारी spending and taxes, and reduction of the u.S. national कर्ज़ and संघीय budget deficit.
the गति रै been पुकारा partly रूढ़िवादी, partly libertarian, और partly populist.
The movement has प्रायोजित विरोध और समर्थित राजनैतिक candidates since 2009.
the name of the movement is derived from the बोस्टन Tea Party of 1773, an iconic इवेंट in American इतिहास.
Anti-tax प्रदर्शनकारियों in the संयुक्त States have प्रायः referred to the original Boston चाय Party for प्रेरणा.
References to the बोस्टन Tea पार्टी were part of कर दिन विरोध आयोजित throughout the 1990s और पहले.
By 2001, a कस्टम था developed among कुछ conservative activists of mailing tea बैग to विधायक and अन्य officials as a सांकेतिक act.
the currencies of प्यूर्टो रीको closely follow the ऐतिहासिक विकास of Puerto Rico.
as a उपनिवेश of स्पेन और the United States, Puerto रीको was granted the use of both विदेशी और provincial currencies.
following the Spanish colonization in 1502, प्यूर्टो रीको became an महत्वपूर्ण port, with इसके अपना सप्लाई of gold.
however, as the खनिज reserves ran empty within the century, the द्वीपसमूह 's economy suffered.
the स्पेनी Crown जारी the Situado Mexicano, which meant कि a semi-regular shipment of gold from the viceroyalty of New स्पेन would be sent to the द्वीप, as a way to provide आर्थिक support.
between 1636 और 1637, फिलिप iv of Spain imposed a कर which था to be सशुल्क using a आय stamp.
Inspired by this, Puerto Rico began producing banknotes in 1766, becoming the पहला उपनिवेश to छपाई 8- real banknotes in the स्पेनी साम्राज्य and which in the Spanish government 's स्वीकृति of subsequent मुद्दे.
the situado was discontinued during the 19th सदी, बनाना an आर्थिक संकट, as a परिणाम of Mexico gaining इसके स्वतंत्रता from Spain.
साल्वाडोर meléndez Bruna, the colonial governor in office, ordered the समस्या of प्रांतीय banknotes, बनाना the Puerto rican peso.
however, printing of ये banknotes ceased after 1815.
During the following दशकों, foreign सिक्के became the widespread currency.
In the 1860s और 1870s, banknotes reemerged.
On February 1, 1890, the Banco Español de प्यूर्टो Rico was inaugurated and began issuing banknotes.
The bank designed four श्रेणी and लगाई तीन in circulation under स्पेनी नियम.
in 1895, a royal Decree ordered the production of provincial peso coins.
On अगस्त 13, 1898, the Spanish-American War ended साथ स्पेन ceding Puerto रीको to the संयुक्त राज्य.
The Banco Español de प्यूर्टो Rico थी renamed बैंको of पोर्टो रीको and जारी bills समतुल्य to the United राज्य dollar, बनाना the प्यूर्टो Rican dollar.
In 1902, the पहला नेशनल Bank of Porto Rico जारी banknotes in a parallel manner.
दो more series were issued until 1913.
बाद Puerto Rico 's economy और मौद्रिक system थी fully एकीकृत into the United States ' economic and monetary प्रणाली, the Puerto Rican dollars यहूद redeemed लिये those issued by the संयुक्त राज्य राजकोष.
The पेसो और डालर have महरूम followed by other समकालीन issues, including commemorative banknotes, private currency, and a quarter सिक्का designed with Fort सैन फेलिप डेल morro in the face.
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase as पेप्सी, formerly stylized in uppercase as PEPSI ) is a कार्बोनेटेड नरम drink कि is produced and manufactured by पेप्सिको.
Created and विकसित in 1893 and introduced as Brad 's पेय, it was renamed as Pepsi-Cola on August 28, 1898, then to Pepsi in 1961.
the किताब of ezekiel is the तीसरा of the latter Prophets in the Hebrew Bible, following the books of यशायाह and यिर्मयाह and preceding the किताब of the बारह.
( The order is somewhat अलग in the Christian Old Testament ).
It गर्भाशयी इसके name इससे, and रिकॉर्ड the visions of, the 6th century BC priest and नबी Ezekiel.
according to the book, the prophet, exiled in Babylon, experienced a series of सात visions दौरान the 22 सालो इससे 593 to 571 bc, a period जिससे spans the फाइनल destruction of Jerusalem in 586.
the visions, और the किताब, are संरचित around three विषयवस्तु : ( 1 ) निर्णय on Israel ( chapters 1-24 ) ; ( 2 ) judgment on the राष्ट्र ( chapters 25-32 ) ; and future blessings लिये Israel ( chapters 33-48 ).
New Orleans ( or, locally or ; ) is a major संयुक्त राज्य बंदरगाहों और the largest city and metropolitan क्षेत्रफल in the राज्य of louisiana.
the जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर थी 343,829 as of the 2010 u.S. जनसांख्यिकी.
The New Orleans metropolitan area ( New orleans–metairie–kenner महानगर सांख्यिकीय Area ) था a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,167,764 in 2010 और was the 46th largest in the संयुक्त States.
the नई orleans–metairie–bogalusa संयुक्त सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल, a larger trading area, था a 2010 जनसांख्यिकी of 1,214,932.
the city is नामित बाद Orléans, a नगर स्तिथ on the Loire River in केन्द्र, France, and is खूब known लिये its पृथक French क्रियोल architecture, as खूब as its cross-cultural and बहुभाषी heritage.
New ऑरलियन्स is भी famous लिये its भोजन, music ( particularly as the birthplace of jazz ), and इसके annual celebrations और festivals, सबसे notably Mardi ग्रा.
the city is often referred to as the `` most unique '' in America.
नई Orleans is located in southeastern Louisiana, straddling the Mississippi नदी.
the नगर and ऑरलियन्स Parish ( ) हैं.
the city and parish are bounded by the parishes of St. tammany to the north, St. बर्नार्ड to the east, Plaquemines to the south और जेफरसन to the south और west.
Lake Pontchartrain, part of जिससे is शामिल in the city limits, lies to the north और झील Borgne lies to the east.
the National Birth कंट्रोल लीग was a जनम control organization in the संयुक्त राज्य.
It was founded in March 1915 by Mary dennett, क्लारा Gruening Stillman and जेसी एशले.
Its main purpose थी to overturn the कानून which बैन contraceptives from the u.S. mails.
अभियान यहूद आरोहित in New York, लकिन in 1919 the League थी disbanded and reformed into the Voluntary Parenthood League.
Cancer, known medically as a malignant neoplasm, is a broad समूह of various diseases, सब involving unregulated cell विकास.
In cancer, कोशिकाएं divide और grow uncontrollably, forming malignant tumors, and invade आसपास parts of the body.
the cancer may also spread to more दूर parts of the body through the lymphatic system or bloodstream.
Not all tumors are cancerous.
Benign tumors do not grow uncontrollably, do नहीं invade neighboring ऊतकों, and do नहीं spread throughout the body.
वहीँ हैं over 200 अलग known cancers that afflict इंसानो.
determining what causes कर्कट is complex.
अनेक बाते are ज्ञात to बढ़ाएँ the रिस्क of कर्कट, including तम्बाकू उपयोग, निश्चित infections, विकिरण, कमी of शारीरिक कार्यकलाप, मोटापा, and environmental प्रदूषक.
ये can directly क्षति जीनों or combine with मौजूदा जेनेटिक faults within cells to cause the disease.
Approximately पाँच to ten percent of cancers हैं entirely खानदानी.
Cancer can be detected in a क्रमांक of ways, सहित the presence of certain लक्षण और लक्षण, स्क्रीनिंग परीक्षण, or medical imaging.
Once a possible cancer is detected it is diagnosed by microscopic परिक्षा of a tissue नमूना.
Cancer is प्रायः treated with chemotherapy, radiation चिकित्सा और surgery.
the संभावना of surviving the disease vary greatly by the type and location of the cancer और the extent of बीमारी at the start of उपचार.
जबकि cancer can affect लोगों of all आयु, और a few प्रकार of cancer are अधिक common in children, the रिस्क of developing कर्कट generally increases with age.
in 2007, कर्कट caused परिचय 13 % of सब इंसान मौतों worldwide ( 7.9 million ).
दरों are उठती as अधिक people live to an बूढ़ा आयु और as mass lifestyle परिवर्तन occur in the विकासशील world.

Skiing is a recreational activity और competitive खेल in जिससे the भागीदार attaches long धावक or skis to बूट or जूते on the feet and उपयोग उन्हें to सफर on top of हिम.
aside इससे recreation और प्रतियोगिता, skiing has महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये military purposes और even यात्राएं in क्षेत्रों that experience भारी snowfall.
अनेक प्रकार of competitive skiing कार्यक्रम are पहचाना by the International Olympic Committee, और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्की Federation.
John मेनार्ड Keynes, 1st Baron keynes, CB, FBA ( ; 5 June 1883 – 21 April 1946 ) was a अंग्रेजों economist जिनकी विचार have fundamentally प्रभावित the theory and practice of modern macroeconomics, and सूचित the economic नीतियों of सरकारें.
he निर्मित on and greatly refined पहले work on the causes of business cycles, और is widely considered to be एक of the संस्थापकों of modern macroeconomics और the most influential economist of the 20th century.
उसके ideas हैं the basis for the स्कूल of विचार known as keynesian अर्थशास्त्र, as well as its various offshoots.
In अनेक ways, subsequent developments in 20th सदी economics can be viewed as either भवन on keynes ' विचार or reacting विरूद्ध उन्हें.
in the 1930s, keynes पथप्रदर्शन a क्रान्ति in आर्थिक सोच, overturning the older ideas of neoclassical अर्थशास्त्र कि आयोजित कि free markets would, in the छोटी to medium term, automatically provide पूरा employment, as long as workers यहूद लचीली in उनके wage demands.
keynes instead argued that aggregate माँग determined the overall level of आर्थिक कार्यकलाप, and कि अपर्याप्त aggregate माँग could सीसे to prolonged periods of ऊँची unemployment.
he advocated the उपयोग of फिस्कल और मौद्रिक उपायों to mitigate the प्रतिकूल प्रभाव of economic recessions and depressions.
following the outbreak of the Second संसार युद्ध, keynes 's ideas concerning economic नीति were adopted by अग्रणी पश्चिमी economies.
In 1942, Keynes was awarded a खानदानी peerage as Baron keynes of Tilton in the काउंटी of ससेक्स.
Keynes died in 1946, but दौरान the 1950s और 1960s the कामयाबी of keynesian economics resulted in लगभग all capitalist सरकारें adopting इसके नीति recommendations.
keynes 's influence waned in the 1970s, partly as a परिणाम of समस्याएं कि began to पहुँचकर the anglo-american economies इससे the प्रारंभ of the दशक, and partly क्युकी of critiques from मिल्टन फ्राइडमैन और अन्य economists जो यहूद pessimistic about the ability of सरकारें to regulate the कारोबार साईकिल with फिस्कल नीति.
however, the advent of the वैश्विक वित्तीय crisis in 2007 caused a resurgence in keynesian thought.
keynesian अर्थशास्त्र provided the सैद्धांतिक underpinning for आर्थिक नीतियों undertaken in response to the crisis by Presidents जार्ज W. Bush और बराक ओबामा of the United States, Prime Minister Gordon Brown of the United Kingdom, और अन्य heads of सरकारें.
In 1999, समय पत्रिका शामिल keynes in their list of the 100 most important और influential लोगों of the 20th century, commenting that : `` उसके कट्टरपंथी idea that सरकारें should खर्च धन वे do n't have may have saved capitalism. ''
In addition to होने an economist, Keynes थी also a सिविल servant, a निदेशक of the अंग्रेजों eugenics समाज, a director of the Bank of इंग्लैण्ड, a संरक्षक of the arts और an आर्ट कलेक्टर, a part of the Bloomsbury समूह of intellectuals, an सलाहकार to अनेक charitable trusts, a लेखक, a philosopher, a private निवेशकों, और a farmer.
इस 1768 parchment ( 612×502 mm ) by Jekuthiel Sofer emulated the 1675 टेन Commandments at the एम्सटर्डम esnoga synagogue.
the टेन Commandments, भी known as the decalogue, are a नियत of biblical कानून relating to आचार और इबादत, जिससे play a आधारभूत role in judaism, Islam and christianity.
वे शामिल instructions to इबादत only God, to रखना the sabbath पावन और prohibitions against idolatry, इनकार, हत्या, theft, deception और adultery.
Different समूह follow slightly different traditions for interpreting और क्रमांकन them.
the Ten आयतें appear twice in the Hebrew बाइबल, in the books of exodus and deuteronomy.
according to the स्टोरी in exodus, परमेश्वर inscribed them on दो स्टोन tablets, which he दिया to मूसा on माउंट Sinai.
आधुनिक scholarship has found likely influences in hittite and mesopotamian laws और treaties, लकिन is divided over exactly जब the Ten Commandments were written and जो wrote them.
The डिस्कोग्राफ़ी of the अंग्रेज़ी alternative rock बैंड the Smiths consists of four स्टुडियो एल्बम, एक extended play ( EP ), एक live album, टेन संकलन एल्बम, बीस singles, one वीडियो album and चौदह म्यूज़िक वीडियो on the Rough Trade, Sire और WEA रिकार्ड लेबल्स.
the band थी formed in 1982 in Manchester by vocalist Morrissey, guitarist Johnny Marr, bass player एंडी rourke and वादक माइक joyce.
despite होने championed by बीबीसी Radio 1 डिस्क jockey जॉन Peel, the बैंड 's डेब्यू सिंगल, `` हाथ in दस्ताने `` ( May 1983 ), failed to chart.
इसके follow-up, `` इस Charming Man `` ( October 1983 ), met साथ critical acclaim and पहुँचे क्रमांक twenty-five on the UK Singles चार्ट.
the smiths ' cult औकात was followed by मुख्यधारा success in 1984, as वे पहुँचे number बारह in the uk with the `` What अंतर Does it Make ? `` single और reached क्रमांक two on the UK एल्बम Chart with their debut album, the smiths ( 1984 ).
उनके next three singles all reached the top बीस of the चार्ट in the UK, helping to consolidate their previous chart success.
The अगला स्टुडियो एल्बम, मांस is हत्या ( 1985 ), reached the top of the British चार्ट ; however, the तभी single to be released from the album, `` कि Joke is n't Funny Anymore `` ( 1985 ), failed to ब्रेक the UK शीर्ष 40.
Returning to form, the smiths ' next six singles all reached the higher than क्रमांक thirty in the UK and उनके third एल्बम, the Queen Is Dead ( 1986 ), पहुँचे number two in the UK.
despite the band 's chart success, marr बाएँ the समूह in अगस्त 1987 due to a strained संबंध with Morrissey.
Failing to find a replacement, the Smiths disbanded by the time their फाइनल स्टुडियो album, strangeways, यहाँ we Come, was released in September that year.
strangeways, यहाँ we Come पहुँचे क्रमांक दो in the uk और became the बैंड 's highest-charting रिलीज in the संयुक्त States when it reached number fifty-five on the Billboard 200.
in जल्दी 1992, WEA acquired the संपूर्ण वापस catalogue of the smiths और उत्पादित दो compilations – Best... I and... Best ii – the first of जिससे reached the शीर्ष of the uk एल्बम Chart.
wea released दो further singles compilations in 1995 और 2001, with a further संकलन, The ध्वनि of The smiths, released in November 2008.
Gone with the Wind is a novel लिखा by Margaret मिशेल, first published in 1936.
it is often placed in the साहित्यिक sub-genre of the ऐतिहासिक रोमांस novel.
however, it रै been argued the अनोखा is a `` निकट miss '' और does not contain सब of the तत्व of the romance genre, बनाना it simply a ऐतिहासिक novel.
the story is नियत in क्लेटन काउंटी, जॉर्जिया, and अटलांटा दौरान the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध और Reconstruction.
It depicts the experiences of स्कारलेट o'hara, the बिगड़े daughter of a well-to-do वृक्षारोपण owner, who जरूर उपयोग every means at उसके disposal to आइये आउट of the poverty वो finds herself in बाद Sherman 's `` March to the Sea ''.
मार्गरेट Mitchell began लिखने Gone with the हवा in 1926 to pass the समय while recovering from an auto-crash चोट कि refused to heal.
in अप्रैल 1935, Harold Latham of macmillan, an एडिटर who थी looking लिये new fiction, read what she had लिखा and देखी कि it could be a best-seller.
बाद Latham agreed to publish the किताब, Mitchell worked for another छह months checking the historical references, and rewrote the खोलने अध्याय several times.
मिशेल और her husband John Marsh, a नक़ल एडिटर by व्यापार, edited the final version of the novel.
मिशेल wrote the book 's फाइनल पल पहला, और then लिखा the events that led up to it.
As to what became of उसके प्रेमियों, रहेट और Scarlett, after the अनोखा ended, Mitchell did नहीं जान, and कहा, `` लिये सब I जान, Rhett may have मिला someone else जो was less difficult. ''
Mitchell received the पुलित्जर पुरस्कार लिये fiction for the book in 1937.
The किताब थी adapted into a 1939 अमरीकी film.
Gone साथ the हवा is the only अनोखा by मिशेल published during her आजीवन.
endodontics ( from the यूनानी endo `` अंदर '' ; and odons `` दाँत '' ) is one of the dental specialties पहचाना by the American Dental Association, royal कॉलेज of Dentists of कनाडा, and royal australasian College of दंत Surgeons, and सौदे साथ the दाँत pulp and the ऊतकों surrounding the root of a दाँत.
Endodontists perform a variety of procedures सहित endodontic therapy ( commonly ज्ञात as `` रूट canal therapy '' ), endodontic retreatment, सर्जरी, treating cracked teeth, और treating dental आघात.
Root कनाल चिकित्सा is one of the most common प्रक्रियाओं.
If the pulp ( containing nerves, arterioles, venules, lymphatic tissue, and तंतुमय ऊतक ) becomes diseased or घायल, endodontic treatment is required to save the दाँत.
Serial संलग्न scsi ( sas ) is a point-to-point serial protocol कि चालें आंकड़ा to and इससे computer storage डिवाइस such as मुश्किल drives and tape ड्राइव.
sas replaces the older Parallel scsi ( सुनाया `` scuzzy '' ) बस प्रौद्योगिकी that पहला appeared in the mid-1980s.
sas, जैसे इसके पूर्ववर्ती, उपयोग the मानक SCSI कमांड set.
SAS offers पिछड़ा संगतता साथ second-generation SATA ड्राइव.
SATA 3 Gbit/s drives may be कनेक्ट to sas backplanes, लकिन SAS drives can not कनेक्ट to sata backplanes.
the T10 तकनीकी कमेटी of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय कमेटी लिये सूचना Technology Standards ( incits ) develops and maintains the sas प्रोटोकॉल ; the scsi Trade Association ( scsita ) promotes the technology.
Part of the constitutional प्रावधान as it appeared in 1787
Status as a natural-born citizen of the United राज्य is one of the पात्रता requirements established in the United States Constitution लिये election to the office of President or Vice President.
This आवश्यकता थी intended to protect the स्वदेश इससे विदेशी influence.
The Constitution करता not define the phrase natural-born नागरिक, और विभिन्न राय have महरूम offered over समय regarding its precise अर्थ.
a 2011 Congressional शोध Service report stated
The natural-born-citizen clause has been mentioned in passing in several decisions of the संयुक्त राज्य Supreme अदालत and निम्नतर courts dealing साथ the सवाल of पात्रता लिये नागरिकता by birth, लकिन the परम् अदालत रै never सीधे addressed the सवाल of a specific अध्यक्षीय or vice-presidential प्रत्याशी 's पात्रता as a natural-born नागरिक.
kurtis Eugene `` Kurt '' Warner ( born June 22, 1971 ) is a former American फ़ुटबॉल player.
he निभाई quarterback लिये three National फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ) teams : the st. Louis Rams, the New यॉर्क Giants, और the एरिज़ोना Cardinals.
he थी originally हस्ताक्षरित by the Green खाड़ी पैकर्स as an undrafted free एजेंट in 1994 बाद playing college फ़ुटबॉल at Northern आयोवा.
Warner would go on to be माना the best undrafted player of सब समय, following a 12-year career regarded as एक of the greatest stories in NFL इतिहास.
warner पहला attained स्टारडम जबकि playing लिये the St. Louis Rams from 1998 to 2003, जहाँ he जीती दो NFL MVP पुरस्कार in 1999 और 2001 as खूब as the सुपर Bowl mvp पुरस्कार in Super Bowl xxxiv.
he led the 2008 एरिज़ोना कार्डिनल्स to सुपर Bowl xliii ( the मताधिकार 's first Super कटोरी berth ), and owns the three उच्चतम single-game गुजर yardage totals in Super Bowl history.
warner currently holds the seventh-highest career passer दरजा of all-time ( 93.7 ), and the third-highest career completion percentage in एनएफएल history साथ 65.5 %.
in 13 करियर playoff games, Warner ranks first all-time in पूर्णता percentage ( 66.5 % ), गज per attempt ( 8.55 ), and second in passer rating ( 102.8 ).
He also holds the उच्चतम पूर्णता percentage for a single खेल during the regular ऋतु, at 92.3 percent ( 24/26 ), on सितंबर 20, 2009, against the jacksonville jaguars.
He घोषित उसके retirement on जनवरी 29, 2010. < ref name='cnn 2010-01-29 ' >
जेनेट Kay Ruthven hagan ( ; born may 26, 1953 ) is the जूनियर United States Senator इससे उत्तर Carolina, in office since जनवरी 2009.
previously वो served in the उत्तर Carolina सीनेट from 1999 to 2009.
वो is a सदस्य of the लोकतांत्रिक Party and is viewed as a moderate member of उसके party.
When hagan पराजित रिपब्लिकन लाज़िम एलिज़ाबेथ dole in the 2008 संयुक्त States Senate चुनाव, she became the first woman to शिकस्त an incumbent woman in a सीनेट चुनाव.
The heisman मेमोरियल Trophy Award ( प्रायः ज्ञात colloquially as the Heisman ट्रॉफी or the Heisman ), is awarded annually to the खिलाड़ी deemed the सबसे बकाया खिलाड़ी in collegiate फ़ुटबॉल.
It थी निर्मित in 1935 as the शहर एथलेटिक Club trophy और renamed in 1936 following the मौत of the क्लबों 's athletic निदेशक, John Heisman ( पूर्व भूरा University and विश्वविद्यालयों of Pennsylvania player ; सिर football coach at Oberlin College, Auburn University, Clemson University, Rice विश्वविद्यालयों, और the University of Pennsylvania ; और फ़ुटबॉल, बास्केट, and baseball सिर कोच and एथलेटिक director at Georgia तकनीक ).
the पुरस्कार is प्रस्तुत by the heisman ट्रॉफी Trust in जल्दी December before the postseason bowl games.
It is the oldest of अनेक overall awards in कॉलेज football, including the मैक्सवेल Award, Walter शिविर पुरस्कार, and the ap Player of the Year.
the heisman और the ap Player of the Year are the only awards to honor the most बकाया player, while the Maxwell पुरस्कार और वाल्टर Camp Award recognize the best player, और the आर्ची griffin Award recognizes the सबसे मूल्यवान player.
the संयुक्त राष्ट्र Command ( unc ) is the एकीकृत command structure for the multinational सैन्य शक्तियां supporting the गणतंत्र of Korea ( दक्षिण कोरियाई or ROK ) during और बाद the कोरियाई युद्ध.
After सैनिकों of the Democratic People 's गणतंत्र of कोरियाई ( North कोरियाई or dprk ) invaded दक्षिण Korea on जून 25, 1950, the United Nations Security Council adopted रेज़ोल्यूशन 82 कॉलिंग on North Korea to cease hostilities and withdraw to the 38th parallel.
on June 27, 1950, it अपनाया Resolution 83, recommending that members of the United राष्ट्र provide assistance to the गणतंत्र of कोरियाई `` to repel the armed attack और to restore अंतरराष्ट्रीय सलाम and security to the area ''.
सुरक्षा Council Resolution 84, adopted on July 7, 1950, recommended that सदस्यों providing military शक्तियां और other सहायता to दक्षिण कोरियाई `` make such शक्तियां and अन्य सहायता available to a unified कमांड under the United States of अमेरिका ''.
हालांकि the रिज़ॉल्यूशन suggested the शक्तियां अंतर्गत the unc यहूद `` संयुक्त Nations forces '', and United राष्ट्र itself could be considered a belligerent, in practice the United राष्ट्र exercised no control over the कॉम्बैट forces, which were controlled by the United States.
सबसे observers concluded कि the शक्तियां under the UNC were not in विधि United Nations troops, और the अधिनियमों of the unc यहूद not the अधिनियमों of the संयुक्त Nations.
The unc can be regarded as an गठबंधन of नेशनल सेना, ऑपरेटिंग under the collective right of self-defense.
on August 29, 1950, the British Commonwealth 's 27th Infantry Brigade arrived at Busan to जुड़ें the UNC, which until तब शामिल तभी rok और U.S. forces.
the 27th ब्रिगेड moved into the Naktong नदी लकीर west of daegu.
Troop इकाई इससे other countries of the UN followed in rapid उत्तराधिकार ; ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Belgian United Nations Command, कनाडा, कोलंबिया, इथियोपिया, France, यूनानियों, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, New जीलैंड, the फिलीपीन, Thailand और तुर्कों.
the संघ of दक्षिण Africa provided एयर units जिससे लड़ा alongside the एयर forces of अन्य member राष्ट्र.
डेनमार्क, इण्डिया, नार्वे, और स्वीडन provided चिकित्सा इकाई.
Italy provided a हॉस्पिटल, even हालांकि it थी not a UN member.
The संयुक्त Nations कमांड and the Chinese-North Korean कमांड हस्ताक्षरित the कोरियाई Armistice Agreement on 27 July 1953, ending the heavy लड़.
the armistice agreement स्थापित the Military armistice Commission ( मैक ), consisting of प्रतिनिधि of the two signatories, to supervise the implementation of the armistice शर्तें.
the North Korean-Chinese MAC रै महरूम replaced by Panmumjon Representatives अंतर्गत exclusive North Korean management.
नियमित बैठक have महरूम रोका, although duty officers of संयुक्त सुरक्षा क्षेत्रफल, commonly ज्ञात as the Truce गाँव of Panmunjom, from each side मिलें regularly.
Lincoln हाइट्स is an अमरीकी family drama टेलीविज़न series about एडी Sutton, a मिशन Vista पुलिस officer जो moves his family back to his old पड़ोस, lincoln Heights, to start a new life और to help आउट उसके बूढ़ा neighborhood.
It is a खतरनाक place to raise a परिवार, और through the अनेक ट्रायल the family goes through, they जल्द learn that settling in is not as easy as it seems.
While अधिकारी Sutton struggles to cope with every day जीवन as a गली cop in लॉस एंजिल्स, his kids try to fit in at their नई स्कूलों और साथ their new neighbors.
the show premiered जनवरी 8, 2007 on the ABC परिवार संजाल साथ 13 एपीसोड ordered लिये the first ऋतु.
It was approved लिये a second season, which premiered September 4, 2007.
Vanessa Hudgens ' सोंग, Say OK था been प्रयुक्त in a वाणिज्यिक to promote the second season.

on जनवरी 29, 2010, ABC परिवार घोषित the रद्दीकरण of the series बाद four seasons.
a ईसाई denomination is an identifiable religious देह under a आम name, structure, और doctrine within Christianity.
In the परंपरागत परंपरा, churches हैं विभाजित प्रायः along जातीय और linguistic lines, into पृथक चर्च and traditions.
technically, divisions between एक समूह and another हैं defined by doctrine and गिरिजाघर authority.
Issues such as the प्रकृति of Jesus, the प्राधिकार of apostolic उत्तराधिकार, eschatology, और papal primacy पृथक one denomination from another.
the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर is the largest denomination with over 1.1 अरब members, over हाफ of सब Christians विश्वव्यापी, बनाना it the largest denomination लिये any religion विश्वव्यापी ( although the गिरिजाघर करता not view itself as a denomination, लकिन as the original pre-denominational church ).
प्रोटोस्टेंट denominations comprise roughly 38–39 % of ईसाइयों worldwide, और साथ the catholics, protestants, Anglicans, and other closely related denominations comprise Western Christianity.
the Eastern परंपरागत गिरिजाघर, Oriental Orthodox चर्च and the assyrian गिरिजाघर of the ईस्ट हैं considered Eastern ईसाई denominations.
Western ईसाई denominations जीतना in Western Europe and its former colonies.
पूर्वी Christian denominations हैं represented ज़्यादातर in Eastern यूरोपीय, the मध्य ईस्ट और North अफ़्रीकी.
Christians have विभिन्न doctrines परिचय the Church, the body of faithful कि they believe थी established by यीशु Christ, और कैसा the divine church corresponds to Christian denominations.
दोनो the catholics और the Eastern Orthodox consider प्रत्येक of themselves solely to faithfully represent the एक Holy कैथोलिक और अपोस्टोलिक Church to the exclusion of the other.
Protestants separated इससे the कैथोलिक Church क्युकी of theologies and practices that they माना to be in violation of उनके interpretation.
Generally, सदस्यों of the various denominations acknowledge प्रत्येक other as ईसाइयों, at least to the extent that वे have mutually recognized baptisms और acknowledge historically orthodox views सहित the Divinity of Jesus and doctrines of सिन and मोक्ष, even हालांकि doctrinal and ecclesiological obstacles रोकते full communion between churches.
चूंकि the reforms surrounding Vatican II, the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर रै referred to Protestant समुदायों as `` denominations '', जबकि reserving the term `` गिरिजाघर '' for अपोस्टोलिक चर्च, सहित the Eastern परंपरागत ( देखिए subsistit in और शाखा सिद्धान्त ).
There हैं however some non-denominational ईसाइयों who do not follow any particular शाखा.
The panda ( Ailuropoda melanoleuca, lit.
`` ब्लैक and white cat-foot '' ), भी ज्ञात as the giant पांडा to फर्क it from the unrelated रेड पांडा, is a भालू native to central-western और दक्षिण western चीन.
it is easily recognized by the large, distinctive black धब्बे around इसके आँखें, over the कानों, and across its round body.
हालांकि it belongs to the अनुक्रम Carnivora, the पांडा 's diet is 99 % बाँसुरी.
pandas in the जंगली will occasionally eat other grasses, जंगली tubers, or भी meat in the रूप of birds, rodents or carrion.
in captivity, वे may प्राप्त मधु, eggs, fish, yams, shrub leaves, oranges, or bananas along साथ विशेषकर prepared खाना.
The दानव panda lives in a few mountain ranges in सेंट्रल चीन, mainly in सिचुआन province, लकिन also in the shaanxi और गांसू प्रांतों.
as a परिणाम of farming, वनों and अन्य विकास, the panda has महरूम driven out of the lowland areas where it once lived.
The पांडा is a conservation reliant endangered species.
A 2007 report shows 239 pandas जीना in captivity अंदर चीन और another 27 बाहर the देश.
Wild जनसांख्यिकी estimates vary ; one estimate shows कि वहीँ are परिचय 1,590 individuals जीना in the wild, while a 2006 study via DNA विश्लेषण estimated that इस फिगर could be as ऊँची as 2,000 to 3,000.
कुछ reports भी show कि the क्रमांक of pandas in the जंगली is on the rise.
however, the IUCN करता नहीं मानना वहीँ is पर्याप्त certainty yet to reclassify the species इससे Endangered to vulnerable.
जबकि the ड्रैगन has often परोसा as चीन 's national emblem, internationally the पांडा appears at तनिक as commonly.
as ऐसे, it is बनने widely used within चीन in international contexts, for example the पाँच fuwa mascots of the Beijing ओलंपिक.
The पतंग धावक is a 2007 अमरीकी drama फिल्मी निर्देशित by मार्क forster based on the अनोखा of the वही नाम by Khaled Hosseini.
it tells the story of Amir, a well-to-do लड़के from the वज़ीर Akbar Khan district of काबुल, who is tormented by the guilt of abandoning his friend Hassan, the बेटे of his पिता 's Hazara servant.
The story is set against a backdrop of tumultuous कार्यक्रम, इससे the fall of the साम्राज्य in अफगानिस्तान through the सोवियत military intervention, the mass exodus of अफगान शरणार्थियों to Pakistan और the United राज्य, और the Taliban शासन.
Though most of the film is नियत in Afghanistan, these parts यहूद ज़्यादातर shot in काश्गर, चीन, due to the dangers of फिल्मांकन in Afghanistan at the time.
The majority of the film 's संवाद is in Dari, with the शेष बोला in English.
The child अभिनेताओं are native speakers, but several adult actors था to learn Dari.
फिल्मांकन wrapped up on दिसम्बर 21, 2006, और the film was अपेक्षित to be released on November 2, 2007.
however, after चिंता लिये the safety of the यंग actors in the फिल्मी due to fears of violent reprisals to the sexual nature of some दृश्यों in जिससे they appear, इसके release तिथि was pushed वापस छह सप्ताह to दिसम्बर 14, 2007.
The पतंग Runner was released on dvd on कूच 25, 2008.
A hd dvd release थी घोषित लिये the same तिथि, but was रद्द following the format 's demise.
The फिल्मी थी मनोनीत लिये the Golden ग्लोब Award लिये बेहतरीन Foreign Language फिल्मी in 2007.
the film 's स्कोर by अल्बर्टो इग्लेसियस थी मनोनीत for Best असली Score at the सुनहरी Globes और the अकादमी Awards.
the legality of cannabis varies इससे country to देश.
कब्ज़ा of cannabis is illegal in सबसे countries और रै महरूम since the beginning of फैली कैनबिस निषेध in the late 1930s.
however, अनेक countries have decriminalized the कब्ज़ा of छोटी quantities of कैनबिस, विशेषकर in North अमेरिका, दक्षिण अमेरिका और Europe.
Furthermore, कब्ज़ा is legal or effectively legal in the Netherlands, North कोरियाई और would be in the u.S. राज्य of कोलोराडो और वॉशिंगटन if it यहूद नहीं for federal law, जिससे governs व्यक्तियों in all राज्य.
The medicinal use of cannabis is विधिक in a number of countries, including Canada, the चेक गणतंत्र और इसराईल.
जबकि federal law in the संयुक्त States bans all sale और possession of cannabis, प्रवर्तन varies widely at the राज्य level and some states have established औषधीय मारिजुआना programs in कि खण्डन federal विधि ; two राज्य ( Colorado and वॉशिंगटन ) have repealed उनके कानून prohibiting the recreational उपयोग of कैनबिस and replaced them साथ a नियामक regime, भी contrary to संघीय statute.
Some देशों have laws कि are not as vigorously prosecuted as अन्य but, apart from the countries कि प्रस्ताव अभिगम to medical marijuana, सबसे countries have विभिन्न penalties ranging इससे lenient to very कठोर.
कुछ infractions are लिया more seriously in some countries than अन्य in लिहाज़ to the cultivation, use, कब्ज़ा or ट्रांसफ़र of कैनबिस लिये recreational use.
a few jurisdictions have lessened penalties for possession of छोटी quantities of cannabis, बनाना it punishable by confiscation and a fine, rather than कारावास.
Some jurisdictions/ drug न्यायालयों उपयोग mandatory उपचार programs लिये young or बारंबार users, साथ स्वतंत्रता इससे narcotic दवाएँ as the लक्ष्य and a few jurisdictions permit cannabis use for औषधीय purposes.
There are भी changes in a अधिक प्रतिबंधक दिशा as in कनाडा.
ड्रग tests to detect कैनबिस are increasingly common in many देशों and have resulted in कारावास वाक्य और people खोने their jobs.
however, simple possession can carry long jail वाक्य in कुछ countries, particularly in parts of ईस्ट एशिया and southeast एशिया जहाँ the बिक्री of cannabis may lead to a वाक्य of life in prison or भी निष्पादन.
Loxahatchee is a community स्तिथ in ताड़ Beach County, फ्लोरिडा, संयुक्त राज्य.
It is located in the क्षेत्रों north of Wellington and वेस्ट and उत्तरपश्चिम of Royal ताड़ Beach, फ्लोरिडा और approximately वेस्ट of West ताड़ Beach.
Loxahatchee is भी the नाम of the पोस्ट दफ्तर that serves इस क्षेत्रफल, जिससे is अंतर्गत the zip कोड of 33470.
The नाम loxahatchee means `` कछुआ नदी. ''
loxahatchee is located भीतर the Indian trails सुधार ज़िला और the loxahatchee Groves Water कंट्रोल District.
शेर Country safari, a drive-through safari park, is स्तिथ in loxahatchee.
in 2006, the राज्य of Florida स्वीकृत incorporation of भाग of Loxahatchee as the Town of loxahatchee Groves to become the 38th नगरपालिका in ताड़ Beach काउंटी.
The main reason लिये incorporating was to better protect the क्षेत्रफल इससे बुवाई growth और to बचाना the rural character of the पड़ोस.
Perhaps the सबसे rural area within a close proximity to West ताड़ बीच, साथ लॉट sizes दायरा इससे 1-20 acres.
साथ with the Acreage, it is notable for loose land restrictions and the native और exotic एनिमल उपस्थिति is quite notable.
seminole लकीरें ऊँची स्कूल serves the area.
The कनाडाई Citizenship परीक्षण is a परीक्षण, administered by Citizenship and आव्रजन कनाडा ( सीआईसी ), that is जरूरी for सब applicants for कनाडाई citizenship who are aged between 18 and 54 और who meet the basic आवश्यकताएँ for नागरिकता.
The परीक्षण is available in both French और English, the official languages of कनाडा.
पुनर्जागरण Cruises, originally founded in 1989 owned by Fearnley & Eger rederi in Oslo - Norway, later खरीदा by एडवर्ड rudner ( संस्थापक of alamo Car rental ) as the कम्पनी faltered दौरान the Gulf युद्ध.
They operated year-round क्रूज itineraries to the Mediterranean, the यूनानी Isles, Tahiti और the दक्षिण प्रशांत, उत्तरी Europe और Scandinavia.
The कम्पनी ceased परिचालन on 25 September 2001 और accommodated up to 220,000 guests in 2000.
जबकि the company had महरूम in ग़रीब financial स्वास्थ्य for quite कुछ समय, the economic decline resulting इससे the सितंबर 11th terrorist हमले are credited साथ the demise of this क्रूज लकीर.
the fleet is listed under सूची of cruise ships.
It थी headquartered in Fort lauderdale, फ्लोरिडा.
Epithelium is one of the चार मौलिक प्रकार of animal ऊतक, along with संयोजी ऊतक, muscle ऊतक और बेचैन ऊतक.
epithelial ऊतकों line the cavities and surfaces of structures throughout the body, and also form अनेक ग्रंथियों.
कृत्यों of epithelial cells include स्राव, selective absorption, protection, transcellular transport और detection of sensation.
in Greek `` ἐπί '' ( `` epi '' ) means `` on '' or `` upon '', and `` θηλή '' ( `` thēlē '' ) means `` nipple ''.
epithelial परतों हैं avascular, so वे must प्राप्त nourishment via diffusion of substances इससे the underlying connective ऊतक, through the तहखाने membrane.
epithelia can also be organized into क्लस्टर of cells that function as बहिःस्रावी and endocrine ग्रंथियों.
Kent E. hovind ( born जनवरी 15, 1953 ) is an American यंग धरती creationist.
Hovind रै बोला on creation science and रै aimed to convince श्रोता to reject theories of evolution, भूभौतिकी, and cosmology in favor of his निर्वचन of the Genesis सृष्टि कथा from the Bible.
hovind 's दृश्य हैं contradicted by वैज्ञानिक प्रमाण and some of his ideas have भी been criticized by यंग धरती creationist organizations such as Answers in Genesis.
Hovind स्थापित the Creation Science Evangelism in 1991, and frequently spoke on young Earth creationism at seminars at private schools and चर्च, debates, and on रेडियो और television broadcasts.
चूंकि जनवरी 2007, hovind रै been सेवारत a ten-year थाना sentence बाद being convicted of 58 federal counts, including 12 कर offenses, one count of obstructing संघीय एजेंटों, and 45 रिश्तो of structuring नकदी transactions.
he is incarcerated at the Federal correctional Institution at बर्लिन, नई Hampshire.
Bride साथ बिंदी decorated forehead
a बिंदी (, from Sanskrit bindu, अर्थ `` a drop, small particle, dot '' ), or a pottu/bottu ( in Tamil, तेलुगु, और मलयालम ) is a माथे सजावट worn in दक्षिण एशिया ( विशेषकर इण्डिया, बांग्लादेश, Nepal, श्री Lanka and Mauritius ) और southeast एशिया.
Traditionally it is a bright बिन्दु of red रंग लागू in the center of the माथे close to the eyebrows, लकिन it can भी consist of a sign or टुकड़ा of आभूषण worn at इस location.
the नई यॉर्क gubernatorial चुनाव of 2010 was आयोजित on Tuesday, नवम्बर 2, 2010, to elect the Governor of New यॉर्क, to serve a four-year term that began in जनवरी 2011.

The main डाल of Dragon बॉल at the समाप्त of the manga.
the Dragon Ball manga और anime series सुविधाएँ an extensive डाल of वर्ण created by अकिरा Toriyama.
The series takes place in a fictional universe, the वही as Toriyama 's पिछला series Dr. Slump, और फ़ॉलो the adventures of martial artist Son Goku from बाल्यकाल to adulthood as he searches for the seven spheres ज्ञात as the Dragon गेंदें, प्रयुक्त to summon a wish-granting ड्रैगन.

While अनेक of the characters हैं humans साथ superhuman शक्ति and/or अलौकिक abilities, the डाल also शामिल anthropomorphic पशु and बाद, extraterrestrial lifeforms.
the श्रेणी भी includes depictions of the आफ्टरलाइफ, साथ several characters being gods कि govern the universe.

The Comanche हैं a मैदान Indian जनजाति जिनकी historic territory, known as comancheria, consisted of उपस्थित दिन eastern New Mexico, दक्षिणी कोलोराडो, northeastern Arizona, दक्षिणी Kansas, all of Oklahoma, और सबसे of northwest टेक्सास.
the comanche people हैं नामांकित in the federally recognized Comanche स्वदेश, in Oklahoma.
Historically, the comanches were hunter-gatherers with a घोड़ा culture.
वहीँ may have been as many as 45,000 Comanches in the लेट 18th सदी.
आज, the comanche स्वदेश comanche tribal enrollment संख्याएँ 15,191 with लगभग 7,763 members residing in the Lawton – Fort sill और surrounding areas of दक्षिणपश्चिम Oklahoma.
The Comanche स्वदेश homecoming Powwow is आयोजित annually in Walters, Oklahoma in mid-July.
The Comanche spoke the Comanche भाषा, a numic language of the Uto-Aztecan परिवार, sometimes वर्गीकृत as a Shoshone dialect ; however, only about 1 % of comanches बोलो it today.

टाइम्स Square Studios ( TSS ) is an अमरीकी television स्टुडियो located in the टाइम्स Square पड़ोस of the Manhattan बरो of नई यॉर्क City, नई York.

the लास Vegas Strip संसार of coca-cola संग्रहालय in 2003
coca-cola is a कार्बोनेटेड नरम पेय बेची in stores, रेस्तरां, और वेंडिंग machines in प्रत्येक country मगर क्यूबा and North कोरियाई.
it is उत्पादित by The Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta, जॉर्जिया, and is often referred to simply as Coke ( a registered ट्रेडमार्क of The coca-cola कम्पनी in the United States चूंकि कूच 27, 1944 ).
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it was invented in the लेट 19th सदी by John Pemberton, coca-cola was bought आउट by बिजनेसमैन asa Griggs Candler, whose विपणन tactics led कोक to its dominance of the संसार soft-drink मार्केट throughout the 20th सदी.
the company produces concentrate, जिससे is तब sold to licensed coca-cola bottlers throughout the world.
the bottlers, जो थाम territorially exclusive अनुबंध with the कम्पनी, produce finished product in cans and बोतलों from the concentrate in combination साथ filtered water and sweeteners.
The bottlers then बेचें, distribute और merchandise Coca-Cola to खुदरा स्टोर्स and vending मशीने.
Such bottlers include coca-cola Enterprises, which is the largest single coca-cola bottler in उत्तर अमेरिका और western Europe.
the Coca-Cola कम्पनी भी sells concentrate for soda स्रोतों to major रेस्तरां and खाना सेवा वितरकों.
the Coca-Cola कम्पनी has, on occasion, introduced other cola drinks अंतर्गत the Coke ब्रांड नाम.
The सबसे common of ये is Diet Coke, with अन्य सहित caffeine-free Coca-Cola, Diet कोक caffeine-free, coca-cola चेरी, Coca-Cola Zero, Coca-Cola Vanilla, और खास संस्करण with lemon, लाइम or कॉफी.
Based on interbrand 's बेहतरीन वैश्विक ब्रांड 2011, coca-cola थी the world 's most valuable ब्रांड.
प्रकार of bar-lines
in musical संकेतन, a बार ( or माप ) is a खण्ड of समय defined by a दिए क्रमांक of बीट्स, each of जिससे are आबंटित a particular note value.
Dividing music into बार provides regular reference points to pin पाइंट locations within a टुकड़ा of music.
It also makes लिखा music easier to follow, since प्रत्येक बार of staff प्रतीकों can be पढ़ा and निभाई as a बैच.
typically, a piece consists of अनेक बार of the same लंबाई, और in आधुनिक musical notation the क्रमांक of बीट्स in each bar is specified at the beginning of the score by the top क्रमांक of a time signature ( such as 3/4 ), जबकि the नीचे क्रमांक indicates the note value of the beat ( the ताल रै a क्वार्टर note value in the 3/4 example ).
the शब्द बार is more common in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी, और the word measure is more आम in American English, हालांकि संगीतकारों generally समझे both usages.
in American English, although the शब्द बार और measure are often used interchangeably the correct उपयोग of the शब्द 'bar ' refers तभी to the vertical line itself, जबकि the word 'measure ' refers to the बीट्स contained between bars.
in international उपयोग, it is बराबर सही to speak of bar संख्याएँ and माप numbers, e.g. ‘bars 9–16’ or ‘mm. 9–16’.
साथ the same लाइनों, it is हिकमत to reserve the abbreviated form ‘bb.
3–4’ etc. लिये बीट्स only ; bars should be referred to by name in पूरा.
The first metrically complete माप भीतर a piece of म्यूज़िक is called ‘bar 1’ or ‘m. 1’.
When the टुकड़ा begins साथ an anacrusis ( an incomplete माप at the सिर of a टुकड़ा of music ), ‘bar 1’ or ‘m. 1’ is the following माप.
the 19.9 mw gemasolar solar plant in Spain features 15 hours of storage और can supply शक्ति 24 घंटों a day.
Solar energy, रौशन light and heat from the सूर्य, रै महरूम harnessed by humans चूंकि ancient times using a दायरा of ever-evolving technologies.
Solar energy technologies शामिल सौर heating, सौर photovoltaics, solar thermal electricity, सौर architecture and कृत्रिम photosynthesis, जिससे can make considerable contributions to solving कुछ of the most urgent energy समस्याएं the संसार अभी चेहरों.
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive सौर or क्रियाशील solar depending on the रास्ता वे कैप्चर, बदलें और वितरित solar उर्जा.
क्रियाशील solar techniques शामिल the use of photovoltaic panels और solar thermal collectors to harness the उर्जा.
passive सौर तकनीकों include orienting a building to the Sun, selecting materials साथ favorable thermal mass or लाइट dispersing properties, और डिजाइनिंग स्पेसेस कि naturally circulate एयर.
In 2011, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Energy एजेंसी कहा that `` the विकास of affordable, inexhaustible and साफ सौर उर्जा technologies होगा have विशाल longer-term benefits.
It will बढ़ाएँ countries’ उर्जा सुरक्षा through रिलायंस on an स्वदेशी, inexhaustible and ज़्यादातर import-independent resource, बढ़ाएँ sustainability, reduce प्रदूषण, lower the costs of mitigating जलवायु change, और रखना चट्टान fuel prices निम्नतर than otherwise.
These advantages हैं वैश्विक.
Hence the अतिरिक्त लागत of the incentives लिये जल्दी deployment should be माना सीखना investments ; they जरूर be बुद्धिमानी खर्च and need to be widely shared ''.
Primary परवाह may be provided in community health centres.
Primary परवाह is the स्वास्थ्य परवाह given by a स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रदाता.
Typically इस provider acts as the प्रिंसिपल पाइंट of consultation for patients भीतर a health परवाह system and coordinates other specialists that the रोगी may need.
ऐसे a professional can be a प्राथमिक परवाह चिकित्सक, such as a general practitioner or family physician, or depending on the मोहल्ले, health प्रणाली organization, और patient 's discretion, वे may देखिए a pharmacist, a चिकित्सक assistant, a nurse practitioner, a नर्स ( ऐसे as in the संयुक्त किंगडम ), a clinical officer ( ऐसे as in parts of Africa ), or an आयुर्वेदिक or other परंपरागत medicine पेशेवर ( such as in parts of Asia ).
depending on the प्रकृति of the स्वास्थ्य condition, patients may तब be referred लिये द्वितीयक or tertiary परवाह.
`` समंदर एवेन्यू '' is a सोंग अंकित by अमरीकी pop punk समूह yellowcard.
It थी released in February 2004 as the दूसरी सिंगल इससे Ocean Avenue और the तीसरा track.
it is known लिये bringing them into the मुख्यधारा, as it received numerous spins on MTV and increasing radio airplay.
समंदर एवेन्यू is a street in Jacksonville, Florida, the band 's stomping grounds निकट their ऊँची school, Douglas एंडरसन School of the Arts, और another गली mentioned in the सोंग, Cherry गली.
the नाम of Ocean Avenue in jacksonville is दरअसल बीच boulevard.

A psychiatrist is a physician जो specializes in psychiatry.
a मनोचिकित्सक specializes in the उपचार of mental विकार.
Psychiatrists हैं authorized to prescribe medicine, conduct शारीरिक examinations, अनुक्रम और interpret प्रयोगशाला tests, use psychotherapy और may order दिमाग इमेजिंग अध्ययन such as computed tomography ( CT/CAT Scan ), magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ), and positron उत्सर्जन tomography ( पालतु ) स्कैनिंग.
भीतर the framework of the संसार Health Organization 's ( जो ) परिभाषा of स्वास्थ्य as a राज्य of पूरा physical, mental and सोशल well-being, और नहीं merely the absence of बीमारी or infirmity, reproductive स्वास्थ्य, or यौन health/hygiene, addresses the reproductive processes, कृत्यों and system at all चरण of जीवन.
Reproductive स्वास्थ्य, इसलिए, implies that people हैं able to have a जिम्मेदार, संतोषजनक और safer sex life and कि वे have the capability to reproduce and the स्वतंत्रता to decide if, when और how often to do so.
एक interpretation of this implies कि मेन और women ought to be सूचित of and to have अभिगम to सुरक्षित, प्रभावी, affordable और acceptable methods of birth कंट्रोल ; भी अभिगम to उचित health care सेवाएं of sexual, reproductive आयुर्विज्ञान and क्रियान्वयन of स्वास्थ्य education programs to तनाव the importance of women to go safely through गर्भावस्था and प्रसव could provide couples साथ the best chance of having a स्वस्थ infant.
on the other hand individuals do फेस inequalities in reproductive health सेवाएं.
inequalities vary आधारित on socioeconomic औकात, शिक्षा स्तर, age, नस्ल, religion, और संसाधन available in their environment.
It is possible for example, कि कम आय individuals कमी the resources for appropriate स्वास्थ्य services और the knowledge to जान कया is appropriate for maintaining reproductive स्वास्थ्य.
According to the जो, `` reproductive और sexual ill-health accounts लिये 20 % of the वैश्विक बोझ of ill-health लिये महिलाओं, and 14 % लिये men. ''
reproductive health is a भाग of Sexual और reproductive health और rights.
