Core 2 is a brand encompassing a range of Intel 's consumer 64-bit x86-64 single-, दुआl-, and quad-core microprocessors आधारित on the कोर microarchitecture.
The single- and dual-core models हैं single- die, whereas the quad-core models comprise two मरता, प्रत्येक containing दो cores, packaged in a multi-chip मोड्यूल.
The परिचय of कोर 2 relegated the pentium brand to the mid-range market, and reunified लैपटॉप और डेस्कटॉप cpu lines, which previously था been divided into the pentium 4, Pentium D, और Pentium M ब्रांड्स.
The Core 2 brand was introduced on 27 July 2006, comprising the Solo ( single-core ), duo ( dual-core ), Quad ( quad-core ), and in 2007, the Extreme ( दुआl- or quad-core cpu for enthusiasts ) subbrands.
इंटेल Core 2 processors साथ vpro technology ( designed लिये व्यवसायों ) शामिल the dual-core और quad-core branches.
the सुपर Bowl is the annual चैंपियनशिप खेल of the National फ़ुटबॉल League ( एनएफएल ), the उच्चतम level of professional अमरीकी football in the संयुक्त States, culminating a season that begins in the late गर्मियाँ of the previous पंचांग साल.
the Super कटोरी उपयोग रोमन numerals to पहचानो each game, बल्कि than the साल in which it is held.
लिये example, सुपर कटोरी i थी played on January 15, 1967, following the 1966 regular ऋतु, while सुपर कटोरी xlvii थी निभाई on February 3, 2013, following the 2012 ऋतु.
the game थी created as part of a merger अनुबंध between the एनएफएल and इसके then-rival लीग, the American फ़ुटबॉल League ( AFL ).
It थी agreed that the two लीग ' चैंपियन teams होता play in an afl–nfl World चैंपियनशिप Game जबतक the विलय थी to officially begin in 1970.
After the merger, each लीग थी redesignated as a `` सम्मेलन ``, और the खेल थी then निभाई between the conference champions.
Currently, the नेशनल Football Conference ( nfc ) leads the श्रेणी with 25 विन्स to 22 wins for the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( AFC ).
The day on जिससे the Super Bowl is played, now considered by कुछ a de facto American national holiday, is called `` Super Bowl संडे ``.
it is the second-largest दिन लिये U.S. खाना consumption, बाद Thanksgiving दिन.
In addition, the Super Bowl has अक्सर महरूम the most watched अमरीकी टेलीविज़न broadcast of the year.
Super Bowl xlv, निभाई in 2011, became the most-watched अमरीकी television कार्यक्रम in history, drawing an औसत audience of 111 लाख दर्शक and taking over the spot आयोजित by the previous साल 's Super कटोरी, जिससे itself had लिया over the # 1 स्पॉट आयोजित लिये twenty-eight years by the फाइनल episode of m*a*s*h.
The सुपर कटोरी is also among the सबसे watched sporting कार्यक्रम in the संसार, लगभग all होने उत्तर अमरीकी ऑडियंस, and is दूसरी to association फ़ुटबॉल ’s यूईएफए champions लीग final as the सबसे watched सालाना sporting event विश्वव्यापी.
Because of its ऊँची viewership, commercial airtime during the सुपर Bowl ब्रॉडकास्ट is the सबसे expensive of the साल.
Due to the ऊँची cost of investing in विज्ञापन on the सुपर कटोरी, companies regularly develop उनके सबसे expensive विज्ञापन लिये इस broadcast.
As a result, watching and discussing the ब्रॉडकास्ट 's commercials रै become a significant पहलू of the event.
In addition, अनेक popular singers and musicians have performed दौरान the इवेंट 's pre-game और मध्यांतर ceremonies because of the एक्सपोज़र.
फिओना is a feminine दिए name.
The नाम फिओना was invented, and पहला प्रयुक्त, by the स्कॉटिश कवि जेम्स macpherson ( 1736–96 ), author of the ossian कविताएं, जिससे he claimed यहूद अनुवाद इससे प्राचीन गैलिक sources ( sources, when challenged, he never produced ).
the नाम थी subsequently प्रयुक्त as a pseudonym by William Sharp ( 1855–1905 ), जो authored several romantic works अंतर्गत the नाम `` फिओना macleod ''.
the name रै चूंकि become popular in England, Scotland और आयरलैंड.
The name is considered to be a latinised रूप of the गैलिक word fionn, meaning `` white '', `` मेला ''.
The name फिओना is भी sometimes used as an anglicisation of the irish-language नाम Fíona, although these names are वरना unrelated ( as Fíona is निकला इससे an element अर्थ `` vine '' ).
वहीँ is भी a आधुनिक tendency to equate the authentic स्कॉटिश Gaelic feminine name Fionnghal साथ फिओना.
The नाम फिओना is उठती in लोकप्रियता विशेषकर in German -speaking countries.
Fiona थी the 49th सबसे popular name for baby girls born in 2008 in जर्मनी.
फिओना थी tied लिये third प्लेस in the ranking of सबसे लोकप्रिय names for baby girls born in the tiny principality of Liechtenstein in 2008.
the name थी the 347th सबसे लोकप्रिय name for girls born in the United States in 2008, where it रै क्रमित among the शीर्ष 1,000 सबसे popular names लिये girls चूंकि 1990 और among the शीर्ष 500 चूंकि 1999.
The नाम फिओना has been विशेषकर लोकप्रिय लिये girls of एशियाई or प्रशांत islander descent in New यॉर्क City, जहाँ फिओना ranked as the ninth most लोकप्रिय name लिये girls from those समूह in 2007.
Many languages are used, or historically have been प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त States.
The सबसे commonly used language is English.
वहीँ हैं also अनेक भाषाएं स्वदेशी to North अमेरिका or to U.S. राज्य or holdings in the Pacific प्रदेश.
भाषाएं brought to the country by colonists or immigrants from यूरोपीय, एशिया, or other भाग of the संसार मेक up a large portion of the भाषाएं फिलहाल प्रयुक्त ; several भाषाएं, including creoles and sign languages, have भी developed in the संयुक्त States.
लगभग 337 भाषाएं हैं spoken or हस्ताक्षरित by the population, of which 176 are indigenous to the area.
fifty-two languages formerly spoken in the country 's territory हैं now विलुप्त.
The किस्में of अंग्रेज़ी spoken in the United States is known as अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी.
अंग्रेज़ी is the de facto नेशनल language of the United States, साथ 80 % of the जनसांख्यिकी claiming it as a माँ tongue, और कुछ 95 % claiming to बोलो it `` खूब '' or `` very well ''.
however, no official language exists at the federal स्तर.
वहीँ have महरूम अनेक प्रस्ताव to make English the नेशनल language in amendments to immigration सुधार bills, but none of ये बिल्स रै become विधि with the amendment intact.
the हालात is quite varied at the state और territorial levels, with कुछ states mirroring the federal policy of adopting no official भाषा in a de jure capacity, अन्य adopting अंग्रेज़ी alone, अन्य officially adopting English as well as लोकल भाषाएं, and still others adopting a नीति of de facto bilingualism.
Spanish is the दूसरी सबसे common language in the देश, and is बोला by over 12 % of the population.
the संयुक्त States holds the संसार 's पांचवां largest spanish-speaking population, outnumbered only by Mexico, स्पेन, Colombia, और अर्जेंटीना.
Throughout the southwestern United राज्य, long-established spanish-speaking communities coexist साथ विशाल संख्याएँ of अधिक हाल Hispanophone आप्रवासियों.
हालांकि many new Latin अमरीकी immigrants हैं कम than fluent in अंग्रेज़ी, nearly all second-generation हिस्पैनिक Americans बोलो English धड़ल्ले, जबकि तभी about हाफ स्टिल बोलो स्पेनी.
according to the 2000 US जनसांख्यिकी, लोगों of German ancestry make up the largest सिंगल जातीय group in the United States, और the German भाषा ranks पांचवां.
Italian, पॉलिश, and फ्रेंच are still widely बोला among populations descending इससे immigrants from those countries in the जल्दी 20th century, but the use of these भाषाएं is dwindling as the older generations die.
Russian is also बोला by अप्रवासी populations.
Tagalog and Vietnamese have over one लाख अध्यक्षों each in the संयुक्त राज्य, लगभग entirely within हाल अप्रवासी populations.
दोनो भाषाएं, साथ with the varieties of the Chinese भाषा, Japanese, and Korean, हैं now used in चुनावों in Alaska, California, हवाई, Illinois, New York, Texas, and Washington.
Native अमरीकी भाषाएं are spoken in smaller pockets of the country, लकिन ये populations are decreasing, और the languages are लगभग never widely used outside of reservations.
हवाई, although having few देशी speakers, is an आधिकारिक language साथ with English at the state स्तर in हवाई.
the राज्य government of louisiana offers services और दस्तावेज़ in French, as करता New मैक्सिको in Spanish.
besides English, Spanish, French, German, navajo and other Native American भाषाएं, all other languages हैं प्रायः सीखे from अप्रवासी पूर्वजो that came after the time of स्वतंत्रता or learned through some रूप of शिक्षा.
1990 's pontiac ग्रैंड am Sedan fender and quarter panel
on an automobile, a क्वार्टर panel ( or rear wing as it is known in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी ) is usually माना the देह फलक which goes between the पश्च द्वार and the ट्रंक and typically wraps around the व्हील well ; however, the समान सामने section फेंडर ( गाडी ), between the द्वार and the हुड, is sometimes incorrectly referred to as a quarter फलक.
The quarter फलक is typically बना of चादर मेटल, but is sometimes made of fiberglass or fiber-reinforced प्लास्टिक ; although, इस varies साथ different makes and models.
A quarter फलक is typically a welded on component of the uni-body ढांचा or Monocoque.
बदलना of a चादर metal क्वार्टर फलक typically requires it to be cut off the vehicle और a replacement part to be welded ( or sometimes bonded ) to the गाडी.
Due to this ऊँची amount of specialized मजदूर, a quarter फलक may often be repaired बल्कि than replaced by hammering out the damage, and a देह फिलर sometimes referred to as bondo to be applied to finalize the original surface.
Shropshire ( or ; alternatively salop ; abbreviated, in print तभी, Shrops ) is a काउंटी in the वेस्ट Midlands प्रदेश of इंग्लैण्ड.
It borders Wales to the वेस्ट, Cheshire to the north, staffordshire to the east, वॉस्टरशायर to the south-east और herefordshire to the दक्षिण.
a unitary प्राधिकार ( Shropshire Council ) was created on 1 April 2009, लेने over इससे the पिछला county council और 5 district councils, और covers most of the county.
the borough of Telford and wrekin रै been a पृथक unitary authority चूंकि 1998 but continues to be शामिल in the ceremonial काउंटी.
the काउंटी 's population और economy is centred on five कस्बों : the काउंटी कस्बा of Shrewsbury, which is culturally and historically important and is located in the केन्द्र of the काउंटी ; telford, a नई कस्बा in the ईस्ट which थी constructed around a क्रमांक of older कस्बों, सबसे notably Wellington, Dawley and Madeley, which is आज the most populous ; and oswestry in the north-west, bridgnorth just to the दक्षिण of Telford, and ludlow in the दक्षिण.
The county has many further market towns, सहित whitchurch in the उत्तर, Newport बस to the north-east of telford, and मार्केट drayton in the north-east of the काउंटी.
The ironbridge Gorge क्षेत्रफल is a युनेस्को संसार Heritage Site, covering ironbridge, Coalbrookdale और a part of Madeley.
There are, additionally, अन्य notable ऐतिहासिक industrial sites located around the county, ऐसे as at shrewsbury, broseley, snailbeach and highley as well as the shropshire Union Canal.
The shropshire पहाड़ियाँ Area of बकाया Natural सौंदर्य covers about a quarter of the काउंटी, मुख्यतः in the दक्षिण.
shropshire is one of England 's सबसे rural और sparsely आबादी counties, with the population घनत्व of the shropshire परिषद area being बस 91/km2 ( 337/sq mi ).
The Wrekin is एक of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध natural landmarks in the county, हालांकि the highest पहाड़ियाँ हैं the clee पहाड़ियाँ, stiperstones और the Long Mynd.
wenlock किनारे is another significant geographical और geological landmark.
in the low-lying उत्तरपश्चिम of the काउंटी ( and overlapping the किनारा साथ वेल्स ) is the Fenn 's, Whixall और Bettisfield Mosses नेशनल प्रकृति Reserve, एक of the most महत्वपूर्ण और best preserved bogs in ब्रिटेन.
The नदी Severn, Great Britain 's longest नदी, runs through the county, exiting into वॉस्टरशायर via the Severn घाटी.
shropshire is landlocked, और साथ an area of, is England 's largest अंतर्देशीय काउंटी.
the काउंटी flower is the round-leaved sundew.
For eurostat उद्देश्य, the county ( कम the एकात्मक ज़िला of telford और Wrekin ) is a NUTS 3 प्रदेश ( code ukg22 ).
The two Shropshire unitary areas ( covering सब of the ceremonial काउंटी ), साथ with the authorities covering the ceremonial काउंटी of Staffordshire, comprise the `` shropshire और Staffordshire '' NUTS 2 region.

the अमरीकी sitcom The बिग बंग सिद्धान्त, created और कार्यपालिका उत्पादित by Chuck Lorre and Bill prady, premiered on CBS on September 24, 2007.
The दिखाएँ centers on five characters : roommates Sheldon कूपर और Leonard hofstadter, two caltech physicists ; Penny, a waitress and aspiring actress जो जीवनदान आरपार the hall ; and लियोनार्ड and शेल्डन 's मित्रों and co-workers aerospace इंजीनियर हावर्ड Wolowitz, और astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali.
Over समय, अनेक supporting वर्ण have been promoted to अभिनीत roles : Leslie Winkle ( season 1 पुनरावर्ती ; season 2 नियमित ; ऋतु 3 अतिथि ), a physicist सहयोगी, और, at different times, a lover of both लियोनार्ड और Howard ; bernadette Rostenkowski-Wolowitz ( season 3 पुनरावर्ती ; season 4-present नियमित ), a microbiologist, Howard 's fiancée और subsequent wife, और पूर्व part-time waitress alongside Penny ; neuroscientist एमी farrah fowler ( season 3 guest ; season 4 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ), who joins the समूह after होने matched to शेल्डन on a डेटिंग जालस्थल ; and comic book store-owner, स्टुअर्ट खिलते ( सीज़न 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ), जो replaces Howard as राज 's best friend when हावर्ड is in स्पेस.
The दिखाएँ भी सुविधाएँ numerous supporting वर्ण, each of जिसको plays a prominent भूमिका in a छोटी समूह of एपीसोड.
the a-team is an American action-adventure टेलीविज़न श्रेणी, कार्यशील इससे 1983 to 1987, परिचय a fictional समूह of ex– United States फौज Special Forces कर्मियों who कार्य as soldiers of सौभाग्य, while on the run from the फौज बाद being ब्रांडेड as युद्ध criminals लिये a `` crime वे किया n't commit ``.
a विशेषता फिल्मी आधारित on the series थी released by 20th सदी Fox on जून 11, 2010.
a कॉमिक book series, A-Team : Shotgun विवाह, began March 9, 2010.
Diana प्रिंस is a fictional character appearing regularly in stories प्रकाशित by dc Comics.
वो debuted in Sensation Comics # 1 ( जनवरी 1942 ) और serves as the civilian and रहस्य identity of the superhero अचरज Woman.
The character थी निर्मित by Charles moulton और Harry G. Peter.
वाट Phra Kaew, Bangkok, Thailand
वहीँ is no आधिकारिक राज्य धर्म in the Thai constitution, which guarantees धार्मिक स्वतंत्रता for all Thai नागरिकों, हालांकि the किंग is जरूरी by law to be Buddhist.
According to the पिछला जनसांख्यिकी ( 2000 ) 94.6 % of Thais हैं बौद्धों of the Theravada परंपरा.
मुसलमान हैं the second largest धार्मिक group in थाईलैंड at 4.6 %.
Thailand 's southernmost प्रांतों - pattani, yala, Narathiwat और भाग of songkhla chumphon have dominant Muslim populations, consisting of दोनो ethnic Thai and मलय.
The दक्षिणी tip of थाईलैंड is ज़्यादातर जातीय Malays.
Christians, मुख्यतः catholics, represent 0.7 % of the population.
A छोटी लकिन influential जातियाँ of सिखों in थाईलैंड and some हिन्दुओं also live in the देश 's शहरों, and हैं heavily engaged in retail कॉमर्स.
There is भी a small यहूदी जातियाँ in Thailand, dating वापस to the 17th सदी.
चूंकि 2001, Muslim activists, generally described by the थाई government as terrorists or separatists, have rallied विरूद्ध the central सरकारी क्युकी of कथित भ्रष्टाचार and जातीय bias on the भाग of officials.
Thailand 's Department of धर्म, currently अंतर्गत the मंत्रालय of संस्कृति, is formally जिम्मेदार for the registration of धार्मिक समूह in Thailand url_http which थाम गुण through legally स्थापित मूलाधार.
It रै oversight, along साथ the Immigration पुलिस, over the work permits of प्रचारकों who are `` expatriate religious मजदूर '' of all धर्मों.
A मान added कर ( VAT ) is a रूप of खपत tax.
From the परिप्रेक्ष्य of the buyer, it is a tax on the purchase दाम.
इससे that of the seller, it is a tax only on the मान added to a उत्पाद, सामग्री, or सेवा, from an हिसाब पाइंट of दृश्य, by इस stage of इसके manufacture or वितरण.
The manufacturer remits to the government the difference between ये two amounts, और retains the बाकी लिये themselves to ऑफसेट the taxes वे था previously सशुल्क on the inputs.
The value added to a उत्पाद by or with a business is the sale price चार्ज to इसके ग्राहक, minus the लागत of materials और अन्य taxable inputs.
A vat is like a बिक्री कर in कि ultimately only the समाप्त consumer is taxed.
it differs from the बिक्री tax in कि, with the latter, the कर is एकत्रित और remitted to the सरकारी only एकबार, at the पाइंट of purchase by the end consumer.
साथ the VAT, collections, remittances to the government, and क्रेडिट for taxes already सशुल्क occur each time a कारोबार in the supply chain purchases products.
A referee calling a high-sticking penaltyHigh
-sticking is the नाम of दो infractions in the sport of ice हॉकी that may occur जब a खिलाड़ी intentionally or inadvertently plays साथ his or her स्टिक ऊपर the ऊँचाई of the कन्धों or ऊपर the cross bar of a hockey goal.
This can परिणाम in a stoppage of खेल or in a penalty.
in the नियम of the नेशनल Hockey League, high-sticking is पारिभाषित as a penalty in नियम 60 and as a non-penalty foul in Rule 80.
a stoppage in खेल परिणाम if a ऊँची stick आता in contact साथ the पक and the टोली who छुआ it regains control of the पक.
However, play usually continues if a खिलाड़ी छू the पक साथ a ऊँची स्टिक and the opposing टोली gains control of the puck.
If the puck goes into the opposing जाल after coming into contact with a ऊँची stick, the लक्ष्य is disallowed.
the level at which a स्टिक is considered too ऊँची लिये a goal is the crossbar of the जाल.
however, if a खिलाड़ी knocks the पक into his own जाल साथ a ऊँची stick, the goal is अनुमत.
a penalty is assessed if a player strikes another खिलाड़ी साथ a ऊँची stick.
The खिलाड़ी is given a minor दंड unless उसके high स्टिक caused an injury, in जिससे case the रेफरी has the विकल्प to assess a double-minor, major or match दंड.
It is the रेफरी 's discretion which दंड to assess : the नियम काल्स लिये a double नाबालिग for an accidental injury, or a match penalty for a deliberate attempt to injure ( whether the opposition खिलाड़ी was actually घायल ).
Injury is प्रायः decided by the high स्टिक causing bleeding, but the presence of रक्त does not automatically mean an अतिरिक्त penalty is awarded.
कुछ referees have been known to award an अतिरिक्त दंड बगैर the presence of रक्त if the रेफरी determines कि the injury sustained थी sufficient to warrant a double-minor penalty.
ठेठ आधुनिक मेमोरी कार्ड रीडर, compatible with many common स्वरुप
a memory card reader is a device, typically having a usb interface, for accessing the data on a मेमोरी कार्ड ऐसे as a CompactFlash ( cf ), सुरक्षित Digital ( sd ) or multimediacard ( mmc ).
सबसे card पाठक also प्रस्ताव लिखें काबिलियत, और साथ with the कार्ड, this can फलन as a pen drive.
कुछ printers and निजी computers have a built-in कार्ड reader.
A multi कार्ड रीडर is used for संचार साथ more than one प्रकार of फ्लैश मेमोरी card.
Multi card पाठक do नहीं have built-in memory capacity, लकिन are समर्थ to accept अनेक प्रकार and styles of memory cards.
the क्रमांक of compatible मेमोरी cards varies इससे रीडर to रीडर और can शामिल अधिक than 20 अलग types.
the number of different मेमोरी cards that a मल्टी कार्ड reader can accept is expressed as x-in-1, with x होने a figure of मेरिट indicating the number of memory cards accepted, ऐसे as 35-in-1.
वहीँ हैं तीन श्रेणी of card पाठक sorted by the प्रकार and मात्रा of the कार्ड slots : सिंगल कार्ड reader ( e.g. 1x sd-only ), multi कार्ड reader ( e.g. 9-in-1 ) और series card reader ( e.g. 4x sd only ).
कुछ kinds of मेमोरी cards with उनके अपना usb कृत्यों do नहीं need the card reader, ऐसे as the Intelligent Stick मेमोरी card, which can प्लग directly into a USB slot.
The USB यंत्र class used is 0x08.
धमकाना is detrimental to students ' well-being और development.
धमकाना is the उपयोग of फ़ोर्स or coercion to abuse or intimidate अन्य.
The बर्ताव can be habitual और involve an असंतुलन of social or शारीरिक शक्ति.
it can include मौखिक उत्पीड़न or threat, शारीरिक उत्पीड़न or coercion और may be निर्देशित repeatedly towards particular victims, perhaps on grounds of race, धर्म, gender, कामुकता, or क्षमता.
If धमकाना is किया by a समूह, it is called mobbing.
the victim of bullying is sometimes referred to as a `` निशाना ''.
धमकाना can be पारिभाषित in अनेक different तरीके.
The UK currently रै no विधिक definition of bullying, जबकि कुछ U.S. states have कानून विरूद्ध it.
Bullying consists of तीन basic types of abuse – emotional, verbal, और physical.
it typically involves हल्का विधि of coercion such as intimidation.
धमकाना ranges इससे सरल one-on-one धमकाना to more complex bullying in which the bully may have one or more `` lieutenants '' who may seem to be willing to assist the primary bully in उसके or her धमकाना क्रियाएँ.
धमकाना in स्कूल and the workplace is also referred to as पीर गाली.
Robert W. फुलर has analyzed bullying in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of rankism.
A bullying संस्कृति can develop in any context in जिससे human beings interact साथ each अन्य.
This includes स्कूल, गिरिजाघर, परिवार, the कार्यस्थल, घर, and पड़ोस.
प्रसन्न slapping in the Instituto क्षेत्रीय federico errázuriz, सांता क्रूज़, Chile
लौरा बुश और Rae leigh Bradbury ( formerly missing ) on अप्रैल 4, 2007, in Austin, टेक्सास, after the 8-year-old introduced mrs. Bush during घोषणा of the भविष्य खोलने of the Texas क्षेत्रीय दफ्तर of the National Center for लापता और शोषित children.
rae Leigh was the पहला चाइल्ड in the u.S. to be recovered as a result of an एम्बर चेतावनी जब she was 8 सप्ताह बूढ़ा in November 1998.
An एम्बर Alert or a चाइल्ड abduction आपात ( SAME कोड : cae ) is a child abduction alert system originating in 1996, now employed in 9 countries.
AMBER is officially a backronym लिये अमेरिका 's लापता : प्रसारण Emergency Response, नामित लिये एम्बर Hagerman, a 9-year-old abducted और murdered in Arlington, Texas in 1996.
वैकल्पिक regional alert names यहूद एकबार used ; in Georgia, `` लेवी 's Call '' ( नामित बाद लेवी frady ) ; in हवाई, `` Maile Amber चेतावनी '' ( बाद maile गिल्बर्ट ) ; और Arkansas, `` Morgan Nick Amber चेतावनी '' ( in memory of मॉर्गन Chauntel उपनाम ).
AMBER Alerts are वितरित via वाणिज्यिक radio stations, Internet रेडियो, satellite रेडियो, television stations, और केबल tv by the Emergency Alert प्रणाली और NOAA Weather Radio ( जहाँ वे हैं termed `` Child Abduction Emergency '' or `` Amber चेतावनियाँ '' ).
The alerts are भी issued via e-mail, electronic traffic-condition signs, the LED billboards which हैं located बाहर of नए Walgreens locations, along with the LED/LCD लक्षण of billboard कंपनियाँ such as Clear चैनल Outdoor, सीबीएस Outdoor and Lamar, or through बेतार device sms टेक्स्ट messages.
एम्बर Alert रै also teamed up साथ google और Facebook to relay information regarding an AMBER Alert to an कभी growing जनसांख्यिकी.
those दिलचस्पी in subscribing to प्राप्त AMBER Alerts in their area via SMS संदेश can visit Wireless Amber चेतावनियाँ, जिससे हैं offered by law as फ़्री messages.
in कुछ states, the display scrollboards in सामने of लॉटरी terminals हैं also used.
the decision to declare an AMBER Alert is made by each पुलिस organization ( in अनेक cases, the राज्य पुलिस or highway पैट्रोल ) which investigates each of the abductions.
Public information in an एम्बर Alert प्रायः consists of the नाम और description of the abductee, a वर्णन of the suspected abductor, and a वर्णन and license थाली क्रमांक of the abductor 's vehicle, if उपलब्धियाँ.
मोनिका samille lewinsky ( born July 23, 1973 ) is an American woman साथ whom संयुक्त राज्य President विधेयक Clinton admitted to having had an `` improper संबंध '' जबकि वो worked at the White House in 1995 और 1996.
The affair and its repercussions ( जिससे included Clinton 's impeachment ) became ज्ञात as the Lewinsky कांड.
House of Night is a series of vampire -themed काल्पनिक novels by American लेखक P. C. Cast and her बेटी Kristin Cast.
it follows the adventures of zoey Redbird, a sixteen-year-old लड़की जो has just become a `` fledgling vampyre '' और is जरूरी to attend the हाउस of रात्रि बोर्डिंग स्कूल in तुलसा, ओक्लाहोमा.
The श्रेणी has महरूम on the New York Times बेहतरीन विक्रेता सूची for 63 सप्ताह और there हैं over seven million नक़ल in छपाई in उत्तर America अलोन.
the छठे novel, Tempted, which went on sale on अक्तूबर 27, 2009 with a first मुद्रण of a million copies, डाला the यूएसए आज bestseller list कि week at # 1.
in January, 2010, Gezeichnet, a जर्मनी अनुवाद of Marked, reached the # 1 स्पॉट on the Der spiegel bestseller सूची.
The श्रेणी रै so far sold अधिक than ten लाख books in 39 देशों.

In यूनानी mythology, the Trojan War थी waged against the नगर of Troy by the Achaeans ( Greeks ) after Paris of Troy took Helen from उसके husband menelaus किंग of Sparta.
the war is एक of the सबसे important events in Greek mythology and has been narrated through many works of Greek literature, सबसे notably through होमर 's Iliad and the ओडिसी.
the इलियड relates a part of the last year of the siege of ट्रॉय ; the Odyssey describes Odysseus 's यात्रा home.
अन्य भाग of the युद्ध are contained in a साईकिल of epic poems, which have बच through fragments.
एपीसोड इससे the युद्ध provided material for Greek tragedy और other works of Greek literature, and लिये Roman कवियों सहित वर्जिल and Ovid.
the war originated इससे a quarrel between the goddesses Athena, Hera, और Aphrodite, बाद eris, the देवी of strife और discord, gave उन्हें a golden apple, sometimes ज्ञात as the ठहराना of Discord, marked `` for the fairest ''.
ज़ीउस भेजा the देवियाँ to पेरिस, जो judged that aphrodite, as the `` fairest '', चाहिए receive the ठहराना.
in exchange, Aphrodite made Helen, the most beautiful of सब women और बीवी of Menelaus, fall in प्रेम साथ Paris, जो took उसके to Troy.
Agamemnon, king of mycenae and the brother of हेलेन 's husband Menelaus, led an expedition of achaean troops to ट्रॉय और besieged the नगर लिये टेन years क्युकी of पेरिस ' बेइज्जती.
बाद the deaths of अनेक नायक, including the achaeans Achilles and Ajax, and the ट्रोजन्स हेक्टर and पेरिस, the city fell to the ruse of the Trojan Horse.
The achaeans slaughtered the ट्रोजन्स ( मगर for कुछ of the women and children whom they रखा or sold as slaves ) और desecrated the temples, thus earning the gods ' प्रकोप.
few of the achaeans लौटे सकुशल to उनके घरों और अनेक संस्थापित colonies in distant shores.
The romans बाद traced उनके origin to Aeneas, one of the Trojans, जो थी said to have led the surviving ट्रोजन्स to modern-day Italy.
The प्राचीन Greeks thought कि the Trojan War थी a ऐतिहासिक event that था taken प्लेस in the 13th or 12th सदी bc, and believed कि ट्रॉय थी located in modern-day तुर्कों near the Dardanelles.
by आधुनिक times, दोनो the war and the नगर were widely believed to be non-historical.
in 1868, however, the जर्मनी पुरातत्ववेत्ताओं heinrich schliemann मिले Frank calvert, जो convinced Schliemann that ट्रॉय थी at hissarlik और schliemann took over Calvert 's excavations on प्रॉपर्टी belonging to calvert ; this अर्जी is अभी स्वीकृत by सबसे scholars.
whether there is any historical reality behind the trojan War is an खोलें सवाल.
अनेक scholars मानना that वहीँ is a historical core to the tale, though इस may बस औसत that the homeric stories are a fusion of विभिन्न tales of sieges and रिझाने by माइसीनियाई यूनानियों during the कांस्य Age.
Those जो believe that the कहानियां of the Trojan War are derived इससे a विशिष्ट ऐतिहासिक विरोध usually date it to the 12th or 11th सदियां BC, often preferring the dates given by इरैटोस्थनिज़, 1194–1184 BC, जिससे roughly corresponds with पुरातत्व प्रमाण of a अनर्थकारी burning of ट्रॉय VIIa.
Anarchists have employed निश्चित symbols for उनके कारण, सहित most prominently the circle-a and the ब्लैक ध्वज, although anarchists have historically largely denied the importance of प्रतीकों to राजनैतिक movement.
Since the revival of anarchism around the प्रारंभ of the 21st-century concurrent with the rise of the anti-globalization गति, anarchist सांस्कृतिक symbols हैं widely present.
The greater palatine कनाल ( or pterygopalatine canal ) is a passage in the कपाल कि transmits the वृहद palatine artery, रग, और तंत्रिका between the pterygopalatine fossa and the मौखिक cavity.
सतह तापमान of अंटार्कटिक in winter और गर्मियाँ इससे the European केन्द्र लिये medium-range मौसम Forecasts
the जलवायु of Antarctica is the coldest on the पूरे of Earth.
Antarctica has the न्यूनतम naturally occurring तापमान ever recorded on the ground on धरती : −89.2 °C ( −128.6 °F ) at वोस्तोक स्टेशन.
It is also extremely शुष्क ( technically a मरुस्थल ), averaging 166 mm ( 6.5 in ) of वर्षण प्रति year.
Even so, on most भाग of the महाद्वीप the हिम rarely melts and is आखिरकार compressed to become the glacial बर्फ कि makes up the बर्फ चादर.
मौसम fronts rarely penetrate दूर into the continent.
Most of Antarctica has an ice कैप climate ( Köppen EF ) with बहुत cold, generally अत्यधिक शुष्क मौसम throughout the year and no माह averaging above 0 °c ( 32 °f ).
Some फ्रिंज तटीय क्षेत्रों have a tundra जलवायु ( Köppen ET ) साथ a short गर्मियाँ averaging above freezing, और much उच्चतर वर्षण.

The पिट्सबर्ग Steelers franchise has था 16 सिर coaches throughout its history.
संस्थापित as the Pittsburgh pirates in, the नाम थी changed to the स्टीलर्स prior to the season to celebrate the city 's विरासत of producing steel.
जो Bach परोसा two separate शर्तें as head कोच and वॉल्ट Kiesling served तीन separate शर्तें.
दौरान the and सीज़न, due to the amount of players who fought in World युद्ध ii, the Steelers combined उनके team with फिलाडेल्फिया और Chicago, respectively.
During ये seasons, Steelers ' coach Walt Kiesling shared coaching कर्तव्य with Greasy Neale and Phil हैंडलर, who have नहीं been शामिल भीतर this list.

in, अंतर्गत sutherland, the Steelers played उनके first playoff खेल against the Philadelphia ईगल्स.
टेन of the 16 head coaches spent उनके संपूर्ण पेशेवर coaching करियर with the franchise, सहित John mcnally, वॉल्ट kiesling और चक Noll, who have also been voted into the प्रो फ़ुटबॉल हॉल of Fame.

विधेयक cowher, noll 's बदलना, coached the Steelers to their पांचवां सुपर Bowl victory, in 2005.
The स्टीलर्स छठे सुपर कटोरी जीत आए in Super Bowl XLIII, जबकि सिर coached by माइक tomlin, the team 's current सिर coach.
In दण्ड law, धोखाधड़ी is intentional deception made for निजी gain or to damage another व्यक्तिगत ; the related क्रियाशील is बेईमान, and verb is defraud.
धोखाधड़ी is a crime and a civil law उल्लंघन, though the विशिष्ट criminal विधि परिभाषा varies by विधिक jurisdiction.
Defrauding लोगों or entities of money or valuables is a common purpose of fraud.
a hoax also involves deception, but without the intention of लाभ or of damaging or depriving the victim.
Fraud is a defense in a civil action for breach of अनुबंध or specific performance of a अनुबंध.
धोखाधड़ी is a basis for equitable क्षेत्राधिकार.
Passover, or pesach ( from : in Hebrew, Yiddish ), Tiberian :, Modern यहूदी : /ˈpesaχ/ Pesah, Pesakh, Yiddish : peysekh, Paysakh, paysokh ) is an महत्वपूर्ण Biblically -derived Jewish festival.
historically, साथ साथ Shavuot ( `` Pentecost '' ) and sukkot ( `` Tabernacles '' ), passover is एक of the तीन यात्राएं त्यौहार ( Shalosh regalim ) during which the संपूर्ण जनसांख्यिकी of the kingdom of Judah बना a यात्राएं to the Temple in जेरूसलम.
Samaritans स्टिल make इस pilgrimage to माउंट Gerizim, लकिन only मेन participate in पब्लिक worship.
Passover commences on the 15th of the यहूदी month of nisan and lasts for either seven दिनों ( in Israel ) or eight days ( in the diaspora ).
in judaism, a day commences at dusk and lasts जबतक the following dusk, thus the first दिन of passover तभी begins बाद dusk of the 14th of Nisan और ends at dusk of the 15th day of the माह of nisan.
the संस्कार unique to the passover celebrations commence साथ the passover seder जब the 15th of nisan रै begun.
In the Northern Hemisphere passover takes प्लेस in spring as the तोरा prescribes it : `` in the month of [ the ] spring '' ( בחדש האביב ).
It is one of the सबसे widely observed यहूदी छुट्टियाँ.
The Jewish लोगों celebrate passover as a commemoration of उनके liberation over 3,300 सालो ago by God from slavery in प्राचीन मिश्र that was शासित by the Pharaohs, और उनके birth as a स्वदेश under the नेतृत्व of Moses.
it commemorates the स्टोरी of the Exodus as described in the Hebrew बाइबल विशेषकर in the Book of exodus, in जिससे the Israelites यहूद freed from गुलामी in मिश्र.
In the narrative of the Exodus, the Bible tells कि परमेश्वर helped the children of इसराईल एस्केप इससे their गुलामी in मिश्र by inflicting ten plagues upon the ancient उन्होंने पहले the Pharaoh होता release his Israelite स्लेव ; the दसवाँ and worst of the plagues was the मौत of the Egyptian first-born.
The israelites यहूद instructed to चिह्नित the doorposts of their घरों साथ the रक्त of a slaughtered spring lamb and, upon seeing इस, the spirit of the रब knew to pass over the first-born in ये घरों, hence the name of the holiday.
There is some बहस over जहाँ the term is दरअसल निकला from.
जब the pharaoh freed the Israelites, it is कहा कि they बाएँ in such a hurry that वे could नहीं इंतजार लिये ब्रैड आटा to वृद्धि ( leaven ).
In commemoration, लिये the duration of Passover no leavened ब्रैड is खाया, लिये जिससे कारण it is called `` the पर्व of the Unleavened ब्रैड ''.
Thus matzo ( flat unleavened ब्रैड ) is eaten during passover and it is a प्रतीक of the अवकाश.
Halley 's धूमकेतु or Comet हैली ( or ), officially designated 1P/Halley, is the best-known of the short-period धूमकेतुओं और is दृश्य इससे धरती every 75–76 सालो.
हैली is the only short-period comet कि is clearly दृश्य to the naked eye इससे Earth, और thus the तभी naked-eye धूमकेतु कि might appear twice in a इंसान lifetime.
अन्य naked-eye comets may be उज्जवल और more spectacular, लकिन होगा appear only once in हज़ारों of years.
Halley 's रिटर्न to the भीतरी सौर प्रणाली have महरूम observed और recorded by खगोलशास्त्रियों since at least 240 BCE.
साफ records of the comet 's appearances were बना by Chinese, babylonian, और medieval यूरोपीय chroniclers, लकिन यहूद not पहचाना as reappearances of the वही object at the समय.
The comet 's periodicity was first determined in 1705 by English astronomer edmond Halley, बाद whom it is अभी नामित.
Halley 's Comet last appeared in the inner सौर System in 1986 and होगा next appear in mid-2061.
दौरान its 1986 apparition, हैली became the first धूमकेतु to be observed in विवरण by spacecraft, providing the first observational आंकड़ा on the structure of a धूमकेतु nucleus and the mechanism of coma और tail गठन.
ये observations समर्थित a क्रमांक of longstanding hypotheses about धूमकेतु निर्माण, विशेषकर Fred whipple 's `` गंदा snowball '' मॉडल, जिससे correctly predicted that हैली होता be रचित of a मिश्रण of volatile ices – ऐसे as water, कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड and ammonia – and धूल.
the मिशन भी provided आंकड़ा जिससे substantially reformed और reconfigured these ideas ; for उदाहरण it is अभी समझा कि Halley 's सतह is largely composed of dusty, non-volatile सामग्री, and that only a small portion of it is icy.
Anti-communism is विपक्ष to communism.
व्यवस्थित anti-communism विकसित in प्रतिक्रिया to the वृद्धि of साम्यवादी, विशेषकर बाद the 1917 अक्तूबर क्रान्ति in Russia और reaching वैश्विक आयाम during the Cold War.
सबसे anti-communists reject the concept of ऐतिहासिक भौतिकवाद, which is a central idea in मार्क्सवाद.
Anti-communists reject the Marxist belief that capitalism होगा be followed by समाजवादी और communism, बस as सामंतवाद थी followed by पूंजीवाद.
anti-communists सवाल the validity of the मार्क्सवादी claim that the समाजवादी state होगा `` wither दूर '' when it becomes unnecessary in a सच्चा कम्युनिस्ट society.
anti-communists argue that the दमन in the early सालो of bolshevik rule, जबकि not as चरम as कि दौरान Joseph Stalin 's rule, was still कठोर by reasonable standards, citing examples ऐसे as Felix dzerzhinsky 's रहस्य police, which eliminated numerous political प्रतिद्वंद्वियों by extrajudicial executions, and the क्रूर crushing of the Kronstadt rebellion और tambov rebellion.
Some anti-communists refer to दोनो Communism and fascism as totalitarianism, seeing similarity between the actions of कम्युनिस्ट and फासिस्ट governments.
इतिहासकार रॉबर्ट conquest has argued कि Communism थी जिम्मेदार लिये tens of लाखो of मौतों दौरान the 20th century.
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों argue कि Communist पार्टियों कि have आइये to शक्ति have tended to be rigidly intolerant of political opposition.
These opponents अर्जी कि सबसे कम्युनिस्ट countries have shown no लक्षण of advancing from मार्क्स 's समाजवादी स्टेज of अर्थव्यवस्था to an ideal communist स्टेज.
बल्कि, Communist सरकारें have महरूम अभियुक्त of creating a नई ruling class ( a Nomenklatura ), साथ powers और privileges वृहद than those previously enjoyed by the अपर classes in the non- communist regimes.
Gil Heron ( 9 अप्रैल 1922 – 27 November 2008 ) थी a Jamaican professional footballer.
he was the first ब्लैक खिलाड़ी to खेल लिये Scottish क्लबों सेल्टिक, और थी the father of poet और musician Gil Scott-Heron.
he died in डेट्रॉयट of a दिल attack on 27 नवम्बर 2008.
The soybean ( us ) or soya bean ( UK ) ( Glycine max ) is a प्रजाति of legume देशी to East एशिया, widely grown लिये इसके खाद्य सेम which has numerous uses.
the संयंत्र is classed as an oilseed बल्कि than a पल्स by the un Food और agricultural Organization ( FAO ).
Fat-free ( defatted ) soybean meal is a significant and सस्ती source of प्रोटीन for animal feeds और अनेक prepackaged meals ; soy सब्ज़ी आयल is another उत्पाद of processing the सोयाबीन क्रॉप.
लिये उदाहरण, soybean products such as textured vegetable protein ( tvp ) are संघटक in many meat and dairy analogues.
soybeans उपज significantly more प्रोटीन प्रति acre than most अन्य uses of जमीन.
परंपरागत nonfermented खाना उपयोग of soybeans include सोया milk, और इससे the latter टोफू and tofu स्किन.
Fermented भोजन शामिल सोया sauce, fermented bean paste, natto, and tempeh, among अन्य.
The आयल is प्रयुक्त in अनेक औद्योगिक अनुप्रयोग.
the main निर्माता of soy हैं the संयुक्त राज्य ( 35 % ), Brazil ( 27 % ), Argentina ( 19 % ), China ( 6 % ) and India ( 4 % ).
the सेम contain significant amounts of phytic acid, alpha-linolenic acid, and isoflavones.
हैरिसन Ford ( born July 13, 1942 ) is an American फिल्मी actor and producer.
he is famous for his performances as हान Solo in the original Star युद्धों त्रयी और the title character of the इंडियाना जोन्स फिल्मी श्रेणी.
Ford is भी ज्ञात लिये his भूमिकाएँ as रिक deckard in Blade Runner, जॉन किताब in Witness और Jack रयान in patriot खेल और साफ and उपस्थित Danger.
उसके करियर has spanned छह decades और शामिल भूमिकाएँ in several हॉलीवुड blockbusters, including presumed निर्दोष, The Fugitive, Air फ़ोर्स एक, and कया Lies beneath.
At one पाइंट, four of the शीर्ष छह box-office हिट्स of all समय शामिल एक of his भूमिकाएँ.
पाँच of उसके films have been inducted into the नेशनल Film रजिस्ट्री.
in 1997, घाट was क्रमित No. 1 in Empire `` The शीर्ष 100 फिल्म Stars of सब Time '' list.
, the United States domestic box office grosses of Ford 's films कुल over US $ 3.5 अरब, साथ worldwide grosses surpassing $ 6 billion, making Ford the तीसरा उच्चतम grossing U.S. domestic box-office star.
Ford is the husband of actress calista flockhart.
a tube of ChapStick
chapstick is a brand name for lip balm manufactured by फाइजर Consumer Healthcare और प्रयुक्त in many countries worldwide.
It is intended to help दावत और prevent chapped lips ; hence the नाम.
अनेक varieties भी शामिल सनस्क्रीन in order to prevent sunburn.
Due to इसके लोकप्रियता, the पद रै become a genericized ट्रेडमार्क.
It popularly refers to any लिप balm contained in a lipstick-style ट्यूब and लागू in the same manner as लिपस्टिक.
however, the पद is still a registered trademark, साथ rights exclusively स्वामित्व by Pfizer.
In स्वीडन and in the United किंगडम, the उत्पाद 's main competitor is Lypsyl, बना by novartis उपभोक्ता स्वास्थ्य, जिससे is distributed in similar packaging to ChapStick.
George बर्कली ( ; 12 March 168514 January 1753 ), also known as Bishop Berkeley ( Bishop of Cloyne ), थी an anglo-irish पारस जिनकी प्राथमिक achievement थी the उन्नति of a सिद्धान्त he called `` immaterialism '' ( later referred to as `` subjective आदर्शवाद `` by others ).
इस theory denies the existence of सामग्री पदार्थ और instead contends that familiar objects जैसे टेबल and chairs are only ideas in the minds of perceivers, and as a परिणाम can not exist without being perceived.
यूँ, as Berkeley famously put it, लिये physical objects `` esse est percipi '' ( `` to be is to be perceived `` ).
Berkeley is भी ज्ञात for उसके critique of abstraction, an important आधार in his तर्क for immaterialism.
In 1709, बर्कली प्रकाशित his पहला major कार्य,, in जिससे he discussed the limitations of human दृष्टि और advanced the theory कि the proper objects of sight are नहीं material वस्तुएँ, but light and रंग.
This foreshadowed his chief philosophical कार्य A Treatise Concerning the सिद्धान्त of इंसान ज्ञान in 1710 जिससे, बाद इसके ग़रीब रिसेप्शन, he rewrote in dialogue form and प्रकाशित अंतर्गत the शीर्षक Three Dialogues between Hylas और Philonous in 1713.
in इस किताब, बर्कली 's views यहूद represented by philonous ( यूनानी : 'lover of mind ' ), जबकि Hylas ( यूनानी : 'matter ' ) embodies the आयरिश thinker’s प्रतिद्वंद्वियों, in particular जॉन Locke.
बर्कली argued विरूद्ध Sir Isaac Newton 's doctrine of absolute space, समय and motion in De मोटू ( on गति ), published 1721.
उसके वितर्क were a precursor to the views of Mach and Einstein.
In 1732, he प्रकाशित Alciphron, a Christian क्षमाप्रार्थी against the free-thinkers, और in 1734, he published The Analyst, an empiricist critique of the foundations of infinitesimal calculus, which was influential in the development of mathematics.
उसके पिछला major philosophical work, siris ( 1744 ), begins by advocating the औषधीय use of tar जल, और तब continues to discuss a wide दायरा of topics including विज्ञान, philosophy, और धर्मशास्त्र.
Interest in बर्कली 's work increased बाद संसार युद्ध II, because he tackled many of the issues of paramount interest to दर्शनशास्त्र in the 20th सदी ऐसे as the problems of बोध, the अंतर between प्राथमिक और द्वितीयक qualities, और the महत्व of भाषा.
चिंगदाओ ( ), historically known as Tsingtao, is a प्रमुख city in eastern Shandong प्रांत, पूर्वी चीन, with a जनसांख्यिकी of over 8.715 लाख ( 2010 census ).
इसके built up area, made of 6 शहरी जिले and 4 county-level शहरों, is home to about 4,896,000 निवासियों in 2010.
it सीमायें Yantai to the पूर्वोत्तर, weifang to the वेस्ट and rizhao to the दक्षिणपश्चिम.
Qīng ( ) in चाइनीज अर्थात् `` green '' or `` रसीले '', while dǎo ( ) means `` island ''.
चिंगदाओ is administered at the sub-provincial level.
Lying आरपार the शानदोंग Peninsula जबकि looking आउट to the Yellow समुद्र, Qingdao is a major seaport, naval आधार, and औद्योगिक centre.
it is भी the site of the tsingtao Brewery.
the world 's longest समुद्र सेतु, the Qingdao haiwan सेतु, links the प्रमुख urban क्षेत्रफल of चिंगदाओ साथ Huangdao ज़िला, straddling the Jiaozhou Bay sea क्षेत्रों.
चिंगदाओ is named China 's सबसे livable नगर.
Mimivirus is a viral genus containing a single पहचाना species named acanthamoeba polyphaga mimivirus ( APMV ), or is a group of phylogenetically सम्बन्धित large viruses ( designated प्रायः mimin ).
In colloquial speech, apmv is more commonly referred to as just `` mimivirus ''.
जबतक अक्तूबर 2011, जब a larger वायरस megavirus chilensis थी described, it had the largest capsid व्यास of सब ज्ञात viruses.
mimivirus has a विशाल और complex genome compared साथ most अन्य वाइरस.
mimivirus, छोटी लिये `` mimicking microbe '', is so पुकारा to reflect its विशाल size और apparent gram-staining properties.
The Mexican War of स्वतंत्रता ( 1810–1821 ) was an armed विरोध between the लोगों of मैक्सिको and the स्पेनी औपनिवेशिक authorities which started on सितंबर 16, 1810.
The गति, जिससे became known as the Mexican युद्ध of Independence, थी led by mexican-born spaniards, Mestizos और amerindians जो sought independence इससे Spain.
it started as an आदर्शवादी peasants ' विद्रोह विरूद्ध their औपनिवेशिक masters, लकिन ended as an unlikely alliance between Mexican ex-royalists और Mexican छापामार insurgents.
Crohn 's बीमारी, also known as Crohn सिंड्रोम और regional enteritis, is a प्रकार of inflammatory bowel बीमारी that may affect कोई part of the जठरांत्र tract इससे mouth to anus, causing a चौड़ी किस्में of symptoms.
It primarily कल्याणकारी abdominal pain, diarrhea ( जिससे may be खूनी if सूजन is at इसके worst ), उल्टी ( can be निरन्तर ), or वज़न loss, but may also कारण complications बाहर the जठरांत्र tract such as स्किन rashes, गठिया, सूजन of the eye, tiredness, and lack of विशेषज्ञता.
Crohn 's बीमारी is caused by interactions between environmental, immunological और bacterial कारकों in genetically susceptible individuals.
इस परिणाम in a chronic inflammatory विकार, in जिससे the देह 's प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली attacks the जठरांत्र ट्रैक्ट possibly directed at सूक्ष्मजैविक antigens.
crohn 's बीमारी has wrongly been described as an असंक्राम्य disease in the past ; recent investigators have described it as an immune कमियां state.
There is a genetic association साथ crohn 's disease, primarily साथ variations of the nod2 gene और इसके protein, which होश bacterial कोशिका walls.
सहोदर of affected individuals are at higher risk.
males and females हैं बराबर affected.
smokers are दो टाइम्स more संभावित to develop Crohn 's disease than nonsmokers.
Crohn 's बीमारी affects between 400,000 और 600,000 people in North America.
Prevalence estimates for Northern यूरोपीय have ranged इससे 27–48 प्रति 100,000.
Crohn 's बीमारी tends to उपस्थित initially in the किशोर and twenties, with another peak incidence in the fifties to seventies, although the disease can occur at कोई age.
There is no ज्ञात फार्मास्युटिकल or surgical cure लिये crohn 's बीमारी.
उपचार विकल्प हैं restricted to controlling symptoms, maintaining remission, और preventing पतन.
The बीमारी was नामित बाद gastroenterologist burrill Bernard Crohn, who, in 1932, साथ with two अन्य colleagues at माउंट sinai Hospital in नई York, वर्णित a श्रेणी of मरीजों साथ सूजन of the terminal ileum, the क्षेत्रफल सबसे commonly affected by the illness.

The list सीधे शामिल the tallest इमारतें और structures for प्रत्येक देश, and where appropriate, it also points to more विस्तृत country-specific lists.
अशिष्ट और तैयार is a census-designated प्लेस in नेवाडा काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, संयुक्त States.
it is स्तिथ वेस्ट of ग्रास घाटी, California, लगभग 62 miles ( 100 km ) इससे sacramento.
The जनसांख्यिकी was 963 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
YouTube is a video-sharing website, निर्मित by three पूर्व paypal employees in February 2005, on which users can upload, view and share वीडियो.
the company is based in San Bruno, California, और उपयोग Adobe फ्लैश Video और html5 technology to display a चौड़ी variety of user-generated video सामग्री, सहित movie क्लिप्स, TV clips, और म्यूज़िक वीडियो, as well as amateur content such as video blogging, short असली videos, और शैक्षणिक videos.
सबसे of the content on youtube has been अपलोड by individuals, although मीडिया corporations सहित सीबीएस, the बीबीसी, vevo, Hulu, and other संगठन offer कुछ of their सामग्री via the site, as भाग of the YouTube partnership कार्यक्रम.
Unregistered उपयोक्ता can watch वीडियो, while registered users can upload an असीमित क्रमांक of videos.
वीडियो माना to contain potentially offensive content are available only to पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता at least 18 years old.
in नवम्बर 2006, YouTube, LLC was खरीदा by google लिये us $ 1.65 अरब, and operates as a subsidiary of Google.

Goldberg is भी a निर्माता of the 2011 Broadway अनुकूलन.
microsoft DirectX is a संग्रहण of application programming interfaces ( APIs ) for handling tasks related to multimedia, विशेषकर खेल programming and वीडियो, on Microsoft प्लेटफ़ॉर्म.
originally, the names of these api सब began with Direct, ऐसे as direct3d, DirectDraw, directmusic, directplay, directsound, और so forth.
the नाम डाइरेक्टएक्स was coined as आशुलिपि term for सब of ये api ( the x खड़ा in लिये the particular API names ) और जल्द became the नाम of the संग्रहण.
When Microsoft later नियत out to develop a गेमिंग कंसोल, the X थी प्रयुक्त as the basis of the name Xbox to indicate that the console थी based on DirectX प्रौद्योगिकी.
the x आरंभिक रै महरूम carried forward in the naming of APIs designed for the एक्सबॉक्स such as xinput और the cross-platform ऑडियो सृष्टि Tool ( xact ), while the डाइरेक्टएक्स पैटर्न has been continued for खिड़कियाँ APIs such as direct2d और directwrite.
direct3d ( the 3D ग्राफिक्स API भीतर DirectX ) is widely used in the विकास of video games लिये Microsoft Windows, microsoft Xbox, microsoft एक्सबॉक्स 360 और some Sega dreamcast खेल.
Direct3D is also used by अन्य software अनुप्रयोग for visualization and graphics tasks such as CAD/CAM अभियान्त्रिकी.
as direct3d is the most widely publicized घटक of DirectX, it is common to देखिए the names `` डाइरेक्टएक्स '' and `` direct3d '' प्रयुक्त interchangeably.
the डाइरेक्टएक्स software विकास kit ( sdk ) consists of runtime पुस्तकालयों in redistributable binary form, along साथ accompanying documentation और headers लिये use in कोडिंग.
originally, the runtimes were तभी installed by games or explicitly by the उपयोक्ता.
खिड़कियाँ 95 did not लॉन्च साथ डाइरेक्टएक्स, लकिन DirectX थी included with Windows 95 oem सेवा रिलीज 2.
Windows 98 और Windows nt 4.0 both shipped साथ डाइरेक्टएक्स, as रै प्रत्येक version of Windows released चूंकि.
The SDK is उपलब्धियाँ as a फ़्री download.
जबकि the runtimes are proprietary, closed-source तन्त्र, source code is provided लिये most of the SDK नमूने.
Starting साथ the release of Windows 8 Developer पूर्वावलोकन, DirectX sdk has महरूम integrated into Windows SDK.
direct3d 9Ex, Direct3D 10, and direct3d 11 हैं only available for खिड़कियाँ Vista and newer क्युकी each of ये new संस्करण थी built to निर्भर upon the new खिड़कियाँ प्रदर्शक Driver मॉडल कि थी introduced लिये खिड़कियाँ विस्टा.
The नई vista/wddm graphics architecture includes a नई वीडियो मेमोरी मैनेजर supporting virtualization of ग्राफिक्स hardware for विभिन्न applications and services जैसे the डेस्कटॉप Window मैनेजर.
quetzaltenango, also commonly known by इसके स्वदेशी name, Xelajú, or अधिक commonly, xela, is the second largest city of Guatemala.
It is दोनो the पूंजी of quetzaltenango विभाग और the नगरपालिका seat of Quetzaltenango नगरपालिका.
it रै an estimated population of 224,703.
the जनसांख्यिकी is परिचय 61 % स्वदेशी or Amerindian, 34 % Mestizo or ladino and 5 % European.
Quetzaltenango is located in a mountain valley at an उन्नयन of 2,330 मीटर ( 7,655 ft ) above समुद्र स्तर at its न्यूनतम part.
it may reach ऊपर 2,400 meters भीतर the नगर.
The Municipality of quetzaltenango consists of an area of.
municipalities abutting the municipality of Quetzaltenango include : Salcajá, Cantel, almolonga, zunil, el Palmar, Concepción chiquirichapa, सैन Mateo, La Esperanza, Olintepeque, और San Andrés xecul.
सब ये municipalities are भाग of the Department of Quetzaltenango, मगर San आन्द्रेस xecul जिससे is a part of the विभाग of totonicapán.
the एपिक of Gilgamesh, an एपिक poem इससे Mesopotamia, is amongst the earliest surviving works of साहित्य.
The साहित्यिक इतिहास of Gilgamesh begins साथ five स्वतंत्र Sumerian poems about 'Bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian लिये gilgamesh ), king of uruk.
Four of ये यहूद प्रयुक्त as सोर्स सामग्री लिये a combined epic in Akkadian.
इस पहला संयुक्त epic, ज्ञात as the `` Old Babylonian '' संस्करण, तिथियाँ to the 18th सदी BC and is titled बाद इसके incipit, shūtur एली sharrī ( `` surpassing All अन्य Kings '' ).
Only a few fragments of it have survived.
the later `` Standard babylonian '' संस्करण तिथियाँ from the 13th to the 10th सदियां bc और bears the incipit शा naqba īmuru ( `` He जो Saw the गहन '' ).
Fragments of लगभग two thirds of इस longer, twelve-tablet संस्करण have महरूम recovered.
Some of the best नक़ल यहूद खोजा in the library तबाह of the 7th-century BC assyrian king Ashurbanipal.
the story centers on a दोस्ती between Gilgamesh and enkidu.
Enkidu is a जंगली man created by the gods as gilgamesh 's equal to distract उसे from oppressing the people of Uruk.
साथ, वे journey to the देवदार पहाड़ to defeat humbaba, its monstrous guardian.
Later वे मार the Bull of स्वर्ग, जिससे the goddess इश्तार भेजना to सजा Gilgamesh for spurning उसके advances.
As a punishment for these क्रियाएँ, the gods sentence enkidu to death.
the दूसरी हाफ of the epic focuses on gilgamesh 's distress at Enkidu 's मौत, और उसके क्वेस्ट लिये अमरत्व.
In अनुक्रम to learn the रहस्य of eternal life, gilgamesh undertakes a long और perilous journey.
he learns that `` The life that तुम are seeking तुम will never ढूँढें.
जब the gods निर्मित man वे allotted to उसे death, but life वे retained in उनके own keeping. ''
This quote थी originally attributed to siduri in the Old babylonian version of the epic, and तब attributed to the immortal flood hero Utnapishtim in the Akkadian संस्करण of the एपिक.
nevertheless, Gilgamesh 's कीर्ति lived on बाद his death, क्युकी of उसके great building प्रोजेक्ट, and उसके खाता of what utnapishtim बताई उसे happened during the बाढ़.
The स्टोरी रै महरूम translated into many different languages, and gilgamesh has चूंकि become adapted in works of popular fiction.
There are numerous debates over जो created the first video खेल, with the जवाब depending largely on कैसा video खेल हैं defined.
The evolution of वीडियो खेल represents a tangled web of अनेक अलग उद्योग, including scientific, computer, arcade, and उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स.
the `` वीडियो '' in `` वीडियो खेल `` traditionally refers to a raster display device.
साथ the popular कैच phrase use of the पद `` video game '', the पद now implies सब प्रदर्शक types, स्वरुप, and प्लेटफ़ॉर्म.
इतिहासकारों have भी sought to बायपास the issue by बजाय using the more specific `` digital games '' वर्णनात्मक.
इस term leaves out the earlier analog-based कंप्यूटर games.
This is a सूची of best-selling वीडियो खेल franchises कि have sold or shipped at तनिक 5 million नक़ल.
जबतक otherwise stated, numbers indicate worldwide units बेची, ordered alphabetically whenever दो or more सूची the वही amount.
The एक्सेप्शन हैं the ones specifying शिपमेंट, जिससे have lower precedence than अन्य लिस्टिंग बिक्री.
मताधिकार sales include विस्तार packs भी though वे are नहीं माना full वीडियो games.
For best-selling individual वीडियो games, see List of best-selling video खेल.
the sales आंकड़े given below do नहीं include arcade खेल बिक्री, जिससे can be मिला at List of highest-grossing arcade video games.
– इस color indicates a sub-series of a larger वीडियो खेल मताधिकार.
इस does not necessarily लागू लिये series that हैं not video game-based.
Dorothy ऐन विलिस Richards ( September 1, 1933 – सितंबर 13, 2006 ) was an अमरीकी राजनेता और the 45th Governor of Texas.
She पहला came to national ध्यान as the राज्य treasurer of Texas, when वो delivered the keynote पता at the 1988 लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल सम्मेलन.
रिचर्ड्स परोसा as the 45th Governor of टेक्सास इससे 1991 to 1995 and was defeated for re-election in 1994 by जार्ज W. Bush.
Ann रिचर्ड्स थी the second female राज्यपाल of टेक्सास.
Data निष्पादन Prevention ( dep ) is a security feature शामिल in modern operating प्रणालियों.
it is known to be available in लिनक्स, मैक os x, आईओएस, Microsoft खिड़कियाँ और Android ऑपरेटिंग systems और is intended to prevent an application or service from निष्पादित code इससे a non-executable मेमोरी प्रदेश.
This helps prevent certain कारनामे that स्टोर code via a buffer overflow, for example.
DEP runs in two modes : hardware-enforced dep लिये CPUs that can mark मेमोरी पृष्ठों as nonexecutable, and software-enforced dep साथ सीमित सुरक्षा for CPUs that do not have hardware support.
Software-enforced dep करता not protect विरूद्ध निष्पादन of कोड in आंकड़ा pages, लकिन instead counters SEH मिटाकर, another प्रकार of आक्रमण.
dep was introduced on Linux in 2004 ( कर्नेल 2.6.8 ), on खिड़कियाँ in 2004 साथ Windows xp सेवा Pack 2, जबकि Apple introduced dep जब वे moved to x86 in 2006.

, is the जापानी word for hermaphroditism, जिससे is also used in a broader भाव for androgyny.
परे जापानी the term is प्रयुक्त to describe a commonly pornographic विधा of computer खेल, comics और animations, जिससे includes characters that show both प्राथमिक यौन विशेषताएँ.
But in today 's language it refers almost exclusively लिये characters जो have an overall feminine appearance.
In कि मामला the पद is भी प्रायः abbreviated as futa ( s ), which is occasionally also प्रयुक्त as term for the works itself.
जल्दी CAPTCHAs such as these, generated by the ez-gimpy program, were used on Yahoo !
a modern CAPTCHA, बल्कि than attempting to create a distorted background और ऊँची स्तर of warping on the टेक्स्ट, might फ़ोकस on making segmentation मुश्किल by adding an angled line.
another way to मेक segmentation मुश्किल is to crowd प्रतीकों साथ, as in याहू ! 's वर्तमान CAPTCHA format.
कुछ captchas कोशिश to utilize the ability of लोगों to see three-dimensional वस्तुएँ.
On इस चित्र, symbols हैं drawn with लाइनों of different मोटाई to मेक an प्रभाव of extrusion.
A CAPTCHA ( ) is a type of challenge-response परीक्षण used in computing as an attempt to ensure that the जवाब is उत्पन्न by a human being.
the process प्रायः involves a computer पूछे a user to पूरा a simple test which the computer is समर्थ to ग्रेड.
ये tests हैं designed to be easy लिये a कंप्यूटर to generate लकिन मुश्किल लिये a कंप्यूटर to solve, but again easy for a इंसान.
If a correct solution is प्राप्त, it can be presumed to have been entered by a इंसान.
a common प्रकार of CAPTCHA requires the user to type अक्षर and/or digits from a distorted चित्र कि appears on the screen.
ऐसे परीक्षण हैं commonly प्रयुक्त to prevent अनावश्यक अंतरजाल bots इससे accessing वेबसाइटों, since a सामान्य इंसान can easily पढ़ा a captcha, while the bot can नहीं process the चित्र अक्षर and इसलिए, can not answer properly, or at सब.
हालांकि सबसे captchas are अक्षर तस्वीरें randomly उत्पन्न, many of them have become मुश्किल even लिये a इंसान to पढ़ा, so picture captchas were निर्मित in जिससे a human is shown a सरल परीक्षण to दिखाएँ a picture of a certain एनिमल ( given few एनिमल pictures ), which is सरल for a human being to process, और therefore easy to चुनें, while a bot can नहीं प्रक्रम और solve the सवाल क्युकी although it can analyze the picture, it can नहीं easily अंदाज़ा the animal.
the पद `` captcha '' थी coined in 2000 by लुइस वोन ahn, मैनुएल ब्लम, निकोलस J. Hopper, and John Langford ( all of कार्नेगी mellon University ).
It is an एक्रोनिम based on the word `` capture '' and standing लिये `` Completely स्वचालित Public Turing परीक्षण to बताना Computers and Humans Apart ''.
Carnegie Mellon विश्वविद्यालयों attempted to trademark the पद on 15 October 2004, but the ट्रेडमार्क application थी abandoned on 21 April 2008.
a CAPTCHA is sometimes described as a reverse turing test, क्युकी it is administered by a machine and targeted at a इंसान, in contrast to the standard Turing परीक्षण that is typically administered by a human and targeted at a यंत्र.
Jacques-Yves cousteau ( ; commonly ज्ञात in English as Jacques Cousteau ; 11 जून 1910 – 25 June 1997 ) was a फ्रेंच नवल अधिकारी, एक्सप्लोरर, conservationist, फिल्मकार, innovator, वैज्ञानिक, फ़ोटोग्राफ़र, author and researcher जो पढ़ाई the sea and सब forms of life in जल.
He co-developed the Aqua-Lung, pioneered marine संरक्षण और was a सदस्य of the académie française.
केएफसी ( केंटकी fried मुर्गा ) is a fast खाना रेस्तरां chain headquartered in louisville, Kentucky, संयुक्त States, जिससे specializes in fried chicken.
An `` अमरीकी प्रतीक '', it is the world 's second largest restaurant chain overall ( as measured by sales ) बाद मैकडोनाल्ड 's, साथ over 18,000 आउटलेट in 120 देशों और territories.
The company is a subsidiary of Yum !
Brands, a रेस्तरां company which also owns Pizza हट and टैको घंटी.
केएफसी थी founded by harland Sanders, जो began selling fried मुर्गा इससे his roadside रेस्तरां in Corbin, Kentucky during the Great Depression.
सैंडर्स was one of the first लोगों to see the potential of the restaurant फ़्रेंचाइज़िंग अवधारणा, साथ the पहला `` Kentucky fried Chicken '' मताधिकार opening in Utah in 1952.
the franchise popularized मुर्गा in the fast खाना उद्योग, thereby diversifying the market and challenging the दबदबा of the हैमबर्गर.
विपणन खुद as `` कर्नल Sanders '', he became a legendary फिगर of American cultural history, and his चित्र is still prominently used in केएफसी branding.
the कम्पनी 's रैपिड विस्तार saw it grow too large for सैंडर्स to manage, और in 1964 he sold the company to a समूह of investors led by John Y. Brown, jr. and जोकर massey.
केएफसी थी one of the पहला तेज़ खाना chains to विस्तार internationally, opening outlets in इंग्लैण्ड, Mexico और Puerto Rico by the mid-1960s.
Throughout the 1970s और 1980s, केएफसी अनुभवी मिश्रित fortunes domestically, as it गई through a series of corporate स्वामी जो था little or no अनुभव in the रेस्तरां business.
in the early 1970s, केएफसी was sold to the spirits firm heublein, जो यहूद taken over by the R.J. Reynolds food and tobacco conglomerate, जो sold the chain to PepsiCo.
The कड़ी जारी to विस्तार विदेशी however, और in 1987 केएफसी became the first Western restaurant कड़ी to open in चीन.
The chain has चूंकि विस्तारित rapidly in चीन, और the country is अभी the कम्पनी 's most लाभप्रद मार्केट.
पेप्सिको spun बंद its restaurants division as tricon Global रेस्तरां, which बाद changed its name to Yum !
Brands.
KFC primarily sells fried chicken टुकड़े and विसंगतियाँ ऐसे as मुर्गा सैंडविच and wraps, सलाद और पक्ष बर्तन ऐसे as फ्रेंच फ्राइज़ and coleslaw, desserts और नरम पेय, often supplied by PepsiCo.
Its most famous product is pressure fried मुर्गा pieces, seasoned साथ Sanders ' `` Original Recipe '' of 11 herbs and मसाले.
The exact nature of ये ingredients is unknown, और represents a notable व्यापार रहस्य.
Larger portions of fried मुर्गा हैं परोसा in a distinctive cardboard `` बाल्टी '', which has become a हस्ताक्षर of the कड़ी since होने introduced by franchisee पीट हर्मन.
KFC is famous लिये the स्लोगन `` उंगली lickin ' शुभ '', जिससे रै since महरूम replaced by `` Nobody does chicken जैसे KFC '' और `` So good ''.
Cnidaria ( साथ a silent c ) or Coelenterata is a phylum containing over 10,000 प्रजाति of पशु found exclusively in aquatic and ज़्यादातर marine environments.
उनके distinguishing विशेषता is cnidocytes, specialized cells that they use mainly लिये capturing prey.
उनके लाशें consist of mesoglea, a non-living jelly-like पदार्थ, sandwiched between दो परतों of epithelium कि are ज़्यादातर एक cell thick.
They have दो मौलिक देह फ़ॉर्म : तैराकी medusae and स्थानबद्ध polyps, both of जिससे हैं radially symmetrical with mouths घिरी by tentacles that bear cnidocytes.
Both फ़ॉर्म have a single orifice and देह cavity that are used लिये digestion और respiration.
Many cnidarian species उपज colonies that हैं single जीवों composed of medusa-like or polyp-like zooids, or both.
cnidarians ' activities are समन्वित by a decentralized तंत्रिका जाल and simple receptors.
Several free-swimming Cubozoa and scyphozoa possess balance-sensing statocysts, और some have simple आँखें.
Not सब cnidarians reproduce sexually.
अनेक have जटिल lifecycles with अलैंगिक polyp चरण और यौन medusae, but कुछ omit either the polyp or the medusa स्टेज.
Cnidarians were for a long समय grouped with ctenophores in the phylum coelenterata, लकिन increasing awareness of their differences caused them to be placed in separate phyla.
Cnidarians are classified into चार main समूह : the almost wholly स्थानबद्ध Anthozoa ( sea anemones, corals, sea पेन ) ; swimming Scyphozoa ( jellyfish ) ; Cubozoa ( बक्सा jellies ) ; और hydrozoa, a विविध group कि includes सब the freshwater cnidarians as खूब as अनेक समुद्री फ़ॉर्म, and has दोनो sessile members such as Hydra and औपनिवेशिक swimmers such as the Portuguese man o ' युद्ध.
staurozoa have recently महरूम recognised as a class in their own सही बल्कि than a sub-group of Scyphozoa, and वहीँ is बहस परिचय whether Myxozoa और polypodiozoa हैं cnidarians or closer to bilaterians ( more जटिल animals ).
सबसे cnidarians शिकार on organisms ranging in आकार from प्लवक to पशु अनेक times larger than themselves, but अनेक obtain much of उनके nutrition from endosymbiotic algae, और a few हैं parasites.
अनेक हैं preyed upon by अन्य पशु सहित starfish, समुद्र slugs, मछली और turtles.
Coral reefs, जिनकी polyps are rich in endosymbiotic algae, support some of the संसार 's most productive ecosystems, and protect वनस्पति in tidal zones और on shorelines from strong currents and tides.
While corals हैं almost entirely प्रतिबंधित to warm, shallow समुद्री waters, other cnidarians live in the depths, in polar समंदर and in freshwater.
चट्टान cnidarians have महरूम found in रॉक्स formed about, और अन्य जीवाश्मों show that corals may have been present shortly पहले and diversified a few million years later.
Fossils of cnidarians कि do नहीं निर्माण mineralized structures हैं very rare.
वैज्ञानिकों currently सोचो that cnidarians, ctenophores और bilaterians are more closely related to calcareous sponges than these are to other sponges, और कि anthozoans are the विकासवादी `` aunts '' or `` sisters '' of other cnidarians, and the most closely related to bilaterians.
Recent analyses have concluded that cnidarians, although considered अधिक `` primitive '' than bilaterians, have a wider range of genes.
the एज़टेक Pyramid at St. cecilia Acatitlan, मैक्सिको State.

विशाल सिरेमिक प्रतिमा of an Aztec त्रिभुज योद्धा
एज़टेक cosmogram in the pre-Hispanic codex fejérváry-mayer - the आग god xiuhtecuhtli is in the center.
the एज़टेक लोगों were certain ethnic समूह of central मैक्सिको, particularly those समूह who spoke the Nahuatl language and जो वर्चस्व large parts of मेसोअमेरिका इससे the 14th to 16th सदियां.
The Nahuatl words aztecatl ( singular ) and aztecah ( plural ) mean `` people from aztlan ``, a mythological प्लेस for the Nahuatl-speaking संस्कृति of the समय, और later अपनाया as the word to define the Mexica people.
Often the term `` Aztec '' refers exclusively to the Mexica लोगों of tenochtitlan ( अभी the location of Mexico City ), situated on an island in Lake Texcoco, जो referred to themselves as mexica tenochca or Cōlhuah mexica.
sometimes the पद भी शामिल the inhabitants of tenochtitlan 's two principal अलाइड city-states, the acolhuas of Texcoco और the Tepanecs of Tlacopan, जो together साथ the Mexica formed the Aztec ट्रिपल गठबंधन which controlled what is प्रायः ज्ञात as `` the Aztec Empire ''.
in अन्य contexts, एज़टेक may refer to सब the विभिन्न city states और their peoples, जो साझा विशाल भाग of उनके ethnic इतिहास and cultural traits साथ the mexica, acolhua और tepanecs, और जो प्रायः also प्रयुक्त the Nahuatl language as a lingua फ़्रांका.
In this अर्थ it is possible to talk परिचय an एज़टेक सभ्यता सहित all the particular cultural पैटर्न common लिये सबसे of the peoples inhabiting Central मैक्सिको in the लेट postclassic period.
इससे the 13th century, the Valley of Mexico was the दिल of Aztec सभ्यता : यहाँ the पूंजी of the Aztec Triple Alliance, the city of Tenochtitlan, थी निर्मित upon उठाया islets in Lake texcoco.
The Triple Alliance formed a tributary empire expanding इसके political hegemony far परे the घाटी of मैक्सिको, conquering अन्य नगर राज्य throughout मेसोअमेरिका.
at its शिखर, Aztec culture had समृद्ध और जटिल पौराणिक और धार्मिक traditions, as खूब as reaching remarkable architectural and artistic accomplishments.
In 1521 Hernán Cortés, along साथ a विशाल number of Nahuatl speaking indigenous allies, conquered tenochtitlan and defeated the Aztec ट्रिपल गठबंधन अंतर्गत the नेतृत्व of Hueyi Tlatoani Moctezuma II.
subsequently the Spanish संस्थापित the नई settlement of Mexico City on the site of the ruined एज़टेक capital, इससे जहाँ they proceeded with the प्रक्रम of colonizing Central अमेरिका.
एज़टेक संस्कृति और history is primarily ज्ञात through archaeological प्रमाण मिला in excavations ऐसे as that of the प्रसिद्ध templo Mayor in Mexico City ; from स्वदेशी छाल paper codices ; इससे eyewitness accounts by Spanish conquistadors ऐसे as hernán Cortés और बर्नल Díaz del Castillo ; and विशेषकर from 16th और 17th सदी descriptions of एज़टेक culture और history लिखा by स्पेनी clergymen and literate aztecs in the स्पेनी or नावातल language, such as the प्रसिद्ध florentine Codex compiled by the franciscan भिक्षु Bernardino de sahagún साथ the help of स्वदेशी Aztec informants.
Anderson hays कूपर ( born जून 3, 1967 ) is an अमरीकी journalist, author, and television personality.
he is the प्राथमिक anchor of the CNN news दिखाएँ Anderson Cooper 360°.
the कार्यक्रम is normally broadcast live इससे a New York नगर स्टुडियो ; however, Cooper often broadcasts सजीव on location लिये breaking न्यूज कहानियां.
As of September 2011, he भी serves as host of his अपना eponymous syndicated daytime talk दिखाएँ, एंडरसन Live, जिससे होगा be cancelled at the end of the दूसरी season.
A प्लाट of a सामान्य वितरण ( or bell-shaped वक्र ) where each बैंड has a width of 1 standard deviation – देखिए भी : 68-95-99.7 rule
Cumulative संभाव्यता of a सामान्य वितरण with expected value 0 and मानक विचलन 1.
in statistics और probability theory, मानक विचलन ( represented by the symbol सिग्मा, σ ) shows how much variation or dispersion exists from the average ( mean ), or अपेक्षित मान.
a low मानक विचलन indicates कि the data points tend to be very close to the mean ; high मानक deviation indicates कि the आंकड़ा अंक हैं spread out over a large दायरा of मान.
The मानक विचलन of a यादृच्छिक परिवर्तनीय, statistical population, data नियत, or संभाव्यता वितरण is the square root of इसके variance.
it is algebraically simpler though practically less मजबूत than the औसत absolute विचलन.
a उपयोगी प्रॉपर्टी of standard deviation is कि, unlike variance, it is expressed in the वही इकाई as the आंकड़ा.
नोट, however, कि लिये measurements with प्रतिशत as ईकाई, the standard deviation will have प्रतिशत points as ईकाई.
in addition to expressing the variability of a जनसांख्यिकी, मानक विचलन is commonly प्रयुक्त to माप confidence in statistical conclusions.
For example, the हाशिया of गलती in polling आंकड़ा is संकल्पित by calculating the अपेक्षित मानक deviation in the परिणाम if the same poll यहूद to be conducted multiple times.
The reported हाशिया of गलती is typically about twice the standard विचलन ­– the radius of a 95 percent confidence अंतराल.
In science, researchers commonly रपट the मानक deviation of experimental आंकड़ा, और only प्रभाव कि पतन दूर बाहर the दायरा of मानक deviation हैं considered statistically significant – normal random गलती or variation in the माप is in this way distinguished from causal variation.
मानक deviation is also महत्वपूर्ण in वित्त, where the standard विचलन on the रेट of वापसी on an निवेश is a measure of the volatility of the निवेश.
When only a sample of data इससे a population is उपलब्धियाँ, the standard विचलन of the जनसांख्यिकी can be अनुमानित by a परिवर्धित quantity पुकारा the `` sample standard deviation ''.
When the sample is the entire population, its unmodified standard deviation is पुकारा the `` population मानक विचलन ''.
ulluco ( u : ju : kɔ : ) ( ullucus tuberosus ) is a plant grown primarily as a root सब्ज़ी, secondarily as a leaf vegetable.
the ulluco is one of the most widely grown and economically important रूट crops in the andean प्रदेश of South अमेरिका, second तभी to the आलू.
it is ज्ञात वहीँ साथ the common नाम of पापा लिसा, लकिन भी by the क्षेत्रीय names melloco ( Ecuador ), olluco ( Peru ), chugua ( कोलंबिया ) or ruba ( वेनेजुएला ), among अन्य.
The leaf और the tuber हैं खाद्य, समान to पालक और the आलू, respectively.
They हैं known to contain high levels of प्रोटीन, calcium, and carotene.
Papalisa यहूद प्रयुक्त by the Incas prior to आगमन of Europeans in दक्षिण America.
ulluco tubers are marketed as `` धरती Gems '' in New Zealand, by Halfords exotic उपज.

An अप्रैल 24, 1851 poster warning the `` रंगीन people of Boston '' about policemen एक्टिंग as slave catchers.
the भगोड़े Slave विधि or Fugitive Slave Act थी passed by the संयुक्त राज्य Congress on सितंबर 18, 1850, as part of the सुलह of 1850 between दक्षिणी slave-holding रूचि and Northern free-soilers.
इस थी एक of the most controversial acts of the 1850 सुलह और heightened उत्तरी fears of a `` स्लेव शक्ति षड्यंत्र ''.
It declared कि all runaway स्लेव were, upon capture, to be लौटे to their masters.
abolitionists nicknamed it the `` Bloodhound विधि '' for the कुत्तो कि यहूद used to track bas runaway slaves.
Frank जोसेफ pallone, jr. ( born October 30, 1951 ) is the u.S. Representative लिये, सेवारत चूंकि 1993.
he is a सदस्य of the लोकतांत्रिक Party.
He previously represented the 3rd ज़िला इससे 1988 to 1993.
trin-i-tee 5:7 is a इन्जील duo इससे नई Orleans, louisiana in the संयुक्त राज्य.
the group थी marketed as a इन्जील वैकल्पिक to r & B girl groups ऐसे as नियति 's Child और tlc.
Trin-i-tee 5:7 has बेची over 2.5 million albums.
in 1998, the group released their first एल्बम हकदार trin-i-tee 5:7 जिससे डेब्यू at # 1 on the शीर्ष Gospel charts.
The album प्रदर्शित the songs `` परमेश्वर 's अनुग्रह '' और the कवर सोंग `` Oh !
मरियम Do n't You Weep ''.
The album later became certified सुनहरा.
In 1999, Terri भूरा left the group और was बाद replaced by singer एड्रियन एंडरसन.
दौरान that साल, the समूह अंकित और released उनके second album, Spiritual प्रेम.
the एल्बम became the group 's second # 1 album on the शीर्ष इन्जील charts.
the album contained the singles `` Put Your हैंड्स '' and `` My Body ''.
in 2002, the समूह released उनके तीसरा album The Kiss जिससे debuted at # 2 on the Top इन्जील charts.
In 2007, the समूह left GospoCentric Records और हस्ताक्षरित a record deal साथ स्पिरिट उठती म्यूज़िक.
in late 2007, Trin-i-tee 5:7 released उनके fifth album t57, जिससे featured the शीर्ष ten इन्जील single `` Listen ''.
T57 charted # 2 on the शीर्ष इन्जील एल्बम, # 5 on the शीर्ष ईसाई चार्ट, और # 12 on the शीर्ष R & B charts.
The United राज्य federal earned income कर credit or अर्जित income क्रेडिट ( eitc or eic ) is a refundable tax credit for low- और medium-income individuals and युगल, primarily for those who have qualifying children.
जब the credit exceeds the amount of कर owed, it results in a tax refund to those who claim the क्रेडिट.
इस credit is provided to ऑफसेट the बोझ of social security कर and also to प्रचार an incentive to कार्य.
in order लिये a person or युगल to अर्जी एक or अधिक persons as उनके qualifying child ( ren ), the आयु, संबंध, and साझा residency आवश्यकताएँ जरूर be met, as खूब as कुछ other requirements.
u.S. कर फ़ॉर्म 1040EZ, 1040A, or 1040 can be used to claim EIC बगैर qualifying children.
to claim the क्रेडिट with qualifying children, 1040A or 1040 जरूर be प्रयुक्त, as खूब as attaching अनुसूची EIC.
EIC phases in slowly, has a medium-length पठार, और तब phases आउट more slowly than it phased in.
चूंकि the क्रेडिट phases आउट at 21 % ( लिये दो children और लिये तीन or अधिक qualilfying children ) or 16 % ( for एक qualifying चाइल्ड ), it is सदा अस्तबलों to have one अधिक dollar of actual salary or मजदूरी ( although technically, since the EIC तालिका moves by fifty डालर increments, it 's सदा अस्तबलों to have an extra fifty-dollar increment of salary or wages ).
लिये tax year 2011, the अधिकतम eic लिये a सिंगल व्यक्ति or couple filing बगैर qualifying children was $ 464.
The maximum eic साथ one qualifying child was $ 3,094, साथ दो children थी $ 5,112, और with तीन or more qualifying children was $ 5,751.
ये amounts are indexed annually लिये inflation.
The अर्जित आय कर credit has been part of राजनैतिक debates in the United राज्य regarding whether उठाने the न्यूनतम मजदूरी or increasing EIC होगा better पता a seeming shortage of good-paying jobs.
the following is a list of halftime shows आयोजित at the National फ़ुटबॉल League 's championship खेल, the Super कटोरी.
जबकि मध्यांतर shows हैं a परंपरा दौरान फ़ुटबॉल खेल at सब levels of competition, the सुपर Bowl मध्यांतर दिखाएँ represents a आधारभूत link to पॉप संस्कृति, which helps broaden the television दर्शक और देशभर interest.
in most years चूंकि the mid-1980s, the मध्यांतर दिखाएँ of the सुपर Bowl रै featured लोकप्रिय रिकॉर्डिंग artists and अन्य well-known हस्तियाँ.
It has measurably increased टेलीविज़न viewers दौरान and बाद the halftime show.
The performance is regarded one of the most-watched कार्यक्रम in American television annually with over 100 लाख दर्शक in the संयुक्त राज्य अलोन.
Musical जाति over the years have represented a broad range of म्यूज़िक प्रकार, including पॉप, rock, classic चट्टान, country, hip hop, रैप, blues, और आत्मा.
in some years, short skits or drama scenes हैं acted आउट on a स्टेज.
The performance group up साथ People रै performed at the most Super कटोरी halftime shows, अभिनीत in चार दौरान the 1970s और 1980s.
According to nielsen ratings, Super Bowl XLVI मध्यांतर दिखाएँ headlined by मैडोना in 2012 remains the most-watched मध्यांतर दिखाएँ in history, with 114 लाख viewers or परिचय 3 लाख अधिक than the actual game.

International Men 's दिन ( imd ) is an annual अंतरराष्ट्रीय event मनाये on 19th November.
Inaugurated in 1999 in त्रिनिदाद and Tobago, the day and इसके कार्यक्रम ढूँढें support from a variety of individuals और समूह in Australia, the Caribbean, उत्तर अमेरिका, एशिया, Europe and अफ़्रीकी.
बोलना on behalf of युनेस्को, Director of महिलाओं and Culture of Peace Ingeborg breines said of IMD, `` इस is an excellent विचार and होता give some लिंग संतुलन. ''
वो added कि युनेस्को थी looking आगे to cooperating with the organizers.
the उद्देश्य of celebrating an अंतरराष्ट्रीय Men 's Day शामिल focusing on men 's और boys ' स्वास्थ्य, improving लिंग relations, promoting gender समता, और highlighting positive पुरूष role models.
It is an अवसर to हाइलाइट discrimination विरूद्ध men और boys और to celebrate their achievements और योगदान, in particular लिये their योगदान to जातियाँ, परिवार, marriage, and child परवाह.
the broader और परम aim of the इवेंट is to promote मौलिक humanitarian मान.
International Men 's दिन is मनाये in over 60 देशों, including Trinidad और Tobago, जमैका, Australia, इण्डिया, चीन, संयुक्त राज्य, रोमानिया, सिंगापुर, माल्टा, संयुक्त Kingdom, South Africa, Tanzania, ज़िम्बाब्वे, बोत्सवाना, australia, Burundi, हंगेरियाई, आयरलैंड, आइल of man, घाना, कनाडा, डेनमार्क, नार्वे, ऑस्ट्रिया, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Ukraine, France, इटली, पाकिस्तानी, क्यूबा, अण्टीगुआ and बारबूडा, st.
