Developmental मनोविज्ञान is the scientific पढ़ाई of परिवर्तन कि occur in इंसान beings over the course of उनके जीवन span.
Originally concerned with infants और children, the field रै विस्तारित to include adolescence, वयस्क development, aging, and the entire life span.
इस फ़ील्ड examines बदलें आरपार a broad range of विषय सहित मोटर skills and अन्य psycho-physiological processes ; संज्ञानात्मक development involving areas such as प्रॉब्लम solving, moral understanding, और conceptual understanding ; भाषा acquisition ; social, व्यक्तित्व, और emotional development ; और self-concept और identity formation.
Developmental मनोविज्ञान includes मुद्दे such as the extent to which development occurs through the क्रमिक accumulation of ज्ञान बनाम stage-like विकास, or the extent to जिससे children are born साथ स्वाभाविक mental structures versus सीखना through अनुभव.
अनेक researchers are दिलचस्पी in the interaction between personal विशेषताएँ, the individual 's बर्ताव, और environmental factors including social context, and उनके प्रभाव on विकास ; others take a अधिक narrowly-focused दृष्टिकोण.
Developmental psychology informs several लागू फ़ील्ड, including : educational psychology, चाइल्ड psychopathology, and forensic developmental मनोविज्ञान.
Developmental मनोविज्ञान complements अनेक अन्य basic शोध फ़ील्ड in मनोविज्ञान including social psychology, cognitive psychology, ecological मनोविज्ञान, and comparative मनोविज्ञान.
Joseph Michael `` Joey '' Stivic is a fictional अक्षर जो पहला appeared on the 1970s American sitcom सब in the परिवार.
जॉय stivic was the बेटे and only child of माइक Stivic ( निभाई by रोब reiner ) and ग्लोरिया Stivic ( played by Sally struthers ), and the पोता of Archie Bunker ( Carroll o'connor ) और Edith बंकर ( Jean Stapleton ).
The character पहला appeared as a नवजात baby in a two-part episode of All in the Family जिससे aired in दिसम्बर 1975.
बाद अनेक दिखावे on सब in the Family until Reiner और struthers left the श्रेणी in 1978 ( by that time, Joey था महरूम निभाई most often by alternating twins जेसन and जस्टिन Draeger ), the जॉय stivic अक्षर next appeared on the सब in the परिवार spin-off श्रेणी ( कुछ call it a continuation of the असली ) आर्ची Bunker 's प्लेस in a guest रूप in the November 1979 episode `` थैंक्सगिविंग Reunion. ''
in इस उदाहरण, the character थी निभाई by child actor Dick Billingsley and थी appropriately pre-school आयु.
With ग्लोरिया now separated इससे Mike, she लौटे to आर्ची बंकर 's प्लेस with Joey in the फ़रवरी 1982 episode `` ग्लोरिया आता घर. ''
In this episode, Joey थी निभाई by Christopher Johnston.
Joey Stivic was a नियमित character on the सब in the परिवार spin-off series Gloria in 1982 और 1983.
On this series, in which the now-divorced ग्लोरिया Bunker अक्षर had स्थानांतरित to Upstate नई यॉर्क in अनुक्रम to work as an सहायक veterinarian, the part of जॉय Stivic was played by ten-year-old actor Christian jacobs.
बाद ग्लोरिया थी रद्द in 1983, Joey Stivic disappeared इससे प्रधान time टेलीविज़न लिये 11 years, जबतक the character बना one last रूप on 704 hauser, a short-lived 1994 series परिचय a ब्लैक family जो था स्थानांतरित into the old बंकर home, years after Bunker had बेची it.
In this appearance, the Joey stivic अक्षर थी निभाई by Casey siemaszko, an actor born in 1961 ( 14 सालो before जॉय Stivic 's fictional birth ).
In 1976 the Ideal Toy Company released a 14-inch `` जॉय stivic doll '' ( पुकारा `` Archie Bunker 's पोता '' ) जिससे was billed as the `` पहला anatomically correct पुरूष doll. ''
The गुड़िया प्रेरित mild controversy at the time, and is a collectors ' मद today.
the 2011 रोज़ कटोरी was the 97th संस्करण of the annual bowl game played on जनवरी 1, 2011, as part of the 2010 college फ़ुटबॉल season.
Played in pasadena, California, the tcu Horned Frogs of the Mountain West सम्मेलन defeated the विस्कॉन्सिन badgers of the बिग टेन सम्मेलन by a स्कोर of 21 – 19.
The pasadena टूर्नामेंट of गुलाब संघ थी the organizer of the game.
Vizio inc. was the कॉरपोरेट प्रायोजक और the game was officially नामित `` The Rose Bowl खेल presented by vizio ''.
इस खेल चिह्नित the पहला time a टोली from a non-Automatic Qualifying Conference निभाई in, और won, the रोज़ Bowl in its 97 years.
The प्रतियोगिता थी ब्रॉडकास्ट on केबल टेलीविज़न station ईएसपीएन साथ a radio ब्रॉडकास्ट on ESPN रेडियो and XM उपग्रह Radio और espn3 streaming video over the internet.
Coverage began at 1:30 pm ( pst ) with kickoff at 2:10 pm ( pst ).
इस चिह्नित the पहला समय कि the खेल was not ब्रॉडकास्ट nationally `` over-the-air '' ( स्थलीय टेलीविज़न ) since the games prior to the 1952 Rose Bowl, जिससे was the first nationally televised college football game.
The Rose कटोरी Game, प्रसंग भवन सपनो, friendships, & Memories, was a contractual sell-out, साथ 64,500 टिकटें आबंटित to the participating teams and सम्मेलनों.
टिकट prices for all seats in the रोज़ कटोरी हैं listed at $ 145.
The remaining टिकटें went to the टूर्नामेंट of Roses सदस्यों, प्रायोजकों, City of Pasadena residents, and the general पब्लिक.
the रोज़ Bowl stadium क्षमता is listed at approximately 91,000.
The घोषणा of Independence is a statement adopted by the Continental कॉंग्रेस on जुलाई 4, 1776, which घोषित कि the तेरह American colonies, then at war साथ ग्रेट Britain, regarded themselves as स्वतंत्र states, and no longer a part of the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य.
बजाय they अभी formed a नई nation—the संयुक्त States of America.
John एडम्स थी a नेता in pushing for independence, जिससे थी unanimously approved on July 2.
a कमेटी था already drafted the formal घोषणा, to be ready जब कॉंग्रेस voted on स्वतंत्रता.
Adams persuaded the committee to चुनें थामस Jefferson to लिखें the असली ड्राफ्ट of the document, जिससे कॉंग्रेस होता edit to produce the final संस्करण.
the घोषणा was ultimately a formal explanation of why Congress had voted on जुलाई 2 to declare independence from ग्रेट Britain, more than a साल after the outbreak of the अमरीकी Revolutionary युद्ध.
The national birthday, the स्वतंत्रता दिन is celebrated on July 4, although एडम्स wanted जुलाई 2.
बाद ratifying the text on July 4, कॉंग्रेस जारी the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता in several forms.
it थी initially प्रकाशित as the printed Dunlap broadside that was widely वितरित and पढ़ा to the पब्लिक.
the सबसे famous संस्करण of the घोषणा, a signed नक़ल कि is popularly regarded as the घोषणा of Independence, is प्रदर्शित at the नेशनल Archives in Washington, D.C.
Although the wording of the Declaration was approved on जुलाई 4, the date of इसके signing थी अगस्त 2.
The असली July 4 संयुक्त राज्य घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता manuscript थी खोया while all other copies have been derived इससे इस original दस्तावेज़.
the स्त्रोत और interpretation of the Declaration have महरूम the विषय of much scholarly पूछताछ.
the घोषणा जायज the independence of the संयुक्त राज्य by listing औपनिवेशिक grievances against King George III, and by asserting निश्चित natural और विधिक rights, including a right of revolution.
Having परोसा इसके असली purpose in announcing independence, the टेक्स्ट of the घोषणा was initially उपेक्षित बाद the American Revolution.
चूंकि तब, it रै come to be माना a major बयान on इंसान अधिकारों, particularly its second sentence:
We hold these सच्चाई to be self-evident, कि सब मेन are created equal, कि वे are endowed by their निर्माता साथ certain unalienable अधिकारों, कि among ये are Life, स्वतंत्रता and the pursuit of Happiness.
This has been called `` एक of the best-known sentences in the अंग्रेज़ी language '', containing `` the सबसे potent और consequential शब्द in American इतिहास. ''
The passage came to represent a moral standard to which the United राज्य should strive.
This दृश्य was notably promoted by Abraham Lincoln, जो considered the Declaration to be the न्यास of his political philosophy, और argued that the Declaration is a बयान of principles through जिससे the United States संविधान should be interpreted.
it has प्रेरित work for the rights of marginalized people throughout the world.
chitty chitty Bang बंग is a 1968 अंग्रेजों musical film loosely आधारित on Ian फ्लेमिंग 's अनोखा.
The film 's स्क्रिप्ट is by roald dahl and केन ह्यूजेस and इसके songs by the शरमन Brothers.
it सितारों लंड Van dyke as caractacus potts और Sally ऐन Howes as Truly scrumptious.
the film was निर्देशित by Ken Hughes और उत्पादित by Albert R. Broccoli ( co-producer of the जेम्स बंध श्रेणी of films, भी based on फ्लेमिंग 's novels ).
जॉन stears supervised the special effects.
इरविन kostal पर्यवेक्षित और conducted the music, while the musical संख्याएँ यहूद मंचन by Marc breaux and dee Dee लकडी.
a region is arid when it is characterized by a severe lack of available water, to the extent of hindering or preventing the विकास and development of संयंत्र और एनिमल life.
Environments subject to arid climates tend to कमी vegetation और हैं called xeric or desertic.
Most `` arid '' climates घेर the equator ; ये places शामिल सबसे of अफ़्रीकी और parts of दक्षिण अमेरिका and सेंट्रल America.
कर्कट ( ♋ ) is an astrological sign, जिससे is संबद्ध साथ the नक्षत्र Cancer.
it spans the 90-120th degree of the zodiac, between 90 और 125.25 उपाधि of celestial longitude, जिससे the सूर्य transits इस क्षेत्रफल on average between जून 22 to जुलाई 22 each साल.
And under the sidereal zodiac, it is currently from जुलाई 21 to August 9.
the United States अध्यक्षीय चुनाव of 1960 was the 44th quadrennial presidential election, held on Tuesday, November 8, 1960.
the Republican Party nominated लाज़िम vice-president रिचर्ड निक्सन, while the लोकतांत्रिक Party nominated John F. Kennedy, Senator from Massachusetts.
The लाज़िम अध्यक्ष, Republican ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर, was नहीं eligible लिये re-election after सेवारत the अधिकतम दो terms अनुमत by the Twenty-second amendment.
कैनेडी थी निर्वाचित with a सीसे of 112,827 votes, or 0.17 % of the लोकप्रिय vote, giving him a victory of 303 to 219 in the Electoral कॉलेज, the closest since 1916.
This थी the first election in जिससे सब fifty of the वर्तमान संयुक्त राज्य participated.
A number of factors बताइये क्यों the election थी so close.
Kennedy gained since there was an आर्थिक recession which ठेस the incumbent रिपब्लिकन, और he था the लाभ of 17 लाख अधिक पंजीकृत Democrats than republicans.
Furthermore, the new मत कि Kennedy gained among catholics लगभग neutralized the नई मत Nixon gained among Protestants.
कैनेडी 's campaigning skills decisively outmatched Nixon 's.
In the end, Nixon 's जोर on his experience carried little weight, और he wasted उर्जा by campaigning in सब 50 states बजाय of concentrating on the झूले states.
कैनेडी used उसके large, well-funded अभियान संगठन to जीत the nomination, सुरक्षित समर्थन, और, with the सहायता of the last of the big-city bosses, to मिलेंगी आउट the vote in the बिग शहरों.
He relied on कार्यशील mate Lyndon B. जॉनसन to थाम the दक्षिण और प्रयुक्त टेलीविज़न effectively.
This election is notable as being the first समय in U.S. इतिहास that two sitting u.s. सीनेटरों ( Kennedy और Johnson ) were elected as अध्यक्ष और vice-president, a phenomenon कि has महरूम repeated once, by बराक Obama और Joe बिडेन in 2008 ( in दोनो cases, the president थी the younger, more जूनियर सीनेटर ).

The यूएसए PATRIOT Act of 2001 is an अधिनियम of the U.S. कॉंग्रेस कि was हस्ताक्षरित into law by अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश on अक्तूबर 26, 2001.
the शीर्षक of the अधिनियम is a टेन letter acronym ( USA patriot ) कि स्टैंड for uniting ( और ) strengthening America ( by ) Providing उचित Tools Required ( to ) Intercept ( and ) obstruct आतंक Act of 2001.
The act, as a response to the terrorist attacks of सितंबर 11th, significantly घटाया प्रतिबंध in law enforcement एजेंसियों ' gathering of intelligence within the United States ; expanded the सचिव of the treasury’s authority to regulate वित्तीय transactions, विशेषकर those involving विदेशी individuals and entities ; and broadened the discretion of law enforcement and आव्रजन authorities in detaining and deporting आप्रवासियों suspected of terrorism-related अधिनियमों.
the अधिनियम भी expanded the परिभाषा of आतंक to include domestic आतंक, thus enlarging the number of activities to which the यूएसए patriot Act’s विस्तारित विधि enforcement शक्तियां can be applied.
on May 26, 2011, अध्यक्ष Barack ओबामा प्रयुक्त an autopen to चिह्न the PATRIOT Sunsets Extension अधिनियम of 2011, a four-year extension of three key provisions in the यूएसए PATRIOT Act while he थी in France : roving wiretaps, searches of business records ( the `` पुस्तकालयों रिकॉर्ड provision `` ), and conducting surveillance of `` लोन wolves '' — individuals suspected of terrorist-related क्रियाएँ not linked to terrorist समूह.
रिपब्लिकन leaders questioned if the उपयोग of the Autopen met the संवैधानिक आवश्यकताएँ लिये signing a विधेयक into law.

snohomish is a city in Snohomish County, वॉशिंगटन, संयुक्त States.
The population थी 9,098 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
The mayor of Snohomish is Karen guzak, and the नगर Manager is Larry Bauman.
snohomish prides itself लिये इसके ऐतिहासिक downtown, and was एकबार ज्ञात for इसके many पुरातन shops जब it was known as the `` पुरातन पूंजी of the उत्तरपश्चिम. ''
the historic कारोबार और residential बीच of the कस्बा constitutes the Snohomish Historic ज़िला, जिससे is सूचीबद्ध on the National Register of ऐतिहासिक Places.
अनेक घरों bear plaques साथ the साल the house थी निर्मित and the नाम of the family or व्यक्तिगत who originally occupied it.

Dave matthews बैंड ( dmb ) is an American rock बैंड कि was formed in charlottesville, वर्जिनिया, United States, in 1991.
The founding members were singer-songwriter और guitarist Dave matthews, bassist Stefan lessard, वादक /backing vocalist Carter beauford और saxophonist LeRoi Moore.
boyd tinsley was added to the बैंड as a violinist जल्द after the बैंड was formed.
मूर died suddenly in अगस्त 2008 due to complications इससे चोटों sustained in an atv accident.
GRAMMY पुरस्कार -winner Jeff Coffin of Béla Fleck और the Flecktones रै चूंकि भर Moore 's spot as the band 's saxophonist.
rashawn रॉस और टिम Reynolds have भी become full-time touring members of the बैंड.
the band 's 2009 album बिग whiskey और the GrooGrux किंग ( the पहला album चूंकि Moore 's death ) debuted at number one on the Billboard 200, कमाई the band उनके fifth consecutive number-one debut— बनाना them the second band पीछे मेटालिका to do so.
Their most हाल एल्बम, Away from the संसार, थी released in 2012, and भी debuted at number एक on the बिलबोर्ड chart.
as of 2010, the Dave Matthews Band रै sold over 30 million रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी.
The band is known for their सालाना summer-long tours of the United States और यूरोपीय, featuring lengthy improvisational renditions of उनके songs, accompanied by an elaborate वीडियो and lighting show.
इस portion of the tour रै become a stamp of DMB and has grown साथ the बैंड चूंकि fenton विलियम्स began working साथ them in the early 1990s.
After twenty लगातार years of touring the बैंड घोषित that it would take the summer of 2011 off.
Dave Matthews बैंड रै won one ग्रैमी Award, और थी awarded the naacp Chairman 's Award.
according to जूलियन Bond, `` they sell आउट the largest arenas on धरती, लकिन frequently दे उनके म्यूज़िक दूर. ''
Transcendental Wild जई : a Chapter from an Unwritten Romance is a गद्य व्यंग्य लिखा by louisa may alcott, about her परिवार 's involvement साथ the transcendentalist community fruitlands in the early 1840s.
The work थी first published in a नई York newspaper in 1873, और reprinted in 1874, 1876, और 1915 और after.
In her account, alcott provides the real लोगों involved साथ thin pseudonymous disguises.
उसके पिता अमोस Bronson alcott is `` abel Lamb, '' while his संगी और जातियाँ co-founder चार्ल्स लेन is `` Timon शेर ; '' Abigail May Alcott, Louisa 's mother and Bronson 's बीवी, is `` Sister Hope. ''
Alcott depicts her father as dominated by his more forceful partner, और both मेन as लापरवाह and impractical dreamers.
the मेन of the community खर्च their समय in pointless debates जबकि Sister Hope works from भोर to dusk to maintain their existence.
A crisis arises at कटाई time, when the अनाज crop is threatened by an approaching storm.
In alcott 's शब्द, `` About the समय the अनाज थी ready to हाउस, कुछ call of the Oversoul wafted all the men दूर. ''
सिस्टर Hope organizes the only उपलब्धियाँ help, तीन छोटी लड़कियों and a boy, और manages to save the crop.
The little जातियाँ collapses as जल्द as the weather turns cold, जब it becomes साफ कि उनके प्रावधानों are too meager to last the coming winter.
Timon शेर and उसके son abscond to join the Shakers — though timon is अप्रसन्न to learn that life among them is `` all कार्य and no खेल. ''
Abel is कुचल by the विफलता of the enterprise ; after days of despair he begins to eat again तभी जब he realizes कि his परिवार needs him.
सिस्टर आशा पाता a way for them to subsist and persevere.
Alcott 's दृश्य of male arrogance and female शोषण in इस piece is paralleled in her novel, प्रकाशित in the वही साल as `` अनुभवातीत Wild Oats. ''
`` अनुभवातीत Wild Oats '' has महरूम reprinted in अनेक modern editions.
माउंट of the Holy Cross is the northernmost 14,000-foot पहाड़ in the sawatch Range, भाग of the Rocky kyu in कोलोराडो.
it is located in the पावन Cross Wilderness निकट the ghost कस्बा of Holy क्रॉस नगर और in त्रिभुज काउंटी.
it was नामित for the distinctive cross-shaped snowfield on the northeast face.
अंतर्गत यूएसडीए वन Service administration, the पहाड़ थी proclaimed `` Holy क्रॉस नेशनल Monument '' by Herbert Hoover on May 11, 1929.
The स्मारक was transferred to the National Park सेवा in 1933.
in 1950, it was लौटे to the वन Service और lost इसके नेशनल Monument status—the क्रमांक of विज़िटर to the mountain और the nearby `` pilgrim 's हट '' had waned, और the व्यय of full-time staff could not be जायज.
इस पहाड़ has been the subject of चित्रकार, फ़ोटोग्राफ़र और even a कविता by Henry वाड्सवर्थ लांगफेलो, ( The Cross of हिम ).
the पहला सरेआम available फोटोग्राफ was प्रकाशित in नेशनल Geographic magazine.
Thomas Moran depicted the mountain in an आयल पेंटिंग, जिससे now is part of the collection of the संग्रहालय of the American West, part of the Autry नेशनल Center in लॉस Angeles, California.
it is स्टिल much photographed but it is not as well known today as it थी in the past.
आसपास सुविधाएँ include Bowl of आंसू झील, सीधे अंतर्गत the ईस्ट face of the peak, tuhare झीलों, in a cirque कि lies south of a significant subpeak, and अनेक अन्य lakes.
Notable locations within include the Dotsero ज्वालामुखी ( near Interstate 70 ), vail और Aspen.

the first अंकित ascent of Holy क्रॉस was in 1873, by F. V. Hayden और फ़ोटोग्राफ़र W. H. Jackson during एक of Hayden 's भौगोलिक surveys.
However, the शिखर may well have महरूम ascended previously by खनिक or अमरीकी इंडियंस.
The पहला शीत ascent of the peak was made in 1943 by russel keene and हावर्ड Freedman of the 10th पहाड़ प्रभाग, तब stationed at शिविर Hale.
Holy Cross can be climbed by at least चार different routes, with the easiest and most आम route होने the उत्तर Ridge, which involves of vertical gain over और is रेटेड YDS क्लास 2 लिये moderate scrambling.
The Cross Couloir route forms the लंबवत portion of the famous cross feature, और provides an advanced हिम चढ़ाई or extreme ski descent.
माउंट of the Holy क्रॉस has a इतिहास of endangering the जीवनदान of many hikers.
Primarily, the hikers who आवश्यकता बचाव are unfamiliar with the risks of entering wilderness क्षेत्रों and do not लाओ adequate उपकरण और आपूर्तियाँ to respond to आपात conditions.
हालांकि the summit on Mount of the पावन Cross is अक्सर पहुँचे on a long day hike, unprepared hikers हैं frequently stranded or खोया due to बदलना पर्यावरणीय conditions and confusion regarding the surrounding landscape, विशेषकर on the descent of उत्तर Ridge.
Thorough शोध and reasonable planning should prevent most tragedies.
माउंट of the Holy क्रॉस is accessible from tigiwon Road, दक्षिण of Minturn, Colorado.
the Half चंद्रमा Pass ट्रेल is the standard रूट to the समिट of माउंट of the Holy क्रॉस via the North Ridge.
following the पतन क्रीक ट्रेल to an ascent of Notch पहाड़ ट्रेल provides the बेहतरीन view of the पावन Cross हिम feature इससे Notch Mountain लकीरें.
The GSM लोगो is प्रयुक्त to identify संगत handsets और equipment
जीएसएम ( वैश्विक प्रणाली लिये मोबाईल संचार, originally ' ), is a standard नियत विकसित by the यूरोपीय Telecommunications Standards Institute ( etsi ) to describe प्रोटोकॉल for दूसरी पीढी ( 2G ) digital cellular संजाल used by मोबाईल फोन.
It became the de facto global मानक लिये mobile communications साथ over 80 % मार्केट share.
the GSM standard was developed as a replacement for पहला पीढी ( 1G ) analog cellular संजाल, और originally वर्णित a digital, सर्किट switched संजाल अनुकूलित लिये full duplex voice telephony.
This थी expanded over समय to include data संचार, first by circuit switched transport, तब पैकेट data transport via GPRS ( General पैकेट Radio Services ) and EDGE ( उन्नत Data दरों for जीएसएम एवोल्यूशन or EGPRS ).
further improvements were made when the 3GPP विकसित third generation ( 3G ) umts standards followed by चौथी पीढी ( 4G ) LTE उन्नत मानकों.
`` जीएसएम '' is a ट्रेडमार्क स्वामित्व by the जीएसएम Association.
President फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट लक्षण the Lend-Lease bill to give aid to ब्रिटेन and China ( 1941 )
the Lend पट्टे अधिनियम was an अधिनियम where the United राज्य had supported its allies.
Lend-Lease ( ) थी the law that प्रारंभ a program under जिससे the United राज्य of अमेरिका supplied the संयुक्त Kingdom, the ussr, Republic of China, फ़्री फ़्रांस, and अन्य Allied nations with materiel between 1941 and 1945.
It was signed into विधि on March 11, 1941, a year और a half बाद the outbreak of World युद्ध ii in Europe in September 1939.
इस थी nine महीने before the U.S. entered the war in December 1941.
Formally titled An अधिनियम to Further प्रचार the रक्षा of the United States, the अधिनियम effectively ended the United राज्य ' pretense of neutrality.
a कुल of $ 50.1 billion ( equivalent to $ today ) worth of supplies यहूद shipped : $ 31.4 अरब to ब्रिटेन, $ 11.3 अरब to the Soviet Union, $ 3.2 अरब to France, $ 1.6 अरब to चीन, and smaller रकम to other Allies.
रिवर्स lend-lease comprised services ऐसे as rent on एयर bases कि went to the u.S., और totaled $ 7.8 billion ; of this, $ 6.8 billion आए from the British and the Commonwealth.
The शर्तें of the अनुबंध provided कि the materiel थी to be प्रयुक्त जबतक time लिये their return or विनाश.
आपूर्तियाँ बाद the termination date यहूद sold to ब्रिटेन at a large छूट for £1.075 billion using long-term लोन इससे the United States.
Canada संचालित a समान कार्यक्रम that भेजा $ 4.7 अरब in supplies to the संयुक्त किंगडम और the सोवियत संघ.
The संयुक्त States किया नहीं charge for aid supplied अंतर्गत इस विधान.
इस program थी a निर्णायक कदम दूर इससे non-interventionist नीति, जिससे had dominated United States foreign relations चूंकि the समाप्त of World युद्ध I, towards अंतरराष्ट्रीय भागीदारी.
The जेरूसलम artichoke ( helianthus tuberosus ), also called sunroot, sunchoke, धरती apple or topinambour, is a species of sunflower native to eastern उत्तर अमेरिका, and found इससे eastern Canada और Maine वेस्ट to North डकोटा, और south to northern Florida and Texas.
It is भी cultivated widely across the शीतोष्ण मण्डल for इसके tuber, जिससे is used as a रूट vegetable.
कैस्टिलो सैन Felipe del morro also known as फोर्ट San फेलिप डेल morro or Morro किला, is a 16th-century citadel स्तिथ in San Juan, Puerto रीको.
stonehenge is a प्रागैतिहासिक monument in Wiltshire, England, about वेस्ट of Amesbury and उत्तर of Salisbury.
One of the सबसे famous साइट in the संसार, Stonehenge is the remains of a ring of खड़ा stones set भीतर earthworks.
it is in the मध्य of the सबसे dense complex of पाषाणकालीन and कांस्य आयु monuments in England, सहित अनेक hundred दफ़न mounds.
Archaeologists मानना it was निर्मित anywhere इससे 3000 BC to 2000 BC.
Radiocarbon डेटिंग in 2008 सुझाया कि the first पत्थरों यहूद raised between 2400 और 2200 BC, whilst another सिद्धान्त suggests कि bluestones may have महरूम raised at the site as early as 3000 BC.
the surrounding गोलाकार earth bank and खाई, which constitute the earliest phase of the monument, have महरूम dated to परिचय 3100 bc.
the site and इसके परिवेश यहूद added to the UNESCO 's सूची of संसार विरासत Sites in 1986 in a co-listing with avebury Henge.
it is a नेशनल legally protected अनुसूचित प्राचीन स्मारक.
stonehenge is स्वामित्व by the क्राउन and प्रबंधित by अंग्रेज़ी विरासत, while the surrounding land is स्वामित्व by the नेशनल विश्वास.
Archaeological प्रमाण found by the Stonehenge Riverside प्रोजेक्ट in 2008 indicates कि stonehenge could have been a burial ground from its earliest beginnings.
the dating of cremated remains found on the साईट indicate that deposits contain human अस्थि from as जल्दी as 3000 bc, when the खाई and बैंको were first dug.
ऐसे जमा जारी at stonehenge for at तनिक another 500 years.
the साईट is a प्लेस of धार्मिक significance और pilgrimage in Neo-Druidry.
the NCAA Women 's प्रभाग i Championship is an annual college basketball टूर्नामेंट for women.
Held प्रत्येक अप्रैल, the महिलाओं 's चैंपियनशिप थी उदघाटन in the 1981–82 season.
the ncaa tournament was preceded by the aiaw महिलाओं 's बास्केट Tournament, which थी आयोजित annually इससे 1972 to 1982.
Basketball was one of twelve महिलाओं 's खेल added to the NCAA चैंपियनशिप कार्यक्रम for the 1981-82 स्कूल साल, as the NCAA सगाई in battle with the संघ लिये intercollegiate Athletics लिये Women for एकमात्र शासन of महिलाओं 's collegiate sports.
the AIAW continued to conduct इसके established चैंपियनशिप कार्यक्रम in the वही बारह ( and अन्य ) खेल ; however, after a साल of dual women 's championships, the NCAA prevailed, while the AIAW disbanded.
उपस्थिति and ब्याज in the महिलाओं 's Division i चैंपियनशिप have grown over the सालो, विशेषकर since 2003, जब the final चैंपियनशिप game was स्थानांतरित to the मंगलवार following the Monday men 's चैंपियनशिप game.
the महिलाओं 's championship खेल is अभी the final overall खेल of the college basketball season.
पहले that, the Women 's फाइनल Four was प्रायः निभाई on the शुक्रवार पहले the Men 's Final चार or the hours पहले the मेन निभाई on the फाइनल शनिवार of the टूर्नामेंट.
The final थी प्रायः निभाई the संडे दोपहर following the Men 's Final Four.
the tournament कोष्ठक is बना up of champions इससे each Division I सम्मेलन, which receive स्वचालित बोलियों.
the remaining स्लॉट are at-large bids, साथ teams chosen by an NCAA चयन committee.
The selection process और tournament seedings are आधारित on अनेक कारकों, सहित team rankings, win-loss रिकॉर्ड and दरजा प्रतिशत Index ( RPI ) data.
नापसंद the मेन 's टूर्नामेंट, वहीँ हैं only 32 at-large बोलियों ( as of the अगला tournament in 2014 ), और no play-in खेल.
the महिलाओं 's टूर्नामेंट, like the men 's, is मंचन in a single विलोपन format, और is part of the media and public frenzy known colloquially as कूच दीवानगी or The Big नृत्य.
All 63 खेल have महरूम broadcast on television since 2003 on ईएसपीएन and espn2.
समान to the pre-2011 men 's टूर्नामेंट coverage on CBS, local teams are दिखाया on each चैनल जब available, साथ `` whip-around '' कवरेज designed to showcase the most competitive प्रतियोगिताओं in the rest of the country.
The rosetta स्टोन in the अंग्रेजों Museum
The rosetta Stone is an प्राचीन मिश्र granodiorite stele inscribed with a decree जारी at Memphis in 196 BC on behalf of King Ptolemy V.
The decree appears in तीन स्क्रिप्ट : the upper टेक्स्ट is Ancient Egyptian hieroglyphs, the मध्य portion Demotic स्क्रिप्ट, और the lowest प्राचीन Greek.
Because it presents essentially the वही text in all तीन scripts ( साथ कुछ minor मतभेद between them ), it provided the key to the modern understanding of Egyptian hieroglyphs.
originally displayed within a टेम्पल, the स्टोन थी probably moved दौरान the जल्दी Christian or मध्यकालीन period और आखिरकार प्रयुक्त as भवन material in the निर्माण of Fort जुलिएन निकट the town of Rashid ( rosetta ) in the Nile Delta.
it was rediscovered वहीँ in 1799 by a soldier, pierre-françois bouchard, of the French expedition to Egypt.
As the first प्राचीन मिश्र दुभाषिया text बरामद in आधुनिक टाइम्स, the rosetta Stone aroused फैली public ब्याज साथ its potential to decipher इस hitherto untranslated प्राचीन language.
Lithographic copies and plaster casts began circulating among यूरोपीय museums and विद्वानों.
Meanwhile, British सैनिकों defeated the फ्रेंच in मिश्र in 1801, और the असली stone आए into British possession under the capitulation of Alexandria.
transported to London, it रै महरूम on पब्लिक प्रदर्शक at the अंग्रेजों Museum since 1802.
It is the most-visited ऑब्जेक्ट in the British संग्रहालय.
कभी since its rediscovery, the stone रै been the focus of nationalist rivalries, including its ट्रांसफ़र from फ्रेंच to British कब्ज़ा during the napoleonic युद्धों, a long-running विवाद over the relative value of Young 's and Champollion 's योगदान to the decipherment, and since 2003, demands लिये the stone 's return to Egypt.
Study of the decree थी already under रास्ता as the पहला full translation of the Greek text appeared in 1803.
it was 20 सालो, however, पहले the transliteration of the मिश्र स्क्रिप्ट थी announced by Jean-François champollion in Paris in 1822 ; it took longer स्टिल पहले scholars यहूद able to पढ़ा Ancient Egyptian inscriptions and साहित्य confidently.
Major advances in the decoding यहूद : मान्यता that the स्टोन offered three संस्करण of the same टेक्स्ट ( 1799 ) ; कि the demotic टेक्स्ट used ध्वन्यात्मक characters to वर्तनी विदेशी names ( 1802 ) ; कि the hieroglyphic टेक्स्ट किया so as खूब, और had pervasive similarities to the demotic ( Thomas यंग, 1814 ) ; और that, in addition to होने used लिये विदेशी names, ध्वन्यात्मक characters यहूद भी प्रयुक्त to spell देशी Egyptian words ( champollion, 1822–1824 ).
दो other fragmentary नक़ल of the same decree were खोजा बाद, and अनेक similar Egyptian bilingual or trilingual inscriptions हैं now ज्ञात, सहित दो slightly पहले Ptolemaic डिक्री ( the डिक्री of canopus in 238 BC, और the मेम्फिस डिक्री of टॉलेमी iv, ca. 218 bc ).
the rosetta Stone is इसलिए no longer unique, लकिन it थी the अनिवार्य key to modern समझना of प्राचीन Egyptian साहित्य और civilization.
The term rosetta Stone is अभी प्रयुक्त in अन्य contexts as the नाम for the essential clue to a नई field of ज्ञान.
ज़हर डार्ट मेंढक ( also dart-poison मेंढक, ज़हर मेंढक or formerly ज़हर तीर मेंढक ) is the आम name of a समूह of मेंढक in the परिवार dendrobatidae जिससे are देशी to सेंट्रल और दक्षिण America.
These प्रजाति are diurnal और often have brightly colored लाशें.
Although all wild dendrobatids हैं at least somewhat toxic, levels of toxicity vary considerably इससे one प्रजाति to the अगला and from एक population to another.
Many प्रजाति हैं threatened.
ये amphibians हैं often पुकारा `` डार्ट frogs '' due to the Amerindians ' indigenous use of उनके to poison the tips of blowdarts.
however, of over 175 प्रजाति, तभी चार have महरूम प्रलेखित as होने प्रयुक्त for इस purpose ( curare पौधे हैं more commonly used ), सब of which आइये इससे the phyllobates genus, जिससे is characterized by the relatively large आकार और ऊँची स्तर of toxicity of इसके सदस्यों.
cajeta is a मैक्सिकन confection of thickened सिरप usually बना of sweetened caramelised मिल्क.
according to शेफ़ रिक Bayless, the नाम लिये cajeta came इससे the Spanish phrase al punto de cajeta, which means `` a द्रव thickened to the point at which a चमचा drawn through the द्रव reveals the bottom of the घट in जिससे it is होने पकाया ''.
Another hypothesis is कि it takes its नाम इससे the small लकड़ी boxes in which it थी traditionally packed.
Mexican cajeta is considered a specialty of the नगर of celaya in the state of Guanajuato, although it is also उत्पादित with the traditional विधि in several towns of the state of jalisco, such as Mazamitla, Sayula, and atotonilco el Alto.
cajeta is made by simmering बकरी 's मिल्क, or occasionally a sweetened द्रव, stirring frequently, until it becomes बहुत viscous due to वाष्पीकरण of जल, and caramelized.
जबकि goat milk is the most usual base, other liquids or juices may be used.
in celaya, और eventually the बाकी of Mexico, the confection of हाफ बकरी 's मिल्क और हाफ गाय 's मिल्क became known by the name cajeta, but elsewhere, the milk कैंडी became known as leche quemada, जलेबी de leche, इत्यादि.
it रै cousins in the many भारतीय milk-based sweets जैसे pera और the milk fudge burfi, and in the opera फ़ज of the u.S. Cajeta is खाया on इसके अपना as a sweet, as a spread or भरना लिये breads and pastries, ऐसे as churros, and as a topping लिये ice cream.
Certain liquors are added to special व्यंजनों पुकारा cajeta envinada.
In addition, cajeta envinada especial is समृद्ध with raisins, almonds, pecans or nuts.
प्रायः it is प्रयुक्त as a topping लिये crêpes, as a मीठी sauce boiled and softened down साथ मिल्क to soak the crepes, resulting in a tasty मिठाई.
in Mexico अनेक brands मेक cajeta but the most common brand is coronado.
it is भी very आम to place cajeta between obleas to make a traditional Mexican dessert.
Prince William, Duke of Cambridge ( William आर्थर फिलिप Louis ; born 21 June 1982 ), is the elder बेटे of Charles, Prince of वेल्स, and Diana, Princess of वेल्स, and third-eldest पोता of Queen एलिज़ाबेथ ii and Prince फिलिप, Duke of Edinburgh.
he is दूसरी in the line of succession, behind his father, to the तख्तों of सोलह स्वतंत्र sovereign राज्य ज्ञात as the राष्ट्रमंडल realms : the संयुक्त किंगडम, Canada, Australia, New जीलैंड, Jamaica, बारबाडोस, The बहामा, हरा, Papua नई गिनी, the Solomon आइलैंड्स, Tuvalu, संत Lucia, Saint विंसेंट and the Grenadines, Belize, Antigua and बारबूडा, and Saint किट्स and Nevis.
Prince William was educated at four schools in the United किंगडम और प्राप्त a degree इससे the University of St Andrews.
He spent भाग of a gap year in Chile, Belize, तंजानिया, और Kenya जहाँ he has lived और holidayed अनेक times.
प्रिंस William has also taken kiswahili studies at universities in Kenya and तंजानिया.
he थी commissioned as a Lieutenant in the ब्लूज़ और Royals Regiment of the Household Cavalry —serving with उसके brother Prince Harry —and, दो years later, earned his wings by completing पायलट training at royal Air फ़ोर्स College Cranwell.
In 2009, he transferred to the royal Air फ़ोर्स, थी प्रचारित to उड़ान Lieutenant and underwent हेलीकाप्टर flying training in order to become a full-time पायलट with the ढूंढें और Rescue फ़ोर्स.
In 2010, he completed his सामान्य और special-to-type हेलीकाप्टर प्रशिक्षण और गई on to raf घाटी on no. 22 स्क्वाड्रन performing co-pilot कर्तव्य on board a समुद्र किंग ढूंढें and rescue helicopter.
Prince William शादीशुदा his longtime girlfriend, कैथरीन Middleton, on 29 April 2011 at Westminster Abbey.
Hours prior to उसके विवाह, Prince विलियम थी निर्मित ड्यूक of कैम्ब्रिज, Earl of Strathearn, और Baron carrickfergus.
माली is a बहुभाषी country.
The भाषाएं spoken वहीँ प्रतिबिंबित ancient settlement पैटर्न, migrations, और इसके long इतिहास.
ऍथनोलॉग counts 50 भाषाएं.
of these, French is the आधिकारिक language and bambara is the सबसे widely बोला.
altogether 13 of the indigenous languages of माली have the legal औकात of national language.
चिह्न in फ्रेंच, at a monument in बमाको.

Rogers भवन, the मुख्यालय of रोजर्स संचार
रोजर्स Communications Inc. is a diversified पब्लिक कनाडाई communications और मीडिया company.
it is विशेषकर in the फ़ील्ड of wireless communications, केबल टेलीविज़न, टेलीफोन, and Internet कनेक्टिविटी साथ significant अतिरिक्त दूरसंचार and द्रव्यमान media assets.
the कम्पनी is headquartered in the Rogers Building in टोरंटो, ओंटारियो.
the कम्पनी दावा the heritage of the Rogers Vacuum Tube कम्पनी, संस्थापित in 1925 by Edward रोजर्स, which प्रारंभ the cfrb radio स्टेशन in Toronto, which थी later acquired by outside interests.
The present enterprise dates to 1960, जब रोजर्स ' बेटे, टेड Rogers, founded रोजर्स Radio प्रसारण Ltd.
That company acquired CHFI कि year, as खूब as Aldred-Rogers Broadcasting, a partnership साथ जोएल Aldred जिससे helped launch CFTO in 1961.
Rogers later bought out aldred और started the वर्तमान केबल and wireless परिचालन, ज्ञात as रोजर्स cablesystems Ltd.
The chief प्रतिस्पर्धी to the कम्पनी is Bell कनाडा, जिससे has a similarly extensive पोर्टफोलियो of रेडियो और टेलीविज़न media एसेट, as well as wireless, television वितरण, and telephone सेवाएं, विशेषकर in Eastern और Central कनाडा ; the two companies are प्रायः देखी as having a द्वयाधिकार on संचार services in उनके regions.
however, the company भी competes nationally साथ Telus for बेतार सेवाएं, और primarily indirectly साथ शॉ संचार for television सेवा.
The कम्पनी भी competes साथ a क्रमांक of अन्य मीडिया कंपनियाँ in the प्रसारण उद्योग.
the अंतरजाल is a वैश्विक प्रणाली of interconnected कंप्यूटर networks that use the standard Internet protocol suite ( TCP/IP ) to serve अरबों of users विश्वव्यापी.
It is a संजाल of संजाल कि consists of millions of निजी, पब्लिक, अकादमिक, business, and सरकारी संजाल, of local to वैश्विक scope, कि हैं linked by a व्यापक array of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक, बेतार और ऑप्टिकल नेटवर्किंग technologies.
The अंतरजाल carries an extensive दायरा of सूचना resources and सेवाएं, such as the inter-linked हाइपरटेक्स्ट दस्तावेज़ of the World Wide Web ( www ) और the infrastructure to support ईमेल.
Most परंपरागत communications media सहित telephone, music, film, and television हैं होने reshaped or redefined by the Internet, giving जनम to नई सेवाएं such as voice over अंतरजाल Protocol ( voip ) and Internet Protocol television ( IPTV ).
समाचारपत्र, किताब और other print publishing हैं adapting to Web site technology, or are reshaped into blogging और वेब फ़ीड्स.
The Internet रै enabled and त्वरित नई फ़ॉर्म of इंसान interactions through तत्काल messaging, Internet forums, and सोशल networking.
ऑनलाइन shopping has boomed दोनो for major खुदरा outlets और छोटी शिल्पकार और traders.
Business-to-business and financial services on the Internet affect सप्लाई chains across entire उद्योग.
The origins of the Internet पहुँचें back to research commissioned by the United States सरकारी in the 1960s to निर्माण robust, fault-tolerant communication via कंप्यूटर संजाल.
The funding of a नई U.S. backbone by the National विज्ञान Foundation in the 1980s, as खूब as private funding लिये other वाणिज्यिक backbones, led to worldwide participation in the development of नई नेटवर्किंग technologies, और the विलय of अनेक संजाल.
The commercialization of कया थी by the 1990s an international संजाल resulted in इसके popularization और incorporation into virtually every पहलू of आधुनिक human life.
, more than 2.4 अरब people—over a third of the संसार 's human जनसांख्यिकी —have used the सेवाएं of the Internet ; approximately 100 टाइम्स more लोगों than यहूद using it in 1995, जब it थी ज़्यादातर प्रयुक्त by tech-savvy मध्य और upper class लोगों in the United States और several other देशों.
The Internet has no centralized governance in either technological implementation or policies लिये access and usage ; प्रत्येक constituent संजाल सेट its अपना policies.
Only the overreaching definitions of the two प्रिंसिपल नाम स्पेसेस in the Internet, the अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल पता space और the Domain नाम प्रणाली, हैं निर्देशित by a maintainer संगठन, the अंतरजाल निगम for आबंटित Names and Numbers ( icann ).
the तकनीकी underpinning और मानकीकरण of the core प्रोटोकॉल ( IPv4 and ipv6 ) is an कार्यकलाप of the अंतरजाल अभियान्त्रिकी कार्य Force ( IETF ), a non-profit संगठन of loosely संबद्ध international participants कि anyone may associate साथ by contributing तकनीकी expertise.
The 2006 Winter Olympics, officially ज्ञात as the XX Olympic Winter खेल, थी a शीत multi-sport इवेंट जिससे was मनाये in Turin, इटली from February 10, 2006, through फ़रवरी 26, 2006.
इस marked the second समय Italy hosted the Olympic Winter खेल, the first being the सात Olympic शीत Games in Cortina d'ampezzo in 1956.
इटली भी hosted the खेल of the xvii Olympiad in Rome in 1960.
Turin was selected as the host नगर लिये the 2006 खेल in 1999.
the आधिकारिक logo प्रदर्शित the name `` Torino '', the इतालवी नाम of the नगर ; the city is known as `` Turin '' in दोनो English and the local परंपरागत language, Piedmontese.
the ओलम्पिक mascots of Torino 2006 were Neve ( `` हिम '' in Italian ), a female स्नोबॉल, और gliz, a पुरूष बर्फ cube.
The official motto of the xx ओलम्पिक शीत खेल was `` Passion जीवनदान here ''.
`` सहायता ! '' is a सोंग by the Beatles that परोसा as the title सोंग for both the 1965 film and its साउंडट्रैक एल्बम.
It थी भी released as a single, and थी number एक for three weeks in दोनो the United States and the United किंगडम.
`` सहायता ! '' was written primarily by John लेनन, लकिन credited to Lennon–McCartney.
During an इंटरव्यू with Playboy in 1984, Paul mccartney stated that the title थी `` out of छटपटाहट ''.

siegfried bing ( 26 February 1838 – 6 सितंबर 1905 ), who usually gave उसके नाम as S. bing, and was यूँ प्रायः referenced erroneously as `` सैमुएल Bing '' ( Samuel Otto Bing, 1850–1905, was उसके brother ) was a जर्मनी आर्ट dealer जो जिया in Paris as an adult, और जो helped introduce जापानी आर्ट और artworks to the वेस्ट and was a factor in the development of the Art देवानंद स्टाइल दौरान the late उन्नीसवीं century.
Comparison of male और female life expectancy at जनम for देशों और territories as defined in the 2011 सीआईए Factbook, with चयनित bubbles labelled.
The बिंदीदार line corresponds to बराबर female और male life प्रत्याशा.
The apparent 3d आयतन of the bubbles are linearly आंशिक to उनके population.

Kennewick is a नगर in benton County in the southeastern part of the u.S. state of वॉशिंगटन, निकट the hanford नाभिकीय साईट.
it is the most populous of the तीन शहरों collectively referred to as the tri-cities ( the अन्य being Pasco and richland ).
Kennewick is स्तिथ along the southwest बैंको of the कोलंबिया River, विपरीत pasco and बस south of the confluence of the Columbia और yakima नदियाँ.
The population was 73,917 at the 2010 census.
अप्रैल 1, 2012 estimates इससे the Washington राज्य दफ्तर of वित्तीय Management put the city 's population at 75,160.
The nearest commercial airport is the tri-cities Airport in Pasco, a regional commercial and private airport.
फोर्ब्स पत्रिका named kennewick the # 2 area in the संयुक्त States लिये जॉब विकास, जबकि आसपास yakima was named # 1.
the आलेख cites the क्रमांक of वैज्ञानिकों employed by the Pacific Northwest नेशनल प्रयोगशाला and क्षेत्रफल farmland for this आउटलुक.
The prothrombin समय ( PT ) और its निकला measures of prothrombin ratio ( pr ) and international normalized अनुपात ( INR ) हैं measures of the extrinsic pathway of जामन.
इस test is also पुकारा `` protime inr '' और `` PT/INR ''.
They are used to determine the clotting tendency of रक्त, in the measure of warfarin dosage, liver damage, and विटामिन k status.
pt उपायों कारकों I ( fibrinogen ), ii ( prothrombin ), V, सात, and x.
it is used in conjunction with the activated partial thromboplastin time ( aPTT ) which उपायों the intrinsic pathway.
`` i 'm in the मनोदशा for Love '' is a popular सोंग.
the म्यूज़िक was written by jimmy mchugh, the गीत by Dorothy फ़ील्ड.
the song was प्रकाशित in 1935.
it was introduced by frances langford in the movie प्रत्येक Night at आठ released that year.
The song was प्रदर्शित in the 1936 Our गिरोह ( Little Rascals ) short, The Pinch Singer, सुंग by Carl `` Alfalfa '' switzer, and in the 1936 film Palm Springs.
It is प्रायः known to be Switzer 's signature सोंग.
James मूडी 's saxophone solo on a 1952 रिकॉर्डिंग of this song inspired the song `` मूडी 's मनोदशा लिये Love ``.
हिप hop कलाकार प्रिंस Paul sampled the song as the basis लिये the track `` मनोदशा for Love '' on उसके album A प्रिंस Among Thieves ( 1999 ), साथ डॉन newkirk singing its असली lyrics.
The song 's शीर्षक प्रेरित the English title of Wong kar Wai 's फिल्म In the Mood लिये Love.
cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान is the वैज्ञानिक पढ़ाई of human बर्ताव और दिमागी processes, including दोनो उनके variability और invariance, अंतर्गत विविध सांस्कृतिक conditions.
Through expanding शोध methodologies to recognize सांस्कृतिक variance in बर्ताव, भाषा, और meaning it seeks to extend और develop psychology.
चूंकि psychology as an academic discipline थी विकसित largely in उत्तर अमेरिका, some psychologists became concerned कि constructs accepted as सार्वभौमिक यहूद not as invariant as previously assumed, विशेषकर since many attempts to replicate notable experiments in other संस्कृतियों था varying success.
चूंकि there हैं सवाल as to whether theories dealing साथ सेंट्रल themes, ऐसे as affect, संज्ञान, conceptions of the self, and मुद्दे such as psychopathology, anxiety, और depression, may lack external validity जब `` exported '' to अन्य cultural contexts, cross-cultural psychology re-examines उन्हें using methodologies designed to factor in सांस्कृतिक मतभेद so as to खाता लिये cultural variance.
Although some आलोचकों have pointed to methodological खामियां in cross-cultural मनोवैज्ञानिक research and अर्जी कि serious shortcomings in the सैद्धांतिक and methodological bases प्रयुक्त impede rather than help the वैज्ञानिक ढूंढें for सार्वभौमिक सिद्धान्त in मनोविज्ञान, cross-cultural psychologists are turning more to the पढ़ाई of कैसा मतभेद ( variance ) occur, बल्कि than searching लिये universals in the स्टाइल of भौतिकी or chemistry.
in 1972 the International Association of Cross-Cultural Psychology ( iaccp ) थी established.
This branch of मनोविज्ञान रै जारी to विस्तार as वहीँ has महरूम an increasing popularity of incorporating संस्कृति और diversity into अध्ययन.
Cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान is differentiated from Cultural psychology.
The latter is the branch of psychology that holds कि human behavior is significantly influenced by सांस्कृतिक differences, meaning कि मनोवैज्ञानिक phenomena can only be compared with प्रत्येक अन्य आरपार संस्कृतियों to a very सीमित extent.
in कंट्रास्ट, cross-cultural psychology शामिल a ढूंढें for संभावित universals in behavior और mental प्रक्रियाओं.
Walter J. lonner, writing लिये Eye on Psi ची, रै stated कि `` cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान can be thought of as a type research methodology, rather than an entirely separate field भीतर मनोविज्ञान ( 2000 ). ''
`` Judas '' is a सोंग by अमरीकी recording कलाकार Lady Gaga, इससे her दूसरी स्टुडियो album Born इस Way ( 2011 ).
It was released by interscope रिकॉर्ड on April 15, 2011, चार दिनों ahead of its अनुसूचित रिलीज.
लिखा और produced by Lady Gaga and RedOne, `` Judas '' is a नृत्य और इलेक्ट्रो हाउस सोंग about a woman in प्रेम साथ a man जो गद्दारी her.
It embodies the incidents that have haunted Gaga in the पास्ट, and इसके core अर्थ refers to the ऋणात्मक भाग of her जीवन कि she ca n't एस्केप.
गागा has further explained कि the song was also परिचय honoring one 's inner अंधेरा in अनुक्रम to bring oneself into the light.
The artwork for the सिंगल थी designed by गागा in Microsoft Word.
In spite of a polarizing प्रभाव on several धार्मिक समूह, the सोंग थी generally well received by आलोचकों, जो likened the song to `` Bad रोमांस `` with some noting it should have महरूम the album 's सीसे single.
the सोंग has a समान sound to Gaga 's previous redone-produced ट्रैक्स, including `` पोकर Face ``, `` lovegame ``, `` Bad Romance '', और `` Alejandro ``.
It contains तीन distinct hooks और a हाउस -influenced ब्रेक bas.
Gaga explained that the lines बोला दौरान the breakdown talk about उसके as परे redemption, regarding the traditional दृश्य of कया a स्त्री should be.
`` यहूदा '' initially had a दमदार sales opening, लकिन थी less successful commercially in comparison to Gaga 's previous singles.
The सोंग reached the शीर्ष टेन of the charts in most major music markets, और also reached the top of the charts in दक्षिण Korea.
A music video for the song थी फिल्माया in अप्रैल 2011, co-directed by गागा and Laurieann Gibson and co-starring नॉर्मन Reedus.
It रै a Biblical कथानक where Reedus निभाई यहूदा इस्कैरियट and Gaga played Mary Magdalene.
The वीडियो portrays them as modern day प्रचारकों going to जेरूसलम.
it शामिल the biblical स्टोरी of यहूदा betraying Jesus, और ended with गागा as magdalene getting stoned to मौत.
Before its release, the कैथोलिक लीग condemned गागा for the alleged उपयोग of धार्मिक imagery and her role in the video.
However, critics generally praised the वीडियो, नहीं finding any अप्रिय content.
The video थी मनोनीत for two awards at the 2011 एमटीवी Video Music पुरस्कार.
गागा रै performed `` यहूदा '' on a क्रमांक of television shows, including the Graham Norton दिखाएँ, शनिवार रात्रि Live, शुभ morning americas `` Summer कॉन्सर्ट Series '', the फ्रेंच x Factor as खूब as on The एलेन degeneres दिखाएँ.
h.264/mpeg-4 Part 10 or avc ( Advanced वीडियो Coding ) is a मानक for वीडियो compression, और is currently एक of the most commonly used formats लिये the recording, compression, और distribution of high definition वीडियो.
The फाइनल drafting work on the first version of the standard was completed in may 2003.
H.264/MPEG-4 AVC is a block-oriented motion-compensation -आधारd codec standard developed by the itu-t Video कोडिंग विशेषज्ञ Group ( vceg ) together साथ the ISO/IEC JTC1 चलती चित्र Experts Group ( एमपीईजी ).
the project साझेदारी प्रयत्न is ज्ञात as the Joint वीडियो Team ( JVT ).
The itu-t h.264 standard और the iso/iec mpeg-4 avc standard ( formally, iso/iec 14496-10 – MPEG-4 भाग 10, उन्नत Video Coding ) are jointly कायम so that they have identical technical content.
h.264 is perhaps best ज्ञात as being one of the कोडेक मानकों लिये Blu-ray discs ; सब blu-ray डिस्क players जरूर be समर्थ to decode h.264.
It is भी widely used by स्ट्रीमिंग अंतरजाल sources, such as वीडियो इससे vimeo, YouTube, and the iTunes Store, वेब तन्त्र ऐसे as the adobe Flash Player and microsoft Silverlight, and भी विभिन्न HDTV broadcasts over terrestrial ( ATSC, ISDB-T, dvb-t or DVB-T2 ), केबल ( dvb-c ) और satellite ( DVB-S और DVB-S2 ).
non-binding मध्यस्थता is a type of मध्यस्थता in which the arbitrator makes a determination of the rights of the पार्टियों to the dispute, लकिन this determination is not binding upon them, और no enforceable मध्यस्थता पुरस्कार is जारी.
the `` award '' is in effect an सलाहकार राय of the arbitrator 's दृश्य of the संबंधित merits of the parties cases.
non-binding arbitration is used in connection with कोशिशें to पहुँचें a negotiated settlement.
the भूमिका of an arbitrator in non-binding arbitration is, on the सतह, समान to that of a मध्यस्थ in a मध्यस्थता.
However, the प्रिंसिपल भेद is that whereas a मध्यस्थ will try to help the parties ढूँढें a मध्य मैदान to compromise at, the arbitrator remains totally removed from the उपनिवेश process and will तभी give a determination of liability and, if उचित, an indication of the क्वांटम of damages देय.
Subsequent to a non-binding मध्यस्थता, the parties remain free to pursue their दावा either through the courts, or by रास्ता of a binding मध्यस्थता, हालांकि in अभ्यास a उपनिवेश is the सबसे common outcome.
The award और तर्क in a non-binding arbitration is almost invariably inadmissible in कोई subsequent action in the courts or in another arbitration ट्रिब्यूनल.
non-binding मध्यस्थता is utilised mostly in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा.
it is largely अनजान in Europe, हालांकि in the संयुक्त Kingdom वहीँ is a practice of parties who are seeking a settlement to jointly instruct a Queen 's Counsel for an opinion on the merits and संभावित quantum of a claim, और then to negotiate on the basis of the views expressed in कि राय.
अगस्टाइन Volcano is a Lava Dome जटिल on Augustine Island in southwestern Cook इनलेट in the Kenai प्रायद्वीप बरो of southcentral तटीय Alaska, दक्षिणपश्चिम of Anchorage.
The Alaska Volcano Observatory currently दरों Mount अगस्टाइन as Level of Concern रंग Code Green लिये विमानन and the Volcano Alert स्तर is at Normal.
अगस्टाइन Island रै a जमीन area of, while West द्वीप, just बंद Augustine 's western shores, रै.
The द्वीप is made up मुख्यतः of पास्ट फटना deposits.
वैज्ञानिकों have been समर्थ to discern कि past गुम्बद पतन रै resulted in विशाल avalanches.
a map of बेलीज़.
the देश of बेलीज़ रै roughly 386 km of coastline, and has many मूँगा reefs, cays, और आइलैंड्स in the Caribbean समुद्र.
सबसे of these form the बेलीज़ अवरोध Reef, the longest in the पश्चिमी गोलार्ध stemming लगभग.
the reef and its आइलैंड्स have महरूम a युनेस्को संसार Heritage साईट since 1996.
the following is a list of oceanic islands of Belize, arranged according to प्रदेश लकिन सब of which हैं in the Caribbean समुद्र.
सबसे of the आइलैंड्स variate in spelling between `` cay '' और `` caye '', और भी use the स्पेनी `` cayo ''.
River आइलैंड्स have नहीं महरूम सूचीबद्ध.
ड्राइव अक्षर Access ( DLA ) is a discontinued वाणिज्यिक पैकेट लिखने अनुप्रयोग लिये the Microsoft Windows operating system कि allows ऑप्टिकल डिस्क आंकड़ा भंडार डिवाइस to be used in a manner similar to फ्लॉपी डिस्क.
dla is a पैकेट writing technology लिये cd और DVD media कि उपयोग the UDF संचिका प्रणाली.
DLA is not compatible with Windows Vista and नए, although a patch exists to फिक्स इस समस्या अंतर्गत Windows Vista.
Roxio बर्न was introduced on April 30, 2009.
As a बदलना for dla, it remedies compatibility मुद्दे Internet Explorer 8.
अल्फा रेक्स emmanuel Humbard ( अगस्त 13, 1919 – September 21, 2007 ) was a well-known American television इंजीलवादी जिनकी Cathedral of Tomorrow show थी दिखाया on over 600 स्टेशन at the शिखर of its popularity.

It is आधारित on the 2001 अनोखा the अंधेरा Fields by एलन Glynn साथ the screenplay by लेस्ली डिक्सन.
Alaska ( ) is a राज्य in the United States, situated in the northwest extremity of the North अमरीकी महाद्वीप, with the international boundary with कनाडा to the east, the आर्कटिक समंदर to the north, and the Pacific Ocean to the west और south, साथ Russia further west आरपार the Bering जलसन्धि.
अलास्का is the largest राज्य in the संयुक्त States by क्षेत्रफल, the 4th least populous and the तनिक densely populated of the 50 United States.
लगभग हाफ of अलास्का 's 731,449 residents live within the Anchorage महानगर क्षेत्रफल.
अलास्का 's अर्थव्यवस्था is dominated by the आयल, natural gas, और fishing उद्योग ; it has these संसाधन in abundance.
अलास्का was purchased from Russia on कूच 30, 1867, लिये $ 7.2 million ( $ समायोजित लिये inflation ) at लगभग two सेंट प्रति एकड़ ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
the जमीन went through several administrative changes पहले बनने an organized ( or incorporated ) territory on may 11, 1912, and the 49th state of the U.S. on जनवरी 3, 1959.
The नाम `` अलास्का '' ( Аляска ) थी already introduced in the रूसी औपनिवेशिक काल, जब it was प्रयुक्त only लिये the peninsula और is derived इससे the aleut alaxsxaq, अर्थ `` the मेनलैंड '' or, more literally, `` the ऑब्जेक्ट towards which the action of the समुद्र is निर्देशित ''.
it is also known as alyeska, the `` ग्रेट जमीन '', an aleut word derived इससे the same root.
नेल्सन मंडेला Metropolitan विश्वविद्यालयों ( NMMU ) is a South अफ़्रीकी tertiary शिक्षा संस्था साथ इसके main प्रशासन in the coastal नगर of बंदरगाहों एलिज़ाबेथ.
A merging of तीन संस्थानों founded nmmu in जनवरी 2005 but इसके history dates वापस to 1882 with the न्यास of बंदरगाहों Elizabeth आर्ट School.
The University draws international students इससे सब over the संसार.
वहीँ are over 3000 international students और include विद्यार्थी इससे the United राज्य, France, China, Germany, बेल्जियम, Denmark, Finland, Netherlands, नार्वे, Sweden, United किंगडम and अनेक अन्य countries.
NMMU is a comprehensive विश्वविद्यालयों offering पेशेवर and vocational प्रशिक्षण.
the विश्वविद्यालयों रै छह campuses - पाँच in बंदरगाहों एलिज़ाबेथ और one in जार्ज.
the main कैम्पस is the दक्षिण Campus.
विद्यार्थी at nmmu can study towards diplomas and डिग्री up to and including doctoral स्तर योग्यता.

CoverGirl is an American cosmetics ब्रांड founded in मेरीलैंड, by the noxzema Chemical Company ( बाद पुकारा noxell ) और acquired by procter & Gamble in 1989.
the Noxell Company advertised this cosmetics लकीर by allowing `` cover लड़कियों '', फ़ैशन models who appear on the सामने cover of women 's magazines, to पहनें इसके उत्पाद.
CoverGirl makes up लिये lack of सीधा individual customer service by providing a चौड़ी किस्में of कॉस्मेटिक्स उपलब्धियाँ at reasonable कीमतें.
On the उत्पत्ति of प्रजाति, published on 24 November 1859, is a कार्य of scientific साहित्य by चार्ल्स डार्विन जिससे is माना to be the न्यास of evolutionary जीवविज्ञान.
Its पूरा title थी on the Origin of प्रजाति by अर्थात् of प्राकृतिक Selection, or the संरक्षण of favoured Races in the संघर्ष for जीवन.
For the sixth edition of 1872, the short शीर्षक थी changed to The Origin of Species.
डार्विन 's book introduced the scientific theory that populations evolve over the कोर्स of generations through a process of natural चयन.
It प्रस्तुत a देह of evidence that the विविधता of जीवन arose by common descent through a branching pattern of एवोल्यूशन.
Darwin included प्रमाण that he था gathered on the beagle expedition in the 1830s और उसके subsequent निष्कर्षों from शोध, correspondence, and experimentation.
Various विकासवादी ideas था already महरूम प्रस्तावित to explain नई findings in biology.
वहीँ थी growing support for ऐसे ideas among dissident anatomists and the general public, लकिन दौरान the पहला half of the 19th century the अंग्रेज़ी scientific स्थापना was closely tied to the Church of England, जबकि विज्ञान थी भाग of प्राकृतिक theology.
विचार about the transmutation of species were controversial as they विरोधी with the beliefs कि species यहूद अपरिवर्तनशील भाग of a designed पदानुक्रम और कि इंसानो were unique, unrelated to अन्य animals.
The political and theological implications were पडती debated, but transmutation was नहीं accepted by the वैज्ञानिक मुख्यधारा.
The book थी लिखा लिये non-specialist पाठक and attracted फैली interest upon its प्रकाशन.
As Darwin थी an eminent scientist, his findings were taken seriously और the प्रमाण he presented उत्पन्न वैज्ञानिक, philosophical, और religious चर्चा.
the बहस over the किताब contributed to the अभियान by t.h. Huxley और his fellow members of the X क्लबों to secularise science by promoting वैज्ञानिक naturalism.
भीतर two दशकों there was widespread scientific अनुबंध that एवोल्यूशन, साथ a branching pattern of common descent, था occurred, but वैज्ञानिकों यहूद slow to give प्राकृतिक selection the significance कि डार्विन thought उचित.
दौरान the `` eclipse of डार्विनवाद `` इससे the 1880s to the 1930s, various अन्य mechanisms of evolution were दिए अधिक क्रेडिट.
साथ the development of the modern विकासवादी संश्लेषण in the 1930s and 1940s, Darwin 's concept of evolutionary adaptation through प्राकृतिक चयन became सेंट्रल to आधुनिक विकासवादी सिद्धान्त, now the unifying concept of the जीवन sciences.
चार्ल्स डिलन `` केसी '' स्टेंगल ( ; जुलाई 30, 1890 – September 29, 1975 ), nicknamed `` The Old Perfessor '', was an American Major लीग Baseball outfielder and manager.
he थी निर्वाचित to the Baseball Hall of Fame in.
Stengel was born in कान्सास नगर, मिसौरी, और originally nicknamed `` डच '', a common nickname at कि समय लिये अमेरिकी of जर्मनी ancestry.
बाद his प्रमुख league करियर began, he acquired the nickname `` Casey '', which originally आए from the initials of उसके hometown ( `` K. C. '' ), which evolved into `` केसी '', बहकावे by the चौड़ी लोकप्रियता of the कविता Casey at the चमगादड़.
In the 1950s, sportswriters उतावले उसे with yet another उपनाम, `` the बूढ़ा Professor '' ( or `` Perfessor '' ), लिये his sharp wit and his ability to बात at लंबाई on anything बेसबॉल -सुनानाd.
हालांकि his baseball करियर spanned a क्रमांक of टीमों and शहरों, he is primarily associated with clubs in नई यॉर्क नगर.
between playing and मैनेजिंग, he is the तभी man to have worn four of New यॉर्क 's प्रमुख league clubs ' वर्दी.
he was the first of चार मेन ( through the season ) to manage दोनो the नई यॉर्क Yankees और New यॉर्क मेट्स ; योगी Berra, डलास ग्रीन, and Joe Torre हैं the अन्य.
जैसे Torre, he भी प्रबंधित the Braves और the Dodgers.
he ended his baseball करियर as the beloved manager लिये the then expansion New यॉर्क Mets, which won over the दिल of New York partly due to the unique अक्षर of उनके दिग्गज leader.
June ( ) is the sixth माह of the year in the Julian और gregorian calendars and एक of the four महीने साथ a लंबाई of 30 days.
ओविड provides दो etymologies लिये जून 's नाम in his poem concerning the महीने entitled the fasti.
the पहला is that the माह is नामित बाद the रोमन goddess Juno, wife of बृहस्पति और equivalent to the Greek देवी hera ; the second is that the name आता from the Latin शब्द iuniores, अर्थ `` younger ones, '' as opposed to maiores ( `` elders '' ) लिये जिससे the preceding month may may be named ( Fasti VI.1–88 ).
देखिए : Months in various पंचांग भी पुकारा the ऋतु of the June is the माह साथ the longest daylight hours of the year in the उत्तरी Hemisphere and the shortest daylight hours of the साल in the दक्षिणी Hemisphere.
जून in the उत्तरी Hemisphere is the seasonal equivalent to December in the दक्षिणी Hemisphere and vice versa.
In the उत्तरी hemisphere, the शुरूआत of the meteorological summer is 1 June.
in the Southern गोलार्ध, the शुरूआत of the meteorological winter is 1 जून.
at the start of June, the सूर्य उदय in the नक्षत्र of Taurus ; at the समाप्त of जून, the sun उदय in the नक्षत्र of Gemini.
however, due to the precession of the equinoxes, जून begins with the sun in the astrological चिह्न of मिथुन, and ends साथ the sun in the astrological चिह्न of कर्कट.
June is known for the विशाल क्रमांक of विवाह कि occur over the कोर्स of the माह.
According to one etymology, जून is नामित बाद juno ( Hera ).
juno was the देवी of marriage और a married युगल 's household, so कुछ consider it good लक to be married in इस month.
According to another etymology provided by the Roman कवि ओविड, June is नामित for the iuniores, लैटिन for `` young लोगों '' ( fasti VI.88 ) और कि the माह of May is named लिये the maiores, Latin for `` elders ''.
in Iceland, लोकगीत says कि if you bathe नग्न in the morning dew on the morning of जून 24, तुम are supposed to keep aging at खाड़ी लिये longer.
A संविधान is a set of आधारभूत principles or established precedents according to जिससे a state or other संगठन is governed.
These नियम साथ make up, i.e. constitute, what the एंटिटी is.
When these principles हैं written down into a सिंगल दस्तावेज़ or नियत of legal दस्तावेज़, those documents may be said to embody a लिखा constitution ; if वे हैं लिखा down in a single comprehensive दस्तावेज़, it is said to embody a codified संविधान.
Constitutions concern अलग स्तर of organizations, from sovereign states to companies and unincorporated associations.
a treaty which establishes an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन is भी इसके constitution, in कि it होता define कैसा कि संगठन is constituted.
भीतर राज्य, whether sovereign or federated, a constitution defines the सिद्धान्त upon जिससे the state is based, the procedure in which laws हैं बना और by जिसको.
कुछ constitutions, विशेषकर संहिताबद्ध constitutions, also act as limiters of state power, by establishing lines जिससे a state 's शासकों can not cross, such as fundamental अधिकारों.
George Washington at संवैधानिक Convention of 1787, हस्ताक्षर of U.S. संविधान.
the संविधान of India is the longest written संविधान of any sovereign देश in the संसार, containing 448 आलेख, 12 schedules and 100 amendments, with 117,369 शब्द in its English भाषा version, जबकि the United States संविधान is the shortest लिखा constitution, at 7 आलेख और 27 amendments.
Ron diftler ( left ), नासा robonaut manager assisting in a Robonaut familiarization training सत्र in the स्पेस Environment सिमुलेशन प्रयोगशाला at NASA 's Johnson Space बीच.
अभियान्त्रिकी management is a specialized रूप of प्रबन्धन कि is concerned with the application of अभियान्त्रिकी सिद्धान्त to कारोबार practice.
Engineering प्रबन्धन is a करियर कि brings together the technological problem-solving savvy of engineering and the organizational, प्रशासनिक, और नियोजन abilities of management in order to oversee complex enterprises इससे conception to completion.
उदाहरण areas of engineering are product विकास, निर्माण, निर्माण, design engineering, industrial अभियान्त्रिकी, प्रौद्योगिकी, उत्पादन, or कोई other फ़ील्ड कि employs personnel जो perform an engineering function.
कामयाब engineering managers typically आवश्यकता प्रशिक्षण and experience in कारोबार and अभियान्त्रिकी.
Technically inept प्रबंधक tend to be वंचित of support by their तकनीकी टोली, and non-commercial managers tend to कमी वाणिज्यिक सूझबूझ to deliver in a मार्केट economy.
Largely, engineering managers मैनेज इंजीनियर्स who are driven by non-entrepreneurial सोच, thus आवश्यकता the necessary लोगों skills to कोच, mentor और motivate तकनीकी professionals.
अभियान्त्रिकी पेशेवर joining manufacturing कंपनियाँ sometimes become engineering प्रबंधक by डिफॉल्ट बाद a काल of समय.
वे हैं जरूरी to learn how to मैनेज एकबार they हैं on the job, हालांकि this is usually an अप्रभावी way to develop managerial abilities.
In an बीमे नीति, the deductible is the राशि of expenses that must be paid out of जेब before an insurer will pay any खर्च.
In सामान्य usage, the term deductible may be प्रयुक्त to describe one of several types of clauses ( देखिए below ) कि are प्रयुक्त by insurance companies as a दहलीज for नीति payments.
Deductibles are typically प्रयुक्त to deter the large क्रमांक of नगण्य claims that a consumer can be reasonably अपेक्षित to bear the लागत of.
by restricting इसके coverage to कार्यक्रम कि हैं significant पर्याप्त to incur large लागत, the insurance कड़ expects to अदा out थोड़ा smaller amounts much कम frequently, incurring much higher बचत.
as a परिणाम, बीमे premiums are typically cheaper जब they involve higher deductibles.
Deductibles are सामान्यतः provided as clauses in an बीमे policy that dictate कैसा much of an insurance-covered expense is borne by the policyholder.
वे हैं सामान्यतः कोटेड as a fixed quantity and is a part of most नीतियों covering नुकसान to the नीति होल्डर.
The insurer then becomes liable लिये claimable खर्च that exceed इस राशि ( subject to the maximum sum claimable indicated in the अनुबंध ).
Depending on the नीति, the deductible may लागू प्रति covered घटना, or प्रति साल.
For policies जहाँ incidences हैं not आसान to delimit ( for example health insurance ), the deductible is typically लागू per साल.
Several deductibles can be set by the insurer आधारित on the cause of the claim.
लिये उदाहरण, a सिंगल housing insurance नीति may contain अनेक deductible amounts लिये घाटा or क्षति arising इससे चोरी, आग, प्राकृतिक calamities, निकासी etc.
वहीँ are भी deductible reimbursement कार्यक्रम कि reimburse a deductible in the event of an auto, home, boat/yacht or health बीमे अर्जी.
an invoice or bill is a commercial दस्तावेज़ issued by a विक्रेता to a buyer, indicating the उत्पाद, quantities, and सहमत कीमतें for उत्पाद or सेवाएं the विक्रेता रै provided the खरीदार.
An invoice indicates the बिक्री लेनदेन only.
भुगतान शर्तें हैं independent of the invoice और are negotiated by the buyer and the seller.
भुगतान शर्तें are प्रायः included on the चालान.
the buyer could have already paid for the products or सेवाएं सूचीबद्ध on the चालान.
Buyer can भी have a maximum क्रमांक of days in which to pay लिये these goods and is sometimes offered a छूट if सशुल्क पहले the due तिथि.
In the rental उद्योग, an invoice must शामिल a विशिष्ट reference to the duration of the समय होने billed, so in जोड to quantity, दाम and discount the invoicing amount is भी आधारित on अवधि.
Generally each line of a rental चालान होगा refer to the वास्तविक hours, दिनों, weeks, महीने, etc., being billed.
इससे the point of view of a seller, an चालान is a बिक्री चालान.
इससे the point of view of a खरीदार, an चालान is a खरीदें invoice.
The document indicates the buyer और seller, लकिन the पद चालान indicates धन is owed or owing.
In अंग्रेज़ी, the context of the पद चालान is usually प्रयुक्त to clarify its अर्थ, ऐसे as `` We भेजा them an invoice '' ( they owe us money ) or `` We received an invoice from उन्हें '' ( we owe them धन ).
the right main bronchus ( or right primary bronchus, or right principal bronchus ) is a bronchus of the respiratory system.
It is wider, shorter, और more vertical in दिशा than the left.
it is परिचय 2.5 cm long, and enters the सही lung nearly विपरीत the पांचवां thoracic vertebra.
The azygos vein arches over it from behind ; and the सही pulmonary artery झूठ at first नीचे and तब in सामने of it.
परिचय 2 cm इससे its commencement it देता off a branch to the अपर पालि of the right फेफड़ों.
इस is termed the eparterial शाखा of the bronchus, because it arises ऊपर the सही pulmonary artery.
the bronchus अभी गुजरता below the धमनी, and is ज्ञात as the hyparterial शाखा ; it divides into दो branches लिये the middle और lower lobes.
if a foreign body in the airway passes through the श्वासनली, it will सबसे likely डालें the right main bronchus instead of the left, due to the straighter संरेखण of the right bronchus to the श्वासनली.
Squash is a racquet खेल निभाई by two ( singles ) or four players ( युगल ) in a four-walled अदालत with a छोटी, खोखला rubber ball.
the खिलाड़ी must alternate in striking the बॉल साथ उनके racquet and hit the ball onto the playable surfaces of the four दीवारें of the court.
the game थी formerly पुकारा स्क्वैश racquets, a सन्दर्भ to the `` squashable '' soft ball प्रयुक्त in the game ( compared with the fatter बॉल used in इसके जनक game racquets or rackets ).
स्क्वैश is recognized by the IOC and supporters are lobbying for इसके incorporation in a future ओलम्पिक कार्यक्रम.
in 2003, फोर्ब्स rated squash as the number एक healthiest खेल to खेल.
Residual आयल is आयल found in कम concentrations naturally or in exhausted आयल fields.
Often mixed with जल, it can not be बरामद by conventional तकनीकों.
However, it can be बरामद using कार्बन dioxide-enhanced आयल रिकवरी ( co2 EOR ) which involves injecting कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड into the well reducing श्यानता और enhancing प्रवाह of the oil.
The तकनीक is not नई but रै नहीं been प्रयुक्त extensively on अवशेष oil zones, low-grade जमा of पेट्रोलियम such as the 38 square miles in the permian Basin of टेक्सास leased by Elliott Roosevelt Jr.
the technique is limited by availability of कार्बन dioxide.
it does नहीं result in sequestration of the कार्बन dioxide लकिन the gas is recycled as much as possible.
संयुक्त States reserves of residual oil हैं estimated to be 100 अरब barrels.
कलाकार 's rendering of the आग, by जॉन R. chapin, originally मुद्रित in हार्पर 's साप्ताहिक ; the दृश्य faces northeast आरपार the Randolph गली सेतु.
The ग्रेट Chicago आग was a conflagration कि burned from Sunday, October 8, to जल्दी मंगलवार, अक्तूबर 10, 1871, killing hundreds and destroying परिचय in शिकागो, इलिनोइस.
Though the आग थी एक of the largest U.S. disasters of the 19th century, the पुनर्निर्माण कि began helped develop शिकागो as one of the सबसे populous and economically महत्वपूर्ण अमरीकी cities.
Henry VIII ( 28 जून 1491 – 28 जनवरी 1547 ) थी king of इंग्लैण्ड from 21 अप्रैल 1509 until his death.
He was रब, and बाद किंग, of आयरलैंड, as खूब as continuing the नाममात्र claim by the अंग्रेज़ी monarchs to the किंगडम of फ़्रांस.
हेनरी was the second monarch of the ट्यूडर dynasty, succeeding उसके पिता, Henry सात.
besides उसके छह विवाह, हेनरी VIII is ज्ञात for उसके role in the separation of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड from the Roman कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर.
हेनरी 's struggles साथ रोम led to the separation of the Church of इंग्लैण्ड इससे papal authority, the विच्छेद of the Monasteries, और his अपना establishment as the परम् सिर of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड.
Yet he remained a believer in कोर Catholic theological teachings, even बाद his excommunication from the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर.
हेनरी oversaw the legal संघ of England और Wales with the Laws in वेल्स अधिनियमों 1535 and 1542.
in 1513, the नई king allied साथ the Holy Roman Emperor, Maximillian i, and invaded फ़्रांस in 1513 with a large, well-equipped army, but हासिल छोटी at a considerable financial लागत.
Maximillian, for उसके part, प्रयुक्त the English आक्रमण to उसके own ends, and इस prejudiced इंग्लैण्ड 's क्षमता to defeat the फ्रेंच.
This foray would prove the प्रारंभ of an obsession लिये Henry, जो invaded again in 1544.
इस समय, हेनरी 's forces captured the important city of Boulogne, लकिन again the Holy Roman Emperor, Charles v, supported Henry only as long as he needed to और England, strained by the विशाल लागत of the war, ransomed the city back लिये peace.
उसके contemporaries considered हेनरी in उसके प्रधान to be an आकर्षक, educated and संपन्नता king, और he रै महरूम वर्णित as `` one of the सबसे charismatic rulers to बैठना on the अंग्रेज़ी सिंहासन ''.
besides सत्ताधारी साथ निरपेक्ष शक्ति, he also engaged खुद as an author और composer.
His desire to provide England with a male heir – which stemmed partly from personal vanity और partly क्युकी he believed a daughter होता be असमर्थ to consolidate the ट्यूडर dynasty and the fragile सलाम that existed following the Wars of the गुलाब – led to the two बाते लिये which Henry is most remembered : his छह marriages और the अंग्रेज़ी reformation.
हेनरी became रुग्ण obese and his health suffered, contributing to his death in 1547.
he is frequently characterised in his बाद जीवन as a lustful, egotistical, harsh, और insecure king.
la reina del सूर ( the महारानी of the दक्षिण ) is a Spanish-language telenovela produced by the United States television network Telemundo, in conjunction with the एंटेना 3 संजाल and rti Producciones.
Based on a अनोखा of the वही नाम by Spanish लेखक arturo Pérez-Reverte, the drama depicts the वृद्धि of टेरेसा मेंडोज़ा ( Kate del कैस्टिलो ), a young स्त्री इससे Mexico who becomes the सबसे powerful drug trafficker in southern स्पेन.
Patricio Wills, the अध्यक्ष of telemundo Television Studios, was the कार्यपालिका producer.
हालांकि la reina del सूर was मनोनीत लिये novela of the Year, पसंदीदा Lead Actress, and बेहतरीन ख़राब लक Video, it won no पुरस्कार.
With a $ 10 million बजट, La reina del सूर थी the most महंगी telenovela ever produced by telemundo.
the कार्यक्रम 's premiere on February 28, 2011, थी the network 's उच्चतम rated premiere लिये a telenovela to तिथि.
The कार्यक्रम अक्सर वर्चस्व इसके time slot, even over अंग्रेज़ी भाषा प्रोग्रामिंग on अन्य major U.S. networks.
La Reina डेल सूर completed its 63 एपीसोड चलाएं on telemundo and इसके 13 episode चलाएं on Antena 3 simultaneously on May 30, 2011.
The फाइनल एपीसोड थी the highest रेटेड broadcast in telemundo 's 19-year history ( 4.2 million viewers ), और ताल all of the English भाषा u.S. television networks to earn the क्रमांक एक slot in the 18-49 adult जनसांख्यिकी.
the कार्यक्रम 's कामयाबी spurred Telemundo to लॉन्च its पहला अभियान to gain the series an Emmy पुरस्कार nomination.
a one-night special featuring several cast सदस्यों aired on May 31, 2011, and marked the Telemundo डेब्यू of विख्यात latina टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व क्रिस्टीना Saralegui.
la Reina डेल सूर is ब्रॉडकास्ट in several अन्य बाज़ार, सहित Serbia, Colombia, चिली, साइप्रस, निकारागुआ, कोस्टा Rica, मैक्सिको, Albania, हंगेरियाई, Slovenia, Croatia, Romania, ( among others ).
an उदाहरण of rack mounted servers
a web hosting service is a type of अंतरजाल होस्टिंग service कि allows individuals और संगठन to make their website accessible via the संसार चौड़ी वेब.
वेब होस्ट are companies कि provide स्पेस on a सर्वर स्वामित्व or leased for use by clients, as well as providing Internet कनेक्टिविटी, typically in a आंकड़ा बीच.
Web होस्ट can भी provide data center स्पेस और connectivity to the अंतरजाल लिये अन्य servers located in उनके आंकड़ा center, पुकारा colocation, भी known as आवास in लैटिन अमेरिका or फ़्रांस.
The पैमाना of वेब होस्टिंग services varies greatly.
The सबसे मौलिक is वेब पेज और small-scale file होस्टिंग, where फाइलें can be अपलोड via File ट्रांसफ़र प्रोटोकॉल ( एफटीपी ) or a Web interface.
the files हैं प्रायः delivered to the वेब `` as is '' or with minimal प्रसंस्करण.
Many अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाताओं ( isps ) प्रस्ताव इस सेवा फ़्री to सदस्य.
individuals और संगठन may भी obtain वेब page होस्टिंग from वैकल्पिक सेवा प्रदाताओं.
निजी web site होस्टिंग is typically फ़्री, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business web site होस्टिंग प्रायः रै a उच्चतर expense depending upon the size और प्रकार of the website.
Single पेज होस्टिंग is generally sufficient for personal web pages.
a complex site काल्स लिये a अधिक व्यापक पैकेज कि provides database support और application development platforms ( e.g. PHP, Java, Ruby on rails, coldfusion, or asp.net ).
ये facilities allow ग्राहक to write or install स्क्रिप्ट लिये अनुप्रयोग like forums and सामग्री management.
भी, सुरक्षित sockets Layer ( SSL ) is typically प्रयुक्त for e-commerce.
The मेजबान may भी provide an interface or control फलक for managing the Web server और installing scripts, as खूब as अन्य मौड्यूल और सेवा applications जैसे e-mail.
कुछ होस्ट specialize in निश्चित software or सेवाएं ( e.g. e-commerce ), which हैं commonly used by larger companies that outsource network infrastructure.
Madden एनएफएल ( known as जॉन Madden फ़ुटबॉल पहले 1993 ) is an अमरीकी football वीडियो खेल श्रेणी विकसित by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक Arts Tiburon for ea Sports.
The game series is named after प्रो फ़ुटबॉल Hall of famer John Madden, a well-known पूर्व Super कटोरी –winning कोच of the ओकलैंड Raiders and color commentator.
The series is the best selling EA खेल श्रेणी.
The खेल have consistently महरूम a best विक्रेता, and रै even spawned TV shows जहाँ players compete.
Among the game 's realistic features शामिल sophisticated playbooks and खिलाड़ी आंकडे, और आवाज़ commentary that allows players to सुन the खेल as if it यहूद a real tv broadcast.
The मैडेन NFL श्रेणी has महरूम nicknamed the एनएफएल 's 33rd Franchise.
the series was originally conceived by Electronic कला founder ट्रिप हॉकिन्स, जो then approached Madden in 1984 for his समर्थन और विशेषज्ञता.
Due to Madden 's insistence कि the खेल be as यथार्थवादी as संभावित, the first संस्करण of जॉन मैडेन Football थी नहीं released जबतक 1988.
the second संस्करण of the खेल थी released in 1990, with annual versions since तब.
The series ' नाम was बदला to मैडेन NFL in 1993 after EA acquired the rights to use एनएफएल टीमों and players.
despite Madden 's रिटायरमेंट as a broadcaster in 2009, he continues to lend his name और provide विशेषज्ञता for the खेल.
Cindy ली मिलर Sheehan ( born जुलाई 10, 1957 ) is an American antiwar activist जिनकी बेटे, u.S. Army विशेषज्ञ केसी Sheehan, थी killed by दुश्मन कार्रवाई दौरान the इराकी War.
वो attracted नेशनल और international media attention in August 2005 for her विस्तारित antiwar protest at a makeshift शिविर बाहर President George W. Bush 's Texas ranch —a स्टैंड कि खींचा both passionate support और angry आलोचना.
sheehan भागा unsuccessfully लिये Congress in 2008.

Her memoir, Peace Mom : A Mother 's यात्रा through heartache to Activism, थी published in 2006.
sheehan थी the 2012 vice-presidential nominee of the सलाम और Freedom पार्टी.
wyclef jeanelle Jean ( ; ; born October 17, 1969 ) Wyclef dumped इससे Haiti 's अध्यक्षीय बैलट – TIME, Aug 21, 2010.
`` Before he announced on August 5 that he थी running लिये President of हैती, wyclef जां was स्टिल listing his age as only 37 years old.
But बाद declaring himself a presidential candidate, the Haitian-American-Irish hip-hop स्टार also decided to आइये साफ और confirm कि he थी वाकई 40. '' is a three-time ग्रैमी Award -winning Haitian-American rapper, singer-songwriter, संगीतकार, record producer, और politician.
At आयु नौ, Jean स्थानांतरित to the United States with उसके family और has spent much of उसके life in the देश.
He पहला received कीर्ति as a member of the acclaimed नई Jersey hip hop group the fugees.
On अगस्त 5, 2010, जां दायर लिये candidacy in the 2010 Haitian अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, हालांकि the चुनावी Commission subsequently शासित him अयोग्य to stand as he had नहीं met the आवश्यकता to have been resident in Haiti for five सालो.
Wyclef Jean to appeal against हैती चुनाव ruling – बीबीसी News, अगस्त 22, 2010.
Haiti 's चुनावी commission कहा that Mr Jean was ineligible to stand as the haitian संविधान requires candidates to have जिया in the देश लिये five सालो prior to an चुनाव.
