In विधि, a set-off is a statutory defense to the whole or to a portion of a plaintiff 's अर्जी.
It था no existence अंतर्गत the English आम विधि, होने निर्मित by 2 जियो. II c. 22 लिये the relief of insolvent कर्जदार, हालांकि set-off थी पहचाना in इक्विटी.
ऐसे a defense could be pleaded only in respect of mutual debts of a definite character, and किया नहीं apply to मामले in जिससे damages यहूद claimed, nor to equitable claims or मांगे.
By the rules of the Supreme अदालत ( O. xix. r. 3 ) a प्रतिवादी in an कार्रवाई may set बंद or set up कोई right or claim by रास्ता of counterclaim विरूद्ध the दावा of a अभियोक्ता, and ऐसे set-off or counterclaim has the वही प्रभाव as a बयान of अर्जी in a cross-action.
the legal defense of set-off ( ऊपर ) थी originally introduced to prevent the अन्यायपूर्ण situation whereby a व्यक्ति ( `` Party a '' ) who owed money to another ( `` Party b '' ) could be भेजा to कर्जदार थाना, despite the fact कि पार्टी b also owed धन to पार्टी A.
the law thus allows both parties to defer payment until उनके respective दावा have महरूम सुना in court.
upon निर्णय, दोनो दावा are बुझे और replaced by a सिंगल जाल योग owing ( e.g. If Party a owes पार्टी b 100 और पार्टी b owes Party A 105, the two रकम हैं नियत off और replaced with a सिंगल obligation of 5 इससे पार्टी b to पार्टी a ).
set-off can also be incorporated by contractual agreement so कि, where a पार्टी मूलभूत, the mutual amounts owing are automatically नियत off और extinguished.
in certain jurisdictions ( including the UK ), set-off takes प्लेस automatically upon the insolvency of a कम्पनी.
इस अर्थात् कि, for each party जिससे is दोनो a creditor and debtor of the insolvent company, mutual debts are set-off विरूद्ध each अन्य, और तब either the bankrupt 's creditor can अर्जी the balance in the bankruptcy or the trustee in bankruptcy can पूछो for the संतुलन remaining to be paid, depending on which पक्ष owed the most.
इस has महरूम criticized as an undeclared security ब्याज that violates the principle of pari passu.
The alternative, जहाँ a creditor रै to अदा सब its debts, लकिन प्राप्त तभी a सीमित portion of the leftover moneys कि अन्य unsecured लेनदारों get, मुद्राएँ the danger of 'knock-on ' insolvencies.
the सही to नियत बंद is विशेषकर महत्वपूर्ण when रिपोर्टिंग a बैंको 's विकिरणों to regulatory अधिकारियों.
the situation where a बैंको has to रपट that it रै lent a विशाल योग to a borrower ( and is therefore exposed, because वहीँ is a रिस्क कि the borrower might डिफॉल्ट thereby leading to the loss of the bank 's or its depositors ' धन ) is thus replaced ( जहाँ the bank has लिया security over shares or प्रतिभूति of the borrower ) with an एक्सपोज़र of the money lent minus the मान of the security लिया.
Jennifer joanna एनिस्टन ( born February 11, 1969 ) is an American अभिनेत्री, film director, और निर्माता.
एनिस्टन gained worldwide recognition in the 1990s लिये portraying Rachel ग्रीन on the टेलीविज़न sitcom Friends, a भूमिका जिससे अर्जित her an एमी पुरस्कार, a सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार, and a स्क्रीन Actors गिल्ड पुरस्कार.
Aniston has also enjoyed a कामयाब हॉलीवुड film career.
वो gained नाजुक acclaim for her प्रदर्शन in the independent films She 's the One ( 1996 ), Office Space ( 1999 ), the Good लड़की ( 2002 ) और Friends with धन ( 2006 ).
वो रै had her greatest commercial सफलताओं साथ the films ब्रूस सर्वशक्तिमान ( 2003 ), the break-up ( 2006 ), मार्ले & me ( 2008 ), Just Go साथ it ( 2011 ) and Horrible Bosses ( 2011 ).
Aniston प्राप्त a star on the Hollywood चलना of Fame on फ़रवरी 22, 2012.
A श्वेत बंगाल बाघ at the ह्यूस्टन एक्वेरियम
( video )
A White बाघ at Tobu चिड़ियाघर, in saitama, Japan.
The श्वेत बाघ is a recessive म्यूटेंट of the Bengal tiger, जिससे was reported in the जंगली इससे समय to समय in Assam, बंगाल, Bihar और especially from the former राज्य of Rewa.
conventional PCI ( PCI is an initialism formed from परिधीय Component Interconnect, part of the PCI लोकल Bus standard and often shortened to बस PCI ) is a लोकल computer bus for attaching hardware डिवाइस in a कंप्यूटर.
The पीसीआई bus supports the कृत्यों found on a processor bus, लकिन in a मानकीकृत format that is independent of any particular प्रोसेसर.
डिवाइस कनेक्ट to the bus appear to the प्रोसेसर to be connected सीधे to the प्रोसेसर बस, और are assigned addresses in the प्रोसेसर 's पता स्पेस.
संलग्न डिवाइस can लो either the रूप of an integrated circuit fitted onto the मदरबोर्ड itself, called a planar यंत्र in the पीसीआई specification, or an expansion card कि fits into a slot.
The पीसीआई लोकल बस was first implemented in IBM pc compatibles, where it विस्थापित the combination of ISA plus one VESA लोकल बस as the bus विन्यास.
it रै subsequently been adopted for other computer प्रकार.
पीसीआई और PCI-X हैं being replaced by PCI एक्स्प्रेस, but, सबसे motherboards हैं still बना साथ one or more PCI स्लॉट, which are sufficient लिये अनेक उपयोग.
The पीसीआई specification कवर the physical size of the बस ( including the size and spacing of the circuit फलक edge विद्युत सम्पर्क ), विद्युत विशेषताएँ, बस timing, और प्रोटोकॉल.
The specification can be खरीदा from the PCI Special ब्याज समूह ( PCI-SIG ).
Typical पीसीआई ताश प्रयुक्त in PCs include : संजाल ताश, ध्वनि cards, modems, अतिरिक्त ports such as usb or सीरियल, tv ट्यूनर ताश and disk controllers.
PCI वीडियो cards replaced isa and vesa cards, until growing bandwidth आवश्यकताएँ outgrew the capabilities of PCI ; the preferred interface लिये video cards became अगप, और then PCI एक्स्प्रेस.
PCI वीडियो ताश remain available for उपयोग साथ बूढ़ा pcs without AGP or PCI Express slots.
अनेक devices previously provided on PCI विस्तार ताश are अभी commonly integrated onto motherboards or available in universal सीरियल bus और पीसीआई Express versions.
Caffeine is a कड़वा, white crystalline xanthine alkaloid that acts as a stimulant drug.
कैफीन is found in varying quantities in the seeds, leaves, और fruit of कुछ plants, जहाँ it अधिनियमों as a natural pesticide कि paralyzes and मारता निश्चित कीट feeding on the plants, as well as बढ़ाना the बदला मेमोरी of pollinators.
It is most commonly खपत by humans in infusions निकाली इससे the बीज of the coffee संयंत्र और the leaves of the tea bush, as well as इससे विभिन्न भोजन और पेय containing products निकला from the कोला nut.
Other स्त्रोत include yerba maté, guarana berries, guayusa, और the yaupon होली.
In humans, caffeine अधिनियमों as a सेंट्रल nervous प्रणाली उत्तेजक, temporarily warding बंद drowsiness और restoring alertness.
it is the संसार 's सबसे widely खपत psychoactive drug, but unlike many अन्य psychoactive substances, it is legal और unregulated in nearly सब भाग of the संसार.
पेय containing caffeine, such as coffee, tea, soft पेय, और energy पेय, enjoy ग्रेट popularity.
in North अमेरिका, 90 % of adults consume कैफीन रोज़.
भाग of the reason कैफीन is वर्गीकृत by the Food और Drug Administration as GRAS ( generally पहचाना as सुरक्षित ) is that विषाक्त doses ( over 10 grams ) are much उच्चतर than typically used doses ( कम than 500 milligrams ).
ordinary consumption can have कम health risks, भी जब carried on लिये सालो – वहीँ may be a modest सुरक्षात्मक प्रभाव विरूद्ध some diseases, including parkinsons बीमारी, और निश्चित प्रकार of कर्कट.
कैफीन can have both positive and negative effects on चिंता disorders.
कुछ लोगों experience नींद disruption if वे consume caffeine, especially दौरान the evening घंटों, but others show छोटी disturbance और the effect of caffeine on नींद is highly परिवर्तनीय.
प्रमाण of a रिस्क to गर्भावस्था is equivocal, लकिन कुछ authorities have concluded that दूरदर्शी सलाह is for गर्भवती women to सीमा consumption to the समतुल्य of two cups of कॉफी प्रति day or कम.
the अमरीकी कॉंग्रेस of Obstetricians and Gynecologists ( acog ) concluded in 2010 that कैफीन consumption is safe up to 200 mg per day in pregnant women.
कैफीन has pressor and mild diuretic प्रभाव जब administered to people जो are नहीं प्रयुक्त to it, but regular users develop a सहिष्णुता to इस प्रभाव, and studies have generally विफल to support the common notion कि ordinary खपत contributes significantly to निर्जलीकरण.
With भारी use, tolerance develops rapidly to autonomic effects such as elevated heart रेट और मांसपेशी twitching, but not to the संज्ञानात्मक or arousal प्रभाव of कैफीन.
The degree to which कैफीन can उपज clinically significant शारीरिक और mental dependence remains a विषय of controversy in the चिकित्सा literature.

A longboard is a longer रूपांतर of a skateboard.
It is commonly प्रयुक्त for cruising, downhill racing, slalom रेसिंग, sliding, and/or transport.

the Coast Ranges of कैलिफ़ोर्निया स्पैन इससे Humboldt काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया south to सांता Barbara काउंटी.
the other three coastal California पहाड़ ranges are the अनुप्रस्थ Ranges, Peninsular Ranges और the klamath Mountains.
physiographically, they are a section of the larger Pacific Border प्रांत, जिससे in turn हैं भाग of the larger प्रशांत Mountain System physiographic प्रभाग.
युनेस्को has included the `` California Coast सीमाएँ जीवमंडल आरक्षित `` in इसके man and the Biosphere कार्यक्रम of संसार Network of Biosphere reserves चूंकि 1983.

An automobile, autocar, motor car or car is a wheeled motor vehicle used लिये transporting passengers, जिससे also carries इसके अपना engine or मोटर.
Most definitions of the पद specify कि automobiles are designed to run primarily on roads, to have seating for एक to eight लोगों, to typically have चार पहियों, और to be constructed प्रधानतया for the transport of people rather than goods.
The पद motorcar रै also been प्रयुक्त in the context of electrified rail प्रणालियों to denote a car which functions as a छोटी लोकोमोटिव लकिन also provides स्पेस for passengers और baggage.
These locomotive गाड़ियाँ यहूद often प्रयुक्त on suburban रूट by both interurban और intercity railroad systems.
It was अनुमानित in 2010 कि the क्रमांक of automobiles था risen to over 1 अरब vehicles, up इससे the 500 million of 1986.
the numbers हैं increasing rapidly, especially in चीन और इण्डिया.
John fitzgerald `` जोकर '' कैनेडी ( May 29, 1917 – November 22, 1963 ), often referred to by his आद्याक्षर jfk, was the 35th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, serving from 1961 जबतक उसके death in 1963.
बाद सैन्य service as कमांडर of the मोटर torpedo नौकाएँ pt-109 और PT-59 during संसार War II in the दक्षिण Pacific, कैनेडी represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in the u.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat.
Thereafter, he served in the U.S. Senate इससे 1953 until 1960.
Kennedy defeated वाइस अध्यक्ष और Republican candidate रिचर्ड Nixon in the 1960 u.S. presidential election.
at 43 years of आयु, he is the youngest to have महरूम elected to the दफ्तर, the second-youngest President ( बाद Theodore Roosevelt ), and the पहला person born in the 20th सदी to serve as president.
A कैथोलिक, कैनेडी is the तभी non- Protestant president, and is the only president to have जीती a Pulitzer पुरस्कार.
कार्यक्रम दौरान उसके प्रेसिडेंसी included the Bay of Pigs Invasion, the Cuban मिसाइल संकट, the building of the बर्लिन वॉल, the Space रेस, the african-american Civil Rights गति, और early stages of the वियतनाम युद्ध.
Therein, कैनेडी increased the क्रमांक of सैन्य advisers, खास आपरेशन forces, and helicopters in an effort to curb the spread of साम्यवादी in South ईस्ट एशिया.
the कैनेडी administration adopted the नीति of the रणनीतिक Hamlet कार्यक्रम which थी implemented by the दक्षिण Vietnamese सरकारी.
it शामिल certain मजबूर relocation, गाँव internment, and पृथक्करण of ग्रामीण दक्षिण वियतनामी इससे the northern and दक्षिणी कम्युनिस्ट insurgents.
Kennedy थी assassinated on नवम्बर 22, 1963 in डलास, टेक्सास.
Lee Harvey ओसवाल्ड was चार्ज साथ the crime, लकिन he was shot and killed by जोकर माणिक्य two दिनों बाद, पहले a trial could लो प्लेस.
the FBI और the वारेन Commission officially concluded कि Oswald थी the लोन assassin.
However, the United States हाउस चुनें कमेटी on Assassinations ( hsca ) concluded कि those investigations were flawed and that Kennedy थी संभवतः assassinated as the result of a षड्यंत्र.
However, एबीसी News in उनके investigation, the कैनेडी हत्या : Beyond Conspiracy, confirmed the findings of the Warren आयोग ; having concluded ओसवाल्ड acted अलोन.
कैनेडी 's विवादास्पद विभाग of Defense tfx सेनानी bomber program led to a Congressional investigation कि lasted इससे 1963 to 1970.
चूंकि the 1960s सूचना concerning Kennedy 's निजी जीवन has आइये to light.
Details of कैनेडी 's स्वास्थ्य problems in which he struggled have become बेहतर known, विशेषकर चूंकि the 1990s.
Although initially kept रहस्य इससे the general पब्लिक, reports of Kennedy 's philandering have garnered much press.
Kennedy बाँधने अत्यधिक in public राय दरजा of u.S. presidents.

a Fire Alarm कंट्रोल फलक ( FACP ), or आग सचेतक कंट्रोल Unit ( facu ), is the controlling घटक of a आग सचेतक प्रणाली.
The फलक receives सूचना from environmental sensors designed to detect changes associated साथ fire, monitors उनके operational अखंडता और provides for स्वचालित कंट्रोल of उपकरण, और transmission of सूचना जरुरी to prepare the facility लिये fire आधारित on a predetermined sequence.
the फलक may also सप्लाई electrical उर्जा to operate any संबद्ध सेंसर, कंट्रोल, transmitter, or relay.
There are four मौलिक types of panels : coded panels, conventional panels, addressable panels, and मल्टीप्लेक्स systems.
This is a सूची of the पहला म्यूज़िक videos ब्रॉडकास्ट on MTV 's first दिन, अगस्त 1, 1981.
एमटीवी 's पहला दिन on the air थी rebroadcast on VH1 Classic in 2006 and अपलोड onto youtube in 2010 ( हालांकि only the first चार घंटों were प्रामाणिक ; the बाकी यहूद edited VH1 rebroadcasts ).
भण्डारनायके अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र ( BIA ) ( also known as Katunayake अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport और कोलोन अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport ) is one of the two international airports serving the city of कोलोन, the other is ratmalana International Airport.
mattala Rajapaksa International Airport located in southern नगर of Hambantota is the other international विमानक्षेत्र in Sri Lanka.
Bandaranaike अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport is located in Katunayake, 22 मील ( 35 km ) उत्तर of Colombo.
it is administered by Airport और विमानन Services ( Sri लंका ) Ltd.
It is the hub of श्रीलंकन Airlines, the national वाहक of Sri लंका, और Mihin Lanka, the बजट airline of श्री लंका.
Black Swan is a 2010 अमरीकी मनोवैज्ञानिक thriller and horror फिल्मी निर्देशित by Darren aronofsky and अभिनीत Natalie पोर्टमैन, विंसेंट cassel, और Mila Kunis.
The प्लाट घूमती around a production of Tchaikovsky 's Swan Lake ballet by a prestigious नई York City company.
The production requires a नर्तकी to खेल the निर्दोष and fragile White Swan, लिये जिससे the committed नर्तकी नीना ( Portman ) is a perfect fit, as well as the dark और sensual Black swan, जिससे हैं qualities embodied by the new arrival Lily ( Kunis ).
Nina is अभिभूत by a feeling of immense दबाव जब she finds herself स्पर्धा for the भाग, causing her to खोना उसके tenuous पकड़ on reality और descend into a living nightmare.
aronofsky conceived the premise by connecting उसके viewings of a उत्पादन of swan झील साथ an unrealized screenplay परिचय understudies and the ख़्याल of होने haunted by a दोगुना, similar to the folklore surrounding doppelgängers.
aronofsky cites Fyodor दोस्तोयेव्स्की 's `` the दोगुना `` as another प्रेरणा लिये the film.
the director also considered Black swan a साथी टुकड़ा to उसके 2008 फिल्मी The पहलवान, with दोनो films involving demanding performances for अलग kinds of आर्ट.
He and Portman पहला discussed the प्रोजेक्ट in 2000, और बाद a brief attachment to सार्वभौमिक Studios, ब्लैक Swan थी produced in New यॉर्क City in 2009 by फॉक्स Searchlight तस्वीरें.
Portman and Kunis trained in ballet for several months prior to filming, और notable figures from the बैले world helped साथ फिल्मी उत्पादन to shape the ballet presentation.
The फिल्मी premiered as the खोलने फिल्मी लिये the 67th वेनिस International Film Festival on सितंबर 1, 2010.
It था a सीमित रिलीज in the United राज्य starting December 3, 2010 and खोली nationwide on दिसम्बर 17.
Black Swan प्राप्त critical praise upon इसके release, विशेषकर लिये पोर्टमैन 's performance and Aronofsky 's दिशा, and थी a significant box दफ्तर कामयाबी, grossing $ 329 million worldwide.
the film प्राप्त पाँच Academy पुरस्कार nominations और पोर्टमैन won the बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री award लिये the फिल्मी, as खूब as many अन्य बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री awards in several guilds and त्यौहार, while aronofsky थी मनोनीत for बेहतरीन निदेशक.
In जोड, the film itself received a nomination for Best चित्र.
the world’s first ice-calorimeter, प्रयुक्त in the शीत of 1782-83, by एंटोनी Lavoisier and Pierre-Simon Laplace, to determine the ऊष्मा involved in various रासायनिक परिवर्तन ; calculations which were based on जोसेफ ब्लैक ’s prior डिस्कवरी of अदृश्य heat.
These प्रयोग चिह्नित the foundation of thermochemistry.
a ऊष्मामापी ( इससे लैटिन calor, meaning heat ) is an object प्रयुक्त लिये calorimetry, or the प्रक्रम of measuring the ऊष्मा of रासायनिक reactions or physical परिवर्तन as well as heat capacity.
Differential स्कैनिंग calorimeters, समतापी microcalorimeters, titration calorimeters और त्वरित रेट calorimeters are among the सबसे आम types.
A सरल calorimeter just consists of a thermometer संलग्न to a मेटल संग्राहक full of जल suspended ऊपर a combustion कक्ष.
to ढूँढें the enthalpy change per mole of a substance a in a प्रतिक्रिया between दो substances A and B, the substances are added to a ऊष्मामापी और the आरंभिक और final temperatures ( before the प्रतिक्रिया started and after it रै समाप्त ) are विख्यात.
multiplying the तापमान बदलें by the द्रव्यमान और विशिष्ट heat capacities of the substances देता a मान लिये the energy given off or absorbed दौरान the reaction.
Dividing the उर्जा change by how अनेक औज़ार of A were उपस्थित देता its enthalpy change of reaction.
This method is प्रयुक्त primarily in academic teaching as it describes the theory of कैलोरीमिति.
It does not account लिये the ऊष्मा घाटा through the container or the heat क्षमता of the थर्मामीटर and संग्राहक itself.
in जोड, the object placed अंदर the ऊष्मामापी shows that the objects transferred उनके ऊष्मा to the ऊष्मामापी और into the द्रव, and the heat अवशोषित by the calorimeter और the द्रव is बराबर to the heat दिए बंद by the धातुओं.
A जोड़ी of ग्रीन flip-flops
Flip-flops ( भी पुकारा zōri, thongs, jandals, or a variety of अन्य names throughout the संसार ) are a type of open-toed चन्दन typically worn in कैज़ुअल परिस्थितियों, ऐसे as outside or at the बीच.
They consist of a चपटा sole आयोजित loosely on the foot by a Y-shaped strap that गुजरता between the पहला और दूसरी toes और around either पक्ष of the foot.
वे may भी be आयोजित to the foot साथ a सिंगल strap over the front of the पैर बल्कि than a थोंग.
The नाम `` flip-flop '' originated क्युकी of the ध्वनि that is बना by slapping between the एकमात्र of the पैर and the floor when चलना.
इस स्टाइल of जूते रै been worn by the लोगों of अनेक संस्कृतियों throughout the world, originating as early as the प्राचीन Egyptians in 4,000 b.c.
the आधुनिक flip-flop उतरता इससे the Japanese zōri, which became लोकप्रिय after World War ii जब सैनिको returning to the संयुक्त States brought उन्हें वापस.
वे became लोकप्रिय in casual जमावट during the 1960s, 1990s, and 2000s, और some varieties have भी found उनके way into more औपचारिक attire, despite criticism.
the उपयोग of flip-flops can परिणाम in अनेक pains और चोटों, सहित ankle sprains और broken bones.
Some individuals जो चलना लिये long periods रपट pain in the फीट, ankles, और निम्नतर legs.
The lack of support provided by flip-flops often results in over-pronation चोटों, caused by the पैर घुसते inwards further than सामान्य.
This can सीसे to चपटा फीट और tendonitis.
Other injuries कि may result are due to the जूते 's open-toed प्रकृति, ऐसे as stubbed toes, कटौती, and bruises.
Doctors सुझाएँ खरीदना pricier sandals साथ thick-cushioned सोल्स, as खूब as those कि have a डोरी कि is not कैनवास and कि comes वापस almost to the टखने.
the owners of Hanjin ओसाका, देखी here transiting the पनामा Canal in 2008, declared सामान्य औसत following an विस्फोट in the ship 's इंजन room on.
the law of सामान्य average is a legal principle of maritime law according to which all पार्टियों in a समुद्र venture proportionally share कोई losses resulting from a voluntary sacrifice of part of the ship or cargo to save the पूरे in an emergency.
in the exigencies of जोखिमों faced at समुद्र, क्रू सदस्यों often have अनमोल little समय in which to determine precisely whose कार्गो वे हैं jettisoning.
Thus, to avoid quarrelling that could बर्बाद मूल्यवान time, वहीँ arose the equitable अभ्यास whereby all the व्यापारियों जिनकी cargo landed सकुशल would be पुकारा on to योगदान a portion, based upon a share or percentage, to the merchant or merchants whose goods था been tossed overboard to avert निकट peril.
जबकि सामान्य औसत traces इसके origins in प्राचीन maritime विधि, still it remains भाग of the admiralty विधि of सबसे देशों.
The पहला codification of general औसत was the यॉर्क Antwerp नियम of 1890.
अमरीकी कंपनियाँ स्वीकृत it in 1949.
General average requires three तत्व which हैं clearly stated by Mr. इंसाफ grier in बर्नार्ड v. आदमs:
`` 1st.
a common danger : a खतरे in जिससे पोत, कार्गो और क्रू सब participate ; a danger निकट और apparently 'inevitable, ' except by voluntarily रूष्ट the loss of a portion of the पूरे to save the शेष. ''
`` 2nd. वहीँ जरूर be a voluntary jettison, jactus, or ढलाई away, of some portion of the joint चिंता for the purpose of avoiding this निकट peril, periculi imminentis evitandi causa, or, in अन्य words, a transfer of the peril इससे the whole to a particular portion of the whole. ''
`` 3rd.
This attempt to avoid the निकट आम peril must be कामयाब ''.
Example Polish call for टीकाकरण विरूद्ध डिप्थीरिया and टेटनस.
a vaccination अनुसूची is a series of vaccinations, including the समय of all doses, which may be either recommended or अनिवार्य, depending on the देश of residence.
A टीका is an antigenic तैयारी used to produce क्रियाशील प्रतिरक्षण to a बीमारी, in अनुक्रम to prevent or reduce the प्रभाव of infection by any natural or `` wild '' pathogen.
Many vaccines require अनेक doses for अधिकतम effectiveness, either to उपज sufficient आरंभिक immune जवाब or to boost जवाब कि fades over time.
लिये उदाहरण, tetanus vaccine boosters are प्रायः अनुशंसित प्रत्येक 10 years.
टीका schedules हैं developed by governmental agencies or physicians groups to achieve अधिकतम प्रभावकारिता using required and अनुशंसित टीके for a मोहल्ले जबकि महती the number of स्वास्थ्य परवाह system interactions.
Over the पास्ट two दशकों, the अनुशंसित vaccination अनुसूची रै grown rapidly and become अधिक जटिल as many new टीके have been विकसित.
Some vaccines हैं recommended only in certain areas ( countries, subnational क्षेत्रों, or at-risk populations ) where a disease is आम.
For उदाहरण, पीला fever टीकाकरण is on the दिनचर्या vaccine schedule of French guiana, is recommended in certain regions of ब्राज़ील but in the United States is only दिए to travelers heading to देशों with a इतिहास of the disease.
In विकासशील countries, vaccine सुझाव भी take into account the स्तर of स्वास्थ्य परवाह अभिगम, the लागत of vaccines and issues साथ टीका availability और storage.
नमूना vaccinations schedules discussed by the World स्वास्थ्य संगठन show a developed देश using a schedule जिससे extends over the पहला five years of a चाइल्ड 's life and uses टीके जिससे cost over $ 700 including administration costs जबकि a developing country uses a schedule providing टीके in the पहला 9 महीने of life and costing तभी $ 25.
This अंतर is due to the निम्नतर लागत of स्वास्थ्य परवाह, the निम्नतर cost of अनेक vaccines provided to developing राष्ट्र, and कि more महंगी टीके, प्रायः लिये कम common diseases, are not utilized.
in 1900, the smallpox टीका थी the तभी एक administered to children.
by the जल्दी 1950s, children routinely received four vaccines, लिये protection against ( diphtheria, pertussis, टेटनस, polio, और smallpox ), और as many as five shots by two years of age.
चूंकि the mid-1980s, अनेक vaccines have been added to the अनुसूची.
, the US centers for Disease Control और Prevention ( CDC ) now अनुशंसा vaccination विरूद्ध at least fourteen diseases.
By दो सालो of age, U.S. children प्राप्त as many as 24 टीका injections, and might receive up to पाँच shots दौरान one visit to the doctor.
the use of संयोजन vaccine उत्पाद means कि,, the United Kingdom 's immunization कार्यक्रम consists of 10 injections by the आयु of two, बल्कि than 25 if टीकाकरण लिये each disease थी given as a पृथक इंजेक्शन.

ट्रक are an integral भाग of the गली parade, featuring सजीव performances or deejays
The Trinidad and टोबैगो कार्निवल is an annual इवेंट held on the Monday and Tuesday पहले Ash Wednesday, and is well known लिये participant 's रंगीन costumes and exuberant जश्न.
Carnival in Trinidad और Tobago is the सबसे significant इवेंट on the islands ' सांस्कृतिक और tourism calendar, साथ numerous सांस्कृतिक events running in the lead up to the गली parade on कार्निवल Monday and Tuesday.
It is कहा कि if the आइलैंडर्स are नहीं celebrating it, तब वे हैं preparing for it, जबकि reminiscing about the past year 's festival.
The heart of the musical celebration रै महरूम कैलिप्सो ; recently soca has replaced calypso as the सबसे celebrated प्रकार of music.
Costumes, stickfighting और limbo प्रतियोगिताओं are also important components of the पर्व.
Carnival as it is celebrated in Trinidad और Tobago is also celebrated in cities विश्वव्यापी.
These सहित टोरंटो 's Caribana, मियामी 's मियामी कार्निवल, Houston Carifest, लंदन 's नॉटिंग Hill Carnival as well as नई York City 's Labor Day कार्निवल to name a few.
कार्निवल थी created जब West अफ़्रीकी स्लेव mimicked उनके French owners जो where ज्ञात for उनके lavish costumes balls.
हराम to partake in ये festivities और confined to their quarters, slaves संयुक्त elements from their अपना cultures to their निपुण 's fete.
hence the creation of characters ऐसे as Jab Jab or Jab Molassie ( शैतानों ), Midnight Robbers, imps, lagahroo, soucouyant, la diablesse and Demons.
साथ the abolition of slavery in 1838, freed africans took उनके version of Carnival to the गलियों through expression of ड्रम, riddim sections like tamboo bamboo and as प्रत्येक नई immigrant population डाला Trinidad, कार्निवल evolved into what we जान आज.
the city of शिकागो, इलिनोइस आयोजित a nonpartisan mayoral election on मंगलवार, फ़रवरी 22, 2011.
Incumbent Mayor Richard M. Daley, a member of the Democratic पार्टी who था been in office चूंकि 1989, did नहीं seek a सातवाँ पद as महापौर.
उम्मीदवार needed to collect 12,500 petition signatures by November 22, 2010 to qualify लिये a प्लेस on the ballot.
April 5, 2011 was scheduled to be a runoff election तिथि if no candidate received an निरपेक्ष बहुमत.
Rahm emanuel won the race for महापौर साथ more than 55 % of the vote.
He was उदघाटन on may 16, 2011.
`` उत्तेजित up kicks '' is a song by American इंडी pop बैंड फोस्टर the People.
it was released as the समूह 's debut single in September 2010, और the following साल थी included on उनके EP फोस्टर the People और उनके डेब्यू album Torches.
`` Pumped Up kicks '' became the समूह 's breakthrough hit और was one of the सबसे लोकप्रिय गीतों of 2011.
The सोंग थी written and अंकित by frontman चिह्नित फोस्टर जबकि he was working as a commercial झंकार लेखक.
चिहृ साथ the upbeat musical composition, the lyrics describe the homicidal विचार of a troubled youth.
The track received considerable ध्यान after it was posted ऑनलाइन in 2010 as a फ़्री download, और it helped the समूह garner a multi-album record deal साथ कोलंबिया रिकॉर्ड imprint startime अंतरराष्ट्रीय.
`` उत्तेजित Up Kicks '' proved to be a sleeper hit ; in 2011, after receiving significant airplay on modern चट्टान स्टेशन, the song crossed-over onto contemporary hit radio stations.
The सोंग खर्च eight लगातार सप्ताह at number तीन on the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 chart in the संयुक्त States, बनाना it the first Billboard Alternative गीतों number-one सिंगल to क्रैक the u.S. शीर्ष 5 since किंग्स of Leon 's `` उपयोग somebody `` in 2009.
The सोंग was widely praised by आलोचकों, and it रै been licensed लिये use in a चौड़ी दायरा of लोकप्रिय मीडिया चूंकि इसके रिलीज.
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' received a ग्रैमी Award nomination लिये Best Pop Duo/Group प्रदर्शन.
The State मेला of West वर्जिनिया is an सालाना राज्य मेला लिये वेस्ट Virginia.
It is आयोजित annually in mid-august on the State fairgrounds in fairlea, निकट lewisburg, West वर्जिनिया in the southeastern भाग of the state.
the राज्य Fairgrounds consists of a large खोलें field for carnivals and exhibitions, a horse track, grandstands, और अनेक प्रदर्शनी इमारतें.
Free पार्किंग is provided adjacent to the fairgrounds and, until 2006, free कैंप थी also available in a विशाल field साथ running-water toilets and बौछार, but no hookups.
Campers हैं now charged a छोटी fee.
The श्वेत House, the president 's आधिकारिक residence and center of the प्रशासन
Under the United राज्य Constitution, the President of the संयुक्त राज्य is the head of state and head of सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य.
As chief of the executive branch और head of the संघीय सरकारी as a whole, the प्रेसिडेंसी is the उच्चतम राजनैतिक दफ्तर in the संयुक्त States by influence and मान्यता.
The president is भी the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed शक्तियां.
The president is indirectly निर्वाचित to a four-year पद by an Electoral कॉलेज ( or by the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि चाहिए the Electoral College असफल to पुरस्कार an निरपेक्ष majority of votes to कोई person ).
Since the ratification of the twenty-second amendment to the संयुक्त States Constitution in 1951, no व्यक्ति may be elected अध्यक्ष अधिक than twice, और no एक जो has served more than two सालो of a term to जिससे किसी else थी elected may be elected more than once.
Upon the death, resignation, or हटाना from दफ्तर of an लाज़िम President, the Vice President assumes the office.
The अध्यक्ष must be at least 35 सालो of age और a `` प्राकृतिक born '' citizen of the संयुक्त राज्य.
इस सूची includes तभी those persons जो यहूद sworn into दफ्तर as president following the अनुसमर्थन of the संयुक्त States संविधान, जिससे took प्रभाव on कूच 4, 1789.
लिये American नेताओ before this ratification, see President of the महाद्वीपीय Congress.
The सूची does not include कोई Acting Presidents under the twenty-fifth amendment to the United राज्य Constitution.
There have महरूम 43 लोगों sworn into office, and 44 presidencies, as Grover क्लीवलैंड served two non-consecutive शर्तें और is counted chronologically as दोनो the 22nd and 24th president.
of the individuals निर्वाचित as president, four died in दफ्तर of natural causes ( विलियम Henry हैरिसन, Zachary Taylor, Warren G. Harding, and फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट ), चार were assassinated ( अब्राहम Lincoln, जेम्स A. गारफ़ील्ड, William mckinley, और जॉन F. कैनेडी ) and एक resigned ( रिचर्ड Nixon ).
George वॉशिंगटन, the पहला अध्यक्ष, was inaugurated in 1789 बाद a unanimous vote of the Electoral College.
William हेनरी हैरिसन spent the shortest समय in office with 32 दिनों in 1841, and फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट spent the longest साथ over twelve सालो, but died shortly into उसके चौथी term in 1945.
he is the तभी अध्यक्ष to serve अधिक than दो शर्तें, और a संवैधानिक amendment, affecting राष्ट्रपतियों after हैरी ट्रूमैन, was passed to limit the number of times an individual can be elected president.
एंड्रयू Jackson, the seventh president, थी the पहला to be elected by मेन of all classes in 1828 बाद most कानून barring non-land-owners इससे मतदान यहूद repealed.
Warren हार्डिंग was the first निर्वाचित बाद women gained मतदान अधिकारों in 1920.
History रिकॉर्ड four presidents – John Q एडम्स, Rutherford B. Hayes, Benjamin Harrison और George W. बुश – who खोया the लोकप्रिय vote but assumed office.
John F. कैनेडी has been the तभी अध्यक्ष of रोमन Catholic आस्था, और the वर्तमान president, Barack ओबामा, is the first अध्यक्ष of African descent.
`` Lombardi Trophy '' redirects here.
लिये the पुरस्कार awarded annually to the बेहतरीन college football lineman or linebacker, see लोम्बार्डी पुरस्कार.
the विंस Lombardi ट्रॉफी is the trophy awarded प्रत्येक साल to the जीतना team of the National Football League 's चैंपियनशिप game, the सुपर Bowl.
the ट्रॉफी is named in honor of legendary एनएफएल कोच विंस लोम्बार्डी.
इस is a list of टेबल of the verified oldest people in the संसार in ordinal rank, ऐसे as oldest person or oldest man.
in ये tables, a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if उसके or her अर्जी रै been validated by an अंतरराष्ट्रीय देह that specifically deals in longevity research, such as the जराविद्या Research Group ( GRG ) or गिनीज World रिकॉर्ड.
the longest unambiguously documented human जीवनकाल is कि of jeanne calment of फ़्रांस ( 1875–1997 ), जो died at आयु 122 years, 164 दिनों.
She met Vincent वैन gogh जब she थी 12 or 13.
This led to news मीडिया attention in 1985, after Calment turned 110.
Subsequent investigation मिला documentation for calment 's age, परे any उचित question, in the रिकॉर्ड of उसके देशी नगर, arles, France.
More प्रमाण of Calment 's जीवनकाल has been उत्पादित than for any अन्य supercentenarian ; her मामला serves as an archetype in the methodology for verifying the आयु of the संसार 's oldest लोगों.
the longest undisputed जीवनकाल for पुरूष supercentenarians is कि of jiroemon Kimura, जो फिलहाल lives in जापानी और is आयु as of.
चूंकि the death of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the संयुक्त राज्य, on 17 December 2012, किमुरा, born 19 April 1897, is the oldest living व्यक्ति in the world जिनकी age can be documented.
He has also been the oldest जीना man चूंकि the death of 114-year old वाल्टर breuning on 14 April 2011.
Since the मौत of 115-year बूढ़ा koto okubo of जापानी on 12 जनवरी 2013, the oldest living स्त्री रै been -year-old Misao Okawa, also from Japan, born on 5 कूच 1898.
the People 's अदालत is an अमरीकी arbitration-based reality court show, फिलहाल presided over by रिटायर्ड Florida राज्य Circuit Court Judge Marilyn Milian, in जिससे छोटी claims विवादों are संभाला.
The People 's Court is the first court दिखाएँ to use बाइंडिंग arbitration, introducing the स्वरूप into the genre in 1981.
the system has महरूम duplicated by most of the show 's successors in the न्यायिक विधा.
Moreover, the People 's अदालत is the first popular, long-running reality in the judicial genre.
it थी preceded only by a few short-lived realities in the विधा ; these short-lived predecessors यहूद only loosely सम्बन्धित to judicial proceedings, except लिये एक : पैरोल ( 1959 ) took फुटेज from real-life courtrooms holding विधिक कार्यवाही.
Prior to the People 's अदालत, the विशाल बहुमत of TV courtroom shows used actors, and बनाई or fictional cases ( as did radio पहले कि ).
among examples of ये types of अदालत shows शामिल प्रसिद्ध Jury Trials and अपना Witness.
The People 's अदालत रै था two चिहृ lives.
the show 's पहला जीवन was presided over solely by पूर्व Los एंजिल्स काउंटी Superior अदालत न्यायधीश जोसेफ Wapner.
उसके tenure lasted from the दिखाएँ 's डेब्यू on September 14, 1981, until May 21, 1993, when the show was रद्द due to low दरजा.
This बाएँ the दिखाएँ with a कुल of 2,484 1⁄2-hour episodes और 12 seasons.
the दिखाएँ was taped in लॉस एंजिल्स दौरान its first life.
बाद होने cancelled, reruns aired जबतक सितंबर 9, 1994.
on September 8, 1997, after being out of production for four years, the लोगों 's Court थी revived for a दूसरी जीवन in first-run अनुप्रयोग as a 60-minute कार्यक्रम.
पूर्व वकील और महापौर of नई यॉर्क ed Koch was चुनी as arbiter, which he maintained लिये 2 सीज़न इससे the 1997–98 season through the 1998–99 ऋतु ( the present जीवन 's 2nd ऋतु और overall show 's 14th ).
By the 1999–00 ऋतु, husband of जूडिथ Sheindlin ( जो presides over न्यायधीश Judy ) and former New York राज्य Supreme अदालत Judge Jerry sheindlin succeeded Koch.
Sheindlin lasted एक और a half सीज़न as he थी replaced towards the end of the 2000–01 ऋतु ( present जीवन 's 4th season और overall show 's 17th ).
शुरूआत in spring 2001, Florida न्यायधीश Marilyn milian took over the लोगों 's अदालत and has presided over the दिखाएँ ever चूंकि.
Once milian completes the 2012–13 ऋतु, वो होगा have served as longest arbiter over the series साथ 12 and a half सीज़न.
As of the present, however, उसके years on the program टाई Wapner at 12 seasons.
In the 2009-10 television ऋतु, The लोगों 's न्यायालयों 2nd/present life outlasted इसके पहला जब it पहुँचे 13 सीज़न.
जबकि the show taped in New यॉर्क City for the पहला 15 सीज़न of its second जीवन, it अभी tapes in stamford, Connecticut as of the 2012-13 season.
On September 3, 2012, The People 's Court 's 2nd/present life डाला इसके 16th ऋतु ( 28th overall ऋतु ).
With 28 कुल सीज़न, The People 's अदालत ranks as the 2nd longest-running courtroom program behind the जारी Divorce Court at 33 सीज़न ( इससे इसके 3 संयुक्त lives ).
Utah ( or ) ( arapaho : wo'tééneihí ' ) is a राज्य in the Western United States.
it became the 45th state admitted to the Union on January 4, 1896.
Utah is the 13th-largest, the 34th-most populous, and the 10th-least-densely आबादी of the 50 United राज्य.
Approximately 80 % of यूटा 's 2,817,222 लोगों सजीव along the Wasatch सामने, centering on Salt Lake City, leaving vast expanses of the राज्य nearly uninhabited and making the population the sixth सबसे urbanized in the U.S. Utah is bordered by Colorado on the east, Wyoming on the northeast, Idaho on the north, एरिज़ोना on the south, और नेवाडा on the वेस्ट.
it भी छू a corner of New मैक्सिको on the southeast.
यूटा is the most religiously homogeneous state in the Union.
Approximately 63 % of utahns are reported to be members of the Church of यीशु मसीह of latter-day Saints or lds ( Mormons ), जिससे greatly influences यूटा संस्कृति and daily जीवन.
The संसार मुख्यालय of the गिरिजाघर of Jesus मसीह of Latter-day संतो ( LDS Church ) is located in Utah 's राज्य पूंजी.
The state is a center of transportation, education, सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी and शोध, government सेवाएं, mining, और a प्रमुख पर्यटक गंतव्य for outdoor मनोरंजन.
According to the u.S. जनसांख्यिकी Bureau 's जनसांख्यिकी estimates, यूटा is the fifth fastest-growing state in the संयुक्त States as of 2012.
st. George, was the fastest–growing metropolitan area in the United States इससे 2000 to 2005.
a 2012 Gallup national सर्वेक्षण मिला यूटा overall to be the `` best state to सजीव in '' आधारित on 13 forward-looking measurements सहित विभिन्न आर्थिक, जीवनशैली, and health-related outlook metrics.
coldwater is a small town in टेट County, Mississippi.
It is in the Memphis महानगर Area.
the population was 1,674 at the 2000 census.
The मुश्किल तालु is a पतला आड़ा bony plate of the कपाल, स्तिथ in the छत of the मुँह.
it spans the arch formed by the अपर teeth.
It is formed by the palatine प्रक्रम of the maxilla और horizontal plate of palatine अस्थि.
It फ़ॉर्म a partition between the nasal passages and the मुँह.
भी on the अग्रवर्ती portion of the roof of the hard palate is the Rugae जिससे are the irregular ridges in the mucous membrane कि help facilitate the गति of खाना backwards towards the pharynx.
इस विभाजन is जारी deeper into the mouth by a मांसल extension पुकारा the soft तालु.
पूरा set of scrolls, constituting the entire Tanakh.
the Tanakh (, or ; भी Tenakh, tenak, tanach ) is a name प्रयुक्त in Judaism for the canon of the Hebrew बाइबल.
The Tanakh is भी known as the Masoretic टेक्स्ट or the miqra.
The नाम is an एक्रोनिम formed from the initial यहूदी अक्षर of the masoretic Text 's तीन परंपरागत subdivisions : the तोरा ( `` शिक्षण '', भी ज्ञात as the पाँच Books of Moses ), Nevi'im ( `` नबियों '' ) and Ketuvim ( `` कृतियाँ '' ) —hence tanakh.
The name `` miqra '' ( מקרא ), अर्थ `` that जिससे is read '', is an वैकल्पिक Hebrew पद लिये the tanakh.
the किताबे of the Tanakh यहूद relayed साथ an accompanying oral tradition passed on by each पीढी, called the Oral Torah.
Sobriety नाका in जर्मनी
Driving अंतर्गत the influence ( DUI ), ड्राइविंग while intoxicated ( dwi ), drunken ड्राइविंग, drunk driving, पेय driving, operating under the influence, drinking और ड्राइविंग, or impaired ड्राइविंग is the crime of driving a motor गाडी साथ blood levels of दारू in excess of a legal limit ( `` Blood Alcohol Content '', or `` bac '' ).
समान regulations cover driving or operating निश्चित types of मशीनरी जबकि प्रभावित by पीने दारू or लेने other drugs, सहित, but नहीं limited to prescription drugs.
इस is a दण्ड ठोकर in सबसे nations.
convictions do नहीं necessarily involve actual driving of the vehicle.
In most jurisdictions a मापन ऐसे as a blood दारू content ( BAC ) in excess of a specific दहलीज level, such as 0.05 % or 0.08 % defines the ठोकर, साथ no need to prove impairment or being under the influence of alcohol.
In कुछ jurisdictions, there is an aggravated श्रेणी of the offense at a higher level e.g. 0.12 %.
in सबसे countries, anyone who is convicted of injuring or हत्या someone while under the influence of दारू or drugs can be heavily fined, as in France, in addition to being दिए a lengthy prison वाक्य.
Some कार्य have their अपना नियम and BAC हद, लिये उदाहरण वाणिज्यिक पायलट, and the Federal रेलरोड प्रशासन in the United राज्य has a 0.04 % सीमा लिये ट्रैन crew.
Some jurisdictions have अनेक levels of bac ; लिये उदाहरण, the राज्य of California रै a 0.08 % BAC limit, which is lowered to 0.04 % if the operator holds a वाणिज्यिक ड्राइवर 's license.
the California BAC सीमा is 0.01 % लिये those younger than 21 सालो of आयु और those on परिवीक्षा for a पिछला DUI conviction.
कुछ विशाल corporations have उनके अपना नियम ; Union प्रशांत Railroad रै उनके अपना BAC सीमा of 0.02 % कि, if violated during a random test or a for-cause परीक्षण — लिये उदाहरण, बाद a ट्रैफ़िक दुर्घटना — can परिणाम in termination of नियुक्ति साथ no chance of भविष्य re-hire.
Many राज्य in the u.S. and provinces in Canada have अपनाया truth in sentencing laws that enforce सख्त guidelines on sentencing, differing इससे previous अभ्यास जहाँ prison time थी घटाया or निलंबित after sentencing had महरूम जारी.
कुछ jurisdictions have न्यायिक guidelines requiring a mandatory न्यूनतम वाक्य.
Penalties लिये dui charges range from expensive fees to forfetiruree of अपना अनुज्ञा plates और in some गंभीर हालातों, your vehicle.
A नशे driving सिम्युलेटर in montréal, कनाडा
the specific दण्ड offense may be पुकारा, depending on the jurisdiction, driving अंतर्गत the influence [ of alcohol or other drugs ] ( DUI ), driving under intense influence ( duii ), driving while intoxicated ( DWI ), ऑपरेटिंग under the influence ( OUI ) ऑपरेटिंग while intoxicated ( OWI ), operating a मोटर vehicle जबकि intoxicated ( omvi ), ड्राइविंग अंतर्गत the combined influence of alcohol and/or other दवाएँ, ड्राइविंग under the influence per se or नशे in चार्ज [ of a गाडी ].
अनेक such कानून लागू भी to motorcycling, बोटिंग, piloting aircraft, उपयोग of motile फार्म equipment such as tractors and combines, riding horses or driving a horse-drawn गाडी, or bicycling, संभवतः with different bac स्तर than driving.
in some jurisdictions there हैं separate charges depending on the गाडी used, ऐसे as bwi ( bicycling while intoxicated ), जिससे may carry a हल्का sentence.
in the संयुक्त राज्य, लोकल law enforcement एजेंसियों made 1,467,300 arrests nationwide लिये driving under the influence of alcohol in 1996, compared to 1.9 million such arrests दौरान the peak year in 1983.
in 1997 an अनुमानित 513,200 dwi अपराधियों यहूद in थाना or कारावास, bas from 593,000 in 1990 and up from 270,100 in 1986.

विधि प्रवर्तन in the संयुक्त States is एक of तीन major components of the criminal इंसाफ प्रणाली of the United States, साथ साथ न्यायालयों and corrections.
Although there exists an inherent interrelatedness between the different समूह that मेक up the criminal इंसाफ प्रणाली आधारित on their crime deterrence purpose, प्रत्येक component operates independently from एक another.
However, the judiciary is vested with the power to मेक legal determinations regarding the conduct of the other two components.
Apart from maintaining order and service functions, the purpose of policing is the investigation of suspected दण्ड activity and the referral of the results of investigations और of suspected criminals to the न्यायालयों.
Law प्रवर्तन, to varying डिग्री at different स्तर of सरकारी and in different एजेंसियों, is भी commonly charged साथ the responsibilities of deterring criminal कार्यकलाप and of preventing the successful आयोग of अपराधों in प्रगति ; the सेवा और enforcement of warrants, writs and अन्य orders of the courts.
Law प्रवर्तन agencies हैं भी शामिल in providing पहला जवाब to emergencies और other खतरे to public सुरक्षा ; the protection of निश्चित public सुविधाएं and infrastructure ; the maintenance of public order ; the protection of पब्लिक officials ; और the आपरेशन of some correctional facilities ( usually at the local स्तर ).
Elmer Figueroa Arce ( born जून 28, 1968 ), बेहतरीन known अंतर्गत the stage name Chayanne, is a प्यूर्टो Rican Latin पॉप singer और actor.
As a solo कलाकार, Chayanne has released 21 solo एल्बम और sold over 15 लाख albums विश्वव्यापी.
`` संसार War हल्क '' is a comic किताब क्रॉसओवर storyline कि भागा through a स्वः titled limited श्रेणी और विभिन्न अन्य titles प्रकाशित by आश्चर्य कॉमिक्स in 2007, featuring the हल्क.
the श्रेणी consists of five main मुद्दे titled संसार युद्ध Hulk, साथ ग्रेग Pak as writer and John romita, jr. as penciller, and three other limited श्रेणी : World War Hulk : Front Line, संसार War Hulk : गामा Corps, and World युद्ध Hulk : x-men.
It भी ran through several other Marvel comics series.
the प्लाट is the culmination of a श्रेणी of events that began साथ the Hulk being tricked into space by the Illuminati और a जीवन मॉडल decoy of Nick फ़्यूरी, the Hulk 's subsequent निर्वासन seen in Planet Hulk और his निकट वापसी to धरती to तलाश बदला on the illuminati.
Marion मिशेल Morrison ( born marion रॉबर्ट मॉरिसन ; May 26, 1907 – June 11, 1979 ), better ज्ञात by his stage name जॉन वेन, थी an अमरीकी film कर्ता, director and निर्माता.
An अकादमी Award -winner, Wayne थी among the शीर्ष box office draws for तीन दशकों, and was named the all-time top money-making star.
An enduring अमरीकी प्रतीक, he epitomized rugged masculinity और is प्रसिद्ध लिये his demeanor, including his distinctive calm voice, walk, और height.
Wayne थी born in winterset, आयोवा लकिन उसके family relocated to the वृहद Los एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल when he was चार सालो old.
He found work at लोकल फिल्मी studios when he lost उसके football scholarship to USC as a परिणाम of a bodysurfing दुर्घटना.
initially working for the फॉक्स फिल्मी Corporation, he ज़्यादातर appeared in small bit भाग.
उसके first अग्रणी role came in the widescreen एपिक The बिग ट्रेल ( 1930 ), जिससे led to leading भूमिकाएँ in numerous films throughout the 1930s, अनेक of उन्हें in the western विधा.
His करियर rose to further heights in 1939, साथ John घाट 's stagecoach बनाना उसे an instant superstar.
वेन होता go on to star in 142 pictures, primarily typecast in Western films.
Among his बेहतरीन known later films हैं the शांत man ( 1952 ), which फ़ॉलो उसे as an irish-american boxer और his प्रेम affair साथ a fiery spinster played by maureen o'hara ; The Searchers ( 1956 ), in जिससे he plays a Civil War दिग्गज जो seeks आउट उसके abducted भांजी ; Rio ब्रावो ( 1959 ), playing a शेरिफ साथ Dean Martin ; सच्चा grit ( 1969 ), playing a humorous u.s. Marshal जो sets आउट to avenge a man 's death in the भूमिका कि जीती Wayne an Academy Award ; और the Shootist ( 1976 ), उसके final स्क्रीन performance in जिससे he plays an aging gunslinger battling cancer.
Wayne moved to Orange काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया in the 1960s, and was a prominent रिपब्लिकन in Hollywood, supporting anti-communist स्थितियाँ.
he died of stomach cancer in 1979.
in जून 1999, the American Film Institute नामित Wayne 13th among the Greatest Male Screen Legends of सब Time.
गैलीलियो गैलिली ( ; 15 फ़रवरी 1564 – 8 जनवरी 1642 ), थी an Italian physicist, mathematician, astronomer, और philosopher जो played a major role in the वैज्ञानिक Revolution.
उसके achievements शामिल सुधार to the telescope and consequent astronomical observations and support लिये Copernicanism.
गैलीलियो रै महरूम called the `` पिता of modern observational astronomy ``, the `` पिता of आधुनिक भौतिकी ``, the `` पिता of विज्ञान '', and `` the Father of Modern विज्ञान ''.
His योगदान to observational खगोलशास्त्र include the telescopic confirmation of the phases of शुक्र, the discovery of the four largest satellites of बृहस्पति ( named the galilean moons in his इज्ज़त ), and the अवलोकन और analysis of sunspots.
Galileo भी worked in लागू science and technology, inventing an improved military कम्पास and other यंत्र.
Galileo 's championing of heliocentrism was controversial within his lifetime, जब सबसे subscribed to either geocentrism or the tychonic system.
He met with विपक्ष इससे खगोलशास्त्रियों, जो doubted heliocentrism due to the अनुपस्थिति of an observed तारकीय parallax.
the पदार्थ was investigated by the रोमन Inquisition in 1615, और वे concluded कि it could be supported as only a सम्भावना, नहीं an स्थापित fact.
गैलीलियो बाद defended his views in संवाद concerning the दो Chief संसार Systems, जिससे appeared to attack Pope Urban VIII और thus alienated him और the jesuits, who had both supported गैलीलियो up until इस पाइंट.
he थी आजमाया by the inquisition, found `` ओजस्वी suspect of heresy '', मजबूर to recant, और खर्च the rest of his जीवन अंतर्गत house arrest.
It थी while गैलीलियो थी अंतर्गत house arrest that he wrote एक of his finest works, Two नई Sciences, in जिससे he summarised the work he था किया some forty years earlier, on the two sciences अभी पुकारा kinematics और strength of सामग्री.

प्रोटोटाइप OLED lighting फलक विकसित by lumiotec
Demonstration of a लचीली oled device
an oled ( सशुल्क light-emitting डायोड ) is a light-emitting डायोड ( led ) in which the emissive electroluminescent layer is a film of सशुल्क यौगिक which emits light in response to an electric current.
इस layer of organic सेमीकंडक्टर is situated between दो electrodes.
generally, at तनिक one of ये electrodes is transparent.
OLEDs are used to बनाएँ digital displays in डिवाइस such as television screens, कंप्यूटर मॉनीटर, पोर्टेबल प्रणालियों such as mobile phones, हैंडहेल्ड games consoles and गुस्से.
a major area of शोध is the development of श्वेत oled devices for उपयोग in solid-state lighting अनुप्रयोग.
There are two प्रमुख परिवारों of oleds : those based on छोटी molecules और those employing polymers.
Adding mobile ions to an oled creates a light-emitting electrochemical कोशिका or LEC, which has a slightly अलग विधि of operation.
oled displays can उपयोग either passive-matrix ( PMOLED ) or active-matrix संबोधित schemes.
Active-matrix oleds ( amoled ) require a thin-film ट्रांजिस्टर backplane to switch प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत pixel on or off, but allow लिये उच्चतर resolution और larger प्रदर्शक आकार.
an oled display works बगैर a backlight.
Thus, it can प्रदर्शक गहन black स्तर and can be thinner और हल्का than a द्रव क्रिस्टल प्रदर्शक ( LCD ).
in low ambient लाइट conditions ऐसे as a dark room an oled स्क्रीन can achieve a उच्चतर कंट्रास्ट ratio than an एलसीडी, whether the LCD uses ठंडा कैथोड fluorescent lamps or LED backlight.
a carton and a glass of eggnog इससे Montreal, Canada, प्रर्दशित its फ्रेंच facade ( English reverse ) और the फ्रेंच term लेत de poule ( वस्तुतः, `` hen 's milk '' )
eggnog, or egg nog, is a sweetened dairy -based पेय traditionally made with मिल्क and/or cream, शुगर, and whipped eggs ( जिससे देता it a frothy texture ).
Brandy, rum, व्हिस्की, bourbon, वोदका, or a संयोजन of liquors are often added.
The समाप्त सेवारत is often garnished with a sprinkling of मैदान दालचीनी or जायफल.
it थी also known as the अंडा milk पंच.
Eggnog is a लोकप्रिय drink throughout the United States और कनाडा, and is प्रायः associated साथ क्रिसमस.
eggnog may be added as a flavoring to food or पेय such as coffee और tea.
eggnog as a कस्टर्ड can भी be used as an ice मलाई आधार.
A pasty (, ), ( sometimes ज्ञात in ब्रिटेन as a Cornish pasty, and in the United राज्य as a pastie or अंग्रेजों pasty ) is a baked पेस्ट्री, a परंपरागत किस्में of जिससे is particularly associated with कॉर्नवॉल, the westernmost काउंटी in England.
It is made by placing uncooked filling typically of meat and vegetables, without मांस in शाकाहारी संस्करण, on a flat pastry circle and folding it to wrap the filling, crimping the किनारे to रूप a seal.
बाद बेकिंग, the result is a raised semicircular comestible.
The traditional cornish pasty, जिससे रै सुरक्षित Geographical Indication ( PGI ) औकात in Europe, is filled with beef, sliced or diced आलू, swede ( भी known as a yellow turnip or rutabaga – referred to in Cornwall as turnip ) और प्याज, seasoned with salt और pepper, and is baked.
आज, the pasty is the food most संबद्ध with कॉर्नवॉल, it is regarded as the national dish, और it accounts for 6 % of the Cornish खाना अर्थव्यवस्था.
pasties with many different fillings हैं बना ; some दुकानें specialise in selling all sorts of pasties.
the origins of the pasty are unclear, हालांकि वहीँ are many सन्दर्भ to them throughout ऐतिहासिक documents and fiction.
The pasty is now popular world-wide due to the spread of cornish miners, और variations can be मिला in Australia, the संयुक्त राज्य, मैक्सिको और elsewhere.
the ( ortho- ) sympathetic बेचैन system ( SNS ) is one of three major parts of the autonomic बेचैन प्रणाली : the अन्य होने the enteric and parasympathetic systems.
Its general कार्रवाई is to mobilize the देह 's बेचैन प्रणाली fight-or-flight जवाब.
It is, however, constantly active at a basic level to maintain homeostasis.
सुरक्षित Digital or ( sd ) is a non-volatile memory card स्वरूप for उपयोग in पोर्टेबल devices, ऐसे as mobile phones, डिजिटल cameras, GPS नेविगेशन डिवाइस, and tablet कंप्यूटर.
the सुरक्षित Digital मानक is maintained by the sd कार्ड Association ( sda ).
sd technologies have महरूम implemented in अधिक than 400 brands across दर्जनों of उत्पाद categories और more than 8,000 मॉडल.
the Secure डिजिटल format शामिल चार card families available in three अलग रूप कारकों.
the चार परिवारों हैं the असली standard-capacity ( SDSC ), the high-capacity ( sdhc ), the eXtended-Capacity ( sdxc ), और the sdio, जिससे combines input/output functions with आंकड़ा भंडार.
The तीन रूप कारकों are the original आकार, the `` मिनी '' आकार, और the `` micro '' आकार ( see उदाहरण ).
There are अनेक combinations of form factors और device families.
electrically passive adapters allow the उपयोग of a छोटी card in a host यंत्र built to hold a larger कार्ड.
मेजबान devices that comply साथ newer versions of the specification provide पिछड़ा संगतता और accept older sd cards, but इस आलेख explains several factors कि can prevent the उपयोग of a newer sd card:
a नए कार्ड may प्रस्ताव greater क्षमता than the host device can हैंडल.
A newer card may use a संचिका प्रणाली the मेजबान यंत्र can not navigate.
उपयोग of an SDIO कार्ड requires the मेजबान device be designed for the input/output functions the कार्ड provides.
The संगठन of the कार्ड थी बदला starting with the sdhc परिवार.
कुछ vendors produced SDSC ताश above 1 gb पहले the sda था मानकीकृत a विधि of doing so.
the sda uses अनेक trademarked logos to enforce अनुपालन with इसके specifications और assure उपयोक्ता of compatibility.

Daniel लॉरेंस Whitney ( born फ़रवरी 17, 1963 ) best known by his stage name and अक्षर लैरी the केबल Guy, is an American stand-up comedian, actor, देश music कलाकार, आवाज़ actor, and former radio व्यक्तित्व.
He was एक of the members of the Blue Collar कॉमेडी Tour, a comedy troupe which शामिल विधेयक Engvall, Ron श्वेत, और Jeff Foxworthy ( साथ whom he रै स्ट्रक्चर on ब्लू Collar TV ).
व्हिटनी रै released seven comedy एल्बम, of जिससे three have been certified gold by the RIAA for शिपमेंट of 500,000 copies.
in जोड, he has स्ट्रक्चर in three ब्लू Collar कॉमेडी Tour-related movies, as well as in the films लैरी the केबल guy : Health इंस्पेक्टर, Delta तमाशा, and witless Protection, as खूब as voicing मेटर in the गाड़ियाँ franchise.
व्हिटनी 's catchphrase : `` Git-R-Done ! '' is भी the title of his book.
on January 26, 2010, the TV चैनल History घोषित that it थी ordering a श्रेणी starring व्हिटनी called Only in America with लैरी the केबल Guy, in जिससे he would explore the देश और immerse खुद in अलग lifestyles, jobs, और शौक.
the पहला एपीसोड of the श्रेणी aired on February 8, 2011.
विटामिन d is a समूह of fat-soluble secosteroids जिम्मेदार for intestinal अवशोषण of calcium and फास्फेट.
In humans, the most महत्वपूर्ण सम्बन्धित compounds of vitamin D हैं vitamin d2 और vitamin d3.
cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) and ergocalciferol ( vitamin d2 ) हैं unique as they constitute कया we know as vitamin D and can be ingested from the diet and/or पूरक.
The body can also synthesize विटामिन d ( from कोलेस्ट्रॉल ) जब सूर्य एक्सपोज़र is पर्याप्त ( hence its उपनाम, the `` सनशाइन विटामिन '' ).
Although vitamin d is commonly पुकारा a विटामिन, it is not दरअसल an अनिवार्य dietary विटामिन in the सख्त भाव, as it can be synthesized in पर्याप्त amounts by सबसे स्तनधारियों exposed to धूप.
( Cats and कुत्तो can नहीं synthesize विटामिन d efficiently और must प्राप्त it in their diet. )
an सशुल्क रासायनिक यौगिक ( or related set of यौगिकों ) is तभी scientifically पुकारा a vitamin जब it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism, and जरूर be obtained इससे their आहार.
however, as साथ अन्य compounds commonly पुकारा विटामिन, vitamin D थी खोजा in an effort to ढूँढें the dietary substance that थी lacking in a बीमारी, namely, rickets, the childhood form of osteomalacia.
additionally, जैसे other compounds called विटामिन, in the developed world विटामिन D is added to staple भोजन, ऐसे as मिल्क, to avoid बीमारी due to कमियां.
उपायों of सीरम levels reflect endogenous synthesis इससे एक्सपोज़र to sunlight as खूब as intake इससे the diet, और it is believed that synthesis may contribute generally to the मेंटेनेंस of adequate serum एकाग्रता.
the प्रमाण indicates कि the संश्लेषण of विटामिन d from सूर्य एक्सपोज़र works in a प्रतिक्रिया लूप that रोकता toxicity but, because of uncertainty परिचय the कर्कट risk from धूप, no सुझाव are जारी by the संस्थान of Medicine, यूएसए, लिये the राशि of sun exposure required to मिलें vitamin D आवश्यकताएँ.
Accordingly, the Dietary सन्दर्भ Intakes for विटामिन D assume कि no synthesis occurs and कि all of a व्यक्ति 's vitamin d is इससे उनके आहार, हालांकि कि होगा rarely occur in practice.
In the जिगर vitamin D is परिवर्तित to calcidiol, which is also known as calcifediol ( INN ), 25-hydroxycholecalciferol, or 25-hydroxyvitamin d—abbreviated 25 ( OH ) d ; और जिससे is the विशिष्ट विटामिन d metabolite कि is measured in serum to determine a व्यक्ति 's vitamin D status.
भाग of the calcidiol is परिवर्तित by the गुर्दे to calcitriol, the biologically क्रियाशील रूप of विटामिन D. Calcitriol circulates as a hormone in the blood, regulating the concentration of calcium और phosphate in the bloodstream और promoting the healthy विकास और remodeling of अस्थि.
calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol बाहर of the गुर्दे लिये अन्य purposes, such as the अप्रसार, differentiation और apoptosis of cells ; calcitriol also affects neuromuscular फलन and सूजन.
परे its उपयोग to prevent osteomalacia or rickets, the प्रमाण for अन्य स्वास्थ्य प्रभाव of विटामिन d supplementation in the general जनसांख्यिकी is असंगत.
the best प्रमाण of benefit is for अस्थि स्वास्थ्य और a घटी in मृत्यु in बुजुर्ग women.
Standard form of the आवधिक तालिका.
The रंगों represent अलग श्रेणी of तत्व समझाया नीचे.
The आवधिक तालिका is a tabular प्रदर्शक of the रासायनिक तत्व, व्यवस्थित on the आधार of their atomic numbers, इलेक्ट्रॉन configurations, और recurring chemical properties.
Elements हैं प्रस्तुत in order of increasing परमाणु क्रमांक ( क्रमांक of protons ).
the standard रूप of तालिका comprises an 18 × 7 grid or main देह of तत्व, positioned ऊपर a smaller double पंक्ति of तत्व.
the table can also be deconstructed into चार rectangular blocks : the s-block to the left, the p-block to the right, the d-block in the मध्य, and the f-block नीचे that.
The पंक्ति of the तालिका are called periods ; the columns of the s-, d-, and p-blocks हैं पुकारा groups, साथ some of these having names ऐसे as the हैलोजन्स or the noble gases.
चूंकि, by परिभाषा, a periodic table incorporates recurring रुझान, कोई such table can be प्रयुक्त to derive relationships between the गुण of the तत्व and भविष्यवाणी the properties of new, yet to be discovered or synthesized, तत्व.
as a result, a periodic table—whether in the मानक रूप or कुछ अन्य variant—provides a उपयोगी फ्रेमवर्क लिये analyzing रासायनिक behavior, and such टेबल हैं widely used in chemistry and अन्य sciences.
Although precursors मौजूद, Dmitri mendeleev is generally credited साथ the publication, in 1869, of the पहला widely पहचाना आवधिक table.
He विकसित उसके तालिका to illustrate periodic रुझान in the गुण of the then-known elements.
mendeleev also पूर्वानुमानित some गुण of then-unknown elements that होता be expected to fill gaps in this तालिका.
सबसे of उसके पूर्वानुमान यहूद proved correct when the तत्व in question यहूद subsequently discovered.
Mendeleev 's आवधिक तालिका has चूंकि been विस्तारित and refined with the discovery or संश्लेषण of further नई elements और the विकास of नई theoretical मॉडल to बताइये chemical बर्ताव.
सब elements from atomic संख्याएँ 1 ( हाइड्रोजन ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have been खोजा or synthesized.
the elements from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have महरूम found to exist naturally, although some हैं मिला तभी in trace amounts और यहूद initially discovered by synthesis in laboratories.
the तत्व बाद 98 have only महरूम synthesized in laboratories.
उत्पादन of elements beyond ununoctium is being धड़ा, with the सवाल of कैसा the periodic तालिका may need to be modified to accommodate कोई ऐसे additions being a पदार्थ of जारी debate.
numerous सिंथेटिक radionuclides of naturally occurring तत्व have भी been उत्पादित in laboratories.
Minimum मजदूरी by u.S. राज्य और u.S. territory ( American Samoa, Guam, Puerto Rico, Virgin आइलैंड्स ), as of Jan. 1, 2013.
in the संयुक्त States, workers हैं generally हकदार to be paid no कम than the statutory minimum wage.
the federal सरकारी mandates a देशभर minimum मजदूरी स्तर of $ 7.25 per घंटा, while some states and municipalities have नियत minimum मजदूरी levels higher than the federal level, साथ the highest राज्य न्यूनतम wage being $ 9.19 per घंटा in Washington as of 2013.
among those paid by the hour in 2012, 1.6 million यहूद reported as earning exactly the prevailing संघीय न्यूनतम wage.
About 2.0 million were reported as कमाई मजदूरी नीचे the न्यूनतम.
Together, these 3.6 million workers with मजदूरी at or नीचे the न्यूनतम बना up 4.7 percent of सब hourly-paid workers.
A चयन of bourbons and Tennessee whiskeys offered at a liquor स्टोर in decatur, जॉर्जिया
evan Williams bourbon whiskey
Bourbon whiskey is a प्रकार of American whiskey – a barrel-aged आसुत स्पिरिट made primarily इससे मकई.
The नाम of the spirit derives from its historical संघ with an क्षेत्रफल ज्ञात as बूढ़ा Bourbon, around what is now bourbon काउंटी, केंटकी ( जिससे, in turn, थी named बाद the फ्रेंच House of Bourbon royal family ).
It रै महरूम उत्पादित चूंकि the 18th century.
जबकि it may be बना anywhere in the संयुक्त राज्य, it is strongly संबद्ध with the American South in सामान्य, और केंटकी in particular.
The Mona लिसा ( La Gioconda or La Joconde ) is a half-length portrait of a स्त्री by the इतालवी artist लियोनार्डो da Vinci, which has been acclaimed as `` the बेहतरीन known, the most visited, the most written about, the most सुंग about, the most parodied work of art in the world. ''
The पेंटिंग, thought to be a पोर्ट्रेट of Lisa Gherardini, the wife of Francesco डेल giocondo, is in आयल on a poplar फलक, and is believed to have been चित्रित between 1503 and 1506.
It was acquired by किंग फ्रांसिस i of फ़्रांस and is अभी the property of the French Republic, on permanent प्रदर्शक at the musée du louvre in Paris since 1797.
The ambiguity of the विषय 's expression, which is frequently वर्णित as enigmatic, the monumentality of the composition, the हल्का modeling of forms and the वायुमंडलीय illusionism यहूद novel qualities that have contributed to the continuing fascination and पढ़ाई of the कार्य.
रॉबर्ट Allen पामर ( 19 January 1949 – 26 सितंबर 2003 ), थी an अंग्रेज़ी singer-songwriter and संगीतकार.
He was ज्ञात लिये his distinctive आवाज़ and the eclectic mix of musical styles on उसके albums, combining आत्मा, jazz, चट्टान, पॉप, रेगी और ब्लूज़.
he found कामयाबी दोनो in उसके सोलो करियर and in the musical अधिनियम The शक्ति Station, और था शीर्ष 10 गीतों in दोनो the UK और the us.
His iconic music videos by टेरेंस डोनोवन लिये the hits `` आदी to Love `` और `` Simply Irresistible `` featured identically वेश dancing महिलाओं साथ पाले चेहरों, अंधेरा eye मेकअप and bright red लिपस्टिक, which resembled the women in the art of पैट्रिक nagel, an कलाकार लोकप्रिय in the 1980s.
Sharp-suited, his भागीदारी in the म्यूज़िक उद्योग commenced in the 1960s, covered five दशकों और शामिल a spell साथ सिरका जो.
पामर प्राप्त a क्रमांक of awards throughout उसके करियर, including two Grammy पुरस्कार for बेहतरीन Male Rock Vocal Performance, an एमटीवी Video म्यूज़िक Award, and was twice nominated for the ब्रिट पुरस्कार for Best अंग्रेजों Male.
computed tomography angiography ( cta ) is a computed tomography technique प्रयुक्त to visualize arterial and venous vessels throughout the देह.
This सीमाएँ इससे धमनियों सेवारत the दिमाग to those bringing रक्त to the lungs, kidneys, arms और टाँगे.
