prise de la Bastille by jean-pierre-louis-laurent houel
bastille Day is the name दिए in english-speaking देशों to the French National दिन, which is मनाये on the 14th of July each साल.
In फ़्रांस, it is formally पुकारा la Fête nationale ( ; The National Celebration ) and commonly le quatorze juillet ( ; the fourteenth of July ).
It commemorates the 1790 fête de la Fédération, आयोजित on the पहला वर्षगांठ of the storming of the Bastille on 14 जुलाई 1789 ; the anniversary of the storming of the Bastille fortress-prison was देखी as a प्रतीक of the uprising of the आधुनिक nation, और of the reconciliation of all the फ्रेंच अंदर the संवैधानिक monarchy जिससे preceded the पहला Republic, during the French Revolution.
festivities और official ceremonies are held सब over फ़्रांस.
the oldest and largest नियमित military parade in यूरोपीय is held on the morning of 14 जुलाई, on the Champs-Élysées avenue in पेरिस in front of the अध्यक्ष of the Republic, French officials और विदेशी अतिथि.
The United States of America ( USA or U.S.A. ), commonly पुकारा the United राज्य ( us or U.S. ) or अमेरिका, is a federal republic consisting of पचास राज्य और a federal ज़िला.
the निम्नतर forty-eight संलग्न states और the संघीय ज़िला of वॉशिंगटन, D.C. are in सेंट्रल North अमेरिका between Canada और Mexico.
the राज्य of अलास्का is west of Canada और ईस्ट of Russia across the Bering Strait, और the राज्य of हवाई is in the mid-North प्रशांत.
The देश भी रै पाँच populated और नौ unpopulated territories in the Pacific और the caribbean.
At 3.79 लाख वर्गाकार मील ( 9.83 लाख km2 ) and with around 315 लाख people, the संयुक्त राज्य is the third- or fourth-largest देश by कुल area and the third-largest by both land area और जनसांख्यिकी.
It is एक of the संसार 's most ethnically diverse and multicultural राष्ट्र, the product of large-scale immigration इससे many देशों.
the भूगोल and climate of the u.S. is भी extremely विविध, साथ रेगिस्तान, plains, वनों, and mountains that are home to a चौड़ी variety of species.
paleoindians migrated इससे एशिया to what is now the United States मेनलैंड around 15,000 years ago.
After 1500, Old संसार diseases introduced by Europeans greatly घटाया उनके populations.
European colonization began around 1600 और आए ज़्यादातर from इंग्लैण्ड.
The United राज्य उभरा इससे thirteen British colonies located along the अटलांटिक seaboard.
Disputes between ग्रेट ब्रिटेन and the American colonies led to the अमरीकी Revolution.
on July 4, 1776, delegates इससे the 13 colonies unanimously जारी the घोषणा of Independence, जिससे established the संयुक्त States of America.
the American क्रांतिकारी War, which ended with the recognition of independence of the संयुक्त राज्य इससे the Kingdom of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, थी the first कामयाब युद्ध of independence against a यूरोपीय औपनिवेशिक साम्राज्य.
the वर्तमान Constitution थी अपनाया on सितंबर 17, 1787 ; twenty-seven Amendments have चूंकि महरूम added to the संविधान.
the first टेन amendments, collectively named the Bill of अधिकारों, were ratified in 1791 और guarantee many fundamental सिविल अधिकारों and freedoms.
Driven by the doctrine of manifest नियति, the United राज्य embarked on a vigorous expansion across North अमेरिका throughout the 19th century.
इस शामिल displacing native जनजातियों, acquiring नई territories, और gradually admitting new राज्य.
The American सिविल War ended legalized गुलामी in the संयुक्त States.
By the समाप्त of the उन्नीसवीं सदी, the United States विस्तारित into the प्रशांत समंदर, and its अर्थव्यवस्था was the संसार 's largest.
The Spanish–American War और confirmed the country 's औकात as a global military power.
the संयुक्त States उभरा इससे as a वैश्विक महाशक्ति, the first देश साथ nuclear हथियार, और a permanent member of the संयुक्त Nations सुरक्षा Council.
the समाप्त of the ठंडा War और the dissolution of the सोवियत संघ बाएँ the United राज्य as the एकमात्र superpower.
the संयुक्त राज्य is a विकसित देश and has the world 's largest national अर्थव्यवस्था, with an अनुमानित 2012 जीडीपी of $ 15.6 trillion 19 % of global जीडीपी at purchasing-power पैरिटी, as of 2011.
The प्रति capita GDP of the U.S. थी the world 's sixth-highest as of 2010, although अमेरिका 's wealth असमानता was also क्रमित उच्चतम among OECD countries by the World Bank.
the अर्थव्यवस्था is fueled by an प्रचुरता of natural resources, a well-developed infrastructure, and ऊँची उत्पादकता ; और while its अर्थव्यवस्था is माना post-industrial it continues to be one of the संसार 's largest निर्माताओं.
The देश खाते लिये 39 % of वैश्विक सैन्य spending, और is a अग्रणी आर्थिक, राजनैतिक, और cultural फ़ोर्स in the world, as well as a leader in वैज्ञानिक research और technological नवीनता.
The NCAA मेन 's प्रभाग i Basketball चैंपियनशिप is a single-elimination tournament निभाई each वसन्त in the United राज्य, फिलहाल featuring 68 college basketball टीमों, to determine the national चैंपियनशिप of the major कॉलेज बास्केट टीमों.
the टूर्नामेंट, व्यवस्थित by the National Collegiate Athletic संघ ( ncaa ), थी created दौरान 1939 by the नेशनल Association of बास्केट कोच, और थी the विचार of ओहियो राज्य University कोच हेरोल्ड olsen.
Played ज़्यादातर during March, it is known informally as March दीवानगी or the Big Dance, और has become one of the most प्रसिद्ध सालाना sporting कार्यक्रम in the संयुक्त राज्य.
the NCAA has credited bob Walsh of the सिएटल आयोजन कमेटी लिये starting the कूच दीवानगी celebration दौरान 1984.
the tournament टीमों include champions इससे 31 प्रभाग i conferences ( which प्राप्त automatic बोलियों ), and 37 teams जिससे हैं awarded at-large berths.
These `` at-large '' टीमों हैं चुनी by an NCAA चयन committee, as विस्तृत नीचे.
the 64 टीमों are विभाजित into four regions and organized into a single elimination `` कोष्ठक '', which predetermines, when a team विन्स a खेल, जिससे team it will फेस अगला.
Each टोली is `` seeded '', or ranked, within its region.
After an initial चार खेल between आठ lower-ranked टीमों, the tournament occurs during the कोर्स of तीन weekends, at pre-selected न्यूट्रल साइट around the संयुक्त राज्य.
lower-ranked teams are लगाई in the कोष्ठक विरूद्ध higher ranked teams.
Each वीकेंड eliminates three-fourths of the teams, from a गोलाकार of 64, to a `` मीठी सोलह '', और for the पिछला weekend of the टूर्नामेंट a फाइनल चार ; the फाइनल Four is usually निभाई during the पहला वीकेंड of April.
ये four teams, एक from प्रत्येक region, then compete in एक location for the नेशनल championship.
the tournament has महरूम at तनिक partially televised since 1969.
presently, the games are reported by सीबीएस, tbs, टीएनटी, और trutv by the trade-name NCAA March Madness.
चूंकि 2011, सब खेल हैं available for देखने nationwide.
as television coverage has grown, so too has the tournament 's लोकप्रियता.
Presently, लाखो of अमेरिकी `` भरण आउट a कोष्ठक '', predicting winners of all 67 खेल.
With 11 national शीर्षक, ucla has the रिकार्ड for the सबसे ncaa मेन 's प्रभाग I Basketball championships ; John लकड़ी coached UCLA to 10 of its 11 titles.
The University of Kentucky is second, साथ 8 national शीर्षक, जबकि इंडियाना University and the University of North Carolina हैं tied for तीसरा with 5 national शीर्षक.
ड्यूक University ranks fifth with 4 national शीर्षक.
A sample of synthetic motor oil
सिंथेटिक आयल is a स्नेहक consisting of chemical यौगिकों कि are artificially बना ( synthesized ).
सिंथेटिक lubricants can be manufactured using chemically modified petroleum components बल्कि than पूरे crude आयल, लकिन can also be synthesized from अन्य कच्चा सामग्री.
सिंथेटिक oil is प्रयुक्त as a substitute लिये स्नेहक refined इससे petroleum जब operating in extremes of temperature, because, in general, it provides श्रेष्ठ mechanical और chemical properties than those found in traditional खनिज oils.
वायुयान जेट इंजन, for example, require the उपयोग of सिंथेटिक oils, whereas वायुयान पिस्टन इंजन do नहीं.
Jackass is an American वास्तविकता series, originally दिखाया on MTV from 2000 to 2002, featuring people performing various खतरनाक, crude self-injuring स्टंट and pranks.
the दिखाएँ served as a launchpad for the television and एक्टिंग careers of bam Margera, Steve-O, और also Johnny Knoxville, जो previously had तभी a few minor एक्टिंग roles.
चूंकि 2002, तीन बेवकूफ़ films have महरूम produced and released by MTV कॉरपोरेट sibling Paramount तस्वीरें, continuing the franchise after इसके चलाएं on टेलीविज़न.
the दिखाएँ sparked several spin-offs including चिरायु la Bam, wildboyz, homewrecker, dr. Steve-O और blastazoid.
the दिखाएँ placed # 68 on entertainment साप्ताहिक `` New tv Classics '' सूची.
Roseanne Cherrie barr ( born November 3, 1952 ) is an अमरीकी actress, comedienne, writer, टेलीविज़न producer, director, and 2012 अध्यक्षीय nominee of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया -आधारd Peace और स्वतंत्रता पार्टी.
barr began उसके करियर in stand-up comedy at clubs before gaining कीर्ति लिये her role in the sitcom Roseanne.
The दिखाएँ was a hit और lasted नौ seasons, from 1988 to 1997.
वो जीती दोनो an Emmy and a Golden Globe पुरस्कार for Best अभिनेत्री लिये her work on the दिखाएँ.
Barr था crafted a `` fierce working-class घरेलू goddess '' persona in the eight years preceding उसके sitcom and wanted to do a यथार्थवादी दिखाएँ about a दमदार माँ who was not a शिकार of patriarchal consumerism.
The granddaughter of immigrants from Europe and Russia, Barr was the oldest of चार children in a working-class यहूदी Salt झील City परिवार ; वो was also क्रियाशील in the LDS Church.
In 1974, she शादीशुदा Bill pentland, with जिसको वो had तीन children, पहले divorcing in 1990 और marrying comedian Tom अर्नाल्ड लिये four सालो.
विवाद arose when वो sang `` the star-spangled Banner `` off-key at a 1990 nationally aired baseball game, followed by grabbing her crotch और spitting.
बाद उसके sitcom ended, she शुभारम्भ उसके अपना बात show, the roseanne दिखाएँ, जिससे aired इससे 1998 to 2000.
in 2005, वो returned to stand-up कॉमेडी साथ a world tour.
in 2011, she starred in an unscripted tv दिखाएँ, roseanne 's Nuts, that lasted from जुलाई to सितंबर of कि साल, परिचय her life on a हवाई farm.
In जल्दी 2012, Barr घोषित her उम्मीदवारी लिये the अध्यक्षीय नामांकन of the ग्रीन Party.
barr lost the nomination to Jill स्टीन.
She तब sought the अध्यक्षीय nomination of the सलाम और Freedom पार्टी, जिससे she won on अगस्त 4, 2012.
barr received 61,971 मत in the general election, रखकर छठे overall.
Francesco albani 's 17th सदी Baptism of Christ is a ठेठ चित्रण साथ the आसमान opening and the Holy Spirit descending as a dove.
The baptism of Jesus marks the शुरूआत of उसके public मंत्रालय.
This event is अंकित in the canonical gospels of Matthew, चिह्नित and ल्यूक.
John 's इन्जील does not describe Jesus ' baptism, but John the बैपटिस्ट does गवाही of the अन्य बाते in.
in the नई वसीयत, जॉन the बैपटिस्ट preached the baptism of repentance लिये the remission of sins ( ), और घोषित खुद a forerunner of he कि would baptize `` with the Holy Ghost and साथ fire '' ( ).
In so doing he was preparing the way for यीशु.
यीशु आए to the Jordan River जहाँ he was baptized by जॉन.
The baptismal झाँकी शामिल the आकाश opening, a dove-like descent of the Holy स्पिरिट, और a voice इससे heaven saying, `` इस is my beloved बेटे, in whom I am खूब प्रसन्न. ''
Most modern विद्वानों दृश्य the fact that Jesus was baptized by John as an historical event to which a high degree of certainty can be आबंटित.
Along with the crucifixion of यीशु most विद्वानों view it as one of the दो historically निश्चित तथ्य about उसे, and often उपयोग it as the starting points for the पढ़ाई of the historical Jesus.
the baptism is one of the five major माइलस्टोन in the इन्जील narrative of the जीवन of यीशु, the others होने the Transfiguration, Crucifixion, क़यामत, and Ascension.
Most Christian denominations view the बपतिस्मा of Jesus as an महत्वपूर्ण event और a basis लिये the ईसाई रीति of बपतिस्मा ( देखिए also ).
In पूर्वी christianity, यीशु ' baptism is commemorated on 6 January, the feast of epiphany.
In the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर, the anglican नियाज़, the Lutheran Churches और कुछ other पश्चिमी denominations, it is recalled on a दिन within the following सप्ताह, the feast of the बपतिस्मा of the रब.
in रोमन Catholicism, the baptism of यीशु is one of the Luminous Mysteries sometimes added to the Rosary.
it is a Trinitarian feast in the Eastern Orthodox Churches.
Methylcobalamin ( दिखाया ) is a रूप of vitamin b12.
physically it resembles the other forms of विटामिन b12, occurring as अंधेरा रेड crystals that freely form cherry-colored transparent समाधान in जल.
Vitamin b12, विटामिन B12 or विटामिन B-12, भी पुकारा cobalamin, is a water-soluble विटामिन साथ a key भूमिका in the सामान्य functioning of the brain and बेचैन प्रणाली, and लिये the गठन of blood.
it is एक of the eight B विटामिन.
It is normally involved in the चयापचय of every कोशिका of the इंसान देह, especially affecting DNA संश्लेषण और विनियमन, लकिन also fatty एसिड synthesis and energy production.
neither fungi, plants, nor पशु हैं capable of producing vitamin b12.
Only bacteria and आर्किया have the enzymes required लिये its संश्लेषण, हालांकि many foods हैं a प्राकृतिक source of b12 because of बैक्टीरियल symbiosis.
The विटामिन is the largest और most structurally complicated vitamin और can be उत्पादित industrially only through bacterial fermentation-synthesis.
Vitamin b12 consists of a क्लास of chemically related compounds ( vitamers ), सब of जिससे have vitamin activity.
it contains the biochemically विरल element कोबाल्ट.
Biosynthesis of the basic structure of the विटामिन is accomplished तभी by bacteria ( which प्रायः produce hydroxocobalamin ), लकिन conversion between different फ़ॉर्म of the vitamin can be संपन्नता in the इंसान body.
a आम semi-synthetic रूप of the vitamin, cyanocobalamin, करता not occur in प्रकृति, लकिन is produced from बैक्टीरियल hydroxocobalamin और then प्रयुक्त in अनेक दवाएँ and पूरक, and as a food additive, because of इसके स्थिरता और निम्नतर production cost.
In the body it is परिवर्तित to the इंसान physiological forms methylcobalamin और adenosylcobalamin, leaving पीछे the cyanide, albeit in minimal concentration.
More recently, hydroxocobalamin, methylcobalamin, and adenosylcobalamin can be मिला in more expensive pharmacological products और खाना supplements.
the अतिरिक्त utility of these is currently debated.
विटामिन b12 थी खोजा इससे its संबंध to the बीमारी pernicious रक्ताल्पता, which is an असंक्राम्य disease in which parietal cells of the stomach जिम्मेदार लिये secreting intrinsic factor are destroyed.
Intrinsic factor is crucial लिये the सामान्य absorption of B12, so a lack of मूलभूत फ़ैक्टर, as seen in घातक रक्ताल्पता, कल्याणकारी a विटामिन B12 कमियां.
अनेक अन्य subtler kinds of विटामिन b12 कमियां and उनके biochemical प्रभाव have चूंकि been elucidated.
Full मेटल जैकेट is a 1987 war फिल्मी produced, निर्देशित और co-written by Stanley Kubrick.
It is an अनुकूलन of Gustav Hasford 's 1979 novel the short-timers and सितारों Matthew modine, विंसेंट d'onofrio, R. ली ermey, Arliss हावर्ड, और Adam baldwin.
The फिल्मी फ़ॉलो a platoon of u.S. Marines through their training and the experiences of two of the platoon 's marines in the Tet अप्रिय दौरान the Vietnam युद्ध.
the film 's title refers to the full मेटल jacket bullet प्रयुक्त by infantry riflemen.
the film प्राप्त नाजुक acclaim.
it received an Academy Award नामांकन लिये Best Adapted पटकथा for Kubrick, माइकल Herr and Gustav Hasford.
in 2001, the American Film Institute लगाई Full Metal जैकेट at # 95 in उनके `` AFI 's 100 सालो... 100 thrills `` poll.
TMZ is a हस्ती news जालस्थल that debuted on नवम्बर 8, 2005.
it was a सहयोग between AOL और telepictures Productions, a division of Warner Bros., until Time Warner divested एओएल in 2009.
however, it remained affiliated with एओएल News and रै the एओएल न्यूज logo affixed in the upper right corner.
The name tmz स्टैंड लिये the historic `` स्टुडियो मण्डल `` or 30-mile zone radius from the चौराहे of वेस्ट Beverly boulevard and उत्तर La Cienega Boulevard in Los Angeles.
tmz 's managing editor is Harvey levin, a lawyer-turned-journalist who थी previously a legal विशेषज्ञ लिये the Los एंजिल्स टेलीविज़न station KCBS-TV.
the साईट claims कि it does नहीं अदा for कहानियां or interviews ; however, Levin रै admitted कि tmz does `` sometimes pay sources लिये leads on stories ''.
Levin रै stated that `` everything is शोधकार्य और vetted for सटीकता. ''
a साथी tv series, tmz on TV, debuted on September 10, 2007.
चीख 3 is a 2000 अमरीकी slasher फिल्मी created by केविन विलियमसन, निर्देशित by वेस Craven और written by Ehren क्रूगर, अभिनीत Neve कैम्पबेल, Courteney कॉक्स arquette and David Arquette.
it थी released on फ़रवरी 4, 2000 as the third किश्त in the Scream film series.
the कार्यक्रम of the story are set तीन years बाद those of Scream 2 और follows sidney प्रेस्कॉट ( Campbell ) जो रै गए into self-imposed अलगाव following the events of the पिछला दो films but is drawn to Hollywood बाद a new Ghostface begins हत्या the cast of the film भीतर a film `` Stab 3 ''.
Scream 3 combines the हिंसा of the slasher genre साथ comedy और `` whodunit `` mystery जबकि satirizing the cliché of film trilogies.
Unlike the previous Scream films, there was an increased जोर on comedic elements and the हिंसा and हॉरर was घटाया in response to increased पब्लिक scrutiny about हिंसा in मीडिया following the Columbine ऊँची School नरसंहार.
the फिल्मी was the concluding chapter of the चीख series जबतक it was revived साथ a sequel, चीख 4, in 2011.
विलियमसन provided a five-page रूपरेखा लिये दो sequels to चीख जब auctioning his असली स्क्रिप्ट, hoping to entice bidders with the potential of खरीदे a मताधिकार.
Williamson 's प्रतिज्ञाओं to other प्रोजेक्ट meant he was असमर्थ to develop a complete script लिये चीख 3 and लिखने कर्तव्य यहूद undertaken by Ehren Kruger जो discarded much of विलियमसन 's notes.
craven और मार्को Beltrami लौटे to सीधा और स्कोर the film क्रमशः as they had with the previous two श्रेणी प्रविष्टियां.
Production थी troubled साथ script rewrites, साथ pages sometimes तभी ready on the दिन of filming, और scheduling difficulties साथ the main डाल.
चीख 3 performed दोनो financially और critically बदतर than इसके preceding films, कमाई over $ 161 लाख and with many आलोचकों claiming that the film had become what चीख originally `` spoofed ``.
Despite ऋणात्मक criticism the फिल्मी किया receive praise साथ reviewers कॉलिंग it the perfect समाप्त to the चीख trilogy.
as of 2012, the फिल्मी is currently the क्रमांक 3 highest-grossing slasher-film in उत्तर America, following चीख at क्रमांक 1 और Scream 2 at number 2.
The film 's soundtrack थी well-received, spending चौदह सप्ताह on the बिलबोर्ड 200 and reaching a ऊँची of # 32.
कंधे impingement syndrome, also called painful arc syndrome, supraspinatus सिंड्रोम, तैराक 's कंधे, और thrower 's shoulder, is a clinical syndrome जिससे occurs जब the tendons of the rotator cuff muscles become irritated and inflamed as they pass through the subacromial space, the ड्योढ़ी beneath the acromion.
इस can परिणाम in पीड़ा, कमज़ोरी और loss of गति at the कंधे.

the colonial इतिहास of the संयुक्त States कवर the इतिहास of European settlements from the प्रारंभ of colonization of America जबतक their incorporation into the United राज्य.
In the लेट 16th century, England, France, Spain और the Netherlands शुभारम्भ प्रमुख colonization programs in eastern उत्तर अमेरिका.
Small जल्दी attempts—such as the अंग्रेज़ी खोया Colony of roanoke —often disappeared ; everywhere the death रेट of the पहला arrivals was बहुत ऊँची.
nevertheless successful colonies यहूद established.
यूरोपीय settlers came इससे a किस्में of सोशल and religious groups.
No aristocrats settled permanently, लकिन a क्रमांक of adventurers, soldiers, किसानो, and tradesmen arrived.
Diversity was an American characteristic as the Dutch of New Netherland, the Swedes and finns of नई Sweden, the English Quakers of पेन्सिलवेनिया, the अंग्रेज़ी puritans of New इंग्लैण्ड, the English settlers of jamestown, and the `` worthy ग़रीब '' of जॉर्जिया, came to the new महाद्वीप and built colonies with distinctive सोशल, religious, political and आर्थिक styles.
occasionally एक colony took control of another ( दौरान wars between their यूरोपीय अभिभावक ).
Only in Nova स्कोटिया ( now भाग of कनाडा ) did the conquerors expel the previous colonists.
बजाय they सब lived side by side in peace.
वहीँ यहूद no प्रमुख civil wars among the 13 colonies, and the two मुख्य armed rebellions ( in Virginia in 1676 और in नई York in 1689–91 ) यहूद short-lived असफलताओं.
Wars between the French and the British—the French and Indian Wars और Father rale 's युद्ध —were recurrent, and शामिल french-support for Wabanaki Confederacy attacks on the frontiers.
by 1760 फ़्रांस was defeated और the अंग्रेजों जब्त its colonies.
the four distinct regions यहूद : नई England, the मध्य Colonies, the chesapeake Bay colonies ( अपर South ) और the Lower South.
Some historians add a fifth region, the Frontier, which थी never separately organized.
By the time European settlers arrived around 1600–1650, the बहुमत of the Native Americans जीना in the eastern संयुक्त States had been decimated by new diseases, introduced to उन्हें decades before by explorers and sailors.
See समयरेखा of Colonial America लिये list of historical कार्यक्रम.
ग्लोरिया Laura वेंडरबिल्ट ( born फ़रवरी 20, 1924 ) is an अमरीकी कलाकार, author, अभिनेत्री, heiress, and socialite most noted as an early developer of पंक्तियां blue jeans.
वो is a सदस्य of the prominent वेंडरबिल्ट परिवार of New यॉर्क and the माँ of CNN 's Anderson Cooper.
यूनानियों ( Romanization of greek| ), officially the Hellenic गणतंत्र ( ' ), is a country in Southeast यूरोपीय.
according to the 2011 जनसांख्यिकी, यूनानियों 's population is around 11 million.
एथेंस is the nation 's capital और largest city, इसके शहरी area भी including piraeus.
यूनानियों is strategically located at the crossroads of Europe, Asia, the Middle East, और Africa, and रै land सीमायें साथ Albania, the Republic of मकदूनिया और Bulgaria to the north, और तुर्कों to the northeast.
the ईजियन समुद्र lies to the east of मेनलैंड यूनानियों, the आयोनियन Sea to the west, और the भूमध्यसागरीय समुद्र to the दक्षिण.
यूनानियों रै the 11th longest तटरेखा in the world at in लंबाई, featuring a विशाल क्रमांक of islands ( approximately 1,400, of which 227 हैं inhabited ), including क्रेट, the Dodecanese, the Cyclades, और the आयोनियन आइलैंड्स among अन्य.
अस्सी प्रतिशत of Greece consists of kyu, of which माउंट Olympus is the highest at.
आधुनिक यूनानियों traces इसके roots to the सभ्यता of Ancient यूनानियों, generally माना the पालना of Western सभ्यता.
As ऐसे, it is the जन्मस्थान of लोकतंत्र, Western दर्शनशास्त्र, the Olympic खेल, पश्चिमी literature and historiography, political science, major scientific and mathematical सिद्धान्त, और Western नाटक, including both tragedy और कॉमेडी.
इस विरासत is partly reflected in the seventeen UNESCO World Heritage साइट located in यूनानियों, रैंकिंग it 7th in यूरोपीय और 13th in the world.
the modern Greek state थी स्थापित in 1830, following the Greek War of स्वतंत्रता.
Greece is a founding सदस्य of the संयुक्त Nations, रै been a सदस्य of what is now the European संघ चूंकि 1981 ( and the eurozone since 2001 ), और has महरूम a सदस्य of NATO since 1952.
यूनानियों is a developed country साथ an उन्नत, high-income अर्थव्यवस्था और very high standards of living, सहित the world 's 21st उच्चतम विशेषता of जीवन as of 2010.
यूनानियों 's अर्थव्यवस्था is भी the largest in the Balkans, where Greece is an important regional investor.
A प्रधान meridian is a मध्याह्न, i.e. a लकीर of longitude, at जिससे longitude is पारिभाषित to be 0°.
A प्रधान meridian and इसके विपरीत in a 360°-system, the 180th मध्याह्न ( at 180° longitude ), form a ग्रेट वृत्त.
इस ग्रेट वृत्त divides the sphere, e.g. the धरती, into दो बांटती.
If एक uses दिशानिर्देश of East and West from a defined प्रधान meridian, तब they can be called पूर्वी गोलार्ध and Western गोलार्ध.
gerardus Mercator in उसके Atlas cosmographicae ( 1595 ) uses a prime मध्याह्न somewhere close to 25°w, passing बस to the west of Santa Maria द्वीप in the Atlantic.
His 180th मध्याह्न runs साथ the जलसन्धि of anián ( Bering जलसन्धि )
A prime meridian is ultimately arbitrary, unlike an equator, जिससे is संकल्पित by the अक्ष of rotation—and विभिन्न conventions have been used or advocated in अलग regions और throughout इतिहास.
Minka Dumont Kelly ( born minka Dumont Dufay ; जून 24, 1980 ) is an अमरीकी actress.
She is शायद बेहतरीन known for उसके roles in Charlie 's Angels, Friday रात्रि Lights, and the Roommate.
r.o.b. ( रोबोटिक ऑपरेटिंग दोस्त ), released in जापानी as the, is an accessory लिये the Nintendo entertainment System ( एनईएस ).
it was released in July 1985 in जापानी and later कि साल in North America.
It था a short उत्पाद lifespan, with support for only two games which comprised the `` रोबोट श्रेणी '' ; gyromite and Stack-Up.
R.O.B. was released with the इरादे of portraying the निन्टेंडो Entertainment System as something अनोखा in order to alleviate खुदरा fears following the वीडियो खेल crash of 1983.
r.o.b. थी उपलब्धियाँ in the डीलक्स नियत, a विन्यास लिये the console कि शामिल, among other things, R.O.B. and gyromite.
Stack-Up थी purchased separately and included its own physical खेल pieces.
The Walking स्वतंत्रता हाफ डालर was a silver 50-cent टुकड़ा or हाफ dollar सिक्का जारी by the United States Mint from 1916 to 1947 ; it थी designed by Adolph A. Weinman.
in 1915, the new मिंट निदेशक, Robert W. Woolley, came to मानना कि he थी not only अनुमत but जरूरी by विधि to replace coin designs कि had महरूम in उपयोग लिये 25 सालो.
he इसलिए began the प्रक्रम of replacing the नाई coinage : dimes, quarters और हाफ डॉलर, सब bearing similar डिजाइन by long-time मिंट Engraver चार्ल्स E. Barber, and पहला struck in 1892.
woolley था the आयोग of Fine Arts conduct a competition, as a परिणाम of जिससे weinman was चयनित to design the dime और half डालर.
weinman 's design of Liberty striding towards the Sun लिये the हाफ डालर proved difficult to perfect, और Treasury सचिव William G. mcadoo, जिनकी विभाग included the मिंट, माना having Barber बनाएँ उसके अपना डिज़ाइन.
मिंट officials were कामयाब in getting Weinman 's डिज़ाइन into उत्पादन, although it never struck very well, which may have महरूम a factor in its बदलना by the फ्रैंकलिन हाफ डालर शुरूआत in 1948.
Nevertheless, आर्ट historian कॉर्नेलियस vermeule considered the टुकड़ा to be among the सबसे beautiful us सिक्के.
Since 1986, a परिवर्धन of weinman 's obverse design has been प्रयुक्त for the अमरीकी चांदी Eagle.
The टोयोटा 4runner is a mid-size खेल यूटिलिटी vehicle ( SUV ) उत्पादित by the Japanese निर्माता Toyota and sold throughout the world from 1984 to present.
In Japan it was ज्ञात as the टोयोटा hilux लहरे.
The असली 4Runner थी a कॉम्पैक्ट SUV और छोटी more than a टोयोटा पिकअप truck साथ a fiberglass shell over the bed, लकिन the मॉडल has since undergone significant independent development into a क्रॉस between a कॉम्पैक्ट and a mid-size एसयूवी.
All 4Runners have been निर्मित at Toyota 's tahara संयंत्र in Tahara, aichi, जापानी, or at hino मोटर्स ' hamura, जापानी plant, और in ब्राज़ील.
Its mid-size क्रॉसओवर SUV counterpart is the Toyota Highlander.
This article deals साथ medicine as practiced by प्रशिक्षित पेशेवर इससे प्राचीन टाइम्स to the उपस्थित.
The प्राचीन Egyptians had a प्रणाली of medicine that was very उन्नत लिये इसके time और influenced बाद चिकित्सा traditions.
The उन्होंने और babylonians दोनो introduced the concepts of निदान, prognosis, and चिकित्सा examination.
The Greeks गई भी further, and उन्नत as खूब medical ethics.
the hippocratic Oath, स्टिल लिया by डॉक्टर today, was written in यूनानियों in the 5th सदी BCE.
In the medieval era, surgical practices inherited from the प्राचीन मास्टर्स यहूद improved and तब systematized in Rogerius 's The अभ्यास of सर्जरी.
Universities began व्यवस्थित training of physicians around the सालो 1220 in इटली.
दौरान the पुनर्जागरण, understanding of anatomy improved, and the microscope थी invented.
the रोगाणु theory of disease in the 19th century led to cures for many संक्रामक diseases.
Military doctors उन्नत the विधि of trauma treatment and सर्जरी.
Public स्वास्थ्य measures were developed especially in the 19th century as the rapid growth of शहरों जरूरी व्यवस्थित sanitary measures.
Advanced शोध centers opened in the early 20th सदी, प्रायः connected साथ प्रमुख अस्पताल.
The mid-20th century was characterized by new biological उपचार, such as एंटीबायोटिक.
ये advancements, along with developments in रसायन, आनुवंशिकी, और lab प्रौद्योगिकी ( ऐसे as the x-ray ) led to modern आयुर्विज्ञान.
आयुर्विज्ञान was heavily professionalized in the 20th सदी, और new careers opened to महिलाओं as नर्स ( from the 1870s ) और as physicians ( विशेषकर after 1970 ).
the 21st century is characterized by बहुत उन्नत research involving numerous fields of विज्ञान.
the hippocratic कॉर्पस, is a collection of जल्दी चिकित्सा works इससे प्राचीन Greece strongly associated with the प्राचीन यूनानी चिकित्सक हिपोक्रेटिस और his teachings.
Potassium is a रासायनिक element साथ प्रतीक K ( from neo-latin kalium ) और atomic क्रमांक 19.
elemental potassium is a नरम silvery-white क्षारीय metal that oxidizes rapidly in एयर और is बहुत reactive साथ water, generating sufficient heat to ignite the हाइड्रोजन emitted in the प्रतिक्रिया and burning with a lilac ज्वाला.
क्युकी पोटैशियम और सोडियम are chemically very समान, their लवण यहूद not at first differentiated.
The अस्तित्व of अनेक elements in उनके लवण थी suspected इससे 1702, और this थी सिद्ध in 1807 when potassium और sodium यहूद individually पृथक इससे different salts by electrolysis.
Potassium in nature occurs तभी in ionic लवण.
as such, it is मिला dissolved in seawater ( which is 0.04 % potassium by वज़न ), and is भाग of many minerals.
Most औद्योगिक chemical applications of potassium employ the अपेक्षाकृत ऊँची घुलनशीलता in जल of पोटैशियम compounds, such as पोटैशियम soaps.
पोटैशियम metal has only a few special applications, होने replaced in most chemical reactions साथ सोडियम मेटल.
Potassium ions are जरुरी for the function of सब जीना कोशिकाएं.
Potassium आयन diffusion is a key mechanism in तंत्रिका transmission, and पोटैशियम depletion in animals, सहित humans, results in विभिन्न हृदय डिस्फंक्शन.
Potassium accumulates in plant cells, और यूँ fresh फल और सब्जियां हैं a good dietary source of it.
Conversely, most plants except specialist halophytes are intolerant of salt, और sodium is उपस्थित in them तभी in low विशेषज्ञता.
इस resulted in पोटैशियम first होने पृथक from potash, the ashes of plants, giving the तत्व इसके नाम.
लिये the same कारण, भारी crop production rapidly depletes soils of potassium, and agricultural fertilizers consume 95 % of global potassium रासायनिक उत्पादन.
the Singapore डालर or dollar ( चिह्न : $ ; code : SGD ) is the आधिकारिक currency of सिंगापुर.
It is सामान्यतः abbreviated साथ the डालर चिह्न $, or alternatively S $ to distinguish it from other dollar -denominated currencies.
it is विभाजित into 100 सेंट.
The मौद्रिक प्राधिकार of सिंगापुर और the ब्रुनेई Currency और मौद्रिक फलक स्टिल maintain the ऐतिहासिक exchangeability of उनके दो मुद्राएँ, the singaporean dollar और the ब्रुनेई dollar, respectively.
the dollar is accepted as `` customary tender '' in Brunei according to the करेंसी interchangeability Agreement.
likewise, the ब्रुनेई dollar is customarily स्वीकृत in सिंगापुर
जेम्स Samuel Coleman ( may 12, 1926 – कूच 25, 1995 ) थी an American sociologist, theorist और empirical researcher, based chiefly at the विश्वविद्यालयों of शिकागो.
he was निर्वाचित president of the अमरीकी समाजशास्त्रीय संघ.
Coleman पढ़ाई the sociology of शिक्षा, पब्लिक policy, and was एक of the earliest उपयोक्ता of the term `` सोशल capital ``.
उसके Foundations of सोशल Theory बहकावे समाजशास्त्रीय theory.
His The adolescent समाज ( 1961 ) and `` कोलमैन रपट '' ( समता of Educational अवसर, 1966 ) यहूद two of the most heavily cited books in educational समाजशास्त्र.
the लैंडमार्क कोलमैन Report helped रूपांतरण educational सिद्धान्त, reshape नेशनल शिक्षा policies, और बहकावे पब्लिक और scholarly राय regarding the role of schooling in determining समता और उत्पादकता in the संयुक्त States.
सुपरमैन ( इससे DC कॉमिक्स ) थी the पहला सुपरहीरो created, आर्ट by जिम Lee.
A superhero ( sometimes rendered super-hero or सुपर नायिका ) is a type of stock character possessing `` असाधारण or superhuman powers '' और dedicated to protecting the public.
चूंकि the debut of the prototypical superhero सुपरमैन in 1938, कहानियां of superheroes—ranging from ब्रैड episodic adventures to continuing years-long sagas—have वर्चस्व अमरीकी comic books and crossed over into other मीडिया.
The शब्द itself तिथियाँ to at least 1917.
A मादा सुपरहीरो is sometimes called a superheroine ( also rendered super-heroine or सुपर नायिका ).
`` सुपर नायक '' is a ट्रेडमार्क co-owned by dc Comics and Marvel Comics.
By सबसे परिभाषाएं, characters do नहीं strictly require actual superhuman शक्तियां to be deemed superheroes, हालांकि शर्तें such as costumed crime सेनानी or masked vigilantes are sometimes प्रयुक्त to refer to those such as Batman और Green Arrow बगैर such शक्तियां जो share अन्य common superhero traits.
Such characters यहूद generally referred to as `` mystery men '' in the so-called सुनहरी Age of Comic किताबे to distinguish them इससे characters साथ super-powers.
सामान्यतः, superheroes उपयोग their powers to counter day-to-day अपराधों while भी combating खतरे विरूद्ध मानवता by supervillains, उनके criminal counterparts.
प्रायः, एक of these supervillains will be the सुपरहीरो 's archenemy.
As खूब, some longrunning superheroes, such as Superman, बैटमैन, Spider-Man and Iron man प्रत्येक रै a rogues gallery of enemies.
As well, superheroes sometimes will कॉम्बैट such irregular threats as aliens, magical/ fantasy entities, अमरीकी war enemies such as nazism or साम्यवादी, और godlike or demonic जीव.

The Shawshank Redemption is a 1994 American नाटक film written और directed by फ़्रैंक Darabont और अभिनीत Tim रॉबिन्स और Morgan फ्रीमैन.
Adapted from the स्टीफन किंग novella रीता Hayworth and shawshank Redemption, the film tells the स्टोरी of Andy Dufresne, a बैंकर जो खर्च nearly two decades in shawshank State Prison for the murder of उसके बीवी और her प्रेमी despite उसके claims of innocence.
During उसके समय at the थाना, he befriends a fellow inmate, Ellis Boyd `` रेड '' Redding, and पाता खुद सुरक्षित by the गार्ड बाद the warden begins using him in his धन laundering operation.
Despite a गुनगुने box office रिसेप्शन कि barely recouped इसके बजट, the फिल्मी received favorable reviews from critics, multiple award nominations, and has चूंकि enjoyed a remarkable जीवन on cable टेलीविज़न, VHS, dvd, और blu-ray.
It was शामिल in the American Film Institute 's 100 सालो... 100 फिल्मों 10th Anniversary Edition.
it management is the अनुशासन whereby सब of the technology संसाधन of a firm are managed in accordance with इसके needs और priorities.
These resources may include ठोस investments like कंप्यूटर हार्डवेयर, software, आंकड़ा, संजाल और आंकड़ा केन्द्र सुविधाएं, as खूब as the staffs जो हैं नियुक्त to maintain them.
मैनेजिंग इस जिम्मेदारी within a company entails अनेक of the मौलिक प्रबन्धन functions, like budgeting, स्टॉफ, and organizing and controlling, along साथ अन्य पहलुओं that are unique to प्रौद्योगिकी, जैसे change प्रबन्धन, तन्त्र डिज़ाइन, संजाल नियोजन, तकनीक support etc.
The penitentiary of New मैक्सिको थाना Riot, जिससे took place on फ़रवरी 2 और 3, 1980, in the state 's अधिकतम security prison south of Santa fe, was one of the सबसे violent थाना दंगे in the इतिहास of the American correctional प्रणाली : 33 inmates died and more than 200 inmates यहूद treated लिये injuries.
None of the 12 officers लिया बंधक यहूद killed, but सात were treated लिये चोटों caused by beatings and rapes.
This was the third प्रमुख riot at the NM State Penitentiary, the first occurring on 19 July 1922 और the second on 15 जून 1953.
Author Roger Morris suggests the death टोल may have been higher, as a number of लाशें यहूद incinerated or dismembered during the course of the mayhem.

the Northern Cardinal ( Cardinalis cardinalis ) is a North American bird in the genus Cardinalis ; it is also known colloquially as the redbird or common cardinal.
It can be found in दक्षिणी कनाडा, through the पूर्वी United राज्य इससे maine to Texas and दक्षिण through मैक्सिको.
It is मिला in woodlands, gardens, shrublands, and swamps.
the Northern कार्डिनल is a mid-sized songbird साथ a देह length of 21 सेंटीमीटर ( 8.3 इंच ).
it has a distinctive crest on the head और a mask on the face which is ब्लैक in the male and धूसर in the मादा.
The male is a हर्षोल्लास red, जबकि the female is a फीकी red-brown shade.
the उत्तरी कार्डिनल is mainly granivorous, लकिन भी feeds on insects और fruit.
The male behaves territorially, marking out उसके territory साथ सोंग.
दौरान प्रेमालाप, the male फ़ीड्स बीज to the मादा beak-to-beak.
a क्लच of three to चार अंडे is laid, और दो to चार चंगुल हैं उत्पादित प्रत्येक year.
it was once prized as a pet, but इसके बिक्री as cage birds is अभी banned in the United राज्य by the Migratory Bird Treaty अधिनियम of 1918.
सतह runoff, भी पुकारा nonpoint सोर्स pollution, इससे a फार्म फ़ील्ड in आयोवा दौरान a बरसात storm.
topsoil as well as फार्म fertilizers and other संभावित pollutants चलाएं off unprotected फार्म fields जब भारी rains occur.
Topsoil is the upper, outermost परत of soil, प्रायः the top to.
It रै the highest concentration of सशुल्क matter और microorganisms and is जहाँ सबसे of the Earth 's biological soil activity occurs.
Musical cryptogram : `` aschbeg '' set in schoenberg 's Sechs kleine klavierstücke, Op. 19, no. 1, m. 5.
Note that the टीप do नहीं come in spelling order but are all सटा ( not separated by other notes ).
Sechs kleine klavierstücke, op. 19 ( or Six Little पियानो Pieces ) is a नियत of टुकड़े for सोलो piano लिखा by the आस्ट्रिया composer Arnold Schoenberg, published in 1913.
McAfee, Inc. ( ) is an अमरीकी global कंप्यूटर security तन्त्र company headquartered in Santa Clara, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, और the संसार 's largest dedicated सुरक्षा प्रौद्योगिकी कम्पनी.
as of February 28, 2011, McAfee is a wholly स्वामित्व subsidiary of Intel.
मैक्एफ़ी 's competitors in the antivirus industry are avira, bitdefender, BullGuard, F-Secure, frisk, kaspersky, Symantec, और ट्रेंड Micro to नाम a few.
Saint रीता of cascia ( Born Margherita Lotti 1381 - may 22, 1457 ) थी an Italian Augustinian नन, विधवा and संत venerated in the रोमन Catholic Church.
Rita was married at an early age.
the marriage lasted for 18 सालो, during जिससे she is remembered लिये her Christian मान as a मॉडल बीवी and माँ who made प्रयत्न to बदलें उसके husband इससे his abusive behavior.
Upon the हत्या of उसके husband by another feuding परिवार, वो sought to dissuade her sons इससे बदला.
वो subsequently joined an augustinian जातियाँ of धार्मिक बहनों, where वो was known for practicing mortification of the flesh, along साथ the apparent efficacy of her प्रार्थनाएं.
St. रीता is venerated due to various चमत्कार attributed to her सिफ़ारिश, and is प्रायः portrayed साथ a bleeding घाव on उसके forehead, which the Roman Catholic गिरिजाघर claims to have महरूम a आंशिक stigmata.
The रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर, अंतर्गत the pontificate of पोप Leo XIII officially canonized रीता on May 24, 1900, while her feast day is celebrated प्रत्येक May 22.
in अनेक pious कैथोलिक countries, रीता is ज्ञात to be a patroness for abused wives and mourning महिलाओं.
North America is a महाद्वीप wholly within the उत्तरी Hemisphere और almost wholly भीतर the पश्चिमी गोलार्ध.
It is also considered a northern उपमहाद्वीप of the Americas.
It is bordered to the north by the Arctic Ocean, to the ईस्ट by the Atlantic समंदर, to the वेस्ट और दक्षिण by the Pacific Ocean, और to the southeast by दक्षिण America और the Caribbean समुद्र.
North अमेरिका कवर an क्षेत्रफल of परिचय 24,709,000 square किलोमीटर ( 9,540,000 square miles ), about 4.8 % of the ग्रह 's surface or परिचय 16.5 % of इसके land क्षेत्रफल.
as of July 2008, इसके जनसांख्यिकी was estimated at nearly 529 लाख लोगों आरपार 23 स्वतंत्र states, representing परिचय 7.5 % of the human population.
उत्तर अमेरिका is the third-largest continent in area, following एशिया और अफ़्रीकी, and the fourth in जनसांख्यिकी after एशिया, अफ़्रीकी, and Europe.
the पहला people to सजीव in उत्तर America यहूद Paleoindians who began to arrive during the last glacial काल by crossing the Bering land सेतु.
वे differentiated into a number of विविध cultures and समुदायों across the continent.
the largest and most advanced pre-columbian civilizations in उत्तर America यहूद the aztecs in what is now मैक्सिको and the Mayans in सेंट्रल America.
European colonists began to arrive starting in the 16th और 17th centuries, wiping आउट विशाल संख्याएँ of the native populations and beginning an era of यूरोपीय dominance.
jermaine lamarr Cole ( born January 28, 1985 ), better known by his stage नाम J. कोल, is an American hip-hop रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार and record निर्माता from Fayetteville, उत्तर Carolina.
In 2009, he became the पहला कलाकार to चिह्न to Jay-Z 's Roc स्वदेश label.
उसके long-awaited डेब्यू album, हकदार कोल World : the Sideline Story, was released on September 27, 2011.
The album debuted at क्रमांक one on the us Billboard 200, शीर्ष R & B Albums and Top Rap एल्बम chart, selling अधिक than 218,000 in इसके पहला week.
He received a nomination लिये बेहतरीन New Artist at the 54th ग्रैमी Awards.
the two main characters of the श्रेणी, ratchet ( right ) and clank ( बाएँ ).
Ratchet & clank is a series of platform video games.
the franchise थी created और developed by insomniac खेल and प्रकाशित by सोनी Computer Entertainment लिये many different PlayStation consoles, ऐसे as PlayStation 2 और प्लेस्टेशन 3 साथ the exclusion of आकार Matters और Secret एजेंट Clank, which were विकसित by ऊँची प्रभाव Games for the PlayStation पोर्टेबल.
प्रत्येक खेल in the श्रेणी रै महरूम released for every कंसोल, as the ip is स्वामित्व by सोनी कंप्यूटर entertainment.
An एनिमेटेड feature film अनुकूलन produced by rainmaker entertainment और Blockade Entertainment is अनुसूचित for a नाट्य release sometime in 2015.
The खेल take place in a विज्ञान fiction सेटिंग और follow the adventures of ratchet ( an animalistic human-like character known as a lombax, who is a मैकेनिक ) and clank ( a diminutive, sentient रोबोट ) as they travel through the universe, छायांकन it from evil forces on a regular आधार.
the श्रेणी is विख्यात for the समावेश of अनेक exotic और अद्वितीय, over the शीर्ष weapons and डिवाइस, a अवधारणा that insomniac खेल भी expanded into their अन्य खेल.
a will or testament is a legal घोषणा by जिससे a व्यक्ति, the testator, names one or more व्यक्तियों to मैनेज his/her estate और provides लिये the ट्रांसफ़र of उसके प्रॉपर्टी at मौत.
लिये the devolution of प्रॉपर्टी not disposed of by होगा, देखिए inheritance और intestacy.
in the strictest sense, a `` will '' रै historically महरूम limited to real property जबकि `` वसीयत '' applies only to dispositions of personal प्रॉपर्टी ( यूँ giving वृद्धि to the popular title of the दस्तावेज़ as `` Last होगा and Testament '' ), हालांकि this भेद is seldom observed आज.
A will may also बनाएँ a testamentary trust that is effective तभी बाद the मौत of the testator.
the 19.9 mw gemasolar सौर plant in स्पेन सुविधाएँ 15 hours of भंडार और can सप्लाई शक्ति 24 hours a day.
Solar उर्जा, radiant light और heat इससे the sun, रै महरूम harnessed by इंसानो since ancient टाइम्स using a दायरा of ever-evolving technologies.
Solar उर्जा technologies शामिल solar हीटिंग, सौर photovoltaics, solar थर्मल electricity, solar architecture and artificial photosynthesis, which can make considerable योगदान to solving some of the सबसे तात्कालिक उर्जा समस्याएं the संसार अभी faces.
सौर technologies हैं broadly characterized as either passive सौर or active सौर depending on the रास्ता वे कैप्चर, convert और वितरित सौर energy.
क्रियाशील सौर techniques शामिल the उपयोग of photovoltaic panels and सौर thermal collectors to दोहन the उर्जा.
passive solar तकनीकों include orienting a building to the Sun, selecting materials साथ favorable thermal द्रव्यमान or light dispersing properties, और designing spaces कि naturally circulate एयर.
In 2011, the International Energy Agency said that `` the विकास of सस्ती, inexhaustible और clean solar energy technologies will have विशाल longer-term benefits.
it होगा increase countries’ energy सुरक्षा through reliance on an indigenous, inexhaustible और ज़्यादातर import-independent संसाधन, enhance स्थिरता, reduce प्रदूषण, निम्नतर the costs of mitigating climate बदलें, और रखना fossil fuel prices निम्नतर than otherwise.
ये लाभ are वैश्विक.
Hence the additional लागत of the incentives लिये जल्दी deployment should be माना learning investments ; they जरूर be wisely खर्च और need to be widely shared ''.
सर थामस अधिक ( ; 7 February 14786 जुलाई 1535 ), ज्ञात to रोमन Catholics as संत थामस More since 1935, थी an अंग्रेज़ी lawyer, सोशल philosopher, लेखक, statesman, and विख्यात पुनर्जागरण humanist.
He was an important पार्षद to Henry viii of इंग्लैण्ड and was Lord Chancellor from October 1529 to 16 May 1532.
he थी canonized by पोप Pius xi in 1935 as one of the early martyrs of the schism that separated the गिरिजाघर of England from रोम in the 16th century.
In 2000, पोप जॉन पॉल ii declared उसे संरक्षक of कैथोलिक statesmen और politicians.
More थी an opponent of the Protestant reformation, in particular of Martin Luther and विलियम टिंडेल.
However, since 1980, he is भी commemorated by the Church of England as a reformation वीरगति.
More coined the शब्द `` यूटोपिया `` – a name he gave to the ideal and imaginary island nation, the political system of जिससे he वर्णित in Utopia, published in 1516.
He opposed the किंग 's separation इससे the रोमन Catholic Church और refused to accept उसे as Supreme सिर of the Church of इंग्लैण्ड, a शीर्षक जिससे had been given by पार्लियामेंट through the अधिनियम of Supremacy of 1534.
he थी imprisoned in 1534 for his refusal to take the शपथ required by the पहला उत्तराधिकार Act, because the act disparaged Papal Authority and Henry’s marriage to कैथरीन of Aragon.
In 1535, he was आजमाया for treason, convicted on perjured testimony, और beheaded.
अधिक also helped to originate the phrase `` grasp at लोभी '' to औसत `` शिद्दत trying even व्यर्थ things '', in उसके संवाद of Comfort Against Tribulation.
Intellectuals and statesmen आरपार Europe were stunned by अधिक 's निष्पादन.
Erasmus saluted उसे as one `` जिनकी आत्मा थी अधिक pure than कोई हिम, whose प्रतिभाशाली थी ऐसे that इंग्लैण्ड never था और never again होगा have its जैसे ''.
वहीँ थी a अधिक विवादास्पद side to अधिक 's life, क्युकी he advocated the persecution and निष्पादन of protestants who refused to recant their faith.
However, the निर्णय of history रै महरूम largely willing to forgive this in लाइट of the times he lived in and उसके martyrdom in the रोमन Catholic कारण.
दो centuries later जोनाथन स्विफ्ट कहा More थी `` the व्यक्ति of the greatest पुण्य this किंगडम ever उत्पादित '', a sentiment with जिससे Samuel Johnson agreed.
इतिहासकार Hugh trevor-roper कहा in 1977 कि अधिक was `` the पहला ग्रेट Englishman whom we feel कि we जान, the सबसे saintly of humanists, the most human of saints, the universal man of हमारी cool उत्तरी renaissance. ''
कप्तान Nemo, भी ज्ञात as प्रिंस dakkar, is a fictional अक्षर invented by the फ्रेंच विज्ञान fiction author जूल्स Verne.
Nemo appears in दो of वर्न 's novels, बीस Thousand लीग अंतर्गत the Sea ( 1870 ) और The Mysterious Island ( 1874 ), और makes a कैमियो appearance in वर्न 's play यात्रा Through the नामुमकिन ( 1882 ).
nemo, एक of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध antiheroes in fiction, is a mysterious figure.
the बेटे of an Indian राजा, he is a scientific प्रतिभाशाली जो roams the depths of the समुद्र in उसके पनडुब्बी, the नॉटिलस, which थी निर्मित on a deserted द्वीप.
nemo tries to प्रोजेक्ट a stern, controlled विश्वास, लकिन he is driven by a प्यास लिये प्रतिशोध और a hatred of imperialism ( विशेषकर the British Empire ).
He is also wracked by remorse over the deaths of his क्रू सदस्यों और even by the मौतों of दुश्मन sailors.
Nemo रै appeared in विभिन्न adaptations of वर्न 's novels, including films, जहाँ he has महरूम portrayed by a क्रमांक of different actors.
he has furthermore been adopted by अन्य authors for inclusion in उनके novels, सबसे notably in Alan Moore 's The लीग of Extraordinary Gentlemen और Philip José किसान 's The Other log of Phileas fogg.
Listed below हैं the प्रमुख League Baseball teams with the बेहतरीन ऋतु won-lost रिकॉर्ड in इतिहास, as संकल्पित by जीतना प्रतिशत (.700 or बेहतर ), न्यूनतम 120 खेल निभाई.
Acoustic coupler मॉडेम
A मॉडेम ( modulator-demodulator ) is a यंत्र कि modulates an एनालॉग carrier सिग्नल to encode डिजिटल information, and भी demodulates such a carrier सिग्नल to decode the transmitted information.
The goal is to उपज a signal कि can be transmitted easily और decoded to reproduce the असली digital आंकड़ा.
Modems can be used over any means of transmitting analog signals, from लाइट emitting diodes to रेडियो.
The most familiar उदाहरण is a voice band मॉडेम that turns the डिजिटल आंकड़ा of a निजी कंप्यूटर into modulated electrical signals in the voice आवृत्ति range of a telephone चैनल.
ये सिग्नल can be transmitted over telephone लाइनों और demodulated by another modem at the receiver side to रिकवर the डिजिटल data.
modems हैं generally classified by the amount of data they can भेजें in a दिए unit of समय, प्रायः expressed in बिट्स प्रति second ( bit/s, or bps ), or bytes प्रति second ( b/s ).
Modems can alternatively be classified by उनके symbol रेट, measured in baud.
The baud unit denotes symbols per दूसरी, or the number of टाइम्स per second the मॉडेम sends a new सिग्नल.
लिये उदाहरण, the ITU v.21 standard used audio frequency shift keying साथ दो possible बारंबारता corresponding to दो पृथक symbols ( or एक बिट per प्रतीक ), to carry 300 बिट्स per दूसरी using 300 baud.
by contrast, the original itu V.22 मानक, which थी समर्थ to transmit और receive चार पृथक symbols ( two bits प्रति symbol ), handled 1,200 bit/s by sending 600 symbols प्रति second ( 600 baud ) using phase शिफ़्ट keying.
The Declaration of Independence is a बयान adopted by the महाद्वीपीय Congress on July 4, 1776, which घोषित that the thirteen अमरीकी colonies, then at युद्ध साथ ग्रेट Britain, regarded themselves as स्वतंत्र राज्य, और no longer a part of the अंग्रेजों Empire.
बजाय वे now formed a new nation—the संयुक्त राज्य of America.
जॉन एडम्स was a leader in pushing लिये independence, which थी unanimously स्वीकृत on जुलाई 2.
a committee था already drafted the औपचारिक घोषणा, to be तैयार जब कॉंग्रेस voted on स्वतंत्रता.
एडम्स persuaded the committee to select Thomas Jefferson to compose the असली draft of the दस्तावेज़, जिससे कॉंग्रेस would संपादन to उपज the फाइनल version.
The घोषणा थी ultimately a औपचारिक explanation of why कॉंग्रेस था voted on जुलाई 2 to घोषित स्वतंत्रता from Great Britain, more than a साल बाद the outbreak of the अमरीकी Revolutionary War.
the national जन्मदिवस, the Independence दिन is celebrated on July 4, although एडम्स wanted जुलाई 2.
बाद ratifying the टेक्स्ट on July 4, Congress issued the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता in अनेक फ़ॉर्म.
It was initially published as the printed Dunlap broadside that was widely वितरित और पढ़ा to the public.
the most प्रसिद्ध संस्करण of the घोषणा, a हस्ताक्षरित नक़ल कि is popularly regarded as the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता, is displayed at the National Archives in Washington, d.c.
Although the wording of the घोषणा थी स्वीकृत on July 4, the date of its signing थी August 2.
The original जुलाई 4 संयुक्त States घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता manuscript थी खोया while all अन्य नक़ल have महरूम निकला इससे this असली दस्तावेज़.
the स्त्रोत और interpretation of the घोषणा have been the विषय of much scholarly inquiry.
the Declaration justified the स्वतंत्रता of the संयुक्त राज्य by listing औपनिवेशिक grievances विरूद्ध किंग George III, और by asserting निश्चित प्राकृतिक and legal rights, including a right of क्रान्ति.
having परोसा its original purpose in announcing independence, the text of the घोषणा was initially उपेक्षित बाद the अमरीकी क्रान्ति.
Since then, it has come to be माना a प्रमुख बयान on human rights, विशेषकर its second sentence:
We hold these सच्चाई to be self-evident, कि all मेन हैं created equal, that they are endowed by their निर्माता with certain unalienable Rights, कि among ये are Life, Liberty और the pursuit of Happiness.
This रै been called `` एक of the best-known sentences in the English भाषा '', containing `` the most potent and consequential words in अमरीकी इतिहास. ''
The passage आए to represent a moral मानक to which the संयुक्त States should strive.
इस दृश्य was notably promoted by Abraham Lincoln, जो माना the घोषणा to be the foundation of उसके political philosophy, और argued कि the घोषणा is a statement of सिद्धान्त through जिससे the संयुक्त राज्य Constitution should be interpreted.
It has inspired work for the rights of अधिकारहीन लोगों throughout the world.
the Economy of Greenland can be characterized as small, mixed और vulnerable.
the उपस्थित economy consists of a बिग public सेक्टर and व्यापक foreign व्यापार, which has resulted in an economy with periods of strong विकास, considerable महंगाई, बेरोजगारी problems और extreme dependence on पूंजी inflow from Denmark and उपयोग of बाहर, mainly Danish, skilled labor.
जीडीपी प्रति capita is similar to the average यूरोपीय economies लकिन the अर्थव्यवस्था is critically dependent upon substantial support from the डैनिश government, which supplies परिचय half the revenues of the घर rule सरकारी जो in फेरे employ about 8,000 greenlanders out of a मजदूर force of 40,156 ( jan. 2012 ).
बेरोजगारी nonetheless remains ऊँची, साथ the बाकी of the economy dependent upon demand for exports of shrimp और fish.
हाइड्रोजन is a chemical element साथ प्रतीक H and परमाणु number 1.
साथ an atomic weight of ( for hydrogen-1 ), hydrogen is the lightest तत्व and its monatomic form ( h1 ) is the most abundant chemical substance, constituting roughly 75 % of the Universe 's baryonic mass.
non- remnant stars are mainly composed of हाइड्रोजन in its plasma state.
at standard temperature और दबाव, हाइड्रोजन is a colorless, odorless, tasteless, non-toxic, nonmetallic, अत्यधिक combustible diatomic गैस साथ the molecular formula H2.
सबसे of the हाइड्रोजन on धरती is in अणुओं ऐसे as water and सशुल्क यौगिकों क्युकी हाइड्रोजन readily forms covalent compounds with most non-metallic तत्व.
हाइड्रोजन plays a particularly important role in acid-base chemistry साथ अनेक reactions exchanging protons between soluble अणुओं.
in ionic compounds, it can लो a negative charge ( an anion known as a hydride और written as H− ), or as a positively चार्ज species H+.
The latter cation is written as हालांकि composed of a bare प्रोटॉन, but in reality, hydrogen cations in ionic compounds सदा occur as अधिक complex species.
the सबसे common isotope of hydrogen is protium ( name rarely used, symbol 1h ) with a single proton और no neutrons.
as the सरलतम अणु ज्ञात, the हाइड्रोजन अणु has महरूम of theoretical उपयोग.
लिये उदाहरण, as the only न्यूट्रल अणु with an analytic समाधान to the श्रोडिंगर समीकरण, the पढ़ाई of the energetics और संबंध of the hydrogen अणु निभाई a key भूमिका in the विकास of क्वांटम यांत्रिकी.
Hydrogen गैस थी first artificially produced in the जल्दी 16th century, via the mixing of metals with acids.
in 1766–81, हेनरी कैवेंडिश थी the first to recognize कि hydrogen गैस थी a discrete substance, और that it produces water when burned, a प्रॉपर्टी which बाद दिया it इसके name : in Greek, hydrogen अर्थात् `` water-former ''.
औद्योगिक उत्पादन is mainly इससे the भाप reforming of प्राकृतिक गैस, और less प्रायः from more energy-intensive hydrogen उत्पादन methods जैसे the electrolysis of water.
सबसे हाइड्रोजन is employed निकट इसके उत्पादन साईट, with the दो largest उपयोग being fossil ईंधन प्रसंस्करण ( e.g., hydrocracking ) and अमोनिया उत्पादन, mostly लिये the fertilizer market.
हाइड्रोजन is a concern in metallurgy as it can embrittle many metals, complicating the design of pipelines और storage टैंक.
अजेय is a 2010 अमरीकी action thriller film directed by टोनी स्कॉट, written by चिह्नित Bomback, और अभिनीत डेंज़ल वॉशिंगटन और क्रिस पाइन.
the फिल्मी, loosely आधारित on the real-life csx 8888 incident, tells the story of a runaway freight ट्रैन, and the two men ( Washington and पाइन ) who manage to रोकें it.
it was Scott 's फाइनल विशेषता फिल्मी before his death in 2012.
the फिल्मी थी released in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा on नवम्बर 12, 2010, and in the संयुक्त किंगडम on नवम्बर 24, 2010.
It प्राप्त mostly अनुकूल reviews इससे फिल्मी आलोचकों ; it garnered a `` certified भैस '' दरजा on Rotten Tomatoes आधारित upon समग्र reviews और a दरजा of `` Generally अनुकूल reviews '' at Metacritic.
the film थी मनोनीत for an अकादमी Award for Best Sound Editing at the 83rd अकादमी Awards, लकिन खोया to inception.
in photography, bracketing is the general तकनीक of लेने several shots of the same विषय using different कैमरा settings.
bracketing is उपयोगी और प्रायः recommended in situations that make it difficult to obtain a संतोषजनक चित्र with a सिंगल शॉट, विशेषकर when a छोटी variation in एक्सपोज़र parameters रै a comparatively विशाल प्रभाव on the resulting image.
Autobracketing is स्वचालित bracketing by using a सेटिंग on the कैमरा to लो several bracketed shots ( in contrast to the photographer altering the settings by hand between प्रत्येक shot ).
Given the time it takes to accomplish अनेक गोलियाँ, it is typically, लकिन not always, used for static विषय.
insulated glazing ( IG ), more commonly ज्ञात as double glazing ( or double-pane, और increasingly ट्रिपल glazing/pane ) हैं double or ट्रिपल कांच खिड़की panes अलग by an एयर or other गैस भर स्पेस to reduce heat transfer आरपार a भाग of the building envelope.
insulated कांच इकाई हैं manufactured with glass in range of thickness from 3 mm to 10 mm or अधिक in special अनुप्रयोग.
Laminated or tempered glass may भी be used as भाग of the निर्माण.
Most units हैं manufactured साथ the same मोटाई of कांच used on दोनो panes but खास applications ऐसे as acoustic क्षीणन or सुरक्षा may require चौड़ी सीमाएँ of thicknesses to be incorporated in the same unit.
a sectioned diagram of a फिक्स्ड insulated चमकीले ईकाई ( IGU ), indicating the क्रमांकन सम्मेलन used in इस article.
सतह # 1 is facing outside, Surface # 2 is the अंदर सतह of the exterior pane, सतह # 3 is the outside surface of the आंतरिक फलक, और सतह # 4 is the अंदर सतह of आंतरिक फलक.
The खिड़की frame is labelled # 5, a spacer is indicated as # 6, seals are shown in रेड ( # 7 ), the internal reveal is on the right hand पक्ष ( # 8 ) और the exterior windowsill on the बाएँ ( # 9 )
To reduce shear effects on the sealed ईकाई ( a major cause of असामयिक विफलता ), manufacturers उपयोग a नियम of अंगूठा that permits a difference of 1 mm between the thickness of the panes of glass प्रयुक्त in the unit और स्टिल maintain the warranty for the unit.
लिये example, a unit may be ordered with a 4 mm pane on the exterior and a 3 mm फलक on the आंतरिक.
These variations हैं अनुमत लिये architectural and cost कारण.
अन्य combinations can be निर्दिष्ट और उत्पादित लकिन the manufacturer may आरक्षित the सही to limit the पद of the वारंटी or refuse to वारंटी the unit altogether.
लिये ease of वर्णन the सतहों of a दोगुना paned ईकाई are नामित according to the following सम्मेलन : Surface # 1 ( facing outside ), Surface # 2 ( inside of बाहर pane ), Surface # 3 ( outside of अंदर pane ) और Surface # 4 ( inside सतह of inside pane ).
applying the corresponding nomenclature for triple paned इकाई results in surfaces # 1 through # 6.

सेलेनियम is a chemical element with प्रतीक se और atomic क्रमांक 34.
It is a nonmetal with गुण कि are इंटरमीडिएट between those of इसके आवधिक table column-adjacent chalcogen तत्व गंधक और tellurium.
It rarely occurs in इसके elemental state in प्रकृति, or as pure अयस्क यौगिकों.
सेलेनियम ( Greek σελήνη selene meaning `` चंद्रमा '' ) was खोजा in 1817 by jöns Jacob Berzelius, who विख्यात the similarity of the new तत्व to the previously-known tellurium ( named लिये the धरती ).
सेलेनियम is found impurely in metal sulfide ores, where it partially replaces the sulfur.
commercially, selenium is उत्पादित as a byproduct in the शोधन of these ores, most often दौरान copper production.
Minerals कि हैं pure selenide or selenate compounds हैं ज्ञात, but हैं विरल.
the मुख्य commercial uses लिये सेलेनियम आज are in glassmaking and in pigments.
सेलेनियम is a सेमीकंडक्टर और is used in photocells.
उपयोग in इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स, once महत्वपूर्ण, have been ज़्यादातर supplanted by सिलिकॉन semiconductor डिवाइस.
सेलेनियम continues to be used in a few types of dc power surge protectors and एक प्रकार of fluorescent क्वांटम बिन्दु.
सेलेनियम salts हैं विषाक्त in large amounts, लकिन trace amounts हैं necessary लिये सेल्यूलर फलन in अनेक जीवों, including all पशु.
Selenium is a घटक of the एंटीऑक्सीडेंट एंजाइमों glutathione peroxidase and thioredoxin reductase ( which indirectly reduce certain oxidized molecules in animals and some पौधे ).
it is भी मिला in तीन deiodinase enzymes, जिससे convert one थायराइड हार्मोन to another.
Selenium आवश्यकताएँ in पौधे differ by species, साथ some पौधे requiring relatively विशाल amounts, and others apparently requiring none.
the United राज्य अध्यक्षीय election of 2008 थी the 56th quadrennial presidential election.
It was आयोजित on मंगलवार, नवम्बर 4, 2008.
डेमोक्रेट बराक ओबामा, then the junior सीनेटर इससे इलिनोइस, defeated रिपब्लिकन जॉन McCain, the senior Senator इससे एरिज़ोना.
As the अभियान progressed, the युद्ध in इराकी and outgoing Republican अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. Bush had become increasingly unpopular, and the major-party उम्मीदवार भागा on a मंच of बदलें और सुधार.
घरेलू policy और the economy आखिरकार उभरा as the main विषयवस्तु in the पिछला few महीने of the चुनाव campaign बाद the onset of the worst मंदी चूंकि the 1930s.
Obama होता go on to win a decisive victory over McCain in दोनो the electoral and popular vote.
ओबामा प्राप्त the most votes लिये a अध्यक्षीय candidate in American history, और जीती the लोकप्रिय और electoral vote by the largest margin in 12 सालो, as खूब as the largest प्रतिशत of the popular vote लिये a डेमोक्रेट in nearly a half-century.
इस was the पहला U.S. अध्यक्षीय चुनाव in which an African अमरीकी थी elected, having भी been the पहला in जिससे an अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी won the nomination of either प्रमुख party.
This चुनाव was also notable for being the first time in u.S. history that both प्रमुख पार्टी candidates यहूद बैठे u.s. सीनेटरों, only the third time ( after 1920 and 1960 ) that any बैठे u.s. सीनेटर was elected president, and only the दूसरी समय कि the जीतना President और Vice President ( Obama and बिडेन ) were दोनो बैठे u.s. Senators.
This was also the first election since 1952 in जिससे neither of the प्रमुख parties ' नामांकित थी the incumbent अध्यक्ष or Vice President.
The Sovereign प्रिंस or राजकुमारी of मोनाको is the reigning monarch and सिर of राज्य of the Principality of Monaco.
सब princes or राजकुमारियों have officially लिया the नाम of the हाउस of Grimaldi, लकिन have belonged to विभिन्न other houses ( goyon de matignon, Polignac ) in पुरूष line.
the reigning प्रिंस is अल्बर्ट ii.
Visualization of fragmentation and तब of defragmentation
In the maintenance of file प्रणालियों, defragmentation is a प्रक्रम कि reduces the राशि of fragmentation.
It करता this by physically organizing the contents of the द्रव्यमान भंडार device used to स्टोर files into the smallest number of contiguous regions ( fragments ).
it भी attempts to बनाएँ larger regions of फ़्री स्पेस using compaction to impede the वापसी of fragmentation.
कुछ defragmentation utilities try to keep छोटी फाइलें भीतर a सिंगल directory together, as वे are प्रायः accessed in sequence.
Defragmentation is लाभदायक और relevant to file प्रणालियों on electromechanical disk drives.
The movement of the hard ड्राइव 's read/write heads over अलग क्षेत्रों of the disk जब accessing fragmented files is slower, compared to accessing the संपूर्ण सामग्री of a non-fragmented संचिका sequentially without moving the read/write heads to seek other fragments.
a service-level अनुबंध ( sla ) is a part of a service contract where a सेवा is formally defined.
In practice, the term sla is sometimes used to refer to the contracted डिलीवरी time ( of the service or performance ).
as an example, internet सेवा प्रदाताओं will commonly शामिल सेवा स्तर agreements within the terms of उनके अनुबंध with customers to define the level ( s ) of service होने sold in मैदान भाषा terms.
in इस case the sla होगा typically have a technical परिभाषा in terms of mean time between failures ( MTBF ), औसत time to repair or औसत time to recovery ( MTTR ) ; विभिन्न आंकड़ा दरों ; throughput ; जिटर ; or similar measurable विवरण.
Union Station is a former खरीदारी mall in संघ नगर, Georgia, in southwest मैट्रो Atlanta सटा to Interstate 85.
बाद new ownership और renovations in 2006, the name थी changed from शैनन southpark Mall in 2007 to संघ Station मॉल.
a पिछला नवीकरण थी done in the लेट 1990s.

This मैप shows the संलग्न संयुक्त राज्य and, in insets at the lower बाएँ, the दो states कि हैं not संलग्न.
The contiguous संयुक्त States are the 48 adjoining u.S. राज्य on the महाद्वीप of North America कि हैं south of Canada और north of Mexico, plus the ज़िला of कोलंबिया.
the term excludes the states of अलास्का and Hawaii, and सब off-shore u.S. territories and possessions, ऐसे as Puerto रीको.
Together, the 48 संलग्न states और D.C. occupy a संयुक्त area of, which is 1.58 % of the कुल सतह area of the Earth.
Of this, is जमीन, composing 83.65 % of U.S. जमीन क्षेत्रफल.
Officially, is जल क्षेत्रफल, composing 62.66 % of the nation 's जल क्षेत्रफल.
the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी जनसांख्यिकी थी 306,675,006, composing 99.33 % of the nation 's population, और a density of 103.639 inhabitants/sq mi ( 40.015/km2 ), compared to 87.264/sq mi ( 33.692/km2 ) for the nation as a पूरे.

it was लिखा by Rob Mathes और एलन Shamblin.
utilization management is the मूल्यांकन of the appropriateness, medical need and दक्षता of स्वास्थ्य care services प्रक्रियाओं और सुविधाएं according to established मापदण्ड or दिशानिर्देश and under the प्रावधानों of an applicable स्वास्थ्य benefits योजना.
Typically it includes new क्रियाएँ or decisions based upon the analysis of a case.
Utilization प्रबन्धन describes proactive procedures, including discharge नियोजन, concurrent नियोजन, pre-certification और नैदानिक case appeals.
It also covers proactive प्रक्रियाओं, such as संयुक्त नैदानिक समीक्षाएँ and peer reviews, as well as appeals introduced by the प्रदाता, payer or patient.
As pre-certification और संयुक्त review of cases grew, utilization प्रबन्धन spun आउट of utilization review.
जबकि नहीं synonymous, स्वास्थ्य परवाह professionals tend to उपयोग the terms as interchangeable.
the difference is utilization management is और intends to manage स्वास्थ्य care मामले efficiently और लागत effectively पहले and दौरान health care प्रशासन.
Utilization review is more considering whether health परवाह was appropriately लागू after it was administered.
There हैं four मौलिक तकनीकों in utilization management:
माँग प्रबन्धन
utilization Review
Case प्रबन्धन
बीमारी प्रबन्धन
The Outsiders is a coming-of-age novel by S. E. Hinton, पहला published in 1967 by Viking दबायें.
hinton was 15 जब she started लिखने the novel, but किया most of the work जब वो was सोलह and a जूनियर in ऊँची school.
Hinton थी 18 when the किताब was प्रकाशित.
The book फ़ॉलो दो rival समूह, the Greasers and the Socs ( pronounced by the author as, छोटी for Socials ), who are divided by their socioeconomic status.
The किताब takes place in तुलसा, Oklahoma, in 1965, लकिन it is never stated in the book.
A film adaptation थी produced in 1983, और a little-known short-lived टेलीविज़न series appeared in 1990, picking up where the फिल्म left off.
The United राज्य House of प्रतिनिधि is एक of the दो घरों of the United राज्य कॉंग्रेस ( a bicameral legislature ).
It is अक्सर referred to as the House.
the other हाउस is the Senate.
The संयोजन और शक्तियां of the हाउस are established in Article एक of the United राज्य Constitution.
The major शक्ति of the हाउस is to pass federal legislation कि affects the संपूर्ण country although its बिल्स जरूर भी be passed by the सीनेट and further agreed to by the u.S. President पहले बनने विधि ( unless both the हाउस और Senate re-pass the विधान with a two-thirds बहुमत in each कक्ष ).
The House has अनेक exclusive powers : the power to initiate आय बिल्स, to impeach officials, और to elect the u.S. President in case वहीँ is no majority in the चुनावी College.
Each U.S. state is represented in the हाउस in proportion to its population लकिन is entitled to at तनिक one representative.
The most populous state, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, फिलहाल has 53 प्रतिनिधि.
the total क्रमांक of मतदान representatives is fixed by law at 435.
Each प्रतिनिधि serves for a two-year पद.
The स्पीकर of the United राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि, who presides over the कक्ष, is elected by the सदस्यों of the हाउस, and is therefore traditionally the leader of the House Democratic caucus or the हाउस रिपब्लिकन सम्मेलन, whichever party has more voting सदस्यों.
the House meets in the दक्षिण wing of the United राज्य कैपिटल.
a supply कड़ी is दरअसल a जटिल और dynamic supply और माँग संजाल.
( cf. wieland/wallenburg, 2011 )
a सप्लाई कड़ी is a system of संगठन, लोगों, activities, सूचना, और संसाधन शामिल in चलती a product or सेवा from supplier to customer.
सप्लाई chain activities transform natural resources, कच्चा सामग्री, and components into a समाप्त उत्पाद कि is delivered to the end customer.
in sophisticated सप्लाई कड़ी प्रणालियों, used उत्पाद may re-enter the supply कड़ी at कोई पाइंट जहाँ अवशेष मान is recyclable.
Supply chains कड़ी value जंजीरों.
`` जामुनी haze '' is a song written and recorded by जिमि Hendrix in 1967, released as the second सिंगल by The जिमि Hendrix अनुभव in both the संयुक्त किंगडम और the संयुक्त States.
It बाद appeared on the अमरीकी संस्करण of the बैंड 's 1967 album हैं तुम Experienced.
`` Purple Haze '' रै become one of the `` archetypical psychedelic ड्रग गीतों of the sixties ''.
`` जामुनी haze 's '' guitar virtuosic techniques होता be emulated by many metal guitarists.
a बंद up picture of a गैंडा स्किन.
स्किन is the soft outer covering of vertebrates.
Other एनिमल coverings ऐसे as the arthropod exoskeleton have different developmental origin, ढांचा and रासायनिक composition.
The adjective cutaneous means `` of the स्किन '' ( from Latin cutis, स्किन ).
In स्तनधारियों, the skin is the largest organ of the integumentary system made up of अनेक layers of ectodermal ऊतक, और गार्ड the underlying muscles, bones, ligaments और आतंरिक अंगों.
स्किन of a अलग प्रकृति exists in amphibians, सरीसृपों, and पक्षियों.
All mammals have some बाल on उनके skin, even marine स्तनधारियों which appear to be hairless.
The skin interfaces साथ the पर्यावरण and is the पहला लकीर of defense from external factors.
लिये उदाहरण, the skin plays a कुंजी भूमिका in protecting the देह against pathogens and excessive जल घाटा.
Its other कृत्यों हैं insulation, temperature regulation, sensation, and the production of विटामिन D folates.
Severely damaged skin may heal by forming scar tissue.
इस is sometimes discoloured और depigmented.
The thickness of स्किन भी varies इससे location to location on an organism.
in इंसानो लिये उदाहरण, the skin स्तिथ अंतर्गत the eyes और around the eyelids is the thinnest स्किन in the देह at 0.5 mm मोटा, और is one of the first क्षेत्रों to दिखाएँ लक्षण of aging such as `` crows feet '' और wrinkles.
the स्किन on the palms and the soles of the feet is 4 mm मोटा and the thickest स्किन in the body.
फर is घना hair.
Primarily, fur augments the इन्सुलेशन the skin provides but can also serve as a secondary sexual characteristic or as camouflage.
On some पशु, the स्किन is very मुश्किल और thick, and can be processed to create चमड़े.
सरीसृपों and fish have hard सुरक्षात्मक तराजू on उनके स्किन लिये सुरक्षा, और birds have मुश्किल feathers, सब बना of tough β- keratins.
Amphibian skin is not a strong अवरोध to ड्योढ़ी of chemicals and is often subject to osmosis and diffusive forces.
लिये example, a मेंढक sitting in an anesthetic समाधान होता be sedated जल्दी, as the chemical diffuses through its skin.

डेनियल Radcliffe, जो portrays Harry Potter, रै been the icon of the फिल्मी series चूंकि the release of the पहला film in 2001.

तेरह अभिनेताओं have appeared as the वही अक्षर in सब eight films of the मताधिकार.
Some well-known अंग्रेजों अभिनेताओं who have नहीं appeared in the series, are पूछा in jest why they have not been cast.
जब दाउद Yates थी directing the पांचवां फिल्मी, Bill Nighy, who था previously collaborated with Yates on तीन of his television प्रोजेक्ट, कहा कि he joked with Yates कि संभवतः now he would n't be the तभी actor in इंग्लैण्ड who था n't महरूम in हैरी Potter.

लकिन in 2009, येट्स cast Nighy as Minister of Magic rufus Scrimgeour in Deathly hallows.
Nighy कहा, `` I am no longer the तभी English actor नहीं to be in हैरी कुम्हार और i am बहुत pleased. ''

i was a bit too बूढ़ा लिये Harry ''.

( v ) indicates the कर्ता or actress lent only his or her आवाज़ लिये उसके or her फिल्मी अक्षर

A twelve-step program is a नियत of guiding सिद्धान्त ( स्वीकृत by members as 'spiritual principles, ' आधारित on the स्वीकृत साहित्य ) outlining a कोर्स of कार्रवाई लिये रिकवरी इससे, मजबूरी, or other behavioral समस्याएं.
Originally proposed by alcoholics बेनाम ( aa ) as a method of recovery from alcoholism, the Twelve Steps यहूद first published in the किताब alcoholics Anonymous : The Story of कैसा अधिक than One सौ मेन have बरामद इससे Alcoholism in 1939.
the method was then adapted and became the foundation of अन्य twelve-step programs.
As summarized by the American Psychological Association, the process involves the following:
admitting कि एक can नहीं control one 's व्यसन or compulsion ;
recognizing a higher power that can give strength ;
examining पास्ट errors साथ the help of a प्रायोजक ( अनुभवी member ) ;
making amends लिये these त्रुटियाँ ;
सीखना to सजीव a new life with a नई कोड of behavior ;
helping others जो suffer इससे the वही addictions or compulsions.
गवाह impeachment, in the law of प्रमाण of the United States, is the process of कॉलिंग into सवाल the credibility of an individual who is testifying in a trial.
The संघीय Rules of Evidence contain the नियम governing महाभियोग in federal न्यायालयों.
Party leaders and whips of the United राज्य हाउस of Representatives are elected by उनके respective parties in a closed-door caucus by secret बैलट और हैं also known as मंजिल नेताओ.
The U.S. House of प्रतिनिधि करता not officially उपयोग the पद `` Minority नेता '' although the मीडिया frequently do.
the House बजाय उपयोग the terms `` Republican नेता '' or `` लोकतांत्रिक नेता '' depending on जिससे पार्टी holds a अल्पसंख्यक of सीटे.
the current House Majority नेता is रिपब्लिकन eric Cantor, जबकि the वर्तमान House अल्पसंख्यक नेता is Democrat Nancy Pelosi.
The current House Majority Whip is रिपब्लिकन Kevin मैकार्थी, जबकि the वर्तमान House अल्पसंख्यक चाबुक is डेमोक्रेट steny hoyer.
Following the outbreak of संसार War I in 1914, the German Army खोली the Western सामने by first आक्रमणकारी Luxembourg और Belgium, then gaining military कंट्रोल of important औद्योगिक regions in France.
the tide of the advance was dramatically turned with the Battle of the Marne.
Following the रेस to the sea, both sides dug in along a meandering लकीर of fortified trenches, stretching इससे the North Sea to the Swiss frontier with France.
This line remained essentially अपरिवर्तित for most of the युद्ध.
between 1915 and 1917 वहीँ were several प्रमुख offensives साथ this सामने.
The attacks employed विशाल artillery bombardments और massed infantry अग्रिम.
however, a संयोजन of entrenchments, यंत्र गन nests, कंटीले wire, और तोपखाने repeatedly inflicted कठोर हताहत on the attackers और counterattacking defenders.
as a result, no significant अग्रिम यहूद made.
among the most costly of ये offensives were the बैटल of verdun साथ a combined [ estimated ] 700,000 dead, the Battle of the Somme with अधिक than [ an estimated ] million हताहत, और the Battle of Passchendaele साथ roughly [ an अनुमानित ] 600,000 casualties.
In an effort to ब्रेक the deadlock, इस front saw the परिचय of new military technology, including ज़हर गैस, वायुयान and tanks.
लकिन it was तभी after the adoption of improved tactics कि कुछ degree of mobility थी restored.
the जर्मनी वसन्त अप्रिय of 1918 थी made possible by the Treaty of Brest-Litovsk कि चिह्नित the समाप्त of the conflict on the Eastern सामने.
using the recently-introduced infiltration tactics, the German सेना advanced nearly to the west, जिससे चिह्नित the deepest अग्रिम by either side since 1914 और बहुत nearly succeeded in forcing a भेदन.
In spite of the generally stagnant nature of this सामने, this थिएटर would prove निर्णायक.
the inexorable advance of the अलाइड सेना during the दूसरी half of 1918 persuaded the German कमांडरों that शिकस्त थी inevitable, and the सरकारी was forced to sue for शर्तें of an armistice.
the terms of peace were agreed upon with the signing of the सन्धि of Versailles in 1919.
The following is a सूची of recurring and नाबालिग characters in the डिज़्नी चैनल असली Series the सुइट जीवन of Zack & Cody.
These वर्ण were regularly घुमाया, often disappearing लिये long periods during the श्रेणी.
The following सूची of characters has महरूम sorted alphabetically, by first name.
कुछ of the वर्ण था no last नाम और most were commonly referred to by their पहला नाम so this appeared to be the सबसे logical विधि.

The First महिला of the संयुक्त राज्य ( flotus ) is the होस्टेस of the श्वेत हाउस.
क्युकी this position is traditionally filled by the बीवी of the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States, the शीर्षक is सबसे प्रायः लागू to the बीवी of a sitting president.
The current पहला महिला is मिशेल ओबामा.
After her husband बराक Obama थी re-elected on November 6, 2012, she is अनुसूचित to serve until जनवरी 20, 2017.
Septic shock is a चिकित्सा कंडीशन as a result of कठोर infection and sepsis, though the microbe may be प्रणालीगत or localized to a particular साईट.
It can कारण अनेक organ dysfunction सिंड्रोम ( formerly known as अनेक organ विफलता ) and मौत.
इसके सबसे आम पीड़ितों हैं children, immunocompromised individuals, and the elderly, as their प्रतिरक्षा systems can नहीं deal साथ the infection as effectively as those of स्वस्थ वयस्कों.
Frequently, मरीजों suffering इससे septic shock are cared लिये in intensive care इकाई.
The mortality rate इससे सेप्टिक शॉक is लगभग 25–50 %.
Kevin brereton ( born फ़रवरी 20, 1972 ), better known by उसके स्टेज name k-os ( ; `` अराजकता '' ), is a Canadian rapper, सिंगर, songwriter and रिकार्ड निर्माता.
उसके दिए नाम may also be cited as Kheaven, a spelling he बाद adopted.
the alias `` k-os '', spelled with a निम्नतर मामला `` k '', was intended to be कम aggressive than the pseudonyms of अन्य rappers जिनकी names were all अपर case, such as KRS-One.
It is an एक्रोनिम for `` ज्ञान of Self, '' although in a बाद इंटरव्यू he said कि it originally stood for `` केविन 's Original ध्वनि. '' k-os ' music incorporates a चौड़ी variety of music genres, सहित रैप, funk, चट्टान, and रेगी.
The lyrics अक्सर focus on promoting a `` धनात्मक संदेश '' जबकि at times expressing आलोचना of मुख्यधारा hip hop संस्कृति 's obsession साथ money, fame and glorification of हिंसा.
A musician as well as a निर्माता, k-os रै लिखा and उत्पादित nearly every भाग of सब चार of his एल्बम.
k-os usually performs with a सजीव बैंड, something that is uncommon in the hip हॉप genre.
He sometimes plays guitar and keyboard both during सजीव प्रदर्शन और in the studio.
k-os प्राप्त his first musical exposure साथ the सिंगल `` musical Essence '', released in 1993.
After the release of उसके दूसरी सिंगल `` वृद्धि Like the Sun '' in 1996, he withdrew इससे the industry because he was dissatisfied साथ his musical स्टाइल.
he reappeared briefly in 1999 और released his डेब्यू album Exit in 2002.
The album received positive समीक्षाएँ लकिन sold अपेक्षाकृत few नक़ल.
he released his दूसरी एल्बम Joyful विद्रोह in 2004, जिससे प्राप्त platinum status in Canada.
A third एल्बम,, थी released in 2006 and also went प्लेटिनम.
His fourth एल्बम, यस !
, was released in 2009.
His पांचवां album BLack on BLonde थी released in 2013.
The आधिकारिक 2007 edition of the UCC.
