the वर्दी वाणिज्यिक Code ( UCC or the कोड ), पहला प्रकाशित in 1952, is one of a क्रमांक of वर्दी acts कि have been promulgated in conjunction साथ efforts to harmonize the law of बिक्री and other वाणिज्यिक ट्रांजेक्शन in सब 50 राज्य within the United राज्य of America.
multi-pitch climbing is the ascent of climbing रूट साथ one or अधिक stops at a belay स्टेशन.
प्रत्येक section of वास्तविक चढ़ाई between stops at the belay stations is called a pitch.
the leader ascends the पिच, placing गियर और stopping to लंगर themselves to the belay station.
the कारण for the stops can be संकल्पित by चुनाव, सम्मेलन or necessity.
लिये example:
the rope is too छोटी to do the संपूर्ण रूट in one pitch ( necessity ).
The leader रै run आउट of सुरक्षात्मक gear ( necessity ).
वहीँ is a सुविधाजनक protectable ledge, or fixed bolts placed by previous चढना, at the स्थान for a belay station ( सम्मेलन ).
The leader chooses to बाकी or exchange leads before the अगला section of the चढ़ाई ( चुनाव ).
the सामान्य purpose of ये stops is to allow the second to ascend to the point of the सीसे climber जबकि collecting the सुरक्षात्मक gear from the रूट in the course of the सीसे climber 's ascent.
at the belay स्टेशन, the protective gear is collected, संभवतः exchanged to a नई leader, और the leader of the next पिच ascends the रूट.
A आरेख showing an I Formation on offense और a 4-3 Formation on रक्षा
In अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल, each team रै ग्यारह players on the field at एक समय.
the विशिष्ट role that a खिलाड़ी takes on the field is पुकारा their स्थिति.
अंतर्गत the modern rules of American फ़ुटबॉल, टीमों are allowed unlimited subsititutions, that is टीमों may change any क्रमांक of players बाद any play.
This रै resulted in the विकास of three `` platoons '' of खिलाड़ी, the ठोकर ( the team साथ the बॉल, who is trying to score ), the रक्षा ( the team trying to prevent the other टोली from scoring, और to take the ball from them ), and the special teams ( who play in kicking परिस्थितियों ).
भीतर those platoons, various specific स्थितियाँ मौजूद depending on what the player 's main job is.
The नियंत्रित substances Act ( सीएसए ) was enacted into law by the कॉंग्रेस of the United States as Title ii of the व्यापक Drug गाली Prevention and Control Act of 1970.
the CSA is the संघीय U.S. ड्रग नीति under जिससे the manufacture, importation, कब्ज़ा, उपयोग और वितरण of निश्चित substances is regulated.
the अधिनियम also परोसा as the national implementing विधान for the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs.
the विधान निर्मित पाँच schedules ( classifications ), साथ varying qualifications for a substance to be included in each.
दो संघीय agencies, the ड्रग प्रवर्तन प्रशासन and the Food और Drug Administration, determine which substances हैं added to or removed इससे the various schedules, though the statute passed by Congress created the initial listing, and Congress has sometimes अनुसूचित अन्य substances through legislation ऐसे as the Hillory J. Farias और सामन्था reid date-rape Prevention अधिनियम of 2000, जिससे लगाई gamma hydroxybutyrate in अनुसूची I. वर्गीकरण निर्णय are जरूरी to be बना on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined पद ), फिलहाल accepted चिकित्सा उपयोग in उपचार in the संयुक्त States, and अंतरराष्ट्रीय treaties.
The वेन Route 23 Transit बीच is a नई जर्सी Transit park-and-ride स्टेशन in Wayne, नई जर्सी साथ the Montclair-Boonton Line that provides bus service to नई York नगर and विभिन्न अन्य अंक in the क्षेत्रफल as well as montclair-boonton Line ट्रैन सेवा to New York, hoboken, और इंटरमीडिएट अंक along the line between Hackettstown and montclair राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों.
it is located off of the southbound lanes of New जर्सी रूट 23 on West Belt Road, निकट the interchange where Route 23, Interstate 80, और U.S. Route 46 meet, आरपार from the Willowbrook Mall.
the station खोली in January 2008 and रै 1,000 parking स्पेसेस.
New जर्सी Transit intends लिये this संयुक्त rail and bus स्टेशन to become an `` interceptor station, '' कि will help relieve the habitual congestion at the वेस्ट Belt सड़क इंटरचेंज, जहाँ the three प्रमुख राजमार्गों meet.
in addition, the construction of the station थी meant to also आसानी the congestion at what थी then Route 23 Park & सवारी, a bus depot on Route 23 North that रै since been renamed माँ 's पार्क & Ride, और the Willowbrook Mall पार्क & सवारी ; the now-Mother 's साईट था सीमित parking जबकि NJT थी having ट्रबल with overfull parking क्षेत्रों at Willowbrook.
the वेन township बस garage is स्तिथ on the विपरीत पक्ष of रूट 23.
वहीँ has महरूम a प्रस्ताव to निर्माण a parking डेक साथ another thousand spots and develop the जमीन at the station.
in जोड to Montclair-Boonton रेल, the पारगमन Center is served by the following नई Jersey Transit bus lines:

the at sign @ is भी commonly called the at प्रतीक, ampersat, apetail or commercial at in English—and कम commonly a चौड़ी दायरा of other terms.
the फैक्ट कि there is no single शब्द in English लिये the प्रतीक रै prompted कुछ writers to use the फ्रेंच arobase or स्पेनी and पुर्तगाली arroba—or to coin नई शब्द such as asperand, ampersat—but none of ये रै हासिल चौड़ी करेंसी.
Originally an हिसाब and commercial invoice abbreviation meaning `` at the rate of '' ( e.g. 7 विजेट @ $ 2 = $ 14 ), it थी नहीं शामिल on the कुंजीपटल of the earliest commercially कामयाब typewriters, लकिन थी on at तनिक one 1889 मॉडल और the बहुत कामयाब Underwood मॉडल इससे the `` Underwood No. 5 '' in 1900 onward.
it is now universally included on कंप्यूटर keyboards.
In recent years, its meaning has grown to include the भाव of being `` located at, '' `` और, '' or `` directed at '', विशेषकर in ईमेल addresses and social media, particularly ट्विटर.
The mark is एनकोडेड at.
the catcher in the rye is a 1951 अनोखा by J. D. Salinger.
Originally प्रकाशित for adults, it रै चूंकि become popular with adolescent readers for its themes of teenage angst and alienation.
it रै been अनूदित into almost all of the संसार 's प्रमुख भाषाएं.
Around 250,000 नक़ल are sold प्रत्येक year साथ total sales of अधिक than 65 million किताबे.
The अनोखा 's protagonist और antihero, Holden Caulfield, रै become an प्रतीक लिये teenage rebellion.
The novel थी included on Times 2005 list of the 100 best english-language novels लिखा since 1923, और it थी named by Modern Library and its readers as one of the 100 best English-language novels of the 20th सदी.
It रै been frequently challenged in the संयुक्त States और other देशों for its उदार उपयोग of profanity and portrayal of sexuality.
It भी सौदे with जटिल मुद्दे of identity, belonging, connection, और alienation.
Skeletal muscles होमो sapiens
This is a table of muscles of the इंसान anatomy.
वहीँ are approximately 642 skeletal मांसपेशियां within the ठेठ इंसान, and almost every muscle constitutes one part of a जोड़ी of एकसमान bilateral muscles, मिला on both पहलू, resulting in लगभग 320 pairs of muscles, as प्रस्तुत in इस article.
nevertheless, the exact क्रमांक is difficult to define क्युकी different स्त्रोत समूह मांसपेशियां differently, e.g. regarding कया is पारिभाषित as different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles.
Examples range from 640 to 850.
The मांसपेशियां of the human देह can be categorized into a number of समूह which शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the सिर and गर्दन, मांसपेशियां of the धड़ or trunk, मांसपेशियां of the upper limbs, और मांसपेशियां of the निम्नतर limbs.
the action refers to the कार्रवाई of each मांसपेशी from the standard anatomical स्थिति.
in other positions, अन्य क्रियाएँ may be performed.
Bad लड़कियों Club ( bgc ) is an American reality टेलीविज़न श्रेणी निर्मित by Jonathan मरे for the ऑक्सीजन टेलीविज़न station.
The show centers on सात feisty and mischievous महिलाओं साथ different backgrounds and personalities, who have a क्रमांक of मनोवैज्ञानिक and behavioral समस्याएं.
They are introduced to the दिखाएँ off their घातक behavior और accomplish विशिष्ट लक्ष्य.
the cast, deemed `` ख़राब girls '', आनंद a luxurious lifestyle in a ठीक mansion for तीन महीने, दौरान which वे must obey specified नियम.
Their जीवनदान अंदर – and बाहर – of the house हैं chronicled और recorded by the उत्पादन team.
the Bad लड़कियों क्लबों is ब्रॉडकास्ट in पाँच देशों ( संयुक्त States, Netherlands, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Hungary, और स्वीडन ).
it रै प्राप्त negative समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों, who मानना the दिखाएँ promotes हिंसा by adolescent viewers.
furthermore, अनेक cast members made विवादास्पद remarks which outraged अनेक viewers.
The format of the दिखाएँ रै बदला इससे early सीज़न.
if a `` bad लड़की '' breaks a rule, वो is evicted from the दिखाएँ और, if it is जल्दी in the ऋतु, replaced by a new `` ख़राब लड़की ''.
There have महरूम nine पूरा seasons of the Bad Girls Club, with the दसवाँ ऋतु फिलहाल airing.
the fourth ऋतु had the उच्चतम ratings in the दिखाएँ 's history, बनने its `` breakthrough season ''.
वहीँ have been three spin-offs of the Bad लड़कियों क्लबों.
एक of उन्हें, प्रेम Games : Bad Girls need प्रेम Too, जहाँ past डाल सदस्यों तलाश सच्चा प्रेम, has gained ऊँची दरजा.
ऑक्सीजन has भी released a मोबाईल खेल, कॉमिक स्ट्रिप and merchandise to promote the दिखाएँ.
of the 92 प्रतियोगी, Kerry Harvick ( of ऋतु one ) थी a successful country singer पहले the दिखाएँ.
Tanisha थामस ( of season two ) बाद hosted Oxygen 's oxygenlive !
and the subsequent seasons of प्रेम Games : ख़राब Girls Need प्रेम Too.
थामस, जो रै been dubbed the `` गॉडमदर '' to all प्रतियोगी, रै her अपना television documentary हकदार tanisha gets Married.
As of Season 8 she 's महरूम the host of the reunion specials.
the Iowa सीनेट is the upper हाउस of the Iowa General Assembly.
वहीँ हैं 50 सीटे in the आयोवा Senate, representing 50 single-member जिले across the राज्य with populations of approximately 60,927 per constituency,.
प्रत्येक Senate ज़िला is रचित of two House districts.
The सीनेट meets at the आयोवा State कैपिटल in Des Moines.
Unlike the निम्नतर हाउस, the Iowa House of Representatives, सीनेटरों serve four-year शर्तें, साथ half of the Senate लड़खड़ाते लिये re-election प्रत्येक दो years.
There हैं no पद हद लिये the Senate.
Mechanical मरम्मत
Maintenance, repair, and परिचालन ( MRO ) or maintenance, repair, और overhaul involves फिक्सिंग कोई sort of mechanical, plumbing or विद्युत device should it become आउट of order or broken ( known as मरम्मत, unscheduled or casualty maintenance ).
It also शामिल performing routine क्रियाएँ जिससे रखना the device in working order ( ज्ञात as scheduled maintenance ) or prevent ट्रबल from arising ( preventive maintenance ).
MRO may be पारिभाषित as, `` All actions which have the उद्देश्य of retaining or restoring an item in or to a राज्य in which it can perform its required फलन.
the क्रियाएँ include the संयोजन of all तकनीकी और सम्बन्धित प्रशासनिक, managerial, और supervision क्रियाएँ. ''
mro परिचालन can be categorised by whether the product remains the प्रॉपर्टी of the ग्राहक, i.e. a सेवा is being offered, or whether the product is bought by the reprocessing संगठन and बेची to कोई ग्राहक wishing to make the खरीदें ( Guadette, 2002 ).
In the पूर्व मामला it may be a backshop operation within a larger संगठन or smaller आपरेशन.
the former of these represents a closed लूप सप्लाई chain and usually रै the scope of मेंटेनेंस, repair or of the product.
the latter of the categorisations is an खोलें लूप supply chain and is typified by refurbishment and remanufacture.
the main characteristic of the closed लूप system is that the माँग for a उत्पाद is matched with the सप्लाई of a प्रयुक्त product.
neglecting एसेट write-offs और असाधारण activities the total जनसांख्यिकी of the उत्पाद between the customer and the service provider remains निरंतर.
Prince William, ड्यूक of Cambridge ( William आर्थर फिलिप Louis ; born 21 जून 1982 ), is the elder son of चार्ल्स, प्रिंस of Wales, और डायना, Princess of Wales, और third-eldest grandchild of Queen एलिज़ाबेथ ii और Prince Philip, ड्यूक of एडिनबर्ग.
he is दूसरी in the लकीर of succession, पीछे उसके पिता, to the thrones of सोलह स्वतंत्र sovereign राज्य known as the Commonwealth realms : the संयुक्त Kingdom, Canada, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, नई जीलैंड, जमैका, बारबाडोस, The बहामा, हरा, Papua New गिनी, the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स, तुवालू, संत Lucia, संत विंसेंट और the Grenadines, बेलीज़, Antigua और बारबूडा, और Saint किट्स और नेविस.
प्रिंस विलियम थी शिक्षित at चार स्कूलों in the United Kingdom and प्राप्त a उपाधि इससे the विश्वविद्यालयों of St एंड्रयूज.
He spent parts of a gap year in Chile, बेलीज़, तंजानिया, and कीनिया where he रै lived और holidayed several टाइम्स.
प्रिंस William रै also लिया kiswahili studies at universities in Kenya and तंजानिया.
he थी commissioned as a लेफ्टिनेंट in the Blues और रॉयल्स Regiment of the Household प्यादे —serving with his brother प्रिंस Harry —and, two years बाद, अर्जित उसके विंग्स by completing पायलट प्रशिक्षण at royal Air फ़ोर्स College Cranwell.
in 2009, he transferred to the royal Air फ़ोर्स, थी प्रचारित to Flight लेफ्टिनेंट and underwent helicopter उड़ती प्रशिक्षण in order to become a full-time पायलट साथ the ढूंढें और Rescue फ़ोर्स.
in 2010, he समाप्त his सामान्य and special-to-type helicopter training और went on to RAF Valley on no. 22 Squadron performing co-pilot duties on board a Sea King ढूंढें और rescue हेलीकाप्टर.
Prince विलियम शादीशुदा उसके longtime girlfriend, Catherine Middleton, on 29 अप्रैल 2011 at Westminster ऐबी.
घंटों prior to उसके विवाह, Prince विलियम was created Duke of Cambridge, अर्ल of strathearn, और सामन्त carrickfergus.
deandre Cortez रास्ता ( born जुलाई 28, 1990 ), better known by उसके stage name Soulja Boy Tell 'Em, or simply Soulja लड़के, is an American rapper, रिकार्ड producer, actor, and उद्योगों.
In सितंबर 2007, his सिंगल `` Crank कि ( soulja लड़के ) `` पहुँचे क्रमांक एक on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100.
The सिंगल थी initially self-published on the अंतरजाल, और it बाद became a number-one hit in the United राज्य for सात non-consecutive सप्ताह starting in September 2007.
on अगस्त 17 Way थी सूचीबद्ध at # 18 on the Forbes सूची of Hip-Hop Cash किंग्स of 2010 earning $ 7 million for कि year.
रास्ता has फिलहाल released three स्टुडियो एल्बम and एक स्वतंत्र album : his debut studio एल्बम Souljaboytellem.com ( 2007 ) थी certified प्लेटिनम by the RIAA.
however, उसके अगला दो albums, iSouljaBoyTellem ( 2008 ) and the DeAndre Way ( 2010 ) किया नहीं match the वाणिज्यिक success of his डेब्यू, the latter तभी selling 100,000 copies, despite the कामयाबी of अनेक singles आरपार both albums, ऐसे as `` Kiss Me thru the Phone `` and `` फेरे my Swag On `` ( iSouljaBoyTellem ) और `` pretty लड़के Swag `` ( The DeAndre Way ).
इस was मुख्यतः due to negotiation problems with Interscope Records जिससे meant a limited amount of रिकॉर्ड were बना उपलब्धियाँ to the पब्लिक.
as of 2011, Way रै confirmed he is working on उसके चौथी studio album, entitled USA ड्रे, जिससे will be released in 2013.
the इलेक्ट्रॉन हस्तांतरण chain in the mitochondrion is the site of oxidative phosphorylation in eukaryotes.
the NADH and succinate generated in the citric एसिड साईकिल हैं oxidized, providing energy to power ATP synthase.
photosynthetic electron transport chain of the thylakoid membrane.
An electron transport chain ( ETC ) युगल electron ट्रांसफ़र between an इलेक्ट्रॉन दाता ( ऐसे as NADH ) और an electron acceptor ( ऐसे as O2 ) साथ the ट्रांसफ़र of H+ ions ( protons ) across a झिल्ली.
the resulting electrochemical proton gradient is used to generate रासायनिक उर्जा in the रूप of एडीनोसिन ट्राइफॉस्फेट ( ATP ).
इलेक्ट्रॉन हस्तांतरण chains are the cellular mechanisms प्रयुक्त लिये extracting energy इससे sunlight in photosynthesis and also इससे redox प्रतिक्रियाएँ, such as the oxidation of sugars ( respiration ).
in chloroplasts, light drives the परिवर्तन of जल to ऑक्सीजन और nadP+ to nadph साथ transfer of H+ ions across chloroplast membranes.
In mitochondria, it is the परिवर्तन of oxygen to water, NADH to NAD+ and succinate to fumarate कि are जरूरी to generate the प्रोटॉन अनुपात.
इलेक्ट्रॉन transport जंजीरों are प्रमुख साइट of असामयिक इलेक्ट्रॉन leakage to ऑक्सीजन, generating superoxide और potentially resulting in increased oxidative तनाव.
Tramadol hydrochloride ( trademarked as conzip, ryzolt, Ultracet, ultram in the यूएसए, ralivia, zytram xl durella { CR-100/200 mg } in Canada or adolonta in स्पेन ) is a centrally एक्टिंग synthetic analgesic प्रयुक्त to treat मॉडरेट to moderately severe पीड़ा.
the ड्रग रै a चौड़ी range of अनुप्रयोग, including उपचार of rheumatoid गठिया, restless legs syndrome, motor neurone disease and fibromyalgia.
it was launched and marketed as tramal by the जर्मनी फार्मास्युटिकल company grünenthal gmbh in 1977.
Tramadol is a weak μ-opioid receptor agonist that भी induces serotonin रिलीज और inhibits the reuptake of norepinephrine.
tramadol is metabolized to O-desmethyltramadol, a significantly more potent μ-opioid agonist.
tramadol and इसके प्रमुख metabolite ( s ) हैं distinguished from other अधिक potent opioid agonists by relative selectivity for μ-opioid receptors.
बर्नार्ड Lawrence `` Bernie '' Madoff ( ; born April 29, 1938 ) is an American former stockbroker, investment advisor, फाइनेंसर, and श्वेत collar criminal.
He is the former non-executive Chairman of the नैस्डैक stock market, और the admitted ऑपरेटर of a Ponzi योजना कि is considered to be the largest वित्तीय fraud in U.S. इतिहास.
madoff founded the वॉल गली firm Bernard L. Madoff निवेश प्रतिभूति llc in 1960, और was इसके अध्यक्ष जबतक his arrest on December 11, 2008.
The firm थी एक of the शीर्ष market maker businesses on वॉल Street, which bypassed `` specialist '' firms by सीधे executing orders over the काउंटर from retail brokers.
he employed at the firm his brother Peter as Senior Managing Director और Chief Compliance Officer ; Peter has since महरूम sentenced to 10 years in prison.
Peter 's बेटी shana madoff as the firm 's नियम और compliance officer और attorney, और उसके बेटे Andrew and चिह्नित ( Mark committed suicide by hanging exactly दो years बाद उसके father 's गिरफ़्तार ).
On December 10, 2008, madoff 's बेटे told अधिकारियों that उनके पिता had confessed to them that the asset प्रबन्धन ईकाई of his firm थी a massive Ponzi scheme, और quoted उसे as describing it as `` one बिग lie. ''
the following दिन, एफबीआई एजेंटों arrested madoff और चार्ज him with one count of प्रतिभूति fraud.
The U.S. Securities and एक्सचेंज आयोग ( सेक ) था previously conducted investigations into madoff 's business practices, लकिन किया not uncover the massive fraud.
In कूच 2009, madoff pleaded अपराधी to 11 federal felonies और admitted to turning उसके माल management कारोबार into a massive पेन्शन scheme that झांसे हज़ारों of investors of अरबों of डॉलर.
madoff said he began the पेन्शन scheme in the early 1990s.
However, federal investigators मानना the fraud began as जल्दी as the 1970s, and those charged साथ recovering the missing money मानना the investment operation may never have महरूम legitimate.
The राशि missing from क्लाएंट accounts, including fabricated gains, was almost $ 65 अरब.
The court-appointed trustee estimated वास्तविक losses to निवेशकों of $ 18 अरब.
On जून 29, 2009, he थी sentenced to 150 सालो in थाना, the अधिकतम अनुमत.
Administrative Professionals Day ( भी ज्ञात as secretaries Day or Admin दिन ) is an unofficial secular अवकाश observed in several देशों to recognize the कार्य of secretaries, administrative assistants, receptionists, and other administrative support पेशेवर.
in North America, it is celebrated on the बुधवार of the last पूरा सप्ताह of April ( April 24 in 2013 ).
In France it is celebrated on the तीसरा गुरुवार in अप्रैल ( April 18 in 2013 ).
In Australia it is मनाये on the first शुक्रवार in may
a quasi-judicial body is an एंटिटी such as an arbitrator or tribunal board, generally of a public प्रशासनिक एजेंसी, जिससे has शक्तियां and procedures resembling those of a court of law or न्यायधीश, and जिससे is obligated to objectively determine facts और draw conclusions from उन्हें so as to provide the basis of an official action.
Such क्रियाएँ are able to उपाय a situation or impose विधिक दंड, और may affect the legal अधिकारों, कर्तव्य or privileges of विशिष्ट पार्टियों.
स्मारक of tycho ब्राहे and Johannes कॅप्लर in प्राग
Tycho ब्राहे ( 14 December 154624 अक्तूबर 1601 ), born tyge ottesen ब्राहे, was a Danish nobleman ज्ञात लिये his accurate and comprehensive astronomical and ग्रहीय observations.
he थी born in स्कैनिया, then part of डेनमार्क, now part of modern-day Sweden.
Tycho was well known in his आजीवन as an astronomer और alchemist.
In his De nova स्टेला ( On the नई star ) of 1573, he refuted the aristotelian विश्वास in an अपरिवर्तनशील celestial फ्रेम.
उसके precise माप indicated कि `` नई सितारों, '' ( stellae novae, अभी known as supernovae ) in particular that of 1572, lacked the parallax अपेक्षित in sub-lunar phenomena, और यहूद therefore नहीं `` atmospheric '' tailless धूमकेतुओं as previously believed, but were above the माहौल and moon.
using समान माप he showed कि धूमकेतुओं यहूद also not atmospheric phenomena, as previously thought, और must pass through the माना `` अपरिवर्तनीय '' celestial spheres.
As an astronomer, tycho worked to combine कया he देखी as the geometrical benefits of the Copernican system with the philosophical benefits of the Ptolemaic प्रणाली into उसके अपना model of the universe, the Tychonic system.
Furthermore, he was the last of the major naked eye खगोलशास्त्रियों, working without telescopes लिये his observations.
Tycho Brahe थी granted an estate on the island of hven और the funding to build the Uraniborg, an early शोध institute, where he built large astronomical यंत्र और took अनेक careful माप, और later stjerneborg, भूमिगत, जब he खोजा कि उसके यंत्र in the former were not sufficiently steady.
on the island ( on which he demonstrated निरंकुश character और बर्ताव toward the निवासियों ) he संस्थापित manufactories ऐसे as paper-making to provide सामग्री लिये मुद्रण his परिणाम.
After मतभिन्नता साथ the new डैनिश king ईसाई iv in 1597, he was invited by the Bohemian किंग और Holy Roman emperor Rudolph II to Prague, where he became the आधिकारिक imperial astronomer.
He निर्मित the नई observatory at benátky nad jizerou.
Here, from 1600 जबतक उसके मौत in 1601, he was assisted by Johannes कॅप्लर जो later used Tycho 's astronomical आंकड़ा to develop Kepler 's कानून of ग्रहीय गति.
Guro District ( guro-gu ) is a ज़िला of Seoul, दक्षिण कोरियाई, which was separated इससे yeongdeungpo ज़िला on April 1, 1980.
Located in the southwestern part of the city, जहाँ besides Yangcheon District और geumcheon ज़िला guro ज़िला has an important स्थिति as a हस्तांतरण link जिससे contains railroads, जमीन routes इससे the बाकी of Seoul to the दक्षिण of the country.
the gyeongbu and Gyeongin railway lines connect सियोल to Busan and इंचियोन.
In जोड, सियोल Metropolitan Subway lines 1, 2, और 7, and प्रमुख राजमार्गों intersect in guro ज़िला.
The name guro originates from the legend that नौ ( ) old men ( Korean : ro ) enjoyed आयु in the ज़िला.
a digital औद्योगिक complex is स्तिथ in guro District.
The guro डिजिटल Industrial जटिल, which निभाई a leading industrial भूमिका mainly साथ textile निर्माण, dressmaking और other labour-intensive उद्योग in 1967, has been rapidly changed into an it industrial जटिल.
This जटिल played a pivotal role in the economic विकास of the दक्षिण कोरियाई 's विकास era, referred to as the `` Miracle on the Han नदी ``, और भी contributed 10 percent of national export in the 1970s.
Twenty-one percent of the कुल area of guro District is a प्रतिबंधित मण्डल to be used as a greenbelt साथ the only arboretum in सियोल.
the zone is changing into a जीवंत ज़िला as विशाल labour-intensive कारखानों are moving from the area और the council is विकासशील what it शर्तें इसके four zones.
An `` e-government `` प्रणाली आधारित on this hosted the अंतरराष्ट्रीय e-participation फ़ोरम on फ़रवरी 7–9, 2007, साथ the participation of more than thirty-seven देशों.
The फ़ोरम was शुभारम्भ with the theme `` Promoting Democracy and क्षेत्रीय Development '' और twenty-five mayors सहित André santini ( issy-les-moulineaux, फ़्रांस ), Kevin foy ( Chapel हिल, US ), Apirak Kosayothin ( बैंकॉक, थाईलैंड ), uvais मोहम्मद Emthiyas ( Colombo, Sri लंका ), and world experts ऐसे as Dr विलियम H. dutton ( निदेशक of ऑक्सफोर्ड Internet Institute at the विश्वविद्यालयों of Oxford, uk ) and dr ari-veiko Anttiroiko ( प्राध्यापक at the University of Tampere, Finland ) participated in the forum.
The guro Declaration, adopted during the फ़ोरम, aims to नियत up a portal साईट लिये e-government development और to establish a concrete प्रोजेक्ट in अनुक्रम to bridge the digital divide among the संसार 's cities.
This practice रै been recognised लिये providing a new important कदम in the विकास of e-democracy.
the e-participation forum was a कुंजी factor लिये guro to खेल the अग्रणी role in bridging the डिजिटल divide among cities, to provide i.t. उद्यमों स्तिथ in Guro डिजिटल औद्योगिक जटिल the opportunity to launch into the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मार्केट, to improve इसके image और become a global नेता to concrete e-democracy.
the international e-participation forum on फ़रवरी 7–9, 2007
a wonton ( also spelled wantan, wanton, or wuntun in transcription from cantonese ; मंदारिन : húndùn ) is a type of dumpling commonly found in a number of Chinese cuisines.
अनेक लोगों were involved in the आविष्कार of रेडियो as we अभी जान it.
अनेक possible methods of wireless communication यहूद considered, including inductive और capacitive प्रेरण और transmission through the ground, however the विधि used for radio today exclusively involves the हस्तांतरण and रिसेप्शन of electromagnetic लहरें.
After early speculation on the विषय, प्रायोगिक work on the connection between electricity और magnetism began around 1820 साथ the कार्य of hans ईसाई ओर्स्टेड और जारी with the कार्य of andré-marie एम्पीयर, Joseph Henry, and माइकल Faraday.
ये investigations culminated in the complete सिद्धान्त of विद्युत्चुम्बकत्व विकसित by James क्लर्क मैक्सवेल.
This सिद्धान्त described the सैद्धांतिक आधार of the propagation of electromagnetic लहरें.
बाद मैक्सवेल 's सिद्धान्त was published अनेक लोगों experimented with wireless संचार, कुछ intentionally using Maxwell 's theory कुछ नहीं.
it is considered likely that the पहला जानबूझकर हस्तांतरण of a signal by अर्थात् of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक लहरें was performed by David Edward Hughes around 1880, although इस थी considered to be induction at the समय.
The पहला व्यवस्थित और unequivocal हस्तांतरण of EM waves was performed by Heinrich Rudolf हर्ट्ज़ and वर्णित in papers published in 1887 और 1890.
हर्ट्ज़ famously considered these results as होने of little practical मान.
बाद Hertz 's कार्य अनेक लोगों were शामिल in the विकास of components और theory involved with the हस्तांतरण and रिसेप्शन of electromagnetic लहरें.
अन्य, notably Guglielmo मार्कोनी, यहूद चिंतित with व्यावहारिक improvements and the commercial application of रेडियो to wireless telegraphy.
Later on Reginald A. fessenden became the पहला to भेजें an ऑडियो signal by अर्थात् of electromagnetic waves.
स्कर्वी is a बीमारी resulting इससे a deficiency of विटामिन C, which is required for the संश्लेषण of collagen in इंसानो.
The chemical नाम for विटामिन C, ascorbic acid, is derived इससे the लैटिन नाम of scurvy, scorbutus, which also provides the क्रियाशील scorbutic ( `` of, characterized by or having to do साथ scurvy '' ).
स्कर्वी often presents itself initially as लक्षण of malaise और lethargy, followed by गठन of धब्बे on the skin, spongy मसूड़ों, and bleeding इससे the mucous झिल्लियों.
धब्बे are most abundant on the जांघों and legs, and a व्यक्ति साथ the ailment looks pale, feels उदास, and is partially immobilized.
as scurvy अग्रिम, there can be खोलें, suppurating wounds, loss of teeth, jaundice, ज्वर, neuropathy और मौत.
स्कर्वी was at एक समय आम among sailors, pirates and अन्य aboard जहाजों at sea longer than perishable fruits and vegetables could be भंडारित ( subsisting बजाय only on cured and salted meats and dried दाने ) and by सैनिको similarly वंचित of ये भोजन लिये extended अवधि.
it थी वर्णित by Hippocrates ( c. 460 BC–c. 380 bc ), और हर्बल cures for स्कर्वी have been ज्ञात in अनेक देशी संस्कृतियों since prehistory.
स्कर्वी थी one of the limiting कारकों of marine सफर, often killing large numbers of the passengers और crew on long-distance voyages.
इस became a significant issue in Europe इससे the beginning of the modern era in the आयु of डिस्कवरी in the 15th century, continuing to play a significant role through संसार War i in the 20th century.
जबकि आज scurvy is ज्ञात to be caused by a nutritional deficiency, until the isolation of vitamin c और सीधा evidence of its link to scurvy in 1932, numerous theories and treatments were proposed, प्रायः on छोटी or no प्रायोगिक आंकड़ा.
इस inconsistency is attributed to the कमी of vitamin C as a पृथक अवधारणा, an अक्षमता to reliably कड़ी different foods ( notably उपस्थित in fresh citrus, watercress, और अंग मांस ) to scurvy.
an additional concept required to समझे scurvy was the degradation of vitamin C by एक्सपोज़र to air and copper and other transition metal salts ऐसे as those of iron, thus बदलना the links of foods to स्कर्वी over समय.
उपचार by fresh food, विशेषकर citrus fruit, was periodically implemented, as it था महरूम चूंकि प्राचीनता.
however जबतक the 1930s, treatment थी inconsistent, with अनेक अप्रभावी treatments used into the 20th century.
it थी a Scottish सर्जन in the royal नेवी, जेम्स lind जो पहला proved it could be treated साथ citrus fruit in प्रयोग he वर्णित in his 1753 किताब, a Treatise of the स्कर्वी, हालांकि उसके सलाह was not implemented by the Royal नेवी for अनेक decades.
in infants, scurvy is sometimes referred to as barlow 's disease, named बाद Sir Thomas Barlow, a अंग्रेजों physician जो वर्णित it.
However, barlow 's disease may भी refer to mitral वाल्व prolapse.
Other eponyms लिये scurvy शामिल moeller 's बीमारी और cheadle 's disease.
स्कर्वी करता नहीं occur in most animals क्युकी they can synthesize उनके own vitamin c.
However, humans and other उच्चतर primates ( the simians - बंदरों और apes - और tarsiers ), guinea pigs, most or all bats, और some species of पक्षियों और fish lack an एंजाइम ( L-gulonolactone oxidase ) necessary लिये ऐसे संश्लेषण और जरूर obtain vitamin c through their diet.
Vitamin c is फैली in plant ऊतकों, साथ विशेषकर high concentrations occurring in citrus फल ( oranges, lemons, limes, grapefruits ), टमाटर, आलू, पत्तागोभी, और green मिर्च.
आयरन is a रासायनिक तत्व with the symbol fe ( इससे ) और atomic number 26.
it is a मेटल in the first परिवर्तन series.
It is the most common element ( by द्रव्यमान ) forming the ग्रह धरती as a whole, forming much of Earth 's बाहरी and inner core.
it is the fourth most common element in the धरती 's क्रस्ट.
Iron 's very common presence in रॉकी planets जैसे Earth is due to its abundant उत्पादन as a परिणाम of fusion in high-mass सितारों, जहाँ the production of nickel-56 ( which decays to the most common isotope of आयरन ) is the पिछला नाभिकीय संलयन reaction कि is ऊष्माक्षेपी.
इस कल्याणकारी radioactive निकल to become the पिछला तत्व to be produced before पतन of a सुपरनोवा लीड to the विस्फोटक events that scatter this precursor radionuclide of आयरन abundantly into space.
Like other group 8 elements, आयरन exists in a wide range of ऑक्सीकरण states, −2 to +6, हालांकि +2 और +3 are the most common.
elemental iron occurs in meteoroids and अन्य कम ऑक्सीजन environments, but is reactive to ऑक्सीजन और जल.
Fresh iron surfaces appear lustrous silvery-gray, लकिन oxidize in normal एयर to give hydrated iron आक्साइड, commonly known as चढ़.
नापसंद अनेक other metals which रूप passivating ऑक्साइड layers, आयरन oxides occupy अधिक आवाज़ than आयरन metal, and यूँ आयरन आक्साइड फ्लेक off और expose भैस surfaces लिये संक्षारण.
आयरन metal has महरूम used चूंकि प्राचीन times, though तांबे alloys, which have lower melting temperatures, were used पहला in इतिहास.
pure iron is soft ( softer than एल्युमिनियम ), लकिन is unobtainable by smelting.
the सामग्री is significantly hardened और strengthened by impurities from the smelting प्रक्रम, ऐसे as कार्बन.
A निश्चित proportion of carbon ( between 0.002 % और 2.1 % ) produces स्टील, which may be up to 1000 टाइम्स harder than pure iron.
crude iron metal is produced in धमाका furnaces, जहाँ अयस्क is घटाया by coke to सुअर आयरन, जिससे has a high carbon content.
further refinement साथ ऑक्सीजन reduces the carbon content to the सही proportion to मेक स्टील.
Steels और कम कार्बन iron alloys with other metals ( alloy steels ) are by दूर the most common metals in industrial उपयोग, due to their ग्रेट दायरा of desirable properties और the प्रचुरता of आयरन.
Iron रासायनिक compounds, जिससे शामिल अमिश्रित और ferric यौगिकों, have many uses.
आयरन ऑक्साइड मिश्रित with एल्युमिनियम चूर्ण can be ignited to बनाएँ a थर्माइट reaction, प्रयुक्त in welding and purifying ores.
It फ़ॉर्म शब्दकोष यौगिकों with the हैलोजन्स और the chalcogens.
among its कार्बधातुक यौगिकों is ferrocene, the पहला sandwich यौगिक discovered.
आयरन plays an महत्वपूर्ण role in जीवविज्ञान, forming देवालय with molecular oxygen in हीमोग्लोबिन और myoglobin ; ये दो यौगिकों are आम oxygen हस्तांतरण proteins in vertebrates.
Iron is भी the metal used at the active site of many महत्वपूर्ण redox एंजाइमों dealing with cellular respiration and ऑक्सीकरण and reduction in plants and animals.
The Blue Cross Blue Shield संघ ( BCBSA ) is a संघ of 38 पृथक स्वास्थ्य बीमे organizations और कंपनियाँ in the United States.
Combined, they सीधे or indirectly provide health बीमे to over 99 लाख अमेरिकी.
The इतिहास of ब्लू Cross dates back to 1929, while the इतिहास of ब्लू Shield तिथियाँ to 1939.
The Blue क्रॉस संघ dates back to 1960, जबकि its ब्लू शील्ड बंटवारा was निर्मित in 1948.
the two organizations merged in 1982, forming the current संघ.
a potato chip ( ज्ञात as a चिप in American, Australian, नई Zealand, कनाडाई, Singaporean, Hong Kong, दक्षिण African and jamaican English ; as a कुरकुरे in British English और hiberno-english, और as either a चिप or wafer in भारतीय अंग्रेज़ी ) is a पतला slice of आलू that is deep fried or baked until crunchy.
Potato chips are commonly served as an appetizer, पक्ष dish, or snack.
The basic चिप्स हैं cooked और salted ; अतिरिक्त varieties are manufactured using विभिन्न flavorings और ingredients including seasonings, herbs, मसाले, cheeses, and कृत्रिम एडिटिव.
`` Crisps '', however, may भी refer to many different प्रकार of savory स्नैक products sold in the संयुक्त Kingdom and आयरलैंड, कुछ बना from आलू, but may भी be बना from maize, tapioca or अन्य cereals.
An example of these kinds of savory स्नैक्स is दानव चबाना.
आलू चिप्स are a predominant part of the snack खाना मार्केट in english-speaking countries और numerous अन्य Western nations.
The global potato chip मार्केट उत्पन्न total revenues of US $ 16.4 billion in 2005.
इस accounted for 35.5 % of the total savory स्नैक्स market in कि साल ( us $ 46.1 अरब ).
हेनरी Clay, Sr. ( अप्रैल 12, 1777 – June 29, 1852 ) थी a lawyer, राजनेता और skilled orator जो represented केंटकी in both the सीनेट और in the House of Representatives.
He served तीन different terms as Speaker of the संयुक्त राज्य House of Representatives और थी भी सचिव of State from 1825 to 1829.
he lost his campaigns for अध्यक्ष in 1824, 1832 and 1844.
मिट्टी थी a प्रबल figure in both the पहला and दूसरी Party प्रणालियों.
As a leading war हॉक in 1812, he favored war साथ Britain और played a significant role in अग्रणी the स्वदेश to युद्ध in the War of 1812.
in 1824 he ran लिये अध्यक्ष and lost, but फेंका his electoral votes to जॉन क्विंसी एडम्स, who made him सचिव of state as the jacksonians denounced कया वे considered a `` भ्रष्ट सौदेबाजी. ''
He भागा and खोया again in 1832 and 1844 as the candidate of the Whig पार्टी, जिससे he founded and प्रायः dominated.
मिट्टी was the foremost proponent of the American प्रणाली, fighting लिये an increase in tariffs to foster industry in the United राज्य, the उपयोग of federal funding to build and maintain infrastructure, और a strong नेशनल bank.
He opposed the annexation of Texas, fearing it होता इंजेक्ट the गुलामी समस्या into politics.
मिट्टी also opposed the mexican-american युद्ध और the `` Manifest नियति `` policy of डेमोक्रेट, which लागत him मत in the close 1844 election.
Dubbed the `` Great pacificator, '' मिट्टी brokered important compromises during the nullification संकट and on the slavery issue.
as भाग of the `` Great Triumvirate `` or `` अमर Trio, '' साथ with उसके सहयोगियों Daniel वेबस्टर और John C. calhoun, he थी इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in formulating the Missouri सुलह of 1820 and the सुलह of 1850.
he थी viewed as the primary प्रतिनिधि of Western रूचि in this समूह, and थी given the names `` हेनरी of the वेस्ट '' and `` The Western Star. ''
A वृक्षारोपण मालिक, Clay held स्लेव during उसके lifetime लकिन freed उन्हें in उसके Will.
Abraham Lincoln, the whig नेता in Illinois, was a ग्रेट admirer of मिट्टी, saying he थी `` my ideal of a great man. ''
Lincoln wholeheartedly supported मिट्टी 's आर्थिक programs.

मारविन Gaye ( अप्रैल 2, 1939april 1, 1984 ), born Marvin pentz Gay, jr., थी an American singer-songwriter और musician.
gaye helped to shape the ध्वनि of Motown रिकॉर्ड in the 1960s with a string of हिट्स सहित `` कैसा Sweet it is ( to be Loved by You ) `` and `` i सुना it through the grapevine `` और duet recordings साथ Mary कुएं और Tammi terrell, बाद earning the शीर्षक `` प्रिंस of motown '' and `` Prince of Soul ''.
दौरान the 1970s, Gaye अंकित the concept एल्बम कया 's Going On और Let 's मिलेंगी It On और became among the first artists in motown to ब्रेक away from the reins of इसके production company.
gaye 's बाद रिकार्डिंग influenced several r & B subgenres such as शांत storm and neo-soul.
Following a period in यूरोपीय अंतर्गत a कर निर्वासन in the जल्दी 1980s, Gaye released the 1982 ग्रैमी Award-winning hit `` Sexual healing `` और the मध्यरात्रि प्रेम एल्बम.
Since उसके death in 1984, gaye रै महरूम मरणोपरांत honored by अनेक संस्थानों, including the ग्रैमी आजीवन उपलब्धि पुरस्कार और the Rock और Roll हॉल of कीर्ति.

The chernobyl disaster (, Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) थी a catastrophic नाभिकीय accident that occurred on 26 अप्रैल 1986 at the Chernobyl नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in Ukraine ( तब officially the यूक्रेनी ssr ), जिससे was under the सीधा jurisdiction of the सेंट्रल अधिकारियों of the Soviet Union.
an विस्फोट and fire released विशाल quantities of रेडियोसक्रिय particles into the atmosphere, जिससे स्प्रेड over much of the western ussr और यूरोपीय.
the chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst नाभिकीय शक्ति plant accident in इतिहास, और is एक of तभी two classified as a स्तर 7 event on the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नाभिकीय Event Scale ( the अन्य होने the Fukushima Daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति in 2011 ).
the बैटल to contain the contamination और avert a वृहद प्रलय ultimately involved over 500,000 workers और लागत an अनुमानित 18 अरब rubles.
the आधिकारिक सोवियत casualty गिनती of 31 deaths रै been disputed, और long-term प्रभाव ऐसे as cancers and deformities हैं still being accounted for.

mrs. Claus is the बीवी of सांता Claus, the Christmas gift-bringer in North American and European क्रिसमस tradition.

Her पहला name is a रहस्य, हालांकि she has been referred to as मरियम, जेसिका, layla, annette, Heidi, or मार्था.
HijackThis ( भी hijackthis or HJT ) is an खोलें source enumerating औजार लिये microsoft Windows originally created by merijn Bellekom, और बाद sold to ट्रेंड सूक्ष्म.
the program is notable for लक्ष्यीकरण browser-hijacking methods, rather than relying on a database of known spyware.
It scans a user 's computer quickly, and प्रदर्शक browser hijacking locations, showing what प्रविष्टियां हैं वहीँ.
hijackthis is used primarily for diagnosis of browser hijacking, as uninformed use of इसके removal facilities can cause significant तन्त्र क्षति to a computer.
HijackThis करता नहीं हटाएँ or detect स्पाइवेयर ; it सूचियाँ सबसे आम locations जहाँ browser hijacking कार्यकलाप can occur.
ब्राउजर hijacking can कारण मैलवेयर to be संस्थापित on a कंप्यूटर.
on फ़रवरी 16, 2012, Trend सूक्ष्म released the hijackthis source code as खोलें source और it is अभी available on the SourceForge site.
काठी Creek रिकॉर्ड is an अमरीकी रिकार्ड लेबल आधारित in Omaha, Nebraska.
Started as a college क्लास project on उद्यमिता, the label थी संस्थापित by Mike Mogis और जस्टिन oberst in 1993 ( as lumberjack Records ).
Mogis जल्द turned over his role in the कम्पनी to robb Nansel.
The लेबल is named बाद काठी क्रीक सड़क, a गली that cuts through the ईस्ट पक्ष of midtown ओमाहा, and the beginnings of a scene जिनकी members included conor Oberst ( then a solo कलाकार, फिलहाल of उज्जवल Eyes, conor Oberst और the Mystic Valley बैंड, desaparecidos and Monsters of लोक ), Tim Kasher ( then of Slowdown वर्जिनिया, फिलहाल of Cursive और The Good जीवन ), and अन्य.
Collectively, they यहूद known unofficially as the `` creekers ''.
Saddle क्रीक पहला appeared in print on a show flyer, offering to `` खर्च an संध्या with Saddle Creek '' ( बाद to be the शीर्षक of the label 's DVD. )
Saddle क्रीक became an incorporated entity as a result of a क्लास प्रोजेक्ट on entrepreneurship.
वितरण is handled by the वैकल्पिक वितरण Alliance, जिससे is अंतर्गत the warner म्यूज़िक Group umbrella.
काठी क्रीक Records continues to be the flagship label of a स्टाइल of म्यूज़िक पुकारा `` the Omaha ध्वनि ``, characterized by a पतला देश twang.
This is increasingly inaccurate, हालांकि, with the rise of अधिक electronic sounds ऐसे as those favored by The Faint और Broken Spindles.
The eclectic sounds of Saddle क्रीक 's disparate member bands is somewhat explained by उनके इतिहास ; a number of the original सदस्यों of the लेबल attended grade स्कूल together.
A `` सिस्टर label '', of sorts, to काठी Creek is Team Love, प्रारंभ by Conor oberst in 2004.
the लेबल opened बाहें to उनके पहला bands not based in Omaha in 2001 साथ रिलीज by अभी It 's ओवरहेड और sorry परिचय Dresden.
अन्य non-Nebraskan artists followed, including लॉस Angeles 's rilo Kiley, Eric Bachmann ( formerly leader of archers of loaf और कुटिल उंगलियाँ from North कैरोलिना ), Georgie James ( वॉशिंगटन d.C. ), Two gallants ( San फ्रांसिस्को ), and most recently टोकियो पुलिस Club ( Toronto ).
In 2005, खर्च an Evening साथ काठी क्रीक, a documentary detailing the पहला ten सालो of the रिकार्ड लेबल 's इतिहास, थी released.
the DVD सुविधाएँ extensive साक्षात्कार with the काठी क्रीक bands, archival footage, और rare live performances.
On जून 8, 2007, the label opened उनके अपना म्यूज़िक स्थान named Slowdown ( after the group Slowdown वर्जिनिया ), स्तिथ in downtown ओमाहा, नेब्रास्का.
The following is a सूची of episodes लिये the टेलीविज़न show पूरा House.
In total, वहीँ यहूद 192 एपीसोड फिल्माया लिये the show over the कोर्स of इसके आठ seasons, from 1987 to 1995.
पूरा हाउस is a situation comedy जिससे chronicles a widowed father 's struggles of उठाने उसके three यंग daughters और the जीवनदान that they have touched.
The patriarch of the परिवार, Danny ( bob Saget ), invites his brother-in-law Jesse ( जॉन Stamos ) और his बेहतरीन friend जॉय ( डेव coulier ), to help उठाएँ उसके children ( Candace cameron, jodie Sweetin, और मरियम Kate/Ashley olsen ), after उसके wife थी मारे during an ऑटोमोबाइल दुर्घटना involving a नशे ड्राइवर.
After एपीसोड 88 और 89, जेसी marries बेकी ( लोरी loughlin ), और they move into the attic.
तब, बाद एपीसोड 104 और 105, बेकी और जेसी have twin लड़कों named nicky और एलेक्स ( डेनियल और Kevin Renteria/Blake and Dylan Tuomy-Wilhoit ).
The श्रेणी ends with एपीसोड 192, `` मिशेल यात्राएँ Again Part 2 '', जब मिशेल loses her memory और the family tries to restore it.
Notice of स्टैम्प Act of 1765 in Newspaper
अमरीकी अखबारों reacted to the स्टैम्प Act with anger और पूर्वानुमान of the demise of journalism.
The स्टैम्प Act 1765 ( short शीर्षक Duties in American colonies अधिनियम 1765 ; 5 George III, c. 12 ) imposed a सीधा कर by the अंग्रेजों पार्लियामेंट specifically on the colonies of अंग्रेजों अमेरिका, और it required that अनेक printed materials in the colonies be उत्पादित on stamped पेपर produced in लंदन, carrying an embossed revenue stamp.
ये मुद्रित materials were विधिक documents, मैगज़ीन, newspapers and अनेक अन्य प्रकार of paper प्रयुक्त throughout the colonies.
जैसे पिछला taxes, the स्टैम्प कर था to be सशुल्क in मान्य British करेंसी, नहीं in colonial paper धन.
The purpose of the कर was to help pay लिये सैनिकों stationed in North अमेरिका बाद the अंग्रेजों victory in the सात Years ' War.
the British सरकारी felt that the colonies were the प्राथमिक beneficiaries of इस सैन्य उपस्थिति, and चाहिए pay at तनिक a portion of the expense.
The स्टैम्प अधिनियम मिले great प्रतिरोध in the colonies.
The colonies sent no representatives to Parliament, और इसलिए had no influence over what कर were उठाया, कैसा वे were levied, or how they would be spent.
Many colonists माना it a उल्लंघन of their rights as अंग्रेजो to be taxed without उनके consent —consent that तभी the औपनिवेशिक legislatures could ग्रान्ट.
औपनिवेशिक assemblies भेजा petitions and विरोध.
the Stamp Act Congress आयोजित in New York City, reflecting the पहला significant joint औपनिवेशिक response to any अंग्रेजों माप, भी petitioned Parliament and the किंग.
Local विरोध groups, led by colonial merchants और landowners, स्थापित connections through पत्राचार that created a loose coalition that extended इससे New इंग्लैण्ड to Georgia.
Protests and demonstrations initiated by the Sons of स्वतंत्रता प्रायः turned violent and destructive as the masses became शामिल.
बहुत जल्द सब स्टैम्प tax distributors were सहमे into resigning their commissions, और the कर थी never effectively एकत्रित.
विपक्ष to the स्टैम्प अधिनियम was not सीमित to the colonies.
British merchants और manufacturers, whose निर्यात to the colonies यहूद threatened by औपनिवेशिक economic समस्याएं exacerbated by the कर, also pressured पार्लियामेंट.
the अधिनियम थी repealed on कूच 18, 1766 as a पदार्थ of expedience, लकिन Parliament affirmed इसके शक्ति to legislate लिये the colonies “in सब cases whatsoever” by भी गुजर the Declaratory Act.
वहीँ followed a series of new कर और regulations, likewise opposed by the colonists.
The episode played a प्रमुख भूमिका in धमक the grievances और enabling the व्यवस्थित औपनिवेशिक resistance कि led to the American Revolution in 1775.
PT-105 underway.
PT नौकाएँ were a variety of torpedo-armed fast आक्रमण शिल्प used by the संयुक्त राज्य नेवी in संसार War ii to आक्रमण larger surface ships.
`` PT '' is the us hull classification symbol लिये `` पैट्रोल Torpedo ''.
The pt नाव squadrons were nicknamed `` the mosquito बेड़े ''.
The जापानी पुकारा them `` Devil नौकाएँ ''.
the original pre– World War I torpedo boats यहूद designed with `` displacement '' hulls.
वे विस्थापित up to 300 tons और the शीर्ष गति थी.
The pt boats used in संसार युद्ध II were built using the planing -type हल रूप विकसित लिये रेसिंग नौकाएँ.
They were much छोटी ( 30–75 tons ) और तेज़ ( 35–40 knots ).
दोनो प्रकार यहूद designed to strike at larger warships साथ torpedoes, using relatively ऊँची speed to मिलेंगी close, and छोटी आकार to avoid being spotted और hit by gunfire.
वे यहूद much कम expensive than विशाल warships.
pt boats यहूद much तेज़, छोटी, and सस्ता than conventional ( विस्थापन hull ) vessels.
दौरान World War II, American PT boats सगाई enemy destroyers और numerous other सतह शिल्प, ranging इससे small नौकाएँ to large सप्लाई ships.
pt नौकाएँ also संचालित as gunboats विरूद्ध enemy छोटी शिल्प, such as कराया barges used by the जापानी forces for inter-island हस्तांतरण.
शुभ Friday is a धार्मिक holiday observed primarily by ईसाइयों commemorating the crucifixion of Jesus Christ और his मौत at Calvary.
The holiday is observed दौरान पावन सप्ताह as part of the paschal Triduum on the शुक्रवार preceding Easter Sunday, and may coincide with the यहूदी observance of passover.
It is also ज्ञात as पावन Friday, Great Friday, Black शुक्रवार, or ईस्टर शुक्रवार, हालांकि the latter properly refers to the Friday in Easter week.
Based on the विवरण of the canonical gospels, the Crucifixion of Jesus थी सबसे संभावित to have महरूम on a Friday ( the day पहले the sabbath ) ( ).
the estimated year of the Crucifixion is ad 33, by दो different groups, and originally as ad 34 by इसहाक़ न्यूटन via the मतभेद between the biblical और Julian calendars and the crescent of the चंद्रमा.
a third विधि, using a completely अलग खगोलीय approach based on a lunar crucifixion अंधेरा and ग्रहण मॉडल ( सतत with apostle Peter 's सन्दर्भ to a `` moon of रक्त '' in Acts 2:20 ), points to शुक्रवार, 3 April AD 33.
The Great जलाशय is the largest area of endorheic watersheds in North America.
It is noted for दोनो its arid शर्तें और its जलाशय and range स्थलाकृति कि varies from the उत्तर अमरीकी कम point at Badwater Basin to the highest पाइंट of the contiguous संयुक्त राज्य, less than दूर at the summit of माउंट व्हिटनी.
the प्रदेश spans अनेक physiographic divisions, biomes / ecoregions, और रेगिस्तान.
रास्टर may refer to:
Raster ग्राफिक्स, graphical तकनीकों using arrays of पिक्सेल मान
रास्टर ग्राफिक्स editor, a कंप्यूटर program
Raster scan, the पैटर्न of चित्र readout, हस्तांतरण, storage, और पुनर्निर्माण in television और कंप्यूटर images
rasterisation, or rasterization, conversion of a वेक्टर image to a रास्टर चित्र
Raster चित्र processor, or rip, a component of a printing system कि performs rasterisation
रास्टर interrupt, a computer इन्टरनेट सिग्नल
Raster to वेक्टर, an चित्र conversion process
रास्टर बार, an effect used in कंप्यूटर demos
Raster-Noton, a रिकार्ड लेबल
Rastrum, a यंत्र प्रयुक्त in मध्यकालीन music manuscripts to draw स्टाफ lines
रास्टर Document ऑब्जेक्ट, a संचिका format
बियोवुल्फ़ ( ; Old English : ) is a legendary Geatish नायिका and later turned king in the एपिक कविता नामित बाद उसे, one of the oldest surviving pieces of साहित्य in the अंग्रेज़ी भाषा.
The आक्रमण on पर्ल Harbor ( called हवाई आपरेशन or आपरेशन ai by the Japanese इम्पीरियल सामान्य मुख्यालय ( आपरेशन z in नियोजन ) and the Battle of Pearl हार्बर ) was a surprise सैन्य strike conducted by the इम्पीरियल Japanese नेवी against the संयुक्त States naval base at पर्ल Harbor, Hawaii, on the morning of दिसम्बर 7, 1941 ( दिसम्बर 8 in जापानी ).
इससे the standpoint of the defenders, the attack commenced at 7:48 a.m. हवाई Time.
The attack थी intended as a preventive कार्रवाई in order to रखना the u.S. प्रशांत Fleet from दखल with सैन्य क्रियाएँ the Empire of जापानी थी planning in southeast Asia विरूद्ध विदेशी territories of the संयुक्त Kingdom, the Netherlands, और the संयुक्त States.
the base was attacked by 353 जापानी fighters, bombers and torpedo planes in दो लहरें, शुभारम्भ from six aircraft carriers.
सब आठ u.S. नेवी battleships were क्षतिग्रस्त, साथ four being sunk.
दो of ये यहूद बाद raised, और साथ the बाकी four repaired, six battleships returned to सेवा later in the war.
The Japanese भी sank or damaged three cruisers, तीन destroyers, an anti-aircraft training ship, और one minelayer.
188 u.S. aircraft यहूद नष्ट ; 2,402 अमेरिकी were killed और 1,282 wounded.
Important आधार संस्थापना such as the power station, डॉकयार्ड, मेंटेनेंस, और fuel and torpedo storage facilities, as well as the submarine पियर और headquarters building ( भी home of the intelligence section ) were नहीं attacked.
Japanese नुकसान were लाइट : 29 वायुयान and पाँच midget submarines खोया, और 65 servicemen killed or wounded.
One Japanese sailor was captured.
The आक्रमण आए as a profound shock to the American लोगों and led सीधे to the अमरीकी प्रविष्टि into संसार युद्ध ii in दोनो the Pacific और यूरोपीय थिएटर.
The following day ( दिसम्बर 8 ), the संयुक्त States घोषित war on जापानी.
घरेलू support लिये non-interventionism, जिससे था been दमदार, disappeared.
Clandestine support of ब्रिटेन ( for example the Neutrality पैट्रोल ) was replaced by क्रियाशील गठबंधन.
Subsequent operations by the U.S. prompted जर्मनी और इटली to घोषित war on the u.S. on दिसम्बर 11, which was reciprocated by the U.S. the वही day.
There were numerous historical precedents लिये unannounced military action by जापानी.
However, the कमी of any औपचारिक warning, particularly while negotiations यहूद still जाहिर ongoing, led President Franklin D. रूज़वेल्ट to proclaim दिसम्बर 7, 1941, `` a तिथि which होगा live in infamy ``.
U.S. रूट 85 ( US 85 ) is a north–south United राज्य highway कि रनों लिये in the Mountain - Northern मैदान states of the संयुक्त राज्य.
the दक्षिणी टर्मिनस of the route is at the United States-Mexico किनारा in el पासो, Texas, connecting साथ Mexican संघीय Highway 45.
the उत्तरी टर्मिनस is at the United states-canada किनारा in Fortuna, उत्तर Dakota, जहाँ the route continues north as saskatchewan राजमार्ग 35.
in दोनो the संयुक्त States और saskatchewan, कनाडा the route is known as the canam राजमार्ग.
Sections of us 85 are considered part of the Theodore Roosevelt एक्सप्रेसवे.
the संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्षीय election of 1968 was the 46th quadrennial presidential election, held on मंगलवार, November 5, 1968.
the Republican nominee, former vice-president Richard Nixon, जीती the चुनाव over the लोकतांत्रिक nominee, लाज़िम vice-president ह्यूबर्ट humphrey.
Nixon भागा on a अभियान कि promised to restore law और order to the स्वदेश 's शहरों, torn by riots और crime.
Analysts have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning चुनाव as it permanently disrupted the नई सौदे Coalition कि had वर्चस्व presidential राजनीती for 36 years.
coming four years बाद Democrat lyndon B. जॉनसन जीती in a ऐतिहासिक landslide, the चुनाव saw the लाज़िम president forced out of the रेस and a रिपब्लिकन निर्वाचित लिये the पहला समय in बारह सालो.
it was a विदारक national experience, conducted दौरान a year of हिंसा कि included the assassination of सिविल rights leader Martin Luther King, jr., और subsequent रेस दंगे आरपार the nation, the assasination of Democratic presidential candidate रॉबर्ट F. Kennedy, widespread विपक्ष to the वियतनाम War आरपार विश्वविद्यालयों campuses, और violent confrontations between पुलिस और anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic नेशनल सम्मेलन as the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी विभाजित again and again.
The election featured the strongest third पार्टी effort since 1912 by former Alabama राज्यपाल जार्ज Wallace, a डेमोक्रेट.
Because Wallace 's अभियान opposed संघीय intervention in the दक्षिण to समाप्त school पृथक्करण, he carried the गहन दक्षिण और भागा well in जातीय औद्योगिक districts in the North.
इस थी the last चुनाव in which नई यॉर्क था the most votes in the चुनावी college ( 43 votes ).
बाद the 1970 जनसांख्यिकी, California gained the सबसे चुनावी मत और रै remained the सबसे populous राज्य since then.
This is the latest election where a presidential ticket won without carrying the वाइस अध्यक्षीय candidate 's घर state.
खिड़कियाँ कार्य Manager is a कार्य manager or System monitor application included with the Microsoft Windows nt family of ऑपरेटिंग systems कि provides limited सूचना परिचय computer प्रदर्शन और running अनुप्रयोग, processes and CPU usage, कमिट charge and मेमोरी सूचना, संजाल कार्यकलाप और statistics, logged-in users, and system सेवाएं ( and as प्रायः is the मामला with तन्त्र tools provided by microsoft लिये खिड़कियाँ, 3rd पार्टी तन्त्र is उपलब्धियाँ जिससे भरता the requirements more thoroughly, e.g, `` प्रक्रम एक्सप्लोरर '', `` Extended कार्य Manager '', `` Anvir कार्य मैनेजर '', `` प्रक्रम हैकर '', और `` प्रणाली एक्सप्लोरर '' ).
The कार्य मैनेजर can भी be प्रयुक्त to set process प्राथमिकताएं, processor affinity, forcibly terminate processes, and shut down, restart, hibernate or log off इससे खिड़कियाँ.
Windows कार्य Manager थी introduced with खिड़कियाँ NT 4.0.
पिछला versions of खिड़कियाँ NT शामिल the Task सूची application, जिससे था दूर कम सुविधाएँ.
The task सूची थी सक्षम of listing फिलहाल कार्यशील processes and killing them, or creating a new प्रक्रम.
in Windows xp तभी, a shutdown मेनू is भी उपस्थित that allows access to standby, hibernate, फेरे off, Restart, log Off and स्विच उपयोक्ता.
पहले संस्करण of microsoft Windows ( microsoft Windows 3.x, Windows 95, खिड़कियाँ 98 ) had a program ज्ञात as tasks to प्रदर्शक the कार्यक्रम फिलहाल running.
This file was चलाया by कार्यशील the taskman.exe file इससे the c : \खिड़कीs निर्देशिका.
Kanji ( ; ) हैं the अपनाया logographic Chinese characters ( hanzi ) that हैं प्रयुक्त in the modern जापानी writing system साथ साथ hiragana ( ひらがな, ), katakana ( カタカナ, ), hindu-arabic numerals, and the occasional use of the Latin वर्णमाला.
The जापानी पद kanji ( ) for the चाइनीज वर्ण वस्तुतः अर्थात् `` हान characters '' और is written using the वही वर्ण as the चाइनीज hanzi ( ).
जॉन R विलियम्स ( may 4, 1782 – अक्तूबर 20, 1854 ) थी an अमरीकी सिपाही, merchant, and राजनेता who is most खूब ज्ञात for serving as the first महापौर of Detroit, मिशिगन.
in कुल, he served as डेट्रॉयट 's महापौर लिये five अन्य शर्तें.
He also was a brigadier general in the संयुक्त States Army दौरान the ब्लैक हॉक War.

a सैन्य कम्पास कि थी प्रयुक्त दौरान World War i.
A कम्पास is a navigational instrument that shows directions in a फ़्रेम of सन्दर्भ that is stationary सापेक्ष to the सतह of the earth.
The frame of सन्दर्भ defines the four cardinal directions ( or points ) – north, south, east, और west.
इंटरमीडिएट दिशानिर्देश are भी पारिभाषित.
प्रायः, a diagram पुकारा a कम्पास rose, which shows the दिशानिर्देश ( with their names प्रायः abbreviated to आद्याक्षर ), is चिह्नित on the compass.
जब the कम्पास is in उपयोग, the rose is aligned with the रियल directions in the frame of reference, so, लिये उदाहरण, the `` N '' चिह्नित on the रोज़ वाकई points to the north.
अक्सर, in addition to the rose or sometimes instead of it, angle markings in degrees are दिखाया on the compass.
North corresponds to शून्य degrees, और the angles increase clockwise, so ईस्ट is 90 degrees, दक्षिण is 180, and वेस्ट is 270.
These numbers allow the compass to दिखाएँ azimuths or bearings, which हैं commonly stated in इस संकेतन.
the चुम्बकीय कम्पास थी पहला invented as a device for divination as early as the Chinese Han Dynasty ( Since परिचय 206 BC ).
The कम्पास was प्रयुक्त in Song राजवंश China by the military for navigational orienteering by 1040-1044, and थी प्रयुक्त लिये मेरीटाइम navigation by 1111 to 1117.
The use of a compass is recorded in Western यूरोपीय between 1187 and 1202, और in फारस in 1232.
The शुष्क compass थी invented in यूरोपीय around 1300.
This was supplanted in the early 20th सदी by the liquid-filled magnetic कम्पास.
the Inca साम्राज्य or inka Empire ( quechua : tawantinsuyu ) was the largest साम्राज्य in pre-Columbian America.
The प्रशासनिक, political और सैन्य बीच of the empire was located in कुज़्को in modern-day पेरू.
the Inca civilization arose इससे the हाइलैंड्स of Peru sometime in the early 13th सदी.
इससे 1438 to 1533, the Incas used a किस्में of methods, from conquest to peaceful assimilation, to चरितार्थ a large portion of western South America, centered on the Andean mountain सीमाएँ, including, besides पेरू, विशाल parts of modern Ecuador, western और south सेंट्रल बोलीविया, northwest अर्जेंटीना, उत्तर और सेंट्रल Chile, and दक्षिणी Colombia into a state comparable to the ऐतिहासिक empires of यूरेशिया.
the official भाषा of the empire was Quechua, हालांकि सैंकड़ों of local languages and dialects of quechua यहूद बोला.
The Inca referred to उनके साम्राज्य as tawantinsuyu which can be अनूदित as the चार Regions or the चार संयुक्त प्रांतों.
There यहूद अनेक लोकल forms of इबादत, most of them concerning लोकल पवित्र `` Huacas ``, लकिन the इन्का नेतृत्व encouraged the worship of Inti —the sun god—and imposed इसके प्रभुता ऊपर other cults such as कि of pachamama.
the incas considered their King, the Sapa Inca, to be the `` चाइल्ड of the sun. ''
the गुर्दे हैं organs that serve several अनिवार्य नियामक roles in सबसे पशु, सहित vertebrates और कुछ invertebrates.
वे are अनिवार्य in the urinary system और also serve homeostatic functions such as the विनियमन of electrolytes, maintenance of acid–base balance, और regulation of रक्त pressure ( via maintaining नमक and water संतुलन ).
वे serve the body as a natural फिल्टर of the blood, और remove wastes which हैं diverted to the urinary bladder.
In producing urine, the गुर्दे excrete wastes ऐसे as urea and ammonium, और वे are also जिम्मेदार लिये the reabsorption of जल, ग्लूकोज, and amino acids.
the kidneys also उपज hormones including calcitriol, erythropoietin, and the एंजाइम renin.
Located at the rear of the abdominal गुहा in the retroperitoneum, the गुर्दे प्राप्त blood from the paired renal arteries, and नाली into the paired renal रगों.
प्रत्येक गुर्दा excretes मूत्र into a ureter, itself a paired structure कि empties into the urinary bladder.
renal physiology is the study of गुर्दा function, जबकि nephrology is the चिकित्सा specialty चिंतित with kidney diseases.
Diseases of the गुर्दा हैं विविध, लकिन individuals साथ kidney बीमारी अक्सर display characteristic clinical features.
Common clinical conditions involving the गुर्दा include the nephritic and nephrotic syndromes, renal cysts, अधि kidney चोट, दीर्घकालिक गुर्दा बीमारी, urinary tract संक्रमण, nephrolithiasis, and urinary tract obstruction.
Various cancers of the गुर्दा exist ; the सबसे आम वयस्क renal कर्कट is renal cell कार्सिनोमा.
cancers, cysts, and some other renal conditions can be प्रबंधित with removal of the kidney, or nephrectomy.
When renal फलन, measured by glomerular filtration rate, is persistently poor, dialysis and kidney प्रत्यारोपण may be treatment विकल्प.
हालांकि वे हैं नहीं severely नुकसानदेह, kidney stones can be painful और a nuisance.
The removal of kidney stones involves अल्ट्रासाउंड उपचार to break up the पत्थरों into smaller टुकड़े, जिससे are तब passed through the urinary ट्रैक्ट.
One आम लक्षण of kidney stones is a sharp पीड़ा in the medial/lateral खण्ड of the lower back.
lockton Companies inc. is the world 's largest privately held बीमे brokerage firm, providing बीमे, रिस्क management and कर्मचारी लाभ solutions.
In addition to इसके Kansas City, Missouri मुख्यालय, lockton operates 60 locations in 17 देशों.
lockton is फिलहाल home to अधिक than 4,450 शरीक विश्वव्यापी.
The company was संस्थापित by जोकर Lockton in 1966 and has चूंकि become the world’s 9th largest बीमे brokerage कड़.
Lockton serves a चौड़ी सरणी of उद्योग with services कि शामिल रिस्क management, casualty, surety, professional indemnity and more.
लिये 46 सालो, lockton posted असाधारण सशुल्क विकास, with global revenues reaching $ 915 लाख in fiscal 2012.
Lockton लाभ Group : lockton’s Employee benefit’s team works closely with बीमे carriers और प्रशासकों to बनाएँ comprehensive और एकीकृत लाभ strategies लिये क्लाइंट.
the Lockton लाभ समूह provides सेवाएं सहित compliance, executive benefits, स्वास्थ्य and welfare, health risk solutions, रिटायरमेंट और अधिक.
Lockton अपनापन : lockton Affinity, an संबद्ध of lockton कंपनियाँ, meets the insurance needs of affinity समूह, franchises, professional संगठन, and associations of all आकार.
lockton अपनापन offers a किस्में of बीमे उत्पाद options और programs.
Products include : सामान्य देयता, पेशेवर Liability, प्रॉपर्टी, Workers मुआवजे, निर्देशकों & अधिकारियों Liability, वाणिज्यिक Auto, specialty Coverage, excess, Health Plans and more.
lockton अंतरराष्ट्रीय : Lockton International operates कार्यालयों in the uk and Ireland, as well as कार्यालयों throughout Asia and Latin अमेरिका.
In यूरोपीय, Lockton International is a partner in eos risq, Europe’s leading बीमे ब्रोकिंग और रिस्क management कंसल्टेंसी.
EOS risq is an equity-based European साझेदारी of major स्वतंत्र बीमे brokers with over 3,500 कर्मचारी आधारित in more than 30 देशों in यूरोपीय.
lockton International provides specialized समाधान लिये निजी लाइनों, SME’s और प्रमुख multi-national clients.
श्वेत chocolate is a चॉकलेट derivative.
it commonly consists of cocoa मक्खन, शुगर, milk solids and नमक, और is characterized by a पाले पीला or ivory appearance.
The melting point of cocoa butter, इसके primary cocoa सेम component, is ऊँची पर्याप्त to रखना white chocolate ठोस at रूम temperature.
डोनाल्ड Leon `` Don '' Blankenship ( born March 14, 1950 ) was Chairman and सीईओ of massey उर्जा Co., the sixth largest कोयले company ( by 2008 production ) in the United राज्य.
he परोसा in those roles from नवम्बर 30, 2000, जबतक दिसम्बर 31, 2010.
blankenship is an active financial backer of the Republican पार्टी and भागीदार in लोकल और राज्य राजनीती, especially in उसके घर राज्य of वेस्ट वर्जिनिया.
He रै अक्सर spoken out publicly about राजनीती, the environment, संघ, and coal production.
u.S. प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज आयोग filings show blankenship थी सशुल्क $ 17.8 लाख in 2009, the highest in the कोयले उद्योग.
उसके 2009 अदा represents a $ 6.8 लाख उठाएँ over 2008 and लगभग दोगुना his compensation package in 2007.
blankenship भी received a deferred compensation पैकेज valued at $ 27.2 million in 2009.
On दिसम्बर 3, 2010, blankenship घोषित that he was retiring as CEO at the समाप्त of the साल, और होता be succeeded by massey President बैक्सटर F. phillips Jr.
Bow Wow is one of the transcriptions used in अंग्रेज़ी to describe a श्वान 's bark.
धनुष Wow may भी refer to:
धनुष Wow ( बैंड ), a Japanese मुश्किल rock/heavy metal बैंड
धनुष Wow ( rapper ), an अमरीकी rapper and कर्ता
धनुष Wow Sauce, a sauce developed in the cotswolds प्रदेश of इंग्लैण्ड
धनुष wow Wow, a UK new वेव बैंड
`` धनुष Wow '', a सोंग by The fiery furnaces इससे their 2003 एल्बम gallowsbird 's Bark
`` धनुष wow ब्लूज़ ( my मामा दावत me जैसे a श्वान ) '', a song रचित in the 1920s by चट्टान Friend & nat ओसबोर्न
लापरवाही ( Lat. negligentia, from neglegere, to उपेक्षा, literally `` not to चुनें up something '' ) is a विफलता to exercise the परवाह that a reasonably दूरदर्शी person होता exercise in like हालातों.
the क्षेत्रफल of tort law known as लापरवाही involves नुक़सान caused by carelessness, नहीं जानबूझकर नुक़सान.
According to Jay M. feinman of the rutgers University स्कूल of विधि ;
`` The कोर idea of negligence is that लोगों चाहिए कसरत reasonable परवाह when वे अधिनियम by taking account of the potential harm that वे might foreseeably cause नुक़सान to अन्य लोगों. ''
`` those who go personally or लाओ प्रॉपर्टी where वे जान that वे or it may आइये into टक्कर साथ the व्यक्तियों or प्रॉपर्टी of others have by law a duty डाल upon them to use उचित परवाह and skill to avoid such a collision. ''
Fletcher v Rylands ( [ 1866 ] lr 1 ex 265 )
Through civil वाद, if an घायल व्यक्ति proves that another व्यक्ति acted negligently to cause their injury, they can recover damages to compensate for their नुक़सान.
Proving a मामला लिये लापरवाही can potentially entitle the घायल plaintiff to compensation लिये नुक़सान to उनके देह, प्रॉपर्टी, दिमागी well-being, financial status, or अंतरंग संबंध.
however, क्युकी लापरवाही मामले are बहुत fact-specific, this सामान्य परिभाषा does not fully बताइये the concept of when the law होगा आवश्यकता one person to compensate another for नुकसान caused by accidental चोट.
further, the law of negligence at common law is तभी one aspect of the विधि of liability.
Although resulting damages जरूर be सिद्ध in अनुक्रम to recover मुआवजे in a लापरवाही कार्रवाई, the nature और extent of those damages are नहीं the प्राथमिक focus of negligence cases.
A melanocytic nevus ( भी known as `` Nevocytic nevus '' ) is a type of lesion कि contains nevus cells ( a type of melanocyte ).
Some स्त्रोत equate the पद mole साथ `` melanocytic nevus ''.
Other sources reserve the term `` mole '' for other उद्देश्य.
The बहुमत of औज़ार appear दौरान the first two दशकों of a person’s life, जबकि about one in every 100 शिशु is born with moles.
acquired moles are a रूप of benign फुलाव, जबकि congenital moles, or जन्मजात nevi, हैं considered a minor malformation or hamartoma and may be at a उच्चतर रिस्क लिये melanoma.
A mole can be either subdermal ( under the स्किन ) or a pigmented growth on the स्किन, formed ज़्यादातर of a प्रकार of कोशिका known as a melanocyte.
the ऊँची concentration of the body’s pigmenting agent, melanin, is जिम्मेदार for उनके अंधेरा रंग.
Moles हैं a सदस्य of the परिवार of skin lesions known as nevi.
The व्यापक metabolic फलक, or chemical स्क्रीन, ( CMP ; CPT कोड 80053 ) is a panel of 14 रक्त परीक्षण which serves as an initial व्यापक medical स्क्रीनिंग tool.
The cmp provides a rough जाँच of गुर्दा फलन, liver फलन, and electrolyte and fluid संतुलन, लकिन it is दूर इससे perfect.
Abnormal values from a CBC may be a result of false positives और thus the cbc may need to be repeated लिये a patient ( or replaced with a अधिक विशिष्ट test ).
The cmp is an विस्तारित संस्करण of the मौलिक metabolic panel ( bmp ), which करता not include liver परीक्षण.
A CMP ( or bmp ) can be ordered as part of a दिनचर्या शारीरिक examination, or may be used to मॉनिटर a patient साथ a chronic disease, such as मधुमेह mellitus or hypertension.
पिछला names for the फलक of परीक्षण have been chem 12, रसायन फलक, Chemistry screen, SMA 12, SMA 20 and smac ( Sequential Multiple Analysis - कंप्यूटर ).
the परीक्षण are performed on machines आधारित on the autoanalyzer invented in 1957.
Natural gas निष्कर्षण by countries in घन meters प्रति year.
प्राकृतिक गैस is a naturally occurring hydrocarbon gas mixture consisting primarily of methane, but commonly सहित varying amounts of other hydrocarbons, कार्बन dioxide, nitrogen, and hydrogen sulfide.
Natural gas is an energy सोर्स often used लिये हीटिंग, कुकिंग, और electricity पीढी.
It is also used as fuel for vehicles और as a रासायनिक feedstock in the manufacture of प्लास्टिक and other commercially महत्वपूर्ण सशुल्क रसायन.
प्राकृतिक gas is मिला in deep भूमिगत प्राकृतिक rock formations or associated with अन्य hydrocarbon reservoirs in कोयले beds और as मिथेन clathrates.
पेट्रोलियम is also another संसाधन मिला in निकटता to and साथ natural गैस.
सबसे प्राकृतिक gas थी निर्मित over समय by two mechanisms : biogenic and thermogenic.
biogenic गैस is created by methanogenic organisms in marshes, bogs, landfills, and shallow sediments.
Deeper in the earth, at वृहद तापमान और pressure, thermogenic gas is created from दफ्न सशुल्क सामग्री.
Before natural गैस can be प्रयुक्त as a ईंधन, it जरूर undergo प्रसंस्करण to remove impurities, सहित जल, to मिलें the specifications of marketable natural gas.
The by-products of processing शामिल ethane, प्रोपेन, butanes, pentanes, और higher आणविक weight hydrocarbons, हाइड्रोजन sulfide ( जिससे may be परिवर्तित into pure गंधक ), कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड, water वाष्प, and sometimes helium और नाइट्रोजन.
प्राकृतिक गैस is प्रायः informally referred to बस as gas, especially जब compared to other उर्जा स्त्रोत such as oil or coal.
