लिये information about the tv show starring the बैंड, see Imagination मूवर्स ( tv श्रेणी ).
कल्पना मूवर्स is a band formed in New Orleans, louisiana, in 2003.
the लाइनअप includes Rich कॉलिन्स, Scott durbin, डेव Poche, and स्कॉट `` Smitty '' स्मिथ.
सदस्यों of the समूह were longtime friends और neighbors.
the समूह प्रारंभ as a television/music अवधारणा जिससे थी pitched to लोकल PBS affiliates in New Orleans.
WLAE-TV थी the पहला to take an interest in the group and later introduced them to बेथ Courtney, the President & Chief Executive अधिकारी at louisiana Public प्रसारण.
Soon after, LPB began airing one-minute वीडियो उत्पादित by the कल्पना Movers themselves.
the मूवर्स built a sizable regional following by सेटिंग शैक्षणिक गीतों for बच्चे to melodies and लय कि वयस्कों appreciate as well.
They sold more than 100,000 नक़ल of उनके self-produced CDs and dvds.
Their तीन इंडी cds : `` शुभ Ideas, '' `` कॉलिंग सब Movers, '' और `` आठ फीट '' साथ साथ their ग्रास roots dvd `` हलचल it up '' have, combined, won चौदह नेशनल पुरस्कार, from ऐसे groups as the National संघ of Parenting publications ( NAPPA ) and Parents ' चुनाव.
In जल्दी 2005, डिज़्नी took notice, and initiated negotiations to add the मूवर्स to the company 's रोस्टर.
These were बाधित in August when the बाढ़ सुरक्षा designed और निर्मित by the फौज corps of इंजीनियर्स to protect New Orleans विफल.
The resulting floodwater claimed the band 's दफ्तर, as खूब as the घरों of कॉलिन्स, Durbin और poche – लकिन the deal थी हस्ताक्षरित in the वसन्त of 2006.
In 2008, Walt डिज़्नी रिकॉर्ड introduced the कल्पना Movers ' म्यूज़िक to the nation साथ the release of the Movers ' first nationally-released cd, `` Juice बक्सा Heroes. ''
in सितंबर 2008, a 30-minute show featuring the group began airing on the डिज़्नी चैनल 's प्रीस्कूल programming block known as Playhouse डिज़्नी, और currently airs on playhouse डिज़्नी 's बदलना, Disney Junior.
The मूवर्स लिखें and perform सब the गीतों on उनके show.
moreover, the Imagination मूवर्स have प्राप्त नाजुक kudos for their live कॉन्सर्ट प्रदर्शन.
in अक्तूबर 2009, the कल्पना मूवर्स started the `` सजीव इससे the विचार Warehouse Concert Tour 2009 ''.
Traveling इससे mid-October to mid-december 2009 their सजीव performances include lots of उनके favorite songs और dancing, as खूब as video दिखावे of गोदाम चूहा.
Beginning in early-february 2011 और wrapping up in late may 2011, the कल्पना मूवर्स presented उनके `` In a Big गोदाम कॉन्सर्ट दौरे, '' playing more than 100 shows in 50+ cities across North अमेरिका.
From कूच to अक्तूबर 2012, the Imagination Movers toured उत्तर America on their post-Disney `` Rock-O-Matic '' tour.
the दिखाएँ maintained अनेक elements of the असली tv concept, ऐसे as an on-stage `` idea आपात '' और several sets from their older कैटलॉग ; however, साथ the departure of वेन्डी calio वापस to उसके native Hawaii, the character `` नीना '', साथ साथ उसके musical संख्याएँ, is not उपस्थित.
the दौरे promotes the Imagination Movers ' new album/dvd release, `` rock-o-matic '', which features सब new music from the बैंड.
the एल्बम itself is उत्पादित independently of डिज़्नी और रै a notably more वयस्क, समकालीन rock-and-roll ध्वनि, हालांकि स्टिल बहुत उचित लिये children.
अनेक प्रदर्शन तिथियाँ यहूद moved to later in 2012 to benefit इससे the increased एक्सपोज़र of the Imagination Movers TV show अभी playing रोज़ on Disney Junior.
the platypus ( ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic स्तनधारी endemic to पूर्वी ऑस्ट्रेलिया, सहित तस्मानिया.
साथ साथ the four प्रजाति of echidna, it is one of the पाँच extant प्रजाति of monotremes, the only mammals that lay eggs instead of giving जनम.
It is the sole जीना प्रतिनिधि of इसके परिवार ( ornithorhynchidae ) और genus ( ornithorhynchus ), हालांकि a क्रमांक of सम्बन्धित प्रजाति have been मिला in the चट्टान रिकार्ड.
the unusual appearance of this egg-laying, बतख -billed, beaver -tailed, otter -footed स्तनधारी baffled European naturalists when वे first encountered it, साथ some considering it an elaborate fraud.
it is one of the few venomous स्तनधारियों, the male platypus having a spur on the hind पैर that delivers a venom capable of causing severe pain to humans.
the अद्वितीय सुविधाएँ of the platypus मेक it an important विषय in the पढ़ाई of विकासवादी biology और a recognisable और iconic प्रतीक of ऑस्ट्रेलिया ; it has appeared as a mascot at national कार्यक्रम और is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent सिक्का.
The platypus is the animal emblem of the राज्य of New South Wales.
जबतक the early 20th सदी, it was hunted for its fur, लकिन it is now सुरक्षित throughout its दायरा.
Although captive breeding programmes have had तभी limited कामयाबी and the platypus is vulnerable to the प्रभाव of प्रदूषण, it is नहीं अंतर्गत कोई immediate threat.
the chupacabra or chupacabras (, इससे chupar `` to चूस '' and cabra `` goat '', वस्तुतः `` बकरी चूषक '' ) is a legendary cryptid rumored to inhabit भाग of the americas.
it is associated अधिक recently साथ sightings of an allegedly unknown एनिमल in प्यूर्टो Rico ( where ये sightings यहूद पहला reported ), मैक्सिको, और the United States, विशेषकर in the latter 's लैटिन अमरीकी समुदायों.
The name comes इससे the एनिमल 's reported habit of attacking और drinking the blood of livestock, विशेषकर बकरियों.
शारीरिक descriptions of the प्राणी vary.
Eyewitness sightings have been claimed as जल्दी as 1995 in प्यूर्टो रीको, and have चूंकि been reported as far north as maine, और as far south as चिली, और even being spotted outside the Americas in देशों like Russia and the Philippines.
it is supposedly a heavy creature, the आकार of a छोटी भालू, with a पंक्ति of spines reaching इससे the गर्दन to the base of the टेल.
Sighting रिपोर्ट्स of the chupacabra have been disregarded as uncorroborated or lacking प्रमाण, जबकि सबसे reports in उत्तरी मैक्सिको और the दक्षिणी United राज्य have महरूम verified as canids afflicted by mange.
biologists और wildlife प्रबन्धन officials दृश्य the chupacabra as a contemporary लेजेंड.
the North American फ़्री Trade Agreement ( NAFTA ) is an अनुबंध हस्ताक्षरित by कनाडा, Mexico, और the संयुक्त States, creating a trilateral व्यापार bloc in उत्तर अमेरिका.
the agreement came into force on जनवरी 1, 1994.
it superseded the canada–united States Free व्यापार अनुबंध between the U.S., Canada, and Mexico
nafta has दो पूरक : the North अमरीकी Agreement on Environmental सहयोग ( NAAEC ) and the North अमरीकी Agreement on Labor Cooperation ( NAALC ).
थर्मल सुकून is the कंडीशन of दिमाग that expresses संतोष साथ the थर्मल पर्यावरण and is assessed by subjective मूल्यांकन ( ansi / ASHRAE Standard 55 ).
maintaining इस मानक of thermal comfort लिये occupants of buildings or other enclosures is एक of the महत्वपूर्ण goals of hvac ( heating, वेंटिलेशन, और air conditioning ) डिज़ाइन engineers.
The पूर्वानुमानित औसत vote ( pmv ) मॉडल stands among the most पहचाना thermal comfort models.
It थी developed using सिद्धान्त of heat balance और प्रायोगिक data एकत्रित in a नियंत्रित climate कक्ष अंतर्गत steady राज्य conditions.
Because the pmv मॉडल was derived from आंकड़ा एकत्रित in a controlled जलवायु, it is नहीं उपयुक्त for अनुप्रयोग in naturally ventilated spaces which प्रायः have ऊँची स्तर of air movement.
इस shortcoming motivated the विकास of a family of empirical statistical models of thermal सुकून in naturally ventilated स्पेसेस known as adaptive मॉडल.
अनुकूली models of थर्मल सुकून consider occupants as dynamically interacting साथ उनके environment, and controlling their thermal comfort by means of कपडे or window-opening और closing.
इस is in कंट्रास्ट to thermal सुकून in sealed buildings, in जिससे occupants अनुभव the पर्यावरण passively.
Thermal सुकून is affected by heat conduction, convection, radiation, and evaporative heat loss.
Thermal comfort is maintained जब the heat उत्पन्न by human चयापचय is अनुमत to dissipate, thus maintaining thermal संतुलन साथ the surroundings.
It has महरूम long पहचाना कि the सनसनी of feeling hot or cold is not just dependent on air तापमान अलोन.
Thermal सुकून calculations according to ANSI/ASHRAE Standard 55 can be freely performed साथ the CBE Thermal Comfort Tool लिये ashrae-55.
Durante degli Alighieri, बस referred to as Dante (, ; ; c. 1265–1321 ), was a major Italian कवि of the Middle आयु.
उसके दैवी Comedy, originally called ' and बाद पुकारा ' by Boccaccio, is widely माना the greatest साहित्यिक कार्य रचित in the इतालवी भाषा and a masterpiece of world literature.
In इटली he is known as ' ( `` the Supreme Poet '' ) or just '.
he, petrarch and boccaccio are also known as `` the three स्रोतों '' or `` the तीन crowns ''.
Dante is भी called the `` Father of the Italian language ''.
मुख्यालय ( Kobe, Japan )
( ) is a tire और रबर company based in Japan.
It is भाग of the sumitomo Group.
The कम्पनी traces इसके origins to 1909, जब the sumitomo समूह बना an निवेश in Dunlop जापानी, the newly formed जापानी subsidiary of the अंग्रेजों company Dunlop रबर.
Over the सालो Sumitomo और Dunlop developed a close business संबंध, और in 1963 the Sumitomo Group acquired कंट्रोल of Dunlop जापानी और renamed it sumitomo रबर Industries ltd.
In 1985, जब Dunlop Rubber थी taken over by btr plc, the कम्पनी acquired the ऑटोमोबाइल tire assets of dunlop, including the right to use the dunlop brand on ऑटोमोबाइल tires.
the acquisition किया नहीं शामिल the us and Australian व्यवसायों, which were separately स्वामित्व, लकिन in 1986 Sumitomo भी acquired the dunlop टायर निगम of the US from इसके प्रबन्धन.
in 1997, Sumitomo formed a संयुक्त venture साथ Goodyear टायर and Rubber कम्पनी, by जिससे Goodyear and Sumitomo agreed to manufacture टायर लिये प्रत्येक अन्य 's markets, including dunlop ब्रांडेड tires.
As भाग of the अनुबंध, Goodyear acquired 75 % interests in dunlop Tyres, the uk company जिससे sumitomo had formed, and in Dunlop टायर निगम.
goodyear और sumitomo भी made निवेश in each other.
आज, the कम्पनी makes a wide दायरा of rubber आधारित उत्पाद, सहित ऑटोमोबाइल tires, गोल्फ़ balls और टेनिस गेंदें.
Microsoft विज़ुअल Studio एक्स्प्रेस is a नियत of freeware integrated विकास environments ( आईडीई ) developed by Microsoft कि are lightweight संस्करण of the microsoft विज़ुअल Studio उत्पाद लकीर.
Express Editions यहूद conceived शुरूआत साथ Visual स्टुडियो 2005.
The विचार of Express संस्करण is to provide streamlined, easy-to-use and easy-to-learn IDEs लिये users other than professional तन्त्र डेवलपर, ऐसे as hobbyists और students.
the Alps हैं one of the great पहाड़ दायरा systems of Europe stretching approximately आरपार आठ Alpine countries from ऑस्ट्रिया and Slovenia in the ईस्ट, स्विट्ज़रलैंड, liechtenstein, Germany, France to the वेस्ट and इटली और Monaco to the दक्षिण.
The mountains were formed over hundreds of लाखो of सालो as the अफ़्रीकी and Eurasian tectonic प्लेटों collided.
Extreme shortening caused by the इवेंट resulted in marine sedimentary रॉक्स उठती by thrusting और folding into high पहाड़ peaks such as मोंट blanc and the matterhorn.
मोंट blanc spans the french–italian border, और at is the उच्चतम mountain in the Alps.
the अल्पाइन प्रदेश क्षेत्रफल contains many चोटियों उच्चतर than, known as the `` four-thousanders ``.
The ऊँचाई और आकार of the दायरा affects the climate in Europe ; in the kyu वर्षण स्तर vary greatly and climatic शर्तें consist of distinct zones.
वन्यजीव ऐसे as ibex live in the उच्चतर peaks to elevations of, and पौधे ऐसे as edelweiss grow in rocky क्षेत्रों in lower elevations as खूब as in higher elevations.
Evidence of human habitation in the Alps goes back to the Paleolithic era.
A mummified man, संकल्पित to be 5,000 सालो old, थी discovered on a glacier at the austrian–italian border in 1991.
by the 6th सदी BC, the सेल्टिक La tène culture थी well established.
Hannibal may have crossed the ऐल्प्स with a झुंड of हाथियों, and the romans था settlements in the region.
In 1800 नेपोलियन crossed one of the पहाड़ गुजरता with an army of 40,000.
The 18th and 19th सदियां saw an influx of naturalists, लेखक, और कलाकारों, in particular the Romantics, followed by the golden आयु of alpinism as mountaineers began to ascend the peaks.
In संसार युद्ध II the Third Reich invaded the Alpine देशों, with the एक्सेप्शन of स्विट्ज़रलैंड and Liechtenstein ; Adolf Hitler kept a आधार of आपरेशन in the bar ऐल्प्स throughout the war.
the Alpine region has a strong सांस्कृतिक identity.
The traditional संस्कृति of खेती, cheesemaking, और woodworking स्टिल exists in Alpine villages, although the tourist industry began to grow early in the 20th सदी and विस्तारित greatly बाद संसार War II to become the प्रबल उद्योग by the समाप्त of the सदी.
The Winter ओलम्पिक खेल have महरूम hosted in the Swiss, फ्रेंच, इतालवी, आस्ट्रिया and German Alps.
at present the प्रदेश is घर to 14 million लोगों and has 120 million annual visitors.
लोइस Patrice griffin ( née Pewterschmidt ) is a character from the एनिमेटेड television श्रेणी Family guy.
She is voiced by writer Alex borstein और पहला appeared on television, along साथ the rest of the family in the 15-minute छोटी on दिसम्बर 20, 1998.
लोइस थी निर्मित and designed by series निर्माता Seth macfarlane.
MacFarlane was पूछा to pitch a pilot to the फॉक्स Broadcasting Company based on लैरी and Steve, a short बना by MacFarlane जिससे featured a middle-aged अक्षर नामित लैरी और an बौद्धिक dog, Steve.
बाद the pilot थी दिए the ग्रीन light, the Griffin परिवार appeared on the एपीसोड `` Death रै a Shadow ``.
Lois is the mother of the Griffin परिवार.
With उसके husband Peter, she रै had three children : Meg, क्रिस, और Stewie.
Lois is often portrayed as a stereotypical टेलीविज़न mother, despite उसके admitting to होने a ड्रग उपयोक्ता, a recovering मेथ नशेड़ी kleptomaniac.
Lois रै भी था अनेक affairs, one of which allegedly resulted in the conception of Meg.
वो रै appeared in other media relating to परिवार guy—including a वीडियो खेल, commercials और books—and inspired an entire line of merchandise.
लोइस 's distinctive New York एक्सेंट originated from a अक्षर in a stage show कि Alex Borstein had performed in, जिससे was largely प्रेरित by a सापेक्ष जो grew up on Long Island, New York.
परिवार हस्तांतरण of बास्क भाषा ( Basque as initial language )
प्रतिशत of विद्यार्थी पंजीकृत in Basque language schools ( 2000–2005 ).
स्थान of the Basque-language प्रांतों within Spain and France
बास्क ( endonym :, ) is the ancestral language of the Basque लोगों, जो inhabit the Basque देश, a प्रदेश spanning an area in northeastern स्पेन and southwestern France.
It is बोला by 27 % of basques in सब territories ( 714,136 आउट of 2,648,998 ).
Of ये, 663,035 live in the Spanish part of the Basque देश and the remaining 51,100 सजीव in the French भाग.
In अकादमिक discussions of the वितरण of Basque in Spain और France, it is customary to refer to तीन ancient provinces in फ़्रांस और four Spanish provinces.
Native अध्यक्षों हैं concentrated in a संलग्न area सहित भाग of the स्पेनी autonomous communities of the Basque Country और नावारा और in the पश्चिमी half of the French département of pyrénées-atlantiques.
the बास्क autonomous Community is an administrative entity within the binational ethnographic Basque देश incorporating the traditional Spanish प्रांतों of Biscay, Gipuzkoa, और álava, जिससे retain उनके अस्तित्व as politico-administrative विभाजन.
These प्रांतों और अनेक क्षेत्रों of नावारा हैं heavily आबादी by ethnic Basques, but बास्क थी, at least जबतक the 1990s, not spoken as a native language in सबसे of álava, पश्चिमी parts of Biscay और central and दक्षिणी क्षेत्रों of Navarre, either क्युकी it था महरूम replaced by स्पेनी along the सदियां, in कुछ क्षेत्रों, or because it had never महरूम बोला there, in other क्षेत्रों.
in southwestern France, the ancient Basque-populated provinces यहूद labourd, Lower नावारा, and soule.
They and अन्य regions यहूद संचित into a single département in 1790 अंतर्गत the नाम Basses-Pyrénées, a name जिससे persisted जबतक 1970.
A मानकीकृत form of the बास्क language, पुकारा Euskara batua, was विकसित by the बास्क भाषा Academy in the लेट 1960s.
Euskara batua थी created so कि बास्क language could be used—and easily समझा by सब Basque speakers—in औपचारिक situations ( शिक्षा, mass media, साहित्य ), और this is its main use today.
The भूमिका of इस मानक Basque भाषा depends on the linguistic शैक्षणिक मॉडल of प्रत्येक प्रदेश and each स्कूल.
In सबसे areas of the स्पेनी बास्क Country, the शैक्षणिक Model D, जहाँ all subjects हैं taught in Basque, except `` Spanish भाषा and साहित्य '' ( जिससे is taught in स्पेनी ) is now the predominant मॉडल.
in France, the बास्क भाषा school seaska and the association लिये a bilingual ( Basque and French ) schooling Ikasbi मिलें a चौड़ी range of बास्क language educational needs up to the Sixth Form, जबकि प्रायः struggling to surmount वित्तीय और administrative constraints.
अलावा from this मानकीकृत संस्करण, वहीँ are five प्रमुख बास्क dialects : Bizkaian, gipuzkoan, और Upper Navarrese in Spain, and navarrese–lapurdian और Zuberoan ( in फ़्रांस ).
हालांकि they take उनके names इससे the mentioned ऐतिहासिक प्रांतों, the dialect boundaries हैं नहीं congruent with प्रांत boundaries.
The President, Directors and Company, of the बैंको of the संयुक्त States, commonly known as the First Bank of the संयुक्त States, was a central बैंको, chartered for a पद of बीस सालो, by the संयुक्त States Congress on February 25, 1791.
Establishment of the Bank was included in a three-part expansion of federal fiscal and मौद्रिक power ( along with a federal मिंट और excise कर ) championed by Alexander हैमिल्टन, पहला सचिव of the राजकोष.
Hamilton believed a central बैंको was जरुरी to stabilize and improve the nation 's credit, and to improve handling of the वित्तीय कारोबार of the संयुक्त राज्य government अंतर्गत the newly enacted संविधान.
Officially प्रस्तावित to the first सत्र of the First कॉंग्रेस in 1790, हैमिल्टन 's Bank faced फैली प्रतिरोध from opponents of increased संघीय शक्ति.
Secretary of State Thomas Jefferson and James Madison led the विपक्ष, which claimed कि the बैंको was unconstitutional, and that it benefited व्यापारियों और निवेशकों at the व्यय of the बहुमत of the जनसांख्यिकी.
The First Bank भवन is अभी a नेशनल ऐतिहासिक लैंडमार्क स्तिथ in फिलाडेल्फिया, Pennsylvania within Independence नेशनल Historical पार्क.
जेम्स वेस्ले Marsters ( born अगस्त 20, 1962 ) is an American actor और संगीतकार.
marsters first आए to the attention of the general public playing the popular character Spike, a platinum-blond yobbish अंग्रेज़ी vampire in the television series Buffy the Vampire Slayer and इसके spin-off श्रेणी, Angel, from 1997 to 2004.
चूंकि तब, he रै गए on to play other विज्ञान fiction roles, such as the एलियन supervillain Brainiac on the Superman -inspired series smallville, the omnisexual time मुसाफ़िर कप्तान John Hart in अंग्रेजों science-fiction दिखाएँ Torchwood and आतंकवादी barnabas Greeley in sci fi 's Caprica.
Marsters appeared in a supporting role in the 2007 movie P.S.
I Love You and as the main antagonist, piccolo, in the 2009 fantasy एडवेंचर film dragonball एवोल्यूशन.
he appeared as a पुनरावर्ती character in the पहला ऋतु of the पुनरुद्धार of Hawaii 5-0.
in आणविक biology, इंसान chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) is a hormone produced by the fertilized egg बाद धारणा.
Later during गर्भावस्था it is बना by the developing placenta, और later by the placental घटक syncytiotrophoblast.
कुछ cancerous tumors उपज this hormone ; इसलिए, elevated स्तर measured when the patient is नहीं pregnant can lead to a cancer निदान.
However, it is नहीं ज्ञात whether इस production is a contributing cause or an effect of tumorigenesis.
the pituitary analogue of hcg, known as luteinizing हार्मोन ( LH ), is उत्पादित in the pituitary gland of males and महिलाओं of all ages.
, the एफडीए रै prohibited the sale of `` homeopathic '' और over the काउंटर hcg diet उत्पाद and घोषित them बेईमान और illegal.
बेयोंस Giselle knowles-carter, ज्ञात by her स्टेज name बेयोंस ( ; born सितंबर 4, 1981 ), is an American singer, songwriter, dancer, and अभिनेत्री.
Born और उठाया in ह्यूस्टन, टेक्सास, she performed in singing और नाचना competitions as a child पहले forming in 1990 a समूह with Kelly rowland और latavia roberson that थी आखिरकार named Destiny 's चाइल्ड.
एकबार signed to Columbia रिकॉर्ड, the लड़कियों subsequently became एक of the संसार 's best-selling girl समूह of सब समय.
the group was plagued by आतंरिक विरोध and विधिक turmoil and नॉलेस suffered from अवसाद that lasted for a number of सालो.
During the group 's hiatus, नॉलेस released उसके debut सोलो एल्बम Dangerously in प्रेम ( 2003 ), which earned उसके पाँच Grammy पुरस्कार and has sold a कुल of 4.9 million नक़ल in the US अलोन.
It spawned Billboard क्रमांक one singles `` Crazy in Love, '' माना by vh1 to be the `` महानतम Song of the 00 's, '' और `` baby लड़के. ''
following the disbandment of Destiny 's चाइल्ड in 2005, Knowles 's दूसरी solo album B'Day ( 2006 ) contained the शीर्ष पाँच singles `` déjà Vu ``, `` Irreplaceable ``, and `` Beautiful झूठा ``.
Her प्रदर्शन in dreamgirls ( 2006 ) अर्जित her two Golden Globe nominations.
नॉलेस ' कार्य playing Etta जेम्स in कि film प्रेरित her subsequent एल्बम i am...
साशा Fierce ( 2008 ) which शाखित hits `` If I यहूद a लड़के ``, `` सिंगल महिलाओं ( Put a रिंग on It ) ``, `` Halo ``, and `` Sweet सपनो ``.
The एल्बम भी helped Knowles earn छह Grammys in 2010, तोड़कर the record लिये सबसे Grammy पुरस्कार won by a मादा artist in one रात्रि.
उसके fourth एल्बम 4 ( 2011 ) deviated towards परंपरागत R & B and became उसके चौथी लगातार number one एल्बम on the Billboard 200.
in जनवरी 2012, Knowles दिया birth to बेटी Blue Ivy Carter, उसके पहला child साथ husband jay-z.
नॉलेस रै बेची over 13 लाख एल्बम in the US और 118 लाख रिकॉर्ड worldwide ( as खूब as a further 50 लाख records with Destiny 's Child ), and is एक of the best-selling music artists of सब समय.
the रिकॉर्डिंग Industry संघ of America ( RIAA ) पहचाना Knowles as the Top Certified Artist of the 2000s.
In 2009, Billboard named उसके the शीर्ष रेडियो Songs कलाकार of the दशक और ranked her the Top मादा कलाकार और the fourth कलाकार of the Decade.
Beyoncé नॉलेस is the सबसे nominated woman in Grammy Award history, receiving 17 पुरस्कार ; other accolades शामिल 12 एमटीवी Video Music Awards, 7 Billboard पुरस्कार including a मिलेनियम Award, and a star on the Hollywood Walk of कीर्ति as भाग of नियति 's Child.
`` Angry All the Time '' is the title of a सोंग लिखा by Bruce robison और first अंकित on his 1998 एल्बम लपेटा.
It थी later covered by टिम McGraw साथ अतिथि vocalist Faith हिल.
Released in जुलाई 2001, McGraw 's संस्करण was the दूसरी single इससे McGraw 's नियत इस सर्कस Down album.
The song reached क्रमांक One on the Billboard Hot देश Singles & ट्रैक्स ( now hot देश गीतों ) चार्ट.
डिअर John is a 2010 American रोमांटिक नाटक - war film अभिनीत Amanda Seyfried और Channing Tatum.
it was released theatrically in उत्तर America on February 5, 2010.
The film was निर्देशित by lasse hallström, और it is an adaptation of Nicholas स्पार्क्स 's novel of the same name.
it फ़ॉलो the जीवन of a सिपाही ( चेनिंग Tatum ) बाद he जलप्रपात in प्रेम with a young स्त्री ( Amanda seyfried ).
They decide to exchange letters to each अन्य after he is deployed to the युद्ध.
the movie was filmed in 2009 in Charleston, दक्षिण कैरोलिना.
despite receiving negative समीक्षाएँ, the film बना a strong बक्सा office प्रदर्शन, knocking off Avatar बाद seven weekends in पहला place and grossing a total of $ 114,977,104 worldwide.
the film was released on May 25, 2010 on DVD and blu-ray.
ये हैं सूचियाँ of the busiest airports in the संयुक्त राज्य.
hartsfield–jackson अटलांटा अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र is the व्यस्ततम सिंगल airport in the संयुक्त राज्य.

Santa fe ( ; ( tewa : Ogha Po'oge, ) ) is the पूंजी of the U.S. state of New Mexico.
It is the fourth-largest city in the राज्य and is the seat of.
सांता fe ( meaning “holy faith” in स्पेनी ) had a जनसांख्यिकी of 67,947 in the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
It is the प्रिंसिपल नगर of a महानगर Statistical Area which encompasses all of Santa fe काउंटी and is part of the larger albuquerque-santa fe-las वेगास संयुक्त Statistical Area.
The city’s पूरा name जब founded was la Villa Real de la सांता fé de San Francisco de asís ( “The royal कस्बा of the Holy आस्था of St. फ्रांसिस of assisi” ).
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase as pepsi, formerly stylized in uppercase as PEPSI ) is a carbonated soft drink कि is produced और manufactured by पेप्सिको.
Created and विकसित in 1893 and introduced as Brad 's Drink, it थी renamed as Pepsi-Cola on अगस्त 28, 1898, तब to पेप्सी in 1961.
1765 Broadside
the Sons of स्वतंत्रता was a group consisting of अमरीकी देशप्रेमी कि originated in the pre-independence उत्तर अमरीकी British colonies.
the समूह थी formed to protect the rights of the colonists and to take to the streets विरूद्ध the taxes by the British सरकारी.
They हैं best known लिये undertaking the Boston चाय पार्टी in 1773, which led to the असहनीय Acts ( an तीव्र crackdown by the British government ), और a counter-mobilization by the Patriots.
Osaka किला
is a city in the Kansai प्रदेश of जापानी 's प्रमुख island of Honshu, a designated नगर अंतर्गत the लोकल Autonomy Law, the capital city of Osaka प्रीफ़ेक्चर और also the largest भाग of the keihanshin metropolis, जिससे comprises तीन major cities of जापानी, Kyoto, Osaka और कोबे.
Located at the mouth of the Yodo River on ओसाका खाड़ी, ओसाका is Japan 's तीसरा largest city by population after टोकियो ( special wards ) and Yokohama.
keihanshin is the दूसरी largest metropolitan area in जापानी by जनसांख्यिकी and एक of the largest महानगर areas highly ranked in the संसार, with nearly 19 लाख लोगों, and by GDP the second largest क्षेत्रफल in जापानी और the seventh largest area in the संसार.
historically the वाणिज्यिक center of जापानी, Osaka कृत्यों as एक of the command centers लिये the जापानी economy.
the अनुपात between दिन और रात्रि समय population is 141 %, the highest in जापानी, highlighting इसके status as an economic center.
Its nighttime जनसांख्यिकी is 2.6 लाख, the third in the देश, but in daytime the जनसांख्यिकी surges to 3.7 million, दूसरी तभी after टोकियो ( combining the special wards of Tokyo, which is नहीं a single incorporated city, लिये सांख्यिकीय purposes ; see the टोकियो आलेख for अधिक information on the definition and मेकअप of टोकियो ).
Osaka प्रयुक्त to be referred to as the in feudal ईदो काल क्युकी it थी the केन्द्र of trading for rice, बनाना the पहला modern futures exchange market in the संसार.
the छोटी Mermaid is a 1989 American एनिमेटेड musical काल्पनिक film उत्पादित by Walt डिज़्नी Feature Animation and distributed by Walt डिज़्नी Pictures.
Based on the डैनिश fairy tale by Hans ईसाई Andersen, The छोटी मरमेड tells the स्टोरी of a beautiful मरमेड जो dreams of becoming human.
Written, directed, and produced by Ron Clements और जॉन musker, with music by Alan Menken and हावर्ड ashman, the फिल्मी features the आवाज़ें jodi बेंसन, Christopher डेनियल Barnes, Pat Carroll, Samuel E. Wright, Jason Marin, Kenneth Mars, दोस्त Hacket, और रेने auberjonois.
The 28th फिल्मी in the Walt Disney एनिमेटेड Classics श्रेणी, the Little मरमेड थी released to theaters on नवम्बर 14, 1989 to largely positive समीक्षाएँ, garnering $ 84 million at the बक्सा दफ्तर during its आरंभिक रिलीज, और $ 211 लाख in total lifetime सकल.
बाद the success of the 1988 Disney / amblin फिल्मी Who Framed Roger खरगोश, the छोटी मरमेड is दिए credit for श्वास जीवन back into the art of Disney animated विशेषता films after a स्ट्रिंग of नाजुक or वाणिज्यिक असफलताओं produced by Disney that dated back to the जल्दी 1970s.
It भी marked the start of the era known as the डिज़्नी पुनर्जागरण.
A स्टेज अनुकूलन of the फिल्मी with a किताब by Doug Wright और additional songs by Alan menken and नई गीतों ग्लेन स्लेटर खोली in Denver in July 2007 और began प्रदर्शन on Broadway January 10, 2008.

Purple पिया is a कठबोली term लिये a recreational ड्रग लोकप्रिय in the hip हॉप community in the दक्षिणी संयुक्त States, originating in Houston, Texas.
इसके प्रमुख संघटक is prescription -strength cough सिरप containing codeine और promethazine.
Cough सिरप is typically मिश्रित with ingredients such as sprite soft drink or पहाड़ ओस और pieces of Jolly rancher कैंडी.
The purplish hue of जामुनी drank आता from dyes in the cough syrup.
There are numerous कठबोली शर्तें लिये purple drank, सहित sizzurp, lean, सिरप, पिया, barre, जामुनी jelly, Texas चाय, और Tsikuni.
first/given, मध्य, and last/family/surname diagram with J. S. Bach as उदाहरण.
J. S. बच साझा his दिए name साथ छह तात्कालिक family सदस्यों and many विस्तारित family सदस्यों.
he shared his परिवार नाम साथ most परिवार members.
A दिए नाम, in Western contexts प्रायः referred to as a first name, is a personal name कि specifies and differentiates between members of a group of individuals, especially in a family, सब of जिनकी members usually share the same family name ( उपनाम ).
a दिए name is purposefully दिए, usually by a चाइल्ड 's parents at or near जनम, in कंट्रास्ट to an inherited एक such as a परिवार नाम.
a दिए नाम is sometimes legally बदला through a नाम change.
दिए names हैं प्रायः used in a familiar and दोस्ताना manner in informal परिस्थितियों.
in more औपचारिक परिस्थितियों the surname is प्रयुक्त बजाय, unless it is जरुरी to फर्क between people साथ the same surname.
The idiom `` on a first-name basis '' ( or `` on first-name terms '' ) alludes to the अपनेपन of addressing another by a given name.
the western स्टाइल of having both a परिवार name ( surname ) and a दिए name is far from सार्वभौमिक.
In अनेक देशों it is आम लिये ordinary लोगों to have only एक name ( a mononym ).
हाइड्रोक्लोरिक acid is a साफ, colourless solution of hydrogen chloride ( h cl ) in जल.
it is a अत्यधिक क्षयकारी, strong खनिज acid with many औद्योगिक उपयोग.
हाइड्रोक्लोरिक एसिड is found naturally in gastric एसिड.
Historically called muriatic एसिड, and spirits of नमक, हाइड्रोक्लोरिक एसिड was produced from vitriol ( sulfuric acid ) और आम नमक.
it पहला appeared during the Renaissance, और तब it थी used by chemists such as glauber, Priestley and डेवी in their scientific research.
With प्रमुख production starting in the Industrial क्रान्ति, हाइड्रोक्लोरिक acid is used in the chemical industry as a chemical अभिकर्मक in the large-scale production of विनाइल chloride for पीवीसी प्लास्टिक, और MDI / tdi for polyurethane.
It has numerous smaller-scale अनुप्रयोग, including household cleaning, production of gelatin and other food additives, descaling, and चमड़े processing.
परिचय 20 million tonnes of हाइड्रोक्लोरिक एसिड हैं उत्पादित annually.
Wheat ( triticum spp. ) is a खाद्यान्न grain, originally इससे the levant region of the Near East and Ethiopian हाइलैंड्स, but now cultivated worldwide.
In 2010, संसार उत्पादन of wheat was 651 million tons, making it the तीसरा most-produced cereal बाद maize ( 844 million टन ) और rice ( 672 लाख tons ).
Wheat was the दूसरी most-produced खाद्यान्न in 2009 ; world उत्पादन in that साल थी 682 million tons, बाद मक्का ( 817 million टन ), और with राइस as a close third ( 679 million टन ).
इस अनाज is grown on अधिक land क्षेत्रफल than कोई other commercial food.
संसार trade in wheat is greater than लिये सब other फसलों संयुक्त.
globally, गेहूं is the leading source of vegetable protein in इंसान food, having a higher protein content than soybeans or the other प्रमुख cereals, मक्का ( मकई ) or राइस.
in terms of कुल production tonnages प्रयुक्त लिये food, it is currently second to rice as the प्रमुख human food क्रॉप and ahead of maize, बाद allowing for maize 's अधिक extensive use in एनिमल फ़ीड्स.
गेहूं was a key factor enabling the emergence of city-based societies at the start of सभ्यता because it was एक of the पहला crops कि could be easily cultivated on a large scale, and had the additional लाभ of yielding a कटाई that provides long-term storage of खाना.
Wheat contributed to the emergence of city-states in the Fertile crescent, सहित the Babylonian और Assyrian empires.
गेहूं grain is a staple खाना used to make आटा for leavened, flat और steamed breads, बिस्कुट, कुकीज़, cakes, breakfast खाद्यान्न, pasta, noodles, couscous and for fermentation to मेक beer, अन्य alcoholic पेय, or biofuel.
गेहूं is planted to a सीमित extent as a forage crop for पशुधन, and इसके straw can be प्रयुक्त as a construction सामग्री for roofing thatch.
The whole अनाज can be milled to leave बस the भ्रूणपोष लिये श्वेत आटा.
The by-products of this are चोकर और germ.
the whole grain is a concentrated source of विटामिन, minerals, and protein, जबकि the refined grain is mostly starch.
Printing
To publish is to मेक content available to the सामान्य पब्लिक.
While विशिष्ट उपयोग of the पद may vary among countries, it is usually applied to टेक्स्ट, images, or अन्य audio-visual content on any परंपरागत medium, सहित paper ( अखबारों, magazines, catalogs, इत्यादि. ).
The शब्द प्रकाशन means the act of प्रकाशन, and also refers to कोई printed नक़ल.
Melissa & Joey is an ABC परिवार original television श्रेणी अभिनीत मेलिसा जोन Hart and जॉय Lawrence.
it first aired on ABC Family on अगस्त 17, 2010.
The series follows लोकल राजनेता Mel Burke ( मेलिसा जोन हार्ट ) and Joe Longo ( जॉय Lawrence ), जिसको Mel hires to look after her niece और nephew after a Ponzi योजना leaves उसे broke.
The series was नवीनीकृत by ABC Family for a दूसरी ऋतु of पंद्रह एपीसोड, जिससे began airing on May 30, 2012 and ended on August 29, 2012.
Melissa & जॉय ranks as केबल TV 's # 1 telecast at 8 o'clock आरपार target ऑडियंस 18–34, 18–49 and 12–34 demographics.
on अगस्त 17, 2012, एबीसी Family renewed मेलिसा & Joey for a तीसरा ऋतु, नियत to premiere in spring 2013.
The धर्मं व्हील, प्रायः used to represent the प्रतिष्ठित eightfold पाथ
the प्रतिष्ठित Eightfold Path (, ) is एक of the प्रिंसिपल शिक्षाओं of the Buddha, जो वर्णित it as the रास्ता अग्रणी to the cessation of suffering ( dukkha ) and the उपलब्धि of self-awakening.
it is used to develop insight into the true nature of phenomena ( or reality ) और to eradicate लोभ, hatred, and delusion.
the प्रतिष्ठित eightfold Path is the चौथी of the Buddha 's चार प्रतिष्ठित सच्चाई ; the first element of the Noble Eightfold पाथ is, in फेरे, an understanding of the Four Noble Truths.
it is also ज्ञात as the मध्य पाथ or मध्य रास्ता.
सब eight elements of the पाथ begin साथ the शब्द `` सही '', which translates the word samyañc ( in संस्कृत ) or sammā ( in Pāli ).
ये denote completion, togetherness, और coherence, और can भी सुझाएँ the senses of `` perfect '' or `` ideal ''.
'Samma ' is भी translated as `` wholesome '', `` हिकमत '' और `` skillful ''.
in Buddhist प्रतीकवाद, the प्रतिष्ठित eightfold Path is प्रायः represented by अर्थात् of the dharma wheel ( dharmachakra ), जिनकी आठ spokes represent the आठ elements of the पाथ.
the Grammy पुरस्कार for Song of the Year is an honor presented at the Grammy पुरस्कार, a रस्म that थी स्थापित in 1958 और originally called the Gramophone Awards.
Awards in अनेक categories हैं वितरित annually by the नेशनल अकादमी of Recording कला and Sciences of the संयुक्त राज्य to `` honor artistic achievement, तकनीकी proficiency और overall excellence in the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग, बगैर regard to एल्बम sales or chart position. ''
अर्थशास्त्र is the social विज्ञान that analyzes the production, distribution, and consumption of goods and सेवाएं.
the पद economics आता from the प्राचीन यूनानी ( ', `` management of a household, प्रशासन '' ) from ( ', `` हाउस '' ) + ( ', `` कस्टम '' or `` law '' ), hence `` rules of the house ( hold ) ''.
राजनैतिक अर्थव्यवस्था थी the पहले name for the subject, लकिन अर्थशास्त्रियों in the late 19th century suggested `` economics '' as a shorter term for `` आर्थिक विज्ञान '' that also avoided a narrow political-interest connotation and as similar in form to `` गणित ``, `` ethics '', और so forth.
A focus of the subject is कैसा economic agents behave or interact और how economies work.
Consistent साथ this, a primary textbook भेद is between microeconomics और macroeconomics.
Microeconomics examines the behavior of मौलिक तत्व in the अर्थव्यवस्था, including individual agents ( ऐसे as households and firms or as buyers and विक्रेता ) और बाज़ार, और their interactions.
Macroeconomics analyzes the entire economy और issues affecting it, सहित बेरोजगारी, inflation, आर्थिक growth, and monetary and फिस्कल policy.
अन्य व्यापक भेद include those between positive अर्थशास्त्र ( describing `` what is '' ) and normative अर्थशास्त्र ( advocating `` what ought to be '' ) ; between economic theory और लागू economics ; between rational और behavioral economics ; और between मुख्यधारा economics ( more `` orthodox '' and dealing with the `` rationality-individualism-equilibrium nexus '' ) और शास्त economics ( more `` कट्टरपंथी '' और dealing साथ the `` institutions-history-social ढांचा नेक्सस '' ).
Economic विश्लेषण may be लागू throughout society, as in business, finance, स्वास्थ्य care, और सरकारी, लकिन also to such diverse विषय as crime, education, the परिवार, law, राजनीती, religion, सोशल institutions, war, and science.
At the turn of the 21st century, the expanding domain of economics in the सोशल sciences has महरूम described as economic साम्राज्यवाद.
An increasing क्रमांक of economists have called for increased जोर on environmental स्थिरता ; इस area of research is known as ecological अर्थशास्त्र.

जरूरी निष्कर्षों for drugs to be placed in this schedule:
The drug or अन्य substance has a कम संभावित for abuse सापेक्ष to the drugs or other substances in अनुसूची III.
the drug or other पदार्थ has a currently स्वीकृत चिकित्सा use in उपचार in the संयुक्त States.
Abuse of the drug or अन्य पदार्थ may lead to सीमित शारीरिक dependence or मनोवैज्ञानिक dependence relative to the दवाएँ or अन्य substances in अनुसूची iii.
The complete सूची of Schedule iv drugs हैं as फ़ॉलो.
the प्रशासनिक Controlled Substances Code क्रमांक लिये each drug is शामिल.
us काउंटी household median income 2009.
मध्य us household income, 2001-2011
household आय is a माप commonly प्रयुक्त by the संयुक्त States government and private संस्थानों.
प्रत्येक household is measured by the आय of every resident over the आयु of 15.
Income शामिल मजदूरी और salaries, बेरोजगारी insurance, विकलांगता भुगतान, child support भुगतान received, regular rental receipts, as well as any personal business, investment, or other kinds of आय प्राप्त routinely.
जबकि inflation-adjusted ( `` रियल '' ) household income had महरूम increasing लगभग प्रत्येक year इससे 1945 to 1999, it has since been flat and भी decreased recently.
u.S. मध्य household income fell from $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011.
चरम poverty in the संयुक्त राज्य, meaning households living on कम than $ 2 per दिन before government लाभ, doubled from 1996 to 1.5 लाख households in 2011, सहित 2.8 million children.
The residents of the household do नहीं have to be सम्बन्धित to the सिर of the household लिये their आय to be माना भाग of the household 's आय.
As households tend to share a समान economic कॉन्टेक्स्ट, the use of household income remains among the सबसे widely accepted measures of income.
कि the size of a household is not commonly taken into account in such उपायों may distort any विश्लेषण of fluctuations within or among the household income categories, and may render direct comparisons between quintiles difficult or even impossible.
the lapse rate is defined as the रेट of decrease साथ height लिये an atmospheric परिवर्तनीय.
The परिवर्तनीय involved is तापमान unless specified otherwise.
The शब्दावली arises from the शब्द बीतने in the sense of a घटी or मनाही.
जबकि most often लागू to धरती 's माहौल the concept can be extended to any gravitationally supported ball of गैस.
ब्लू Mountain State is an अमरीकी कॉमेडी series कि premiered on स्पाइक on जनवरी 11, 2010.
The श्रेणी निर्माता include क्रिस Romano और Eric falconer, and it is उत्पादित by Lionsgate टेलीविज़न.

it portrays निश्चित aspects of American university जीवन, सहित फ़ुटबॉल, sex, binge पीने, दवाएँ, wild पार्टी, and hazing.
In फ़रवरी 2012, it was reported कि Blue Mountain State होता not be नवीनीकृत लिये a fourth ऋतु.
In March 2013, Ed marinaro stated that he is working on a ब्लू पहाड़ राज्य फिल्मी.
ठहराना Inc., formerly ठहराना कंप्यूटर, inc., is an American बहुराष्ट्रीय corporation headquartered in Cupertino, कैलिफ़ोर्निया that designs, develops, और sells उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स, computer software and निजी कंप्यूटर.
Its best-known hardware उत्पाद are the मैक लकीर of computers, the ipod म्यूज़िक खिलाड़ी, the iPhone smartphone, and the iPad tablet कंप्यूटर.
Its तन्त्र includes the os X और आईओएस ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों, the iTunes मीडिया browser, the safari वेब ब्राउजर, and the ilife and iwork रचनात्मकता और उत्पादन suites.
The कम्पनी थी संस्थापित on अप्रैल 1, 1976, और incorporated as Apple Computer, inc. on जनवरी 3, 1977.
The word `` कंप्यूटर '' was removed इससे इसके name on January 9, 2007, reflecting इसके shifted फ़ोकस towards उपभोक्ता electronics after the परिचय of the iPhone.
Apple is the world 's second-largest सूचना technology कम्पनी by आय after Samsung इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स, और the संसार 's third-largest मोबाईल phone मेकर बाद Samsung and Nokia.
सौभाग्य magazine नामित Apple the सबसे admired company in the संयुक्त राज्य in 2008, and in the संसार इससे 2008 to 2012.
however, the company रै प्राप्त criticism for its contractors ' labor practices, and for ठहराना 's own environmental और कारोबार practices.
, Apple maintains 394 retail stores in चौदह देशों as well as the online ठहराना स्टोर और itunes स्टोर.
It is the second-largest सरेआम traded corporation in the world by मार्केट capitalization, with an estimated मान of US $ 414 अरब as of जनवरी 2013.
, the company था 72,800 permanent full-time employees और 3,300 अस्थाई full-time employees worldwide.
Its विश्वव्यापी सालाना revenue in 2012 totalled $ 156 अरब.
Section 8 आवास in the दक्षिण bronx
Section 8 of the आवास Act of 1937 ( ), often बस known as खण्ड 8, as repeatedly amended, authorizes the भुगतान of rental आवास assistance to private landlords on निमित्त of approximately 3.1 million low-income households.
It operates through अनेक programs, the largest of जिससे, the आवास चुनाव वाउचर program, pays a large portion of the rents and उपयोगिताएँ of about 2.1 million households.
The US विभाग of आवास and Urban विकास manages the Section 8 programs.
the आवास चुनाव Voucher कार्यक्रम provides `` tenant-based '' rental सहायता, so a किरायेदार can move इससे one ईकाई of at least न्यूनतम housing quality to another.
It भी allows individuals to लागू their मासिक voucher towards the purchase of a home, साथ over $ 17 billion going towards such purchases each साल ( इससे ncsha.org विश्लेषण ).
The अधिकतम अनुमत वाउचर is $ 2200 a month.
Section 8 भी authorizes a किस्में of `` project-based '' rental सहायता कार्यक्रम, under which the owner reserves some or all of the इकाई in a भवन for low-income किरायेदारों, in वापसी for a संघीय government guarantee to make up the अंतर between the किरायेदार 's contribution and the rent for 1 cent in the मालिक 's contract with the government.
a किरायेदार who पत्ते a subsidized प्रोजेक्ट होगा lose अभिगम to the project-based रियायत.
The United राज्य विभाग of आवास और Urban विकास and संयुक्त राज्य Department of दिग्गजों Affairs have a special खण्ड 8 program पुकारा VASH ( दिग्गजों अफेयर्स Supportive आवास ), or hud-vash, which gives आउट a certain क्रमांक of खण्ड 8 वाउचर to योग्य बेघर and otherwise vulnerable us हथियारबंद forces veterans.
रेस्तरां categorized by type and सूचना about ये अलग प्रकार.

The इतिहास of the United States डालर कवर more than 200 years.
